verses.arabic: فِي الدُّنْيَا وَالْآخِرَةِ وَيَسْأَلُونَكَ عَنِ الْيَتَامَىٰ قُلْ إِصْلَاحٌ لَّهُمْ خَيْرٌ وَإِن تُخَالِطُوهُمْ فَإِخْوَانُكُمْ وَاللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ الْمُفْسِدَ مِنَ الْمُصْلِحِ وَلَوْ شَاءَ اللَّهُ لَأَعْنَتَكُمْ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌ
verses.transliteration: Fid-dunyaa wal- 'aakhirah; wa yas'aloonaka 'anil- yataamaa qul 'işlaahul- lahum khayr, wa 'in tukhaalitoohum fa'ikhwaanukum; wal- laahu ya'lamul-mufsida minal-muslih; wa law shaaa'al-laahu la'a'natakum; 'innal- laaha 'Azeezun Hakeem.
verses.translation: Dunya aur aakhirat ki baabat, aur log aap se yateemon ki baabat poochhte hain, kah deejiye: unki islaah karna unke liye bahut behtar hai aur agar tum apna aur unka kharch aur rahan sahan ekatthha rakkho to woh tumhaare bhaai hi hain aur Allah jaanta hai ke fasaad karne waala kaun hai aur islaah karne waala kaun, aur agar Allah chaahta to tumhein takleef mein daal deta, beshak Allah ghaalib hai, khoob hikmat waala.

verses.arabic: وَلَا تَنكِحُوا الْمُشْرِكَاتِ حَتَّىٰ يُؤْمِنَّ وَلَأَمَةٌ مُّؤْمِنَةٌ خَيْرٌ مِّن مُّشْرِكَةٍ وَلَوْ أَعْجَبَتْكُمْ وَلَا تُنكِحُوا الْمُشْرِكِينَ حَتَّىٰ يُؤْمِنُوا وَلَعَبْدٌ مُّؤْمِنٌ خَيْرٌ مِّن مُّشْرِكٍ وَلَوْ أَعْجَبَكُمْ أُولَٰئِكَ يَدْعُونَ إِلَى النَّارِ وَاللَّهُ يَدْعُو إِلَى الْجَنَّةِ وَالْمَغْفِرَةِ بِإِذْنِهِ وَيُبَيِّنُ آيَاتِهِ لِلنَّاسِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laa tankihul- mushrikaati hattaa yu'minn; wa laʼamatum- mu'minatun khayrum- mim-mushrikatiñw-wa law 'a'jabatkum; wa laa tunkihul-mushrikeena hattaa yu'minoo; wa la'abdum-mu'minun khayrum-mim- mushrikiñw-wa law 'ajabakum; 'ulaaa'ika yad'oona 'ilan-Naari wal- laahu yad'ooo 'ilal- Jannati wal-maghfirati bi'iznihee wa yubayyinu 'Aayaatihee la'allahum yatazakkaroon.
verses.translation: Aur tum mushrik a'uraton se nikaah na karo yahaan tak ke woh eemaan le aayein, albattah ek eemaan waali laundi mushrik a'urat se behtar hai agarcheh woh tumhein bhali hi lage aur tum (musalmaan a'uratein) mushrik mardon¹ ke nikaah mein na do yahaan tak ke woh eemaan le aayen, albattah momin ghulaam mushrik se behtar hai agarcheh woh tumhein bhala hi lage. yeh (mushrik to) dozakh ki taraf bulaate hain aur Allah apne hukm se tumhein jannat aur bakhshish ki taraf bulaata hai aur woh logon ke liye apni aayatein bayaan karta hai taake woh naseehat haasil karein.
verses.deepMeaning: (Mushrik) woh kaafir aur but parast waghairah jo Allah ki wahdaaniyat aur Muhammad ﷺ ki resaalat ke munkir hon.

verses.arabic: وَيَسْأَلُونَكَ عَنِ الْمَحِيضِ قُلْ هُوَ أَذًى فَاعْتَزِلُوا النِّسَاءَ فِي الْمَحِيضِ وَلَا تَقْرَبُوهُنَّ حَتَّىٰ يَطْهُرْنَ فَإِذَا تَطَهَّرْنَ فَأْتُوهُنَّ مِنْ حَيْثُ أَمَرَكُمُ اللَّهُ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُحِبُّ التَّوَّابِينَ وَيُحِبُّ الْمُتَطَهِّرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa yas'aloonaka 'anil-maheedi qul-huwa 'azan faʻtazilun-nisaaa'a fil-maheedi wa laa taqraboo hunna hattaa yathurna fa'izaa tatahharna fa'toohunna min haysu 'amarakumul- laah; 'innal-laaha yuhibbut-Tawwaabeena wa yuhibbul- mutatahhireen.
verses.translation: Aur (Aye Nabi!) log aapse haiz ke baare mein sawaal karte hain. kah deejiye: woh to gandagi hai, tum haiz (ki haalat) mein a'uraton se alag raho aur unse humbistari na karo yahaan tak ke woh paak ho jaayein, phir jab woh paak ho jaayein to unke paas jaao jahaan se Allah ne tumhein hukm diya hai, beshak Allah tauba karne waalon ko pasand karta hai aur paal saaf rahne waalon ko pasand karta hai.

verses.arabic: نِسَاؤُكُمْ حَرْثٌ لَّكُمْ فَأْتُوا حَرْثَكُمْ أَنَّىٰ شِئْتُمْ وَقَدِّمُوا لِأَنفُسِكُمْ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَاعْلَمُوا أَنَّكُم مُّلَاقُوهُ وَبَشِّرِ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.transliteration: Nisaaa'ukum harsul- lakum fa'too harsakum 'annaa shi'tum wa qaddimoo li'anfusikum; wattaqul-laaha wa'lamooo 'annakum mulaaqooh; wa bashshiril-mu'mineen.
verses.translation: Tumhaari a'uratein tumhaari kheti hain, pas tum jis tarah chaaho apni kheti mein aao aur tum apni zaat ke liye (nek amal) aage bhejo aur Allah se daro aur jaan lo ke beshak (ek din) tumhein unse milna hai aur mominon ko khushkhabri suna deejiye.

verses.arabic: وَلَا تَجْعَلُوا اللَّهَ عُرْضَةً لِّأَيْمَانِكُمْ أَن تَبَرُّوا وَتَتَّقُوا وَتُصْلِحُوا بَيْنَ النَّاسِ وَاللَّهُ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa laa taj'alul-laaha 'urdatal-li'aymaanikum 'an tabarroo wa tattaqoo wa tuşlihoo baynan- naas; wal-laahu Samee'un 'Aleem.
verses.translation: Aur tum Allah ka naam apni qasmon¹ ke liye iste'maal na karo, yeh ke tum neki (nahin) karoge aur taqwa (nahin) apnaaoge aur logon ke darmiyaan sulah (nahin) karaaoge aur Allah khoob sunne waala, khoob jaanne waala hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Qasmon ki qismein hain. dekhiye haashyah (Surah Maayidah:5/89)

verses.arabic: لَا يُؤَاخِذُكُمُ اللَّهُ بِاللَّغْوِ فِي أَيْمَانِكُمْ وَلَٰكِن يُؤَاخِذُكُم بِمَا كَسَبَتْ قُلُوبُكُمْ وَاللَّهُ غَفُورٌ حَلِيمٌ
verses.transliteration: Laa yu'aakhizukumul-laahu bil-laghwi feee 'aymaanikum wa laakiny-yu'aakhizukum bimaa kasabat quloobukum; wal-laahu Ghafoorun Raleem.
verses.translation: Allah tumhaari laghw qasmon par tumhein nahin pakdega lekin woh un qasmon par tumhein zaroor pakdega jinka tumhaare dilon ne iraadah kiya, aur Allah bahut bakhshne waala, nehaayat hausle waala hai.

verses.arabic: لِلَّذِينَ يُؤْلُونَ مِنْ نِسَائِهِمْ تَرَبُّصُ أَرْبَعَةِ أَشْهُرٍ ۚ فَإِنْ فَاءُ وَ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.transliteration: Lillazeena yu'loona min-nisaaa'ihim tarabbuşu 'arba'ati 'ashhurin fa'in faaa'oo fa'innal-laaha Ghafoorur- Raheem.
verses.translation: jo log apni a'uraton ke paas na jaane ki qasam khaa lete hain¹ unhein chaahiye ke chaar maah intezaar karen, phir agar woh ruju' kar len to beshak Allah bahut bakhshne waala, bada raham waala hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Ise (Eila) kaha jaata hai jiska matlab hai: 'Beewi se ta'alluq na rakhne ki qasam khaa lena.' Abdullah bin Umar  رضي الله عنها farmaya karte the: 'Kisi shakhs ke liye iske elaawah koyi aur soorat jaayez nahin use chaahiye ke woh muddat guzar jaane ke ba'd ya to beewi ko aam dastoor ke mutaabiq ghar mein rakkhe ya phi ise talaaq de.' (Bukhari, Baab:21, Hadees:5290) Aap hi ka yeh qaul bhi hai: 'Chaar maah guzarne par mard ko majboor kiya jaaye ke woh apni qasam se ruju' kare ya biwi ko talaaq de aur jab tak shauhar (saaf lafzon mein) talaaq na de, talaaq waaqe' nahin hogi.' Usmaan, Ali, Abu Dardaa, Aayeshah aur mazeed baarah sahaaba رَضِيَ اللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ ka bhi yahi moqif hai. (Bukhari:Baab:21,5291).

verses.arabic: وَ إِنْ عَزَمُوا الطَّلَاقَ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ س عَلِيمٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'in 'azamut- talaaqa fa'innal-laaha Samee'un 'Aleem.
verses.translation: Aur agar unhon ne talaaq hi ki thhaan li ho to beshak Allah khoob sunne waala, khoob jaanne waala hai.

verses.arabic: والحَمَتْ يَتَرَبَّصْنَ بِأَنْفُسِهِنَّ ثةَ قُرُوءٍ وَ لَا يَحِلُّ لَهُنَّ أن يَنْتُمْنَ مَا خَلَقَ اللهُ فِي حَامِهِنَّ إِنْ كُنْ يُؤْمِنَ بِاللَّهِ وَ الْيَوْمِ الْآخِرِ وَ بُعُولَتُهُنَّ أَحَقُّ بِرَدِّهِنَّ فِي ذَلِكَ إِنْ أَرَادُوا إصْلَاحًا ۖ وَ لَهُنَّ مِثْلُ الَّذِي عَلَيْهِنَّ بِالْمَعْرُوفِ وَ لِلرِّجَالِ عَلَيْهِنَّ دَرَجَهُ وَ اللَّهُ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌ
verses.transliteration: Walmutal-laqaatu yatarab-başna salaasata bi'anfusihinna qurooo'; wa laa yahillu lahunna 'añy-yaktumna maa khalagal-laahu feee 'arhaamihinna 'in kunna yu'minna billaahi wal- yawmil-'aakhir; wa bu'oolatuhunna 'ahaqqu biraddihinna fee zaalika 'in 'araadooo 'islaahaa; wa lahunna mislul-lazee 'alayhinna bilma'roof; wa lirrijjaali 'alayhinna darajah; wal-laahu 'Azeezun Hakeem.
verses.translation: Aur muta'allaqah a'uratein teen haiz tak apne aapko intezaar mein rakkhein aur unke liye jaayez nahin ke Allah ne unke pet mein jo kuchh paida kiya hai use chhupaayein.agar woh Allah aur yaum-e-aakhirat par eemaan rakhti hain (to aisa hargiz na karein) aur unke khaawind agar islaah ka iraadah rakhte hon to woh ziyaadah haq daar hain ke unhein iss (muddat) mein lauta len, aur dastoor ke mutaabiq a'uraton ke liye mardon par waise hi huqooq hain jaise mardon ke liye a'uraton par hain aur mardon ke liye un par ek fazeelat hai aur Allah ghaalib, khoob hikmat waala hai.

verses.arabic: ٱلطَّلَٰقُ مَرَّتَانِۖ فَإِمْسَاكٌۢ بِمَعْرُوفٍ أَوْ تَسْرِيحٌۢ بِإِحْسَٰنٍۗ وَلَا يَحِلُّ لَكُمْ أَن تَأْخُذُوا۟ مِمَّآ ءَاتَيْتُمُوهُنَّ شَيْـًٔا إِلَّآ أَن يَخَافَآ أَلَّا يُقِيمَا حُدُودَ ٱللَّهِۖ فَإِنْ خِفْتُمْ أَلَّا يُقِيمَا حُدُودَ ٱللَّهِ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْهِمَا فِيمَا ٱفْتَدَتْ بِهِۦۗ تِلْكَ حُدُودُ ٱللَّهِ فَلَا تَعْتَدُوهَاۚ وَمَن يَتَعَدَّ حُدُودَ ٱللَّهِ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Attalaaqua marrataani fa'imsaakum bima'roofin 'aw tasreehum bi'ihsaan; wa laa yahillu lakum 'an ta'khuzoo mimmaaa 'aataytumoohunna shay'an 'illaaa 'any- yakhaafaaa 'allaa yuqeemaa hudoodal- laahi fa'in khiftum 'allaa yuqeemaa hudoodal- laahi falaa junaaha 'Alayhimaa feemaf-tadat bihee tilka hudoodul- laahi falaa taʻtadoohaa; wa mañy-yata'adda hudoodal-laahi fa'ulaaa'ika humuz- zaalimoon.
verses.translation: Talaaq (raja'ee) do martabah hai, phir ya to (a'urat ko) dastoor ke mutaabiq rok liya jaaye ya bhlaayi ke saath chhod diya jaaye aur tumhaare liye yeh jaayez nahin ke tum unhein jo de chuke ho, uss mein se kuchh waapas lo, illa yeh ke donon ko dar ho ke woh Allah ki hadein qaayem na rakh sakenge. pas agar tumhen dar ho ke woh donon Allah ki hadein qaayen na rakh sakenge to un donon par koyi gunaah nahin ke a'urat fidye mein woh maaal de (kar khula¹ haasil karle) yeh Allah ki hadein hain, so tum unse aage na badho, aur jo log Allah ki hadon se tajaawuz karte hain, wahi zaalim hain.
verses.deepMeaning: (Khula') koyi aurat agar apne shauhar se alaahidgi haasil karna chaahe to ba'z sharaayet ke saath mahar waapas karke talaaq le sakti hai ise sharayi istelaah mein 'Khul'a' kahte hain. ya'ni aurat ka khud koshish karke talaaq haasil karna. Ibne Abbaas ضي الله عنها se marvi hai: Saabit bin Qais  رضي الله عنه ki beewi ne arz kiya: 'Yaa Rasoolallah! Main Saabit bin Qais ki deendaari aur akhlaaq par to koyi aib nahin lagaati lekin main pasand nahin karti ke musalmaan ho kar shauhar ki naa shukri ka gunaah mol lun.' Chunaancheh Nabi Akram ﷺ ne mahar mein diya huwa baagh waapas dilwaaya aur Saabit se yun farmaya: 'Apna baagh waapas le lo aur ise talaaq de do.' (Bukhari, Baab:12, Hadees:5273).

verses.arabic: فَإِن طَلَّقَهَا فَلَا تَحِلُّ لَهُۥ مِنۢ بَعْدُ حَتَّىٰ تَنكِحَ زَوْجًا غَيْرَهُۥۗ فَإِن طَلَّقَهَا فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْهِمَآ أَن يَتَرَاجَعَآ إِن ظَنَّآ أَن يُقِيمَا حُدُودَ ٱللَّهِۗ وَتِلْكَ حُدُودُ ٱللَّهِ يُبَيِّنُهَا لِقَوْمٍۢ يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Fa'in tallaqahaa falaa tahillu lahoo mim ba'du hattaa tankiha zawjan ghayrah; fa'in tallaqahaa falaa junaaha 'alayhimaaa 'añy- yataraaja aaa 'in zannaaa 'any-yuqeemaa hudoodal-laah; wa tilka hudoodul-laahi yubayyinuhaa liqawminy-yaʻlamoon.
verses.translation: Phir agar woh (khaawind) use (teesri) talaaq de de to uske ba'd woh (a'urat) uske liye halaal nahin yahaan tak ke woh uske e'laawah kisi aur khaawind se nikaah kare, phir agar woh bhi use talaaq de de to un donon (saabqah miyan- beewi) par koyi gunaah nahin ke aapas mein ruju' karlein agar woh donon khayaal karen ke Allah ki hadein qaayem rakh sakenge, aur yeh Allah ki hadein hain, woh unhein un logon ke liye bayaan karta hai jo i'lm rakhte hian.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا طَلَّقْتُمُ ٱلنِّسَآءَ فَبَلَغْنَ أَجَلَهُنَّ فَأَمْسِكُوهُنَّ بِمَعْرُوفٍ أَوْ سَرِّحُوهُنَّ بِمَعْرُوفٍۭ وَلَا تُمْسِكُوهُنَّ ضِرَارًۢا لِّتَعْتَدُوا۟ۚ وَمَن يَفْعَلْ ذَٰلِكَ فَقَدْ ظَلَمَ نَفْسَهُۥۚ وَلَا تَتَّخِذُوٓا۟ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ هُزُوًاۖ وَٱذْكُرُوا۟ نِعْمَتَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيْكُمْ وَمَآ أَنزَلَ عَلَيْكُم مِّنَ ٱلْكِتَٰبِ وَٱلْحِكْمَةِ يَعِظُكُم بِهِۦۚ وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'izaa tallaqtumun-nisaaa'a fabalaghna 'ajalahunna fa'amsikoohunna bima'roofin aw sarrihoohunna bima'roof; wa laa tumsikoohunna diraaral-lita'tadoo; wa mañy-yafal zaalika faqad zalama nafsah; wa laa tattakhizooo 'aayaatil-laahi huzuwaa; wazkuroo ni'matal-laahi 'alaykum wa maaa 'anzala 'alaykum minal- kitaabi wal-Hikmati yaʻizukum bih; wattaqul- laaha walamooo 'annal- laaha bikulli shay'in 'Aleem.
verses.translation: Aur jab tum a'uraton ko (pahli ya doosri) talaaq do phir unki i'ddat puri hone ko ho to unhein dastoor ke mutaabiq rok lo ya unhein dastoor ke mutaabiq chhod do aur unhein sataane ke liye na roko taake tum ziyaadati karo aur jo koyi aisa karega woh yaqeenan apne aap hi par zulm karega aur tum Allah ki aayaton ko hansi mazaaq na banaao, aur Allah ki taraf se tum par jo in'aam huwa use yaad karo aur uss kitab aur hikmat ko bhi yaad karo jo usne tum par naazil ki, woh tumhen uski nasheehat karta hai aur tum Allah se daro aur jaan lo ke beshak Allah har cheez ko khoob jaanne waala hai.

verses.arabic: و إذا طلقتم النِّسَاءَ فَبلغن أَجَلَهُنَّ فَلَا تَعْضُلُوهُنَّ أَنْ يَنْكِحُنَ أَزْوَاجَهُنَّ إِذَا تَرَاضَوا بَيْنَهُم بِالْمَعْرُوفِ ذَلِكَ يُوعَظُ بِهِ مَنْ كَانَ مِنْكُمْ يُؤْمِنُ بِاللَّهِ وَالْيَوْمِ الْآخِرِ ذَلِكُمْ أَزْكَى لَكُمْ وَ أَطْهَرُ وَاللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ وَ انْتُمْ لَا پوروور تعلمون
verses.transliteration: Wa 'izaa tallaqtumun-nisaaa'a fabalaghna 'ajalahunna falaa ta'duloo hunna 'any-yankihna 'azwaajahunna izaa taraadaw baynahum bilma'roof; zaalika yooʻazu bihee man kaana minkum yu'minu billaahi wal-yawmil- 'aakhir; zaalikum 'azkaa lakum wa 'athar; wallaahu ya'lamu wa 'antum laa taʻlamoon.
verses.translation: Aur jab tum a'uraton ko talaaq do phir woh apni i'ddat ko pahunch jaayein to tum unhein iss baat se mat roko ke woh apne (pahle) khaawindon se nikaah karein jabke woh dastoor ke mutbaaiq aapas mein raazi hon. yeh uss shakhs ko naseehat ki jaati hai jo tum mein se Allah aur aakhirat ke din par eemaan rakhta hai. tumhaare liye bahut suljha huwa aur ziyaadah paakeezah tareeqa yahi hai aur Allah jaanta hai aur tum nahin jaante.

verses.arabic: وَٱلْوَٰلِدَٰتُ يُرْضِعْنَ أَوْلَٰدَهُنَّ حَوْلَيْنِ كَامِلَيْنِ لِمَنْ أَرَادَ أَن يُتِمَّ ٱلرَّضَاعَةَۚ وَعَلَى ٱلْمَوْلُودِ لَهُۥ رِزْقُهُنَّ وَكِسْوَتُهُنَّ بِٱلْمَعْرُوفِۚ لَا تُكَلَّفُ نَفْسٌ إِلَّا وُسْعَهَاۚ لَا تُضَآرَّ وَٰلِدَةٌۢ بِوَلَدِهَا وَلَا مَوْلُودٌ لَّهُۥ بِوَلَدِهِۦۚ وَعَلَى ٱلْوَارِثِ مِثْلُ ذَٰلِكَۚ فَإِنْ أَرَادَا فِصَالًا عَن تَرَاضٍۢ مِّنْهُمَا وَتَشَاوُرٍۢ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْهِمَاۗ وَإِنْ أَرَدتُّمْ أَن تَسْتَرْضِعُوٓا۟ أَوْلَٰدَكُمْ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْكُمْ إِذَا سَلَّمْتُم مَّآ ءَاتَيْتُم بِٱلْمَعْرُوفِۗ وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Walwaalidaatu yurdi'na 'awlaadahunna hawlayni kaamilayni liman 'araada 'añy- yutimmar-radaa'ah; wa 'alal-mawloodi lahoo rizquhunna wa kiswatuhunna bilma'roof; laa tukallafu nafsun 'illaa wus'ahaa; laa tudaaarra waalidatum-biwaladihaa wa laa mawloodul-lahoo biwaladih; wa 'alal- waarisi mislu zaalik; fa'in 'araadaa Fişaalan 'an taraadim-minhumaa wa tashaawurin falaa junaaha 'alayhimaa; wa 'in 'arattum 'an tastardi'ooo 'awlaadakum falaa junaaha 'alaykum 'izaa sallamtum maaa 'aataytum bilma'roof; wattaqul-laaha wa'lamooo 'annal-laaha bimaa ta'maloona el baseer.bondpoled
verses.translation: Aur maayein apni aulaad ko pure do saal doodh pilaayein, (yeh hukm) uss shakhs ke liye hai jo doodh pilaane ki muddat puri karna chaahe (iss soorat mein baaap ke zimme hai ke un (ki  maaon ) ko dastoor ke mutaabiq khaana aur kapda de, kisi jaan par uski gunjaayish se badh kar bojh na daaala jaaye, na maan ko uske bachche ki wajah se tak;eef di jaaye aur na baap ko uske bachche ki wajah se (tang kiya jaaye) aur (agar baap mar jaaye to) uske waaris ka yahi zimma hai phir agar donon (maan baap) aapas ki razaamandi aur mashware se doodh chhudaane ka iraadah karen to un donon par kuchh gunaah nahin, aur agar tuma iraadah karo ke apni aulaadi ko kisi aur a'urat se doodh pilaao to tum par koyi gunaah nahin jabke tum iss muaa'waze ki adaayegi kardo jo tumne dastoor ke mutaabiq tay kiya ho, aur Allah se daro aur jaan lo ke beshak Allah tumhaare har amal par kadi nigaah rakhta hai jo tum karte ho.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُتَوَفَّوْنَ مِنكُمْ وَيَذَرُونَ أَزْوَٰجًا يَتَرَبَّصْنَ بِأَنفُسِهِنَّ أَرْبَعَةَ أَشْهُرٍۢ وَعَشْرًۭاۖ فَإِذَا بَلَغْنَ أَجَلَهُنَّ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْكُمْ فِيمَا فَعَلْنَ فِىٓ أَنفُسِهِنَّ بِٱلْمَعْرُوفِۗ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena yutawaffawna minkum wa yazaroona 'azwaajañy- yatarabbaşna bi'anfusihinna 'arba'ata 'ashhuriñw-wa 'ashran fa'izaa balaghna 'ajalahunna falaa junaaha 'alaykum feemaa fa'alna feee 'anfusihinna bilma'roof; wallaahu bimaa ta'maloona Khabeer
verses.translation: Aur tum mein se jo log wafaat paa jaayein aur peechhe biwiyaan chhod jaayein to woh chaar maah das din apne Aap ko intezaar mein rakkhein, phir jab unki i'ddat puri ho jaaye to tum par koyi gunaah nahin, woh apni zaat ke mu'aamle mein dastoor ke mutaabiq jo chaahein karein (unhein ikhtiyaar hai) aur Allah tumhaare har amal se khoob khabardaar hal jo tum karte ho.

verses.arabic: وَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْكُمْ فِيمَا عَرَّضْتُم بِهِۦ مِنْ خِطْبَةِ ٱلنِّسَآءِ أَوْ أَكْنَنتُمْ فِىٓ أَنفُسِكُمْۚ عَلِمَ ٱللَّهُ أَنَّكُمْ سَتَذْكُرُونَهُنَّ وَلَٰكِن لَّا تُوَاعِدُوهُنَّ سِرًّا إِلَّآ أَن تَقُولُوا۟ قَوْلًۭا مَّعْرُوفًۭاۚ وَلَا تَعْزِمُوا۟ عُقْدَةَ ٱلنِّكَاحِ حَتَّىٰ يَبْلُغَ ٱلْكِتَٰبُ أَجَلَهُۥۚ وَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعْلَمُ مَا فِىٓ أَنفُسِكُمْ فَٱحْذَرُوهُۚ وَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌ حَلِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Wa laa junaaha 'alaykum feemaa 'arradtum bihee min khitbatin-nisaaa'i 'aw 'aknantum feee 'anfusikum; 'alimal- laahu 'annakum satazkuroonahunna wa laakil-laa tuwaa'idoohunna sirran 'illaaa 'an taqooloo qawlam-ma'roofaa; wa laa ta'zimoo 'uqdatan- nikaahi hattaa yablughal-kitaabu 'ajalah; wa'lamooo 'annal-laaha ya'lamu maa feee 'anfusikum fahzarooh; wa'lamooo 'annal-laaha Ghafoorun Haleem.
verses.translation: Aur iss baat mein tum par koyl gunaah nahin ke tum a'uraton ki iddat ke dauraan unhein ishaare kinaaye mein nikaah ka paighaam do ya tum apna iraadah apne dilon mein chhupaaye rakkho. Allah jaanta hai ke be shak tum un a'uraton ka zikr zaroor karoge lekin unse nikaah ka khufyah wa'dah na karo magar yahi ke dastoor ke mutaabiq baat kaho, aur a'qd-e-nikaah ka pukhta iraadah mat karo yahaan tak ke i'ddat puri ho jaaye, aur jaan lo! beshak Allah jaanata hai jo kuchh tumhaare dilon mein hai, pas tum usse daro aur jaan lo ke beshak Allah bahut bakhshne waala, nihaayat burdbaar hai.

verses.arabic: لَّا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْكُمْ إِن طَلَّقْتُمُ ٱلنِّسَآءَ مَا لَمْ تَمَسُّوهُنَّ أَوْ تَفْرِضُوا۟ لَهُنَّ فَرِيضَةًۚ وَمَتِّعُوهُنَّ عَلَى ٱلْمُوسِعِ قَدَرُهُۥ وَعَلَى ٱلْمُقْتِرِ قَدَرُهُۥ مَتَٰعًۢا بِٱلْمَعْرُوفِۖ حَقًّۢا عَلَى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.transliteration: Laa junaaha 'alaykum 'in tallaqtumun-nisaaa'a maa lam tamassoohunna 'aw tafridoo lahunna fareedah; wa matti'oohunna 'alal- moosi'i qadaruhoo wa 'alal-muqtiri qadaruhoo mata'am bilma'roofi haqqan 'alal-muhsineen.
verses.translation: Tum par koyi gunaah nahin agar tum a'uraton ko talaaq de do jabke tumne unhein haath na lagaaya ho aur na unke liye kuchh mahar muqarrar kiya ho aur unhein kuchh maal-o-mataa' de do, us'at waale aadmi par uski haisiyat ke mutaabiq hai aur tang dast par uski haisiyat ke mutaabiq, ma'roof tareeqe se, (yeh) neki karne waalon par laazim hai.

verses.arabic: وَإِن طَلَّقْتُمُوهُنَّ مِن قَبْلِ أَن تَمَسُّوهُنَّ وَقَدْ فَرَضْتُمْ لَهُنَّ فَرِيضَةًۭ فَنِصْفُ مَا فَرَضْتُمْ إِلَّآ أَن يَعْفُونَ أَوْ يَعْفُوَا۟ ٱلَّذِى بِيَدِهِۦ عُقْدَةُ ٱلنِّكَاحِ وَأَن تَعْفُوٓا۟ أَقْرَبُ لِلتَّقْوَىٰۚ وَلَا تَنسَوُا۟ ٱلْفَضْلَ بَيْنَكُمْۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'in tallaqtumoohunna min qabli 'an tamassoohunna wa qad faradtum lahunna fareedatan fanişfu maa faradtum 'illaaa 'any-ya'foona 'aw ya'fuwal-lazee biyadihee 'uqdatun-nikaah; wa 'an ta'fooo 'aqrabu littaqwaa; wa laa tansawul-fadla baynakum; 'innal-laaha bimaa ta'maloona Başeer.
verses.translation: Aur agar tum unhein haath lagaane se pahle talaaq de do jabke tum unke liye mahar muqarrar kar chuke ho to uss (mahar) ka nisf adaa karna hoga jo tumne muqarrar kiya ho, haan! woh a'uratein chaahen to (mahar) mu'aaf kar sakti hain ya woh shakhs mu'aaf kar sakta hai jiske haath mein a'qd-e- nikaah hai aur tum maa'f kardo to yeh taqwaa ke ziyaadah qareeb hai aur tum aapas mein bhalaayi aur ehsaan ka bartaao karna mat bhoolo, beshak Allah tumhaare har amal par nigaah rakhta hai jo tum karte ho.

verses.arabic: حَٰفِظُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلصَّلَوَٰتِ وَٱلصَّلَوٰةِ ٱلْوُسْطَىٰ وَقُومُوا۟ لِلَّهِ قَٰنِتِينَ
verses.transliteration: Haafizoo 'alaş- şalawaati waş-Şalaatil- Wustaa wa qoomoo lil-laahi qaaniteen.
verses.translation: Aur tum sab namaazon. aur khaas taur par darmiyaan waali namaaz ki¹ hifaazat karo aur Allah ke saamne aa'jzi karne waale ban kar khade ho.
verses.deepMeaning: (Salaatul Usta) se muraad namaaz-e-asr hai. Rasool-e-Akram ﷺ ne farmaya: 'Jiski namaaz-e-asr qaza ho gayi to goya uska gharbaar aur maal asbaab sab lut gaya. (Bukhari:Baab:14, Hadees:552).

verses.arabic: فَإِنْ خِفْتُمْ فَرِجَالًا أَوْ رُكْبَانًا فَإِذَآ أَمِنتُمْ فَٱذْكُرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ كَمَا عَلَّمَكُم مَّا لَمْ تَكُونُوا۟ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Fa'in khiftum farijaalan 'aw rukbaanan fa'izaaa 'amintum fazkurul-laaha kamaa 'allamakum maa lam takoonoo taʻlamoon.
verses.translation: Phir agar tum khauf ki haalat mein ho to paidal ya sawaar hi (namaaz padh lo)¹, phir jab tum aman mein ho jaao to Allah ko yaad karo jis tarah usne tumhein woh sikhaaya jo tum nahin jaante the.
verses.deepMeaning: Iss mein Salaatul Khauf ka zikr hai jo zaroorat ke pesh-e-nazar payaadah aur sawaar adaa ki jaa sakti hai, sahih ahaadees mein iski ta'daad chaar aur do ke elaawah ek raka't bhi hai. iski mukhtalif sooratein hain ek hadees mein hai: Nabi ﷺ ne Ek giroh ko do raka'at namaaz padhaayi (jabke doosra giroh dushman ke muqbaail raha) phir yeh hat gaya (aur dushman ke muqaabil ho gaya) aur doosre giroh ko do raka'at namaaz padhaayi to (iss tarah) Nabi ﷺ ki chaar raka'at namaaz huyi aur deegar logon ki do do raka'at. (Muslim: Hadees:843) Mazeed tafseel: (Surah Nisa:4/102)

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُتَوَفَّوْنَ مِنكُمْ وَيَذَرُونَ أَزْوَٰجًا وَصِيَّةًۢ لِّأَزْوَٰجِهِم مَّتَٰعًا إِلَى ٱلْحَوْلِ غَيْرَ إِخْرَاجٍۚ فَإِنْ خَرَجْنَ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْكُمْ فِيمَا فَعَلْنَ فِىٓ أَنفُسِهِنَّ مِن مَّعْرُوفٍۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌ
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena yutawaffawna minkum wa yazaroona 'azwaajañw-waşiyyatal- li'azwaajihim mataa'an 'ilal-hawli ghayra 'ikhraaj; fa'in kharajna falaa junaaha 'alaykum fee maa fa'alna feee 'anfusihinna mim- ma'roof; wallaahu 'Azeezun Hakeem.
verses.translation: Aur tum mein se jo log wafaat paa jaayein aur beewiyaan chhod jaayein, aun par apni biwiyon ke haq mein wasiyyat karna (laazim) hai ke unhein kharch diya jaaye aur unko ek saal tak ghar se na nikaala jaaye, phir agar woh khud chali jaayein na to tum par iss baare mein koyi gunaah nahin jo woh dastoor ke mutaabiq apni zaat ke mu'aamle mein karein aur Allah ghaalib hai, khoob hikmat waala hai.

verses.arabic: وَلِلْمُطَلَّقَٰتِ مَتَٰعٌۢ بِٱلْمَعْرُوفِۖ حَقًّا عَلَى ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa lilmutallaqaati mataa'um-bilma'roofi haqqan 'alal-muttaqeen.
verses.translation: Aur yeh jin a'uraton ko talaaq di gayi ho unhein bhi dastoor ke mutaabiq kuchh de dila kar rukhsat kiya jaaye, (yeh) muttaqi logon par laazim hai.

verses.arabic: كَذَلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ اللَّهُ لَكُم ايته لَعَلَّكُمْ تَعْقِلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Kazaalika yubayyinul-laahu lakum 'aayaatihee laʻallakum taʻqiloon.
verses.translation: Allah isi tarah tumhaare liye apni aayaten bayaan farmaata hai ke samjho.

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ خَرَجُوا۟ مِن دِيَـٰرِهِمْ وَهُمْ أُلُوفٌ حَذَرَ ٱلْمَوْتِ فَقَالَ لَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ مُوتُوا۟ ثُمَّ أَحْيَـٰهُمْ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَذُو فَضْلٍ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَشْكُرُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Alam tara 'ilal- lazeena kharajoo min diyaarihim wa hum 'uloofun hazaral-mawti faqaaala lahumul-laahu mootoo summa 'ahyaahum; 'innal-laaha lazoo fadlin 'alan-naași wa laakinna 'aksaran- naași laa yashkuroon.
verses.translation: (Aye nabi!) kiya aapne un logon ko nahin dekha jo apne gharon se maut ke dar se nikle aur woh kayi hazaar the? pas Allah ne un se kaha: tum mar jaao! phir usne unko zindah kar diya, beshak Allah logon par fazl karne waala hai lekin aksar log shukr nahin karte.

verses.arabic: وَقَاتِلُوا۟ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Wa qaatiloo fee sabeelil-laahi waʻlamooo 'annal-laaha Samee'un 'Aleem.
verses.translation: Aur tum Allah ki raah mein lado aur jaan lo ke beshak Allah khoob sunne waala, khoob jaanne waala hai.

verses.arabic: مَّن ذَا ٱلَّذِى يُقْرِضُ ٱللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًا فَيُضَٰعِفَهُۥ لَهُۥٓ أَضْعَافًا كَثِيرَةًۭ وَٱللَّهُ يَقْبِضُ وَيَبْصۜطُ وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
verses.transliteration: Man zal-lazee yuqridul-laaha qardan hasanan fayudaa'ifahoo lahooo 'ad'aafan kaseerah; wallaahu yaqbidu wa yabșut wa 'ilayhi turja'oon.
verses.translation: Kaun hai jo Allah ko qarz- e-hasanah de?¹ phir Allah woh maal uske liye kayi kayi guna badhaa de aur Allah hi tangi karta aur faraakhi karta hai aur tum usi ki taraf lautaaye jaaoge.
verses.deepMeaning: Qaraz-e-Hasanah se muraad Allah ki raah mein aur jehaad mein maal kharch karna hai ya'ni jaan ki tarah maali qurbaani mein bhi ta'ammul mat karo, rizq ki kushaadgi aur kami bhi Allah ke ikhtiyaar mein hai aur woh donon tareeqon se tumhaari aazmaayish karta hai kabhi rizq mein kami karke aur kabhi iss mein faraawaani karke. Phir Allah ki raah mein kharch karne se to kami bhi nahin hoti. Allah Ta'ala iss main kayi kayi guna ezaafah farmaata hai.

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلْمَلَإِ مِنۢ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مُوسَىٰٓ إِذْ قَالُوا۟ لِنَبِىٍّۢ لَّهُمُ ٱبْعَثْ لَنَا مَلِكًۭا نُّقَٰتِلْ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۖ قَالَ هَلْ عَسَيْتُمْ إِن كُتِبَ عَلَيْكُمُ ٱلْقِتَالُ أَلَّا تُقَٰتِلُوا۟ ۖ قَالُوا۟ وَمَا لَنَآ أَلَّا نُقَٰتِلَ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَقَدْ أُخْرِجْنَا مِن دِيَـٰرِنَا وَأَبْنَآئِنَا ۖ فَلَمَّا كُتِبَ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْقِتَالُ تَوَلَّوْا۟ إِلَّا قَلِيلًۭا مِّنْهُمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌۢ بِٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: 'Alam tara 'ilal- mala'i mim-Baneee 'Israaa'eela mim ba'di Moosaaa; 'iz qaaloo li- Nabiyyil-lahumub-'as lanaa malikan nuqaatil fee sabeelil-laahi qaala hal 'asaytum 'in kutiba 'alaykumul-qitaalu 'allaa tuqaatiloo qaaloo wa maa lanaaa 'allaa nuqaatila fee sabeelil- laahi wa qad 'ukhrijnaa min diyaarinaa wa 'abnaaa'inaa falammaa kutiba 'alayhimul-qitaalu tawallaw 'illaa qaleelam- minhum; wallaahu 'aleemum-bizzaalimeen.
verses.translation: (Aye nabi!) kiya Aapne Moosa ke ba'd bani israayeel ki ek jamaa'at nahin dekhi? jab unhon ne apne nabi se kaha: aap hamaare liye ek baadshaah muqarrar kardein taake hum Allah ki raah mein ladein. usne kaha: mumkin hai ke agar tum par jehaad farz kar diya gaya to tum jehaad na karo, unhon ne kaha: aakhir humein kiya huwa hai ke hum Allah ki raah mein na ladein jabke humein apne gharon aur apne beton se nikaal diya gaya hai? phir jab un par ladna farz kar diya gaya to un mein se thode se logon ke siwa sab phir gaye aur Allah zaalimon ko khoob jaanta hai.

verses.arabic: وَقَالَ لَهُمْ نَبِيُّهُمْ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَدْ بَعَثَ لَكُمْ طَالُوتَ مَلِكًۭا ۚ قَالُوٓا۟ أَنَّىٰ يَكُونُ لَهُ ٱلْمُلْكُ عَلَيْنَا وَنَحْنُ أَحَقُّ بِٱلْمُلْكِ مِنْهُ وَلَمْ يُؤْتَ سَعَةًۭ مِّنَ ٱلْمَالِ ۚ قَالَ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ ٱصْطَفَىٰهُ عَلَيْكُمْ وَزَادَهُۥ بَسْطَةًۭ فِى ٱلْعِلْمِ وَٱلْجِسْمِ ۖ وَٱللَّهُ يُؤْتِى مُلْكَهُۥ مَن يَشَآءُ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ وَٰسِعٌ عَلِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Wa qaala lahum Nabiyyuhum 'innal-laaha qad baʻasa lakum Taaloota malikaa; qaalooo 'annaa yakoonu lahul-mulku 'alaynaa wa nahnu 'ahaqqu bilmulki minhu wa lam yu'ta sa'atam-minal-maal; qaala 'innal-laahaş tafaahu 'alaykum wa zaadahoo bastatan fil- 'ilmi waljismi wal-laahu yu'tee mulkahoo many- yashaaa'; wallaahu Waasi'un 'Aleem.
verses.translation: Aur unke nabi ne unse kaha: beshak Allah ne tumhaare liye Taaloot ko baadshaah muqarrar kiya hai unhon ne kaha: hum par uski baadshaahi kaise ho sakti hai jabke hum baadshaahi ke usse ziyaadah haqdaar hain? aur use maal ki usa't nahin mili. us ne kaha: beshak Allah ne use tum par chun liya hai, aur use i'lm aur jism (donon) mein ziyaadah kushaadgi di hai, aur Allah jise chaahta hai apna mulk a'taa karta hai aur Allah bada usa't waala, khoob jaanne waala hai.

verses.arabic: وَقَالَ لَهُمْ نَبِيُّهُمْ إِنَّ ءَايَةَ مُلْكِهِۦٓ أَن يَأْتِيَكُمُ ٱلتَّابُوتُ فِيهِ سَكِينَةٌۭ مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ وَبَقِيَّةٌۭ مِّمَّا تَرَكَ ءَالُ مُوسَىٰ وَءَالُ هَٰرُونَ تَحْمِلُهُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَءَايَةًۭ لَّكُمْ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa qaala lahum Nabiyyuhum 'inna 'Aayata mulkiheee 'añy- ya'tiyakumut-Taabootu feehi sakeenatum-mir- Rabbikum wa baqiyyatum-mimmaa taraka 'Aalu Moosaa wa 'Aalu Haaroona tahmiluhul-malaaa'ikah; 'inna fee zaalika la- 'Aayatal-lakum 'in kuntum mu'mineen.
verses.translation: Aur unke nabi ne un se kaha: beshak uski baadshaahi ki nishaani yeh hai ke tumhaare paas woh sandooq aayega jis mein tumhaare rab ki taraf se taskeen aur woh baqyah cheezein hongi jinhein Aal-e- Moosa aur Aal-e-Haroon chhod gaye the, use farishte uthhaa kar laayenge. beshak uss mein tumhaare liye ek a'zeem nishaani hai agar tum momin ho.

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّا فَصَلَ طَالُوتُ بِٱلْجُنُودِ قَالَ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ مُبْتَلِيكُم بِنَهَرٍۢ فَمَن شَرِبَ مِنْهُ فَلَيْسَ مِنِّى وَمَن لَّمْ يَطْعَمْهُ فَإِنَّهُ مِنِّىٓ إِلَّا مَنِ ٱغْتَرَفَ غُرْفَةًۭ بِيَدِهِۦ فَشَرِبُوا۟ مِنْهُ إِلَّا قَلِيلًۭا مِّنْهُمْ ۚ فَلَمَّا جَاوَزَهُۥ هُوَ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مَعَهُۥ قَالُوا۟ لَا طَاقَةَ لَنَا ٱلْيَوْمَ بِجَالُوتَ وَجُنُودِهِۦ ۚ قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ يَظُنُّونَ أَنَّهُم مُّلَـٰقُوا۟ ٱللَّهِ كَم مِّن فِئَةٍۢ قَلِيلَةٍۢ غَلَبَتْ فِئَةًۭ كَثِيرَةًۢ بِإِذْنِ ٱللَّهِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ مَعَ ٱلصَّـٰبِرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Falammaa faşala Taalootu biljunoodi qaala 'innal-laaha mubtaleekum binaharin faman shariba minhu falaysa minnee wa mal- lam yat'amhu fa'innahoo minneee 'illaa manigh- tarafa ghurfatam biyadih; fashariboo minhu 'illaa qaleelam- minhum; falam-maa jaawazahoo huwa wallazeena 'aamanoo ma'ahoo qaaloo laa taaqata lanal-yawma bijaaloota wa junoodih; qaalal-lazeena yazunnoona 'annahum mulaaqul-laahi kam-min fi'atin qaleelatin ghalabat fi'atan kaseeratam bi'iznil-laah; wallaahu ma'aş- şaabireen.
verses.translation: Phir jab taaloot faujein le kar nikla to usne kaha: beshak Allah tumhein ek nahar ke zariye se aazmaata hai, pas jis ne usse (sair hokar) paani piya, to woh mujh se nahin aur jis ne uska paani na chakha, to yaqeenan woh mera hai, haan! koyi apne haath se ek aadh chullo bhar le (to harj nahin) phir un mein se thode logon ke siwa sab ne uss (nahar) ka paani pi liya, phir jab taaloot ne woh nahar paar karli aur un logon ne (bhi) jo uske saath eemaan laaye the, to unhon ne (aapas mein) kaha: aaj hum mein jaaloot aur uski faujon ke khilaaf ladne ki taaqat nahin. woh log jo iss baat ka yaqeen rakhte the ke beshak woh Allah se milne waale hain, unhon ne kaha: kayi baar chhoti si jamaa'at Allah ke hukm se badi jamaa'at par ghaalib aayi hai aur Allah sabr karne waalon ke saath hai.

verses.arabic: وَلَمَّا بَرَزُوا۟ لِجَالُوتَ وَجُنُودِهِۦ قَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَآ أَفْرِغْ عَلَيْنَا صَبْرًۭا وَثَبِّتْ أَقْدَامَنَا وَٱنصُرْنَا عَلَى ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa lammaa barazoo li-Jaaloota wa junoodihee qaaloo Rabbanaaa 'afrigh 'alaynaa şabrañw-wa sabbit 'aqdaamanaa wansurnaa 'alal-qawmil- kaafireen.
verses.translation: Aur jab woh jaaloot aur uski faujon ke muqaable par nikle to unhon ne kaha: aye hamaare rab! hum par sabr daal de aur hamaare qadam jamaaye rakh aur uss kaafir qaum ke muqaable mein hamaari madad farma.

verses.arabic: فَهَزَمُوهُم بِإِذْنِ ٱللَّهِ وَقَتَلَ دَاوُۥدُ جَالُوتَ وَءَاتَىٰهُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمُلْكَ وَٱلْحِكْمَةَ وَعَلَّمَهُۥ مِمَّا يَشَآءُ ۗ وَلَوْلَا دَفْعُ ٱللَّهِ ٱلنَّاسَ بَعْضَهُم بِبَعْضٍۢ لَّفَسَدَتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَلَـٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ ذُو فَضْلٍ عَلَى ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Fahazamoohum bi'iznil-laahi wa qatala Daawoodu jaaloota wa 'aataahul-laahul-mulka Wal-Hikmata wa 'allamahoo mimmaa yashaaa'; wa law laa daful-laahin-naasa ba'dahum biba'dil- lafasadatil-'ardu wa laakin-nal-laaha zoo fadlin 'alal-'aalameen
verses.translation: Pas mominon ne Allah ke hukm se kaafiron ko shikast di aur dawood ne jaaloot ko qatl kiya aur Allah ne Dawood ko baadshaahi aur hikmat a'ta ki aur jo chaaha use sikhaaya aur agar Allah insaanon ke ek (giroh) ko doosre (giroh) ke zariye se hataata na rahta to yaqeenan saari zameen ka nizaam bigad jaata, lekin Allah dunya waalon par bada fazl karne waala hai.

verses.arabic: تِلْكَ ءَايَـٰتُ ٱللَّهِ نَتْلُوهَا عَلَيْكَ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۚ وَإِنَّكَ لَمِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.transliteration: Tilka 'Aayaatul-laahi natloohaa 'alayka bilhaqq; wa 'innaka laminal-mursaleen.
verses.translation: Yeh Allah ki aayatein hain, hum haq ke saath aap par unki tilaawat karte hain aur be shak aap Rasoolon mein se hain.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Iss mein Rasoolullah ﷺ ki risaalat ka isbaat hai aapki risaalat puri nau' insaaniyat aur qiyaamat tak ke liye hai. Aap Allah ke aakhri Rasool hain, Aap ke ba'd koyi Nabi aur Rasool nahin aayega jaisa ke ahaadees mein mukammal tafseel hai. mulaahazah ho.(Bukhari: Baab:1, Hadees: 335, Al-Manaaqib, Baab:18, Hadees:3535).

verses.arabic: تِلْكَ ٱلرُّسُلُ فَضَّلْنَا بَعْضَهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍۢ ۘ مِّنْهُم مَّن كَلَّمَ ٱللَّهُ وَرَفَعَ بَعْضَهُمْ دَرَجَـٰتٍۢ ۚ وَءَاتَيْنَا عِيسَى ٱبْنَ مَرْيَمَ ٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ وَأَيَّدْنَـٰهُ بِرُوحِ ٱلْقُدُسِ ۗ وَلَوْ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ مَا ٱقْتَتَلَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِنۢ بَعْدِهِم مِّنۢ بَعْدِ مَا جَآءَتْهُمُ ٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتُ وَلَـٰكِنِ ٱخْتَلَفُوا۟ فَمِنْهُم مَّنْ ءَامَنَ وَمِنْهُم مَّن كَفَرَ ۚ وَلَوْ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ مَا ٱقْتَتَلُوا۟ وَلَـٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَفْعَلُ مَا يُرِيدُ
verses.transliteration: Tilkar-Rusulu faddalnaa baʻdahum 'alaa ba'd; minhum man kallamal-laahu wa rafa'a ba'dahum darajaat; wa 'aataynaa 'Eesab-na- Maryamal-bayyinaati wa 'ayyadnaahu bi-Roohil- Qudus; wa law shaaa'al- laahu maq-tatalal- lazeena mim ba'dihim mim-ba'di maa jaaa'athumul-bayyinaatu wa laakinikh-talafoo faminhum man 'aamana wa minhum man kafar; wa law shaaa'al-laahu maq-tataloo wa laakinnal-laaha yafalu maa yureed.
verses.translation: Yeh sab Rasool hain, humne un mein se ba'z ko ba'z par fazeelat di, un mein se kuchh aise hain jinse Allah ne kalaam kiya aur un mein se ba'z ke darje buland kiye aur hum ne Ei'saa ibne Maryam ko waazeh nishaaniyan a'taa kin aur roohulqudus (Jibrayeel) ke saath uski madad ki aur agar Allah chaahta to un (Rasoolon) ke ba'd aane waale log baahum na ladte jabke unke paas waazeh nishaaniyaan aa chuki thin lekin unhon ne (baahum) ikhtelaaf kiya, chunaancheh un mein se kuchh woh hain jo eemaan laaye aur kcuhh woh hain jinhon ne kufr kiya aur agar Allah chaahta to woh baahum na ladte, lekin Allah jo chaahta hai karta hai.

verses.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ أَنفِقُوا۟ مِمَّا رَزَقْنَـٰكُم مِّن قَبْلِ أَن يَأْتِىَ يَوْمٌۭ لَّا بَيْعٌۭ فِيهِ وَلَا خُلَّةٌۭ وَلَا شَفَـٰعَةٌۭ ۗ وَٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ هُمُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhal- Jazeena 'aamanoo 'anfiqoo mimmaa razaqnaakum min qabli Pañy-ya'tiya yawmul-laa bay'un feehi wa laa khullatunw-wa laa shafaa'ah; walkaafiroona humuz-zaalimoon.
verses.translation: Aye logo jo eemaan laaye ho! hum ne tumhein jo kuchh diya uss mein se kharch karo, isse pahle ke woh din aajaaye jis mein na khareed-o-farokht hogi aur na koyi dosti ya sifaarish hi kaam aayegi aur kufr karne waale hi zaalim hain.

verses.arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلْحَىُّ ٱلْقَيُّومُ ۚ لَا تَأْخُذُهُۥ سِنَةٌۭ وَلَا نَوْمٌۭ ۚ لَّهُۥ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۗ مَن ذَا ٱلَّذِى يَشْفَعُ عِندَهُۥٓ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِهِۦ ۚ يَعْلَمُ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَمَا خَلْفَهُمْ ۖ وَلَا يُحِيطُونَ بِشَىْءٍۢ مِّنْ عِلْمِهِۦٓ إِلَّا بِمَا شَآءَ ۚ وَسِعَ كُرْسِيُّهُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ ۖ وَلَا يَـُٔودُهُۥ حِفْظُهُمَا ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَلِىُّ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
verses.transliteration: 'Allaahu laaa ilaaha 'illaa Huwal-Hayyul- Qayyoom; laa ta'khuzuhoo sinatuñw- wa laa nawm; lahooo maa fis-samaawaati wa maa fil-'ard; man zal- lazee yashfa'u 'indahooo 'illaa bi-'iznih; ya'lamu maa bayna 'aydeehim wa maa khalfahum wa laa yuheetoona bishay'im- min 'ilmihee 'illaa bimaa shaaa'; wasi'a Kursiyyuhus- samaawaati wal-'arda wa laa ya'ooduhoo hifzuhumaa; wa Huwal- 'Aliyyul-'Azeem.
verses.translation: Woh Allah hai, uske siwa koyi (sachcha) ma'bood nahin, zindah hai, sab ko sanbhaale huye hai, use oongh aati hai na neend, jo kuchh aasmaanon mein aur jo kuchh zameen mein hai, sab usi ka hai. kaun hai jo uske saamne uski ijaazat ke baghair sifaarish kar sake? woh jaanta hai jo kuchh logon ke saamne hai aur jo kuchh unke peechhe hai aur woh uske i'lm mein se kisi cheez ko apne ehaate mein nahin laa sakte, siwaaye iss baat ke jo woh chaahe. uski kursi ¹ne aasmaanon aur zameen ko gher rakkha hai aur use un donon ki hifaazat thakaati nahin aur woh buland tar, nehaayat a'zmat waala hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Nabi Kareem ne farmaaya:'Kursi ke muqaabla mein saat aasmaanon ki haisyat sirf itni si hai jitni kisi khaali zameen mein padi huyi angoothhi ki.' (Silsilatul Ahaadeesis-Sahiha, Hadees:109) Jumhoor ahl-e- sunnat ka yeh aqeedah hai ke Kursi a'rsh ke saamne qadmon ki jagah hai.' (Fataawa Ibne Taymiyah, Jild:5,page:55) sone se qabl aayatul kursi padh lene se ek farishta hifaazat karne par muqarrar ho jaata hai. (Al-Bukhari, Fazaayel-e-Qur'an, Hadees:5010).

verses.arabic: لَآ إِكْرَاهَ فِى ٱلدِّينِ ۖ قَد تَّبَيَّنَ ٱلرُّشْدُ مِنَ ٱلْغَىِّ ۚ فَمَن يَكْفُرْ بِٱلطَّـٰغُوتِ وَيُؤْمِنۢ بِٱللَّهِ فَقَدِ ٱسْتَمْسَكَ بِٱلْعُرْوَةِ ٱلْوُثْقَىٰ لَا ٱنفِصَامَ لَهَا ۗ وَٱللَّهُ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ
verses.transliteration: Laaa 'ikraaha fid- deeni qat- tabayyanar- rushdu minal-ghayy; famany-yakfur bit- Taaghooti wa yu'mim- billaahi faqadis-tamsaka bil'urwatil-wusqaa lan- fișaama lahaa; wallaahu Samee'un 'Aleem.
verses.translation: Deen mein koyi zabardasti nahin, hidaayat, gumraahi se waazeh ho chuki hai, phir jo shakhs taaghoot ka inkaar kare aur Allah par eemaan le aaye, to yaqeenan usne ek mazboot kada thaam liya jo tootne waala nahin aur Allah khoob sunne waala, khoob jaanne waala hai.

verses.arabic: ٱللَّهُ وَلِىُّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ يُخْرِجُهُم مِّنَ ٱلظُّلُمَـٰتِ إِلَى ٱلنُّورِ ۖ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ أَوْلِيَآؤُهُمُ ٱلطَّـٰغُوتُ يُخْرِجُونَهُم مِّنَ ٱلنُّورِ إِلَى ٱلظُّلُمَـٰتِ ۗ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ ۖ هُمْ فِيهَا خَـٰلِدُونَ
verses.transliteration: Allaahu waliyyul- lazeena 'aamanoo yukhrijuhum-minaz- zulumaati 'ilan-noori wallazeena kafarooo 'awliyaaa'uhumut- Taaghootu yukhrijoonahum -minan-noori 'ilaz-zulumaat; 'ulaaa'ika 'Ashaabun-Naari hum feehaa khaalidoon.
verses.translation: Allah, un logon ka dost hai jo eemaan laaye, woh unko andheron se nikaal kar raushni ki taraf laata hai aur woh log jinhon ne kufr kiya unke dost taaghoot hain,¹ woh unhein raushni se nikaal kar andheeron ki taraf le jaate hain, wahi log dozakhi hain, woh uss mein hameshah rahenge.
verses.deepMeaning: (Taaghoot) se muraad har woh cheez hai jiski ma'bood haqeeqi ke e'laawah parastish ki jaaye (Hajar, Shajar, Qabar, Insaan zindah ya murdah, haiwaan, murti, chaand, suraj, sitaare aur patthar waghairah) isi tarah Eisa عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام Maryam, doosre Ambiya عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام aur jo bhi Allah ke siwa hain, unki kisi soorat mein bhi ibaadat ki jaaye to woh taaghoot kah laayeinge. (go haqeeqat mein woh taaghoot nahin hain) Umar رضي الله عنه ne farmaya: 'Ek maaldaar ki misaal hai jo Allah ki etaa'at karta rahta hai, Phir Allah Ta'ala (use aazmaane ke liye) shaytaan ko bhej deta hai aur (iski wajah se) woh bure a'amaal karne shuru kar deta hai yahaan tak ke (saare nek) a'amaal bhi zaaye' ho jaate hain.'(Bukhari:Hadees:4538).

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِى حَآجَّ إِبْرَٰهِـۧمَ فِى رَبِّهِۦٓ أَنْ ءَاتَىٰهُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمُلْكَ إِذْ قَالَ إِبْرَٰهِـۧمُ رَبِّىَ ٱلَّذِى يُحْىِۦ وَيُمِيتُ ۖ قَالَ أَنَا۠ أُحْىِۦ وَأُمِيتُ ۖ قَالَ إِبْرَٰهِـۧمُ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَأْتِى بِٱلشَّمْسِ مِنَ ٱلْمَشْرِقِ فَأْتِ بِهَا مِنَ ٱلْمَغْرِبِ فَبُهِتَ ٱلَّذِى كَفَرَ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يَهْدِى ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: 'Alam tara 'ilal-lazee Haaajja 'Ibraaheema fee Rabbiheee 'an 'aataahul- laahul-mulk; 'iz qaala 'Ibraaheemu Rabbiyal- lazee yuhyee wa yumeetu qaala 'ana 'uhyee wa 'umeetu qaala 'Ibraaheemu fa'innal-laaha ya'tee bishshamsi minal-mashriqi fa'ti bihaa minal-maghribi fabuhital-lazee kafar; wallaahu laa yahdil- qawmaz-zaalimeen.
verses.translation: Kiya aapne uss shakhs ko nahin dekha jis ne Ibraheem se uske rab ke baare mein isliye jhagda kiya ke Allah ne use baadshaahi de rakkhi thi? jab Ibraheem ne kaha: mera rab woh hai jo zindah karta hai aur maarta hai. uss (namrood) ne kaha: main bhi zindah karta hoon aur maarta hoon. Ibraheem ne kaha: be shak Allah to sooraj ko mashriq se nikaalta hai too zara use maghrib se nikaal kar dikha. chunaancheh woh hakka bakka rah gaya jisne kufr kiya tha aur Allah un logon ko hidaayat nahin deta jo zaalim hain.

verses.arabic: أَوْ كَٱلَّذِى مَرَّ عَلَىٰ قَرْيَةٍۢ وَهِىَ خَاوِيَةٌ عَلَىٰ عُرُوشِهَا قَالَ أَنَّىٰ يُحْىِۦ هَـٰذِهِ ٱللَّهُ بَعْدَ مَوْتِهَا فَأَمَاتَهُ ٱللَّهُ مِا۟ئَةَ عَامٍۢ ثُمَّ بَعَثَهُۥ قَالَ كَمْ لَبِثْتَ قَالَ لَبِثْتُ يَوْمًا أَوْ بَعْضَ يَوْمٍۢ قَالَ بَل لَّبِثْتَ مِا۟ئَةَ عَامٍۢ فَٱنظُرْ إِلَىٰ طَعَامِكَ وَشَرَابِكَ لَمْ يَتَسَنَّهْ ۖ وَٱنظُرْ إِلَىٰ حِمَارِكَ وَلِنَجْعَلَكَ ءَايَةًۭ لِّلنَّاسِ ۖ وَٱنظُرْ إِلَى ٱلْعِظَامِ كَيْفَ نُنشِزُهَا ثُمَّ نَكْسُوهَا لَحْمًۭا ۚ فَلَمَّا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُۥ قَالَ أَعْلَمُ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ قَدِيرٌۭ
verses.transliteration: 'Aw kallazee marra 'alaa qaryatiñw-wa hiya khaawiyatun 'alaa 'urooshihaa qaala 'annaa yuhyee haazihil- laahu ba'da mawtihaa fa'amaatahul-laahu mi'ata 'aamin summa ba'asahoo qaala kam labista qaala labistu yawman 'aw ba da yawmin qaala bal- Jabista mi'ata 'aamin fanzur 'ilaa ta'aamika wa sharaabika lam yatasannah wanzur 'ilaa himaarika wa linaj'alaka 'Aayatal-linnaasi wanzur 'ilal-'izaami kayfa nunshizuhaa summa naksoohaa lahmaa; falammaa tabayyana lahoo qaala 'a'lamu 'annal-laaha 'alaa kulli shau'in Qadeer.
verses.translation: Yaa isi tarah uss shakhs ko (nahin dekha) jo ek basti se guzra aur woh apni chhaton par giri padi thi? usne kaha: Allah iss basti ko kaise zindah karega uski maut ke ba'd? to Allah ne use Fek 100 saal ke ba'd maut de di, phir use zindah kiya. Allah ne poochha: tu kitni der (yahaan) rahaa hai? usne kaha: ek din ya din ka kuchh hissa. Allah ne farmaya: (nahin!) balke tu (maut ki haalat mein) 100 saal raha, albatta tu apne khaane aur peene (ke saamaan) ki taraf dekh woh bilkul sada basa naihn, neez dekh apne gadhe (ke dhaanche) ko, aur (yeh isliye huwa ke)hum tujhe logon ke liye ek nishaani banaana chaahte hain aur too (gadhe ki) haddiyon ko dekh ke hum kaise unhein ubhaar kar jodte, phir un par gosht chaadhaate hain. phir jab uske saamne (yeh sab) waazeh ho gaya to usne kaha: main jaanta hoon ke beshak Allah har cheez par qudrat rakhta hai.

verses.arabic: وَإِذْ قَالَ إِبْرَٰهِـۧمُ رَبِّ أَرِنِى كَيْفَ تُحْىِ ٱلْمَوْتَىٰ ۖ قَالَ أَوَلَمْ تُؤْمِن ۖ قَالَ بَلَىٰ وَلَـٰكِن لِّيَطْمَئِنَّ قَلْبِى ۖ قَالَ فَخُذْ أَرْبَعَةًۭ مِّنَ ٱلطَّيْرِ فَصُرْهُنَّ إِلَيْكَ ثُمَّ ٱجْعَلْ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ جَبَلٍۢ مِّنْهُنَّ جُزْءًۭا ثُمَّ ٱدْعُهُنَّ يَأْتِينَكَ سَعْيًۭا ۚ وَٱعْلَمْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'iz qaala 'Ibraaheemu Rabbi 'arinee kayfa tuhyil- mawtaa qaala 'awalam tu'min qaala balaa wa laakil-liyatma'inna qalbee qaala fakhuz 'ar b'atam-minat-tayri faşurhunna 'ilayka summaj'al 'alaa kulli jabalim-minhunna juz'an summad-'uhunna ya'teenaka sa'yaa; wa'lam 'annal-laaha 'Azeezun Hakeem.
verses.translation: Aur jab Ibraheem ne kaha: aye mere rab! mujhe dikha tu murdon ko kaise zindah karega? Allah ne kaha: kiya tu (uss par) eemaan nahin laaya? Ibraheem ne kaha: kyun nahin! lekin mein to qalbi itminaan chaahta hoon. Allah ne farmaya: phir tu chaar parinde le kar unhein apne saath maanoos kar, phir (unhein zabah karke) unka ek ek tukda har pahaad par rakh de, phir unko bula, woh tere paas daude chale aayenge aur jaan le ke beshak Allah ghaalib, khoob hikmat waala hai.

verses.arabic: مَّثَلُ ٱلَّذِينَ يُنفِقُونَ أَمْوَٰلَهُمْ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ كَمَثَلِ حَبَّةٍ أَنبَتَتْ سَبْعَ سَنَابِلَ فِى كُلِّ سُنۢبُلَةٍۢ مِّا۟ئَةُ حَبَّةٍۢ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ يُضَٰعِفُ لِمَن يَشَآءُ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ وَٰسِعٌ عَلِيمٌ
verses.transliteration: Maşalul-lazeena yunfiqoona 'amwaalahum fee sabeelil-laahi kamasali habbatin 'ambatat sab'a sanaabila fee kulli sumbulatim- mi'atu habbah; wallaahu yudaa'ifu limany- yashaaa'u; wallaahu Waasi'un 'Aleem.
verses.translation: Un logon ki misaal jo Allah ki raah mein apne maal kharch karte hain, uss daane ki si hai jis mein se saat baaliyaan niklen aur har baali mein 100 daane hon aur Allah jiske liye chaahe (ajr) badhaa deta hai aur¹ Allah us'at waala, khoob jaanne waala hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Yeh infaaq fi sabeelillah ki fazeelat hai, isse muraad agar jehaad haad hai to iske ma'na yeh honge ke jehaad mein kharch ki gayi raqam ka yeh sawaab hoga aur agar isse muraad tamaam masaarif-e- khair hain to yeh fazeelat nafqaat-o-sadaqaat-e-naafilah ki hogi aur deegar nekyaan (ek neki ka ajr das guna) ki zail mein aayeingi. (Fatahul Qadeer) goya nafqaat-o-sadaqaat ka aam ajr-o-sawaab deegar umoor-e-khair se ziyaadah hai. infaaq fi sabeelillah ki iss ahmiyat wa fazeelat ki wajah bhi waazeh hai ke jab tak saamaan-o-aslaha jung ka intezaam nahin hoga, fauj ki kaar kardagi bhi sifar hogi aur saamaan aur aslaha raqam ke baghair mohayya nahin kiye jaasakte.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُنفِقُونَ أَمْوَٰلَهُمْ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ثُمَّ لَا يُتْبِعُونَ مَآ أَنفَقُوا۟ مَنًّۭا وَلَآ أَذًۭى ۙ لَّهُمْ أَجْرُهُمْ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ وَلَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Allazeena yunfiqoona 'amwaalahum fee sabeelil-laahi summa laa yutbi'oona maaa 'anfaqoo mannañw-wa laaa 'azal- lahum 'ajruhum 'inda Rabbihim; wa laa khawfun 'alayhim wa laa hum yahzanoon.
verses.translation: Jo log apne maal Allah ki raah mein kharch karte hain phir kharch karne ke ba'd ehsaan nahin jataate aur na dukh dete hain, unke liye unke rab ke paas ajr hai, na un par koyi khauf hoga aur na ghamgeen honge.

verses.arabic: قَوْلٌۭ مَّعْرُوفٌۭ وَمَغْفِرَةٌ خَيْرٌۭ مِّن صَدَقَةٍۢ يَتْبَعُهَآ أَذًۭى ۗ وَٱللَّهُ غَنِىٌّ حَلِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Qawlum-ma'roofunw- wa maghfiratun khayrum min şadaqatiny-yatba uhaaa 'azaa; wallaahu Ghaniyyun Haleem.
verses.translation: Achchhi baat kahna aur mu'aaf karna uss sadqe se behtar hai jiske ba'd dukh diya jaaye aur Allah be parwaa nihaayat burdbaar hai.

verses.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَا تُبْطِلُوا۟ صَدَقَـٰتِكُم بِٱلْمَنِّ وَٱلْأَذَىٰ كَٱلَّذِى يُنفِقُ مَالَهُۥ رِئَآءَ ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَا يُؤْمِنُ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِ ۖ فَمَثَلُهُۥ كَمَثَلِ صَفْوَانٍ عَلَيْهِ تُرَابٌۭ فَأَصَابَهُۥ وَابِلٌۭ فَتَرَكَهُۥ صَلْدًۭا ۖ لَّا يَقْدِرُونَ عَلَىٰ شَىْءٍۢ مِّمَّا كَسَبُوا۟ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يَهْدِى ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhal- lazeena 'aamanoo laa tubtiloo şadaqaatikum bilmanni wal-'azaa kal- lazee yunfiqu maalahoo ri'aaa'an-naasi wa laa yu'minu billaahi wal- yawmil-'aakhiri famasaluhoo kamasali safwaanin 'alayhi turaabun fa'aşaabahoo waabilun fatarakahoo şaldaa; laa yaqdiroona 'alaa shay'im- mimmaa kasaboo; wallaahu laa yahdil-qawmal-kaafireen.
verses.translation: Aye logo jo eemaan laaye ho! apne sadqaat ko lukh ehsaan jataa kar aur dukh de kar uss shakhs ki tarah zaay'e na karo jo apna maal logon ko dikhaane ke liye kharch karta hai aur woh Allah aur aakhirat ke din par eemaan nahin rakhta, to uski misaal chikne patthar ki si hai jis par mitti padi ho, phir uss par zor ki baarish ho to (saari mittibah jaaye aur) saaf chattaan rah jaaye. woh (riya kaar) jo neki karte hain, usse kuchh bhi unke haath nahin aata aur Allah kaafiron hidaayat nahin deta.

verses.arabic: وَمَثَلُ ٱلَّذِينَ يُنفِقُونَ أَمْوَٰلَهُمُ ٱبْتِغَآءَ مَرْضَاتِ ٱللَّهِ وَتَثْبِيتًۭا مِّنْ أَنفُسِهِمْ كَمَثَلِ جَنَّةٍۢ بِرَبْوَةٍ أَصَابَهَا وَابِلٌۭ فَـَٔاتَتْ أُكُلَهَا ضِعْفَيْنِ ۚ فَإِن لَّمْ يُصِبْهَا وَابِلٌۭ فَطَلٌّۭ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa masalul-lazeena yunfiqoona 'amwaalahumub- tighaaaa'a mardaatil- laahi wa tasbeetam-min 'anfusihim kamasali jannatim birabwatin 'aşaabahaa waabilun fa'aatat 'ukulahaa di'fayni fa'il-lam yuşibhaa waabilun fatall; wallaahu bimaa ta'maloona Başeer.
verses.translation: Aur un logon ki misaal jo Allah ki razaa joyi aur poorl dil jamayi' se apne maal kharch karte hain uss baagh ki si hai jo kisi ounchi satah par ho, uss par zor ki baarish ho to woh do guna phal laaye, phir agar uss par zor ki baarish na bhi ho to phawwaar hi (kaafi hai) aur tum jo kuchh karte ho, Allah use khoob dekhne waala hai.

verses.arabic: أَيَوَدُّ أَحَدُكُمْ أَن تَكُونَ لَهُۥ جَنَّةٌۭ مِّن نَّخِيلٍۢ وَأَعْنَـٰبٍۢ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ لَهُۥ فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ ٱلثَّمَرَٰتِ وَأَصَابَهُ ٱلْكِبَرُ وَلَهُۥ ذُرِّيَّةٌۭ ضُعَفَآءُ فَأَصَابَهَآ إِعْصَارٌۭ فِيهِ نَارٌۭ فَٱحْتَرَقَتْ ۗ كَذَٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمُ ٱلْءَايَـٰتِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَتَفَكَّرُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Ayawaddu 'ahadukum 'an takoona lahoo jannatum-min nakheelinw-wa 'a'naabin tajree min tahtihal- 'anhaaru lahoo feehaa min kullis-samaraati wa 'aşaabahul-kibaru wa lahoo zurriyyatun du'afaaa'u fa'aşaabahaaa 'i'şaarun feehi naarun fahtaraqat; kazaalika yubayyinul- laahu lakumul-'Aayaati la'allakum tatafakkaroon.
verses.translation: Kiya tum mein se koyi yeh pasand karta hai ke uske liye khujooron aur angooron ka ek baagh ho, uske neeche nahrein bahti hon, uss baagh mein uske liye har qism ke phal hon aur use budhaapa aajaaye jabke uski aulaad kamzor ho, phir (achaanak) uss baagh par aisa bagola aa pade jis mein aag ho aur woh use jalaa kar rakh de? iss tarah Allah tumhaare liye. aayatein khol kar bayaan karta hai taake tum ghaur-o- fikr karo.

verses.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ أَنفِقُوا۟ مِن طَيِّبَـٰتِ مَا كَسَبْتُمْ وَمِمَّآ أَخْرَجْنَا لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ وَلَا تَيَمَّمُوا۟ ٱلْخَبِيثَ مِنْهُ تُنفِقُونَ وَلَسْتُم بِـَٔاخِذِيهِ إِلَّآ أَن تُغْمِضُوا۟ فِيهِ ۚ وَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَنِىٌّ حَمِيدٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhal- lazeena 'aamanooo 'anfiqoo min tayyibaati maa kasabtum wa mimmaaa 'akhrajnaa lakum minal-'ardi wa laa tayammamul-khabeesa minhu tunfiqoona wa lastum bi'aakhizeehi 'illaaa 'an tughmidoo feeh; wa'lamooo 'annal- Jaaha Ghaniyyun Hameed.
verses.translation: Aye logo jo eemaan laaye ho! tum un paakeezah cheezon mein se kharch karo jo tum kamaate ho aur un mein se bhi jo humne tumhaare liye zameen mein se nikaali hain aur mat iraadah karo (Allah ki raah mein) raddi aur kharaab cheez kharch karne ka, jabke tum (khud) to woh (cheez) lena bhi pasand nahin karte, illa yeh ke uski baabat tum chashm poshi kar jaao aur jaan lo ke beshak Allah ta'ala be parwaah hai, qaabil-e-ta'reef hai.

verses.arabic: ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ يَعِدُكُمُ ٱلْفَقْرَ وَيَأْمُرُكُم بِٱلْفَحْشَآءِ ۖ وَٱللَّهُ يَعِدُكُم مَّغْفِرَةًۭ مِّنْهُ وَفَضْلًۭا ۗ وَٱللَّهُ وَٰسِعٌ عَلِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: 'Ash-Shaytaanu ya'idukumul-faqra wa ya'murukum bilfahshaaa'i wallaahu ya'idukum- maghfiratam-minhu wa fadlaa; wallaahu Waasi'un 'Aleem.
verses.translation: Shaytaan tumhein tangdasti se daraata hai aur be hayaayi ka hukm deta hai aur Allah tumse apni bakhshish aur fazl ka wa'dah karta hai aur Allah us'at waala, khoob jaanne waala hai.

verses.arabic: يُؤْتِى ٱلْحِكْمَةَ مَن يَشَآءُ ۚ وَمَن يُؤْتَ ٱلْحِكْمَةَ فَقَدْ أُوتِىَ خَيْرًۭا كَثِيرًۭا ۗ وَمَا يَذَّكَّرُ إِلَّآ أُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ
verses.transliteration: Yu'til-Hikmata mañy- yashaaa'u; wa mañy- yutal-Hikmata faqad 'ootiya khayran kaseeraa; wa maa yazzakkaru 'illaaa 'ulul-'albaab.
verses.translation: Allah jise chaahta hai hikmat deta hai aur jis shakhs ko hikmat¹ di gayi, to use bahut bhalaayi a'taa ki gayi aur (in baaton se) aql mand hi naseehat haasil karte hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Hikmat ke asal ma'na 'Daanaayi' ke hain lekin yahaan yeh lafz ilm aur qur'an-o-sunnat ke mafhoom mein iste'maal huwa hai, matlab yeh hai ke kisi shakhs ke liye qur'an wa sunnat ki raushni mein amal karna aasaan ho jaaye. Sahihain ki ek hadees main hai ke 'do shakhson par rashk karna jaayez hai ek woh jis ko Allah ne maal diya aur woh use raah-e-haq mein kharch karta hai doosra woh jise Allah ne hikmat di jisse woh faisle karta hai aur logon ko uski ta'leem deta hai.'(Sahih Bukhari:, Al-ilm: hadees: 73, Sahih Muslim, Salatul Musaafireen, Hadees: 816)

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَنفَقْتُم مِّن نَّفَقَةٍ أَوْ نَذَرْتُم مِّن نَّذْرٍۢ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعْلَمُهُۥ ۗ وَمَا لِلظَّـٰلِمِينَ مِنْ أَنصَارٍ
verses.transliteration: Wa maaa 'anfaqtum min nafaqatin 'aw nazartum min nazrin fa'innal-laaha yalamuh; wa maa lizzaalimeena min 'anşaar.
verses.translation: Aur tum kisi qism ka kharch karo ya koyi bhi nazr maano to be shak Allah use jaanta hai, aur zaalimon ka koyi madadgaar nahin.

verses.arabic: إِن تُبْدُوا۟ ٱلصَّدَقَـٰتِ فَنِعِمَّا هِىَ ۖ وَإِن تُخْفُوهَا وَتُؤْتُوهَا ٱلْفُقَرَآءَ فَهُوَ خَيْرٌۭ لَّكُمْ ۚ وَيُكَفِّرُ عَنكُم مِّن سَيِّـَٔاتِكُمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرٌۭ
verses.transliteration: 'In tubduş-şadaqaati fani'immaa hiya wa 'in tukhfoohaa wa tu'toohal- fuqaraaa'a fahuwa khayrul-lakum; wa yukaffiru 'ankum min sayyi'aatikum; wallaahu bimaa ta'maloona Khabeer.
verses.translation: Agar tum zaahir karke sadqaat do to yeh achchhi baat hai aur agar tum use chhupaa kar faqeeron ko do to woh tumhaare liye ziyaadah behtar hai, woh (Allah) tumse tumhaare gunaah door kardega aur tum jo bhi amal karte ho Allah uski khoob khabar rakhta hai.

verses.arabic: لَّيْسَ عَلَيْكَ هُدَىٰهُمْ وَلَـٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَهْدِى مَن يَشَآءُ ۗ وَمَا تُنفِقُوا۟ مِنْ خَيْرٍۢ فَلِأَنفُسِكُمْ ۚ وَمَا تُنفِقُونَ إِلَّا ٱبْتِغَآءَ وَجْهِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ وَمَا تُنفِقُوا۟ مِنْ خَيْرٍۢ يُوَفَّ إِلَيْكُمْ وَأَنتُمْ لَا تُظْلَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Laysa 'alayka hudaahum wa laakinnal- laaha yahdee many- yashaaa'u; wa maa tunfiqoo min khayrin fali'anfusikum; wa maa tunfiqoona 'illab-tighaaa'a wajhil-laah; wa maa tunfiqoo min khayriñy- yuwaffa ilaykum wa 'antum laa tuzlamoon.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) logon ko hidaayat dena Aapki zimmedaari nahin, lekin Allah jise chaahta hai hidaayat deta hai aur tum apne maal mein se jo kharch karo, woh tumhaare apne faayide ke liye hai aur tum jo kuchh kharch karte ho woh Allah ki raza haasil karne hi ke liye karte ho aur tum apne maal mein se jo kharch karoge uska tumhein pura pura silah diya jaayega aur tum par zulm nahin kiya jaayega.

verses.arabic: لِلْفُقَرَآءِ ٱلَّذِينَ أُحْصِرُوا۟ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ لَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ ضَرْبًۭا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ يَحْسَبُهُمُ ٱلْجَاهِلُ أَغْنِيَآءَ مِنَ ٱلتَّعَفُّفِ تَعْرِفُهُم بِسِيمَىٰهُمْ لَا يَسْـَٔلُونَ ٱلنَّاسَ إِلْحَافًۭا ۗ وَمَا تُنفِقُوا۟ مِنْ خَيْرٍۢ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِهِۦ عَلِيمٌ
verses.transliteration: Lilfuqaraaa'il-lazeena 'uhsiroo fee sabeelil-laahi laa yastatee'oona darban fil-'ardi yahsabuhumul- jaahilu 'aghniyaaa'a minat-ta'affufi ta'rifuhum biseemaahum laa yas'aloonan-naasa 'ilhaafaa; wa maa tunfiqoo min khayrin fa'innal-laaha bihee 'Aleem.
verses.translation: Sadqaat to) un zaroorat mandon ke liye hain jo Allal ke kaamon mein aise mashghool hon ke (apne rozgaar ke liye) zameen mein daud dhoop na kar sakte hon, naa waaqif shakhs unke sawaal na karne ki wajah se unhein maal daar khayaal kare, tum unhein unke chehron se pahchaan loge, woh logon se chimat kar sawaal nahin karte aur¹ tum apne maal mein se jo kharch karte ho, beshak Allah use khoob jaanne waala hai.
verses.deepMeaning: (Ilhaafan) asal mein iske ma'na (chimat kar sawaal karna' hain, lekin Imam Tabri doosre mufassireen ne iska matlab bayaan kiya hai: 'Bilkul sawaal na karna'.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُنفِقُونَ أَمْوَٰلَهُم بِٱلَّيْلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ سِرًّۭا وَعَلَانِيَةًۭ فَلَهُمْ أَجْرُهُمْ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ وَلَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Allazeena yunfiqoona 'amwaalahum billayli wan-nahaari sirrañw-wa 'alaaniyatan falahum 'ajruhum 'inda Rabbihim wa laa khawfun 'alayhim wa laa hum yahzanoon.
verses.translation: Jo log apne maal kharch karte hain raat aur din mein, chhupaa kar aur zaahir, unke rab ke haan unke liye ajr hai, na unhein koyi khauf hoga aur na woh ghamgeen honge.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Nabi kareem ﷺ ne farmaya: 'Saat shakhs aise hain jin ko Allah uss din apna saaya ataa farmaayega jis din uske saaye ke siwa koyi saaya nahin hoga: ⓵ Aadil baadshaah ⓶woh naujawaan jo Allah ki ibaadat mein jawaan huwa. ⓷woh shakhs jis ka dil masjidon mein laga rahe. ⓸woh do mard jo aapas mein sirf Allah ke liye muhabbat karte hon, isi (bunyaad) par ekhatte hon aur usi par juda hon. ⓹aisa insaan jis ko kisi jaah-o-Jamaal waali aurat ne (buraayi ki)da'wat di to usne kaha ke 'main Allah se darta hoon.' Aisa insaan jisne aise poshidah andaaz mein sadqah diya ke baayein haath ko bhi ilm na ho ke uske daayein haath ne kiya khairaat ki. ⓺Aisa shakhs jis ne tanhaayi mein Allah ko yaad kiya to uski aankhon mein aansu aagye.' (Bukhari, Baab:16, Hadees:1423)

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَأْكُلُونَ ٱلرِّبَىٰ لَا يَقُومُونَ إِلَّا كَمَا يَقُومُ ٱلَّذِى يَتَخَبَّطُهُ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ مِنَ ٱلْمَسِّ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّمَا ٱلْبَيْعُ مِثْلُ ٱلرِّبَىٰ ۗ وَأَحَلَّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْبَيْعَ وَحَرَّمَ ٱلرِّبَىٰ ۚ فَمَن جَآءَهُۥ مَوْعِظَةٌۭ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦ فَٱنتَهَىٰ فَلَهُۥ مَا سَلَفَ وَأَمْرُهُۥٓ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ ۖ وَمَنْ عَادَ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ ۖ هُمْ فِيهَا خَـٰلِدُونَ
verses.transliteration: Allazeena ya'kuloonar-ribaa laa yaqoomoona 'illaa kamaa yaqoomul-lazee yatakhabbatuhush-shaytaanu minal-mass; zaalika bi'annahum qaalooo 'innamal-bay'u mislur-ribaa; wa 'ahallal- laahul bay'a wa 'harramar-ribaa; faman jaaa'ahoo mawʻizatum- mir-rabbihee fantahaa falahoo maa salafa wa 'amruhooo 'ilal-laahi wa man 'aada fa'ulaaa'ika 'Ashaabun-naari hum feehaa khaalidoon.
verses.translation: Jo log sood khaate 0 hain, woh (qiyaamat ke din) uss shakhs ki tarah khade honge jise shaytaan ne chhu kar badhawaas kar diya ho. yeh (saza) isliye (milegi) ke woh kahte the: tijaarat bhi sood hi ki tarah hai, haalaanke Allah ne tijaarat ko halaal kiya hai aur sood ko haraam. phir jis shakhs ke paas uske rab ki taraf se naseehat aajaaye aur woh (sood khaane se) baaz rahe to jo kuchh woh pahle khaa chuka, so khaa chuka, uska mu'aamlah Allah ke hawaale hai, aur jo shakhs dobaarah (soodi mu'aamlah) kare to aise log dozakhi hain, woh uss mein hameshah rahenge.
verses.deepMeaning: (Riba) 'Sood' ke lughwi ma'na: 'Ziyaadati aur izaafe' ke hain. kuchh muddat ke liye kisi ko 100 rupe iss shart par dena ke waapsi pe 125 rupe dene honge, yeh 25 rupe ziyaadah jo uss muddat ke e'waz hain woh sood hai ise (rebannasiyah) kahte hain. aur (Ribal fazl) woh sood hai jo hadees mein mazkoor 6 ashyaa mein kami beshi yaa naqad-o-udhaar ki wajah se hota hai. masalan: gandum ka tabaadlah gandum se karna ho to zaroori hai ke ek to baraabar baraabar ho doosra haathon haath ho, agar iss mein kami beshi ho ya ek naqad aur doosri udhaar ho ya donon hi udhaar, tab yeh sood hai.(Mulkhas az: Ahasanul Bayaan).

verses.arabic: يَمْحَقُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلرِّبَىٰ وَيُرْبِى ٱلصَّدَقَـٰتِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يُحِبُّ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ أَثِيمٍ
verses.transliteration: Yamhaqul-laahur- ribaa wa yurbiş-şadaqaat; wallaahu laa yuhibbu kulla kaffaarin 'aseem.
verses.translation: Allah sood ko mitaata hai aur sadqaat ko badhaata hai Allah kisi naa shukre gunaah gaar ko pasand nahin karta.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ وَأَقَامُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتَوُا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ لَهُمْ أَجْرُهُمْ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ وَلَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Innal-lazeena 'aamanoo wa 'amilus- saalihaati wa 'aqaamus- salaata wa 'aatawuz- zakaata lahum 'ajruhum 'inda Rabbihim wa laa khawfun 'alayhim wa laa hum yahzanoon.
verses.translation: Beshak jo log eemaan laaye aur unhon ne nek amal kiye aur namaaz qaayem ki aur woh zakaat adaa karte rahe, unke liye unke rab ke paas ajr hai, na un par koyi khauf hoga aur na woh ghamgeen honge.

verses.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَذَرُوا۟ مَا بَقِىَ مِنَ ٱلرِّبَوٰٓا۟ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhal- lazeena 'aamanut-taqul- laaha wa zaroo maa baqiya minar-ribaaa 'in kuntum mu'mineen.
verses.translation: Aye logon jo eemaan laaye ho! Allah se daro! aur jo sood baaqi hai woh chhod do¹ agar tum momin ho.
verses.deepMeaning: Ahaadees mein haraam ki kamaayi se roka gaya hai, masalan kutte aur khoon nikaalne ki qeemat lena, faahishah ki kamaayi neez goodne aur gudwaane waali par, sood khaane aur khilaane waale par aur tasweer banaane waale par Nabi ﷺ ne la'nat farmaayi hai. (Bukhari: baab:25, Al-libaas, Baab:96, Hadees:5962) Ek dafa Bilaal رضي الله عنه kharaab khujoor ke do sa' dekar a'ala qism khujoor ka ek sa' laaye take aapki khidmat mein khaane ke liye pesh karein to Nabi Kareem ﷺne farmaaya: 'afsos hai afsos! Yeh to bilkul sood hai bilkul sood, aisa mat karo aur agar tumne do baarah khujoor khareedni ho to (pahle) apni khujoor becho aur umdah khujoor (qeemat adaa karke) khareedo.(Bukhari:2312) mazeed dekhein. (Aal-e-Imran:3/130)'

verses.arabic: فَإِن لَّمْ تَفْعَلُوا۟ فَأْذَنُوا۟ بِحَرْبٍۢ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ ۖ وَإِن تُبْتُمْ فَلَكُمْ رُءُوسُ أَمْوَٰلِكُمْ لَا تَظْلِمُونَ وَلَا تُظْلَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Fa'il-lam tafaloo fa'zanoo biharbim-minal- laahi wa Rasoolihee wa 'in tubtum falakum ru'oosu 'amwaalikum laa tazlimoona wa laa tuzlamoon.
verses.translation: Phir agar tumne yeh na kiya to Allah aur uske Rasool se jung ke liye tayyaar hojaao, aur agar tum taubah karlo to tumhaare liye tumhaare asal maal hi hain, na tum kisi par zulm karo aur na tum par zulm kiya jaaye.

verses.arabic: وَإِن كَانَ ذُو عُسْرَةٍۢ فَنَظِرَةٌ إِلَىٰ مَيْسَرَةٍۢ ۚ وَأَن تَصَدَّقُوا۟ خَيْرٌۭ لَّكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'in kaana zoo 'usratin fanaziratun 'ilaa maysarah; wa 'anol taşaddaqoo khayrul- lakum 'in kuntum A taʻlamoon.
verses.translation: Aur agar (tumhaara maqrooz) tangdast ho to aasaani tak use mohlat do aur tumhaara sadqah¹ karna (qarz mu'aaf kar dena) to tumhaare liye bahut behatar hai, agar tum i'lm rakhte ho. 281. Aur uss din se daro jab tum Allah ki taraf lautaaye jaaoge, phir har shakhs ne jo kuchh kiya hoga use uska pura pura badlah diya jaayega aur kisi par zulm na hoga.
verses.deepMeaning: Muraad 'Mu'aaf kardena' hai. ek shakhs qarz diya karta tha aur apne ghulaam se kaha karta: 'Agar tu (qarz waapas lene ke liye) kisi tang dast ke paas jaaye to usse dar guzar karna shaayad ke Allah bhi humse dar guzar farmaaye.' To phir marne par waaqayi' Allah Ta'ala ne usko mu'aaf kar diya.(Al-Bukhari:Baab:54, Hadees: 3480)

verses.arabic: وَٱتَّقُوا۟ يَوْمًۭا تُرْجَعُونَ فِيهِ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ ۖ ثُمَّ تُوَفَّىٰ كُلُّ نَفْسٍۢ مَّا كَسَبَتْ وَهُمْ لَا يُظْلَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wattaqoo yawman turja'oona feehi 'ilal-laahi summa tuwaffaa kullu nafsim- maa kasabat wa hum laa yuzlamoon.
verses.translation: Aur uss din se daro jab tum Allah ki taraf lautaaye jaaoge, phir har shakhs ne jo kuchh kiya hoga use uska- pura pura badlah diya jaayega aur kisi par zulm na hoga.

verses.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِذَا تَدَايَنتُم بِدَيْنٍ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍۢ مُّسَمًّۭى فَٱكْتُبُوهُ ۚ وَلْيَكْتُب بَّيْنَكُمْ كَاتِبٌۭ بِٱلْعَدْلِ ۚ وَلَا يَأْبَ كَاتِبٌ أَن يَكْتُبَ كَمَا عَلَّمَهُ ٱللَّهُ ۚ فَلْيَكْتُبْ وَلْيُمْلِلِ ٱلَّذِى عَلَيْهِ ٱلْحَقُّ وَلْيَتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ رَبَّهُۥ وَلَا يَبْخَسْ مِنْهُ شَيْـًۭٔا ۚ فَإِن كَانَ ٱلَّذِى عَلَيْهِ ٱلْحَقُّ سَفِيهًا أَوْ ضَعِيفًا أَوْ لَا يَسْتَطِيعُ أَن يُمِلَّ هُوَ فَلْيُمْلِلْ وَلِيُّهُۥ بِٱلْعَدْلِ ۚ وَٱسْتَشْهِدُوا۟ شَهِيدَيْنِ مِن رِّجَالِكُمْ ۖ فَإِن لَّمْ يَكُونَا رَجُلَيْنِ فَرَجُلٌۭ وَٱمْرَأَتَانِ مِمَّن تَرْضَوْنَ مِنَ ٱلشُّهَدَآءِ أَن تَضِلَّ إِحْدَىٰهُمَا فَتُذَكِّرَ إِحْدَىٰهُمَا ٱلْأُخْرَىٰ ۚ وَلَا يَأْبَ ٱلشُّهَدَآءُ إِذَا مَا دُعُوا۟ ۚ وَلَا تَسْـَٔمُوٓا۟ أَن تَكْتُبُوهُ صَغِيرًا أَوْ كَبِيرًا إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلِهِۦ ۚ ذَٰلِكُمْ أَقْسَطُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَأَقْوَمُ لِلشَّهَـٰدَةِ وَأَدْنَىٰٓ أَلَّا تَرْتَابُوٓا۟ ۖ إِلَّآ أَن تَكُونَ تِجَـٰرَةً حَاضِرَةًۭ تُدِيرُونَهَا بَيْنَكُمْ فَلَيْسَ عَلَيْكُمْ جُنَاحٌ أَلَّا تَكْتُبُوهَا ۗ وَأَشْهِدُوٓا۟ إِذَا تَبَايَعْتُمْ وَلَا يُضَآرَّ كَاتِبٌۭ وَلَا شَهِيدٌۭ ۚ وَإِن تَفْعَلُوا۟ فَإِنَّهُۥ فُسُوقُۢ بِكُمْ ۗ وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَيُعَلِّمُكُمُ ٱللَّهُ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhal- lazeena 'aamanooo 'izaa tadaayantum bidaynin 'ilaa 'ajalim-musam-man faktubooh; walyaktub- baynakum kaatibum bil'adl; wa laa ya'ba kaatibun 'any-yaktuba kamaa 'allamahul-laah; falyaktub walyumlilil- lazee 'alayhil-haqqu walyattaqil-laaha rabbahoo wa laa yabkhas minhu shay'aa; fa'in kaanal-lazee 'alayhil- haqqu safeehan 'aw da'eefan 'aw laa yastatee'u 'añy-yumilla huwa falyumlil waliyyuhoo bil'adl; wastashhidoo shaheedayni mir- rijaalikum fa'il-lam yakoonaa rajulayni farajuluñw-wamra'ataani mimman tardawna minash-shuhadaaa'i 'an tadilla 'ihdaahumaa fatuzakkira 'ihdaahumal- 'ukhraa; wa laa ya'bash-shuhadaaa'u 'izaa maa du'oo; wa laa tas'amooo 'an taktuboohu şagheeran 'aw kabeeran 'ilaaa 'ajalih; zaalikum 'aqsatu 'indal-laahi wa 'aqwamu lishshahaadati wa 'adnaaa 'allaa tartaabooo 'illaaa 'an takoona tijaaratan haadiratan tudeeroonahaa baynakum falaysa 'alaykum junaahun 'allaa taktuboohaa; wa 'ashidooo 'izaa tabaaya'tum; wa laa yudaaarra kaatibuñw-wa laa shaheed; wa 'in taf aloo fa'innahoo fusooqum-bikum; wattaqul-laaha wa yu'allimukumul-laah; wallaahu bikulli shay'in 'Aleem.
verses.translation: Aye logo jo eemaan laaye ho! jab tum aapas mein ek muqarrarah muddat ke liye udhaar ka len den karo to use likh lo, aur likhne waale ko chaahiye ke tumhaare darmiyaan insaaf ke saath tahreer karde, aur likhne waala likhne se inkaar na kare jaise Allah ne use sikhaaya hai, use likhna chaahiye, aur woh shakhs likhwaaye jiske zimme qarz ho aur use apne rab, Allah se darna chaahiye aur (likhwaate waqt) woh (maqrooz) uss mein se koyi cheez kam na kare, lekin agar woh jis ke zimme qarz hai naadaan ya kamzor ho, yaa likhwaa na sakta ho to uska mukhtaar insaaf ke saath likhwaaye, aur tum apne musalmaan mardon mein se do gawaah banaa lo, phir agar do mard (muyassar) na hon to ek mard aur do a'uratein (gawaahi den) jinhein tum gawaahon ke taur par pasand karo. (yeh isliye) ke ek a'urat agar bhool jaaye to un mein se doosri use yaad dilaa de, aur gawaah jab bulaaye jaayein to woh inkaar na karein aur mu'aamlah chhota ho ya bada use muqarrarah muddat ke saath likhwaane mein susti na karo. yeh Allah ke nazdeek ziyaadah insaaf ki baat hai aur gawaahi ke liye ziyaadah durust tareeqa hai aur (iss tarah) tumhaare shak mein padne ka imkaan bhi kam rah jaata hai. haan tum aapas mein naqd jo tijaarati len den karo, use na likha jaaye to tum par koyi harj nahin aur jab tum aapas mein sauda karo to gawaah banaa liya karo aur kaatib aur gawaah ko sataaya na jaaye aur agar tum (aisa) karoge to yaqeenan yeh tumhaari taraf se naa farmaani hogi aur Allah se darte raho aur Allah tumhen (yeh ahkaam) sikhaata hai aur Allah har cheez ko khoob jaanne waala hai.

verses.arabic: وَإِن كُنتُمْ عَلَىٰ سَفَرٍۢ وَلَمْ تَجِدُوا۟ كَاتِبًۭا فَرِهَـٰنٌۭ مَّقْبُوضَةٌۭ ۖ فَإِنْ أَمِنَ بَعْضُكُم بَعْضًۭا فَلْيُؤَدِّ ٱلَّذِى ٱؤْتُمِنَ أَمَـٰنَتَهُۥ وَلْيَتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ رَبَّهُۥ ۗ وَلَا تَكْتُمُوا۟ ٱلشَّهَـٰدَةَ ۚ وَمَن يَكْتُمْهَا فَإِنَّهُۥٓ ءَاثِمٌۭ قَلْبُهُۥ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ عَلِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'in kuntum 'alaa safariñw-wa lam tajidoo kaatiban farihaanum- maqboodatun fa'in 'amina ba'dukum ba'dan falyu'addil-lazi'-tumina 'amaa natahoo walyattaqil-laaha Rabbah; wa laa taktumush-shahaadah; wa mañy-yaktumhaa fa'innahooo 'aasimun qalbuh; wallaahu bimaa ta maloona 'Aleem.
verses.translation: Aur agar tum safar mein ho aur tumhein koyi likhne waala na mile to koyi cheez girwi (rahan ke taur par¹ qabze mein de di jaaye, aur agar tum mein se koyi doosre par e'tebaar kare to jis shakhs par e'tebaar kiya gaya ho use chaahiye ke doosre ki amaanat waapas adaa kar de aur apne rab, Allah se dare aur tum gawaahi na chhupaao aur jo shakhs gawaahi chhupaayega to beshak uska dil gunaah gaar hai aur jo amal tum karte ho Allah use khoob jaanta hai.
verses.deepMeaning: (Rahan) ka hadees se bhi jawaaz saabit hai. Nabi Kareem ﷺ ne ek yahoodi ke paas apni zirah girwi rakh kar ek waqt tak ke liye kuchh anaaj khareeda tha. (Al-Bukhari, Ar-Rahan, Baab:2, Hadees:2509

verses.arabic: لِّلَّهِ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۗ وَإِن تُبْدُوا۟ مَا فِىٓ أَنفُسِكُمْ أَوْ تُخْفُوهُ يُحَاسِبْكُم بِهِ ٱللَّهُ ۖ فَيَغْفِرُ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيُعَذِّبُ مَن يَشَآءُ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ قَدِيرٌ
verses.transliteration: Lillaahi maa fis- samaawaati wa maa fil- 'ard; wa 'in tubdoo maa feee 'anfusikum 'aw tukhfoohu yuhaasibkum bihil-laah; fayaghfiru wa limany-yashaaa'u yu'azzibu mañy- yashaaa; wallaahu 'alaa kulli shay'in qadeer.
verses.translation: Aasmaanon aur zameen mein jo kuchh hai (sab) Allah hi ka hai aur tumhaare dilon mein jo kuchh hai khaah use zaahir-karo ya chhupaao, Allah tumse uska hisaab lega, phir jise woh chaahega bakhsh dega aur jise chaahega a'zaab dega aur Allah har cheez par khoob qaadir hai.

verses.arabic: ءَامَنَ ٱلرَّسُولُ بِمَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيْهِ مِن رَّبِّهِۦ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ ۚ كُلٌّ ءَامَنَ بِٱللَّهِ وَمَلَـٰٓئِكَتِهِۦ وَكُتُبِهِۦ وَرُسُلِهِۦ لَا نُفَرِّقُ بَيْنَ أَحَدٍۢ مِّن رُّسُلِهِۦ ۚ وَقَالُوا۟ سَمِعْنَا وَأَطَعْنَا ۖ غُفْرَانَكَ رَبَّنَا وَإِلَيْكَ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
verses.transliteration: 'Aamanar-Rasoolu bimaaa 'unzila 'ilayhi mir-Rabbihee walmu'minoon; kullun 'aamana billaahi wa Malaaa'ikatihee wa Kutubihee wa Rusulih; laa nufarriqu bayna 'ahadim-mir-Rusulih; wa qaaloo sami'naa wa 'ata'naa ghufraanaka Rabbanaa wa 'ilaykal- maseer.
verses.translation: Rasool (ﷺ) USS (hidaayat) par eemaan laaye hain jo unke rab ki taraf se un par naazil ki gayi hai aur saare momin bhi, sab Allah par aur uske farishton par aur uski kitabon par aur uske Rasoolon par eemaan laaye hain. (woh kahte hain): hum uske Rasoolon mein se kisi ek mein bhi farq nahin karte, aur woh kahte hain: humne (hukm) suna aur etaa'at ki, aye hamaare rab! hum teri bakhshish chaahte hain aur hamein teri hi taraf laut kar aana hai.

verses.arabic: لَا يُكَلِّفُ ٱللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا ۚ لَهَا مَا كَسَبَتْ وَعَلَيْهَا مَا ٱكْتَسَبَتْ ۗ رَبَّنَا لَا تُؤَاخِذْنَآ إِن نَّسِينَآ أَوْ أَخْطَأْنَا ۚ رَبَّنَا وَلَا تَحْمِلْ عَلَيْنَآ إِصْرًۭا كَمَا حَمَلْتَهُۥ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِنَا ۚ رَبَّنَا وَلَا تُحَمِّلْنَا مَا لَا طَاقَةَ لَنَا بِهِۦ ۖ وَٱعْفُ عَنَّا وَٱغْفِرْ لَنَا وَٱرْحَمْنَآ ۚ أَنتَ مَوْلَىٰنَا فَٱنصُرْنَا عَلَى ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Laa yukalliful-laahu nafsan 'illaa wus'ahaa; lahaa maa kasabat wa 'alayhaa maktasabat; Rabbanaa laa tu'aakhiznaaa 'in- naseenaaa 'aw 'akhta'naa; Rabbanaa wa laa tahmil-'alaynaaa 'işran kamaa hamaltahoo 'alal-lazeena min qablinaa; Rabbanaa wa laa tuhammilnaa maa laa taaqata lanaa bihee wa'fu 'annaa waghfir lanaa warhamnaa; 'Anta mawlaanaa fanşurnaa 'alal-qawmil-kaafireen.
verses.translation: Allah kisi ko uski bardaasht se badh kar takleef nahin deta, kisi shakhs ne jo neki kamaayi uska phal usi ke liye hai aur jo usne buraayi ki uska wabaal bhi usi par hai. aye hamaare rab! agar humse bhool chook ho jaaye to hamaari girift na kar. aye hamaare rab! jis bojh ko uthhaane ki hum mein taaqat nahin woh humse na uthhwa, aur humse dar guzar farma, aur humein bakhsh de, aur hum par raham farma, tu hi hamaara kaarsaaz hai, pas tu kaafiron ke muqaable mein hamaari madad farma.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Hadees mein hai ke Nabi Kareem ﷺ ne farmaaya: 'jis ne surah Baqarah ki aakhri do aayatein raat ko padhein to woh uske liye (raat ki ibaadat se) kaafi hain. '(Al-Bukhari, Al-Maghaazi, Baab:12, Hadees:4008)

verses.arabic: الم
verses.transliteration: 'Alif-Laaam-Meeem
verses.translation: Alif laaam meeem.

verses.arabic: اللهُ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا هُوَ الْحَيُّ الْقَيُّومُ
verses.transliteration: 'Allaahu laaa 'ilaaha 'illaa Huwal-Hayyul- Qayyoom.
verses.translation: Woh Allah hai, uske siwa koyi ma'bood nahin, woh zindah hai, sab sambhaalne waala hai.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Hayyun aur Qayyoom Allah Ta'ala ki khaas sifaat hain. Hayyun ka matlab woh azal ze hai aur abad tak rahega, use maut aur fana nahin, Qayyoom ka matlab saari kaayenaat ka qaayem rakhne waala mhuaafiz aur nigraan.

verses.arabic: نَزَّلَ عَلَيْكَ الْكِتَبَ بِالْحَقِّ مُصَدِّقًا لِمَا بَيْنَ يَدَيْهِ وَ أَنْزَلَ التَّوْرَيةَ وَ الْإِنْجِيلَ
verses.transliteration: Nazzala 'alaykal- Kitaaba bilhaqqi muşaddiqal-limaa bayna yadayhi wa 'anzalat- Tawraata wal-'Injeel.
verses.translation: Usi ne aap par haq ke saath kitab naazil ki hai, jo apne se pahli kitabon ki tasdeeq karne waali hai aur usi ne Tauraat aur injeel ko naazil kiya.

verses.arabic: مِنْ قَبْلُ هُدًى لِلنَّاسِ وَ أَنْزَلَ الْفُرْقَانَ إِنَّ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا بِأَيْتِ اللَّهِ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ شَدِيدٌ وَاللَّهُ عَزِيزٌ ذُو انْتِقَامٍ
verses.transliteration: Min qablu hudal- linnaasi wa 'anzalal- Furqaan; 'innal-lazeena kafaroo bi-'Aayaatil-laahi lahum 'azaabun shadeed; wallaahu 'azeezun zun-tiqaam.
verses.translation: Isse pahle, logon ki hidaayat ke liye aur usi ne furqaan (qur'an) naazil kiya. beshak woh log jinhon ne Allah ki aayaton ka inkaar kiya unke liye shadeed a'zaab hai aur Allah ghaalib hai, badlah lene waala.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ اللَّهَ لَا يَخْفَى عَلَيْهِ شَيْءٌ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَلَا فِي السَّمَاءِ
verses.transliteration: 'Innal-laaha laa yakhfaa 'alayhi shay'un fil-'ardi wa laa fis-samaaa'.
verses.translation: Beshak Allah se zameen aur aasmaan mein koyi cheez chhupi huyi nahin.

verses.arabic: هُوَ الَّذِي يُصَوِّرُكُمْ فِي الْأَرْحَامِ كَيْفَ يَشَاءُ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا هُوَ الْعَزِيزُ الْحَكِيمُ
verses.transliteration: Huwal-lazee yuşawwirukum fil- 'arhaami kayfa yashaaa'; laaa 'ilaaha 'illaa Huwal-'Azeezul- Hakeem.
verses.translation: Wahi hai jo tumhaari maaon ke pet mein tumhaari sooratein jaisi chaahta hai banaata hai.¹ uske siwa koyi ma'bood nahin woh ghaalib, khoob hikmat waala hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Khoobsurat ya bad soorat, muzakkar ya muannas, nek bakht ya badbakht, naaqisul khilqat ya taammul khilqat. Jab reham-e-maadar mein yeh saare tasarrufaat sirf Allah Ta'ala hi karne waala hai to Eisa عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام ilaah kis tarah ho sakte hain jo khud bhi is marhala-e-takhleeq se guzar kar dunya mein aaye hain jis ka silsila Allah ne reham-e-maadar mein qaayem farmaaya hai.

verses.arabic: هُوَ الَّذِي أَنْزَلَ عَلَيْكَ الْكِتَبَ مِنْهُ أَيْتُ مُحْكَمْتُ هُنَّ أُمُّ الكِتَبِ وَ أُخَرُ مُتَشْبِهُتُ فَأَمَّا الَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِمْ زَيْغٌ فَيَتَّبِعُونَ مَا تَشَابَهَ مِنْهُ ابْتِغَاءَ الْفِتْنَةِ وَ ابْتِغَاءَ تَأْوِيلِهِ وَ مَا يَعْلَمُ تَأْوِيلَةَ إِلَّا اللهُ وَالرَّسِخُونَ فِي الْعِلْمِ يَقُولُونَ آمَنَّا بِهِ كُلٌّ مِّنْ عِنْدِ رَبِّنَا ۚ وَمَا يَذَّكَّرُ إِلَّا أُولُوا الْأَلْبَابِ .
verses.transliteration: Huwal-lazeee 'anzala 'alaykal-Kitaaba minhu 'Aayaatum-Muhkamaatun hunna 'Ummul-Kitaabi wa 'ukharu Mutashaabihaatun fa'ammal-lazeena fee quloobihim zayghun fayattabi'oona maa tashaabaha minhub- tighaaa'al-fitnati wabtighaaa'a ta'weelih; wa maa ya'lamu ta'weelahooo 'illal-laah; warraasikhoona fil-'ilmi yaqooloona 'aamannaa bihee kullum-min 'indi Rabbinaa; wa maa yazzakkaru 'illaaa 'ulul- 'albaab.
verses.translation: Wahi hai jisne aap par kitab naazil ki jis mein kuchh aayaat-e-mohkam (waazeh) hain, jo iss kitab ki asal bunyaad hain aur kuchh doosri mutashaabihaat (ghair waazeh) hain, phir jin logon ke dil mein tedhe hai woh un mein se inhi aayaton ke peechhe pade rahte hain jo mutaashabah (ghair waazeh) hain, unka maqsad mahaz fitne aur taaweel ki talaash hota hai, haalaanke Allah ke siwa koyi bhi unki taaweel ki talaash hota hai, haalaanke Allah ke siwa koyi bhi unki taaweel nahin jaanta, aur jo log i'lm mein pukhtah hain woh kahte hain: hamaara un (mutashaabihaat) par eemaan hai, yeh sab hamaare rab hi ki taraf se hain aur naseehat to aqlmand hi haasil karte hain.

verses.arabic: رَبَّنَا لَا تُزِغْ قُلُوبَنَا بَعْدَ إِذْ هَدَيْتَنَا وَهَبْ لَنَا مِنْ لَدُنْكَ رَحْمَةً إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ الْوَهَّابُ
verses.transliteration: Rabbanaa laa tuzigh quloobanaa ba'da 'iz hadaytanaa wahab lanaa mil-ladunka rahmah; 'innaka 'antal- Wahhaab.
verses.translation: (Woh du'a karte hain:) aye hamaare rab! hamen hidaayat dene ke ba'd hamaare dilon ko tedha na kar aur a'taa kar humein apne paas se rahmat, beshak tu hi bada a'taa karne waala hai.

verses.arabic: رَبَّنَا إِنَّكَ جَامِعُ النَّاسِ لِيَوْمٍ لَّا رَيْبَ فِيهِ إِنَّ اللَّهَ لَا يُخْلِفُ الميعاد
verses.transliteration: Rabbanaaa 'innaka jaami'un-naasi li- Yawmil-laa rayba feeh; 'innal-laaha laa yukhliful-mee'aad.
verses.translation: Aye hamaare rab! yaqeenan tu logon ko ek din jama' karne waala hai jis mein koyi shak nahin, beshak Allah apne wa'de ki khilaaf warzi nahin karta.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لَنْ تُغْنِيَ عَنْهُمْ أَمْوَالُهُمْ وَلَا أَوْلَادُهُمْ مِّنَ اللَّهِ شَيْئًا وَ أُولَئِكَ هُمْ وَقُودُ النَّارِ
verses.transliteration: 'Innal-lazeena kafaroo lan tughniya 'anhum 'amwaaluhum wa laaa 'awlaaduhum minal-laahi shay'aa; wa 'ulaaa'ika hum waqoodun-Naar.
verses.translation: Beshak jin logon ne kufr kiya, unke maal aur unki aulaad Allah (ke a'zaab) se (bachaane mein) unke kuchh bhi kaam nahin aayengi aur wahi log aag ka indhan hain.

verses.arabic: كَدَابِ آلِ فِرْعَوْنَ وَ الَّذِينَ مِنْ قَبْلِهِمْ كَذَّبُوا بِايْتِنَا فَأَخَذَهُمُ اللهُ بِذُنُوبِهِمْ وَ اللَّهُ شَدِيدُ الْعِقَابِ
verses.transliteration: Kada'bi 'Aali Fir'awna wallazeena min qablihim; kazzaboo bi-'Aayaatinaa fa'akhazahumul-laahu bizunoobihim; wallaahu shadeedul-'iqaab.
verses.translation: (Unka anjaam) aal-e- fira'un aur un logon ka saa hoga jo unse pahle the, unhon ne hamaari aayaton ko jhutlaaya, to Allah ne unke gunaahon ke baay'is unhein pakad liya aur Allah sakht sazaa dene waala hai.

verses.arabic: قُلْ لِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا سَتُغْلَبُونَ وَلَ تُحْشَرُونَ إِلَى جَهَنَّمَ وَ بِئْسَ الْمِهَادُ
verses.transliteration: Qul lillazeena kafaroo satughlaboona wa tuhsharoona 'ilaa jahannam; wa bi'sal- mihaad.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) jin logon ne kufr kiya, unse kah deejiye: a'nqareeb tum maghloob ho jaaoge¹ aur tum jahannam ki taraf ekhatthhe kiye (haanke) jaaoge¹ aur woh bura thhikaana hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Yahaan kaafiron se muraad yahoodi hain. aur yeh peshgoyi jald hi puri ho gayi, chunaancheh banu Qai'nuqa' aur Banu Nazeer jelaa watan kiye gaye, banu Quraizah qatl kiye gaye, phir Khaibar fatah ho gaya aur tamaam yahoodiyon par jizyah aayed kar diya gaya. (Fatahul Qadeer).

verses.arabic: قد كَانَ لَكُمْ آيَةٌ فِي فِئَتَيْنِ التَقَتَا فِئَةٌ تُقَاتِلُ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ وَ أُخْرَى كَافِرَةٌ يَرَوْنَهُمْ مِثْلَيْهِمْ رَأَى الْعَيْنِ وَاللَّهُ يُؤَيِّدُ بِنَصْرِهِ مَنْ يَشَاءُ إِنَّ فِي ذَلِكَ لَعِبْرَةً لأُولِي الْأَبْصَارِ
verses.transliteration: Qad kaana lakum 'Aayatun fee fi'ataynil- taqataa fi'atun tuqaatilu fee sabeelil-laahi wa 'ukhraa kaafiratuñy- yarawnahum-mislayhim ra'yal-'ayn; wallaahu yu'ayyidu binașrihee many-yashaaa'; 'inna fee zaalika laʻibratal- li'ulil-'absaar.
verses.translation: Tahqeeq tumhaare liye un do girohon mein ek badi nishaani hai jo (badr mein) baahum takraaye. ek giroh Allah ki raah mein lad rahaa tha aur doosra giroh kaafir tha. musalmaan zaahiri aankhon se unko apne se do guna dekh rahe the aur Allah apni madad se jisko chaahta hai quwwat deta hai, beshak iss mein baseerat waalon ke liye i'brat hai.

verses.arabic: زيِّنَ لِلنَّاسِ حُبُّ الشَّهَاتِ مِنَ النِّسَاءِ وَالْبَنِينَ وَالْقَنَاطِيرِ الْمُقَنْطَرَةِ مِنَ الذَّهَبِ وَالْفِضَّةِ وَ الْخَيْلِ الْمُسَوَّمَةِ وَ الْأَنْعَامِ وَ الْحَرْثِ ذَلِكَ مَتَاعُ الْحَيُوةِ الدُّنْيَا وَاللَّهُ عِنْدَهُ حُسْنُ الْبَابِ
verses.transliteration: Zuyyina linnaasi hubbush-shahawaati minan-nisaaa'i wal-baneena walqanaateeril- muqantarati minaz- zahabi walfiddati walkhaylil-musawwamat wal-'an'aami walhars; zaalika mataa'ul- hayaatid-dunyaa wallaahu 'indahoo husnul-ma'aab.
