verses.translation: Aur aise log (bhi Allah ko pasand nahin) jo logon ke dekhaawe ke liye apne maal kharch karte hain. aur woh Allah par aur aakhirat ke din par eemaan nahin rakhte. aur jis shakhs ka saathi shaytaan ho to woh bahut bura saathi hai.

verses.arabic: وَ مَاذَا عَلَيْهِمْ لَوْ اٰمَنُوْا بِاللّٰهِ وَ الْيَوْمِ الْاٰخِرِ وَ اَنْفَقُوْا مِمَّا رَزَقَهُمُ اللّٰهُ ۭ وَ كَانَ اللّٰهُ بِهِمْ عَلِيْمًا
verses.transliteration: Wa maazaa 'alayhim law 'aamanoo billaahi wal-Yawmil-'Aakhiri wa 'anfaqoo mimmaa razaqahumul-laah; wa kaanal-laahu bihim 'Aaleemaa.
verses.translation: Aur un logon ka kiya jaata agar woh Allah aur aakhirat ke din par eemaan le aate aur Allah ne unhein jo maal diya hai uss mein se kharch karte? aur Allah unhein khoob jaanne waala hai.

verses.arabic: اِنَّ اللّٰهَ لَا يَظْلِمُ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ ۖ وَّ اِنْ تَكُ حَسَنَةً يُّضٰعِفْهَا وَ يُؤْتِ مِنْ لَّدُنْهُ اَجْرًا عَظِيْمًا
verses.transliteration: 'Innal-laaha laa yazlimu misqaala zarratin wa 'in taku hasanatany- yudaa'ifhaa wa yu'ti mil- ladunhu 'ajran 'azeemaa.
verses.translation: Beshak Allah zarrah baraabar bhi zulm nahin karta¹ aur agar (kisi ki) koyi neki ho to woh use dugni kar deta hai aur apni taraf se bahut bada ajr deta hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Ya'ni har ek ko usi cheez ka badlah milega jo usne kiya hoga. Qadre tafseel ke liye mulaahzah karein (Sahih Al-Bukhari, Tafseer Surah Nisa, Baab:8, Hadees:4581)

verses.arabic: فَكَيْفَ اِذَا جِئْنَا مِنْ كُلِّ اُمَّةٍۭ بِشَهِيْدٍ وَّ جِئْنَا بِكَ عَلٰى هٰۤؤُلَآءِ شَهِيْدًا
verses.transliteration: Fakayfa 'izaa ji'naa min kulli 'ummatim bishaheedinw-wa ji'naa bika 'alaa haaa'ulaaa'i Shaheedaa.
verses.translation: Phir unka kiya haal hoga jab hum har ummat se ek gawaah laayenge aur Aap ﷺ ko uss ummat par gawaah banaayenge.

verses.arabic: يَوْمَىٕذٍ يَّوَدُّ الَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا وَ عَصَوُا الرَّسُوْلَ لَوْ تُسَوّٰى بِهِمُ الْاَرْضُ ۚ وَ لَا يَكْتُمُوْنَ اللّٰهَ حَدِيْثًا
verses.transliteration: Yawma'iziny- yawaddul-lazeena kafaroo wa'aşawur- Rasoola law tusawwaa bihimul-'ardu wa laa yaktumoonal-laaha hadeesaa.
verses.translation: Uss din woh log jinhon ne kufr kiya aur Rasool ki naafarmaani ki, khaahish karenge ke kaash! unhen zameen ke saath baraabar kardiya jaata, aur woh Allah se koyi baat chhupa na sakenge.

verses.arabic: يٰٓاَيُّهَا الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا لَا تَقْرَبُوا الصَّلٰوةَ وَ اَنْتُمْ سُكٰرٰى حَتّٰى تَعْلَمُوْا مَا تَقُوْلُوْنَ وَ لَا جُنُبًا اِلَّا عَابِرِيْ سَبِيْلٍ حَتّٰى تَغْتَسِلُوْا ۭ وَ اِنْ كُنْتُمْ مَّرْضٰى اَوْ عَلٰى سَفَرٍ اَوْ جَآءَ اَحَدٌ مِّنْكُمْ مِّنَ الْغَآىٕطِ اَوْ لٰمَسْتُمُ النِّسَآءَ فَلَمْ تَجِدُوْا مَآءً فَتَيَمَّمُوْا صَعِيْدًا طَيِّبًا فَامْسَحُوْا بِوُجُوْهِكُمْ وَ اَيْدِيْكُمْ ۭ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ كَانَ عَفُوًّا غَفُوْرًا
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhal- lazeena 'aamanoo laa wa taqrabuş-şalaata 'antum sukaaraa hattaa taʻlamoo maa taqooloona wa laa junuban 'illaa 'aabiree sabeelin hattaa taghtasiloo; wa 'in kuntum mardaaa 'aw 'alaa safarin 'aw jaaa'a 'ahadum-minkum minal-ghaaa'iti 'aw laamastumun- nisaaa'a falam tajidoo maaa'an fatayammamoo şa'eedan tayyiban famsahoo biwujoohikum wa 'aydeekum; 'innal-laaha kaana 'Afuwwan Ghafooraa.
verses.translation: Aye logo jo eemaan laaye ho! tum uss waqt namaaz ke qareeb na jaao jab tum nashe mein ho, yahaan tak tum samajhne lago jo kuchh tum kahte ho, aur na naapaaki ki haalat mein (namaaz ke qareeb jaao) yahaan tak ke tum ghusl karlo, haan agar raah chalte guzro to aur baat hai. aur agar tum bimaar ho ya safar mein ho ya tum mein se koyi rafa' haajat se (faarigh ho kar) aaya ho ya tum ne auraton se mubaashrat ki ho, phir tumhein paani na mile to paak mitti se tayammum karlo aur use apne munh aur haathon par mal lo¹ beshak Allah bahut mu'aaf karne waala, bada bakhshne waala hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Ise 'tayammum karna' kahte hain. namaaz adaa karne ke liye wazu zaroori hai lekin paani na milne ki soorat mein ya marz ki soorat mein mitti se tayammum karke namaaz adaa ki jasakti hai iska tareeqa yeh hai: Ek hi martabah haath zameen par maar kar kalaayi tak

verses.arabic: اَلَمْ تَرَ اِلَى الَّذِيْنَ اُوْتُوْا نَصِيْبًا مِّنَ الْكِتٰبِ يَشْتَرُوْنَ الضَّلٰلَةَ وَ يُرِيْدُوْنَ اَنْ تَضِلُّوا السَّبِيْلَ
verses.transliteration: 'Alam tara 'ilal-lazeena 'ootoo naseebam-minal- Kitaabi yashtaroonad- dalaalata wa yureedoona 'an tadillus- sabeel.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) kiya aap ne un logon ko nahin dekha jinhein kitab ka kuchh hissa diya gaya? woh gumraahi khareedte hain aur yeh chaahte hain ke tum bhi gumraah ho jaao.

verses.arabic: وَ اللّٰهُ اَعْلَمُ بِاَعْدَآىٕكُمْ ۚ وَ كَفٰى بِاللّٰهِ وَلِيًّا وَّ كَفٰى بِاللّٰهِ نَصِيْرًا
verses.transliteration: Wallaahu 'alamu bi'a'daaa'ikum; wa kafaa billaahi waliyyanw-wa kafaa billaahi naşeeraa.
verses.translation: Aur Allah dushmanon tumhaare khoob ko jaanta hai aur Allah dost aur madadgaar ke taur par kaafi hai.

verses.arabic: مِنَ الَّذِيْنَ هَادُوْا يُحَرِّفُوْنَ الْكَلِمَ عَنْ مَّوَاضِعِهٖ وَ يَقُوْلُوْنَ سَمِعْنَا وَ عَصَيْنَا وَ اسْمَعْ غَيْرَ مُسْمَعٍ وَّ رَاعِنَا لَيًّۢا بِاَلْسِنَتِهِمْ وَ طَعْنًا فِي الدِّيْنِ ۚ وَ لَوْ اَنَّهُمْ قَالُوْا سَمِعْنَا وَ اَطَعْنَا وَ اسْمَعْ وَ انْظُرْنَا لَكَانَ خَيْرًا لَّهُمْ وَ اَقْوَمَ وَ لٰكِنْ لَّعَنَهُمُ اللّٰهُ بِكُفْرِهِمْ فَلَا يُؤْمِنُوْنَ اِلَّا قَلِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: Minal-lazeena haadoo yuharrifoonal- Kalima 'am-mawaadi'ihee wa yaqooloona sami'naa wa 'aşaynaa wasma' ghayra musma'inw-wa raa inaa layyam bi'alsinatihim wa ta'nan fid-deen; wa law 'annahum qaaloo sami'naa wa 'ata'naa wasma' wanzurnaa lakaana khayral- lahum wa 'aqwama wa laakil- la 'anahumul-laahu bikufrihim falaa yu'minoona 'illaa qaleelaa.
verses.translation: Yahoodiyon mein se kuchh log alfaaz ko unke moqa mahal se pher dete hain aur phir apni zabaanon ko tad mod kar sachche deen ke khilaaf ta'na zani karte huye(Nabi se) kahte hain: 'humne suna aur humne naa farmaani ki' aur kahte hain: Suno! Agarcheh tum iss qaabil nahin ho ke tumhein kuchh sunaaya jaaye, aur aapse mukhaatab ho kar kahte hain: (Raa'ina) 'aye hamaare charwaahe' aur beshak agar woh kahte: 'humne suna aur humne etaa'at ki, aur hamaari baat sunye aur hamaari taraf nazar keejiye' to unke liye behtar aur nihaayat munaasib hota, lekin Allah ne unke kufr ki wajah se un par la'nat ki, chunaancheh siwaaye chand logon ke woh eemaan nahin laate.

verses.arabic: يٰٓاَيُّهَا الَّذِيْنَ اُوْتُوا الْكِتٰبَ اٰمِنُوْا بِمَا نَزَّلْنَا مُصَدِّقًا لِّمَا مَعَكُمْ مِّنْ قَبْلِ اَنْ نَّطْمِسَ وُجُوْهًا فَنَرُدَّهَا عَلٰٓى اَدْبَارِهَاۤ اَوْ نَلْعَنَهُمْ كَمَا لَعَنَّاۤ اَصْحٰبَ السَّبْتِ ۭ وَ كَانَ اَمْرُ اللّٰهِ مَفْعُوْلًا
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhal-lazeena 'ootul-Kitaaba 'aaminoo bimaa nazzalnaa muşaddiqal-limaa ma'akum min qabli 'an natmisa wujoohan fanaruddahaa 'alaaa 'adbaarihaaa 'aw nal'anahum kamaa la'annaaa Ashaabas- Sabt; wa kaana 'amrul- laahi mafoolaa.
verses.translation: Aye logo jinhein kitab di gayi! iss (Qur'an) par eemaan laao jo humne naazil kiya, aur woh iski tasdeeq karne waala hai jo tumhaare paas hai, (tum eemaan laao)¹ isse pahle ke hum chehre bigaad den aur unhein peechhe ki taraf pherdein ya un par usi tarah la'nat bhejein jis tarah humne sabt waalon par la'nat bheji thi, aur (yaad rakkho!) Allah ka hukm atal hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Yeh aayat Yahood-o-Nasaara ko Muhammad ﷺ ki risaalat aur qur'an majeed ki ta'limaat par eemaan laane ko zaroori qaraar de rahi hai. mazeed mulaahazah ho haashyah: (Surah Aal-e-Imran:3/85,116)

verses.arabic: اِنَّ اللّٰهَ لَا يَغْفِرُ اَنْ يُّشْرَكَ بِهٖ وَ يَغْفِرُ مَا دُوْنَ ذٰلِكَ لِمَنْ يَّشَآءُ ۚ وَ مَنْ يُّشْرِكْ بِاللّٰهِ فَقَدِ افْتَرٰٓى اِثْمًا عَظِيْمًا
verses.transliteration: Innal-laaha laa yaghfiru any-yushraka bihee wa yaghfiru maa doona zaalika limany- yashaaa'; wa mañy- yushrik billaahi faqadif- taraaa 'isman 'azeemaa.
verses.translation: Beshak Allah (yeh gunaah) nahin bakhshta ke uske saath shirk kiya jaaye aur woh uske elaawah jise chaahe bakhsh deta hai aur jis ne Allah ke saath shirk kiya, usne jhoot ghada aur bade gunaah ka kaam kiya.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Mulaahazah ho surah Aal-e-Imran:3:91

verses.arabic: اَلَمْ تَرَ اِلَى الَّذِيْنَ يُزَكُّوْنَ اَنْفُسَهُمْ ۚ بَلِ اللّٰهُ يُزَكِّيْ مَنْ يَّشَآءُ وَ لَا يُظْلَمُوْنَ فَتِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: 'Alam tara 'ilal- lazeena yuzakkoona 'anfusahum; balil-laahu yuzakkee many- yashaaa'u wa laa yuzlamoona fateelaa.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) kiya aapne unhein nahin dekha jo apni paakeezgi khud bayaan karte hain balke Allah jise chaahta hai paak karta hai aur logon par zarrah baraabar bhi zulm nahin kiya jaayega.

verses.arabic: انْظُرْ كَيْفَ يَفْتَرُوْنَ عَلَى اللّٰهِ الْكَذِبَ ۚ وَ كَفٰى بِهٖٓ اِثْمًا مُّبِيْنًا
verses.transliteration: 'Unzur kayfa yaftaroona 'alal-laahil- kazib; wa kafaa biheee ismam-mubeenaa.
verses.translation: Dekhiye! woh kis tarah Allah par jhoot ghhadte hain aur unke gunaah gaar hone ke liye yahi khula gunaah kaafi hai.

verses.arabic: اَلَمْ تَرَ اِلَى الَّذِيْنَ اُوْتُوا نَصِيْبًا مِّنَ الْكِتٰبِ يُؤْمِنُوْنَ بِالْجِبْتِ وَ الطَّاغُوْتِ وَ يَقُوْلُوْنَ لِلَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا هٰٓؤُلَآءِ اَهْدٰى مِنَ الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا سَبِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: 'Alam tara 'ilal- lazeena 'ootoo naseebam-minal-kitaabi yu'minoona bil- Jibti wat- Taaghooti wa yaqooloona lillazeena kafaroo haaa'ulaaa'i 'ahdaa minal-lazeena 'aamanoo sabeelaa.
verses.translation: Kiya Aapne un logon ko nahin dekha jinhein kitab ka kuchh hissa diya gaya (unka haal yeh hai ke) woh buton aur shaytaan par eemaan rakhte hain.¹ aur kaafiron ke baare mein kahte hain ke yeh log eemaan laane waalon se ziyaadah hidaayat waale hain.
verses.deepMeaning: (Jibt wa Taaghoot) ke ma'na bahut wasi' hain: 'Jibt' se muraad hai, 'but, kaahin ya jaadu gar' aur 'Taaghoot' se muraad 'Jhoote ma'bood' goya har woh cheez jo Allah ke siwa hai, uski ibaadat ki jaaye, uss par bharosa, usse e'aanat, usse madad, isteghaasa (iss hadtak jinta ke Allah se hona chaahiye) kiya jaaye woh taaghoot kahlaayegi lekin dunyaawi umoor mein ek doosre ki muaa'winat ya madad karna iss mein daakhil nahin kyun ke 'و تعاونوا عَلَى الْبر والتقوى' (Surah Maayidah:2/5) to sharia't-e- mutahharah ka hukm hai. neez mulaahazah karein haashyah: (Surah Baqara:2/257)

verses.arabic: اُولٰٓٮٕكَ الَّذِيْنَ لَعَنَهُمُ اللّٰهُ ۖ وَ مَنْ يَّلْعَنِ اللّٰهُ فَلَنْ تَجِدَ لَهٗ نَصِيْرًا
verses.transliteration: 'Ulaaa'ikal-lazeena la'anahumul-laahu wa many-yal'anil-laahu falan tajida lahoo naseeraa.
verses.translation: Wahi log hain jin par Allah ne la'nat ki aur jis par Allah la'nat kare, uske liye aap qata'an koyi madad gaar nahin paayenge.

verses.arabic: اَمْ لَهُمْ نَصِيْبٌ مِّنَ الْمُلْكِ فَاِذًا لَّا يُؤْتُوْنَ النَّاسَ نَقِيْرًا
verses.transliteration: 'Am lahum naseebum-minal-mulki faizal-laa yu'toonan- naasa naqeeraa.
verses.translation: Kiya (woh samajhte hain ke) unhen baadshaahi ka kuchh hissa mila hai, phir to woh uss mein se logon ko til baraabar bhi nahin denge.

verses.arabic: اَمْ يَحْسُدُوْنَ النَّاسَ عَلٰى مَآ اٰتٰٮهُمُ اللّٰهُ مِنْ فَضْلِهٖ ۖ فَقَدْ اٰتَيْنَآ اٰلَ اِبْرٰهِيْمَ الْكِتٰبَ وَ الْحِكْمَةَ وَ اٰتَيْنٰهُمْ مُّلْكًا عَظِيْمًا
verses.transliteration: 'Am yahsudoonan-naasa 'alaa maaa 'aataahumul-laahu min fadlihee faqad 'aataynaaa 'Aala 'Ibraaheemal- Kitaaba wal-Hikmata wa 'aataynaahum mulkan 'azeemaa.
verses.translation: Kiya woh uss par logon se hasad karte hain jo Allah ne unhein apne fazl se diya hai, chunaancheh humne aal-e-ibraaheem ko kitab aur hikmat di aur bahut badi baadshaahi di.

verses.arabic: فَمِنْهُمْ مَّنْ اٰمَنَ بِهٖ وَ مِنْهُمْ مَّنْ صَدَّ عَنْهُ ۚ وَ كَفٰى بِجَهَنَّمَ سَعِيْرًا
verses.transliteration: Faminhum man 'aamana bihee wa minhum man şadda 'anh; wa kafaa bi- Jahannama sa'eeraa.
verses.translation: To un mein se ba'z woh hain jo uss par eemaan laaye aur ba'z woh hain jo uss par eemaan laane se baaz rahe, aur unke liye dahakti jahannam hi kaafi hai.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Allah Ta'ala ki naazil kardah kitaabon par eemaan laana bunyaadi aqaayed mein shaamil hai. neez mulaahazah ho haashyah: (Surah Aal-e-Imran:3/85)

verses.arabic: اِنَّ الَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا بِاٰيٰتِنَا سَوْفَ نُصْلِيْهِمْ نَارًا ۚ كُلَّمَا نَضِجَتْ جُلُوْدُهُمْ بَدَّلْنٰهُمْ جُلُوْدًا غَيْرَهَا لِيَذُوْقُوا الْعَذَابَ ۭ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ كَانَ عَزِيْزًا حَكِيْمًا
verses.transliteration: 'Innal-lazeena kafaroo bi-'Aayaatinaa sawfa nuşleehim Naaran kullamaa nadijat julooduhum baddalnaahum juloodan ghayrahaa liyazooqul- 'azaab; innal-laaha kaana 'Azeezan Hakeemaa.
verses.translation: Beshak jin logon ne hamaari aayaton ka inkaar kiya, hum jald unhein aag mein daalenge. jab unki khaalein jal jaayengi to hum unki jagah doosri khaalen chadhaadenge taake woh a'zaab chakhen, bilaashubah Allah bahut zabardast, badi hikmat waala hai.

verses.arabic: وَ الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا وَ عَمِلُوا الصّٰلِحٰتِ سَنُدْخِلُهُمْ جَنّٰتٍ تَجْرِيْ مِنْ تَحْتِهَا الْاَنْهٰرُ خٰلِدِيْنَ فِيْهَآ اَبَدًا ۖ لَهُمْ فِيْهَآ اَزْوَاجٌ مُّطَهَّرَةٌ ۖ وَ نُدْخِلُهُمْ ظِلًّا ظَلِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena 'aamanoo wa 'amiluş-şaalihaati sanudkhiluhum jannaatin tajree min tahtihal- 'anhaaru khaalideena feehaaa 'abadaa, lahum feehaaa 'azwaajum- mutahharatuñw-wa nudkhiluhum zillan zaleelaa.
verses.translation: Aur jo log eemaan laaye aur unhon ne nek amal kiye, unhein hum jald aise baaghon mein daakhil karenge jinke neeche nahrein bahti hain aur woh un mein hameshah rahenge, wahaan unke liye paakeezah beewiyaan hongi, aur hum unhen ghani chaaon¹ mein daakhil karenge
verses.deepMeaning: Nabi Kareem ﷺ ne farmaya: (Jannat mein ek darakht hai jis ke saaya mein agar sawaar chalta rahe to 100 baras tak chalne par bhi uska saaya khatm na hoga.

verses.arabic: اِنَّ اللّٰهَ يَاْمُرُكُمْ اَنْ تُؤَدُّوا الْاَمٰنٰتِ اِلٰٓى اَهْلِهَا وَ اِذَا حَكَمْتُمْ بَيْنَ النَّاسِ اَنْ تَحْكُمُوْا بِالْعَدْلِ ۭ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ نِعِمَّا يَعِظُكُمْ بِهٖ ۭ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ كَانَ سَمِيْعًاۢ بَصِيْرًا
verses.transliteration: 'Innal laaha ya'murukum 'an tu'addul-'amaanaati 'ilaaa 'ahlihaa wa 'izaa hakamtum baynan-naas 'an tahkumoo bil'adl; 'innal-laaha ni'immaa ya'izukum bih; 'innal- laaha kaana Samee'am Baseeraa
verses.translation: Beshak Allah tumhein hukm deta hai ke tum amaanatein unke haqdaaron ko waapas kardo, aur jab tum logon ke darmiyaan faislah karo to insaaf ke saath faislah karo, beshak Allah tumhein bahut hi achchhi baat ki naseehat karta hai, beshak Allah khoob sunne waala, khoob dekhne waala hai.

verses.arabic: يٰٓاَيُّهَا الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْۤا اَطِيْعُوا اللّٰهَ وَ اَطِيْعُوا الرَّسُوْلَ وَ اُولِي الْاَمْرِ مِنْكُمْ ۚ فَاِنْ تَنَازَعْتُمْ فِيْ شَيْءٍ فَرُدُّوْهُ اِلَى اللّٰهِ وَ الرَّسُوْلِ اِنْ كُنْتُمْ تُؤْمِنُوْنَ بِاللّٰهِ وَ الْيَوْمِ الْاٰخِرِ ۭ ذٰلِكَ خَيْرٌ وَّ اَحْسَنُ تَاْوِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhal- lazeena 'aamanooo 'atee'ul-laaha wa 'a atee'ur-Rasoola wa 'ulil- 'amri minkum fa'in tanaaza'tum fee shay'in faruddoohu 'ilal-laahi war- Rasooli 'in kuntum tu'minoona billaahi wal- yawmil-'Aakhir; zaalika khayrunw- wa ahsanu ta'weelaa.
verses.translation: Aye logo jo eemaan laaye ho! tum e'taa'at karo Allah ki, aur e'taa'at karo Rasool ki aur un logon ki jo tum mein se saahib-e-amr hon. phir agar tum baahum kisi cheez mein ikhtelaaf karo to use Allah uske Rasool ki taraf lautaa do agar tum waaqai' Allaha yaum-e-aakhrat ke din par eemaan rakhte ho. yeh behtar hai aur anjaam ke lehaaz se bahut achchha hai.

verses.arabic: اَلَمْ تَرَ اِلَى الَّذِيْنَ يَزْعُمُوْنَ اَنَّهُمْ اٰمَنُوْا بِمَآ اُنْزِلَ اِلَيْكَ وَ مَآ اُنْزِلَ مِنْ قَبْلِكَ يُرِيْدُوْنَ اَنْ يَّتَحَاكَمُوْۤا اِلَى الطَّاغُوْتِ وَ قَدْ اُمِرُوْۤا اَنْ يَّكْفُرُوْا بِهٖ وَ يُرِيْدُ الشَّيْطٰنُ اَنْ يُّضِلَّهُمْ ضَلٰلًۢا بَعِيْدًا
verses.transliteration: 'Alam tara 'ilal- lazeena yaz'umoona 'annahum 'aamanoo bimaaa 'unzilaa 'ilayka wa maaa 'unzila min qablika yureedoona añy- yatahaakamooo'ilat- Taaghooti wa qad 'umirooo añy-yakfuroo bih, wa yureedush- Shaytaanu añy- yudillahum dalaalam ba'eedaa
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) kiya aapne un logon ko nahin dekha jo da'wa karte hain ke beshak woh uss par eemaan laaye hain jo aapki taraf naazil kiya gaya hai aur uss par bhi jo aap se pahle naazil kiya gaya. woh chaahte hain ke apne muaa'mlaat ka faislah shaytaani chelon se karaayen, haalaanke unhein hukm diya gaya hai ke aise shaytaanon ka inkaar karein, aur shaytaan chaahta hai ke unhein gumraah karke door phenk de.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Yeh aur iske ba'd mein aane waali aayaat, un logon ke baare mein naazil huyi hain jo apna faislah adaalat-e-Muhammadi ki bajaaye yahood ya quraish ke sardaaron ki taraf le jaana chaahte the. Taahum iska hukm aam hai aur iss mein tamaam woh log shaamil hain jo kitab wa sunnat se e'raaz karte aur apne faislon ke liye kiab-o-sunnat ko chhod kar kisi aur ki taraf jaate hain.

verses.arabic: وَ اِذَا قِيْلَ لَهُمْ تَعَالَوْا اِلٰى مَآ اَنْزَلَ اللّٰهُ وَ اِلَى الرَّسُوْلِ رَاَيْتَ الْمُنٰفِقِيْنَ يَصُدُّوْنَ عَنْكَ صُدُوْدًا
verses.transliteration: Wa izaa qeela lahum ta'aalaw 'ilaa maaa 'anzalal-laahu wa 'ilar- Rasooli ra'aytal- munaafiqeena yaşuddoona 'anka sudoodaa.
verses.translation: Aur jab unse kahaa jaata hai ke aao uski taraf jo Allah ne naazil kiya aur aao Rasool ki taraf, to aap munaafiqon ko dekhte hain ke woh aapki taraf aane se katraate hain.

verses.arabic: فَكَيْفَ اِذَآ اَصَابَتْهُمْ مُّصِيْبَةٌۢ بِمَا قَدَّمَتْ اَيْدِيْهِمْ ثُمَّ جَآءُوْكَ يَحْلِفُوْنَ بِاللّٰهِ اِنْ اَرَدْنَآ اِلَّاۤ اِحْسَانًا وَّ تَوْفِيْقًا
verses.transliteration: Fakayfa izaaa 'aşaabathum muşeebatum bimaa qaddamat 'aydeehim summa jaaa'ooka yahlifoona billaahi 'in 'aradnaaa 'illaaa ihsaanañw- wa tawfeeqaa.
verses.translation: Phir unka kiya haal hota hai, jab unke haathon ki laayi huyi museebat un par aapadti hai, phir woh qasmein khaate huye aapke paas aakar kahte hain: Allah ki qasam! humne to bhalaayi aur sulah safaayi ka iraadah kiya tha.

verses.arabic: اُولٰٓٮٕكَ الَّذِيْنَ يَعْلَمُ اللّٰهُ مَا فِيْ قُلُوْبِهِمْ فَاَعْرِضْ عَنْهُمْ وَ عِظْهُمْ وَ قُلْ لَهُمْ فِيْۤ اَنْفُسِهِمْ قَوْلًۢا بَلِيْغًا
verses.transliteration: Ulaaa'ikal-lazeena yala mul-laahu maa fee quloobihim fa'a'rid 'anhum wa 'izhum wa qul lahum feee 'anfusihim qawlam- baleeghaa
verses.translation: Yeh woh log hain ke Allah jaanta hai unke dilon mein kiya hai, lehaaza (aye nabi!) aap unki baaton par dhiyaan na den aur unhein naseehat karte rahein aur un se dilon par asar karne waali baat kahein.

verses.arabic: وَ مَآ اَرْسَلْنَا مِنْ رَّسُوْلٍ اِلَّا لِيُطَاعَ بِاِذْنِ اللّٰهِ ۚ وَ لَوْ اَنَّهُمْ اِذْ ظَّلَمُوْۤا اَنْفُسَهُمْ جَآءُوْكَ فَاسْتَغْفَرُوا اللّٰهَ وَ اسْتَغْفَرَ لَهُمُ الرَّسُوْلُ لَوَجَدُوا اللّٰهَ تَوَّابًا رَّحِيْمًا
verses.transliteration: Wa maaa 'arsalnaa mir-Rasoolin 'illaa liyutaa'a bi'iznil-laah; wa law 'annahum 'iz zalamooo 'anfusahum jaaa'ooka fastaghfarul- laaha wastaghfara lahumur-Rasoolu lawajadul-laaha Tawwaabar- Raheemaa.
verses.translation: Aur humne koyi Rasool nahin bheja magar isliye ke Allah ke hukm se uski e'taa'at ki jaaye aur agar beshak woh log jab unhon ne apni jaanon par zulm kiya tha, Aap ke paas aate, phir woh Allah se bakhshish maangte aur Rasool bhi unke liye bakhshish talab karta to woh yaqeenan Allah ko bahut taubah qubool karne waala aur nihaayat raham karne waala paate.

verses.arabic: فَلَا وَ رَبِّكَ لَا يُؤْمِنُوْنَ حَتّٰى يُحَكِّمُوْكَ فِيْمَا شَجَرَ بَيْنَهُمْ ثُمَّ لَا يَجِدُوْا فِيْۤ اَنْفُسِهِمْ حَرَجًا مِّمَّا قَضَيْتَ وَ يُسَلِّمُوْا تَسْلِيْمًا
verses.transliteration: Falaa wa Rabbika laa yu'minoona hattaa yuhakkimooka feemaa shajara baynahum summa laa yajidoo feee 'anfusihim harajam- mimmaa qadayta wa yusallimoo tasleemaa.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh (Aye Nabi!) Aapke rab ki qasam! woh momin nahin hosakte jab tak ke apne baahami ikhtelaafaat mein aapko faislah karne waala na maan len, phir aapke kiye huye faisle par unke dilon mein koyi tangi na aane paaye aur woh use dil-o- jaan se maan len.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Matlab yeh huwa ke Nabi ﷺ ki kisi baat ya faisle se ikhtelaaf to kaja, dil mein inqebaaz bhi mahsoos karna eemaan ke manaafi hai. yeh aayat bhi munkareen-e-hadees ke liye to hai hi, muqallideen ke liye bhi lamh-e-fikriya hai jo qaul imam ke muqaable mein hadees sahih se inqebaaz hi mahsoos nahin karte balke ya to kuhle lafzon mein use maanne se inkaar kar dete hain ya uski door az kaar taaweel karke ya siqah raawiyon ko zayeef baawar karaake use kandam karne ki mazmoom sayi' karte hain. (Fa ilallaahil Mushtakaa)

verses.arabic: وَ لَوْ اَنَّا كَتَبْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ اَنِ اقْتُلُوْۤا اَنْفُسَكُمْ اَوِ اخْرُجُوْا مِنْ دِيَارِكُمْ مَّا فَعَلُوْهُ اِلَّا قَلِيْلٌ مِّنْهُمْ ۖ وَ لَوْ اَنَّهُمْ فَعَلُوْا مَا يُوْعَظُوْنَ بِهٖ لَكَانَ خَيْرًا لَّهُمْ وَ اَشَدَّ تَثْبِيْتًا
verses.transliteration: Wa law 'annaa katabnaa 'alayhim 'aniq-tulooo 'anfusakum 'awikh-rujoo min diyaarikum maa fa'aloohu 'illaa qaleelum- minhum wa law 'annahum fa'aloo maa yooʻazoona bihee lakaana khayral-lahum wa 'ashadda tasbeetaa.
verses.translation: Aur agar beshak hum un par farz kar dete ke tum apne aap ko qatl karo ya tum apne gharon se niklo to un mein se chand ek ke siwa koyi bhi yeh kaam na karta aur agar beshak woh maan lete jis ki unhein naseehat ki jaati hai to yeh un ke liye behtar aur (deen mein) ziyaadah saabit qadmi ka baay'is hota.

verses.arabic: وَ اِذًا لَّاٰتَيْنٰهُمْ مِّنْ لَّدُنَّآ اَجْرًا عَظِيْمًا
verses.transliteration: Wa 'izal-la 'aataynaahum mil- ladunnaaa 'ajran 'azeemaa
verses.translation: Aur tab hum zaroor unhein apni taraf se bahut bada ajr dete.

verses.arabic: وَّ لَهَدَيْنٰهُمْ صِرَاطًا مُّسْتَقِيْمًا
verses.transliteration: Wa lahadaynaahum Şiraatam-mustaqeemaa.
verses.translation: Aur hum zaroor unhein seedhe raaste par chalaate.

verses.arabic: وَ مَنْ يُّطِعِ اللّٰهَ وَ الرَّسُوْلَ فَاُولٰٓٮٕكَ مَعَ الَّذِيْنَ اَنْعَمَ اللّٰهُ عَلَيْهِمْ مِّنَ النَّبِيّٖنَ وَ الصِّدِّيْقِيْنَ وَ الشُّهَدَآءِ وَ الصّٰلِحِيْنَ ۚ وَ حَسُنَ اُولٰٓٮٕكَ رَفِيْقًا
verses.transliteration: Wa mañy-yuti'il-laaha war-Rasoola fa'ulaaa'ika ma'al-lazeena 'an'amal- laahu 'alayhim minan- nabiyyeena waşşiddeeqeena washshuhadaaa'i waşşaaliheen; wa hasuna 'ulaaa'ika rafeeqaa.
verses.translation: Aur jo koyi Allah aur Rasool ki etaa'at kare, to woh aise logon ke saath honge jin par Allah ne inaa'm kiya, (ya'ni) ambiyaa, siddiqeen, shaheedon aur nek logon ke saath, aur yeh log achchhe rafeeq honge.

verses.arabic: ذٰلِكَ الْفَضْلُ مِنَ اللّٰهِ ۚ وَ كَفٰى بِاللّٰهِ عَلِيْمًا
verses.transliteration: Zaalikal-fadlu minal-ilaah; wa kafaa billaahi 'Aleemaa.
verses.translation: Yeh Allah ki taraf se fazl hai, aur Allah kaafi hai jaanne waala.

verses.arabic: يٰٓاَيُّهَا الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا خُذُوْا حِذْرَكُمْ فَانْفِرُوْا ثُبَاتٍ اَوِ انْفِرُوْا جَمِيْعًا
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhal- lazeena 'aamanoo khuzoo hizrakum fanfiroo subaatin 'awin-firoo jamee'aa.
verses.translation: Aye logo jo eemaan laaye ho! tum apne bachaao ka saamaan le lo, phir tum alag alag daston ki shakl mein ya ekatthhe ho kar niklo.

verses.arabic: وَ اِنَّ مِنْكُمْ لَمَنْ لَّيُبَطِّـئَنَّ فَاِنْ اَصَابَتْكُمْ مُّصِيْبَةٌ قَالَ قَدْ اَنْعَمَ اللّٰهُ عَلَيَّ اِذْ لَمْ اَكُنْ مَّعَهُمْ شَهِيْدًا
verses.transliteration: Wa 'inna minkum lamal-layubatti'anna fa'in aşaabatkum muşeebatun qaala qad 'an'amal-laahu 'alayya 'iz lam 'akum-ma'ahum shaheeda.
verses.translation: Aur be shak tum mein se koyi aisa bhi hai jo nikalne mein zaroor der karta hai, phir agar tum par koyi museebat aaye to woh kahta hai: Allah ne mujh par badi meharbaani ki ke main unke saath maujood nahin tha.

verses.arabic: وَ لَىٕنْ اَصَابَكُمْ فَضْلٌ مِّنَ اللّٰهِ لَيَقُوْلَنَّ كَاَنْ لَمْ تَكُنْۢ بَيْنَكُمْ وَ بَيْنَهٗ مَوَدَّةٌ يٰلَيْتَنِيْ كُنْتُ مَعَهُمْ فَاَفُوْزَ فَوْزًا عَظِيْمًا
verses.transliteration: Wa la'in 'aşaabakum fadlum-minal- laahi layaqoolanna ka'al-lam takum- baynakum wa baynahoo mawaddatuñy- yaa laytanee kuntu ma'ahum fa'afooza fawzan 'azeemaa.
verses.translation: Aur agar tumhein Allah ka fazl mile to woh, jaise tumhaare aur uske darmiyaan koyi dosti na ho, zaroor kahega: kaash main unke saath hota, phir main badi kaamyaabi haasil karta

verses.arabic: فَلْيُقَاتِلْ فِيْ سَبِيْلِ اللّٰهِ الَّذِيْنَ يَشْرُوْنَ الْحَيٰوةَ الدُّنْيَا بِالْاٰخِرَةِ ۚ وَ مَنْ يُّقَاتِلْ فِيْ سَبِيْلِ اللّٰهِ فَيُقْتَلْ اَوْ يَغْلِبْ فَسَوْفَ نُؤْتِيْهِ اَجْرًا عَظِيْمًا
verses.transliteration: Falyuqaatil fee sabeelil-laahil-lazeena yashroonal-hayaatad- dunyaa bil-'Aakhirah; wa mañy-uqaatil fee sabeelil- laahi fayuqtal 'aw yaghlib fasawfa nu'teehi 'ajran 'azeemaa
verses.translation: Phir jo log aakhirat ke badle dunya ki zindagi bech chuke hain, unhein chaahiye ke woh Allah ke raaste mein ladein, aur jo shakhs Allah ke raaste mein lade, phir woh qatl kar diya jaaye yaa ghaalib aajaaye to hum jald use bahut bada ajr denge

verses.arabic: وَ مَا لَكُمْ لَا تُقَاتِلُوْنَ فِيْ سَبِيْلِ اللّٰهِ وَ الْمُسْتَضْعَفِيْنَ مِنَ الرِّجَالِ وَ النِّسَآءِ وَ الْوِلْدَانِ الَّذِيْنَ يَقُوْلُوْنَ رَبَّنَآ اَخْرِجْنَا مِنْ هٰذِهِ الْقَرْيَةِ الظَّالِمِ اَهْلُهَا وَ اجْعَلْ لَّنَا مِنْ لَّدُنْكَ وَلِيًّا وَّ اجْعَلْ لَّنَا مِنْ لَّدُنْكَ نَصِيْرًا
verses.transliteration: Wa maa lakum laa tuqaatiloona fee sabeelil- laahi walmustad'afeena minar- rijaali wannisaaa'i walwildaanil-lazeena yaqooloona Rabbanaaa 'akhrijnaa min haazihil- qaryatiz-zaalimi 'ahluhaa waj'al-lanaa mil-ladunka waliyyanw- waj'al lanaa mil ladunka naseeraa.
verses.translation: Aur (aye musalmaano!) tumhein kiya ho gaya hai ke tum Allah ke raaste mein kamzor mardon, auraton aur bachchon ki khaatir nahin ladte jo kahte hain: aye hamaare rab! hamen iss basti se nikaal ke iske baashinde zaalim hain, aur hamaare liye apni taraf se koyi himaayati bhej, aur hamaare liye apni taraf se koyi madadgaar bhej.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Zaalimon ki basti se muraad (nuzool ke e'tebaar se) makkah hai. hijrat ke ba'd wahaan baaqi rah jaane waale musalmaan khaas taur par boodhe mard, auratein aur bachche, kaafiron ke zulm-o-sitam se tung aakar Allah ki baargaah mein madad ki dua' karte the. Allah Ta'ala ne musalmaanon ko mutanabbah farmaaya ke tum un mustazafeen ko kuffaar se najaat dilaane ke liye jihaad kyun nahin karte? Iss aayat se istedlaal karte huye ulmaa ne kaha hai ke jis elaaqe mein musalmaan iss tarah zulm- o-sitam ka shikaar aur narga-e-kuffaar mein ghire huye hon to doosre musalmaanon par yeh farz aayed hota hai ke unko kaafiron ke zulm-o-sitam se bachaane ke liye jehaad karein. Yeh jihaad ki doosri qism hai. pahli qism hai a'alaa-e-kalimatullah ya'ni deen ki nashr-o-ishaa'at aur kalimatullah ke ghalbe ke liye ladna, jiska zikr isse pahli aayat mein aur ba'd ki aayat mein hai.

verses.arabic: اَلَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا يُقَاتِلُوْنَ فِيْ سَبِيْلِ اللّٰهِ ۚ وَ الَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا يُقَاتِلُوْنَ فِيْ سَبِيْلِ الطَّاغُوْتِ فَقَاتِلُوْٓا اَوْلِيَآءَ الشَّيْطٰنِ ۚ اِنَّ كَيْدَ الشَّيْطٰنِ كَانَ ضَعِيْفًا
verses.transliteration: 'Allazeena 'aamanoo yuqaatiloona fee sabeelil- laahi wallazeena kafaroo yuqaatiloona fee sabeelit- i Taaghooti faqaatilooo 'awliyaaa'ash-Shaytaan; 'inna kaydash-Shaytaani kaana da'eefa.
verses.translation: Jo log eemaan laaye woh Allah ki raah mein ladte hain aur jin logon ne kufr kiya woh taaghoot¹ (shaytaan) ki raah mein ladte hain, chunaancheh tum shaytaan ke saathyon se lado, beshak shaytaan ki chaal badi kamzor hai.
verses.deepMeaning: (Taaghoot) ke liye dekhein aayat:51 ka haashyah.

verses.arabic: اَلَمْ تَرَ اِلَى الَّذِيْنَ قِيْلَ لَهُمْ كُفُّوْۤا اَيْدِيَكُمْ وَ اَقِيْمُوا الصَّلٰوةَ وَ اٰتُوا الزَّكٰوةَ ۚ فَلَمَّا كُتِبَ عَلَيْهِمُ الْقِتَالُ اِذَا فَرِيْقٌ مِّنْهُمْ يَخْشَوْنَ النَّاسَ كَخَشْيَةِ اللّٰهِ اَوْ اَشَدَّ خَشْيَةً ۚ وَ قَالُوْا رَبَّنَا لِمَ كَتَبْتَ عَلَيْنَا الْقِتَالَ لَوْلَاۤ اَخَّرْتَنَآ اِلٰٓى اَجَلٍ قَرِيْبٍ ۭ قُلْ مَتَاعُ الدُّنْيَا قَلِيْلٌ وَّ الْاٰخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ لِّمَنِ اتَّقٰى وَ لَا تُظْلَمُوْنَ فَتِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: 'Alam tara 'ilal- lazeena qeela lahum kuffooo 'aydiyakum wa aqeemuş-Şalaata wa 'aatuz-Zakaata falammaa kutiba 'alayhimul-qitaalu 'izaa fareequm-minhum yakhshawnan-naasa kakhashyatil laahi 'aw 'ashadda khashyah; wa qaaloo Rabbanaa lima katabta 'alaynal-qitaala law laaa 'akhkhartanaaa ilaaa 'ajalin qareeb; qul mataa'ud-dunyaa qaleel; wal-'Aakhiratu khayrul- limanit-taqaa wa laa tuzlamoona fateelaa.
verses.translation: (Ane Nabi!) kiya aapne un logon ko nahin dekha jin se kaha gaya tha ke tum (ladaayi se) apne haath roke rakkho aur namaaz qaayem karo aur zakaat do, phir jab un par jung farz ki gayi to un mein se ek giroh kaafir logon se iss tarah darne laga ke jis tarah Allah se darna chaahiye- ya woh usse bhi badh kar khaufzadah tha. aur woh kahne lage: aye hamaare rab! toone hum par jung farz kyun ki? toone hamein kuchh muddat tak mohlat kyun na di? kah deejiye: dunya ka faayidah thoda hai aur aakhirat behtar hai USS shakhs ke liye jisne parhezgaari ikhtiyaar ki aur tum par dhaage baraabar bhi zulm nahin kiya jaayega.

verses.arabic: اَيْنَمَا تَكُوْنُوْا يُدْرِكْكُّمُ الْمَوْتُ وَ لَوْ كُنْتُمْ فِيْ بُرُوْجٍ مُّشَيَّدَةٍ ۭ وَ اِنْ تُصِبْهُمْ حَسَنَةٌ يَّقُوْلُوْا هٰذِهٖ مِنْ عِنْدِ اللّٰهِ ۚ وَ اِنْ تُصِبْهُمْ سَيِّئَةٌ يَّقُوْلُوْا هٰذِهٖ مِنْ عِنْدِكَ ۭ قُلْ كُلٌّ مِّنْ عِنْدِ اللّٰهِ ۚ فَمَالِ هٰٓؤُلَآءِ الْقَوْمِ لَا يَكَادُوْنَ يَفْقَهُوْنَ حَدِيْثًا
verses.transliteration: 'Aynamaa takoonoo yudrikkumul- mawtu wa law kuntum fee buroojim- mushay-yadah; wa 'in tuşibhum hasanatuñy- yaqooloo haazihee min 'indil- laahi wa 'in tuşibhum sayyi'atuñy- yaqooloo haazihee min 'indik; qul kullum- min 'indil-laahi famaa lihaaa'ulaaa'il- qawmi laa yakaadoona yafqahoona hadeesaa
verses.translation: Tum jahaan kahin bhi hoge, maut tumhen paalegi, khaah tum mazboot qilo'n mein ho, aur agar unhein koyi bhlaayi mile to woh kahte hain ke yeh Allah ki taraf se hai aur agar unhein koyi takleef pahunche to kahte hain ke yeh aapki taraf se hai. kah deejiye: yeh sab kuchh Allah ki taraf se hai, chunaancheh kiya haal hai un logon ka jo baat samajhne ke qareeb nahin phatakte.

verses.arabic: مَآ اَصَابَكَ مِنْ حَسَنَةٍ فَمِنَ اللّٰهِ ۚ وَ مَآ اَصَابَكَ مِنْ سَيِّئَةٍ فَمِنْ نَفْسِكَ ۚ وَ اَرْسَلْنٰكَ لِلنَّاسِ رَسُوْلًا ۭ وَ كَفٰى بِاللّٰهِ شَهِيْدًا
verses.transliteration: Maaa 'aşaabaka min hasanatin faminal-laahi wa maaa 'aşaaabaka min sayyi'atin famin- nafsik; wa 'arsalnaaka linnaasi Rasoolaa; wa kafaa billaahi Shaheedaa
verses.translation: (Aye insaan!) tujhe jo bhi bhalaayi mile, woh Allah ki taraf se hai, aur tujhe jo bhi takleef pahunche woh teri apni taraf se hai aur (aye Nabi!) humne aapko logon ke liye Rasool banaa kar bheja hai aur¹ Allah batuar- e-gawaah kaafi hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Mulaahazah ho haashyah:Surah Baqarah:2/252

verses.arabic: مَنْ يُّطِعِ الرَّسُوْلَ فَقَدْ اَطَاعَ اللّٰهَ ۚ وَ مَنْ تَوَلّٰى فَمَآ اَرْسَلْنٰكَ عَلَيْهِمْ حَفِيْظًا
verses.transliteration: Many-yuti'ir-Rasoola faqad 'ataa'al- laaha wa man tawallaa famaaa 'arsalnaaka 'alayhim hafeezaa.
verses.translation: Jisne Rasool ki e'taa'at ki, chunaancheh usne Allah ki e'taa'at ki¹ aur jis ne munh moda to humne aapko un par negahbaan banaa kar nahin bheja.
verses.deepMeaning: Iss mazmoon ke liye yeh aahaadees mulaahazah farmaayein 'jisne meri etaa'at ki usne Allah ki etaa'at ki aur jisne meri naafarmaani ki usne Allah ki naafarmaani ki aur jisne mere muqarrar kardah hakim ki etaa'at ki usne mrei etaa'at ki aur jis ne uski naafarmaani ki usne goya meri naafar maani ki.'  (Al-Bukhari, Al-Ahkaam, Baab:1) Doosri hadees: 'meri ummat ke sab log jannat mein jaayenge magar jisne inkaar kiya.' Sahaaba  رضي الله عنه ke istafsaar par farmaaya: 'Jisne meri naafarmaani ki usne jannat mein jaane se inkaar kiya.' (Al-Bukhari, Hadees:7280)

verses.arabic: وَ يَقُوْلُوْنَ طَاعَةٌ فَاِذَا بَرَزُوْا مِنْ عِنْدِكَ بَيَّتَ طَآىٕفَةٌ مِّنْهُمْ غَيْرَ الَّذِيْ تَقُوْلُ وَ اللّٰهُ يَكْتُبُ مَا يُبَيِّتُوْنَ ۚ فَاَعْرِضْ عَنْهُمْ وَ تَوَكَّلْ عَلَى اللّٰهِ ۭ وَ كَفٰى بِاللّٰهِ وَكِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: Wa yaqooloona taa'atun fa'izaa barazoo min 'indika bayyata taaa'ifatum-minhum ghayral-lazee taqoolu wallaahu yaktubu maa yubayyitoona fa'a'rid 'anhum wa tawakkal 'alal-laah; wa kafaa billaahi Wakeelaa
verses.translation: Aur munaafiq kahte hain ke (hamaara kaam to) farmaan bardaari hai phir jab woh aapke paas se uthh kar jaate hain to raat ko unka ek giroh uss baat ke khilaaf jod tod karta hai jo aap kahte hain aur Allah likh leta hai jo woh raat ko saazish karte hain, chunaancheh aap unhein jaane den aur Allah par bharosa karen aur Allah kaar saaz ke taur par kaafi hai.

verses.arabic: اَفَلَا يَتَدَبَّرُوْنَ الْقُرْاٰنَ ۚ وَ لَوْ كَانَ مِنْ عِنْدِ غَيْرِ اللّٰهِ لَوَجَدُوْا فِيْهِ اخْتِلَافًا كَثِيْرًا
verses.transliteration: 'Afalaa yatadabbaroonal- Qur'aan; wa law kaana min 'indi ghayril-laahi lawajadoo feehikh- tilaafan kaseeraa.
verses.translation: Kiya phir woh qur'an mein ghaur-o-fikr nahin karte? aur agar yeh Allah ke siwa kisi aur ki taraf se hota to woh yaqeenan uss mein bahut kuchh ikhtelaaf paate.

verses.arabic: وَ اِذَا جَآءَهُمْ اَمْرٌ مِّنَ الْاَمْنِ اَوِ الْخَوْفِ اَذَاعُوْا بِهٖ ۭ وَ لَوْ رَدُّوْهُ اِلَى الرَّسُوْلِ وَ اِلٰٓى اُولِي الْاَمْرِ مِنْهُمْ لَعَلِمَهُ الَّذِيْنَ يَسْتَنْۢبِطُوْنَهٗ مِنْهُمْ ۗ وَ لَوْلَا فَضْلُ اللّٰهِ عَلَيْكُمْ وَ رَحْمَتُهٗ لَاتَّبَعْتُمُ الشَّيْطٰنَ اِلَّا قَلِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: Wa 'izaa jaaa'ahum 'amrum-minal-'amni 'awil-khawfi 'azaa oo bihee wa law raddoohu 'ilar-Rasooli wa 'ilaaa 'ulil-'amri minhum la'alimahul lazeena yastambitoonahoo minhum; wa law laa fadlul-laahi 'alaykum wa rahmatuhoo Jattaba tumush- Shaytaana'illaa qaleelaa.
verses.translation: Aur jab unke paas koyi aman ya khauf ki khabar aati hai to use mash hoor kardete hain haalaanke agar woh use Rasool aur apne mein se kisi zimma daar haakim ke hawaale kardete, to aisi baaton ki tah tak pahunchne waale uski haqeeqat jaan lete aur agar tum par Allah ka fazl aur uski rahmat na hoti to chand ek ke siwa tum zaroor shaytaan ke peechhe lag jaate.

verses.arabic: فَقَاتِلْ فِيْ سَبِيْلِ اللّٰهِ ۖ لَا تُكَلَّفُ اِلَّا نَفْسَكَ وَ حَرِّضِ الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ ۗ عَسَى اللّٰهُ اَنْ يَّكُفَّ بَاْسَ الَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا ۭ وَ اللّٰهُ اَشَدُّ بَاْسًا وَّ اَشَدُّ تَنْكِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: Faqaatil fee sabeelil- Jaahi laa tukallafu 'illaa nafsaka wa harridil- mu'mineena 'asal-laahu Pañy-yakuffa ba'sal- Hazeena kafaroo; wallaahu 'ashaddu ba'sanw-wa 'ashaddu tanakeelaa.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh (aye Nabi!) Aap Allah ki raah mein ladein, aapko apni zaat ke siwa kisi ka zimmedaar nahin banaaya gaya aur aap mominon ko ladaayi par aamaadah karein. Ummeed hai ke Allah un logon ko ladaayi se rok de jinhon ne kufr kiya aur Allah ladaayi mein bahut sakht hai aur saza dene mein bahut sakht hai.

verses.arabic: مَنْ يَّشْفَعْ شَفَاعَةً حَسَنَةً يَّكُنْ لَّهٗ نَصِيْبٌ مِّنْهَا ۚ وَ مَنْ يَّشْفَعْ شَفَاعَةً سَيِّئَةً يَّكُنْ لَّهٗ كِفْلٌ مِّنْهَا ۭ وَ كَانَ اللّٰهُ عَلٰى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ مُّقِيْتًا
verses.transliteration: Many-yashfa' shafaa'atan hasanatañy- yakul-lahoo naseebum- minhaa wa mañy- yashfa' shafaa'atan sayyi'atañy-yakul- lahoo kiflum-minhaa; wa kaanal-laahu 'alaa kulli shay'im-Muqeetaa.
verses.translation: Jo koyi achchhi sifaarish karega, use bhi uska kuchh hissa milega aur jo koyi buri sifaarish karega, use bhi uska kuchh hissa milega aur Allah har cheez par negahbaan hai.

verses.arabic: وَ اِذَا حُيِّيْتُمْ بِتَحِيَّةٍ فَحَيُّوْا بِاَحْسَنَ مِنْهَآ اَوْ رُدُّوْهَآ ۭ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ كَانَ عَلٰى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ حَسِيْبًا
verses.transliteration: Wa 'izaa huyyeetum bitahiyyatin fahayyoo bi'ahsana minhaaa 'aw ruddoohaa; 'innal-laaha kaana 'alaa kulli shay'in Haseebaa.
verses.translation: Aur jab tumhein salaam kiya jaaye to tum usse achchha jawaab do ya wahi alfaaz lautaa do¹ beshak Allah har cheez ka khoob hisaab lene waala hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Hadees mein hai: Nabi Kareem ﷺ ne farmaaya: 'Allah Ta'ala ne Aadam ko uski soorat paida kaida kiya unka qad 60 haath tha, jab Allah unko paida karchuka to farmaya: woh farishton ka giroh baithha huwa hai unko jaakar salaam karo aur suno woh kiya kahte hain!phir yahi tumhaara aur tumhaari aulaad ka salaam rahega, to Aadam عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام ne kaha: (Assalaamu Alaikum) to unhon ne jawaab diya: (Asslaamu A'laikum wa rahmatullahi) unhon ne (lafz) (warahmatullah) badhaaya. (Nabi Kareem ﷺ Ne farmaya) jo koyi bhi jannat mein jaayega to woh Aadam عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام ki soorat par hoga ya'ni 60 haath lamba, aur Aadam عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام ke ba'd se khilqat ka qad-o-qaamat kam hota gaya aur yeh silsila abhi tak jaari hai.' (Sahih Bukhari, Hadees:6227)

verses.arabic: اَللّٰهُ لَاۤ اِلٰهَ اِلَّا هُوَ ۚ لَيَجْمَعَنَّكُمْ اِلٰى يَوْمِ الْقِيٰمَةِ لَا رَيْبَ فِيْهِ ۭ وَ مَنْ اَصْدَقُ مِنَ اللّٰهِ حَدِيْثًا
verses.transliteration: Allaahu laaa ilaaha 'illaa huwa layajma'annakum 'ilaa Yawmil- Qiyaamati laa rayba feeh; wa man 'aşdaqu minal-laahi hadeesaa.
verses.translation: Allah ke siwa koyi ma'bood barhaq nahin, woh zaroor tumhein qiyaamat ke din ekattha karega, jiske aane mein koyi shak nahin aur baat kahne mein Allah se ziyaadah kaun sachcha hai.

verses.arabic: فَمَا لَكُمْ فِي الْمُنٰفِقِيْنَ فِئَتَيْنِ وَ اللّٰهُ اَرْكَسَهُمْ بِمَا كَسَبُوْا ۭ اَتُرِيْدُوْنَ اَنْ تَهْدُوْا مَنْ اَضَلَّ اللّٰهُ ۚ وَ مَنْ يُّضْلِلِ اللّٰهُ فَلَنْ تَجِدَ لَهٗ سَبِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: Famaa lakum fil- munaafiqeena fi'atayni wallaahu 'arkasahum bimaa kasaboo; 'atureedoona 'an tahdoo man 'adallal-laahu wa may-yudlilil-laahu falan tajida lahoo sabeelaa.
verses.translation: Phir tumhein kiya huwa hai ke munaafiqon ke baare mein do girhon mein bat gaye ho? haalaanke Allah ne unke a'maal ki wajah se unhein ulta kar diya hai. kiya tum chaahte ho ke un logon ko hidaayat do jinhein Allah ne gumraah kiya ho? aur jise Allah gumraah kare, phir uske liye aap hargiz koyi raastah nahin paayenge.

verses.arabic: وَدُّوْا لَوْ تَكْفُرُوْنَ كَمَا كَفَرُوْا فَتَكُوْنُوْنَ سَوَآءً فَلَا تَتَّخِذُوْا مِنْهُمْ اَوْلِيَآءَ حَتّٰى يُهَاجِرُوْا فِيْ سَبِيْلِ اللّٰهِ ۚ فَاِنْ تَوَلَّوْا فَخُذُوْهُمْ وَ اقْتُلُوْهُمْ حَيْثُ وَجَدْتُمُوْهُمْ وَ لَا تَتَّخِذُوْا مِنْهُمْ وَلِيًّا وَّ لَا نَصِيْرًا
verses.transliteration: Waddoo law takfuroona kamaa kafaroo fatakoonoona sawaaa'an falaa tattakhizoo minhum 'awliyaaa'a hattaa yuhaajiroo fee sabeelil- laah; fa'in tawallaw fakhuzoohum waqtuloohum haysu wajattumoohum wa laa tattakhizoo minhum waliyyañw-wa laa naseeraa.
verses.translation: Woh chaahte hain ke tum bhi kufr karo jis tarah unhon ne kufr kiya. phir tum unke baraabar ho jaao, chunaancheh tum un mein se kisi ko dost na banaao yahaan tak ke woh Allah ki raah mein hijrat karein, phir agar woh (deen se) munh modein to unhein jahaan paao qatl kardo. Aur un mein se kisi ko apna dost aur madad gaar na banaao.

verses.arabic: اِلَّا الَّذِيْنَ يَصِلُوْنَ اِلٰى قَوْمٍۢ بَيْنَكُمْ وَ بَيْنَهُمْ مِّیْثَاقٌ اَوْ جَآءُوْكُمْ حَصِرَتْ صُدُوْرُهُمْ اَنْ يُّقَاتِلُوْكُمْ اَوْ يُقَاتِلُوْا قَوْمَهُمْ ۚ وَ لَوْ شَآءَ اللّٰهُ لَسَلَّطَهُمْ عَلَيْكُمْ فَلَقٰتَلُوْكُمْ ۚ فَاِنِ اعْتَزَلُوْكُمْ فَلَمْ يُقَاتِلُوْكُمْ وَ اَلْقَوْا اِلَيْكُمُ السَّلَمَ فَمَا جَعَلَ اللّٰهُ لَكُمْ عَلَيْهِمْ سَبِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: 'Illal-lazeena yaşiloona ilaa qawmim- baynakum wa baynahum meesaaqun 'aw jaaa'ookum hasirat şudooruhum 'any- yuqaatilookum 'aw yuqaatiloo qawmahum, wa law shaaa'al-laahu lasallatahum 'alaykum falaqaatalookum; fa'ini'- tazalookum falam yuqaatilookum wa 'alqaw 'ilaykumus- salama famaa ja'alal- laahu lakum 'alayhim sabeelaa.
verses.translation: Magar woh log (is hukm se mustasna hain) jo uss qaum se ta'alluq rakhte hon jinse tumhaara mu'aahidah ho chuka hai ya (woh munaafiq bhi mustasna hain) jo tumhaare paas iss haalat mein aayein ke woh ladaayi se bezaar hon na tumse ladna chaahte hon aur na apni qaum se¹ aur agar Allah chaahta to unhein tum par musallat kar deta phir woh tumse yaqeenan ladte, lehaaza agar woh tum se kinaarah kash ikhtiyaar kar lein aur tumhaare saath ladni se baaz rahein, aur tumhaari taraf sulah aur aman ka haath badhaayein to Allah ne tumhaare liye koyi gunjaayish nahin rakkhi ke tum unse ladaayi karo.
verses.deepMeaning: Ya'ni jinse ladne ka hukm diya jaa rahaa hai, usse do qism ke log mustasnaa hain. ek woh log, jo aisi qaum se rabt-o-ta'alluq rakhte hain ya'ni aisi qaum ke fard hain ya uski panaah mein hain jis qaum se tumhaara muaa'hidah hai. doosre woh jo tumhaare paas iss haal mein aate hain ke unke seene iss baat se tung hain ke woh apni qaum se mil kar tumse ya tumse mil kar apni qaum se jung karein ya'ni 'ni tumhaari himaayat mein ladna pasand karte hain na tumhaari mukhaalifat mein.

verses.arabic: سَتَجِدُوْنَ اٰخَرِيْنَ يُرِيْدُوْنَ اَنْ يَّاْمَنُوْكُمْ وَ يَاْمَنُوْا قَوْمَهُمْ كُلَّمَا رُدُّوْۤا اِلَى الْفِتْنَةِ اُرْكِسُوْا فِيْهَا ۚ فَاِنْ لَّمْ يَعْتَزِلُوْكُمْ وَ يُلْقُوْۤا اِلَيْكُمُ السَّلَمَ وَ يَكُفُّوْۤا اَيْدِيَهُمْ فَخُذُوْهُمْ وَ اقْتُلُوْهُمْ حَيْثُ ثَقِفْتُمُوْهُمْ ۭ وَ اُولٰٓٮٕكُمْ جَعَلْنَا لَكُمْ عَلَيْهِمْ سُلْطٰنًا مُّبِيْنًا
verses.transliteration: Satajidoona 'aakhareena yureedoona añy-ya'manookum wa ya'manoo qawmahum kullamaa ruddooo 'ilal- fitnati 'urkisoo feehaa; fa'il-lam ya'tazilookum wa yulqooo 'ilaykumus- salama wa yakuffooo 'aydiyahum fakhuzoohum waqtuloohum haysu saqif tumoohum; wa 'ulaaa'ikum ja'alnaa lakum 'alayhim sultaanam-mubeenaa.
verses.translation: Tumhein ek aur qism ke munaafiq milenge jo chaahte hain ke tumse bhi aman mein rahein aur apni qaum se bhi, magar jab kabhi woh fitne ka moqa paate hain to uss mein kood padte hain, chunaancheh aise log agar tumse muqaablah karne se baaz na aayein aur tumhein sulah aur aman ki peshkash na karein aur ladaayi se apne haath na rokein to tum unhein jahaan kahin paao, pakad kar qatl kardo. Yahi woh log hain jin par (haath uthaane ke liye) humne tumhein khuli ijaazat de di hai.

verses.arabic: وَ مَا كَانَ لِمُؤْمِنٍ اَنْ يَّقْتُلَ مُؤْمِنًا اِلَّا خَطَــًٔۢا ۚ وَ مَنْ قَتَلَ مُؤْمِنًا خَطَــًٔۢا فَتَحْرِيْرُ رَقَبَةٍ مُّؤْمِنَةٍ وَّ دِيَةٌ مُّسَلَّمَةٌ اِلٰٓى اَهْلِهٖۤ اِلَّاۤ اَنْ يَّصَّدَّقُوْا ۚ فَاِنْ كَانَ مِنْ قَوْمٍ عَدُوٍّ لَّكُمْ وَ هُوَ مُؤْمِنٌ فَتَحْرِيْرُ رَقَبَةٍ مُّؤْمِنَةٍ ۚ وَ اِنْ كَانَ مِنْ قَوْمٍۢ بَيْنَكُمْ وَ بَيْنَهُمْ مِّيْثَاقٌ فَدِيَةٌ مُّسَلَّمَةٌ اِلٰٓى اَهْلِهٖ وَ تَحْرِيْرُ رَقَبَةٍ مُّؤْمِنَةٍ ۚ فَمَنْ لَّمْ يَجِدْ فَصِيَامُ شَهْرَيْنِ مُتَتَابِعَيْنِ تَوْبَةً مِّنَ اللّٰهِ ۭ وَ كَانَ اللّٰهُ عَلِيْمًا حَكِيْمًا
verses.transliteration: Wa maa kaana limu'minin añy-yaqtula mu'minan 'illaa khata'aa; wa man qatala mu'minan khata'an fatahreeru raqabatim- mu'minatinw-wa diyatum-musallamatun 'ilaaa 'ahliheee 'illaaa any-yaşşaddaqoo; fa'in kaana min qawmin 'aduwwil-lakum wa huwa mu'minun fatahreeru raqabatim- mu'minah; wa 'in kaana min qawmim baynakum wa baynahum meesaaqun fadiyatum- musallamatun 'ilaaa 'ahlihee wa tahreeru raqabatim-mu'minatin famal-lam yajid fa- Şiyaamu shahrayni mutataabi ayni tawbatam-minal-laah; wa kaanal-laahu 'Aleeman hakeemaa.
verses.translation: Aur kisi momin ke liye jaayez nahin ke woh doosre momin ko qatl kare, magar ghalti se (ho jaaye to aur baat hai) aur jo shakhs kisi momin ko ghalti se qatl karde, uss par ek musalmaan ghulaam aazaad karna aur maqtool ke risthe daaron ko khoon baha adaa karna laazim hai, haan agar woh log mu'aaf karden (to aur baat hai) phir agar woh maqtool aisi qaum mein se ho jo tumhaari dushman ho jabke woh khud momin ho to ek musalmaan ghulaam aazaad karna laazim hai aur agar woh aisi qaum mein se ho ke tumhaare aur unke darmiyaan muaa'hidah ho chuka ho to uske waarison ko khoon bahaa diya jaayega aur ek musalmaan ghulaam aazaad karna hoga, phir jo shakhs ghulaam aazaad karne ki taaqat na rakhta ho woh do maah lagataar roze rakkhe, yeh (kaffaarah) Allah ki taraf se taubah (Qubool karne ka zariah) hai Allah khoob jaanne waala, bahut hikmat waala hai.

verses.arabic: وَ مَنْ يَّقْتُلْ مُؤْمِنًا مُّتَعَمِّدًا فَجَزَآؤُهٗ جَهَنَّمُ خَالِدًا فِيْهَا وَ غَضِبَ اللّٰهُ عَلَيْهِ وَ لَعَنَهٗ وَ اَعَدَّ لَهٗ عَذَابًا عَظِيْمًا
verses.transliteration: Wa mañy-yaqtul mu'minam- muta'ammidan fajazaaa'uhoo Jahannamu khaalidan feehaa wa ghadibal-laahu 'alayhi wa la'anahoo wa' a'adda lahoo 'azaaban 'azeemaa.
verses.translation: Aur jo shakhs kisi momin ko jaan boojh kar qatl kare, uski sazaa jahannam hai, woh uss mein hameshah rahega, aur uss par Allah ka ghazab aur uski la'nat hogi, aur Allah ne uske liye bahut bada a'zaab tayyaar kar rakkha hai.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Qatl-e-naa haq ke baare mein hadees hai: Nabi Kareem ﷺ ne farmaya: Musalmaan deen ke muaa'mle mein uss waqt tak kushaadgi (itmenaan-o-sukoon se nek a'amaal ki taraf raghbat) mein mubtala rahta hai jab tak ke naahaq khoon na bahaaye.' (Al-Bukhari, Ad-Diyaat, Hadees:6862)

verses.arabic: يٰٓاَيُّهَا الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا اِذَا ضَرَبْتُمْ فِيْ سَبِيْلِ اللّٰهِ فَتَبَيَّنُوْا وَ لَا تَقُوْلُوْا لِمَنْ اَلْقٰى اِلَيْكُمُ السَّلٰمَ لَسْتَ مُؤْمِنًا تَبْتَغُوْنَ عَرَضَ الْحَيٰوةِ الدُّنْيَا فَعِنْدَ اللّٰهِ مَغَانِمُ كَثِيْرَةٌ ۭ كَذٰلِكَ كُنْتُمْ مِّنْ قَبْلُ فَمَنَّ اللّٰهُ عَلَيْكُمْ فَتَبَيَّنُوْا ۚ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ كَانَ بِمَا تَعْمَلُوْنَ خَبِيْرًا
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhal-lazeena 'aamanooo 'izaa darabtum fee sabeelil-laahi fatabayyanoo wa laa taqooloo liman 'alqaaa 'ilaykumus- salaama lasta mu'minan tabtaghoona 'aradal- hayaatid- dunyaa fa'indal-laahi maghaanimu kaseerah; kazaalika kuntum min qablu famannal-laahu 'alaykum fatabayyanoo; 'innal-laaha kaana bimaa ta'maloona Khabeeraa.
verses.translation: Aye logo jo eemaan laaye ho! jab tum Allah ke raaste mein niklo to tahqeeq kar liya karo, aur jo shakhs tumhein salaam kare to uske muta'alliq yeh na kaho ke tu momin nahin, tum dunyaawi zindagi ka saamaan chaahte ho, to Allah ke paas (tumhaare liye) bahut se maal-e-ghaneemat hain. tum isse pahle khud bhi iss haalat mein mubtala rah chuke ho, phir Allah ne tum par ehsaan kiya, lehaaza mu'aamle ki tahqeeq karliya karo, beshak tum jo amal karte ho Allah usse khoob baa khabar hai.

verses.arabic: لَا يَسْتَوِي الْقٰٓعِدُوْنَ مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ غَيْرُ اُولِي الضَّرَرِ وَ الْمُجَاهِدُوْنَ فِيْ سَبِيْلِ اللّٰهِ بِاَمْوَالِهِمْ وَ اَنْفُسِهِمْ ۭ فَضَّلَ اللّٰهُ الْمُجَاهِدِيْنَ بِاَمْوَالِهِمْ وَ اَنْفُسِهِمْ عَلَي الْقٰعِدِيْنَ دَرَجَةً ۭ وَ كُلًّا وَّعَدَ اللّٰهُ الْحُسْنٰى ۭ وَ فَضَّلَ اللّٰهُ الْمُجَاهِدِيْنَ عَلَي الْقٰعِدِيْنَ اَجْرًا عَظِيْمًا
verses.transliteration: Laa yastawil- qaa'idoona Minal- mu'mineena ghayru 'ulid- darari walmujaahidoona fee sabeelil-laahi bi'amwaalihim wa 'anfusihim; faddalal- laahul-mujaahideena bi'amwaalihim wa 'anfusihim 'alal- qaa'ideena darajah; wa kullanw-wa'adal-laahul- husnaa; wa faddalal- laahul-mujaahideena 'alal- qaa'ideena 'ajran 'azeemaa.
verses.translation: Kisi u'zr ke baghair peechhe baithh rahne waale momin aur Allah ki raah mein apne maalon aur apni jaanon ke saath jehaad karne waale baraabar nahin ho sakte, Allah ne apne maalon aur apni jaanon ke saath jehaad karne waalon ko peechhe baithh rahne waalon par martabe mein fazeelat di hal. aur Allah ne sab se bhalaayi ka wa'dah kiya hai, aur Allah ne mujaahideen ko peechhe baithh rahne waalon ke muqaable mein bahut bada ajr diya hai.

verses.arabic: دَرَجٰتٍ مِّنْهُ وَ مَغْفِرَةً وَّ رَحْمَةً ۭ وَ كَانَ اللّٰهُ غَفُوْرًا رَّحِيْمًا
verses.transliteration: Darajaatimminhu wa maghfiratanw- wa rahmah; wa kaanal- Jaahu Ghafoorar- Raheemaa.
verses.translation: Unke liye Allah ki taraf se darje hain aur bakhshish aur rahmat hai aur Allah ta'ala bahut bakhshne waala, nehaayat raham karne waala hai.

verses.arabic: اِنَّ الَّذِيْنَ تَوَفّٰىهُمُ الْمَلٰٓىٕكَةُ ظَالِمِيْۤ اَنْفُسِهِمْ قَالُوْا فِيْمَ كُنْتُمْ ۭ قَالُوْا كُنَّا مُسْتَضْعَفِيْنَ فِي الْاَرْضِ ۭ قَالُوْۤا اَلَمْ تَكُنْ اَرْضُ اللّٰهِ وَاسِعَةً فَتُهَاجِرُوْا فِيْهَا ۭ فَاُولٰٓٮٕكَ مَاْوٰىهُمْ جَهَنَّمُ ۭ وَ سَآءَتْ مَصِيْرًا
verses.transliteration: 'Innal-lazeena tawaffaahumul- malaaa'ikatu zaalimeee 'anfusihim qaaloo feema kuntum qaaloo kunnaa mustad'afeena fil-'ard; qaalooo 'alam takun ardul laahi waasi'atan fatuhaajiroo feehaa; fa'ulaaa'ika ma'waahum Jahannamu wa saaa'at maseeraa.
verses.translation: Jin logon ki uss haalat mein farishte jaan qabz karte hain ke woh (jaan boojh kar kaafiron mein rah kar) apni jaanon par zulm karte rahe hon, to farishte poochhte hain ke tum kis haal mein the? woh kahte hain: hum zameen mein kamzor the. tab Farishte kahte hain: kiya Allah ki zameen wasi' na thi ke tum uss mein hijrat kar jaate? chunaancheh yahi log hain jinka thhikaana jahannam hai aur woh bahut bura thhikaana hai.

verses.arabic: اِلَّا الْمُسْتَضْعَفِيْنَ مِنَ الرِّجَالِ وَ النِّسَآءِ وَ الْوِلْدَانِ لَا يَسْتَطِيْعُوْنَ حِيْلَةً وَّ لَا يَهْتَدُوْنَ سَبِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: 'Illal-mustad'afeena minar-rijaali wannisaaa'i walwildaani laa yastatee'oona heelatañw-wa laa yahtadoona sabeelaa.
verses.translation: Magar woh mard, auratein aur bachche jo waaqay'i be bas hon aur woh uss jagah se nikalne ka koyi waseela aur koyi raasta nahin paate.

verses.arabic: فَاُولٰٓٮٕكَ عَسَى اللّٰهُ اَنْ يَّعْفُوَ عَنْهُمْ ۭ وَ كَانَ اللّٰهُ عَفُوًّا غَفُوْرًا
verses.transliteration: Fa'ulaaa'ika 'asal- laahu any-ya'fuwa 'anhum; wa kaanal-laahu 'Afuwwan Ghafooraa.
verses.translation: Un logon ke baare mein ummeed hai ke Allah unhein mu'aaf kar dega aur Allah bahut mu'aaf karne waala, nehaayat bakhshne waala hai.

verses.arabic: وَ مَنْ يُّهَاجِرْ فِيْ سَبِيْلِ اللّٰهِ يَجِدْ فِي الْاَرْضِ مُرٰغَمًا كَثِيْرًا وَّ سَعَةً ۭ وَ مَنْ يَّخْرُجْ مِنْۢ بَيْتِهٖ مُهَاجِرًا اِلَى اللّٰهِ وَ رَسُوْلِهٖ ثُمَّ يُدْرِكْهُ الْمَوْتُ فَقَدْ وَقَعَ اَجْرُهٗ عَلَى اللّٰهِ ۭ وَ كَانَ اللّٰهُ غَفُوْرًا رَّحِيْمًا
verses.transliteration: Wa mañy-yuhaajir fee sabeelil-laahi yajid fil-'ardi muraaghaman kaseeranw- wa sa'ah; wa mañy-yakhruj mim baytihee muhaajiran 'ilal-laahi wa Rasoolihee summa yudrik-hul- mawtu faqad waqa'a 'ajruhoo 'alal-laah; wa kaanal-laahu Ghafoorar- Raheemaa
verses.translation: Aur jo shakhs Allah ki raah mein hijrat kare woh zameen mein panaah lene ke liye bahut jagah aur gunjaayish paayega aur jo shakhs Allah aur uske Rasool ki taraf hijrat karne ki khaatir apne ghar se nikle, phir use raaste mein maut aa jaaye to uska ajr Allah ke zimme waajib hogaya aur Allah nehaayat bakhshne waala, bahut raham karne waala hai.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Iss mein hijrat ki targheeb aur mushrikeen se mufaariqat ikhtiyaar karne ki talqeen hai. neez iss mein niyyat ke mutaabiq ajr-o-sawaab milne ki yaqeen dehaani hai chaahe maut ki wajah se woh iss amal ke mukammal karne se qaasir rahaa ho. Jaisa ke guzishta ummaton mein se 100 ke qaatil ka waaqia'h hadees mein bayaan kiya gaya hai jo taubah ke liye nekon ki ek basti mein jaa rahaa tha ke raaste mein use maut aa gayi. Allah Ta'ala ne nekon ki basti ko, banisbat doosri basti ke, qareeb tar kardiya, jiski wajah se use rahmat ke farishte apne sath le gaye. (Sahih Bukhari:3470) iss tarah jo shakhs hijrat ki niyyat se ghar se nikle, lekin raaste mein hi use maut aa jaaye to use Allah ki taraf se hijrat ka sawaab zaroor milega. go abhi woh hijrat kea mal ko paaya-e-takmeel tak bhi na phuncha saka ho jaise hadees mein bhi hai 'Wa innama likullim ri immanawaa' (Sahih Bukhari:1) 'Aadmi ke liye wahi hai jiski usne niyyat ki.' Yeh hukm deen ke har kaam ko shaamil hai ya'ni usko karte waqt Allah ki raza pesh-e-nazar hogi to woh maqbool warnah mardood hoga.

verses.arabic: وَ اِذَا ضَرَبْتُمْ فِي الْاَرْضِ فَلَيْسَ عَلَيْكُمْ جُنَاحٌ اَنْ تَقْصُرُوْا مِنَ الصَّلٰوةِ اِنْ خِفْتُمْ اَنْ يَّفْتِنَكُمُ الَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا ۭ اِنَّ الْكٰفِرِيْنَ كَانُوْا لَكُمْ عَدُوًّا مُّبِيْنًا
verses.transliteration: Wa 'izaa darabtum fil-'ardi falaysa 'alaykum junaahun 'an taqsuroo minaş- Şalaati 'in khiftum any-yaftinakumul-lazeena kafarooo; 'innal- kaafireena kaanoo lakum 'aduwwam-mubeenaa.
verses.translation: Aur jab tum zameen mein safar kar rahe ho to tum par koyi gunaah nahin ke agar tumhein dar ho ke kaafir hamlah karke tumhein fitne mein daal denge, to tum namaaz-e- qasr adaa karo, beshak kaafir tumhaare khule dushman hain.

verses.arabic: وَ اِذَا كُنْتَ فِيْهِمْ فَاَقَمْتَ لَهُمُ الصَّلٰوةَ فَلْتَقُمْ طَآىٕفَةٌ مِّنْهُمْ مَّعَكَ وَ لْيَاْخُذُوْۤا اَسْلِحَتَهُمْ ۚ فَاِذَا سَجَدُوْا فَلْيَكُوْنُوْا مِنْ وَّرَآىٕكُمْ وَ لْتَاْتِ طَآىٕفَةٌ اُخْرٰى لَمْ يُصَلُّوْا فَلْيُصَلُّوْا مَعَكَ وَ لْيَاْخُذُوْا حِذْرَهُمْ وَ اَسْلِحَتَهُمْ ۗ وَدَّ الَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا لَوْ تَغْفُلُوْنَ عَنْ اَسْلِحَتِكُمْ وَ اَمْتِعَتِكُمْ فَيَمِيْلُوْنَ عَلَيْكُمْ مَّيْلَةً وَّاحِدَةً ۚ وَ لَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْكُمْ اِنْ كَانَ بِكُمْ اَذًى مِّنْ مَّطَرٍ اَوْ كُنْتُمْ مَّرْضٰۤى اَنْ تَضَعُوْۤا اَسْلِحَتَكُمْ وَ خُذُوْا حِذْرَكُمْ ۭ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ اَعَدَّ لِلْكٰفِرِيْنَ عَذَابًا مُّهِينًا
verses.transliteration: Wa 'izaa kunta feehim fa'aqamta lahumuş-Şalaata faltaqum taaa'ifatum- minhum ma'aka walya'khuzo00 'aslihatahum fa'izaa sajadoo falyakoonoo minw-waraaa'ikum walta'ti taaa'ifatun 'ukhraa lam yuşalloo falyuşalloo ma'aka walya'khuzoo hizrahum wa aslihatahum; waddal lazeena kafaroo law taghfuloona 'anaslihatikum wa 'amti'atikum fayameeloona 'alaykum maylatanw waahidah; wa laa junaaha 'alaykum 'in kaana bikum 'azam- mimmatarin 'aw kuntum mardaaa 'an tada ooo 'aslihatakum wa khuzoo hizrakum; 'innal-laaha Pa'adda lilkaafireena azaabam- muheenaa.
verses.translation: Aur (Aye Nabi!) jab Aap mominon ke darmiyaan hon, phir unhein namaaz padhaane ke liye khade hon to un mein se ek giroh apne hathyaar lagaaye huye aapke saath jamaa'at mein khada ho, phir jab woh sajdah karle to peechhe chala jaaye aur doosra giroh jisne abhi namaaz nahin padhi woh aap ke saath namaaz adaa kare aur woh bhi chaukanna rahe aur apne hathyaar lagaaye rakkhe, kaafir chaahte hain ke tum apne hathyaaron aur apne saamaan ki taraf se zara ghaafil ho jaao to woh tum par achaanak dhaawa bol dein,¹ aur agar tumhen baarish se takleef ho ya tum bimaar ho to tum par koyi gunaah nahin ke apne hathyaar ek taraf rakh do, aur iss haalat mein bhi chaukanne raho. beshak Allah ne kaafiron ke liye ruswa kardene waala a'zaab tayyaar kar rakkha hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Iss aayat mein salaatul khauf ki ijaazat balke hukm diya jaaraha hai. salaatul khauf ke ma'ana hain, khauf ki namaaz. Yeh uss waqt mashru hai jab musalmaan aur kaafiron ki faujein ek doosre ke maqaabil jung ke liye tayyaar khadi hon aur ek lamhe ki bhi ghaflat musalmaanon ke liye sakht khatarnaak saabit ho sakti ho.aise haalaat mein agar namaaz ka waqt ho jaaye to salaatul khauf padhne ka hukm hai, jiski mukhtalif sooratein hadees mein bayaan ki gayi hain. masalan: fauj do hisson mein taqseem ho gayi ek hissa dushman ke bilmuqaabil khada rahaa take kaafiron ko hamlah karne ki jasaarat na ho aur ek hisse ne aakar Nabi ﷺ ke peechhe namaaz padhi. Jab yeh hissa namaaz se faarigh ho gaya to yeh pahle ki jagah morchah zan ho gaya aur morchah zan hissa namaaz ke liye aa gaya. Ba'z rivayaat mein aata hai ke aapne donon hisson ko ek ek ra'kat namaaz padhaayi,iss tarah aapki do rak'at aur baaqi faujyon ki ek ek rak'at huyi, ba'z mein aata hai ke do do rak'aat padhaayein, iss tarah aapki chaar raka'at aur faujiyon ki do do raka'at huyin aur ba'z mein aata hai ke ek rak'at padh kar attahiyaat ki tarah baithhe rahe, faujiyon ne khade ho kar apne taur par ek raka'at aur padh kar do rak'atein puri kin aur dushman kesaamne jaakar dat gaye. Doosre hisse ne aakar Nabi ﷺ ke peechhe namaaz padhi, aapne unhein bhi ek raka'at padhaayi aur attahiyaat mein baithh gaye aur uss waqt tak baithhe rahe jab tak faujiyon ne doosri raka'at puri nahin karli, phir unke saath aap ne salaam pher diya. Iss tarah aapki bhi do raka'at aur fauj ke donon hisson ki bhi do do raka'atein huyin. (Ahsanul Bayaan) Mazeed mulaahazah farmaayein (Surah Baqarah:2/239)

verses.arabic: فَاِذَا قَضَيْتُمُ الصَّلٰوةَ فَاذْكُرُوا اللّٰهَ قِيَامًا وَّ قُعُوْدًا وَّ عَلٰى جُنُوْبِكُمْ ۚ فَاِذَا اطْمَاْنَنْتُمْ فَاَقِيْمُوا الصَّلٰوةَ ۭ اِنَّ الصَّلٰوةَ كَانَتْ عَلَي الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ كِتٰبًا مَّوْقُوْتًا
verses.transliteration: Fa'izaa qadaytumuş-Şalaata fazkurul- laaha qiyaamañw-wa qu'oodañw-wa 'alaa junoobikum; fa-'izat- ma'nantum fa'aqeemus- Şalaah; 'innaş-Şalaata kaanat 'alal mu'mineena kitaabam-mawqootaa
verses.translation: Phir jab tum namaaz adaa kar chuko to khade huye, baithhe huye aur lete huye (har haal mein) Allah ko yaad karte raho, phir jab tumhen itminaan ho jaaye to (puri) namaaz padho, beshak mominon par muqarrarah waqton mein namaaz farz hai.

verses.arabic: وَ لَا تَهِنُوْا فِي ابْتِغَآءِ الْقَوْمِ ۭ اِنْ تَكُوْنُوْا تَاْلَمُوْنَ فَاِنَّهُمْ يَاْلَمُوْنَ كَمَا تَاْلَمُوْنَ وَ تَرْجُوْنَ مِنَ اللّٰهِ مَا لَا يَرْجُوْنَ ۭ وَ كَانَ اللّٰهُ عَلِيْمًا حَكِيْمًا
verses.transliteration: Wa laa tahinoo fib- tighaaa'il-qawmi 'in takoonoo ta'lamoona fa'innahum ya'lamoona kamaa ta'lamoona wa tarjoona minal-laahi maa laa yarjoon; wa kaanal- laahu 'Aleeman Hakeemaa.
verses.translation: Aur tum dushman qaum ka peechha karne mein kamzori na dikhaao. agar tum takleef uthhate ho to beshak woh bhi takleef uthhaate hain jaise tum takleef uthhaate ho aur tum Allah se jis cheez ki ummeed rakhte ho woh uski ummeed nahin rakhte, Aur Allah khoob jaanne waala, bahut hikmat waala hai.

verses.arabic: اِنَّآ اَنْزَلْنَآ اِلَيْكَ الْكِتٰبَ بِالْحَقِّ لِتَحْكُمَ بَيْنَ النَّاسِ بِمَآ اَرٰٮكَ اللّٰهُ ۚ وَ لَا تَكُنْ لِّلْخَآىٕنِيْنَ خَصِيْمًا
verses.transliteration: 'Innaaa 'anzalnaaa 'ilaykal-Kitaaba bilhaqqi litahkuma baynan-naasi bimaaa 'araakal-laah; wa laa takul- lilkhaaa'ineena khaseemaa.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) beshak humne aapki taraf yeh kitab haq ke saath naazil ki hai taake aapko Allah ne jo seedhi raah dikhaayi hai uske mutaabiq logon ke darmiyaan faislah karein, aur aap khiyaanat karne waalon ke himaayati na banen.

verses.arabic: وَ اسْتَغْفِرِ اللّٰهَ ۭ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ كَانَ غَفُوْرًا رَّحِيْمًا
verses.transliteration: Wastaghfiril-laaha 'innal-laaha kaana Ghafoorar-Raheema
verses.translation: Aur Allah se bakhshish maangen, beshak Allah bahut bakhshne waala, nihaayat raham karne waala hai.

verses.arabic: وَ لَا تُجَادِلْ عَنِ الَّذِيْنَ يَخْتَانُوْنَ اَنْفُسَهُمْ ۭ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ لَا يُحِبُّ مَنْ كَانَ خَوَّانًا اَثِيْمًا
verses.transliteration: Wa laa tujaadil 'anil- lazeena yakhtaanoona 'anfusahum; innal-laaha laa yuhibbu man kaana khawwaanan 'aseemaa.
verses.translation: Aur Aap un logon ki taraf se jhagda na karein jo apne aapse khiyaanat karte hain, beshak Allah USS shakhs ko pasand nahin karta jo khiyaanat karne waala gunah gaar ho.

verses.arabic: يَسْتَخْفُوْنَ مِنَ النَّاسِ وَ لَا يَسْتَخْفُوْنَ مِنَ اللّٰهِ وَ هُوَ مَعَهُمْ اِذْ يُبَيِّتُوْنَ مَا لَا يَرْضٰى مِنَ الْقَوْلِ ۭ وَ كَانَ اللّٰهُ بِمَا يَعْمَلُوْنَ مُحِيْطًا
verses.transliteration: Yastakhfoona minan-naasi wa laa yastakhfoona minal- laahi wa huwa ma'ahum 'iz yubayyitoona maa laa yardaa minal-qawl; wa kaanal-laahu bimaa ya'maloona muheetaa.
verses.translation: Woh logon se (to apni harkatein) chhupa sakte hain magar Allah se nahin chhupa sakte aur woh uss waqt bhi unke saath hota hai jab woh raat ko chhup kar aisa mashwarah karte hain jo Allah ko pasand nahin aur woh jo bhi amal karte hain Allah use ghere huye hai.

verses.arabic: هٰٓاَنْتُمْ هٰٓؤُلَآءِ جَادَلْتُمْ عَنْهُمْ فِي الْحَيٰوةِ الدُّنْيَا فَمَنْ يُّجَادِلُ اللّٰهَ عَنْهُمْ يَوْمَ الْقِيٰمَةِ اَمْ مَّنْ يَّكُوْنُ عَلَيْهِمْ وَكِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: Haaa'antum haaa'ulaaa'i jaadaltum 'anhum fil-hayaatid- dunyaa famañу- yujaadilul-laaha 'anhum Yawmal- Qiyaamati 'am many-yakoonu 'alayhim wakeelaa.
verses.translation: Haan! tum logon ke haan dunya ki zindagi mein to un (mujrimon) ki taraf se jhagde kar liya phir qiyaamat ke din Allah haan unki taraf se kaun jhagdega? ya wahaan kaun unka wakeel hoga?

verses.arabic: وَ مَنْ يَّعْمَلْ سُوْۤءًا اَوْ يَظْلِمْ نَفْسَهٗ ثُمَّ يَسْتَغْفِرِ اللّٰهَ يَجِدِ اللّٰهَ غَفُوْرًا رَّحِيْمًا
verses.transliteration: Wa mañy-ya'mal sooo'an 'aw yazlim nafsahoo suтта yastaghfiril-laaha yajidil- laaha Ghafoorar- Raheemaa
verses.translation: Aur jo shakhs bura amal kare ya apni jaan par zulm kare, phir woh Allah se bakhshish maange to woh Allah ko bahut bakhsne waala, nihaayat raham karne waala paayega.

verses.arabic: وَ مَنْ يَّكْسِبْ اِثْمًا فَاِنَّمَا يَكْسِبُهٗ عَلٰى نَفْسِهٖ ۭ وَ كَانَ اللّٰهُ عَلِيْمًا حَكِيْمًا
verses.transliteration: Wa mañy-yaksib 'isman fa'innamaa yaksibuhoo 'alaa nafsih; wa kaanal-laahu 'Aleeman Hakeemaa.
verses.translation: Aur jo shakhs koyi gunaah karta hai to be shak uski yeh kamaayi usi ke liye wabaal hogi, Aur Allah khoob jaanne waala, bahut hikmat waala hai.

verses.arabic: وَ مَنْ يَّكْسِبْ خَطِيْۤـئَةً اَوْ اِثْمًا ثُمَّ يَرْمِ بِهٖ بَرِيْۤئًا فَقَدِ احْتَمَلَ بُهْتَانًا وَّ اِثْمًا مُّبِيْنًا
verses.transliteration: Wa mañy-yaksib khateee'atan 'aw 'isman summa yarmi bihee bareee'an faqadih- tamala buhtaananw-wa 'ismam mubeenaa.
verses.translation: Aur jo shakhs koyi khata ya gunaah karta hai, phir kisi be gunaah par uska ilzaam laga deta hai to (aisa karke) woh ek bade bohtaan aur khule gunaah ka bojh uthhaata hai.

verses.arabic: وَ لَوْ لَا فَضْلُ اللّٰهِ عَلَيْكَ وَ رَحْمَتُهٗ لَهَمَّتْ طَّآىٕفَةٌ مِّنْهُمْ اَنْ يُّضِلُّوْكَ وَ مَا يُضِلُّوْنَ اِلَّاۤ اَنْفُسَهُمْ وَ مَا يَضُرُّوْنَكَ مِنْ شَيْءٍ ۭ وَاَنْزَلَ اللّٰهُ عَلَيْكَ الْكِتٰبَ وَ الْحِكْمَةَ وَ عَلَّمَكَ مَا لَمْ تَكُنْ تَعْلَمُ ۭ وَ كَانَ فَضْلُ اللّٰهِ عَلَيْكَ عَظِيْمًا
verses.transliteration: Wa law laa fadlul- laahi 'alayka wa rahmatuhoo lahammat- taaa'ifatum minhum any- yudillooka wa maa yudilloona 'illaaa 'anfusahum wa maa yadurroonaka min shay'; wa 'anzalal- laahu 'alaykal-Kitaaba wal- Hikmata wa 'allamaka maa lam takun ta'lam; wa kaana fadlul-laahi 'alayka 'azeemaa.
verses.translation: Aur agar Aap par Allah ka fazl aur uski rahmat na hoti to logon ke ek giroh ne yaqeenan iraadah karliya tha ke woh aapko bahkaa de, aur woh apne aapke siwa kisi ko nahin bahkaate, aur woh aapko zara bhi nuqsaan nahin pahunchaa sakte, aur Allah ne Aap par yeh kitab aur hikmat naazil ki hai aur aap ko woh kuchh sikhaaya hai jo Aap nahin jaante the aur Aap par Allah ka fazl bahut ziyaadah hai.

verses.arabic: لَا خَيْرَ فِيْ كَثِيْرٍ مِّنْ نَجْوٰىهُمْ اِلَّا مَنْ اَمَرَ بِصَدَقَةٍ اَوْ مَعْرُوْفٍ اَوْ اِصْلَاحٍۢ بَيْنَ النَّاسِ ۭ وَ مَنْ يَّفْعَلْ ذٰلِكَ ابْتِغَآءَ مَرْضَاةِ اللّٰهِ فَسَوْفَ نُؤْتِيْهِ اَجْرًا عَظِيْمًا
verses.transliteration: laa khayra fee kaseerim-min najwaahum 'illaa man 'amara bişadaqatin 'aw ma'roofin 'aw 'islaahim- baynan-naas; wa mañy- yafal zaalikab- tighaaa'a mardaatil- laahi fasawfa nu'teehi 'ajran 'azeemaa.
verses.translation: Unki aksar khufyah sargoshiyon mein koyi bhalaayi nahin hoti magar jo shakhs sadqe ya neki ya logon ke darmiyaan sulah ka hukm de (to yeh achchhi baat hai) aur jo koyi Allah ki raza haasil karne ke liye aisa kare, to hum use jald bahut bada ajr a'taa karenge.

verses.arabic: وَ مَنْ يُّشَاقِقِ الرَّسُوْلَ مِنْۢ بَعْدِ مَا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُ الْهُدٰى وَ يَتَّبِعْ غَيْرَ سَبِيْلِ الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ نُوَلِّهٖ مَا تَوَلّٰى وَ نُصْلِهٖ جَهَنَّمَ ۭ وَ سَآءَتْ مَصِيْرًا
verses.transliteration: Wa mañy- yushaaqiqir-Rasoola mim ba'di maa tabayyana ghayra sabeelil-lahul-hudaa wa yattabi'mu'mineena nuwallihee maa tawallaa wa nuşlihee Jahannama wa saaa'at maseeraa.
verses.translation: Aur jis shakhs ke saamne waazeh shakl mein hidaayat aa jaaye aur uske ba'd woh Rasool ki mukhaalifat kare, aur musalmaanon ka raasta chhod kar doosre raaste ki pairwi kare, to hum use usi taraf pher denge jis taraf woh jaana chaahe aur hum use jahannam mein daalenge,¹ aur woh bahut 0 bura thhikaana hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Mulaahazah ho haashyah: (Surah Aal-e-Imran:3/85) hidaayat ke waazeh ho jaane ke ba'd Rasoolullah ﷺ ki mukhaalifat aur momineen ka raastah chhod kar kisi aur raaste ki pairwi, deen-e-islam se khurooj hai jis par yahaan jahannam ki wayeed bayaan farmaayi gayi hai. momineen se muraad sahaaba-e- kiraam رَضِيَ اللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ hain jo deen-e-islam ke awwaleen pairo aur uski ta'limaat ka kaamil namuna the. Aur in aayaat ke nuzool ke waqt jinke siwa koyi giroh momineen maujdood na tha ke woh muraad ho. Isliye Rasoolullah ﷺ ki mukhaalifat aur ghair sabeelil momineen ka itteba' donon haqeeqat mein ek hi cheez ka naam hai isliye sahaaba kiraam ke raaste aur minhaaj se inheraaf bhi kufr-o-zalaal hi hai. ba'z ulmaa ne sabeelul mominoon se muraad jima'-e-ummat liya hai ya'ni ijma'-e-ummat se inheraaf bhi kufr hai.

verses.arabic: اِنَّ اللّٰهَ لَا يَغْفِرُ اَنْ يُّشْرَكَ بِهٖ وَ يَغْفِرُ مَا دُوْنَ ذٰلِكَ لِمَنْ يَّشَآءُ ۚ وَ مَنْ يُّشْرِكْ بِاللّٰهِ فَقَدْ ضَلَّ ضَلٰلًۢا بَعِيْدًا
verses.transliteration: Innal-laaha laa yaghfiru any-yushraka bihee wa yaghfiru maa doona zaalika limany- yashaaa'; wa mañy- yushrik billaahi faqad dalla dalaalam ba'eedaa.
verses.translation: Beshak Allah yen gunaah hargiz nahin bakhshta ke uske saath shirk kiya jaaye, aur woh uske siwa jise chaahe mu'aaf kar deta hai aur jo shakhs Allah ke saath shirk karta hai, to woh yaqeenan bahut door ki gumraahi mein jaa padaa hai.

verses.arabic: اِنْ يَّدْعُوْنَ مِنْ دُوْنِهٖ اِلَّاۤ اِنَاثًا وَّ اِنْ يَّدْعُوْنَ اِلَّا شَيْطٰنًا مَّرِيْدًا
verses.transliteration: 'Iñy-yad'oona min dooniheee 'illaaa 'inaasaa; wa iny- yad'oona 'illaa Shaytaanam-mareedaa.
verses.translation: Woh log Allah ko chhod kar dewiyon ko pukaarte hain aur dar asl woh sarkash shaytaan hi ko pukaarte hain.

verses.arabic: لَّعَنَهُ اللّٰهُ ۘ وَ قَالَ لَاَتَّخِذَنَّ مِنْ عِبَادِكَ نَصِيْبًا مَّفْرُوْضًا
verses.transliteration: Laʻanahul-laah; wa qaala la'attakhizanna min 'ibaadika nașeebam- mafroodaa.
verses.translation: Allah ne uss par la'nat ki hai, aur usne kaha ke main tere bandon mein se ek muqarrar hissa zaroor le kar rahunga.

verses.arabic: وَ لَاُضِلَّنَّهُمْ وَ لَاُمَنِّيَنَّهُمْ وَ لَاٰمُرَنَّهُمْ فَلَيُبَتِّكُنَّ اٰذَانَ الْاَنْعَامِ وَ لَاٰمُرَنَّهُمْ فَلَيُغَيِّرُنَّ خَلْقَ اللّٰهِ ۭ وَ مَنْ يَّتَّخِذِ الشَّيْطٰنَ وَلِيًّا مِّنْ دُوْنِ اللّٰهِ فَقَدْ خَسِرَ خُسْرَانًا مُّبِيْنًا
verses.transliteration: Wa la'udillannahum wa la'umanni yannahum wa la'aamurannahum fala yubattikunna 'aazaanal'an'aami wa la'aamurannahum falayughayyirunna khalqal-laah; wa mañy- yattakhizish- Shaytaana waliyyam-min doonil- laahi faqad khasira khusraanam-mubeenaa
verses.translation: Aur main unhein gumraah karunga aur unhein ummeedein dilaaounga, aur main unhein hukm dunga to woh jaanwaron ke kaan cheerenge aur main unhein hukm dunga to woh Allah ki banaawat mein raddo badal karenge. aur jo shakhs Allah ko chhod kar shaytaan ko apna dost banaa le to woh yaqeenan khule nuqsaan main jaa pada.

verses.arabic: يَعِدُهُمْ وَ يُمَنِّيْهِمْ ۚ وَ مَا يَعِدُهُمُ الشَّيْطٰنُ اِلَّا غُرُوْرًا
verses.transliteration: Yaʻiduhum wa yumanneehim wa maa ya'iduhumush- Shaytaanu 'illaa ghurooraa
verses.translation: Shaytaan logon se wa'de karta hai aur unhein ummedein dilaata hai, magar shaytaan ke saare wa'de fareb ke siwa kuchh nahin.

verses.arabic: اُولٰٓٮٕكَ مَاْوٰىهُمْ جَهَنَّمُ وَ لَا يَجِدُوْنَ عَنْهَا مَحِيْصًا
verses.transliteration: 'Ulaaa'ika ma'waahum Jahannamu wa laa yajidoona 'anhaa maheesaa.
verses.translation: Un logon ka thhekaana jahannam hai, aur woh usse chhutkaare ki koyi soorat na paayenge.

verses.arabic: وَ الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا وَ عَمِلُوا الصّٰلِحٰتِ سَنُدْخِلُهُمْ جَنّٰتٍ تَجْرِيْ مِنْ تَحْتِهَا الْاَنْهٰرُ خٰلِدِيْنَ فِيْهَآ اَبَدًا ۭ وَعْدَ اللّٰهِ حَقًّا ۭ وَ مَنْ اَصْدَقُ مِنَ اللّٰهِ قِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena 'aamanoo wa 'amilus- saalihaati sanudkhiluhum Jannaatin tajree min tahtihal-'anhaaru khaalideena feehaaa 'abadaa; wa'dal-laahi haqqaa; wa man 'aşdaqu minal-laahi qeelaa.
verses.translation: Aur jo log eemaan laaye aur unhon ne nek amal kiye, hum jald unhein aise baaghon mein daakhil karenge jinke neeche nahrein jaari hain, woh un mein hameshah rahenge, Allah ka wa'dah sachcha hai, aur Allah se badh kar kaun qaul-o-qaraar mein sachcha hai?

verses.arabic: لَيْسَ بِاَمَانِيِّكُمْ وَ لَاۤ اَمَانِيِّ اَهْلِ الْكِتٰبِ ۭ مَنْ يَّعْمَلْ سُوْۤءًا يُجْزَ بِهٖ وَ لَا يَجِدْ لَهٗ مِنْ دُوْنِ اللّٰهِ وَلِيًّا وَّ لَا نَصِيْرًا
verses.transliteration: Laysa bi'amaaniyyikum wa laaa 'amaaniyyi 'Ahlil-Kitaab; many-ya'mal sooo'any- yujza bihee wa laa yajid lahoo min doonil-laahi waliyyanw-wa laa naseeraa.
verses.translation: Anjaam ka daar-o-madaar na tumhaari khaahishaat par hai na ahl-e-kitab ki khaahishaat par, balke jo koyi bura amal karega, uska use badlah diya jaayega aur woh Allah ke siwa koyi dost aur mdadgaar na paayega.

verses.arabic: وَ مَنْ يَعْمَلْ مِنَ الصُّلِحَتِ مِنْ ذَكَرٍ أَوْ أُنْثَى وَهُوَ مُؤْمِنٌ فَأُولَئِكَ يَدْخُلُونَ الْجَنَّةَ وَ لَا يُظْلَمُونَ نَقِيرًا
verses.transliteration: Wa mañy-ya'mal minaş-şaalihaati min zakarin 'aw 'unsaa wa huwa mu'minun fa'ulaaa'ika yadkhuloonal-Jannata wa laa yuzlamoona naqeeraa.
verses.translation: Aur jo koyi nek kaam karega khaah woh mard ho yaa aurat, jabke woh momin ho to aise log jannat mein daakhil honge, aur un par zara bhi zulm nahin kiya jaayega.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Ahl-e-Kitaab apne muta'alliq badi khush famiyon mein mubtala the yahaan Allah Ta'ala ne phir un khush fahmiyon ka pardah chaak karte huye farmaaya ke aakhirat ki kaamyaabi mahaz ummeedon aur aarzuon se nahin milegi. uske liye to eemaan aur amal-e-saaleh ki punji zaroori hai agar uske baraks naama-e-a'amaal mein buraaiyaan hongi to use har soorat mein uski saza bhugatni hogi. Wahaan aisa koyi dost ya madadgaar nahin hoga jo buraayi ki saza se bacha jaa sake. Aayat mein ahl-e-kitab ke saath Allah Ta'ala ne ahl-e-eemaan ko bhi khitaab farmaaya hai take woh bhi yahud wa nasaara ki si ghalat fahmiyon, khush fahmiyon aur amal se khaali aarzuon aur tamannaaon se apna daaman bacha kar rakkhein lekin afsos musalmaan iss tambih ke baawajood inhi khaam khiyaaliyon mein mubtala ho gaye jin mein saabqah ummatein giraftaar huyin, aur aaj be amali aur bad amali musalmaan ka bhi she'aar bani huyi hai aur uske baawajood 'Ummat-e-Marhooma' kahlaane par musir hai.Allah Ta'ala use hiydaayat de.

verses.arabic: وَ مَنْ يَعْمَلْ مِنَ الصُّلِحَتِ مِنْ ذَكَرٍ أَوْ أُنْثَى وَهُوَ مُؤْمِنٌ فَأُولَئِكَ يَدْخُلُونَ الْجَنَّةَ وَ لَا يُظْلَمُونَ نَقِيرًا
verses.transliteration: Wa man 'ahsanu deenam-mimman 'aslama wajhahoo lillaahi wa huwa muhsinuñw-wattaba'a Millata 'Ibraaheema haneefaa; wattakhazal- laahu 'Ibraaheema khaleelaa.
verses.translation: Aur deen mein USS shakhs se ziyaadah achchha kaun hai jisne apna chehrah Allah ke saamne jhuka diya? aur woh neki karne waala bhi ho, aur millat-e- ibraheem ki pairwi kare, jo sirf haq parast tha. aur Allah ne Ibraheem ko apna khaas dost banaaya tha.

verses.arabic: وَ لِلّٰهِ مَا فِي السَّمٰوٰتِ وَ مَا فِي الْاَرْضِ ۭ وَ كَانَ اللّٰهُ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ مُّحِيْطًا
verses.transliteration: Wa lillaahi maa fis- samaawaati wa maa fil- 'ard; wa kaanal-laahu bikulli shay'im- muheetaa.
verses.translation: Aur aasmaanon aur zameen mein jo kuchh hai Allah hi ka hai aur Allah har cheez ko ghere huye hai.

verses.arabic: وَ يَسْتَفْتُوْنَكَ فِي النِّسَآءِ ۭ قُلِ اللّٰهُ يُفْتِيْكُمْ فِيْهِنَّ وَ مَا يُتْلٰى عَلَيْكُمْ فِي الْكِتٰبِ فِيْ يَتٰمَى النِّسَآءِ الّٰتِيْ لَا تُؤْتُوْنَهُنَّ مَا كُتِبَ لَهُنَّ وَ تَرْغَبُوْنَ اَنْ تَنْكِحُوْهُنَّ وَ الْمُسْتَضْعَفِيْنَ مِنَ الْوِلْدَانِ وَ اَنْ تَقُوْمُوْا لِلْيَتٰمٰى بِالْقِسْطِ ۭ وَ مَا تَفْعَلُوْا مِنْ خَيْرٍ فَاِنَّ اللّٰهَ كَانَ بِهٖ عَلِيْمًا
verses.transliteration: Wa yastaftoonaka fin-nisaaa'i qulil-laahu yufteekum feehinna wa maa yutlaa 'alaykum fil- Kitaabi fee yataaman- nisaaa'il-laatee laa tu'toonahunna maa kutiba lahunna wa targhaboona 'an tankihoohunna walmustad afeena minal-wildaani wa 'an taqoomoo lilyataamaa bilqist; wa maa tafaloo min khayrin fa'innal- laaha kaana bihee 'Aleemaa.
verses.translation: Aur (Aye Nabi!) log aapse auraton ke baare mein daryaaft karte hain kah deejiye! Allah khud unke baare mein hukm de rahaa hai aur kitab ki woh aayatein bhi, jo yateem auraton ke baare mein tumhein padh kar sunaayi jaati hain jinhein unka muqarrar haq tum nahin dete aur tum chaahte ho ke un se nikah karlo, aur (woh) kamzor bachchon ke baare mein (tumhein hukm de rahaa hai) aur yeh ke tum yateemon se insaaf karo aur tum jo bhi neki karo, to beshak Allah uska khoob i'lm rakhta hai.

verses.arabic: وَ اِنِ امْرَاَةٌ خَافَتْ مِنْۢ بَعْلِهَا نُشُوْزًا اَوْ اِعْرَاضًا فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْهِمَآ اَنْ يُّصْلِحَا بَيْنَهُمَا صُلْحًا ۭ وَ الصُّلْحُ خَيْرٌ ۭ وَ اُحْضِرَتِ الْاَنْفُسُ الشُّحَّ ۭ وَ اِنْ تُحْسِنُوْا وَ تَتَّقُوْا فَاِنَّ اللّٰهَ كَانَ بِمَا تَعْمَلُوْنَ خَبِيْرًا
verses.transliteration: Wa 'inim-ra'atun- khaafat mim baʻlihaa nushoozan 'aw 'i'raadan falaa junaaha 'alayhimaaa 'añy- yuşlihaa baynahumaa sulhaa; waşşulhu khayr;
verses.translation: Aur agar kisi aurat ko apne shauhar ki taraf se zulm-o-ziyaadati ya nazar andaaz kiye jaane ka andeshah ho to un donon par koyi gunaah nahin ke woh aapas mein kisi tarah sulah karlein aur sulah hi achchhi hai, aur insaani nafs mein bakheeli rakkhi gayi hai.¹ aur agar tum ehsaan karo aur parhez gaar bano to beshak tum jo bhi amal karte ho, Allah uski khoob khabar rakhta hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Shuh, bukhl aur laalach ko kahte hain. yahaan muraad apna apna mafaad hai jo har nafs ko aziz hota hai ya'ni har nafs apne mafaad mein bukhl aur laalach se kaam leta hai.

verses.arabic: وَ لَنْ تَسْتَطِيْعُوْۤا اَنْ تَعْدِلُوْا بَيْنَ النِّسَآءِ وَ لَوْ حَرَصْتُمْ ۚ فَلَا تَمِيْلُوْا كُلَّ الْمَيْلِ فَتَذَرُوْهَا كَالْمُعَلَّقَةِ ۚ وَ اِنْ تُصْلِحُوْا وَ تَتَّقُوْا فَاِنَّ اللّٰهَ كَانَ غَفُوْرًا رَّحِيْمًا
verses.transliteration: Wa lan tastatee'ooo 'an ta'diloo baynan- nisaaa'i wa law harastum falaa tameeloo kullal-mayli fatazaroohaa kalmu'allaqah; wa 'in tuşlihoo wa tattaqoo fa'innal-laaha kaana Ghafoorar- Raheemaa.
verses.translation: Aur tum se yeh kabhi na ho sakega ke tum apni beewiyon mein har tarah se adl karo, khaah tum uski kitni hi khaahish rakkho, lehaaza tum kisi ki taraf puri tarah maayel na hojaao ke doosri ko beech mein latakti chhod do,¹ aur agar tum islaah ka rawayyah ikhtiyaar karo aur parhez gaar bano to Allah bahut bakhshne waala, nehaayat raham karne waala hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Yeh ek doosri soorat hai ke ek shakhs ki ek se ziyaadah beewiyaan hon to dili ta'alluq aur muhabbat mein woh sabke saath yaksaan sulook nahin kar sakta. kyun ke muhabbat, f'el-e-qalb hai jis par kisi ko ikhtiyaar nahin hai. khud Nabi ﷺ ko bhi apni biwiyon mein se sabse ziyaadah muhabbat Aayeshah  رضي الله عنها se thi. khaahish ke baa wajood insaaf na karne se matlab yahi qalbi mailaan aur muhabbat mein adm-e-masawaat hai. agar yeh qalbi muhabbat zaahiri huqooq ki masawaat mein maane' na bane to indallah qaabil-e-muaakhzah nahin.

verses.arabic: وَ اِنْ يَّتَفَرَّقَا يُغْنِ اللّٰهُ كُلًّا مِّنْ سَعَتِهٖ ۭ وَ كَانَ اللّٰهُ وَاسِعًا حَكِيْمًا
verses.transliteration: Wa 'iny- yatafarraqaa yughnil- laahu kullam-min sa'atih; wa kaanal-laahu Waasi'an Hakeemaa.
verses.translation: Aur agar woh donon (miyaan beewi) ek doosre se alag ho jaayein to Allah apne fazl se har ek ko (doosre se) be niyaaz kardega aur Allah badi us'at waala hai, khoob hikmat waala hai.

verses.arabic: وَ لِلّٰهِ مَا فِي السَّمٰوٰتِ وَ مَا فِي الْاَرْضِ ۭ وَ لَقَدْ وَصَّيْنَا الَّذِيْنَ اُوْتُوا الْكِتٰبَ مِنْ قَبْلِكُمْ وَ اِِيَّاكُمْ اَنِ اتَّقُوا اللّٰهَ ۚ وَ اِنْ تَكْفُرُوْا فَاِنَّ لِلّٰهِ مَا فِي السَّمٰوٰتِ وَ مَا فِي الْاَرْضِ ۭ وَ كَانَ اللّٰهُ غَنِيًّا حَمِيْدًا
verses.transliteration: Wa lillaahi maa fis- samaawaati wa maa fil- 'ard; wa laqad waşşaynal-lazeena 'ootul- Kitaaba min qablikum wa 'iyyaakum 'anit-taqul- laah; wa 'in takfuroo fa'inna lillaahi maa fis- samaawaati wa maa fil- 'ard; wa kaanal-laahu Ghaniyyan hameedaa.
verses.translation: Aur aasmaanon aur zamein mein jo kuchh hai Allah hi ka hai aur humne tumse pahle jin logon ko kitab di, unko aur tumhein bhi yahi hukm diya ke Allah se darte raho, phir agar tum kufr karoge to beshak aasmaanon aur zameen mein jo kuchh hai Allah hi ka hai, aur Allah bahut be parwa, qaabil-e-ta'reef hai.

verses.arabic: وَ لِلّٰهِ مَا فِي السَّمٰوٰتِ وَ مَا فِي الْاَرْضِ ۭ وَ كَفٰى بِاللّٰهِ وَكِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: Wa lillaahi maa fis- samaawaati wa maa fil- 'ard; wa kafaa billaahi Wakeelaa
verses.translation: Aur aasmaanon aur zameen mein jo kuchh hai Allah hi ka hai, aur Allah bataur kaar saaz kaafi hai.

verses.arabic: اِنْ يَّشَاْ يُذْهِبْكُمْ اَيُّهَا النَّاسُ وَ يَاْتِ بِاٰخَرِيْنَ ۭ وَ كَانَ اللّٰهُ عَلٰى ذٰلِكَ قَدِيْرًا
verses.transliteration: 'Iñy-yasha' yuzhibkum 'ayyuhan- naasu wa ya'ti bi'aakhareen; wa kaanal-laahu 'alaa zaalika Qadeeraa.
verses.translation: Aye logo! agar Allah chaahe to tumhein hataa kar tumhaari jagah doosron ko le aaye, aur Allah iss baat ki puri qudrat rakhta hai.

verses.arabic: مَنْ كَانَ يُرِيْدُ ثَوَابَ الدُّنْيَا فَعِنْدَ اللّٰهِ ثَوَابُ الدُّنْيَا وَ الْاٰخِرَةِ ۚ وَ كَانَ اللّٰهُ سَمِيْعًۢا بَصِيْرًا
verses.transliteration: Man kaana yureedu sawaabad-dunyaa fa'indal-laahi sawaabud- dunyaa wal-'Aakhirah; wa kaanal laahu Samee'am-Baseeraa.
verses.translation: Jo shakhs dunya ka sawaab chaahta ho to Allah ke paas to dunya aur aakhirat donon ka sawaab maujood hai, aur Allah khoob sunne waala, khoob dekhne waala hai.

verses.arabic: يٰٓاَيُّهَا الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا كُوْنُوْا قَوَّامِيْنَ بِالْقِسْطِ شُهَدَآءَ لِلّٰهِ وَ لَوْ عَلٰۤى اَنْفُسِكُمْ اَوِ الْوَالِدَيْنِ وَ الْاَقْرَبِيْنَ ۭ اِنْ يَّكُنْ غَنِيًّا اَوْ فَقِيْرًا فَاللّٰهُ اَوْلٰى بِهِمَا فَلَا تَتَّبِعُوا الْهَوٰٓى اَنْ تَعْدِلُوْا ۚ وَ اِنْ تَلْوٗا اَوْ تُعْرِضُوْا فَاِنَّ اللّٰهَ كَانَ بِمَا تَعْمَلُوْنَ خَبِيْرًا
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhal- lazeena 'aamanoo koonoo qawwaameena bilqisti shuhadaaa'a lillaahi wa law 'alaaa 'anfusikum 'awil- waalidayni wal'aqrabeen; 'iny- yakun ghaniyyan 'aw faqeeran fallaahu 'awlaa bihimaa falaaa tattabi'ul- hawaaa 'an ta'diloo; wa 'in talwooo aw tu'ridoo fa'innal-laaha kaana bimaa ta'maloona Khabeeraa.
verses.translation: Aye logo jo eemaan laaye ho! tum insaaf ke liye dat jaane waale aur Allah ke liye sachchi gawaahi dene waale ban jaao, khaah woh tumhaare apne khilaaf ya tumhaare waaledain aur rishte daaron ke khelaaf ho,¹ mu'aamle ka fareeq Ameer ho ya ghareeb, donon sooraton mein tumhaari nisbat Allah ziyaadah unka khair khaah hai, pas tum nafsaani khaahish ke peechhe pad kar insaaf ka daaman haath se na chhodo, aur agar tum ne tod marod kar baat ki ya (gawaahi dene se) munh moda to beshak tum jo bhi amal karte ho Allah usse khoob baa khabar hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Iss mein sachchi gawaahi ki taakeed ki gayi hai kyun ke jhooti gawaahi kabirah gunaah hai. chunaancheh Nabi Kareem ﷺ se kabirah gunahon ke muta'alliq poochha gaya to Aap ﷺ ne farmaya: '⓵Allah ke saath kisi ko ibaadat mein shareek karna ⓶ waaledain ki naa farmaani karna ⓷(naahaq) khoon bahaana ⓸jhooti gawaahi dena.' (Sahih Bukhari, Ash-shahadaat, Baab:10, Hadees:2653)

verses.arabic: يٰٓاَيُّهَا الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا اٰمِنُوْا بِاللّٰهِ وَ رَسُوْلِهٖ وَ الْكِتٰبِ الَّذِيْ نَزَّلَ عَلٰى رَسُوْلِهٖ وَ الْكِتٰبِ الَّذِيْۤ اَنْزَلَ مِنْ قَبْلُ ۚ وَ مَنْ يَّكْفُرْ بِاللّٰهِ وَ مَلٰٓىٕكَتِهٖ وَ كُتُبِهٖ وَ رُسُلِهٖ وَ الْيَوْمِ الْاٰخِرِ فَقَدْ ضَلَّ ضَلٰلًۢا بَعِيْدًا
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhal- lazeena 'aamanooo 'aaminoo billaahi wa Rasoolihee wal- Kitaabil- lazee nazzala 'alaa Rasoolihee wal-Kitaabil- lazeee 'anzala min qabl; wa mañy-yakfur billaahi wa Malaaa'ikatihee wa Kutubihee wa Rusulihee wal-Yawmil-'Aakhiri faqad dalla dalaalam- ba'eedaa
verses.translation: Aye logo jo eemaan laaye ho! Allah, uske Rasool aur uss kitab par eemaan laao jo Allah ne apne Rasool par naazil ki aur uss kitab par bhi jo usne pahle naazil ki aur jo shakhs Allah, uske farishton, uski kitabon, uske Rasoolon aur aakhirat ke din ka inkaar kare to woh yaqeenan bahut door k gumraahi mein jaa pada.

verses.arabic: اِنَّ الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا ثُمَّ كَفَرُوْا ثُمَّ اٰمَنُوْا ثُمَّ كَفَرُوْا ثُمَّ ازْدَادُوْا كُفْرًا لَّمْ يَكُنِ اللّٰهُ لِيَغْفِرَ لَهُمْ وَ لَا لِيَهْدِيَهُمْ سَبِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: 'Innal-lazeena 'aamanoo summa kafaroo summa 'aamanoo summa kafaroo summaz-daadoo kufral-lam yakunil-laahu liyaghfira lahum wa laa liyahdiyahum sabeelaa.
verses.translation: Beshak jo log eemaan laaye, phir unhon ne kufr kiya, phir eemaan le aaye, phir kufr, kiya phir kufr mein kahin badh gaye, Allah unhein hargiz nahin bakhshega aur na unhein hidaayat ka raastah dikhaayega.

verses.arabic: بَشِّرِ الْمُنٰفِقِيْنَ بِاَنَّ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا اَلِيْمًا
verses.transliteration: Bashshiril- munaafiqeena bi'anna lahum 'azaaban 'aleemaa.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) munaafiqon ko khabar daar kar deejiye ke unke liye dardnaak a'zaab hai.
