verses.arabic: الَّذِيْنَ يَتَّخِذُوْنَ الْكٰفِرِيْنَ اَوْلِيَآءَ مِنْ دُوْنِ الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ ۭ اَيَبْتَغُوْنَ عِنْدَهُمُ الْعِزَّةَ فَاِنَّ الْعِزَّةَ لِلّٰهِ جَمِيْعًا
verses.transliteration: Allazeena yattakhizoonal-kaafireena 'awliyaaa'a min doonil- mu'mineen; 'ayabtaghoona 'indahumul-'izzata fa'innal-'izzata lillaahi jamee'aa.
verses.translation: Jo mominon ko chhod kar kaafiron ko dost banaate hain, kiya woh un kaafiron ke haan i'zzat talaash karte hain? phir beshak i'zzat to saari Allah hi ke liye hai.

verses.arabic: وَ قَدْ نَزَّلَ عَلَيْكُمْ فِي الْكِتٰبِ اَنْ اِذَا سَمِعْتُمْ اٰيٰتِ اللّٰهِ يُكْفَرُ بِهَا وَ يُسْتَهْزَأُ بِهَا فَلَا تَقْعُدُوْا مَعَهُمْ حَتّٰى يَخُوْضُوْا فِيْ حَدِيْثٍ غَيْرِهٖۤ ۚ اِنَّكُمْ اِذًا مِّثْلُهُمْ ۭ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ جَامِعُ الْمُنٰفِقِيْنَ وَ الْكٰفِرِيْنَ فِيْ جَهَنَّمَ جَمِيْعًا
verses.transliteration: Wa qad nazzala 'alaykum fil-Kitaabi 'an 'izaa sami'tum 'Aayaatil- laahi yukfaru bihaa wa yustahza'u bihaa falaa taq'udoo ma'ahum hattaa yakhoodoo fee hadeesin ghayrih; 'innakum 'izam- misluhum; 'innal-laaha jaami'ul- munaafiqeena wal-kaafireena fee jahannama jamee'aa.
verses.translation: Aur usne iss kitab mein tumhaare liye naazil kiya hai ke jab tum suno ke Allah ki aayaat ka inkaar kiya jaa rahaa ho ya unka mazaaq udaaya jaa rahaa ho to tum unki majlis mein na baithho, yahaan tak ke woh uske e'laawah kisi aur baat mein mashghool ho jaayen, warna tum bhi uss waqt yaqeenan unhi jaise hoge, beshak Allah munaafiqon aur kaafiron sab ko jahannam mein jama karne waala hai.

verses.arabic: اَلَّذِيْنَ يَتَرَبَّصُوْنَ بِكُمْ ۚ فَاِنْ كَانَ لَكُمْ فَتْحٌ مِّنَ اللّٰهِ قَالُوْۤا اَلَمْ نَكُنْ مَّعَكُمْ ۚ وَ اِنْ كَانَ لِلْكٰفِرِيْنَ نَصِيْبٌ قَالُوْۤا اَلَمْ نَسْتَحْوِذْ عَلَيْكُمْ وَ نَمْنَعْكُمْ مِّنَ الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ ۭ فَاللّٰهُ يَحْكُمُ بَيْنَكُمْ يَوْمَ الْقِيٰمَةِ ۚ وَ لَنْ يَّجْعَلَ اللّٰهُ لِلْكٰفِرِيْنَ عَلَي الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ سَبِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: 'Allazeena yatarabbasoona bikum fa'in kaana lakum fathum-minal-laahi qaalooo 'alam nakum- ma'akum wa 'in kaana lilkaafireena naseebun qaalooo 'alam nastahwiz 'alaykum wa namna kum minal- mu'mineen; fallaahu yahkumu baynakum Yawmal-Qiyaamah; wa lañy-yaj'alal-laahu lilkaafireena 'alal- mu'mineena sabeelaa.
verses.translation: Woh log tumhaare anjaam ka intezaar karte rahte hain, phir agar tumhein Allah ki taraf se fatah haasil ho to woh kahte hain: kiya hum tumhaare saath na the? aur agar kaafiron ko kuchh ghalbah mile to unse kahte hain: kiya hum tum par ghaalib na aane lage the aur (kiya) humne tumhen mominon se nahin bachaaya? phir qiyaamat ke din Allah unke darmiyaan faislah kardega aur Allah kaafiron ko mominon ke khelaaf hargiz koyi raastah nahin dega.

verses.arabic: اِنَّ الْمُنٰفِقِيْنَ يُخٰدِعُوْنَ اللّٰهَ وَ هُوَ خَادِعُهُمْ ۚ وَ اِذَا قَامُوْۤا اِلَى الصَّلٰوةِ قَامُوْا كُسَالٰى ۙ يُرَآءُوْنَ النَّاسَ وَ لَا يَذْكُرُوْنَ اللّٰهَ اِلَّا قَلِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: 'Innal-munaafiqeena yukhaadi'oonal-laaha wa huwa khaadi'uhum wa 'izaa qaamooo 'ilas- Şalaati qaamoo kusaalaa yuraaa'oonan-naasa wa laa yazkuroonal-laaha 'illaa qaleelaa.
verses.translation: Beshak munaafiqeen Allah ko dhoka dete hain magar haqeeqat yeh hai ke Allah ne unhen dhoke mein daal rakkha hai aur jab woh namaaz ke liye khade hote hain to dil se na chaahte huye, logon ko dekhaane ke liye khade hote hain, aur woh Allah ko bas thoda hi yaad karte hain.

verses.arabic: مُّذَبْذَبِيْنَ بَيْنَ ذٰلِكَ ۖ لَآ اِلٰى هٰٓؤُلَآءِ وَ لَآ اِلٰى هٰٓؤُلَآءِ ۚ وَ مَنْ يُّضْلِلِ اللّٰهُ فَلَنْ تَجِدَ لَهٗ سَبِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: Muzabzabeena bayna zaalika laaa 'ilaa haaa'ulaaa'i wa laaa 'ilaa haaa'ulaaa'; wa many-yudlilil-laahu falan tajida lahoo sabeelaa.
verses.translation: Woh kufr aur eemaan ke darmiyaan daanwaan dol hain, na pure iss taraf na pure uss taraf, aur (aye Nabi!) jise Allah gumraah kare, Aap uske liye hargiz koyi raah nahin paayenge.

verses.arabic: يٰٓاَيُّهَا الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا لَا تَتَّخِذُوا الْكٰفِرِيْنَ اَوْلِيَآءَ مِنْ دُوْنِ الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ ۭ اَتُرِيْدُوْنَ اَنْ تَجْعَلُوْا لِلّٰهِ عَلَيْكُمْ سُلْطٰنًا مُّبِيْنًا
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhal- lazeena 'aamanoo laa tattakhizul-kaafireena 'awliyaaa'a min doonil- mu'mineen; 'atureedoona 'an taj'aloo lillaahi 'alaykum sultaanam- mubeenaa
verses.translation: Aye logo jo eemaan laaye ho! mominon ko chhod kar kaafiron ko dost na banaao, kiya tum chaahte ho ke Allah ko apne khelaaf (kaarrwaayi ke liye) khuli hujjat de do?

verses.arabic: اِنَّ الْمُنٰفِقِيْنَ فِي الدَّرْكِ الْاَسْفَلِ مِنَ النَّارِ ۖ وَ لَنْ تَجِدَ لَهُمْ نَصِيْرًا
verses.transliteration: 'Innal- munaafiqeena fid- darkil'asfali minan- Naari wa lan tajida lahum naseeraa
verses.translation: Beshak munaafiqeen dozakh ke sabse nichle tabqe mein jaayenge,¹ aur wahaan aap unke liye hargiz koyi madad gaar nahin paayenge.
verses.deepMeaning: Iss mein munaafiqeen ke liye sakht wayeed hai lehaaza har musalmaan ko hadees mein bayaan kardah munaafiqon ki numaayaan sifaat se bach kar rahna chaahiye.⓵ Jab uske paas amaanat rakkhi jaaye to khiyaanat kare ⓶ Jab bole to jhooti baat kare ⓷ Jab wa'dah kare to wa'dah khilaafi kare ⓸ Jab jhagdaa kare gaaliyaan de.' (Al-Bukhari, Al-eemaan, Baab:24) neez mulaahazah keejiye: (Surah taubah:9/54) elaawah azin: 'Qiyaamat ke din Allah ke haan woh shakhs badtareen logon mein se hoga jo do rukha ho, idhar ek munh se aur udhar doosre munh se baat kahe. (Al-Bukhari, Al-adab:52)

verses.arabic: اِلَّا الَّذِيْنَ تَابُوْا وَ اَصْلَحُوْا وَ اعْتَصَمُوْا بِاللّٰهِ وَ اَخْلَصُوْا دِيْنَهُمْ لِلّٰهِ فَاُولٰٓٮٕكَ مَعَ الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ ۭ وَ سَوْفَ يُؤْتِ اللّٰهُ الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ اَجْرًا عَظِيْمًا
verses.transliteration: Siwaaye un logon ke jinhon ne taubah ki aur apni islaah karli, aur thaam liya Allah (ke deen) ko, aur apna deen Allah ke liye khaalis karliya, to aise log mominon ke saath hogne aur Allah mominon ko jald bahut bada ajr a'taa karega.
verses.translation: Siwaaye un logon ke jinhon ne taubah ki aur apni islaah karli, aur thaam liya Allah (ke deen) ko, aur apna deen Allah ke liye khaalis karliya, to aise log mominon ke saath hogne aur Allah mominon ko jald bahut bada ajr a'taa karega.

verses.arabic: مَا يَفْعَلُ اللّٰهُ بِعَذَابِكُمْ اِنْ شَكَرْتُمْ وَ اٰمَنْتُمْ ۚ وَ كَانَ اللّٰهُ شَاكِرًا عَلِيْمًا
verses.transliteration: Agar tum shukr karo aur eemaan le aao to Allah tumhein 'azaab dekar kiya karega? aur Allah bada qadardaan, khoob jaanne waala hai.
verses.translation: Agar tum shukr karo aur eemaan le aao to Allah tumhein 'azaab dekar kiya karega? aur Allah bada qadardaan, khoob jaanne waala hai.

verses.arabic: لَا يُحِبُّ اللّٰهُ الْجَهْرَ بِالسُّوْۤءِ مِنَ الْقَوْلِ اِلَّا مَنْ ظُلِمَ ۚ وَ كَانَ اللّٰهُ سَمِيْعًا عَلِيْمًا
verses.transliteration: Laa yuhibbul- laahul-jahra bissooo'i minal-qawli' illaa man zulim; wa kaanal-laahu Samee'an 'Aleemaa.
verses.translation: Allah ounchi aawaaz mein buraayi ki baat karne ko pasand nahin karta, magar jis par zulm kiya gaya ho (use ijaazat hai) aur Allah khoob sunne waala, khoob jaanne waala hai.

verses.arabic: اِنْ تُبْدُوْا خَيْرًا اَوْ تُخْفُوْهُ اَوْ تَعْفُوْا عَنْ سُوْۤءٍ فَاِنَّ اللّٰهَ كَانَ عَفُوًّا قَدِيْرًا
verses.transliteration: 'In tubdoo khayran 'aw tukhfoohu 'aw ta'foo 'an sooo'in fa'innal-laaha kaana 'Afuwwan Qadeeraa
verses.translation: Agar tum khule taur par koyi neki karo ya chhpaa kar karo, yaa buraayi se dar guzar kardo, to Allah bhi bahut mu'aafa karne waala, badi qudrat waala hai.

verses.arabic: اِنَّ الَّذِيْنَ يَكْفُرُوْنَ بِاللّٰهِ وَ رُسُلِهٖ وَ يُرِيْدُوْنَ اَنْ يُّفَرِّقُوْا بَيْنَ اللّٰهِ وَ رُسُلِهٖ وَ يَقُوْلُوْنَ نُؤْمِنُ بِبَعْضٍ وَّ نَكْفُرُ بِبَعْضٍ وَّ يُرِيْدُوْنَ اَنْ يَّتَّخِذُوْا بَيْنَ ذٰلِكَ سَبِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: Innal-lazeena yakfuroona billaahi wa Rusulihee wa yureedoona añy-yufarriqoo baynal- laahi wa Rusulihee wa yaqooloona nu'minu biba dinw-wa nakfuru biba'diñw-wa yureedoona 'añy-yattakhizoo bayna zaalika sabeelaa.
verses.translation: Beshak jo log Allah aur uske Rasoolon ka inkaar karte hain aur chaahte hain ke woh Allah aur uske Rasoolon ke darmiyaan tafreeq karein aur woh kahte hain: hum ba'z par eemaan laate hain aur ba'z ka inkaar karte hain.aur woh chaahte hain ke uske darmiyaan koyi raah ikhtiyaar karein.

verses.arabic: اُولٰٓٮٕكَ هُمُ الْكٰفِرُوْنَ حَقًّا ۚ وَ اَعْتَدْنَا لِلْكٰفِرِيْنَ عَذَابًا مُّهِينًا
verses.transliteration: Ulaaa'ika humul- kaafiroona haqqaa; wa 'atadnaa lilkaafireena; 'azaabam-muheenaa.
verses.translation: Wahi log haqeeqi kaafir hain aur hum ne kaafiron ke liye ruswa karne waala a'zaab tayyaar kar rakkha hai.

verses.arabic: وَ الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا بِاللّٰهِ وَ رُسُلِهٖ وَ لَمْ يُفَرِّقُوْا بَيْنَ اَحَدٍ مِّنْهُمْ اُولٰٓٮٕكَ سَوْفَ يُؤْتِيْهِمْ اُجُوْرَهُمْ ۭ وَ كَانَ اللّٰهُ غَفُوْرًا رَّحِيْمًا
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena 'aamanoo billaahi wa Rusulihee wa lam yufarriqoo bayna i'ahadim-minhum 'ulaaa'ika sawfa yu'teehim 'ujoorahum; wa kaanal-laahu Ghafoorar- Raheemaa.
verses.translation: Aur jo log Allah aur uske Rasoolon par eemaan laaye, aur unhon ne un mein se kisi ek ke darmiyaan bhi tafreeq nahin ki, wohi log hain jinhein Allah jald unka ajr dega. aur Allah bada bakhshne waala, bahut raham karne waala hai.

verses.arabic: يَسْـَٔلُكَ اَهْلُ الْكِتٰبِ اَنْ تُنَزِّلَ عَلَيْهِمْ كِتٰبًا مِّنَ السَّمَآءِ فَقَدْ سَاَلُوْا مُوْسٰٓى اَكْبَرَ مِنْ ذٰلِكَ فَقَالُوْۤا اَرِنَا اللّٰهَ جَهْرَةً فَاَخَذَتْهُمُ الصّٰعِقَةُ بِظُلْمِهِمْ ۚ ثُمَّ اتَّخَذُوا الْعِجْلَ مِنْۢ بَعْدِ مَا جَآءَتْهُمُ الْبَيِّنٰتُ فَعَفَوْنَا عَنْ ذٰلِكَ ۚ وَ اٰتَيْنَا مُوْسٰى سُلْطٰنًا مُّبِيْنًا
verses.transliteration: Yas'aluka 'Ahlul- Kitaabi 'an tunazzila 'alayhim Kitaabam- minas-samaaa'i faqad sa'aloo Moosaaa 'akbara min zaalika faqaalooo 'arinal-laaha jahratan fa'akhazathumus- şaaʻiqatu bizulmihim; summat-takhazul-'ijla mim ba'di maa jaaa'athumul-bayyinaatu fa'afawnaa 'an zaalik; wa 'aataynaa Moosaa sultaanam-mubeenaa.
verses.translation: (Aye nabi!) ahle kitab aap se taqaaza karte hain ke aap un par aasman se ek kitab utaar laayein, chunaancheh un logon ne Moosa se isse bhi bada taqaaza kiya tha, unhon ne kaha tha: (Aye Moosa!) hamein Allah bilkul aankhon ke saamne dikha, phir unke zulm ki wajah se kadaake ki bijli un par aan padi, phir unke paas khuli nishaaniyaan aa jaane ke ba'd unhon ne bachhde ko ma'bud banaa liya, phir uss par bhi humne unhein mu'aaf kar diya aur humne Moosa ko khula ghalbah a'taa kiya.

verses.arabic: وَ رَفَعْنَا فَوْقَهُمُ الطُّوْرَ بِمِيْثَاقِهِمْ وَ قُلْنَا لَهُمُ ادْخُلُوا الْبَابَ سُجَّدًا وَّ قُلْنَا لَهُمْ لَا تَعْدُوْا فِي السَّبْتِ وَ اَخَذْنَا مِنْهُمْ مِيْثَاقًا غَلِيْظًا
verses.transliteration: Wa rafa'naa fawqahumut-Toora bimeesaaqihim wa qulnaa lahumud-khulul- baaba sujjadañw-wa qulnaa lahum laa ta'doo fis-Sabti wa 'akhaznaa minhum meesaaqan ghaleezaa.
verses.translation: Aur hum ne unse iqraar lene ke liye un par Toor pahaad buland kiya aur humne unse kaha: (Shahar ke) darwaaze mein sajdah karte huye daakhil hojaao.¹ aur humne unse kaha: hafte ke din mein ziyaadati na karo, aur hum ne unse pukhtah a'had liya.
verses.deepMeaning: Nabi Kareem ne farmaya: 'Bani Israyeel ko hukm diya gaya tha ke shahar ke darwaaze mein sajdah karte huye aur (Hittatun) 'Hamaari Taubah' kahte huye daakhil hona, lekin unhon ne iss hukm ko badal diya chunaancheh woh (sajdah ki bajaaye) sureenon ke bal ghaseette huye aur (Habbatun fi sha'ratin) ya'ni 'sate() mein daana. 'Kahte huye shahar mein daakhil huye: (Al-Bukhari, Ahaadeesul Ambiya, Baab:28, Hadees:3403) Allah ke hukm mein taghayyur wa tabaddul ki bena par unpar Allah Ta'ala ki taraf se azaab naazil huwa jo wabaaon aur taawoon ki soorat mein tha.

verses.arabic: فَبِمَا نَقْضِهِمْ مِّیْثَاقَهُمْ وَ كُفْرِهِمْ بِاٰيٰتِ اللّٰهِ وَ قَتْلِهِمُ الْاَنْۢبِيَآءَ بِغَيْرِ حَقٍّ وَّ قَوْلِهِمْ قُلُوْبُنَا غُلْفٌ ۭ بَلْ طَبَعَ اللّٰهُ عَلَيْهَا بِكُفْرِهِمْ فَلَا يُؤْمِنُوْنَ اِلَّا قَلِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: Fabimaa naqdihim meesaaqahum wa kufrihim bi-'Aayaatil- laahi wa qatlihimul- 'Ambiyaaa'a bighayri haqqinw-wa qawlihim quloobuna ghulf; bal taba'al-laahu 'alayhaa bikufrihim falaa yu'minoona 'illaa qaleelaa
verses.translation: Phir (humne un par la'nat ki) isliye ke unhon ne apna a'had toda, Allah ki aayaton ka inkaar kiya, nabyon ko naahaq qatl karte rahe aur unhon ne yeh kaha ke hamaare dil pardon mein hain balke Allah ne unke kufr ki wajah se unke dilon par mohar lagaadi, chunaancheh woh eemaan nahin laate magar thode hi.

verses.arabic: وَّ بِكُفْرِهِمْ وَ قَوْلِهِمْ عَلٰى مَرْيَمَ بُهْتَانًا عَظِيْمًا
verses.transliteration: Wa bikufrihim wa qawlihim 'alaa Maryama buhtaanan 'azeemaa.
verses.translation: .Aur (humne un par la'nat ki) unke kufr ki wajah se aur Maryam par bahut bada bohtaan lagaane ki wajah se.

verses.arabic: وَّ قَوْلِهِمْ اِنَّا قَتَلْنَا الْمَسِيْحَ عِيْسَى ابْنَ مَرْيَمَ رَسُوْلَ اللّٰهِ وَ مَا قَتَلُوْهُ وَ مَا صَلَبُوْهُ وَ لٰكِنْ شُبِّهَ لَهُمْ ۭ وَ اِنَّ الَّذِيْنَ اخْتَلَفُوْا فِيْهِ لَفِيْ شَكٍّ مِّنْهُ ۭ مَا لَهُمْ بِهٖ مِنْ عِلْمٍ اِلَّا اتِّبَاعَ الظَّنِّ ۚ وَ مَا قَتَلُوْهُ يَقِيْنًۢا
verses.transliteration: Wa qawlihim 'innaa qatalnal-maseeha 'Eesab-na-Maryama Rasoolal-laahi wa maa qataloohu wa maa şalaboohu wa laakin shubbiha lahum; wa 'innal-lazeenakh-talafoo feehi lafee shakkim-minh; maa lahum bihee min 'ilmin 'illat-tibaa 'az- zann; wa maa qataloohu yaqeenaa.
verses.translation: Aur unke yeh kahne ki wajah se ke humne Maseeh Isaa Ibne Maryam Allah ke Rasool ko qatl kiya, haalaanke unhon ne na unhen qatl kiya aur na unhen sooli par chaadhaaya balke unhein shubhe mein daal diya gaya aur beshak jinhon ne Eisa ke baare mein ikhtelaaf kiya woh zaroor unke muta'alliq shak mein hain. un logon ke paas unke baare mein koyi I'lm nahin siwaaye gumaan ki pairwi ke, aur unhon ne yaqeenan unhein qatl nahin kiya.

verses.arabic: بَلْ رَفَعَهُ اللّٰهُ اِلَيْهِ ۭ وَ كَانَ اللّٰهُ عَزِيْزًا حَكِيْمًا
verses.transliteration: Bar-rafa'ahul-laahu 'ilayh; wa kaanal-laahu 'Azeezan Hakeemaa.
verses.translation: Balke Allah ne unhen apni taraf uthhaa liya, aur Allah bada zabardast, bahut hikmat waala hai.

verses.arabic: وَ اِنْ مِّنْ اَهْلِ الْكِتٰبِ اِلَّا لَيُؤْمِنَنَّ بِهٖ قَبْلَ مَوْتِهٖ ۚ وَ يَوْمَ الْقِيٰمَةِ يَكُوْنُ عَلَيْهِمْ شَهِيْدًا
verses.transliteration: Wa 'im-min 'Ahlil- Kitaabi 'illaa layu'minanna bihee qabla mawtihee wa Yawmal-Qiyaamati yakoonu 'alayhim shaheedaa.
verses.translation: Aur ahle kitab mein se koyi bhi aisa na bachega jo Eisa par unki maut se pahle eemaan na le aaye aur¹ qiyaamat ke din woh un sab par gawaah honge.
verses.deepMeaning: (Qabla Mautihee) mein zameer ka marja kaun hai? ba'z ke nazdeek Eisa عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام hain, Ya'ni Eisa عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام ke aasmaan se nuzool ke ba'd unki maut se pahle sab ahl-e-kitab un par eemaan le aayenge, ya'ni musalmaan ho jaayeinge aur ba'z nazdeek marja' ahl-e-kitab hain, ya'ni har Yahood aur Eisayi farishta-e- ajal ke zuhoor ke waqt jab uss par yeh haqeeqat khul jaayegi ke Eisa عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام mahaz Allah ke Rasool the, Khudaayi mein unka koyi hissa na tha to uss waqt woh Eisa عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام par eemaan le aata hai. (go maut ke waqt ka eemaan naafe' nahin) aksar mufassireen ke nazdeek pahla mafhoom ziyaadah sahih hai. (Wallahu 'alam)

verses.arabic: فَبِظُلْمٍ مِّنَ الَّذِيْنَ هَادُوْا حَرَّمْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ طَيِّبٰتٍ اُحِلَّتْ لَهُمْ وَ بِصَدِّهِمْ عَنْ سَبِيْلِ اللّٰهِ كَثِيْرًا
verses.transliteration: Fabizulmim-minal- lazeena haadoo harramnaa 'alayhim tayyibaatin uhillat lahum wa bişaddihim 'an sabeelil-laahi kaseeraa.
verses.translation: Phir jo log yahoodi huye, unke zulm ki wajah se aur unke aksar logon ko Allah ki raah se rokne ki wajah se, humne un par kuchh paak cheezen haraam kardin jo pahle unke liye halaal thin.

verses.arabic: وَّ اَخْذِهِمُ الرِّبٰوا وَ قَدْ نُهُوْا عَنْهُ وَ اَكْلِهِمْ اَمْوَالَ النَّاسِ بِالْبَاطِلِ ۭ وَ اَعْتَدْنَا لِلْكٰفِرِيْنَ مِنْهُمْ عَذَابًا اَلِيْمًا
verses.transliteration: Wa 'akhzihimur- ribaa wa qad nuhoo 'anhu wa 'aklihim 'amwaalan-naasi bilbaatil; wa 'a'tadnaa lilkaafireena minhum 'azaaban 'aleemaa.
verses.translation: Aur iss wajah se bhi ke woh sood lete the haalaanke unhen usse mana' kiya gaya tha aur iss wajah se bhi ke woh logon ka maal naahaq khaate the aur hum ne un mein se kaafiron ke liye dardnaak azaab tayyaar kar rakkha hai.

verses.arabic: لٰكِنِ الرّٰسِخُوْنَ فِي الْعِلْمِ مِنْهُمْ وَ الْمُؤْمِنُوْنَ يُؤْمِنُوْنَ بِمَاۤ اُنْزِلَ اِلَيْكَ وَ مَآ اُنْزِلَ مِنْ قَبْلِكَ وَ الْمُقِيْمِيْنَ الصَّلٰوةَ وَ الْمُؤْتُوْنَ الزَّكٰوةَ وَ الْمُؤْمِنُوْنَ بِاللّٰهِ وَ الْيَوْمِ الْاٰخِرِ ۭ اُولٰٓٮٕكَ سَنُؤْتِيْهِمْ اَجْرًا عَظِيْمًا
verses.transliteration: Laakinir-raasikhoona fil-ilmi minhum walmu'minoona yu'minoona bimaaa 'unzila 'ilayka wa maaa 'unzila min qablika walmuqeemeenaş-Şalaata walmu'toonaz-Zakaata walmu'minoona billaahi wal-yawmil-'Aakhir; 'ulaaa'ika sanu'teehim 'ajran 'azeemaa.
verses.translation: Lekin un mein se jo i'lm mein pukhtah aur momin hain woh eenaan laate hain uss par jo aap par naazil kiya gaya aur jo aapse pahle naazil kiya gaya, aur woh namaaz qaayem karte hain aur zakaat dete hain aur Allah aur aakhirat ke din par eemaan rakhte hain, wahi log hain jinhein hum jald bahut badaa ajr denge.

verses.arabic: اِنَّاۤ اَوْحَيْنَاۤ اِلَيْكَ كَمَاۤ اَوْحَيْنَاۤ اِلٰى نُوْحٍ وَّ النَّبِيّٖنَ مِنْۢ بَعْدِهٖ ۚ وَ اَوْحَيْنَاۤ اِلٰٓى اِبْرٰهِيْمَ وَ اِسْمٰعِيْلَ وَ اِسْحٰقَ وَ يَعْقُوْبَ وَ الْاَسْبَاطِ وَ عِيْسٰى وَ اَيُّوْبَ وَ يُوْنُسَ وَ هٰرُوْنَ وَ سُلَيْمٰنَ ۚ وَ اٰتَيْنَا دَاوٗدَ زَبُوْرًا
verses.transliteration: Innaaa 'awhaynaaa 'ilayka kamaaa 'awhaynaaa 'ilaa Noohinw-wan- Nabiyyeena mim ba'dih; wa 'awhaynaaa 'ilaaa 'ibraaheema wa 'Ismaa'eela wa Ishaaqa wa Yaʻqooba wal-'Asbaati wa 'Eesaa wa 'Ayyooba wa Yoonusa wa Haaroona wa Sulaymaan; wa 'aataynaa Daawooda Zabooraa.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) beshak humne aapki taraf wahi'¹ ki jaise humne Nooh aur unke ba'd doosre Nabyon ki taraf wahi' ki, aur humne Ibraheem, Ismaay'eel, Ishaaq, Ya'qoob aur unki aulaad aur Ei'saa, Ayyub, Yunus, Haaroon aur Sulaimaan ki taraf wahi' ki aur hum ne Dawood ko zuboor a'taa ki.
verses.deepMeaning: Rasoolullah ﷺ se poochha gaya aap par wahi kaise naazil hoti hai? to aapne farmaya: 'Wahi kabhi to mujh par ghanti ki aawaaz ki maanind naazil hoti hai. Nuzool-e-wahi ki yeh kaifiyat meri tabia't par bahut giran hoti hai aur phir jo kuchh wahi mein kaha jaata hai use mein yaad kar leta hoon to woh kaifiyat khatm ho jaati hai aur kabhi farishtah insaan ki soorat mein mere paas aata hai aur mujh se guftagu karta hai aur jo kuchh woh kahta hai main use yaad kar leta hoon.' Aayeshah رضي الله عنها farmaati hain: 'Main ne sakht sardiyon mein Nabi ﷺ par wahi naazil hote dekhi, chunaancheh jab wahi munqata' ho jaati to aapki peshaani se paseena bahne lagta.' (Sahih Bukhari, Bada il wahi, Baab:1, Hadees:2)

verses.arabic: وَ رُسُلًا قَدْ قَصَصْنٰهُمْ عَلَيْكَ مِنْ قَبْلُ وَ رُسُلًا لَّمْ نَقْصُصْهُمْ عَلَيْكَ ۚ وَ كَلَّمَ اللّٰهُ مُوْسٰى تَكْلِيْمًا
verses.transliteration: Wa Rusulan qad qaşaşnaahum 'alayka min qablu wa Rusulal- lam naqşuşhum 'alayk; wa kallamal-laahu Moosaa takleemaa.
verses.translation: Aur humne kayi Rasool bheje, isse pahle hum unka haal aapke saamne bayaan karchuke hian. aur kayi Rasool aise hain ke un ka haal humne aapke saamne bayaan nahin kiya. aur Allah ne Moosa se (khaas taur par) kalaam kiya.

verses.arabic: رُّسُلًا مُّبَشِّرِيْنَ وَ مُنْذِرِيْنَ لِئَلَّا يَكُوْنَ لِلنَّاسِ عَلَى اللّٰهِ حُجَّةٌۢ بَعْدَ الرُّسُلِ ۭ وَ كَانَ اللّٰهُ عَزِيْزًا حَكِيْمًا
verses.transliteration: Rusulam- mubashshireena wa munzireena li'allaa yakoona linnaasi 'alal- laahi hujjatum ba'dar- Rusul; wa kaanal-laahu 'Azeezan Hakeemaa.
verses.translation: Aur khushkhabri dene waale aur daraane waale Rasool bheje taake Rasoolon ke ba'd logon ke liye Allah ko ilzaam dene ki koyi gunjaayish na rahe. aur Allah bada zabardast, badi hikmat waala hai.

verses.arabic: لٰكِنِ اللّٰهُ يَشْهَدُ بِمَاۤ اَنْزَلَ اِلَيْكَ ۙ اَنْزَلَهٗ بِعِلْمِهٖ ۚ وَ الْمَلٰٓىٕكَةُ يَشْهَدُوْنَ ۭ وَ كَفٰى بِاللّٰهِ شَهِيْدًا
verses.transliteration: Laakinil-laahu yashhadu bimaaa 'anzala 'ilayka 'anzalahoo biʻilmihee walmalaaa'ikatu yashhadoon; wa kafaa billaahi Shaheedaa.
verses.translation: Lekin Allah ne aap par jo naazil kiya hai, woh uski baabat gawaahi deta hai ke usne apne i'lm ke saath naazil kiya hai aur farishte bhi gawaahi dete hain, aur Allah bataur gawaah kaafi hai.

verses.arabic: اِنَّ الَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا وَ صَدُّوْا عَنْ سَبِيْلِ اللّٰهِ قَدْ ضَلُّوْا ضَلٰلًۢا بَعِيْدًا
verses.transliteration: 'Innal-lazeena kafaroo wa şaddoo 'an sabeelil-laahi qad dalloo dalaalam-ba'eedaa.
verses.translation: Beshak jin logon ne kufr kiya aur logon ko Allah ki raah se roka, yaqeenan woh door ki gumraahi mein jaa pade hain.

verses.arabic: اِنَّ الَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا وَ ظَلَمُوْا لَمْ يَكُنِ اللّٰهُ لِيَغْفِرَ لَهُمْ وَ لَا لِيَهْدِيَهُمْ طَرِيْقًا
verses.transliteration: 'Innal-lazeena kafaroo wa zalamoo lam yakunil-laahu liyaghfira lahum wa laa liyahdiyahum tareeqaa.
verses.translation: Beshak jin logon ne kufr kiya aur zulm kiya, Allah ke shaayaan nahin ke woh unhein bakhsh de aur na yeh shaayaan hai ke woh unhein seedhi raah dikhaaye.

verses.arabic: اِلَّا طَرِيْقَ جَهَنَّمَ خَالِدِيْنَ فِيْهَاۤ اَبَدًا ۚ وَ كَانَ ذٰلِكَ عَلَى اللّٰهِ يَسِيْرًا
verses.transliteration: Illaa tareeqa jahannama khaalideena feehaaa 'abadaa; wa kaana zaalika 'alal-laahi yaseeraa.
verses.translation: Magar woh unhein jahannam ka raastah dikhaayega jis mein woh hameshah rahenge, aur yeh Allah ke liye bahut aasaan hai.

verses.arabic: يٰٓاَيُّهَا النَّاسُ قَدْ جَآءَكُمُ الرَّسُوْلُ بِالْحَقِّ مِنْ رَّبِّكُمْ فَاٰمِنُوْا خَيْرًا لَّكُمْ ۚ وَ اِنْ تَكْفُرُوْا فَاِنَّ لِلّٰهِ مَا فِي السَّمٰوٰتِ وَ الْاَرْضِ ۭ وَ كَانَ اللّٰهُ عَلِيْمًا حَكِيْمًا
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhan- naasu qad jaaa'akumur- Rasoolu bilhaqqi mir- Rabbikum fa'aaminoo khayral-lakum; wa 'in takfuroo fa'inna lillaahi maa fis-samaawaati wal 'ard; wa kaanal-laahu 'Aleeman hakeemaa.
verses.translation: Aye logo! yaqeenan yeh Rasool tumhaare rab ki taraf se haq le kar tumhaare paas aaya hai, lehaaza tum eemaan laao, yeh tumhaare liye behtar hoga, aur agar tum kufr karoge to aasmaanon aur zameen mein jo kuchh hai, Allah hi ke liye hai, aur Allah khoob jaanne waala, khoob hikmat waala hai.

verses.arabic: يٰٓاَهْلَ الْكِتٰبِ لَا تَغْلُوْا فِيْ دِيْنِكُمْ وَ لَا تَقُوْلُوْا عَلَى اللّٰهِ اِلَّا الْحَقَّ ۭ اِنَّمَا الْمَسِيْحُ عِيْسَى ابْنُ مَرْيَمَ رَسُوْلُ اللّٰهِ وَ كَلِمَتُهٗٓ اَلْقٰىهَا اِلٰى مَرْيَمَ وَ رُوْحٌ مِّنْهُ ۚ فَاٰمِنُوْا بِاللّٰهِ وَ رُسُلِهٖ ۭ وَ لَا تَقُوْلُوْا ثَلٰثَةٌ ۭ اِنْتَهُوْا خَيْرًا لَّكُمْ ۭ اِنَّمَا اللّٰهُ اِلٰهٌ وَّاحِدٌ ۭ سُبْحٰنَهٗٓ اَنْ يَّكُوْنَ لَهٗ وَلَدٌ ۭ لَهٗ مَا فِي السَّمٰوٰتِ وَ مَا فِي الْاَرْضِ ۭ وَ كَفٰى بِاللّٰهِ وَكِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'Ahlal-Kitaabi laa taghloo fee deenikum wa laa taqooloo 'alal- laahi 'illal-haqq; 'innamal Maseehu 'Eesab-nu- Maryama Rasoolul-laahi wa Kalimatuhooo 'alqaahaaa 'ilaa Maryama wa roohum-minhu fa 'aaminoo billaahi wa Rusulihee wa laa taqooloo salaasah; 'intahoo khayral-lakum; 'innamal-laahu 'Ilaahuñw-Waahid, Subhaanahooo 'añy- yakoona lahoo walad; lahoo maa fis- samaawaati wa maa fil- ard; wa kafaa billaahi Wakeelaa.
verses.translation: Aye ahle kitab! apne deen ke baare mein had se na guzar jaao aur Allah ke baare mein haq baat ke siwa kuchh na kaho, beshak Maseeh Eisa Ibne Maryam to Allah ka Rasool aur uska kalimah hi hai jise usne Maryam ki taraf daala, aur woh uski taraf se ek rooh hai¹ chunaancheh tum Allah aur uske Rasoolon par eemaan laao aur yeh na kaho ke ma'bood teen hain. usse baaz aa jaao yeh tumhaare liye behtar hai. beshak Allah hi waahid ma'bood hai, woh uss (Amr) se paak hai ke uski koyi aulaad ho,¹ aasmaanon aur zameen mein jo kuchh hai usi ka hai, aur Allah bataur kaar saaz kaafi hai.
verses.deepMeaning: 1️⃣ (Ruhullah) mein Baitullah, Rasoolullah aur Abdullah ki taraf ism-e-muzaaf Allah Ta'ala ki makhlooq se ta'alluq rakhta hai jin mein Allah ki taraf izaafat ka matlab, uss cheez ka nigaahon mein mohtaram- o-mukarram hona hai. lekin jab ism-e-muzaaf Allah ki makhlooq ke bajaaye uski sifat ho masalan: Ilmullah, Kalaamullah aur Zaatullah to yeh Allah Ta'ala ki sifaat hain. sahaaba kiraam رضي الله عنها tabayeen, Ulmaay-e-mutaqaddimeen رحمه الله aur aimma mujtahideen رحمه الله ke nazdeek murakkab izaafi (muzaaf aur muzaaf ilaih) mein do ismon ke darmiyaan tameez qaayem karne ka yeh qaayedah hai jab muzaaf ilaih Allah Ta'ala ka ism ho aur muzaaf koyi aur ism ho. 2️⃣ Nabi Kareem ne ﷺ farmaya: jis kisi ne gawaahi di ke Allah ke siwa koyi ma'bood nahin, woh waahid la shareek hai aur beshak Muhammad ﷺ uske bande aur Rasool hain aur gawaahi di ke Eisa عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام bhi Allah ke bande aur Rasool aur uska ek kalimah hain jo usne Maryam ki taraf daala tha aur usi ki taraf se (Paida ki gayi) ek Rooh hain aur jannat aur dozakh barhaq hain, to Allah Ta'ala usko jannat mein daakhil kardega khaah uske amal kuchh bhi hon (chaahe saza bhugatne ke ba'd jannat mein jaaye.') (Al-Bukhar, Ahaadeesul Ambiya, Baab:47, Hadees:3435)

verses.arabic: لَنْ يَّسْتَنْكِفَ الْمَسِيْحُ اَنْ يَّكُوْنَ عَبْدًا لِّلّٰهِ وَ لَا الْمَلٰٓىٕكَةُ الْمُقَرَّبُوْنَ ۚ وَ مَنْ يَّسْتَنْكِفْ عَنْ عِبَادَتِهٖ وَ يَسْتَكْبِرْ فَسَيَحْشُرُهُمْ اِلَيْهِ جَمِيْعًا
verses.transliteration: Lañy-yastankifal- Maseehu 'any- yakoona 'abdal-lillaahi wa lalmalaaa'ikatul- muqarraboon; wa mañy- yastankif 'an 'ibaadatihee wa yastakbir fasayahshuruhum 'ilayhi jamee'aa.
verses.translation: Maseeh (Eisa Ibne Maryam) ko Allah ka bandah hone mein koyi 'aar nahin aur na muqarrab farishton ko 'aar hai, aur jo koyi Allah ki i'baadat ko 'aar khayaal kare aur takabbur kare, to Allah jald un sab ko apni taraf jama karega.

verses.arabic: فَاَمَّا الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا وَ عَمِلُوا الصّٰلِحٰتِ فَيُوَفِّيْهِمْ اُجُوْرَهُمْ وَ يَزِيْدُهُمْ مِّنْ فَضْلِهٖ ۭ وَ اَمَّا الَّذِيْنَ اسْتَنْكفُوْا وَ اسْتَكْبَرُوْا فَيُعَذِّبُهُمْ عَذَابًا اَلِيْمًا وَّ لَا يَجِدُوْنَ لَهُمْ مِّنْ دُوْنِ اللّٰهِ وَلِيًّا وَّ لَا نَصِيْرًا
verses.transliteration: Fa'ammal-lazeena 'aamanoo wa 'amilus- saalihaati fayuwaffeehim 'ujoorahum wa yazeeduhum min fadlihee wa 'ammal-lazeenas- tankafoo wastakbaroo fa yu'azzibuhum 'azaaban 'aleemanw-wa laa yajidoona lahum min doonil-laahi waliyyanw-wa laa naseeraa.
verses.translation: Phir jo log eemaan laaye aur unhon ne nek amal kiye to Allah unhein unke pure ajr dega aur unhein apne fazl se ziyaadah a'taa karega, aur jin logon ne Allah ki i'baadat ko 'aar khayaal kiya aur takabbur kiya to woh unhein bahut dardnaak 'azaab dega aur woh Allah ke siwa apne liye koyi himaayati aur koyi madadgaar nahin paayenge.

verses.arabic: يٰٓاَيُّهَا النَّاسُ قَدْ جَآءَكُمْ بُرْهَانٌ مِّنْ رَّبِّكُمْ وَ اَنْزَلْنَآ اِلَيْكُمْ نُوْرًا مُّبِيْنًا
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhan-naasu qad jaaa'akum burhaanum-mir-Rabbikum wa'anzalnaaa 'ilaykum Nooram-Mubeenaa.
verses.translation: Aye logo! tumhaare rab ki taraf se tumhaare paas ek daleel aagayi hai, aur hum ne tumhaari taraf ek waazeh Noor naazil kiya hai.

verses.arabic: فَاَمَّا الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا بِاللّٰهِ وَ اعْتَصَمُوْا بِهٖ فَسَيُدْخِلُهُمْ فِيْ رَحْمَةٍ مِّنْهُ وَ فَضْلٍ وَ يَهْدِيْهِمْ اِلَيْهِ صِرَاطًا مُّسْتَقِيْمًا
verses.transliteration: Fa ammal lazeena aamanoo billaahi wa'tasamoo bihee fasayud khiluhum fee rahmatim minh; wa fadlinw wa yahdeehim ilaihi siraatam mustaqeema
verses.translation: Phir jo log Allah par eemaan le aaye aur uske deen ko mazbooti se pakad liya to woh zaroor unhein apni rahmat aur fazl mein daakhil karega aur unhein apni taraf (pahunchne ke liye) seedha raastah dekhaayega.

verses.arabic: يَسْتَفْتُوْنَكَ ۖ قُلِ اللّٰهُ يُفْتِيْكُمْ فِي الْكَلٰلَةِ ۚ اِنِ امْرُؤٌا هَلَكَ لَيْسَ لَهٗ وَلَدٌ وَّ لَهٗۤ اُخْتٌ فَلَهَا نِصْفُ مَا تَرَكَ ۚ وَ هُوَ يَرِثُهَاۤ اِنْ لَّمْ يَكُنْ لَّهَا وَلَدٌ ۚ فَاِنْ كَانَتَا اثْنَتَيْنِ فَلَهُمَا الثُّلُثٰنِ مِمَّا تَرَكَ ۚ وَ اِنْ كَانُوْۤا اِخْوَةً رِّجَالًا وَّ نِسَآءً فَلِلذَّكَرِ مِثْلُ حَظِّ الْاُنْثَيَيْنِ ۭ يُبَيِّنُ اللّٰهُ لَكُمْ اَنْ تَضِلُّوْا ۭ وَ اللّٰهُ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: Yastaftoonaka qulil- laahu yafteekum fil- kalaalah; 'inim-ru'un halaka laysa lahoo waladuñw-wa lahooo 'ukhtun falahaa nişfu maa tarak; wa huwa yarisuhaaa 'il-lam yakul- lahaa walad; fa'in kaanatas-natayni falahumas-sulusaani mimmaa tarak; wa 'in kaanooo 'ikhwatar- rijaalan-w-wa nisaaa'an faliz-zakari mislu hazzil- 'unsayayn; yubayyinul- laahu lakum 'an tadilloo; wallaahu bikulli shay'in 'Aleem.
verses.translation: (Aye nabi!) log Aap se fatwa poochhte hain, kah deejiye: Allah 'kalaalah) ke baare mein hukm deta hai, agar koyi shakhs mar jaaye jiski aulaad na ho aur uski ek bahan ho to uske liye bhaai ke chhode huye maal ka aadha hissa hai aur agar bahan ki aulaad na ho, to uska bhaai uska waaris hoga, phir agar bahnein do (yaa do se ziyaadah) hon to unke liye bhaai ke chhode huye maal ka do tehaayi hai aur agar kayi bhaai bahan, mard aur a'uratein (waaris) hon to mard ka hissa do auraton ke hisse ke baraabar hoga, Allah tumhaare liye wazaahat se bayaan karta hai taake tum gumraah na ho jaao, aur Allah har cheez ko khoob jaanne waala hai.

verses.arabic: يٰٓاَيُّهَا الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْۤا اَوْفُوْا بِالْعُقُوْدِ ۗ اُحِلَّتْ لَكُمْ بَهِيْمَةُ الْاَنْعَامِ اِلَّا مَا يُتْلٰى عَلَيْكُمْ غَيْرَ مُحِلِّى الصَّيْدِ وَ اَنْتُمْ حُرُمٌ ۗ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ يَحْكُمُ مَا يُرِيْدُ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhal-lazeena 'aamanoo 'awfoo bil'uqood; 'uhillat lakum baheematul-'an 'illaa maa yutlaa 'alaykum ghayra 'aami muhillis-saydi wa 'antum hurum; 'innal-laaha yahkumu maa yureed.
verses.translation: Aye logo jo eemaan laaye ho! muaa'hide pure kiya karo, tumhaare liye chaupaaye maweshi halaal kiye gaye hain, siwaaye unke jinke naam tumhein padh kar suna diye jaayenge, jab tum ehraam ki haalat mein ho to shikaar ko halaal na jaano, beshak Allah jo chaahta hai, faislah karta hai.

verses.arabic: يٰٓاَيُّهَا الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا لَا تُحِلُّوْا شَعَآىٕرَ اللّٰهِ وَ لَا الشَّهْرَ الْحَرَامَ وَ لَا الْهَدْيَ وَ لَا الْقَلَآىٕدَ وَ لَآ آٰۤمِّيْنَ الْبَيْتَ الْحَرَامَ يَبْتَغُوْنَ فَضْلًا مِّنْ رَّبِّهِمْ وَ رِضْوَانًا ۚ وَ اِذَا حَلَلْتُمْ فَاصْطَادُوْا ۚ وَ لَا يَجْرِمَنَّكُمْ شَنَاٰنُ قَوْمٍ اَنْ صَدُّوْكُمْ عَنِ الْمَسْجِدِ الْحَرَامِ اَنْ تَعْتَدُوْا ۘ وَ تَعَاوَنُوْا عَلَى الْبِرِّ وَ التَّقْوٰى ۖ وَ لَا تَعَاوَنُوْا عَلَى الْاِثْمِ وَ الْعُدْوَانِ ۖ وَ اتَّقُوا اللّٰهَ ۖ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ شَدِيْدُ الْعِقَابِ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhal-lazeena 'aamanoo laa tuhilloo sha'aaa'iral-laahi wa lash-Shahral-Haraama wa lal-hadya wa lal- qalaaa'ida wa laaa 'aaammeenal-Baytal- Haraama yabtaghoona fadlam-mir-Rabbihim wa ridwaanaa; wa 'izaa halaltum fastaadoo; wa laa yajrimannakum shana'aanu qawmin 'an şaddookum 'anil- Masjidil-Haraami 'an taʻtadoo; wa ta'aawanoo 'alal-birri wattaqwaa; wa laa ta'aawanoo 'alal- 'ismi wal'udwaan; wattaqul-laah; 'innal- laaha shadeedul-'iqaab.
verses.translation: Aye logo jo eemaan laaye ho! Allah ki nishaaniyon ki be hurmati na karo, aur na adab waale maheenon ki, na haram mein qurbaan hone waale aur na patte pahnaaye jaanwaron ki aur na baitul haraam ka qasd karne waalon ki, woh apne rab ka fazl aur uski raza talaash karte hain aur jab tum ehraam khol do to shikaar kar sakte ho, aur kisi qaum ki dushmani tumhein sirf isliye unse ziyaadati karne par aamaadah na kare ke unhon ne tumhein masjid-e-haraam se rok diya tha, aur tum neki aur parhez gaari ke kaamon mein ek doosre ki madad karo, aur gunaah aur ziyaadati ke kaamon mein baaham madad na karo, aur Allah se daro, beshak Allah sakht a'zaab waala hai.

verses.arabic: حُرِّمَتْ عَلَيْكُمُ الْمَيْتَةُ وَ الدَّمُ وَ لَحْمُ الْخِنْزِيْرِ وَ مَاۤ اُهِلَّ لِغَيْرِ اللّٰهِ بِهٖ وَ الْمُنْخَنِقَةُ وَ الْمَوْقُوْذَةُ وَ الْمُتَرَدِّيَةُ وَ النَّطِيْحَةُ وَ مَاۤ اَكَلَ السَّبُعُ اِلَّا مَا ذَكَّيْتُمْ وَ مَا ذُبِحَ عَلَى النُّصُبِ وَ اَنْ تَسْتَقْسِمُوْا بِالْاَزْلَامِ ۭ ذٰلِكُمْ فِسْقٌ ۭ اَلْيَوْمَ يَىٕسَ الَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا مِنْ دِيْنِكُمْ فَلَا تَخْشَوْهُمْ وَ اخْشَوْنِ ۭ اَلْيَوْمَ اَكْمَلْتُ لَكُمْ دِيْنَكُمْ وَ اَتْمَمْتُ عَلَيْكُمْ نِعْمَتِيْ وَ رَضِيْتُ لَكُمُ الْاِسْلَامَ دِيْنًا ۭ فَمَنِ اضْطُرَّ فِيْ مَخْمَصَةٍ غَيْرَ مُتَجَانِفٍ لِّاِثْمٍ فَاِنَّ اللّٰهَ غَفُوْرٌ رَّحِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: Hurrimat 'alaykumul- maytatu waddamu wa lahmul-khinzeeri wa maaa 'uhilla lighyril- laahi bihee walmunkhaniqatu walmawqoozatu walmutaraddiyatu wannateehatu wa maaa 'akalas-sabu'u illaa maa zakkaytum wa maa zubiņa 'alan-nuşubi wa 'an tastaqsimoo bil'azlaam; zaalikum fisq; 'alyawma ya'isal- lazeena kafaroo min deenikum falaa takhshawhum wakhshawn; 'alyawma 'akmaltu lakum deenakum wa 'atmamtu 'alaykum ni'matee wa radeetu lakumul- 'Islaama deenaa; famanid-turra fee makhmaşatin ghayra mutajaanifil-liismin fa 'innal-laaha Ghafoorur Raheem.
verses.translation: Tumhaare liye haraam kiye gaye hain murdah jaanwar, khoon, suwar ka ghosht aur jis par Allah ke siwa kisi aur ka naam pukaara jaaye aur gala ghut kar marne waala, chot se marne waala, oupar se gir kar marne waala, seeng lag kar marne waala aur woh jaanwar bhi jise darinde khaa jaayein, siwaaye uske jise tum zabah karlo, aur jo aastaanon¹ par zabah kiya jaaye aur yeh ke tum faal ke teeron se qismat ma'loom karo, yeh sab gunaah (ke kaam hain). aaj woh log naa ummeed ho gaye jinhon ne tumhaare deen ka inkaar kiya, lehaaza tum unse na daro, aur mujh hi se daro, aaj main ne tumhaare liye tumhaara deen mukammal kardiya aur tum par apni ne'mat poori kardi, aur tumhaare liye islam ko deen ke taur par pasnad kiya, phir jo shakhs bhook se be bas ho jaaye jab ke woh gunaah par maayel hone waala na ho, to yaqeenan Allah bahut bakhshne waala, nihaayat raham karne waala hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Aastaanon se muraad woh jaghein (thaan) hain jo buton ke paas hoti thin aur jahaan buton ki khushnoodi ke liye jaanwar zabah kiye jaate the. Ya'ni yeh وَمَا أُهِنَّ بِهِ لِغَيْرِ اللَّهِ' hi ki ek shakl thi. Isse ma'loom huwa ke aastaanon, maqbaron aur dargaahon par jahaan log talab-e-haajaat ke liye jaate hain aur wahaan madfoon afraad ki khushnoodi ke liye jaanwar zabah karte hain ya paki huyi degein taqseem karte hain, unka khaana haraam hai.

verses.arabic: يَسْـَٔلُوْنَكَ مَاذَآ اُحِلَّ لَهُمْ ۭ قُلْ اُحِلَّ لَكُمُ الطَّيِّبٰتُ ۙ وَ مَا عَلَّمْتُمْ مِّنَ الْجَوَارِحِ مُكَلِّبِيْنَ تُعَلِّمُوْنَهُنَّ مِمَّا عَلَّمَكُمُ اللّٰهُ ۚ فَكُلُوْا مِمَّاۤ اَمْسَكْنَ عَلَيْكُمْ وَ اذْكُرُوا اسْمَ اللّٰهِ عَلَيْهِ ۤ وَ اتَّقُوا اللّٰهَ ۭ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ سَرِيْعُ الْحِسَابِ
verses.transliteration: Yas'aloonaka maazaaa 'uhilla lahum; qul 'uhilla lakumut-tayyibaatu wa maa 'allamtum minal- jawaarihi mukallibeena tu 'allimoonahunna mimmaa 'allamakumul- laahu fakuloo mimmaaa 'amsakna 'alaykum wazkurus-mal-laahi 'alayh; wattaqul-laah; 'innal-laaha saree'ul hisaab
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) log aapse poochhte hain ke un ke liye kiya kiya cheezein halaal ki gayi hain? kah deejiye: tumhaare liye tamaam paakeezah cheezein halaal ki gayi hain aur un shikaari jaanwaron ka kiya huwa shikaar, jinhein tum sadha lete ho, Allah ne tumhein jo sikhaaya hai uske mutaabiq tum unhein sikhaate ho, to woh jis shikaar ko tumhaare liye pakad rakkhein, uss par Allah ka naam padho aur uss mein se khaao, aur Allah se darte raho, beshak Allah jald hisaab lene waala hai.

verses.arabic: اَلْيَوْمَ اُحِلَّ لَكُمُ الطَّيِّبٰتُ ۖ وَ طَعَامُ الَّذِيْنَ اُوْتُوا الْكِتٰبَ حِلٌّ لَّكُمْ وَ طَعَامُكُمْ حِلٌّ لَّهُمْ ۭ وَ الْمُحْصَنٰتُ مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنٰتِ وَ الْمُحْصَنٰتُ مِنَ الَّذِيْنَ اُوْتُوا الْكِتٰبَ مِنْ قَبْلِكُمْ اِذَآ اٰتَيْتُمُوْهُنَّ اُجُوْرَهُنَّ مُحْصِنِيْنَ غَيْرَ مُسٰفِحِيْنَ وَ لَا مُتَّخِذِيْۤ اَخْدَانٍ ۗ وَ مَنْ يَّكْفُرْ بِالْاِيْمَانِ فَقَدْ حَبِطَ عَمَلُهٗ وَ هُوَ فِي الْاٰخِرَةِ مِنَ الْخٰسِرِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Alyawma 'uhilla wa lakumut-tayyibaatu ta'aamul-lazeena 'ootul- Kitaaba hillul-lakum wa ta'aamukum hillul-lahum wal-muhsanaatu minal- mu'minaati wal- عرض muhsanaatu minal- lazeena 'ootul-Kitaaba min qablikum 'izaaa 'aataytumoohunna 'ujoorahunna muhsineena ghayra muşaafiheena wa laa muttakhizeee 'akhdaan; wa mañy-yakfur bil'eemaani faqad habita 'amaluhoo wa huwa fil- 'Aaakhirati minal- khaasireen.
verses.translation: Aaj tumhaare liye paakeezah cheezen halaal ki gayi hain aur ahle kitab ka khaana tumhaare liye halaal hai, aur tumhaara khaana unke liye halaal hai, aur tumhaare liye paak daaman musalmaan auratein, aur un logon ki paak daaman auratein halaal hain jinhein tumse pahle kitab di gayi jabke tum unhein unke mahar de do, neez unhein nikah ki qaid mein laane waale bano na ke badkaari karne waale aur na chhupi aashnaayi rakhne waale, aur jo eemaan se inkaar karega to uska amal yaqeenan barbaad ho gaya aur woh aakhirat mein nuqsaan uthhane waalon mein se hoga.

verses.arabic: يٰٓاَيُّهَا الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا اِذَا قُمْتُمْ اِلَى الصَّلٰوةِ فَاغْسِلُوْا وُجُوْهَكُمْ وَ اَيْدِيَكُمْ اِلَى الْمَرَافِقِ وَ امْسَحُوْا بِرُءُوْسِكُمْ وَ اَرْجُلَكُمْ اِلَى الْكَعْبَيْنِ ۚ وَ اِنْ كُنْتُمْ جُنُبًا فَاطَّهَّرُوْا ۚ وَ اِنْ كُنْتُمْ مَّرْضٰٓى اَوْ عَلٰى سَفَرٍ اَوْ جَآءَ اَحَدٌ مِّنْكُمْ مِّنَ الْغَآىٕطِ اَوْ لٰمَسْتُمُ النِّسَآءَ فَلَمْ تَجِدُوْا مَآءً فَتَيَمَّمُوْا صَعِيْدًا طَيِّبًا فَامْسَحُوْا بِوُجُوْهِكُمْ وَ اَيْدِيْكُمْ مِّنْهُ ۭ مَا يُرِيْدُ اللّٰهُ لِيَجْعَلَ عَلَيْكُمْ مِّنْ حَرَجٍ وَّ لٰكِنْ يُرِيْدُ لِيُطَهِّرَكُمْ وَ لِيُتِمَّ نِعْمَتَهٗ عَلَيْكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَشْكُرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhal-lazeena 'aamanooo 'izaa qumtum ilaş-Şalaati faghsiloo wujoohakum wa 'Aydiyakum 'ilal-maraafiqi wamsahoo biru'oosikum wa 'arjulakum 'ilal- ka'bayn; wa'in kuntum junuban fattahharoo; wa'in kuntum mardaaa 'aw 'alaa safarin 'aw jaaa'a ahadum-minkum minal-ghaaa'iti 'aw laamastumun-nisaaa'a falam tajidoo maaa'an fatayammamoo şa'eedan tayyiban famsahoo biwujoohikum wa 'aydeekum-minh; maa yureedul-laahu liyaj'ala 'alaykum min harajiñw- wa laakiny-yureedu liyutahhirakum wa liyutimma ni'matahoo 'alaykum la'allakum tashkuroon.
verses.translation: Aye logo jo eemaan laaye ho! jab tum namaaz ke liye uthho to apne chehre aur kuhniyon tak apne haath dholo¹ aur apne saron ka masah karlo aur apne paaoun takhnon tak (dholo) aur agar tum janaabat ki haalat mein ho to ghusl karlo, aur agar tum bimaar ho ya safar ki haalat mein ho ya tum mein se koyi zaroori haajat se (faarigh ho kar) aaya ho yaa tumne auraton se ham bistari ki ho, phir tum paani na paao to paak mitti se tayammum karlo,² phir use apne chehre aur haathon par mal lo, Allah nahin chaahta ke tumhein tangi mein daale balke woh chaahta hai ke tumhein paak karde, aur tum par apni ne'mat puri kare taake tum shukr karo.
verses.deepMeaning: 1️⃣ Iss mein wazu karne ka hukm diya gaya hai, qiyaamat ke din ummat-e-Muhammadia ﷺ ki yeh imtiyaazi khusoosiyat hogi ke uske a'azaa-e-wazu chamkenge jaisa ke Nabi ﷺ ne farmaya: 'Meri ummat ke log qiyaamat ke din bolaaye jaayeinge jabke wazu ke nishanaat ki wajah se unki peshaaniyaan aur haath paaun chamakte honge to tum mein se jo koyi apni chamak badhaane ki istetaa'at rakhta ho, to woh badhaaye (wazu achchhe tareeqe se kare aur a'azaa ko qadr-e-ziyaadah dhoye.') (Al-Bukhari, Al-wazu, baab:3, adees:136 2️⃣Tayammum ka tareeqa: apne donon haathon ko zameen par maaren phir donon haathon se mitti jhaad kar baayein haath ki hatheli ko daayein haath ki pusht par, phir daayein ki hatheli ko baayein ki pusht par pherein, phir donon ko apne chehre par mal fein. Ek martabah iss tarah karlena kaafi hai. (Sahih Al-Bukhari, At-taymmum, baab:8, Hadees:347) neez dekhein suratun Nisa:4/43.)

verses.arabic: وَ اذْكُرُوْا نِعْمَتَ اللّٰهِ عَلَيْكُمْ وَ مِيْثَاقَهُ الَّذِيْ وَاثَقَكُمْ بِهٖۤ اِذْ قُلْتُمْ سَمِعْنَا وَ اَطَعْنَا ۚ وَ اتَّقُوا اللّٰهَ ۚ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ عَلِيْمٌۢ بِذَاتِ الصُّدُوْرِ
verses.transliteration: Wazkuroo ni'matal- laahi 'alaykum wa meesaaqahul-lazee waasagakum biheee 'iz qultum sami'naa wa 'ata'naa wattaqul-laah; 'innal-laaha 'aleemum- bizaatiş-şudoor.
verses.translation: Aur tum par Allah ki jo ne'mat huyi use yaad rakkho! aur woh a'had bhi yaad rakkho jo tum ne uske saath baandha, jab tumne kaha ke humne suna aur etaa'at ki aur Allah se daro, beshak Allah seenon ke raaz khoob jaanta hai.

verses.arabic: يٰٓاَيُّهَا الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا كُوْنُوْا قَوَّامِيْنَ لِلّٰهِ شُهَدَآءَ بِالْقِسْطِ ۖ وَ لَا يَجْرِمَنَّكُمْ شَنَاٰنُ قَوْمٍ عَلٰٓى اَلَّا تَعْدِلُوْا ۚ اِعْدِلُوْا ۫ هُوَ اَقْرَبُ لِلتَّقْوٰى ۖ وَ اتَّقُوا اللّٰهَ ۭ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ خَبِيْرٌۢ بِمَا تَعْمَلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo koonoo qawwaameena lillaahi shuhadaaa'a bilqisti wa laa yajrimannakum shanaaa'aanu qawmin 'alaaa allaa ta'diloo; i'diloo huwa aqrabu lit taqwaa wattaqul laah; innal laaha khabeerum bimaa ta'maloon
verses.translation: Aye logo jo eemaan laaye ho! tum Allah ke liye (haq par) qaayem rahne waale aur insaaf ki gawaahi dene waale bano, aur kisi qaum ki dushmani tumhen iss baat par aamaadah na kare ke tum adl na karo, adl karo yahi, baat taqwa ke ziyaadah qareeb hai, aur Allah se daro, beshak tum jo amal karte ho Allah usse khoob aagaah hai.

verses.arabic: وَعَدَ اللّٰهُ الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا وَ عَمِلُوا الصّٰلِحٰتِ ۙ لَهُمْ مَّغْفِرَةٌ وَّ اَجْرٌ عَظِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa'adal laahul lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati lahum maghfiratunw wa ajrun 'azeem
verses.translation: Allah ne un logon se wa'dah kiya jo eemaan laaye aur unhon ne nek amal kiye, unke liye bakhshish aur bahut bada ajr hai.

verses.arabic: وَ الَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا وَ كَذَّبُوْا بِاٰيٰتِنَآ اُولٰٓىٕكَ اَصْحٰبُ الْجَحِيْمِ
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena kafaroo wa kazzaboo bi aayaatinaa ulaaa'ika ashaabul jaheem
verses.translation: Aur jin logon ne kufr kiya aur hamaari aayaton ko jhutlaaya, wohi log dozakhi hain.

verses.arabic: يٰٓاَيُّهَا الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوُا اذْكُرُوْا نِعْمَتَ اللّٰهِ عَلَيْكُمْ اِذْ هَمَّ قَوْمٌ اَنْ يَّبْسُطُوْۤا اِلَيْكُمْ اَيْدِيَهُمْ فَكَفَّ اَيْدِيَهُمْ عَنْكُمْ ۖ وَ اتَّقُوا اللّٰهَ ۚ وَ عَلَى اللّٰهِ فَلْيَتَوَكَّلِ الْمُؤْمِنُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo uzkuroo ni'matal laahi 'alaikum iz hammar qawmun ai yabsutooo ilaikum aidiyahum fakaffa aidiyahum 'ankum wattaqul laah; wa 'alal laahi falyatawakkalil mu'minoon
verses.translation: Aye logo jo eemaan laaye ho! Allah ne tum par jo ne'mat naazil ki woh yaad karo, jab ek qaum ne iraadah kiya tha ke tumhaari taraf apne haath badhaayein to Allah ne unhen tum par haath daalne se rok diya aur Allah se daro aur eemaan waalon ko chaahiye ke Allah hi par bharosa karein.

verses.arabic: وَ لَقَدْ اَخَذَ اللّٰهُ مِيْثَاقَ بَنِيْۤ اِسْرَآءِيْلَ وَ بَعَثْنَا مِنْهُمُ اثْنَيْ عَشَرَ نَقِيْبًا ۚ وَ قَالَ اللّٰهُ اِنِّيْ مَعَكُمْ ۚ لَىٕنْ اَقَمْتُمُ الصَّلٰوةَ وَ اٰتَيْتُمُ الزَّكٰوةَ وَ اٰمَنْتُمْ بِرُسُلِيْ وَ عَزَّرْتُمُوْهُمْ وَ اَقْرَضْتُمُ اللّٰهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًا لَّاُكَفِّرَنَّ عَنْكُمْ سَيِّاٰتِكُمْ وَ لَاُدْخِلَنَّكُمْ جَنّٰتٍ تَجْرِيْ مِنْ تَحْتِهَا الْاَنْهٰرُ ۭ فَمَنْ كَفَرَ بَعْدَ ذٰلِكَ مِنْكُمْ فَقَدْ ضَلَّ سَوَآءَ السَّبِيْلِ
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad akhazal laahu meesaaqa Baneee Israaa'eela wa ba'asnaa minhumusnaya 'ashara naqeebanw wa qaalal laahu innee ma'akum; la'in aqamtumus Salaata wa aataitumuz Zakaata wa aamantum birusulee wa'azzartumoohum wa aqradtumul laaha qardana hasanal la'ukaffiranna 'ankum saiyi aatikum wa la'udkhilannakum jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru faman kafara ba'da zaalika minkum faqad dalla sawaaa'as sabeel
verses.translation: Aur beshak Allah ne bani Israayeel se a'had liya tha aur hum ne un mein se baarah sardaar muqarrar kiye the, aur Allah ne kaha: beshak main tumhaare saath hoon, agar tum namaaz qaayem karoge aur zakaat adaa karoge aur mere Rasoolon par eemaan laaoge aur unki madad karte rahoge aur Allah ko achchha qarz doge to main zaroor tumse tumhaari buraayiyaan door kardunga aur zaroor tumhein aise baaghon mein daakhil karunga jin ke neeche nahren bahti hain phir uske ba'd jis ne kufr kiya to yaqeenan woh seedhi raah se bhatak gaya.

verses.arabic: فَبِمَا نَقْضِهِمْ مِّيثَاقَهُمْ لَعَنّٰهُمْ وَ جَعَلْنَا قُلُوْبَهُمْ قَاسِيَةً ۭ يُحَرِّفُوْنَ الْكَلِمَ عَنْ مَّوَاضِعِهٖ وَ نَسُوْا حَظًّا مِّمَّا ذُكِّرُوْا بِهٖ ۭ وَ لَا تَزَالُ تَطَّلِعُ عَلٰى خَآىٕنَةٍ مِّنْهُمْ اِلَّا قَلِيْلًا مِّنْهُمْ فَاعْفُ عَنْهُمْ وَ اصْفَحْ ۭ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ يُحِبُّ الْمُحْسِنِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Fabimaa naqdihim meesaaqahum la'an naahum wa ja'alnaa quloobahum qaasiyatan yuharifoonal kalima 'am mawadi'ihee wa nasoo hazzam mimmaa zukkiboo bihee wa laa tazalu tattali'u 'alaa khaa'inatim minhum illaa qaleelam minhum fa'fu 'anhum wasfah; innal laaha yuhibbul muhsineen
verses.translation: Chunaancheh unke apna ahad todne¹ ki wajah se humne un par la'nat ki aur humne unke dilon ko sakht kar diya. woh kalimaat ko unke moqa wo mahal se badal daalte hain.² aur jis  cheez ki unhein taakeed ki gayi thi uska ek hissa unhon ne bhula diya aur aapko un mein se chand afraad ke siwa doosron ki khiyaanat ki aksar ittela' milti rahti hai, chunaancheh aap unhein mu'aaf kardein aur unse darguzar karein, beshak Allah ehsaan karne waalon ko pasnad karta hai.
verses.deepMeaning: 1️⃣Ya'ni Yahood ko Tauraat mein yeh hukm diya gaya tha ke jab Muhammad Arabi ﷺ tamaam nasl-e- insaani ki taraf Allah ke Rasool ki haiisyat se mab'oos kiye jaayein to woh aap ﷺ ki pairwi karein, yeh baat qur'an kareem (Al-a'raaf:7/157) mein bhi kahi gayi hai, magar unhon ne ahad shikni ki. 2️⃣Yeh tahreef lafzi aur ma'nawi donon tarah ki hoti thi, jo iss baat ki daleel thi ke unki aql-o-faham mein kaji aa gayi hai aur unki jasaaraton mein bhi be panaah ezaafah ho gaya hai ke Allah ki aayaton tak main tasarruf karne se unhein gurez nahin.bad qismati se iss qasaawat-e-qalbi aur kalimaat-e-ilaahi mein tahreef se ummat-e-muhammadia ke afraad bhi mahfooz nahin rahe. Musalmaan kahlaane waale a'waam hi nahin khaas bhi, johalaa hi nahin ulmaa bhi aise maqaam par pahunch chuke hain ke wa'z-o-naseehat aur ahkaam-e-ilaahi ki yaad dihaani unke liye bekaar hai. woh sun kar unse zara asar qubool nahin karte aur jin ghaflaton aur kotaahiyon ka woh shikaar hain un se taayib nahin hote iss tarah apni bid'aat, khud saakhtah mazoomaat aur apne fiqhi jumood ke asbaat ke liye unhein kalaam-e-ilaahi mein tahreef karne mein bhi baak nahin. woh hasb-e-zaroorat bade dhadalle se yeh kaam bhi kar guzarte hain.

verses.arabic: وَ مِنَ الَّذِيْنَ قَالُوْۤا اِنَّا نَصٰرٰى اَخَذْنَا مِيْثَاقَهُمْ فَنَسُوْا حَظًّا مِّمَّا ذُكِّرُوْا بِهٖ فَاَغْرَيْنَا بَيْنَهُمُ الْعَدَاوَةَ وَ الْبَغْضَآءَ اِلٰى يَوْمِ الْقِيٰمَةِ ۭ وَ سَوْفَ يُنَبِّئُهُمُ اللّٰهُ بِمَا كَانُوْا يَصْنَعُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa minal lazeena qaalooo innaa nasaaraa akhaznaa meesaaqahum fanasoo hazzam mimmaa zukkiboo bihee fa aghrainaa bainahumul 'adaawata wal baghdaaa'a ilaa Yawmil Qiyaamati wa sawfa yunabbi'uhumul laahu bimaa kaanoo yasna'oon fa'aghraynaa baynahumul- 'adaawata walbaghdaaa'a 'ilaa yawmil-Qiyaamah; wa sawfa yunabbi'uhumul- laahu bimaa kaanoo yaşna'oon.
verses.translation: Aur jin logon ne kaha: beshak hum nasaara hain, unse hum ne a'had liya tha¹ phir jis cheez ki unhein taakeed ki gayi thi, uska ek hissa unhon ne bhula diya, chunaancheh hum ne roz-e-qiyaamat tak unke darmiyaan dushmani aur bughz daal diya aur woh jo kuchh karte rahte hain Allah jald unhein usse aagaah karega.
verses.deepMeaning: Nasaara ko bhi injeel mein yeh hukm diya gaya tha ke jab Muhammad Rasoolullah ﷺ tamaam nasl-e- insaani ki taraf Allah ke Rasool ki haisyat se mab'oos hon to woh sab aap par eemaan laayein aur aap ki pairwi kareina.

verses.arabic: يٰٓاَهْلَ الْكِتٰبِ قَدْ جَآءَكُمْ رَسُوْلُنَا يُبَيِّنُ لَكُمْ كَثِيْرًا مِّمَّا كُنْتُمْ تُخْفُوْنَ مِنَ الْكِتٰبِ وَ يَعْفُوْا عَنْ كَثِيْرٍ ۚ قَدْ جَآءَكُمْ مِّنَ اللّٰهِ نُوْرٌ وَّ كِتٰبٌ مُّبِيْنٌ
verses.transliteration: yaaa 'Ahlal-kitaabi qad jaaa'akum Rasoolunaa yubayyinu lakum kaseeram- mimmaa kuntum tukhfoona minal-Kitaabi wa ya'foo 'an kaseer; qad jaaa'akum minal- laahi nooruñw-wa Kitaabum-Mubeen
verses.translation: Aye ahle kitab! tumhaare paas hamaara Rasool aa gaya hai, woh tumhaare liye Allah ki kitab ki bahut si aisi baatein zaahir karta hai jinhein tum chhupaate the aur bahut si baaton se dar guzar karta hai. yaqeenan tumhaare paas Allah ki taraf se raushni aur waazeh karne waali kitab aagayi hai.

verses.arabic: يَهْدِيْ بِهِ اللّٰهُ مَنِ اتَّبَعَ رِضْوَانَهٗ سُبُلَ السَّلٰمِ وَ يُخْرِجُهُمْ مِّنَ الظُّلُمٰتِ اِلَى النُّوْرِ بِاِذْنِهٖ وَ يَهْدِيْهِمْ اِلٰى صِرَاطٍ مُّسْتَقِيْمٍ
verses.transliteration: Yahdee bihil-laahu manit-taba'a ridwaanahoo subulas- salaami wa yukhrijuhum minaz-zulumaati 'ilan- noori bi'iznihee wa yahdeehim 'ilaa Şiraatim-Mustaqeem.
verses.translation: Jiske zariye se Allah uss shakhs ko salaamti ki raah dikhaata hai jo Allah ki raza ki pairwi karna chaahta hai aur unhein apne hukm se andheron se raushni ki taraf nikaal laata hai aur unki seedhe raaste ki taraf rahnumaayi karta hai.

verses.arabic: لَقَدْ كَفَرَ الَّذِيْنَ قَالُوْۤا اِنَّ اللّٰهَ هُوَ الْمَسِيْحُ ابْنُ مَرْيَمَ ۘ قُلْ فَمَنْ يَّمْلِكُ مِنَ اللّٰهِ شَيْـًٔا اِنْ اَرَادَ اَنْ يُّهْلِكَ الْمَسِيْحَ ابْنَ مَرْيَمَ وَ اُمَّهٗ وَ مَنْ فِي الْاَرْضِ جَمِيْعًا ۭ وَ لِلّٰهِ مُلْكُ السَّمٰوٰتِ وَ الْاَرْضِ وَ مَا بَيْنَهُمَا ۭ يَخْلُقُ مَا يَشَآءُ ۭ وَ اللّٰهُ عَلٰى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيْرٌ
verses.transliteration: Laqad kafaral-lazeena qaalooo 'innal-laaha huwal-maseehub-nu- Maryam; qul famañy- yamliku minal-laahi shay'an 'in araada 'añy- yuhlikal-Maseehab-na- Maryama wa 'ummahoo wa man fil-'ardi jamee'aa, wa lillaahi mulkus- samaawaati wal'ardi wa maa baynahumaa; yakhluqu maa Yashaaa'; wallaahu 'alaa kulli shay'in Qadeer.
verses.translation: Yaqeenan un logon ne kufr kiya jinhon ne yeh kaha ke beshak Allah to wahi Maseeh Ibne Maryam hai (Aye nabi!) kah deejiye: pas kaun hai jo Allah ke aage kuchh ikhtiyaar rakhta ho agar Allah Maseeh Ibne Maryam ko aur unki maan aur tamaam zameen waalon ko halaak karne ka iraadah karle? aur Allah hi ke liye aasmanon aur zameen ki baadshaahi hai aur jo kuchh un donon ke darmiyaan hai, woh jo chaahe paida karta hai, aur Allah har cheez par khoob qudrat rakhta hai.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Allah Ta'ala ne apni qudrat-e-kaamilah aur milkiyat-e-taammah ka bayaan farmaaya hai. maqsad eisaayiyon ke aqeeda-e-uloohiyat maseeh ka radd-o-ibtaal hai.hazrat maseeh ke ain Allah hone ke qaayel pahle to kuchh hi l log the ya'ni firqa ya'qoobiyah lekin ab taqreeban tamaam eisaayi uloohiyat- e-maseeh ke kisi na kisi andaaz se qaayel hain. isi liye maseehiyat mein ab aqeeda-e-taslees ya aqaaneem-e-salaasa ko bunyaadi ahmiyat haasil hai. qur'an kareem ne iss maqaam par tasreeh kardi hai ke kisi Rasool ko uloohi sifaat se muttasif qaraar dena sareeh kufr hai.

verses.arabic: وَ قَالَتِ الْيَهُوْدُ وَ النَّصٰرٰى نَحْنُ اَبْنٰٓؤُا اللّٰهِ وَ اَحِبَّآؤُهٗ ۭ قُلْ فَلِمَ يُعَذِّبُكُمْ بِذُنُوْبِكُمْ ۚ بَلْ اَنْتُمْ بَشَرٌ مِّمَّنْ خَلَقَ ۭ يَغْفِرُ لِمَنْ يَّشَآءُ وَ يُعَذِّبُ مَنْ يَّشَآءُ ۭ وَ لِلّٰهِ مُلْكُ السَّمٰوٰتِ وَ الْاَرْضِ وَ مَا بَيْنَهُمَا ۚ وَ اِلَيْهِ الْمَصِيْرُ
verses.transliteration: Wa qaalatil-Yahoodu wan-Nasaaraa nahnu 'abnaaa'ul-laahi wa 'ahibbaaa'uh; qul falima yu'azzibukum bizunoobikum bal 'antum basharum-mimman khalaq; yaghfiru limany- yashaaa'u wa yu'azzibu many-yashaaa; wa lillaahi mulkus- samaawaati wal'ardi wa maa baynahumaa wa 'ilayhil-maşeer.
verses.translation: Aur Yahoodiyon aur i'saayiyon ne kaha: hum Allah ke bete aur uske piyaare hain (Aye nabi!) kah deejiye: phir woh tumhein tumhaare gunaahon ki saza kyun deta hai? (nahin) balke tum bhi uski makhlooq mein se insaan ho, woh jise chaahe bakhsh deta hai aur jise chaahe a'zaab deta hai aur Allah hi ke liye aasmaanon aur zameen ki baadshaahi hai aur jo kuchh un donon ke darmiyaan hai, aur usi ki taraf laut kar jaana hai.

verses.arabic: يٰٓاَهْلَ الْكِتٰبِ قَدْ جَآءَكُمْ رَسُوْلُنَا يُبَيِّنُ لَكُمْ عَلٰى فَتْرَةٍ مِّنَ الرُّسُلِ اَنْ تَقُوْلُوْا مَا جَآءَنَا مِنْ بَشِيْرٍ وَّ لَا نَذِيْرٍ ۭ فَقَدْ جَآءَكُمْ بَشِيْرٌ وَّ نَذِيْرٌ ۭ وَ اللّٰهُ عَلٰى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيْرٌ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'Ahlal-Kitaabi qad jaaa'akum Rasoolunaa yubayyinu lakum 'alaa fatratim- minar-Rusuli 'an taqooloo maa jaaa'anaa mim basheerinw-wa laa nazeerin faqad jaaa'akum basheeruñw- awa nazeer; wallaahu 'alaa kulli shay'in Qadeer.
verses.translation: Aye ahle kitab! tumhaare paas hamaara Rasool aa gaya hai jo Rasoolon ke waqfe ke ba'd tumhaare liye baatein khol kar bayaan karta hai taake tum yeh na kaho ke hamaare paas to koyi khushkhabri dene waala aur koyi daraane waala nahin aaya. pas yaqeenan tumhaare paas khushkhabri dene waala aur daraane waala aa gaya hai. aur Allah har cheez par khoob qaadir hai.

verses.arabic: وَ اِذْ قَالَ مُوْسٰى لِقَوْمِهٖ يٰقَوْمِ اذْكُرُوْا نِعْمَتَ اللّٰهِ عَلَيْكُمْ اِذْ جَعَلَ فِيْكُمْ اَنْۢبِيَآءَ وَ جَعَلَكُمْ مُّلُوْكًا وَّ اٰتٰىكُمْ مَّا لَمْ يُؤْتِ اَحَدًا مِّنَ الْعٰلَمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'iz qaala Moosaa liqawmihee yaa qawmiz- kuroo ni'matal-laahi 'alaykum 'iz ja'ala feekum 'ambiyaaa'a wa ja'alakum mulookañw- wa 'aataakum maa lam yu'ti ahadam-minal 'aalameen.
verses.translation: Aur jab Moosa ne apni qaum se kaha: Aye meri qaum! Allah ki woh ne'mat yaad karo jo usne tum par ki, jab usne tum mein se nabi banaaye aur tumhein baadshaah banaaya, aur tumhein woh kuchh diya jo saari dunya mein kisi ko nahin diya gaya.

verses.arabic: يٰقَوْمِ ادْخُلُوا الْاَرْضَ الْمُقَدَّسَةَ الَّتِيْ كَتَبَ اللّٰهُ لَكُمْ وَ لَا تَرْتَدُّوْا عَلٰٓى اَدْبَارِكُمْ فَتَنْقَلِبُوْا خٰسِرِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Yaaqawmid-khulul-'Ardal Muqaddasatal- latee katabal-laahu lakum wa laa tartaddoo 'alaaa 'adbaarikum fatanqaliboo khaasireen.
verses.translation: Aye meri qaum! muqaddas zameen mein daakhil ho jaao jo Allah ne tumhaare naam likh di hai aur tum apni pusht ke bal munh na modo, phir tum khasaarah uthhaane waale ho jaaoge.

verses.arabic: قَالُوْا يٰمُوْسٰۤى اِنَّ فِيْهَا قَوْمًا جَبَّارِيْنَ وَ اِنَّا لَنْ نَّدْخُلَهَا حَتّٰى يَخْرُجُوْا مِنْهَا فَاِنْ يَّخْرُجُوْا مِنْهَا فَاِنَّا دٰخِلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo yaa Moosaaa 'inna feehaa qawman jabbaareena wa 'innaa lan nadkhulahaa hattaa yakhrujoo minhaa fa'iny-yakhrujoo minhaa fa'innaa daakhiloon.
verses.translation: Unhon ne jawaab diya: aye Moosa! beshak uss zameen mein ek badi zor aawar qaum hai. aur hum hargiz uss mein daakhil nahin honge yahaan tak ke woh log uss mein se nikal jaayein, phir agar woh uss mein se nikal gaye to beshak hum daakhil hojaayenge.

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَجُلٰنِ مِنَ الَّذِيْنَ يَخَافُوْنَ اَنْعَمَ اللّٰهُ عَلَيْهِمَا ادْخُلُوا عَلَيْهِمُ الْبَابَ فَاِذَا دَخَلْتُمُوْهُ فَاِنَّكُمْ غٰلِبُوْنَ ۚ وَ عَلَى اللّٰهِ فَتَوَكَّلُوْۤا اِنْ كُنْتُمْ مُّؤْمِنِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala rajulaani minal-lazeena yakhaafoona 'an'amal- laahu 'alayhimad-khuloo 'alayhimul-baab, fa'izaa dakhaltumoohu fa'innakum ghaaliboon; wa 'alal-laahi -fatawakkalooo 'in kuntum mu'mineen.
verses.translation: Jo log Allah se darte the, un mein se do aadmi jin par Allah ka fazl tha, woh bole: tum unke muqaable ke liye darwaaze mein daakhil ho jaao, phir jab tum darwaaze mein daakhil ho gaye to beshak tum ghaalib aa jaaoge aur agar tum momin ho to tumhein Allah hi par bharosa karna chaahiye.

verses.arabic: قَالُوْا يٰمُوْسٰۤى اِنَّا لَنْ نَّدْخُلَهَآ اَبَدًا مَّا دَامُوْا فِيْهَا فَاذْهَبْ اَنْتَ وَ رَبُّكَ فَقَاتِلَآ اِنَّا هٰهُنَا قٰعِدُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo yaa Moosaaa 'innaa lan nadkhulahaaa 'abadam-maa daamoo feehaa fazhab 'anta wa Rabbuka faqaatilaaa 'innaa haahunaa qaa'idoon.
verses.translation: Woh kahne lage: aye Moosa! hum hargiz uss' zameen mein daakhil nahin honge jab tak woh log wahaan maujood hai, chunaancheh too aur tera rab jaaye, phir tum donon un se lado, hum to yahin baithhe hain.

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ اِنِّيْ لَآ اَمْلِكُ اِلَّا نَفْسِيْ وَ اَخِيْ فَافْرُقْ بَيْنَنَا وَ بَيْنَ الْقَوْمِ الْفٰسِقِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala Rabbi 'innee laaa 'amliku 'illaa nafsee wa akhee fafruq baynanaa wa baynal- qawmil-faasiqeen.
verses.translation: Moosa ne kaha: Aye mere rab! beshak mujhe apne aap aur apne bhaayi ke siwa kisi par ikhtiyaar nahin, humein chunaancheh tu uss naafarmaan qaum se alag karde.

verses.arabic: قَالَ فَاِنَّهَا مُحَرَّمَةٌ عَلَيْهِمْ اَرْبَعِيْنَ سَنَةً ۭ يَتِيْهُوْنَ فِي الْاَرْضِ ۭ فَلَا تَاْسَ عَلَى الْقَوْمِ الْفٰسِقِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala fa'innahaa muharramatun 'alayhim 'arba'eena sanah; yateehoona fil-ard; falaa ta'sa 'alal-qawmil-faasiqeen.
verses.translation: Allah ne farmaya: beshak woh (muqaddas zameen) un logon par chaalis baras tak haraam kardi gayai hai, woh zameen mein chaalis baras tak idhar udhar bhatakte phirenge, chunaancheh aap uss naafarmaan qaum ka gham na khaaayen.

verses.arabic: وَ اتْلُ عَلَيْهِمْ نَبَاَ ابْنَيْ اٰدَمَ بِالْحَقِّ اِذْ قَرَّبَا قُرْبَانًا فَتُقُبِّلَ مِنْ اَحَدِهِمَا وَ لَمْ يُتَقَبَّلْ مِنَ الْاٰخَرِ ۖ قَالَ لَاَقْتُلَنَّكَ ۭ قَالَ اِنَّمَا يَتَقَبَّلُ اللّٰهُ مِنَ الْمُتَّقِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Watlu 'alayhim naba'ab-nay 'Aadama bilhaqq; 'iz qarrabaa qurbaanan fatuqubbila min 'ahadihimaa wa lam yutaqabbal minal- 'aakhari qaala la- 'aqtulannaka qaala 'innamaa yataqabbalul- laahu minal-muttaqeen.
verses.translation: Aur (Aye Nabi!) Aap unhein aadam ke do beton ka waaqe'ah thheek thheek sunaayein, jab un donon ne qurbaani ki thi, phir un mein se ek ki qurbaani to qubool karli gayi aur doosre ki qubool na ki gayi. doosra bola: main tujhe qatl kardunga.¹ pahle ne jawaab diya: Allah sirf parhez gaaron se (qurbaani) qubool karta hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Chunaancheh ussne use qatl kar hi diya. Iski baabat Rasoolullah ne farmaya: 'Jab bhi dunya mein kisi ko naahaq qatl kiya jaata hai to uske khoon ke gunaah ka ek hissa Aadam ke pahle bête (Qaabil) par padta hai kyun ke usi ne sabse pahle qatl-e-naahaq ki rasm jaari kit hi.' (Al-Bukhari:3335) ek doosri hadees mein baahum qatl naahaq karne ko kaafiraana kaam qaraar diya: 'mere ba'd tum ek doosre ko naahaq qatl karke kaafir na ban jaana.' (Al-Bukhari:6868)

verses.arabic: لَىٕنْۣ بَسَطْتَّ اِلَىَّ يَدَكَ لِتَقْتُلَنِيْ مَآ اَنَا بِبَاسِطٍ يَّدِيَ اِلَيْكَ لِاَقْتُلَكَ ۚ اِنِّيْۤ اَخَافُ اللّٰهَ رَبَّ الْعٰلَمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: La'im basatta 'ilayya yadaka litaqtulanee maaa 'ana bibaasitiny- yadiya 'ilayka li- 'aqtulaka 'inneee 'akhaaful-laaha Rabbal- 'aalameen.
verses.translation: Agar toone apna haath meri taraf (iss iraade se) badhaaya ke mujhe qatl karde to bhi main apna haath teri taraf nahin badhaaounga ke tujhe qatl kardun. beshak main Allah se darta hoon jo sab jahaanon ka rab hai.

verses.arabic: اِنِّيْۤ اُرِيْدُ اَنْ تَبُوْۤا بِاِثْمِيْ وَ اِثْمِكَ فَتَكُوْنَ مِنْ اَصْحٰبِ النَّارِ ۭ وَ ذٰلِكَ جَزَآءُ الظّٰلِمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Inneee 'ureedu 'an tabooo'a bi'ismee wa 'ismika fatakoona min wa 'Ashaabin-Naar; zaalika jazaaa'uz- zaalimeen.
verses.translation: Main to chaahta hoon ke tu mera aur apna gunhaah apne sar le le aur dozakhiyon mein shaamil ho jaaye. aur zaalimon ka yahi badlah hai.

verses.arabic: فَطَوَّعَتْ لَهٗ نَفْسُهٗ قَتْلَ اَخِيْهِ فَقَتَلَهٗ فَاَصْبَحَ مِنَ الْخٰسِرِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Fatawwa'at lahoo nafsuhoo qatla 'akheehi faqatalahoo fa'aşbaha minal-khaasireen.
verses.translation: Phir uske nafs ne use apne bhaai ko qatl karne par uksaaya, chunaancheh usne use qatl kardiya aur woh khasaarah paane waalon mein se ho gaya.

verses.arabic: فَبَعَثَ اللّٰهُ غُرَابًا يَّبْحَثُ فِي الْاَرْضِ لِيُرِيَهٗ كَيْفَ يُوَارِيْ سَوْءَةَ اَخِيْهِ ۭ قَالَ يٰوَيْلَتٰٓى اَعَجَزْتُ اَنْ اَكُوْنَ مِثْلَ هٰذَا الْغُرَابِ فَاُوَارِيَ سَوْءَةَ اَخِيْ ۭ فَاَصْبَحَ مِنَ النَّادِمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Faba asal-laahu ghuraabany-yabhasu fil- 'ardi liyuriyahoo kayfa yuwaaree saw'ata 'akheeh; qaala yaa waylataaa 'a'ajaztu 'an 'akoona misla haazal-
verses.translation: Phir Allah ne (wahaan) ek kawwa bheja, woh (apne panjon se) zameen kuredne laga taake use dikhaaye ke woh apne bhaai ki laash kaise dafan kare, woh kahne laga: afsos! main iss kawwe jaisa hone se bhi aa'jiz raha ke apne bhaai ki laash dafna deta. chunaancheh woh pachhtaane waalon mein se ho gaya.

verses.arabic: مِنْ اَجْلِ ذٰلِكَ كَتَبْنَا عَلٰى بَنِيْۤ اِسْرَآءِيْلَ اَنَّهٗ مَنْ قَتَلَ نَفْسًۢا بِغَيْرِ نَفْسٍ اَوْ فَسَادٍ فِي الْاَرْضِ فَكَاَنَّمَا قَتَلَ النَّاسَ جَمِيْعًا ۚ وَ مَنْ اَحْيَاهَا فَكَاَنَّمَاۤ اَحْيَا النَّاسَ جَمِيْعًا ۭ وَ لَقَدْ جَآءَتْهُمْ رُسُلُنَا بِالْبَيِّنٰتِ ثُمَّ اِنَّ كَثِيْرًا مِّنْهُمْ بَعْدَ ذٰلِكَ فِي الْاَرْضِ لَمُسْرِفُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Min 'ajli zaalika katabnaa 'alaa Baneee 'Israaa'eela 'annahoo man qatala nafsam bighayri nafsin 'aw fasaadin fil-'ardi faka'annamaa qatalan- naasa jamee'an wa man 'ahyaahaa faka'annamaaa 'ahyan- naasa jamee aa; wa laqad jaaa'athum Rusulunaa bilbayyinaati summa 'inna kaseeram- minhum ba'da zaalika fil-'ardi lamusrifoon.
verses.translation: lss wajah se humne bani israayeel ke liye yeh likh diya ke jo shakhs kisi ko qatl karde, siwaaye uske ke woh kisi ka qaatil ho ya zameen mein fasaad karne waala ho, to goya usne tamaam logon ko qatl kar diya¹ aur jo shakhs kisi ek jaan ko (naahaq qatl hone se) bachaaye, to goya usne tamaam logon ki jaan bachaayi. aur hamaare Rasool waazeh nishaaniyaan lekar unke paas aaye, phir beshak uske ba'd un mein se bahut se log zameen mein had se nikal jaane waale hain.
verses.deepMeaning: Isse andaazah lagaaya jaa sakta hai ke Allah ke haan insaani khoon ki kitni ahmiyat aur takreem hai. aur yeh usool sirf bani Israyeel hi ke liye nahin tha, islam ki ta'leemaat ke mutaabiq bhi yeh usool hamesha ke liye hai. Sulaimaan bin Ali Rabayi'  رحمه الله  kahte hain ke main ne hazrat Hasan Basari  رحمه الله se poochha: 'Yeh aayat hamaare liye bhi hai jis tarah Banu Israyeel ke liye thi?' unhon ne farmaya: haan qasam hai uss zaat ki jiske siwa koyi ma'bood nahin. Banu Israyeel ke khoon Allah ke haan hamaare khoonon se ziyaadah qaabil-e-ehteraam nahin the. (Ibne Kaseer) hadees mein ise kabirah gunahon mein shumaar kiya gaya hai. Rasoolullah ﷺ ne farmaya: 'Bade kabirah gunah yeh hain: ⓵ Allah ke saath kisi ko shareek thhahraana ⓶ kisi insaan ko naahaq qatl karna ⓷ waaledain ki naafarmaani karna ⓸jhooti baat kahna ya yeh ke jhooti gawaahi dena.' (Al-Bukhari, Ad-diyaat, Baab:2, Hadees:6871)

verses.arabic: اِنَّمَا جَزٰٓؤُا الَّذِيْنَ يُحَارِبُوْنَ اللّٰهَ وَ رَسُوْلَهٗ وَ يَسْعَوْنَ فِي الْاَرْضِ فَسَادًا اَنْ يُّقَتَّلُوْۤا اَوْ يُصَلَّبُوْۤا اَوْ تُقَطَّعَ اَيْدِيْهِمْ وَ اَرْجُلُهُمْ مِّنْ خِلَافٍ اَوْ يُنْفَوْا مِنَ الْاَرْضِ ۭ ذٰلِكَ لَهُمْ خِزْيٌ فِي الدُّنْيَا وَ لَهُمْ فِي الْاٰخِرَةِ عَذَابٌ عَظِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: 'Innamaa jazaaa'ul- lazeena yuhaariboonal- laaha wa Rasoolahoo wa yas'awna fil-'ardi fasaadan 'any- yuqattalooo 'aw yuşallabooo 'aw tuqatta'a 'aydeehim wa 'arjuluhum min khilaafin 'aw yunfaw minal-'ard; zaalika lahum khizyun fid-dunyaa wa lahum fil-'Aakhirati 'azaabun 'azeem.
verses.translation: Jo log Allah aur uske Rasool se jung karte hain aur zameen mein fasaad ke liye bhaag daud karte hain, unki sazaa to sirf yeh hai ke unhein qatl kiya jaaye ya sooli di jaaye ya unke haath aur paaoun mukhaalif jaanib se kaat diye jaayein yaa unhein jilaa watan kardiya jaaye. yeh dunya mein unke liye zillat hai aur aakhirat mein unke liye bahut badaa a'zaab hai.

verses.arabic: اِلَّا الَّذِيْنَ تَابُوْا مِنْ قَبْلِ اَنْ تَقْدِرُوْا عَلَيْهِمْ ۭ فَاعْلَمُوْۤا اَنَّ اللّٰهَ غَفُوْرٌ رَّحِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: 'Illal-lazeena taaboo min qabli 'an taqdiroo 'alayhim fa'lamooo 'annal-laaha Ghafoorur-Raheem
verses.translation: Siwaaye un logon ke jo isse pahle ke tum un par qaabu paao, taubah karlen, pas tum jaan lo ke beshak Allah bahut bakhashne waala, bada raham karne waala hai.

verses.arabic: يٰٓاَيُّهَا الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوا اتَّقُوا اللّٰهَ وَ ابْتَغُوْۤا اِلَيْهِ الْوَسِيْلَةَ وَ جَاهِدُوْا فِيْ سَبِيْلِهٖ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُفْلِحُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhal- lazeena 'aamanut-taqul- laaha wabtaghooo 'ilayhil-waseelata wa jaahidoo fee sabeelihee la'allakum tuflihoon.
verses.translation: Aye logo jo eemaan laaye ho! Allah se daro, aur uska qurb talaash karo, aur uske raaste mein jehaad karo taake tum falaah paao.

verses.arabic: اِنَّ الَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا لَوْ اَنَّ لَهُمْ مَّا فِي الْاَرْضِ جَمِيْعًا وَّ مِثْلَهٗ مَعَهٗ لِيَفْتَدُوْا بِهٖ مِنْ عَذَابِ يَوْمِ الْقِيٰمَةِ مَا تُقُبِّلَ مِنْهُمْ ۖ وَ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ اَلِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: 'Innal-lazeena kafaroo law 'anna lahum maa fil-'ardi jamee'añw- wa mislahoo maʻahoo liyaftadoo bihee min 'azaabi Yawmil- Qiyaamati maa tuqubbila minhum wa lahum 'azaabun 'aleem.
verses.translation: Beshak jin logon ne kufr kiya agar unke paas woh sab kuchh ho jo saari zameen mein hai aur uske baraabar aur bhi hota ke woh qiyaamat ke din a'zaab se bachne ke liye fidye mein de den to bhi woh unse qubool nahin kiya jaayega¹ aur unke liye bahut dardnaak a'zaab hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Mulaahazah ho haashyah: (Surah Aal-e-Imran:3/91)

verses.arabic: يُرِيْدُوْنَ اَنْ يَّخْرُجُوْا مِنَ النَّارِ وَ مَا هُمْ بِخَارِجِيْنَ مِنْهَا ۭ وَ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ مُّقِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: Yureedoona 'añy- yakhrujoo minan-Naari wa maa hum bikhaarijeena minhaa wa lahum 'azaabum- muqeem.
verses.translation: Woh aag se nikalna chaahenge magar woh uss mein se nahin nikal sakenge, aur unke liye hameshah rahne waala a'zaab hai.

verses.arabic: وَ السَّارِقُ وَ السَّارِقَةُ فَاقْطَعُوْۤا اَيْدِيَهُمَا جَزَآءًۢ بِمَا كَسَبَا نَكَالًا مِّنَ اللّٰهِ ۗ وَ اللّٰهُ عَزِيْزٌ حَكِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: Wassaariqu wassaariqatu faqta'ooo 'aydiyahuma jazaaa'am- bimaa kasabaa nakaalam-minal-laah; wallaahu 'Azeezun Hakeem.
verses.translation: Aur tum chori karne waale mard aur chori karne waali aurat ke haath kaat diya karo,¹ yeh Allah ki taraf se uss gunaah ki i'brat naak saza hai jo unhon ne kiya, aur Allah ghaalib, khoob hikmat waala hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Ba'z fuqahaa zaahiri ke nazdeek chori ka yeh hukm aam hai chori thodi si cheez ki ho ya ziyaadah ki. Isi tarah woh harz (mahfooz jagah) mein rakkhi ho ya ghair mahfooz jagah mein. har soorat mein chori ki saza di jaayegi. Jab ke doosre foqahaa iske liye hirz-e-nisaab ko zaroori qaraar dete hain. mohaddiseen ke nazdeek nisaab rub'o dinar ya teen dirhum (ya unke masaawi qeemat ki cheez) hai. isse kam chori par haath nahin kaata jaayega isi tarah haath pahchon se kaate jaayeinge, kohni ya kandhe se nahin jaisa ke ba'z ka khayaal hai.

verses.arabic: فَمَنْ تَابَ مِنْۢ بَعْدِ ظُلْمِهٖ وَ اَصْلَحَ فَاِنَّ اللّٰهَ يَتُوْبُ عَلَيْهِ ۭ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ غَفُوْرٌ رَّحِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: Faman taaba mim ba'di zulmihee wa 'aşlaha fa'innal-laaha yatoobu 'alayh; 'innal- laaha Ghafoorur- Raheem.
verses.translation: Phir jo shakhs apne gunaah ke ba'd taubah karle aur apni islaah karle to beshak Allah uski taubah qubool kar leta hai, beshak Allah bada bakhashne waala, bahut raham karne waala hai.

verses.arabic: اَلَمْ تَعْلَمْ اَنَّ اللّٰهَ لَهٗ مُلْكُ السَّمٰوٰتِ وَ الْاَرْضِ ۭ يُعَذِّبُ مَنْ يَّشَآءُ وَ يَغْفِرُ لِمَنْ يَّشَآءُ ۭ وَ اللّٰهُ عَلٰى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيْرٌ
verses.transliteration: 'Alam ta'lam 'annal- laaha lahoo mulkus- samaawaati wal-'ardi yu'azzibu mañу- yashaa'u wa yaghfiru limany-yashaaa'; wallaahu 'alaa kulli shay'in Qadeer.
verses.translation: Kiya tumhein ilm nahin ke aasmaanon aur zameen ki baadshaahi Allah hi ke liye hai, woh jise chaahta hai a'zaab deta hai aur jise chaahe bakhsh deta hai. aur Allah har cheez par khoob qudrat rakhne waala hai.

verses.arabic: يٰٓاَيُّهَا الرَّسُوْلُ لَا يَحْزُنْكَ الَّذِيْنَ يُسَارِعُوْنَ فِي الْكُفْرِ مِنَ الَّذِيْنَ قَالُوْا اٰمَنَّا بِاَفْوَاهِهِمْ وَ لَمْ تُؤْمِنْ قُلُوْبُهُمْ ۙ وَ مِنَ الَّذِيْنَ هَادُوْا ۛ سَمّٰعُوْنَ لِلْكَذِبِ سَمّٰعُوْنَ لِقَوْمٍ اٰخَرِيْنَ لَمْ يَاْتُوْكَ ۚ يُحَرِّفُوْنَ الْكَلِمَ مِنْۢ بَعْدِ مَوَاضِعِهٖ ۚ يَقُوْلُوْنَ اِنْ اُوْتِيْتُمْ هٰذَا فَخُذُوْهُ وَ اِنْ لَّمْ تُوْتَوْهُ فَاحْذَرُوْا ۚ وَ مَنْ يُّرِدِ اللّٰهُ فِتْنَتَهٗ فَلَنْ تَمْلِكَ لَهٗ مِنَ اللّٰهِ شَيْـًٔا ۭ اُولٰٓىٕكَ الَّذِيْنَ لَمْ يُرِدِ اللّٰهُ اَنْ يُّطَهِّرَ قُلُوْبَهُمْ ۚ لَهُمْ فِي الدُّنْيَا خِزْيٌ ۙ وَّ لَهُمْ فِي الْاٰخِرَةِ عَذَابٌ عَظِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhar- Rasoolu laa yahzunkal- lazeena yusaari'oona fil- kufri minal-lazeena qaalooo 'aamannaa bi'afwaahihim wa lam tu'min quloobuhum; wa minal-lazeena haadoo sammaa'oona lilkazibi sammaa'oona liqawmin 'aakhareena lam ya'tooka yuharrifoonal-kalima mim ba'di mawaadi'ihee yaqooloona 'in 'ooteetum  'il-lam tu'tawhu fahzaroo; wa mañy- yuridil-laahu fitnatahoo falan tamlika lahoo minal-laahi shay'aa; ulaaa'ikal-lazeena lam yuridil-laahu 'añy- yutahhira quloobahum; lahum fid-dunyaa khizyunw-wa lahum fil- 'Aakhirati azaabun 'azeem.
verses.translation: Aye Rasool! aap un logon ka gham na khaayein jo kufr mein jaldi karte hain, un logon mein se kuchh to woh hain jo apne munh se kahte hain ke hum eemaan laaye haalaanke unke dil eemaan nahin laate, aur kuchh un logon mein se jo yahoodi huye, woh jhooti baatein sunne ke aa'di hain aur doosri qaum ki jaasoosi karne waale hain jo (abhi etaa'at ke liye) aapke paas nahin aayi. woh kalimaat ka moqa-o-mahal saabit hone ke ba'd use badal dete hain woh kahte hain agar tumhein yeh hukm diya jaaye to qubool karlo aur agar yeh hukm na diya jaaye to unse alag thalag raho. aur jise Allah fitne mein daalna chaahe to aap Allah ki taraf se uski baabat qata'n kuchh ikhtiyaar nahin rakhte. wahi log hain jinke baare mein Allah ne nahin chaaha unke dilon ko paak kare, unke liye dunya mein ruswaayi hai aur aakhrat mein unke liye bahut bada a'zaab hai.

verses.arabic: سَمّٰعُوْنَ لِلْكَذِبِ اَكّٰلُوْنَ لِلسُّحْتِ ۚ فَاِنْ جَآءُوْكَ فَاحْكُمْ بَيْنَهُمْ اَوْ اَعْرِضْ عَنْهُمْ ۚ وَ اِنْ تُعْرِضْ عَنْهُمْ فَلَنْ يَّضُرُّوْكَ شَيْـًٔا ۚ وَ اِنْ حَكَمْتَ فَاحْكُمْ بَيْنَهُمْ بِالْقِسْطِ ۭ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ يُحِبُّ الْمُقْسِطِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Sammaa'oona lilkazibi 'akkaaloona lissuht; fa'in jaaa'ooka fahkum baynahum 'aw 'a'rid 'anhum wa 'in tu'rid 'anhum falañy- yadurrooka shay'aa; wa'in hakamta fahkum baynahum bilqist; 'innal- laaha yuhibbul- muqsiteen.
verses.translation: Woh jhooti baatein sunne ke 'aadi hain aur ji bhar kar haraam khaane waale hain. phir agar woh Aapke paas aayein to aap (ko ikhtiyaar hai ke) unke darmiyaan faislah karden aur ya unse e'raaz karein aur agar aap unse munh mod lenge to bhi woh aapko qata'an koyi nuqsaan nahin pahunchaa sakenge. aur agar aap unke darmiyaan koyi faislah karen to insaaf ke saath karen. beshak Allah insaaf karne waalon ko pasand karta hai.

verses.arabic: وَ كَيْفَ يُحَكِّمُوْنَكَ وَ عِنْدَهُمُ التَّوْرٰىةُ فِيْهَا حُكْمُ اللّٰهِ ثُمَّ يَتَوَلَّوْنَ مِنْۢ بَعْدِ ذٰلِكَ ۭ وَ مَاۤ اُولٰٓىٕكَ بِالْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa kayfa yuhakkimoonaka wa 'indahumut-Tawraatu feehaa hukmul-laahi summa yatawallawna mim ba'di zaalik; wa maaa 'ulaaa'ika bilmu'mineen.
verses.translation: Aur woh kaise aapse faisle karwaate hain jabke unke paas tauraat (maujood) hai jis mein Allah ka hukm hai, phir woh uss (hukm) se munh modte hain, aur woh eemaan laane waale nahin.

verses.arabic: اِنَّاۤ اَنْزَلْنَا التَّوْرٰىةَ فِيْهَا هُدًى وَّ نُوْرٌ ۭ يَحْكُمُ بِهَا النَّبِيُّوْنَ الَّذِيْنَ اَسْلَمُوْا لِلَّذِيْنَ هَادُوْا وَ الرَّبّٰنِيُّوْنَ وَ الْاَحْبَارُ بِمَا اسْتُحْفِظُوْا مِنْ كِتٰبِ اللّٰهِ وَ كَانُوْا عَلَيْهِ شُهَدَآءَ ۭ فَلَا تَخْشَوُا النَّاسَ وَ اخْشَوْنِ وَ لَا تَشْتَرُوْا بِاٰيٰتِيْ ثَمَنًا قَلِيْلًا ۚ وَ مَنْ لَّمْ يَحْكُمْ بِمَاۤ اَنْزَلَ اللّٰهُ فَاُولٰٓىٕكَ هُمُ الْكٰفِرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Innaaa 'anzalnat- Tawraata feehaa hudañw-wa noor; yahkumu bihan- Nabiyyoonal-lazeena 'aslamoo lillazeena haadoo warrabbaaniy- yoona walahbaaru bimas-tuhfizoo min Kitaabil-laahi wa kaanoo 'alayhi shuhadaaa; falaa takhshawun-naasa wakhshawni wa laa tashtaroo bi'aayaatee samanan qaleelaa; wa mal-lam yahkum bimaaa 'anzalal-laahu fa'ulaaa'ika humul- kaafiroon.
verses.translation: Beshak humne tauraat naazil ki, uss mein hidaayat aur raushni hai, ambiyaa jo Allah ki etaa'at karne waale the, uske mutaabiq yahoodiyon ke faisle karte the aur Allah waale u'lamaa faisle karte the, isliye ke woh Allah ki kitab ke nigraan banaaye gaye the, aur woh uss par gawaah the, chunaancheh tum logon se na daro, mujhse daro, aur meri aayaten thodi qeemat par na becho aur jo log Allah ke naazil kiye huye ke mutaabiq faisle na karein wahi kaafir hain.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Kufr ke do bade darje hain: ⓵ kufr-e-akbar ⓶ kufr-e-asghar. Kufr-e-akbar mein takzeeb, inkaar-o- takabbur, shak, e'raaz aur nifaaq ke kufr shaamil hain jab ke kufr-e-asghar 'kufraan-e-nemat' ko kahte hain ya'ni naashukri bhi ek qism ka kufr hai.

verses.arabic: وَ كَتَبْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ فِيْهَآ اَنَّ النَّفْسَ بِالنَّفْسِ وَ الْعَيْنَ بِالْعَيْنِ وَ الْاَنْفَ بِالْاَنْفِ وَ الْاُذُنَ بِالْاُذُنِ وَ السِّنَّ بِالسِّنِّ وَ الْجُرُوْحَ قِصَاصٌ ۚ فَمَنْ تَصَدَّقَ بِهٖ فَهُوَ كَفَّارَةٌ لَّهٗ ۚ وَ مَنْ لَّمْ يَحْكُمْ بِمَاۤ اَنْزَلَ اللّٰهُ فَاُولٰٓىٕكَ هُمُ الظّٰلِمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa katabnaa 'alayhim feehaaa 'annan-nafsa binnafsi wal'ayna bil'ayni
verses.translation: Aur humne tauraat mein unke liye likh diya tha ke beshak jaan ke badle jaan hai¹ aur aankh ke badle aankh, aur naak ke badle naak, aur kaan ke badle kaan, aur daant ke badle daant aur tamaam zakhmon ka qesaas hai, phir jo shakhs use mu'aaf karde to woh uske liye kaffaarah hai. aur jo log Allah ke naazil kiye huye ke mutaabiq faisle na karein wahi zaalim hain.
verses.deepMeaning: Shari'at-e-Islamia mein bhi yahi hukm hai ke qesaas ke baghair kisi ko qatl nahin kiya jaa sakta, chunaancheh hadees mein hai, Rasoolullah ﷺ ne farmaya: Ek musalmaan shakhs jo iss baat ki gawaahi deta ho ke Allah ke siwa koyi ma'bood nahin aur Main (Muhammad ﷺ) uska Rasool hoon to uska khoon (usko qatl-o-halaak karna) in teen sooraton ke siwa halaal nahin: ⓵ Jaan ke badle jaan (qatl-e-amad ki soorat mein bataur-e-qisaas qatl kiya jaayega) ⓶ Shaadi shudah shakhs zina ka murtakib ho (to use rajm ki saza di jaayegi) ⓷ Koyi shakhs apne deen (islam) se phir jaaye aur (musalmaanon ki) jamaa'at ko chhod de.' Neez mulaahazah keejiye: (Sahih Bukhar, Hadees:6878 ma' Fatahul Baari)

verses.arabic: وَ قَفَّيْنَا عَلٰٓى اٰثَارِهِمْ بِعِيْسَى ابْنِ مَرْيَمَ مُصَدِّقًا لِّمَا بَيْنَ يَدَيْهِ مِنَ التَّوْرٰىةِ ۖ وَ اٰتَيْنَاهُ الْاِنْجِيْلَ فِيْهِ هُدًى وَّ نُوْرٌ وَّ مُصَدِّقًا لِّمَا بَيْنَ يَدَيْهِ مِنَ التَّوْرٰىةِ وَ هُدًى وَّ مَوْعِظَةً لِّلْمُتَّقِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa qaffainaa 'alaa aasaarihim bi'Eesabni Maryama musaddiqal limaa baina yadaihi minat Tawraah; wa aatainaahul Injeela feehi hudanw wa noorunw wa musaddiqal limaa baina yadaihi minat Tawraati wa hudanw wa maw'izatan lilmuttaqeen
verses.translation: Aur humne un (Rasoolon) ke ba'd Eisa Ibne Maryam ko bheja¹ jo apne se pahle naazil shudah kitab tauraat ki tasdeeq karne waale the. aur humne unhein injeel di jis mein hidaayat aur raushni thi, aur woh apne se pahle ki kitab tauraat ki tasdeeq karne waali thi aur parhez gaaron ke liye saraasar hidaayat aur naseehat thi.
verses.deepMeaning: Rasoolullah ﷺ ne farmaya: 'Main ibne Maryam (عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام) se sab logon se ziyaadah qurb-o-ta'alluq rakhne waala hoon aur tamaam paghamber allaati bhaai hain aur mere aur Ibne Maryam ke darmiyaan koyi Nabi Mab'oos nahin huwa.' (Al-Bukhari, Hadees:3442)

verses.arabic: وَ لْيَحْكُمْ اَهْلُ الْاِنْجِيْلِ بِمَاۤ اَنْزَلَ اللّٰهُ فِيْهِ ۭ وَ مَنْ لَّمْ يَحْكُمْ بِمَاۤ اَنْزَلَ اللّٰهُ فَاُولٰٓىٕكَ هُمُ الْفٰسِقُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wal yahkum ahlul Injeeli bimaaa anzalal laahu feeh; wa mal lam yahkum bimaaa anzalal laahu fa ulaaa'ika humul faasiqoon
verses.translation: Aur ahle injeel ko chaahiye ke Allah ne uss mein jo kuchh naazil kiya uske mutaabiq faisle karein, aur jo log Allah ke naazil kiye huye ke mutaabiq faisle na karein wahi naafar maan hain.

verses.arabic: وَ اَنْزَلْنَآ اِلَيْكَ الْكِتٰبَ بِالْحَقِّ مُصَدِّقًا لِّمَا بَيْنَ يَدَيْهِ مِنَ الْكِتٰبِ وَ مُهَيْمِنًا عَلَيْهِ فَاحْكُمْ بَيْنَهُمْ بِمَآ اَنْزَلَ اللّٰهُ وَ لَا تَتَّبِعْ اَهْوَآءَهُمْ عَمَّا جَآءَكَ مِنَ الْحَقِّ ۭ لِكُلٍّ جَعَلْنَا مِنْكُمْ شِرْعَةً وَّ مِنْهَاجًا ۭ وَ لَوْ شَآءَ اللّٰهُ لَجَعَلَكُمْ اُمَّةً وَّاحِدَةً وَّ لٰكِنْ لِّيَبْلُوَكُمْ فِيْ مَآ اٰتٰىكُمْ فَاسْتَبِقُوا الْخَيْرٰتِ ۭ اِلَى اللّٰهِ مَرْجِعُكُمْ جَمِيْعًا فَيُنَبِّئُكُمْ بِمَا كُنْتُمْ فِيْهِ تَخْتَلِفُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa anzalnaaa ilaikal Kitaaba bilhaqqi musaddiqal limaa baina yadaihi minal Kitaabi wa muhaiminan 'alaihi fahkum bainahum bimaaa anzalal laahu wa laa tattabi' ahwaaa'ahum 'ammaa jaaa'aka minal haqq; likullin ja'alnaa minkum shir'atanw wa minhaaja; wa law shaaa'al laahu laja'alakum ummatanw waahidatanw wa laakil liyabluwakum fee maa ataakum fastabiqoo alkhairaati; ilal laahi marji'ukum jamee'an fayunabbi'ukum bimaa kuntum feehi takhtalifoon 'ahwaaa'ahum 'ammaa jaaa'aka minal-haqq; likullin-ja'alnaa minkum shir'atanw-wa minhaajaa; wa law shaaa'al-laahu laja'alakum ummatañw- waahidatanw-wa laakil- liyabluwakum fee maaa 'aataakum fastabiqul- khayraat; 'ilal-laahi marji'ukum jamee'an fayunabbi'ukum bimaa kuntum feehi takhtalifoon.
verses.translation: Aur (Aye Nabi!) humne Aap par yeh kitaab haq ke saath naazil ki yeh tasdeeq karne waali hai iss kitab ki jo isse pahle thi aur uss par negahbaan hai,¹ chunaancheh Aap unke darmiyaan Allah ki naazil ki huye hidaayat ke mutaabiq faisle karein, aur aapke paas jo haq aaya hai use nazar andaaz karke unki khaahishaat ki pairwi na karein. humne tum mein se har ek ke liye ek dastoor aur tareeqah banaaya, aur agar Allah chaahta to zaroor ek ummat bana deta lekin woh chaahta hai ke tumhein uss (kitaab) ke baare mein aazmaaye jo usne tumhein di hai, chunaancheh tum nekiyon mein ek doosre se aage badho, tum sab ko Allah hi ki taraf laut kar jaana hai, phir woh tumhen asal haqeeqat bataa dega jis mein tum ikhtelaaf karte rahte the.
verses.deepMeaning: Qura'n Kareem pichhli tamaam aasmaani kitabon par muhaafiz (negahbaan)hai. un kitabon ke ander jo sachchaayi (Allah ka kalaam)hai, qura'n uski tasdeeq karta hai aur unke ander jo jhoot (tahreef-o-aamezish) hai uski takzeeb karta hai.

verses.arabic: وَ اَنِ احْكُمْ بَيْنَهُمْ بِمَآ اَنْزَلَ اللّٰهُ وَ لَا تَتَّبِعْ اَهْوَآءَهُمْ وَ احْذَرْهُمْ اَنْ يَّفْتِنُوْكَ عَنْۢ بَعْضِ مَآ اَنْزَلَ اللّٰهُ اِلَيْكَ ۚ فَاِنْ تَوَلَّوْا فَاعْلَمْ اَنَّمَا يُرِيْدُ اللّٰهُ اَنْ يُّصِيْبَهُمْ بِبَعْضِ ذُنُوْبِهِمْ ۭ وَ اِنَّ كَثِيْرًا مِّنَ النَّاسِ لَفٰسِقُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'anih-kum baynahum bimaaa 'anzalal-laahu wa laa tattabi' 'ahwaaa'ahum wahzarhum 'añy- yaftinooka 'am ba di maaa 'anzalal-laahu 'ilayka fa'in tawallaw falam 'annamaa yureedul-laahu 'any- yuşeebahum biba'di zunoobihim; wa 'inna kaseeram-minan-naasi lafaasiqoon.
verses.translation: Aur (Aye Nabi!) Aap un logon ke darmiyaan uske mutaabiq faislah karen jo Allah ne (Aap par) naazil kiya hai aur unki khaahishaat ki pairwi na karein, aur unse hoshyaar rahein kahin woh Aapko kisi aise hukm se idhar udhar na kardein jo Allah ne Aap par utaara hai, phir agar woh usse munh modein to jaan len ke Allah ka faqat yahi iraadah hai ke unke ba'z gunaahon ki wajah se unhen saza de, aur beshak un logon mein se aksar naafarmaan hain.

verses.arabic: اَفَحُكْمَ الْجَاهِلِيَّةِ يَبْغُوْنَ ۚ وَ مَنْ اَحْسَنُ مِنَ اللّٰهِ حُكْمًا لِقَوْمٍ يُّوْقِنُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Afahukmal- jaahiliyyati yabghoon; wa man 'ahsanu minal- laahi hukmal-liqawminy- yooqinoon.
verses.translation: Kiya phir woh jaahliyyat ka faislah chaahte hain? aur jo qaum Allah par yaqeen rakhti hai, uske nazdeek Allah se behtar faislah karne waala kaun hai?

verses.arabic: يٰٓاَيُّهَا الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا لَا تَتَّخِذُوا الْيَهُوْدَ وَ النَّصٰرٰى اَوْلِيَآءَ ۘ بَعْضُهُمْ اَوْلِيَآءُ بَعْضٍ ۚ وَ مَنْ يَّتَوَلَّهُمْ مِّنْكُمْ فَاِنَّهٗ مِنْهُمْ ۭ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ لَا يَهْدِي الْقَوْمَ الظّٰلِمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhal- lazeena aamanoo laa tattakhizul-Yahooda wan-nasaaraaa 'awliyaaa'; ba'duhum 'awliyaaa'u ba'd; wa many-yatawallahum minkum fa'innahoo minhum; innal-laaha laa yahdil-qawmaz- zaalimeen.
verses.translation: Aye logo jo eemaan laaye ho! yahoodiyon aur Eisaayiyon ko dost na banaao, woh aapas mein baahum dost hain, aur tum mein se jo koyi unse dosti rakkhega to beshak woh unhi mein se hoga. beshak Allah zaalim logon ko hidaayat nahin deta.
