verses.arabic: فَتَرَى الَّذِيْنَ فِيْ قُلُوْبِهِمْ مَّرَضٌ يُّسَارِعُوْنَ فِيْهِمْ يَقُوْلُوْنَ نَخْشٰۤى اَنْ تُصِيْبَنَا دَآىٕرَةٌ ۭ فَعَسَى اللّٰهُ اَنْ يَّاْتِيَ بِالْفَتْحِ اَوْ اَمْرٍ مِّنْ عِنْدِهٖ فَيُصْبِحُوْا عَلٰى مَآ اَسَرُّوْا فِيْٓ اَنْفُسِهِمْ نٰدِمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Fataral-lazeena fee quloobihim-maraduñy- yusaari'oona feehim yaqooloona nakhshaaa 'an tuşeebanaa daaa'irah; fa'asal-laahu 'any-ya'tiya bilfathi 'aw 'amrim-min 'indihee fayuşbihoo 'alaa maaa 'asarroo feee 'anfusihim naadimeen.
verses.translation: Phir aap un logon ko dekhte hain jinke dilon mein (munaafiqat ka) rog hai ke woh daud kar yahoodiyon mein jaate hain aur un se kahte hain: hamein dar hai ke kahin hum kisi museebat mein na phans jaayein, phir qareeb hai ke Allah (tumhein) fatah 'ataa kare ya apni taraf se koyi aur baat zaahir kare, to yeh log (apni munaafiqat par) pachtaayenge jise woh apne dilon mein chhupaaye huye hain.

verses.arabic: وَ يَقُوْلُ الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْۤا اَهٰٓؤُلَآءِ الَّذِيْنَ اَقْسَمُوْا بِاللّٰهِ جَهْدَ اَيْمَانِهِمْ اِنَّهُمْ لَمَعَكُمْ ۚ حَبِطَتْ اَعْمَالُهُمْ فَاَصْبَحُوْا خٰسِرِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa yaqoolul-lazeena 'aamanooo 'ahaaa'ulaaa'il-lazeena 'aqsamoo billaahi jahda 'aymaanihim 'innahum lama'akum; habitat 'a'maaluhum fa'aşbahoo khaasireen.
verses.translation: Aur (uss waqt) woh log jo eemaan laaye hain, kahenge: kiya yahi woh log hain jinhon ne badi shaddo mad se Allah ki qasmen khaayi thin ke beshak woh tumhaare saath hain, unke amal barbaad ho gaye aur woh khasaarah uthhaane waalon mein ho gaye.

verses.arabic: يٰٓاَيُّهَا الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا مَنْ يَّرْتَدَّ مِنْكُمْ عَنْ دِيْنِهٖ فَسَوْفَ يَاْتِي اللّٰهُ بِقَوْمٍ يُّحِبُّهُمْ وَ يُحِبُّوْنَهٗۤ اَذِلَّةٍ عَلَى الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ اَعِزَّةٍ عَلَى الْكٰفِرِيْنَ يُجَاهِدُوْنَ فِيْ سَبِيْلِ اللّٰهِ وَ لَا يَخَافُوْنَ لَوْمَةَ لَآىٕمٍ ۭ ذٰلِكَ فَضْلُ اللّٰهِ يُؤْتِيْهِ مَنْ يَّشَآءُ ۭ وَ اللّٰهُ وَاسِعٌ عَلِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhal- lazeena 'aamanoo many- yartadda minkum 'an deenihee fasawfa ya'til- laahu biqawminy- yuhibbuhum wa yuhibboonahooo 'azillatin 'alal- mu'mineena 'a'izzatin 'alal-kaafireena yujaahidoona fee sabeelil-laahi wa laa yakhaafoona lawmata laaa'im; zaalika fadlul- laahi yu'teehi mañy- yashaaa'; wallaahu Waasi'un 'Aleem.
verses.translation: Aye logo jo eemaan laaye ho! tum mein se jo koyi apne deen se phir jaaye to Allah jald aise log laayega ke woh unse muhabbat karta hoga. aur woh usse muhabbat karte honge. woh mominon par narmi karne waale honge aur kaafiron par sakhti karne waale, woh Allah ki raah mein jehaad karenge. aur kisi mulaamat karne waale ki mulaamat se na darenge, yeh Allah ka fazl hai, woh jise chaahta hai a'taa karta hai aur Allah us'at waala, khoob jaanne waala hai.

verses.arabic: اِنَّمَا وَلِيُّكُمُ اللّٰهُ وَ رَسُوْلُهٗ وَ الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوا الَّذِيْنَ يُقِيْمُوْنَ الصَّلٰوةَ وَ يُؤْتُوْنَ الزَّكٰوةَ وَ هُمْ رٰكِعُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Innamaa waliyyukumul-laahu wa Rasooluhoo wal-lazeena 'aamanul-lazeena yuqeemoonaş-Şalaata wa yu'toonaz-Zakaata wa hum raaki'oon.
verses.translation: Tumhaare dost to sirf Allah aur uska Rasool aur woh log hain jo eemaan laaye, jo namaaz qaayem karte hain aur zakaat dete hain aur woh ruku' karne waale hain.

verses.arabic: وَ مَنْ يَّتَوَلَّ اللّٰهَ وَ رَسُوْلَهٗ وَ الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا فَاِنَّ حِزْبَ اللّٰهِ هُمُ الْغٰلِبُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa mañy-yatawallal- laaha wa Rasoolahoo wallazeena 'aamanoo fa'inna hizbal-laahi humul-ghaaliboon.
verses.translation: Aur jo koyi Allah se aur uske Rasool se dosti rakhta hai aur un logon se dosti rakhta hai jo eemaan laaye hain,¹ to (woh Allah ka giroh hain aur) yaqeenan Allah ka giroh hi ghaalib aane waala hai.

verses.arabic: يٰٓاَيُّهَا الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا لَا تَتَّخِذُوا الَّذِيْنَ اتَّخَذُوْا دِيْنَكُمْ هُزُوًا وَّ لَعِبًا مِّنَ الَّذِيْنَ اُوْتُوا الْكِتٰبَ مِنْ قَبْلِكُمْ وَ الْكُفَّارَ اَوْلِيَآءَ ۘ وَ اتَّقُوا اللّٰهَ اِنْ كُنْتُمْ مُّؤْمِنِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhal- lazeena 'aamanoo laa tattakhizul-lazeenat- takhazoo deenakum huzuwanw-wa la'ibam- minal-lazeena 'ootul- Kitaaba min qablikum walkuffaara 'awliyaaa'; wattaqul-laaha in kuntum mu'mineen.
verses.translation: Aye logo jo eemaan laaye ho! tum un logon ko apna dost na banaao jinhon ne tumhaare deen ko hansi aur khel banaa liya hai, un logon mein se jinhein tumse pahle kitab di gayi thi aur jo kaafir hain, aur Allah se darte raho agar tum momin ho.

verses.arabic: وَ اِذَا نَادَيْتُمْ اِلَى الصَّلٰوةِ اتَّخَذُوْهَا هُزُوًا وَّ لَعِبًا ۭ ذٰلِكَ بِاَنَّهُمْ قَوْمٌ لَّا يَعْقِلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'izaa naadaytum 'ilaş-Şalaatit- takhazoohaa huzu- wanw-wa laʻibaa; zaalika bi'annahum qawmul-laa ya'qiloon.
verses.translation: Aur jab tum unhen namaaz ki taraf bulaate ho¹ to woh use hansi aur khel banaa lete hain. uski wajah se yeh hai ke woh log aqal nahin rakhte.
verses.deepMeaning: Ya'ni azaan de kar. Namaaz ke liye bulaane ka yeh tareeqa Nabi ﷺ ko iss tarah batalaaya gaya ke ba'z sahaaba رضي الله عنه ko khaab mein iske lafaaz bataaye gaye aur Aap ﷺ ne unhein ikhtiyaar farma liya. Hazrat Anas se rivaayat hai ke namaaz ke e'laan ke liye logon ne aag jalaana aur naaqoos bajaana tajweez kiya jo ke Yahood-o-Nasaara ka tareeqa tha. Tab Bilaal رضي الله عنه se kaha gaya: 'azaan ke kalimaat do do martabah aur iqaamat ke liye ek ek martabah kahe.' (Al-Bukhaari, Al-azaan, Baab:1, Hadees:603) iss maqaam ke elaawah (Surah juma' 62/9) mein bhi namaaz ke liye (nidaa) azaan) diye jaane ka zikr hai. yeh kalimaat-e-azaan ya (Nidaa-e-salaat) qur'an mein kahin nahin hai. jis se yeh waazeh ho jaata hai ke hadees ke baghair qur'an ko nahin samjha jaa sakta na uss par amal hi kiya jaa sakta hai lehaaza hadees bhi qur'an ki tarah deen ka maakhaz hai.

verses.arabic: قُلْ يٰٓاَهْلَ الْكِتٰبِ هَلْ تَنْقِمُوْنَ مِنَّاۤ اِلَّاۤ اَنْ اٰمَنَّا بِاللّٰهِ وَ مَآ اُنْزِلَ اِلَيْنَا وَ مَآ اُنْزِلَ مِنْ قَبْلُ وَ اَنَّ اَكْثَرَكُمْ فٰسِقُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qul yaaa 'Ahlal- Kitaabi hal tanqimoona minnaaa 'illaaa 'an 'aamannaa billaahi wa maaa 'unzila 'ilaynaa wa maaa 'unzila min qablu wa 'anna 'aksarakum faasiqoon.
verses.translation: (Aye nabi!) kah deejiye: aye ahle kitab! kiya tum hum se sirf iss wajah se zid rakhte ho ke hum Allah par aur apni taraf naazil ki gayi kitab par aur (apne se) pahle naazil ki gayi kitabon par eemaan rakhte hain, aur beshak tum mein se aksar naa farmaan hain.

verses.arabic: قُلْ هَلْ اُنَبِّئُكُمْ بِشَرٍّ مِّنْ ذٰلِكَ مَثُوْبَةً عِنْدَ اللّٰهِ ۭ مَنْ لَّعَنَهُ اللّٰهُ وَ غَضِبَ عَلَيْهِ وَ جَعَلَ مِنْهُمُ الْقِرَدَةَ وَ الْخَنَازِيْرَ وَ عَبَدَ الطَّاغُوْتَ ۭ اُولٰٓىٕكَ شَرٌّ مَّكَانًا وَّ اَضَلُّ عَنْ سَوَآءِ السَّبِيْلِ
verses.transliteration: Qul hal 'unabbi'ukum bisharrim-min zaalika masoobatan 'indal-laah; mal-la'anahul-laahu wa ghadiba 'alayhi wa ja'ala minhumul-qiradata walkhanaazeera wa 'abadat-Taaghoot; 'ulaaa'ika sharrum- makaananw-wa 'adallu 'an Sawaaa'is-Sabeel.
verses.translation: (Aye nabi!) kah deejiye: kiya main tumhein (uss shakhs ke baare mein) na bataa dun jo jaza ke e'tebaar se, Allah ke nazdeek usse bhi badtar hai? yeh woh shakhs hai ke Allah ne uss pa la'nat ki aur iss benaa par apna ghazab naazil kiya, aur un mein se ba'z ko bandar aur suwar banaa diya, aur uss shakhs ne shaytaan ki bandagi ki, wohi log badtar darje mein hain aur seedhi raah se woh sabse ziyaadah gumraah hain.

verses.arabic: وَ اِذَا جَآءُوْكُمْ قَالُوْۤا اٰمَنَّا وَ قَدْ دَخَلُوْا بِالْكُفْرِ وَ هُمْ قَدْ خَرَجُوْا بِهٖ ۚ وَ اللّٰهُ اَعْلَمُ بِمَا كَانُوْا يَكْتُمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'izaa jaaa'ookum qaalooo 'aamannaa wa qad dakhaloo bilkufri wa hum qad kharajoo bih; wallaahu 'a'lamu bimaa kaanoo yaktumoon.
verses.translation: Aur jab woh tumhaare paas aate hain to kahte hain ke hum eemaan laaye aur unka haal yeh hai ke woh kufr ke saath hi daakhil huye the aur usi ke saath nikal gaye aur Allah uss cheez ko khoob jaanta hai jise woh chhupaate hain.

verses.arabic: وَ تَرٰى كَثِيْرًا مِّنْهُمْ يُّسَارِعُوْنَ فِي الْاِثْمِ وَ الْعُدْوَانِ وَ اَكْلِهِمُ السُّحْتَ ۭ لَبِئْسَ مَا كَانُوْا يَعْمَلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa taraa kaseeram- minhum yusaari'oona fil- 'ismi wal'udwaani wa 'aklihimus-suht; labi'sa maa kaanoo ya'maloon.
verses.translation: Aur aap un mein se bahuton ko dekhte hain ke woh gunaah, ziyaadati aur haraam khaane mein jaldi karte hain, bahut bura hai jo kuchh woh karte hain.

verses.arabic: لَوْلَا يَنْهٰىهُمُ الرَّبّٰنِيُّوْنَ وَ الْاَحْبَارُ عَنْ قَوْلِهِمُ الْاِثْمَ وَ اَكْلِهِمُ السُّحْتَ ۭ لَبِئْسَ مَا كَانُوْا يَصْنَعُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Law laa yanhaahumur- rabbaaniyyoona wal'ahbaaru 'an qawlihimul-isma wa 'aklihimus-suht; labi'sa maa kaanoo yaşna'oon.
verses.translation: Rab waale aur unke u'lamaa unhen gunaah ki baat kahne aur haraam khaane se kyun nahin rokte? bahut bura hai jo kuchh woh (apne liye) tayyaar kar rahe hain.

verses.arabic: وَ قَالَتِ الْيَهُوْدُ يَدُ اللّٰهِ مَغْلُوْلَةٌ ۘ غُلَّتْ اَيْدِيْهِمْ وَ لُعِنُوْا بِمَا قَالُوْا ۘ بَلْ يَدَاهُ مَبْسُوْطَتٰنِ يُنْفِقُ كَيْفَ يَشَآءُ ۭ وَ لَيَزِيْدَنَّ كَثِيْرًا مِّنْهُمْ مَّآ اُنْزِلَ اِلَيْكَ مِنْ رَّبِّكَ طُغْيَانًا وَّ كُفْرًا ۭ وَ اَلْقَيْنَا بَيْنَهُمُ الْعَدَاوَةَ وَ الْبَغْضَآءَ اِلٰى يَوْمِ الْقِيٰمَةِ ۭ كُلَّمَآ اَوْقَدُوْا نَارًا لِّلْحَرْبِ اَطْفَاَهَا اللّٰهُ وَ يَسْعَوْنَ فِي الْاَرْضِ فَسَادًا ۭ وَ اللّٰهُ لَا يُحِبُّ الْمُفْسِدِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa qaalatil-Yahoodu Yadul-laahi maghloolah; ghullat 'aydeehim wa lu'inoo bimaa qaaloo; bal yadaahu mabsootataani yunfiqu kayfa yashaaa; wa layazeedanna kaseeram-minhum-maaa 'unzila 'ilayka mir- Rabbika tughyaananw- wa kufraa; wa 'alqaynaa baynahumul-'adaawata walbaghdaa'a 'ilaa Yawmil-Qiyaamah; kullamaaa 'awqadoo naaral-lilharbi 'atfa'ahal- laah; wa yas'awna fil- 'ardi fasaadaa; wallaahu laa yuhibbul- mufsideen.
verses.translation: Aur yahoodiyon ne kaha: 'Allah ka haath bandha huwa hai.'¹ bandh gaye unhi ke haath, aur la'nat padi un par unke uss qaul (unki uss bakwaas) ki wajah se, balke Allah ke to donon haath khule huye hain, woh jaise chaahe kharch karta hai, haqeeqat yeh hai ke yeh (qur'an) jo aapke rab ki taraf se naazil huwa hai, un mein se aksar logon ki sarkashi aur kufr mein ezaafe ka baay'is bana hai. aur humne qiyaamat ke din tak unke darmiyaan dushmani aur bughz daal diya hai. jab kabhi woh ladaayi ki aag bhadkaate hain to Allah use bujhaa deta hai aur woh zameen mein fasaad karne ko daudte hain aur Allah fasaad karne waalon ko pasand nahin karta.
verses.deepMeaning: (Sifaatullah) ki tafseer ke liye mulaahazah keejiye haashyah: (Surah Aal-e-Imran:3/73) qura'n kareem mein jo bhi Allah Ta'ala ki sifaat masalan: chehrah, aankh, haath, pindli, aana aur qaraar pakadna waghairah bayaan huyi hain ya jo sifaat aahaadees-e-Rasool ﷺ se saabit hain. jaise: utarna aur hansna waghairah, to ulmaa-e-kitab-o-sunnat un sifaat par eemaan rakhte hain aur baghair kisi taaweel, tashbeeh aur ta'teel (inkaar) ke un sifaat ko Allah ke liye saabit karte hain.

verses.arabic: وَ لَوْ اَنَّ اَهْلَ الْكِتٰبِ اٰمَنُوْا وَ اتَّقَوْا لَكَفَّرْنَا عَنْهُمْ سَيِّاٰتِهِمْ وَ لَاَدْخَلْنٰهُمْ جَنّٰتِ النَّعِيْمِ
verses.transliteration: Wa law 'anna 'Ahlal- Kitaabi 'aamanoo wattaqaw lakaffarnaa 'anhum sayyi'aatihim wa la'adkhalnaahum Jannaatin-Na'eem.
verses.translation: Aur agar ahle kitab eemaan le aayein aur parhez gaari ikhtiyaar karlein to yaqeenan hum unse unki buraayiyaan door kardenge aur unhein ne'mat waale baaghon mein zaroor daakhil karenge

verses.arabic: وَ لَوْ اَنَّهُمْ اَقَامُوا التَّوْرٰىةَ وَ الْاِنْجِيْلَ وَ مَاۤ اُنْزِلَ اِلَيْهِمْ مِّنْ رَّبِّهِمْ لَاَكَلُوْا مِنْ فَوْقِهِمْ وَ مِنْ تَحْتِ اَرْجُلِهِمْ ۚ مِنْهُمْ اُمَّةٌ مُّقْتَصِدَةٌ ۙ وَ كَثِيْرٌ مِّنْهُمْ سَآءَ مَا يَعْمَلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa law 'annahum 'aqaamut-Tawraata wal- 'Injeela wa maaa 'unzila 'ilayhim-mir-Rabbihim la'akaloo min fawqihim wa min tahti 'arjulihim; minhum 'ummatum- muqtasidatun wa kaseerum-minhum saaa'a maa ya maloon.
verses.translation: Aur agar woh toraat aur injeel aur apne rab ki taraf se naazil ki gayi (doosri) kitabon ke ahkaam par thheek thheek amal karte to unhen apne oupar aur neeche se (waafar rizq) khaane ko milta. un mein se ek giroh darmiyaani raah chalne waala hai. aur un mein se ziyaadah tar log jo kuchh kar rahe hain woh bahut bura hai.

verses.arabic: يٰٓاَيُّهَا الرَّسُوْلُ بَلِّغْ مَآ اُنْزِلَ اِلَيْكَ مِنْ رَّبِّكَ ۭ وَ اِنْ لَّمْ تَفْعَلْ فَمَا بَلَّغْتَ رِسَالَتَهٗ ۭ وَ اللّٰهُ يَعْصِمُكَ مِنَ النَّاسِ ۭ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ لَا يَهْدِي الْقَوْمَ الْكٰفِرِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhar- Rasoolu balligh maaaa 'unzila 'ilayka mir- Rabbika wa 'il-lam tafal famaaa ballaghta Risaalatah; wallaahu ya'şimuka minan-naas; 'innal-laaha laa yahdil- qawmal-kaafireen.
verses.translation: Aye Rasool! aapke rab ki taraf se aap par jo naazil kiya gaya hai woh logon tak pahunchaa deejiye. aur agar aap ne aisa na kiya to goya aap ne uski paighambari ka haq adaa na kiya, aur Allah aap ko logon (ke shar) se bachaayega, aur bilashubah Allah kaafiron ki qaum ko hidaayat nahin deta.

verses.arabic: قُلْ يٰٓاَهْلَ الْكِتٰبِ لَسْتُمْ عَلٰى شَيْءٍ حَتّٰى تُقِيْمُوا التَّوْرٰىةَ وَ الْاِنْجِيْلَ وَ مَاۤ اُنْزِلَ اِلَيْكُمْ مِّنْ رَّبِّكُمْ ۭ وَ لَيَزِيْدَنَّ كَثِيْرًا مِّنْهُمْ مَّاۤ اُنْزِلَ اِلَيْكَ مِنْ رَّبِّكَ طُغْيَانًا وَّ كُفْرًا ۭ فَلَا تَاْسَ عَلَى الْقَوْمِ الْكٰفِرِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qul yaaa 'Ahlal- Kitaabi lastum 'alaa shay'in hattaa tuqeemut- Tawraata wal-'Injeela wa maaa 'unzila 'ilaykum mir-Rabbikum; wa layazeedanna kaseeram-minhum-maaa 'unzila 'ilayka mir- Rabbika tughyaananw- wa kufran falaa ta'sa 'alal-qawmil-kaafireen.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) kah deejiye: aye ahle kitab! tum hargiz asal deen par kaarband nahin ho sakte yahaan tak ke tum tauraat-o-injeel aur apne rab ki taraf se naazil ki gayi doosri kitabon ke ahkaam par thheek thheek amal karne lago haqeeqat yeh hai ke yeh qur'an jo aapke rab ki taraf se naazil huwa hai, un mein se aksar logon ki sarkashi aur kufr mein ezaafe ka baay'is banega, aur aap kaakiron ki qaum ka gham na khaayen.

verses.arabic: اِنَّ الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا وَ الَّذِيْنَ هَادُوْا وَ الصّٰبِـُٕوْنَ وَ النَّصٰرٰى مَنْ اٰمَنَ بِاللّٰهِ وَ الْيَوْمِ الْاٰخِرِ وَ عَمِلَ صَالِحًا فَلَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ وَ لَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Innal-lazeena 'aamanoo wallazeena haadoo waş-şaabi'oona wan-Nasaaraa man 'aamana billaahi wal- yawmil-'Aakhiri wa 'amila şaalihan falaa khawfun 'alayhim wa laa hum yahzanoon.
verses.translation: Beshak jo log eemaan laaye aur jo log yahoodi huye aur saabi (be deen) aur Nasaara, un mein se jo bhi Allah aur aakhirat ke din par eemaan laaye aur nek amal karte to un par koyi khauf nahin hoga aur na ghamgeen honge.

verses.arabic: لَقَدْ اَخَذْنَا مِيْثَاقَ بَنِيْۤ اِسْرَآءِيْلَ وَ اَرْسَلْنَآ اِلَيْهِمْ رُسُلًا ۚ كُلَّمَا جَآءَهُمْ رَسُوْلٌۢ بِمَا لَا تَهْوٰٓى اَنْفُسُهُمْ فَرِيْقًا كَذَّبُوْا وَ فَرِيْقًا يَقْتُلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Laqad 'akhaznaa meesaaqa Baneee 'Israaa'eela wa 'arsalnaaa 'ilayhim Rusulan kullamaa jaaa'ahum Rasoolum- bimaa laa tahwaaa 'anfusuhum fareeqan kazzaboo wa fareeqañy- yaqtuloon.
verses.translation: Yaqeenan humne Bani Israayeel se pukhtah a'had liya tha aur hum ne unki taraf kayi Rasool bheje, jab unke paas koyi Rasool aisi cheez le kar aaya jise unke nafs pasand nahin karte the to ba'z nabyon ko unhon ne jhutlaaya aur ba'z ko woh qatl hi kar dete the.

verses.arabic: وَ حَسِبُوْۤا اَلَّا تَكُوْنَ فِتْنَةٌ فَعَمُوْا وَ صَمُّوْا ثُمَّ تَابَ اللّٰهُ عَلَيْهِمْ ثُمَّ عَمُوْا وَ صَمُّوْا كَثِيْرٌ مِّنْهُمْ ۭ وَ اللّٰهُ بَصِيْرٌۢ بِمَا يَعْمَلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa hasibooo 'allaa takoona fitnatun fa'amoo wa şammoo summa taabal-laahu 'alayhim summa 'amoo wa şammoo kaseerum- minhum; wallaahu baseerum-bimaa ya'maloon.
verses.translation: Aur un logon ka khayaal tha ke unki koyi aazmaayish na hogi, pas woh andhe aur bahre ho gaye, phir Allah un par meharbaan huwa, magar un mein se ziyaada tar log phir andhe aur bahre ho gaye. aur Allah khoob dekhne waala hai jo kuchh woh karte hain.

verses.arabic: لَقَدْ كَفَرَ الَّذِيْنَ قَالُوْۤا اِنَّ اللّٰهَ هُوَ الْمَسِيْحُ ابْنُ مَرْيَمَ ۚ وَ قَالَ الْمَسِيْحُ يٰبَنِيْۤ اِسْرَآءِيْلَ اعْبُدُوا اللّٰهَ رَبِّيْ وَ رَبَّكُمْ ۭ اِنَّهٗ مَنْ يُّشْرِكْ بِاللّٰهِ فَقَدْ حَرَّمَ اللّٰهُ عَلَيْهِ الْجَنَّةَ وَ مَاْوٰىهُ النَّارُ ۭ وَ مَا لِلظّٰلِمِيْنَ مِنْ اَنْصَارٍ
verses.transliteration: Laqad kafaral-lazeena qaalooo 'innal- laaha Huwal-maseehub- nu-Maryama wa qaalal- Maseehu yaa Baneee 'Israaa'eela'-budul-laaha Rabbee wa Rabbakum 'innahoo many-yushrik ballaahi faqad harramal- laahu 'alayhil-jannata wa ma'waahun-Naaru wa maa lizzaalimeena min 'anşaar.
verses.translation: Yaqeenan kufr kiya un logon ne jinhon ne kaha: beshak Allah to wahi maseeh Ibne Maryam hai. aur Maseeh ne kaha: aye Bani Israyeel! tum Allah ki i'baadat karo jo mera aur tumhaara rab hai, beshak jo Allah ke saath shirk karta hai to yaqeenan Allah ne uss par jannat haraam kardi hai, aur uska thhekaana dozakh hai aur zaalimon ka koyi madadgaaar nahin.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Mulaahazah keejiye haashyah: (Surah Baqarah:2/165)

verses.arabic: لَقَدْ كَفَرَ الَّذِيْنَ قَالُوْۤا اِنَّ اللّٰهَ ثَالِثُ ثَلٰثَةٍ ۘ وَ مَا مِنْ اِلٰهٍ اِلَّآ اِلٰهٌ وَّاحِدٌ ۭ وَ اِنْ لَّمْ يَنْتَهُوْا عَمَّا يَقُوْلُوْنَ لَيَمَسَّنَّ الَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا مِنْهُمْ عَذَابٌ اَلِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: laqad kafaral-lazeena qaalooo 'innal-laaha saalisu salaasah; wa maa min 'ilaahin 'illaaa 'Ilaahuñw-Waahid; wa 'il-lam yantahoo 'ammaa yaqooloona layamas- sannal-lazeena kafaroo minhum 'azaabun 'aleem.
verses.translation: Yaqeenan kaafir huye woh log jinhon ne kaha: beshak Allah teen mein se teesra hai aur koyi ma'bood nahin siwaaye ek ma'bood ke. aur woh jo kuchh kahte hain agar usse baaz na aaye to un mein se jin logon ne kufr kiya, unhen zaroor dardnaak a'zaab milega.

verses.arabic: اَفَلَا يَتُوْبُوْنَ اِلَى اللّٰهِ وَ يَسْتَغْفِرُوْنَهٗ ۭ وَ اللّٰهُ غَفُوْرٌ رَّحِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: 'Afalaa yatooboona 'ilal-laahi wa yastaghfiroonah; wallaahu Ghafoorur- Raheem.
verses.translation: Phir kiya woh Allah ke saamne taubah nahin karte aur usse bakhshish nahin maangte? aur Allah bahut bakhshne wala, nihaayat raham karne waala hai.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Allah Ta'ala taubah-o-istaghfaar se kitna khush hota hai uska andaazah hadees-e-Rasool ﷺ se lagaayein: 'Allah Ta'ala apne bande ki taubah par uss aadmi se bhi ziyaadah khush hota hai ke jiska wount bayabaan mein gum ho jaane ke ba'd use achaanak mil jaaye.' (Sahih Al-Bukhari, Ad-Da'waat, Baab:4, Hadees:6309)

verses.arabic: مَا الْمَسِيْحُ ابْنُ مَرْيَمَ اِلَّا رَسُوْلٌ ۚ قَدْ خَلَتْ مِنْ قَبْلِهِ الرُّسُلُ ۚ وَ اُمُّهٗ صِدِّيْقَةٌ ۚ كَانَا يَاْكُلٰنِ الطَّعَامَ ۭ اُنْظُرْ كَيْفَ نُبَيِّنُ لَهُمُ الْاٰيٰتِ ثُمَّ انْظُرْ اَنّٰى يُؤْفَكُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Mal-Maseehub-nu- Maryama 'illaa Rasoolun qad khalat min qablihir- Rusulu wa 'ummuhoo şiddeeqatun kaanaa ya'kulaanit-ta'aam; 'unzur kayfa nubayyinu lahumul-'Aayaati summan-zur 'annaa yu'fakoon.
verses.translation: Maseeh Ibne Maryam nahin hain magar ek Rasool hi, unse pahle bahut se Rasool guzar chuke hain aur unki maan siddeeqah (nihaayat raast baaz) thi, woh donon khaana khaate the. dekhein hum unke liye kaisi kaisi nishaaniyan bayaan karte hain, phir dekhenge woh kidhar ulte phire jaate hain.

verses.arabic: قُلْ اَتَعْبُدُوْنَ مِنْ دُوْنِ اللّٰهِ مَا لَا يَمْلِكُ لَكُمْ ضَرًّا وَّ لَا نَفْعًا ۚ وَ اللّٰهُ هُوَ السَّمِيْعُ الْعَلِيْمُ
verses.transliteration: Qul 'ata'budoona min doonil-laahi maa laa yamliku lakum darrañw- wa laa nafaa; wallaahu Huwas-Samee'ul-'Aleem.
verses.translation: (Aye nabi!) kah deejiye: kiya tum Allah ko chhod kar aisi cheez ki ibaadat karte ho jo tumhaare liye nuqsaan aur nafa' ka koyi ikhtiyaar nahin rakhti aur Allah hi to khoob sunne waala, khoob jaanne waala hai.

verses.arabic: قُلْ يٰٓاَهْلَ الْكِتٰبِ لَا تَغْلُوْا فِيْ دِيْنِكُمْ غَيْرَ الْحَقِّ وَ لَا تَتَّبِعُوْۤا اَهْوَآءَ قَوْمٍ قَدْ ضَلُّوْا مِنْ قَبْلُ وَ اَضَلُّوْا كَثِيْرًا وَّ ضَلُّوْا عَنْ سَوَآءِ السَّبِيْلِ
verses.transliteration: Qul yaaa 'Ahlal- Kitaabi laa taghloo fee deenikum ghayral-haqqi wa laa tattabi'ooo 'ahwaaa'a qawmin qad dalloo min qablu wa 'adalloo kaseeranw-wa dalloo 'an Sawaaa'is- Sabeel.
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: aye ahle kitab! tum apne deen mein naahaq ziyaadati na karo, aur un logon ki khaahishaat ki pairwi na karo jo isse pahle gumraah ho chuke hain. aur unhon ne bahut son ko gumraah kiya aur seedhi raah se bahak gaye.

verses.arabic: لُعِنَ الَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا مِنْۢ بَنِيْۤ اِسْرَآءِيْلَ عَلٰى لِسَانِ دَاوٗدَ وَ عِيْسَى ابْنِ مَرْيَمَ ۭ ذٰلِكَ بِمَا عَصَوْا وَّ كَانُوْا يَعْتَدُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Lu'inal-lazeena kafaroo mim Baneee 'israaa'eela 'alaa lisaani Daawooda wa 'Eesab-ni- Maryam; zaalika bimaa 'aşaw wa kaanoo ya'tadoon.
verses.translation: Bani Israayeel mein se jo log kaafir huye un par Dawood aur Eisaa Ibne Maryam ki zabaan se la'nat ki gayi, yeh iss wajah se huwa ke unhon ne naa farmaani ki aur woh had se guzar jaate the.

verses.arabic: كَانُوْا لَا يَتَنَاهَوْنَ عَنْ مُّنْكَرٍ فَعَلُوْهُ ۭ لَبِئْسَ مَا كَانُوْا يَفْعَلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Kaanoo laa yatanaahawna 'am- munkarin fa'alooh; labi'sa maa kaanoo yafaloon.
verses.translation: Woh ek doosre ko bure kaam se mana' nahin karte the ke unhon ne woh khud kiya hota tha, bahut bura tha jo woh karte the.

verses.arabic: تَرٰى كَثِيْرًا مِّنْهُمْ يَتَوَلَّوْنَ الَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا ۭ لَبِئْسَ مَا قَدَّمَتْ لَهُمْ اَنْفُسُهُمْ اَنْ سَخِطَ اللّٰهُ عَلَيْهِمْ وَ فِي الْعَذَابِ هُمْ خٰلِدُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Taraa kaseeram- minhum yatawallawnal- lazeena kafaroo; labi'sa maa qaddamat lahum 'anfusuhum 'an sakhital- laahu 'alayhim wa fil- 'azaabi hum khaalidoon.
verses.translation: Aap un mein se bahuton ko dekhenge ke woh un logon se dosti karte hain jinhon ne kufr kiya. bahut bura hai jo unke nafson ne un ke liye aage bhejaa ke Allah un se naaraaz ho gaya aur woh hameshah 'azaab mein rahne waale hain.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Yeh ahl-e-kufr se dostaanah ta'alluq ka nateejah hai ke Allah Ta'ala un par naaraaz huwa aur uss naaraazi ka nateejah jahannam ka daayemi azaab hai.

verses.arabic: وَ لَوْ كَانُوْا يُؤْمِنُوْنَ بِاللّٰهِ وَ النَّبِيِّ وَ مَآ اُنْزِلَ اِلَيْهِ مَا اتَّخَذُوْهُمْ اَوْلِيَآءَ وَ لٰكِنَّ كَثِيْرًا مِّنْهُمْ فٰسِقُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa law kaanoo yu'minoona billaahi wan- nabiyyi wa maaa 'unzila 'ilayhi mat-takhazoohum 'awliyaaa'a wa laakinna kaseeram-minhum faasiqoon.
verses.translation: Aur agar aisa hota ke woh Allah par aur uske Nabi par eemaan le aate aur uss par eemaan laate jo uski taraf naazil kiya gaya, to un (kaafiron) ko dost na banaate lekin un mein se ziyaadah tar log naafarmaan hain.

verses.arabic: لَتَجِدَنَّ اَشَدَّ النَّاسِ عَدَاوَةً لِّلَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوا الْيَهُوْدَ وَ الَّذِيْنَ اَشْرَكُوْا وَ لَتَجِدَنَّ اَقْرَبَهُمْ مَّوَدَّةً لِّلَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوا الَّذِيْنَ قَالُوْۤا اِنَّا نَصٰرٰى ۭ ذٰلِكَ بِاَنَّ مِنْهُمْ قِسِّيْسِيْنَ وَ رُهْبَانًا وَّ اَنَّهُمْ لَا يَسْتَكْبِرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Latajidanna 'ashaddan-naasi 'adaawatal-lillazeena 'aamanul-Yahooda wallazeena 'ashrakoo wa latajidanna 'aqrabahum- mawaddatal-lillazeena 'aamanul-lazeena qaalooo 'innaa Nașaaraa; zaalika bi'anna minhum qisseeseena wa ruhbaananw-wa 'annahum laa yastakbiroon.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) yaqeenan Aap logon mein ahle eemaan se a'daawat rakhne mein sakht tareen yahoodiyon aur mushrikon¹ ko paayenge aur ahle eemaan se dosti rakhne mein qareeb tareen un logon ko paayenge jinhon ne kaha beshak hum Nasaara hain, iski wajah yeh hai ke beshak un mein kuchh padhe huye 'ibaadat karne waale hain, kuchh dunya se alag thalag rahne waale hain, aur yeh ke woh ghuroor nahin karte.
verses.deepMeaning: (Al-mushrikoon) se muraad, muta'addad ma'boodon ke maanne waale, but parast, mazaahir parast aur Allah ki wahdaaniyat aur uske Rasool ﷺ Muhammad risaalat par eemaan na rakhne waale hain.

verses.arabic: وَ اِذَا سَمِعُوْا مَآ اُنْزِلَ اِلَى الرَّسُوْلِ تَرٰىۤ اَعْيُنَهُمْ تَفِيْضُ مِنَ الدَّمْعِ مِمَّا عَرَفُوْا مِنَ الْحَقِّ ۚ يَقُوْلُوْنَ رَبَّنَآ اٰمَنَّا فَاكْتُبْنَا مَعَ الشّٰهِدِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'izaa sami'oo maaa 'unzila 'ilar- Rasooli taraaa 'a'yunahum tafeedu minad-dam'i mimmaa 'arafoo minal- haqq; yaqooloona Rabbanaaa 'aamannaa faktubnaa ma'ash-shaahideen.
verses.translation: Aur jab woh Rasool par naazil kiya gaya kalaam sunte hain to Aap dekhte hain ke unki aankhon se aansu bahne lagte hain, uski wajah yeh hai ke unhon ne haq ko pahchaan liya hai. woh kahte hain: aye hamaare rab! hum eemaan le aaye, lehaaza tu hamaare naam (haq ki) gawaahi dene waalon ke saath likh le.

verses.arabic: وَ مَا لَنَا لَا نُؤْمِنُ بِاللّٰهِ وَ مَا جَآءَنَا مِنَ الْحَقِّ وَ نَطْمَعُ اَنْ يُّدْخِلَنَا رَبُّنَا مَعَ الْقَوْمِ الصّٰلِحِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maa lanaa laa nu'minu billaahi wa maa jaaa'anaa minal- haqqi wa natma'u any- yudkhilanaa Rabbunaa ma'al- qawmiş- saaliheen.
verses.translation: Aur hamaare paas kiya u'zr hai ke hum Allah par aur jo haq hum tak pahuncha hai uss par eemaan na laayein, aur hum ummeed rakhte hain ke hamaara rab hamein nek logon ke giroh mein daakhil karega.

verses.arabic: فَاَثَابَهُمُ اللّٰهُ بِمَا قَالُوْا جَنّٰتٍ تَجْرِيْ مِنْ تَحْتِهَا الْاَنْهٰرُ خٰلِدِيْنَ فِيْهَا ۭ وَ ذٰلِكَ جَزَآءُ الْمُحْسِنِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Fa'asaabahumul- laahu bimaa qaaloo Jannaatin tajree min tahtihal-'anhaaru khaalideena feehaa; wa zaalika jazaaa'ul- muhsineen.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh unhon ne jo kaha uske e'waz Allah unhein aise baagh dega jinke neeche nahrein bahti hain, woh un mein hameshah rahenge. aur yeh neki karne waalon ki jazaa hai.

verses.arabic: وَ الَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا وَ كَذَّبُوْا بِاٰيٰتِنَآ اُولٰٓىٕكَ اَصْحٰبُ الْجَحِيْمِ
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena kafaroo awa kazzaboo bi- 'Aayaatinaaa 'ulaaa'ika 'Ashaabul-Jaheem.
verses.translation: Aur jin logon ne kufr kiya aur hamaari aayaton ko jhutlaaya, wahi dozakhi hain.

verses.arabic: يٰٓاَيُّهَا الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا لَا تُحَرِّمُوْا طَيِّبٰتِ مَآ اَحَلَّ اللّٰهُ لَكُمْ وَ لَا تَعْتَدُوْا ۭ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ لَا يُحِبُّ الْمُعْتَدِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhal- lazeena 'aamanoo laa tuharrimoo tayyibaati maaa 'ahallal-laahu lakum wa laa taʻtadooo; 'innal-laaha laa yuhibbul-mu'tadeen.
verses.translation: Aye logo jo eemaan laaye ho! woh paakeezah cheezein haraam mat thhahraao jo Allah ne tumhaare liye halaal ki hain aur tum had se na guzro, beshak Allah had se guzarne waalon ko pasand nahin karta.

verses.arabic: وَ كُلُوْا مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ اللّٰهُ حَلٰلًا طَيِّبًا ۚ وَ اتَّقُوا اللّٰهَ الَّذِيْۤ اَنْتُمْ بِهٖ مُؤْمِنُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa kuloo mimmaa razaqakumul-laahu halaalan tayyibaa; wattaqul-laahal-lazeee 'antum bihee mu'minoon.
verses.translation: Aur Allah ne tumhein jo halaal paakeezah rizq diya hai uss mein se khaao, aur Allah se daro jis par tum eemaan rakhte ho.

verses.arabic: لَا يُؤَاخِذُكُمُ اللّٰهُ بِاللَّغْوِ فِيْۤ اَيْمَانِكُمْ وَ لٰكِنْ يُؤَاخِذُكُمْ بِمَا عَقَّدْتُّمُ الْاَيْمَانَ ۚ فَكَفَّارَتُهٗٓ اِطْعَامُ عَشَرَةِ مَسَاكِيْنَ مِنْ اَوْسَطِ مَا تُطْعِمُوْنَ اَهْلِيْكُمْ اَوْ كِسْوَتُهُمْ اَوْ تَحْرِيْرُ رَقَبَةٍ ۚ فَمَنْ لَّمْ يَجِدْ فَصِيَامُ ثَلٰثَةِ اَيَّامٍ ۭ ذٰلِكَ كَفَّارَةُ اَيْمَانِكُمْ اِذَا حَلَفْتُمْ ۚ وَ احْفَظُوْۤا اَيْمَانَكُمْ ۭ كَذٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ اللّٰهُ لَكُمْ اٰيٰتِهٖ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَشْكُرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Laa yu'aakhizukumul -laahu billaghwi feee 'aymaanikum wa laakiny yu'aakhizukum bimaa 'aqqattumul- 'aymaana fakaffaaratuhooo 'it'aamu 'asharati masaakeena min 'awsati maa tut'imoona 'ahleekum 'aw kiswatuhum 'aw tahreeru raqabatin famal-lam yajid fa- Şiyaamu salaasati 'ayyaam; zaalika kaffaaratu 'aymaanikum 'izaa halaftum; wahfazooo 'aymaanakum; kazaalika yubayyinul- laahu lakum 'Aayaatihee la'allakum tashkuroon.
verses.translation: Allaah tumhaari behoodah qasmon par tumhein nahin pakdega lekin un qasmon par zaroor pakdega jo tumne mazboot baandh len,¹ chunaancheh uska kaffaarah 10 miskinon ko ausat darje ka khaana khilaana hai jo tum apne ahlo a'yaal ko khilaate ho, ya unhein kapde pahnaana hai, ya ek gardan aazaad karna hai, phir jo uski taaqat na rakhta ho to woh teen din ke roze rakkhe, yeh tumhaari qasmon ka kaffaarah hai jab tum qasam khaa (kar tod) baithho. aur tum apni qasmon ki hifaazat karo, Allah isi tarah tumhaare liye apni aayaten bayaan karta hai taake tum shukr karo.
verses.deepMeaning: Nabi kareem ﷺ ne farmaya: 'Allah ki qasam! Tum mein se koyi agar aisi qasam ko pura karne par israar kare jis se uske ahl-o-a'yaal ko nuqsaan hota ho to woh Allah ki nazar mein ziyaadah gunahgaar hai bajaaye uske ke woh aisi qasam tod de aur Allah ke hukm ke mutaabiq iska kaffaarah adaa kar de.' (Sahih Bukhari, Al-Eemaan wannuzoor, Baab:1 Hadees:6625) ziyaadah munaasib yahi hai ke qasam na uthhaayi jaaye lekin agar koyi qasam uthha le aur uske ba'd use masale (jiske liye usne qasam uthhaayi hai) ka behtar hal mil jaaye to use usi par amal karna chaahiye aur qasam ke badle mein kaffaarah adaa kar de.

verses.arabic: يٰٓاَيُّهَا الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا اِنَّمَا الْخَمْرُ وَ الْمَيْسِرُ وَ الْاَنْصَابُ وَ الْاَزْلَامُ رِجْسٌ مِّنْ عَمَلِ الشَّيْطٰنِ فَاجْتَنِبُوْهُ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُفْلِحُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhal- lazeena 'aamanooo 'innamal-khamru walmaysiru wal- 'anşaabu wal'azlaamu rijsum-min 'amalish- shaytaani fajtaniboohu la'allakum tuflihoon.
verses.translation: Aye logo jo eemaan laaye ho! beshak sharaab aur joowa aastaane aur faal nikaalne ke teer, sab gande kaam hain aur shaytaan ke amal se hain, lehaazah tum unse bacho,¹ taake tum falaah paao.
verses.deepMeaning: Isse ma'loom huwa ke shaytaani kaamon ko halaal karne ki koshish nehaayat mazmoom hai iss tarah woh halaal nahin hojaayeinge, haraam hi raheinge. Ek hadees mein Rasoolullah ﷺ ne farmaya: 'Meri ummat mein se zaroor kuchh log aise paida honge jo zina, resham, sharaab aur museeqi ke aalaat ko halaal samjheinge.' (Al-Bukhari, Al-Ashrabah, Baab:6)

verses.arabic: اِنَّمَا يُرِيْدُ الشَّيْطٰنُ اَنْ يُّوْقِعَ بَيْنَكُمُ الْعَدَاوَةَ وَ الْبَغْضَآءَ فِي الْخَمْرِ وَ الْمَيْسِرِ وَ يَصُدَّكُمْ عَنْ ذِكْرِ اللّٰهِ وَ عَنِ الصَّلٰوةِ ۚ فَهَلْ اَنْتُمْ مُّنْتَهُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Innamaa yureedush-Shaytaanu 'any-yooqi'a baynakumul-'adaawata wal baghdaaa'a fil- khamri walmaysiri wa yaşuddakum 'an zikril- laahi wa 'aniş- Şalaati fahal 'antum muntahoon.
verses.translation: Beshak shaytaan chaahta hai ke tumhaare darmiyaan sharaab aur jooye ke zariye se dushmani aur bughz daal de, aur tumhein Allah ke zikr aur namaaz se roke, phir kiya tum un (shaytaani kaamon) se baaz aate ho?

verses.arabic: وَ اَطِيْعُوا اللّٰهَ وَ اَطِيْعُوا الرَّسُوْلَ وَ احْذَرُوْا ۚ فَاِنْ تَوَلَّيْتُمْ فَاعْلَمُوْۤا اَنَّمَا عَلٰى رَسُوْلِنَا الْبَلٰغُ الْمُبِيْنُ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'atee'ul-laaha wa 'atee'ur-Rasoola wahzaroo; fa'in tawallaytum fa'lamooo 'annamaa 'alaa Rasoolinal-balaaghul- mubeen.
verses.translation: Aur tum Allah ki etaa'at karo aur rasool ki etaa'at karo, aur ehtiyaat karo, pas agar tum haqq se phir jaao to jaan lo ke hamaare rasool par to sirf khol kar pahuncha dena laazim hai.

verses.arabic: لَيْسَ عَلَى الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا وَ عَمِلُوا الصّٰلِحٰتِ جُنَاحٌ فِيْمَا طَعِمُوْۤا اِذَا مَا اتَّقَوْا وَ اٰمَنُوْا وَ عَمِلُوا الصّٰلِحٰتِ ثُمَّ اتَّقَوْا وَ اٰمَنُوْا ثُمَّ اتَّقَوْا وَ اَحْسَنُوْا ۭ وَ اللّٰهُ يُحِبُّ الْمُحْسِنِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Laysa 'alal-lazeena 'aamanoo wa 'amilus- saalihaati junaahun feemaa ta'imooo 'izaa mat-taqaw wa 'aamanoo wa 'amilus- saalihaati summat- taqaw wa 'aamanoo summat-taqaw wa 'ahsanoo; wallaahu yuhibbul-muhsineen.
verses.translation: jo log eemaan laaye aur nek amal karne lage, unhon ne jo kuchh pahle khaaya piya ho, us par unhein koyi gunaah nahin jabke woh aayindah parhez gaari ikhtiyaar karein aur eemaan par qaayim rahein aur nek amal karein, phir woh parhez gaar hi rahein aur eemaan par jame rahein, phir woh parhez gaari hi apnaayen aur neki karen, aur Allah neki karne waalon ko pasand karta hai.

verses.arabic: يٰٓاَيُّهَا الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا لَيَبْلُوَنَّكُمُ اللّٰهُ بِشَيْءٍ مِّنَ الصَّيْدِ تَنَالُهٗۤ اَيْدِيْكُمْ وَ رِمَاحُكُمْ لِيَعْلَمَ اللّٰهُ مَنْ يَّخَافُهٗ بِالْغَيْبِ ۭ فَمَنِ اعْتَدٰى بَعْدَ ذٰلِكَ فَلَهٗ عَذَابٌ اَلِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhal- lazeena 'aamanoo layabluwannakumul- laahu bishay'im- minas- şaydi tanaaluhooo 'aydeekum wa rimaahukum liyaʻlamal- laahu many- yakhaafuhoo bilghayb; famani'-tadaa ba'da zaalika falahoo 'azaabun 'aleem.
verses.translation: Aye logo jo eemaan laaye ho! Allah zaroor tumhein us cheez ke shikaar ke zariye se aaz maayega jis tak tumhaare haath aur neze pahunch sakte hon taake Allah jaan le ke kaun usse bin dekhe darta hai, phir uske ba'd jo had se guzar gaya, uske liye dardnaak azaab hai.

verses.arabic: يٰٓاَيُّهَا الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا لَا تَقْتُلُوا الصَّيْدَ وَ اَنْتُمْ حُرُمٌ ۚ وَ مَنْ قَتَلَهٗ مِنْكُمْ مُّتَعَمِّدًا فَجَزَآءٌ مِّثْلُ مَا قَتَلَ مِنَ النَّعَمِ يَحْكُمُ بِهٖ ذَوَا عَدْلٍ مِّنْكُمْ هَدْيًاۢ بٰلِغَ الْكَعْبَةِ اَوْ كَفَّارَةٌ طَعَامُ مَسٰكِيْنَ اَوْ عَدْلُ ذٰلِكَ صِيَامًا لِيَذُوْقَ وَبَالَ اَمْرِهٖ ۭ عَفَا اللّٰهُ عَمَّا سَلَفَ ۭ وَ مَنْ عَادَ فَيَنْتَقِمُ اللّٰهُ مِنْهُ ۭ وَ اللّٰهُ عَزِيْزٌ ذُوانْتِقَامٍ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhal- lazeena 'aamanoo laa taqtuluş-şayda wa 'antum hurum; wa man qatalahoo minkum- muta'am-midan fajazaaa'um-mislu maa qatala minan-naʻami yahkumu bihee zawaa 'adlim-minkum hadyam baalighal-Ka'bati 'aw kaffaaratun ta'aamu masaakeena 'aw 'adlu zaalika Şiyaamal- liyazooqa wabaala 'amrih; 'afal-laahu 'ammaa salaf; wa man 'aada fayanta-qimul- laahu minh; wallaahu 'azeezun zun-tiqaam.
verses.translation: Aye logo jo eemaan laaye ho! jab tum ahraam ke haalat mein hoto shikaar na maaro, tum mein se jo jaan boojh kar shikaar maare jo jaanwar usne maara ho use uske baraabar ek jaanwar maweshiyon mein se fidyah

verses.arabic: اُحِلَّ لَكُمْ صَيْدُ الْبَحْرِ وَ طَعَامُهٗ مَتَاعًا لَّكُمْ وَ لِلسَّيَّارَةِ ۚ وَ حُرِّمَ عَلَيْكُمْ صَيْدُ الْبَرِّ مَا دُمْتُمْ حُرُمًا ۚ وَ اتَّقُوا اللّٰهَ الَّذِيْۤ اِلَيْهِ تُحْشَرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Uhillalakum şaydul- bahri wa ta'aamuhoo mataa'al-lakum wa lissayyaarati wa hurrima 'alaykum şaydul-barri maa dumtum hurumaa; wattaqul-laahal-lazeee 'ilayhi tuhsharoon.
verses.translation: Tumhaare liye samandar ka shikaar aur uska khaana halaal kiya gaya hai, yeh tumhaare aur musaafiron ke faaide ke liye hai. aur jab tak tum ahraam ki haalat mein ho, tumhaare liye khushki ka shikaar haraam kiya gaya hai. aur tum Allah se darte raho jiski taraf tum ekhatthhe kiye jaao ge.

verses.arabic: جَعَلَ اللّٰهُ الْكَعْبَةَ الْبَيْتَ الْحَرَامَ قِيٰمًا لِّلنَّاسِ وَ الشَّهْرَ الْحَرَامَ وَ الْهَدْيَ وَ الْقَلَآىٕدَ ۭ ذٰلِكَ لِتَعْلَمُوْا اَنَّ اللّٰهَ يَعْلَمُ مَا فِي السَّمٰوٰتِ وَ مَا فِي الْاَرْضِ وَ اَنَّ اللّٰهَ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: Ja'alal-laahul- Ka'batal-Baytal- Haraama qiyaamal- linnaasi wash-Shahral- Haraama walhadya walqalaaa'id; zaalika litaʻlamooo 'annal-laaha yalamu maa fis- samaawaati wa maa fil-ardi wa 'annal-laaha bikulli shay'in 'Aleem.
verses.translation: Ka'bah jo hurmat waala ghar hai, Allah ne use logon ke qiyaam ka zariyah banaaya hai, aur hurmat waale maheene aur haram waali qurbaani aur patton waale jaanwaron ko bhi hurmat di hai, yeh isliye ke tum jaan lo ke beshak Allah jaanta hai jo kuchh aasmaanon mein hai aur jo kuchh zameen mein hai. aur yeh ke Allah har cheez ko khoob jaanne waala hai.

verses.arabic: اِعْلَمُوْا اَنَّ اللّٰهَ شَدِيْدُ الْعِقَابِ وَ اَنَّ اللّٰهَ غَفُوْرٌ رَّحِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: 'I'lamooo 'annal- laaha shadeedul-'iqaabi wa 'annal-laaha Ghafoorur-Raheem.
verses.translation: jaan lo! beshak Allah sakht sazaa dene waala hai, aur beshak Allah bahut bakhshne waala nihaayat raham karne waala hai.

verses.arabic: مَا عَلَى الرَّسُوْلِ اِلَّا الْبَلٰغُ ۭ وَ اللّٰهُ يَعْلَمُ مَا تُبْدُوْنَ وَ مَا تَكْتُمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Maa 'alar-Rasooli 'illal-balaagh; wallaahu ya'lamu maa tubdoona wa maa taktumoon.
verses.translation: Rasool ke zimme Allah ka paighaam pahunchaa dene ke siwa kuchh nahin aur Allah jaanta hai jo tum zaahir karte aur jo tum chhupaate ho.

verses.arabic: قُلْ لَا يَسْتَوِي الْخَبِيْثُ وَ الطَّيِّبُ وَ لَوْ اَعْجَبَكَ كَثْرَةُ الْخَبِيْثِ ۚ فَاتَّقُوا اللّٰهَ يٰۤاُولِي الْاَلْبَابِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُفْلِحُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qul-laa yastawil- khabeesu wattayyibu wa law 'a'jabaka kasratul-khabees; fattaqul-laaha yaaa 'ulil-'albaabi laʻallakum tuflihoon.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) kah deejiye! paak aur naapaak baraabar nahin ho sakte agar cheh naapaak ki kasrat aap ko hairaani mein daal de, lihaaza aye aql waalo! tum Allah se daro taake falaah paao.

verses.arabic: يٰٓاَيُّهَا الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا لَا تَسْـَٔـلُوْا عَنْ اَشْيَآءَ اِنْ تُبْدَ لَكُمْ تَسُؤْكُمْ ۚ وَ اِنْ تَسْـَٔـلُوْا عَنْهَا حِيْنَ يُنَزَّلُ الْقُرْاٰنُ تُبْدَ لَكُمْ ۭ عَفَا اللّٰهُ عَنْهَا ۭ وَ اللّٰهُ غَفُوْرٌ حَلِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: yaaa 'ayyuhal- lazeena 'aamanoo laa tas'aloo 'an 'ashyaaa'a 'in tubda lakum tasu'kum wa 'in tas'aloo 'anhaa heena yunazzalul-Qur'aanu tubda lakum; 'afal- laahu 'anhaa; wallaahu Ghafoorun Haleem.
verses.translation: Aye logo jo eemaan laaye ho! aisi baaton ke baare mein sawaal na karo ke agar woh tum par zaahir kardi jaayein to tumhein buri lagein, aur agar tum unke muta'alliq sawaal karoge jabke qur'an naazil kiya jaaraha ho to woh tum par zaahir kar di jaayengi, Allah ne tumhaari iss harkat ko mu'aaf kar diya hai, aur Allah bahut bakhshne waala, bahut hausle waala hai.

verses.arabic: قَدْ سَاَلَهَا قَوْمٌ مِّنْ قَبْلِكُمْ ثُمَّ اَصْبَحُوْا بِهَا كٰفِرِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qad sa'alahaa qablikum qawmum-min summa 'aşbahoo bihaa kaafireen.
verses.translation: Unke baare mein tumse pahle bhi ek qaum ne sawaal kiya tha, phir un (baaton) ki wajah se woh- kaafir ho gaye.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Kahin iss kotaahi ke murtakib tum bhi hojaao. Jis tarah ek martabah Nabi ﷺ ne farmaya: 'Allah Ta'ala ne tum par hajj farz kiya hai.' ek shakhs ne sawaal kiya: 'Kiya har saal? Aap ﷺ khaamoosh rahe, usne teen martabah sawaal dohraaya, phir phir Aapne farmaaya ke 'agar main haan kah deta to hajj har saal farz ho jaata aur agar aisa ho jaata to har saal saal hajj karna karn tumhaare liye mumkin na hota. (Sahih Muslim, Kitabul Hajj, Baab:73, Hadees:1337)

verses.arabic: مَا جَعَلَ اللّٰهُ مِنْۢ بَحِيْرَةٍ وَّ لَا سَآىٕبَةٍ وَّ لَا وَصِيْلَةٍ وَّ لَا حَامٍ ۙ وَّ لٰكِنَّ الَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا يَفْتَرُوْنَ عَلَى اللّٰهِ الْكَذِبَ ۚ وَ اَكْثَرُهُمْ لَا يَعْقِلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Maa ja'alal-laahu mim-baheeratiñw-wa laa saaa'ibatinw-wa laa waşeelatiñw-wa laa haaminw-wa laakinnal- lazeena kafaroo yaftaroona 'alal-laahil- kazib; wa 'aksaruhum laa ya qiloon.
verses.translation: Allah ne nahin banaaya kisi ko buhairah aur na saaiba aur na waseela aur na haam, magar yeh kaafir Allah par jhooti tohmat lagaate hain, aur un mein se aksar aql nahin rakhte.

verses.arabic: وَ اِذَا قِيْلَ لَهُمْ تَعَالَوْا اِلٰى مَاۤ اَنْزَلَ اللّٰهُ وَ اِلَى الرَّسُوْلِ قَالُوْا حَسْبُنَا مَا وَجَدْنَا عَلَيْهِ اٰبَآءَنَا ۭ اَوَ لَوْ كَانَ اٰبَآؤُهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُوْنَ شَيْـًٔا وَّ لَا يَهْتَدُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'izaa qeela lahum ta'aalaw 'ilaa maaa 'anzalal-laahu wa 'ilar-Rasooli qaaloo hasbunaa maa wajadnaa 'alayhi 'aabaaa'anaa; 'awa law kaana 'aabaaa'uhum laa yalamoona shay'anw- wa laa yahtadoon.
verses.translation: Aur jab unse kaha jaata hai ke tum aao uss cheez ki taraf, jo Allah ne naazil ki hai aur aao Rasool ki taraf to woh kahte hain: hamein woh kaafi hai jis par hamne apne baap daada ko paaya, kiya agar cheh unke baap daada kuchh na jaante ho aur na woh hidaayat yaafta hi hon (to bhi woh unhi ki pairwi kareinge?)

verses.arabic: يٰٓاَيُّهَا الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا عَلَيْكُمْ اَنْفُسَكُمْ ۖ لَا يَضُرُّكُمْ مَّنْ ضَلَّ اِذَا اهْتَدَيْتُمْ ۭ اِلَى اللّٰهِ مَرْجِعُكُمْ جَمِيْعًا فَيُنَبِّئُكُمْ بِمَا كُنْتُمْ تَعْمَلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhal- lazeena 'aamanoo 'alaykum 'anfusakum laa yadurrukum man dalla 'izah-tadaytum; 'ilal-laahi marji'ukum jamee'an fayunabbi'ukum bimaa kuntum ta'maloon.
verses.translation: Aye logo jo eemaan laaye ho! tum par apni jaanon ki fikr laazim hai, jo shakhs gumraah ho, woh tumhein nuqsaan nahin pahuncha sakta jab ke tum khud hidaayat par ho. tum sab ko Allah hi ki taraf laut kar jaana hai, phir woh tumhein bataa dega ke tum kiya karte rahe ho.

verses.arabic: يٰٓاَيُّهَا الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا شَهَادَةُ بَيْنِكُمْ اِذَا حَضَرَ اَحَدَكُمُ الْمَوْتُ حِيْنَ الْوَصِيَّةِ اثْنَانِ ذَوَا عَدْلٍ مِّنْكُمْ اَوْ اٰخَرٰنِ مِنْ غَيْرِكُمْ اِنْ اَنْتُمْ ضَرَبْتُمْ فِي الْاَرْضِ فَاَصَابَتْكُمْ مُّصِيْبَةُ الْمَوْتِ ۚ تَحْبِسُوْنَهُمَا مِنْۢ بَعْدِ الصَّلٰوةِ فَيُقْسِمٰنِ بِاللّٰهِ اِنِ ارْتَبْتُمْ لَا نَشْتَرِيْ بِهٖ ثَمَنًا وَّ لَوْ كَانَ ذَا قُرْبٰى وَ لَا نَكْتُمُ شَهَادَةَ اللّٰهِ اِنَّآ اِذًا لَّمِنَ الْاٰثِمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhal-lazeena 'aamanoo shahaadatu baynikum 'izaa hadara 'ahadakumul-mawtu heenal-waşiyyatis- naani zawaa 'adlim- minkum 'aw 'aakharaani min ghayrikum 'in 'antum darabtum fil-'ardi fa'aşaabatkum- muşeebatul-mawt; tahbisoonahumaa mim- ba'diş-Şalaati fayuqsimaani billaahi 'inir-tabtum laa nashtaree bihee samananw-wa law kaana zaa qurbaa wa laa naktumu shahaadatal-laahi 'innaaa 'izal-laminal- 'aasimeen.
verses.translation: Aye logo jo eemaan laaye ho! jab tum mein se kisi ko maut aane lage to tumhaare darmiyaan gawaahi honi chaahiye aur wasiyyat ke waqt apne (musalmaanon) mein se do insaaf waale gawaah bana lo ya agar tum zameen mein safar par nikle ho aur (raaste mein) maut ki museebat pesh aa jaaye to ghair qaum ke do gawaah bhi kaafi honge, phir agar tumhen koyi shubah ho to un donon gawaahon ko namaaz ke ba'd (masjid mein) rok lo, to woh Allah ki qasam khaa kar kahen ke hum iss gawaahi ke badle koyi qeemat nahin le rahe aur koyi hamaara rishte daar bhi ho (to hum uski re'aayat karne waale nahin) aur hum Allah ki gawaahi nahin chhupaate, agar hum aisa karein to hum gunaah gaaron mein shumaar honge.

verses.arabic: فَاِنْ عُثِرَ عَلٰٓى اَنَّهُمَا اسْتَحَقَّاۤ اِثْمًا فَاٰخَرٰنِ يَقُوْمٰنِ مَقَامَهُمَا مِنَ الَّذِيْنَ اسْتَحَقَّ عَلَيْهِمُ الْاَوْلَيٰنِ فَيُقْسِمٰنِ بِاللّٰهِ لَشَهَادَتُنَاۤ اَحَقُّ مِنْ شَهَادَتِهِمَا وَ مَا اعْتَدَيْنَآ اِنَّآ اِذًا لَّمِنَ الظّٰلِمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Fa'in 'usira 'alaaa 'annahumas-tahaqqaaa 'isman fa 'aakharaani yaqoomaani maqaamahumaa minal- lazeenas-tahaqqa 'alayhimul-awlayaani fa- yuqsimaani billaahi lashahaadatunaaa 'ahaqqu min shahaadatihimaa wa ma'tadaynaa 'innaaa 'izal-laminaz-zaalimeen.
verses.translation: Phir agar pata chal jaaye ke beshak un donon ne gunaah ka irtekaab kiya hai to un donon ki jagah do aur gawaah un logon mein se khade hon jinka haq maara gaya ho aur jo marne waale ke ziyaadah qareebi hon, phir woh donon Allah ki qasam khaayein ke hamaari gawaahi un (pahle) donon ki gawaahi se ziyaadah sachchi hai, aur humne koyi ziyaadati nahin ki, agar hum aisa karen to hum gunaah gaaron mein shumaar honge.

verses.arabic: ذٰلِكَ اَدْنٰٓى اَنْ يَّاْتُوْا بِالشَّهَادَةِ عَلٰى وَجْهِهَآ اَوْ يَخَافُوْۤا اَنْ تُرَدَّ اَيْمَانٌۢ بَعْدَ اَيْمَانِهِمْ ۭ وَ اتَّقُوا اللّٰهَ وَ اسْمَعُوْا ۭ وَ اللّٰهُ لَا يَهْدِي الْقَوْمَ الْفٰسِقِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Zaalika adnaaa 'añy- ya'too bishshahaadati 'alaa wajhihaaa 'aw yakhaafooo 'an turadda 'aymaanum-ba'da 'aymaanihim; wattaqul- laaha wasma'oo; wallaahu laa yahdil- qawmal-faasiqeen.
verses.translation: lss tarah ziyaadah ummeed ki jaa sakti hai ke woh thheek theek gawaahi denge ya kam az kam iss baat hi ka khauf karenge ke kahin un (warsaa) ki qismon ke ba'd un ki qasmein rad na kardi jaayen aur tum Allah se daro aur suno, aur Allah naafarmaani karne waalon ko hidaayat nahin deta.

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ يَجْمَعُ اللّٰهُ الرُّسُلَ فَيَقُوْلُ مَاذَآ اُجِبْتُمْ ۭ قَالُوْا لَا عِلْمَ لَنَا ۭ اِنَّكَ اَنْتَ عَلَّامُ الْغُيُوْبِ
verses.transliteration: Yawma yajma'ul- laahur-Rusula fayaqoolu maazaaa 'ujibtum qaaloo laa 'ilma lanaaa 'innaka 'Anta 'Allaamul- Ghuyoob.
verses.translation: Uss din ka khayaal karo jab Allah Rasoolon ko jama karega, phir unse kahega ke tumhen kiya jawaab diya gaya tha? to woh kahenge: hamen koyi ilm nahin, beshak tu hi ghaib ki baaton ko jaanne waala hai.

verses.arabic: اِذْ قَالَ اللّٰهُ يٰعِيْسَى ابْنَ مَرْيَمَ اذْكُرْ نِعْمَتِيْ عَلَيْكَ وَ عَلٰى وَالِدَتِكَ اِذْ اَيَّدْتُّكَ بِرُوْحِ الْقُدُسِ تُكَلِّمُ النَّاسَ فِي الْمَهْدِ وَ كَهْلًا ۚ وَ اِذْ عَلَّمْتُكَ الْكِتٰبَ وَ الْحِكْمَةَ وَ التَّوْرٰىةَ وَ الْاِنْجِيْلَ ۚ وَ اِذْ تَخْلُقُ مِنَ الطِّيْنِ كَهَيْـَٔةِ الطَّيْرِ بِاِذْنِيْ فَتَنْفُخُ فِيْهَا فَتَكُوْنُ طَيْرًۢا بِاِذْنِيْ ۚ وَ تُبْرِئُ الْاَكْمَهَ وَ الْاَبْرَصَ بِاِذْنِيْ ۚ وَ اِذْ تُخْرِجُ الْمَوْتٰى بِاِذْنِيْ ۚ وَ اِذْ كَفَفْتُ بَنِيْۤ اِسْرَآءِيْلَ عَنْكَ اِذْ جِئْتَهُمْ بِالْبَيِّنٰتِ فَقَالَ الَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا مِنْهُمْ اِنْ هٰذَآ اِلَّا سِحْرٌ مُّبِيْنٌ
verses.transliteration: 'Iz qaalal-laahu yaa 'Eesab-na-Maryamaz- kur ni'matee 'alayka wa 'alaa waalidatik; 'iz 'ayyattuka bi-Roohil- Qudusi tukallimun- naasa fil-mahdi wa kahlan wa 'iz 'allamtukal-kitaaba wal- Hikmata wat-Tawraata wal-'Injeela wa 'iz takhluqu minat-teeni kahay'atit-tayri bi'iznee fatanfukhu feehaa fatakoonu tayram bi'iznee wa tubri'ul- 'akmaha wal'abraşa bi'iznee wa 'iz tukhrijul- mawtaa bi'iznee wa 'iz kafaftu Baneee 'Israaa'eela 'anka 'iz ji'tahum bilbayyinaati faqaalal-lazeena kafaroo minhum 'in haazaaa 'illaa sihrum-mubeen.
verses.translation: Jab Allah kahega: Aye Eisa Ibne Maryam! tu khud par aur apni maan par meri ne'mat yaad kar, jab main ne tujhe Roohul qudus (Jibrayeel) ke saath quwwat di, tu (maan ki) god mein,¹ aur pukhtah umr mein logon se kalaam karta tha aur jab main ne tujhe kitab-o- hikmat aur tauraat aur injeel ki ta'leem di aur jab tu mere hukm se gaare se parinde ki si moorat banaata tha, phir to uss mein phoonk maarta tha tu woh mere hukm se (parindah) ban jaata tha aur tu.paidaayeshi andhe ko aur phulbahri waale ko mere hukm se tandurust karta tha aur jab tu murdon ko mere hukm se (zindah) nikaalta tha aur jab main ne tujhe bani Israayeel se bachaaya jab tu unke paas waazeh nishaaniyon ke saath aaya tha. tab un logon mein se jinhon ne kufr kiya, uhon ne kaha tha: yeh to khule jaadu ke siwa kuchh nahin.
verses.deepMeaning: Mulaahazah keejiye Haashyah (Surah Aal-e-Imran:3/46)

verses.arabic: وَ اِذْ اَوْحَيْتُ اِلَى الْحَوَارِيّٖنَ اَنْ اٰمِنُوْا بِيْ وَ بِرَسُوْلِيْ قَالُوْۤا اٰمَنَّا وَ اشْهَدْ بِاَنَّنَا مُسْلِمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'iz 'awhaytu 'ilal-hawaariyyeena 'an 'aaminoo bee wa bi- Rasoolee qaalooo 'aamannaa washhad bi'annanaa muslimoon.
verses.translation: Aur jab main ne hawaariyon ko ilhaam¹ kiya ke tum mujh par aur mere Rasool par eemaan laao, tab unhon ne kaha: hum eemaan laaye hain, aur tu gawaah rah ke be shak hum farmaan bardaar hain.
verses.deepMeaning: Hawaariyon se muraad hazrat Eisa عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام ke woh pairo kaar hain jo un par eemaan laaye aur unke saathi aur madad gaar bane. Unki ta'daad 12 bayaan ki jaati hai. wahi se muraad yahaan woh wahi nahin hai jo bazaria farishta ambiya عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام par naazil hoti thi balke yeh wahi-e-ilhaam hai jo Allah Ta'ala ki taraf se ba'z logon ke dilon mein ilqa kardi jaati hai. jaise Moosa عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام ki waalidah aur Maryam ko isi i qism ka ilhaam huwa jise qur'an ne wahi se ta'beer kiya hai. lekin yeh wahi-e-ilhaam thi wahi-e-risaalat nahin thi.

verses.arabic: اِذْ قَالَ الْحَوَارِيُّوْنَ يٰعِيْسَى ابْنَ مَرْيَمَ هَلْ يَسْتَطِيْعُ رَبُّكَ اَنْ يُّنَزِّلَ عَلَيْنَا مَآىٕدَةً مِّنَ السَّمَآءِ ۖ قَالَ اتَّقُوا اللّٰهَ اِنْ كُنْتُمْ مُّؤْمِنِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Iz qaalal- Hawaariyyoona yaa 'Eesab-na-Maryama hal yastatee'u Rabbuka 'añy-yunazzila 'alynaa maaa'idatam-minas- samaaa'i qaalat-taqul- laaha 'in kuntum mu'mineen.
verses.translation: (Aur) jab Hawaariyon ne kaha: Aye Eisa Ibne Maryam! kiya tera rab yeh taaqat rakhta hai ke hum par aasmaan se ek dastarkhaan naazil kare? unhon ne jawaab diya: tum Allah se daro agar tum momin ho.

verses.arabic: قَالُوا نُرِيْدُ اَنْ نَّاْكُلَ مِنْهَا وَ تَطْمَىٕنَّ قُلُوْبُنَا وَ نَعْلَمَ اَنْ قَدْ صَدَقْتَنَا وَ نَكُوْنَ عَلَيْهَا مِنَ الشّٰهِدِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo nureedu 'anna'kula minhaa wa tatama'inna quloobunaa wa nalama 'an qad sadaqtanaa wa nakoona 'alayhaa minash-shaahideen.
verses.translation: Woh bole: hum yeh chaahte hain ke hum uss mein se khaayein aur hamaare dilon ko tasalli ho jaaye, aur hum yeh jaan len ke toone humse sach kahaa hai aur hum USS par gawaahi dene waalon mein se hojaayein.

verses.arabic: قَالَ عِيْسَى ابْنُ مَرْيَمَ اللّٰهُمَّ رَبَّنَآ اَنْزِلْ عَلَيْنَا مَآىٕدَةً مِّنَ السَّمَآءِ تَكُوْنُ لَنَا عِيْدًا لِّاَوَّلِنَا وَ اٰخِرِنَا وَ اٰيَةً مِّنْكَ ۖ وَ ارْزُقْنَا وَ اَنْتَ خَيْرُ الرّٰزِقِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala 'Eesab-nu- Maryamal-laahumma Rabbanaaa 'anzil 'alaynaa maaa'idatam- minas-samaaa'i takoonu lanaa 'eedal- li'awwalinaa wa 'aakhirinaa wa 'Aayatam-minka warzuqnaa wa 'Anta khayrur-raaziqeen.
verses.translation: Eisa Ibne Maryam ne kaha: Aye Allah! aye hamaare rab! hum par aasmaan se dastarkhaan naazil farma ke woh hamaare pahlon aur hamaare ba'd waalon ke liye eid (ya'ni khushi ka moqa) ban jaaye, aur woh teri taraf se khaas nishaani ho, aur tu hamen rizq de, aur tu behtareen rizq dene waala hai.

verses.arabic: قَالَ اللّٰهُ اِنِّيْ مُنَزِّلُهَا عَلَيْكُمْ ۚ فَمَنْ يَّكْفُرْ بَعْدُ مِنْكُمْ فَاِنِّيْۤ اُعَذِّبُهٗ عَذَابًا لَّاۤ اُعَذِّبُهٗۤ اَحَدًا مِّنَ الْعٰلَمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaalal-laahu 'innee munaz-ziluhaa 'alaykum famañy- yakfur ba'du minkum fa'inneee 'u'azzibuhoo 'azaabal-laaa 'u'azzibuhooo 'ahadam- minal-'aalameen.
verses.translation: Allah ne farmaya: beshak main woh dastarkhaan tum par naazil karunga phir uss ke ba'd tum mein se jo shakhs kufr karega to main zaroor use aisa a'zaab dunga ke waisa a'zaab dunya bhar mein kisi aur ko nahin dunga.

verses.arabic: وَ اِذْ قَالَ اللّٰهُ يٰعِيْسَى ابْنَ مَرْيَمَ ءَاَنْتَ قُلْتَ لِلنَّاسِ اتَّخِذُوْنِيْ وَ اُمِّيَ اِلٰهَيْنِ مِنْ دُوْنِ اللّٰهِ ۭ قَالَ سُبْحٰنَكَ مَا يَكُوْنُ لِيْۤ اَنْ اَقُوْلَ مَا لَيْسَ لِيْ بِحَقٍّ ۚ اِنْ كُنْتُ قُلْتُهٗ فَقَدْ عَلِمْتَهٗ ۚ تَعْلَمُ مَا فِيْ نَفْسِيْ وَ لَاۤ اَعْلَمُ مَا فِيْ نَفْسِكَ ۭ اِنَّكَ اَنْتَ عَلَّامُ الْغُيُوْبِ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'iz qaalal-laahu yaa 'Eesab-na- Maryama 'a'anta qulta linnaasit-takhizoonee wa 'ummiya 'ilaahayni min doonil-laahi qaala Subhaanaka maa yakoonu leee 'an 'aqoola maa laysa lee bihaqq; 'in kuntu qultuhoo faqad 'alimtah; ta'lamu maa fee nafsee wa laaa 'a'almu maa fee nafsik; 'innaka 'Anta 'Allaamul-Ghuyoob.
verses.translation: Aur jab Allah kahega: aye Eisa Ibne Maryam! kiya toone logon se kahaa tha ke mujhe aur meri maan ko Allah ke siwa do ma'bood bana lo to woh kaheinge tu paak hai, mere liye jaayez nahin ke main woh baat kahun jis ka mujhe haq nahin, agar main ne yeh baat kahi ho to yaqeenan tu use jaanta hai, tu use bhi jaanta hai jo kuchh mere dil mein hai aur main use nahin jaanta jo kuchh tere nafs mein hai. beshak tu hi sab se badh kar ghaib jaanne waala hai.

verses.arabic: مَا قُلْتُ لَهُمْ اِلَّا مَآ اَمَرْتَنِيْ بِهٖۤ اَنِ اعْبُدُوا اللّٰهَ رَبِّيْ وَ رَبَّكُمْ ۚ وَ كُنْتُ عَلَيْهِمْ شَهِيْدًا مَّا دُمْتُ فِيْهِمْ ۚ فَلَمَّا تَوَفَّيْتَنِيْ كُنْتَ اَنْتَ الرَّقِيْبَ عَلَيْهِمْ ۭ وَ اَنْتَ عَلٰى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ شَهِيْدٌ
verses.transliteration: Maa qultu lahum 'illaa maaa amartanee biheee 'ani budul-laaha Rabbeee wa Rabbakum; wa kuntu 'alayhim shaheedam-maa dumtu feehim falamтаа tawaffaytanee kunta 'Antar-Raqeeba 'alayhim, wa 'Anta 'alaa kulli shay'in Shaheed.
verses.translation: Main ne un se kuchh nahin kahaa tha siwaye uske jiska toone mujhe hukm diya tha, yeh ke tum Allah ki i'baadat karo jo mera aur tumhaara rab hai, aur main un par nigraan tha, jabtak main ne un mein raha jab toone mujhe uthhaa liya to toohi un par nigraan tha aur tu har cheez par nigraan hai.

verses.arabic: اِنْ تُعَذِّبْهُمْ فَاِنَّهُمْ عِبَادُكَ ۚ وَ اِنْ تَغْفِرْ لَهُمْ فَاِنَّكَ اَنْتَ الْعَزِيْزُ الْحَكِيْمُ
verses.transliteration: 'In tuʻazzibhum fa'innahum 'ibaaduka wa 'in taghfir lahum fa'innaka 'Antal- 'Azeezul-Hakeem.
verses.translation: Agar tu unhein a'zaab de to beshak woh tere bande hain, aur agar tu unhein bakhsh de to beshak tu hi ghaalib hai, badi hikmat waala hai.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Nabi ﷺ bhi qiyaamat ke din yahi alfaaz dohraayeinge jaisa ke hadees mein hai: Rasoolullah ﷺ ne farmaya: 'Qiyaamat ke din tumhein jama' kiya jaayega aur kuchh logon ko baayein jaanib (dozakh ki taraf) le jaaya jaayega, main uss waqt wahi kahunga jo Allah ke nek bande hazrat Eisa عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام ne kahaa tha.....' (Sahih Bukhari, tafseer Surah Maayidah, Baab:15, Hadees:4626)

verses.arabic: قَالَ اللّٰهُ هٰذَا يَوْمُ يَنْفَعُ الصّٰدِقِيْنَ صِدْقُهُمْ ۚ لَهُمْ جَنّٰتٌ تَجْرِيْ مِنْ تَحْتِهَا الْاَنْهٰرُ خٰلِدِيْنَ فِيْهَآ اَبَدًا ۚ رَضِيَ اللّٰهُ عَنْهُمْ وَ رَضُوْا عَنْهُ ۭ ذٰلِكَ الْفَوْزُ الْعَظِيْمُ
verses.transliteration: Qaalal-laahu haaza yawmu yanfa'us- şaadiqeena şidquhum; lahum jannaatun tajree min tahtihal-'anhaaru khaalideena feehaaa 'abadaa; radiyal-laahu 'anhum wa radoo 'anh; zaalikal-fawzul-'azeem.
verses.translation: Allah farmaayega: yeh aisa din hai ke sachchon ko unka sach nafa' dega, unke liye aise baagh hain jinke neeche nahren bahti hain, woh un mein hameshah rahenge, Allah unse raazi huwa aur woh usse raazi huye, yahi badi kaamiyaabi hai.

verses.arabic: لِلّٰهِ مُلْكُ السَّمٰوٰتِ وَ الْاَرْضِ وَ مَا فِيْهِنَّ ۭ وَ هُوَ عَلٰى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيْرٌ
verses.transliteration: Lillaahi mulkus- samaawaati wal-'ardi wa maa feehinn; wa Huwa 'alaa kulli shay'in Qadeer.
verses.translation: Aasmaanon aur zameen ki aur jo kuchh un ke darmiyaan hai, uski baadshaahi Allah hi ke liye hai, aur woh har cheez par khoob qaadir hai.

verses.arabic: اَلْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ الَّذِيْ خَلَقَ السَّمٰوٰتِ وَ الْاَرْضَ وَ جَعَلَ الظُّلُمٰتِ وَ النُّوْرَ ۖ ثُمَّ الَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا بِرَبِّهِمْ يَعْدِلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Alhamdu lillaahil-lazee khalaqas-samaawaati wal-'arda wa jaʻalaz- zulumaati wannoor; summal-lazeena kafaroo bi-Rabbihim ya'diloon.
verses.translation: Tamaam ta'reef Allah hi ke liye jisne aasmaanon aur zameen ko paida kiya aur andheron aur raushni ko banaaya phir jin logon ne kufr kiya, woh apne rab ke saath (auron ko) baraabar thhahraate hain.

verses.arabic: هُوَ الَّذِيْ خَلَقَكُمْ مِّنْ طِيْنٍ ثُمَّ قَضٰى اَجَلًا ۚ وَّ اَجَلٌ مُّسَمًّى عِنْدَهٗ ۚ ثُمَّ اَنْتُمْ تَمْتَرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Huwal-lazee khalaqakum min teenin summa qadaaa 'ajalan wa 'ajalum-musamman 'indahoo summa 'antum tamtaroon.
verses.translation: Wahi Allah hai jisse tumhein mitti se paida kiya, phir usne (tumhaare liye) ek waqt muqarrar kiya, aur uske haan (qiyaamat ka) ek muqarrar waqt bhi hai, phir bhi tum shak karte ho.

verses.arabic: وَ هُوَ اللّٰهُ فِي السَّمٰوٰتِ وَ فِي الْاَرْضِ ۚ يَعْلَمُ سِرَّكُمْ وَ جَهْرَكُمْ وَ يَعْلَمُ مَا تَكْسِبُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa Huwal-laahu fis-samaawaati wa fil- 'ardi ya'lamu sirrakum wa jahrakum wa ya'lamu maa taksiboon.
verses.translation: Aur wahi Allah hai aasmaanon aur zameen mein¹ woh tumhaari chhupi aur zaahiri (sab) baatein jaanta hai, aur woh jaanta hai jo kuchh tum kamaate (ya karte) ho.
verses.deepMeaning: Ahle sunnat ya'ni salaf ka aqeedah hai ke Allah Ta'ala khud to arsh par hai jis tarah uski shaan ke laayeq hai lekin apne ilm ke lehaaz se har jagah hai ya'ni uske ilm-o-khabar se koyi cheez baahar nahin. Albattah ba'z gumraah firqe Allah Ta'ala ko arsh par nahin maante aur kahte hain ke Allah Ta'ala har jagah maujood hai. lekin yeh aqeedah ghalat hai

verses.arabic: وَ مَا تَاْتِيْهِمْ مِّنْ اٰيَةٍ مِّنْ اٰيٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ اِلَّا كَانُوْا عَنْهَا مُعْرِضِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maa ta'teehim min 'Aayatim-min 'Aayaati Rabbihim 'illaa kaanoo 'anhaa mu'rideen.
verses.translation: Aur un (logon) ke paas unke rab ki nishaaniyon mein se koyi nishaani aisi nahin aayi jis se unhon ne munh na mod liya ho.

verses.arabic: فَقَدْ كَذَّبُوْا بِالْحَقِّ لَمَّا جَآءَهُمْ ۚ فَسَوْفَ يَاْتِيْهِمْ اَنْۢبَآؤُا مَا كَانُوْا بِهٖ يَسْتَهْزِءُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Faqad kazzaboo bilhaqqi lammaa jaaa'ahum fasawfa ya'teehim 'ambaaa'u maa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon.
verses.translation: Unke paas jab haq aagaya to use bhi unhon ne jhutlaa diya, chunaancheh jald hi unhen uss cheez ka pata chal jaayega jiska woh mazaaq udaaya karte the.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Ya'ni azaab-e-ilaahi se do chaar honge kyunke Muhammad Rasoolullah ﷺ ki nabuwwat-o- risaalat par eemaan laana tamaam insaanon par waajib hai. mazeed dekhye haashyah: (Surah Aal-e-Imran:3/85)

verses.arabic: اَلَمْ يَرَوْا كَمْ اَهْلَكْنَا مِنْ قَبْلِهِمْ مِّنْ قَرْنٍ مَّكَّنّٰهُمْ فِي الْاَرْضِ مَا لَمْ نُمَكِّنْ لَّكُمْ وَ اَرْسَلْنَا السَّمَآءَ عَلَيْهِمْ مِّدْرَارًا وَّ جَعَلْنَا الْاَنْهٰرَ تَجْرِيْ مِنْ تَحْتِهِمْ فَاَهْلَكْنٰهُمْ بِذُنُوْبِهِمْ وَ اَنْشَاْنَا مِنْۢ بَعْدِهِمْ قَرْنًا اٰخَرِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Alam yaraw kam 'ahlaknaa min qablihim min qarnim-makkannaahum fil-'ardi maa lam numakkil-lakum wa 'arsalnas-samaaa'a 'alayhim midraarañw- wa ja'alnal-'anhaara tajree min tahtihim fa'ahlaknaahum bizunoobihim wa 'ansha'naa mim-ba'dihim qarnan 'aakhareen.
verses.translation: Kiya unhon ne nahin dekha ke un se pahle humne kitni hi qaumen halaak karden jinhen humne zameen mein aisi taaqat di thi jo tumhein nahin di aur humne un par musla dhaar baarish naazil ki aur nahrein banaayen jo unke neeche bahti thin, phir humne unke gunaah ke baay'is unhein halaak kardiya aur unke ba'd doosri qaumein paida kin.

verses.arabic: وَ لَوْ نَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْكَ كِتٰبًا فِيْ قِرْطَاسٍ فَلَمَسُوْهُ بِاَيْدِيْهِمْ لَقَالَ الَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْۤا اِنْ هٰذَآ اِلَّا سِحْرٌ مُّبِيْنٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa law nazzalnaa 'alayka Kitaaban fee qirtaasin falamasoohu bi'aydeehim laqaalal- lazeena kafarooo 'in haazaaa 'illaa sihrum- mubeen.
verses.translation: Aur (Aye nabi!) agar hum kaaghaz par likhi huyi koyi kitab aap par naazil karte, phir woh apne haathon se use chhu kar dekhte to jin logon ne kufr kiya woh zaroor kahte ke yeh to khula jaadu hai.

verses.arabic: وَ قَالُوْا لَوْلَاۤ اُنْزِلَ عَلَيْهِ مَلَكٌ ۭ وَ لَوْ اَنْزَلْنَا مَلَكًا لَّقُضِيَ الْاَمْرُ ثُمَّ لَا يُنْظَرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa qaaloo law laaa 'unzila 'alayhi malakun wa law 'anzalnaa malakal-laqudiyal-'amru summa laa yunzaroon.
verses.translation: Aur un (kaafir) logon ne kaha ke iss Nabi par koyi farishta kyun nahin utaara gaya? aur agar hum koyi farishta utaarte to saara mu'aamlah hi khatm ho jaata, phir unko zara mohlat na di jaati.

verses.arabic: وَ لَوْ جَعَلْنٰهُ مَلَكًا لَّجَعَلْنٰهُ رَجُلًا وَّ لَلَبَسْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ مَا يَلْبِسُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa law ja'alnaahu malakal-lajaʻalnaahu rajulañw-wa lalabasnaa 'alayhim maa yalbisoon.
verses.translation: Aur agar hum uss (Nabi) ko farishta banaa kar bhejte to bhi hum use insaan hi ki shakl mein bhejte aur (tab bhi) hum unhein usi shubhe mein daalte jis mein woh ab pade huye hain.

verses.arabic: وَ لَقَدِ اسْتُهْزِئَ بِرُسُلٍ مِّنْ قَبْلِكَ فَحَاقَ بِالَّذِيْنَ سَخِرُوْا مِنْهُمْ مَّا كَانُوْا بِهٖ يَسْتَهْزِءُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laqadis-tuhzi'a bi- Rusulim-min qablika fahaaqa billazeena sakhiroo minhum maa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon.
verses.translation: Aur (aye Nabi!) yaqeenan aap se pahle Rasoolon se bhi mazaaq kiya gaya tha, phir un mein se jin logon ne mazaaq kiya tha, unhen uss a'zaab ne aa ghera jiska woh mazaaq udaate the.

verses.arabic: قُلْ سِيْرُوْا فِي الْاَرْضِ ثُمَّ انْظُرُوْا كَيْفَ كَانَ عَاقِبَةُ الْمُكَذِّبِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qul seeroo fil-'ardi Summan-zuroo kayfa kaana 'aaqibatul- mukazzibeen.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) kah deejiye: tum zameen mein ghumo phiro, phir dekho jhutlaane waalon ka anjaam kiya huwa?

verses.arabic: قُلْ لِّمَنْ مَّا فِي السَّمٰوٰتِ وَ الْاَرْضِ ۭ قُلْ لِلّٰهِ ۭ كَتَبَ عَلٰى نَفْسِهِ الرَّحْمَةَ ۭ لَيَجْمَعَنَّكُمْ اِلٰى يَوْمِ الْقِيٰمَةِ لَا رَيْبَ فِيْهِ ۭ الَّذِيْنَ خَسِرُوْۤا اَنْفُسَهُمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qul limam-maa fis- samaawaati wal'ardi qul lillaah; kataba 'alaa nafsihir-rahmah; layajma'annakum 'ilaa Yawmil-Qiyaamati laa rayba feeh; 'allazeena khasirooo 'anfusahum fahum laa yu'minoon.
verses.translation: Unse poochhye: jo kuchh aasmaanon aur zameen mein hai woh kis ke liye hai? kah deejiye: Allah hi ke liye hai, usne (makhlooq par) mehar baani karna¹ apne oupar laazim karliya hai, woh qiyaamat ke din tumhein zaroor jama karega jis mein koyi shak nahin, jin logon ne apne aapko khasaare mein daala hai, to woh eemaan nahin laate.
verses.deepMeaning: Kyunke woh Raheem hai, uski rahmat badi wasi' hai. hadees mein hai: 'Allah Ta'ala ne rahmat ke 100 hisse kiye hain aur un mein se 99 hisse apne paas rakh liye hain aur zameen par sirf ek hissah utaara hai aur uss ek hisse ki badolat makhlooq ek doosre par raham karti hai yahaan tak ke ghodi apne sum apne bachche ko nahin lagne deti ke kahin use takleef na pahunche.' (Al-Bukhari, Hadees:6000) ek doosri rivaayat mein hai: 'jab Allah Ta'ala ne kaayenaat ko mukammal kar liya to apni kitab mein, jo uske paas arsh ke oupar hai, likh liya: 'Beshak meri rahmat mere ghazab par ghaalib aa gayi hai.' (Al-Bukhari, Hadees:3194)

verses.arabic: وَ لَهٗ مَا سَكَنَ فِي الَّيْلِ وَ النَّهَارِ ۗ وَ هُوَ السَّمِيْعُ الْعَلِيْمُ
verses.transliteration: Wa lahoo maa sakana fil-layli wannahaar; wa Huwas- Samee'ul-'Aleem.
verses.translation: Raat (ke andhere) aur din (ke ujaale) mein jo kuchh thhahraa huwa hai, woh Allah hi ka hai aur woh sab kuchh sunta aur khoob jaanta hai.

verses.arabic: قُلْ اَغَيْرَ اللّٰهِ اَتَّخِذُ وَلِيًّا فَاطِرِ السَّمٰوٰتِ وَ الْاَرْضِ وَ هُوَ يُطْعِمُ وَ لَا يُطْعَمُ ۗ قُلْ اِنِّيْۤ اُمِرْتُ اَنْ اَكُوْنَ اَوَّلَ مَنْ اَسْلَمَ ۖ وَ لَا تَكُوْنَنَّ مِنَ الْمُشْرِكِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qul 'aghayral-laahi 'attakhizu waliyyan faatiris-samaawaati wal'ardi wa Huwa yut'imu wa laa yut'am; qul 'inneee 'umirtu 'an 'akoona 'awwala man 'aslama wa laa takoonanna minal- mushrikeen.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) kah deejiye: kiya main uss Allah ke siwa ma'bood banaa loon jo aasmaanon aur zameen ko paida karne waala hai? aur (sabko) khilaata hai aur use nahin khilaaya jaata, kah deejiye: beshak mujhe hukm diya gaya hai ke main woh pahla shakhs ho jaaun jo islam laaya, aur aap mushrikon mein shamil na ho jaayein.

verses.arabic: قُلْ اِنِّيْۤ اَخَافُ اِنْ عَصَيْتُ رَبِّيْ عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيْمٍ
verses.transliteration: Qul 'inneee 'akhaafu 'in 'aşaytu Rabbee 'azaaba Yawmin 'Azeem.
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: beshak agar main ne apne rab ki naafarmaani ki to main ek bahut bade din ke a'zaab se darta hoon.

verses.arabic: مَنْ يُّصْرَفْ عَنْهُ يَوْمَىٕذٍ فَقَدْ رَحِمَهٗ ۭ وَ ذٰلِكَ الْفَوْزُ الْمُبِيْنُ
verses.transliteration: Many-yuşraf 'anhu Yawma'izin faqad rahimah; wa zaalikal- fawzul-mubeen.
verses.translation: Uss din jis shakhs se a'zaab hata liya gaya to yaqeenan uss par Allah ne raham kardiya, aur yahi hai waazeh kaamyaabi.

verses.arabic: وَ اِنْ يَّمْسَسْكَ اللّٰهُ بِضُرٍّ فَلَا كَاشِفَ لَهٗۤ اِلَّا هُوَ ۚ وَ اِنْ يَّمْسَسْكَ بِخَيْرٍ فَهُوَ عَلٰى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيْرٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'iny-yamsaskal- laahu bidurrin falaaa kaashifa lahooo 'illaa Huwa wa 'iny-yamsaska bikhayrin fa-Huwa 'alaa kulli shay'in Qadeer.
verses.translation: Aur agar Allah aapko koyi takleef pahunchaaye to uske siwa koyi use door karne waala nahin aur agar woh aapko koyi bhalaayi pahunchaaye, to woh har cheez par khoob qaadir hai.

verses.arabic: وَ هُوَ الْقَاهِرُ فَوْقَ عِبَادِهٖ وَ هُوَ الْحَكِيْمُ الْخَبِيْرُ
verses.transliteration: Wa Huwal-qaahiru fawqa 'ibaadih; wa Huwal-Hakeemul- Khabeer.
verses.translation: Aur woh apne bandon par pura ikhtiyaar rakhta hai aur woh khoob hikmat waala hai, nihaayat baa khabar hai.

verses.arabic: قُلْ اَيُّ شَيْءٍ اَكْبَرُ شَهَادَةً ۭ قُلِ اللّٰهُ ۭ شَهِيْدٌۢ بَيْنِيْ وَ بَيْنَكُمْ ۚ وَ اُوْحِيَ اِلَيَّ هٰذَا الْقُرْاٰنُ لِاُنْذِرَكُمْ بِهٖ وَ مَنْۢ بَلَغَ ۭ اَىٕنَّكُمْ لَتَشْهَدُوْنَ اَنَّ مَعَ اللّٰهِ اٰلِهَةً اُخْرٰى ۭ قُلْ لَاۤ اَشْهَدُ ۚ قُلْ اِنَّمَا هُوَ اِلٰهٌ وَّاحِدٌ وَّ اِنَّنِيْ بَرِيْٓءٌ مِّمَّا تُشْرِكُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qul 'ayyu shay'in 'akbaru shahaadatan qulil-laahu shaheedum baynee wa baynakum; wa 'oohiya 'ilayya haazal-Qur'aanu li'unzirakum bihee wa mam-balagh; 'a'innakum latashhadoona 'anna ma'al-laahi 'aalihatan 'ukhraa; qul laaa 'ashhad; qul 'innamaa Huwa 'Ilaahunw-Waahiduñw-wa 'innanee baree'um-mimmaa tushrikoon.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi! unse) kahiye: gawaahi ke taur par kaun si cheez sabse badh kar hai? kah deejiye: Allah mere aur tumhaare darmiyaan gawaah hai, aur meri taraf yeh qur'an wahi kiya gaya hai taake iske zariye se main tumhen aur jis jisko yeh pahunche sab ko daraaoun (khabar daar kardun) kiya tum iski gawaahi dete ho ke Allah ke saath doosre ma'bood bhi hain,? kah deejiye: mein yeh gawaahi nahin deta. (aur yeh bhi) kah deejiye ke sirf wahi ek ma'bood hai aur be shak main usse bari hoon jo tum shareek thhahraate ho.

verses.arabic: اَلَّذِيْنَ اٰتَيْنٰهُمُ الْكِتٰبَ يَعْرِفُوْنَهٗ كَمَا يَعْرِفُوْنَ اَبْنَآءَهُمْ ۭ اَلَّذِيْنَ خَسِرُوْۤا اَنْفُسَهُمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Allazeena 'aataynaahumul-Kitaaba ya'rifoonahoo kamaa ya'rifoona 'abnaaa'ahum; 'allazeena khasirooo 'anfusahum fahum laa yu'minoon.
verses.translation: Jin logon ko humne kitab di woh use uss tarah pahchaante hain jis tarah apne beton ko pahchaante hain. jin logon ne apne aapko khasaare mein daala, to woh eemaan nahin late.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Mulaahazah keejiye haashyah: (Surah Aal-e-Imran:3/85)

verses.arabic: وَ مَنْ اَظْلَمُ مِمَّنِ افْتَرٰى عَلَى اللّٰهِ كَذِبًا اَوْ كَذَّبَ بِاٰيٰتِهٖ ۭ اِنَّهٗ لَا يُفْلِحُ الظّٰلِمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa man 'azlamu mimmanif-taraa 'alal- laahi kaziban 'aw kazzaba bi-'Aayaatih; 'innahoo laa yuflihuz- zaalimoon.
verses.translation: Aur uss shakhs se badh kar zaalim kaun hai jo Allah par jhoot baandhe ya uski aayaat ko jhutlaaye? beshak zaalim falaah nahin paayenge.

verses.arabic: وَ يَوْمَ نَحْشُرُهُمْ جَمِيْعًا ثُمَّ نَقُوْلُ لِلَّذِيْنَ اَشْرَكُوْا اَيْنَ شُرَكٰٓؤُكُمُ الَّذِيْنَ كُنْتُمْ تَزْعُمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa Yawma nahshuruhum jamee'an summa naqoolu lillazeena 'ashrakooo 'ayna shurakaaa'ukumul- lazeena kuntum taz'umoon.
verses.translation: Aur jis din hum sabko ekhatthha karenge, phir jo log (Allah ke saath) shareek thharaate the, unse hum kahenge: tumhaare woh shareek kahan hain jinhein tum (Allah ke saath shareek) khayaal karte the?

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ لَمْ تَكُنْ فِتْنَتُهُمْ اِلَّاۤ اَنْ قَالُوْا وَ اللّٰهِ رَبِّنَا مَا كُنَّا مُشْرِكِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Summa lam takun fitnatuhum 'illaaa 'an qaaloo wallaahi Rabbinaa maa kunnaa mushrikeen.
verses.translation: Phir uss (jawaab talabi) par unki ma'zrat yahi hogi ke woh kahenge: Allah, hamaare rab ki qasam! hum mushrik nahin the.

verses.arabic: انْظُرْ كَيْفَ كَذَبُوْا عَلٰٓى اَنْفُسِهِمْ وَ ضَلَّ عَنْهُمْ مَّا كَانُوْا يَفْتَرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Unzur kayfa kazaboo 'alaaa 'anfusihim, wa dalla 'anhum maa kaanoo yaftaroon.
verses.translation: Dekhen woh apne Aap par kaisa jhoot ghadenge aur jinhein woh jhoote ma'bood bana lete the, sab (wahaan) gum ho jaayenge.

verses.arabic: وَ مِنْهُمْ مَّنْ يَّسْتَمِعُ اِلَيْكَ ۚ وَ جَعَلْنَا عَلٰى قُلُوْبِهِمْ اَكِنَّةً اَنْ يَّفْقَهُوْهُ وَ فِيْ اٰذَانِهِمْ وَقْرًا ۚ وَ اِنْ يَّرَوْا كُلَّ اٰيَةٍ لَّا يُؤْمِنُوْا بِهَا ۚ حَتّٰٓى اِذَا جَآءُوْكَ يُجَادِلُوْنَكَ يَقُوْلُ الَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْۤا اِنْ هٰذَآ اِلَّاۤ اَسَاطِيْرُ الْاَوَّلِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa minhum mañy- yastami'u 'ilayka wa ja'alnaa 'alaa quloobihim 'akinnatan 'any- yafqahoohu wa feee 'aazaanihim waqraa; wa iny-yaraw kulla 'Aayatil- laa yu'minoo bihaa; hattaaa 'izaa jaaa'ooka yujaadiloonaka yaqoolul-lazeena kafarooo 'in haazaaa 'illaaa 'asaateerul-'awwaleen.
verses.translation: Aur un meinse ba'z woh hain jo kaan lagaa kar aap ki baat sunte hain, jabke humne unke dilon par parde daal diye hain ke woh usko samajh hi na saken aur un ke kaanon mein rukaawat daal di, aur agar woh saari nishaaniyaan dekh len to bhi un par eemaan nahin laayenge, hatta

verses.arabic: وَ هُمْ يَنْهَوْنَ عَنْهُ وَ يَنْـَٔوْنَ عَنْهُ ۚ وَ اِنْ يُهْلِكُوْنَ اِلَّاۤ اَنْفُسَهُمْ وَ مَا يَشْعُرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa hum yanhawna 'anhu wa yanʼawna 'anhu wa 'iny- yuhlikoona 'illaaa 'anfusahum wa maa yash'uroon.
verses.translation: Aur woh doosron ko iss (hidaayat) se rokte hain aur khud bhi usse door rahte hain aur woh apne aap hi ko halaak kar rahe hain, aur woh shu'oor nahin rakhte.

verses.arabic: وَ لَوْ تَرٰٓى اِذْ وُقِفُوْا عَلَى النَّارِ فَقَالُوْا يٰلَيْتَنَا نُرَدُّ وَ لَا نُكَذِّبَ بِاٰيٰتِ رَبِّنَا وَ نَكُوْنَ مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa law taraaa 'iz wuqifoo 'alan-Naari faqaaloo yaa laytanaa nuraddu wa laa nukazziba bi-'Aayaati Rabbinaa wa nakoona minal-mu'mineen.
verses.translation: Aur agar aap unhein uss waqt dekhen jab woh aag mein khade kiye jaayenge to woh kahenge: kaash! ek baar hamein dunya mein waapas bhej diya jaaye to hum apne rab ki nishaaniyon ko hargiz nahin jhutlaayenge aur hum mominon mein se honge.

verses.arabic: بَلْ بَدَا لَهُمْ مَّا كَانُوْا يُخْفُوْنَ مِنْ قَبْلُ ۚ وَ لَوْ رُدُّوْا لَعَادُوْا لِمَا نُهُوْا عَنْهُ وَ اِنَّهُمْ لَكٰذِبُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Bal badaa lahum maa kaanoo yukhfoona min qablu wa law ruddoo la'aadoo limaa nuhoo 'anhu wa 'innahum lakaaziboon.
verses.translation: Nahin, balke unke woh kartoot zaahir ho chuke honge jinhein woh pahle chhupaate the. aur agar unhein waapas (dunya mein) bhej diya jaaye to bhi woh wahi kaam karenge jinse unhein roka gaya tha, aur be shak woh jhoote hain.

verses.arabic: وَ قَالُوْۤا اِنْ هِيَ اِلَّا حَيَاتُنَا الدُّنْيَا وَ مَا نَحْنُ بِمَبْعُوْثِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa qaalooo 'in hiya 'illaa hayaatunad- dunyaa wa maa nahnu bimab'ooseen.
verses.translation: Aur woh kahte hain ke zindagi to bas hamaari dunya hi ki zindagi hai, aur hamein dobaarah nahin

verses.arabic: وَ لَوْ تَرٰٓى اِذْ وُقِفُوْا عَلٰى رَبِّهِمْ ۭ قَالَ اَلَيْسَ هٰذَا بِالْحَقِّ ۭ قَالُوْا بَلٰى وَ رَبِّنَا ۭ قَالَ فَذُوْقُوا الْعَذَابَ بِمَا كُنْتُمْ تَكْفُرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa law taraaa 'iz wuqifoo 'alaa Rabbihim; qaala 'alaysa haazaa bilhaqq; qaaloo balaa wa Rabbinaa; qaala fazooqul-'azaaba bimaa kuntum takfuroon.
verses.translation: Aur agar aap unhein uss waqt dekhein jab woh apne rab ke saamne khade kiye jaayenge to woh farmaayega: kiya yeh haq nahin hai? to woh kahenge: kyun nahin! (yeh haq hai) hamaare rab ki qasam! to Allah farmaayega: phir tum a'zaab ka mazah chakhho iss wajah se ke tum kufr karte the.

verses.arabic: قَدْ خَسِرَ الَّذِيْنَ كَذَّبُوْا بِلِقَآءِ اللّٰهِ ۭ حَتّٰٓى اِذَا جَآءَتْهُمُ السَّاعَةُ بَغْتَةً ۙ قَالُوْا يٰحَسْرَتَنَا عَلٰى مَا فَرَّطْنَا فِيْهَا وَ هُمْ يَحْمِلُوْنَ اَوْزَارَهُمْ عَلٰى ظُهُوْرِهِمْ ۭ اَلَا سَآءَ مَا يَزِرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qad khasiral-lazeena kazzaboo biliqaaa'il-laahi hattaaa 'izaa jaaa'athumus-Saa'atu baghtatan qaaloo yaa hasratanaa 'alaa maa farratnaa feehaa wa hum yahmiloona 'awzaarahum 'alaa zuhoorihim; 'alaa saaa'a maa yaziroon.
verses.translation: Beshak woh log khasaare mein rahe jinhon ne Allah se mulaaqaat ko jhutlaaya¹ hatta ke jab unke paas qiyaamat achaanak aa jaayegi woh kahenge: afsos! humse iss muaa'mle mein kaisi kotaahi huyi, aur woh apne bojh apni peethh par uthhaaye huye honge.khabar daar! bahut bura hai woh bojh jo woh uthhaayenge.
verses.deepMeaning: Ya'ni qiyaamat ko nahin maana, aise logon se Allah bhi milna pasand nahin karta chunaancheh hadees mein hai, Rasoolullah ﷺ ne farmaya: jo shakhs Allah se milna pasand karta hai to Allah Ta'ala bhi usse milna psand karta hai jo koyi Allah se milna naa pasand karta hai to Allah bhi usse milna naa pasand karta hai.' (Sahih Al-Bukhari, Ar-Reqaaq, Baab: 41, Hadees:6508)

verses.arabic: وَ مَا الْحَيٰوةُ الدُّنْيَاۤ اِلَّا لَعِبٌ وَّ لَهْوٌ ۭ وَ لَلدَّارُ الْاٰخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ لِّلَّذِيْنَ يَتَّقُوْنَ ۭ اَفَلَا تَعْقِلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa mal-hayaatud- dunyaaa 'illaa la'ibuñw- wa lahwun wa lad- Daarul-'Aakhiratu khayrul-lillazeena yattaqoon; 'afalaa ta'qiloon.
verses.translation: Aur dunya ki zindagi bas khel tamaashe ke siwa kuchh nahin, aur aakhirat ka ghar un logon ke liye yaqeenan behtar hai jo parhez gaari¹ ikhtiyaar karte hain, kiya phir tum aql nahin rakhte.?
verses.deepMeaning: Ya'ni parhez gaar, saaleh aur raast baaz log jo Allah Ta'ala se bahut ziyaadah darte hain aur un tamaam gunaahon aur bure kaamon se baaz rahte hain jin se ussne mana' farmaaya hai. yeh log Allah Ta'ala se bahut ziyaadah muhabbat (bhi) karte hain aur woh tamaam nek kaam bajaa laate hain jinke karne ka usne hukm diya hai.

verses.arabic: قَدْ نَعْلَمُ اِنَّهٗ لَيَحْزُنُكَ الَّذِيْ يَقُوْلُوْنَ ۖ فَاِنَّهُمْ لَا يُكَذِّبُوْنَكَ وَ لٰكِنَّ الظَّالِمِيْنَ بِاٰيٰتِ اللّٰهِ يَجْحَدُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qad nalamu 'innahoo layahzunukal-lazee yaqooloona fa'innahum laa yukazziboonaka wa laakinnaz-zaalimeena bi- 'Aayaatil-laahi yajhadoon.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) hum jaante hain ke be shak aap ko woh baat ghamgeen karti hai jo woh kahte hain, pas be shak woh aap ko nahin jhutlaate balke dar asl yeh zaalim to Allah ki aayaton ka inkaar karte hain.

verses.arabic: وَ لَقَدْ كُذِّبَتْ رُسُلٌ مِّنْ قَبْلِكَ فَصَبَرُوْا عَلٰى مَا كُذِّبُوْا وَ اُوْذُوْا حَتّٰى اَتٰىهُمْ نَصْرُنَا ۚ وَ لَا مُبَدِّلَ لِكَلِمٰتِ اللّٰهِ ۚ وَ لَقَدْ جَآءَكَ مِنْ نَّبَاِ الْمُرْسَلِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad kuzzibat Rusulum-min qablika faşabaroo 'alaa maa kuzziboo wa 'oozoo hattaaa 'ataahum naşrunaa; wa laa mubaddila li-Kalimaatil- laah; wa laqad jaaa'aka min-naba'il-mursaleen.
verses.translation: Aur (aye Nabi!) beshak Aap se pahle bahut se Rasool jhutlaaye gaye, to unhon ne jhutlaaye jaane aur takleef diye jaane par sabr kiya hatta ke unke paas hamaari madad aa pahunchi aur Allah ke kalimaat ko koyi badalne waala nahin aur yaqeenan aapke paas Rasoolon ki kuchh khabren aachuki hain.

verses.arabic: وَ اِنْ كَانَ كَبُرَ عَلَيْكَ اِعْرَاضُهُمْ فَاِنِ اسْتَطَعْتَ اَنْ تَبْتَغِيَ نَفَقًا فِي الْاَرْضِ اَوْ سُلَّمًا فِي السَّمَآءِ فَتَاْتِيَهُمْ بِاٰيَةٍ ۭ وَ لَوْ شَآءَ اللّٰهُ لَجَمَعَهُمْ عَلَى الْهُدٰى ۚ فَلَا تَكُوْنَنَّ مِنَ الْجٰهِلِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'in kaana kabura 'alayka 'I'raaduhum fa'inis-tata'ta 'an tabtaghiya nafaqan fil- 'ardi 'aw sullaman fis-samaaa'i fata'tiyahum bi-'Aayah; wa law shaaa'al-laahu lajama'ahum 'alal- hudaa; falaa takoonanna minal-jaahileen.
verses.translation: Aur agar un logon (kaafiron) ka haq se munh modna aapko naa gawaar hai to agar aap mein yeh taaqat hai ke aap zameen mein koyi surang yaa aasmaan mein koyi seedhi dhoondlein, phir aap unke paas koyi nishaani le aayein (to aisa kar guzren) aur agar Allah chaahta to unhein hidaayat par jama kardeta, chunaancheh aap naadaanon mein se na ho jaayen.

verses.arabic: اِنَّمَا يَسْتَجِيْبُ الَّذِيْنَ يَسْمَعُوْنَ ۘ وَ الْمَوْتٰى يَبْعَثُهُمُ اللّٰهُ ثُمَّ اِلَيْهِ يُرْجَعُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Innamaa yastajeebul-lazeena yasma'oon; walmawtaa yab'asuhumul-laahu summa 'ilayhi yurja'oon.
verses.translation: Haq ko qubool to sirf woh karte hain jo sunte hain aur jahaan tak murdon (kaafiron) ka ta'alluq hai, Allah unhein uthhaayega, phir woh usi ki taraf lautaaye jaayenge

verses.arabic: وَ قَالُوْا لَوْلَا نُزِّلَ عَلَيْهِ اٰيَةٌ مِّنْ رَّبِّهٖ ۭ قُلْ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ قَادِرٌ عَلٰٓى اَنْ يُّنَزِّلَ اٰيَةً وَّ لٰكِنَّ اَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa qaaloo law laa nuzzila 'alayhi 'Aayatum-mir-Rabbih; qul 'innal-laaha qaadirun 'alaaa 'añy-yunazzila 'Aayatanw- wa laakinna 'aksarahum laa yalamoon.
verses.translation: 37.Aur unhon ne kaha: iss (nabi) par uske rab ki taraf se koyi (badi) nishaani kyun nahin naazil ki gayi? kah deejiye: beshak Allah uss par qudrat rakhta hai ke koyi (badi) nishaani naazil farmaaye lekin logon mein se aksar ilm nahin rakhte.

verses.arabic: وَ مَا مِنْ دَآبَّةٍ فِي الْاَرْضِ وَ لَا طٰٓىٕرٍ يَّطِيْرُ بِجَنَاحَيْهِ اِلَّآ اُمَمٌ اَمْثَالُكُمْ ۚ مَا فَرَّطْنَا فِي الْكِتٰبِ مِنْ شَيْءٍ ثُمَّ اِلٰى رَبِّهِمْ يُحْشَرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maa min daaabbatin fil-ardi wa laa taaa'iriñy-yateeru bijanaahayhi 'illaaa 'umamun 'amsaalukum; maa farratnaa fil-Kitaabi min shay'in summa 'ilaa Rabbihim yuhsharoon.
verses.translation: Aur zameen par chalne waala koyi jaanwar aur apne donon paron se udne waala koyi parindah aisa nahin jo tumhaari tarah alag ummat na ho, humne kitab mein koyi cheez nahin chhodi (jis ka zikr na kiya ho) phir woh sab apne rab ki taraf ekhatthhe kiye jaayenge.

verses.arabic: وَ الَّذِيْنَ كَذَّبُوْا بِاٰيٰتِنَا صُمٌّ وَّ بُكْمٌ فِي الظُّلُمٰتِ ۗ مَنْ يَّشَاِ اللّٰهُ يُضْلِلْهُ وَ مَنْ يَّشَاْ يَجْعَلْهُ عَلٰى صِرَاطٍ مُّسْتَقِيْمٍ
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena kazzaboo bi-'Aayaatinaa şummuñw- wa bukmun fiz-zulumaat; mañy-yasha'il-laahu yudlilh; wa mañy- yasha' yaj'alhu 'alaa Şiraatim- Mustaqeem.
verses.translation: Aur jin logon ne hamaari aayaton ko jhutlaaya woh andheron mein bahre aur gonge hain, Allah jise chaahe gumraah kardeta hai aur jise chaahe seedhi raah par le aata hai.

verses.arabic: قُلْ اَرَءَيْتَكُمْ اِنْ اَتٰىكُمْ عَذَابُ اللّٰهِ اَوْ اَتَتْكُمُ السَّاعَةُ اَغَيْرَ اللّٰهِ تَدْعُوْنَ اِنْ كُنْتُمْ صٰدِقِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qul 'ara'aytakum 'in 'ataakum 'azaabul-laahi 'aw 'atatkumus-Saa'atu 'aghayral-laahi tad'oona 'in kuntum şaadiqeen.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) kah deejiye: agar tum par Allah ka a'zaab aa jaaye ya tum par qiyaamat aa jaaye to bataao kiya tum Allah ke siwa kisi aur ko pukaaroge agar tum sachche ho?

verses.arabic: بَلْ اِيَّاهُ تَدْعُوْنَ فَيَكْشِفُ مَا تَدْعُوْنَ اِلَيْهِ اِنْ شَآءَ وَ تَنْسَوْنَ مَا تُشْرِكُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Bal 'iyyaahu tad'oona fayakshifu maa tad'oona 'ilayhi 'in shaaa'a wa tansawna maa tushrikoon.
verses.translation: Balke tum sirf usi ko pukaaroge, phir agar woh chaahega to woh takleef door kardega jiske liye tum use pukaaroge, aur tum unhein bhool jaaoge jinhein tum shareek thhahraate the.

verses.arabic: وَ لَقَدْ اَرْسَلْنَاۤ اِلٰٓى اُمَمٍ مِّنْ قَبْلِكَ فَاَخَذْنٰهُمْ بِالْبَاْسَآءِ وَ الضَّرَّآءِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَضَرَّعُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad 'arsalnaaa 'ilaaa umamim-min qablika fa'akhaznaahum bilba'asaaa'i waddarraaa'i la'allahum yatadarra'oon.
verses.translation: Aur tahqeeq humne aap se pahli ummaton ki taraf Rasool bheje, phir humne un (ummaton) ko sakhti aur takleef ke saath pakda taake woh aa'jizi ikhtyaar karein.

verses.arabic: فَلَوْلَآ اِذْ جَآءَهُمْ بَاْسُنَا تَضَرَّعُوْا وَ لٰكِنْ قَسَتْ قُلُوْبُهُمْ وَ زَيَّنَ لَهُمُ الشَّيْطٰنُ مَا كَانُوْا يَعْمَلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Falaw laaa 'iz jaaa'ahum ba'sunaa tadarra'oo wa laakin qasat quloobuhum wa zayyana lahumush- Shaytaanu maa kaanoo ya'maloon.
verses.translation: Phir jab un par hamaara a'zaab aaya to unhon ne aa'jzi kyun na ikhtiyaar ki? lekin unke dil sakht ho gaye aur jo amal woh karte the uss mein shaytaan ne un ke liye kashish paida kardi thi.

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّا نَسُوْا مَا ذُكِّرُوْا بِهٖ فَتَحْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ اَبْوَابَ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ حَتّٰىۤ اِذَا فَرِحُوْا بِمَاۤ اُوْتُوْا اَخَذْنٰهُمْ بَغْتَةً فَاِذَا هُمْ مُّبْلِسُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Falammaa nasoo maa zukkiroo bihee fatahnaa 'alayhim 'abwaaba kulli shay'in hattaaa 'izaa farihoo bimaaa 'ootooo 'akhaznaahum baghtatan fa'izaa hum mublisoon.
verses.translation: Phir jab unhon ne woh naseehat bhulaadi jo unhein ki gayi thi to humne un par har cheez ke darwaaze khol diye hatta ke jab woh un cheezon par itraane lage jo unhein di gayi thin to humne unhein achaanak pakad liya phir woh na ummeed ho kar rah gaye.

verses.arabic: فَقُطِعَ دَابِرُ الْقَوْمِ الَّذِيْنَ ظَلَمُوْا ۚ وَ الْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ رَبِّ الْعٰلَمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Faquti'a daabirul- qawmil-lazeena zalamoo; walhamdu lillaahi Rabbil-'aalameen.
verses.translation: Phir uss qaum ki jad kaat daali gayi jinhon ne zulm kiya tha, aur tamaam ta'reef Allah hi ke liye hai jo tamaam jahaanon ka rab hai.
