verses.arabic: قُلْ اَرَءَيْتُمْ اِنْ اَخَذَ اللّٰهُ سَمْعَكُمْ وَ اَبْصَارَكُمْ وَ خَتَمَ عَلٰى قُلُوْبِكُمْ مَّنْ اِلٰهٌ غَيْرُ اللّٰهِ يَاْتِيْكُمْ بِهٖ ۭ اُنْظُرْ كَيْفَ نُصَرِّفُ الْاٰيٰتِ ثُمَّ هُمْ يَصْدِفُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qul 'ara'aytum 'in 'akhazal-laahu sam'akum wa 'abşaarakum wa khatama 'alaa quloobikum man 'ilaahun ghayrul-laahi ya'teekum bih; 'unzur kayfa nuşarriful-'Aayaati summa hum yaşdifoon.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi! un se) kah deejiye: agar Allah tumhaare kaan aur tumhaari aankhein chheen le aur tumhaare dilon par mohar lagaa de, to bataao Allah ke siwa kaun ma'bood hai jo tumhen yeh (cheezein) laa de? dekhiye kis tarah hum aayaten pher pher kar bayaan karte hain, phir bhi woh munh modte hain.

verses.arabic: قُلْ اَرَءَيْتَكُمْ اِنْ اَتٰىكُمْ عَذَابُ اللّٰهِ بَغْتَةً اَوْ جَهْرَةً هَلْ يُهْلَكُ اِلَّا الْقَوْمُ الظّٰلِمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qul 'ara'aytakum 'in 'ataakum 'azaabul-laahi baghtatan 'aw jahratan hal yuhlaku 'illal-qawmuz-zaalimoon.
verses.translation: Kahiye: agar tum par Allah ka aʻzaab achaanak ya khullam khulla aa jaaye, to bataao kiya zaalimon ke siwa koyi aur log bhi halaak kiye jaayenge?

verses.arabic: وَ مَا نُرْسِلُ الْمُرْسَلِيْنَ اِلَّا مُبَشِّرِيْنَ وَ مُنْذِرِيْنَ ۚ فَمَنْ اٰمَنَ وَ اَصْلَحَ فَلَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ وَ لَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maa nursilul- mursaleena 'illaa mubashshireena wa munzireena faman 'aamana wa 'aşlaha falaa khawfun 'alayhim wa laa hum yahzanoon.
verses.translation: Aur humne koyi Rasool aise nahin bheja jise khushkhabri dene waala aur daraane wala na banaaya ho, phir jo shakhs eemaan le aaye aur apni islaah kar le, to un par na koyi khauf hoga aur na woh ghamgeen honge.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Mustaqbil (ya'ni aakhirat) mein pesh aane waale haalaat ka unhein andeshah nahin aur apne peechhe dunya mein jo kuchh chhod aaye ya dunya ki jo aasoodgiyaan woh haasil na kar sake, uss par woh maghmoom nahin honge, kyun ke donon jahaanon mein unka wali aur kaar saaz woh rab hai jo donon hi jahaanon ka rab hai.

verses.arabic: وَ الَّذِيْنَ كَذَّبُوْا بِاٰيٰتِنَا يَمَسُّهُمُ الْعَذَابُ بِمَا كَانُوْا يَفْسُقُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena kazzaboo bi-'Aayaatinaa yamassuhumul-'azaabu bimaa kaanoo yafsugoon.
verses.translation: Aur jin logon ne hamaari aayat ko jhutlaaya, unhein uss (naafarmaani ki) wajah se a'zaab pahunchega jo naafarmaani woh karte the.

verses.arabic: قُلْ لَّاۤ اَقُوْلُ لَكُمْ عِنْدِيْ خَزَآىٕنُ اللّٰهِ وَ لَاۤ اَعْلَمُ الْغَيْبَ وَ لَاۤ اَقُوْلُ لَكُمْ اِنِّيْ مَلَكٌ ۚ اِنْ اَتَّبِعُ اِلَّا مَا يُوْحٰىٓ اِلَيَّ ۚ قُلْ هَلْ يَسْتَوِي الْاَعْمٰى وَ الْبَصِيْرُ ۚ اَفَلَا تَتَفَكَّرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qullaaa 'agoolu lakum 'indee wa khazaaa'inul-laahi laaa 'a'lamul-ghayba wa laaa 'aqoolu lakum 'innee malakun 'in 'attabi'u 'illaa maa yoohaaa ilayy; qul hal yastawil-'a'maa walbaseer; 'afalaa tatafakkaroon.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) kah deejiye: _ main tum se nahin kahta ke mere paas Allah ke khazaane hain, aur na main ghaib jaanta hoon, aur na main tumse kahta hoon ke main farishtah hoon, main to usi cheez ki pairwi kartal hoon jo meri taraf wahi ki jaati hai. kah deejiye: kiya naabeena aur beena baraabar ho sakte hain? phir kiya tum ghaur nahin karte

verses.arabic: وَ اَنْذِرْ بِهِ الَّذِيْنَ يَخَافُوْنَ اَنْ يُحْشَرُوْۤا اِلٰى رَبِّهِمْ ۙ لَيْسَ لَهُمْ مِّنْ دُوْنِهٖ وَلِيٌّ وَّ لَا شَفِيْعٌ لَّعَلَّهُمْ يَتَّقُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'anzir bihil- Lazeena yakhaafoona Pañy-yuhsharooo 'ilaa Rabbihim laysa lahum- min doonihee waliyyunw-wa laa shafee'ul-la'allahum yattaqoon.
verses.translation: Aur aye Nabi!) aap iss (qura'n) ke zariye se un logon ko daraayein jinhein dar rahta hai ke woh apne rab ke paas ekhaththe kiye jaayeinge, wahaan uske siwa unka koyi dost aur sifaarshi na hoga shaayad ke woh parhez gaari ikhtiyaar karen.

verses.arabic: وَ لَا تَطْرُدِ الَّذِيْنَ يَدْعُوْنَ رَبَّهُمْ بِالْغَدٰوةِ وَ الْعَشِيِّ يُرِيْدُوْنَ وَجْهَهٗ ۭ مَا عَلَيْكَ مِنْ حِسَابِهِمْ مِّنْ شَيْءٍ وَّ مَا مِنْ حِسَابِكَ عَلَيْهِمْ مِّنْ شَيْءٍ فَتَطْرُدَهُمْ فَتَكُوْنَ مِنَ الظّٰلِمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laa tatrudil- lazeena yad'oona Rabbahum bilghadaati wal'ashiyyi yureedoona Wajhahoo maa 'alayka min hisaabihim min shay'inw-wa maa min hisaabika 'alayhim min shay'in fatatrudahum fatakoona minaz- zaalimeen.
verses.translation: Aur un logon ko apne se mat door karen jo apne rab ko subah aur shaam pukaarte hain, woh apne rab ka chehrah (raza mandi) chaahte hain, unke hisaab mein se kisi cheez ka bojh aap par nahin aur aapke hisaab mein se kisi cheez ka bojh un par nahin, phir (agar) aap unko apne se door karen ge to aap zaalimon mein se ho jaaye ge.

verses.arabic: وَ كَذٰلِكَ فَتَنَّا بَعْضَهُمْ بِبَعْضٍ لِّيَقُوْلُوْٓا اَهٰٓؤُلَآءِ مَنَّ اللّٰهُ عَلَيْهِمْ مِّنْ بَيْنِنَا ۗ اَلَيْسَ اللّٰهُ بِاَعْلَمَ بِالشّٰكِرِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa kazaalika fatannaa ba'dahum biba'dil-liyaqoolooo 'ahaaa'ulaaa'i mannal- laahu 'alayhim-mim- bayninaa; 'alaysal-laahu bi'a'lama bishshaakireen.
verses.translation: Aur humne isi tarah logon mein se ba'z ko ba'z ke zariye se aazmaayish mein daala hai taake woh unhein dekh kar kahein: 'kiya hummein se yeh log hain jin par Allah ne ehsaan kiya hai?' (haan) kiya Allah apne shukr guzaar bandon ko (unse) ziyaadah nahin jaanta?.

verses.arabic: وَ اِذَا جَآءَكَ الَّذِيْنَ يُؤْمِنُوْنَ بِاٰيٰتِنَا فَقُلْ سَلٰمٌ عَلَيْكُمْ ۭ كَتَبَ رَبُّكُمْ عَلٰى نَفْسِهِ الرَّحْمَةَ ۚ اَنَّهٗ مَنْ عَمِلَ مِنْكُمْ سُوْٓءًۢا بِجَهَالَةٍ ثُمَّ تَابَ مِنْۢ بَعْدِهٖ وَ اَصْلَحَ فَاَنَّهٗ غَفُوْرٌ رَّحِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'izaa jaaa'akal- lazeena yu'minoona bi- Aayaatinaa faqul salaamun 'alaykum kataba Rabbukum 'alaa nafsihir-rahmata 'annahoo man 'amila minkum sooo'am bijahaalatin summa taaba mim ba'dihee wa 'aşlaha fa'annahoo Ghafoorur-Raheem.
verses.translation: Aur jab woh log aapke paas aayein jo hamaari aayaat par eemaan rakhte hain to kah deejiye: tum par salaam ho, tumhaare rab ne meharbaani ko apne upar laazim kar liya hai.¹ beshak tum mein se jo shakhs jihaalat se bura amal kare, phir uske ba'd taubah kare aur islaah karle to yaqeenan woh bahut bakhsh ne waala, nihaayat raham karne waala hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Aur unhein khushkhabri den ke tafazzal-o-ehsaan ke taur par Allah Ta'ala ne apne shukr guzaar bandon par apni rahmat karne ka faislah kar rakkha hai. jis tarah hadees mein aata hai ke jab Allah Ta'ala takhleeq-e-kaayenaat se faarigh ho gaya to usne arsh par likh diya 'Inna rahmati taghlibu ghazabi' (Al-Bukhari, Hadees:7404) 'Meri rahmat mere ghazab par ghaalib hai

verses.arabic: وَ كَذٰلِكَ نُفَصِّلُ الْاٰيٰتِ وَ لِتَسْتَبِيْنَ سَبِيْلُ الْمُجْرِمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa kazaalika nufaşşilul-'Aayaati wa litastabeena sabeelul-mujrimeen.
verses.translation: Aur hum isi tarah aayaat ko tafseel se bayaan karte hain taake mujrimon ka raastah bilkul waazeh ho jaaye.

verses.arabic: قُلْ اِنِّيْ نُهِيْتُ اَنْ اَعْبُدَ الَّذِيْنَ تَدْعُوْنَ مِنْ دُوْنِ اللّٰهِ ۘ قُلْ لَّا اَتَّبِعُ اَهْوَآءَكُمْ ۙ قَدْ ضَلَلْتُ اِذًا وَّ مَآ اَنَا۠ مِنَ الْمُهْتَدِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qul 'innee nuheetu 'an 'a'budal-lazeena tadʻoona min doonil-laah; qullaaa 'attabi'u 'ahwaaa'akum qad dalaltu 'izañw-wa maaa 'ana minal- muhtadeen.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) kah deejiye: beshak mujhe mana' kiya gaya hai ke main unki ibaadat karun jinhein tum Allah ko chod kar pukaarte ho, kah deejiye: main tumhaari khaahishaat ke peechhe nahin chalta, iss soorat mein, gumaraah ho jaaounga, aur main hidaayat paane waalon mein se na hunga.

verses.arabic: قُلْ اِنِّيْ عَلٰى بَيِّنَةٍ مِّنْ رَّبِّيْ وَ كَذَّبْتُمْ بِهٖ ۭ مَا عِنْدِيْ مَا تَسْتَعْجِلُوْنَ بِهٖ ۭ اِنِ الْحُكْمُ اِلَّا لِلّٰهِ ۭ يَقُصُّ الْحَقَّ وَ هُوَ خَيْرُ الْفٰصِلِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qul 'innee 'alaa bayyinatim-mir-Rabbee wa kazzabtum bih; maa 'indee maa tasta jiloona bih; 'inil-hukmu 'illaa lillaahi yaquşşul-haqqa wa Huwa khayrul- faaşileen.
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: beshak main apne rab ki taraf se bilkul waazeh daleel par hoon, aur tumne iss daleel ko jhuthlaaya hai, mere paas woh cheez nahin hai jise tum jaldi talab kar rahe ho, faisle ka saara ikhtiyaar Allah hi ko hai, wahi haq baat bayaan karta hai, aur woh behtareen faislah karne waala hai.

verses.arabic: قُلْ لَّوْ اَنَّ عِنْدِيْ مَا تَسْتَعْجِلُوْنَ بِهٖ لَقُضِيَ الْاَمْرُ بَيْنِيْ وَ بَيْنَكُمْ ۭ وَ اللّٰهُ اَعْلَمُ بِالظّٰلِمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qul law 'anna 'indee maa tasta jiloona bihee laqudiyal-'amru baynee wa baynakum; wallaahu 'a'lamu bizzaalimeen.
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: beshak mere paas woh cheez hoti jise tum jaldi talab kar rahe ho, to mere aur tumhaare darmiyaan mu'aamlah kabhi ka chuka diya gaya hota aur Allah zaalimon ko khoob jaanta hai.

verses.arabic: وَ عِنْدَهٗ مَفَاتِحُ الْغَيْبِ لَا يَعْلَمُهَآ اِلَّا هُوَ ۚ وَ يَعْلَمُ مَا فِي الْبَرِّ وَ الْبَحْرِ ۭ وَ مَا تَسْقُطُ مِنْ وَّرَقَةٍ اِلَّا يَعْلَمُهَا وَ لَا حَبَّةٍ فِيْ ظُلُمٰتِ الْاَرْضِ وَ لَا رَطْبٍ وَّ لَا يَابِسٍ اِلَّا فِيْ كِتٰبٍ مُّبِيْنٍ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'indahoo mafaatihul-ghaybi laa ya'lamuhaaa 'illaa Hoo; wa ya'lamu maa fil-barri walbahr; wa maa tasqutu minw- waraqatin 'illaa ya'lamuhaa wa laa habbatin fee zulumaatil- 'ardi wa laa ratbinw-wa laa yaabisin 'illaa fee Kitaabim-Mubeen.
verses.translation: Aur usi ke paas ghaib ki kunjiyaan hain, unhein uske siwa koyi nahin jaanta, aur woh jaanta hai jo kuchh khushki aur tari mein hai aur koyi patta aisa nahin girta jise woh jaanta na ho, aur zameen ke andheron mein koyi daanah aisa nahin jise woh jaanta na ho, aur koyi tar cheez aur koyi khushk cheez aisi nahin jo waazeh kitab mein likhi huyi na ho.

verses.arabic: وَ هُوَ الَّذِيْ يَتَوَفّٰىكُمْ بِالَّيْلِ وَ يَعْلَمُ مَا جَرَحْتُمْ بِالنَّهَارِ ثُمَّ يَبْعَثُكُمْ فِيْهِ لِيُقْضٰٓى اَجَلٌ مُّسَمًّى ۚ ثُمَّ اِلَيْهِ مَرْجِعُكُمْ ثُمَّ يُنَبِّئُكُمْ بِمَا كُنْتُمْ تَعْمَلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa Huwal-lazee yatawaffaakum billayli wa yalamu maa jarahtum binnahaari summa yab'asukum feehi liyuqdaaa 'ajalum- musamman summa 'ilayhi marji'ukum summa yunabbi'ukum bimaa kuntum ta'maloon.
verses.translation: Aur wahi hai (Allah) jo raat ko tumhein faut karta hai, aur woh jaanta hai jo kuchh tum din mein karte ho, phir doosre din tumhein uthhaata hai taake zindagi ki muqarrarah muddat poori ho, phir usi ki taraf tumhaari waapsi hai, phir woh tumhein bataa dega ke tum kiya karte rahe ho.

verses.arabic: وَ هُوَ الْقَاهِرُ فَوْقَ عِبَادِهٖ وَ يُرْسِلُ عَلَيْكُمْ حَفَظَةً حَتّٰٓى اِذَا جَآءَ اَحَدَكُمُ الْمَوْتُ تَوَفَّتْهُ رُسُلُنَا وَ هُمْ لَا يُفَرِّطُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa huwal-qaahiru fawqa 'ibaadihee wa yursilu 'alaykum hafazatan hattaaa 'izaa jaaa'a 'ahadakumul- mawtu tawaffathu rusulunaa wa hum laa yufarritoon.
verses.translation: Aur wahi apne bandon par ghaalib hai, aur tum par muhaafiz (Farishte) bhejta hai,¹ hattah ke jab tum mein se kisi ek ki maut ka waqt aata hai to hamaare farishte uski rooh qabz kar lete hain, aur woh uss mein kotaahi nahin karte.
verses.deepMeaning: Isse muraad woh farishte hain jo insaan ke achchhe bure saare amal likhte hain, chunaancheh hadees mein hain, Nabi Kareem ﷺ ne farmaya: 'Raat aur din ke farishte baari baari aate hain aur woh fajr aur asr ki namaaz mein ekatthhe ho jaate hain...' (Sahih Bukhari, Badayil Khalq, baab:6 hadees:3223)

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ رُدُّوْۤا اِلَى اللّٰهِ مَوْلٰىهُمُ الْحَقِّ ۚ اَلَا لَهُ الْحُكْمُ وَ هُوَ اَسْرَعُ الْحٰسِبِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Summa ruddooo 'ilal- laahi mawlaahumul- haqq; 'alaa lahul-hukmu wa Huwa 'asra'ul- haasibeen.
verses.translation: Phir woh Allah ki taraf lautaaye jaate hain jo unka sachcha malik hai. khabardaar! faisle ka saaral ikhtiyaar usi ko haasil hai, aur woh bahut jald hisaab lene waala hai.

verses.arabic: قُلْ مَنْ يُّنَجِّيْكُمْ مِّنْ ظُلُمٰتِ الْبَرِّ وَ الْبَحْرِ تَدْعُوْنَهٗ تَضَرُّعًا وَّ خُفْيَةً ۙ لَىٕنْ اَنْجٰىنَا مِنْ هٰذِهٖ لَنَكُوْنَنَّ مِنَ الشّٰكِرِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qul mañy- yunajjeekum min zulumaatil-barri walbahri tadʻoonahoo tadarru'añw-wa khufyatan la'in 'anjaanaa min haazihee lanakoonanna minash- shaakireen.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) kah deejiye: tumhein khushki aur tari ke andheron se kaun nijaat deta hai? tum use aah-o- zaari karte huye aur chupke chupke pukaarte ho (aur kahte ho) ke agar woh humein iss (museebat) se nijaat de de to ham zaroon shukr karne waalon mein se ho jaayenge.

verses.arabic: قُلِ اللّٰهُ يُنَجِّيْكُمْ مِّنْهَا وَ مِنْ كُلِّ كَرْبٍ ثُمَّ اَنْتُمْ تُشْرِكُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qulil-laahu yunajjeekum minhaa wa min kulli karbin summa 'antum tushrikoon.
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: Allah hi tumhein uss (museebat) se aur gham se nijaat deta hai, phir bhi tum uske saath shirk karte ho?.

verses.arabic: قُلْ هُوَ الْقَادِرُ عَلٰٓى اَنْ يَّبْعَثَ عَلَيْكُمْ عَذَابًا مِّنْ فَوْقِكُمْ اَوْ مِنْ تَحْتِ اَرْجُلِكُمْ اَوْ يَلْبِسَكُمْ شِيَعًا وَّ يُذِيْقَ بَعْضَكُمْ بَاْسَ بَعْضٍ ۭ اُنْظُرْ كَيْفَ نُصَرِّفُ الْاٰيٰتِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَفْقَهُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qul huwal-Qaadiru 'alaaa añy-yab'asa 'alaykum 'azaabam-min fawqikum 'aw min tahti 'arjulikum 'aw yalbisakum shiyaʻanw- wa yuzeeqa ba'dakum ba'sa ba'd; unzur kayfa nuşarriful-'Aayaati la'allahum yafqahoon.
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: wahi iss par qudrat rakhta hai ke tumhaare oupar se ya tumhaare paaon ke neeche se tum par azaab bheje, ya tumhen girohon mein taqseem karke ek (giroh) ko doosre ki taaqat ka mazah chakhaaye. dekhiye, hum kis tarah aayaton ko pher pher kar bayaan karte hain taake woh samjhein.

verses.arabic: وَ كَذَّبَ بِهٖ قَوْمُكَ وَ هُوَ الْحَقُّ ۭ قُلْ لَسْتُ عَلَيْكُمْ بِوَكِيْلٍ
verses.transliteration: Wa kazzaba bihee qawmuka wa huwal- haqq; qullastu 'alaykum biwakeel.
verses.translation: Aur iss (qur'an) ko aapki qaum ne jhut laaya, halaanke woh haq hai, kah deejiye: main tum par nigraan nahin hoon.

verses.arabic: لِكُلِّ نَبَاٍ مُّسْتَقَرٌّ وَّ سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Likulli naba'im- mustaqarr; wa sawfa ta'lamoon.
verses.translation: Har ek khabar ka waqt muqarrar hai, aur jald hi tum jaan loge.

verses.arabic: وَ اِذَا رَاَيْتَ الَّذِيْنَ يَخُوْضُوْنَ فِيْ اٰيٰتِنَا فَاَعْرِضْ عَنْهُمْ حَتّٰى يَخُوْضُوْا فِيْ حَدِيْثٍ غَيْرِهٖ وَ اِمَّا يُنْسِيَنَّكَ الشَّيْطٰنُ فَلَا تَقْعُدْ بَعْدَ الذِّكْرٰى مَعَ الْقَوْمِ الظّٰلِمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'izaa ra'aytal- lazeena yakhoodoona feee 'Aayaatinaa fa'a'rid 'anhum hattaa yakhoodoo fee hadeesin ghayrih; wa 'immaa yunsiyannakash- Shaytaanu falaa taq'ud ba'daz-zikraa ma'al- qawmiz-zaalimeen.
verses.translation: Aur jab aap un logon ko dekhein jo hamaari aayaton par nuktah cheeni kar rahe hote hain, to aap unke paas se hat jaayen yahaan tak ke woh uske elaawah kisi aur baat mein mashghool ho jaayein aur agar shaytaan aapko yeh baat bhula de to yaad aabne par un zaalim logon ke paas mat baithhein.

verses.arabic: وَ مَا عَلَى الَّذِيْنَ يَتَّقُوْنَ مِنْ حِسَابِهِمْ مِّنْ شَيْءٍ وَّ لٰكِنْ ذِكْرٰى لَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَّقُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maa 'alal-lazeena yattaqoona min hisaabihim min shay'inw-wa laakin zikraa la'allahum uattagoon.
verses.translation: Unke hisaab mein se kisi cheez ki zimme daari un logon par nahin jo parhez gaari ikhtiyaar karte hain lekin naseehat karna (unka farz) hai taake woh bhi parhez gaari ikhtiyaar karein.

verses.arabic: وَ ذَرِ الَّذِيْنَ اتَّخَذُوْا دِيْنَهُمْ لَعِبًا وَّ لَهْوًا وَّ غَرَّتْهُمُ الْحَيٰوةُ الدُّنْيَا ۚ وَ ذَكِّرْ بِهٖٓ اَنْ تُبْسَلَ نَفْسٌۢ بِمَا كَسَبَتْ ۙ لَيْسَ لَهَا مِنْ دُوْنِ اللّٰهِ وَلِيٌّ وَّ لَا شَفِيْعٌ ۚ وَ اِنْ تَعْدِلْ كُلَّ عَدْلٍ لَّا يُؤْخَذْ مِنْهَا ۭ اُولٰٓىٕكَ الَّذِيْنَ اُبْسِلُوْا بِمَا كَسَبُوْا ۭ لَهُمْ شَرَابٌ مِّنْ حَمِيْمٍ وَّ عَذَابٌ اَلِيْمٌۢ بِمَا كَانُوْا يَكْفُرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa zaril-lazeenat- takhazoo deenahum la'ibañw-wa lahwanw- wa gharrathumul- hayaatud-dunyaa; wa zakkir biheee 'an tubsala nafsum bimaa kasabat laysa lahaa min doonil- laahi waliyyuñw-wa laa shafee'un wa 'in ta'dil kulla 'adlil-laa yu'khaz minhaa; 'ulaaa'ikal- lazeena 'ubsiloo bimaa kasaboo lahum sharaabum-min hameeminw-wa 'azaabun 'aleemum bimaa kaanoo yakfuroon.
verses.translation: Aur (aye Nabi!) un logon ko chhod deejiye jinhon ne apne deen ko khel tamaasha banaa liya hai, aur duniya ki zindagi ne unhein dhoke mein daal rakkha hai, aur aap iss (qur'an) ke zariye se naseehat karte rahiye taake koyi shakhs apne kartooton ke wabaal se halaak na ho jaaye. Allah ke siwa koyi uska dost aur sifaarshi na hoga. aur woh agar badle mein har tarah ka fidya de to woh bhi usse nahin liya jaayega, yahi woh log hain jo kuchh unhon ne kamaaya uski wajah se unhein halaak kardiya gaya. aur jo woh kufr karte rahein hain uski wajah se unhen dozakh main tez garam paani peene ko milega aur dard naak azaab hoga.

verses.arabic: قُلْ اَنَدْعُوْا مِنْ دُوْنِ اللّٰهِ مَا لَا يَنْفَعُنَا وَ لَا يَضُرُّنَا وَ نُرَدُّ عَلٰٓى اَعْقَابِنَا بَعْدَ اِذْ هَدٰىنَا اللّٰهُ كَالَّذِيِ اسْتَهْوَتْهُ الشَّيٰطِيْنُ فِي الْاَرْضِ حَيْرَانَ ۭ لَهٗ اَصْحَابٌ يَدْعُوْنَهٗٓ اِلَى الْهُدَى ائْتِنَا ۭ قُلْ اِنَّ هُدَى اللّٰهِ هُوَ الْهُدٰى ۭ وَ اُمِرْنَا لِنُسْلِمَ لِرَبِّ الْعٰلَمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qul 'anad'oo min doonil-laahi maa laa yanfa'unaa wa laa yadurrunaa wa nuraddu 'alaaa 'a'qaabinaa ba'da 'iz hadaanal-laahu kallazis-tahwathush- Shayaateenu fil-'ardi hayraana lahooo 'aşhaabuñy- yad'oonahooo 'ilal-huda'- tinaa; qul 'inna hudal- laahi huwal-hudaa wa 'umirnaa linuslima li- Rabbil- 'aalameen.
verses.translation: (Aye nabi!) kah deejiye: kiya hum Allah ke siwa unko pukaarein jo humein na nafa' yanfa'unaa wa laa yadurrunaa wa nuraddu 'alaaa 'a'qaabinaa ba'da 'iz hadaanal-laahu kallazis-tahwathush- Shayaateenu fil-'ardi hayraana lahooo 'ashaabuñy-yad'oonahooo 'ilal-huda'- tinaa; qul 'inna hudal- laahi huwal-hudaa wa 'umirnaa linuslima li- Rabbil- 'aalameen.

verses.arabic: وَ اَنْ اَقِيْمُوا الصَّلٰوةَ وَ اتَّقُوْهُ ۚ وَ هُوَ الَّذِيْٓ اِلَيْهِ تُحْشَرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'an 'aqeemus- Salaata wattaqooh; wa Huwal-lazeee 'ilayhi tuhsharoon.
verses.translation: Wa 'an 'aqeemus- Şalaata wattaqooh; wa Huwal-lazeee 'ilayhi tuhsharoon.

verses.arabic: وَ هُوَ الَّذِيْ خَلَقَ السَّمٰوٰتِ وَ الْاَرْضَ بِالْحَقِّ ۭ وَ يَوْمَ يَقُوْلُ كُنْ فَيَكُوْنُ ۚ قَوْلُهُ الْحَقُّ ۭ وَلَهُ الْمُلْكُ يَوْمَ يُنْفَخُ فِي الصُّوْرِ ۭ عَالِمُ الْغَيْبِ وَ الشَّهَادَةِ ۭ وَ هُوَ الْحَكِيْمُ الْخَبِيْرُ
verses.transliteration: Wa Huwal-lazee khalaqas-samaawaati wal'arda bilhaqq; wa Yawma yaqoolu kun fayakoon; Qawluhul- haqq; wa lahul-mulku Yawma yunfakhu fiş- Soor; 'Aalimul-Ghaybi washshahaadah; wa Huwal-Hakeemul- Khabeer.
verses.translation: Aur wahi hai jisne aasmaanon aur zameen ko haq ke saath paida kiya. aur jis din woh kahega: ho ja to (hashr barpa) ho jaayega, qaul usi ka haq hai, aur jis din soor phoonka jaaye ga us din usi ki hukoomat hogi, woh chhupi aur zaahir (sab) baaton ko jaanne waala hai aur wahi hikmat waala, khabar rakhne waala hai.

verses.arabic: وَ اِذْ قَالَ اِبْرٰهِيْمُ لِاَبِيْهِ اٰزَرَ اَتَتَّخِذُ اَصْنَامًا اٰلِهَةً ۭ اِنِّيْٓ اَرٰىكَ وَ قَوْمَكَ فِيْ ضَلٰلٍ مُّبِيْنٍ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'iz qaala 'Ibraaheemu li'abeehi 'Aazara 'atattakhizu 'aşnaaman 'aalihatan 'inneee 'araaka wa qawmaka fee dalaalim - mubeen.
verses.translation: Aur jab Ibraheem ne apne baap Aazar se kaha: kiya tum buton ko ma'bood thhahraate ho? beshak main tumhein aur tumhaari qaum ko khuli gumraahi mein pade dekhta hoon.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Ibraheem عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام ke baap aazar apni qaum ki tarah mushrik aur gumraah hi rahe, chunaancheh deegar mushrikon ki tarah woh bhi jahannami honge jaisa ke Rasoolullah ﷺ ne farmaya: 'hashr ke din Ibraheem عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام apne baap aazar se milenge jis ka chehrah siyaah aur gard-o-ghubaar mein chhupa huwa hoga. Ibraheem عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام unse kahenge: kiya main ne aapko yeh nahin kaha tha: meri naafarmaani na karein? to aazar kahega: aaj mein teri naa farmaani nahin karunga. Ibraheem عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام apne rab se arz karenge: aye rab! toone mujh se wa'dah farmaaya tha ke tu mujhe hashr ke din ruswa nahin karega to isse ziyaadah aur kiya zillat aur ruswaayi hogi ke mera baap zaleel-o-ruswa ho? woh teri rahmat se mahroom hai. uss par Allah Ta'ala farmaayega: main ne kaafiron par jannat haraam kardi hai. phir farmaayega: aye Ibraheem! Apne paaun tale to dekh, Ibraheem dekhenge ke najaasat se lathda huwa, ek bijju hai jise taangon se pakda jaayega aur jahahannam mein phenk diya jaayega.' (Al- Bukhari, Ahaadesul Ambiya, Hadees:3350) un logon ka khayaal durust nahin jo kahte hain ke aazar chacha the. Arabi zabaan mein chacha ke liye mustaqil lafz (Ammun) maujood hai isliye qur'an ke zaahir ko tabdeel karne ki koyi ma'qool wajah nazar nahin aati.

verses.arabic: وَ كَذٰلِكَ نُرِيْٓ اِبْرٰهِيْمَ مَلَكُوْتَ السَّمٰوٰتِ وَ الْاَرْضِ وَ لِيَكُوْنَ مِنَ الْمُوْقِنِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa kazaalika nureee 'Ibraaheema malakootas- samaawaati wal'ardi wa liyakoona minal- mooqineen.
verses.translation: Aur isi tarah hum Ibraheem ko aasmaanon aur zameen ki baadshaahi dikhaate the taake woh yaqeen karne waalon mein se ho jaaye.

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّا جَنَّ عَلَيْهِ الَّيْلُ رَاٰى كَوْكَبًا ۚ قَالَ هٰذَا رَبِّيْ ۚ فَلَمَّآ اَفَلَ قَالَ لَاۤ اُحِبُّ الْاٰفِلِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Falammaa janna 'alayhil-laylu ra'aa kawkaban qaala haaza Rabbee falammaaa 'afala qaala laaa 'uhibbul- 'aafileen.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh jab uss par raat chha gayi to usne ek sitaarah dekha, Ibraheem ne kaha: yeh mera rab hai, phir jab woh ghuroob ho gaya to kaha: main ghuroob hone waalon se mohabbat nahin karta.

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّا رَاَى الْقَمَرَ بَازِغًا قَالَ هٰذَا رَبِّيْ ۚ فَلَمَّآ اَفَلَ قَالَ لَىٕنْ لَّمْ يَهْدِنِيْ رَبِّيْ لَاَكُوْنَنَّ مِنَ الْقَوْمِ الضَّاۗلِّيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Falammaa ra'al qamara baazighan qaala haazaa Rabbee falammaaa 'afala qaala la'il-lam yahdinee Rabbee la'akoonanna minal-qawmid-daaalleen
verses.translation: Phir jab usne chaand chamakta huwa dekha to kaha: yahi mera rab hai, phir jab woh ghuroob ho gaya to usne kaha: agar mere rab ne mujhe hidaayat na di to yaqeenan main ghumraah qaum mein se ho jaaounga.

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّا رَاَى الشَّمْسَ بَازِغَةً قَالَ هٰذَا رَبِّيْ هٰذَآ اَكْبَرُ ۚ فَلَمَّآ اَفَلَتْ قَالَ يٰقَوْمِ اِنِّيْ بَرِيْٓءٌ مِّمَّا تُشْرِكُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Falammaa ra'ash- shamsa baazighatan qaala haazaa Rabbee haazaaa 'akbaru falammaaa 'afalat qaala yaa qawmi 'innee bareee'um-mimmaa tushrikoon.
verses.translation: Phir jab usne sooraj ko jagmagaata huwa dekha to kaha: yeh mera rab hai, yeh sabse bada hai, phir jab woh bhi ghuroob ho gaya to usne kaha: Aye meri qaum! beshak jinhein tum shareek thhahraate ho, main unse bezaar hoon.

verses.arabic: اِنِّيْ وَجَّهْتُ وَجْهِيَ لِلَّذِيْ فَطَرَ السَّمٰوٰتِ وَ الْاَرْضَ حَنِيْفًا وَّ مَاۤ اَنَا۠ مِنَ الْمُشْرِكِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Innee wajjahtu wajhiya lillazee fataras- samaawaati wal'arda haneefanw-wa maaa ana minal-mushrikeen.
verses.translation: Beshak main ne apna chehra uss zaat ki taraf markooz kar liya hai jisne aasmaanon aur zameen ko paida kiya, main usi (Allah) ka parastaar hoon aur main mushrikon mein se nahin hoon.

verses.arabic: وَ حَآجَّهُ قَوْمُهٗ ۙ قَالَ اَتُحَآجُّوْنِّيْ فِي اللّٰهِ وَ قَدْ هَدٰىنِ ۚ وَ لَاۤ اَخَافُ مَا تُشْرِكُوْنَ بِهٖٓ اِلَّاۤ اَنْ يَّشَآءَ رَبِّيْ شَيْـــًٔـا ۗ وَّسِعَ رَبِّيْ كُلَّ شَيْءٍ عِلْمًا ۭ اَفَلَا تَتَذَكَّرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa haaajjahoo qawmuh; qaala 'atuhaaajjooonnee fil- laahi wa qad hadaan; wa laaa 'akhaafu maa tushrikoona biheee 'illaaa 'any-yashaaa'a Rabbee shay'an wasi'a Rabbee kulla shay'in 'ilman 'afalaa tatazakkaroon.
verses.translation: Aur uski qaum ne usse jhagda kiya to Iss (ibraaheem) ne kaha: kiya tum mujhse Allah kar baare mein jhagada karte ho, haalaan ke usi ne mujhe hidaayat di hai, aur main unse nahin darta jinhein tum uske shareek thhahraate ho. haan, agar mera rab kuchh chaahe, (to woh zaroor ho sakta hai), mere rab ka ilm har cheez par chhaaya huwa hai, kiya phir tum naseehat haasil nahin karte?

verses.arabic: وَ كَيْفَ اَخَافُ مَآ اَشْرَكْتُمْ وَ لَا تَخَافُوْنَ اَنَّكُمْ اَشْرَكْتُمْ بِاللّٰهِ مَا لَمْ يُنَزِّلْ بِهٖ عَلَيْكُمْ سُلْطٰنًا ۭ فَاَيُّ الْفَرِيْقَيْنِ اَحَقُّ بِالْاَمْنِ اِنْ كُنْتُمْ تَعْلَمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa kayfa 'akhaafu maaa 'ashraktum wa laa takhaafoona 'annakum 'ashraktum billaahi maa Jam yunazzil bihee alaykum sultaanaa; fa'ayyul- fareeqayni Pahaqqu bil'amni 'in kuntum ta'lamoon.
verses.translation: Aur main unse kyun darun jinhein tum shareek thhahraate ho, jabke tum uss baat se nahin darte ke tum unko Allah ke shareek thhahraate ho jinki usne turn par koyi daleel naazil nahin ki? pas donon fareeqon mein se kaun aman ka ziyaadah haqdaar hai? (bataao) agar tum jaante ho?

verses.arabic: اَلَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا وَ لَمْ يَلْبِسُوْٓا اِيْمَانَهُمْ بِظُلْمٍ اُولٰٓىٕكَ لَهُمُ الْاَمْنُ وَ هُمْ مُّهْتَدُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Allazeena 'aamanoo wa lam yalbisooo 'eemaanahum bizulmin 'ulaaa'ika lahumul- 'amnu wa hum muhtadoon.
verses.translation: Jo log eemaan laaye aur unhon ne apne eemaan ko zulm (shirk) ke saath khalat malat nahin kiya, wahi log hain jinke liye aman hai, aur wahi hidaayat yaaftah hain.

verses.arabic: وَ تِلْكَ حُجَّتُنَآ اٰتَيْنٰهَآ اِبْرٰهِيْمَ عَلٰى قَوْمِهٖ ۚ نَرْفَعُ دَرَجٰتٍ مَّنْ نَّشَآءُ ۭ اِنَّ رَبَّكَ حَكِيْمٌ عَلِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa tilka hujjatunaaa 'aataynaahaaa 'Ibraaheema 'alaa qawmih; narfa'u darajaatim-man- nashaaa'; 'inna Rabbaka Hakeemun 'Aleem.
verses.translation: Aur yeh hai hamaari daleel jo humne Ibraheem ko uski qaum ke muqaable mein di thi. hum jise chaahein uske darje buland karte hain. beshak Aap ka rab bahut hikmat waala, khoob jaanne waala hai.

verses.arabic: وَ وَهَبْنَا لَهٗٓ اِسْحٰقَ وَ يَعْقُوْبَ ۖ كُلًّا هَدَيْنَا ۚ وَ نُوْحًا هَدَيْنَا مِنْ قَبْلُ وَ مِنْ ذُرِّيَّتِهٖ دَاوٗدَ وَ سُلَيْمٰنَ وَ اَيُّوْبَ وَ يُوْسُفَ وَ مُوْسٰى وَ هٰرُوْنَ ۚ وَ كَذٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa wahabnaa lahooo 'ishaaqa wa yaʻqoob; kullan hadaynaa; wa Noohan hadaynaa min qablu wa min zurriyyatihee Daawooda wa Sulaymaana wa 'Ayyooba wa Yoosufa wa Moosaa wa haaroon; wa kazaalika najzil- muhsineen.
verses.translation: Aur humne USS (Ibraheem) ko Ishaaq aur Ya'qoob a'taa kiye, humne sab ko hidaayat di, aur usse pahle hum ne Nooh ko hidaayat di thi, aur uski aulaad mein se dawood, Sulaimaan, Ayyub, Yusuf, Moosa aur Haaroon ko (bhi hidaayat di) aur isi tarah hum neki karne waalon ko badlah dete hain.

verses.arabic: وَ زَكَرِيَّا وَ يَحْيٰى وَ عِيْسٰى وَ اِلْيَاسَ ۖ كُلٌّ مِّنَ الصّٰلِحِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa Zakariyyaa wa Yahyaa wa 'Eesaa wa 'Ilyaasa kullum-minas- saaliheen.
verses.translation: Aur (humne) Zakariya, Eisa aur Ilyaas ko (bhi hidaayat di), woh sab nek logon meins e the.

verses.arabic: وَ اِسْمٰعِيْلَ وَ الْيَسَعَ وَ يُوْنُسَ وَ لُوْطًا ۚ وَ كُلًّا فَضَّلْنَا عَلَى الْعٰلَمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'Ismaa'eela wal- Yasa'a wa Yoonusa wa Lootaa; wa kullan faddalnaa 'alal- 'aalameen.
verses.translation: Aur (humne) Ismayeel, Ilyasa', Yunus aur Loot ko (bhi hidayat di), aur un sab ko humne jahaanon par fazeelat di.

verses.arabic: وَ مِنْ اٰبَآىٕهِمْ وَ ذُرِّيّٰتِهِمْ وَ اِخْوَانِهِمْ ۚ وَ اجْتَبَيْنٰهُمْ وَ هَدَيْنٰهُمْ اِلٰى صِرَاطٍ مُّسْتَقِيْمٍ
verses.transliteration: Wa min 'aabaaa'ihim wa zurriyyaatihim wa 'ikhwaanihim wajtabaynaahum wa hadaynaahum 'ilaa Siraatim-Mustaqeem.
verses.translation: Aur kuchh ko unke baap, dada, un ki aulaad aur unke bhaaiyon mein se aur humne unhein chun liya aur seedhi raah ki taraf hidaayat di.

verses.arabic: ذٰلِكَ هُدَى اللّٰهِ يَهْدِيْ بِهٖ مَنْ يَّشَآءُ مِنْ عِبَادِهٖ ۚ وَ لَوْ اَشْرَكُوْا لَحَبِطَ عَنْهُمْ مَّا كَانُوْا يَعْمَلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Zaalika hudal-laahi yahdee bihee many- yashaaa'u min 'ibaadih; wa law 'ashrakoo lahabita 'anhum maa kaanoo ya maloon.
verses.translation: Yeh Allah ki hidaayat hai, woh apne bandon mein se jise chaahta hai iski taraf rahnumaayi karta hai. aur agar woh log shirk karte to jo woh amal karte the barbaad ho jaate.

verses.arabic: اُولٰٓىٕكَ الَّذِيْنَ اٰتَيْنٰهُمُ الْكِتٰبَ وَ الْحُكْمَ وَ النُّبُوَّةَ ۚ فَاِنْ يَّكْفُرْ بِهَا هٰٓؤُلَآءِ فَقَدْ وَكَّلْنَا بِهَا قَوْمًا لَّيْسُوْا بِهَا بِكٰفِرِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Ulaaa'ikal-lazeena 'aataynaahumul-Kitaaba walhukma wan- Nubuwwah; fa'iny- yakfur bihaa haaa'ulaaa'i faqad wakkalnaa bihaa qawmal-laysoo bihaa bikaafireen.
verses.translation: Yeh woh log hain jinhein humne kitab, hikmat aur nabuwwat di thi. ab agar yeh log iss (hidaayat ko maanne) se inkaar karte hain to be shak humne uske liye aisi qaum tayyaar ki hai ke woh unka inkaar karne waali nahin.

verses.arabic: اُولٰٓىٕكَ الَّذِيْنَ هَدَى اللّٰهُ ۚ فَبِهُدٰىهُمُ اقْتَدِهْ ۗ قُلْ لَاۤ اَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ اَجْرًا ۭ اِنْ هُوَ اِلَّا ذِكْرٰى لِلْعٰلَمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Ulaaa'ikal-lazeena hadal-laahu fabihudaahumuq-tadih; qul-laaa 'as'alukum 'alayhi 'ajran 'in huwa 'illaa zikraa lil'aalameen
verses.translation: Yeh log hain jinhein Allah ne hidaayat di, lehaaza (aye nabi!) aap bhi unke tareeqe ki pairwi karein. kah deejiye: mein uss par tumse koyi ajr nahin maangta, yeh to tamaam dunya waalon ke liye naseehat hai.

verses.arabic: وَ مَا قَدَرُوا اللّٰهَ حَقَّ قَدْرِهٖۤ اِذْ قَالُوْا مَاۤ اَنْزَلَ اللّٰهُ عَلٰى بَشَرٍ مِّنْ شَيْءٍ ۗ قُلْ مَنْ اَنْزَلَ الْكِتٰبَ الَّذِيْ جَآءَ بِهٖ مُوْسٰى نُوْرًا وَّ هُدًى لِّلنَّاسِ ۭ تَجْعَلُوْنَهٗ قَرَاطِيْسَ تُبْدُوْنَهَا وَ تُخْفُوْنَ كَثِيْرًا ۖ وَّ عُلِّمْتُمْ مَّا لَمْ تَعْلَمُوْا اَنْتُمْ وَ لَاۤ اٰبَآؤُكُمْ ۭ قُلِ اللّٰهُ ۚ ثُمَّ ذَرْهُمْ فِيْ خَوْضِهِمْ يَلْعَبُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maa qadarul- laaha haqqa qadriheee 'iz qaaloo maaa 'anzalal- laahu 'alaa basharim- min shay; qul man 'anzalal-Kitaabal-lazee jaaa'a bihee Moosaa noorañw-wa hudal- linnaasi taj'aloonahoo qaraateesa tubdoonahaa wa tukhfoona kaseeran wa 'ullimtum maa lam ta'lamooo 'antum wa laaa 'aabaaa'ukum qulil- laahu summa zarhum fee khawdihim yal'aboon.
verses.translation: Aur unhon ne Allah ki qadr nahin ki jis tarah uski qadr karne ka haq hai, jis waqt unhon ne kaha: Allah ne kisi bashar par koyi cheez naazil nahin ki, kah deejiye: phir woh kitab kis ne naazil ki thi jise Moosa laaye the? jo tamaam insaanon ke liye raushni aur hidaayat thi, jise tum mutafarriq auraaq mein naql karte ho. uss mein se kuchh tum zaahir karte ho aur bahut kuchh chhupaa lete ho. aur (uss kitab ke zariye se) tumhein woh ilm diya gaya tha jo na tumhein haasil tha aur na tumhaare baap dada ko. kah deejiye: woh Allah ne (naazil ki thi), phir unhein (unke haal par) chhod deejiye: woh apni nuktah cheeniyon mein khelte rahein.

verses.arabic: وَ هٰذَا كِتٰبٌ اَنْزَلْنَاهُ مُبَارَكٌ مُّصَدِّقُ الَّذِيْ بَيْنَ يَدَيْهِ وَ لِتُنْذِرَ اُمَّ الْقُرٰى وَ مَنْ حَوْلَهَا ۚ وَ الَّذِيْنَ يُؤْمِنُوْنَ بِالْاٰخِرَةِ يُؤْمِنُوْنَ بِهٖ ۙ وَ هُمْ عَلٰى صَلَاتِهِمْ يُحَافِظُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa haazaa Kitaabun 'anzalnaahu Mubaarakum- muşaddiqul-lazee bayna yadayhi wa litunzira 'ummal-Quraa wa man hawlahaa; wallazeena yu'minoona bil-'Aakhirati yu'minoona bihee wa hum 'alaa Şalaatihim yuhaafizoon.
verses.translation: Aur yeh kitab (Qur'an Majeed) humne ise naazil kiya hai, yeh barkat waali, tasdeeq karne waali hai uss kitab ki jo isse pahle aayi thi taake aap ummul qura (Makkah) aur uke aas paas waalon ko daraayen. aur jo log aakhrat par eemaan rakhte hain woh iss (Qur'an) par bhi eemaan rakhte hain, aur woh apni namaaz ki hifaazat karte hain.

verses.arabic: وَ مَنْ اَظْلَمُ مِمَّنِ افْتَرٰى عَلَى اللّٰهِ كَذِبًا اَوْ قَالَ اُوْحِيَ اِلَيَّ وَ لَمْ يُوْحَ اِلَيْهِ شَيْءٌ وَّ مَنْ قَالَ سَاُنْزِلُ مِثْلَ مَآ اَنْزَلَ اللّٰهُ ۗ وَ لَوْ تَرٰٓى اِذِ الظّٰلِمُوْنَ فِيْ غَمَرٰتِ الْمَوْتِ وَ الْمَلٰٓىٕكَةُ بَاسِطُوْۤا اَيْدِيْهِمْ ۭ اَخْرِجُوْۤا اَنْفُسَكُمُ ۭ اَلْيَوْمَ تُجْزَوْنَ عَذَابَ الْهُوْنِ بِمَا كُنْتُمْ تَقُوْلُوْنَ عَلَى اللّٰهِ غَيْرَ الْحَقِّ وَ كُنْتُمْ عَنْ اٰيٰتِهٖ تَسْتَكْبِرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa man 'aşlamu mimmanif-taraa 'alal- laahi kaziban 'aw qaala 'oohiya ilayya wa lam yooha 'ilayhi shay'uñw- wa man qaala sa'unzilu misla maaa 'anzalal- laah; wa law taraaa 'iziz-zaalimoona fee ghamaraatil-mawti walmalaaa'ikatu baasitooo 'aydeehim 'akhrijooo 'anfusakum; 'alyawma tujzawna 'azaabal-hooni bimaa kuntum taqooloona 'alal- laahi ghayral-haqqi wa kuntum 'an 'aayaatihee tastakbiroon.
verses.translation: Aur usse ziyaadah zaalim kaun hai jo Allah par jhoot ghade ya kahe ke mujh par wahi' naazil ki gayi hai, haalaanke uss par koyi wahi' naazil nahin ki gayi, aur jisne kaha ke main bhi aisi cheez naazil karsakta hoon jaisi Allah ne naazil ki hai. kaash! aap zaalimon ko dekhein jab woh maut ki sakhtiyon mein giraftaar hote hain, aur farishte (yeh kate huye) aapne haath phailaaye huye hote hain ke nikaalo apni jaanen! aaj tumhen zillat ka a'zaab diya jaayega¹ kyun ke tum Allah par naahaq baatein ghadte aur uski aayaton se takabbur karte the.
verses.deepMeaning: Isse azaab-e-qabr par istadlaal kiya gaya hai jo barhaq hai. isi tarah surah momin ki aayaat 45,46 se bhi iska isbaaat kiya gaya jis mein aal-e-firaun ke azaab ka zikr hai, yeh aayat azaab-e-qabr mein bilkul waazeh hai.

verses.arabic: وَ لَقَدْ جِئْتُمُوْنَا فُرَادٰى كَمَا خَلَقْنٰكُمْ اَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍ وَّ تَرَكْتُمْ مَّا خَوَّلْنٰكُمْ وَرَآءَ ظُهُوْرِكُمْ ۚ وَ مَا نَرٰى مَعَكُمْ شُفَعَآءَكُمُ الَّذِيْنَ زَعَمْتُمْ اَنَّهُمْ فِيْكُمْ شُرَكٰٓؤُا ۚ لَقَدْ تَقَطَّعَ بَيْنَكُمْ وَ ضَلَّ عَنْكُمْ مَّا كُنْتُمْ تَزْعُمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad ji'tumoonaa furaadaa kamaa khalaqnaakum 'awwala marratinw-wa taraktum- maa khawwalnaakum waraaa'a zuhoorikum wa maa naraa ma'akum shufa'aaa'akumul- lazeena zaʻamtum 'annahum feekum shurakaaa'; laqat- taqatta'a baynakum wa dalla 'ankum maa kuntum taz'umoon.
verses.translation: Aur yaqeenan tum hamaare paas akele aaye ho jis tarah ke humne tumhen pahli baar paida kiya aur humne tumhein jo kuchh a'taa kiya tha woh tum apne peechhe chhod aaye ho, aur hum tumhaare saath tumhaare woh sifaarshi nahin dekh rahe hain jinki baabat tumhaara da'wa tha ke beshak woh tumhaari bandagi mein Allah ke shareek hain, unse tumhaara ta'alluq yaqeenan toot gaya hai aur woh tum se kho gaye hain jinhein tum apne ma'bood samajhte the.

verses.arabic: اِنَّ اللّٰهَ فَالِقُ الْحَبِّ وَ النَّوٰى ۖ يُخْرِجُ الْحَيَّ مِنَ الْمَيِّتِ وَ مُخْرِجُ الْمَيِّتِ مِنَ الْحَيِّ ۚ ذٰلِكُمُ اللّٰهُ فَاَنّٰى تُؤْفَكُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Innal-laaha faaliqul- habbi wannawaa yukhrijul-hayya minal- mayyiti wa mukhrijul- mayyiti minal-hayy; zaalikumul-laahu fa'annaa tu'fakoon.
verses.translation: Beshak Allah hi daane aur guthli ko phaadne waala hai, woh zindah ko murde se aur murdah ko zinde se nikaalta hai. yeh hai Allah, chunaancheh tum kahaan bahkaaye jaate ho!

verses.arabic: فَالِقُ الْاِصْبَاحِ وَ جَعَلَ الَّيْلَ سَكَنًا وَّ الشَّمْسَ وَ الْقَمَرَ حُسْبَانًا ۭ ذٰلِكَ تَقْدِيْرُ الْعَزِيْزِ الْعَلِيْمِ
verses.transliteration: Faaliqul-'işbaahi wa ja'alal-layla sakanañw- washshamsa walqamara husbaanaa; zaalika taqdeerul-'Azeezil-'Aleem.
verses.translation: Woh subah ki sapedi nikaalta hai, aur ussne raat ko sukoon ka baay'is banaaya, aur sooraj aur chaand ko waqt ke hisaab ka zari'ah (banaaya) yeh sab bahut zabardast, khoob ilm waale ka andaazah hai.

verses.arabic: وَ هُوَ الَّذِيْ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ النُّجُوْمَ لِتَهْتَدُوْا بِهَا فِيْ ظُلُمٰتِ الْبَرِّ وَ الْبَحْرِ ۭ قَدْ فَصَّلْنَا الْاٰيٰتِ لِقَوْمٍ يَّعْلَمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa Huwal-lazee ja'ala lakumun- nujooma litahtadoo bihaa fee zulumaatil-barri walbahr; qad faşşalnal-'Aayaati liqawminy- ya'lamoon.
verses.translation: Aur wahi hai jis ne tumhaare liye sitaare banaaye¹ taake tum unke zariye se khushki aur tari ke andheron mein raah paao, tahqeeq hum ne apni
verses.deepMeaning: Sitaaron ki paidaayish ke muta'alliq Taabayi' Jaleel Qataadah  رضي الله عنه Apni tafseer mein (Surah Mulk:67/5) ke zimn mein tahreer farmaate hain: 'In sitaaron ki paidaayish ke teen maqaasid hain: ⓵ Aasmaan-e-dunya ki tazyeen-o-araayish ⓶ Bataur-e-mizaayel ke unse shayaateen ko maar bhagaaya jaaye. ⓷ Batuar-e-alamaat ke musaafir unse apni manzil ma'loom kar sakein, chunaancheh jo koyi bhi uske elaawah iss aayat ki koyi aur ta'beer-o-tashreeh talaash kare to woh ghalti par hai aur apni kaawishon ka zíya' karta hai.' (Sahih Bukhari, Badayil Khalaq, Baab:3)

verses.arabic: وَ هُوَ الَّذِيْٓ اَنْشَاَكُمْ مِّنْ نَّفْسٍ وَّاحِدَةٍ فَمُسْتَقَرٌّ وَّ مُسْتَوْدَعٌ ۭ قَدْ فَصَّلْنَا الْاٰيٰتِ لِقَوْمٍ يَّفْقَهُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa huwal-lazeee 'ansha'akum minnafsinw-waahidatin famustaqarruñw-wa mustawda'; qad faşsalnal-'Aayaati liqawminy-yafqahoon.
verses.translation: Aur wahi hai jisne tumhein ek jaan se paida kiya, chunaancheh har ek ke liye ek jaaye qaraar hai aur ek jaaye amaanat, humne apni aayaten un logon ke liye khol kar bayaan kardi hain jo samajh rakhte hain.

verses.arabic: وَ هُوَ الَّذِيْٓ اَنْزَلَ مِنَ السَّمَآءِ مَآءً فَاَخْرَجْنَا بِهٖ نَبَاتَ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ فَاَخْرَجْنَا مِنْهُ خَضِرًا نُخْرِجُ مِنْهُ حَبًّا مُّتَرَاكِبًا وَ مِنَ النَّخْلِ مِنْ طَلْعِهَا قِنْوَانٌ دَانِيَةٌ وَّ جَنّٰتٍ مِّنْ اَعْنَابٍ وَّ الزَّيْتُوْنَ وَ الرُّمَّانَ مُشْتَبِهًا وَّ غَيْرَ مُتَشَابِهٍ ۭ اُنْظُرُوْٓا اِلٰى ثَمَرِهٖٓ اِذَآ اَثْمَرَ وَ يَنْعِهٖ ۭ اِنَّ فِيْ ذٰلِكُمْ لَاٰيٰتٍ لِّقَوْمٍ يُّؤْمِنُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa Huwal-lazeee 'anzala minas-samaaa'i maaa'an fa'akhrajnaa bihee nabaata kulli shay'in fa'akhrajnaa minhu khadiran-nukhriju minhu habbam- mutaraakiban wa minan- nakhli min tal'ihaa qinwaanun daaniyatunw-wa jannaatim-min 'a'naabiñw-wazzaytoona warrummaana mushtabihanw-wa ghayra mutashaabih; 'unzurooo 'ilaa samariheee 'izaaa 'asmara wa yan'ih; 'inna fee zaalikum la-'Aayaatil-liqawminy-yu'minoon.
verses.translation: Aur wahi hai jisne aasmaan se paani naazil kiya, phir humne uske zariye se har qism ki nabaataat paida kin, phir humne hari bhari khetiyaan ugaayin jin se hum ek doosre se jude huye daane nikaalte hain aur khujoor ke shagoofe se phal ke guchchhe paida kiye jo bojh se jhuke jaate hain aur angoor, zaitoon aur anaar ke baagh lagaaye jinke phal ek doosre se milte julte hain magar har ek ki khusoosiyaat juda juda hain. yeh darakht jab phal dene lagte hain to unke phal dene aur unke pakne ki haalat ko dekh kar ghaur karo, beshak uss mein un logon ke liye nishaaniyaan hain jo eemaan laate hain.

verses.arabic: وَ جَعَلُوْا لِلّٰهِ شُرَكَآءَ الْجِنَّ وَ خَلَقَهُمْ وَ خَرَقُوْا لَهٗ بَنِيْنَ وَ بَنٰتٍۢ بِغَيْرِ عِلْمٍ ۭ سُبْحٰنَهٗ وَ تَعٰلٰى عَمَّا يَصِفُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa ja'aloo lillaahi shurakaaa'al-jinna wa khalaqahum wa kharaqoo lahoo baneena wa banaatim bighayri 'ilm; Subhaanahoo wa Ta'aalaa 'ammaa yaşifoon.
verses.translation: .Aur (uss par bhi) logon ne jinnon ko Allah ka shareek thhahraa diya, haalaanke usi ne to unhein paida kiya hai aur unhon ne baghair kisi ilm ke Allah ke bete aur betiyaan ghad liye, woh paak hai aur un baaton se buland hai jo woh bayaan karte hain.

verses.arabic: بَدِيْعُ السَّمٰوٰتِ وَ الْاَرْضِ ۚ اَنّٰى يَكُوْنُ لَهٗ وَلَدٌ وَّ لَمْ تَكُنْ لَّهٗ صَاحِبَةٌ ۭ وَ خَلَقَ كُلَّ شَيْءٍ ۠ وَّ هُوَ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: Badee'us- samaawaati wal 'ardi 'annaa yakoonu lahoo waladuñw-wa lam takul- lahoo şaahibatun wa khalaqa kulla shay'; wa huwa bikulli shay'in 'Aleem.
verses.translation: Wahi aasmaanon aur zameen ka mojid hai, uski aulaad kaise ho sakti hai jabke uski koyi biwi nahin? aur usi ne har cheez ko paida kiya aur wahi har cheez ko khoob jaanne waala hai.

verses.arabic: ذٰلِكُمُ اللّٰهُ رَبُّكُمْ ۖ لَاۤ اِلٰهَ اِلَّا هُوَ ۚ خَالِقُ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ فَاعْبُدُوْهُ ۭ وَ هُوَ عَلٰى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ وَّكِيْلٌ
verses.transliteration: Zaalikumul-laahu Rabbukum laaa 'ilaaha 'illaa Huwa khaaliqu kulli shay'in fa'budooh; wa huwa 'alaa kulli shay'inw-Wakeel.
verses.translation: Yeh hai Allah, tumhaara rab, uske siwa koyi ma'bood nahin, wahi har cheez ko paida karne waala hai, lehaaza tum usi ki i'baadat karo, aur woh har cheez par nigraan hai.

verses.arabic: لَا تُدْرِكُهُ الْاَبْصَارُ وَ هُوَ يُدْرِكُ الْاَبْصَارَ ۚ وَ هُوَ اللَّطِيْفُ الْخَبِيْرُ
verses.transliteration: Laa tudrikuhul- 'absaaru wa Huwa yudrikul-'abşaara wa huwal-Lateeful- Khabeer.
verses.translation: Uss (ki haqeeqat) ko nigaahein nahin paa saktin, aur woh nigaahon ko paa leta hai, aur woh nehaayat baareek been, bahut baa khabar hai.

verses.arabic: قَدْ جَآءَكُمْ بَصَآىٕرُ مِنْ رَّبِّكُمْ ۚ فَمَنْ اَبْصَرَ فَلِنَفْسِهٖ وَ مَنْ عَمِيَ فَعَلَيْهَا ۭ وَ مَاۤ اَنَا عَلَيْكُمْ بِحَفِيْظٍ
verses.transliteration: Qad jaaa'akum başaaa'iru mir- Rabbikum faman 'abşara falinafsihee wa man 'amiya fa'alayhaa; wa maaa 'ana 'alaykum bihafeez
verses.translation: Tumhaare paas tumhaare rab ki taraf se waazeh daleelein aa chuki hain, chunaancheh jisne baseerat se kaam liya to uske apne faaide ke liye hai aur jo andha bana raha uska wabaal usi par hai, aur (kah deejiye) main tum par muhaafiz nahin hoon.

verses.arabic: وَ كَذٰلِكَ نُصَرِّفُ الْاٰيٰتِ وَ لِيَقُوْلُوْا دَرَسْتَ وَ لِنُبَيِّنَهٗ لِقَوْمٍ يَعْلَمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa kazaalika nuşarriful-'Aayaati wa liyaqooloo darasta wa linubayyinahoo liqawminy-yaʻlamoon.
verses.translation: Aur hum aayaat ko usi tarah pher pher kar bayaan karte hain taake kaafir yeh kahen ke toone (kisi se) padh liya hai aur jo log ilm rakhte hain, un par hum uss (haqeeqat) ko waazeh karden.

verses.arabic: اتَّبِعْ مَآ اُوْحِيَ اِلَيْكَ مِنْ رَّبِّكَ ۖ لَآ اِلٰهَ اِلَّا هُوَ ۚ وَ اَعْرِضْ عَنِ الْمُشْرِكِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Ittabi' maaa 'oohiya 'ilayka mir-Rabbika laaa 'ilaaha 'illaa Huwa wa 'a'rid 'anil-mushrikeen.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) Aap uss wahi' ki pairwi karen jo aap par Aap ke rab ki taraf se (naazil) ki jaati hai. uske siwa koyi ma'bood nahin aur mushrikeen¹ ki taraf dhiyaan na dein.
verses.deepMeaning: (Al-Mushrikeen) muta'addid ma'boodon ke maanne waale, but parast aur muzaahir parast.

verses.arabic: وَ لَوْ شَآءَ اللّٰهُ مَآ اَشْرَكُوْا ۗ وَ مَا جَعَلْنٰكَ عَلَيْهِمْ حَفِيْظًا ۚ وَ مَآ اَنْتَ عَلَيْهِمْ بِوَكِيْلٍ
verses.transliteration: Wa law shaaa'al- laahu maaa 'ashrakoo; wa maa jaʻalnaaka 'alayhim hafeezaa; wa maaa 'anta 'alayhim biwakeel.
verses.translation: Aur agar Allah chaahta to woh shirk na karte aur humne Aapko un par muhaafiz nahin banaaya aur aap unke zimme daar nahin.

verses.arabic: وَ لَا تَسُبُّوا الَّذِيْنَ يَدْعُوْنَ مِنْ دُوْنِ اللّٰهِ فَيَسُبُّوا اللّٰهَ عَدْوًۢا بِغَيْرِ عِلْمٍ ۭ كَذٰلِكَ زَيَّنَّا لِكُلِّ اُمَّةٍ عَمَلَهُمْ ثُمَّ اِلٰى رَبِّهِمْ مَّرْجِعُهُمْ فَيُنَبِّئُهُمْ بِمَا كَانُوْا يَعْمَلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laa tasubbul- lazeena yad'oona min doonil-laahi fayasubbul- laaha 'adwam bighayri 'ilm; kazaalika zayyannaa likulli 'ummatin 'amalahum summa 'ilaa Rabbihim marji'uhum fayunabbi'uhum bimaa kaanoo ya maloon.
verses.translation: Aur mushrikeen Allah ko chhod kar jinhein pukaarte hain, tum unhein gaali mat do phir woh bhi jehaalat mein had se guzarte huye Allah ko gaali denge. usi tarah humne har ummat ke liye unke amal mein kashish paida kardi hai, phir unhein apne rab ki taraf laut kar jaana hai, phir woh unhein bataayega ke woh kiya kuchh karte rahte the.

verses.arabic: وَ اَقْسَمُوْا بِاللّٰهِ جَهْدَ اَيْمَانِهِمْ لَىٕنْ جَآءَتْهُمْ اٰيَةٌ لَّيُؤْمِنُنَّ بِهَا ۭ قُلْ اِنَّمَا الْاٰيٰتُ عِنْدَ اللّٰهِ ۭ وَ مَا يُشْعِرُكُمْ اَنَّهَآ اِذَا جَآءَتْ لَا يُؤْمِنُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'aqsamoo billaahi jahda 'aymaanihim la'in jaaa'athum 'Aayatul- layu'minunna bihaa; qul 'innamal-'Aayaatu 'indal- Jaahi wa maa yush'irukum 'annahaaa izaa jaaa'at laa yu'minoon.
verses.translation: Aur unhon ne Allah ke naam ki pukhtah qasmein khaayein ke agar unke paas (makhsoos) nishaani aa jaaye to woh uss par zaroor eemaan le aayenge, (aye Nabi!) kah deejiye: nishaaniyaan to sirf Allah ke paas hain, aur tumhein yeh baat kaun samjhaaye ke beshak jab woh nishaani aa jaayegi to bhi woh eemaan nahin layenge.

verses.arabic: وَ نُقَلِّبُ اَفْـٕدَتَهُمْ وَ اَبْصَارَهُمْ كَمَا لَمْ يُؤْمِنُوْا بِهٖٓ اَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍ وَّ نَذَرُهُمْ فِيْ طُغْيَانِهِمْ يَعْمَهُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa nuqallibu 'af'idatahum wa 'absaarahum kamaa lam yu'minoo biheee 'awwala marratiñw-wa nazaruhum fee tughyaanihim ya'mahoon.
verses.translation: Aur hum (isi tarah) unke dilon aur nigaahon ko pher dete hain jis tarah yeh pahli baar iss (qur'an) par eemaan nahin laaye the aur hum unhein unki sarkashi mein bhatakne ke liye chhod denge.

verses.arabic: وَ لَوْ اَنَّنَا نَزَّلْنَآ اِلَيْهِمُ الْمَلٰٓىٕكَةَ وَ كَلَّمَهُمُ الْمَوْتٰى وَ حَشَرْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ كُلَّ شَيْءٍ قُبُلًا مَّا كَانُوْا لِيُؤْمِنُوْٓا اِلَّاۤ اَنْ يَّشَآءَ اللّٰهُ وَ لٰكِنَّ اَكْثَرَهُمْ يَجْهَلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa law 'annanaa nazzalnaaa 'ilayhimul- malaaa'ikata wa kallamahumul-mawtaa wa hasharnaa 'alayhim kulla shay'in qubulam- maa kaanoo liyu'minooo 'illaaa 'añy- yashaaa'al- laahu wa laakinna 'aksarahum yajhaloon.
verses.translation: Aur agar beshak hum unki taraf Farishte naazil karte aur unse murde kalaam karte aur hum (unki) har (matloobah) shay unke saamne pesh kar dete to bhi woh eemaan na laate. haan agar Allah aisa chaahta to aur baat thi lekin un mein se aksar jehaalat mein doobe huye hain.

verses.arabic: وَ كَذٰلِكَ جَعَلْنَا لِكُلِّ نَبِيٍّ عَدُوًّا شَيٰطِيْنَ الْاِنْسِ وَ الْجِنِّ يُوْحِيْ بَعْضُهُمْ اِلٰى بَعْضٍ زُخْرُفَ الْقَوْلِ غُرُوْرًا ۚ وَ لَوْ شَآءَ رَبُّكَ مَا فَعَلُوْهُ فَذَرْهُمْ وَ مَا يَفْتَرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa kazaalika jaʻalnaa likulli nabiyyin 'aduwwan Shayaateenal-'insi waljinni yoohee ba'duhum 'ilaa ba din zukhrufal-qawli ghurooraa; wa law shaaa'a Rabbuka maa fa'aloohu fazarhum wa maa yaftaroon.
verses.translation: Aur isi tarah humne insaanon aur jinon mein se shayaateen har Nabi ke dushman bnaaye, un mein se har ek doosre ke kaan mein chikni chapdi baatein daalta rahta hai taake use dhoke mein rakkhe, aur (aye Nabi!) agar Aap ka rab chaahta to woh yeh kaam na karte, chunaancheh aap un logon ko aur jo kuchh yeh jhoot ghad rahe hain, usko rahne deejiye.

verses.arabic: وَ لِتَصْغٰٓى اِلَيْهِ اَفْـٕدَةُ الَّذِيْنَ لَا يُؤْمِنُوْنَ بِالْاٰخِرَةِ وَ لِيَرْضَوْهُ وَ لِيَقْتَرِفُوْا مَا هُمْ مُّقْتَرِفُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa litaşghaaa 'ilayhi 'af'idatul-lazeena laa yu'minoona bil- 'Aakhirati wa liyardawhu wa liyaqtarifoo maa hum muqtarifoon.
verses.translation: Aur taake jo log aakhirat par eemaan nahin laate un ke dil uss jhoot ki taraf maayel ho jaayein aur woh uss (jhoot) ko pasand karte rahein aur woh jo (bure kaam) kar rahe hain woh karte rahein.

verses.arabic: اَفَغَيْرَ اللّٰهِ اَبْتَغِيْ حَكَمًا وَّ هُوَ الَّذِيْٓ اَنْزَلَ اِلَيْكُمُ الْكِتٰبَ مُفَصَّلًا ۭ وَ الَّذِيْنَ اٰتَيْنٰهُمُ الْكِتٰبَ يَعْلَمُوْنَ اَنَّهٗ مُنَزَّلٌ مِّنْ رَّبِّكَ بِالْحَقِّ ۭ فَلَا تَكُوْنَنَّ مِنَ الْمُمْتَرِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Afaghayral-laahi 'abtaghee hakamañw- wa Huwal-lazeee 'anzala 'ilaykumul-Kitaaba mufaşşalaa; wallazeena 'aataynaahumul-Kitaaba yalamoona 'annahoo munazzalum-mir- Rabbika bilhaqqi falaa takoonanna minal- mumtareen.
verses.translation: (Kah deejiye:) kiya phir main Allah ke siwa koyi aur haakim talaash karun? haalaanke wahi hai jisne tumhaari taraf yeh kitab tafseel se naazil ki aur jin logon ko humne kitab di woh jaante hain ke beshak woh aap ke rab ki taraf se haq ke saath naazil ki gayi hai, lehaaza Aap hargiz shak karne waalon mein (shaamil) na hon.

verses.arabic: وَ تَمَّتْ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ صِدْقًا وَّ عَدْلًا ۚ لَا مُبَدِّلَ لِكَلِمٰتِهٖ ۚ وَ هُوَ السَّمِيْعُ الْعَلِيْمُ
verses.transliteration: Wa tammat Kalimatu Rabbika sidqanw-wa 'adlaa; laa mubaddila li- Kalimaatih, wa Huwas-Samee'ul- 'Aleem.
verses.translation: Aur aapke rab ki baat tasdeeq aur adl mein mukammal hai, uski baaton ko tabdeel karne waala koyi nahin aur woh khoob sunne waala, khoob jaanne waala hai.

verses.arabic: وَ اِنْ تُطِعْ اَكْثَرَ مَنْ فِي الْاَرْضِ يُضِلُّوْكَ عَنْ سَبِيْلِ اللّٰهِ ۭ اِنْ يَّتَّبِعُوْنَ اِلَّا الظَّنَّ وَ اِنْ هُمْ اِلَّا يَخْرُصُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'in tuti' 'aksara man fil-'ardi yudillooka 'an sabeelil-laah; 'iny- yattabi'oona 'illaz-zanna wa 'in hum 'illaa yakhruşoon.
verses.translation: Aur agar aap ahle zameen ki aksariyyat ki e'taa'at karen to woh aapko Allah ki raah se bahkaa denge, woh apne gumaan ke siwa kisi baat ki pairwi nahin karte, aur woh atkal pachchu baatein hi karte hain.

verses.arabic: اِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ اَعْلَمُ مَنْ يَّضِلُّ عَنْ سَبِيْلِهٖ وَ هُوَ اَعْلَمُ بِالْمُهْتَدِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Inna rabbaka Huwa 'a'lamu many- yadillu 'an sabeelihee wa Huwa 'a'lamu bilmuhtadeen.
verses.translation: Beshak aap ka rab uss shakhs ko khoob jaanta hai jo uski raah se bahakta hai aur woh hidaayat yaaftah logon ko bhi khoob jaanta hai.

verses.arabic: فَكُلُوْا مِمَّا ذُكِرَ اسْمُ اللّٰهِ عَلَيْهِ اِنْ كُنْتُمْ بِاٰيٰتِهٖ مُؤْمِنِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Fakuloo mimmaa zukiras-mul-laahi 'alayhi 'in kuntum bi- 'Aayaatihee mu'mineen.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh tum USS (jaanwar) ka gosht khaao jis par 'Allah ka naam padhaa gaya ho, agar tum uski aayaat par eemaan laane waale ho.

verses.arabic: وَ مَا لَكُمْ اَلَّا تَاْكُلُوْا مِمَّا ذُكِرَ اسْمُ اللّٰهِ عَلَيْهِ وَ قَدْ فَصَّلَ لَكُمْ مَّا حَرَّمَ عَلَيْكُمْ اِلَّا مَا اضْطُرِرْتُمْ اِلَيْهِ ۗ وَ اِنَّ كَثِيْرًا لَّيُضِلُّوْنَ بِاَهْوَآىٕهِمْ بِغَيْرِ عِلْمٍ ۭ اِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ اَعْلَمُ بِالْمُعْتَدِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maa lakum 'allaa ta'kuloo mimmaa zukiras-mul-laahi 'alayhi wa qad faşşala lakum maa harrama 'alaykum 'illaa mad-turirtum 'ilayh; wa 'inna kaseeral- layudilloona bi'ahwaaa'ihim bighayri 'ilm; 'inna Rabbaka Huwa 'a'lamu bilmu 'tadeen.
verses.translation: Aur tumhein kiya ho gaya hai ke tum uss (halaal jaanwar) ka gosht na khaao jis par Allah ka naam padha gaya ho? haalaanke Allah ne un (sab jaanwaron) ke baare mein tafseel se bataadiya hai jo usne tum par haraam kiye hain magar jise tum khaane par majboor ho jaao (to woh bhi halaal hain) aur beshak aksar log apni khaahishaat se baghair ilm ke doosron ko bahakaate hain. beshak aapka rab had se guzarne waalon ko khoob jaanta hai.

verses.arabic: وَ ذَرُوْا ظَاهِرَ الْاِثْمِ وَ بَاطِنَهٗ ۭ اِنَّ الَّذِيْنَ يَكْسِبُوْنَ الْاِثْمَ سَيُجْزَوْنَ بِمَا كَانُوْا يَقْتَرِفُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa zaroo zaahiral- 'ismi wa baatinah; 'innal-lazeena yaksiboonal-'isma sayujzawna bimaa kaanoo yaqtarifoon.
verses.translation: Aur tum khule aur chhupe gunaah chhod do, beshak jo log gunaah karte hain unko un ('amlon) ki jald saza milegi jo woh karte rahe hain.

verses.arabic: وَ لَا تَاْكُلُوْا مِمَّا لَمْ يُذْكَرِ اسْمُ اللّٰهِ عَلَيْهِ وَ اِنَّهٗ لَفِسْقٌ ۭ وَ اِنَّ الشَّيٰطِيْنَ لَيُوْحُوْنَ اِلٰٓى اَوْلِيٰٓـىٕهِمْ لِيُجَادِلُوْكُمْ ۚ وَ اِنْ اَطَعْتُمُوْهُمْ اِنَّكُمْ لَمُشْرِكُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laa ta'kuloo mimmaa lam yuzkaris- mul-laahi 'alayhi wa 'innahoo lafisq; wa 'innash-Shayaateena la yoohoona 'ilaaa 'awliyaaa'ihim liyujaadilookum wa 'in 'ata'tumoohum 'innakum lamushrikoon.
verses.translation: Aur tum uss (jaanwar) ka gosht mat khaao jis par Allah ka naam na padhaa gaya ho kyun ke yeh (khaana) yaqeenan naafarmani hai aur be shak shaytaan apne doston ke zahnon mein shubhe daalte hain taake woh tumse jhagda karein aur tumne unki itaa'at ki to bilaa shubah tum bhi zaroor mushrik¹ hoge
verses.deepMeaning: Aisi andhi etaa'at jis mein mubtala hone ke ba'd insaan haq aur dalaayel ko na dekhe balke sirf apne badon ko aur inhi ki baaton ko harf-e-aakhir samjhe to ghairullah ki yahi etaa'at shirk hai. jaisa ke Adi bin Haatim رضي الله عنه ko samjhaate huye Aap ﷺ ne farmaya tha: woh yaqeenan unki ibaadat nahin karte the lekin unke ulmaa jis cheez ko halaal qaraar dete yeh un ko halaal samajhte aur jis cheez ko haraam kah dete use haraam samajhte the.' (Tafseer Tabri:10/147 wa jaame' Tirmezi, Hadees:3095)

verses.arabic: اَوَ مَنْ كَانَ مَيْتًا فَاَحْيَيْنٰهُ وَ جَعَلْنَا لَهٗ نُوْرًا يَّمْشِيْ بِهٖ فِي النَّاسِ كَمَنْ مَّثَلُهٗ فِي الظُّلُمٰتِ لَيْسَ بِخَارِجٍ مِّنْهَا ۭ كَذٰلِكَ زُيِّنَ لِلْكٰفِرِيْنَ مَا كَانُوْا يَعْمَلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Awa man kaana maytan fa-'ahyaynaahu wa jaʻalnaa lahoo noorañy- yamshee bihee fin-naasi kamam- masaluhoo fiz-zulumaati laysa bikhaarijim- minhaa; kazaalika zuyyina lilkaafireena maa kaanoo ya'maloon.
verses.translation: Kiya ek aisa shakhs jo murdah tha phir hum ne use zindah kiya aur hum ne uske liye noor banaadiya, woh uski raushni mein logon mein chalta hai, (kiya) woh uss shakhs jaisa (ho sakta) hai jis ka haal yeh hai ke woh andheron mein pada hai, unse nikalne waala nahin? isi tarah kaafiron ke liye un kaamon mein kashish rakkhi gayi hai jo woh karte hain.

verses.arabic: وَ كَذٰلِكَ جَعَلْنَا فِيْ كُلِّ قَرْيَةٍ اَكٰبِرَ مُجْرِمِيْهَا لِيَمْكُرُوْا فِيْهَا ۖ وَ مَا يَمْكُرُوْنَ اِلَّا بِاَنْفُسِهِمْ وَ مَا يَشْعُرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa kazaalika ja'alnaa fee kulli qaryatin 'akaabira mujrimeehaa liyamkuroo feehaa wa maa yamkuroona 'illaa bi'anfusihim wa maa yash'uroon.
verses.translation: Aur isi tarah humne har basti mein uske bade bade mujrimon ko lagaa diya ke woh uss (basti) mein apne makr-o-fareb ka jaal phailaayen aur woh apne aap hi se makr-o- fareb karte hain, aur woh shu'oor nahin rakhte.

verses.arabic: وَ اِذَا جَآءَتْهُمْ اٰيَةٌ قَالُوْا لَنْ نُّؤْمِنَ حَتّٰى نُؤْتٰى مِثْلَ مَآ اُوْتِيَ رُسُلُ اللّٰهِ ۭ اَللّٰهُ اَعْلَمُ حَيْثُ يَجْعَلُ رِسَالَتَهٗ ۗ سَيُصِيْبُ الَّذِيْنَ اَجْرَمُوْا صَغَارٌ عِنْدَ اللّٰهِ وَ عَذَابٌ شَدِيْدٌۢ بِمَا كَانُوْا يَمْكُرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'izaa jaaa'athum 'Aayatun qaaloo lannu'mina hattaa nu'taa misla maaa 'ootiya Rusulul-laah; 'Allaahu 'a'lamu haysu yaj'alu Risaalatah; sayuşeebul-lazeena 'ajramoo şaghaarun 'indal-laahi wa 'azaabun shadeedum bimaa kaanoo yamkuroon.
verses.translation: Aur jab unke paas nishaani aati hai to woh kahte hain: hum hargiz eemaan nahin laayenge hatta ke aisi hi cheez khud hamen di jaaye jaisi Rasoolon ko di gayi, Allah ziyaadah behtar jaanta hai ke apni risaalat ka kaam kis ko sonpe. jin logon ne jurm kiye unhein jald hi Allah ke haan zillat milegi aur uss makr-o- fareb ki wajah se shadeed a'zaab hoga jo woh karte rahe.

verses.arabic: فَمَنْ يُرِدِ اللّٰهُ اَنْ يَّهْدِيَهٗ يَشْرَحْ صَدْرَهٗ لِلْاِسْلَامِ ۚ وَ مَنْ يُرِدْ اَنْ يُّضِلَّهٗ يَجْعَلْ صَدْرَهٗ ضَيِّقًا حَرَجًا كَاَنَّمَا يَصَّعَّدُ فِي السَّمَآءِ ۭ كَذٰلِكَ يَجْعَلُ اللّٰهُ الرِّجْسَ عَلَي الَّذِيْنَ لَا يُؤْمِنُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Famañy-yuridil- laahu 'any-yahdiyahoo yashrah şadrahoo lil- Islaami wa many-yurid yaj'al 'añy-yudillahoo şadrahoo dayyiqan harajan ka'annamaa yaşşa' adu fis-samaaa'; kazaalika yaj'alul- laahur-rijsa 'alal-lazeena laa yu'minoon.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh Allah jise hidaayat dena chaahta hai to uska seena islam ke liye khol deta hai¹ aur jise  gumraah karna chaahta hai to uska seena bahut tung kar deta hai jaise woh aasmaan mein chadh rahaa ho, isi tarah Allah un logon par paleedi musallat kar deta hai jo eemaan nahin laate.
verses.deepMeaning: Iss mafhoom ko hadees mein iss tarah bayaan kiya gaya hai ke Rasoolullah ﷺ ne farmaya: 'Allah Ta'ala jis ke saath bhalaayi karna chaahta hai use deen (qura'n aur Rasool رَضِيَ اللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ ki sunnat) ka faham ataa kar deta hai.' (Al-Bukhari, Al-ilm Baab:13, Hadees:71)

verses.arabic: وَ هٰذَا صِرَاطُ رَبِّكَ مُسْتَقِيْمًا ۭ قَدْ فَصَّلْنَا الْاٰيٰتِ لِقَوْمٍ يَّذَّكَّرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa haazaa Şiraatu Rabbika Mustaqeemaa; qad faşşalnal-'Aayaati liqawminy- yazzakkaroon.
verses.translation: Aur yeh Aapke rab ka seedha raastah hai, humne un logon ke liye aayaat khol kar bayaan kardi hain jo naseehat haasil karte hain.

verses.arabic: لَهُمْ دَارُ السَّلٰمِ عِنْدَ رَبِّهِمْ ۚ وَ هُوَ وَلِيُّهُمْ بِمَا كَانُوْا يَعْمَلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Lahum daarus- salaami 'inda Rabbihim wa huwa waliyyuhum bimaa kaanoo ya'maloon.
verses.translation: Unhi ke liye unke rab ke haan salaamti ka ghar hai, aur woh un kaamon ki wajah se unka dost hai jo woh karte rahe.

verses.arabic: وَ يَوْمَ يَحْشُرُهُمْ جَمِيْعًا يٰمَعْشَرَ الْجِنِّ قَدِ اسْتَكْثَرْتُمْ مِّنَ الْاِنْسِ ۚ وَ قَالَ اَوْلِيٰٓـؤُهُمْ مِّنَ الْاِنْسِ رَبَّنَا اسْتَمْتَعَ بَعْضُنَا بِبَعْضٍ وَّ بَلَغْنَآ اَجَلَنَا الَّذِيْٓ اَجَّلْتَ لَـنَا ۚ قَالَ النَّارُ مَثْوٰىكُمْ خٰلِدِيْنَ فِيْهَا اِلَّا مَا شَآءَ اللّٰهُ ۭ اِنَّ رَبَّكَ حَكِيْمٌ عَلِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa yawma yahshuruhum jamee'aa; yaa ma'sharal-jinni qadis-taksartum minal- insi wa qaala 'awliyaaa'uhum minal- 'insi Rabbanas-tamta'a ba'dunaa biba'diñw-wa balaghnaaa 'ajalanal- lazeee 'ajjalta lanaa; qaalan-Naaru maswaakum داد khaalideena feehaaa 'illaa maa shaaa'al-laah; 'inna Rabbaka Hakeemun 'Aleem.
verses.translation: Aur jis din woh un sab ko ekatthha karega (to farmaayega:) aye jinnon ke giroh! tumne insaanon mein se bahut ziyaadah gumraah kiye the, aur insaanon mein se unke dost kahenge! aye hamaare rab! humne ek doosre se faayidah uthhaaya, aur hum uss mi'aad ko pahunche jo toone hamaare liye muqrrar farmaayi thi, Allah farmaayega: aag hi tumhaara thhekaana hai, tum USS mein hamesha rahoge, haan agar Allah chaahe (to doosri baat hai) beshak aapka rab bada hikmat waala, khoob jaanne waala hai.

verses.arabic: وَ كَذٰلِكَ نُوَلِّيْ بَعْضَ الظّٰلِمِيْنَ بَعْضًاۢ بِمَا كَانُوْا يَكْسِبُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa kazaalika nuwallee ba'daz- zaalimeena ba'dam bimaa kaanoo yaksiboon.
verses.translation: Aur isi tarah hum ba'z zaalimon ko ba'z par un ki wajah kaamon ki se musallat kar dete hain jo woh karte rahe.

verses.arabic: يٰمَعْشَرَ الْجِنِّ وَ الْاِنْسِ اَلَمْ يَاْتِكُمْ رُسُلٌ مِّنْكُمْ يَقُصُّوْنَ عَلَيْكُمْ اٰيٰتِيْ وَ يُنْذِرُوْنَكُمْ لِقَآءَ يَوْمِكُمْ هٰذَا ۚ قَالُوْا شَهِدْنَا عَلٰٓى اَنْفُسِنَا ۚ وَ غَرَّتْهُمُ الْحَيٰوةُ الدُّنْيَا وَ شَهِدُوْا عَلٰٓى اَنْفُسِهِمْ اَنَّهُمْ كَانُوْا كٰفِرِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Yaa ma'sharal-jinni awal'insi 'alam ya'tikum Rusulum-minkum yaquşşoona 'alaykum 'Aayaatee wa yunziroonakum liqaaa'a Yawmikum haazaa; qaaloo shahidnaa 'alaaa 'anfusinaa wa gharrat- humul-hayaatud-dunyaa wa shahidoo 'alaaa 'anfusihim 'annahum kaanoo kaafireen.
verses.translation: Aye jinnon aur insaanon ke giroh! kiya tumhaare pas tumhi mein se Rasool nahin aaye the? woh tumse meri aayaat bayaan karte the aur tumhein tumhaari iss aaj ke din ki mulaaqaat se daraate the. (tab) woh kahenge: hum apne aap par gawaahi dete hain aur unhein dunya ki zindagi ne dhoke mein daale rakkha aur woh apne aap par gawaahi denge ke be shak woh kufr karne waale the.

verses.arabic: ذٰلِكَ اَنْ لَّمْ يَكُنْ رَّبُّكَ مُهْلِكَ الْقُرٰى بِظُلْمٍ وَّ اَهْلُهَا غٰفِلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Zaalika 'al-lam yakur-Rabbuka muhlikal quraa bizulminw-wa 'ahluhaa ghaafiloon.
verses.translation: Yeh (Rasool) isliye (bheje gaye) ke aapka rab bastiyon ko un ke zulm ki wajah se halaak karne waala nahin jab ke unke baashinde ghaafil hon.

verses.arabic: وَ لِكُلٍّ دَرَجٰتٌ مِّمَّا عَمِلُوْا ۚ وَ مَا رَبُّكَ بِغَافِلٍ عَمَّا يَعْمَلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa likullin darajaatum-mimmaa 'amiloo; wa maa Rabbuka bighaafilin 'ammaa ya maloon.
verses.translation: Aur har ek ke liye un a'amaal ki wajah se darje hain jo unhon ne kiye aur aapka rab usse ghaafil nahin jo woh karte hain.

verses.arabic: وَ رَبُّكَ الْغَنِيُّ ذُو الرَّحْمَةِ ۭ اِنْ يَّشَاْ يُذْهِبْكُمْ وَ يَسْتَخْلِفْ مِنْۢ بَعْدِكُمْ مَّا يَشَآءُ كَمَآ اَنْشَاَكُمْ مِّنْ ذُرِّيَّةِ قَوْمٍ اٰخَرِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa Rabbukal bukal ghaniyyu zur-rahmah; 'iny-yasha' yuzhibkum wa yastakhlif mimba'dikum maa yashaaa'u kamaaa 'ansha'akum min zurriyyati qawmin 'aakhareen.
verses.translation: Aur aapka rab be niyaaz hai rahmat waala, agar woh chaahe to tumhein le jaaye aur tumhaare ba'd jinhein chaaye jaanasheen banaa de jaise usne tumhen doosri qaum ki nasal se paida kiya.

verses.arabic: اِنَّ مَا تُوْعَدُوْنَ لَاٰتٍ ۭ وَّ مَآ اَنْتُمْ بِمُعْجِزِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Inna maa too'adoona la'aatinw-wa maaa 'antum bimu jizeen.
verses.translation: Beshak jis cheez ka tumse wa'dah kiya jaata hai, woh zaroor aane waali hai aur tum aa'jiz karne waale nahin.

verses.arabic: قُلْ يٰقَوْمِ اعْمَلُوْا عَلٰى مَكَانَتِكُمْ اِنِّيْ عَامِلٌ ۚ فَسَوْفَ تَعْلَمُوْنَ مَنْ تَكُوْنُ لَهٗ عَاقِبَةُ الدَّارِ ۭ اِنَّهٗ لَا يُفْلِحُ الظّٰلِمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qul yaa qawmi'- maloo 'alaa makaanatikum 'innee 'aamilun fasawfa ta'lamoona man takoonu lahoo 'aaqibatud-daar; 'innahoo laa yuflihuz- zaalimoon.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) kah deejiye: aye meri qaum! tum apni jagah amal karo, beshak main bhi (apni jagah) amal karne waala hoon, chunaancheh jald hi tum jaan loge ke kis shakhs ke liye aakhirat ka (achchha) anjaam hai aur beshak zaalim falaah nahin paayenge.

verses.arabic: وَ جَعَلُوْا لِلّٰهِ مِمَّا ذَرَاَ مِنَ الْحَرْثِ وَ الْاَنْعَامِ نَصِيْبًا فَقَالُوْا هٰذَا لِلّٰهِ بِزَعْمِهِمْ وَ هٰذَا لِشُرَكَاۗىٕنَا ۚ فَمَا كَانَ لِشُرَكَاۗىٕهِمْ فَلَا يَصِلُ اِلَى اللّٰهِ ۖ وَ مَا كَانَ لِلّٰهِ فَهُوَ يَصِلُ اِلٰى شُرَكَاۗىٕهِمْ ۗ سَآءَ مَا يَحْكُمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa ja'aloo lillaahi mimmaa zara'a minal- harsi wal'an'aami naseeban faqaaloo haazaa lillaahi biza'mihim wa haazaa lishurakaaa'inaa famaa kaana lishurakaaa'ihim falaa yaşilu 'ilal-laahi wa maa kaana lillaahi fahuwa yaşilu 'ilaa shurakaaa'ihim; saaa'a maa yahkumoon.
verses.translation: Aur unhon ne uss mein se Allah ke liye ek hissa thhahraaya jo usne kheti aur chau paayon ki shakl mein paida kiya, phir apne khayaal ke mutaabiq kahne lage: yeh (hissa) Allah ke liye hai aur yeh hamaare dewtaaon ke liye hai¹ chunaancheh unke dewtaaon ka jo hissa hai woh to Allah ke paas nahin pahunchta aur jo Allah ka hissa hai woh unke dewtaaon ke paas pahunch jaata hai, kis qadar bura hai jo woh faislah karte hain.
verses.deepMeaning: Iss aayat mein mushrikon ke uss aqeedah-o-amal ka ek namoona batlaaya gaya hai jo unhon ne apne taur par gadh rakkhe the. Woh zameeni paidawaar aur maal maweshiyon mein se kuchh hissa Allah ke liye aur kuchh apne khud saakhtah ma'boodon ke liye muqarrar kar lete. Allah ke hisse ko mehmaanon, fuqaraa aur silah rahmi par kharch karte aur buton ke hisse ko buton ke majaawareen aur unki zarooriyaat par kharch karte. Phir agar buton ke muqarrarah hisse mein tawaqqo' ke mutaabiq paidawaar na hoti to Allah ke hisse mein se nikaal kar uss mein shaamil kare lete aur uske bara'ks muaa'mlah hota to buton ke hisse mein se na nikaalte aur kahte ke Allah to ghani hai.

verses.arabic: وَ كَذٰلِكَ زَيَّنَ لِكَثِيْرٍ مِّنَ الْمُشْرِكِيْنَ قَتْلَ اَوْلَادِهِمْ شُرَكَاۗؤُهُمْ لِيُرْدُوْهُمْ وَ لِيَلْبِسُوْا عَلَيْهِمْ دِيْنَهُمْ ۭ وَ لَوْ شَآءَ اللّٰهُ مَا فَعَلُوْهُ فَذَرْهُمْ وَ مَا يَفْتَرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa kazaalika zayyana likaseerim- minal-mushrikeena qatla 'awlaadihim shurakaaa'uhum liyurdoohum wa liyalbisoo 'alayhim deenahum wa law shaaa'al-laahu maa fa'aloohu fazarhum wa maa yaftaroon.
verses.translation: Aur isi tarah bahut se mushrikon ke liye unke dewtaaon ne unki aulaad ka qatl pasandeedah bana rakkha hai taake woh unhein halaak kardein aur unke liye unka deen mashkook banaa den aur agar Allah chaahta to woh yeh kaam na karte, chunaancheh unhein aur unke jhoot ko (unke haal par) chhod deejiye jo woh ghadte hain.

verses.arabic: وَ قَالُوْا هٰذِهٖٓ اَنْعَامٌ وَّ حَرْثٌ حِجْرٌ لَا يَطْعَمُهَآ اِلَّا مَنْ نَّشَآءُ بِزَعْمِهِمْ ۭ وَ اَنْعَامٌ حُرِّمَتْ ظُهُوْرُهَا وَ اَنْعَامٌ لَا يَذْكُرُوْنَ اسْمَ اللّٰهِ عَلَيْهَا افْتِرَآءً عَلَيْهِ ۚ سَيَجْزِيْهِمْ بِمَا كَانُوْا يَفْتَرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa qaaloo haaziheee 'an'aamuñw- wa harsun hijr; laa yat'amuhaaa 'illaa man nashaaa'u biza mihim wa 'an'aamun hurrimat zuhooruhaa wa 'an aamul-laa yazkuroonas-mal-laahi 'alayhaf-tiraaa'an 'alayh; sayajzeehim bimaa kaanoo yaftaroon.
verses.translation: Aur apne (jhoote) khayaal ke mutaabiq unhon ne kaha: yeh chaupaaye aur kheti mamnu' hain, unhen bas wahi khaa sakta hai jise hum chaahen aur ba'z chau paaye hain jin ki pausht (par sawaari) haraam kardi gayi aur ba'z chaupaaye hain jin par woh Allah ka naam nahin padhte, yeh sab woh Allah par jhoot ghadte huye karte hain, woh jald hi unhein uss jhoot ki sazaa dega jo woh ghadte rahe hain.

verses.arabic: وَ قَالُوْا مَا فِيْ بُطُوْنِ هٰذِهِ الْاَنْعَامِ خَالِصَةٌ لِّذُكُوْرِنَا وَ مُحَرَّمٌ عَلٰٓى اَزْوَاجِنَا ۭ وَ اِنْ يَّكُنْ مَّيْتَةً فَهُمْ فِيْهِ شُرَكَآءُ ۚ سَيَجْزِيْهِمْ وَصْفَهُمْ ۭ اِنَّهٗ حَكِيْمٌ عَلِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa qaaloo maa fee butooni haazihil-'an'aami khaalisatul-lizukoorinaa wa muharramun 'alaaa 'azwaajinaa wa 'iny- yakum-maytatan fahum feehi shurakaaa; sayajzeehim wasfahum; 'innahoo Hakeemun 'Aleem.
verses.translation: Aur unhon ne kaha: un (haraam kiye huye) chaupaayon ke pet mein jo bachcha ho woh khaalis hamaare mardon ke liye hai aur hamaari auraton par haraam hai aur agar woh murdah ho to mard aur aurten sab USS mein shareek hain. jald hi Allah unhein iss tarah (khud hi halaal aur haraam) tay karne ki sazaa dega, beshak woh bada hikmat waala hai, khoob jaanne waala hai.

verses.arabic: قَدْ خَسِرَ الَّذِيْنَ قَتَلُوْٓا اَوْلَادَهُمْ سَفَهًۢا بِغَيْرِ عِلْمٍ وَّ حَرَّمُوْا مَا رَزَقَهُمُ اللّٰهُ افْتِرَاءً عَلَى اللّٰهِ ۭ قَدْ ضَلُّوْا وَ مَا كَانُوْا مُهْتَدِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qad khasiral- lazeena qatalooo 'awlaadahum safaham bighayri 'ilmiñw-wa harramoo maa razaqahumul-laahuf- tiraaa'an 'alal-laah; qad dalloo wa maa kaanoo muhtadeen.
verses.translation: Beshak woh log khasaare mein rahe jinhon ne apni aulaad ko ilm ke baghair bewaqoofi se qatl kiya aur Allah ne unhein jo rizq diya Allah par jhoot baandh kar use haraam thhahraa liya, tahqeeq woh gumraah ho gaye aur woh hidaayat yaaftah na huye.

verses.arabic: وَهُوَ الَّذِيْٓ اَنْشَاَ جَنّٰتٍ مَّعْرُوْشٰتٍ وَّ غَيْرَ مَعْرُوْشٰتٍ وَّ النَّخْلَ وَ الزَّرْعَ مُخْتَلِفًا اُكُلُهٗ وَ الزَّيْتُوْنَ وَ الرُّمَّانَ مُتَشَابِهًا وَّ غَيْرَ مُتَشَابِهٍ ۭ كُلُوْا مِنْ ثَمَرِهٖٓ اِذَآ اَثْمَرَ وَ اٰتُوْا حَقَّهٗ يَوْمَ حَصَادِهٖ ۠ وَ لَا تُسْرِفُوْا ۭ اِنَّهٗ لَا يُحِبُّ الْمُسْرِفِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa Huwal-lazeee 'ansha'a jannaatim- ma'rooshaatiñw-wa ghayra ma'rooshaatiñw- wannakhla wazzar'a mukhtalifan 'ukuluhoo wazzaytoona warrummaana mutashaabihanw-wa ghayra mutashaabih; kuloo min samariheee 'izaaa 'asmara wa 'aatoo haqqahoo yawma hasaadihee wa laa tusrifooo; 'innahoo laa yuhibbul-musrifeen.
verses.translation: Aur wahi hai jisne baaghaat paida kiye chhatriyon par chadaaye huye aur baghair chadaaye huye aur khujoor aur faslein (paida kin) unke phal (maze mein) mukhtalif hain aur zaitoon aur anaar (paida kiye) milte julte bhi aur na milte julte bhi, unka phal khaao jab woh phal laayein aur unki kataayi aur chunaayi ke din uss (Allah) ka haq de diya karo aur fuzool kharchi na karo¹ beshak Allah fuzool kharchi karne waalon ko pasand nahin karta.
verses.deepMeaning: Israaf) 'Had se tajaawuz karna' kisi muaamle mein iski hudood se aage nikal jaana. isliye israaf kisi cheez mein bhi pasandeedah nahin hai, sadqah-o-khairaat dene mein na kisi aur cheez mein. Har בתרבות raw matloob-o-mahboob hai aur uski taakeed ki gayi hai.

verses.arabic: وَ مِنَ الْاَنْعَامِ حَمُوْلَةً وَّ فَرْشًا ۭ كُلُوْا مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ اللّٰهُ وَ لَا تَتَّبِعُوْا خُطُوٰتِ الشَّيْطٰنِ ۭ اِنَّهٗ لَكُمْ عَدُوٌّ مُّبِيْنٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa minal-'an'aami hamoolatanw-wa farshaa; kuloo mimmaa razaqakumul-laahu wa laa tattabi'oo khutuwaatish-Shaytaan; 'innahoo lakum 'aduwwum-mubeen.
verses.translation: Aur (paida kiye) usne chaupaayon mein se bojh uthhaane waale aur zameen se lage (past qad,) Allah ne tumhen jo rizq diya hai uss mein se khaao aur shaytaan ke qadmon ki pairwi na karo.¹ beshak woh tumhaara khula dushman hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Jis tarah mushrikeen uske peechhe lag gaye aur halaal jaanwaron ko bhi apne oupar haraam kar liya. goya Allah ki halaal kardah cheez ko haraam ya haraam ko halaal kar lena, yeh shaytaan ki pairwi hai.

verses.arabic: ثَمٰنِيَةَ اَزْوَاجٍ ۭ مِّنَ الضَّاْنِ اثْنَيْنِ وَ مِنَ الْمَعْزِ اثْنَيْنِ ۭ قُلْ اٰلذَّكَرَيْنِ حَرَّمَ اَمِ الْاُنْثَيَيْنِ اَمَّا اشْتَمَلَتْ عَلَيْهِ اَرْحَامُ الْاُنْثَيَيْنِ ۚ نَبِّـُٔوْنِيْ بِعِلْمٍ اِنْ كُنْتُمْ صٰدِقِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Samaaniyata 'azwaajin minad-da'nis- nayni wa minal-ma'zis- nayn; qul 'aaazzakarayni harrama 'amil-'unsayayni 'ammash-tamalat 'alayhi 'arhaamul-'unsayayni nabbi'oonee bi'ilmin 'in kuntum şaadiqeen.
verses.translation: Yeh aathh (8) qismein (paida ki) hain do bhed mein se aur do bakri mein se,¹ (Aye Nabi!) kah deejiye: kiya uss (Allah) ne donon ke nar haraam kiye hain ya donon ki madaayen ya woh bachche jo donon maadaaon ke pet mein hon? (thheek thheek) ilm ke saath mujhe bataao agar tum sachche ho.
verses.deepMeaning: Yeh nar aur maadah jaanwar, jinhein insaan khaata bhi hai aur unse baar bardaari ka kaam bhi leta hai, Allah ki nishaaniyon mein se hain. yeh agarcheh insaanon ki tarah bol nahin sakte lekin agar Allah chaahe to unhein bhi bolne ki taaqat de de jaisa ke ahaadees mein ba'z waaqe'aat ka zikr hai, Nabi ﷺ ne farmaya: 'ek charwaaha bakriyaan charaa rahaa tha ke bhediya ek bakri le bhaaga. charwaahe ke bhediye ka ta'aaqub karne par bhediya bola: (Qiyaamat ke qareeb) darindon se un bakriyon ki hifaazat kaun karega jab ke uss din mere siwa koyi charwaaha na hoga? Aur (Nabi ﷺ ne yeh bhi farmaya:) ek shakhs bail par saamaan lade liye jaaraha tha. Bail ne uski taraf mud kar dekha aur kaha: mujhe (baar bardaari) ke liye paida nahin kiya gaya, mujhe to kheti baadi ke liye paida kiya gaya hai.' log (hairat se) bole: 'Subhaanallah!' (Jaanwar bhi baatein karte hain) Nabi ﷺ ne farmaya: iss par main eemaan laaya الله aur Abu Bakr-o-Umar  رضي الله عنها bhi iss par eemaan laaye.' (Al-Bukhari, fazaayel-e-as haabunnabi ﷺ baab: 5, Hadees:3663) Abu Sayeed Khudri  رضي الله عنه bayaan karte hain: 'Ahad-e-Nabwi ﷺ mein bhi madeene ke nawaah mein ek bhediye ne ek charwaahe se guftagu ki.'(Musnad Ahmed:3/83,84)

verses.arabic: وَ مِنَ الْاِبِلِ اثْنَيْنِ وَ مِنَ الْبَقَرِ اثْنَيْنِ ۭ قُلْ ءَا۟لذَّكَرَيْنِ حَرَّمَ اَمِ الْاُنْثَيَيْنِ اَمَّا اشْتَمَلَتْ عَلَيْهِ اَرْحَامُ الْاُنْثَيَيْنِ ۚ اَمْ كُنْتُمْ شُهَدَآءَ اِذْ وَصّٰىكُمُ اللّٰهُ بِهٰذَا ۚ فَمَنْ اَظْلَمُ مِمَّنِ افْتَرٰى عَلَى اللّٰهِ كَذِبًا لِّيُضِلَّ النَّاسَ بِغَيْرِ عِلْمٍ ۗ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ لَا يَهْدِي الْقَوْمَ الظّٰلِمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa minal-'ibilis- nayni wa minal-baqaris- nayn; qul 'aaazzakarayni harrama 'amil-'unsayayni 'ammash-tamalat 'alayhi 'arhaamul-'unsayayni 'am kuntum shuhadaaa'a 'iz waşşaakumul-laahu bihaazaa; faman 'azlamu mimmanif-taraa 'alal- laahi kazibal-liyudillan- naasa bighayri 'ilm; 'innal-laaha laa yahdil- qawmaz-zaalimeen.
verses.translation: Aur do ount mein se aur do gaaye mein se. kah deejiye: kiya Allah ne donon ke nar haraam kiye hain ya donon ki maadaayein ya woh bachche jo donon maadaaon ke pet mein hon.? kiya tum uss waqt haazir the jab Allah ne tumhein yeh taakeedi hukm diya tha? phur uss shakhs se badh kar zaalim kaun hoga jisne Allah par jhoot ghada taake woh baghair i'lm ke logon ko gumraah kare? beshak Allah (aise) zaalim logon ko hidaayat nahin deta.

verses.arabic: قُلْ لَاۤ اَجِدُ فِيْ مَآ اُوْحِيَ اِلَيَّ مُحَرَّمًا عَلٰي طَاعِمٍ يَّطْعَمُهٗٓ اِلَّاۤ اَنْ يَّكُوْنَ مَيْتَةً اَوْ دَمًا مَسْفُوْحًا اَوْ لَحْمَ خِنْزِيْرٍ فَاِنَّهٗ رِجْسٌ اَوْ فِسْقًا اُهِلَّ لِغَيْرِ اللّٰهِ بِهٖ ۭ فَمَنِ اضْطُرَّ غَيْرَ بَاغٍ وَّلَا عَادٍ فَاِنَّ رَبَّكَ غَفُوْرٌ رَّحِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: Qul laaa 'ajidu fee maaa 'oohiya 'ilayya muharraman 'alaa taa'iminy-yat'amuhooo 'illaaa 'añy-yakoona maytatan 'aw damam- masfoohan 'aw lahma khinzeerin fa'innahoo rijsun 'aw fisqan 'uhilla lighayril-laahi bih; famanid-turra ghayra baaghinw-wa laa 'aadin fa'inna Rabbaka Ghafoorur-Raheem.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) kah deejiye: meri taraf jo wahi ki gayi hai mein uss mein koyi cheez aisi nahin paata jo kisi khaane waale par, jo use khaaye, haraam ho magar yeh ke woh murdaar ho ya bayaa huwa khoon ho ya suwor ka gosht kyun ke woh naapaak hai, ya woh fisq ho ke (zabah karte the) uss par Allah ke siwa kisi aur ka naam pukaara gaya ho, phir jo shakhs majboor ho jaaye, (bashartaike) woh sarkashi karne waala aur had se guzarne waala na ho, to beshak aapka rab bada bakhshne waala, nihaayat raham karne waala hai.

verses.arabic: وَ عَلَى الَّذِيْنَ هَادُوْا حَرَّمْنَا كُلَّ ذِيْ ظُفُرٍ ۭ وَ مِنَ الْبَقَرِ وَ الْغَنَمِ حَرَّمْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ شُحُوْمَهُمَآ اِلَّا مَا حَمَلَتْ ظُهُوْرُهُمَآ اَوِ الْحَوَايَآ اَوْ مَا اخْتَلَطَ بِعَظْمٍ ۭ ذٰلِكَ جَزَيْنٰهُمْ بِبَغْيِهِمْ ۚ وَ اِنَّا لَصٰدِقُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'alal-lazeena haadoo harramnaa kulla zee zufurin wa minal- baqari walghanami harramnaa 'alayhim shuhoomahumaaa 'illaa maa hamalat zuhooruhumaaa 'awil- hawaayaaa 'aw makh- talața biʻazm; zaalika jazaynaahum bibaghyihim wa 'innaa laşaadiqoon.
verses.translation: Aur jo log yahoodi huye un par humne har naakhun waala (jaanwar) haraam kiya tha aur gaaye aur bakri mein se un par unki charbi haraam ki thi, siwaaye uss charbi ke jo unki peethhon ya aanton ke saath lagi ho ya haddi ke saath mili huyi ho, yeh sazaa humne unhein un ki sarkashi ke baay'is di thi aur beshak hum sachche hain.

verses.arabic: فَاِنْ كَذَّبُوْكَ فَقُلْ رَبُّكُمْ ذُوْ رَحْمَةٍ وَّاسِعَةٍ ۭ وَّ لَا يُرَدُّ بَاْسُهٗ عَنِ الْقَوْمِ الْمُجْرِمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Fa'in kazzabooka faqur-Rabbukum zoo rahmatinw-waasi'atin wa laa yuraddu ba'suhoo 'anil-qawmil-mujrimeen.
verses.translation: Phir agar woh aapko jhutlaayen to kah deejiye: tumhaara rab wasi' rahmat waala hai, aur uska 'azaab mujrim qaum se taala nahin jaata.

verses.arabic: سَيَقُوْلُ الَّذِيْنَ اَشْرَكُوْا لَوْ شَآءَ اللّٰهُ مَاۤ اَشْرَكْنَا وَ لَآ اٰبَآؤُنَا وَ لَا حَرَّمْنَا مِنْ شَيْءٍ ۭ كَذٰلِكَ كَذَّبَ الَّذِيْنَ مِنْ قَبْلِهِمْ حَتّٰى ذَاقُوْا بَاْسَنَا ۭ قُلْ هَلْ عِنْدَكُمْ مِّنْ عِلْمٍ فَتُخْرِجُوْهُ لَنَا ۭ اِنْ تَتَّبِعُوْنَ اِلَّا الظَّنَّ وَ اِنْ اَنْتُمْ اِلَّا تَخْرُصُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Sayaqoolul-lazeena 'ashrakoo law shaaa'al- laahu maaa 'ashraknaa wa laaa 'aabaaa'unaa wa laa harramnaa min shay'; kazaalika kazzabal-lazeena min qablihim hattaa zaaqoo ba'sanaa; qul hal 'indakum min 'ilmin fatukhrijoohu lanaa 'in tattabi'oona 'illaz-zanna wa 'in 'antum 'illaa takhruşoon.
verses.translation: Jin logon ne shirk kiya woh jald hi kahenge: agar Allah chaahta to hum aur hamaare baap daada shirk na karte aur na hum koyi cheez haraam karte. isi tarah un logon ne (haq ko) jhutlaaya tha jo unse pahle the yahaan tak ke unhon ne hamaara a'zaab chakh liya. kah deejiye: kiya tumhaare paas kuchh ilm hai, to use hamaare saamne pesh karo? tum to gumaan hi ki pairwi karte ho aur tum atkal bachchu hi se kaam leta ho.

verses.arabic: قُلْ فَلِلّٰهِ الْحُجَّةُ الْبَالِغَةُ ۖ فَلَوْ شَآءَ لَهَدٰىكُمْ اَجْمَعِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qul falillaahil- hujjatul-baalighatu falaw shaaa'a lahadaakum 'ajma'een.
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: phir mazboot daleel to Allah hi ki hai, lehaaza agar woh chaahta to tum sab ko hidaayat deta.

verses.arabic: قُلْ هَلُمَّ شُهَدَآءَكُمُ الَّذِيْنَ يَشْهَدُوْنَ اَنَّ اللّٰهَ حَرَّمَ هٰذَا ۚ فَاِنْ شَهِدُوْا فَلَا تَشْهَدْ مَعَهُمْ ۭ وَ لَا تَتَّبِعْ اَهْوَآءَ الَّذِيْنَ كَذَّبُوْا بِاٰيٰتِنَا وَ الَّذِيْنَ لَا يُؤْمِنُوْنَ بِالْاٰخِرَةِ وَ هُمْ بِرَبِّهِمْ يَعْدِلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qul halumma shuhadaaa'akumul- lazeena yashhadoona 'annal-laaha harrama haazaa fa'in shahidoo falaa tashhad ma'ahum; wa laa tattabi 'ahwaaa'al-lazeena kazzaboo bi-'Aayaatinaa wallazeena laa yu'minoona bil-'Aakhirati wa hum bi- Rabbihim ya'diloon.
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: tum apne gawaah le aao jo iss baat ki wagaahi dein ke beshak Allah ne un (cheezon) ko haraam kiya hai, phir agar woh gawaahi dein to bhi aap unke saath gawaahi na den aur aap un logon ki khaahishaat ke peechhe na chalein jinhon ne hamaari aayat jhutlaayen aur (na) un logon ki (pairwi karein) jo aakhrat par eemaan nahin laate aur woh doosron ko apne rab ke baraabar thhahraate hain.

verses.arabic: قُلْ تَعَالَوْا اَتْلُ مَا حَرَّمَ رَبُّكُمْ عَلَيْكُمْ ۙ اَلَّا تُشْرِكُوْا بِهٖ شَيْـــًٔا وَّ بِالْوَالِدَيْنِ اِحْسَانًا ۙ وَّ لَا تَقْتُلُوْٓا اَوْلَادَكُمْ مِّنْ اِمْلَاقٍ ۭ نَحْنُ نَرْزُقُكُمْ وَ اِيَّاهُمْ ۙ وَلَا تَقْرَبُوا الْفَوَاحِشَ مَا ظَهَرَ مِنْهَا وَ مَا بَطَنَ ۖ وَلَا تَقْتُلُوا النَّفْسَ الَّتِيْ حَرَّمَ اللّٰهُ اِلَّا بِالْحَقِّ ۭ ذٰلِكُمْ وَصّٰكُمْ بِهٖ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَعْقِلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qul ta'aalaw 'atlu maa harrama Rabbukum 'alaykum 'allaa tushrikoo bihee shay'anw-wa bilwaalidayni 'ihsaanaa; wa laa taqtulooo 'awlaa dakum min 'imlaaq; nahnu narzuqukum wa 'iyyaahum wa laa taqrabul-fawaahisha maa zahara minhaa wa maa batana wa laa taqtulun-nafsal-latee harramal-laahu 'illaa bilhaqq; zaalikum waşşaakum bihee la'allakum ta'qiloon.
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: aao main padh kar sunaata hoon jo kuchh tumhaare rabne tum par haaraam kiya hai yeh ke tum uske saath kisi cheez ko shareek na thhahraao aur maan baap ke saath neki karo aur apni aulaad ko tung dasti ke dar se qatl na karo, hum tumhein bhi aur unhen bhi rizq dete hain aur be hayaayi ke kaamon ke qareeb na jaao khaah woh zaahir hon ya chhupe huye hon aur kisi aisi jaan ko qatl mat karo jise Allah ne haraam kiya ho siwaaye uske jis ka qatl barhaq ho, in saari baaton ki Allah ne tumhein taakeed ki hai taake tum aql se kaam lo.

verses.arabic: وَلَا تَقْرَبُوا مَالَ الْيَتِيْمِ اِلَّا بِالَّتِيْ هِيَ اَحْسَنُ حَتّٰى يَبْلُغَ اَشُدَّهٗ ۚ وَاَوْفُوا الْكَيْلَ وَالْمِيْزَانَ بِالْقِسْطِ ۚ لَا نُكَلِّفُ نَفْسًا اِلَّا وُسْعَهَا ۭ وَاِذَا قُلْتُمْ فَاعْدِلُوْا وَلَوْ كَانَ ذَا قُرْبٰى ۚ وَبِعَهْدِ اللّٰهِ اَوْفُوْا ۭ ذٰلِكُمْ وَصّٰكُمْ بِهٖ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَذَكَّرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laa taqraboo maalal-yateemi 'illaa billatee hiya 'ahsanu hattaa yablugha 'ashuddahoo wa 'awful- kayla wal-meezaana bilqisti laa nukallifu nafsan 'illaa wus'ahaa wa 'izaa qultum fa'diloo wa law kaana zaa qurbaa wa bi-'ahdil-laahi 'awfoo; zaalikum waşşaakum bihee laʻallakum tazakkarroon.
verses.translation: Aur tum yateem ke maal ke qareeb na jaao magar uss tareeqe se jo sab se achchha ho yahaan tak ke woh pukhtagi ki umr ko pahunch jaaye aur tum naap aur taul ko insaaf ke saath pura do, hum kisi jaan ko uski taaqat se badh kar takleef nahin dete aur jab tum koyi baat kaho to insaaf se kaam lo agarcheh (mu'aamlah tumhaare) qareebi rishtedaar (ka) ho aur tum Allah ka ahad pura karo, un saari baaton ki Allah ne tumhen taakeed ki hai taake tum haasil karo. naseehat

verses.arabic: وَاَنَّ هٰذَا صِرَاطِيْ مُسْتَقِيْمًا فَاتَّبِعُوْهُ ۖ وَلَا تَتَّبِعُوا السُّبُلَ فَتَفَرَّقَ بِكُمْ عَنْ سَبِيْلِهٖ ۭ ذٰلِكُمْ وَصّٰكُمْ بِهٖ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَتَّقُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'anna haazaa Şiraatee mustaqeeman fattabi'oohu wa laa tattabi'us-subula fatafarraqa bikum 'an sabeelih; zaalikum waşşaakum bihee la'allakum tattaqoon.
verses.translation: Aur yaqeenan yeh¹ mera raastah seedha hai lehaaza tum usi ki pairwi karo aur tum doosre raaston ki pairwi mat karo, woh tumhen Allah ke raaste se alag kardenge. Allah ne tumhein uski taakeed ki hai taake tum parhez gaari ikhtiyaar karo.
verses.deepMeaning: Haaza (yeh) se muraad qur'an majeed, ya deen-e-islam ya woh ahkaam hain jo bataur khaas iss soorat mein bayaan kiye gaye hain woh hain tauheed, ma'aad aur risaalat. Aur yehi islam ke usool-e-salaasah hain jin ke gird pura deen ghoomta hai. isliye jo bhi muraad liya jaaye, mafhoom sab ka ek hi hai.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ اٰتَيْنَا مُوْسَى الْكِتٰبَ تَمَامًا عَلَى الَّذِيْۤ اَحْسَنَ وَ تَفْصِيْلًا لِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ وَّ هُدًى وَّ رَحْمَةً لَّعَلَّهُمْ بِلِقَآءِ رَبِّهِمْ يُؤْمِنُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Summa 'aataynaa Moosal-Kitaaba tamaaman 'alal-lazeee 'ahsana wa tafseelal- likulli shay'inw-wa hudañw-wa rahmatal- la'allahum biliqaaa'i Rabbihim yu'minoon.
verses.translation: Phir humne Moosa ko isliye kitab di ke jo shakhs achchhe kaam kare uss par hamaari ne'maten puri hon aur har cheez ki tafseel bayaan karne ke liye aur hidaayat aur rahmat ka zaria'h hai taake woh apne rab se mulaqaat par eemaan le aayein.

verses.arabic: وَ هٰذَا كِتٰبٌ اَنْزَلْنَاهُ مُبَارَكٌ فَاتَّبِعُوْهُ وَ اتَّقُوْا لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa haazaa Kitaabun 'anzalnaahu Mubaarakun fattabi'oohu wattaqoo la'allakum turhamoon.
verses.translation: Aur yeh (qur'an) ek a'zeem kitab hai, hum ne ise naazil kiya hai, (yeh) barkat waali hai, pas tum uski pairwi karo aur parhez gaari ikhtiyaar karo taake tum par raham kiya jaaye.
