verses.arabic: اَنْ تَقُوْلُوْٓا اِنَّمَآ اُنْزِلَ الْكِتٰبُ عَلٰى طَآىٕفَتَيْنِ مِنْ قَبْلِنَا وَ اِنْ كُنَّا عَنْ دِرَاسَتِهِمْ لَغٰفِلِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'An taqoolooo 'innamaaa 'unzilal- Kitaabu 'alaa taaa'ifatayni min qablinaa wa 'in kunnaa 'an diraasatihim laghaafileen.
verses.translation: Taake tum (yeh na) kaho ke sirf humse pahle do girohon (Yahood-o- Nasaara) par kitab naazil ki gayi thi aur beshak hum to unke padhne padhaane se be khabar the.

verses.arabic: اَوْ تَقُوْلُوْا لَوْ اَنَّآ اُنْزِلَ عَلَيْنَا الْكِتٰبُ لَكُنَّآ اَهْدٰى مِنْهُمْ ۭ فَقَدْ جَآءَكُمْ بَيِّنَةٌ مِّنْ رَّبِّكُمْ وَ هُدًى وَّ رَحْمَةٌ ۭ فَمَنْ اَظْلَمُ مِمَّنْ كَذَّبَ بِاٰيٰتِ اللّٰهِ وَ صَدَفَ عَنْهَا ۭ سَنَجْزِي الَّذِيْنَ يَصْدِفُوْنَ عَنْ اٰيٰتِنَا سُوْۤءَ الْعَذَابِ بِمَا كَانُوْا يَصْدِفُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Aw taqooloo law annaaa 'unzila 'alaynal- kitaabu lakunnaaa Pahdaa minhum; faqad jaaa'akum bayyinatum mir-Rabbikum wa hudañw-wa rahmah; faman 'azlamu mimman kazzaba bi-'Aayaatil- laahi wa şadafa 'anhaa; sanajzil-lazeena yaşdifoona 'an 'Aayaatinaa sooo'al- 'azaabi bimaa kaanoo yaşdifoon.
verses.translation: Yaa tum (ye na) kaho ke agar beshak hum par kitab naazil ki jaati to hum zaroor un se ziyaadah hidaayat haasil karte, (chunaancheh) tumhaare paas tumhaare rab ki taraf se ek waazeh kitab aur hidaayat aur rahmat aa gayi hai, phir uss shakhs se ziyaadah zaalim- kaun hai jisne Allah ki aayaton ko jhutlaaya aur un se munh moda? jo log hamaari aayaat se munh modte hain unhein jald hum sakht a'zaab ki shakl mein sazaa denge, isliye ke woh haq se munh modte hain.

verses.arabic: هَلْ يَنْظُرُوْنَ اِلَّاۤ اَنْ تَاْتِيَهُمُ الْمَلٰٓىٕكَةُ اَوْ يَاْتِيَ رَبُّكَ اَوْ يَاْتِيَ بَعْضُ اٰيٰتِ رَبِّكَ ۭ يَوْمَ يَاْتِيْ بَعْضُ اٰيٰتِ رَبِّكَ لَا يَنْفَعُ نَفْسًا اِيْمَانُهَا لَمْ تَكُنْ اٰمَنَتْ مِنْ قَبْلُ اَوْ كَسَبَتْ فِيْۤ اِيْمَانِهَا خَيْرًا ۭ قُلِ انْتَظِرُوْا اِنَّا مُنْتَظِرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Hal yanzuroona 'illaaa 'an ta'tiyahumul- malaaa'ikatu 'aw ya'tiya Rabbuka 'aw ya'tiya ba'du 'Aayaati Rabbik; yawma ya'tee ba'du 'Aayaati Rabbika laa yanfa'u nafsan 'eemaanuhaa lam takun 'aamanat min qablu 'aw kasabat feee 'eemaanihaa khayraa; qulin-tazirooo 'innaa muntaziroon.
verses.translation: Kiya woh sirf iss baat ka intezaar kar rahe hain ke unke paas farishte aayein ya aapka rab aaye ya Aapke rab ki ba'z nishaaniyaan aayein? jis din Aapke rab ki ba'z nishaaniyaan aa jaayengi to kisi aise shakhs ka eemaan laana use faayedah nahin dega jo usse pahle eemaan nahin laaya tha ya usne apne eemaan mein koyi nek 'amal nahin kiya tha. kah deejiye: tum intezaar karo, beshak hum bhi intezaar karne waale hain.

verses.arabic: اِنَّ الَّذِيْنَ فَرَّقُوْا دِيْنَهُمْ وَ كَانُوْا شِيَعًا لَسْتَ مِنْهُمْ فِيْ شَيْءٍ ۭ اِنَّمَاۤ اَمْرُهُمْ اِلَى اللّٰهِ ثُمَّ يُنَبِّئُهُمْ بِمَا كَانُوْا يَفْعَلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Innal-lazeena farraqoo deenahum wa kaanoo shiyaʻal-lasta minhum fee shay'; 'innamaaa 'amruhum 'ilal-laahi summa yunabbi'uhum bimaa kaanoo yafaloon.
verses.translation: Beshak jin logon ne apne deen mein tafarqa baazi ki aur woh girohon mein bat gaye aapka unse koyi ta'alluq nahin, beshak unka mu'aamlah Allah ke haath mein hai phir woh unhein un kaamon se aagaah karega jo woh karte rahe the.

verses.arabic: مَنْ جَآءَ بِالْحَسَنَةِ فَلَهٗ عَشْرُ اَمْثَالِهَا ۖ وَ مَنْ جَآءَ بِالسَّيِّئَةِ فَلَا يُجْزٰٓى اِلَّا مِثْلَهَا وَ هُمْ لَا يُظْلَمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: man jaaa'a bilhasanati falahoo 'ashreu 'amsaalihaa wa man jaaa'a bissayyi'ati falaa yujzaaa 'illaa mislahaa wa hum laa yuzlamoon.
verses.translation: Jo shakhs (wahaan) ek neki le kar aayega to uske liye das guna (sawaab) hoga aur jo shakhs ek buraayi le kar aayega to use bas uske baraabar hi saza di jaayegi aur un par zulm nahin kiya jaayega.

verses.arabic: قُلْ اِنَّنِيْ هَدٰىنِيْ رَبِّيْٓ اِلٰى صِرَاطٍ مُّسْتَقِيْمٍ دِيْنًا قِيَمًا مِلَّةَ اِبْرٰهِيْمَ حَنِيْفًا ۚ وَ مَا كَانَ مِنَ الْمُشْرِكِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qul 'innanee hadaanee Rabbeee 'ilaa Şiraatim-Mustaqeemin deenan qiyamam-Millata 'Ibraaheema Haneefaa; wa maa kaana minal- mushrikeen.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) kah deejiye: beshak mujhe mere rab ne seedhe raaste ki taraf hidaayat di hai sahih aa'la iqdaar ke haamil-e-deen ki, ek rab ke parastaar ibraheem ke tareeq ki aur woh mushrikon mein se nahin tha.

verses.arabic: قُلْ اِنَّ صَلَاتِيْ وَ نُسُكِيْ وَ مَحْيَايَ وَ مَمَاتِيْ لِلّٰهِ رَبِّ الْعٰلَمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qul 'inna Şalaatee wa nusukee wa mahyaaya wa mamaatee lillaahi Rabbil-'aalameen. 163.Laa shareeka lahoo wa bizaalika 'umirtu wa 'ana 'awwalul- muslimeen.
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: beshak meri namaaz, meri qurbaani, meri zindagi aur meri maut, (sab kuchh) Allah Rabbul 'Aalameen hi ke liye hai.

verses.arabic: لَا شَرِيْكَ لَهٗ ۚ وَ بِذٰلِكَ اُمِرْتُ وَ اَنَا اَوَّلُ الْمُسْلِمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Laa shareeka lahoo wa bizaalika 'umirtu wa 'ana 'awwalul- muslimeen.
verses.translation: Uska koyi shareek nahin aur mujhe usi (baat ya'ni tauheed) ka hukm diya gaya hai aur main sab se pahla musalmaan hoon.

verses.arabic: قُلْ اَغَيْرَ اللّٰهِ اَبْغِيْ رَبًّا وَّهُوَ رَبُّ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ ۭ وَلَا تَكْسِبُ كُلُّ نَفْسٍ اِلَّا عَلَيْهَا ۭ وَلَا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةٌ وِّزْرَ اُخْرٰى ۚ ثُمَّ اِلٰى رَبِّكُمْ مَّرْجِعُكُمْ فَيُنَبِّئُكُمْ بِمَا كُنْتُمْ فِيْهِ تَخْتَلِفُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qul 'aghayral-laahi 'abghee Rabbañw- wa Huwa Rabbu kulli shay'; wa laa taksibu kullu nafsin 'illaa 'alayhaa; wa laa taziru waaziratunw-wizra 'ukhraa; summa 'ilaa Rabbikum marji'ukum fayunabbi'ukum bimaa kuntum feehi takhtalifoon.
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: kiya main Allah ke siwa koyi aur rab talaash karun? jabke wahi har cheez ka rab hai aur koyi shakhs aisa (gunaah) nahin kamaata jiska wabaal usi par na ho aur koyi bojh uthhaane waala kisi doosre ka bojh nahin uthhaayega phir apne rab hi ki taraf tumhein lautna hai. chunaancheh woh tumhein un baaton se aagaah karega jin mein tum ikhtelaaf karte rahe the.

verses.arabic: وَهُوَ الَّذِيْ جَعَلَكُمْ خَلٰٓىٕفَ الْاَرْضِ وَرَفَعَ بَعْضَكُمْ فَوْقَ بَعْضٍ دَرَجٰتٍ لِّيَبْلُوَكُمْ فِيْ مَآ اٰتٰىكُمْ ۭ اِنَّ رَبَّكَ سَرِيْعُ الْعِقَابِ ۭ وَاِنَّهٗ لَغَفُوْرٌ رَّحِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa Huwal-lazee ja'alakum khalaaa'ifal-'ardi wa rafa'a ba'dakum fawqa ba'din darajaatil-liyabluwakum fee maaa 'aataakum; 'inna Rabbaka saree'ul- 'iqaabi wa 'innahoo la Ghafoorur-Raheem.
verses.translation: .Aur wahi hai jisne tumhein zameen mein ek doosre ka jaanasheen banaaya aur tum mein se ba'z ko ba'z par ounche darje a'taa kiye taake woh tumhein un ne'maton mein aazmaaye jo usne tumhein din. beshak Aap ka rab jald sazaa dene waala hai aur beshak woh bahut bakhashne waala, nehaayat raham karne waala hai.

verses.arabic: المص
verses.transliteration: Alif-Laaam-Мееет- Şaaad
verses.translation: Alif Laaam Meeem Saaad.

verses.arabic: كِتَابٌ أُنزِلَ إِلَيْكَ فَلَا يَكُن فِي صَدْرِكَ حَرَجٌ مِّنْهُ لِتُنذِرَ بِهِ وَذِكْرَىٰ لِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.transliteration: Kitaabun 'unzila 'ilayka falaa yakun fee şadrika harajum-minhu litunzira bihee wa zikraa lilmu'mineen.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) yeh kitaab aap ki taraf naazil ki gayi hai, isse Aap ke seene mein kisi qism ki tangi nahin honi chaahiye taake Aap iske zariye se (logon ko) daraayen aur yeh mominon ke liye naseehat hai.

verses.arabic: ٱتَّبِعُوا۟ مَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيْكُم مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ وَلَا تَتَّبِعُوا۟ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ أَوْلِيَآءَ ۗ قَلِيلًا مَّا تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Ittabi'oo maaa 'unzila 'ilaykum mir-Rabbikum wa laa tattabi'oo min dooniheee 'awliyaaa; qaleelam-maa tazakkaroon.
verses.translation: Tum uss (hidaayat) ki pairwi karo jo tumhaare rab ki taraf se tumhaari taraf naazil ki gayi hai aur tum uske elaawah (aur) doston ki pairwi na karo, tum bahut hi kam naseehat haasil karte ho.

verses.arabic: وَكَم مِّن قَرْيَةٍ أَهْلَكْنَـٰهَا فَجَآءَهَا بَأْسُنَا بَيَـٰتًا أَوْ هُمْ قَآئِلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa kam min qaryatin 'ahlaknaahaa fajaaa'ahaa ba'sunaa bayaatan 'aw hum qaaa'iloon.
verses.translation: Aur bahut si bastiyaan aisi hain ke humne unhein halaak kar diya, to unke paas hamaara azaab us waqt aaya jab woh raat ko soye huye the ya woh do pahar ko aaraam kar rahe the.

verses.arabic: فَمَا كَانَ دَعْوَىٰهُمْ إِذْ جَآءَهُم بَأْسُنَآ إِلَّآ أَن قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَـٰلِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Famaa kaana da'waahum 'iz jaaa'ahum ba'sunaaa 'illaaa 'an qaalooo 'innaa kunnaa zaalimeen.
verses.translation: Phir jab unke paas hamaara azaab aa gaya to unki pukaar bas yahi thi ke woh kah uthe: be shak hum hi zaalim the.

verses.arabic: فَلَنَسْـَٔلَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ أُرْسِلَ إِلَيْهِمْ وَلَنَسْـَٔلَنَّ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.transliteration: Falanas'alannal- lazeena 'ursila 'ilayhim wa lanas'alannal- mursaleen.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh hum un logon se zaroor sawaal karenge jinki taraf Rasool bheje gaye the aur hum Rasoolon se bhi zaroor sawaal kareinge.

verses.arabic: فَلَنَقُصَّنَّ عَلَيْهِم بِعِلْمٍۢ وَمَا كُنَّا غَآئِبِينَ
verses.transliteration: Falanaquşşanna 'alayhim bi'ilminw-wa maa kunnaa ghaaa'ibeen.
verses.translation: Phir hum (sab kuchh) apne ilm se unke saamne zaroor bayaan kareinge aur hum (dunya mein) ghaayib (ghair haazir) to na the.

verses.arabic: وَٱلْوَزْنُ يَوْمَئِذٍ ٱلْحَقُّ ۚ فَمَن ثَقُلَتْ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُفْلِحُونَ
verses.transliteration: Walwaznu Yawma'izinil-haqq; faman saqulat mawaazeenuhoo fa'ulaaa'ika humul- muflihoon
verses.translation: Aur us din (a'maal ka) wazan kiya jaana barhaq hai, phir jis shakhs ke (nek a'maal ke) wazan bhaari ho gaye to wahi log falaah paane waale hain.¹
verses.deepMeaning: iss mein wazan-e-a'amaal ka bayaan hai, ya'ni qiyaamat ke din insaanon ke a'amaal taule jaayeinge. Ek aur maqaam par Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya hai: 'Aur qiyaamat ke din hum (logon ke a'amaal taulne ke liye) meezaan adı qaayem kareinge.' (Ambiya:21/47) ahaadees mein bhi wazan a'amaal ka bayaan bayaan hai jaise sahih bukhari ki aakhri hadees mein hai

verses.arabic: وَمَنْ خَفَّتْ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ خَسِرُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُم بِمَا كَانُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا يَظْلِمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa man khaffat mawaazeenuhoo fa'ulaaa'ikal-lazeena khasirooo 'anfusahum bimaa kaanoo bi- 'Aayaatinaa yazlimoon.
verses.translation: Aur jis shakhs ke (nek a'maal ke) wazan halke ho gaye to wahi log hain jinhon ne apni jaanon ko khasaare mein daala, isliye ke woh hamaari aayaat ke saath be insaafi karte the.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ مَكَّنَّـٰكُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَجَعَلْنَا لَكُمْ فِيهَا مَعَـٰيِشَ ۗ قَلِيلًۭا مَّا تَشْكُرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad makkannaakum fil-'ardi wa ja'alnaa lakum feehaa ma aayish; qaleelam-maa tashkuroon.
verses.translation: Aur bela shubah humne tumhein zameen mein qudrat di aur uss mein tumhaare liye gazraan ke asbaab faraahum kar diye, tum bahut hi kam shukar karte ho.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَـٰكُمْ ثُمَّ صَوَّرْنَـٰكُمْ ثُمَّ قُلْنَا لِلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ ٱسْجُدُوا۟ لِـَٔادَمَ فَسَجَدُوٓا۟ إِلَّآ إِبْلِيسَ لَمْ يَكُن مِّنَ ٱلسَّـٰجِدِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa lagad khalaqnaakum summa şawwarnaakum summa qulnaa lilmalaaa'ikatis- judoo li-'Aadama fasajadooo 'illaaa 'Ibleesa lam yakum- minas-saajideen.
verses.translation: Aur bila shubah humne tumhein paida kiya phir tumhaari sooratein banaayin phir humne farishton se kaha: tum aadam ko sajdah karo, chunaancheh unhon ne sajdah kiya siwaaye Iblees ke, woh sajdah karne waalon mein shaamil na huwa.

verses.arabic: قَالَ مَا مَنَعَكَ أَلَّا تَسْجُدَ إِذْ أَمَرْتُكَ ۖ قَالَ أَنَا۠ خَيْرٌۭ مِّنْهُ ۖ خَلَقْتَنِى مِن نَّارٍۢ وَخَلَقْتَهُۥ مِن طِينٍۢ
verses.transliteration: Qaala maa mana'aka 'allaa tasjuda 'iz 'amartuka qaala 'ana khayrum-minhu khalaqtanee min naarin wa khalaqtahoo min teen
verses.translation: Allah ne kaha: tujhe kis cheez ne roka ke toone sajdah na kiya, jabke main ne tujhe hukm diya tha? woh bola: main usse behtar hoon, mujhe toone aag se paida kiya aur use toone mitti se paida kiya hai.

verses.arabic: قَالَ فَٱهْبِطْ مِنْهَا فَمَا يَكُونُ لَكَ أَن تَتَكَبَّرَ فِيهَا فَٱخْرُجْ إِنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰغِرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala fahbit minhaa famaa yakoonu laka 'an tatakabbara feehaa fakhruj 'innaka minas- saaghireen.
verses.translation: Allah ne kaha: phir tu iss (aasmaan) se utar jaa kyun ke tere laayeq yeh nahin tha ke tu iss mein takabbur karta, lehaaza tu nikal jaa! beshak tu zaleelon mein se hai.

verses.arabic: قَالَ أَنظِرْنِىٓ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala 'anzirneee 'ilaa Yawmi yub'asoon
verses.translation: Usne kaha: tu mujhe uss din tak mohlat de de, jab log qabron se uthhaaye jaayenge.

verses.arabic: قَالَ إِنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلْمُنظَرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala 'innaka minal- munzareen.
verses.translation: Allah ne kaha: beshak tu mohlat diye gaye logon mein se hai.

verses.arabic: قَالَ فَبِمَآ أَغْوَيْتَنِى لَأَقْعُدَنَّ لَهُمْ صِرَٰطَكَ ٱلْمُسْتَقِيمَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala fabimaaa 'aghwaytanee la'aq'udanna lahum Şiraatakal-Mustaqeem.
verses.translation: Woh bola:pas iss wajah se ke toone mujhe gumraah kiya, to main un (logon ko gumraah karne) ke liye tere seedhe raaste par zaroor baithhunga.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ لَأٓتِيَنَّهُم مِّنۢ بَيْنِ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِمْ وَعَنْ أَيْمَـٰنِهِمْ وَعَن شَمَآئِلِهِمْ ۖ وَلَا تَجِدُ أَكْثَرَهُمْ شَـٰكِرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Summa mim la'aatiyannahum bayni 'aydeehim wa min khalfihim wa 'an 'aymaanihim wa 'an shamaaa'ilihim wa laa tajidu 'aksarahum shaakireen.
verses.translation: Phir main unke saamne sè aur unke peechhe se unke paas zaroor aaounga aur unke daayein se aur unke baayein se bhi aur tu unki aksariyat ko shukr guzaar nahin paayega.

verses.arabic: قَالَ ٱخْرُجْ مِنْهَا مَذْءُومًۭا مَّدْحُورًۭا ۖ لَّمَن تَبِعَكَ مِنْهُمْ لَأَمْلَـَٔنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنكُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaalakh-ruj minhaa maz'oomam madhooraa; laman tabi'aka minhum la'amla'anna Jahannama minkum 'ajma'een.
verses.translation: Allah ne farmaya: nikal jaa yahaan se tu haqeer aur dhutkaara huwa hai, phir un mein se jo teri pairwi karega to main jahannam ko tum sab se zaroor bharunga

verses.arabic: وَيَـٰٓـَٔادَمُ ٱسْكُنْ أَنتَ وَزَوْجُكَ ٱلْجَنَّةَ فَكُلَا مِنْ حَيْثُ شِئْتُمَا وَلَا تَقْرَبَا هَـٰذِهِ ٱلشَّجَرَةَ فَتَكُونَا مِنَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa yaaa 'Aadamus- kun 'anta wa zawjukal- Jannata fakulaa min haysu shi'tumaa wa laa taqrabaa haazihish- shajarata fatakoonaa minaz-zaalimeen.
verses.translation: Aur aye Aadam! tu aur teri beewi jannat mein raho, aur tum donon jahaan se chaaho khaao, aur tum donon USS darakht ke qareeb mat jaana warna tum donon zaalimon mein se ho jaaoge.

verses.arabic: فَوَسْوَسَ لَهُمَا ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ لِيُبْدِىَ لَهُمَا مَا وُورِىَ عَنْهُمَا مِن سَوْءَٰتِهِمَا وَقَالَ مَا نَهَىٰكُمَا رَبُّكُمَا عَنْ هَـٰذِهِ ٱلشَّجَرَةِ إِلَّآ أَن تَكُونَا مَلَكَيْنِ أَوْ تَكُونَا مِنَ ٱلْخَـٰلِدِينَ
verses.transliteration: Fawaswasa lahumash-Shaytaanu liyubdiya lahumaa maa wooriya 'anhumaa min saw'aatihimaa wa qaala maa nahaakumaa Rabbukumaa 'an haazihish-shajarati 'illaaa 'an takoonaa malakayni 'aw takoonaa minal-khaalideen.
verses.translation: Phir shaytaan ne un donon (ko bahkaane) ke liye unke dil mein waswasah daala taake unke liye unki sharm gaahein zaahir karde jo unse chhupaayi gayi thin aur shaytaan ne kaha: tumhaare rab ne tumhen sirf isliye roka hai ke kahin tum donon farishte na ban jaao ya kahin tum donon hameshah rahne waalon mein se na hojaao.

verses.arabic: وَقَاسَمَهُمَآ إِنِّى لَكُمَا لَمِنَ ٱلنَّـٰصِحِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa qaasamahumaaa 'innee lakumaa laminan- naaşiheen.
verses.translation: Aur usne un donon ke saamne qasam khaayi ke beshak main tum donon ke khair khaahon mein se hoon.

verses.arabic: فَدَلَّىٰهُمَا بِغُرُورٍۢ ۚ فَلَمَّا ذَاقَا ٱلشَّجَرَةَ بَدَتْ لَهُمَا سَوْءَٰتُهُمَا وَطَفِقَا يَخْصِفَانِ عَلَيْهِمَا مِن وَرَقِ ٱلْجَنَّةِ ۖ وَنَادَىٰهُمَا رَبُّهُمَآ أَلَمْ أَنْهَكُمَا عَن تِلْكُمَا ٱلشَّجَرَةِ وَأَقُل لَّكُمَآ إِنَّ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنَ لَكُمَا عَدُوٌّۭ مُّبِينٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Fadallaahumaa bighuroor; falammaa zaaqash-shajarata badat lahumaa saw 'aatuhumaa wa tafiqaa yakhşifaani 'alayhimaa minw-waraqil-jannati wa naadaahumaa Rabbuhumaaa 'alam 'anhakumaa 'an tilkumash-shajarati wa 'aqul-lakumaaa 'innash- Shaytaana lakumaa 'aduwwum-mubeen.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh shaytaan ne un donon ko dhoka de kar phuslaa diya, phir jab un donon ne uss darakht ka phal chakha to un donon ki sharamgaahein un par zaahir ho gayin, aur woh donon apne oupar jannat ke patte chipkaane lage (taake satr dhaank sakein) aur unke rab ne unko aawaaz di: kiya main ne tumhein uss darakht se roka nahin tha? aur main ne tumhen yeh (nahin) kaha tha ke shaytaan tum donon ka khula dushman hai?

verses.arabic: قَالَا رَبَّنَا ظَلَمْنَآ أَنفُسَنَا وَإِن لَّمْ تَغْفِرْ لَنَا وَتَرْحَمْنَا لَنَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلْخَـٰسِرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaalaa Rabbanaa zalamnaaa 'anfusanaa wa 'il-lam taghfir lanaa wa tarhamnaa lanakoonanna minal- khaasireen.
verses.translation: Unhon ne kaha: Aye hamaare rab! humne apne aap par zulm kiya aur agar toone hamen na bakhsha aur toone hum par raham na farmaya tu yaqeenan hum khasaarah paane waalon mein se ho jaayenge.

verses.arabic: قَالَ ٱهْبِطُوا۟ بَعْضُكُمْ لِبَعْضٍ عَدُوٌّۭ ۖ وَلَكُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ مُسْتَقَرٌّۭ وَمَتَـٰعٌ إِلَىٰ حِينٍۢ
verses.transliteration: Qaalah-bitoo ba'dukum liba din 'aduwwun wa lakum fil- 'ardi mustaqarruñw-wa mataa'un 'ilaa heen.
verses.translation: Allah ne kaha: tum utar jaao, tum ek doosre ke dushman ho aur tumhen zameen mein thhaharna aur ek (muqarrarah) waqt tak faayidah uthhaana hai.

verses.arabic: قَالَ فِيهَا تَحْيَوْنَ وَفِيهَا تَمُوتُونَ وَمِنْهَا تُخْرَجُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala feehaa tahyawna wa feehaa tamootoona wa minhaa tukhrajoon.
verses.translation: Aur farmaya: tum usi (zameen) mein zindah rahoge aur usi mein tum maroge aur (qiyaamat ke din) usi se tum niklaale jaaoge

verses.arabic: يَـٰبَنِىٓ ءَادَمَ قَدْ أَنزَلْنَا عَلَيْكُمْ لِبَاسًۭا يُوَٰرِى سَوْءَٰتِكُمْ وَرِيشًۭا ۖ وَلِبَاسُ ٱلتَّقْوَىٰ ذَٰلِكَ خَيْرٌۭ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ مِنْ ءَايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَذَّكَّرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Yaa Baneee 'Aadama qad 'anzalnaa 'alaykum libaasany-yuwaaree saw'aatikum wa reeshan wa libaasut-taqwaa zaalika khayr; zaalika min 'Aayaatil-laahi laʻallahum yazzakkaroon.
verses.translation: Aye bani aadam! beshak hum ne tum par aisa libaas naazil kiya jo tumhaari sharam gaahein chhupaata hai aur zeenat ka baay'is hai aur parhez gaari ka libaas bahut behtar hai.¹ yeh Allah ki nishaaniyon mein se hai taake log naseehat haasil karein.
verses.deepMeaning: Bayaan kiya jaata hai ke islam se pahle daur-e-jaahiliyat mein arab ke but parast barhanah haalat mein ka'ba ka tawaaf kiya karte the, chunaancheh jab islam ghaalib aa gaya aur Makkah fatah ho gaya to in but paraston aur mushrikeen ko Makkah mein daakhil hone se mana' kar diya gaya aur sabko barhanah haalat mein tawaaf-e-ka'ba se rok diya gaya

verses.arabic: يَـٰبَنِىٓ ءَادَمَ لَا يَفْتِنَنَّكُمُ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ كَمَآ أَخْرَجَ أَبَوَيْكُم مِّنَ ٱلْجَنَّةِ يَنزِعُ عَنْهُمَا لِبَاسَهُمَا لِيُرِيَهُمَا سَوْءَٰتِهِمَآ ۗ إِنَّهُۥ يَرَىٰكُمْ هُوَ وَقَبِيلُهُۥ مِنْ حَيْثُ لَا تَرَوْنَهُمْ ۖ إِنَّا جَعَلْنَا ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينَ أَوْلِيَآءَ لِلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.transliteration: aa Baneee 'Aadama laa yaftinannakumush- Shaytaanu kamaaa 'akhraja 'abawaykum minal-Jannati yanzi'u 'anhumaa libaasahumaa liyuriyahumaa saw'aatihimaaa; 'innahoo yaraakum huwa wa qabeeluhoo min haysu laa tarawnahum; 'innaa ja'alnash-Shayaateena 'awliyaaa'a lillazeena laa yu'minoon.
verses.translation: Aye bani aadam! kahin shaytaan tumhein fitne mein na daal de jis tarah usne tumhaare maan baap ko jannat se nikal waaya tha jab us ne un donon ka libaas utarwaa diya tha taake unko unki sharam gaahen dikhaade, beshak woh aur uska qabeelah tumhein dekhta hai jahaan se tum unhein nahin dekh sakte. beshak humne shaytaanon ko un logon ke dost bana diya jo eemaan nahin laate.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا فَعَلُوا۟ فَـٰحِشَةًۭ قَالُوا۟ وَجَدْنَا عَلَيْهَآ ءَابَآءَنَا وَٱللَّهُ أَمَرَنَا بِهَا ۗ قُلْ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَأْمُرُ بِٱلْفَحْشَآءِ ۖ أَتَقُولُونَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'izaa fa'aloo faahishatan qaaloo wajadnaa 'alayhaaa aabaaa'anaa wallaahu 'amaranaa bihaa; qul 'innal-laaha laa ya'muru bilfahshaaa'i 'ataqooloona 'alal-laahi maa laa ta'lamoon.
verses.translation: Aur jab woh koyi be hayaayi ka kaam karte hain to kahte hain: humne apne baap dada ko yahi karte paaya aur Allah humein iska hukm diya hai. (Aye Nabi!) Aap kah deejiye: Allah qat'an be hayaayi ka hukm nahin deta, kiya tum Allah ke zimme aisi baaten lagaate ho jo tum nahin jaante?

verses.arabic: قُلْ أَمَرَ رَبِّى بِٱلْقِسْطِ ۖ وَأَقِيمُوا۟ وُجُوهَكُمْ عِندَ كُلِّ مَسْجِدٍۢ وَٱدْعُوهُ مُخْلِصِينَ لَهُ ٱلدِّينَ ۚ كَمَا بَدَأَكُمْ تَعُودُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qul 'amara Rabbee bilqisti wa 'aqeemoo wujoohakum 'inda kulli masjidiñw-wad'oohu mukhliseena lahud-deen, kamaa bada'akum ta'oodoon.
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: mere rab ne insaaf karne ka hukm diya hai, aur (yeh ke) har namaaz ke waqt apne munh seedhe (qiblah rukh) karlo aur khaalis usi ki itaa'at karte huye usi ko pukaaro jaise usne tumhen pahle paida kya waise hi tum (uski taraf) lautoge.

verses.arabic: فَرِيقًا هَدَىٰ وَفَرِيقًا حَقَّ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلضَّلَـٰلَةُ ۗ إِنَّهُمُ ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينَ أَوْلِيَآءَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَيَحْسَبُونَ أَنَّهُم مُّهْتَدُونَ
verses.transliteration: Fareeqan hadaa wa fareeqan haqqa 'alayhimud-dalaalah; 'innahumut-takhazush- Shayaateena 'awliyaaa'a min doonil- laahi wa yahsaboona 'annahum-muhtadoon.
verses.translation: Ek fareeq ko uss ne hidaayat di aur doosre fareeq par gumraahi saabit ho gayi hai, yaqeenan unhon ne Allah ko chhod kar shaytaanon ko dost bana liya hai aur woh khayaal karte hain ke beshak woh hidaayat yaaftah hai.

verses.arabic: يَـٰبَنِىٓ ءَادَمَ خُذُوا۟ زِينَتَكُمْ عِندَ كُلِّ مَسْجِدٍۢ وَكُلُوا۟ وَٱشْرَبُوا۟ وَلَا تُسْرِفُوٓا۟ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلْمُسْرِفِينَ
verses.transliteration: Yaa Baneee 'Aadama khuzoo zeenatakum 'inda kulli masjidiñw-wa kuloo washraboo wa laa tusrifooo; 'innahoo laa yuhibbul-musrifeen.
verses.translation: Aye bani Aadam! tum har namaaz ke waqt apni zeenat ikhtiyaar karo¹ aur 0 khaao aur piyo aur bejaa na udaao, beshak woh bejaa udaane waalon ko pasand nahin karta.
verses.deepMeaning: Iska matlab yeh bayaan kiya gaya hai ke namaaz ke waqt kapde pahanna zaroori hai. satar dhaanpne se muraad yeh hai ke namaaz adaa karte huye ek mard kandhon par kapda dale aur naaf se ghutnon tak apna jism kapdon se chhupa kar rakkhe aur ek aurat apne chehre ke siwa tamaam jism chhupa kar rakkhe. Ulmaa ki yeh raaye ahaadees Rasool ﷺ par mabni hai. (Sunan Abi Dawood, Hadees:639,640) Sayyedah Aayeshah  رضي الله عنها rivaayat karti hain: Nabi Akram ﷺ fajr ki namaaz adaa karte the to kuchh musalmaan auratein (parde ke liye) chaadarein odh kar namaaz mein shirkat karti thin, phir namaaz padh kar apne gharon ko waapas chali jaati thin baghair uske ke woh pahchaani jaayein. (Sahih Bukhari: 372)

verses.arabic: قُلْ مَنْ حَرَّمَ زِينَةَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّتِىٓ أَخْرَجَ لِعِبَادِهِۦ وَٱلطَّيِّبَـٰتِ مِنَ ٱلرِّزْقِ ۚ قُلْ هِىَ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا خَالِصَةًۭ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۗ كَذَٰلِكَ نُفَصِّلُ ٱلْءَايَـٰتِ لِقَوْمٍۢ يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qul man harrama zeenatal-laahil-lateee 'akhraja li'ibaadihee wattayyibaati minar-rizq; qul hiya lillazeena 'aamanoo fil-hayaatid- dunyaa khaalișatany- Yawmal-Qiyaamah; kazaalika nufaşşilul- 'Aayaati liqawminy- yalamoon.
verses.translation: Aye Nabi!) kah deejiye: jo zeenat aur khaane peene ki paakezah cheezen Allah ne apne bandon ke liye paida ki hain, woh kis ne haraam ki hain? kah deejiye: yeh (paakeezah cheezein) dunya ki zindagi mein un logon ke liye bhi hain jo eemaan laaye, jabke qiyaamat ke din yeh khaalis mominon hi ke liye hongi, isi tarah hum aayaat ko un logon ke liye khol kar bayaan karte hain jo i'lm rakhte hain.

verses.arabic: قُلْ إِنَّمَا حَرَّمَ رَبِّىَ ٱلْفَوَٰحِشَ مَا ظَهَرَ مِنْهَا وَمَا بَطَنَ وَٱلْإِثْمَ وَٱلْبَغْىَ بِغَيْرِ ٱلْحَقِّ وَأَن تُشْرِكُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ مَا لَمْ يُنَزِّلْ بِهِۦ سُلْطَـٰنًۭا وَأَن تَقُولُوا۟ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qul 'innamaa harrama Rabbiyal- fawaahisha maa zahara minhaa wa maa batana wal'isma walbaghya bighayril-haqqi wa 'an tushrikoo billaahi maa lam yunazzil bihee sultaananw-wa 'an taqooloo 'alal-laahi maa laa ta'lamoon.
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: beshak mere rab ne behayaai ki baaton ko haraam thhahraaya hai, chaahe woh zaahir hon ya chhupi huyi aur gunaah ko aur naahaq zulm ko bhi aur yeh (bhi haraam hai) ke tum Allah ke saath uss cheez ko shareek thhahraao jiski usne koyi daleel nahin utaari aur yeh (bhi haraam hai) ke tum Allah ke muta'alliq woh baatein kaho jo tum nahin jaante.

verses.arabic: وَلِكُلِّ أُمَّةٍ أَجَلٌۭ فَإِذَا جَآءَ أَجَلُهُمْ لَا يَسْتَـْٔخِرُونَ سَاعَةًۭ وَلَا يَسْتَقْدِمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa likulli 'ummatin 'ajalun fa'izaa jaaa'a 'ajaluhum laa yasta'khiroona saa'atañw-wa laa yastaqdimoon.
verses.translation: Aur har ummat ke liye ek waqt muqarrar hai, to jab unka muqarrarah waqt aa jaayega to woh (usse) lamha bhar peechhe honge aur na aage honge.

verses.arabic: يَـٰبَنِىٓ ءَادَمَ إِمَّا يَأْتِيَنَّكُمْ رُسُلٌۭ مِّنكُمْ يَقُصُّونَ عَلَيْكُمْ ءَايَـٰتِى ۙ فَمَنِ ٱتَّقَىٰ وَأَصْلَحَ فَلَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُونَ
verses.transliteration: yaa Baneee 'Aadama 'immaa ya'tiyannakum Rusulum-minkum yaquşşoona 'alaykum 'Aayaatee famanit-taqaa wa 'aşlaha falaa khawfun 'alayhim wa laa hum yahzanoon.
verses.translation: Aye bani Aadam! agar tumhaare paas tum mein se Rasool aayen jo tumhaare saamne meri aayatein bayaan karein to jinhon ne parhez gaari ikhtiyaar ki aur apni islaah karli, to un par koyi khauf na hoga aur na ghamgeen honge.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا وَٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ عَنْهَآ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ ۖ هُمْ فِيهَا خَـٰلِدُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena kazzaboo bi-'Aayaatinaa wastakbaroo 'anhaaa 'ulaaa'ika 'Ashaabun- naari hum feehaa khaalidoon.
verses.translation: Aur jin logon ne hamaari aayaton ko jhutlaaya aur unse takabbur kiya wahi log dozakhi hain, woh uss mein hameshah rahenge.

verses.arabic: فَمَنْ أَظْلَمُ مِمَّنِ ٱفْتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا أَوْ كَذَّبَ بِـَٔايَـٰتِهِۦٓ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ يَنَالُهُمْ نَصِيبُهُم مِّنَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ ۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءَتْهُمْ رُسُلُنَا يَتَوَفَّوْنَهُمْ قَالُوٓا۟ أَيْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ تَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ۖ قَالُوا۟ ضَلُّوا۟ عَنَّا وَشَهِدُوا۟ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمْ أَنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ كَـٰفِرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Faman 'azlamu mimmanif-taraa 'alal- laahi kaziban 'aw kazzaba bi-'Aayaatih; 'ulaaa'ika yanaaluhum naseebuhum minal- Kitaab; hattaaa 'izaa jaaa'athum rusulunaa yatawaffawnahum qaalooo 'ayna maa kuntum tadʻoona min doonil-laahi qaaloo dalloo 'annaa wa shahidoo 'alaaa 'anfusihim 'annahum kaanoo kaafireen.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh uss shakhs se ziyaadah zaalim kaun hai jisne Allah ke baare mein jhoot ghada ya uski aayaat ko jhutlaaya? yahi log hain jinka likkha huwa naseeb unhen mil jaayega. yahaan tak ke unke paas jab hamaare farishte pahunchenge, jo unki roohein qabz karenge, to woh unse kahenge: aaj woh kahaan hain jinhein tum Allah ke siwa pukaarte the? woh jawaab denge: woh hum se kho gaye aur woh apne khilaaf gawaahi denge ke beshak woh kufr karne waale the.

verses.arabic: قَالَ ٱدْخُلُوا۟ فِىٓ أُمَمٍۢ قَدْ خَلَتْ مِن قَبْلِكُم مِّنَ ٱلْجِنِّ وَٱلْإِنسِ فِى ٱلنَّارِ ۖ كُلَّمَا دَخَلَتْ أُمَّةٌۭ لَّعَنَتْ أُخْتَهَا ۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا ٱدَّارَكُوا۟ فِيهَا جَمِيعًا قَالَتْ أُخْرَىٰهُمْ لِأُولَىٰهُمْ رَبَّنَا هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ أَضَلُّونَا فَـَٔاتِهِمْ عَذَابًۢا ضِعْفًۭا مِّنَ ٱلنَّارِ ۖ قَالَ لِكُلٍّۢ ضِعْفٌۭ وَلَـٰكِن لَّا تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qaalad-khuloo feee 'umamin qad khalat min qablikum minal-jinni wal'insi fin-naari kullamaa dakhalat 'ummatul-la'anat 'ukhtahaa hattaaa 'izad- daarakoo feehaa jamee'an qaalat 'ukhraahum li'oolaahum Rabbanaa haaa'ulaaa'i 'adalloonaa fa'aatihim 'azaaban di fam-minan- naari qaala likullin di funw-wa laakil-laa talamoon.
verses.translation: Allah farmaayega: tum un ummaton ke saath aag mein daakhil ho jaao jo jinnon aur insaanon mein se tumse pahle guzar chuki hain, jab bhi ek ummat aag mein daakhil hogi to woh apne jaisi doosri ummat ko la'nat malaamat karegi yahaan tak ke jab uss mein woh sab ekatthe honge to unki doosri jamaa'at unki pahli jamaa'at ke baare mein kahegi: aye hamaare rab! in logon ne hamen gumraah kiya tha, lehaaza tu inhen aag ka dugna a'zaab de. Allah farmaayega: (tum mein se) har ek ke liye dugna (a'zaab) hai magar tum nahin jaante.

verses.arabic: وَقَالَتْ أُولَىٰهُمْ لِأُخْرَىٰهُمْ فَمَا كَانَ لَكُمْ عَلَيْنَا مِن فَضْلٍۢ فَذُوقُوا۟ ٱلْعَذَابَ بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَكْسِبُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa qaalat 'oolaahum li'ukhraahum famaa kaana lakum 'alaynaa min fadlin fazooqul- 'azaaba bimaa kuntum taksiboon.
verses.translation: Aur unki pahli jamaa'at unki doosri jamaa'at se kahegi: tumhein hum par koyi fazeelat haasil nahin, chunaancheh tum uske badle mein a'zaab ka mazah chakho jo kuchh tum kamaate rahe the.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا وَٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ عَنْهَا لَا تُفَتَّحُ لَهُمْ أَبْوَٰبُ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَلَا يَدْخُلُونَ ٱلْجَنَّةَ حَتَّىٰ يَلِجَ ٱلْجَمَلُ فِى سَمِّ ٱلْخِيَاطِ ۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: 'Innal-lazeena kazzaboo bi-'Aayaatinaa wastakbaroo 'anhaa laa tufattahu lahum 'abwaabus-samaaa'i wa laa yadkhuloonal- jannata hattaa yalijal- jamalu fee sammil- khiyaat; wa kazaalika najzil-mujrimeen.
verses.translation: Beshak jin logon ne hamaari aayaton ko jhutlaaya aur unse takabbur kiya, unke liye aasmaan ke darwaaze nahin khole jaayenge aur na woh jannat mein daakhil honge yahaan tak ke ount suyi ke naake mein ghus jaaye aur hum mujrimon ko isi tarah badlah dete hain.

verses.arabic: لَهُم مِّن جَهَنَّمَ مِهَادٌۭ وَمِن فَوْقِهِمْ غَوَاشٍۢ ۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Lahum min jahannama mihaaduñw- wa min fawqihim ghawaash; wa kazaalika najziz-zaalimeen
verses.translation: Unke liye jahannam hi ka bichhauna hoga, aur unke oupar usi ka odhna hoga aur hum zaalimon ko isi tarah badlah dete hain.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ لَا نُكَلِّفُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَآ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْجَنَّةِ ۖ هُمْ فِيهَا خَـٰلِدُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena 'aamanoo wa 'amiluş-şaalihaati laa nukallifu nafsan 'illaa wus'ahaaa 'ulaaa'ika 'Ashaabul-jannati hum feehaa khaalidoon.
verses.translation: Aur jo log eemaan laaye aur unhon ne nek amal kiye to hum kisi shakhs ko uski himmat se ziyaadah takleef nahin dete, wahi log jannat waale hain, woh uss mein hameshah rahenge.

verses.arabic: وَنَزَعْنَا مَا فِى صُدُورِهِم مِّنْ غِلٍّۢ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهِمُ ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ ۖ وَقَالُوا۟ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِى هَدَىٰنَا لِهَـٰذَا وَمَا كُنَّا لِنَهْتَدِىَ لَوْلَآ أَنْ هَدَىٰنَا ٱللَّهُ ۖ لَقَدْ جَآءَتْ رُسُلُ رَبِّنَا بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ وَنُودُوٓا۟ أَن تِلْكُمُ ٱلْجَنَّةُ أُورِثْتُمُوهَا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa naza'naa maa fee sudoorihim min ghillin tajree min tahtihimul- 'anhaaru wa qaalul- hamdu lillaahil-lazee hadaanaa lihaaza wa maa kunnaa linahtadiya law laaa 'an hadaanal- laahu laqad jaaa'at Rusulu Rabbinaa bilhaqq; wa noodooo 'an tilkumul-jannatu 'ooristumoohaa bimaa kuntum ta'maloon.
verses.translation: Aur unke dilon mein jo keenah hoga woh hum nikaal phekenge, unke neeche nahrein bahti hongi, aur woh kahenge: sab ta'reef Allah hi ke liye hai jisne humein yeh seedhi raah dikhaayi aur agar yeh baat na hoti ke Allah ne humein hidaayt di to hum hargiz aise na the ke hidaayat paate, bilaal shubah hamaare rab ke Rasool haq lekar aaye the aur unhein aawaaz di jaayegi ke yeh hai woh jannat jis ke tum un a'amaal ke badle waaris banaaye gaye ho jo tum karte the.

verses.arabic: وَنَادَىٰٓ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْجَنَّةِ أَصْحَـٰبَ ٱلنَّارِ أَنْ قَدْ وَجَدْنَا مَا وَعَدَنَا رَبُّنَا حَقًّۭا فَهَلْ وَجَدتُّم مَّا وَعَدَ رَبُّكُمْ حَقًّۭا ۖ قَالُوا۟ نَعَمْ ۚ فَأَذَّنَ مُؤَذِّنٌۭ بَيْنَهُمْ أَن لَّعْنَةُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَى ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa naadaaa 'Ashaabul-jannati 'ashaaban-Naari 'an qad wajadnaa maa wa'adanaa Rabbunaa haqqan fahal wajattummaa wa'ada Rabbukum haqqan qaaloo na'am; fa'azzana mu'azzinum baynahum 'al-la'natul-laahi 'alaz- zaalimeen.
verses.translation: Aur jannat waale dozakh waalon se pukaar kar kahenge ke beshak hamaare rab ne hum se wa'dah kiya tha woh humse sachcha paaya to kiya tum ne bhi woh wa'dah sachcha paaya jo tumhaare rab ne tumse kiya tha? woh (dozakhi) kahenge: haan: phir ek e'laan karne waala un mein e'laan karega ke zaalimon par Allah ki la'nat hai.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَصُدُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَيَبْغُونَهَا عِوَجًۭا وَهُم بِٱلْءَاخِرَةِ كَـٰفِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Allazeena yaşuddoona 'an sabeelil- laahi wa yabghoonahaa 'iwajan wa hum bil- 'Aakhirati kaafiroon
verses.translation: Woh log jo Allah ki raah se rokte the aur uss mein tedh dhoondte the aur woh aakhirat ka inkaar karne waale the.

verses.arabic: وَبَيْنَهُمَا حِجَابٌۭ ۚ وَعَلَى ٱلْأَعْرَافِ رِجَالٌۭ يَعْرِفُونَ كُلًّۭا بِسِيمَىٰهُمْ ۚ وَنَادَوْا۟ أَصْحَـٰبَ ٱلْجَنَّةِ أَن سَلَـٰمٌ عَلَيْكُمْ ۚ لَمْ يَدْخُلُوهَا وَهُمْ يَطْمَعُونَ
verses.transliteration: 4Wa baynahumaa hijaab; wa 'alal-'A'raafi rijaaluñy-ya'rifoona kullam biseemaahum; wa naadaw 'Ashaabal- jannati 'an salaamun 'alaykum; lam yadkhuloohaa wa hum yatma'oon.
verses.translation: Aur un donon (ke darmiyaan pardah hoga aur A'raaf¹ par kuchh log honge jo har ek (jannati-o- dozakhi) ko unki khaas a'laamaton se pahchaante honge aur woh jannatiyon ko pukaar kar kahenge ke tum par salaam ho, A'raaf waale (bhi) jannat mein daakhil na huye honge jabke woh uski ummeed rakhte honge.
verses.deepMeaning: (Al-a'araaf) kaha jaata hai ke yeh jannat aur dozakh ke darmiyaan ek jagah ka naam hai tafseel ke liye mulaahazah keejiye: (Tafseer Qurtubi:7/211)

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا صُرِفَتْ أَبْصَـٰرُهُمْ تِلْقَآءَ أَصْحَـٰبِ ٱلنَّارِ قَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا لَا تَجْعَلْنَا مَعَ ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'izaa şurifat 'abşaaruhum tilqaaa'a 'Ashaabin-Naari qaaloo Rabbanaa laa taj'alnaa ma'al-qawmiz-zaalimeen.
verses.translation: Aur jab unki aankhein dozakhiyon ki taraf pheri jaayengi to kahenge: aye hamaare rab! tu hamen zaalim logon ke saath na kar.

verses.arabic: وَنَادَىٰٓ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْأَعْرَافِ رِجَالًۭا يَعْرِفُونَهُم بِسِيمَىٰهُمْ قَالُوا۟ مَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنكُمْ جَمْعُكُمْ وَمَا كُنتُمْ تَسْتَكْبِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa naadaaa 'Ashaabul-'A'raafi rijaalany-ya'rifoonahum biseemaahum qaaloo maaa 'aghnaa 'ankum jam'ukum wa maa kuntum tastakbiroon.
verses.translation: Aur A'araaf waale kuchh aise logon ko pukaarenge jinhen woh unki khaas alaamaton se pahchaante honge woh kahenge ke tumhein tumhaare giroh ne koyi faaidah nahin diya aur na uss takabbur ne (faaidah diya) jo tum karte the.

verses.arabic: أَهَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ ٱلَّذِينَ أَقْسَمْتُمْ لَا يَنَالُهُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِرَحْمَةٍ ۚ ٱدْخُلُوا۟ ٱلْجَنَّةَ لَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْكُمْ وَلَآ أَنتُمْ تَحْزَنُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'A haaa'ulaaa'il- lazeena 'aqsamtum laa yanaaluhumul-laahu birahmah; 'udkhulul- Jannata laa khawfun 'alaykum wa laaa 'antum tahzanoon.
verses.translation: Kiya yahi woh log hain jinke baare mein tum qasmein khaate the ke Allah un par rahmat nahin karega (unse kah diya gaya ke) tum jannat mein daakhil hojaao, tum par koyi khauf nahin aur na tum ghamgeen hoge.

verses.arabic: وَنَادَىٰٓ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ أَصْحَـٰبَ ٱلْجَنَّةِ أَنْ أَفِيضُوا۟ عَلَيْنَا مِنَ ٱلْمَآءِ أَوْ مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ ۚ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ حَرَّمَهُمَا عَلَى ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa naadaaa 'Ashaabun-Naari Ashaabal-jannati'an 'afeedoo 'alaynaa minal- maaa'i 'aw mimmaa razaqakumul-laah; qaalooo 'innal-laaha harramahumaa 'alal- kaafireen.
verses.translation: Aur dozakh waale jannat waalon ko pukaar kar kahenge ke tum kuchh paani hum par undel do ya uss rizq mein se, jo Allah ne tumhein diya hai, kuchh humein ataa kardo jannati kahenge: beshak Allah ne yeh donon cheezein kaafrion par haraam kardi hain.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ دِينَهُمْ لَهْوًۭا وَلَعِبًۭا وَغَرَّتْهُمُ ٱلْحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنْيَا ۚ فَٱلْيَوْمَ نَنسَىٰهُمْ كَمَا نَسُوا۟ لِقَآءَ يَوْمِهِمْ هَـٰذَا وَمَا كَانُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا يَجْحَدُونَ
verses.transliteration: Allazeenat-takhazoo deenahum lahwanw-wa laʻibanw-wa gharrathumul-hayaatud- dunyaa; fal-Yawma nansaahum kamaa nasoo liqaaa'a Yawmihim haazaa wa maa kaanoo bi-'Aayaatinaa yajhadoon.
verses.translation: Woh log jinhon ne apne deen ko khel tamaasha bana liya aur unhein dunya ki zindagi ne dhoke mein daale rakkha, chunaancheh aaj hum unhein usi tarah bhula denge jis tarah unhon ne apni iss din ki mulaqaat ko bhula diya tha aur jaise ke woh hamaari aayaton ka inkaar karte the.

verses.arabic: لَقَدْ جِئْنَـٰهُم بِكِتَـٰبٍۢ فَصَّلْنَـٰهُ عَلَىٰ عِلْمٍ هُدًۭى وَرَحْمَةًۭ لِّقَوْمٍۢ يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad ji'naahum bi-Kitaabin faşşalnaahu 'alaa 'ilmin hudañw-wa rahmatal-liqawminy- yu'minoon.
verses.translation: Aur hum unke paas aisi kitab laaye hain jise humne apne ilm se tafseel ke saath bayaan kiya hai jabke won un logon ke liye hidaayat aur rahmat hai jo eemaan laate hain.

verses.arabic: هَلْ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا تَأْوِيلَهُۥ ۚ يَوْمَ يَأْتِى تَأْوِيلُهُۥ يَقُولُ ٱلَّذِينَ نَسُوهُ مِن قَبْلُ قَدْ جَآءَتْ رُسُلُ رَبِّنَا بِٱلْحَقِّ فَهَل لَّنَا مِن شُفَعَآءَ فَيَشْفَعُوا۟ لَنَآ أَوْ نُرَدُّ فَنَعْمَلَ غَيْرَ ٱلَّذِى كُنَّا نَعْمَلُ ۚ قَدْ خَسِرُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ وَضَلَّ عَنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَفْتَرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Hal yanzuroona 'illaa ta'weelah; yawma ya'tee ta'weeluhoo yaqoolul- lazeena nasoohu min qablu qad jaaa'at Rusulu Rabbinaa bilhaqq; fahal- lanaa min shufa'aaa'a fayashfa'oo lanaaa 'aw nuraddu fana'mala ghayral-lazee kunnaa na'mal; qad khasirooo 'anfusahum wa dalla 'anhum maa kaanoo yaftaroon.
verses.translation: Un logon ko aur kisi baat ka intezaar nahin sirf uske anjaam (qiyaamat) ka intezaar hai jis din uska anjaam saamne aayega to woh log jo isse pahle iss din ko bhoole huye the kahenge ke waaqay'i hamaare rab ke rasool haq le kar aaye the, to kiya hamaare liye koyi sifaarshi hain ke woh hamaare haq mein sifaarish karen? ya humein duniya mein lautaa diya jaaye to hum un a'maal se hat kar amal karenge jo hum (pahle) kiya karte the, beshak unhon ne apbne aapko khasaare mein daala aur woh saari baaten hawa ho gayin jo woh gadhte rahte the

verses.arabic: إِنَّ رَبَّكُمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ فِى سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍۢ ثُمَّ ٱسْتَوَىٰ عَلَى ٱلْعَرْشِ ۖ يُغْشِى ٱلَّيْلَ ٱلنَّهَارَ يَطْلُبُهُۥ حَثِيثًۭا وَٱلشَّمْسَ وَٱلْقَمَرَ وَٱلنُّجُومَ مُسَخَّرَٰتٍۢ بِأَمْرِهِۦٓ ۗ أَلَا لَهُ ٱلْخَلْقُ وَٱلْأَمْرُ ۗ تَبَارَكَ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.transliteration: 'Inna Rabbakumul- laahul-lazee khalaqas- samaawaati wal-'arda fee sittati 'ayyaamin summas-tawaa 'alal- 'arshi yughshil-laylan- nahaara yatlubuhoo haseesanw- washshamsa walqamara wannujooma musakhkharaatim bi'amrih; 'alaa lahul- khalqu wal'amr; tabaarakal-laahu Rabbul-'aalameen.
verses.translation: Beshak tumhaara rab woh Allah hai jisne aasmaanon aur zameenon ko sirf 6 dinon mein paida kiya phir woh arsh par mustawi ho gaya. woh din ko raat se iss tarah dhaanpta hai ke woh (raat) jaldi se use (din ko) aa leti hai aur usne sooraj, chaand aur taare iss tarah paida kiye ke woh sab uss (Allah) ke hukm ke paaband kar diye gaye hain. aagaah raho! paida karna hukm saadir karna usi ke liye rawaa hai, Allah Rabbul 'Aalameen bahut baa barkat hai.

verses.arabic: ٱدْعُوا۟ رَبَّكُمْ تَضَرُّعًۭا وَخُفْيَةً ۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلْمُعْتَدِينَ
verses.transliteration: 'Ud'oo Rabbakum tadarru'anw-wa khufyah; 'innahoo laa yuhibbul-mu'tadeen.
verses.translation: Tum apne rab ko aah-o- zaari karte huye aur chupke chupke pukaaro, beshak woh had se guzarne waalon ko pasand nahin karta.

verses.arabic: وَلَا تُفْسِدُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ بَعْدَ إِصْلَـٰحِهَا وَٱدْعُوهُ خَوْفًۭا وَطَمَعًا ۚ إِنَّ رَحْمَتَ ٱللَّهِ قَرِيبٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laa tufsidoo fil- 'ardi ba'da 'islaahihaa wad'oohu khawfanw-wa tama'aa; 'inna rahmatal- laahi qareebum-minal- muhsineen.
verses.translation: Aur zameen ki islaah ke ba'd tum uss mein fasaad na karo aur Allah ko khauf se aur tama' karte huye pukaaro, beshak Allah ki rahmat ehsaan karne waalon ke qareeb hai.

verses.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى يُرْسِلُ ٱلرِّيَـٰحَ بُشْرَۢا بَيْنَ يَدَىْ رَحْمَتِهِۦ ۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَقَلَّتْ سَحَابًۭا ثِقَالًا سُقْنَـٰهُ لِبَلَدٍۢ مَّيِّتٍۢ فَأَنزَلْنَا بِهِ ٱلْمَآءَ فَأَخْرَجْنَا بِهِۦ مِن كُلِّ ٱلثَّمَرَٰتِ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نُخْرِجُ ٱلْمَوْتَىٰ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa Huwal-lazee yursilur-riyaaha bushram bayna yaday rahmatihee hattaaa 'izaaa 'aqallat sahaaban siqaalan suqnaahu libaladim-mayyitin fa'anzalnaa bihil- maaa'a fa'akhrajnaa bihee min kullis- samaraat; kazaalika nukhrijul-mawtaa laʻallakum tazakkaroon.
verses.translation: Aur wahi to hai jo apni rahmat (meena) se pahle khush khabri dene waali hawaayein bhejta hai hattaa ke jab woh (hawaayein) bhaari baadalon ko uthhaati hain to hum unhein kisi murdah shahar ki taraf haank dete hain, phir hum unke zariye se paani naazil karte hain, phir hum uske zariye se zameen se har tarah ke phal nikaalte hain, isi tarah hum murdon ko qabron se nikaalenge taake tum naseehat haasil karo.

verses.arabic: وَٱلْبَلَدُ ٱلطَّيِّبُ يَخْرُجُ نَبَاتُهُۥ بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِۦ ۖ وَٱلَّذِى خَبُثَ لَا يَخْرُجُ إِلَّا نَكِدًۭا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نُصَرِّفُ ٱلْءَايَـٰتِ لِقَوْمٍۢ يَشْكُرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Walbaladut-tayyibu yakhruju nabaatuhoo bi'izni Rabbihee wallazee khabusa laa yakhruju 'illaa nakidaa; kazaalika nuşarriful-'Aayaati liqawminy- yashkuroon.
verses.translation: Aur jo suthri zameen hoti hai uski paidawaar apne rab ke hukm se (khoob) nikalti hai aur jo kharaab hoti hai uski paidawaar naaqis hi nikalti hai. isi tarah hum apni aayaat ko un logon ke liye pher pher kar bayaan karte hain jo shukr karte hain.

verses.arabic: لَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦ فَقَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنْ إِلَـٰهٍ غَيْرُهُۥٓ ۖ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيْكُمْ عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍۢ
verses.transliteration: Laqad 'arsalnaa Noohan 'ilaa qawmihee faqaala yaa qawmi'- budul-laaha maa lakum min 'ilaahin ghayruhoo 'inneee 'akhaafu 'alaykum 'azaaba Yawmin 'Azeem.
verses.translation: Humne Nooh ko uski qaum ki taraf bheja, chunaancheh usne kaha: aye meri qaum: tum Allah ki ibaadat karo, uske siwa tumhaare liye koyi ma'bood nahin, beshak main tum par bahut bade din ka azaab aane se darta hoon.

verses.arabic: قَالَ ٱلْمَلَأُ مِن قَوْمِهِۦٓ إِنَّا لَنَرَىٰكَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍۢ مُّبِينٍۢ
verses.transliteration: Qaalal-mala'u min qawmiheee 'innaa lanaraaka fee dalaalim- mubeen.
verses.translation: Uski qaum mein se ba'z sardaaron ne kaha: beshak hum to tujhe khuli gumraahi mein dekhte hain.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Shirk iss tarah insaani aql ko khatm kar deta hai ke insaan ko hidaayat, gumraahi aur gumraahi, hidaayat nazar aati hai. chunaancheh qaum-e-Nooh ki bhi yahi qalb-e-maahiyat huyi, unko Nooh عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام in Allah ki tauheed ki taraf apni qaum ko da'wat de rahe the, na'oozubillah gumraah nazar aate the

verses.arabic: قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ لَيْسَ بِى ضَلَـٰلَةٌ وَلَـٰكِنِّى رَسُولٌۭ مِّن رَّبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala yaa qawmi laysa bee dalaalatuñw- wa laakinnee Rasoolum- mir-Rabbil-'aalameen.
verses.translation: Nooh ne kaha: aye meri qaum: main gumraah nahin hoon balke main to sab jahaanon ke rab ki taraf se rasool hoon.

verses.arabic: أُبَلِّغُكُمْ رِسَـٰلَـٰتِ رَبِّى وَأَنصَحُ لَكُمْ وَأَعْلَمُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Uballighukum Risaalaati Rabbee wa 'anşahu lakum wa 'a'lamu minal-laahi maa laa ta'lamoon.
verses.translation: Main tumhein apne rab ke paighaamaat pahunchaata hoon aur tumhaari khair khaahi karta hoon aur main Allah ki taraf se woh baaten jaanta hoon jo tum nahin jaante.

verses.arabic: أَوَعَجِبْتُمْ أَن جَآءَكُمْ ذِكْرٌۭ مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ عَلَىٰ رَجُلٍۢ مِّنكُمْ لِيُنذِرَكُمْ وَلِتَتَّقُوا۟ وَلَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Awa 'ajibtum 'an jaaa'akum zikrum-mir- Rabbikum 'alaa rajulim- minkum liyunzirakum wa litattaqoo wa la'allakum turhamoon.
verses.translation: Kiya tum iss baat par ta'ajjub karte ho ke tumhaare paas tumhaare rab ki taraf se ek aise aadmi ke zariye se naseehat aagayi jo tum mein se hai? taake woh tumhein daraaye aur taake tum dar jaao aur taake tum par raham kiva jaaye.

verses.arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَنجَيْنَـٰهُ وَٱلَّذِينَ مَعَهُۥ فِى ٱلْفُلْكِ وَأَغْرَقْنَا ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَآ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَوْمًا عَمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Fakazzaboohu fa'anjaynaahu wallazeena ma'ahoo fil- fulki wa 'aghraqnal- lazeena kazzaboo bi- 'Aayaatinaa; 'innahum kaanoo qawman 'ameen
verses.translation: Phir unhon ne Nooh ko jhut laaya to humne use aur un logon ko jo uske saath (eemaan laane waale) the kashti mein bacha liya aur humne un logon ko gharq kar diya jo hamaari aayaton ko jhutlaate the, beshak woh log (dil ke) andhe th.

verses.arabic: وَإِلَىٰ عَادٍ أَخَاهُمْ هُودًۭا ۚ قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنْ إِلَـٰهٍ غَيْرُهُۥٓ ۚ أَفَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'ilaa 'Aadin 'akhaahum Hoodaa; qaala yaaqawmi'-budul- laaha maa lakum min 'ilaahin ghayruh; 'afalaa tattaqoon.
verses.translation: Aur humne qaum-e-Aad ki taraf unke bhaai Hood ko bhėja, usne kaha: aye meri qaum! tum Allah ki ibaadat karo, uske siwa tumhaare liye ma'bood nahin, kiya phir tum darte nahin?.

verses.arabic: قَالَ ٱلْمَلَأُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِن قَوْمِهِۦٓ إِنَّا لَنَرَىٰكَ فِى سَفَاهَةٍۢ وَإِنَّا لَنَظُنُّكَ مِنَ ٱلْكَـٰذِبِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaalal-mala'ul- lazeena kafaroo min qawmiheee 'innaa lanaraaka fee safaahatinw-wa 'innaa lanazunnuka minal- kaazibeen.
verses.translation: Uski qaum mein se kaafir chaudhri kahne lage: beshak hum tujhe be waqoofi mein pada dekhte hain aur beshak hum tujhe jhooton mein shumaar karte hain.

verses.arabic: قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ لَيْسَ بِى سَفَاهَةٌ وَلَـٰكِنِّى رَسُولٌۭ مِّن رَّبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala yaa qawmi laysa bee safaahatuñw- wa laakinnee Rasoolum- mir-Rabbil-'aalameen.
verses.translation: Hood ne kaha: aye meri qaum: main be waqoof nahin hoon balke main to sab jahaanon ke rab ki taraf se rasool hoon.

verses.arabic: أُبَلِّغُكُمْ رِسَـٰلَـٰتِ رَبِّى وَأَنَا۠ لَكُمْ نَاصِحٌ أَمِينٌ
verses.transliteration: Uballighukum Risaalaati Rabbee wa 'ana lakum naaşihun 'ameen.
verses.translation: Main apne rab ke paighamaat tumhen pahunchaata hoon aur main tumhaara khair khaah aur ameen hoon.

verses.arabic: أَوَعَجِبْتُمْ أَن جَآءَكُمْ ذِكْرٌۭ مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ عَلَىٰ رَجُلٍۢ مِّنكُمْ لِيُنذِرَكُمْ ۚ وَٱذْكُرُوٓا۟ إِذْ جَعَلَكُمْ خُلَفَآءَ مِنۢ بَعْدِ قَوْمِ نُوحٍۢ وَزَادَكُمْ فِى ٱلْخَلْقِ بَصْطَةًۭ ۖ فَٱذْكُرُوٓا۟ ءَالَآءَ ٱللَّهِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُفْلِحُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Awa 'ajibtum 'an jaaa'akum zikrum-mir- Rabbikum 'alaa rajulim- minkum liyunzirakum; wazkurooo 'iz ja'alakum khulafaaa'a mim ba'di qawmi Noohinw-wa zaadakum fil-khalqi baştatan fazkurooo 'aalaaa'al-laahi la'allakum tuflihoon.
verses.translation: Kiya tum iss baat par ta'ajjub karte ho ke tumhaare rab ki taraf se tumhaare paas ek aise aadmi ke zariye se naseehat aayi hai jo tumhi mein se hai taake woh tumhen daraaye aur yaad karo! jab usne qaum-e-Nooh ke ba'd tumhein zameen mein ek doosre ka jaanasheen banaaya aur tumhen qad-o- qaamat mein badhotari di, lehaaza tum Allah ki ne'matein yaad karo taake tum falaah paao.

verses.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ أَجِئْتَنَا لِنَعْبُدَ ٱللَّهَ وَحْدَهُۥ وَنَذَرَ مَا كَانَ يَعْبُدُ ءَابَآؤُنَا فَأْتِنَا بِمَا تَعِدُنَآ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaalooo 'aji'tanaa lina'budal-laaha wahdahoo wa nazara maa kaana ya'budu 'aabaaa'unaa fa'tinaa bimaa ta'idunaaa 'in kunta minaş-şaadiqeen.
verses.translation: Unhon ne kaha: kiya tu hamaare paas iss liye aaya hai ke hum ek akele Allah ki 'ibaadat karein aur unhein chhod dein jinki hamaare baap ibaadat karte the?¹ chunaancheh agar tu sachchon mein se hai to hum par (azaab) le aa jisse tu humein daraata hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Aabaa-o-ajdaad ki taqleed, har daur mein gumraahi ki bunyaad rahi hai. qaum-e-aad ne bhi yahi 'daleel' pesh ki aur shirk ko chhod kar tauheed ka raastah ikhtiyaar karne par aamaadah nahin huye. Badqismati se musalmaanon mein bhi apne badon ki taqleed ki yeh bimaari aam hai unka ek tabqah to woh hai jo deen ka kuchh shu'oor rakhta hai aur deeni u'loom mein bhi use ek had tak dastars haasil hai lekin usne apne aap ko kisi na kisi khaas fiqh aur muta'ayyan imam ki raaye ka paaband kar rakkha hai aur uss 'Taqleed' ko apne taur par wajoob ka darjah diya huwa hai, haalaanke sire se yeh hukm sharay'i hi nahin cheh jaayeke yeh waajib ho. Iss taqleed ne un muqallideen ko kayi sunnaton par amal karne se rok rakkha hai kyun ke woh sunnatein unki fiaqh mein darj nahin hain ya unke Imam ne unhein koyi ahmiyat nahin di. Ek doosra tabqah woh hai jo deeni shu'oor aur deeni uloom se hi be bahrah hai, uska to mazhab hi rasm-o-rewaaj parasti hai chunaancheh yeh tabqah shaadi ho ya marg, har moqa par jaahilaana rasmon ki paa bandi karta hai aur bid'aat par amal karne ko faraayez-o-sunan se bhi ziyaadah ahmiyat deta hai. unke haan faraayez ka tark aam hai lekin bid'aat wa rasoomaat ki paabandi ka ghaayat darjah ehtemaam. 'daleel' unki bhi yehi hai ke yeh kaam hamaare 'bade' karte aaye hain. يَعْقِلُونَ شَيْئًا وَلَا يَهْتَدُونَ أَوَ لَوْ كَانَ آبَاؤُهُمْ لَ (12/170 : Surah Baqarah)

verses.arabic: قَالَ قَدْ وَقَعَ عَلَيْكُم مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ رِجْسٌۭ وَغَضَبٌ ۖ أَتُجَٰدِلُونَنِى فِىٓ أَسْمَآءٍۢ سَمَّيْتُمُوهَآ أَنتُمْ وَءَابَآؤُكُم مَّا نَزَّلَ ٱللَّهُ بِهَا مِن سُلْطَـٰنٍۢ ۚ فَٱنتَظِرُوٓا۟ إِنِّى مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْمُنتَظِرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala qad waqa'a 'alaykum-mir-Rabbikum rijsunw-wa ghadab, 'atujaadiloonanee feee 'asmaaa'in sammaytumoohaaa 'antum wa 'aabaaa'ukum maa nazzalal-laahu bihaa min sultaan; fantazirooo 'innee ma'akum minal- muntazireen.
verses.translation: Hood ne kaha: tumhaare rab ki taraf se tum par azaab aur ghazab naazil huwa hi chaahta hai, kiya tum mujhse un naamon ke baare mein jhagadte ho jo tumne aur tumhaare Abaa- o-ajdaad ne rakh liye hain, Allah ne unki koyi daleel naazil nahin farmayi? chunaancheh tum intezaar karo, beshak main bhi tumhaare saath intezaar karne waalon mein hoon.

verses.arabic: فَأَنجَيْنَـٰهُ وَٱلَّذِينَ مَعَهُۥ بِرَحْمَةٍۢ مِّنَّا وَقَطَعْنَا دَابِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا ۖ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ مُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.transliteration: Fa'anjaynaahu wallazeena ma'ahoo birahmatim-minnaa wa qata'naa daabiral- lazeena kazzaboo bi- 'Aayaatinaa wa maa kaanoo mu'mineen.
verses.translation: Phir humne Hood ko aur un logon ko jo uske humraah the, apni rahmat ke saath najaat di aur humne un logon ki jad kaat di jinhon ne hamaari aayaat ko jhutlaaya aur woh eemaan laane waale na the.

verses.arabic: وَإِلَىٰ ثَمُودَ أَخَاهُمْ صَـٰلِحً۬ا ۚ قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنْ إِلَـٰهٍ غَيْرُهُۥ ۖ قَدْ جَآءَتْكُم بَيِّنَةٌۭ مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ ۖ هَـٰذِهِۦ نَاقَةُ ٱللَّهِ لَكُمْ ءَايَةًۭ فَذَرُوهَا تَأْكُلْ فِىٓ أَرْضِ ٱللَّهِ وَلَا تَمَسُّوهَا بِسُوٓءٍۢ فَيَأْخُذَكُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'ilaa Samooda 'akhaahum Şaalihaa; qaala yaa qawmi'-budul- laaha maa lakum min 'ilaahin ghayruhoo qad jaaa'atkum bayyinatum- mir-Rabbikum haazihee naaqatul-laahi lakum 'Aayatan fazaroohaa ta'kul feee 'ardil-laahi wa laa tamassoohaa bisooo'in faya'khuzakum 'azaabun 'aleem.
verses.translation: Aur humne (Qaum) Samood ki taraf unke bhaai Saaleh ko bheja, Saaleh ne kaha: aye meri qaum! tum Allah ki i'baadat karo, uske siwa tumhaare liye koyi ma'bood nahin, tahqeeq tumhaare paas tumhaare rab ki taraf se waazeh daleel aa gayi hai, yeh Allah ki ountni hai jo tumhaare liye khaas nishaani hai, chunaancheh tum ise chhod do ke Allah ki zameen mein charti phire aur ise buraayi ke saath haath bhi na lagaana warna tumhen bahut dardnaak azaab pakad lega.

verses.arabic: وَٱذْكُرُوٓا۟ إِذْ جَعَلَكُمْ خُلَفَآءَ مِنۢ بَعْدِ عَادٍۢ وَبَوَّأَكُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ تَتَّخِذُونَ مِن سُهُولِهَا قُصُورًۭا وَتَنْحِتُونَ ٱلْجِبَالَ بُيُوتًۭا ۖ فَٱذْكُرُوٓا۟ ءَالَآءَ ٱللَّهِ وَلَا تَعْثَوْا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ مُفْسِدِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wazkurooo 'iz ja'alakum khulafaaa'a mim ba'di 'Aadiñw-wa bawwa'akum fil-'ardi tattakhizoona min suhoolihaa quşoorañw- wa tanhitoonal-jibaala buyootan fazkurooo 'aalaaa'al-laahi wa laa ta'saw fil-'ardi mufsideen.
verses.translation: Aur yaad karo! jab usne tumhein Qaum-e- Aad ke ba'd ek doosre ka jaanasheen banaaya aur tumhein zameen mein thhekaana diya, tum uski narm mitti se mahallaat banaate ho aur pahaadon se ghar taraasthe ho, chunaancheh tum Allah ki ne'matein yaad karo aur zameen mein fasaadi ban kar mat phiro.

verses.arabic: قَالَ ٱلْمَلَأُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ مِن قَوْمِهِۦ لِلَّذِينَ ٱسْتُضْعِفُوا۟ لِمَنْ ءَامَنَ مِنْهُمْ أَتَعْلَمُونَ أَنَّ صَـٰلِحًۭا مُّرْسَلٌۭ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦ ۚ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا بِمَآ أُرْسِلَ بِهِۦ مُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qaalal-mala'ul- lazeenas-takbaroo min qawmihee lillazeenas- tud'ifoo liman 'aamana minhum 'ataʻlamoona 'anna Şaaliham- mursalum-mir-Rabbih; qaalooo 'innaa bimaaa 'ursila bihee mu'minoon.
verses.translation: Uski qaum ke wadere (zameendaar) jinhon takabbur kiya, ne kamzor samjhe jaane waale eemaandaaron se kahne lage: kiya tum yeh baat jaante ho ke waaqayi' Saaleh apne rab ki taraf se bheja huwa hai? unhon ne kaha: (haan) bila shubah hum uss cheez par eemaan laane waale hain jiske saath use bheja gaya hai.

verses.arabic: قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسْتَكْبَرُوٓا۟ إِنَّا بِٱلَّذِىٓ ءَامَنتُم بِهِۦ كَـٰفِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qaalal-lazeenas- takbarooo 'innaa billazeee 'aamantum bihee kaafiroon.
verses.translation: Un logon ne kaha jinhon ne takabbur kiya: be shak hum uss cheez ka inkaar karne waale hain jis par tum eemaan laaye ho.

verses.arabic: فَعَقَرُوا۟ ٱلنَّاقَةَ وَعَتَوْا۟ عَنْ أَمْرِ رَبِّهِمْ وَقَالُوا۟ يَـٰصَـٰلِحُ ٱئْتِنَا بِمَا تَعِدُنَآ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.transliteration: Faʻaqarun-naaqata wa 'ataw 'an 'amri Rabbihim wa qaaloo yaa Saalihu-tinaa bimaa ta'idunaaa 'in kunta minal-mursaleen.
verses.translation: hunaancheh unhon ne ountni ki taangein kaat daalin aur unhon ne apne rab ke hukm se sarkashi ki aur kaha: aye Saaleh! agar tu Rasoolon mein se hai to hum par woh (azaab) le aa jisse tu humein daraata rahta hai.

verses.arabic: فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ ٱلرَّجْفَةُ فَأَصْبَحُوا۟ فِى دَارِهِمْ جَـٰثِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Fa'akhazathumur- rajfatu fa'aşbahoo fee daarihim jaasimeen.
verses.translation: Phir unhein zalzale ne aa liya, chunaancheh woh apne gharon mein (Murdah) ghutnon ke bal gir pade the.

verses.arabic: فَتَوَلَّىٰ عَنْهُمْ وَقَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ لَقَدْ أَبْلَغْتُكُمْ رِسَالَةَ رَبِّى وَنَصَحْتُ لَكُمْ وَلَـٰكِن لَّا تُحِبُّونَ ٱلنَّـٰصِحِينَ
verses.transliteration: Fatawallaa 'anhum wa qaala yaa qawmi laqad 'ablaghtukum Risaalata Rabbee wa naşahtu lakum wa laakil-laa tuhibboonan- naaşiheen
verses.translation: Tab Saaleh ne unse munh phera aur kaha: aye meri qaum! beshak main ne tumhein apne rab ka paighaam pahuncha diya tha aur main ne tumhen naseehat ki thi lekin tum naseehat karne waalon ko pasand nahin karte.

verses.arabic: وَلُوطًا إِذْ قَالَ لِقَوْمِهِۦٓ أَتَأْتُونَ ٱلْفَـٰحِشَةَ مَا سَبَقَكُم بِهَا مِنْ أَحَدٍۢ مِّنَ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa Lootan 'iz qaala liqawmiheee 'ata'toonal- faahishata maa sabaqakum bihaa min 'ahadim-minal- 'aalameen.
verses.translation: Aur Loot ko bheja jab usne apni Qaum se kaha: kiya tum aisi behayaayi karte ho jo tum se pahle dunya waalon mein se kisi ne bhi nahin ki?

verses.arabic: إِنَّكُمْ لَتَأْتُونَ ٱلرِّجَالَ شَهْوَةًۭ مِّن دُونِ ٱلنِّسَآءِ ۚ بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌۭ مُّسْرِفُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Innakum lata'toonar- rijaala shahwatam-min doonin-nisaaa'; bal 'antum qawmum-musrifoon.
verses.translation: Beshak tum jinsi khaahish poori karne ke liye auraton ko chhod kar mardon ke paas aate ho, balke tum log had se badh jaane waale ho.

verses.arabic: وَمَا كَانَ جَوَابَ قَوْمِهِۦٓ إِلَّآ أَن قَالُوٓا۟ أَخْرِجُوهُم مِّن قَرْيَتِكُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ أُنَاسٌۭ يَتَطَهَّرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maa kaana jawaaba qawmiheee 'illaaa 'an qaalooo 'akhrijoohum min qaryatikum 'innahum 'unaasuñy-yatatahharoon
verses.translation: Aur uski qaum ka jawaab bas yahi tha ke unhon ne kaha: inhein apni basti se nikaal do, beshak yeh log bade paak saaf bante hain.

verses.arabic: فَأَنجَيْنَـٰهُ وَأَهْلَهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱمْرَأَتَهُۥ كَانَتْ مِنَ ٱلْغَـٰبِرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Fa'anjaynaahu wa 'ahlahooo 'illam- ra'atahoo kaanat minal- ghaabireen.
verses.translation: Phir humne use aur uske ghar waalon ko najaat di siwaaye uski beewi ke, woh peechhe rahne (halaak hone) waalon mein shaamil ho gayi.

verses.arabic: وَأَمْطَرْنَا عَلَيْهِم مَّطَرًۭا ۖ فَٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'amtarnaa 'alayhim mataran fanzur kayfa kaana 'aaqibatul- mujrimeen.
verses.translation: Aur humne un par pattharon ki baarish barsaayi, chunaancheh dekh leejiye mujrimon ka anjaam kaisa huwa?

verses.arabic: وَإِلَىٰ مَدْيَنَ أَخَاهُمْ شُعَيْبً۬ا ۚ قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنْ إِلَـٰهٍ غَيْرُهُۥ ۖ قَدْ جَآءَتْكُم بَيِّنَةٌۭ مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ ۖ فَأَوْفُوا۟ ٱلْكَيْلَ وَٱلْمِيزَانَ وَلَا تَبْخَسُوا۟ ٱلنَّاسَ أَشْيَآءَهُمْ وَلَا تُفْسِدُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ بَعْدَ إِصْلَـٰحِهَا ۚ ذَٰلِكُمْ خَيْرٌۭ لَّكُمْ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'ilaa Madyana 'akhaahum Shu'aybaa; qaala yaa qawmi'-budul- laaha maa lakum min 'ilaahin ghayruhoo qad jaaa'atkum bayyinatum- mir-Rabbikum fa'awful- kayla walmeezaana wa laa tabkhasun-naasa 'ashyaaa'ahum wa laa tufsidoo fil-'ardi ba'da 'işlaahihaa; zaalikum khayrul-lakum 'in kuntum mu'mineen
verses.translation: Aur humne ahle Madyan ki taraf unke bhaai Shuaib ko bheja, usne kaha: aye meri qaum! tum Allah ki i'baadat karo, uske siwa tumhaare liye koyi ma'bood nahin, tumhaare paas tumhaare rab ki taraf se waazeh daleel aa gayi hai. lehaaza tum naap aur taul ko pura karo aur logon ko unki cheezen kam karke mat do aur tum zameen ki islaah ke ba'd uss mein fasaad na karo, yeh tumhaare liye behtar hai agar tum momin ho.

verses.arabic: وَلَا تَقْعُدُوا۟ بِكُلِّ صِرَٰطٍۢ تُوعِدُونَ وَتَصُدُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ مَنْ ءَامَنَ بِهِۦ وَتَبْغُونَهَا عِوَجًۭا ۚ وَٱذْكُرُوٓا۟ إِذْ كُنتُمْ قَلِيلًۭا فَكَثَّرَكُمْ ۖ وَٱنظُرُوا۟ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلْمُفْسِدِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laa taqʻudoo bikulli şiraatin too idoona wa taşuddoona 'an sabeelil-laahi man 'aamana bihee wa tabghoonahaa 'iwajaa; wazkurooo 'iz kuntum qaleelan fakassarakum wanzuroo kayfa kaana 'aaqibatul-mufsideen.
verses.translation: Aur tum har ek raaste par mat baithho, tum uss shakhs ko daraate aur Allah ke raaste se rokte ho jo uss par eemaan le aaye aur tum uss raah mein tedh talaash karte ho, aur yaad karo jab tum thode the phir usne tumhein ziyaadah kar diya aur dekho! fasaadiyon ka anjaam kaisa huwa tha.?

verses.arabic: وَإِن كَانَ طَآئِفَةٌۭ مِّنكُمْ ءَامَنُوا۟ بِٱلَّذِىٓ أُرْسِلْتُ بِهِۦ وَطَآئِفَةٌۭ لَّمْ يُؤْمِنُوا۟ فَٱصْبِرُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ يَحْكُمَ ٱللَّهُ بَيْنَنَا ۚ وَهُوَ خَيْرُ ٱلْحَـٰكِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'In kaana taaa'ifatum-minkum 'aamanoo billazeee 'ursiltu bihee wa taaa'ifatul-lam yu'minoo faşbiroo hattaa yahkumal-laahu baynanaa; wa Huwa khayrul-haakimeen.
verses.translation: Aur agar tum mein se kuchh log iss hukm par eemaan le aaye hain jo mujhe de kar bheja gaya hai aur kuchh doosre eemaan nahin laaye hain to tum zara sabr karo yahaan tak ke Allah hamaare darmiyaan faislah karde,¹ aur woh sab se behtar faislah karne waala hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Yeh faislah dunya mein bhi ho sakta hai taahum aakhirat mein to yaqeenan hoga, chunaancheh wahaan har ek se baaz purs hogi aur phir uski raushni mein faisle honge jaise ke Rasoolullah ﷺ ne farmaya: 'tum mein se har shakhs nigraan hai aur usse uski rai'yyat ke baare mein baaz purs hogi, phir Aap ne imam, khaawind, biwi aur khaadim ki zimmedaari ka alag alag zikr kiya. (Al-Bukhari, Hadees:7138) ek aadmi ne Rasoolullah ﷺ se arz kiya: aye Allah ke Rasool! Qiyaamat kab qaayem hogi? Aap ne farmaya: 'toone uske liye kiya kuchh tayyaar kiya hai?' to woh aadmi sharmindah aur khaufzadah ho gaya aur arz kiya: Aye Allah ke Rasool! Main ne uske liye bahut ziyaadah roze, sadqaat aur namaazein to tayyaar nahin ki hain lekin main Allah aur uske Rasool se muhabbat karta hoon. Uss par Nabi ﷺ ne farmaya: tu usi ke saath hoga jisse tu mohabbat karta hai: (Al-Bukhari, hadees:7153) ek rivaayat mein Aap ﷺ ne farmaya 'uss Allah ki qasam, jiske qabze mein meri jaan hai! jis kisi ke paas wount, gaaye aur bakriyaan hon aur woh zakaat adaa na kare to qiyaamat ke din un jaanwaron ko bahut farbah haalat mein laaya jaayega, woh use apne khuron se pairon tale raundeinge aur seenghon se maareinge aur uss par musalsal chakkar lagaate rahenge aur yeh sazaa uss waqt tak jaari rahegi jab tak Allah Ta'ala tamaam insaanon ke darmiyaan faislah na karlega.' (Al-Bukhari, Az-Zakaat, Baab:43,1460)

verses.arabic: قَالَ ٱلْمَلَأُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ مِن قَوْمِهِۦ لَنُخْرِجَنَّكَ يَـٰشُعَيْبُ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مَعَكَ مِن قَرْيَتِنَآ أَوْ لَتَعُودُنَّ فِى مِلَّتِنَا ۚ قَالَ أَوَلَوْ كُنَّا كَـٰرِهِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaalal-mala'ul- lazeenas-takbaroo min qawmihee lanukhrijannaka yaa Shu'aybu wallazeena 'aamanoo maʻaka min qaryatinaaa 'aw lata'oodunna fee millatinaa; qaala 'awa law kunnaa kaariheen.
verses.translation: Uski qaum mein se jo sardaar takabbur karte the, unhon ne kaha: aye Shuaib! hum tujhe aur un logon ko jo tere saath eemaan laaye hain, apni basti se zaroor nikaal denge, ya tum hamaare deen mein laut aaoge.Shuaib ne kaha: kiya (hum tumhaare deen mein aa jaayen) agarcheh hum (usse) karaahat karte hain

verses.arabic: قَدِ ٱفْتَرَيْنَا عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا إِنْ عُدْنَا فِى مِلَّتِكُم بَعْدَ إِذْ نَجَّىٰنَا ٱللَّهُ مِنْهَا ۚ وَمَا يَكُونُ لَنَآ أَن نَّعُودَ فِيهَآ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّنَا ۚ وَسِعَ رَبُّنَا كُلَّ شَىْءٍ عِلْمًا ۚ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ تَوَكَّلْنَا ۚ رَبَّنَا ٱفْتَحْ بَيْنَنَا وَبَيْنَ قَوْمِنَا بِٱلْحَقِّ وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ ٱلْفَـٰتِحِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qadif-taraynaa 'alal- laahi kaziban 'in 'udnaa fee millatikum ba'da 'iz najjaanal-laahu minhaa; wa maa yakoonu lanaaa 'an na'ooda feehaaa 'illaaa 'añy-yashaaa'al- laahu Rabbunaa; wasi'a Rabbunaa kulla shay'in 'ilmaa; 'alal-laahi tawakkalnaa; Rabbanaf- tah baynanaa wa bayna qawminaa bilhaqqi wa 'Anta khayrul-faatiheen.
verses.translation: Humne (goya) Allah par jhoot baandha agar hum tumhaare deen mein laut aayein jabke Allah humein usse najaat de chukka hai aur hamaare laayeq nahin ke hum uss mein laut aayein magar yeh ke Allah hamaara rab chaahe, hamaare rab ne har cheez ko (apne) ilm se gher rakkha hai, hum ne Allah hi par bharosa kiya hai. (aur hum du'a karte hain) aye hamaare rab! tu hamaare aur hamaari qaum ke darmiyaan haq ke saath faislah kar, aur tu behtareen faislah karne waala hai.

verses.arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلْمَلَأُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِن قَوْمِهِۦ لَئِنِ ٱتَّبَعْتُمْ شُعَيْبًا إِنَّكُمْ إِذًا لَّخَـٰسِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa qaalal-mala'ul- Jazeena kafaroo min qawmihee la'init-taba'tum Shu'ayban 'innakum 'izal- lakhaasiroon.
verses.translation: Aur uski qaum mein se woh sardaar jinhon ne kufr kiya tha, kahne lage: agar tumne shuaib ki pairwi ki to beshak tum zaroor khasaarah paane waale hoge.

verses.arabic: فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ ٱلرَّجْفَةُ فَأَصْبَحُوا۟ فِى دَارِهِمْ جَـٰثِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Fa'akhazathumur- rajfatu fa'aşbahoo fee daarihim jaasimeen.
verses.translation: Phir unhein zalzale ne aa pakda chunaancheh woh apne gharon mein wondhe pade rah gaye.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ شُعَيْبًۭا كَأَن لَّمْ يَغْنَوْا۟ فِيهَا ۚ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ شُعَيْبًۭا كَانُوا۟ هُمُ ٱلْخَـٰسِرِينَ
verses.transliteration: 'Allazeena kazzaboo Shu'ayban ka'al-lam yaghnaw feehaa; 'allazeena kazzaboo Shu'ayban kaanoo humul-khaasireen.
verses.translation: Jin logon ne Shuaib ko jhutlaaya woh (yun ho gaye) jaise un gharon mein kabhi base hi na the, jin logon ne shuaib ko jhutlaaya wahi khasaarah paane waale the.

verses.arabic: فَتَوَلَّىٰ عَنْهُمْ وَقَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ لَقَدْ أَبْلَغْتُكُمْ رِسَالَـٰتِ رَبِّى وَنَصَحْتُ لَكُمْ ۖ فَكَيْفَ ءَاسَىٰ عَلَىٰ قَوْمٍۢ كَـٰفِرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Fatawallaa 'anhum wa qaala yaa qawmi laqad 'ablaghtukum Risaalaati Rabbee wa naşahtu lakum fakayfa 'aasaa 'alaa qawmin kaafireen.
verses.translation: Phir Shuaib ne unse munh pher kar kaha: aye meri qaum! yaqeenan main ne tu apne rab ke paighaamaat pahunchaa tumhein diye aur tumhaari khair khaahi ki, phir main kaafir qaum par gham kyun khaaoun?

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَا فِى قَرْيَةٍۢ مِّن نَّبِىٍّ إِلَّآ أَخَذْنَآ أَهْلَهَا بِٱلْبَأْسَآءِ وَٱلضَّرَّآءِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَضَّرَّعُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maaa 'arsalnaa fee qaryatim-min- Nabiyyin 'illaaa 'akhaznaaa 'ahlahaa bil- ba'asaaa'i waddarraaa'i la allahum yaddarra'oon
verses.translation: Aur jab bhi humne kisi basti mein koyi nabi bheja to uss basti waalon ko tangi aur sakhti mein mubtala kiya taake woh aajzi ikhtiyaar karein.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ بَدَّلْنَا مَكَانَ ٱلسَّيِّئَةِ ٱلْحَسَنَةَ حَتَّىٰ عَفَوا۟ وَقَالُوا۟ قَدْ مَسَّ ءَابَآءَنَا ٱلضَّرَّآءُ وَٱلسَّرَّآءُ فَأَخَذْنَـٰهُم بَغْتَةًۢ وَهُمْ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Summa baddalnaa makaanas-sayyi'atil- hasanata hattaa 'afaw wa qaaloo qad massa 'aabaaa'anad-darraaa'u awassarraaa'u fa'akhaznaahum baghtatanw-wa hum laa yash'uroon.
verses.translation: Phir humne (unki) badhaali ko khush haali mein badal diya yahaan tak ke woh khoob phale phoole aur kahne lage: hamaare baap daada ko bhi sakhti aur raahat pesh aayi thi, tab humne unhein achaanak pakad liya aur unhen khabar tak na ho saki.

verses.arabic: وَلَوْ أَنَّ أَهْلَ ٱلْقُرَىٰٓ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَٱتَّقَوْا۟ لَفَتَحْنَا عَلَيْهِم بَرَكَـٰتٍۢ مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَـٰكِن كَذَّبُوا۟ فَأَخَذْنَـٰهُم بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa law 'anna 'ahlal- quraaa 'aamanoo wattaqaw lafatahnaa 'alayhim barakaatim- minas-samaaa'i wal'ardi wa laakin kazzaboo fa'akhaznaahum bimaa kaanoo yaksiboon.
verses.translation: Aur agar un bastiyon waale eemaan le aate aur parhez gaari ikhtiyaar karte to hum un par aasmaan aur zameen ki barkaton ke darwaaze khol dete lekin unhon ne (deen-e-haq ko) jhutlaaya to humne unhein (unke bure) amlon ke baayis pakad liya jo woh karte rahe the.

verses.arabic: أَفَأَمِنَ أَهْلُ ٱلْقُرَىٰٓ أَن يَأْتِيَهُم بَأْسُنَا بَيَـٰتًۭا وَهُمْ نَآئِمُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Afa'amina 'ahlul- quraaa añy-ya'tiyahum ba'sunaa bayaatanw-wa hum naaa'imoon.
verses.translation: Kiya phir bastiyon waale iss (baat) se be khauf ho gaye hain ke un par hamaaraa azaab raat ko aa jaaye aur woh soye huye hon?

verses.arabic: أَوَأَمِنَ أَهْلُ ٱلْقُرَىٰٓ أَن يَأْتِيَهُم بَأْسُنَا ضُحًۭى وَهُمْ يَلْعَبُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Awa 'amina 'ahlul- quraaa 'any- ya'tiyahum ba'sunaa duhanw-wa hum yal'aboon.
verses.translation: Ya bastiyon waale iss (baat) se be khauf ho gaye hain ke unpar hamaaraa 'azaab din chadhe aa jaaye aur woh khel tamaashe mein masroof hon?

verses.arabic: أَفَأَمِنُوا۟ مَكْرَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ فَلَا يَأْمَنُ مَكْرَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَّا ٱلْقَوْمُ ٱلْخَـٰسِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Afa'aminoo makral- laah; falaa ya'manu makral-laahi 'illal- qawmul-khaasiroon.
verses.translation: Kiya phir woh Allah ki tadbeer se be khauf ho gaye hain? Allah ki tadbeer se be khauf to wahi log hote hain jo khasaarah paane waale hon.

verses.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَهْدِ لِلَّذِينَ يَرِثُونَ ٱلْأَرْضَ مِنۢ بَعْدِ أَهْلِهَآ أَن لَّوْ نَشَآءُ أَصَبْنَـٰهُم بِذُنُوبِهِمْ وَنَطْبَعُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمْ فَهُمْ لَا يَسْمَعُونَ
verses.transliteration: Awa lam yahdi lillazeena yarisoonal- 'arda mim ba'di 'ahlihaaa 'al-law nashaaa'u 'aşabnaahum bizunoobihim; wa natba'u 'alaa quloobihim fahum laa yasma'oon
verses.translation: Kiya un logon par waazeh nahin huwa jo zameen mein (pahle) basne waalon)ki halaakat) ke ba'd uske waaris huye ke agar hum chaahein to un ke gunaahon ki wajah se unhein museebaton mein mubtala kardein aur un ke dilon par mohar lagaa den, phir woh (kuchh) na sun paayen.

verses.arabic: تِلْكَ ٱلْقُرَىٰ نَقُصُّ عَلَيْكَ مِنْ أَنۢبَآئِهَا ۚ وَلَقَدْ جَآءَتْهُمْ رُسُلُهُم بِٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ فَمَا كَانُوا۟ لِيُؤْمِنُوا۟ بِمَا كَذَّبُوا۟ مِن قَبْلُ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يَطْبَعُ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Tilkal-quraa naquşşu 'alayka min 'ambaaa'ihaa; wa laqad jaaa'athum Rusuluhum bilbayyinaati famaa kaanoo liyu'minoo bimaa kazzaboo min qabl; kazaalika yatbaʻul-laahu 'alaa quloobil-kaafireen.
verses.translation: (Aye nabi!) yeh woh bastiyaan hain jin ki kuchh khabrein hum aapse bayaan karte hain aur yaqeenan unke Rasool unke paas khuli nishaaniyan le kar aaye, chunaancheh jis cheez ko woh pahle jhutlaa chuke the, uss par eemaan laane ke rawaa daar na huye¹ Allah isi tarah kaafiron ke dilon par mohar lagaa deta hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Iska ek mafhoom to yeh hai ke yaum-e-misaaq ko jab unse ahad liya gaya tha to yeh Allah ke ilm mein eemaan laane waale na the unki taqdeer mein eemaan nahin tha jise Allah ne apne ilm ke mutaabiq likh diya tha jis ko hadees mein 'Fakullum muyassarullima khuliga lahu' (Al-Bukhari, Tafseer suratul-lail) se ta'beer kiya gaya hai. doosra mafhoom yeh hai ke jab paighambar unke paas aaye to woh iss wajah se un par eemaan nahin laaye ke woh usse qabl haq ki takzeeb kar chuke the. Goya ibtedaa'an jis cheez ki woh takzeeb kar chuke the, yahi gunah unke adm-e-eemaan ka sabab ban gaya aur eemaan laane ki taufeeq unse chheen li gayi, isi ko agle jumle mein mohar lagaane se ta'beer kiya gaya hai. mazeed dekhein. (Surah An'aam:6/110)

verses.arabic: وَمَا وَجَدْنَا لِأَكْثَرِهِم مِّنْ عَهْدٍۢ ۖ وَإِن وَجَدْنَآ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَفَـٰسِقِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maa wajadnaa li'aksarihim min 'ahd; wa 'inw-wajadnaaa 'aksarahum lafaasiqeen.
verses.translation: Aur humne un mein se aksar main ahad (kaa paas) nahin paaya aur bila shubah hum ne un mein se aksar ko naa farmaan hi paaya.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ بَعَثْنَا مِنۢ بَعْدِهِم مُّوسَىٰ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَآ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ وَمَلَإِيْهِۦ فَظَلَمُوا۟ بِهَا ۖ فَٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلْمُفْسِدِينَ
verses.transliteration: Summa baʻasnaa mim ba'dihim Moosaa bi- 'Aayaatinaaa 'ilaa Fir'awna wa mala'ihee fazalamoo bihaa fanzur kayfa kaana 'aaqibatul- mufsideen.
verses.translation: Phir un (Nabyon) ke ba'd humne Moosa ko apni nishaaniyon ke saath firaun aur uske darbaariyon ke paas behja to unhon ne un (nishaaniyon) ko na maana, phir dekhiye fasaad karne waalon ka anjaam kiya huwa.

verses.arabic: وَقَالَ مُوسَىٰ يَـٰفِرْعَوْنُ إِنِّى رَسُولٌۭ مِّن رَّبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa qaala Moosaa yaa Fir'awnu 'innee Rasoolum-mir-Rabbil- 'aalameen.
verses.translation: Aur Moosa ne kaha: Aye firaun! beshak main sab jahaanon ke rab ki taraf se Rasool hoon.

verses.arabic: حَقِيقٌ عَلَىٰٓ أَن لَّآ أَقُولَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ إِلَّا ٱلْحَقَّ ۖ قَدْ جِئْتُكُم بِبَيِّنَةٍۢ مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ فَأَرْسِلْ مَعِىَ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ
verses.transliteration: Haqeequn 'alaaa 'al- laaa 'aqoola 'alal-laahi 'illal-haqq; qad ji'tukum bibayyinatim-mir- Rabbikum fa'arsil ma'iya Baneee 'Israaa'eel.
verses.translation: Mujh par waajib hai ke main Allah ki taraf se haq ke siwa kuchh na kahoon. tahqeeq main tumhaare paas tumhaare rab ki taraf se waazeh daleel laaya hoon, lehaaza tu Bani Israyeel ko mere saath bhej de.

verses.arabic: قَالَ إِن كُنتَ جِئْتَ بِـَٔايَةٍۢ فَأْتِ بِهَآ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala 'in kunta ji'ta bi-'Aayatin fa'ti bihaaa 'in kunta minaş- şaadiqeen.
verses.translation: Fir'aun ne kaha: agar tu koyi nishaani le kar aaya hai to woh peshkar, agar tu sachchon mein se hai.

verses.arabic: فَأَلْقَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِىَ ثُعْبَانٌۭ مُّبِينٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Fa'alqaa 'aşaahu fa'izaa hiya su baanum- mubeen.
verses.translation: Tab Moosa ne apna a'sa (zameen par) daala to woh usi waqt azdaha (ban kar) zaahir huwa.

verses.arabic: وَنَزَعَ يَدَهُۥ فَإِذَا هِىَ بَيْضَآءُ لِلنَّـٰظِرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa naza'a yadahoo fa'izaa hiya baydaaa'u linnaazireen.
verses.translation: Aur Moosa ne (baghal se) apna haath baahar nikaala to woh dekhne waalon ke liye chamakta huwa safed tha.

verses.arabic: قَالَ ٱلْمَلَأُ مِن قَوْمِ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَسَـٰحِرٌ عَلِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Qaalal-mala'u min qawmi Fir'awna 'inna haazaa lasaahirun 'aleem.
verses.translation: Firaun ki qaum ke sardaaron ne kaha: beshak yeh to maahir jaadu gar hai

verses.arabic: يُرِيدُ أَن يُخْرِجَكُم مِّنْ أَرْضِكُمْ ۖ فَمَاذَا تَأْمُرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Yureedu 'any- yukhrijakum min 'ardikum famaazaa ta'muroon.
verses.translation: Yeh chaahta hai ke tumhein tumhaari sar zameen se nikaal de, pas tum kiya mashwarah dete ho?

verses.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ أَرْجِهْ وَأَخَاهُ وَأَرْسِلْ فِى ٱلْمَدَآئِنِ حَـٰشِرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaalooo 'arjih wa 'akhaahu wa 'arsil fil- madaaa'ini haashireen.
verses.translation: Unhon ne kaha: Use aur uske bhaai (Haroon) ko mohlat de aur shahron mein har kaare bhej de.

verses.arabic: يَأْتُوكَ بِكُلِّ سَـٰحِرٍ عَلِيمٍۢ
verses.transliteration: Ya'tooka bikulli saahirin 'aleem.
verses.translation: (Taake) woh har maahir jaadu gar ko tere paas le aayein.

verses.arabic: وَجَآءَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ فِرْعَوْنَ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّ لَنَا لَأَجْرًا إِن كُنَّا نَحْنُ ٱلْغَـٰلِبِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa jaaa'as-saharatu Fir'awna qaalooo 'inna lanaa la'ajran 'in kunnaa nahnul-ghaalibeen.
verses.translation: Aur woh jaadu gar firaun ke paas aaye, to unhon ne kaha: yaqeenan hamaare liye inaa'm hoga agar hum ghaalib aa gaye?

verses.arabic: قَالَ نَعَمْ وَإِنَّكُمْ لَمِنَ ٱلْمُقَرَّبِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala na'am wa 'innakum laminal- muqarrabeen.
verses.translation: Firaun ne kaha: haan, aur beshak tum (mere) muqarrab logon mein se hoge.

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ يَـٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِمَّآ أَن تُلْقِىَ وَإِمَّآ أَن نَّكُونَ نَحْنُ ٱلْمُلْقِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo yaa Moosaaa 'immaaa 'an tulqiya wa 'immaaa 'an nakoona nahnul-mulqeen.
verses.translation: Jaadu garon ne kaha: aye Moosa! yaa to tu daal ya (pahle) hum hi (apna jaadu) daalein.

verses.arabic: قَالَ أَلْقُوا۟ ۖ فَلَمَّآ أَلْقَوْا۟ سَحَرُوٓا۟ أَعْيُنَ ٱلنَّاسِ وَٱسْتَرْهَبُوهُمْ وَجَآءُو بِسِحْرٍ عَظِيمٍۢ
verses.transliteration: Qaala 'alqoo falam maaa 'alqaw saharooo 'a'yunan-naasi wastarhaboohum wa jaaa'oo bisihrin 'azeem.
verses.translation: Moosa ne kaha: (Pahle) tum daalo. phir jab unhon ne (apni laathhiyaan aur rassiyaan) daalein to logon ki aankhon par jaadu kar diya aur unhein (laathhiyon aur rassiyon ke saanpon se) daraaya, aur woh bahut badaa jaadu laaye the.¹
verses.deepMeaning: • Ba'z aasaar mein bataaya gaya hai ke yeh jaadu gar 70 hazaar ki ta'daad mein the. Bazaahir ta'daad mubaalghe se khaali nahin, jin mein se har ek ne ek ek rassi aur ek ek laathhi maidaan mein pheinki, ada jaadu jo dekhne waalon ko daudti huyi mahsoos hoti thin, yeh goya bazaghm-e-khawesh bahut bada tha jo unhon ne pesh kiya.

verses.arabic: وَأَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنْ أَلْقِ عَصَاكَ ۖ فَإِذَا هِىَ تَلْقَفُ مَا يَأْفِكُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'awhaynaaa 'ilaa Moosaaa 'an 'alqi 'aşaaka fa'izaa hiya talqafu maa ya'fikoon.
verses.translation: Aur hum ne Moosa ki taraf wahi ki ke tu (bhi) apna asaa daal. (jab usne daala) to woh dekhte hi dekhte (azdaha ban kar un saanpon ko) nigalne laga jo woh (jaadu gar) ghadte the.

verses.arabic: فَوَقَعَ ٱلْحَقُّ وَبَطَلَ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Fawaqa'al-haqqu wa batala maa kaanoo ya'maloon.
verses.translation: Bil aakhir haq saabit ho gaya aur jo kuchh woh log kar rahe the baatil thhahra.

verses.arabic: فَغُلِبُوا۟ هُنَالِكَ وَٱنقَلَبُوا۟ صَـٰغِرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Faghuliboo hunaalika wanqalaboo saaghireen.
verses.translation: Tab woh jaadugar waheen maghloob ho gaye aur zaleel- o-khaar ho kar peechhe hat aaye.

verses.arabic: وَأُلْقِىَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ سَـٰجِدِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'ulqiyas- saharatu saajideen.
verses.translation: Aur jaadu gar (be ikhtiyaar) sajde mein gir pade.

verses.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ ءَامَنَّا بِرَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaalooo 'aamannaa bi-Rabbil-'aalameen.
verses.translation: Unhon ne kaha: hum Rabbul Aalameen par eemaan le aaye.

verses.arabic: رَبِّ مُوسَىٰ وَهَـٰرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Rabbi Moosaa wa Haaroon.
verses.translation: Moosa aur Haaroon ke rab par.

verses.arabic: قَالَ فِرْعَوْنُ ءَامَنتُم بِهِۦ قَبْلَ أَنْ ءَاذَنَ لَكُمْ ۖ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَمَكْرٌۭ مَّكَرْتُمُوهُ فِى ٱلْمَدِينَةِ لِتُخْرِجُوا۟ مِنْهَآ أَهْلَهَا ۖ فَسَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala Fir'awnu 'aamantum bihee qabla 'an 'aazana lakum; 'inna haazaa lamakrum- makartumoohu fil- madeenati litukhrijoo minhaaa 'ahlahaa fasawfa ta'lmoon.
verses.translation: Firaun ne kaha: (kiya) tum mere ejaazat dene se pahle uss par eemaan le aaye ho? beshak yeh makr hai, tumne iss shahar mein (mil kar) yeh makr kiya hai taake yahaan ke rahne waalon ko iss (shahar) se nikaal do, phir jald hi (uska nateeja) tum jaan loge.

verses.arabic: لَأُقَطِّعَنَّ أَيْدِيَكُمْ وَأَرْجُلَكُم مِّنْ خِلَـٰفٍۢ ثُمَّ لَأُصَلِّبَنَّكُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.transliteration: La'uqatti'anna 'aydiyakum wa 'arjulakum min khilaafin summa la'usallibannakum 'ajma'een.
verses.translation: Main tumhaare haath aur paaun mukhaalif taraf se zaroor kaat dunga, phir main tum sab ko zaroor sooli par latkaaounga.

verses.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّآ إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا مُنقَلِبُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qaalooo 'innaaa 'ilaa Rabbinaa munqaliboon.
verses.translation: Unhon ne kaha: beshak hum apne rab hi ki taraf lautne waale hain.

verses.arabic: وَمَا تَنقِمُ مِنَّآ إِلَّآ أَنْ ءَامَنَّا بِـَٔايَـٰتِ رَبِّنَا لَمَّا جَآءَتْنَا ۚ رَبَّنَآ أَفْرِغْ عَلَيْنَا صَبْرًۭا وَتَوَفَّنَا مُسْلِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maa tangimu minnaaa 'illaaa 'an 'aamannaa bi-'Aayaati Rabbinaa lammaa jaaa'atnaa; Rabbanaaa 'afrigh 'alaynaa şabrañw-wa tawaffanaa muslimeen.
verses.translation: Aur (Aye Fir'aun:) tu hamein sirf iss baat ki saza de raha hai ke hum apne rab ki nishaaniyon par eemaan le aaye hain jab woh hamaare paas aa gayin. aye hamaare rab! hum par sabr daal de aur hamein iss haal mein faut kar ke hum musalmaan hon.

verses.arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلْمَلَأُ مِن قَوْمِ فِرْعَوْنَ أَتَذَرُ مُوسَىٰ وَقَوْمَهُۥ لِيُفْسِدُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَيَذَرَكَ وَءَالِهَتَكَ ۚ قَالَ سَنُقَتِّلُ أَبْنَآءَهُمْ وَنَسْتَحْىِۦ نِسَآءَهُمْ وَإِنَّا فَوْقَهُمْ قَـٰهِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa qaalal-mala'u min qawmi Fir'awna 'atazaru Moosaa wa qawmahoo liyufsidoo fil- 'ardi wa yazaraka wa 'aalihatak; qaala sanuqattilu 'abnaaa'ahum wa nastahyee nisaaa'ahum wa 'innaa fawqahum qaahiroon.
verses.translation: Aur Fir'aun ki qaum ke chaudhriyon ne (usse) kaha: kiya tu Moosa aur uski qaum ko chhod dega taake woh zameen mein fasaad karein, aur woh (Moosa) tujhe aur tere maboodon ko chhod de? Firaun ne kaha: hum unke (nau maulood) bete qatl kardenge aur unki beetyaan chhod denge aur beshak hum un par poora ghalbah rakhte hain.

verses.arabic: قَالَ مُوسَىٰ لِقَوْمِهِ ٱسْتَعِينُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱصْبِرُوٓا۟ ۖ إِنَّ ٱلْأَرْضَ لِلَّهِ يُورِثُهَا مَن يَشَآءُ مِنْ عِبَادِهِۦ ۖ وَٱلْعَـٰقِبَةُ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala Moosaa liqawmihis-ta'eenoo billaahi waşbiroo 'innal- 'arda lillaahi yoorisuhaa many-yashaaa'u min 'ibaadihee wal'aaqibatu lilmuttaqeen.
verses.translation: Moosa ne apni qaum se kaha: tum Allah se madad maango aur sabr karo, beshak zameen to Allah hi ki hai, woh apne bandon mein se jise chaahta hai iska waaris banaata hai, aur (achchha) anjaam to parhez gaaron hi ke liye hai.
