verses.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ أُوذِينَا مِن قَبْلِ أَن تَأْتِيَنَا وَمِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا جِئْتَنَا ۚ قَالَ عَسَىٰ رَبُّكُمْ أَن يُهْلِكَ عَدُوَّكُمْ وَيَسْتَخْلِفَكُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَيَنظُرَ كَيْفَ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qaalooo 'oozeenaa min qabli 'an ta'tiyanaa wa mim ba'di maa ji'tanaa; qaa'la 'asaa Rabbukum 'añy-yuhlika 'aduwwakum wa yastakhlifakum fil-'ardi fayanzura kayfa ta'maloon.
verses.translation: Unhon ne (Moosa se) kaha: Hamaare paas tumhaare aane se pahle bhi hamein takleefein di gayin aur tumhaare aane ke ba'd bhi. Moosa ne kaha: Ummeed hai ke tumhaara rab tumhaare dushman ko halaak kardega aur tumhein zameen mein jaanasheen banaa dega, phir dekhega ke tum kaise amal karte ho.¹

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَخَذْنَآ ءَالَ فِرْعَوْنَ بِٱلسِّنِينَ وَنَقْصٍۢ مِّنَ ٱلثَّمَرَٰتِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَذَّكَّرُونَ
verses.transliteration: 130. Wa laqad 'akhaznaaa 'Aala Fir'awna bissineena wa naqsim-minas-samaraati laʻallahum yazzakkaroon.
verses.translation: 130.Aur bilaa shubah humne aale fir'aun ko qahat saali aur phalon ke nuqsaan mein pakda taake woh naseehat haasil karein.

verses.arabic: فَإِذَا جَآءَتْهُمُ ٱلْحَسَنَةُ قَالُوا۟ لَنَا هَـٰذِهِۦ ۖ وَإِن تُصِبْهُمْ سَيِّئَةٌۭ يَطَّيَّرُوا۟ بِمُوسَىٰ وَمَن مَّعَهُۥٓ ۗ أَلَآ إِنَّمَا طَـٰٓئِرُهُمْ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Fa'izaa jaaa'athumul-hasanatu qaaloo lanaa haazihee wa 'in tuşibhum sayyi'atuny-yattayyaroo bi-Moosaa wa mam- ma'ah; 'alaaa 'innamaa taaa'iruhum 'indal-laahi wa laakinna 'aksarahum laa ya'lamoon.
verses.translation: Phir jab un par khush haali aati to kahte: yeh hamaare hi liye hai aur agar unhein bad haali aa leti to use Moosa aur unke saathiyon ki nuhoosat thhahraate. khabar daar! unki nuhoosat¹ Allah ke paas (muqaddar) hai lekin un mein akasar (log) nahin jaante.
verses.deepMeaning: Taayir ke ma'na hain 'Udne waala' ya'ni parindah. Chunke parinde ke baayein ya daayein udne se woh log nek faali ya bad faali liya karte the. Isliye yeh lafz mutlaq faal ke liye bhi iste'maal hone lag gaya aur yahaan yeh isi ma'na mein iste'maal huwa hai. Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya ke khair ya shar, jo khush haali ya qahat saali ki wajah se unhein pahunchta hai uske asbaab Allah Ta'ala ki taraf se hain, Moosa aur unke pairokaar uska sabab nahin. Taayiruhum indallah ka matlab hoga ke unki badshagooni ka sabab Allah ke ilm mein hai aur woh unka kufr-o-juhood hai na ke kuchh aur. Ya Allah ki taraf se hai aur iski wajah unka kufr hai.

verses.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ مَهْمَا تَأْتِنَا بِهِۦ مِنْ ءَايَةٍۢ لِّتَسْحَرَنَا بِهَا فَمَا نَحْنُ لَكَ بِمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa qaaloo mahmaa ta'tinaa bihee min 'Aayatil-litasharanaa bihaa famaa nahnu laka bimu'mineen.
verses.translation: Aur unhon ne (Moosa se) kaha: khaah tum hamaare paas koyi nishaani le aao taake uske zariye se hum par jaadu kardo, to hum tum par eemaan nahin laayenge.

verses.arabic: فَأَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلطُّوفَانَ وَٱلْجَرَادَ وَٱلْقُمَّلَ وَٱلضَّفَادِعَ وَٱلدَّمَ ءَايَـٰتٍۢ مّفَصَّلَـٰتٍ فَٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ وَكَانُوا۟ قَوْمًۭا مُّجْرِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Fa'arsalnaa alayhimut-toofaana waljaraada walqummala waddafaadi'a waddama Aayaatim-mufaşşalaatin fastakbaroo wa kaanoo qawmam-mujrimeen.
verses.translation: Phir humne un par tufaan, tiddi dal, juon, mendakon aur khoon (ka azaab) bheja (yeh) alag alag nihsaanyaan thin, phir bhi unhon ne takbbuar kiya aur woh log the hi mujrim.

verses.arabic: وَلَمَّا وَقَعَ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلرِّجْزُ قَالُوا۟ يَـٰمُوسَى ٱدْعُ لَنَا رَبَّكَ بِمَا عَهِدَ عِندَكَ ۖ لَئِن كَشَفْتَ عَنَّا ٱلرِّجْزَ لَنُؤْمِنَنَّ لَكَ وَلَنُرْسِلَنَّ مَعَكَ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ
verses.transliteration: Wa lammaa waqa'a 'alayhimur-rijzu qaaloo yaa Moosad'u lanaa rabbaka bimaa 'ahida 'indaka la'in kashafta 'annar-rijza lanu'minanna laka wa lanursilanna ma'aka Banee 'Israaa'eel.
verses.translation: Aur jab un par koyi azaab aata to kahte: aye Moosa! tu apne rab se hamaare liye du'a kar jaisa ke usne tujh se a'had kar rakkha hai. agar tu humse azaab hata de to hum zaroor tujh par eemaan le aayenge aur tere saath bani Israyeel ko zaroor bhej denge

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّا كَشَفْنَا عَنْهُمُ ٱلرِّجْزَ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍ هُم بَـٰلِغُوهُ إِذَا هُمْ يَنكُثُونَ
verses.transliteration: Falammaa kashafnaa 'anhumur-rijza 'ilaaa 'ajalin hum baalighoohu 'izaa hum yankusoon.
verses.translation: Phir jab hum unse ek muqarrar waqt tak azaab hata lete jis tak woh baharhaal pahunchne waale hote, to yaka yak woh ahad tod dete.

verses.arabic: فَٱنتَقَمْنَا مِنْهُمْ فَأَغْرَقْنَـٰهُمْ فِى ٱلْيَمِّ بِأَنَّهُمْ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا وَكَانُوا۟ عَنْهَا غَـٰفِلِينَ
verses.transliteration: Fantaqamnaa minhum fa'aghraqnaahum fil- yammi bi'annahum kazzaboo bi-'Aayaatinaa wa kaanoo 'anhaa ghaafileen.
verses.translation: Phir humne unse inteqaam liya to unhein samandar mein gharq kardiya kyun ke unhon ne hamaari aayaat ko jhutlaaya tha aur woh unse be parwa ho gaye the.

verses.arabic: وَأَوْرَثْنَا ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَانُوا۟ يُسْتَضْعَفُونَ مَشَـٰرِقَ ٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَغَـٰرِبَهَا ٱلَّتِى بَٰرَكْنَا فِيهَا ۖ وَتَمَّتْ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ ٱلْحُسْنَىٰ عَلَىٰ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ بِمَا صَبَرُوا۟ ۖ وَدَمَّرْنَا مَا كَانَ يَصْنَعُ فِرْعَوْنُ وَقَوْمُهُۥ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْرِشُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'awrasnal- qawmal-lazeena kaanoo yustad afoona mashaariqal-'ardi wa maghaaribahal-latee baaraknaa feehaa wa tammat kalimatu Rabbikal-husnaa 'alaa Baneee 'Israaa'eela bimaa şabaroo wa dammarnaa maa kaana yaşna'u Fir'awnu wa qawmuhoo wa maa kaanoo ya'rishoon.
verses.translation: Aur humne un logon ko jo kamzor samjhe jaate the, uss zameen ke mashriq aur maghrib ka waaris bana diya jis mein humne barkat rakkhi thi. aur (aye nabi! iss tarah) bani Israyeel ke haq mein aap ke rab ka achchha wa'dah pura huwa. isliye ke unhon ne sabr kiya tha. aur humne firaun aur uski qaum ka woh sab ka tabaah kardiya jo (kaarkhaane) woh banaate aur jo (mahallaat ki emaaratein) woh uthhaate the.

verses.arabic: وَجَٰوَزْنَا بِبَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ ٱلْبَحْرَ فَأَتَوْا۟ عَلَىٰ قَوْمٍۢ يَعْكُفُونَ عَلَىٰٓ أَصْنَامٍۢ لَّهُمْ ۚ قَالُوا۟ يَـٰمُوسَى ٱجْعَل لَّنَآ إِلَـٰهًۭا كَمَا لَهُمْ ءَالِهَةٌۭ ۚ قَالَ إِنَّكُمْ قَوْمٌۭ تَجْهَلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa jaawaznaa bi- Banneee 'Israaa'eelal- bahra fa'ataw 'alaa qawminy-ya kufoona 'alaaa 'aşnaamil-lahum; qaaloo yaa Moosaj-'al- lanaa ilaahan kamaa lahum 'aalihah; qaala 'innakum qawmun tajhaloon.
verses.translation: Aur (jab) humne bani Israyeel ko samandar ke paar utaar diya, to unka aise logon par guzar huwa jo apne buton ki ibaadat mein lage huye the. unhon ne kaha: aye Moosa! tu hamaare liye ek mabood bana de jis tarah ke inke mabood hain. Moosa ne kaha: beshak tum log to(nare) jaahil ho.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ مُتَبَّرٌۭ مَّا هُمْ فِيهِ وَبَٰطِلٌۭ مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Inna haaa'ulaaa'i mutabbarum-maa hum feehi wa baatilum-maa kaanoo ya maloon.
verses.translation: Yeh log jis kaam mein lage hain yaqeenan woh tabaah hone waala hai aur jo kuchh yeh kar rahe hain woh baatil hai.

verses.arabic: قَالَ أَغَيْرَ ٱللَّهِ أَبْغِيكُمْ إِلَـٰهًۭا وَهُوَ فَضَّلَكُمْ عَلَى ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala 'aghayral- laahi 'abgheekum 'ilaahanw-wa Huwa faddalakum 'alal- 'aalameen.
verses.translation: Moosa ne kaha: kiya main tumhaare liye Allah ke siwa koyi (aur) mabood talaash karun jabke usi ne tumhein sab jahaanon par fazeelat di hai.

verses.arabic: وَإِذْ أَنجَيْنَـٰكُم مِّنْ ءَالِ فِرْعَوْنَ يَسُومُونَكُمْ سُوٓءَ ٱلْعَذَابِ يُقَتِّلُونَ أَبْنَآءَكُمْ وَيَسْتَحْيُونَ نِسَآءَكُمْ ۚ وَفِى ذَٰلِكُم بَلَآءٌۭ مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ عَظِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'iz 'anjaynaakum min 'Aali-Fir'awna yasoomoonakum sooo'al- 'azaab; yuqattiloona 'abnaaa'akum wa yastahyoona nisaaa'akum; wa fee zaalikum balaaa'um-mir- Rabbikum 'azeem.
verses.translation: Aur (aye bani Israyeel! yaad karo) jab hum ne tumhein firaun ki qaum se najaat di, woh tumhein bura azaab chakhaate the tumhaare beton ko qatl kar dete the aur tumhaari auraton (betyon) ko zindah rahne dete the, aur uss mein tumhaare rab ki taraf se bahut badi aazaamyish thi.

verses.arabic: وَوَٰعَدْنَا مُوسَىٰ ثَلَـٰثِينَ لَيْلَةًۭ وَأَتْمَمْنَـٰهَا بِعَشْرٍۢ فَتَمَّ مِيقَـٰتُ رَبِّهِۦٓ أَرْبَعِينَ لَيْلَةًۭ ۚ وَقَالَ مُوسَىٰ لِأَخِيهِ هَـٰرُونَ ٱخْلُفْنِى فِى قَوْمِى وَأَصْلِحْ وَلَا تَتَّبِعْ سَبِيلَ ٱلْمُفْسِدِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa waa'adnaa Moosaa salaaseena laylatañw-wa 'atmamnaahaa bi'ashrin fatamma meeqaatu Rabbiheee 'arba'eena laylah; wa qaala Moosaa li'akheehi Haaroonakh- lufnee fee qawmee wa 'aşlih wa laa tattabi' sabeelal-mufsideen.
verses.translation: Aur humne Moosa se tees raaton ka wa'dah kiya (ke woh itni raatein koohe toor par guzaare) aur humne unhein (mazeed) das raaton ke saath pura kiya, yun uske rab ki (muqarrar ki huyi) chaalis raaton ki muddat poori ho gayi. aur Moosa ne apne bhaai haaroon se kaha: too meri qaum mein mere peechhe jaanasheen ban jaa, aur (inki) islaah karna aur fasaad karne waalon ke raaste ki pairwi na karna.

verses.arabic: وَلَمَّا جَآءَ مُوسَىٰ لِمِيقَـٰتِنَا وَكَلَّمَهُۥ رَبُّهُۥ قَالَ رَبِّ أَرِنِىٓ أَنظُرْ إِلَيْكَ ۚ قَالَ لَن تَرَىٰنِى وَلَـٰكِنِ ٱنظُرْ إِلَى ٱلْجَبَلِ فَإِنِ ٱسْتَقَرَّ مَكَانَهُۥ فَسَوْفَ تَرَىٰنِى ۚ فَلَمَّا تَجَلَّىٰ رَبُّهُۥ لِلْجَبَلِ جَعَلَهُۥ دَكًّۭا وَخَرَّ مُوسَىٰ صَعِقًۭا ۚ فَلَمَّآ أَفَاقَ قَالَ سُبْحَـٰنَكَ تُبْتُ إِلَيْكَ وَأَنَا۠ أَوَّلُ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa lammaa jaaa'a Moosaa limeeqaatinaa wa kallamahoo Rabbuhoo qaala Rabbi Parineee 'anzur 'ilayk; qaala lan taraanee wa Jaakinin-zur 'ilal-jabali fa'inis-taqarra makaanahoo fasawfa taraanee; falammaa tajallaa Rabbuhoo liljabali ja'alahoo dakkanw-wa kharra Moosaa saʻiqaa; falammaaa 'afaaqa qaala Subhaanaka tubtu 'ilayka wa 'ana 'awwalul-mu'mineen.
verses.translation: Aur jab Moosa hamaari muqarrarah muddat ke liye aaya aur usse uske rab ne kalaam kiya to Moosa ne kaha: aye mere rab! mujhe (apni jhalak) dikhaa ke main tujhe dekh sakoon. Allah ne farmaya: tu mujhe hargiz nahin dekh sakega. Lekin tu iss pahaad ki taraf dekh, phir agar woh apni jagah thhahra rahaa to tu bhi mujhe zaroor dekh sakega. phir jab uske rab ne pahaad par (apna) jalwah daala to use rezah rezah kardiya,¹ aur Moosa be hosh ho kar gir pada. phir jab woh hosh mein aaya to usne arz ki: (Aye Allah!) tu paak hai, main tere huzoor taubah karta hoon aur main sabse pahla momin hoon.
verses.deepMeaning: Haalaanke pahaad par Allah Ta'ala ka bahut hi kam zuhoor huwa tha jaisa ke tafseer Tabri mein rivaayat hai: Nabi ﷺ ne iss aayat: 7/143 ki tilaawat ki aur farmaaya: 'pahaad par Allah Ta'ala ne insaan ki chhoti ungli ki por ke baraabar apna zuhoor farmaya tha.'' (At-Tabri:9/72 wa Musnad Ahmed:3/209)

verses.arabic: قَالَ يَـٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِنِّى ٱصْطَفَيْتُكَ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ بِرِسَـٰلَـٰتِى وَبِكَلَـٰمِى فَخُذْ مَآ ءَاتَيْتُكَ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلشَّـٰكِرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala yaa Moosaaa 'innis-tafaytuka 'alan- naasi bi-Risaalaatee wa bi-kalaamee fakhuz maaa 'aataytuka wa kum-minash-shaakireen.
verses.translation: Allah ne farmaya: aye Moosa! beshak main ne apne paighaamaat pahunchaane aur apni hamkalaami ke liye logon mein se tujhe chun liya hai, chunaancheh tu lele jo main ne tujhe diya hai aur shukr guzaaron mein (shaamil) ho jaa.

verses.arabic: وَكَتَبْنَا لَهُۥ فِى ٱلْأَلْوَٰحِ مِن كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ مَّوْعِظَةًۭ وَتَفْصِيلًۭا لِّكُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ فَخُذْهَا بِقُوَّةٍۢ وَأْمُرْ قَوْمَكَ يَأْخُذُوا۟ بِأَحْسَنِهَا ۚ سَأُو۟رِيكُمْ دَارَ ٱلْفَـٰسِقِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa katabnaa lahoo fil-'alwaahi min kulli shay'immaw-'izatanw- wa tafseelal-likulli shay'in fakhuzhaa biquwwatiñw- wa'mur qawmaka ya'khuzoo bi'ahsanihaa; sa'ooreekum daaral- faasiqeen.
verses.translation: Aur hum ne USS (Moosa) ke liye (tauraat ki) takhtiyon mein (zindagi ke) har muaamle ke baare mein naseehat aur har pahlu ke muta'alliq tafseel likh kar de di hai, chunaancheh tu un (hidaayaat) ko mazbooti se pakad le aur apni qaum ko hukm de ke un ki achchhi achchhi baaton par kaar band rahein. jald hi main tumhein naafar maanon ka ghar dikhaahunga.

verses.arabic: سَأَصْرِفُ عَنْ ءَايَـٰتِىَ ٱلَّذِينَ يَتَكَبَّرُونَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ بِغَيْرِ ٱلْحَقِّ ۖ وَإِن يَرَوْا۟ كُلَّ ءَايَةٍۢ لَّا يُؤْمِنُوا۟ بِهَا ۚ وَإِن يَرَوْا۟ سَبِيلَ ٱلرُّشْدِ لَا يَتَّخِذُوهُ سَبِيلًۭا ۖ وَإِن يَرَوْا۟ سَبِيلَ ٱلْغَىِّ يَتَّخِذُوهُ سَبِيلًۭا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا وَكَانُوا۟ عَنْهَا غَـٰفِلِينَ
verses.transliteration: Sa'aşrifu 'an 'Aayaatiyal-lazeena yatakabbaroona fil-'ardi bighayril-haqq; wa 'iny- yaraw kulla 'Aayatil-laa yu'minoo bihaa wa 'iny- yaraw sabeelar-rushdi laa yattakhizoohu sabeelaa; wa'iny-yaraw sabeelal-ghayyi yattakhizoohu sabeelaa; zaalika bi'annahum kazzaboo bi-'Aayaatinaa wa kaanoo 'anhaa ghaafileen.
verses.translation: Aur jald hi main apni nishaaniyon se un logon (ki nigaahon) ko pher dunga jo zameen mein naa haq takabbur karte hain, aur agar woh tamaam nishaaniyaan dekh len to bhi un par eemaan nahin laayenge, aur agar woh hidaayat ki raah dekh len to use ikhtiyaar nahin karenge, aur agar woh gumraahi ka raastah dekh len to use ikhtiyaar karlenge, yeh isliye ke unhon ne hamaari nishaaniyon ko jhutlaaya aur woh unse ghaafil rahe.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا وَلِقَآءِ ٱلْءَاخِرَةِ حَبِطَتْ أَعْمَـٰلُهُمْ ۚ هَلْ يُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena kazzaboo bi-'Aayaatinaa wa liqaaa'il-'Aakhirati habitat 'a'maaluhum; hal yujzawna 'illaa maa kaanoo ya maloon.
verses.translation: Aur woh log jinhon ne hamaari nishaaniyon aur aakhirat ki mulaaqaat ko juhtlaaya, unke amal barbaad ho gaye, unhein wahi badlah diya jaayega jo kuchh woh (dunya mein) karte rahe the.

verses.arabic: وَٱتَّخَذَ قَوْمُ مُوسَىٰ مِنۢ بَعْدِهِۦ مِنْ حُلِيِّهِمْ عِجْلًۭا جَسَدًۭا لَّهُۥ خُوَارٌ ۚ أَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ أَنَّهُۥ لَا يُكَلِّمُهُمْ وَلَا يَهْدِيهِمْ سَبِيلًا ۘ ٱتَّخَذُوهُ وَكَانُوا۟ ظَـٰلِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wattakhaza qawmu Moosaa mim ba'dihee min huliyyihim 'ijlan jasadal-lahoo khuwaar; 'alam yaraw 'annahoo laa yukallimuhum wa laa yahdeehim sabeelaa; 'ittakhazoohu wa kaanoo zaalimeen.
verses.translation: Aur Moosa ki qaum ne unke (toor par jaane ke) ba'd apne zewraat se ek bachhda bana liya, woh ek jism tha jiski aawaaz gaaye ki thi. kiya unhon ne nahin dekha ke woh un se kalaam nahin karta aur na unhein koyi raastah bataata hai? (phir bhi) unhon ne use (ma'bood) bana liya aur woh zaalim the.¹
verses.deepMeaning: • Moosa عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام jab 40 raaton ke liye kooh-e-toor par gaye to peechhe se saamri naami shakhs ne sone ke zewraat ekhatthhe karke ek bachhda tayyaar kiya jis mein usne Jibrayeel ke ghode ke simon ke neeche ki mitti bhi, jo usne sambhaal kar rakkhi huyi thi, shaamil kardi, jis mein Allah ne zindagi ki taaseer rakkhi thi, jis ki wajah se bachhda kuchh kuchh bail ki aawaaz nikaalta tha (go waazeh kalaam karne aur rahnumaayi karne se aajiz tha jaisa ke qur'an ke alfaaz waazeh kar rahe hain.) iss mein ikhtelaaf hai ke woh filwaaqe' gosht post ka bachhda ban gaya tha ya tha woh sone ka hi lekin kisi tareeqe se iss mein hawa daakhil hoti to gaaye, bail ki si aawaaz uss mein se nikalti. (Ibne Katheer)

verses.arabic: وَلَمَّا سُقِطَ فِىٓ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَرَأَوْا۟ أَنَّهُمْ قَدْ ضَلُّوا۟ قَالُوا۟ لَئِن لَّمْ يَرْحَمْنَا رَبُّنَا وَيَغْفِرْ لَنَا لَنَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلْخَـٰسِرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa lammaa suqita feee 'aydeehim wa ra'aw 'annahum qad dalloo qaaloo la'il-lam yarhamnaa Rabbunaa wa yaghfir lanaa lanakoonanna minal- khaasireen.
verses.translation: Aur jab unhein sharmindagi huyi aur unhon ne dekha ke woh gumraah ho gaye hain to kahne lage: agar hamaare rab ne hum par raham na kiya aur hamein na bakhsha to hum zaroor khasaarah paane waalon mein (shaamil) ho jaayenge.

verses.arabic: وَلَمَّا رَجَعَ مُوسَىٰٓ إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦ غَضْبَٰنَ أَسِفًۭا قَالَ بِئْسَمَا خَلَفْتُمُونِى مِنۢ بَعْدِىٓ ۖ أَعَجِلْتُمْ أَمْرَ رَبِّكُمْ ۖ وَأَلْقَى ٱلْأَلْوَٰحَ وَأَخَذَ بِرَأْسِ أَخِيهِ يَجُرُّهُۥٓ إِلَيْهِ ۖ قَالَ ٱبْنَ أُمَّ إِنَّ ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱسْتَضْعَفُونِى وَكَادُوا۟ يَقْتُلُونَنِى ۖ فَلَا تُشْمِتْ بِىَ ٱلْأَعْدَآءَ وَلَا تَجْعَلْنِى مَعَ ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa lammaa raja'a Moosaaa 'ilaa qawmihee ghadbaana 'asifan qaala bi'samaa khalaftumoonee mim ba'dee 'a'ajiltum 'amra Rabbikum wa 'alqal-'alwaaha wa 'akhaza bira'si 'akheehi yajurruhooo 'ilayh; qaalab-na-'umma 'innal- qawmas-tad'afoonee wa kadoo yaqtuloonanee; falaa tushmit biyal- 'a'daaa'a wa laa taj'alnee maʻal-qawmiz-zaalimeen.
verses.translation: Aur jab Moosa ghusse aur ranj mein bhare apni qaum ke paas waapas aaye to (unse) kaha: mere (jaane ke) ba'd tum bahut bure janasheen huye ho! kiya tumne apne rab ke hukm se (munh modne mein) jaldi ki? aur unhon ne (tauraat ki) takhtiyaan (zameen par) daal din aur apne bhaai ka sar pakad liya aur use apni taraf kheenchne lage. (uss par) Haaroon ne kaha: aye maan jaaye! beshak in logon ne mujhe kamzor samjha aur woh mujhe qatl karne par utar aaye the. chunaancheh tu dushmanon ko mujh par hansne ka moqa na de aur mujhe un logon ke saath shaamil na kar jo zaalim hain.

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱغْفِرْ لِى وَلِأَخِى وَأَدْخِلْنَا فِى رَحْمَتِكَ ۖ وَأَنتَ أَرْحَمُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala Rabbigh-fir lee wa li'akhee wa 'adkhilnaa fee rahmatika wa 'Anta 'arhamur- raahimeen.
verses.translation: Moosa ne kaha: aye mere rab! tu mujhe aur mere bhaai ko bakhsh de aur hamein apni rahmat mein daakhil farma, aur tu sab mehar baaonon se ziyaadah raham karne waala hai.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ ٱلْعِجْلَ سَيَنَالُهُمْ غَضَبٌۭ مِّن رَّبِّهِمْ وَذِلَّةٌۭ فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا ۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُفْتَرِينَ
verses.transliteration: 'Innal-lazeenat- takhazul-'ijla sayanaaluhum ghadabum-mir-Rabbihim wa zillatun fil-hayaatid- dunyaa; wa kazaalika najzil-muftareen.
verses.translation: Beshak woh log jinhon ne bachhde ko ma'bood banaaya, jald hi unke rab ka ghazab un par aan pahunchega aur (unhein) dunya ki zindagi mein zillat naseeb hogi aur hum bohtaan baandhne waalon ko aisi hi saza deiya karte hain.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ عَمِلُوا۟ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ ثُمَّ تَابُوا۟ مِنۢ بَعْدِهَا وَءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ مِنۢ بَعْدِهَا لَغَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena 'amilus- sayyi'aati summa taaboo mim ba'dihaa wa 'aamanooo 'inna Rabbaka mim ba'dihaa la-Ghafoorur-Raheem.
verses.translation: Aur woh log jinhon ne bure amal kiye, phir unke ba'd taubah ki aur eemaan le aaye, beshak aap ka rab uske ba'd (zaroor unhein bakhsh dega kyun ke woh) bahut bakhshne waala, nehaayat raham karne waala hai.

verses.arabic: وَلَمَّا سَكَتَ عَن مُّوسَى ٱلْغَضَبُ أَخَذَ ٱلْأَلْوَٰحَ ۖ وَفِى نُسْخَتِهَا هُدًۭى وَرَحْمَةٌۭ لِّلَّذِينَ هُمْ لِرَبِّهِمْ يَرْهَبُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa lammaa sakata 'am-Moosal-ghadabu 'akhazal-'alwaaha wa fee nuskhatihaa hudañw- wa rahmatul-lillazeena hum li-Rabbihim yarhaboon.
verses.translation: Aur jab Moosa ka ghussa thhanda huwa to ussne (tauraat ki) takhtiyaan uthhalin aur un ke mazaameen mein unke liye hidaayat aur rahmat thi jo apne rab se darte the.

verses.arabic: وَٱخْتَارَ مُوسَىٰ قَوْمَهُۥ سَبْعِينَ رَجُلًۭا لِّمِيقَـٰتِنَا ۖ فَلَمَّآ أَخَذَتْهُمُ ٱلرَّجْفَةُ قَالَ رَبِّ لَوْ شِئْتَ أَهْلَكْتَهُم مِّن قَبْلُ وَإِيَّـٰىَ ۖ أَتُهْلِكُنَا بِمَا فَعَلَ ٱلسُّفَهَآءُ مِنَّآ ۖ إِنْ هِىَ إِلَّا فِتْنَتُكَ ۖ تُضِلُّ بِهَا مَن تَشَآءُ وَتَهْدِى مَن تَشَآءُ ۖ أَنتَ وَلِيُّنَا فَٱغْفِرْ لَنَا وَٱرْحَمْنَا ۖ وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ ٱلْغَـٰفِرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wakhtaara Moosaa qawmahoo sab'eena rajulal-limeeqaatinaa falammaaa 'akhazathumur-rajfatu qaala Rabbi law shi'ta 'ahlaktahum min qablu wa 'iyyaaya 'atuhlikunaa bimaa fa'alas-sufahaaa'u minnaa 'in hiya 'illaa fitnatuka tudillu bihaa man tashaaa'u wa tahdee man tashaaa'u 'Anta waliyyunaa faghfir lanaa warhamnaa wa 'Anta khayrul- ghaafireen.
verses.translation: Aur Moosa ne apni qaum mein se sattar aadmi hamaare muqarrarah waqt (par kooh-e-toor par taubah- o-istaghfaar) ke liye chune, phir jab unko zalzale ne aa pakda to Moosa ne kaha: aye mere rab! agar tu chaahta to isse pahle hi unhein aur mujhe bhi halaak kardeta, kiya tu uski wajah se hamein halaak karta hai jo hum mein se bewaqoofon ne kiya? yeh teri taraf se aazaamyish ke siwa kuchh nahin, too uss (aazmaayish) se jise chaahta hai gumraah karta hai aur jise chaahta hai hidaayat deta hai, tu hi hamaara kaar saaz hai, lehaaza hamen bakhsh de aur hum par raham farma aur tu hi behtareen bakhashne waala hai.

verses.arabic: وَٱكْتُبْ لَنَا فِى هَـٰذِهِ ٱلدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةًۭ وَفِى ٱلْءَاخِرَةِ ۖ إِنَّا هُدْنَآ إِلَيْكَ ۚ قَالَ عَذَابِىٓ أُصِيبُ بِهِۦ مَنْ أَشَآءُ ۖ وَرَحْمَتِى وَسِعَتْ كُلَّ شَىْءٍۢ ۚ فَسَأَكْتُبُهَا لِلَّذِينَ يَتَّقُونَ وَيُؤْتُونَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.transliteration: Waktub lanaa fee haazihid-dunyaa hasanatanw-wa fil- 'Aakhirati 'innaa hudnaaa 'ilayk; qaala 'azaabeee 'uşeebu bihee man 'ashaaa'u wa rahmatee wasi'at kulla shay'; fasa'aktubuhaa lillazeena yattaqoona wa yu'toonaz-Zakaata wallazeena hum bi- 'Aayaatinaa yu'minoon.
verses.translation: Aur tu hamaare liye iss dunya mein bhi aur aakhirat mein bhi bhalaayi likh de, beshak humne teri hi taraf ruju' kiya hai, Allah ne kaha: Main jise chaahta hoon apna azaab pahunchaata hoon aur meri rahmat ne har cheez ko gher rakkha hai, chunaancheh jald hi main iss (rahmat) ko un logon ke liye likh dunga jo parhez gaar hain aur zakaat dete hain aur (unke liye bhi) jo hamaari aayaton par eemaan laate hain.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَتَّبِعُونَ ٱلرَّسُولَ ٱلنَّبِىَّ ٱلْأُمِّىَّ ٱلَّذِى يَجِدُونَهُۥ مَكْتُوبًا عِندَهُمْ فِى ٱلتَّوْرَىٰةِ وَٱلْإِنجِيلِ يَأْمُرُهُم بِٱلْمَعْرُوفِ وَيَنْهَىٰهُمْ عَنِ ٱلْمُنكَرِ وَيُحِلُّ لَهُمُ ٱلطَّيِّبَـٰتِ وَيُحَرِّمُ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْخَبَـٰٓئِثَ وَيَضَعُ عَنْهُمْ إِصْرَهُمْ وَٱلْأَغْلَـٰلَ ٱلَّتِى كَانَتْ عَلَيْهِمْ ۚ فَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ بِهِۦ وَعَزَّرُوهُ وَنَصَرُوهُ وَٱتَّبَعُوا۟ ٱلنُّورَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أُنزِلَ مَعَهُۥٓ ۙ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُفْلِحُونَ
verses.transliteration: Allazeena yattabi'oonar-Rasoolan- Nabiyyal-'ummiyyal- lazee yajidoonahoo maktooban 'indahum fit- Tawraati wal-'Injeeli ya'muruhum bilma'roofi wa yanhaahum 'anil- munkari wa yuhillu lahumut-tayyibaati wa yuharrimu 'alayhimul- khabaaa'isa wa yada'u 'anhum 'işrahum wal'aghlaalal-latee kaanat 'alayhim; fallazeena 'aamanoo bihee wa 'azzaroohu wa naşaroohu wattaba'un- nooral-lazeee 'unzila ma'ahooo 'ulaaa'ika humul-muflihoon.
verses.translation: (Ya'ni) woh log jo uss Rasool-e-Ummi Nabi (Muhammad ﷺ ) ki pairwi karte hain jis ka zikr woh apne haan tauraat aur injeel mein likha paate hain,¹ woh unhein achchhe kaamon ka hukm deta hai aur unhein bure kaamon se rokta hai. aur woh unke liye paakeezah cheezein halaal karta hai aur un par naapaak cheezen haraam thhahraata hai, aur un par se unke bojh aur woh tauq utaarta hai jo un par the, chunaancheh jo log uss par eemaan laaye aur unhon ne uski ta'zeem ki aur uski madad ki aur uss noor (hidaayat) ki pairwi ki jo uss par naazil kiya gaya, wahi log falaah paane waale hain.
verses.deepMeaning: Tauraat aur Injeel mein unke asal matan ke maskh ho jaane ke baa wajood Muhammad ﷺ ki be'sat ke baare mein badi waazeh peshan goyiyaan maujood hain. masalan: Istesnaa: 18,18, 21,21,21, Zaboor: 118,22,23, Yas'ayaah:42:1-13, hubqooq:3:3-4, Injeel Mati:21:42-43 aur Injeel Yuhanna:14:12-17,26:7-14 doosre maqaam par Allah ne farmaya: 'Aye ahle-e-kitab! (Yahood-o- Nasaara) eemaan le aao uss qura'n par jo hum ne naazil kiya hai woh iss (kitab) ki bhi tasdeeq karta hai jo tumhaare paas pahle se maujood hai, qabl iske ke hum (logon ke) chehre bigaad kar peechhe pher dein ya isi tarah hum un par la'nat karein jis tarah hum ne 'As haab-e-sabt' par la'nat ki thi aur yaad rakkho! Allah ka hukm naafiz ho kar rahta hai.' Surah Nisa:4/47) mazeed mulaahazah ho: (Surah Hadeed:57/27-28)

verses.arabic: قُلْ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ إِنِّى رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ إِلَيْكُمْ جَمِيعًا ٱلَّذِى لَهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ يُحْىِۦ وَيُمِيتُ ۖ فَـَٔامِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ ٱلنَّبِىِّ ٱلْأُمِّىِّ ٱلَّذِى يُؤْمِنُ بِٱللَّهِ وَكَلِمَـٰتِهِۦ وَٱتَّبِعُوهُ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَهْتَدُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qul yaaa 'ayyuhan- naasu 'innee Rasoolul- laahi 'ilaykum jamee'anil- lazee lahoo mulkus- samaawaati wal'ardi laaa ilaaha 'illaa Huwa yuhyee wa yumeetu fa'aaminoo billaahi wa Rasoolihin-Nabiyyil- 'ummiyyil-lazee yu'minu billaahi wa Kalimaatihee wattabi'oohu laʻallakum tahtadoon.
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: aye logo! beshak main tum sab ki taraf Allah ka Rasool hoon jiske paas aasmaanon aur zameen ki baadshaahi hai, uske siwa koyi mabood (barhaq) nahin, woh zindah karta aur maarta hai, lehaaza tum Allah par aur uske Rasool Ummi nabi par eemaan laao jo (khud bhi) Allah aur uske (tamaam) kalimaat par eemaan laata hai, aur tum uski pairwi karo taake tum hidaayat paao.

verses.arabic: وَمِن قَوْمِ مُوسَىٰٓ أُمَّةٌۭ يَهْدُونَ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَبِهِۦ يَعْدِلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa min qawmi Moosaaa 'ummatuñy- yahdoona bilhaqqi wa bihee ya'diloon.
verses.translation: Aur Moosa ki qaum mein se ek giroh (aisa) hai jo haq ke saath rahnumaayi karte hain aur usi (haq) ke saath adl karte hain.

verses.arabic: وَقَطَّعْنَـٰهُمُ ٱثْنَتَىْ عَشْرَةَ أَسْبَاطًا أُمَمًۭا ۚ وَأَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ إِذِ ٱسْتَسْقَىٰهُ قَوْمُهُۥٓ أَنِ ٱضْرِب بِّعَصَاكَ ٱلْحَجَرَ ۖ فَٱنبَجَسَتْ مِنْهُ ٱثْنَتَا عَشْرَةَ عَيْنًۭا ۖ قَدْ عَلِمَ كُلُّ أُنَاسٍۢ مَّشْرَبَهُمْ ۚ وَظَلَّلْنَا عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْغَمَـٰمَ وَأَنزَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْمَنَّ وَٱلسَّلْوَىٰ ۖ كُلُوا۟ مِن طَيِّبَٰتِ مَا رَزَقْنَـٰكُمْ ۚ وَمَا ظَلَمُونَا وَلَـٰكِن كَانُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ يَظْلِمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa natay 'ashrata 'asbaatan qatta'naahumus- 'umamaa; wa 'awhaynaaa 'ilaa Moosaaa 'izis-tasqaahu qawmuhooo 'anid-rib bi așaakal-hajara fambajasat minhus-nataa 'ashrata 'aynan qad 'alima kullu 'unaasim- mashrabahum; wa zallalnaa 'alayhimul- ghamaama wa 'anzalnaa 'alayhimul-Manna was- Salwaa kuloo min tayyibaati maa razaqnaakum; wa maa zalamoonaa wa laakin kaanooo 'anfusahum yazlimoon.
verses.translation: Aur humne un (Bani Israyeel) ko baarah qabeelon ke lehaaz se (baarah) girohon mein baant diya tha. aur jab Moosa ki qaum ne usse paani maanga to humne uski taraf wahi ki ke tu apna asaa (uss) pathhar par maar.(usne maara) to uss (patthar) se baarah chashme phoot nikle, tab har qabeele ne apna ghaat jaan liya, aur humne unpar baadalon ka saaya kiya, aur humne un par manna wa salwa¹ naazil kiya (aur kaha) jo paakeezah cheezen hum ne tumhen di hain, un mein se khaao. aur (uske ba'd) unhon ne (jo kuchh kiya, to) hum par zulm nahin kiya balke woh apne aap hi par zulm karte rahe.
verses.deepMeaning: Mulaahazah ho haashyah: (Surah Baqarah:2/57)

verses.arabic: وَإِذْ قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱسْكُنُوا۟ هَـٰذِهِ ٱلْقَرْيَةَ وَكُلُوا۟ مِنْهَا حَيْثُ شِئْتُمْ وَقُولُوا۟ حِطَّةٌۭ وَٱدْخُلُوا۟ ٱلْبَابَ سُجَّدًۭا نَّغْفِرْ لَكُمْ خَطِيٓـَٔـٰتِكُمْ ۚ سَنَزِيدُ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'iz qeela lahumus-kunoo haazihil- qaryata wa kuloo minhaa haysu shi'tum wa qooloo hittatunw- wadkhulul-baaba sujjadan-naghfir-lakum khateee'aatikum;- sanazeedul-muhsineen.
verses.translation: Aur jab unse kaha gaya: tum uss basti mein thhahro aur uss mein jahaan se ji chaahe khaao piyo (rizq haasil karo) aur kaho hittatun (hamein mu'aaf kar de) aur (shahar ke) darwaaze mein sajdah karte huye daakhil hona, to hum tumhaari khaatir tumhaari khataayen mu'aaf kardenge. phir hum neki karne waalon ko aur ziyaadah denge

verses.arabic: فَبَدَّلَ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ مِنْهُمْ قَوْلًا غَيْرَ ٱلَّذِى قِيلَ لَهُمْ فَأَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ رِجْزًۭا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَظْلِمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Fabaddalal-lazeena zalamoo minhum qawlan ghayral-lazee qeela lahum fa'arsalnaa 'alayhim rijzam-minas- samaaa'i bimaa kaanoo yazlimoon.
verses.translation: Phir un mein se jin logon ne zulm kiya tha, unhon ne uss lafz ko jis ka unhein hukm diya gaya tha, uske baraks badal daala, tab humne aasmaan se un par azaab bheja,¹ isliye ke woh zulm karte the.
verses.deepMeaning: Mulaahazah ho aayat-o-haashyah: (Surah Baqarah:2/59)

verses.arabic: وَسْـَٔلْهُمْ عَنِ ٱلْقَرْيَةِ ٱلَّتِى كَانَتْ حَاضِرَةَ ٱلْبَحْرِ إِذْ يَعْدُونَ فِى ٱلسَّبْتِ إِذْ تَأْتِيهِمْ حِيتَانُهُمْ يَوْمَ سَبْتِهِمْ شُرَّعًۭا وَيَوْمَ لَا يَسْبِتُونَ ۙ لَا تَأْتِيهِمْ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَبْلُوهُم بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَفْسُقُونَ
verses.transliteration: Was'alhum 'anil- qaryatil-latee kaanat haadiratal-bahr; 'iz ya'doona fis-Sabti 'iz ta'teehim heetaanuhum yawma Sabtihim shurra'anw-wa yawma laa yasbitoona laa ta'teehim; kazaalika nabloohum bimaa kaanoo yafsuqoon.
verses.translation: Aur (aye Nabi!) un (yahood-e-Madina) se uss basti (eila)¹ ke baare mein poochhein jo samandar ke saahil par waaqe thi, jab woh log sabt (hafte ke din) ke baare mein had se guzar jaate the jabke unke yaum- e-sabt ko un ki (shikaar ki) machhliyaan unke paas zaahir (paani ke oupar) aa jaati thin, aur jis din unka haftah na hota woh (unke paas) nahin aati thin. isi tarah hum unhein aazmaate the isliye ke -naafarmaani karte the.
verses.deepMeaning: Iss basti ki ta'ayyun mein ikhtelaaf hai koyi iska naam eila, koyi tabriya, koyi eiliya aur koyi sham ki koyi basti, jo smandur ke qareeb thi, batlaata hai.mufassireen ka ziyaadah rujhaan 'Eila' ki taraf hai jo Madyan aur kooh-e-toor ke darmiyaan daryaa-e-qulzum ke saahil par thi.

verses.arabic: وَإِذْ قَالَتْ أُمَّةٌۭ مِّنْهُمْ لِمَ تَعِظُونَ قَوْمًا ٱللَّهُ مُهْلِكُهُمْ أَوْ مُعَذِّبُهُمۡ عَذَابًۭا شَدِيدًۭا ۖ قَالُوا۟ مَعْذِرَةً إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُمْ وَلَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَّقُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'iz qaalat 'ummatum-minhum lima taʻizoona qawmanil- laahu muhlikuhum 'aw mu'azzibuhum 'azaaban shadeedan qaaloo ma ziratan 'ilaa Rabbikum wa la'allahum yattaqoon.
verses.translation: Aur jab un mein se ek giroh ne (doosre se) kaha: tum aise logon ko wa'z kyun karte ho jinhein Allah halaak karne waala hai ya sakht azaab dene waala hai? unhon ne jawaab diya: isliye ke (hum) tumhaare rab ke huzoor uzr kar sakein aur shaayad ke woh (Allah se) darein.

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّا نَسُوا۟ مَا ذُكِّرُوا۟ بِهِۦٓ أَنجَيْنَا ٱلَّذِينَ يَنْهَوْنَ عَنِ ٱلسُّوٓءِ وَأَخَذْنَا ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ بِعَذَابِۭ بَـِٔيسِۭ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَفْسُقُونَ
verses.transliteration: Falammaa nasoo maa zukkiroo biheee 'anjaynal-lazeena yanhawna 'anis-sooo'i wa akhaznal-lazeena zalamoo biʻazaabim- ba'eesim-bimaa kaanoo yafsuqoon.
verses.translation: Phir jab unhon ne woh baatein bhula din jink unhein naseehat ki gayi th to humne un logon ko najaat di jo bure kaam se rokte the, aur humne ur logon ko badtareen azaal ke saath pakad liya jinhor ne ziyaadati ki thi, iss liye ke woh naafarmaani karte the

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّا عَتَوْا۟ عَن مَّا نُهُوا۟ عَنْهُ قُلْنَا لَهُمْ كُونُوا۟ قِرَدَةً خَـٰسِـِٔينَ
verses.transliteration: Falammaa 'ataw 'am-maa nuhoo 'anhu qulnaa lahum koonoo qiradatan khaasi'een.
verses.translation: Phir jab unhon ne uss muaa'mle mein sar kashi ki jisse unhein roka gaya tha, to hum ne unse kaha: ho jaao zaleel bandar.

verses.arabic: وَإِذْ تَأَذَّنَ رَبُّكَ لَيَبْعَثَنَّ عَلَيْهِمْ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ مَن يَسُومُهُمْ سُوٓءَ ٱلْعَذَابِ ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَسَرِيعُ ٱلْعِقَابِ وَإِنَّهُۥ لَغَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'iz ta'azzana Rabbuka layabʻasanna 'alayhim 'ilaa Yawmil- Qiyaamati mañy- yasoomuhum sooo'al- 'azaab; 'inna Rabbaka lasaree'ul-iqaab; wa 'innahoo la-Ghafoorur- Raheem.
verses.translation: Aur (aye Nabi! yaad karo) jab Aapke rab ne (yahood ko) khabardaar kar diya tha ke woh qiyaamat tak un par aise shakhs ko zaroor musallat rakkhega jo unhein sakht azaab (ka mazah) chakhaata rahega. beshak aap ka rab bahut jald saza dene waala hai aur beshak woh bahut bakhsne waala, nehaayat raham karne waala hai.

verses.arabic: وَقَطَّعْنَـٰهُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ أُمَمًۭا ۖ مِّنْهُمُ ٱلصَّـٰلِحُونَ وَمِنْهُمْ دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ وَبَلَوْنَـٰهُم بِٱلْحَسَنَـٰتِ وَٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa qatta'naahum fil- 'ardi 'umaman minhumuş-şaalihoona wa minhum doona zaalika wa balawnaahum bilhasanaati wassayyi'aati laʻallahum yarji'oon.
verses.translation: Aur humne unheim qabeelon mein baant kar zameen mein phaila diya. un mein se kuchh nek the aur un mein se kuchh uske siwa (bad a'maal) the. aur hum ne unhein khush haali aur bad haali ke saath aazmaaya, shaayad ke woh (Allah ki taraf) laut aayein.

verses.arabic: فَخَلَفَ مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ خَلْفٌۭ وَرِثُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ يَأْخُذُونَ عَرَضَ هَـٰذَا ٱلْأَدْنَىٰ وَيَقُولُونَ سَيُغْفَرُ لَنَا ۚ وَإِن يَأْتِهِمْ عَرَضٌۭ مِّثْلُهُۥ يَأْخُذُوهُ ۚ أَلَمْ يُؤْخَذْ عَلَيْهِم مِّيثَـٰقُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ أَن لَّا يَقُولُوا۟ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ إِلَّا ٱلْحَقَّ وَدَرَسُوا۟ مَا فِيهِ ۗ وَٱلدَّارُ ٱلْءَاخِرَةُ خَيْرٌۭ لِّلَّذِينَ يَتَّقُونَ ۗ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Fakhalafa mim ba'dihim khalfunw- warisul-Kitaaba ya'khuzoona 'arada haazal-'adnaa wa yaqooloona sayughfaru lanaa wa 'iny-ya'tihim 'aradum-misluhoo ya'khuzooh; 'alam yu'khaz 'alayhim meesaaqul-Kitaabi 'al-laa yaqooloo 'alal-laahi 'illal-haqqa wa darasoo maa feeh; wad-Daarul- 'Aakhirtu khayrul- lillazeena yattaqoon; 'afalaa ta'qiloon.
verses.translation: Phir unke ba'd naa ahal unke jaanasheen bane, jo kitab (tauraat) ke waaris huye, woh adna (dunya ka) saamaan le lete hain aur kahte hain ke jald hamen bakhsh diya jaayega (magar unka haal yeh hai) ke agar uss jaisa ghatya (dunya ka) saamaan (dobaarah) un ke paas aaye to (baghair kisi aa'r ke) le len, kiya unse kitab (tauraat) mein pukhtah wa'dah nahin liya gaya tha ke woh Allah ke baare mein haq ke siwa (kuchh) na kahein? haalaanke unhon ne padh liya hai jo kuchh uss mein hai aur aakhirat ka ghar un logon ke liye bahut behtar hai jo parhez gaari ikhtiyaar karte hain.kiya phir tum samajhte nahin?

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُمَسِّكُونَ بِٱلْكِتَـٰبِ وَأَقَامُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ إِنَّا لَا نُضِيعُ أَجْرَ ٱلْمُصْلِحِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena yumassikoona bil-Kitaab wa 'aqaamuş-Şalaata 'innaa laa nudee'u 'ajral- musliheen.
verses.translation: Aur jo log kitab ko mazbooti se pakadte hain aur namaaz qaayem karte hain (unhein hum ajr denge), beshak hum neko kaaron ka ajr zaaye' nahin karte.

verses.arabic: وَإِذْ نَتَقْنَا ٱلْجَبَلَ فَوْقَهُمْ كَأَنَّهُۥ ظُلَّةٌۭ وَظَنُّوٓا۟ أَنَّهُۥ وَاقِعُۢ بِهِمْ ۖ خُذُوا۟ مَآ ءَاتَيْنَـٰكُم بِقُوَّةٍۢ وَٱذْكُرُوا۟ مَا فِيهِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَتَّقُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa iz nataqnal- jabala fawqahum ka'annahoo zullatuñw- wa zannooo 'annahoo waaqi'um bihim khuzoo maaa 'aataynaakum biquwwatinw-wazkuroo maa feehi la'allakum tattaqoon.
verses.translation: Aur jab humne un (ke saron) par pahaad uthha kar khada kiya goya woh ek- saayebaan tha, aur unhon ne khayaal kiya ke yaqeenan woh un par girne waala hai. (humne kaha:) iss (tauraat) ko jo hum ne tumhen di, quwwat ke saath pakdo aur jo kuchh uss mein hai usko yaad rakkho taake tum (bure kaamon se) bach jaao.

verses.arabic: وَإِذْ أَخَذَ رَبُّكَ مِنۢ بَنِىٓ ءَادَمَ مِن ظُهُورِهِمْ ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ وَأَشْهَدَهُمْ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمْ ۖ أَلَسْتُ بِرَبِّكُمْ ۖ قَالُوا۟ بَلَىٰ شَهِدْنَآ ۛ أَن تَقُولُوا۟ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ إِنَّا كُنَّا عَنْ هَـٰذَا غَـٰفِلِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'iz 'akhaza Rabbuka mim Baneee 'Aadama min zuhoorihim zurriyyatahum wa 'ashhadahum 'alaaa 'anfusihim 'alastu bi- Rabbikum qaaloo balaa shahidnaaa; 'an taqooloo Yawmal-Qiyaamati 'innaa kunnaa 'an haazaa ghaafileen.
verses.translation: Aur (aye nabi! yaad karo) jab aap ke rab ne bani aadam ki pushton se unki aulaad ko nikaala, aur unhein unki jaanon par gawaah banaaya (aur poochha:) kiya mein tumhaara rab nahin hoon? unhon ne kaha:kyun nahin! hum gawaahi dete hain. (Allah ne farmaya: yeh isliye) ke tum qiyaamat ke din yeh (na) kaho ke hum to iss baat se be khabar the.

verses.arabic: أَوْ تَقُولُوٓا۟ إِنَّمَآ أَشْرَكَ ءَابَآؤُنَا مِن قَبْلُ وَكُنَّا ذُرِّيَّةًۭ مِّنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ ۖ أَفَتُهْلِكُنَا بِمَا فَعَلَ ٱلْمُبْطِلُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Aw taqoolooo 'innamaaa 'ashraka 'aabaaa'unaa min qablu wa kunnaa zurriyyatam- mim ba'dihim 'afatuhlikunaa bimaa fa'alal-mubtiloon.
verses.translation: Yaa tum (yeh na) kaho ke beshak humse pahle hamaare baap daada ne shirk kiya tha aur hum unke ba'd (unki) aulaad the, phir kiya tu hamein uss (fe'l) ki wajah se halaak karta hai jo gumraah logon ne kiya tha?

verses.arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُفَصِّلُ ٱلْءَايَـٰتِ وَلَعَلَّهُمْ يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa kazaalika nufaşşilul-'Aayaati wa la'allahum yarji'oon.
verses.translation: Aur isi tarah hum aayatein khol khol kar bayaan karte hain, shaayad ke woh (log hamaari taraf) laut aayein.

verses.arabic: وَٱتْلُ عَلَيْهِمْ نَبَأَ ٱلَّذِىٓ ءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ ءَايَـٰتِنَا فَٱنسَلَخَ مِنْهَا فَأَتْبَعَهُ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ فَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلْغَاوِينَ
verses.transliteration: Watlu 'alayhim naba'al-lazeee 'aataynaahu 'Aayaatinaa fansalakha minhaa fa'atba'ahush- Shaytaanu fakaana minal-ghaaween.
verses.translation: Aur (aye Nabi!) unhein uss shakhs ki khabar padh sunaayen¹ jise humne apni aayaten di thin, magar woh un (ki paabadni) se nikal bhaaga to use shaytaan ne peechhe laga liya, phir woh gumraahon mein (shaamil) ho gaya.
verses.deepMeaning: Mufassireen ne ise kisi ek muta'ayyan shakhs se muta'alliq qaraar diya hai jise kitab-e-ilaahi ka ilm haasil tha lekin phir woh dunya aur shaytaan ke peechhe lag kar gumraah ho gaya, taahum uski ta'ayyun mein koyi mustanad baat marwi bhi nahin. isliye iss takalluf ki zaroorat nahin hai. yeh aam hai aur aise afraad har ummat aur har daur mein hote rahe hain, jo bhi iss sifat ka haamil hoga, woh iska misdaaq qaraar paayega.

verses.arabic: وَلَوْ شِئْنَا لَرَفَعْنَـٰهُ بِهَا وَلَـٰكِنَّهُۥٓ أَخْلَدَ إِلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَٱتَّبَعَ هَوَىٰهُ ۚ فَمَثَلُهُۥ كَمَثَلِ ٱلْكَلْبِ إِن تَحْمِلْ عَلَيْهِ يَلْهَثْ أَوْ تَتْرُكْهُ يَلْهَث ۚ ذَّٰلِكَ مَثَلُ ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا ۚ فَٱقْصُصِ ٱلْقَصَصَ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa law shi'naa larafa'naahu bihaa wa laakinnahooo 'akhlada 'ilal-'ardi wattaba'a hawaah; famasaluhoo kamasalil-kalb; 'in tahmil 'alayhi yalhas 'aw tatrukhu yalhas; zaalika masalul-qawmil-lazeena kazzaboo bi- 'Aayaatinaa; faqsuşil- qaşaşa la allahum yatafakkaroon.
verses.translation: Aur agar hum chaahte to un (aayaton) ke zariye se use buland darjah dete lekin woh zameen ki taraf jhuk pada aur apni khaahish ke peechhe lag gaya, chunaancheh uski misaal kutte ki si hai ke agar tu uss par hamlah kare to bhi haanpta hai aur agar tu use chhod de to bhi haanpta hai. yahi misaal un logon ki hai jinhon ne hamaari aayaat ko jhutlaaya, chunaancheh (aye Nabi!) Aap (yahood se) yeh qissa bayaan kardein, shaayad ke woh ghaur-o-fikr karein.

verses.arabic: سَآءَ مَثَلًۭا ٱلْقَوْمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا وَأَنفُسَهُمْ كَانُوا۟ يَظْلِمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Saaa'a masalanil- qawmul-lazeena kazzaboo bi-'Aayaatinaa wa 'anfusahum kaanoo yazlimoon.
verses.translation: Un logon ki misaal buri hai jinhon ne hamaari aayaton ko jhutlaaya aur woh apni jaanon par zulm karte the.

verses.arabic: مَن يَهْدِ ٱللَّهُ فَهُوَ ٱلْمُهْتَدِى ۖ وَمَن يُضْلِلْ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْخَـٰسِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: many-yahdil-laahu fahuwal-muhtadee wa many-yudlil fa'ulaaa'ika humul-khaasiroon.
verses.translation: Jise Allah hidaayat de, to wahi hidaayat paane waala hai aur jise (Allah) gumraah karde to yahi log khasaarah paane waale hain.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ ذَرَأْنَا لِجَهَنَّمَ كَثِيرًۭا مِّنَ ٱلْجِنِّ وَٱلْإِنسِ ۖ لَهُمْ قُلُوبٌۭ لَّا يَفْقَهُونَ بِهَا وَلَهُمْ أَعْيُنٌۭ لَّا يُبْصِرُونَ بِهَا وَلَهُمْ ءَاذَانٌۭ لَّا يَسْمَعُونَ بِهَآ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ كَٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ بَلْ هُمْ أَضَلُّ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْغَـٰفِلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad zara'naa li-jahannama minal-jinni wal'insi lahum quloobul-laa yafqahoona bihaa wa lahum 'a'yunul- laa yubşiroona bihaaa; wa lahum 'aazaanul-laa yasma'oona bihaa; 'ulaaa'ika kal'an'aami bal hum 'adall; 'ulaaa'ika humul-ghaafiloon.
verses.translation: Aur tahqeeq humne bahut se jin aur insaan dozakh ke liye paida kiye hain. unke dil to hain (magar) woh unse (haq ko) samajhte nahin, aur unki aankhein to hain (magar) woh unse (haq ko) dekhte nahin, aur unke kaan to hain (magar) woh unse (haq baat) sunte nahin. woh to chaupaayon ki tarah hain balke (unse bhi) ziyaadah gumraah hain, yahi log ghaafil hain.

verses.arabic: وَلِلَّهِ ٱلْأَسْمَآءُ ٱلْحُسْنَىٰ فَٱدْعُوهُ بِهَا ۖ وَذَرُوا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ يُلْحِدُونَ فِىٓ أَسْمَآئِهِۦ ۚ سَيُجْزَوْنَ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa lillaahil- 'Asmaaa'ul-Husnaa fad'oohu bihaa wa zarul- lazeena yulhidoona feee 'Asmaaa'ih; sayujzawna maa kaanoo ya'maloon.
verses.translation: Aur Allah hi ke liye achchhe achchhe naam hain,¹ lehaaza tum use un (naamon) se pukaaro, aur chhod do un logon ko jo uske naamon mein kaj rawi ikhtiyaar karte hain. woh jo kuchh kar rahe hain, jald uski saza paayenge.
verses.deepMeaning: Rasoolullah ﷺ ne farmaya: 'Allah Ta'ala ke 99 naam hain, unhein jo koyi bhi yaad karega jannat mein daakhil hoga aur Allah witr (taaq) hai aur witr ko pasand karta hai.(Sahih Bukhari, Ad-Dawaat, Baab:68, Hadees:6410)

verses.arabic: وَمِمَّنْ خَلَقْنَآ أُمَّةٌۭ يَهْدُونَ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَبِهِۦ يَعْدِلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa mimman khalaqnaaa 'ummatuñy- yahdoona bilhaqqi wa bihee ya'diloon.
verses.translation: Aur jinhen hum ne paida kiya un mein se ek giroh (un logon ka) hai jo haq ka raastah bataate hain aur usi ke saath insaaf karte hain.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا سَنَسْتَدْرِجُهُم مِّنْ حَيْثُ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena kazzaboo bi-'Aayaatinaa sanastadrijuhum min haysu laa ya'lamoon.
verses.translation: Aur jin logon ne hamaari aayaton ko jhutlaaya, hum zaroor unhein batadreej pakdenge jahaan se unhen ilm tak na hoga.

verses.arabic: وَأُمْلِى لَهُمْ ۚ إِنَّ كَيْدِى مَتِينٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'umlee lahum; 'inna kaydee mateen.
verses.translation: Aur main unhein mohlat deta hoon, beshak meri tadbeer nehaayat mazboot hai.

verses.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَتَفَكَّرُوا۟ ۗ مَا بِصَاحِبِهِم مِّن جِنَّةٍ ۚ إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا نَذِيرٌۭ مُّبِينٌ
verses.transliteration: 'Awalam yatafakkaroo maa bisaahibihim-min jinnah; 'in huwa 'illaa nazeerum- mubeen.
verses.translation: Kiya unhon ne ghaur nahin kiya ke unke saathi (Nabi) ko koyi junoon (laahaq) nahin? woh to saaf saaf (Allah ke azaab se) daraane waale hain.

verses.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَنظُرُوا۟ فِى مَلَكُوتِ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ مِن شَىْءٍۢ وَأَنْ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ قَدِ ٱقْتَرَبَ أَجَلُهُمْ ۖ فَبِأَىِّ حَدِيثٍۭ بَعْدَهُۥ يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'A walam yanzuroo fee malakootis- samaawaati wal'ardi wa maa khalaqal-laahu min shay'inw-wa 'an 'asaaa any-yakoona qadiq- taraba 'ajaluhum fabi'ayyi hadeesim ba'dahoo yu'minoon.
verses.translation: Kiya unhon ne aasmaanon aur zameen ki badshaahi mein aur jo cheezen Allah ne paida ki hain un par nazar nahin daali, aur (uss par ghaur nahin kiya ke) shaayad unki maut qareeb aa gayi ho? phir iss (qur'an) ke ba'd woh kiss baat par eemaan laayenge?

verses.arabic: مَن يُضْلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَلَا هَادِىَ لَهُۥ ۚ وَيَذَرُهُمْ فِى طُغْيَـٰنِهِمْ يَعْمَهُونَ
verses.transliteration: Many-yudlilil-laahu falaa haadiya lah; wa yazaruhum fee tughyaanihim ya mahoon.
verses.translation: Jise Allah gumraah karde to use koyi hidaayat dene waala nahin, aur woh unhein chhod deta hai ke woh apni sarkashi mein bhatakte phirein.

verses.arabic: يَسْـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلسَّاعَةِ أَيَّانَ مُرْسَىٰهَا ۖ قُلْ إِنَّمَا عِلْمُهَا عِندَ رَبِّى ۖ لَا يُجَلِّيهَا لِوَقْتِهَآ إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ ثَقُلَتْ فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ لَا تَأْتِيكُمْ إِلَّا بَغْتَةًۭ ۗ يَسْـَٔلُونَكَ كَأَنَّكَ حَفِىٌّ عَنْهَا ۖ قُلْ إِنَّمَا عِلْمُهَا عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Yas'aloonaka 'anis- Saa'ati 'ayyaana mursaahaa qul 'innamaa 'ilmuhaa 'inda Rabbee laa yujalleehaa liwaqtihaaa 'illaa Hoo; saqulat fis-samaawaati wal'ard; laa ta'teekum 'illaa baghtah; yas'aloonaka ka'annaka hafiyyun 'anhaa qul 'innamaa 'ilmuhaa 'indal-laahi wa laakinna 'aksaran-naasi laa yalamoon.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) woh log aapse qiyaamat ke baare mein sawaal karte hain ke uske waage hone ka waqt kaunsa hai? hai kah deejiye: uska ilm to mere rab hi ke paas hai, wahi use uske waqt hi par zaahir karega. woh aasmaanon aur zameen mein bhaari (haadsah) hogi. woh (qiyaamat) tumhaare paas bas achaanak hi aayegi. woh (log) Aap se sawaal karte hain jaise aap uss (ke waqt) se bakhoobi waaqif hain. kah deejiye: iska ilm to sirf Allah ke paas hai lekin aksar log nahin jaante.

verses.arabic: قُل لَّآ أَمْلِكُ لِنَفْسِى نَفْعًۭا وَلَا ضَرًّا إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ وَلَوْ كُنتُ أَعْلَمُ ٱلْغَيْبَ ٱسْتَكْثَرْتُ مِنَ ٱلْخَيْرِ وَمَا مَسَّنِىَ ٱلسُّوٓءُ ۚ إِنْ أَنَا۠ إِلَّا نَذِيرٌۭ وَبَشِيرٌۭ لِّقَوْمٍۢ يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qullaaa 'amliku linafsee nafañw-wa laa darran 'illaa maa shaaa'al-laah; wa law kuntu 'a'lamul-ghayba lastaksartu minal-khayri wa maa massaniyas- sooo'; 'in 'ana 'illaa nazeeruñw-wa basheerul-liqawminy- yu'minoon.
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: main apni jaan ke liye nafa aur nuqsaan ka ikhtiyaar nahin rakhta, magar jo Allah chaahe, aur agar main ghaib jaanta hota to bahut si bhalaayiyaan haasil kar leta aur mujhe koyi takleef na pahunchti, main to daraane waala aur khushkhabri sunaane waalal hoon un logon ko jo eemaan laate hain.

verses.arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَكُم مِّن نَّفْسٍۢ وَٰحِدَةٍۢ وَجَعَلَ مِنْهَا زَوْجَهَا لِيَسْكُنَ إِلَيْهَا ۖ فَلَمَّا تَغَشَّىٰهَا حَمَلَتْ حَمْلًا خَفِيفًۭا فَمَرَّتْ بِهِۦ فَلَمَّآ أَثْقَلَت دَّعَوَا ٱللَّهَ رَبَّهُمَا لَئِنْ ءَاتَيْتَنَا صَـٰلِحًۭا لَّنَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلشَّـٰكِرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Huwal-lazee khalaqakum min nafsinw- waahidatinw-wa ja ala minhaa zawjahaa liyaskuna 'ilayhaa falammaa taghashshaahaa hamalat hamlan khafeefan famarrat bihee falammaaa 'asqalad- da'awal-laaha Rabbahumaa la'in 'aataytanaa saalihal- lanakoonanna minash- shaakireen.
verses.translation: Woh (Allah) hi to hai jisne tumhein ek jaan (Aadam) se paida kiya aur usse uska joda banaaya taake woh usse sukoon haasil kare, phir jab uss (kisi mard) ne beewi se sohbat ki to use halka sa hamal ho gaya, to woh use liye phirti rahi, phir jab woh bojhal ho gayi to un donon ne apne rab, Allah se dua' ki ke agar toone hamen tandurust (bachcha) diya to hum zaroor tere shukr guzaaron mein se honge.

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّآ ءَاتَىٰهُمَا صَـٰلِحًۭا جَعَلَا لَهُۥ شُرَكَآءَ فِيمَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمَا ۚ فَتَعَـٰلَى ٱللَّهُ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
verses.transliteration: Falammaaa 'aataahumaa saalihan ja'alaa lahoo shurakaaa'a feemaaa 'aataahumaa; fata'aalal- laahu 'ammaa yushrikoon.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh jab Allah ne unhen tandurust bachcha diya to unhon ne uss (bachche) mein jo Allah ne unhein diya tha, uske shareek thhahraa liye, Allah to usse bahut ouncha hai jo woh shirk karte hain.

verses.arabic: أَيُشْرِكُونَ مَا لَا يَخْلُقُ شَيْـًۭٔا وَهُمْ يُخْلَقُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'A yushrikoona maa laa yakhluqu shay'anw- wa hum yukhlaqoon.
verses.translation: Kiya woh unko (Allah ke) shareek thhahraate hain jo koyi cheez bhi paida nahin karte jab ke woh to khud paida kiye jaate hian.

verses.arabic: وَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ لَهُمْ نَصْرًۭا وَلَآ أَنفُسَهُمْ يَنصُرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laa yastatee'oona lahum naşranw-wa laaa 'anfusahum yanșuroon.
verses.translation: Aur woh un (mushrikeen) ki madad karne ki taaqat nahin rakhte aur na apni madad hi kar sakte hain.

verses.arabic: وَإِن تَدْعُوهُمْ إِلَى ٱلْهُدَىٰ لَا يَتَّبِعُوكُمْ ۚ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيْكُمْ أَدَعَوْتُمُوهُمْ أَمْ أَنتُمْ صَـٰمِتُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'in tad'oohum Pilal-hudaa laa yattabi'ookum; sawaaa'un 'alaykum 'ada'awtumoohum 'am 'antum şaamitoon.
verses.translation: Aur agar tum unhein hidaayat ki taraf bulaao to woh tumhaari pairwi nahin karenge. tumhaare liye baraabar hai ke tum unhein (hidaayat ki taraf) bulaao ya khaamoosh ho raho.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ تَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ عِبَادٌ أَمْثَالُكُمْ ۖ فَٱدْعُوهُمْ فَلْيَسْتَجِيبُوا۟ لَكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
verses.transliteration: 'Innal-lazeena tad'oona min doonil-laahi 'ibaadun 'amsaalukum fad'oohum falyastajeeboo lakum 'in kuntum şaadiqeen.
verses.translation: (Aye mushriko!) beshak woh log jinhein tum Allah ke siwa pukaarte ho woh tumhi jaise bande hain (achchha to) jab tum unko pukaaro to unhein tumhaari pukaar ka jawaab dena chaahiye agar tum sachche ho.

verses.arabic: أَلَهُمْ أَرْجُلٌۭ يَمْشُونَ بِهَآ ۖ أَمْ لَهُمْ أَيْدٍۢ يَبْطِشُونَ بِهَآ ۖ أَمْ لَهُمْ أَعْيُنٌۭ يُبْصِرُونَ بِهَآ ۖ أَمْ لَهُمْ ءَاذَانٌۭ يَسْمَعُونَ بِهَا ۗ قُلِ ٱدْعُوا۟ شُرَكَآءَكُمْ ثُمَّ كِيدُونِ فَلَا تُنظِرُونِ
verses.transliteration: 'A lahum 'arjuluny- yamshoona bihaaa 'am lahum 'aydiny- yabtishoona bihaaa 'am lahum 'a'yunuñy- yubşiroona bihaaa 'am lahum 'aazaanuñy-yasma'oona bihaa; qulid- 'oo shurakaaa'akum summa keedooni falaa tunziroon.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi! mushrikeen se poochhiye) kiya unke (maboodon ke) aise paaon hain ke woh unse chalte hon? kiya unke aise haath hain ke woh unse pakadte hon? kiya unki aisi aankhein hain ke woh unse dekhte hon? kiya un ke aise kaan hain ke woh unse sunte hon? kah deejiye: tum apne shareekon ko bulaao, phir tum mere khilaaf (jo chaaho) tadbeer karo, phir mujhe mohlat na do (phir dekho woh mera kiya bigaadte hain)

verses.arabic: إِنَّ وَلِيِّىَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِى نَزَّلَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ ۖ وَهُوَ يَتَوَلَّى ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
verses.transliteration: 'Inna waliyyiyal- laahul-lazee nazzalal- Kitaaba wa Huwa yatawallaş-şaaliheen.
verses.translation: (Kah deejiye:) beshak mera kaar saaz to Allah hi hai jisne yeh kitab naazil ki, aur wahi nek logon ki kaarsaazi karta hai.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ تَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِهِۦ لَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ نَصْرَكُمْ وَلَآ أَنفُسَهُمْ يَنصُرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena tad'oona min doonihee laa yastatee'oona naşrakum wa laaa 'anfusahum yansuroon.
verses.translation: Aur jinhein tum Allah ke siwa pukaarte ho, woh tumhaari madad karne ki salaahiyat nahin rakhte aur na woh apni mdad kar sakte hain.

verses.arabic: وَإِن تَدْعُوهُمْ إِلَى ٱلْهُدَىٰ لَا يَسْمَعُوا۟ ۖ وَتَرَىٰهُمْ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَيْكَ وَهُمْ لَا يُبْصِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'in tad'oohum 'ilal-hudaa laa yasma'oo wa taraahum yanzuroona 'ilayka wa hum laa yubșiroon.
verses.translation: Aur agar tum unhein hidaayat ki taraf bulaao to woh sun na paayenge, aur (Aye Nabi!) Aap unhein dekhte hain ke (bazaahir) woh aapki taraf dekh rahe hain, haalaanke woh nahin dekhte.

verses.arabic: خُذِ ٱلْعَفْوَ وَأْمُرْ بِٱلْعُرْفِ وَأَعْرِضْ عَنِ ٱلْجَـٰهِلِينَ
verses.transliteration: khuzil-'afwa wa'mur bil'urfi wa 'a'rid 'anil- jaahileen.
verses.translation: Aap (unse) dar guzar keejiye aur nek kaam ka hukm deejiye aur jaahilon se kanaarah keejiye.

verses.arabic: وَإِمَّا يَنزَغَنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنِ نَزْغٌۭ فَٱسْتَعِذْ بِٱللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'immaa yanzaghannaka minash- Shaytaani nazghun fasta'iz billaah; 'innahoo Samee'un 'Aleem.
verses.translation: Aur agar aapko shaytaan ka koyi waswasah ubhaare to Allah ki panaah maangiye, beshak woh khoob sunne waala, khoob jaanne waala hai.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوْا۟ إِذَا مَسَّهُمْ طَـٰٓئِفٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنِ تَذَكَّرُوا۟ فَإِذَا هُم مُّبْصِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Innal-lazeenat- taqaw 'izaa massahum taaa'ifum-minash- Shaytaani tazakkaroo fa'izaa hummubşiroon.
verses.translation: Beshak jin logon ne taqwa ikhtiyaar kiya jab unhen shaytaan ki taraf se koyi waswasah aa leta hai to woh chaunk padte hain, phir woh yakaa yak soojh boojh waale ho jaate hain.

verses.arabic: وَإِخْوَٰنُهُمْ يَمُدُّونَهُمْ فِى ٱلْغَىِّ ثُمَّ لَا يُقْصِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'ikhwaanuhum yamuddoonahum fil- ghayyi sum-ma laa yuqsiroon.
verses.translation: Aur unke bhaai (shaytaan) unhein gumraahi mein kheench le jaate hain aur woh uss mein koyi kami nahin karte.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا لَمْ تَأْتِهِم بِـَٔايَةٍۢ قَالُوا۟ لَوْلَا ٱجْتَبَيْتَهَا ۚ قُلْ إِنَّمَآ أَتَّبِعُ مَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَىَّ مِن رَّبِّى ۚ هَـٰذَا بَصَآئِرُ مِن رَّبِّكُمْ وَهُدًۭى وَرَحْمَةٌۭ لِّقَوْمٍۢ يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa izaa lam ta'tihim bi-'Aayatin qaaloo law laj- tabaytahaa; qul 'innamaaa 'attabi'u maa yoohaaa 'ilayya mir- Rabbee; haazaa başaaa'iru mir-Rabbikum wa hudanw-wa rahmatul- liqawminy-yu'minoon.
verses.translation: Aur (Aye Nabi!) jab Aap unke paas koyi nishaani nahin laate to woh kahte hain: tum khud kyun nahin banaa laaye?¹ kah deejiye: main to sirf uss cheez ka itteba' karta hoon jo meri taraf mere rab ki taraf se ki jaati hai yeh rab ki taraf se raushan dalaayel hain aur rahmat hai un logon ke liye jo eemaan laate hain.
verses.deepMeaning: Chunaancheh ek moqa' par Nabi ﷺ ne ahl-e-Makkah ko unke mutaalbe par ek azeem mo'jizah dikhaaya, jaise Anas bin Malik رضي الله عنه se rivaayat hai: 'Nabi ﷺ se ahl-e-Makkah ne kisi nishaani ka mutaalbah kiya, to aapne unhein chaand tukde hote huye dikhaaya.' (Sahih Bukhari, Al-Manaaqib, Hadees:3637) lekin uska unhein koyi faayedah nahin huwa. Isi liye Allah Ta'ala kuffaar ke kahne par bil-umoom mo'jizah nahin dikhaata tha, balke mo'jize ka zuhoor usi waqt hota tha jab Allah ki mashiyat hoti thi.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ ٱلْقُرْءَانُ فَٱسْتَمِعُوا۟ لَهُۥ وَأَنصِتُوا۟ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'izaa quri'al- Qur'aanu fastami'oo lahoo wa 'anșitoo la'allakum turhamoon.
verses.translation: Aur jab qur'an padhaa jaaye to use tawajjoh se (kaan lagaa kar) suno aur khaamoosh raho taake tum par raham kiya jaaye.

verses.arabic: وَٱذْكُر رَّبَّكَ فِى نَفْسِكَ تَضَرُّعًۭا وَخِيفَةًۭ وَدُونَ ٱلْجَهْرِ مِنَ ٱلْقَوْلِ بِٱلْغُدُوِّ وَٱلْءَاصَالِ وَلَا تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلْغَـٰفِلِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wazkur-Rabbaka fee nafsika tadarru'añw- wa kheefatanw-wa doonal-jahri minal-qawli bilghuduwwi wal'aasaali wa laa takum-minal- ghaafileen.
verses.translation: Aur (aye Nabi!) apne rab ko subah aur shaam apne dil mein yaad keejiye aa'jzi se aur darte huye, past aur halki aawaaz se aur aap ghaafilon mein (shaamil) na hon.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ عِندَ رَبِّكَ لَا يَسْتَكْبِرُونَ عَنْ عِبَادَتِهِۦ وَيُسَبِّحُونَهُۥ وَلَهُۥ يَسْجُدُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Innal-lazeena 'inda Rabbika laa yastakbiroona 'an 'ibaadatihee wa yusabbihoonahoo wa lahoo yasjudoon.
verses.translation: Beshak jo (farishte) aapke rab ke paas hain, woh uski ibaadat se takabbur nahin karte, woh uski tasbeeh bayaan karte hain aur usi ko woh sajdah karte hain.

verses.arabic: يَسْـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلْأَنفَالِ ۖ قُلِ ٱلْأَنفَالُ لِلَّهِ وَٱلرَّسُولِ ۖ فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَصْلِحُوا۟ ذَاتَ بَيْنِكُمْ ۖ وَأَطِيعُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥٓ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.transliteration: Yas'aloonaka 'anil- 'anfaali qulil-'anfaalu lillaahi war-Rasooli fattaqul-laaha wa 'aşlihoo zaata baynikum wa 'atee'ul-laaha wa Rasoolahooo 'in kuntum mu'mineen.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) woh aapse maal- e-ghaneemat ke baare mein poochhte hain.kah deejiye: maal-e- ghaneemat Allah aur uske Rasool ke liye hai, lehaaza tum Allah se daro, aur aapas mein baahami islaah karlo aur Allah aur uske Rasool ki etaa'at karo agar tum momin ho.

verses.arabic: إِنَّمَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ذُكِرَ ٱللَّهُ وَجِلَتْ قُلُوبُهُمْ وَإِذَا تُلِيَتْ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَايَـٰتُهُۥ زَادَتْهُمْ إِيمَـٰنًۭا وَعَلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ يَتَوَكَّلُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Innamal-mu'minoonal- lazeena 'izaa zukiral- laahu wajilat quloobuhum wa 'izaa tuliyat 'alayhim 'Aayaatuhoo zaadathum 'eemaanañw-wa 'alaa Rabbihim yatawakkaloon.
verses.translation: (Sachche) momin to sirf woh log hain jab Allah ka zikr kiya jaaye to unke dil kaanp uthhte hain, aur jab un par uski aayaton ki tilaawat ki jaaye to woh unka eemaan badhaa deti hain, aur woh apne rab hi par tawakkal karte hain.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَمِمَّا رَزَقْنَـٰهُمْ يُنفِقُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Allazeena yuqeemoonaş-Şalaata wa mimmaa razaqnaahum yunfiqoon
verses.translation: Aur woh log jo namaaz qaayem karte hain aur humne unhein jo rizq diya hai uss mein se woh kharch karte hain.

verses.arabic: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ حَقًّۭا ۚ لَّهُمْ دَرَجَـٰتٌ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ وَمَغْفِرَةٌۭ وَرِزْقٌۭ كَرِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: 'Ulaaa'ika humul- mu'minoona haqqaa; lahum darajaatun 'inda Rabbihim wa maghfiratuñw-wa rizqun kareem.
verses.translation: Yahi log sachche momin hain, unke liye apne rab ke haan darje hain aur bakhshish hai aur baa i'zzat rizq hai.

verses.arabic: كَمَآ أَخْرَجَكَ رَبُّكَ مِنۢ بَيْتِكَ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَإِنَّ فَرِيقًۭا مِّنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ لَكَـٰرِهُونَ
verses.transliteration: Kaamaaa 'akhrajaka Rabbuka mim baytika bilhaqq; wa 'inna fareeqam-minal- mu'mineena lakaarihoon.
verses.translation: Jaise (badr ke moqe par) aap ke rab ne aap ko aapke ghar (Madinah) se haq (behtareen tadbeer) ke saath nikaala tha,¹ aur beshak (uss waqt) mominon ka ek giroh (uss nikalne ko) naa pasand karta tha.
verses.deepMeaning: Ya'ni jis tarah maal-e-ghaneemat ki taqseem ka mu'aamlah musalmaanon ke darmiyaan ikhtelaaf ka baa'yis bana huwa tha, phir ise Allah aur uske Rasool ke hawaalah kar diya gaya to usi mein musalmaanon ki behtari thi, isi tarah aapka Madinah se nikalna, aur phir aage chal kar tijaarati qaafle ki bajaaye, lashkar-e-quraish se mud bhed ho jaana. Go ba'z tabaaye ke liye naa gawaar tha, lekin iss mein bhi bil aakhir faayedah musalmaanon hi ka hoga

verses.arabic: يُجَـٰدِلُونَكَ فِى ٱلْحَقِّ بَعْدَمَا تَبَيَّنَ كَأَنَّمَا يُسَاقُونَ إِلَى ٱلْمَوْتِ وَهُمْ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Yujaadiloonaka fil- haqqi ba'da maa tabayyana ka'annamaa yusaaqoona 'ilal-mawti wa hum yanzuroon.
verses.translation: Woh aapse haq (ke muaa'mle) mein uske waazeh jo jaane ke ba'd jhagadte the, goya ke unhein maut ki taraf haanka jaa rahaa tha, aur woh (use) dekh rahe the.

verses.arabic: وَإِذْ يَعِدُكُمُ ٱللَّهُ إِحْدَى ٱلطَّآئِفَتَيْنِ أَنَّهَا لَكُمْ وَتَوَدُّونَ أَنَّ غَيْرَ ذَاتِ ٱلشَّوْكَةِ تَكُونُ لَكُمْ وَيُرِيدُ ٱللَّهُ أَن يُحِقَّ ٱلْحَقَّ بِكَلِمَـٰتِهِۦ وَيَقْطَعَ دَابِرَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'iz ya'idukumul- laahu 'ihdat- taaa'ifatayni 'annahaa lakum wa tawaddoona 'anna ghayra zaatish- shawkati takoonu lakum wa yureedul-laahu 'añy- yuhiqqal-haqqa bi- kalimaatihee wa yaqta'a daabiral-kaafireen.
verses.translation: Aur jab Allah tumse do girohon mein se ek ka wa'dah kar raha tha ke yaqeenan woh tumhaare liye hai, aur tum chaahte the ke jo ghair musleh (tijaarati qaafilah) hai wahi tumhaare haath lage, aur Allah ka iraadah yeh tha ke woh apne farmaameen ke saath haq ko saabit kar dekhaaye aur kaafiron ki jad kaat de.

verses.arabic: لِيُحِقَّ ٱلْحَقَّ وَيُبْطِلَ ٱلْبَـٰطِلَ وَلَوْ كَرِهَ ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Liyuhiqqal-haqqa wa yubtilal-baatila wa law karihal-mujrimoon.
verses.translation: Taake woh haq ko kaq kar dikhaaye aur baatil ko baatil kar dikhaaye agarcheh mujrim log (use) naa pasand hi karen.

verses.arabic: إِذْ تَسْتَغِيثُونَ رَبَّكُمْ فَٱسْتَجَابَ لَكُمْ أَنِّى مُمِدُّكُم بِأَلْفٍۢ مِّنَ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ مُرْدِفِينَ
verses.transliteration: 'Iz tastagheesoona Rabbakum fastajaaba lakum 'annee mumiddukum bi'alfim- minal-malaaa'ikati murdifeen.
verses.translation: (Yaad karo) jab tum apne rab se faryaad kar rahe the, to usne tumhaari faryaad qubool karli (aur kaha) ke beshak mein ek doosre ke peechhe aane waale ek hazaar farishton se tumhaari madad karunga.

verses.arabic: وَمَا جَعَلَهُ ٱللَّهُ إِلَّا بُشْرَىٰ وَلِتَطْمَئِنَّ بِهِۦ قُلُوبُكُمْ ۚ وَمَا ٱلنَّصْرُ إِلَّا مِنْ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa maa jaʻalahul- laahu 'illaa bushraa wa litatma'inna bihee quloobukum; wa man- naşru 'illaa min 'indil- laah; 'innal-laaha 'Azeezun Hakeem.
verses.translation: Aur uss (madad) ko Allah ne khush khabri banaa diya taake usse tumhaare dilon ko tasalli ho jaaye aur madad to Allah hi ke paas se hai,¹ beshak Allah ghaalib hai, khoob hikmat waala.
verses.deepMeaning: Ya'ni farishton ka nuzool to sirf khush khabri aur tumhaare dilon ke itmenaan ke liye the, warnah asal madad to Allah ki taraf se thi, jo farishton ke baghair bhi tmhaari madad kar sakta tha taa hum usse yeh samajhna bhi sahih nahin ke farishton ne amalan jung mein hiss nahin liya. Ahaadees se ma'loom hota hai ke jung mein farishton ne amali hissah liya aur kayi kaafiron ko unhon ne tah taigh kiya. (Sahih Al-Bukhari, Sahih Muslim, Kitabul Maghaazi wa Fazaayil-e-Sahaaba)

verses.arabic: إِذْ يُغَشِّيكُمُ ٱلنُّعَاسَ أَمَنَةًۭ مِّنْهُ وَيُنَزِّلُ عَلَيْكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءًۭ لِّيُطَهِّرَكُم بِهِۦ وَيُذْهِبَ عَنكُمْ رِجْزَ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنِ وَلِيَرْبِطَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِكُمْ وَيُثَبِّتَ بِهِ ٱلْأَقْدَامَ
verses.transliteration: Iz yughashsheekumun- nu'aasa 'amanatam- minhu wa yunazzilu 'alaykum minas- samaaa'i maaa'al- liyutahhirakum bihee wa yuzhiba 'ankum rijzash- Shaytaani wa liyarbita 'alaa quloobikum wa yusabbita bihil-'aqdaam
verses.translation: (Yaad karo) jab woh (Allah) apni taraf se tumhein amn-o- sukoon dene ke liye tum par ongh taari kar raha tha, aur aasmaan se tum par baarish barsa rahaa tha taake tumhein uske zariye se paak karde aur tumse shaytaan ki najaasat le jaaye aur taake tumhaare dilon ko mazboot karde, aur taake uski wajah se (tumhein) saabit qadam rakkhe

verses.arabic: إِذْ يُوحِى رَبُّكَ إِلَى ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ أَنِّى مَعَكُمْ فَثَبِّتُوا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ۚ سَأُلْقِى فِى قُلُوبِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ٱلرُّعْبَ فَٱضْرِبُوا۟ فَوْقَ ٱلْأَعْنَاقِ وَٱضْرِبُوا۟ مِنْهُمْ كُلَّ بَنَانٍۢ
verses.transliteration: 'Iz yoohee Rabbuka 'ilal-malaaa'ikati 'annee ma'akum fasabbitul- lazeena 'aamanoo; sa'ulqee fee quloobil- lazeena kafarur-ru'ba fadriboo fawqal-'a'naaqi wadriboo minhum kulla banaan.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) jab aapka rab farishton ki taraf wah'i kar rahaa tha ke beshak mein tumhaare saath hoon, chunaancheh tum unko saabit qadam rakkho jo eemaan laaye hain, main jald hi un logon ke dilon mein ro'b daal dunga jinhon ne kufr kiya, chunaancheh tum unki gardanon par waar karo aur unke har (har) por par zarb lagaao.

verses.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ شَآقُّوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ ۚ وَمَن يُشَاقِقِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلْعِقَابِ
verses.transliteration: Zaalika bi'annahum shaaaqqul-laaha wa Rasoolah; wa mañy- yushaaqiqil-laaha wa Rasoolahoo fa 'innal- laaha shadeedul-'iqaab.
verses.translation: Yeh isliye ke beshak unhon ne Allah aur uske Rasool ki mukhaalifat ki, aur jo koyi Allah aur uske Rasool ki mukhaalifat karega to yaqeenan Allah sakht saza dene waala hai.

verses.arabic: ذَٰلِكُمْ فَذُوقُوهُ وَأَنَّ لِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ عَذَابَ ٱلنَّارِ
verses.transliteration: Zaalikum fazooqoohu wa 'anna lilkaafireena 'azaaban-Naar.
verses.translation: Pas tum yeh (sazaa) chakho aur beshak kaafiron ke liye dozakh ka azaab (tayyaar) hai.

verses.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِذَا لَقِيتُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ زَحْفًۭا فَلَا تُوَلُّوهُمُ ٱلْأَدْبَارَ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhal- lazeena 'aamanooo 'izaa laqeetumul-lazeena kafaroo zahfan falaa tuwalloohumul-'adbaar.
verses.translation: Aye eemaan waalo! jab tumhaara un logon ke lashkar se muqaablah ho jinhon ne kufr kiya to tum unse peeth pher kar na bhaago.

verses.arabic: وَمَن يُوَلِّهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ دُبُرَهُۥٓ إِلَّا مُتَحَرِّفًۭا لِّقِتَالٍ أَوْ مُتَحَيِّزًا إِلَىٰ فِئَةٍۢ فَقَدْ بَآءَ بِغَضَبٍۢ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَمَأْوَىٰهُ جَهَنَّمُ ۖ وَبِئْسَ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
verses.transliteration: Wa mañy-yuwallihim yawma'izin duburahooo 'illaa mutaharrifal- liqitaalin 'aw mutahayyizan 'ilaa fi'atin faqad baaa'a bighadabim-minal-laahi wa ma'waahu Jahannamu wa bi'sal maşeer.
verses.translation: Aur jo shakhs uss din unse peethh pher kar bhaagega siwaaye uss shakhs ke jo ladaayi ke liye pentra badalne waala ho ya (apne) kisi giroh ki panaah lene waala ho, to yaqeenan woh Allah ka ghazab le kar lauta, aur uska thhekaana jahannam hai, aur woh bahut buri lautne ki jagah hai.

verses.arabic: فَلَمْ تَقْتُلُوهُمْ وَلَـٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَتَلَهُمْ ۚ وَمَا رَمَيْتَ إِذْ رَمَيْتَ وَلَـٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ رَمَىٰ ۚ وَلِيُبْلِىَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ مِنْهُ بَلَآءً حَسَنًا ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Falam taqtuloohum wa laakinnal-laaha qatalahum; wa maa ramayta 'iz ramayta wa laakinnal-laaha ramaa; wa liyubliyal- mu'mineena minhu balaaa'an hasanaa; 'innal-laaha Samee'un 'Aleem.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh tumne unhein qatl nahin kiya balke Allah hi ne unhein qatl kiya, aur (Aye nabi!) jab aapne (mutthhi bhar khaak unki taraf) phenki to woh aapne nahin phenki balke Allah ne phenki taake woh mominon ko apni taraf se achchhe in'aam se nawaaze, beshak Allah khoob sunne waala, khoob jaanne waala hai.

verses.arabic: ذَٰلِكُمْ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مُوهِنُ كَيْدِ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Zaalikum wa 'annal- laaha moohinu kaydil- kaafireen.
verses.translation: Yeh thi baat (hamaari hikmat) aur beshak Allah kaafiron ki chaal kamzor karne waala hai.

verses.arabic: إِن تَسْتَفْتِحُوا۟ فَقَدْ جَآءَكُمُ ٱلْفَتْحُ ۖ وَإِن تَنتَهُوا۟ فَهُوَ خَيْرٌۭ لَّكُمْ ۖ وَإِن تَعُودُوا۟ نَعُدْ وَلَن تُغْنِىَ عَنكُمْ فِئَتُكُمْ شَيْـًۭٔا وَلَوْ كَثُرَتْ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.transliteration: 'In tastaftihoo faqad jaaa'akumul-fathu wa 'in tantahoo fahuwa khayrul-lakum wa 'in ta'oodoo na'ud wa lan tughniya 'ankum fi'atukum shay'anw-wa law kasurat wa 'annal- laaha ma'al-mu'mineen.
verses.translation: (Kaafiron se kah do) agar tum faislah maangte the to faislah tumhaare saamne aa gaya. ab agar tum baaz aajaao to woh tumhaare haq mein behtar hai, aur agar tum dobaarah (pahle ki tarah) karoge to hum bhi phir usi tarah karenge (tumhein sazaa denge) aur tumhaari jamaa'at agarcheh ziyaadah hi ho woh tumhein hargiz faayidah na degi, aur beshak Allah mominon ke saath hai.

verses.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ أَطِيعُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَلَا تَوَلَّوْا۟ عَنْهُ وَأَنتُمْ تَسْمَعُونَ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhal-lazeena 'aamanooo 'atee'ul-laaha wa Rasoolahoo wa laa tawallaw 'anhu wa 'antum tasmaʻoon.
verses.translation: Aye eemaan waalo! Allah aur uske Rasool ki itaa'at karo aur usse munh na phero jabke tum sun rahe ho.

verses.arabic: وَلَا تَكُونُوا۟ كَٱلَّذِينَ قَالُوا۟ سَمِعْنَا وَهُمْ لَا يَسْمَعُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laa takoonoo kallazeena qaaloo sami'naa wa hum laa yasma'oon.
verses.translation: Aur tum un logon ki maanind na ho jaao jinhon ne kaha: humne sun liya, haalaanke woh sunte nahin the.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ شَرَّ ٱلدَّوَآبِّ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلصُّمُّ ٱلْبُكْمُ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعْقِلُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Inna sharrad- dawaaabbi 'indal-laahiş- summul-bukmul-lazeena laa ya qiloon.
verses.translation: Beshak Allah ke nazdeek zameen par chalne waalon mein badtareen woh bahre gonge hain jo aql nahin rakhte.

verses.arabic: وَلَوْ عَلِمَ ٱللَّهُ فِيهِمْ خَيْرًۭا لَّأَسْمَعَهُمْ ۖ وَلَوْ أَسْمَعَهُمْ لَتَوَلَّوا۟ وَّهُم مُّعْرِضُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa law 'alimal-laahu feehim khayral- la'asma'ahum; wa law 'asma'ahum latawallaw wa hum muʻridoon.
verses.translation: Aur agar Allah un mein koyi bhalaayi paata to unhein zaroor sunne ki taufeeq deta, aur agar woh unhein sunne ki taufeeq de deta to bhi woh zaroor munh pher kar bhaag jaate.

verses.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱسْتَجِيبُوا۟ لِلَّهِ وَلِلرَّسُولِ إِذَا دَعَاكُمْ لِمَا يُحْيِيكُمْ ۖ وَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَحُولُ بَيْنَ ٱلْمَرْءِ وَقَلْبِهِۦ وَأَنَّهُۥٓ إِلَيْهِ تُحْشَرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhal- lazeena 'aamanus- tajeeboo lillaahi wa lir- Rasooli 'izaa da'aakum limaa yuhyeekum wa'lamooo 'annal-laaha yahoolu baynal-mar'i wa qalbihee wa 'annahooo 'ilayhi tuhsharoon.
verses.translation: Aye eemaan waalo! tum Allah aur uske Rasool ka kanha maano jab woh tumhen uss (amr) ki taraf bulaaye¹ jo tumhen zindagi bakhshta hai, aur tum jaan lo ke yaqeenan Allah bande aur uske dil ke darmiyaan haayel ho jaata hai aur yeh bhi ke tum uske huzoor ekatthhe kiye jaaoge.
verses.deepMeaning: Iss mein Allah wa Rasool ki itaa'at ka faayidah bayaan kiya gaya hai, ya'ni jo sachcha momin hai use hayaat-e- jaawedaan naseeb hoti hai aur sachcha momin woh hai jo Allah aur uske Rasool ﷺ ka farmaanbardaar hai aur amali taur par qur'an aur sunnat-e-Rasool ﷺ (deen-e-islam) ki pairwi karta hai, jo Allah ki raah mein jehaad ke liye nikalta hai aur agar woh shaheed ho jaaye to uske liye maut nahin balke jannat mein hameshah ke liye abdi zindgai hoti hai. iske baraks ghair momin eemaan ke e'tebaar se, ek murde ki tarah hota hai aur use jahannam ki daayemi sazaa di jaayegi (wahaan na woh jiyega na marega)

verses.arabic: وَٱتَّقُوا۟ فِتْنَةًۭ لَّا تُصِيبَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ مِنكُمْ خَآصَّةًۭ ۖ وَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلْعِقَابِ
verses.transliteration: Wattaqoo fitnatal-laa tuşeebannal-lazeena zalamoo minkum khaaaşşah; waʻlamooo 'annal-laaha shadeedul 'iqaab.
verses.translation: Aur uss fitne se daro jo tum mein se khaas taur par (sirf) un logon ko nahin gherega jinhon ne zulm kiya (balke sab uski zad mein aa sakte hain) aur tum jaan lo ke beshak Allah sakht sazaa dene waala hai.

verses.arabic: وَٱذْكُرُوٓا۟ إِذْ أَنتُمْ قَلِيلٌۭ مُّسْتَضْعَفُونَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ تَخَافُونَ أَن يَتَخَطَّفَكُمُ ٱلنَّاسُ فَـَٔاوَىٰكُمْ وَأَيَّدَكُم بِنَصْرِهِۦ وَرَزَقَكُم مِّنَ ٱلطَّيِّبَـٰتِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَشْكُرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wazkurooo 'iz 'antum qaleelum-mustad'afoona fil-'ardi takhaafoona 'any- yatakhattafakumun- naasu fa'aawaakum wa 'ayyadakum binasrihee wa razaqakum-minat- tayyibaati laʻallakum tashkuroon.
verses.translation: Aur yaad karo jab tum bahut thode the, zameen mein kamzor samjhe jaate the, tum iss baat se darte the ke kahin log tumhein achaanak (na) le jaayen, to Allah ne tumhein thhekaana diya, aur apni nusrat ke saath tumhaari taayeed ki, aur tumhein paakeezah cheezon se rizq diya taake tum uska shukr karo.

verses.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَا تَخُونُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَٱلرَّسُولَ وَتَخُونُوٓا۟ أَمَـٰنَـٰتِكُمْ وَأَنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhal- lazeena 'aamanoo laa takhoonul-laaha war- Rasoola wa takhoonoo0 'amaanaatikum wa 'antum talamoon.
verses.translation: Aye eemaan waalo! tum Allah aur uske Rasool se khiyaanat na karo, aur tum aapas ki amaanaton mein khiyaanat na karo,¹ jabke tum jaante ho.
verses.deepMeaning: Mulaahazah ho haashyah: (Surah Aal-e-Imran:3/164)

verses.arabic: وَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّمَآ أَمْوَٰلُكُمْ وَأَوْلَـٰدُكُمْ فِتْنَةٌۭ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ عِندَهُۥٓ أَجْرٌ عَظِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Walamooo 'annamaaa Pamwaalukum wa Pawlaadukum fitnatuñw- wa 'annal-laaha 'indahoo0 ajrun 'azeem.
verses.translation: Aur jaan lo yaqeenan tumhaare maal aur tumhaari aulaad fitnah hain.¹ aur (jaan lo) beshak Allah hi ke paas ajr-e-azeem hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Maal aur aulaad ki muhabbat aam taur par insaan ko khiyaanat par aur Allah, Rasool ki itaa'at se gurez par majboor karti hai, isliye inko fatnah (aazmaayish) qaraar diya gaya hai ya'ni inke zariye se insaan ki aazmaayish hoti hai ke unki muhabbat mein amaanat aur etaa'at ke taqaaze pure karta hai ya nahin? Agar woh pure karta hai to samajh lo ke woh iss aazmaayish mein kaamyaab hai basoorat-e-digar naa kaam. Iss soorat mein yahi maal aur aulaad uske liye azaab-e- ilaahi ka baay'is ban jaayenge.

verses.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِن تَتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ يَجْعَل لَّكُمْ فُرْقَانًۭا وَيُكَفِّرْ عَنكُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتِكُمْ وَيَغْفِرْ لَكُمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ ذُو ٱلْفَضْلِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhal-lazeena 'aamanooo 'in tattaqul- laaha yaj'al-lakum furqaananw-wa yukaffir 'ankum sayyi'aatikum wa yaghfir lakum; wallaahu zul-fadlil-'azeem.
verses.translation: Aye eemaam waalo! agar tum Allah se daro to woh tumhaare liye kasoti (daleel- e-haq) banaa dega aur tumse tumhaari buraaiyaan door kardega aur tumhein bakhsh dega. Aur Allah bahut bade fazl waala hai.

verses.arabic: وَإِذْ يَمْكُرُ بِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لِيُثْبِتُوكَ أَوْ يَقْتُلُوكَ أَوْ يُخْرِجُوكَ ۚ وَيَمْكُرُونَ وَيَمْكُرُ ٱللَّهُ ۖ وَٱللَّهُ خَيْرُ ٱلْمَـٰكِرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'iz yamkuru bikal- lazeena kafaroo liyusbitooka 'aw yaqtulooka 'aw yukhrijook; wωα yamkuroona wa yamkurul-laahu wallaahu khayrul- maakireen
verses.translation: Aur (aye Nabi! yaad keejiye) jab woh log jinhon ne kufr kiya, aapke baare mein tadbeer kar rahe the taake woh Aapko qaid karden, ya Aapko qatl karden, yaa aapko (Makkah se) nikaal den, aur woh tadbeerein kar rahe the aur Allah bhi tadbeer kar raha tha. aur Allah behtareen tabdeer karne waala hai.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَايَـٰتُنَا قَالُوا۟ قَدْ سَمِعْنَا لَوْ نَشَآءُ لَقُلْنَا مِثْلَ هَـٰذَآ ۙ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّآ أَسَـٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'izaa tutlaa 'alayhim 'Aayaatunaa qaaloo qad sami'naa law nashaaa'u laqulnaa misla haazaaa 'in haazaaa 'illaaa 'asaateerul-'awwaleen.
verses.translation: Aur jab un par hamaari aayatein padhi jaati hain to woh kahte hain:yaqeenan humne sun lin, agar hum chaahein to iss tarah (ka kalaam) hum bhi kah sakte hain, yeh to agle logon hi ki daastaanen hain.

verses.arabic: وَإِذْ قَالُوا۟ ٱللَّهُمَّ إِن كَانَ هَـٰذَا هُوَ ٱلْحَقَّ مِنْ عِندِكَ فَأَمْطِرْ عَلَيْنَا حِجَارَةًۭ مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَوِ ٱئْتِنَا بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍۢ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'iz qaalul-laahumma 'in kaana haazaa huwal- haqqa min 'indika fa'amtir 'alaynaa hijaaratam-minas- samaaa'i 'awi'-tinaa bi'azaabin 'aleem.
verses.translation: Aur jab unhon ne kaha: aye Allah agar yeh (Qur'an) teri taraf se haq hai to hum par aasmaan se patthar barsaa ya hum par dardnaak azaab le aa.

verses.arabic: وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ لِيُعَذِّبَهُمْ وَأَنتَ فِيهِمْ ۚ وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ مُعَذِّبَهُمْ وَهُمْ يَسْتَغْفِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maa kaanal- laahu liyu'azzibahum wa 'anta feehim; wa maa kaanal-laahu mu'azzibahum wa hum yastaghfiroon.
verses.translation: Aur (Aye Nabi!) Allah aisa nahin ke unhen azaab de jabke aap bhi unke darmiyaan (maujood) hon, aur Allah unhein azaab dene waala nahin jabke woh bakhshish maangte hon.

verses.arabic: وَمَا لَهُمْ أَلَّا يُعَذِّبَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ وَهُمْ يَصُدُّونَ عَنِ ٱلْمَسْجِدِ ٱلْحَرَامِ وَمَا كَانُوٓا۟ أَوْلِيَآءَهُۥٓ ۚ إِنْ أَوْلِيَآؤُهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱلْمُتَّقُونَ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maa lahum 'allaa yu'azzibahumul-laahu wa hum yaşuddoona 'anil- Masjidil-Haraami wa maa kaanooo 'awliyaaa'ah; 'in 'awliyaaa'uhooo 'illal- muttaqoona walaakinna 'aksarahum laa yaʻlamoon.
verses.translation: Aur (ab) unke liye kaunsi wajah hai ke Allah unhen azaab na de jabke woh (logon ko) Masjid- e-Haraam se rokte hain haalaanke woh uske mutawalli nahin, uske mutawaali to muttaqi hi log hain lekin un mein se aksar (iss haqeeqat ko) nahin jaante.

verses.arabic: وَمَا كَانَ صَلَاتُهُمْ عِندَ ٱلْبَيْتِ إِلَّا مُكَآءًۭ وَتَصْدِيَةًۭ ۚ فَذُوقُوا۟ ٱلْعَذَابَ بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَكْفُرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maa kaana Şalaatuhum 'indal-Bayti 'illaa mukaaa'añw-wa taşdiyah; fazooqul- 'azaaba bimaa kuntum takfuroon.
verses.translation: Aur baitullah ke paas un (mushrikeen) ki namaaz seetiyaan aur taaliyaan bajane ke siwa kuchh nahin thi, chunaancheh tum azaab chakho uss kufr ki wajah se jo tum karte the.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ يُنفِقُونَ أَمْوَٰلَهُمْ لِيَصُدُّوا۟ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۖ فَسَيُنفِقُونَهَا ثُمَّ تَكُونُ عَلَيْهِمْ حَسْرَةًۭ ثُمَّ يُغْلَبُونَ ۗ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ جَهَنَّمَ يُحْشَرُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Innal-lazeena kafaroo yunfiqoona 'amwaalahum liyașuddoo 'an sabeelil- laah; fasayunfiqoonahaa summa takoonu 'alayhim hasratan summa yughlaboon; wallazeena kafarooo 'ilaa Jahannama yuhsharoona.
verses.translation: Beshak jin logon ne kufr kiya woh apne maal kharch karte hain taake woh (logon ko) Allah ke raaste se rokein, to woh abhi (aur) maal kharch karenge, phir woh unke liye baa'is-e-hasrat hoga. phir woh maghloob ho jaayenge, aur jin logon ne kufr kiya woh jahannam ki taraf ekatthhe kiye jaayeinge.

verses.arabic: لِيَمِيزَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْخَبِيثَ مِنَ ٱلطَّيِّبِ وَيَجْعَلَ ٱلْخَبِيثَ بَعْضَهُۥ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍۢ فَيَرْكُمَهُۥ جَمِيعًۭا فَيَجْعَلَهُۥ فِى جَهَنَّمَ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْخَـٰسِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Liyameezal-laahul- khabeesa minat-tayyibi wa yaj'alal-khabeesa ba'dahoo 'alaa ba'din fayarkumahoo jamee'an fayaj'alahoo fee Jahannam; 'ulaaa'ika humul-khaasiroon.
verses.translation: Taake Allah naapaak ko paak se alag karde, aur naapaak (logon) ko (ek doosre par) oupar tale rakh kar majmooyi' dher lagaa de, phir use jahannam mein daal de, yahi log khasaarah paane waale hain.

verses.arabic: قُل لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ إِن يَنتَهُوا۟ يُغْفَرْ لَهُم مَّا قَدْ سَلَفَ وَإِن يَعُودُوا۟ فَقَدْ مَضَتْ سُنَّةُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qul lillazeena kafarooo 'iny-yantahoo yughfar lahum maa qad salafa wa 'iny-ya'oodoo faqad madat sunnatul- 'awwaleen.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) jin logon ne kufr kiya unse kah deejiye ke agar woh baaz aajaayein to jo kuchh pahle ho chuka woh unhein maaf kardiya jaayega,¹ aur agar woh dobaarah wahi karenge to bilaa shubah agle logon ka (jo) tareeqa guzra hai (wahi unka anjaam hoga.)
verses.deepMeaning: Baaz aa jaane ka matlab musalmaan hona hai jis tarah hadees mein bhi hai 'Jis ne islam qubool karke neki ka raastah apna liya, usse uske gunaahon ki baaz purs nhin hogi jo usne jaaheliyat mein kiye honge aur jisne islam laa kar bhi buraayi na chhodi usse agle pichhle sab amalon ka muaakhzah hoga. (Al-Bukhari:6921) ek aur hadees mein hai 'Islam maa qabl ke gunaahon ko mitaa deta hai.' (Musnad Ahmed, jild:4,safah:199)

verses.arabic: وَقَـٰتِلُوهُمْ حَتَّىٰ لَا تَكُونَ فِتْنَةٌۭ وَيَكُونَ ٱلدِّينُ كُلُّهُۥ لِلَّهِ ۚ فَإِنِ ٱنتَهَوْا۟ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِمَا يَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Wa qaatiloohum hattaa laa takoona fitnatunw-wa yakoonad- deenu kulluhoo lillaah; fa'inin-tahaw fa'innal- laaha bimaa ya maloona Baseer.
verses.translation: Aur tum un se lado hatta ke fitnah (shirk) na rahe aur (har kaahin) saare ka saara deen Allah hi ka ho,¹ phir agar woh (kaafir) baaz aa jaayein to beshak Allah unke kaamon ko khoob dekh raha hai.
verses.deepMeaning: (Wa yakoonaddeenu kulluhu lillaahi) ba'z ulmaa-e-islam ne bayaan kiya hai ke yeh uss waqt hoga jab Eisa عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام zameen par utrenge to woh islam ke elaawah, jo ke Allah Ta'ala ka sachcha deen hai, koyi aur deen qubool nahin kareinge. Mazeed mulaahazah ho haashyah: (Surah Baqarah:2/193)

verses.arabic: وَإِن تَوَلَّوْا۟ فَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَوْلَىٰكُمْ ۚ نِعْمَ ٱلْمَوْلَىٰ وَنِعْمَ ٱلنَّصِيرُ
verses.transliteration: 40. Wa 'in tawallaw fa'lamooo 'annal-laaha mawlaakum; ni'mal- mawlaa wa ni'man- naseer.
verses.translation: 40.Aur agar woh munh pherlen to jaan lo ke yaqeenan Allah hi tumhaara kaar saaz hai, woh behtareen kaar saaz aur behtareen madad gaar hai.

verses.arabic: وَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّمَا غَنِمْتُم مِّن شَىْءٍۢ فَأَنَّ لِلَّهِ خُمُسَهُۥ وَلِلرَّسُولِ وَلِذِى ٱلْقُرْبَىٰ وَٱلْيَتَـٰمَىٰ وَٱلْمَسَـٰكِينِ وَٱبْنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ إِن كُنتُمْ ءَامَنتُم بِٱللَّهِ وَمَآ أَنزَلْنَا عَلَىٰ عَبْدِنَا يَوْمَ ٱلْفُرْقَانِ يَوْمَ ٱلْتَقَى ٱلْجَمْعَانِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ قَدِيرٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa'lamooo 'annamaa ghanimtum min shay'in fa'anna lillaahi khumusahoo wa lir- Rasooli wa lizil-qurba walyataamaa walmasaakeeni wabnis- sabeeli 'in kuntum 'aamantum billaahi wa maaa 'anzalnaa 'alaa 'abdinaa yawmal- Furqaani yawmal-taqal- jam'aan; wallaahu 'alaa kulli shay'in Qadeer
verses.translation: Aur (aye musalmaano!) jaan lo ke tum jo kuchh bhi maal-e-ghaneemat¹ haasil karo, uss mein se paanchwaan hissa yaqeenan Allah ke liye hai aur Rasool ke liye aur (uske) rishte daaron, yateemon, miskeenon aur musaafiron ke liye hai, agar tum Allah par eemaan laaye ho aur uss par jo humne apne bande par faisle ke din utaara jis din do faujon mein takraao huwa tha, aur Allah har cheez par khoob qudrat rakhta hai.
