verses.deepMeaning: Ghaneemat se muraad woh maal hai jo kaafiron se, kaafiron par ladaayi mein fatah-o-ghalbah haasil hone ke ba'd haasil ho, pahli ummaton mein iske liye yeh tareeqa tha ke jung khatm hone ke ba'd kaafiron se haasil kardah saara maal ek jagah dher kar diya jaata tha, aasmaan se aag aati aur use jalaa kar bhasm kar daalti, lekin ummat-e-muslimah ke liye yah maal-e-ghanimat halaal kar diya gaya. Aur jo maal baghair ladaayi ke sulah ke zariye ya jizyah wa kheraaj se usool huwa use Fai kahaa jaata hai. kabhi ghanimat ko bhi Fai se ta'beer kar liya jaata hai. taqseem se pahle kisi sipaahi ko koyi cheez apne paas rakhne ki ejaazat nahin hai agar koyi koyi aisa karega to khiyaanat hogi. Min Shayin se muraad jo kuchh bhi ho ya'ni thoda ho ya ziyaadah, qeemti ho ya ma'mooli sa sab ko jama' karke uski taqseem hasb-e-zaabtah ki jaayegi.

verses.arabic: إِذْ أَنتُم بِٱلْعُدْوَةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا وَهُم بِٱلْعُدْوَةِ ٱلْقُصْوَىٰ وَٱلرَّكْبُ أَسْفَلَ مِنكُمْ ۚ وَلَوْ تَوَاعَدتُّمْ لَٱخْتَلَفْتُمْ فِى ٱلْمِيعَـٰدِ وَلَـٰكِن لِّيَقْضِىَ ٱللَّهُ أَمْرًۭا كَانَ مَفْعُولًۭا لِّيَهْلِكَ مَنْ هَلَكَ عَنۢ بَيِّنَةٍۢ وَيَحْيَىٰ مَنْ حَىَّ عَنۢ بَيِّنَةٍۢ ۗ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَسَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ
verses.transliteration: 'Iz 'antum bil'udwatid-dunyaa wa hum bil'udwatil-quşwaa warrakbu 'asfala minkum; wa law tawaa'attum lakhtalaftum fil-mee'aadi wa laakil-liyaqdiyal- laahu 'amran kaana mafoolal-liyahlika man halaka 'am bayyinatinw- wa yahyaa man hayya 'am bayyinah; wa 'innal-laaha la-Samee'un Aleem.
verses.translation: Jabke tum (maidaan-e-badr ke) qareeb waale kinaare par the aur woh (kaafir) door waale kinaare par the aur (Quraish ka tijaarati) qaaflah tumse bahut neeche (Baheerah Qulzum ke saahil ki taraf) tha aur agar tum (donon fareeq jung ke liye) aapas mein wadah karte to muqarrarah waqt par zaroor ikhtelaaf karte, lekin (huwa yeh ke donon giroh aamne saamne aa gaye) taake Allah uss kaam ko pura karde jo hone waala tha taake jo halaak ho woh hujjat (qaayem hone) se halaak ho aur jo zindah rahe woh daleel se (haq pahchaan kar) zindah rahe aur beshak Allah khoob sunne waala, khoob jaanne waala hai.

verses.arabic: إِذْ يُرِيكَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ فِى مَنَامِكَ قَلِيلًۭا ۖ وَلَوْ أَرَىٰكَهُمْ كَثِيرًۭا لَّفَشِلْتُمْ وَلَتَنَـٰزَعْتُمْ فِى ٱلْأَمْرِ وَلَـٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَلَّمَ ۗ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
verses.transliteration: 'Iz yureekahumul-laahu fee manaamika qaleelaa; wa law 'araakahum kaseeral- lafashiltum wa latanaaza'tum fil-'amri wa laakinnal-laaha sallam; 'innahoo 'aleemum bizaatiş- sudoor.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi! yaad karein) jab Allah ne aap ke khaab mein aapko unki ta'daad kam dikhaayi aur agar woh aapko unki ta'daad ziyaadah dikhaata to tum zaroor himmat haar dete aur iss mu'aamle mein aapas mein ikhtelaaf karte lekin Allah ne tumhein bacha liya. beshak woh seenon ke bhed khoob jaanta hai.

verses.arabic: وَإِذْ يُرِيكُمُوهُمْ إِذِ ٱلْتَقَيْتُمْ فِىٓ أَعْيُنِكُمْ قَلِيلًۭا وَيُقَلِّلُكُمْ فِىٓ أَعْيُنِهِمْ لِيَقْضِىَ ٱللَّهُ أَمْرًۭا كَانَ مَفْعُولًۭا ۗ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُرْجَعُ ٱلْأُمُورُ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'iz yureekumoohum 'izil- taqaytum feee 'a'yunikum qaleelañw- wa yuqallilukum feee 'a'yunihim liyaqdiyal- laahu 'amran kaana mafoolaa; wa 'ilal-laahi turja'ul-'umoor.
verses.translation: Aur (Aye musalmaano! yaad karo) jab tum (kaafiron ke) aamne saamne huye to Allah ne unhen tumhaari nazron mein thoda dikhaaya aur tumhein unki nazron mein thoda dikhaaya taake Allah uss kaam ko pura karde jo hone waala tha aur sab kaam Allah hi ki taraf laut te hain.

verses.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِذَا لَقِيتُمْ فِئَةًۭ فَٱثْبُتُوا۟ وَٱذْكُرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ كَثِيرًۭا لَّعَلَّكُمْ تُفْلِحُونَ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhal-lazeena 'aamanooo 'izaa laqeetum fi'atan fasbutoo wazkurul- laaha kaseeral-la'allakum tuflihoon.
verses.translation: Aye eemaan waalo! jab kisi giroh se tumhaara aamna saamna ho to saabit qadam raho aur Allah ko bahut yaad karo taake tum falaah paao.

verses.arabic: وَأَطِيعُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَلَا تَنَـٰزَعُوا۟ فَتَفْشَلُوا۟ وَتَذْهَبَ رِيحُكُمْ وَٱصْبِرُوٓا۟ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلصَّـٰبِرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'atee'ul-laaha wa Rasoolahoo wa laa tanaaza'oo fatafshaloo wa tazhaba reehukum waşbiroo; 'innal-laaha ma'aş-şaabireen.
verses.translation: Aur Allah aur uske Rasool ki i'taa'at karo aur aapas mein jhadga na karo warnah tum himmat haar baithhoge aur tumhaari hawa ukhad jaayegi aur sabr karo, beshak Allah sabr karne waalon ke saath hai.

verses.arabic: وَلَا تَكُونُوا۟ كَٱلَّذِينَ خَرَجُوا۟ مِن دِيَـٰرِهِم بَطَرًۭا وَرِئَآءَ ٱلنَّاسِ وَيَصُدُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا يَعْمَلُونَ مُحِيطٌۢ
verses.transliteration: Wa laa takoonoo kallazeena kharajoo min diyaarihim batarañw-wa ri'aaa'an-naasi wa yaşuddoona 'an sabeelil- laah; wallaahu bimaa ya'maloona muheet
verses.translation: Aur tum un logon ki tarah na ho jaao jo apne gharon se itraate huye aur logon ko (apni shaan) dikhaate huye nikle aur woh (logon ko) Allah ki raah se rokte the aur woh jo kuchh kar rahe hain Allah us ka ehaata kiye huye hai..

verses.arabic: وَإِذْ زَيَّنَ لَهُمُ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ وَقَالَ لَا غَالِبَ لَكُمُ ٱلْيَوْمَ مِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ وَإِنِّى جَارٌۭ لَّكُمْ ۖ فَلَمَّا تَرَآءَتِ ٱلْفِئَتَانِ نَكَصَ عَلَىٰ عَقِبَيْهِ وَقَالَ إِنِّى بَرِىٓءٌۭ مِّنكُمْ إِنِّىٓ أَرَىٰ مَا لَا تَرَوْنَ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ ٱللَّهَ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ شَدِيدُ ٱلْعِقَابِ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'iz zayyana lahumush-shaytaanu 'a'maalahum wa qaala laa ghaaliba lakumul- yawma minan-naasi wa 'innee jaarul-lakum falammaa taraaa'atil- fi'ataani nakaşa 'alaa 'aqibayhi wa qaala 'innee bareee'um- minkum 'inneee 'araa maa laa tarawna 'inneee 'akhaaful-laah; wallaahu shadeedul-'iqaab.
verses.translation: Aur (Yaad karo) jab shaytaan ne unke a'amaal unke liye saja kar pesh kiye aur woh kahne laga: aaj logon mein se koyi tum par ghaalib nahin aa sakta aur beshak main tumhaara saathi hoon, phir jab donon faujon ka aamna saamna huwa to woh ulte paaon phir gaya aur kahne laga: beshak mein tumse bari hoon. beshak main woh (Farishte) dekh raha hoon jo tum nahin dekh rahe, beshak Allah se darta hoon¹ aur Allah sakht saza dene waala hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Allah ka khauf to uske dil mein kiya hona tha? Taahum use yaqeen ho gaya tha ke musalmaanon ko Allah ki khaas madad haasil hai. mushrikeen unke muqaable mein nahin thhahar sakenge

verses.arabic: إِذْ يَقُولُ ٱلْمُنَـٰفِقُونَ وَٱلَّذِينَ فِى قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌۭ غَرَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ دِينُهُمْ ۗ وَمَن يَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: 'Iz yaqoolul- munaafiqoona wallazeena fee quloobihim maradun gharra haaa'ulaaa'i deenuhum; wa mañy- yatawakkal 'alal-laahi fa'innal-laaha 'azeezun Hakeem.
verses.translation: Jab munaafiq aur woh log jinke dilon mein rog tha, yeh kahte the ke un (musalmaanon) ko unke deen ne dhoke mein daal diya hai aur jo koyi Allah par bharosa kare to beshak Allah zabar dast, khoob hikmat waala hai.

verses.arabic: وَلَوْ تَرَىٰٓ إِذْ يَتَوَفَّى ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ يَضْرِبُونَ وُجُوهَهُمْ وَأَدْبَٰرَهُمْ وَذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابَ ٱلْحَرِيقِ
verses.transliteration: Wa law taraaa 'iz yatawaffal-lazeena kafarul-malaaa'ikatu yadriboona wujoohahum wa 'adbaarahum wa zooqoo 'azaabal-hareeq.
verses.translation: Aur kaash! Aap dekhein jabke farishte kaafiron ki jaan qabz karte hain, woh unke munh aur unki peethh par maarte hain aur (kahte hain ke) tum jala dene waala azaab chakho.

verses.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِمَا قَدَّمَتْ أَيْدِيكُمْ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَيْسَ بِظَلَّـٰمٍۢ لِّلْعَبِيدِ
verses.transliteration: Zaalika bimaa qaddamat 'aydeekum wa 'annal-laaha laysa bizallaamil-lil'abeed.
verses.translation: Yeh usi ka badlah hai jo tumhaare haathon ne aage bheja aur yeh (jaan lo) ke beshak Allah apne bandon par zulm karne waala nahin.

verses.arabic: كَدَأْبِ ءَالِ فِرْعَوْنَ وَٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ كَفَرُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِذُنُوبِهِمْ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَوِىٌّۭ شَدِيدُ ٱلْعِقَابِ
verses.transliteration: Kada'bi 'Aali Fir'awna wallazeena min qablihim; kafaroo bi- 'Aayaatil-laahi fa'akhazahumul-laahu bizunoobihim; 'innal- laaha qawiyyun shadeedul-'iqaab.
verses.translation: Unki aadat aal-e-firaun aur un logon ki aadat jaisi hai jo unse pahle the, unhon Allah ki aayaat ka inkaar kiya to Allah ne unke gunaahon ki wajah se unhein pakad liya, beshak Allah bahut taaqatwar, sakht sazaa dene waala hai.

verses.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَمْ يَكُ مُغَيِّرًۭا نِّعْمَةً أَنْعَمَهَا عَلَىٰ قَوْمٍ حَتَّىٰ يُغَيِّرُوا۟ مَا بِأَنفُسِهِمْ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Zaalika bi'annal- laaha lam yaku mughayyiran-ni'matan 'an'amahaa 'alaa qawmin hattaa yughayyiroo maa bi'anfusihim wa 'annal- laaha samee'un 'Aleem.
verses.translation: Yeh isliye ke beshak Allah koyi ne'mat, jo usne kisi qaum ko bakhshi ho, nahin badalta yahaan tak ke woh khud apne dilon ki haalat badal daalein aur beshak Allah khoob sunne waala, khoob jaanne waala hai.

verses.arabic: كَدَأْبِ ءَالِ فِرْعَوْنَ وَٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ ۙ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ فَأَهْلَكْنَـٰهُم بِذُنُوبِهِمْ وَأَغْرَقْنَآ ءَالَ فِرْعَوْنَ ۚ وَكُلٌّۭ كَانُوا۟ ظَـٰلِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Kada'bi 'Aali Fir'awna wallazeena min qablihim; kazzaboo bi-'Aayaati Rabbihim fa'ahlaknaahum bizunoobihim wa 'aghraqnaaa 'Aala Fir'awn; wa kullun kaanoo zaalimeen.
verses.translation: Unki aadat aal-e-firaun aur uri logon ki aadat jaisi hai jo unse pahle the, unhon ne apne rab ki aayaat ko jhutlaaya to hum ne unhein unke gunaahon ki wajah se halaak kardiya aur humne aal-e-firaun ko gharq kardiya aur woh sab zaalim the.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ شَرَّ ٱلدَّوَآبِّ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Inna sharrad- dawaaabbi 'indal-laahil- lazeena kafaroo fahum laa yu'minoon.
verses.translation: Beshak zameen par chalne waalon mein se Allah ke nazdkeek bad tareen woh log hain jinhon ne kufr kiya phir woh eemaan nahin laate.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Sharrunnaas (logon mein sab se bad tar) kahne ke bajaaye (Sharrad dawaab) inhein tamaam jaandaaron se bad tar kahaa gaya hai, jo lughwi ma'na ke lehaaz se to insaanon aur chaupaayon waghairah sab par bola jaata hai lekin aam taur par iska iste'maal chaupaayon ke liye hota hai. goya kaafiron ka ta'alluq insaanon se hi nahin, kufr ka irtekaab karke woh jaanwar balke jaanwaron mein bhi sab se badtar jaanwar ban gaye hain.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ عَـٰهَدتَّ مِنْهُمْ ثُمَّ يَنقُضُونَ عَهْدَهُمْ فِى كُلِّ مَرَّةٍۢ وَهُمْ لَا يَتَّقُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Allazeena 'aahatta minhum summa yanqudoona 'ahdahum fee kulli marratiñw-wa hum laa yattaqoon.
verses.translation: Woh jinse aapne muaa'hidah kiya, phir woh har baar apna ahad tod daalte hain aur woh (Allah se zara) nahin darte.

verses.arabic: فَإِمَّا تَثْقَفَنَّهُمْ فِى ٱلْحَرْبِ فَشَرِّدْ بِهِم مَّنْ خَلْفَهُمْ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَذَّكَّرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Fa'immaa tasqafannahum fil-harbi fasharrid bihim man khalfahum laʻallahum yazzakkaroon.
verses.translation: Phir agar aap un ko ladaayi mein paayein to unke saath un logon ko bhi bhaga den jo unke peechhe hon, shaayad ke woh nasihat pakdein.

verses.arabic: وَإِمَّا تَخَافَنَّ مِن قَوْمٍ خِيَانَةًۭ فَٱنۢبِذْ إِلَيْهِمْ عَلَىٰ سَوَآءٍ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلْخَآئِنِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'immaa takhaafanna min qawmin khiyaanatan fambiz 'ilayhim 'alaa sawaaa'; 'innal-laaha laa yuhibbul- khaaa'ineen.
verses.translation: Aur agar aapko kisi qaum ki taraf se khiyaant (bad ahdi) ka khauf ho to baraabri (ki satah) par unka a'had unke munh par de maarein. beshak Allah khiyaanat (bad a'hadi) karne waalon ko pasand nahin karta.

verses.arabic: وَلَا يَحْسَبَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ سَبَقُوٓا۟ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ لَا يُعْجِزُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laa yahsabannal- lazeena kafaroo sabaqooo; 'innahum laa yu jizoon.
verses.translation: Aur jin logon ne kufr kiya woh yeh khayaal na karen ke woh bach nikle hain, beshak woh (apni chaalon se Allah ko) aa'jiz nahin kar sakte.

verses.arabic: وَأَعِدُّوا۟ لَهُم مَّا ٱسْتَطَعْتُم مِّن قُوَّةٍۢ وَمِن رِّبَاطِ ٱلْخَيْلِ تُرْهِبُونَ بِهِۦ عَدُوَّ ٱللَّهِ وَعَدُوَّكُمْ وَءَاخَرِينَ مِن دُونِهِمْ لَا تَعْلَمُونَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ يَعْلَمُهُمْ ۚ وَمَا تُنفِقُوا۟ مِن شَىْءٍۢ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ يُوَفَّ إِلَيْكُمْ وَأَنتُمْ لَا تُظْلَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'a'iddoo lahum mas-tata'tum min quwwatiñw-wa mir- ribaatil-khayli turhiboona bihee 'aduwwal-laahi wa 'aduwwakum wa 'aakhareena min doonihim laa ta'lamoonahum Allaahu yalamuhum; wa maa tunfiqoo min shay'in fee sabeelil-laahi yuwaffa 'ilaykum wa 'antum laa tuzlamoon.
verses.translation: Aur un (kaafiron ke muqaable) ke liye tum maqdoor bhar quwwat aur jungi ghode tayyaar rakkho jinse tum Allah ke dushmanon aur apne dushmanon ko aur unke e'laawah doosron ko daraaye rakkho jinhein tum nahin jaante (magar) Allah unhein jaanta hai aur tum Allah ki raah mein jo kuchh kharch karoge tumhein (uska) pura pura sawaab diya jaayega aur tum par zulm nahin kiya jaayega.

verses.arabic: وَإِن جَنَحُوا۟ لِلسَّلْمِ فَٱجْنَحْ لَهَا وَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'in janahoo lissalmi fajnah lahaa wa tawakkal 'alal-laah; 'innahoo Huwas- Samee'ul 'Aleem.
verses.translation: Aur (Aye Nabi!) agar woh sulah ki taraf maayel hon to aap bhi uski taraf maayel ho jaayein aur Allah par bharosa rakkhen, beshak wahi khoob sunne waala, khoob jaanne waala hai.

verses.arabic: وَإِن يُرِيدُوٓا۟ أَن يَخْدَعُوكَ فَإِنَّ حَسْبَكَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ هُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَيَّدَكَ بِنَصْرِهِۦ وَبِٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'iny-yureedooo 'any-yakhdaʻooka fa'inna hasbakal-laah; Huwal-lazeee 'ayyadaka binasrihee wa bilmu'mineen.
verses.translation: Aur agar woh aapko dhoka dena chaahen to beshak aapke liye Allah kaafi hai, wahi to hai jisne apni madad se aur mominon se aapki taayeed ki.

verses.arabic: وَأَلَّفَ بَيْنَ قُلُوبِهِمْ ۚ لَوْ أَنفَقْتَ مَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ جَمِيعًۭا مَّآ أَلَّفْتَ بَيْنَ قُلُوبِهِمْ وَلَـٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ أَلَّفَ بَيْنَهُمْ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'allafa bayna quloobihim; law 'anfaqta maa fil-'ardi jamee'am- maaa 'allafta bayna quloobihim wa laakinnal- laaha 'allafa baynahum; 'innaahoo 'Azeezun- Hakeem.
verses.translation: Aur usne un (mominon) ke dilon mein ulfat daal di, agar aap dunya bhar ke sab khazaane kharch kar dete to bhi unke dilon mein ulfat paida na kar sakte lekin Allah hi un mein ulfat daali, beshak woh zabardast aur khoob hikmat waala hai.

verses.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِىُّ حَسْبُكَ ٱللَّهُ وَمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhan-Nabiyyu hasbukal-laahu wa manit-taba'aka minal-mu'mineen.
verses.translation: Aye Nabi! aapke liye Allah kafi hai aur un logon ke liye bhi jo maminon mein se aap ki pairwi karte hain..

verses.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِىُّ حَرِّضِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ عَلَى ٱلْقِتَالِ ۚ إِن يَكُن مِّنكُمْ عِشْرُونَ صَـٰبِرُونَ يَغْلِبُوا۟ مِا۟ئَتَيْنِ ۚ وَإِن يَكُن مِّنكُم مِّا۟ئَةٌۭ يَغْلِبُوٓا۟ أَلْفًۭا مِّنَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِأَنَّهُمْ قَوْمٌۭ لَّا يَفْقَهُونَ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhan- Nabiyyu harridil- mu'mineena 'alal-qitaal; 'iny-yakum-minkum 'ishroona şaabiroona yaghliboo mi'atayn; wa 'iny-yakum-minkum mi'atuñy-yaghlibooo 'alfam-minal-lazeena kafaroo bi'annahum qawmul-laa yafqahoon.
verses.translation: Aye Nabi! mominon ko jehaad par ubhaarein, agar tum mein bees sabr karne waale hon to woh do sau (kaafiron) par ghaalib aayenge aur agar tum mein ek sau (saabir) hon to woh hazaar (kaafir) par ghaalib aayenge, isliye ke woh log kuchh bhi samajh nahir rakhte.

verses.arabic: ٱلْـَٔـٰنَ خَفَّفَ ٱللَّهُ عَنكُمْ وَعَلِمَ أَنَّ فِيكُمْ ضَعْفًۭا ۚ فَإِن يَكُن مِّنكُم مِّا۟ئَةٌۭ صَابِرَةٌۭ يَغْلِبُوا۟ مِا۟ئَتَيْنِ ۚ وَإِن يَكُن مِّنكُمْ أَلْفٌۭ يَغْلِبُوٓا۟ أَلْفَيْنِ بِإِذْنِ ٱللَّهِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ مَعَ ٱلصَّـٰبِرِينَ
verses.transliteration: 'Al'aana khaffafal- laahu 'ankum wa 'alima 'anna feekum da faa; fa'iny-yakum- minkum mi'atun şaabiratuny- yaghliboo mi'atayn; wa 'iny-yakum-minkum 'alfuñy-yaghlibooo 'alfayni bi'iznil-laah; wallaahu ma'aş-şaabireen.
verses.translation: Ab Allah ne tumse takhfeef kardi aur usne jaan liya ke tumhaare andar kuchh kamzori hai, chunaancheh agar tum mein ek sau sabr karne waale hon to woh do sau (kaafiron) par ghaalib aayenge aur Allah sabr karne waalon ke saath hai.

verses.arabic: مَا كَانَ لِنَبِىٍّ أَنْ يَكُونَ لَهُۥٓ أَسْرَىٰ حَتَّىٰ يُثْخِنَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ تُرِيدُونَ عَرَضَ ٱلدُّنْيَا وَٱللَّهُ يُرِيدُ ٱلْءَاخِرَةَ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Maa kaana li-Nabiyyin 'añy-yakoona lahooo 'asraa hattaa yuskhina fil-'ard; tureedoona 'aradad-dunyaa wallaahu yureedul- 'Aakhirah; wallaahu 'Azeezun Hakeem.
verses.translation: Kisi nabi ke laayeq nahin ke uske paas qaid hon yahaan tak ke woh zameen mein khoob khoon rezi kare (unhein qatl kare Musalmaano!) tum saamaan- e-dunya chaahte ho aur Allah (tumhaari) aakhirat chaahta hai aur Allah zabar dast, khoob hikmat waala hai.

verses.arabic: لَوْلَا كِتَـٰبٌۭ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ سَبَقَ لَمَسَّكُمْ فِيمَآ أَخَذْتُمْ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Law laa Kitaabum- minal-laahi sabaqa lamassakum feemaaa 'akhaztum 'azaabun 'azeem.
verses.translation: Agar Allah ki taraf se pahle hi (ek baat) likhi huyi na hoti¹ to tumne (badr ke qaidiyon se) jo (fidyah) liya uske badle tumhein bada azaab aa pakadta.
verses.deepMeaning: Likhi huyi baat ke muta'alliq ba'z ne kaha hai ke isse maal-e-ghaneemat ki hillat muraad hai ya'ni chunke nawishta-e-taqdeer tha ke musalmaanon ke liye maal-e-ghaneemat halaal hoga. Isliye tum ne fidyah le kar ek jaayez kaam hi kiya hai agar aisa na hota to fidyah lene ki wajah se tumhein azaab-e- azeem pahunchta. Ba'z ne ahl-e-badr ki maghfirat isse muraad li hai aur ba'z ne Rasool ﷺ ki maujoodgi ko azaab mein maane' hona muraad liya hai waghairah.

verses.arabic: فَكُلُوا۟ مِمَّا غَنِمْتُمْ حَلَـٰلًۭا طَيِّبًۭا ۚ وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Fakuloo mimmaa ghanimtum halaalan tayyibaa; wattaqul-laah; 'innal-laaha Ghafoorur- Raheem.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh jo halaal, paakeezah ghaneemat tumne haasil ki hai uss mein se khaao aur Allah se darte raho, beshak Allah bahut bakhshne waala, nehaayat raham karne waala hai.

verses.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِىُّ قُل لِّمَن فِىٓ أَيْدِيكُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَسْرَىٰٓ إِن يَعْلَمِ ٱللَّهُ فِى قُلُوبِكُمْ خَيْرًۭا يُؤْتِكُمْ خَيْرًۭا مِّمَّآ أُخِذَ مِنكُمْ وَيَغْفِرْ لَكُمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhan- Nabiyyu qul-liman feee 'aydeekum minal- 'asraaa 'iny-ya'-lamil- laahu fee quloobikum khayrany-yu'tikum khayram-mimmaaa 'ukhiza minkum wa yaghfir lakum; wallaahu Ghafoorur-Raheem.
verses.translation: Aye Nabi! jo qaidi tumhaare haathon giraftaar hain, aap unse kah deinz agar Allah tumhaare dilon mein bhalaai paayega to tumhein iss (fidye) se kahin behtar ataa karega jo tumse liya gaya hai aur tumhein bakhsh dega aur Allah bahut bakhshne waala, nihaayat raham karne waala hai.

verses.arabic: وَإِن يُرِيدُوا۟ خِيَانَتَكَ فَقَدْ خَانُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مِن قَبْلُ فَأَمْكَنَ مِنْهُمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'iny-yureedoo khiyaanataka faqad khaanul-laaha min qablu fa'amkana minhum; wallaahu 'aleemun Hakeem.
verses.translation: Aur (aye Nabi!) agar woh aapse khayaanat (dagha) karna chaahein to woh pahle hi Allah se dagha kar chuke hain, phir usne unhein tumhaare qabze mein de diya aur Allah khoob jaanne waala, khoob hikmat waala hai.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَهَاجَرُوا۟ وَجَـٰهَدُوا۟ بِأَمْوَٰلِهِمْ وَأَنفُسِهِمْ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَاوَوا۟ وَّنَصَرُوٓا۟ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ بَعْضُهُمْ أَوْلِيَآءُ بَعْضٍۢ ۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَلَمْ يُهَاجِرُوا۟ مَا لَكُم مِّن وَلَـٰيَتِهِم مِّن شَىْءٍ حَتَّىٰ يُهَاجِرُوا۟ ۚ وَإِنِ ٱسْتَنصَرُوكُمْ فِى ٱلدِّينِ فَعَلَيْكُمُ ٱلنَّصْرُ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ قَوْمٍۢ بَيْنَكُمْ وَبَيْنَهُم مِّيثَـٰقٌۭ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌۭ
verses.transliteration: 'Innal-lazeena 'aamanoo wa haajaroo wa jaahadoo bi'amwaalihim wa 'anfusihim fee sabeelil- laahi wallazeena 'aawaw-wa nașarooo 'ulaaa'ika ba'duhum 'awliyaaa'u ba'd; wallazeena 'aamanoo wa lam yuhaajiroo maa lakum minw- walaayatihim min shay'in hattaa yuhaajiroo; wa 'inis-tanşarookum fid- deeni fa'alaykumun naşru 'illaa 'alaa qawmim baynakum wa baynahum meesaaq; wallaahu bimaa ta'maloona Başeer
verses.translation: Beshak jo log eemaan laaye aur unhon ne hijrat ki aur apne maalon aur apni jaanon ke saath Allah ki raah mein jihaad kiya aur jinhon ne (muhaajiron ko apne haan) jagah di aur (unki) madad ki, woh ek doosre ke himaayati hain aur jo log eemaan to le aaye magar unhon ne hijrat nahin ki, unki himaayat se tumhein koyi gharz nahin hattaa ke woh hijrat karein aur agar woh tumse deen (ke mu'aamle) mein madad maangen to tum par madad laazim hai magar uss qaum ke khilaaf nahin ke jin ke aur tumhaare darmiyaan koyi mu'aahidah ho aur tum jo kaam karte ho Allah dekh raha hai.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بَعْضُهُمْ أَوْلِيَآءُ بَعْضٍ إِلَّا تَفْعَلُوهُ تَكُن فِتْنَةٌۭ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَفَسَادٌۭ كَبِيرٌ
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena kafaroo ba'duhum 'awliyaaa'u ba'd; 'illaa taf aloohu takun fitnatun fil-'ardi wa fasaadun kabeer.
verses.translation: Aur jin logori në Kufr Kiya woh aapas mein ek doosre ke himaayati hain. (aye musalmaano!) agar tum aisa nahin karo ge to zameen mein fitnah¹ aur bade fasaad machega.
verses.deepMeaning: Tafseer Tabri: (Jild:10 safah:56) mein iss aayat ki tafseer yun hai: 'Agar tum woh kuchh na karo jo main (Allah) ne tumhein karne ka hukm diya hai, ya'ni tum dunya bhar ke musalmaan Allah ke deen ko ghaalib aur fatah mand karne ke liye ek muttahidah balock ki tarah ek doosre ke himaayati wa haleef na banoge to dunya mein azeem fitnah-o-fasaad (shirk-o-kufr, jung-o-qitaal, halaakat-o-khoonrezi, daaka zani, baddiyaanati aur zulm wa istebadaad waghairah) barpaa ho jaayega.'' Aur ek hi waqt mein muta'ddad musalmaan hukmaraanon ka hona bhi ek fitnah hai jaisa ke Rasoolullah ne farmaya: 'Agar musalmaanaan-e-dunya do khulfaa se bai'at kar lin to (pahla bataur-e-khaleefa baaqi rahe jab ke) doosre ko qatl kardiya jaaye' (Sahih Muslim, Al-Imaarah, Baab:15, Hadees:1853) isi tarah maa qabl hadees:1852 mein bhi khaleefa ki khilaafat mein ifteraaq-o- inteshaar daalne waale ki garden zadni ka hukm maujood hai. mazkoorah dalaayel ki ru se yeh ek qaanooni farz hai ke ek waqt mein saari islami dunya ke liye ek se zaayed khaleefah (musalmaan hukmaraan-e-a'alaa) nahin hone chaahiyein basoorat deegar ek azeem fitnah (fasaad) barpaa ho jaayega. Jiske intehaayi nataayej qaabil sataayesh na honge.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَهَاجَرُوا۟ وَجَـٰهَدُوا۟ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَاوَوا۟ وَّنَصَرُوٓا۟ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ حَقًّۭا ۚ لَّهُم مَّغْفِرَةٌۭ وَرِزْقٌۭ كَرِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena 'aamanoo wa haajaroo wa jaahadoo fee sabeelil-laahi wallazeena 'aawaw-wa naşarooo 'ulaaa'ika humul-mu'minoona haqqaa; lahum maghfiratuñw-wa rizqun kareem.
verses.translation: Aur jo log eemaan laaye aur unhon ne hijrat ki aur Allah ki raah mein jihaad kiya aur jinhon ne (muhaajireen ko) jagah di aur (unki) madad ki wahi log sachche momin hain, unke liye maghfirat aur baa izzat rozi hai.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مِنۢ بَعْدُ وَهَاجَرُوا۟ وَجَـٰهَدُوا۟ مَعَكُمْ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ مِنكُمْ ۚ وَأُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلْأَرْحَامِ بَعْضُهُمْ أَوْلَىٰ بِبَعْضٍۢ فِى كِتَـٰبِ ٱللَّهِ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمٌۢ
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena 'aamanoo mim ba'du wa haajaroo wa jaahadoo ma'akum fa 'ulaaa'ika minkum, wa ulul arhaami ba'duhum aulaa bi-ba'd fee kitaabillaahi. Innallaaha bi kulli shay'in 'Aleem.
verses.translation: Aur jo log ba'd mein eemaan laaye aur unhon hijrat ki aur tumhaare saath (mil kar) jihaad kiya, to woh bhi tumhi mein se hain aur Allah ki kitab mein (khoon ke) rishte daar aapas mein ek doosre ke ziyaadah haqdaar hain, beshak Allah har cheez ko khoob jaanne waalah hai..

verses.arabic: بَرَآءَةٌۭ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦٓ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ عَـٰهَدتُّم مِّنَ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ
verses.transliteration: Baraaa'atum-minal- laahi wa Rasooliheee 'ilal-lazeena 'aahattum- minal-mushrikeen.
verses.translation: (Aye Musalmaano!) jin mushrikeen se tum ne a'had kar rakkha tha, Allah aur uske Rasool ki taraf se unhein saaf jawaab hai.

verses.arabic: فَسِيحُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ أَرْبَعَةَ أَشْهُرٍۢ وَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّكُمْ غَيْرُ مُعْجِزِى ٱللَّهِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مُخْزِى ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Faseehoo fil-'ardi 'arba'ata 'ashhuriñw- walamooo 'annakum ghayru mu'jizil-laahi wa 'annal-laaha mukhzil- kaafireen.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh (Aye mushrikon!) tum zameen mein chaar maah chal phir lo aur jaan lo ke tum Allah ko aajiz nahin kar sakte aur yeh ke Allah kaafiron ko ruswa karne waala hai.

verses.arabic: وَأَذَٰنٌۭ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦٓ إِلَى ٱلنَّاسِ يَوْمَ ٱلْحَجِّ ٱلْأَكْبَرِ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ بَرِيٓءٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ وَرَسُولُهُۥ ۚ فَإِن تُبْتُمْ فَهُوَ خَيْرٌۭ لَّكُمْ ۖ وَإِن تَوَلَّيْتُمْ فَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّكُمْ غَيْرُ مُعْجِزِى ٱللَّهِ ۗ وَبَشِّرِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'azaanum-minal- laahi wa Rasooliheee 'ilan- naasi yawmal-Hajjil- 'Akbari 'annal-laaha bareee'um-minal- mushrikeena wa Rasooluh; fa'in tubtum fahuwa khayrul-lakum wa 'in tawallaytum falamooo 'annakum ghayru mu jizil- laah; wa bashshiril- lazeena kafaroo bi'azaabin 'aleem.
verses.translation: Aur hajj-e-Akbar ke din Allah aur uske Rasool ki jaanib se logon ke liye e'laan hai ke Allah aur uska Rasool mushrikon se bariuzzimah hain, lehaaza (aye mushriko!) agar tum taubah karlo to yeh tumhaare liye behtar hai aur agar tumne (haq se) munh mode rakkha to jaan lo ke tum Allah ko aajiz nahin kar sakte aur (aye nabi!) Aap un kaafiron ko dardnaak azaab ki khabar sunaa den.

verses.arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ عَـٰهَدتُّم مِّنَ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَنقُصُوكُمْ شَيْـًۭٔا وَلَمْ يُظَـٰهِرُوا۟ عَلَيْكُمْ أَحَدًۭا فَأَتِمُّوٓا۟ إِلَيْهِمْ عَهْدَهُمْ إِلَىٰ مُدَّتِهِمْ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحِبُّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ
verses.transliteration: Illal-lazeena 'aahattum-minal- mushrikeena summa lam yanquşookum shay'añw- wa lam yuzaahiroo 'alaykum 'ahadan fa'atimmooo 'ilayhim 'ahdahum 'ilaa muddatihim; 'innal-laaha yuhibbul-muttaqeen.
verses.translation: Lekin jin mushrikon se tumne ahad kiya hai phir unhon ne tumhaare haq mein koyi kami nahin ki aur na tumhaare muqaable mein kisi ki madad ki to unse (muqarrarah) muddat tak unka a'had pura karo. Beshak Allah muttaqiyon ko pasand karta hai.

verses.arabic: فَإِذَا ٱنسَلَخَ ٱلْأَشْهُرُ ٱلْحُرُمُ فَٱقْتُلُوا۟ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ حَيْثُ وَجَدتُّمُوهُمْ وَخُذُوهُمْ وَٱحْصُرُوهُمْ وَٱقْعُدُوا۟ لَهُمْ كُلَّ مَرْصَدٍۢ ۚ فَإِن تَابُوا۟ وَأَقَامُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتَوُا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ فَخَلُّوا۟ سَبِيلَهُمْ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Fa'izan-salakhal-'Ashhurul-Hurumu faqtulul-mushrikeena haysu wajattumoohum wa khuzoohum wahsuroohum waq'udoo lahum kulla marşad; fa'in taaboo wa 'aqaamus- Şalaata wa 'aatawuz- Zakaata fakhalloo sabeelahum; 'innal-laaha Ghafoorur-Raheem.
verses.translation: Phir jab hurmat waale mahine guzar jaayein to tum mushrikeen ko jahaan kahin paao qatl kardo aur unhein pakadlo aur unka muhaasrah karlo aur har ghaat ki jagah unki taak mein baithhe raho,¹ phir agar woh taubah karlein aur namaaz qaayem karein aur zakaat dein to unki raah chhod do, beshak Allah bahut bakhshne waala, nehaayat raham karne waala hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Mulaahazah keejiye:(Surah Baqarah:2/193)

verses.arabic: وَإِنْ أَحَدٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ ٱسْتَجَارَكَ فَأَجِرْهُ حَتَّىٰ يَسْمَعَ كَلَـٰمَ ٱللَّهِ ثُمَّ أَبْلِغْهُ مَأْمَنَهُۥ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ قَوْمٌۭ لَّا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'in 'ahadum-minal- mushrikeenas-tajaaraka fa'ajirhu hattaa yasma'a Kalaamal-laahi summa 'ablighhu ma'manah; zaalika bi'annahum qawmul-laa yaʻlamoon.
verses.translation: Aur (aye Nabi!) agar mushrikon mein se koyi aapse panaah maange to usko panaah dein yahaan tak ke woh Allah ka kalaam sunle, phir use uski amn ki jagah pahunchaa den, isliye ke beshak woh aise log hain jo ilm nahin rakhte.

verses.arabic: كَيْفَ يَكُونُ لِلْمُشْرِكِينَ عَهْدٌ عِندَ اللَّهِ وَعِندَ رَسُولِهِۦٓ إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ عَـٰهَدتُّمْ عِندَ ٱلْمَسْجِدِ ٱلْحَرَامِ ۖ فَمَا ٱسْتَقَـٰمُوا۟ لَكُمْ فَٱسْتَقِيمُوا۟ لَهُمْ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحِبُّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ
verses.transliteration: Kayfa yakoonu lilmushrikeena 'ahdun 'indal-laahi wa 'inda Rasooliheee 'illal-lazeena 'aahattum 'indal- Masjidil-Haraami famas- taqaamoo lakum fastaqeemoo lahum; 'innal-laaha yuhibbul- muttaqeen.
verses.translation: Bhala mushrikon ke liye Allah aur uske Rasool ke nazdeek koyi ahad kyun kar ho sakta hai siwaaye un logon ke jinse tumne masjid-e-haraam ke qareeb ahad liya tha, phir jab tak woh tumhaare saath seedhe rahein tum bhi unke saath seedhe raho, beshak Allah muttaqiyon ko pasand karta hai.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Mulaahazah keejiye:(Surah Baqarah:2/2)

verses.arabic: كَيْفَ وَإِن يَظْهَرُوا۟ عَلَيْكُمْ لَا يَرْقُبُوا۟ فِيكُمْ إِلًّا وَلَا ذِمَّةًۭ ۚ يُرْضُونَكُم بِأَفْوَٰهِهِمْ وَتَأْبَىٰ قُلُوبُهُمْ وَأَكْثَرُهُمْ فَـٰسِقُونَ
verses.transliteration: Kayfa wa 'iny- yazharoo 'alaykum laa yarquboo feekum 'illañw- wa laa zimmah; yurdoonakum bi'afwaahihim wa ta'baa quloobuhum wa 'aksaruhum faasiqoon.
verses.translation: Kis tarah (mushrikon se ahad rah sakta hai?) jabke unka yeh haal hai ke agar woh tum par ghalbah paalein to woh tumhaare muaa'mle mein rishte daari ka lehaaz karenge na kisi a'had ka, woh apne munh (zabaan) se tumhein khush karte hain aur unke dil inkaar karte hain aur un mein se aksar naafarmaan hain.

verses.arabic: ٱشْتَرَوْا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ ثَمَنًۭا قَلِيلًۭا فَصَدُّوا۟ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦٓ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ سَآءَ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Ishtaraw bi-'Aayaatil- laahi samanan qaleelan faşaddoo 'an sabeelih; 'innahum saaa'a maa kaanoo ya maloon.
verses.translation: Unhon ne Allah ki aayaat ko thodi si qeemat par becha phir (logon ko) uske raaste se roka, beshak bura hai jo woh karte hain.

verses.arabic: لَا يَرْقُبُونَ فِى مُؤْمِنٍ إِلًّا وَلَا ذِمَّةًۭ ۚ وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُعْتَدُونَ
verses.transliteration: Laa yarquboona fee mu'minin 'illañw-wa laa zimmah; wa 'ulaaa'ika humul-mu'tadoon.
verses.translation: Woh kisi momin ke mu'aamle mein rishte daari ka lehaaz karte hain na kisi ahad ka, aur wahi log had se guzarne waale hain.

verses.arabic: فَإِن تَابُوا۟ وَأَقَامُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتَوُا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ فَإِخْوَٰنُكُمْ فِى ٱلدِّينِ ۗ وَنُفَصِّلُ ٱلْءَايَـٰتِ لِقَوْمٍۢ يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Fa'in taaboo wa 'aqaamuş-Şalaata wa 'aatawuz-Zakaata fa'ikhwaanukum fid- deen; wa nufaşşilul- 'Aayaati liqawminy- yalamoon.
verses.translation: Phir agar woh taubah karlen aur namaaz qaayem karein aur zakaat dein to woh deen mein tumhaare bhaai hain aur hum apni nishaaniyaan un logon ke liye tafseel se bayaan karte hain jo ilm rakhte hain.

verses.arabic: وَإِن نَّكَثُوٓا۟ أَيْمَـٰنَهُم مِّنۢ بَعْدِ عَهْدِهِمْ وَطَعَنُوا۟ فِى دِينِكُمْ فَقَـٰتِلُوٓا۟ أَئِمَّةَ ٱلْكُفْرِ ۙ إِنَّهُمْ لَآ أَيْمَـٰنَ لَهُمْ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَنتَهُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'in nakasooo 'aymaanahum mim ba'di 'ahdihim wa ta'anoo fee deenikum faqaatilooo 'a'immatal-kufri 'innahum laaa 'aymaana lahum la'allahum yantahoon.
verses.translation: Aur agar woh apne a'had ke ba'd apni qasmon ko tod daalein aur tumhaare deen mein ta'n karein e to kufr ke un sardaaron se jung karo, beshak unki qasmon ka koyi e'tebaar nahin, shaayad ke woh baaz aayein.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Aimma, imam ki jama' hai muraad peshwa aur leader hain. matlab yeh hai ke agar yeh log ahad tod dein aur deen mein ta'n karein to zaahiri taur par yeh qasmein bhi khaayein to unki qasmon mon ka e'tebaar nahin. Kufr ke un peshwaaon se ladaayi karo mumkin hai iss tarah apne kufr se yeh baaz aa jaayein.

verses.arabic: أَلَا تُقَـٰتِلُونَ قَوْمًا نَّكَثُوٓا۟ أَيْمَـٰنَهُمْ وَهَمُّوا۟ بِإِخْرَاجِ ٱلرَّسُولِ وَهُم بَدَءُوكُمْ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍ ۚ أَتَخْشَوْنَهُمْ ۚ فَٱللَّهُ أَحَقُّ أَن تَخْشَوْهُ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.transliteration: 'Alaa tuqaatiloona qawman-nakasooo 'aymaanahum wa hammoo bi'ikhraajir- Rasooli wa hum bada'ookum 'awwala marrah; 'atakhshawnahum; fallaahu 'ahaqqu 'an takhshawhu 'in kuntum mu'mineen.
verses.translation: Kiya tum un logon se nahin ladoge jinhon ne apni qasmein tod daalin aur Rasool ko (Makkah se) nikaalne ka iraadah kiya¹ aur unhon ne hi pahle pahal tumse ladaayi shuru ki? Kiya tum unse darte ho? Haalaanke Allah hi ziyaadah haqdaar hai ke tum usse daro agar tum momin ho.
verses.deepMeaning: Isse muraad daarunnadwah ki woh mashaawarat hai jis mein ruoosaa-e-Makkah ne Nabi ﷺ ke jalaa watan karne, qaid karne ya qatl karne ki tajweezon par ghaur kiya.

verses.arabic: قَـٰتِلُوهُمْ يُعَذِّبْهُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِأَيْدِيكُمْ وَيُخْزِهِمْ وَيَنصُرْكُمْ عَلَيْهِمْ وَيَشْفِ صُدُورَ قَوْمٍۢ مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaatiloohum yu'azzibhumul-laahu bi'aydeekum wa yukhzihim wa yansurkum 'alayhim wa yashfi şudoora qawmim- mu'mineen.
verses.translation: Unse (khoob) ladaayi karo, Allah unhein tumhaare haathon a'zaab mein daalega aur unhein ruswa karega aur tumhen un par fatah dega aur mominon ke seenon ko shifa (thhandak) bakhshega.

verses.arabic: وَيُذْهِبْ غَيْظَ قُلُوبِهِمْ ۗ وَيَتُوبُ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ مَن يَشَآءُ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa yuzhib ghayza quloobihim; wa yatoobul- laahu 'alaa mañy- yashaaa'; wallaahu 'Aleemun Hakeem
verses.translation: Aur woh unke dilon ka ghussa door karega aur Allah jis par chaahe tawajjoh farmaata hai aur Allah khoob jaanne waala, khoob hikmat waala hai.

verses.arabic: أَمْ حَسِبْتُمْ أَن تُتْرَكُوا۟ وَلَمَّا يَعْلَمِ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ جَـٰهَدُوا۟ مِنكُمْ وَلَمْ يَتَّخِذُوا۟ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَلَا رَسُولِهِۦ وَلَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَلِيجَةًۭ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ خَبِيرٌۢ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Am hasibtum 'an tutrakoo wa lammaa ya'lamil-laahul-lazeena jaahadoo minkum wa lam yattakhizoo min doonil-laahi wa laa Rasoolihee wa lalmu'mineena waleejah; wallaahu khabeerum bimaa ta'maloon.
verses.translation: Kiya tumne yeh samajh rakkha hai ke tumhein (yunhi) chhod diyaa jaayega jabke abhi Allah ne tum mein se un logon ko nahin chhaanta jinhon ne jehaad kiya aur Allah aur uske Rasool aur mominon ke siwa kisi ko dili dost nahin banaaya aur tum jo amal karte ho Allah unki khoob khabar rakhta hai.

verses.arabic: مَا كَانَ لِلْمُشْرِكِينَ أَن يَعْمُرُوا۟ مَسَـٰجِدَ ٱللَّهِ شَـٰهِدِينَ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِم بِٱلْكُفْرِ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ حَبِطَتْ أَعْمَـٰلُهُمْ وَفِى ٱلنَّارِ هُمْ خَـٰلِدُونَ
verses.transliteration: maa kaana lilmushrikeena 'any- ya'muroo masaajidal- laahi shaahideena 'alaaa 'anfusihim bilkufr; 'ulaaa'ika habitat 'a'maaluhum wa fin- Naari hum khaalidoon.
verses.translation: Mushrikeen iss laayeq nahin ke woh Allah ki masjdein aabaad karein jabke woh apne aap par kufr ki gawaahi de rahe hon, inhi logon ke sab aa'maal barbaad ho gaye aur woh hameshah dozakh mein rahenge.

verses.arabic: إِنَّمَا يَعْمُرُ مَسَـٰجِدَ ٱللَّهِ مَنْ ءَامَنَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِ وَأَقَامَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتَى ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَلَمْ يَخْشَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَ فَعَسَىٰٓ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ أَن يَكُونُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلْمُهْتَدِينَ
verses.transliteration: 'Innamaa ya'muru masaajidal-laahi man 'aamana billaahi wal- Yawmil-'Aakhiri wa 'aqaamaş-Şalaata wa 'aataz-Zakaata wa lam yakhsha 'illal-laaha fa'asaaa 'ulaaa'ika 'añy-yakoonoo minal- muhtadeen.
verses.translation: Allah ki masjidein to sirf woh aabaad karta hai jo Allah aur yaum-e-aakhirat par eemaan laaya aur usne namaaz qaayem ki aur zakaat di aur Allah ke siwa kisi se nahin dara, lehaaza ummeed hai ke yahi log hidaayat yaaftah logon mein se honge.

verses.arabic: أَجَعَلْتُمْ سِقَايَةَ ٱلْحَآجِّ وَعِمَارَةَ ٱلْمَسْجِدِ ٱلْحَرَامِ كَمَنْ ءَامَنَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِ وَجَـٰهَدَ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ لَا يَسْتَوُۥنَ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يَهْدِى ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: 'Ajaʻaltum siqaayatal- haaajji wa 'imaaratal- masjidil-haraami kaman 'aamana billaahi wal- Yawmil-'Aakhiri wa jaahada fee sabeelil- laah; laa yastawoona 'indal-laah; wallaahu laa yahdil-qawmaz- zaalimeen.
verses.translation: Kiya tumne haajiyon ko paani pilaana aur masjid-e- haraam ko aabaad karna uss shakhs ke (aa'maal ke) maanind qaraar de rakkha hai jo Allah aur yaum-e- aakhrat par eemaan laaya aur usne Allah ki raah mein jehaad kiya, Allah ke nazdeek yeh baraabar nahin hosakte aur Allah zaalim logon ko hidaayat nahin diya karta.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَهَاجَرُوا۟ وَجَـٰهَدُوا۟ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ بِأَمْوَٰلِهِمْ وَأَنفُسِهِمْ أَعْظَمُ دَرَجَةً عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْفَآئِزُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Allazeena 'aamanoo wa haajaroo wa jaahadoo fee sabeelil- laahi bi'amwaalihim wa 'anfusihim 'a'zamu darajatan 'indal-laah; wa 'ulaaa'ika humul- faaa'izoon.
verses.translation: Jo log eemaan laaye aur unhon ne hijrat ki aur Allah ki raah mein apne amwaal aur apni jaanon se jehaad kiya, Allah ke haan unka darjah bahut bada hai aur wahi muraad paane waale hain.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Rasoolullah ﷺ ne eemaan, namaaz aur roze par jannat mein daakhil hone ki baat ki phir mazeed farmaya: 'Jannat ke 100 darje hain jo Allah ne raah-e-haq mein jehaad karne waalon ke liye tayyaar kar rakkhe hain, har do darjon ke darmiyaan itna faaslah hai jitna zameen aur aasmaan ke darmiyaan hai.' (Al-Bukhari, Al-jehaad Wassair, Baab:4, Hadees:2790) Shahaadat ki aarzu karna bhi ek momin ka imtiyaazi wasf hai. jis tarah Rasoolullah ﷺ ki yeh aarzu thi ke main Allah ki raah mein maara jaaoun, phir zindah kar diya jaaoun phir qatl kar diya jaaun, phir zindah kiya jaaun phir qatl kar diya jaaoun phir zindah kiya jaaoun phir qatl kar diya jaaun. (Al-Bukhari, Al-jehaad wassair, baab:7 hadees:2797)

verses.arabic: يُبَشِّرُهُمْ رَبُّهُم بِرَحْمَةٍۢ مِّنْهُ وَرِضْوَٰنٍۢ وَجَنَّـٰتٍۢ لَّهُمْ فِيهَا نَعِيمٌۭ مُّقِيمٌ
verses.transliteration: Yubashshiruhum Rabbuhum birahmatim- minhu wa ridwaaniñw- wa Jannaatil-lahum feehaa na'eeтит- muqeem.
verses.translation: Unka rab unhein apni taraf se rahmat aur razaa mandi aur aise baaghon ki khushkhabri sunaata hai jin mein unke liye hameshah rahne waali ne'matein hongi.

verses.arabic: خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًا ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عِندَهُۥٓ أَجْرٌ عَظِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Khaalideena feehaaa 'abadaa; 'innal-laaha 'indahooo 'ajrun 'azeem.
verses.translation: Woh un mein hameshah rahenge abad tak, beshak Allah ke haan bahut bada ajr hai.

verses.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَا تَتَّخِذُوٓا۟ ءَابَآءَكُمْ وَإِخْوَٰنَكُمْ أَوْلِيَآءَ إِنِ ٱسْتَحَبُّوا۟ ٱلْكُفْرَ عَلَى ٱلْإِيمَـٰنِ ۚ وَمَن يَتَوَلَّهُم مِّنكُمْ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhal- lazeena 'aamanoo laa tattakhizooo 'aabaaa'akum wa 'ikhwaanakum 'awliyaaa'a 'inis- tahabbul-kufra 'alal- 'eemaan; wa mañy-yatawallahum minkum fa'ulaaa'ika humuz- zaalimoon.
verses.translation: Aye logo jo eemaan laaye ho! Agar tumhaare baap aur bhaai eemaan par kufr ko pasand karein to tum (hargiz) unhein dost na banaao aur tum mein se jo unko dost banaayenge to wahi log zaalim hain.

verses.arabic: قُلْ إِن كَانَ ءَابَآؤُكُمْ وَأَبْنَآؤُكُمْ وَإِخْوَٰنُكُمْ وَأَزْوَٰجُكُمْ وَعَشِيرَتُكُمْ وَأَمْوَٰلٌ ٱقْتَرَفْتُمُوهَا وَتِجَـٰرَةٌۭ تَخْشَوْنَ كَسَادَهَا وَمَسَـٰكِنُ تَرْضَوْنَهَآ أَحَبَّ إِلَيْكُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَجِهَادٍۢ فِى سَبِيلِهِۦ فَتَرَبَّصُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ يَأْتِىَ ٱللَّهُ بِأَمْرِهِۦ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يَهْدِى ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلْفَـٰسِقِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qul 'in kaana 'aabaaa'ukum wa 'abnaaa'ukum wa 'ikhwaanukum wa 'azwaajukum wa 'asheeratukum wa 'amwaaluniq- taraftumoohaa wa tijaaratun takhshawna kasaadahaa wa masaakinu tardawnahaaa 'ahabba 'ilaykum minal- laahi wa Rasoolihee wa Jihaadin fee Sabeelihee fatarabbasoo hattaa ya'tiyal-laahu bi'amrih; wallaahu laa yahdil- qawmal-faasiqeen.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) kah dein agar tumhaare baap aur bete aur bhaai aur biwiyaan aur tumhaara kumbah qabeelah aur jo maal tumne kamaaye aur woh tijaarat jiske manda padne ka tumhein dar hai aur makaanaat jinhein tum pasand karte ho, (yeh sab) tumhein Allah aur uske Rasool aur uski raah mein jehaad se ziyaadah aziz hain to intezaar karo yahaan tak ke Allah apna hukm bhej de.¹ aur Allah naafarmaan logon ko hidaayat nahin deta.
verses.deepMeaning: Iss mein jehaad se gurez par sakht wayeed bayaan farmaayi gayi hai. jehaad fi sabeelillah ko islam ki ek azeem choti kaha gaya hai. jehaad se islam ka qiyaam amal mein aata, (Kalimatullah) aur (Laa ilaaha illallaah) 'Allah ke siwa koyi ma'bood-e-haqeeqi nahin' ko ghalbah haasil hota hai neez isse deen-e- islam ki ishaa'at hoti hai jabke jehaad tark karne se islam paa maal hota, musalmaan intehaayi past-o- zillat mein jaa girte aur sharf-o-izzat se mahroom ho jaate hain. (Nawoozubillah min Zaalik) unki zameenein ghasab karli jaati hain aur unki hukoomat aur iqtedaar ma'doom ho jaata hai. islam mein jehaad ek nehaayat ahum fareezah hai aur jo iss fareeze ko adaa karne ki aarzu nahin karta to woh nifaaq ki khaslaton mein se ek khaslat ke saath marta hai, hazrat Abu Hurairah  رضي الله عنه ne Rasoolullah ﷺ ka farmaan bayin alfaaz rivaayat kiya hai: 'jo shakhs mar gaya aur jehaad kiya na dil mein jehaad ka iraadah hi kiya, woh nifaaq ki ek qism mein mara.'' (Sahih Muslim, Al-imaarah, Baab:47, Hadees:1910

verses.arabic: لَقَدْ نَصَرَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ فِى مَوَٰطِنَ كَثِيرَةٍۢ ۙ وَيَوْمَ حُنَيْنٍ إِذْ أَعْجَبَتْكُمْ كَثْرَتُكُمْ فَلَمْ تُغْنِ عَنكُم شَيْـًۭٔا وَضَاقَتْ عَلَيْكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضُ بِمَا رَحُبَتْ ثُمَّ وَلَّيْتُم مُّدْبِرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Laqad naşarakumul- laahu fee mawaatina kaseeratiñw-wa yawma Hunaynin 'iz 'a'jabatkum kasratukum falam tughni 'ankum shay'anw-wa daaqat 'alaykumul-'ardu bimaa rahubat summa wallaytum mudbireen.
verses.translation: Yaqeenan Allah ne bahut se mawaaqe' par tumhaari madad ki hai aur hunain ke din (bhi) jabke tumhaari kasrat ne tumhein khush fahmi mein daal diya tha, to woh tumhaare kuchh bhi kaam na aayi aur zameen faraakhi ke baa wajood tum par tang ho gayi phir tum peethh pher kar palte.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ سَكِينَتَهُۥ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِهِۦ وَعَلَى ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَأَنزَلَ جُنُودًۭا لَّمْ تَرَوْهَا وَعَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ جَزَآءُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Summa 'anzalal-laahu sakeenatahoo 'alaa Rasoolihee wa 'alal- mu'mineena wa 'anzala junoodal-lam tarawhaa wa 'azzabal-lazeenan kafaroo; wa zaalika jazaaa'ul-kaafireen.
verses.translation: Phir Allah ne apne Rasool par aur mominon par apni taskeen naazil ki aur uss ne aise lashkar bheje jo tumne nahin dekhe aur jin logon ne kufr kiya unhein a'zaab diya aur kaafiron ki yahi saza hai.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ يَتُوبُ ٱللَّهُ مِنۢ بَعْدِ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَىٰ مَن يَشَآءُ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Summa yatoobul- laahu mim ba'di zaalika 'alaa mañy-yashaaa'; wallaahu Ghafoorur-Raheem.
verses.translation: Phir uske ba'd Allah jis par chaahega tawajjoh farmaayega aur Allah bahut bakhshne waala, nehaayat raham karne waala hai.

verses.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِنَّمَا ٱلْمُشْرِكُونَ نَجَسٌۭ فَلَا يَقْرَبُوا۟ ٱلْمَسْجِدَ ٱلْحَرَامَ بَعْدَ عَامِهِمْ هَـٰذَا ۖ وَإِنْ خِفْتُمْ عَيْلَةًۭ فَسَوْفَ يُغْنِيكُمُ ٱللَّهُ مِن فَضْلِهِۦٓ إِن شَآءَ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhal- lazeena 'aamanooo 'innamal-mushrikoona najasun falaa yaqrabul- Masjidal-Haraama ba'da 'aamihim haazaa; wa 'in khiftum 'aylatan fasawfa yughneekumul-laahu min fadliheee 'in shaaa'; 'innal-laaha 'Aleemun hakeem.
verses.translation: Aye eemaan waalo! Mushrik to hain hi paleed,¹ lehaaza woh iss baras ke ba'd masjid-e-haraam ke qareeb na aane paayein aur agar tumhein tang dasti ka khauf hai to agar Allah chaahega to tumhen apne fazl se ghani kardega, beshak Allah sab kuchh jaanne waala, khoob hikmat waala hai.
verses.deepMeaning: In mushrikeen ki najaasat ruhaani bhi hai aur jismaani bhi: ruhaani najaasat yeh hai ke woh Allah ki wahdaaniyat aur uske Rasool hazrat Muhammad ﷺ par eemaan nahin rakhte. Aur jismaani najaasat yeh hai ke woh zaati hifzaan-e-sehat, tahaarat-o-safaayi ka koyi ehtamaam nahin karte, ya'ni peshaab, ejaabat aur jinsi ratoobaat ke akhraajaat ke lehaaz se junbi aur naapaak hote hain.

verses.arabic: قَـٰتِلُوا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَلَا بِٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِ وَلَا يُحَرِّمُونَ مَا حَرَّمَ ٱللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُۥ وَلَا يَدِينُونَ دِينَ ٱلْحَقِّ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ حَتَّىٰ يُعْطُوا۟ ٱلْجِزْيَةَ عَن يَدٍۢ وَهُمْ صَـٰغِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qaatilul-lazeena laa yu'minoona billaahi wa laa bil-yawmil-'Aakhiri wa laa yuharrimoona maa harramal-laahu wa Rasooluhoo wa laa yadeenoona deenal-haqqi minal-lazeena 'ootul- Kitaaba hattaa yu tul- jizyata 'any-yadinw-wa hum şaaghiroon.
verses.translation: Un logon se lado jo Allah par aur yaum-e-aakhirat par eemaan nahin laate aur uss cheez ko haraam nahin thhahraate jise Allah ne aur uske Rasool ne haraam thhahraaya hai, aur deen-e- haq ko qubool nahin karte, woh jo ahl-e-kitab mein se hain, (unse lado) yahaan tak ke woh zaleel ho kar apne haath se jizyah¹ dein.
verses.deepMeaning: Jizyah) ek aisa tex hai jo aise ghair muslimon (Yahud wa Nasaara waghairah) se wosool kiya jaata hai jo musalmaan hukoomat ki hifaazat wa aamaan mein zindagi basar karte hain.

verses.arabic: وَقَالَتِ ٱلْيَهُودُ عُزَيْرٌ ٱبْنُ ٱللَّهِ وَقَالَتِ ٱلنَّصَـٰرَى ٱلْمَسِيحُ ٱبْنُ ٱللَّهِ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ قَوْلُهُم بِأَفْوَٰهِهِمْ ۖ يُضَٰهِـُٔونَ قَوْلَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِن قَبْلُ ۚ قَـٰتَلَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ۚ أَنَّىٰ يُؤْفَكُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa qaalatil-Yahoodu 'Uzayrunib-nul-laahi wa qaalatin-Nasaaral- Maseehub-nul-laahi zaalika qawluhum bi'afwaahihim yudaahi'oona qawlal- lazeena kafaroo min qabl; qaatalahumul-laah; 'annaa yu'fakoon.
verses.translation: Aur yahoodiyon ne kaha: Uzair Allah ka beta hai aur eisaayiyon ne kaha: Eisa Allah ka beta hai,¹ yeh unke munh ki baatein hain, yeh un kaafiron ki baat ki rees karte hain jo unse pahle guzre, Allah unhein halaak kare yeh kahaan bahke phirte hain.
verses.deepMeaning: Haalaanke Allah ki koyi aulaad nahin woh un cheezon se paak hai.

verses.arabic: ٱتَّخَذُوٓا۟ أَحْبَارَهُمْ وَرُهْبَـٰنَهُمْ أَرْبَابًۭا مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلْمَسِيحَ ٱبْنَ مَرْيَمَ وَمَآ أُمِرُوٓا۟ إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُوٓا۟ إِلَـٰهًۭا وَٰحِدًۭا ۖ لَّآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ سُبْحَـٰنَهُۥ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Ittakhazooo Pahbaarahum wa ruhbaanahum 'arbaabam-min doonil-laahi wal-Maseehab-na Maryama wa maaa 'umirooo 'illaa liya'budooo 'Ilaahanw-Waahidan laaa 'ilaaha 'illaa hoo; Subhaanahoo 'ammaa yushrikoon.
verses.translation: Unhon ne Allah ko chhod kar apne u'lamaa aur durweshon ke (apna) rab banaa liya aur masih ibne maryam ko bhi, haalaanke unhen yahi hukm diya gaya tha ke woh sirf ek ma'bood (Allah) ki ibaadat karein jis ke siwa koyi ma'bood nahin,¹ woh uss shirk se paak hai jo woh karte hain.
verses.deepMeaning: Adi bin Haatim ne Rasoolullah ko yeh aayat tilaawat farmaate huye suna, aapne farmaya: woh yaqeenan unki ibaadat nahin karte the, lekin unke u'lamaa jis cheez ko halaal qaraar dete yeh unko halaal samajhte aur jis cheez ko haraam kah dete, use haraam samajhte the.' (Jame Tirmezi, Tafseer, Surah Taubah, Hadees:3095) goya Ulamaa-o-ahbaar ki andhi pairwi unki ibaadat ke mutaraadif hai.

verses.arabic: يُرِيدُونَ أَن يُطْفِـُٔوا۟ نُورَ ٱللَّهِ بِأَفْوَٰهِهِمْ وَيَأْبَى ٱللَّهُ إِلَّآ أَن يُتِمَّ نُورَهُۥ وَلَوْ كَرِهَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Yureedoona 'añy- yutfi'oo nooral-laahi bi'afwaahihim wa ya'bal-laahu 'illaaa 'añy- yutimma noorahoo wa law karihal-kaafiroon.
verses.translation: Woh chaahte hain ke Allah ke Noor ko apne munhon se bujhaaden aur Allah apne Noor ko pura karke rahta hai, khaah kaafiron ko bura hi lage.

verses.arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَرْسَلَ رَسُولَهُۥ بِٱلْهُدَىٰ وَدِينِ ٱلْحَقِّ لِيُظْهِرَهُۥ عَلَى ٱلدِّينِ كُلِّهِۦ وَلَوْ كَرِهَ ٱلْمُشْرِكُونَ
verses.transliteration: Huwal-lazeee 'arsala Rasoolahoo bilhudaa wa deenil-haqqi liyuzhirahoo 'alad-deeni kullihee wa law karihal-mushrikoon.
verses.translation: Wahi (Allah) hai jisne apne Rasool ko hidaayat aur deen-e-haq ke saath C bheja take use sab deenonapar ghaalib kare, khaah mushrikeen ko bura hi lage.

verses.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِنَّ كَثِيرًۭا مِّنَ ٱلْأَحْبَارِ وَٱلرُّهْبَـٰنِ لَيَأْكُلُونَ أَمْوَٰلَ ٱلنَّاسِ بِٱلْبَـٰطِلِ وَيَصُدُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۗ وَٱلَّذِينَ يَكْنِزُونَ ٱلذَّهَبَ وَٱلْفِضَّةَ وَلَا يُنفِقُونَهَا فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ فَبَشِّرْهُم بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍۢ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhal-lazeena 'aamanooo 'inna kaseeram- minal-'ahbaari warruhbaani la ya'kuloona 'amwaalan-naasi bilbaatili wa yaşuddoona 'an sabeelil-laah; wallazeena yaknizoonaz-zahaba walfiddata wa laa yunfiqoonahaa fee sabeelil- laahi fabashshirhum bi'azaabin 'aleem.
verses.translation: Aye eemaan waalo! Be shak! Aksar ulamaa aur durwesh logon ka maal naa haq hi khaate hain aur woh (logon ko) Allah ke raaste se rokte hain aur jo log sona aur chaandi jama karte hain aur use Allah ki raah mein kharch nahin karte, to aap unhein dardnaak azaab ki khabar suna dein.

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ يُحْمَىٰ عَلَيْهَا فِى نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ فَتُكْوَىٰ بِهَا جِبَاهُهُمْ وَجُنُوبُهُمْ وَظُهُورُهُمْ ۖ هَـٰذَا مَا كَنَزْتُمْ لِأَنفُسِكُمْ فَذُوقُوا۟ مَا كُنتُمْ تَكْنِزُونَ
verses.transliteration: Yawma yuhmaa 'alayhaa fee naari jahannama fatukwaa bihaa jibaahuhum wa junoobuhum wa izuhooruhum haazaa maa kanaztum li'anfusikum fazooqoo maa kuntum taknizoon.
verses.translation: Jis din woh maal dozakh ki aag mein tapaa ya jaayega phir usse unke marathon, unke pahluon aur unki peethhon ko daagha jaayega (aur kahaa jaayega) yeh woh (maal) hai jo tumne apne liye jama kiya tha, lehaaza ab uska mazah chakho jo tum jama karte rahe the.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Mulaahazah ho haashyah: (Surah Al-e-Imran: 3/180)

verses.arabic: إِنَّ عِدَّةَ ٱلشُّهُورِ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ٱثْنَا عَشَرَ شَهْرًۭا فِى كِتَـٰبِ ٱللَّهِ يَوْمَ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ مِنْهَآ أَرْبَعَةٌ حُرُمٌۭ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلدِّينُ ٱلْقَيِّمُ ۚ فَلَا تَظْلِمُوا۟ فِيهِنَّ أَنفُسَكُمْ ۚ وَقَـٰتِلُوا۟ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ كَآفَّةًۭ كَمَا يُقَـٰتِلُونَكُمْ كَآفَّةًۭ ۚ وَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ
verses.transliteration: 'Inna 'iddatash- shuhoori 'indal-laahis naa 'ashara shahran fee Kitaabil-laahi yawma khalaqas-samaawaati wal'arda minhaaa 'arba'atun hurum; zaalikad-deenul-qayyim; falaa tazlimoo feehinna 'anfusakum; wa qaatilul- mushrikeena kaaaffattan kamaa yuqaatiloonakum kaaaffah; waʻlamooo 'annal-laaha ma'al- muttaqeen.
verses.translation: Beshak Allah ke nazdeek maheenon ki ginti baarah mahine hi hai Allah ki kitab mein, jis din se usne aasmaan aur zameen ko paida kiya, un mein se chaar mahine hurmat waale hain.¹ yahi seedha deen hai, chunaancheh tum un (mahinon) mein apne aap par zulm na karo aur tamaam mushrikeen se lado jaise woh tum sab se ladte hain,² aur jaan lo ke beshak Allah muttaqiyon ke saath hai.
verses.deepMeaning: 1️⃣Fee kitaabillah se muraad lauh-e-mahfooz ya'ni taqdeer-e-ilaahi hai ya'ni ibtedaa-e-aafreenish se hi Allah Ta'ala ne 12 mahine muqarrar farmaaye hain, jin mein chaar hurmat waale hain jin mein qitaal wa jidaal ki bilkhusoos mumaani'at hai, isi baat ko Nabi Kareem ﷺ ne iss tarah bayaan farmaya hai ke zamaana ghoom ghuma kar phir usi haalat par aa gaya hai jis haalat par uss waqt tha jab Allah ne aasmaanon aur zameen ki takhleeq farmaayi thi. Saal 12 mahinon ka hai jin mein 4 mahine hurmat waale hain, 3 pay dar pay:zulqa'dah, zulhijjah aur muharram aur chauthha rajab-e-murajjab, jo jamaadiul ukhra aur sha'baan ke darmiyaan hai. (Bukhari:4662, Sahih Muslim, Al-qasaamah wal muhaaribeen, Baab:9, Hadees:1679) zamaana, isi haalat par aa gaya hai ka matlab, mushrikeen-e-arab mahinon mein ja taakheer-o-taqdeem karte the, jis ki tafseel aage aarahi hai, iska khaatmah hai. 2️⃣Lekin hurmat waale mahine guzarne ke ba'd illa yeh ke woh ladne par majboor kardein, phir hurmat waale mahinon mein bhi tumhaare liye ladna jaayez hoga.

verses.arabic: إِنَّمَا ٱلنَّسِىٓءُ زِيَادَةٌۭ فِى ٱلْكُفْرِ ۖ يُضَلُّ بِهِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ يُحِلُّونَهُۥ عَامًۭا وَيُحَرِّمُونَهُۥ عَامًۭا لِّيُوَاطِـُٔوا۟ عِدَّةَ مَا حَرَّمَ ٱللَّهُ فَيُحِلُّوا۟ مَا حَرَّمَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ زُيِّنَ لَهُمْ سُوٓءُ أَعْمَـٰلِهِمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يَهْدِى ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
verses.transliteration: 'Innaman-naseee'u ziyaadatun fil-kufri yudallu bihil-lazeena kafaroo yuhil-loonahoo 'aamanw-wa yuharrimoonahoo 'aamal-liyuwaati'oo 'iddata maa harramal- laahu fayuhilloo maa harramal-laah; zuyyina lahum sooo'u 'a'maalihim; wallaahu laa yahdil-qawmal- kaafireen.
verses.translation: ilaa shubah kisi mahine ko aage peechhe kar dena kufr mein ziyaadati hai uski wajah se kaafir gumraah kiye jaate hain woh ek saal use halaal kar lete hain aur doosre saal use haraam (khayaal karte hain) taake un (mahinon) ki ginti puri karein jo Allah ne haraam thhahraaye hain, phir woh halaal thhahraalein jise Allah ne haraam thhahraaya. unke bure aa'maal unhein bhale dikhaayi dete hain aur Allah kaafrion ko hidaayat nahin deta.

verses.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مَا لَكُمْ إِذَا قِيلَ لَكُمُ ٱنفِرُوا۟ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ٱثَّاقَلْتُمْ إِلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ أَرَضِيتُم بِٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا مِنَ ٱلْءَاخِرَةِ ۚ فَمَا مَتَـٰعُ ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا فِى ٱلْءَاخِرَةِ إِلَّا قَلِيلٌ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhal-lazeena 'aamanoo maa lakum 'izaa qeela lakumun-firoo fee sabeelil-laahis- saaqaltum 'ilal-'ard; 'aradeetum bilhayaatid- dunyaa minal-'Aakhirah; famaa mataaʻul-hayaatid- dunyaa fil-'Aakhirati 'illaa qaleel.
verses.translation: Aye eemaan . waalo! Tumhein kiya ho gaya hai, jab tumse kahaa jaata hai ke Allah ki raah mein niklo to tum zameen par dher ho jaate ho?¹ kiya tum aakhirat ko chhod kar dunya ki zindagi par reejh gaye ho? Chunaancheh dunya ki zindagi ka faayidah jo aakhirat (ke muqaable) mein bahut haqeer hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Haalaanke Allah ki raah mein jehaad karna bada fazeelat waala amal hai hatta ke shaheed dunya mein dobaarah aane ki aarzu karega take phir shahaadat ke darje se musharraf ho. Rasoolullah ﷺ ne farmaya: 'Koyi shakhs aisa nahin jise marne ke ba'd Allah ke haan achchha ajr-o-sawaab mile aur phir bhi woh dunya mein waapas aana pasnad kare agarcheh usko saari dunya aur jo kuchh uss mein hai sab kuchh de diya jaaye siwaa-e-shaheed ke, woh shahaadat ki fazeelat dekh kar chaahega ke dunya mein waapas aaye aur dobaarah (Allah ki raah mein) maara jaaye.(Al-Bukhari, Al-Jihaad Wassair, Baab,6, Hadees:2795)

verses.arabic: إِلَّا تَنفِرُوا۟ يُعَذِّبْكُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًۭا وَيَسْتَبْدِلْ قَوْمًا غَيْرَكُمْ وَلَا تَضُرُّوهُ شَيْـًۭٔا ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ قَدِيرٌ
verses.transliteration: 'Illaa tanfiroo yu'azzibkum 'azaaban 'aleemañw-wa yastabdil qawman ghayrakum wa laa tadurroohu shay'aa; wallaahu 'alaa kulli shay'in Qadeer.
verses.translation: Agar tum nahin nikloge to Allah tumhein dardnaak azaab dega aur tumhaari jagah kisi aur qaum ko le aayega aur tum uska kuchh bhi na bigaad sakoge aur Allah har cheez par khoob qaadir hai.

verses.arabic: إِلَّا تَنصُرُوهُ فَقَدْ نَصَرَهُ ٱللَّهُ إِذْ أَخْرَجَهُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ثَانِىَ ٱثْنَيْنِ إِذْ هُمَا فِى ٱلْغَارِ إِذْ يَقُولُ لِصَـٰحِبِهِۦ لَا تَحْزَنْ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَنَا ۖ فَأَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ سَكِينَتَهُۥ عَلَيْهِ وَأَيَّدَهُۥ بِجُنُودٍۢ لَّمْ تَرَوْهَا وَجَعَلَ كَلِمَةَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ٱلسُّفْلَىٰ ۗ وَكَلِمَةُ ٱللَّهِ هِىَ ٱلْعُلْيَا ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌ
verses.transliteration: 'Illaa tanşșuroohu faqad naşarahul-laahu 'iz 'akhrajahul-lazeena kafaroo saaniyas-nayni 'iz humaa fil-ghaari 'iz yaqoolu lisaahibihee laa tahzan 'innal-laaha ma'anaa fa'anzalal- laahu sakeenatahoo 'alayhi wa 'ayyadahoo bijunoodil-lam tarawhaa wa ja'ala kalimatal- lazeena kafarus-suflaa; wa Kalimatul-laahi hiyal- 'ulyaa; wallaahu 'Azeezun Hakeem;
verses.translation: Agar tum iss (Nabi) ki madad nahin karoge to tahqeeq Allah ne uski (uss waqt) madad ki jab kaafiron ne usko (Makkah se) nikaal diya tha, (woh) do mein doosra tha. Jabke woh donon ghaar-e-(saur) mein the, jab woh (Nabi) apne saathi (Abu Bakr) se kah rahaa tha: gham na kar, yaqeenan Allah hamaare saath hai, phir Allah ne uss par apni sakeenat naazil ki aur aise lashkaron se uski madad ki jinhein tumne nahin dekha aur usne kaafiron ki baat ko past kardiya aur baat to Allah hi ki buland hai aur Allah bahut zabardast hai khoob hikmat waala hai.

verses.arabic: ٱنفِرُوا۟ خِفَافًۭا وَثِقَالًۭا وَجَـٰهِدُوا۟ بِأَمْوَٰلِكُمْ وَأَنفُسِكُمْ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ ذَٰلِكُمْ خَيْرٌۭ لَّكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Infiroo khifaafañw- wa siqaalañw-wa jaahidoo bi'amwaalikum wa 'anfusikum fee sabeelil-laah; zaalikum khayrul-lakum 'in kuntum ta'lamoon.
verses.translation: Tum halke bhi niklo aur bojhal bhi aur apne maal aur apni jaan se Allah ki raah mein jehaad karo yeh tumhaare liye behtar hai agar tum ilm rakhte ho.

verses.arabic: لَوْ كَانَ عَرَضًۭا قَرِيبًۭا وَسَفَرًۭا قَاصِدًۭا لَّٱتَّبَعُوكَ وَلَـٰكِنۢ بَعُدَتْ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلشُّقَّةُ ۚ وَسَيَحْلِفُونَ بِٱللَّهِ لَوِ ٱسْتَطَعْنَا لَخَرَجْنَا مَعَكُمْ يُهْلِكُونَ أَنفُسَهُمْ وَٱللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ إِنَّهُمْ لَكَـٰذِبُونَ
verses.transliteration: Law kaana 'aradan qareebañw-wa safaran qaaşidal-lattabaʻooka wa laakim ba'udat 'alayhimush-shuqqah; wa sayahlifoona billaahi lawis-tata'naa lakharajnaa ma'akum; yuhlikoona 'anfusahum wallaahu ya'lamu 'innahum lakaaziboon.
verses.translation: Agar maale ghaneemat qareebul-husool aur safar halka hota to woh (munaafiq) aap ke saath zaroor chalte lekin unhein masaafat door nazar aayi aur woh ab woh Allah ki qasmein khaayenge ke agar hum taaqat rakhte to tumhaare saath zaroor nikalte. woh khud ko halaak kar rahe hain aur Allah jaanta hai ke beshak who saraasar jhoote hain.

verses.arabic: عَفَا ٱللَّهُ عَنكَ لِمَ أَذِنتَ لَهُمْ حَتَّىٰ يَتَبَيَّنَ لَكَ ٱلَّذِينَ صَدَقُوا۟ وَتَعْلَمَ ٱلْكَـٰذِبِينَ
verses.transliteration: 'Afal-laahu 'anka lima 'azinta lahum hattaa yatabayyana lakal- lazeena şadaqoo wa taʻlamal-kaazibeen.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) Allah ne aapko mu'aaf kar diya, aapne un (munaafiqeen) ko rukhsat kyun di? (aap rukhsat na dete yahaan) tak ke aap par zaahir ho jaate sachche log aur aap jhooton ko jaan lete.

verses.arabic: لَا يَسْتَـْٔذِنُكَ ٱلَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِ أَن يُجَـٰهِدُوا۟ بِأَمْوَٰلِهِمْ وَأَنفُسِهِمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌۢ بِٱلْمُتَّقِينَ
verses.transliteration: Laa yastaʼzinukal- lazeena yu'minoona billaahi wal-Yawmil- 'Aakhiri 'añy-yujaahidoo bi'amwaalihim wa 'anfusihim; wallaahu 'aleemum bilmuttaqeen.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) jo log Allah aur yaume aakhirat par eemaan rakhte hain woh aap se rukhsat nahin maangte isse ke apne maalon aur apni jaanon ke saath jehaad karein¹ aur Allah parhez gaaron ko khoob jaanta hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Iss jehaad mein shirkat ke muaamle mein musalmaanon ki chaar qismein hain ⓵ woh musalmaan jo bila ta'ammul tayyaar ho gaye ⓶ doosre, woh jinhein ibtedaa'an taraddud huwa aur unke dil dole lekin phir jald hi iss taraddud se nikal aaye ⓷ teesre, woh jo zo'f aur bimaari ya sawaari aur safar kharch na hone ki wajah se fil waaqe' jaane se ma'zoor the aur jinhein khud Allah ne ijaazat de di thi (unka zikr aayat 91-92 mein hain. ⓸ chauthi qism, woh jo mahaz susti ki wajah se wajan shareek nahin huye, aur jab Nabi Kareem ﷺ waapas aaye to unhon ne apne gunah ka e'teraaf karke apne aapko taubah aur saza ke liye pesh kar diya. unke e'laawah baaqi munaafiqeen aur unke jaasoos the. yahaan musalmaanon ke pahle giroh aur munaafiqeen ka zikr hai. musalmaanon ki baaqi teen qismon ka bayaan aage chal kar aayega.

verses.arabic: إِنَّمَا يَسْتَـْٔذِنُكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِ وَٱرْتَابَتْ قُلُوبُهُمْ فَهُمْ فِى رَيْبِهِمْ يَتَرَدَّدُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Innamaa yasta zinukal-lazeena laa yu'minoona billaahi wal-Yawmil-'Aakhiri wartaabat quloobuhum fahum fee raybihim yataraddadoon.
verses.translation: Aapse rukhsat to sirf woh log maangte hain jo Allah aur yaume aakhirat par eemaan nahin rakhte aur unke dil shak mein pade hain, lihaaza woh apne shak mein pade taraddud kar rahe hain.

verses.arabic: وَلَوْ أَرَادُوا۟ ٱلْخُرُوجَ لَأَعَدُّوا۟ لَهُۥ عُدَّةًۭ وَلَـٰكِن كَرِهَ ٱللَّهُ ٱنبِعَاثَهُمْ فَثَبَّطَهُمْ وَقِيلَ ٱقْعُدُوا۟ مَعَ ٱلْقَـٰعِدِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa law 'araadul- khurooja la'a'addoo lahoo 'uddatañw-wa laakin karihal-laahum- bi'aasahum fasabbatahum wa qeelaq-'udoo maʻal- qaa'ideen.
verses.translation: Agar woh nikalne ka iraadah karte to uss ke liye kuchh saamaan zaroor tayyaar karte lekin Allah ko unka uthhna pasand na tha, iss liye usne unhein sust kar diya aur (unse) kah diya gaya ke baithhne waalon ke saath baithe raho.

verses.arabic: لَوْ خَرَجُوا۟ فِيكُم مَّا زَادُوكُمْ إِلَّا خَبَالًۭا وَلَأَوْضَعُوا۟ خِلَـٰلَكُمْ يَبْغُونَكُمُ ٱلْفِتْنَةَ وَفِيكُمْ سَمَّـٰعُونَ لَهُمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌۢ بِٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Law kharajoo feekum maa zaadookum 'illaa Khabaalañw- wala'awda'oo khilaalakum yabghoonakumul-fitnata wa feekum sammaaʻoona lahum; wallaahu 'aleemum biz-zaalimeen.
verses.translation: Agar woh (munaafiq) tumhaare saath nikalte bhi to woh tumhaare liye kharaabi hi badhaate aur tumhaare andar fitnah (khada karne) ki khaahish liye daude daude phirte aur tum mein ba'z unke jaasoos hain aur Allah zaalimon ko khoob jaanta hai.

verses.arabic: لَقَدِ ٱبْتَغَوُا۟ ٱلْفِتْنَةَ مِن قَبْلُ وَقَلَّبُوا۟ لَكَ ٱلْأُمُورَ حَتَّىٰ جَآءَ ٱلْحَقُّ وَظَهَرَ أَمْرُ ٱللَّهِ وَهُمْ كَـٰرِهُونَ
verses.transliteration: Laqadib-taghawul- fitnata min qablu wa qallaboo lakal-'umoora hattaa jaaa'al-haqqu wa zahara 'amrul-laahi wa hum kaarihoon.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) yaqeenan unhone isse pahle bhi fitnah (phailaana) chaaha tha aur aapke mu'aamlaat bigaadne ki koshish ki thi yahaan tak ke haq aagaya aur Allah ka hukm ghaalib thhahra jabke woh naapasand hi karte rahe.

verses.arabic: وَمِنْهُم مَّن يَقُولُ ٱئْذَن لِّى وَلَا تَفْتِنِّىٓ ۚ أَلَا فِى ٱلْفِتْنَةِ سَقَطُوا۟ ۗ وَإِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ لَمُحِيطَةٌۢ بِٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa minhum mañy- yaqoolu'-zal-lee wa laa taftinneee; 'alaa fil-fitnati saqatoo; wa 'inna Jahannama lamuheetatum bilkaafireen.
verses.translation: Aur un mein se koyi aapse kahta ke mujhe ruksat de dein aur fitne mein na daalein. Sun lo! woh fitne mein to pad chuke hain aur beshak jahannam kaafiron ko gherne waali hai.

verses.arabic: إِن تُصِبْكَ حَسَنَةٌۭ تَسُؤْهُمْ ۖ وَإِن تُصِبْكَ مُصِيبَةٌۭ يَقُولُوا۟ قَدْ أَخَذْنَآ أَمْرَنَا مِن قَبْلُ وَيَتَوَلَّوا۟ وَّهُمْ فَرِحُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'in tuşibka hasanatun tasu'hum; wa 'in tuşibka muşeebatuñy-yaqooloo qad 'akhaznaaa 'amranaa min qablu wa yatawallaw wa hum farihoon.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) agar Aapko koyi bhalaayi pahunchti hai to unhein buri lagti hai aur agar aap par koyi museebat padti hai to woh kahte hain ke humne to apne mu'aamle mein pahle hi ehtiyaat barti thi. Aur woh Khush khush laut jaate hain.

verses.arabic: قُل لَّن يُصِيبَنَآ إِلَّا مَا كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ لَنَا هُوَ مَوْلَىٰنَا ۚ وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَلْيَتَوَكَّلِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qul lañy-yuşeebanaaa 'illaa maa katabal-laahu lanaa Huwa mawlaanaa; wa 'alal-laahi falyatawakkalil- mu'minoon.
verses.translation: Aye Nabi!) kah deejiye: humein to sirf woh (museebat) pahunchegi jo Allah ne hamaare liye likh wahi hamaara kaar saaz hai aur mominon ko Allah hi par bharosa karna chaahiye.

verses.arabic: قُلْ هَلْ تَرَبَّصُونَ بِنَآ إِلَّآ إِحْدَى ٱلْحُسْنَيَيْنِ ۖ وَنَحْنُ نَتَرَبَّصُ بِكُمْ أَن يُصِيبَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِعَذَابٍۢ مِّنْ عِندِهِۦٓ أَوْ بِأَيْدِينَا ۖ فَتَرَبَّصُوٓا۟ إِنَّا مَعَكُم مُّتَرَبِّصُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qul hal tarabbasoona binaaa 'illaaa 'ihdal- husnayayni wa nahnu natarabbașu bikum 'añy- yuşeebakumul-laahu bi'azaabim-min 'indiheee 'aw bi'aydeena fatarabbasooo 'innaa ma'akum mutarabbişoon.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) kah deejiye: tum hamaare haq mein do bhalaayiyon mein se bas ek (fatah ya shahaadat) ka intezaar karte ho aur hum tumhaare haq mein yeh entezaar karte hain ke Allah tumhein apne paas se azaab de ya hamaare haathon ('azaab dilwaaye), chunaancheh tum bhi intezaar karo, aur beshak ham bhi tumhaare saath muntazir hain.

verses.arabic: قُلْ أَنفِقُوا۟ طَوْعًا أَوْ كَرْهًۭا لَّن يُتَقَبَّلَ مِنكُمْ ۖ إِنَّكُمْ كُنتُمْ قَوْمًۭا فَـٰسِقِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qul 'anfiqoo taw'an 'aw karhal-lañy- yutaqabbala minkum 'innakum kuntum qawman faasiqeen.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) kah deejiye: tum khushi se kharch karo ya na khushi se tumse hargiz qubool nahin kiya jaayega, beshak tum naafarmaan log ho.

verses.arabic: وَمَا مَنَعَهُمْ أَن تُقْبَلَ مِنْهُمْ نَفَقَـٰتُهُمْ إِلَّآ أَنَّهُمْ كَفَرُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَبِرَسُولِهِۦ وَلَا يَأْتُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ إِلَّا وَهُمْ كُسَالَىٰ وَلَا يُنفِقُونَ إِلَّا وَهُمْ كَـٰرِهُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maa mana'ahum 'an tuqbala minhum nafaqaatuhum 'illaaa 'annahum kafaroo billaahi wa bi-Rasoolihee wa laa ya'toonaş-Şalaata 'illaa wa hum kusaalaa wa laa yunfiqoona 'illaa wa hum kaarihoon.
verses.translation: Aur unke kharch kiye huye maal kiye jaane mein sirf yeh (amr) maane' hai ke unhon ne Allah ke saath aur uske Rasool ke saath kufr kiya aur woh namaaz ke liye sust ho kar hi aate hain¹ aur woh naagawaari hi se kharch karte hain.
verses.deepMeaning: Isse ma'loom huwa ke namaaz mein susti karna munaafiqeen ka shewah hai. Rasoolullah ﷺ ne farmaya: 'Namaaz-e-fajr aur ishaa se badh kar munaafiqon par aur koyi namaaz bhaari nahin lekin agar inhein ma'loom ho jaaye ke in donon mein kis qadar ajr-o-sawaab hai to (Masjidon mein) zaroor aayein khaah unhein sureen ke bal aana pade.' Rasoolullah ﷺ ne mazeed farmaya: 'bila shubah main ne iraadah kiya ke muazzin ko iqaamat kahne ka hukm dun phir woh iqaamat nat kahe aur main kisi aadmi ko hukm dun ke woh namaaz mein logon ki imaamat karaaye phir main aag ke sho'le lekar un logon ko, jo namaaz ke liye na nikle hon (unhein unke gharon samet) jalaa daalun.'(Al-Bukhari, Al-azaan, Baab:34, Hadees:657)

verses.arabic: فَلَا تُعْجِبْكَ أَمْوَٰلُهُمْ وَلَآ أَوْلَـٰدُهُمْ ۚ إِنَّمَا يُرِيدُ ٱللَّهُ لِيُعَذِّبَهُم بِهَا فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا وَتَزْهَقَ أَنفُسُهُمْ وَهُمْ كَـٰفِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Falaa tu jibka 'amwaaluhum wa laaa 'awlaaduhum; 'innamaa yureedul-laahu liyu'azzibahum bihaa fil- hayaatid-dunyaa wa tazhaqa 'anfusuhum wa hum kaafiroon.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh unke maal aur unki aulaad aapko hairat mein na daalein, yaqeenan Allah yahi chahta hai ke unki wajah se unhen duniya ki zindagi hi mein azaab de¹ aur unki jaanein haalate kufr hi mein niklen.
verses.deepMeaning: Imam Ibne Kaseer  رحمه الله  aur imam Ibne Jareer Tabri  رحمه الله ne isse zakaat aur infaaq fi sabeelillah muraad liya hai ya'ni un munaafiqeen se zakaat-o-sadqaat to (jo woh musalmaan zaahir karne ke liye dete hain) dunya mein qubool kar liye jaayein take iss tareeqe se unko maali maar bhi dunya mein di jaaye.

verses.arabic: وَيَحْلِفُونَ بِٱللَّهِ إِنَّهُمْ لَمِنكُمْ وَمَا هُم مِّنكُمْ وَلَـٰكِنَّهُمْ قَوْمٌۭ يَفْرَقُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa yahlifoona billaahi 'innahum laminkum wa maa hum minkum wa laakinnahum qawmuñy- yafraqoon.
verses.translation: Aur woh Allah ki qasamein khaate hain ke be shak woh tum mein se hain halaanke woh tum mein se nahin balke woh to darpok log hain.

verses.arabic: لَوْ يَجِدُونَ مَلْجَـًۭٔا أَوْ مَغَـٰرَٰتٍ أَوْ مُدَّخَلًۭا لَّوَلَّوْا۟ إِلَيْهِ وَهُمْ يَجْمَحُونَ
verses.transliteration: Law yajidoona malja'an 'aw maghaaraatin 'aw muddakhalal-lawallaw 'ilayhi wa hum yajmahoon.
verses.translation: Agar woh koyi panah ki jagah ya ghaar ya koyi aur ghus baithhne ki jagah paayen to uski taraf zaroor bhaag niklen rassiyaan tudaa kar.

verses.arabic: وَمِنْهُم مَّن يَلْمِزُكَ فِى ٱلصَّدَقَـٰتِ فَإِنْ أُعْطُوا۟ مِنهَا رَضُوا۟ وَإِن لَّمْ يُعْطَوْا۟ مِنهَآ إِذَا هُمْ يَسْخَطُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa minhum mañy- yalmizuka fiş-şadaqaati fa'in 'u'too minhaa radoo wa 'il-lam yutaw minhaaa 'izaa hum yaskhatoon.
verses.translation: Aur un mein se ba'z woh hain ke aap par sadaqaat (ki taqseem) mein e'taraaz karte hain chunaancheh agar uss mein se unhein kuchh de diya jaaye to raazi rahte hain aur agar uss mein se na diya jaaye to jhat naaraaz ho jaate hain.

verses.arabic: وَلَوْ أَنَّهُمْ رَضُوا۟ مَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُۥ وَقَالُوا۟ حَسْبُنَا ٱللَّهُ سَيُؤْتِينَا ٱللَّهُ مِن فَضْلِهِۦ وَرَسُولُهُۥٓ إِنَّآ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ رَٰغِبُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa law 'annahum radoo maaa 'aataahumul-laahu wa Rasooluhoo wa qaaloo hasbunal-laahu sayu'teenal-laahu min fadlihee wa Rasooluhooo 'innaaa 'ilal-laahi raaghiboon.
verses.translation: Aur (kiya hi achchha hota) agar woh uss par raazi rahte jo Allah aur uske Rasool ne unhein diya aur kahte ke Allah hamaare liye kaafi hai, jald hi Allah hamen apne fazl se dega aur uska Rasool bhi, beshak hum Allah hi ki taraf raaghib hain.

verses.arabic: إِنَّمَا ٱلصَّدَقَـٰتُ لِلْفُقَرَآءِ وَٱلْمَسَـٰكِينِ وَٱلْعَـٰمِلِينَ عَلَيْهَا وَٱلْمُؤَلَّفَةِ قُلُوبُهُمْ وَفِى ٱلرِّقَابِ وَٱلْغَـٰرِمِينَ وَفِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱبْنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ ۖ فَرِيضَةًۭ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: 'Innamaş-şadaqaatu lilfuqaraaa'i walmasaakeeni wal'aamileena 'alayhaa walmu'allafati quloobuhum wa fir-riqaabi walghaarimeena wa fee sabeelil-laahi wabnis- sabeeli fareedatam-minal- laah; wallaahu 'Aleemun Hakeem.
verses.translation: Zakaat to sirf faqeeron aur miskeenon aur un ahalkaaron ke liye hai jo uss (ki wasooli) par muqarrar hain aur unke liye jinki dildaari maqsood hai aur gardanein chhudaane aur qarzah daaron (ke qarz utaarne) ke liye aur Allah ki raah mein musaafiron (ki madad) mein,¹ (yeh) Allah ki taraf se farz hai aur Allah khoob jaanne waala, hikmat waala hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Mulaahazah ho haashyah: (Surah Baqarah:2/83)

verses.arabic: وَمِنْهُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ يُؤْذُونَ ٱلنَّبِىَّ وَيَقُولُونَ هُوَ أُذُنٌۭ ۚ قُلْ أُذُنُ خَيْرٍۢ لَّكُمْ يُؤْمِنُ بِٱللَّهِ وَيُؤْمِنُ لِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَرَحْمَةٌۭ لِّلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مِنكُمْ ۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ يُؤْذُونَ رَسُولَ ٱللَّهِ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Wa minhumul- lazeena yuʼzoonan- nabiyya wa yaqooloona huwa 'uzun; qul 'uzunu khayril-lakum yu'minu billaahi wa yu'minu lilmu'mineena wa rahmatul- lillazeena 'aamanoo minkum; wallazeena yuʼzoona Rasoolal-laahi lahum 'azaabun 'aleem.
verses.translation: Aur un (munaafiqon) mein se ba'z woh hain jo Nabi ko takleef dete hain aur kahte hain ke woh to sirf kaan hai (har ek ki sun aur maan leta hai.) Aap kah deejiye: woh tumhaare liye khair ka kaan hai, woh Allah par yaqeen rakhta hai aur mominon (ki baaton) par yaqeen rakhta hai, aur tum mein se jo eemaan laaye unke liye rahmat hai. aur jo log Allah ke Rasool ko takleef dete hain unke liye dardnaak azaab hai.

verses.arabic: يَحْلِفُونَ بِٱللَّهِ لَكُمْ لِيُرْضُوكُمْ وَٱللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُۥٓ أَحَقُّ أَن يُرْضُوهُ إِن كَانُوا۟ مُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.transliteration: Yahlifoona billaahi lakum liyurdookum wallaahu wa Rasooluhooo 'ahaqqu 'any-yurdoohu 'in kaanoo mu'mineen.
verses.translation: (Aye Musalmaanon!) woh (munaafiqeen) tumhaare saamne Allah ki qasamein khaate hain taake tumhein raazi rakhkhein halaanke Allah aur uska Rasool ziyaadah haqdaar hain ke woh unhein raazi rakhkhein agar yeh log momin hain.

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ يَعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّهُۥ مَن يُحَادِدِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَأَنَّ لَهُۥ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدًۭا فِيهَا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْخِزْىُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
verses.transliteration: 'Alam ya'lamooo 'annahoo many- yuhaadidil-laaha wa Rasoolahoo fa'anna lahoo Naara jahannama khaalidan feehaa; zaalikal-khizyul-'Azeem.
verses.translation: Kiya unhein ma'loom nahin huwa ke beshak jo shakhs Allah aur uske Rasool ki mukhaalifat karta hai to uske liye jahannam ka aag hai, woh hamesha uss mein rahe ga, yeh bahut badi ruswaayi hai.

verses.arabic: يَحْذَرُ ٱلْمُنَـٰفِقُونَ أَن تُنَزَّلَ عَلَيْهِمْ سُورَةٌۭ تُنَبِّئُهُم بِمَا فِى قُلُوبِهِمْ ۚ قُلِ ٱسْتَهْزِءُوٓا۟ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ مُخْرِجٌۭ مَّا تَحْذَرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Yahzarul- munaafiqoona 'an tunazzala 'alayhim Sooratun tunabbi'uhum bimaa fee quloobihim; qulis-tahzi'oo 'innal- laaha mukhrijum-maa tahzaroon.
verses.translation: Munaafiqeen iss baat se darte hain ke (in musalmaanon) par koyi surat naazil kardi jaaye jo unhein har baat bataade jo un (munaafiqon) ke dilon mein hai. kah deejiye: tum mazaaq karte raho, beshak Allah woh baatein zaahir karne waala hai jisse tum darte ho.

verses.arabic: وَلَئِن سَأَلْتَهُمْ لَيَقُولُنَّ إِنَّمَا كُنَّا نَخُوضُ وَنَلْعَبُ ۚ قُلْ أَبِٱللَّهِ وَءَايَـٰتِهِۦ وَرَسُولِهِۦ كُنتُمْ تَسْتَهْزِءُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa la'in sa'altahum layaqoolunna 'innamaa kunnaa nakhoodu wa nal'ab; qul 'abillaahi wa 'Aayaatihee wa Rasoolihee kuntum tastahzi'oon.
verses.translation: Aur agar aap unse poochhein to woh zaroor kahenge ke hum to sirf shughl ke taur par baatein aur dil lagi karte the. kah deejiye: kiya tum Allah aur uski aayaton aur uske Rasool ke saath mazaaq karte the?¹
verses.deepMeaning: Munaafiqeen aayaat-e-ilaahi ka mazaaq udaate, momineen ka istehza karte hatta ke Rasoolullah ﷺ ki shaan mein gustaakhaanah kalimaat kahne se gurez na karte jis ki ittela' kisi na kisi tareeqe se ba'z musalmaanon ko aur phir Rasoolullah ﷺ ko ho jaati. Lekin jab unse poochha jaata to saaf mukar jaate aur kahte ke hum to yun hi aapas mein hansi mazaaq kar rahe the. Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya hansi mazaaq ke liye kiya tumhaare saamne Allah aur uski aayaat aur uska Rasool hi rah gaya hai? balke yeh tumhaare uss khabs aur nifaaq ka izhaar hai jo aayaat-e-ilaahi aur hamaare paighambar ke khilaaf tumhaare dilon mein maujood hai.

verses.arabic: لَا تَعْتَذِرُوا۟ قَدْ كَفَرْتُم بَعْدَ إِيمَـٰنِكُمْ ۚ إِن نَّعْفُ عَن طَآئِفَةٍۢ مِّنكُمْ نُعَذِّبْ طَآئِفَةًۢ بِأَنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ مُجْرِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Laa ta taziroo qad kafartum ba'da 'eemaanikum; 'in na'fu 'an taaa'ifatim-minkum nu'azzib taaa'ifatam bi'annahum kaanoo mujrimeen.
verses.translation: (Ab) bahaane mat banaao, yaqeenan tumne apne eemaan ke saath kufr kiya hai, agar hum tum mein se ek giroh ko mu'aaf bhi kardein to doosre giroh ko iss wajah se azaab denge ke =woh mujrim the.

verses.arabic: ٱلْمُنَـٰفِقُونَ وَٱلْمُنَـٰفِقَـٰتُ بَعْضُهُم مِّنۢ بَعْضٍۢ ۚ يَأْمُرُونَ بِٱلْمُنكَرِ وَيَنْهَوْنَ عَنِ ٱلْمَعْرُوفِ وَيَقْبِضُونَ أَيْدِيَهُمْ ۚ نَسُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ فَنَسِيَهُمْ ۗ إِنَّ ٱلْمُنَـٰفِقِينَ هُمُ ٱلْفَـٰسِقُونَ
verses.transliteration: Almunaafiqoona walmunaafiqaatu ba'duhum mim ba'd; ya'muroona bilmunkari wa yanhawna 'anil- ma'roofi wa yaqbidoona 'aydiyahum; nasul-laaha fanasiyahum; 'innal- munaafiqeena humul- faasiqoon.
verses.translation: Munaafiq mard aur aur munaafiq auratein sab ek jaise hain, woh bure kaam ka hukm dete hain aur nek kaam se rokte hain aur (kharch karne se) apne haath roke rakhte hain. unhon ne Allah ko bhulaa diya to usne bhi unhein bhulaa diya. beshak munaafiqeen hi naafarmaan hain.

verses.arabic: وَعَدَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمُنَـٰفِقِينَ وَٱلْمُنَـٰفِقَـٰتِ وَٱلْكُفَّارَ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا ۚ هِىَ حَسْبُهُمْ ۚ وَلَعَنَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ۖ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌۭ مُّقِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Wa'adal-laahul- munaafiqeena walmunaafiqaati walkuffaara Naara jahannama khaalideena feehaa; hiya hasbuhum; wa la'anahumul-laahu wa lahum 'azaabum- muqeem.
verses.translation: Allah ne munaafiq mardon aur munaafiq auraton aur kaafiron se dozakh ki aag ka wa'dah kar rakhkha hai, woh uss mein hameshah rahenge, woh (dozakh) unhein kaafi hai aur Allah ne un par la'nat ki hai aur unke liye daayimi azaab hai.

verses.arabic: كَٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِكُمْ كَانُوٓا۟ أَشَدَّ مِنكُمْ قُوَّةًۭ وَأَكْثَرَ أَمْوَٰلًۭا وَأَوْلَـٰدًۭا فَٱسْتَمْتَعُوا۟ بِخَلَـٰقِهِمْ فَٱسْتَمْتَعْتُم بِخَلَـٰقِكُمْ كَمَا ٱسْتَمْتَعَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِكُم بِخَلَـٰقِهِمْ وَخُضْتُمْ كَٱلَّذِى خَاضُوٓا۟ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ حَبِطَتْ أَعْمَـٰلُهُمْ فِى ٱلدُّنْيَا وَٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ ۖ وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْخَـٰسِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Kallazeena min qablikum kaanoo ashad da minkum quwwatanw wa aksara amwaalanw wa awlaadan fastamta'oo bikhalaaqihim fastamta'tum bikhalaaqikum kamaas tamta'al lazeena min qablikum bikhalaaqihim wa khudtum kallazee khaadoo; ulaaa'ika habitat a'maaluhum fid dunyaa wal aakhirati wa ulaaa'ika humul khaasiroon
verses.translation: Munaafiqo! Tum un logon ki tarah ho jo tum se pahle the, woh quwwat mein kahin zabardast aur maal-o-aulaad mein tumse kahin ziyaadah the, chunaacheh woh (duniya mein) apna hissah barat chuke, pass tumne (bhi) apna hissah barat liya jis tarah un logon ne apna hissah barat liya jo tum se pahle the aur tum fuzool baaton mein uljhe rahe. Yahi log hain jinke a'maal dunya aur aakhirat mein barbaad ho gaye aur yahi log khasaarah paane waale hain.

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ يَأْتِهِمْ نَبَؤُا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ قَوْمِ نُوحٍۢ وَعَادٍۢ وَثَمُودَ وَقَوْمِ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَأَصْحَـٰبِ مَدْيَنَ وَٱلْمُؤْتَفِكَـٰتِ ۙ أَتَتْهُمْ رُسُلُهُم بِٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ ۖ فَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ لِيَظْلِمَهُمْ وَلَـٰكِن كَانُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ يَظْلِمُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Alam ya'tihim min naba'ul-lazeena qablihim qawmi Noohinw- wa 'Aadiñw-wa Samooda wa qawmi Ibraaheema wa 'ashaabi madyana walmu'tafikaat; 'atathum Rusuluhum bilbayyinaati famaa kaanal-laahu liyazlimahum wa laakin kaanooo 'anfusahum yazlimoon.
verses.translation: Kiya un tak un logon ki khabar na pahunchi jo unse pahle the (ya'ni) Qaum-e- Nooh Aad-o-Samood aur Qaume Ibraheem aur Madyan waale aur woh bastiyaan jinhen ulat diya gaya tha.¹ unke paas unke Rasool khuli nishaaniyaan le kar aaye, phir Allah aisa nahin ke unpar zulm karta lekin woh khud hi apne jaanon par zulm karte the.
verses.deepMeaning: Yahaan un 6 qaumon ka hawaalah diya gaya hai jinka maskan mulk-e-shaam raha hai, yeh bilaad-e- arab ke qareeb hai aur unki kuchh baatein unhon ne shaayad aabaa-o-ajdaad se suni bhi hon, qaum-e- Nooh, jo toofaan mein gharq kardi gayi, qaum-e-aad, jo quwwat-o-taaqat mein mumtaaz hone ke baawajood baad-e-tund se halaak kar di gayi, qaum-e-samood, jise aasmaani cheekh se halaak kiya gaya, qaum ibraheem, jis ke baadshaah Namrood bin kanaan bin kosh ko machchhar se marwaa diya gaya. As haab-e-madyan (hazrat Shuaib عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام ki qaum) jinhein cheekh, zalzalah aur baadalon ke saaye ke azaab se halaak kiya gaya. Aur ahl-e-motafikaat, isse muraad qaum-e-loot hai jinki basti ka naam (Saddoom) tha. Etekaaf ke ma'na hain inqelaab, ulat palat dena. un par ek to aasmaan se patthar barsaaye gaye doosre unki basti ko oupar uthhaakar neeche phenka gaya jisse puri basti oupar neeche ho gayi iss e'tebaar se unhein as haab-e-mo'tafikaat kaha jaata hai.

verses.arabic: وَٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتُ بَعْضُهُمْ أَوْلِيَآءُ بَعْضٍۢ ۚ يَأْمُرُونَ بِٱلْمَعْرُوفِ وَيَنْهَوْنَ عَنِ ٱلْمُنكَرِ وَيُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُؤْتُونَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَيُطِيعُونَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥٓ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ سَيَرْحَمُهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Walmu'minoona walmu'minaatu ba'duhum 'awliyaaa'u ba'd; ya'muroona bilma'roofi wa yanhawna 'anil-munkari wa yuqeemoonaş-Şalaata wa yu'toonaz-Zakaata wa yutee'oonal-laaha wa Rasoolah; 'ulaaa'ika sayarhamuhumul-laah; 'innal-laaha 'Azeezun Hakeem.
verses.translation: Momin mard aur Momin auratein aapas mein ek doosre ke madadgaar hain. Woh neki ka hukm dete hain aur buraayi se rokte hain aur namaaz qaayem karte hain aur zakaat dete hain aur Allah aur uske Rasool ki etaa'at karte hain. Yahi log hain jin par Allah zaroor raham farmaayega, beshak Allah zabardast hai, khoob hikmat waala.

verses.arabic: وَعَدَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ جَنَّـٰتٍۢ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا وَمَسَـٰكِنَ طَيِّبَةًۭ فِى جَنَّـٰتِ عَدْنٍۢ ۚ وَرِضْوَٰنٌۭ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ أَكْبَرُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
verses.transliteration: Wa'adal-laahul- mu'mineena walmu'minaati Jannaatin tajree min tahtihal- 'anhaaru khaalideena feehaa wa masaakina tayyibatan fee Jannaati 'adn; wa ridwaanum- minal-laahi 'akbar; zaalika huwal-fawzul- 'azeem.
