verses.translation: Allah ne momin mardon aur momin auraton se aise baaghon ka wa'dah kiya hai jinke neeche nahren bahti hongi, woh hameshah un mein rahenge aur sada bahaar baaghon mein paakeezah mahallaat ka (wa'dah hai) aur Allah ki raza mandi sabse badh kar (ne'mat) hogi, yahi azeem kaamyaabi hai.

verses.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِىُّ جَٰهِدِ ٱلْكُفَّارَ وَٱلْمُنَـٰفِقِينَ وَٱغْلُظْ عَلَيْهِمْ ۚ وَمَأْوَىٰهُمْ جَهَنَّمُ ۖ وَبِئْسَ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
verses.transliteration: yaaa 'ayyuhan-Nabiyyu jaahidil-kuffaara walmunaafiqeena waghluz 'alayhim; wa ma'waahum jahannamu wa bi'sal-maşeer.
verses.translation: Aye Nabi! Kaafiron aur munaafiqon se jehaad keejiye aur un par sakhti keejiye aur un ka asal thhekaana dozakh hai aur woh badtareen maqaam hai

verses.arabic: يَحْلِفُونَ بِٱللَّهِ مَا قَالُوا۟ وَلَقَدْ قَالُوا۟ كَلِمَةَ ٱلْكُفْرِ وَكَفَرُوا۟ بَعْدَ إِسْلَـٰمِهِمْ وَهَمُّوا۟ بِمَا لَمْ يَنَالُوا۟ ۚ وَمَا نَقَمُوٓا۟ إِلَّآ أَنْ أَغْنَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُۥ مِن فَضْلِهِۦ ۚ فَإِن يَتُوبُوا۟ يَكُ خَيْرًۭا لَّهُمْ وَإِن يَتَوَلَّوْا۟ يُعَذِّبْهُمُ ٱللَّهُ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًۭا فِى ٱلدُّنْيَا وَٱلْءَاخِرَةِ ۚ وَمَا لَهُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ مِن وَلِىٍّۢ وَلَا نَصِيرٍۢ
verses.transliteration: Yahlifoona billaahi maa qaaloo wa laqad qaaloo kalimatal-kufri wa kafaroo ba'da 'Islaamihim wa hamтоо bimaa lam yanaaloo; wa maa naqamooo 'illaaa 'an 'aghnaahumul-laahu wa Rasooluhoo min fadlih; fa'iny-yatooboo yaku khayral-lahum wa 'iny-yatawallaw yu'azzibhumul-laahu 'azaaban 'aleeman fid- dunyaa wal-'Aakhirah; wa maa lahum fil-'ardi minw-waliyyinw-wa laa naseer.
verses.translation: Woh (munaafiqeen) Allah ki qasamein khaate hain ke unhon ne (koyi baat) nahin kahi, halaanke unhon ne zaroor kalma-e-kufr kaha tha aur woh islam laane ke ba'd kaafir ho gaye hain aur unhon ne woh kuchh karne ka iraadah kiya jo woh na kar sake aur unhon ne ghussah nahin nikaala magar iss baat par ke Allah aur uske Rasool ne apne fazl se unhein ghani kar diya,¹ phir woh agar taubah karlein to unke liye behtar hoga agar woh munh modlein to Allah unhein duniya-o-aakhirat mein dardnaak azaab dega aur unka zameen mein koyi himaayati aur koyi madadgaar na hoga.
verses.deepMeaning: Musalmaanon ki hijrat ke ba'd Madinah ko markazi haisiyat haasil ho gayi thi, jiski wajah wahaan se tijaarat aur kaarobaar ko bhi farogh mila aur ahl-e-madinah ki ma'aashi haalat bahut achchhi ho gayi. Munaafiqeen madinah ko bhi isse khoob faayedah haasil huwa. Allah Ta'ala iss aayat mein yahi farma rahaa hai ke kiya unko iss baat ki naaraazi hai ke Allah ne unko apne fazl se ghani banaadiya hai? ya'ni yeh naaraazi aur ghazab waali baat to nahin, balke unko to Allah ka shukr guzaar hona chaahiye ke usne unhein faqr wa tang dasti se nikaal kar khush haal banaa diya. Malhooazah: Allah Ta'ala ke saath, Rasoolullah ﷺ ka zikr is liye hai ke uss ghina aur tawangari ka zaahiri sabab Rasoolullah ﷺ ki zaat-e- giraami hi bani thi, warnah haqeeqat mein ghani banaane waala to Allah Ta'ala hi tha, isliye aayat mein 'Min fazlihi' waahid ki zameer hai ke Allah ne apne fazl se unhein ghani kar diya.

verses.arabic: وَمِنْهُم مَّنْ عَـٰهَدَ ٱللَّهَ لَئِنْ ءَاتَىٰنَا مِن فَضْلِهِۦ لَنَصَّدَّقَنَّ وَلَنَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa minhum man 'aahadal-laaha la'in 'aataanaa min fadlihee lanaşşaddaqanna wa lanakoonanna minas- saaliheen.
verses.translation: Aur un mein se ba'z woh hain jinhon ne Allah se ahad kiya tha ke agar Allah ne apne fazl se hamen ataa kiya to hum zaroor sadqah khairaat karenge aur hum zaroor saaliheen mein se ho jaaynge.

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّآ ءَاتَىٰهُم مِّن فَضْلِهِۦ بَخِلُوا۟ بِهِۦ وَتَوَلَّوا۟ وَّهُم مُّعْرِضُونَ
verses.transliteration: Falammaaa 'aataahum min fadlihee bakhiloo bihee wa tawallaw wa hum mu'ridoon.
verses.translation: Phir jab Allah ne apne fazl se unhein ataa kiya to woh kanjoosi par utar aaye aur unhon ne (haq se) munh mod liya aur woh (apne ahad se) munharif ho gaye.

verses.arabic: فَأَعْقَبَهُمْ نِفَاقًۭا فِى قُلُوبِهِمْ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يَلْقَوْنَهُۥ بِمَآ أَخْلَفُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا وَعَدُوهُ وَبِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَكْذِبُونَ
verses.transliteration: Fa'a'qabahum nifaaqan fee quloobihim 'ilaa Yawmi yalqawnahoo bimaaa 'akhlaful-laaha maa wa 'adoohu wa bimaa kaanoo yakziboon.
verses.translation: Phir jab Allah ne unhein unke dilon mein nifaaq daal kar sazaa di uss din tak ke liye jab woh Allah ke huzoor mein haazir ho gaye, iss liye ke unhon ne Allah se jo wa'dah kiya tha, uski khilaaf warzi ki aur uske liye woh jhoot bolte the.

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ يَعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعْلَمُ سِرَّهُمْ وَنَجْوَىٰهُمْ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَّـٰمُ ٱلْغُيُوبِ
verses.transliteration: 'Alam ya'lamooo 'annal-laaha ya'lamu sirrahum wa najwaahum wa 'annal-laaha 'Allaamul-Ghuyoob.
verses.translation: Kiya yeh log nahin jaante ke beshak Allah unke bhedon aur unki sar goshiyon ko jaanta hai aur beshak Allah ghaib ki baaton ko khoob jaanta hai.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَلْمِزُونَ ٱلْمُطَّوِّعِينَ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ فِى ٱلصَّدَقَـٰتِ وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَجِدُونَ إِلَّا جُهْدَهُمْ فَيَسْخَرُونَ مِنْهُمْ ۙ سَخِرَ ٱللَّهُ مِنْهُمْ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
verses.transliteration: Allazeena yalmizoonal- muttawwi'eena minal- mu'mineena fiş-şadaqaati wallazeena laa yajidoona 'illaa juhdahum fayaskharoona minhum sakhiral-laahu minhum wa lahum 'azaabun 'aleem.
verses.translation: Jo log ta'n karte hain khule dil se khairaat karne waale mominon par, (unke) sadaqaat ki baabat aur un par bhi jo apni (thodi si) mehnat mazdoori ke siwa kuchh nahin rakhte, to woh unka mazaaq udaate hain, Allah bhi unka mazaaq udaayega aur unke liye dardnaak azaab hai.

verses.arabic: ٱسْتَغْفِرْ لَهُمْ أَوْ لَا تَسْتَغْفِرْ لَهُمْ ۖ إِن تَسْتَغْفِرْ لَهُمْ سَبْعِينَ مَرَّةًۭ فَلَن يَغْفِرَ ٱللَّهُ لَهُمْ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ كَفَرُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يَهْدِى ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلْفَـٰسِقِينَ
verses.transliteration: 'Istaghfir lahum 'aw laa tastaghfir lahum 'in tastaghfir lahum sab'eena marratan falany-yaghfiral-laahu lahum; zaalika bi'annahum kafaroo billaahi wa Rasoolih; wallaahu laa yahdil- qawmal-faasiqeen
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) Aap unke liye bakhshish maangen ya na maangein (baraabar hai.) agar aap unke liye sattar baar bakhshish maagenge to bhi Allah unhein nahin bakhshega. Yeh is liye ke unhon ne Allah aur uske Rasool ke saath kufr kiya aur Allah naafarmaan logon ko hidaayat nahin deta.

verses.arabic: فَرِحَ ٱلْمُخَلَّفُونَ بِمَقْعَدِهِمْ خِلَـٰفَ رَسُولِ ٱللَّهِ وَكَرِهُوٓا۟ أَن يُجَـٰهِدُوا۟ بِأَمْوَٰلِهِمْ وَأَنفُسِهِمْ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَقَالُوا۟ لَا تَنفِرُوا۟ فِى ٱلْحَرِّ ۗ قُلْ نَارُ جَهَنَّمَ أَشَدُّ حَرًّۭا ۚ لَّوْ كَانُوا۟ يَفْقَهُونَ
verses.transliteration: Farihal-mukhallafoona bimaq'adihim khilaafa Rasoolil-laahi wa karihooo 'añy-yujaahidoo bi'amwaalihim wa 'anfusihim fee sabeelil- laahi wa qaaloo laa tanfiroo fil-harr; qul Naaru jahannama 'ashaddu harraa; law kaanoo yafqahoon.
verses.translation: Jo log peechhe chhod diye gaye the woh Rasoolullah ke peechhe apne baithh rahne par khush huye aur unhein bura laga ke apne maalon aur apni jaanon se Allah ki raah mein jehaad karein aur unhon ne (auron se) kaha ke sakht garmi mein kooch na karo. (Aye Nabi!) kah deejiye: jahannam ki aag (isse) kahin ziyaadah garm hai, kaash! woh yeh baat samajhte.

verses.arabic: فَلْيَضْحَكُوا۟ قَلِيلًۭا وَلْيَبْكُوا۟ كَثِيرًۭا جَزَآءًۢ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
verses.transliteration: Falyadhakoo qaleelañw-walyabkoo kaseeran jazaaa'am bimaa kaanoo yaksiboon.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh unhein chaahiye ke woh thoda hansein aur ziyaadah royein unke a'maal ki jaza ke badle mein jo woh kamaate the.

verses.arabic: فَإِن رَّجَعَكَ ٱللَّهُ إِلَىٰ طَآئِفَةٍۢ مِّنْهُمْ فَٱسْتَـْٔذَنُوكَ لِلْخُرُوجِ فَقُل لَّن تَخْرُجُوا۟ مَعِىَ أَبَدًۭا وَلَن تُقَـٰتِلُوا۟ مَعِىَ عَدُوًّا ۖ إِنَّكُمْ رَضِيتُم بِٱلْقُعُودِ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍۢ فَٱقْعُدُوا۟ مَعَ ٱلْخَـٰلِفِينَ
verses.transliteration: Fa'ir-raja'akal-laahu 'ilaa taaa'ifatim-minhum fastaʼzanooka lilkhurooji faqul-lan takhrujoo ma'iya 'abadañw-wa lan tuqaatiloo maʻiya 'aduwwan 'innakum radeetum bilqu'oodi 'awwala marratin faq'udoo ma'al- khaalifeen.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) phir agar Allah aapko waapas le aaye in (munaafiqeen) ke kisi giroh ki taraf phir woh aapse (jehaad par) nikalne ki ejaazat maangein to kah deejiye: tum ab mere saath kabhi bhi (jehaad par) nahin niklo ge aur na kabhi mere saath (milkar) dushman se lado ge.tum pahli baar (peechhe) baithh rahne par raazi ho gaye the to (ab bhi) peechhe rahne waalon ke saath baithhe raho.

verses.arabic: وَلَا تُصَلِّ عَلَىٰٓ أَحَدٍۢ مِّنْهُم مَّاتَ أَبَدًۭا وَلَا تَقُمْ عَلَىٰ قَبْرِهِۦٓ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَفَرُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَمَاتُوا۟ وَهُمْ فَـٰسِقُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laa tuşalli 'alaaa 'ahadim-minhum maata 'abadanw-wa laa taqum 'alaa qabriheee 'innahum kafaroo billaahi wa Rasoolihee wa maatoo wa hum faasiqoon.
verses.translation: Aur (Aye Nabi!) un mein se jo mar jaaye aap uski namaaz-e-(janaazah) hargiz na padhein aur na kabhi uski qabr par khade hon. beshak unhon ne Allah aur uske Rasool ke saath kufr kiya aur woh haalat-e-fisq mein mare.

verses.arabic: وَلَا تُعْجِبْكَ أَمْوَٰلُهُمْ وَأَوْلَـٰدُهُمْ ۚ إِنَّمَا يُرِيدُ ٱللَّهُ أَن يُعَذِّبَهُم بِهَا فِى ٱلدُّنْيَا وَتَزْهَقَ أَنفُسُهُمْ وَهُمْ كَـٰفِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laa tu jibka 'amwaaluhum wa 'awlaaduhum; 'innamaa yureedul-laahu 'añy- yu'azzibahum bihaa fid- dunyaa wa tazhaqa 'anfusuhum wa hum kaafiroon.
verses.translation: Aur (Aye Nabi!) unke maal aur unki aulaad aapko hairat mein na daalen. beshak Allah to chaahta hai ke unki wajah se unhein dunya mein azaab de aur unki jaanein haalat-e-kufr mein niklein.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَآ أُنزِلَتْ سُورَةٌ أَنْ ءَامِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَجَـٰهِدُوا۟ مَعَ رَسُولِهِ ٱسْتَـْٔذَنَكَ أُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلطَّوْلِ مِنْهُمْ وَقَالُوا۟ ذَرْنَا نَكُن مَّعَ ٱلْقَـٰعِدِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'izaaa 'unzilat Sooratun 'an 'aaminoo billaahi wa jaahidoo ma'a Rasoolihis- ta'zanaka 'ulut-tawli minhum wa qaaloo zarnaa nakum-ma'al- qaa'ideen.
verses.translation: Aur jab koyi surat naazil ki jaati hai ke Allah par eemaan laao aur uske Rasool ﷺ ke saath (milkar) jehaad karo to unke daulat mand aapse rukhsat maangne lagte hain aur kahte hain ke humein chhod deejiye ke hum (gharon mein) baith rahne waalon ke saath rahe.

verses.arabic: رَضُوا۟ بِأَن يَكُونُوا۟ مَعَ ٱلْخَوَالِفِ وَطُبِعَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمْ فَهُمْ لَا يَفْقَهُونَ
verses.transliteration: Radoo bi'any- yakoonoo ma'al- khawaalifi wa tubi'a 'alaa quloobihim fahum laa yafqahoon.
verses.translation: Woh iss baat par raazi ho gaye ke peechhe rahne waali auraton ke saath rahen aur unke dilon par mohar lagaa di gayi hai, lihaaza who nahin samajhte.

verses.arabic: لَـٰكِنِ ٱلرَّسُولُ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مَعَهُۥ جَـٰهَدُوا۟ بِأَمْوَٰلِهِمْ وَأَنفُسِهِمْ ۚ وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمُ ٱلْخَيْرَٰتُ ۖ وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُفْلِحُونَ
verses.transliteration: Laakinir-Rasoolu wallazeena 'aamanoo ma'ahoo jaahadoo bi'amwaalihim wa 'anfusihim; wa 'ulaaa'ika lahumul-khayraatu wa 'ulaaa'ika humul- muflihoon.
verses.translation: Lekin Rasool ﷺ aur jo log uske saath eemaan laaye, unhon ne apne maalon aur apni jaanon ke saath jehaad kiya, aur unhi logon ke liye bhalaayiyaan hain aur yahi log falaah paane waale hain.

verses.arabic: أَعَدَّ ٱللَّهُ لَهُمْ جَنَّـٰتٍۢ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
verses.transliteration: A'addal-laahu lahum Jannaatin tajree min tahtihal-'anhaaru khaalideena feehaa; zaalikal-fawzul-'azeem.
verses.translation: Allah ne unke liye aise baaghaat tayyaar kiye hain jinke neeche nahrein bahti hain, woh un mein hameshah rahenge, yahi azeem kaamyaabi hai.

verses.arabic: وَجَآءَ ٱلْمُعَذِّرُونَ مِنَ ٱلْأَعْرَابِ لِيُؤْذَنَ لَهُمْ وَقَعَدَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَبُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ ۚ سَيُصِيبُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنْهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Wa jaaa'al- mu'azziroona minal- 'A'raabi liyuʼzana lahum wa qa'adal-lazeena kazabul-laaha wa Rasoolah; sayuşeebul- lazeena kafaroo minhum 'azaabun 'aleem.
verses.translation: Aur dehaatiyon mein se bahaane baaz aaye ke unhein rukhsat di jaaye jabke woh log baith rahe jinhon ne Allah aur uske Rasool se jhoot bola, un mein se jin logon ne kufr kiya unhen jald hi dardnaak azaab aa pakdega.

verses.arabic: لَّيْسَ عَلَى ٱلضُّعَفَآءِ وَلَا عَلَى ٱلْمَرْضَىٰ وَلَا عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَجِدُونَ مَا يُنفِقُونَ حَرَجٌ إِذَا نَصَحُوا۟ لِلَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ ۚ مَا عَلَى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ مِن سَبِيلٍۢ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Laysa 'alad- du'afaaa'i wa laa 'alal- mardaa wa laa 'alal- lazeena laa yajidoona maa yunfiqoona harajun 'izaa naşahoo lillaahi wa Rasoolih; maa 'alal- muhsineena min sabeel; wallaahu Ghafoorur- Raheem.
verses.translation: Za'eefon aur bimaaron par aur jo log koyi cheez nahin paate ke woh kharch karein, un par (peechhe rahne mein) koyi gunaah nahin jabke woh Allah aur uske Rasool ki khair khaahi karte hain.¹ neki karne waalon par koyi harf nahin aata aur Allah bahut bakhshne waala, nehaayat raham karne waala hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Nabi Kareem ﷺ ne farmaya: 'Deen khair khaahi (Ekhlaas aur sadaaqat) ka naam hai, Allah ke liye, uske Rasool ke liye, ulil amr ke liye aur aam musalmaanon ke liye.' (Sahih Muslim, Al- Eemaan, Hadees:55) neez hazrat Jareer bin Abdullah  رضي الله عنه rivaayat karte hain: 'Main ne Rasoolullah ﷺ se mandarjah zail umoor par bai'at ki: ⓵ Namaaz qaayem karna ⓶ Zakaat dena ⓷ Musalmaanon ki khairkhaahi karna. (unhein ma'roof ka hukm dena, munkar se rokna, unki madad karna aur unke saath narmi aur mohabbat ka bartaao karna) (Sahih Bukhari, Al- Eemaan:42 Hadees:57)

verses.arabic: وَلَا عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا مَآ أَتَوْكَ لِتَحْمِلَهُمْ قُلْتَ لَآ أَجِدُ مَآ أَحْمِلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ تَوَلَّوا۟ وَّأَعْيُنُهُمْ تَفِيضُ مِنَ ٱلدَّمْعِ حَزَنًا أَلَّا يَجِدُوا۟ مَا يُنفِقُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laa 'alal-lazeena 'izaa maaa 'atawka litahmilahum qulta laaa 'ajidu maaa 'ahmilukum 'alayhi tawallaw wa 'a'yunuhum tafeedu minad-dam'i hazanan 'allaa yajidoo maa yunfiqoon.
verses.translation: Aur (Aye Nabi!) na un logon par (koyi gunaah hai) jo aap ke paas aaye aap unhein (safar-e-jehaad ke liye) sawaari dein (aur) Aap ne kaha ke mere paas koyi sawaari nahin to woh iss haal mein laut gaye ke unki aankhen uss ghum se aansu bahaa rahi thin ke unke paąs kuchh nahin jise woh (Allah ki raah mein) kharch karein.

verses.arabic: إِنَّمَا ٱلسَّبِيلُ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ يَسْتَـْٔذِنُونَكَ وَهُمْ أَغْنِيَآءُ ۚ رَضُوا۟ بِأَن يَكُونُوا۟ مَعَ ٱلْخَوَالِفِ وَطَبَعَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمْ فَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Innamas-sabeelu 'alal-lazeena yastaʼzinoonaka wa hum 'aghniyaaa'; radoo bi'añy-yakoonoo maʻal- khawaalifi wa taba'al- laahu 'alaa quloobihim fahum laa yaʻlamoon.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) harf to aata hi un logon par hai jo aap se rukhsat maangte hain, halaanke woh maaldaar hain, woh iss baat par raazi ho gaye ke peechhe (gharon mein) rahne waali auraton ke saath rahein aur Allah ne unke dilon par mohar lagaa di, chunaancheh woh nahin jaante.

verses.arabic: يَعْتَذِرُونَ إِلَيْكُمْ إِذَا رَجَعْتُمْ إِلَيْهِمْ ۚ قُل لَّا تَعْتَذِرُوا۟ لَن نُّؤْمِنَ لَكُمْ قَدْ نَبَّأَنَا ٱللَّهُ مِنْ أَخْبَارِكُمْ ۚ وَسَيَرَى ٱللَّهُ عَمَلَكُمْ وَرَسُولُهُۥ ثُمَّ تُرَدُّونَ إِلَىٰ عَـٰلِمِ ٱلْغَيْبِ وَٱلشَّهَـٰدَةِ فَيُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Yaʻtaziroona 'ilaykum 'izaa raja'tum 'ilayhim; qul laa ta taziroo lan nu'mina lakum qad nabba'anal-laahu min 'akhbaarikum; wa sayaral-laahu 'amalakum wa Rasooluhoo summa turaddoona 'ilaa 'Aalimil- Ghaybi washshahaadati fayunabbi'ukum bimaa kuntum ta'maloon.
verses.translation: Woh(munaafiq) tumhare saamne uzr pesh karenge jab tum unki taraf laut kar jaao ge. (Aye Nabi! unse) kah deejiye: tum uzr pesh na karo, hum hargiz tum par yaqeen nahin karnge, Allah ne tumhaari khabron se hamein aagaah kar diya hai, aur Allah jald tumhaare amal dekh lega aur uska Rasool bhi, phir tum chhupi aur khuli baaton ko jaanne waale ki taraf lautaaye jaaoge, to woh tumhein bata dega jo tum amal karte rahe.

verses.arabic: سَيَحْلِفُونَ بِٱللَّهِ لَكُمْ إِذَا ٱنقَلَبْتُمْ إِلَيْهِمْ لِتُعْرِضُوا۟ عَنْهُمْ فَأَعْرِضُوا۟ عَنْهُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ رِجْسٌۭ ۖ وَمَأْوَىٰهُمْ جَهَنَّمُ جَزَآءًۢ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
verses.transliteration: Sayahlifoona billaahi lakum 'izañqalabtum 'ilayhim litu'ridoo 'anhum fa'a'ridoo 'anhum 'innahum rijsunw-wa ma'waahum jahannamu jazaaa'am bimaa kaanoo yaksiboon.
verses.translation: Anqareeb woh tumhaare saamne Allah ki qasmein khaayenge jab tum unki taraf laut kar jaaoge taake tum unse dar guzar karo, chunaacheh tum unse dar guzar (hi) karo. bilaashubah woh naapaak hain¹ aur unka 0 thhikaana jahannam hai, yeh saza hai un kaamon ki jo woh karte rahe the.
verses.deepMeaning: Iss mein qata' ta'alluq ke sabab ki taraf ishaarah hai ke woh khayalaat aur a'amaal ke e'tebaar se gande hain lehaaza 'Sohbat taaleh tura taaleh kunad' ke tehat tumhein chaahiye ke unse door raho mabaadan un se muta'assir ho jaao, mulaahazah ho haashiyah: (Surah Taubah:9/28

verses.arabic: يَحْلِفُونَ لَكُمْ لِتَرْضَوْا۟ عَنْهُمْ فَإِن تَرْضَوْا۟ عَنْهُمْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَرْضَىٰ عَنِ ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلْفَـٰسِقِينَ
verses.transliteration: Yahlifoona lakum litardaw 'anhum fa'in tardaw 'anhum fa'innal- laaha laa yardaa 'anil- qawmil-faasiqeen
verses.translation: Woh tumhaare saamne qasmein khaayenge taake tum unse raazi ho jaao. phir agar tum unse raazi ho bhi jaao to Allah un logon se raazi nahin hota jo naafarmaan hon.

verses.arabic: ٱلْأَعْرَابُ أَشَدُّ كُفْرًۭا وَنِفَاقًۭا وَأَجْدَرُ أَلَّا يَعْلَمُوا۟ حُدُودَ مَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِهِۦ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: 'Al-'A'raabu 'ashaddu kufranw-wa nifaaqañw- wa 'ajdaru 'allaa ya'lamoo hudooda maaa 'anzalal-laahu 'alaa Rasoolih; wallaahu 'Aleemun Hakeem
verses.translation: Dehaati kufr aur munaafiqat mein ziyaadah sakht hain aur iss amr ke ziyaadah laayeq hain ke woh un ahkaam ko na jaan paayen jo Allah ne apne Rasool par naazil kiye, aur Allah khoob jaanne waala, bahut hikmat waala hai.

verses.arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلْأَعْرَابِ مَن يَتَّخِذُ مَا يُنفِقُ مَغْرَمًۭا وَيَتَرَبَّصُ بِكُمُ ٱلدَّوَآئِرَ ۚ عَلَيْهِمْ دَآئِرَةُ ٱلسَّوْءِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Wa minal-'A'raabi many-yattakhizu maa yunfiqu maghramanw- wa yatarabbaşu bikumud-dawaaa'ir; 'alayhim daaa'iratus- saw'; wallaahu Samee'un 'Aleem.
verses.translation: Aur kuchh dehaati usko taawaan samajhte hain jo woh (Allah ki raah mein) kharch karte hain, aur woh tumhaare khilaaf zamaane ki gardishon ka intazaar karte hain (magar) manhoos gardish unhi ke khilaaf hai, aur Allah khoob sunne waala, khoob jaanne waala hai.

verses.arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلْأَعْرَابِ مَن يُؤْمِنُ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِ وَيَتَّخِذُ مَا يُنفِقُ قُرُبَٰتٍ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَصَلَوَٰتِ ٱلرَّسُولِ ۚ أَلَآ إِنَّهَا قُرْبَةٌۭ لَّهُمْ ۚ سَيُدْخِلُهُمُ ٱللَّهُ فِى رَحْمَتِهِۦٓ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Wa minal-'A'raabi many-yu'minu billaahi wal-yawmil-'Aakhiri wa yattakhizu maa yunfiqu qurubaatin 'indal-laahi wa salawaatir-Rasool; 'alaaa 'innahaa qurbatul-lahum; sayudkhiluhumul-laahu fee rahmatih; 'innal- laaha Ghafoorur- Raheem.
verses.translation: Aur kuchh dehaati woh hain jo Allah aur yaume aakhirat aur eemaan laate hain, aur woh jo kuchh kharch karte hain, use Allah ke haan qurbat aur Rasool ki duaon ka zari'ah samajhte hain, Aagaah raho! Yaqeenan yeh (kharch karna) unke liye qurbat ka zariyah hai, Allah jald unhein apni rahmat mein daakhil karega, beshak Allah bahut bakhshne waala, nehaayat raham karne waalah hai.

verses.arabic: وَٱلسَّـٰبِقُونَ ٱلْأَوَّلُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُهَـٰجِرِينَ وَٱلْأَنصَارِ وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّبَعُوهُم بِإِحْسَـٰنٍۢ رَّضِىَ ٱللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ وَرَضُوا۟ عَنْهُ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمْ جَنَّـٰتٍۢ تَجْرِى تَحْتَهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًۭا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
verses.transliteration: Wassaabiqoonal- 'awwaloona minal- Muhaajireena wal- 'Anşaari wallazeenat- tabaʻoohum bi'ihsaanir- radiyal-laahu 'anhum wa radoo 'anhu wa 'a'adda lahum jannaatin tajree tahtahal-'anhaaru khaalideena feehaaa 'abadaa; zaalikal- fawzul-'azeem.
verses.translation: Aur (Qubool-e-islam mein) sabqat karne waale muhaajireen aur ansaar aur woh log jinhon ne neko kaari ke saath unki pairwi ki, Allah unse raazi ho gaya aur woh usse raazi ho gaye, aur Allah ne unke liye aise baagh tayyaar kiye hain jinke neeche nahre bahti hai, woh unmein hameshah hamesh rahenge, yeh bahut badi kaamyaabi hai.

verses.arabic: وَمِمَّنْ حَوْلَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَعْرَابِ مُنَـٰفِقُونَ ۖ وَمِنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْمَدِينَةِ ۖ مَرَدُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلنِّفَاقِ ۖ لَا تَعْلَمُهُمْ ۖ نَحْنُ نَعْلَمُهُمْ ۚ سَنُعَذِّبُهُم مَّرَّتَيْنِ ثُمَّ يُرَدُّونَ إِلَىٰ عَذَابٍ عَظِيمٍۢ
verses.transliteration: Wa mimman hawlakum-minal-'A'raabi munaafiqoona wa min maradoo 'ahlil-Madeenati 'alan-nifaaq; laa talamuhum nahnu naʻlamuhum; sanu'azzibuhum marratayni summa yuraddoona 'ilaa 'azaabin 'azeem.
verses.translation: Aur tumhaare aas paas jo dehaati hain un mein ba'z munaafiq hain, aur ba'z ahle Madinah bhi nifaaq par ade huye hain. (Aye Nabi!) aap unhein nahin jaante hain, hum unhein jaante hain. hum jald unhein dohri saza denge, phir woh bade azaab ki taraf lautaaye jaayenge.

verses.arabic: وَءَاخَرُونَ ٱعْتَرَفُوا۟ بِذُنُوبِهِمْ خَلَطُوا۟ عَمَلًۭا صَـٰلِحًۭا وَءَاخَرَ سَيِّـًٔا عَسَى ٱللَّهُ أَن يَتُوبَ عَلَيْهِمْ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'aakharoona'- tarafoo bizunoobihim khalatoo 'amalan saalihanw-wa 'aakhara sayyi'an 'asal-laahu 'añy-yatooba 'alayhim; 'innal-laaha Ghafoorur- Raheem
verses.translation: Aur kuchh deegar log hain jinhon ne apne gunaahon ka eqraar kiya hai. unhon ne mila jula amal kiya, ek achchha aur doosra bura, ummeed hai ke Allah unki taubah qubool farmayega¹ yaqeenan Allah bahut bakhshne waala, nehaayat raham karne waala hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Rasoolullah ﷺ ko khaab mein aise aadmi dikhaaye gaye jinka aadha jism khubsoorat tha aur aadha bad soorat. Farishton ne unhein nahar mein daakhil hone ko kaha, waapsi par woh bahut hi khubsoorat ban chuke the. Farishton ne mujhse kaha: yeh aise log the jinhon ne achchhe aur bure donon tarah ke amal kiye the, lekin Allah Ta'ala ne unhein muaa'f kar diya.' (Sahih Bukhari,4674)

verses.arabic: خُذْ مِنْ أَمْوَٰلِهِمْ صَدَقَةًۭ تُطَهِّرُهُمْ وَتُزَكِّيهِم بِهَا وَصَلِّ عَلَيْهِمْ ۖ إِنَّ صَلَوٰتَكَ سَكَنٌۭ لَّهُمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ
verses.transliteration: Khuz min 'amwaalihim şadaqatan tutahhiruhum wa tuzakkeehim bihaa wa salli 'alayhim 'inna salaataka sakanul- lahum; wallaahu Samee'un 'Aleem.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) unke maalon mein se sadqah leejiye (taake) uske zariye se unhein paak karen aur unka tazkiyah karein aur unke liye du'a keejiye, beshak Aap ki dua' unke liye sukoon (ka baayis) hai, aur Allah khoob sunne waala, khoob jaanne waala hai.

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ يَعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ يَقْبَلُ ٱلتَّوْبَةَ عَنْ عِبَادِهِۦ وَيَأْخُذُ ٱلصَّدَقَـٰتِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلتَّوَّابُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
verses.transliteration: 'Alam yaʻlamooo 'annal-laaha huwa yaqbalut-tawbata 'an 'ibaadihee wa ya'khuzuş-şadaqaati wa 'annal-laaha Huwat- tawwaabur-Raheem.
verses.translation: Kiya unhen ma'loom nahin ke beshak Allah hi apne bandon ki taubah qubool farmaata hai aur wahi sadqaat qubool karta hai aur yeh ke bilaashubah Allah hi bahut taubah qubool karne waala, nehaayat raham karne waala hai?

verses.arabic: وَقُلِ ٱعْمَلُوا۟ فَسَيَرَى ٱللَّهُ عَمَلَكُمْ وَرَسُولُهُۥ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ ۖ وَسَتُرَدُّونَ إِلَىٰ عَـٰلِمِ ٱلْغَيْبِ وَٱلشَّهَـٰدَةِ فَيُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa quli-maloo fasayaral-laahu 'amalakum wa Rasooluhoo walmu'minoona wa saturaddoona 'ilaa 'Aalimil-Ghaybi washshahaadati fayunabbi'ukum bimaa kuntum ta'maloon.
verses.translation: Aur (Aye Nabi!) kah deejiye: tum amal karo, phir Allah tumhaare 'amal ko dekhega aur uska Rasool aur momineen bhi aur tum jald uski taraf lautaaye jaaoge jo chhupi aur khuli baatein jaanne waala hai, phir woh tumhein bata dega jo kuchh tum karte rahe.

verses.arabic: وَءَاخَرُونَ مُرْجَوْنَ لِأَمْرِ ٱللَّهِ إِمَّا يُعَذِّبُهُمْ وَإِمَّا يَتُوبُ عَلَيْهِمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'aakharoona murjawna li'amril-laahi 'immaa yu'azzibuhum wa 'immaa yatoobu 'alayhim; wallaahu 'Aleemun Hakeem.
verses.translation: Aur kuchh aur log hain jinka mu'aamlah Allah ka hukm aane tak muakhkhar kar diya gaya hai, ya to woh unhein saza dega ya unki taubah qubool karlega. aur Allah khoob jaanne waala, khoob hikmat waala hai.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مَسْجِدًۭا ضِرَارًۭا وَكُفْرًۭا وَتَفْرِيقًۢا بَيْنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَإِرْصَادًۭا لِّمَنْ حَارَبَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ مِن قَبْلُ ۚ وَلَيَحْلِفُنَّ إِنْ أَرَدْنَآ إِلَّا ٱلْحُسْنَىٰ ۖ وَٱللَّهُ يَشْهَدُ إِنَّهُمْ لَكَـٰذِبُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wallazeenat- Cakhazoo masjidan diraarañw-wa kufrañw- wa tafreeqam baynal- mu'mineena wa Pirşaadal-liman haarabal-laaha wa Rasoolahoo min qabl; wa Jayahlifunna 'in 'aradnaaa 'illal-husnaa wallaahu yashhadu 'innahum lakaaziboon.
verses.translation: Aur (kuchh log hain) jinhon ne ek masjid banaayi taake (musalmaanon ko) zarar pahunchaayein aur kufr phailaayein aur mominon ke darmiyaan tafarqah daalein aur uss shakhs ke liye ghaat ka bando bast karein jo isse pahle Allah aur uske Rasool se lad chuka hai. aur woh zaroor qasmein khaayenge ke hamaara eraadah to nek hi tha. aur Allah gawaahi deta hai ke beshak woh saraasar jhoote hain..

verses.arabic: لَا تَقُمْ فِيهِ أَبَدًۭا ۚ لَّمَسْجِدٌ أُسِّسَ عَلَى ٱلتَّقْوَىٰ مِنْ أَوَّلِ يَوْمٍ أَحَقُّ أَن تَقُومَ فِيهِ ۚ فِيهِ رِجَالٌۭ يُحِبُّونَ أَن يَتَطَهَّرُوا۟ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ يُحِبُّ ٱلْمُطَّهِّرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Laa taqum feehi 'abadaa; lamasjidun 'ussisa 'alat-taqwaa min 'awwali yawmin 'ahaqqu 'an taqooma feeh; feehi rijaaluñy-yuhibboona any-yatatahharoo, wallaahu yuhibbul- muttahhireen.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) aap uss masjid (zeraar) mein kabhi bhi khade na hon, albattah woh masjid jiski buniyaad awwal roz hi se taqwah par rakhkhi gayi hai uski ziyaadah haqdaar hai ke aap uss mein khade hon. uss mein aise log hain jo iss baat ko pasand karte hain ke woh paak hon aur Allah paak rahne waalon ko pasand karta hai.

verses.arabic: أَفَمَنْ أَسَّسَ بُنْيَـٰنَهُۥ عَلَىٰ تَقْوَىٰ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِضْوَٰنٍ خَيْرٌ أَم مَّنْ أَسَّسَ بُنْيَـٰنَهُۥ عَلَىٰ شَفَا جُرُفٍ هَارٍۢ فَٱنْهَارَ بِهِۦ فِى نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يَهْدِى ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: 'Afaman 'assasa bunyaanahoo 'alaa taqwaa minal-laahi wa ridwaanin khayrun man 'assasa 'am- bunyaanahoo 'alaa shafaa jurufin haarin fanhaara bihee fee Naari Jahannam; wallaahu laa yahdil-qawmaz- zaalimeen.
verses.translation: Kiya bhala woh shakhs jisne apni emaarat ki buniyaad Allah ke taqwa aur (uski) raza par rakhkhi, (woh) behtar hai ya woh shakhs jisne apni emaarat ki buniyaad (darya ke) ek khokhle girne waale kinaare par rakhkhi? phir woh use jahannam ki aag mein le gira? aur Allah zaalim logon ko hidaayat nahin deta.

verses.arabic: لَا يَزَالُ بُنْيَـٰنُهُمُ ٱلَّذِى بَنَوْا۟ رِيبَةًۭ فِى قُلُوبِهِمْ إِلَّآ أَن تَقَطَّعَ قُلُوبُهُمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ
verses.transliteration: Laa yazaalu bunyaanuhumul-lazee banaw reebatan fee quloobihim 'illaaa 'an taqatta'a quloobuhum; wallaahu 'Aleemun Hakeem.
verses.translation: Unhon ne jo emaarat banaayi thi woh hameshah unke dilon mein shak daale rakhkhegi illa yeh ke unke dil tukde tukde ho jaayen. aur Allah khoob jaanne waala, khoob hikmat waala hai.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ ٱشْتَرَىٰ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ أَنفُسَهُمْ وَأَمْوَٰلَهُم بِأَنَّ لَهُمُ ٱلْجَنَّةَ ۚ يُقَـٰتِلُونَ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ فَيَقْتُلُونَ وَيُقْتَلُونَ ۖ وَعْدًا عَلَيْهِ حَقًّۭا فِى ٱلتَّوْرَىٰةِ وَٱلْإِنجِيلِ وَٱلْقُرْءَانِ ۚ وَمَنْ أَوْفَىٰ بِعَهْدِهِۦ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ فَٱسْتَبْشِرُوا۟ بِبَيْعِكُمُ ٱلَّذِى بَايَعْتُم بِهِۦ ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
verses.transliteration: 'Innal-laahash-taraa minal-mu'mineena 'anfusahum wa 'amwaalahum bi'anna lahumul-jannah; yuqaatiloona fee sabeelil- laahi fayaqtuloona wa yuqtaloona wa'dan 'alayhi haqqan fit- Tawraati wal-'Injeeli wal- Qur'aan; wa man 'awfaa bi'ahdihee minal-laahi fastabshiroo bibay'ikumul-lazee baaya'tum bih; wa zaalika huwal-fawzul- 'azeem.
verses.translation: Beshak Allah ne mominon se unki jaanen aur unke maal jannat ke badle khareed liye hain. woh Allah ki raah mein ladte hain, phir woh qatl karte hain aur qatl kiye jaate hain, yeh Allah ke zimme sachcha wa'dah hai tauraat aur injeel aur qura'n mein. aur Allah se ziyaadah apne ahad ko pura karne waala kaun hai? lehaaza tum apne iss saude par khush ho jaao jo tumne Allah se kiya, aur yahi bahut badi kaamyaabi hai.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Iss mein jehaad ki fazeelat aur uske ajr-e-azeem ka bayaan hai. ahaadees mein bhi iski fazeelat waazeh kardi gayi hai ek hadees mein Rasoolullah ﷺ ne farmaya: 'Jo shakhs Allah ki raah mein jehaad karta ho aur Allah ki raah mein jehaad aur uske kalimaat ki tasdeeq hi ne use ghar se nikaala ho, to Allah uska zaamin ban jaata hai ke ya to use jannat mein daakhil karde ya ajr-o-sawaab aur maal-e- ghaneemat de kar use uski qiyaam gaah tak jahaan se woh nikla tha waapas pahuncha de.' (Sahih Bukhari, farazul Khams, Baab:8, Hadees:3123)

verses.arabic: ٱلتَّـٰٓئِبُونَ ٱلْعَـٰبِدُونَ ٱلْحَـٰمِدُونَ ٱلسَّـٰٓئِحُونَ ٱلرَّٰكِعُونَ ٱلسَّـٰجِدُونَ ٱلْءَامِرُونَ بِٱلْمَعْرُوفِ وَٱلنَّاهُونَ عَنِ ٱلْمُنكَرِ وَٱلْحَـٰفِظُونَ لِحُدُودِ ٱللَّهِ ۗ وَبَشِّرِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.transliteration: 'Attaaa'iboonal- 'aabidoonal-haamidoonas- saaa'ihoonar-raaki'oonas -saajidoonal-'aamiroona bilma'roofi wannaahoona 'anil-munkari walhaafizoona lihudoodil- laah; wa bashshiril- mu'mineen.
verses.translation: Woh momin taubah karne waale, i'baadat karne waale, hamd karne waale, rozah rakhne waale, ruku' karne waale, sajdah karne waale, neki ka hukm karne waale aur buraayi se rokne waale aur Allah ki hadon ki hifaazat karne waale hain, aur (Aye Nabi!) mominon ko khushkhabri suna deejiye

verses.arabic: مَا كَانَ لِلنَّبِىِّ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ أَن يَسْتَغْفِرُوا۟ لِلْمُشْرِكِينَ وَلَوْ كَانُوٓا۟ أُو۟لِى قُرْبَىٰ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُمْ أَنَّهُمْ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
verses.transliteration: Maa kaana lin- nabiyyi wallazeena 'aamanooo añy- yastaghfiroo lilmushrikeena wa law kaanooo 'ulee qurbaa mim ba'di maa tabayyana lahum 'annahum 'Ashaabul- jaheem.
verses.translation: Nabi ke aur eemaan waalon ke laayeq nahin ke woh mushrikon ke liye bakhshish ki dua' karein, khaah woh unke qareebi rishte daar hon, unke muta'alliq yeh waazeh ho jaane ke ba'd ke woh bilaashubah dozakhi hain.

verses.arabic: وَمَا كَانَ ٱسْتِغْفَـٰرُ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ لِأَبِيهِ إِلَّا عَن مَّوْعِدَةٍۢ وَعَدَهَآ إِيَّاهُ ۖ فَلَمَّا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُۥٓ أَنَّهُۥ عَدُوٌّۭ لِّلَّهِ تَبَرَّأَ مِنْهُ ۚ إِنَّ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ لَأَوَّٰهٌ حَلِيمٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa maa kaanas- tighfaaru 'Ibraaheema li'abeehi 'illaa 'am- maw'idatiñw- wa'adahaaa 'iyyaahu falammaa tabayyana lahooo 'annahoo 'aduwwul-lillaahi tabarra'a minh; 'inna 'Ibraaheema la'awwaahun haleem
verses.translation: Aur Ibraheem ka apne baap ke liye bakhshish ki du'a karna bas ek wa'de ke baayis tha jo wa'dah unhon ne usse kiya tha, phir jab Ibraheem par waazeh ho gaya ke yaqeenan woh Allah ka dushman hai to woh usse bezaar ho gaye. beshak Ibraheem bade narm dil, bahut tahammul waale the.

verses.arabic: وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ لِيُضِلَّ قَوْمًۢا بَعْدَ إِذْ هَدَىٰهُمْ حَتَّىٰ يُبَيِّنَ لَهُم مَّا يَتَّقُونَ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa maa kaanal- laahu liyudilla qawmam ba'da 'iz hadaahum hattaa yubayyina lahum maa yattaqoon; 'innal- laaha bikulli shay'in 'Aleem.
verses.translation: Aur Allah aisa nahin ke kisi qaum ko hidaayat dene ke ba'd gumraah kar de, jab tak ke unke liye woh cheezein waazeh na karde jinse woh bachein.¹ beshak Allah har cheez ko khoob jaanta hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Isi liye ulama ne bhi taakeed ki hai ke waazeh dalaayel ke baghair kisi musalmaan ko kaafir na kaha jaaye. taahum iska matlab yeh bhi nahin ke kufr sareeh aur irtedaad ke ba'd bhi ise kuchh na kahaa jaaye. chunaancheh ulamaa-e-islam ne isi liye khawaarij ko islam ke daayir-e-se nikaal diya tha. (khawaarij) ya harooriyah) woh log hain jo deen-e-islam se nikal gaye aur jinhon ne baaqi musalmaanon se (deen ke muslimah aqaayed mein) ikhtelaaf kiya aur (mulhideen) (be deen log, deen ke muslimah aqaayed ke mukhaalifeen) ko un par hujjat qaayem karne ke ba'd qatl kar dena jaayez jaa hai. (agar islam aur islami hukoomat ke mafaad ke liye zaroori ho.) Abdullah bin Umar رضي الله عنه unhein (khawaarij aur mulhideen ko) badtareen makhlooq samjha karte the aur farmaate the: 'un logon ne jo aayaat kuffaar ke muta'alliq naazil huyi hain, unhein ghalat ta'beer-o-tashreeh karke musalmaanon par chaspaan kardiya.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ يُحْىِۦ وَيُمِيتُ ۚ وَمَا لَكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مِن وَلِىٍّۢ وَلَا نَصِيرٍ
verses.transliteration: 'Innal-laaha lahoo mulkus-samaawaati wal'ardi yuhyee wa yumeet; wa maa lakum min doonil-laahi miñw- waliyyinw-wa laa naseer
verses.translation: Beshak aasmaan aur zameen ki baadshaahi Allah hi ke liye hai, wahi zindah karta hai aur wahi maarta hai, aur Allah ke siwa koyi tumhaara dost aur madadgaar nahin.

verses.arabic: لَقَدْ تَابَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَى ٱلنَّبِىِّ وَٱلْمُهَـٰجِرِينَ وَٱلْأَنصَارِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّبَعُوهُ فِى سَاعَةِ ٱلْعُسْرَةِ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا كَادَ يَزِيغُ قُلُوبُ فَرِيقٍۢ مِّنْهُمْ ثُمَّ تَابَ عَلَيْهِمْ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِهِمْ رَءُوفٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Laqat-taabal-laahu 'alan-nabiyyi wal- Muhaajireena wal- 'Anşaaril-lazeenat- taba'oohu fee saa'atil- 'usrati mim ba'di maa kaada yazeeghu quloobu fareeqim-minhum summa taaba 'alayhim; 'innahoo bihim Ra'oofur-Raheem
verses.translation: Yaqeenan Allah ne Nabi aur Muhaajireen-o-Ansaar par tawajjoh farmaayi woh jinhon ne tangi ki ghadi mein aapki pairwi ki, ba'd uske ke un mein se ek giroh ke dil bahak jaane ko the, phir Allah ne un par meharbaani farmaayi. beshak woh un par bahut shafqat karne waala, nehaayat raham karne waalah hai.

verses.arabic: وَعَلَى ٱلثَّلَـٰثَةِ ٱلَّذِينَ خُلِّفُوا۟ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا ضَاقَتْ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْأَرْضُ بِمَا رَحُبَتْ وَضَاقَتْ عَلَيْهِمْ أَنفُسُهُمْ وَظَنُّوٓا۟ أَن لَّا مَلْجَأَ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَّآ إِلَيْهِ ثُمَّ تَابَ عَلَيْهِمْ لِيَتُوبُوٓا۟ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلتَّوَّابُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'alas-salaasatil- lazeena khullifoo hattaaa 'izaa daaqat 'alayhimul- 'ardu bimaa rahubat wa daaqat 'alayhim 'anfusuhum wa zannooo 'al-laa malja'a minal-laahi 'illaaa 'ilayhi summa taaba 'alayhim liyatoobooo; 'innal-laaha Huwat-Tawwaabur- Raheem.
verses.translation: Aur teen afraad par bhi (meharbaani farmaayi) jinhein (hukm-e-ilaahi ke intezaar mein) chhod diya gaya tha, hatta ke jab zameen faraakhi ke baawajood un par tang ho gayi aur unki jaanein (bhi) un par tang ho gayin, aur unhon ne samjha ke Allah (ke ghazab) se khud uske siwa unke liye koyi jaaye panaah nahin, phir Allah ne un par tawajjoh ki woh taubah karen, beshak Allah bahut ziyaadah taubah qubool karne waala, nehaayat raham karne waala hai.

verses.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَكُونُوا۟ مَعَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhal- lazeena 'aamanut-taqul- laaha wa koonoo maʻaş- şaadiqeen.
verses.translation: Aye logo! jo eemaan laaye ho, Allah se daro aur such bolne waalon ke saath ho jaao.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Isliye ke sach insaan ki najaat ka aur jhoot tabaahi-o-barbaadi ka baay'is hai, nabi kareem ﷺ ne farmaya: 'Beshakh sachchaayi neki ki taraf hidaayat karti hai aur neki jannat ki taraf le jaati hai aur aadmi baraabar sach bolta rahta hai hatta ke (siddeeq) ban jaata hai.'(Al-Bukhari, Al-Adab, Baab:69, Hadees:6094)

verses.arabic: مَا كَانَ لِأَهْلِ ٱلْمَدِينَةِ وَمَنْ حَوْلَهُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَعْرَابِ أَن يَتَخَلَّفُوا۟ عَن رَّسُولِ ٱللَّهِ وَلَا يَرْغَبُوا۟ بِأَنفُسِهِمْ عَن نَّفْسِهِۦ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ لَا يُصِيبُهُمْ ظَمَأٌۭ وَلَا نَصَبٌۭ وَلَا مَخْمَصَةٌۭ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَلَا يَطَـُٔونَ مَوْطِئًۭا يَغِيظُ ٱلْكُفَّارَ وَلَا يَنَالُونَ مِنْ عَدُوٍّۢ نَّيْلًا إِلَّا كُتِبَ لَهُم بِهِۦ عَمَلٌۭ صَـٰلِحٌ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُضِيعُ أَجْرَ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.transliteration: Maa kaana li'ahlil- Madeenati wa man hawlahum-minal-'A'raabi 'any-yatakhallafoo 'ar- Rasoolil-laahi wa laa yarghaboo bi'unfusihim 'an nafsih; zaalika bi'annahum laa yuşeebuhum zama'uñw- wa laa nașabuñw-wa laa makhmaşatun fee sabeelil-laahi wa laa yata'oona mawți'any- yagheezul-kuffaara wa laa yanaaloona min 'aduwwin-naylan 'illaa kutiba lahum bihee 'amalun şaalih; 'innal- laaha laa yudee'u 'ajral- muhsineen.
verses.translation: Ahle Madinah aur unke aas paas rahne waale dehaatiyon ke laayeq nahin tha ke woh (jehaad mein) Rasoolullah se peechhe rah jaayein aur na yeh (jaayez) ke apni jaan ko Nabi ki jaan se ziyaadah aziz rakhkhein, yeh isliye ke yeh woh (log) hain ke beshak unhein Allah ki raah mein jo bhi piyaas aur thakaawat aur bhook (ki takleef) pahunchti hai, aur woh jo bhi aisi jagah raundte hain jo kaafiron ko sakht naagawaar ho, aur woh dushman se jo bhi kaamyaabi haasil karte hain, uske badle unke liye nek amal likha jaata hai. beshak Allah mohsineen¹ ka ajr zaaye' nahin karta.
verses.deepMeaning: (Mohsineen) 'Neko kaar log' jo dikhaawe, shohrat-o-naamwari aur sataayish ki tamanna a kiye baghair mahaz Allah ke liye nek a'amaal anjaam dete hain aur woh yeh woh tamaam nek a'amaal Rasoolullah ﷺ ki sunnat ke mutaabiq anjaam dete hain.

verses.arabic: وَلَا يُنفِقُونَ نَفَقَةًۭ صَغِيرَةًۭ وَلَا كَبِيرَةًۭ وَلَا يَقْطَعُونَ وَادِيًا إِلَّا كُتِبَ لَهُمْ لِيَجْزِيَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ أَحْسَنَ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laa yunfiqoona nafaqatan şagheeratañw- wa laa kabeeratanw-wa laa yaqta'oona waadiyan 'illaa kutiba lahum liyajziyahumul-laahu 'ahsana maa kaanoo ya'maloon.
verses.translation: Aur woh job hi chhota aur bada kharch karte hain aur woh jo bhi waadi tai karte hain woh (sab) unke liye likha jaata hai taake Allah unhein un kaamon ki behtareen jaza de jo woh tai karte hai.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Iss mein Allah Ta'ala ke uss fazl-o-karam ka bayaan hai jo neki ka silah dete waqt woh ikhtiyaar farmaata hai, chunaancheh islam qubool karne se, (Allah ki raah mein) hijrat karne se aur hajj se pichhle tamaam gunah mu'aaf ho jaate hain. (Muslim, Al-Eemaan, Hadees:121) elaawah azin phir use har achchhe kaam par 10 se 700 guna tak sawaab milta hai aur agar woh bura kaam kare to woh ek hi gunah shumaar hota hai illa yeh ke Allah use mu'aaf farmaade.' (Al-Bukhari, Hadees:41)

verses.arabic: وَمَا كَانَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ لِيَنفِرُوا۟ كَآفَّةًۭ ۚ فَلَوْلَا نَفَرَ مِن كُلِّ فِرْقَةٍۢ مِّنْهُمْ طَآئِفَةٌۭ لِّيَتَفَقَّهُوا۟ فِى ٱلدِّينِ وَلِيُنذِرُوا۟ قَوْمَهُمْ إِذَا رَجَعُوٓا۟ إِلَيْهِمْ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَحْذَرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maa kaanal- mu'minoona liyanfiroo kaaaffah; falaw laa nafara min kulli firqatim- minhum taaa'ifatul- liyatafaqqahoo fid-deeni wa liyunziroo qawmahum 'izaa raja ooo 'ilayhim laʻallahum yahzaroon.
verses.translation: Aur mominon ke liye munaasib nahin ke woh sab hi nikal khade hon, phir har firqe mein se ek giroh deen mein samajh haasil karne ke liye kyun na nikala taake woh jab apne qabeele mein waapas jaayein to unhen khabardaar karein taake woh (peechhe waale bhi Allah se) darein.

verses.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ قَـٰتِلُوا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ يَلُونَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْكُفَّارِ وَلِيَجِدُوا۟ فِيكُمْ غِلْظَةًۭ ۚ وَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhal- lazeena 'aamanoo qaatilul-lazeena yaloonakum minal- kuffaari walyajidoo feekum ghilzah; wa'lamooo 'annal-laaha ma'al-muttaqeen.
verses.translation: Aye logo jo eemaan laaye ho! tum un kaafiron se lado jo tumhaare qareebo jawaar mein hain¹ aur chaahiye ke woh tumhaare andar sakhti paayein. aur jaan lo ke yaqeenan Allah muttaqiyon ke saath hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Iss mein kaafiron se ladne ka ek ahum usool bayaan kiya gaya hai ke al awwal fa lawwal aur al aqu aqrab fal fal aqrab ke mutaabiq kaafiron se jehaad karna hai jaisa ke Rasoolullah ﷺ ne pahle jazeerah arab mein aabaad mushrikeen se qitaal kiya, jab unse faarigh ho gaye aur Allah Ta'ala ne Makkah, Taayef, Yaman, yamaamah, Hajar, Khaibar, Hazr-e-maut waghairah aqaaleem par musalmaanon ko ghalbah ataa farma diya aur arab ke saare qabaayel fauj dar fauj islam mein daakhil ho gaye, to phir ahl-e-kitab se qetaal ka aaghaaz farmaya.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا مَآ أُنزِلَتْ سُورَةٌۭ فَمِنْهُم مَّن يَقُولُ أَيُّكُمْ زَادَتْهُ هَـٰذِهِۦٓ إِيمَـٰنًۭا ۚ فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ فَزَادَتْهُمْ إِيمَـٰنًۭا وَهُمْ يَسْتَبْشِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'izaa maaa 'unzilat Sooratun faminhum mañy-yaqoolu 'ayyukum zaadathu haaziheee 'eemaanaa; fa'ammal-lazeena 'aamanoo fazaadathum 'eemaananw-wa hum yastabshiroon.
verses.translation: Aur jab koyi surat naazil ki jaati hai to un (munaafiqeen) mein se ba'z aise hain jo (tanzan) kahte hain: tum mein se kisko iss (surat) ne eemaan mein ziyaadah kiya hai? chunaancheh jo log eemaan laaye hain, iss surat ne unko eemaan mein ziyaadah kiya hai, aur woh khush hote hain.

verses.arabic: وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ فِى قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌۭ فَزَادَتْهُمْ رِجْسًا إِلَىٰ رِجْسِهِمْ وَمَاتُوا۟ وَهُمْ كَـٰفِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'ammal-lazeena fee quloobihim maradun fazaadathum rijsan 'ilaa rijsihim wa maatoo wa hum kaafiroon.
verses.translation: Lekin jin logon ke dilon mein rog hai to iss (surat) ne unki (pahli) paleedi par mazeed paleedi ka ezaafah kar diya aur woh marte dam tak kaafir hi rahe.

verses.arabic: أَوَلَا يَرَوْنَ أَنَّهُمْ يُفْتَنُونَ فِى كُلِّ عَامٍۢ مَّرَّةً أَوْ مَرَّتَيْنِ ثُمَّ لَا يَتُوبُونَ وَلَا هُمْ يَذَّكَّرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Awalaa yarawna 'annahum yuftanoona fee kulli 'aamim- marratan 'aw marratayni summa laa yatooboona wa laa hum yazzakkaroon.
verses.translation: Kiya woh (momin) nahin, dekhte ke beshak woh (munaafiq) har saal ek ya do baar fitne mein mubtala kiye jaate hain? phir bhi woh taubah nahin karte aur na woh naseehat pakadte hain.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا مَآ أُنزِلَتْ سُورَةٌۭ نَّظَرَ بَعْضُهُمْ إِلَىٰ بَعْضٍ هَلْ يَرَىٰكُم مِّنْ أَحَدٍۢ ثُمَّ ٱنصَرَفُوا۟ ۚ صَرَفَ ٱللَّهُ قُلُوبَهُم بِأَنَّهُمْ قَوْمٌۭ لَّا يَفْقَهُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'izaa maaa 'unzilat Sooratun nazara ba'duhum 'ilaa ba'din hal yaraakum min 'ahadin summan- sarafoo; sarafal-laahu quloobahum bi'annahum qawmul-laa yafqahoon.
verses.translation: Aur jab koyi surat naazil hoti hai to woh ek doosre ki taraf nigaah uthaate hain ke kahin koyi (musalmaan) tumhein dekh to nahin raha phir (chupke se) khisak jaate hain. Allah ne unke dilon ko pher diya hai, isliye ke beshak woh log samajhte nahin.

verses.arabic: لَقَدْ جَآءَكُمْ رَسُولٌۭ مِّنْ أَنفُسِكُمْ عَزِيزٌ عَلَيْهِ مَا عَنِتُّمْ حَرِيصٌ عَلَيْكُم بِٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ رَءُوفٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Laqad jaaa'akum Rasoolum-min 'anfusikum 'azeezun 'alayhi maa 'anittum hareesun 'alaykum bilmu'mineena ra'oofur- raheem.
verses.translation: (Logo!) yaqeenan tumhaare paas tumhin mein se ek Rasool aagaya hai, uss par tumhaara takleef mein mubtala hona giraan guzarta hai, woh tumhaari bhalaayi ka bahut harees hai, mominon par nihaayat shafeeq, bahut raham karne waala hai.

verses.arabic: فَإِن تَوَلَّوْا۟ فَقُلْ حَسْبِىَ ٱللَّهُ ۖ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ عَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ ۖ وَهُوَ رَبُّ ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
verses.transliteration: Fa'in tawallaw faqu hasbiyal-laahu laaa 'ilaaha 'illaa Huwa 'alayhi tawakkaltu wa Huwa Rabbul-'Arshil- 'Azeem.
verses.translation: Phir bhi agar woh munh pherlein to kah deejiye: mujhe Allah kaafi hai, uske siwa koyi ma'bood (barhaq) nahin, usi par main ne bharosa kiya hai aur woh arshe azeem ka rab hai.

verses.arabic: الر ۚ تِلْكَ اٰيٰتُ الْكِتٰبِ الْحَكِيْمِ
verses.transliteration: Alif-Laaam-Raa; tilka 'Aayaatul-Kitaabil- Hakeem.
verses.translation: Alif laaam raa, yeh hikmat waali kitab ki aayatein hain.

verses.arabic: اَكَانَ لِلنَّاسِ عَجَبًا اَنْ اُوْحَيْنَآ اِلٰى رَجُلٍ مِّنْهُمْ اَنْ اَنْذِرِ النَّاسَ وَبَشِّرِ الَّذِينَ اٰمَنُوْٓا اَنَّ لَهُمْ قَدَمَ صِدْقٍ عِنْدَ رَبِّهِمْ ۗ قَالَ الْكٰفِرُوْنَ اِنَّ هٰذَا لَسٰحِرٌ مُّبِيْنٌ
verses.transliteration: 'A kaana linnaasi 'ajaban 'an 'awhaynaaa 'ilaa rajulim-minhum 'an 'anzirin-naasa wa bashshiril-lazeena 'aamanooo 'anna lahum qadama şidqin 'inda Rabbihim; qaalal- kaafiroona 'inna haazaa lasaahirum-mubeen.
verses.translation: Kiya logon ke liye yeh ta'ajjub (ki baat) hai kehamne un mein se ek aadmi ki taraf wahi¹ bheji ke aap logon ko daraayein aur un logon ko khushkhabri dein jo eemaan laaye ke beshak unke liye unke rab ke haan sachchaayi ka martabah hai. kaafiron ne kaha: beshak yeh to saaf jaadugar hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Istafhaam inkaar-e-ta'ajjub ke liye hai, jis mein taubeekh ka pahlu bhi shaamil hai ya'ni iss baat par ta'ajjub nahin hona chaahiye ke Allah Ta'ala ne insaanon mein se hi ek aadmi ko wahi-e-risaalat ke liye chun liya, kyun ke unke hum jins hone ki wajah se woh sahih ma'non mein unki rahnumaayi kar sakta hai, agar woh kisi aur jins se hota to farishta ya jin hota, aur donon hi sooraton mein risaalat ka asal maqsad faut ho jaata is liye ke insaan usse maanoos hone ke bajaaye wahshat mahsoos karte. doosre unke liye usko dekhna bhi mumkin na hota. Aur agar hum kisi jin ya farishte ko insaani qaalib mein bhejte to phir wahi e'teraaz aata ke yeh to hamaari tarah ka hi insaan hai. isliye unke iss ta ajjub mein koyi ma'qooliyat nahin hai. mulaahazah farmaayein haashyah (Surah Nisa:4/163)

verses.arabic: اِنَّ رَبَّكُمُ اللّٰهُ الَّذِيْ خَلَقَ السَّمٰوٰتِ وَالْاَرْضَ فِيْ سِتَّةِ اَيَّامٍ ثُمَّ اسْتَوٰى عَلَي الْعَرْشِ يُدَبِّرُ الْاَمْرَ ۗ مَا مِنْ شَفِيْعٍ اِلَّا مِنْۢ بَعْدِ اِذْنِهٖ ۭ ذٰلِكُمُ اللّٰهُ رَبُّكُمْ فَاعْبُدُوْهُ ۭ اَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Inna Rabbakumul- laahul-lazee khalaqas- samaawaati wal'arda fee sittati 'ayyaamin summas-tawaa 'alal- 'Arshi yudabbirul-'amra maa min shafee'in 'illaa mim ba'di 'iznih; zaalikumul-laahu Rabbukum fabudooh; 'afalaa tazakkaroon.
verses.translation: Beshak tumhaara rab woh hai jisne aasmaanon aur zameen ko 6 dinon mein paida kiya, phir woh arsh par mustawi hogaya, wahi har kaam ki tadbeer karta hai. koyi sifaarshi nahin (ban sakta) baghair uske ejaazat ke. yahi Allah hai tumhaara rab, chunaancheh tum usi ki ibaadat karo, phir kiya tum naseehat nahin pakadte?.

verses.arabic: اِلَيْهِ مَرْجِعُكُمْ جَمِيْعًا ۚ وَعْدَ اللّٰهِ حَقًّا ۭ اِنَّهٗ يَبْدَؤُا الْخَلْقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيْدُهٗ لِيَجْزِيَ الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا وَعَمِلُوا الصّٰلِحٰتِ بِالْقِسْطِ ۭ وَالَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا لَهُمْ شَرَابٌ مِّنْ حَمِيْمٍ وَّعَذَابٌ اَلِيْمٌ ۢ بِمَا كَانُوْا يَكْفُرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Ilayhi marji'ukum jamee'aa; wa'dal-laahi haqqaa; 'innahoo yabda'ul-khalqa summa yu'eeduhoo liyajziyal- lazeena 'aamanoo wa 'amiluş-şaalihaati bilqist; wallazeena kafaroo lahum sharaabum-min hameeminw-wa 'azaabun 'aleemum bimaa kaanoo yakfuroon.
verses.translation: Tum sabko usi ki taraf laut kar jaana hai, Allah ka wa'dah sachcha hai, beshak wahi makhlooq ko pahli baar paida karta hai, phir wahi use dobaarah zindah karega taake un logon ko insaaf ke saath badlah de jo eemaan laaye aur jinhon ne nek amal kiye. aur jin logon ne kufr kiya, unke liye khaulta huwa paani aur dardnaak azaab hoga, isliye ke woh kufr karte the.

verses.arabic: هُوَ الَّذِيْ جَعَلَ الشَّمْسَ ضِيَاءً وَّالْقَمَرَ نُوْرًا وَّقَدَّرَهٗ مَنَازِلَ لِتَعْلَمُوْا عَدَدَ السِّنِيْنَ وَالْحِسَابَ ۚ مَا خَلَقَ اللّٰهُ ذٰلِكَ اِلَّا بِالْحَقِّ ۗ يُفَصِّلُ الْاٰيٰتِ لِقَوْمٍ يَّعْلَمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Huwal-lazee ja'alash-shamsa diyaaa'añw- walqamara noorañw-wa qaddarahoo manaazila litaʻlamoo 'adadas- sineena walhisaab; maa khalaqal-laahu zaalika 'illaa bilhaqq; yufaşşilul- 'aayaati liqawminw-ya'lamoon
verses.translation: Wahi hai (Allah) jisne suraj ko chamakne waala banaaya aur chaand ko noor aur uski manzilein muqarrar kin taake tum saalon ki ginti aur hisaab ma'loom kar sako. yeh (sab kuchh) Allah ne haq hi ke saath paida kiya hai. woh apni aayatein tafseel se bayaan karta hai un logon ke liye jo jaante hain.

verses.arabic: اِنَّ فِي اخْتِلَافِ الَّيْلِ وَالنَّهَارِ وَمَا خَلَقَ اللّٰهُ فِي السَّمٰوٰتِ وَالْاَرْضِ لَاٰيٰتٍ لِّقَوْمٍ يَّتَّقُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Inna fikh-tilaafil-layli wannahaari wa maa khalaqal-laahu fis- samaawaati wal'ardi la- 'Aayaatil-liqawminy- yattaqoon.
verses.translation: Beshak raat aur din ke (badal badal kar) aane jaane mein aur jo kuchh Allah ne aasmaanon aur zameen mein paida kiya hai (uss mein bhi), albattah nishaaniyaan hain un logon ke liye jo darte hain.

verses.arabic: اِنَّ الَّذِيْنَ لَا يَرْجُوْنَ لِقَآءَنَا وَرَضُوْا بِالْحَيٰوةِ الدُّنْيَا وَاطْمَاَنُّوْا بِهَا وَالَّذِيْنَ هُمْ عَنْ اٰيٰتِنَا غٰفِلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Innal-lazeena laa yarjoona liqaaa'anaa wa radoo bilhayaatid- dunyaa watma'annoo bihaa wallazeena hum 'an 'Aayaatinaa ghaafiloon.
verses.translation: Beshak woh log jo hamaari mulaaqaat ki ummeed nahin rakhte, aur duniya ki zindagi par raazi aur usi par muttma'in hain, aur woh log jo hamaari nishaaniyon se ghaafil hain.

verses.arabic: اُولٰٓىٕكَ مَاْوٰىهُمُ النَّارُ بِمَا كَانُوْا يَكْسِبُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Ulaaa'ika ma'waahumun-Naaru bimaa kaanoo yaksiboon.
verses.translation: Wahi hain jinka thhikaana dozakh hai un amalon ki wajah se jo woh kamaate the.

verses.arabic: اِنَّ الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا وَعَمِلُوا الصّٰلِحٰتِ يَهْدِيْهِمْ رَبُّهُمْ بِاِيْمَانِهِمْ ۖ تَجْرِيْ مِنْ تَحْتِهِمُ الْاَنْهٰرُ فِيْ جَنّٰتِ النَّعِيْمِ
verses.transliteration: 'Innal-lazeena 'aamanoo wa 'amilus- şaalihaati yahdeehim Rabbuhum bi'eemaanihim tajree min tahtihimul-'anhaaru fee jannaatin-Na'eem.
verses.translation: Beshak jo log eemaan laaye aur unhon ne nek amal kiye, unka rab unke eemaan ki wajah se unhein (jannat ke baaghon ki) raah dikhaayega, jin ke neeche nahrein bahti hongi ne'maton waale baaghaat mein

verses.arabic: دَعْوٰىهُمْ فِيْهَا سُبْحٰنَكَ اللّٰهُمَّ وَتَحِيَّتُهُمْ فِيْهَا سَلٰمٌ ۚ وَاٰخِرُ دَعْوٰىهُمْ اَنِ الْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ رَبِّ الْعٰلَمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Da'waahum feehaa Subhaanakal-laahumma wa tahiyyatuhum feehaa salaam; wa 'aakhiru da'waahum 'anil-hamdu lillaahi Rabbil-'aalameen.
verses.translation: Uss (jannat) mein unki pukaar hogi: Aye Allah! tu paak hai¹ aur uss mein unki 0 du'a hogi: salaam. aur unki aakhiri pukaar yeh hogi ke tamaam ta'reefein Allah Rabbul Aalimeen hi ke liye hain.
verses.deepMeaning: Ya'ni ahl-e-jannat Allah ki Hamd-o-tasbeeh mein har waqt rutbullisaan rahenge. Jis tarah hadees mein aata hai ke 'Ahl-e-jannat ki zabaanon par tasbeeh-o-tahmeed ka iss tarah ilhaam hoga jis tarah saans ilhaam kiya jaata hai.' (Sahih Muslim, Al-jannah, Hadees:2835)

verses.arabic: وَلَوْ يُعَجِّلُ اللّٰهُ لِلنَّاسِ الشَّرَّ اسْتِعْجَالَهُمْ بِالْخَيْرِ لَقُضِيَ اِلَيْهِمْ اَجَلُهُمْ ۚ فَنَذَرُ الَّذِيْنَ لَا يَرْجُوْنَ لِقَآءَنَا فِيْ طُغْيَانِهِمْ يَعْمَهُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa law yu'ajjilul- laahu linnaasish- sharras-ti jaalahum bilkhayri laqudiya 'ilayhim 'ajaluhum fanazarul-lazeena laa yarjoona liqaaa'anaa fee tughyaanihim ya'mahoon.
verses.translation: Aur agar Allah logon ko buraayi pahunchaane mein jaldi karta jaise woh bhalaayi maangne mein jaldi karte hain to unki mi'aad puri ho chuki hoti, chunaancheh hum un logon ko jo hamaari mulaaqaat ki ummeed nahin rakhte, chhod dete hain ke woh apni sar kashi mein bahakte rahein.

verses.arabic: وَاِذَا مَسَّ الْاِنْسَانَ الضُّرُّ دَعَانَا لِجَنْبِهٖٓ اَوْ قَاعِدًا اَوْ قَآىٕمًا ۚ فَلَمَّا كَشَفْنَا عَنْهُ ضُرَّهٗ مَرَّ كَاَنْ لَمْ يَدْعُنَآ اِلٰى ضُرٍّ مَسَّهٗ ۚ كَذٰلِكَ زُيِّنَ لِلْمُسْرِفِيْنَ مَا كَانُوْا يَعْمَلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'izaa massal- 'insaanad-durru da'aanaa lijambiheee 'aw qaa'idan 'aw qaaa'iman falammaa kashafnaa 'anhu durrahoo marra ka'al- lam yad'unaaa 'ilaa durrim-massah; kazaalika zuyyina lilmusrifeena maa kaanoo ya maloon.
verses.translation: Aur jab insaan ko takleef pahunchti hai to woh humein pukaarta hai, woh humein apne pahlu par (lete) ya baithhe ya khade huye, phir jab ham uski takleef door kar dete hain to woh (yun) guzar jaata hai jaise usne khud ko takleef pahunchne par humein pukaara hi na tha, isi tarah musrifeen¹ ke liye unke (bure) amal purkashish bana diye gaye.
verses.deepMeaning: (Al-Musrifeen) woh log jo Allah aur uske Rasoolon ko jhutlaate hain aur har tarah ke jaraayem aur gunaahon ka irtekaab karke Allah Ta'ala ki hudood se tajaawuz karte hain.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ اَهْلَكْنَا الْقُرُوْنَ مِنْ قَبْلِكُمْ لَمَّا ظَلَمُوْا وَجَآءَتْهُمْ رُسُلُهُمْ بِالْبَيِّنٰتِ وَمَا كَانُوْا لِيُؤْمِنُوْا ۭ كَذٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْقَوْمَ الْمُجْرِمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad 'ahlaknal- quroona min qablikum lammaa zalamoo wa jaaa'athum Rusuluhum bilbayyinaati wa maa kaanoo liyu'minoo; kazaalika najzil-qawmal- mujrimeen.
verses.translation: Aur albattah hum un ummaton ko halaak kar chuke hain jo tumse pahle guzrin, jab unhon ne zulm kiya, aur unke paas unke rasool waazeh daleelon ke saath aaye, aur woh aise na the ke eemaan laate. mujrim logon ko hum isi tarah saza dete hain.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ جَعَلْنٰكُمْ خَلٰٓىٕفَ فِي الْاَرْضِ مِنْۢ بَعْدِهِمْ لِنَنْظُرَ كَيْفَ تَعْمَلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Summa ja'alnaakum khalaaa'ifa fil-'ardi mim ba'dihim linanzura kayfa ta'maloon.
verses.translation: Phir unke ba'd hamne tumhein zameen mein jaanasheen banaaya taake hum dekhein ke tum kaise amal karte ho.

verses.arabic: وَاِذَا تُتْلٰى عَلَيْهِمْ اٰيٰتُنَا بَيِّنٰتٍ ۙ قَالَ الَّذِيْنَ لَا يَرْجُوْنَ لِقَآءَنَا ائْتِ بِقُرْاٰنٍ غَيْرِ هٰذَآ اَوْ بَدِّلْهُ ۭ قُلْ مَا يَكُوْنُ لِيْٓ اَنْ اُبَدِّلَهٗ مِنْ تِلْقَاۗئِ نَفْسِيْ ۭ اِنْ اَتَّبِعُ اِلَّا مَا يُوْحٰٓى اِلَيَّ ۚ اِنِّيْٓ اَخَافُ اِنْ عَصَيْتُ رَبِّيْ عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيْمٍ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'izaa tutlaa 'alayhim 'aayaatunaa bayyinaatin qaalal- lazeena laa yarjoona liqaaa'ana'ti bi-Qur'aanin ghayri haazaaa 'aw baddilh; qul maa yakoonu leee 'an 'ubaddilahoo min tilqaaa'i nafsee 'in 'attabi'u 'illaa maa yoohaaa ilayya 'inneee 'akhaafu 'in 'aşaytu Rabbee 'azaaba Yawmin 'Azeeem.
verses.translation: Aur jab un par hamaari waazeh aayatein tilaawat ki jaati hain, to woh log jo hamaari mulaaqaat ki ummeed nahin rakhte, kahte hain: tu iske elaawah koyi (aur) qur'an le aa, ya use (kuchh) badal de. kah deejiye: mujhe ikhtiyaar nahin ke main ise apni taraf se badal dun. main to usi cheez ki pairwi karta hoon jo meri taraf wahi ki jaati hai, beshak agar main apne rab ki naafarmaani karun to mujhe (sakht) din ke azaab se dar lagta hai.

verses.arabic: قُلْ لَّوْ شَآءَ اللّٰهُ مَا تَلَوْتُهٗ عَلَيْكُمْ وَلَآ اَدْرٰىكُمْ بِهٖ ۖ فَقَدْ لَبِثْتُ فِيْكُمْ عُمُرًا مِّنْ قَبْلِهٖ ۚ اَفَلَا تَعْقِلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qullaw shaaa'al- laahu maa talawtuhoo 'alaykum wa laaa 'adraakum bihee faqad labistu feekum 'umuram- min qablih; 'afalaa ta'qiloon.
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: agar Allah chaahta to main iss (qur'an) ki tum.par tilaawat na karta aur na Allah tumhein iski khabar deta. phir main ne (nubuwat se pahle) tumhaare andar ek umr guzaari hai, to kiya tum aql nahin rakhte?.

verses.arabic: فَمَنْ اَظْلَمُ مِمَّنِ افْتَرٰى عَلَي اللّٰهِ كَذِبًا اَوْ كَذَّبَ بِاٰيٰتِهٖ ۭ اِنَّهٗ لَا يُفْلِحُ الْمُجْرِمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Faman 'azlamu mimmanif-taraa 'alal- laahi kaziban 'aw kazzaba bi-'Aayaatih; 'innahoo laa yuflihul- mujrimoon.
verses.translation: Phir uss shakhs se ziyaadah zaalim kaun hai jisne Allah par jhoot gadh liya ya uski aayaton ko jhutlaaya? beshak mujrim falah nahin paate.

verses.arabic: وَيَعْبُدُوْنَ مِنْ دُوْنِ اللّٰهِ مَا لَا يَضُرُّهُمْ وَلَا يَنْفَعُهُمْ وَيَقُوْلُوْنَ هٰٓؤُلَاۗءِ شُفَعَاۗؤُنَا عِنْدَ اللّٰهِ ۭ قُلْ اَتُنَبِّــُٔوْنَ اللّٰهَ بِمَا لَا يَعْلَمُ فِي السَّمٰوٰتِ وَلَا فِي الْاَرْضِ ۭ سُبْحٰنَهٗ وَتَعٰلٰى عَمَّا يُشْرِكُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa ya'budoona min doonil-laahi maa laa yadurruhum wa laa yanfa'uhum wa yaqooloona haaa 'ulaaa'i shufa'aaa'unaa 'indal- laah; qul 'atunabbi'oonal- laaha bima laa yalamu fis-samaawaati wa laa fil- 'ard; subhaanahoo wa Ta'aalaa 'ammaa yushrikoon.
verses.translation: Aur woh Allah ke siwa aisi cheezon ki ibaadat karte hain jo unhein na nuqsaan deti hain aur na nafa' deti hain, aur woh kahte hain: yeh Allah ke haan hamaare sifaarishi hain. kah deejiye: kiya tum Allah ko uss cheez ki khabar dete jise woh aasmaanon mein nahin jaanta aur na zameen mein? woh paak aur baland hai unse jin ko woh shareek thhahraate hain.

verses.arabic: وَمَا كَانَ النَّاسُ اِلَّآ اُمَّةً وَّاحِدَةً فَاخْتَلَفُوْا ۚ وَلَوْلَا كَلِمَةٌ سَبَقَتْ مِنْ رَّبِّكَ لَقُضِيَ بَيْنَهُمْ فِيْمَا فِيْهِ يَخْتَلِفُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maa kaanan- naasu 'illaaa 'ummatanw-waahidatan fakhtalafoo; wa law laa kalimatun sabaqat mir- Rabbika laqudiya baynahum feemaa feehi yakhtalifoon.
verses.translation: Aur pahle log ek hi ummat the¹ phir unhon ne (baahum) ikhtilaaf kiya, aur agar na hoti ek baat jo aapke rab ki taraf se pahle se tai ho chuki hai to un mein USS cheez ke muta'alliq yaqeenan faislah kar diya jaata jis mein woh ikhtilaaf kar rahein hain.
verses.deepMeaning: Har shakhs hidaayat (fitrat) par paida hota hai goya sab ek hi ummat hain jaise hadees mein hai, Rasoolullah ﷺ ne farmaaya: 'har bachcha fitrat (islam ke aqeeda-e-tauheed ya'ni sirf ek Allah ki ibaadat waale aqeedah) par paida hota hai phir uske waaledain use yahoodi, nasraani ya majoosi bana dete hain jaise ek jaanwar ek sahih saalim bachcha janam deta hai, kiya tum use kaan kata huwa paate ho?'' (Al-Bukhari, Al-janaayez, Baab:92, Hadees:1385)

verses.arabic: وَيَقُوْلُوْنَ لَوْلَآ اُنْزِلَ عَلَيْهِ اٰيَةٌ مِّنْ رَّبِّهٖ ۭ فَقُلْ اِنَّمَا الْغَيْبُ لِلّٰهِ فَانْتَظِرُوْٓا اِنِّيْ مَعَكُمْ مِّنَ الْمُنْتَظِرِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa yaqooloona law laaa 'unzila 'alayhi 'Aayatum-mir-Rabbihee faqul 'innamal-ghaybu lillaahi fantaziroo 'innee ma'akum minal- muntazireen.
verses.translation: Aur woh kahte hain: uss par uski rab ki taraf se koyi nishaani kyun nahin naazil ki gayi? to aap kah deejiye: yaqeenan ghaib to Allah hi ke liye hai, to phir tum intizaar karo beshak main (bhi) tumhaare saath intizaar karne waalon mein se hoon.

verses.arabic: وَاِذَآ اَذَقْنَا النَّاسَ رَحْمَةً مِّنْۢ بَعْدِ ضَرَّاۗءَ مَسَّتْهُمْ اِذَا لَهُمْ مَّكْرٌ فِيْٓ اٰيٰتِنَا ۭ قُلِ اللّٰهُ اَسْرَعُ مَكْرًا ۭ اِنَّ رُسُلَنَا يَكْتُبُوْنَ مَا تَمْكُرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'izaaa 'azaqnan- naasa rahmatam-mim ba'di darraaa'a massathum 'izaa lahum makrun feee 'Aayaatinaa; qulil-laahu 'asra'u makraa; 'inna rusulanaa yaktuboona maa tamkuroon.
verses.translation: Aur jab hum un (kaafir) logon ko takleef pahunchne ke ba'd (apni) rahmat ka mazah chakhaate hain to woh fauran hi hamaari aayaton mein chaal baaziyaan karte hain, kah deejiye: Allah sabse tez tar hai chaal chalne mein. beshak hamaare farishte likhte jaate hain jo tum chaal baaziyaan karte ho.

verses.arabic: هُوَ الَّذِيْ يُسَيِّرُكُمْ فِي الْبَرِّ وَالْبَحْرِ ۚ حَتّٰىٓ اِذَا كُنْتُمْ فِي الْفُلْكِ وَجَرَيْنَ بِهِمْ بِرِيْحٍ طَيِّبَةٍ وَّفَرِحُوْا بِهَا جَاۗءَتْهَا رِيْحٌ عَاصِفٌ وَّجَاۗءَهُمُ الْمَوْجُ مِنْ كُلِّ مَكَانٍ وَّظَنُّوْٓا اَنَّهُمْ اُحِيْطَ بِهِمْ دَعَوُا اللّٰهَ مُخْلِصِيْنَ لَهُ الدِّيْنَ لَىٕنْ اَنْجَيْتَنَا مِنْ هٰذِهٖ لَنَكُوْنَنَّ مِنَ الشّٰكِرِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Huwal-lazee yusayyirukum fil-barri walbahri hattaaa 'izaa kuntum fil-fulki wa jarayna bihim bireeh'in tayyibatinw- wa farihoo bihaa jaaa'athaa reehun 'aaşifunw-wa jaaa'ahumul-mawju min kulli makaaninw-wa zannooo 'annahum 'uheeta bihim da'awul- laaha mukhlişeena lahud- deena la'in'anjaytanaa min haazihee lanakoonannaa minash- shaakireen.
verses.translation: Wahi hai (Allah) jo tumhein khushki aur tari mein chalaata hai hatta ke jab tum kashtiyon mein hote ho, to achaanak un (kashtyon) par tufaani hawa aa pahunchti hai aur lahrein un par har taraf se umad aati hain aur woh khayaal karte hain ke beshak woh (tufaan mein) ghir gaye hain to uss waqt khaalis Allah ki ibaadat karte huye use paakarte hain ke agar toone hamein iss (tufaan) se najaat di to hum zaroor shukr guzaar ho jaayeinge¹
verses.deepMeaning: Ya'ni phir woh dua' mein ghairullah ki milaawat nahin karte jis tarah aam haalaat mein karte hain, jab shadaayed mein ghar jaate hain to saare shaytaani falsafe bhool jaate hain aur sirf Allah hi yaad rah jaata hai mazeed dekhein haashyah (Surah Bani Israyeel:17/67)

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّآ اَنْجٰىهُمْ اِذَا هُمْ يَبْغُوْنَ فِي الْاَرْضِ بِغَيْرِ الْحَقِّ ۭ يٰٓاَيُّهَا النَّاسُ اِنَّمَا بَغْيُكُمْ عَلٰٓي اَنْفُسِكُمْ ۚ مَتَاعَ الْحَيٰوةِ الدُّنْيَا ۚ ثُمَّ اِلَيْنَا مَرْجِعُكُمْ فَنُنَبِّئُكُمْ بِمَا كُنْتُمْ تَعْمَلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Falammaaa 'anjaahum 'izaa hum yabghoona fil- 'ardi bighayril-haqq; yaaa 'ayyuhan-naasu 'innamaa baghyukum 'alaaa 'anfusikum-mataa'al- hayaatid-dunyaa summa 'ilaynaa marji'ukum fanunabbi'ukum bimaa kuntum ta'maloon.
verses.translation: Phir jab uss (Allah) ne unhein najaat de di to woh fauran hi zameen mein naahaq sarkashi karne lagte hain. aye logo! tumhaari sarkashi (ka wabaal) tumhaari apni hi jaanon par hai, tum duniya ki zindagi ka faaidah (uthhaalo), phir tumhein hamaari hi taraf lautna hai, phir hum tumhein bataayenge jo amal tum kiya karte the.

verses.arabic: اِنَّمَا مَثَلُ الْحَيٰوةِ الدُّنْيَا كَمَآءٍ اَنْزَلْنٰهُ مِنَ السَّمَاۗءِ فَاخْتَلَطَ بِهٖ نَبَاتُ الْاَرْضِ مِمَّا يَاْكُلُ النَّاسُ وَالْاَنْعَامُ ۭ حَتّٰىٓ اِذَآ اَخَذَتِ الْاَرْضُ زُخْرُفَهَا وَازَّيَّنَتْ وَظَنَّ اَهْلُهَآ اَنَّهُمْ قٰدِرُوْنَ عَلَيْهَآ اَتٰىهَآ اَمْرُنَا لَيْلًا اَوْ نَهَارًا فَجَعَلْنٰهَا حَصِيْدًا كَاَنْ لَّمْ تَغْنَ بِالْاَمْسِ ۭ كَذٰلِكَ نُفَصِّلُ الْاٰيٰتِ لِقَوْمٍ يَّتَفَكَّرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Innamaa masalul- hayaatid-dunyaa kamaaa'in 'anzalnaahu minas-samaaa'i fakhtalata bihee nabaatul- 'ardi mimmaa ya'kulun- naasu wal'an'aam; hattaaa 'izaaa 'akhazatil- 'ardu zukhrufahaa wazzayyanat wa zanna 'ahluhaaa 'annahum qaadiroona 'alayhaaa 'ataahaaa 'amrunaa laylan 'aw nahaaran faja alnaahaa haseedan ka'al-lam taghna bil'ams; kazaalika nufaşşilul- 'Aayaati liqawminy- yatafakkaroon.
verses.translation: Beshak duniya ki zindagi ki misaal to baarish ki si hai jo humne aasmaan se barsaayi, phir uske saath zameen ki nabaataat mil kar nikli jiss mein se insaan aur chaupaaye khaate hain hatta ke jab zameen ne apni raunaq pakadli aur lahlaha uthh aur zameen waalon ne samjha ke beshak wo iss (fasal kaatne) par qaadir hain to hamaara hukm ('azaab) raat ya din ko (achaanak) aagaya, chunaancheh humne use kati huyi kheti ki tarah kar diya goya kal woh thi hi nahin, isi tarah hum apni aayatein khol kar bayaan karte hain un logon ke liye jo ghaur-o-fikr karte hain.

verses.arabic: وَاللّٰهُ يَدْعُوْٓا اِلٰى دَارِ السَّلٰمِ وَيَهْدِيْ مَنْ يَّشَاۗءُ اِلٰى صِرَاطٍ مُّسْتَقِيْمٍ
verses.transliteration: Wallaahu yad'ooo 'ilaa daaris-salaami wa yahdee mañy-yashaaa'u 'ilaa Şiraatim-Mustaqeem.
verses.translation: Aur Allah salaamti ke ghar (jannat) ki taraf bulaata hai, aur woh jise chaahta hai siraat-e-mustaqeem ki hidaayat deta hai.

verses.arabic: لِلَّذِيْنَ اَحْسَنُوا الْحُسْنٰى وَزِيَادَةٌ ۚ وَلَا يَرْهَقُ وُجُوْهَهُمْ قَتَرٌ وَّلَا ذِلَّةٌ ۭ اُولٰٓىٕكَ اَصْحٰبُ الْجَنَّةِ ۚ هُمْ فِيْهَا خٰلِدُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Lillazeena 'ahsanul- husnaa wa ziyaadah; wa laa yarhaqu wujoohahum qataruñw- wa laa zillah; 'ulaaa'ika 'aşhaabul-jannati hum feehaa khaalidoon
verses.translation: Jin logon ne nek kaam kiye unke liye bhalaayi hai aur mazeed (deedaare ilaahi) hai, aur unke chehron ko siyaahi aur zillat nahin dhaanpegi, yahi log jannati hain, woh uss mein hameshah rahenge.

verses.arabic: وَالَّذِيْنَ كَسَبُوا السَّيِّاٰتِ جَزَاۗءُ سَيِّئَةٍۢ بِمِثْلِهَا وَتَرْهَقُهُمْ ذِلَّةٌ ۭ مَا لَهُمْ مِّنَ اللّٰهِ مِنْ عَاصِمٍ ۙ كَاَنَّمَآ اُغْشِيَتْ وُجُوْهُهُمْ قِطَعًا مِّنَ الَّيْلِ مُظْلِمًا ۭ اُولٰٓىٕكَ اَصْحٰبُ النَّارِ ۚ هُمْ فِيْهَا خٰلِدُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena kasabus- sayyi'aati jazaaa'u sayyi'atim bimislihaa wa tarhaquhum zillah; maa lahum minal-laahi min 'aaşimin ka'annamaaa 'ughshiyat wujoohuhum qita'am-minal-layli muzlimaa; 'ulaaa'ika 'Ashaabun-Naari hum feeha khaalidoon.
verses.translation: Aur jin logon ne bure kaam kiye to buraayi ka badlah uss (buraayi) ke baraabar hi hai, aur unko zillat dhaanp legi. koyi unhein Allah (ke azaab) se bachaane waala nahin hoga, yun lage ga ke unke chehron par taareek raat ke tukde udhaa diye gaye hain, wahi dozakhi hain, woh uss mein hameshah rahenge.

verses.arabic: وَيَوْمَ نَحْشُرُهُمْ جَمِيْعًا ثُمَّ نَقُوْلُ لِلَّذِيْنَ اَشْرَكُوْٓا مَكَانَكُمْ اَنْتُمْ وَشُرَكَآؤُكُمْ ۚ فَزَيَّلْنَا بَيْنَهُمْ وَقَالَ شُرَكَآؤُهُمْ مَاكُنْتُمْ اِيَّانَا تَعْبُدُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa yawma nahshuruhum jamee'an summa naqoolu lillazeena 'ashrakoo makaanakum 'antum wa shurakaaa'ukum; fazayyalnaa baynahum wa qaala shurakaaa'uhum maa kuntum 'iyyaanaa ta'budoon.
verses.translation: Aur jis din hum un sab ko jama' karenge, phir hum un logon se jinhon ne shirk kiya, kahenge: tum aur tumhaare shareek apni apni jagah thhahre raho, phir hum unke darmiyaan judaayi daal denge,¹ aur unke shareek kahenge: tum hamaari ibaadat to karte hi na the.
verses.deepMeaning: Ya'ni dunya mein unke darmiyaan aapas mein jo khusoosi ta'alluq tha, woh khatm kar diya jaayega aur yeh ek doosre ke dushman ban jaayenge aur unke ma'boodeen iss baat ka hi inkaar karenge ke yeh log unki ibaadat karte the, unko madad ke liye pukaarte the, unke naam ki nazr-o- niyaaz dete the.

verses.arabic: فَكَفٰى بِاللّٰهِ شَهِيْدًۢا بَيْنَنَا وَبَيْنَكُمْ ۙ اِنْ كُنَّا عَنْ عِبَادَتِكُمْ لَغٰفِلِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Fakafaa billaahi shaheedam baynanaa wa baynakum 'in kunnaa 'an- 'ibaadatikum laghaafileen.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh hamaare aur tumhaare darmiyaan Allah kaafi gawaah hai, beshak hum tumhaari ibaadat se bilkul ghaafil the.

verses.arabic: هُنَالِكَ تَبْلُوْا كُلُّ نَفْسٍ مَّآ اَسْلَفَتْ وَرُدُّوْٓا اِلَى اللّٰهِ مَوْلٰىهُمُ الْحَقِّ وَضَلَّ عَنْهُمْ مَّا كَانُوْا يَفْتَرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Hunaalika tabloo kullu nafsim-maaa 'aslafat; wa ruddooo 'ilal-laahi mawlaahumul- haqqi wa dalla 'anhum maa kaanoo yaftaroon.
verses.translation: Wahaan har shakhs jaanch lega jo kuchh usne pahle (duniya) mein kiya tha, aur Allah ki taraf lautaaye jaayenge jo unka haqeeqi maalik hai, aur woh sab kuchh unse jaata rahega woh jhoot gadha karte the.

verses.arabic: قُلْ مَنْ يَّرْزُقُكُمْ مِّنَ السَّمَاۗءِ وَالْاَرْضِ اَمَّنْ يَّمْلِكُ السَّمْعَ وَالْاَبْصَارَ وَمَنْ يُّخْرِجُ الْحَيَّ مِنَ الْمَيِّتِ وَيُخْرِجُ الْمَيِّتَ مِنَ الْحَيِّ وَمَنْ يُّدَبِّرُ الْاَمْرَ ۭ فَسَيَقُوْلُوْنَ اللّٰهُ فَقُلْ اَفَلَا تَتَّقُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qul many- yarzuqukum minas- samaaa'i wal'ardi 'ammany-yamlikus- sam'a wal'abşaara wa many-yukhrijul-hayya minal-mayyiti wa yukhrijul-mayyita minal- hayyi wa mañy- yudabbirul-'amr; fasayaqooloonal-laah; faqul 'afalaa tattaqoon.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) kah deejiye: tumhein aasmaan aur zameen mein se kaun rizq deta hai? ya kaanon ya aankhon ka maalik kaun hai? aur kaun zindah ko murdah se nikaalta hai aur murdah ko zindah senikaalta hai? aur kaun (duniya) ke kaamon ka intizaam karta hai? to woh (kaafir) zaroor kahenge: Allah! to kah deejiye: kiya phir tum (Allah se) darte nahin?

verses.arabic: فَذٰلِكُمُ اللّٰهُ رَبُّكُمُ الْحَقُّ ۚ فَمَاذَا بَعْدَ الْحَقِّ اِلَّا الضَّلٰلُ ۚ فَاَنّٰى تُصْرَفُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Fazaalikumul-laahu Rabbukumul-haqq; famaazaa ba'dal-haqqi 'illad-dalaalu fa'annaa tuşrafoon.
verses.translation: Yahi to hai Allah, tumhaara rab sachcha, phir haq ke ba'd gumraahi ke siwa kiya hai? phir tum kidhar phere jaato ho?.

verses.arabic: كَذٰلِكَ حَقَّتْ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ عَلَي الَّذِيْنَ فَسَقُوْٓا اَنَّهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Kazaalika haqqat Kalimatu Rabbika 'alal- lazeena fasaqooo 'annahum laa yu'minoon.
verses.translation: Isi tarah aapke rab ka kalmah unke logon ke baare mein saabit ho kar raha jinhon ne ne naafarmaani ki ke beshak woh eemaan nahin laayenge.

verses.arabic: قُلْ هَلْ مِنْ شُرَكَاۗىِٕكُمْ مَّنْ يَّبْدَؤُا الْخَلْقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيْدُهٗ ۭ قُلِ اللّٰهُ يَبْدَؤُا الْخَلْقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيْدُهٗ فَاَنّٰى تُؤْفَكُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qul hal min shurakaaa'ikum mañy- yabda'ul-khalqa summa yu'eeduh; qulil-laahu yabda'ul-khalqa summa yu'eeduhoo fa'annaa tu'fakoon.
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: kiya tumhaare (banaawati) shareekon mein se koyi hai to pahli baar makhlooq ko paida kare, phir use dobaarah paidah karde? kah deejiye: Allah hi pahli baar makhlooq ko paida karta hai, phir wahi dobaarah bhi paida karega, lihaaza tum kahaan bahkaaye jaate ho?.

verses.arabic: قُلْ هَلْ مِنْ شُرَكَاۗىِٕكُمْ مَّنْ يَّهْدِيْٓ اِلَي الْحَقِّ ۭ قُلِ اللّٰهُ يَهْدِيْ لِلْحَقِّ ۭ اَفَمَنْ يَّهْدِيْٓ اِلَي الْحَقِّ اَحَقُّ اَنْ يُّتَّبَعَ اَمَّنْ لَّا يَهِدِّيْٓ اِلَّآ اَنْ يُهْدٰي ۭ فَمَا لَكُمْ كَيْفَ تَحْكُمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qul hal min shurakaaa'ikum mañy- yahdeee 'ilal-haqq; qulil- laahu yahdee lilhaqq; 'afamany-yahdeee 'ilal- haqqi 'ahaqqu 'any- yuttaba'a 'ammal-laa yahiddeee 'illaaa 'any- yuhdaa famaa lakum kayfa tahkumoon
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: kiya tumhaare shareekon mein se koyi hai jo haq ki taraf hidaayat deta ho? kah deejiye: Allah hi haq ki hidaayat deta hai. phir kiya jo haq ki taraf hidaayat deta hai, woh iss baat ka ziyaadah haqdaar hai ke uski pairwi ki jaaye ya woh (haqdaar) hai jo khud hidaayat yaaftah nahin magar yeh ke use (haq ki) hidaayat di jaaye, chunancheh tumhein kiya huwa tum kaise faisle karte ho?

verses.arabic: وَمَا يَتَّبِعُ اَكْثَرُهُمْ اِلَّا ظَنًّا ۚ اِنَّ الظَّنَّ لَا يُغْنِيْ مِنَ الْحَقِّ شَـيْـــًٔا ۭ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ عَلِيْمٌ ۢ بِمَا يَفْعَلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maa yattabi'u 'aksaruhum 'illaa zannaa; 'innaz-zanna laa yughnee minal-haqqi shay'aa; 'innal-laaha 'Aleemum bimaa yaf aloon.
verses.translation: Aur un (kaafiron) mein se aksar gumaan hi ki pairwi karte hain. beshak gumaan haq ke muqaable mein kuchh bhi faaidah nahin deta. beshak Allah khoob jaanne waala hai jo kuchh woh kar rahe hain.

verses.arabic: وَمَا كَانَ هٰذَا الْقُرْاٰنُ اَنْ يُّفْتَرٰي مِنْ دُوْنِ اللّٰهِ وَلٰكِنْ تَصْدِيْقَ الَّذِيْ بَيْنَ يَدَيْهِ وَتَفْصِيْلَ الْكِتٰبِ لَا رَيْبَ فِيْهِ مِنْ رَّبِّ الْعٰلَمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maa kaana haazal-Qur'aanu 'any- yuftaraa min doonil-laahi wa laakin taşdeeqal- lazee bayna yadayhi wa tafseelal-Kitaabi laa rayba feehi mir-Rabbil- 'aalameen.
verses.translation: Aur yeh qur'an (aisa) nahin ke ghairullah ki taraf se gadh liya gaya ho balke yeh to un kitabon ki tasdeeq karta hai jo isse hle ki hain aur un tamaam pahle kitabon ki tafseel (bayaan karta) hai, iss mein koyi shak nahin, (yeh) Rabbul Aalameen ki taraf se hai.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Ya'ni yeh qur'an kareem, ek hadees mein Nabi ﷺ ne iss qur'an ko apna sab se ahum mo'jezah qaraar diya jaise farmaya: 'har Nabi ko aise aise mo'jazaat ataa kiye gaye jinki wajah se logon ko eemaan naseeb huwa. Ya khilqat eemaan laayi. Aur mujhe jo (mo'jazah) ataa kiya gaya hai wahi ilaahi hai jo Allah ne mujh par naazil ki hai, chunaancheh mujhe ummeed hai ke qiyaamat ke roz mere pair-o-kaar sab se ziyaadah honge.' (Sahih Bukhari, Al-e'tesaam bil-kitab wassunah, Baab:1 Hadees:7274)

verses.arabic: اَمْ يَقُوْلُوْنَ افْتَرٰىهُ ۭ قُلْ فَاْتُوْا بِسُوْرَةٍ مِّثْلِهٖ وَادْعُوْا مَنِ اسْتَطَعْتُمْ مِّنْ دُوْنِ اللّٰهِ اِنْ كُنْتُمْ صٰدِقِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Am yaqooloonaf- taraahu qul fa'too bisooratim-mislihee wad'oo manis-tata'tum min doonil-laahi 'in kuntum şaadiqeen.
verses.translation: Kiya woh (kaafir) kahte hain ke iss (Rasool) ne ise gadh liya hai (Aye Nabi!) kah deejiye: to tum iss jaisi ek hi surat le aao aur (iss mein madad ke liye) Allah ke siwa jin ko bula sakte ho bulaalo, agar tum sachche ho?.

verses.arabic: بَلْ كَذَّبُوْا بِمَا لَمْ يُحِيْطُوْا بِعِلْمِهٖ وَلَمَّا يَاْتِهِمْ تَاْوِيْلُهٗ ۭ كَذٰلِكَ كَذَّبَ الَّذِيْنَ مِنْ قَبْلِهِمْ ۚ فَانْظُرْ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَاقِبَةُ الظّٰلِمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Bal kazzaboo bimaa lam yuheetoo bi'ilmihee wa lammaa ya'tihim ta'weeluh; kazaalika kazzabal-lazeena min qablihim fanzur kayfa kaana 'aaqibatuz- zaalimeen.
verses.translation: Balke unhon ne aisi cheez ko jhutlaaya jis ka apne ilm se woh ehaatah na kar sake aur abhi tak uski haqeeqat bhi un par nahin khuli thi, isi tarah un logon ne jhutlaaya tha jo inse pahle the, phir dekhiye zaalimon ka anjaam kaisa huwa!.

verses.arabic: وَمِنْهُمْ مَّنْ يُّؤْمِنُ بِهٖ وَمِنْهُمْ مَّنْ لَّا يُؤْمِنُ بِهٖ ۭ وَرَبُّكَ اَعْلَمُ بِالْمُفْسِدِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa minhum mañy- yu'minu bihee wa minhum mal-laa yu'minu bih; wa Rabbuka 'a'lamu bilmufsideen.
verses.translation: Aur un mein se ba'z woh hain jo iss (qur'an) par eemaan laate hain aur in mein se ba'z woh hain jo iss par eemaan nahin laate. aur aapka rab un fasaad karne waalon ko khoob jaanta hai.

verses.arabic: وَاِنْ كَذَّبُوْكَ فَقُلْ لِيْ عَمَلِيْ وَلَكُمْ عَمَلُكُمْ ۚ اَنْتُمْ بَرِيْۗـُٔوْنَ مِمَّآ اَعْمَلُ وَاَنَا بَرِيْۗءٌ مِّمَّا تَعْمَلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'in kazzabooka faqullee 'amalee wa lakum 'amalukum 'antum bareee'oona mimmaaa 'a'malu wa 'ana bareee'um-mimmaa ta'maloon.
verses.translation: Aur agar woh aapko jhutlaayen to kah deejiye: mere liye mera amal hai aur tumhaare liye tumhaara amal. tum usse bari ho jo main amal karta hoon aur main usse bari hoon jo tum amal karte ho.

verses.arabic: وَمِنْهُمْ مَّنْ يَّسْتَمِعُوْنَ اِلَيْكَ ۭ اَفَاَنْتَ تُسْمِعُ الصُّمَّ وَلَوْ كَانُوْا لَا يَعْقِلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa minhum mañy- yastami'oona 'ilayk; 'afa'anta tusmi'uş- summa wa law kaanoo laa ya'qiloon.
verses.translation: Aur un mein se ba'z woh hain jo aapki taraf kaan lagaate hain, phir kiya aap bahron ko suna sakte hain agarcheh woh aql na rakhte hon?.

verses.arabic: وَمِنْهُمْ مَّنْ يَّنْظُرُ اِلَيْكَ ۭ اَفَاَنْتَ تَهْدِي الْعُمْيَ وَلَوْ كَانُوْا لَا يُبْصِرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa minhum mañy- yanzuru 'ilayk; 'afa'anta tahdil-'umya wa law kaanoo laa yubşiroon.
verses.translation: Aur un mein se ba'z woh hain jo aapki taraf dekhte hain, phir kiya aap andhon ko raah dikha sakte hain agarcheh woh na dekhte hon?.

verses.arabic: اِنَّ اللّٰهَ لَا يَظْلِمُ النَّاسَ شَيْـًٔا وَّلٰكِنَّ النَّاسَ اَنْفُسَهُمْ يَظْلِمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Innal-laaha laa yazlimun-naasa shay'añw- wa laakinnan-naasa 'anfusahum yazlimoon.
verses.translation: Beshak Allah logon par zulm nahin karta magar log apne aap par (khud hi) zulm karte hain.

verses.arabic: وَيَوْمَ يَحْشُرُهُمْ كَاَنْ لَمْ يَلْبَثُوْٓا اِلَّا سَاعَةً مِّنَ النَّهَارِ يَتَعَارَفُوْنَ بَيْنَهُمْ ۭ قَدْ خَسِرَ الَّذِيْنَ كَذَّبُوْا بِلِقَاۗءِ اللّٰهِ وَمَا كَانُوْا مُهْتَدِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa Yawma yahshuruhum ka'al-lam yalbasooo 'illaa saa'atam-minan-nahaari yata'aarafoona baynahum; qad khasiral- lazeena kazzaboo biliqaaa'il-laahi wa maa kaanoo muhtadeen
verses.translation: Aur jis din woh unhein ekhatthha karega (to unhein yun lagega) jaise woh (duniya mein) din ki ek ghadi se ziyaadah nahin rahe the. woh baahum ek doosre ko pahchaan lenge. yaqeenan woh log khasaare mein rahe jinhon ne Allah ki mulaaqaat ko jhutlaaya, aur woh hidaayat yaaftah na the.

verses.arabic: وَاِمَّا نُرِيَنَّكَ بَعْضَ الَّذِيْ نَعِدُهُمْ اَوْ نَتَوَفَّيَنَّكَ فَاِلَيْنَا مَرْجِعُهُمْ ثُمَّ اللّٰهُ شَهِيْدٌ عَلٰي مَا يَفْعَلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'immaa nuriyannaka ba'dal- lazee na iduhum 'aw natawaffayannaka fa'ilaynaa marji'uhum summal-laahu shaheedun 'alaa maa yafaloon.
verses.translation: Aur (Aye Nabi!) agar hum aisa koyi azaab aapko dikhaadein jiska hum unse wa'dah karte hain ya hum aapko wafaat de dein, to unhen hamaari taraf hi lautna hai, phir Allah un kaamon par gawaah hai jo woh karte hain.

verses.arabic: وَلِكُلِّ اُمَّةٍ رَّسُوْلٌ ۚ فَاِذَا جَاۗءَ رَسُوْلُهُمْ قُضِيَ بَيْنَهُمْ بِالْقِسْطِ وَهُمْ لَا يُظْلَمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa likulli 'ummatir- Rasoolun fa'izaa jaaa'a Rasooluhum qudiya baynahum bilqisti wa hum laa yuzlamoon.
verses.translation: Aur har ummat ka ek Rasool hai, phir jab unka rasool aagaya to un mein insaaf ke saath faislah kar diya gaya, aur un par zulm nahin kiya jaata.

verses.arabic: وَيَقُوْلُوْنَ مَتٰي هٰذَا الْوَعْدُ اِنْ كُنْتُمْ صٰدِقِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa yaqooloona mataa haazal-wa'du 'in kuntum şaadiqeen.
verses.translation: Aur woh (kaafir) kahte hain yeh (azaab ka) wa'dah kab (pura) hoga agar tum sachche ho?.

verses.arabic: قُلْ لَآ اَمْلِكُ لِنَفْسِيْ ضَرًّا وَّلَا نَفْعًا اِلَّا مَا شَاۗءَ اللّٰهُ ۭ لِكُلِّ اُمَّةٍ اَجَلٌ ۭ اِذَا جَاۗءَ اَجَلُهُمْ فَلَا يَسْتَاْخِرُوْنَ سَاعَةً وَّلَا يَسْتَقْدِمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qullaaa 'amliku linafsee darrañw-wa laa nafan 'illaa maa shaaa'al-laah; likulli 'ummatin 'ajalun 'izaa jaaa'a 'ajaluhum falaaa yasta'khiroona saa'atanw-wa laa uastagdimoon.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) kah deejiye: main apni zaat ke liye kisi nuqsaan ka ikhtiyaar nahin rakhta aur na nafa' ka magar jo Allah chaahe, har ummat ke liye ek muqarrarah waqt hai. jab unka muqarrarah waqt aajata hai to woh (usse) ek ghadi bhi aage peechhe nahin ho sakte.

verses.arabic: قُلْ اَرَءَيْتُمْ اِنْ اَتٰىكُمْ عَذَابُهٗ بَيَاتًا اَوْ نَهَارًا مَاذَا يَسْتَعْجِلُ مِنْهُ الْمُجْرِمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qul 'ara'aytum 'in 'ataakum 'azaabuhoo bayaatan 'aw nahaaram-maazaa yasta jilu minhul- mujrimoon.
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: bhala dekho to, agar uska azaab tum par raat ko ya din ko aajaaye (to kiya bachaao kar loge? aakhir) kiya cheez hai jiske liye mujrim jaldi macha rahe hain?.

verses.arabic: اَثُمَّ اِذَا مَا وَقَعَ اٰمَنْتُمْ بِهٖ ۭ اٰلْـٰٔنَ وَقَدْ كُنْتُمْ بِهٖ تَسْتَعْجِلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'A summa 'izaa maa waqa'a 'aamantum bih; 'aaal'aana wa qad kuntum bihee tasta'jiloon.
verses.translation: Kiya phir jab ('azaab) aa padega (tab) uss par eemaan laaoge? (uss waqt kaha jaayega:) kiya ab (eemaan laate ho?) haalaanke tum use jaldi maangte the.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ قِيْلَ لِلَّذِيْنَ ظَلَمُوْا ذُوْقُوْا عَذَابَ الْخُلْدِ ۭ هَلْ تُجْزَوْنَ اِلَّا بِمَا كُنْتُمْ تَكْسِبُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Summa qeela lillazeena zalamoo zooqoo 'azaabal-khuldi hal tujzawna 'illaa bimaa kuntum taksiboon
verses.translation: Phir jab unhon ne zulm kiya unse kaha jaayega: tum daayimi azaab ka mazah chakho, tumhein unhi kaamon ka badlah diya jaata hai jo tum (duniya mein) karte rahe.

verses.arabic: وَيَسْتَـنْۢبِـُٔوْنَكَ اَحَقٌّ هُوَ ۭ قُلْ اِيْ وَرَبِّيْٓ اِنَّهٗ لَحَقٌّ ۚ وَمَآ اَنْتُمْ بِمُعْجِزِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa yastambi'oonaka 'ahaqqun huwa qul 'ee wa Rabbeee 'innahoo lahaqq; wa maaa 'antum bimu'jizeen.
verses.translation: Aur (Aye Nabi!) woh aap se daryaaft karte hain kiya woh (azaab) such much aaye ga? aap kah deejiye: haan! mere rab ki qasam! woh such much aayega, aur tum (Allah ko) aajiz nahin kar sakte.

verses.arabic: وَلَوْ اَنَّ لِكُلِّ نَفْسٍ ظَلَمَتْ مَا فِي الْاَرْضِ لَافْتَدَتْ بِهٖ ۗ وَاَسَرُّوا النَّدَامَةَ لَمَّا رَاَوُا الْعَذَابَ ۖ وَقُضِيَ بَيْنَهُمْ بِالْقِسْطِ وَهُمْ لَا يُظْلَمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa law 'anna likulli nafsin zalamat maa fil- 'ardi laftadat bih; wa 'asarrun-nadaamata lammaa ra'awul-'azaab; wa qudiya baynahum bilqist; wa hum laa yuzlamoon.
verses.translation: Aur agar har zaalim shakhs ke paas (saari) zameen ka maal ho to woh use (azaab se bachchne ke liye)¹ zaroor fidyah de dega, aur mujrim jab azaab dekhenge to nadaamat ko chhupaayeinge aur un mein insaaf ke saath faislah kiya jaaye ga aur un par (koyi) zulm nahin hoga.
verses.deepMeaning: Mulaahazah ho: (Surah Aal-e-Imran:3/91)

verses.arabic: اَلَآ اِنَّ لِلّٰهِ مَا فِي السَّمٰوٰتِ وَالْاَرْضِ ۭ اَلَآ اِنَّ وَعْدَ اللّٰهِ حَقٌّ وَّلٰكِنَّ اَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Alaaa 'inna lillaahi maa fis-samaawaati wal'ard; 'alaaa 'inna wa'dal-laahi haqqunw- walaakinna 'aksarahum laa yaʻlamoon.
verses.translation: Aagaah raho! beshak Allah hi ka hai jo kuchh aasmaanon aur zameen mein hai, aagaah raho! bilaa shubah Allah ka wa'dah haq hai lekin aksar log nahin jaante.

verses.arabic: هُوَ يُحْيٖ وَيُمِيْتُ وَاِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Huwa yuhyee wa yumeetu wa 'ilayhi turja'oon.
