verses.translation: Wahi zindah karta aur (wahi) maarta hai aur usi ki taraf tum lautaaye jaaoge.

verses.arabic: يٰٓاَيُّهَا النَّاسُ قَدْ جَاۗءَتْكُمْ مَّوْعِظَةٌ مِّنْ رَّبِّكُمْ وَشِفَاۗءٌ لِّمَا فِي الصُّدُوْرِ وَهُدًى وَّرَحْمَةٌ لِّلْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhan- naasu qad jaaa'atkum maw'izatum-mir- Rabbikum wa shifaaa'ul- limaa fiş-şudoori wa hudañw-wa rahmatul- lilmu'mineen.
verses.translation: Aye logo! yaqeenan tumhaare paas tumhaare rab ki taraf se (qur'an ki) naseehat aagayi hai aur (yeh) shifa hai un (bimaariyon) ke liye jo seenon mein hain, aur mominon ke liye hidaayat wa rahmat hai.

verses.arabic: قُلْ بِفَضْلِ اللّٰهِ وَبِرَحْمَتِهٖ فَبِذٰلِكَ فَلْيَفْرَحُوْا ۭ هُوَ خَيْرٌ مِّمَّا يَجْمَعُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qul bifadlil-laahi wa birahmatihee fabizaalika falyafrahoo huwa khayrum- mimmaa yajma'oon.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) kah deejiye: yeh Allah ke fazl aur uski rahmat se (naazil huwa) hai, lihaaza (logon ko) chaahiye. ke woh khush hon, yeh un cheezon se bahut behtar hai jo woh jama' karte hain.

verses.arabic: قُلْ اَرَءَيْتُمْ مَّآ اَنْزَلَ اللّٰهُ لَكُمْ مِّنْ رِّزْقٍ فَجَعَلْتُمْ مِّنْهُ حَرَامًا وَّحَلٰلًا ۭ قُلْ اٰللّٰهُ اَذِنَ لَكُمْ اَمْ عَلَي اللّٰهِ تَفْتَرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qul 'ara'aytum maaa 'anzalal-laahu lakum mir-rizqin faja'altum minhu haraamañw-wa halaalan qul 'aaallaahu 'azina lakum 'am 'alal- laahi taftaroon.
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: bhala dekho to, Allah ne tumhaare liye jo rizq naazil kiya, phir tumne uss mein se kuchh haraam aur kuchh halaal thhah raaliya. kah deejiye: kiya Allah ne tumhein (yeh) hukm diya hai ya tum Allah par jhoot baandhte ho?.

verses.arabic: وَمَا ظَنُّ الَّذِيْنَ يَفْتَرُوْنَ عَلَي اللّٰهِ الْكَذِبَ يَوْمَ الْقِيٰمَةِ ۭ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ لَذُوْ فَضْلٍ عَلَي النَّاسِ وَلٰكِنَّ اَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَشْكُرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maa zannul- lazeena yaftaroona 'alal- laahil-kaziba Yawmal- Qiyaamah; 'innal-laaha lazoo fadlin 'alan-naasi wa laakinna 'aksarahum laa yashkuroon.
verses.translation: Aur kiya gumaan hai un logon ka jo Allah par jhoot baandhte hain roze qiyaanmat ke baare mein? beshak Allah logon par bade fazl waala hai lekin un mein se aksar shukr nahin karte.

verses.arabic: وَمَا تَكُوْنُ فِيْ شَاْنٍ وَّمَا تَتْلُوْا مِنْهُ مِنْ قُرْاٰنٍ وَّلَا تَعْمَلُوْنَ مِنْ عَمَلٍ اِلَّا كُنَّا عَلَيْكُمْ شُهُوْدًا اِذْ تُفِيْضُوْنَ فِيْهِ ۚ وَمَا يَعْزُبُ عَنْ رَّبِّكَ مِنْ مِّثْقَالِ ذَرَّةٍ فِي الْاَرْضِ وَلَا فِي السَّمَاۗءِ وَلَآ اَصْغَرَ مِنْ ذٰلِكَ وَلَآ اَكْبَرَ اِلَّا فِيْ كِتٰبٍ مُّبِيْنٍ
verses.transliteration: Wa maa takoonu fee sha'ninw-wa maa tatloo minhu min qur'aaninw- wa laa ta'maloona min 'amalin 'illaa kunnaa 'alaykum shuhoodan 'iz tufeedoona feeh; wa maa ya'zubu 'ar-Rabbika mim-misqaali zarratin fil- 'ardi wa laa fis-samaaa'i wa laaa 'asghara min zaalika wa laaa 'akbara 'illaa fee Kitaabim- Mubeen.
verses.translation: Aur (Aye Nabi!) aap jiss haal mein bhi hote hain aur Allah ki taraf se (naazil shudah) qur'an mein se jo kuchh bhi padhte hain, aur tum log jo bhi amal karte ho, uss waqt hum tumhein dekh rahe hote hain, jab tum uss mein masroof hote ho. aur Aapke rab se zarrah baraabar koyi cheez bhi chhupi nahin hoti, zameen mein aur na aasmaan mein, aur na koyi usse chhoti (cheez) aur na badi, magar woh waazeh kitab mein (darj) hai.

verses.arabic: اَلَآ اِنَّ اَوْلِيَاۗءَ اللّٰهِ لَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Alaaa 'inna 'awliyaaa'al-laahi laa khawfun 'alayhim wa laa hum yahzanoon.
verses.translation: Aagaah raho! beshak Auliya Allah par koyi khauf na hoga aur na woh ghamgheem honge.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Yeh Allah ke nek bandon ka haal bayaan kiya gaya hai jabke Allah ke naafarmaanon ka haal iske baraks hoga, chunaancheh hadees mein hai, Rasoolullah ﷺ ne farmaya: 'Jab janaazah tayyaar ho jaata hai aur aadmi use kandhon par uthhaalete hain agar woh nek hota hai to kahta hai: 'Mujhe jaldi jaldi le chalo!' aur agar bura hota hai to kahta ha: 'haaye kharaabi tum use (mujhe) kahaan le jaarahe ho?' uski aawaaz insaanon ke siwa har cheez sunti hai aur agar insaan sun lein to behosh ho jaayein.'(Sahih Bukhari, Al-Janaayiz Baab:50 Hadees:1314)

verses.arabic: اَلَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا وَكَانُوْا يَتَّقُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Allazeena 'aamanoo wa kaanoo yattaqoon.
verses.translation: (Ya'ni) woh log jo eemaan laaye aur (Allah se) darte rahe.

verses.arabic: لَهُمُ الْبُشْرٰى فِي الْحَيٰوةِ الدُّنْيَا وَفِي الْاٰخِرَةِ ۚ لَا تَبْدِيْلَ لِكَلِمٰتِ اللّٰهِ ۭ ذٰلِكَ هُوَ الْفَوْزُ الْعَظِيْمُ
verses.transliteration: Lahumul-bushraa fil-hayaatid-dunyaa wa fil- 'Aakhirah; laa tabdeela li-Kalimaatil-laah; zaalika huwal-fawzul- 'azeem.
verses.translation: Unke liye duniya ki zindagi mein khush-khabri¹ hai aur aakhirat mein (bhi) Allah ki baaton mein tabdeeli nahin hoti, yahi bahut badi kaamiyaabi hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Sachche aur achchhe khaab bhi khushkhabri ka ek pahlu hai. hadees ke mutaabiq 'Nabuwwat mein kuchh bhi baaqi nahin raha maa siwaaye mubashshiraat ke' logon ne arz kiya: mubashshiraat kiya hai? farmaya: sachche aur achchhe khaab (jo khushkhabriyaan pahunchaayein.'') (Al-Bukhari, Atta'beer Baab:5 Hadees:6990)

verses.arabic: وَلَا يَحْزُنْكَ قَوْلُهُمْ ۘ اِنَّ الْعِزَّةَ لِلّٰهِ جَمِيْعًا ۭ هُوَ السَّمِيْعُ الْعَلِيْمُ
verses.transliteration: Wa laa yahzunka qawluhum; 'innal-'izzata lillaahi jamee'aa; Huwas-Samee'ul-'Aleem.
verses.translation: Aur (Aye Nabi!) unki baatein aapko ghamgheen na karen, beshak izzat to saari Allah hi ke liye hai, wahi khoob sunne waala, khoob jaanne waala hai.

verses.arabic: اَلَآ اِنَّ لِلّٰهِ مَنْ فِي السَّمٰوٰتِ وَمَنْ فِي الْاَرْضِ ۭ وَمَا يَتَّبِعُ الَّذِيْنَ يَدْعُوْنَ مِنْ دُوْنِ اللّٰهِ شُرَكَاۗءَ ۚ اِنْ يَّتَّبِعُوْنَ اِلَّا الظَّنَّ وَاِنْ هُمْ اِلَّا يَخْرُصُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Alaaa 'inna lillaahi man fis-samaawaati wa man fil-'ard; wa maa yattabi'ul-lazeena yad'oona min doonil- laahi shurakaaa'; 'iny- yattabi'oona 'illaz-zanna wa 'in hum 'illaa yakhrusoon.
verses.translation: Aagaah raho! beshak Allah hi ke liye hai aasmaanon mein jo (makhlooq) hai aur jo zameen mein hai. aur jo log Allah ke siwa shareekon ko pukaarte hain, woh (kisi aur cheez ki) pairwi nahin karte magar sirf gumaan ki pairwi karte hain, aur woh mahaz qiyaas ke ghode daudaate hain.

verses.arabic: هُوَ الَّذِيْ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ الَّيْلَ لِتَسْكُنُوْا فِيْهِ وَالنَّهَارَ مُبْصِرًا ۭ اِنَّ فِيْ ذٰلِكَ لَاٰيٰتٍ لِّقَوْمٍ يَّسْمَعُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Huwal-lazee ja'ala lakumul-layla litaskunoo feehi wannahaara mubșiraa; 'inna fee zaalika la-'Aayaatil- liqawminy-yasma'oon.
verses.translation: Wahi hai (Allah) jisne tumhaare liye raat banaayi, taake uss mein sukoon (haasil) karo aur din ko raushan banaaya. beshak iss mein bahut badi nishaaniyaan hain un logon ke liye jo sunte hain.

verses.arabic: قَالُوا اتَّخَذَ اللّٰهُ وَلَدًا ۗ سُبْحٰنَهٗ ۭ هُوَ الْغَنِيُّ لَهٗ مَا فِي السَّمٰوٰتِ وَمَا فِي الْاَرْضِ ۭ اِنْ عِنْدَكُمْ مِّنْ سُلْطٰنٍۢ بِهٰذَا ۭ اَتَقُوْلُوْنَ عَلَي اللّٰهِ مَا لَا تَعْلَمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaalut-takhazal- laahu waladan Subhaanahoo Huwal- Ghaniyyu lahoo maa fis- samaawaati wa maa fil- 'ard; 'in 'indakum min sultaanim bihaazaaa; 'ataqooloona 'alal-laahi maa laa ta'lamoon.
verses.translation: Unhon ne kaha ke Allah ne beta banaa liya hai. woh (aulad se) paak hai, woh be parwaah hai, usi ke liye hai jo kuchh aasmaanon mein hai aur jo kuchh zameen mein hai, tumhaare paas iss baat ki koyi daleel nahin. kiya tum Allah ki baabat woh baat kahte ho jo tum jaante nahin.

verses.arabic: قُلْ اِنَّ الَّذِيْنَ يَفْتَرُوْنَ عَلَي اللّٰهِ الْكَذِبَ لَا يُفْلِحُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qul 'innal-lazeena yaftaroona 'alal-laahil- kaziba laa yuflihoon.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) kah deejiye: bilashubah jo log Allah par hoot baandhte hain, woh falaah nahin paayenge.

verses.arabic: مَتَاعٌ فِي الدُّنْيَا ثُمَّ اِلَيْنَا مَرْجِعُهُمْ ثُمَّ نُذِيْقُهُمُ الْعَذَابَ الشَّدِيْدَ بِمَا كَانُوْا يَكْفُرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Mataa'un fid-dunyaa summa 'ilaynaa marji'uhum summa nuzeequhumul- 'azaabash-shadeeda bimaa kaanoo yakfuroon.
verses.translation: Duniya mein thoda sa faaidah uthhaana hai, phir unhein hamaari hi taraf lautna hai, phir unke kufr karne ki wajah se hum nhein shadeed azaab ka mazah chakhaayenge.

verses.arabic: وَاتْلُ عَلَيْهِمْ نَبَاَ نُوْحٍ اِذْ قَالَ لِقَوْمِهٖ يٰقَوْمِ اِنْ كَانَ كَبُرَ عَلَيْكُمْ مَّقَامِيْ وَتَذْكِيْرِيْ بِاٰيٰتِ اللّٰهِ فَعَلَي اللّٰهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ فَاَجْمِعُوْٓا اَمْرَكُمْ وَشُرَكَاۗءَكُمْ ثُمَّ لَا يَكُنْ اَمْرُكُمْ عَلَيْكُمْ غُمَّةً ثُمَّ اقْضُوْٓا اِلَيَّ وَلَا تُنْظِرُوْنِ
verses.transliteration: Watlu 'alayhim naba'a Nooh; 'iz qaala liqawmihee yaa qawmi 'in kaana kabura 'alaykum maqaamee wa tazkeeree bi-'Aayaatil- laahi fa'alal-laahi tawakkaltu fa'ajmi ooo 'amrakum wa shurakaaa'akum summa laa yakun 'amrukum 'alaykum ghummatan summaq-dooo 'ilayya wa laa tunziroon.
verses.translation: Aur (Aye Nabi!) aap unhein Nooh ka qissah suna deejiye: jab usne apni qaum se kaha: aye meri qaum! agar tumhein mera qiyaam aur Allah ki aayaton ke saath naseehat karna naa gawaar hai to main ne Allah hi par tawakkul kiya hai, chunaancheh tum aur tumhaare shareek mil kar (mere khilaaf) faislah karlo, phir tumhaara faislah tum mein (kisi se) posheedah na rahe, phir mere khilaaf woh kar guzro mohlat na do. aur miujhe

verses.arabic: فَاِنْ تَوَلَّيْتُمْ فَمَا سَاَلْتُكُمْ مِّنْ اَجْرٍ ۚ اِنْ اَجْرِيَ اِلَّا عَلَي اللّٰهِ وَأُمِرْتُ أَنْ أَكُوْنَ مِنَ الْمُسْلِمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Fa'in tawallaytum famaa sa'altukum min 'ajrin 'in 'ajriya 'illaa 'alal-laahi wa 'umirtu 'an 'akoona minal- muslimeen.
verses.translation: Phir agar tum (haq se) munh modlo, to mein ne tum se kisi ajr ka sawaal nahin kiya, mera ajr to Allah ke paas hai, aur mujhe yeh hukm diya gaya hai ke main farmaa bardaaron mein se ho jaaoon.

verses.arabic: فَكَذَّبُوْهُ فَنَجَّيْنٰهُ وَمَنْ مَّعَهٗ فِي الْفُلْكِ وَجَعَلْنٰهُمْ خَلٰٓىٕفَ وَاَغْرَقْنَا الَّذِيْنَ كَذَّبُوْا بِاٰيٰتِنَا ۭ فَانْظُرْ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَاقِبَةُ الْمُنْذَرِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Fakazzaboohu fanajjaynaahu wa mam- ma'ahoo fil-fulki wa jaʻalnaahum khalaaa'ifa wa 'aghraqnal-lazeena kazzaboo bi'Aayaatinaa fanzur kayfa kaana 'aaqibatul-munzareen
verses.translation: Phir unhon ne use jhutlaaya to humne use aur un logon ko najaat di jo uske saath kashti mein (sawaar) the, aur humne unhein (unka) jaanasheen bana diya, aur humne un logon ko gharq kar diya jinhon ne hamaari aayaat ko jhutlaaya tha, phir (Aye Nabi!) dekhiye un logon ka kaisa anjaam huwa jinhein daraaya gaya tha?

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ بَعَثْنَا مِنْ بَعْدِهٖ رُسُلًا اِلٰي قَوْمِهِمْ فَجَاۗءُوْهُمْ بِالْبَيِّنٰتِ فَمَا كَانُوْا لِيُؤْمِنُوْا بِمَا كَذَّبُوْا بِهٖ مِنْ قَبْلُ ۭ كَذٰلِكَ نَطْبَعُ عَلٰي قُلُوْبِ الْمُعْتَدِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Summa baʻasnaa mim ba'dihee Rusulan 'ilaa qawmihim fajaaa'oohum bilbayyinaati famaa kaanoo liyu'minoo bimaa kazzaboo bihee min qabl; kazaalika natba'u 'alaa quloobil-mu'tadeen.
verses.translation: Phir humne Nooh ke ba'd kayi Rasool unki (apni apni) qaum ki taraf bheje, to woh unke paas waazeh dalaayil lekar aaye, to (phir bhi) na huye ke woh uss (hidaayat) par eemaan le aate jise woh pahle jhutla chuke the. isi tarah hum had se guzar ne waalon ke dilon par mohar laga dete hain.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ بَعَثْنَا مِنْ بَعْدِهِمْ مُّوْسٰى وَهٰرُوْنَ اِلٰى فِرْعَوْنَ وَمَلَاِهٖ بِاٰيٰتِنَا فَاسْتَكْبَرُوْا وَكَانُوْا قَوْمًا مُّجْرِمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Summa ba'asnaa mim ba'dihim- Moosaa Wa Haaroona 'ilaa Fir'awna wa mala'ihee bi- 'Aayaatinaa fastakbaroo wa kaanoo qawmam- mujrimeen.
verses.translation: Phir uske ba'd humne Moosa aur Haaroon ko apni aayaton ke saath firaun aur uss (ki qaum) ke sardaaron ki taraf bheja, to unhon ne takabbur kiya aur woh log mujrim the.

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّا جَاۗءَهُمُ الْحَقُّ مِنْ عِنْدِنَا قَالُوْٓا اِنَّ هٰذَا لَسِحْرٌ مُّبِيْنٌ
verses.transliteration: Falammaa jaaa'ahumul-haqqu min 'indinaa qaalooo 'inna haazaa lasihrum-mubeen
verses.translation: Phir jab unke paas hamaari taraf se haq aagaya, to unhon ne kaha: beshak yeh to khula jaadu hai.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Jab inkaar ke liye koyi ma'qool daleel nahin hoti to usse chhutkaara haasil karne ke liye kah dete hain ke yeh to jaadu hai haalaanke jaadu to saraasar dhoka aur fareb hai, ambiyaa. عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام ka isse kiya ta'alluq?

verses.arabic: قَالَ مُوْسٰى اَتَقُوْلُوْنَ لِلْحَقِّ لَمَّا جَاۗءَكُمْ ۙ اَسِحْرٌ هٰذَا وَلَا يُفْلِحُ السَّاحِرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala Moosaaa 'ataqooloona lilhaqqi lammaa jaaa'akum 'asihrun haazaa wa laa yuflihus-saahiroon.
verses.translation: Moosa ne kaha: kiya tum haq ke baare mein (yeh) kahte ho jab woh tumhaare paas aagaya? kiya yeh jaadu hai? haa laanke jaadu gar to falaah nahin paate.

verses.arabic: قَالُوْٓا اَجِئْتَنَا لِتَلْفِتَنَا عَمَّا وَجَدْنَا عَلَيْهِ اٰبَاۗءَنَا وَتَكُوْنَ لَكُمَا الْكِبْرِيَاۗءُ فِي الْاَرْضِ ۖ وَمَا نَحْنُ لَكُمَا بِمُؤْمِنِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaalooo 'aji'tanaa litalfitanaa 'ammaa wajadnaa 'alayhi 'aabaaa'anaa wa takoona lakumal- kibriyaaa'u fil-'ardi wa maa nahnu lakumaa bimu'mineen.
verses.translation: Unhon ne kaha: kiya tu hamaare paas aaya hai ke humein uss (tareeqe) se hataade jiss par humne apne baap daada ko paaya, aur tum donon ke liye zameen mein iqtedaar ho? jabke hum tum donon par eemaan laane waale nahin.

verses.arabic: وَقَالَ فِرْعَوْنُ ائْتُوْنِيْ بِكُلِّ سٰحِرٍ عَلِيْمٍ
verses.transliteration: Wa qaala Fir'awnu'- toonee bikulli saahirin 'aleem.
verses.translation: Aur Firaun ne kaha: tum mere paas har maahir jaadu gar ko le aao.

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّا جَاۗءَ السَّحَرَةُ قَالَ لَهُمْ مُّوْسٰى اَلْقُوْا مَآ اَنْتُمْ مُّلْقُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Falammaa jaaa'as- saharatu qaala lahum Moosaaa 'alqoo maaa 'antum mulqoon.
verses.translation: Phir jab tamaam jaadu gar aagaye to unse Moosa ne kaha: daalo jo kuchh tum daalne waale ho.

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّآ اَلْقَوْا قَالَ مُوْسٰى مَا جِئْتُمْ بِهِ السِّحْرُ ۖ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ سَيُبْطِلُهٗ ۭ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ لَا يُصْلِحُ عَمَلَ الْمُفْسِدِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Falammaaa 'alqaw qaala Moosaa maa ji'tum bihis-sihru 'innal-laaha sayubtiluhoo 'innal- laaha laa yuşlihu 'amalal-mufsideen.
verses.translation: Phir jab unhon ne daala to Moosa ne kaha: jo kuchh tum laaye ho (yeh) jaadu hai. beshak Allah jald use baatil kar dega. beshak Allah fasaad karne waalon ka kaam nahin sanwaarta.

verses.arabic: وَيُحِقُّ اللّٰهُ الْحَقَّ بِكَلِمٰتِهٖ وَلَوْ كَرِهَ الْمُجْرِمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa yuhiqqul-laahul- haqqa bi-Kalimaatihee wa law karihal-mujrimoon.
verses.translation: Aur Allah haq ko apne kalimaat se saabir karta hai agarcheh mujrim log naa pasand karen.

verses.arabic: فَمَآ اٰمَنَ لِمُوْسٰٓي اِلَّا ذُرِّيَّةٌ مِّنْ قَوْمِهٖ عَلٰي خَوْفٍ مِّنْ فِرْعَوْنَ وَمَلَاۗىٕهِمْ اَنْ يَّفْتِنَهُمْ ۭ وَاِنَّ فِرْعَوْنَ لَعَالٍ فِي الْاَرْضِ ۚ وَاِنَّهٗ لَمِنَ الْمُسْرِفِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Famaaa 'aamana li- Moosaaa 'illaa zurriyyatum-min qawmihee 'alaa khawfim-min Fir'awna wa mala'ihim 'any- yaftinahum; wa 'inna Fir'awna la'aalin fil-'ardi wa 'innahoo laminal- musrifeen.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh Moosa par uski qaum ke chand naujawaanon ke siwa koyi bhi.eemaan na laaya ¹ Firaun aur uske darbaariyon se darte huye ke kahin woh unhein fitne mein daal de, aur beshak Firaun sar zameene (Misr) mein sarkash bana huwa tha, aur beshak woh had se guzarne waalon mein se tha.
verses.deepMeaning: (Qaumihee) ki zameer ke marja' mein mufassireen ka ikhtelaaf hai ba'z ke nazdeek Moosa عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام hain kyun ke isse qabl unhi ka zikr hai aur ba'z ke nazdeek firaun hai ya'ni firoun ki qaum se hode log eemaan laaye, unki daleel yeh hai ke Bani Israyeel ke log to ek Rasool aur najaat dahindah ke intezaar mein the Jo Moosa ki soorat mein unhein mil gaye aur iss e'tebaar se saare Bani Israyeel (siwaaye Qaroon ke) un par eemaan rakhte the, isliye sahih baat yahi hai ke isse muraad firaun ki qaum hai unhi mein se ek uski biwi Aasiyah bhi hai.

verses.arabic: وَقَالَ مُوْسٰى يٰقَوْمِ اِنْ كُنْتُمْ اٰمَنْتُمْ بِاللّٰهِ فَعَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلُوْٓا اِنْ كُنْتُمْ مُّسْلِمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa qaala Moosaa yaa qawmi 'in kuntum 'aamantum billaahi fa'alayhi tawakkalooo 'in kuntum muslimeen.
verses.translation: Aur Moosa ne kaha: Aye meri qaum! Agar tum Allah par eemaan laaye ho to usi par bharosah karo agar tum farmaanbardaar ho.

verses.arabic: فَقَالُوْا عَلَي اللّٰهِ تَوَكَّلْنَا ۭ رَبَّنَا لَا تَجْعَلْنَا فِتْنَةً لِّلْقَوْمِ الظّٰلِمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Faqaaloo 'alal-laahi tawakkalnaa Rabbanaa laa taj'alnaa fitnatal- lilqawmiz-zaalimeen.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh unhon ne kahaa: humne Allah hi par tawakkul kiya hai. aye hamaare rab! tu hamein zaalim qaum ke haathon aazmaayish mein na daal.

verses.arabic: وَنَجِّنَا بِرَحْمَتِكَ مِنَ الْقَوْمِ الْكٰفِرِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa najjinaa birahmatika minal- qawmil-kaafireen.
verses.translation: Aur tu humein apni rahmat ke saath kaafir qaum se najaat de

verses.arabic: وَاَوْحَيْنَآ اِلٰي مُوْسٰي وَأَخِيْهِ أَنْ تَبَوَّءَا لِقَوْمِكُمَا بِمِصْرَ بُيُوْتًا وَاجْعَلُوْا بُيُوْتَكُمْ قِبْلَةً وَّاَقِيْمُوا الصَّلَاةَ ۗ وَبَشِّرِ الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'awhaynaaa ilaa Moosaa wa 'akheehi 'an tabawwa'aa liqawmikumaa bi-Misra buyootanw-waj'aloo buyootakum qiblatañw wa 'aqeemuş-Şalaah; wa bashshiril-mu'mineen.
verses.translation: Aur humne Moosa aur uske bhaai ki taraf wahi ki ke tum apni qaum ke liye misr mein kuchh ghar banaao, aur tum apne gharon ko qiblah (masjidein) banaao aur namaaz qaayem karo, aur mominon ko khsuhkhabri de deejiye.

verses.arabic: وَقَالَ مُوْسٰى رَبَّنَآ اِنَّكَ اٰتَيْتَ فِرْعَوْنَ وَمَلَاَهٗ زِيْنَةً وَّاَمْوَالًا فِي الْحَيٰوةِ الدُّنْيَا ۚ رَبَّنَا لِيُضِلُّوْا عَنْ سَبِيْلِكَ ۖ رَبَّنَا اطْمِسْ عَلٰٓي اَمْوَالِهِمْ وَاشْدُدْ عَلٰي قُلُوْبِهِمْ فَلَا يُؤْمِنُوْا حَتّٰى يَرَوُا الْعَذَابَ الْاَلِيْمَ
verses.transliteration: Wa qaala Moosaa Rabbanaaa 'innaka 'aatayta Fir'awna wa mala'ahoo zeenatañw-wa Pamwaalan fil-hayaatid- dunyaa Rabbanaa diyudilloo 'an sabeelika Rabbanat-mis 'alaaa Pamwaalihim washdud alaa quloobihim falaa yu'minoo hattaa yarawul- 'azaabal-'aleem
verses.translation: Aur Moosa ne kaha: aye hamaare rab! beshak tune Firaun aur uss (ki qaum) ke sardaaron ko duniya ki zindagi mein shaan-o- shaukat aur maal-o-zar de rakhkha hai, aye hamaare rab! taake woh logon ko teri raah se bhatkaa dein. aye hamaare rab! unka maal-o- zar ghaarat karde aur unke dil sakht karde, chunaancheh yeh eemaan na laayein jab tak ke dardnaak azaab na dekh lein.

verses.arabic: قَالَ قَدْ اُجِيْبَتْ دَّعْوَتُكُمَا فَاسْتَقِيْمَا وَلَا تَتَّبِعٰنِّ سَبِيْلَ الَّذِيْنَ لَا يَعْلَمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala qad 'ujeebad- da'watukumaa fastaqeemaa wa laa tattabi'aaanni sabeelal- lazeena laa yaʻlamoon.
verses.translation: Allah ne kaha: yaqeenan tum donon ki dua' qubool kar li gayi hai, chunaancheh tum donon saabit qadam raho aur un logon ke raaste ki mat pairwi karo jo ilm nahin rakhte.

verses.arabic: وَجٰوَزْنَا بِبَنِيْٓ اِسْرَاۗءِيْلَ الْبَحْرَ فَاَتْبَعَهُمْ فِرْعَوْنُ وَجُنُوْدُهٗ بَغْيًا وَّعَدْوًا ۚ حَتّٰىٓ اِذَآ اَدْرَكَهُ الْغَرَقُ قَالَ اٰمَنْتُ اَنَّهٗ لَآ اِلٰهَ اِلَّا الَّذِيْٓ اٰمَنَتْ بِهٖ بَنُوْٓا اِسْرَاۗءِيْلَ وَأَنَا مِنَ الْمُسْلِمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa jaawaznaa bi- Baneee 'Israaa'eelal- bahra fa'atba'ahum Fir'awnu wa junooduhoo baghyanw-wa 'adwan hattaaa 'izaaa 'adrakahul-gharaqu qaala 'aamantu 'annahoo laaa 'ilaaha 'illal-lazeee 'aamanat bihee Banooo 'Israaa'eela wa 'ana minal-muslimeen.
verses.translation: Aur humne Bani Israaeel ko samandar se paar kar diya, phir Fir'aun aur uski faujon ne sarkashi aur zulm se unka peechha kiya, hatta ke jab woh gharq hone ko pahuncha to pukaar utha: main eemaan laata hoon ke beshak uss zaat ke siwa koyi ma'bood nahin jiss par Banu Israaeel eemaan laaye, aur main musalmaanon mein se hoon.

verses.arabic: اٰلْـٰٔنَ وَقَدْ عَصَيْتَ قَبْلُ وَكُنْتَ مِنَ الْمُفْسِدِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Aaal'aana wa qad 'aşayta qablu wa kunta minal-mufsideen.
verses.translation: (Allah ne farmaaya:) kiya ab (eemaan laata hai?) jabke tu pahle naafarmaan tha, aur tu fasaad karne waalon mein se tha.

verses.arabic: فَالْيَوْمَ نُنَجِّيْكَ بِبَدَنِكَ لِتَكُوْنَ لِمَنْ خَلْفَكَ اٰيَةً ۚ وَاِنَّ كَثِيْرًا مِّنَ النَّاسِ عَنْ اٰيٰتِنَا لَغٰفِلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Falyawma nunajjeeka bibadanika litakoona liman khalfaka 'Aayah; wa 'inna kaseeram-minan-naasi 'an 'Aayaatinaa laghaafiloon.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh aaj hum tera jism bacha kar (samandar se) baahar phenkenge taake tum apne peechhe waalon ke liye nishaan (ibrat) ho, aur beshak bahut se log hamaari nishaaniyon se ghaafil hain.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ بَوَّاْنَا بَنِيْٓ اِسْرَاۗءِيْلَ مُبَوَّاَ صِدْقٍ وَّرَزَقْنٰهُمْ مِّنَ الطَّيِّبٰتِ ۚ فَمَا اخْتَلَفُوْا حَتّٰى جَاۗءَهُمُ الْعِلْمُ ۭ اِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَقْضِيْ بَيْنَهُمْ يَوْمَ الْقِيٰمَةِ فِيْمَا كَانُوْا فِيْهِ يَخْتَلِفُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad bawwa'naa Baneee 'Israaa'eela mubawwa'a şidqinw-wa razaqnaahum minat- tayyibaati famakh-talafoo hattaa jaaa'ahumul-ilm; 'inna Rabbaka yaqdee baynahum Yawmal- Qiyaamati feemaa kaanoo feehi yakhtalifoon.
verses.translation: Aur yaqeenan humne Bani Israaeel ko achchha thhekaana diya aur humne unhein paakeezah cheezon se rizq diya, phir unhon ne (baahum) ikhtelaaf nahin kiya hatta ke unke paas ilm aagaya. (Aye Nabi!) beshak aap ka rab unke darmiyaan roz-eqiyaamat ko un baaton ka faislah karega jin mein woh ikhtelaaf karte the.

verses.arabic: فَاِنْ كُنْتَ فِيْ شَكٍّ مِمَّآ اَنْزَلْنَآ اِلَيْكَ فَسْـَٔلِ الَّذِيْنَ يَقْرَءُوْنَ الْكِتٰبَ مِنْ قَبْلِكَ ۚ لَقَدْ جَاۗءَكَ الْحَقُّ مِنْ رَّبِّكَ فَلَا تَكُوْنَنَّ مِنَ الْمُمْتَرِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Fa'in kunta fee shakkim-mimmaaa 'anzalnaaa 'ilayka fas'alil-lazeena yaqra'oonal-Kitaaba min qablik; laqad jaaa'akal- haqqu mir-Rabbika falaa takoonanna minal- mumtareen.
verses.translation: Phir agar aap iss (kitab) ke muta'alliq shak mein hon jo humne aapki taraf naazil ki hai to un logon se poochhiye jo aapse pahle kitab padhte hain, yaqeenan aapke paas aapke rab ki taraf se haq aagaya hai, lihaaza aap shak karne waalon mein se na hon.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Yeh khitaab ya to aa'm insaanon ko hai ya phir Nabi ﷺ ke waaste se ummat ko ta'leem di jaarahi hai. kyun ke Nabi ﷺ ko to wahi ke baare mein koyi shak ho hi nahin sakta tha. 'jo kitab padhte hain unse poochhlein' ka matlab hai ke qur'an majeed se pahle ki aasmaani kitaabein jin ke paas maujood hain unse iss qur'an ki baabat ma'loom karein kyun ke un mein iski nishaanyaan aur aakhri paighambar ki sifaat bayaan ki gayi hain. mazeed mulaahazah ho haashyah: (Surah A'araf:7/157)

verses.arabic: وَلَا تَكُوْنَنَّ مِنَ الَّذِيْنَ كَذَّبُوْا بِاٰيٰتِ اللّٰهِ فَتَكُوْنَ مِنَ الْخٰسِرِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laa takoonanna minal-lazeena kazzaboo bi-'Aayaatil-laahi fatakoona minal- khaasireen.
verses.translation: Aur aap un logon mein se na hon jinhon ne Allah ki aayaton ko jhutlaaya, warnah aap khasarah paane waalon mein se honge.

verses.arabic: اِنَّ الَّذِيْنَ حَقَّتْ عَلَيْهِمْ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ لَا يُؤْمِنُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Innal-lazeena haqqat 'alayhim Kalimatu Rabbika laa yu'minoon.
verses.translation: Beshak jin logon ke baare mein aapke rab ka hukm ('azaab) saadir ho chuka woh eemaan nahin laayenge.

verses.arabic: وَلَوْ جَاۗءَتْهُمْ كُلُّ اٰيَةٍ حَتّٰى يَرَوُا الْعَذَابَ الْاَلِيْمَ
verses.transliteration: Wa law jaaa'athun kullu 'Aayatin hattaa yarawul-'azaabal-'aleem.
verses.translation: Khaah unke paas saari nishaaniyaan aajaayein hatta ke woh dardnaak azaab dekh len.

verses.arabic: فَلَوْلَا كَانَتْ قَرْيَةٌ اٰمَنَتْ فَنَفَعَهَآ اِيْمَانُهَآ اِلَّا قَوْمَ يُوْنُسَ ۘ لَمَّآ اٰمَنُوْا كَشَفْنَا عَنْهُمْ عَذَابَ الْخِزْيِ فِي الْحَيٰوةِ الدُّنْيَا وَمَتَّعْنٰهُمْ اِلٰى حِيْنٍ
verses.transliteration: Falaw laa kaanat qaryatun 'aamanat fanafa'ahaaa 'eemaanuhaaa 'illaa qawma Yoonusa lammaaa 'aamanoo kashafnaa 'anhum 'azaabal-khizyi fil- hayaatid-dunyaa wa matta'naahum 'ilaa heen.
verses.translation: Phir kyun na huyi koyi basti aisi ke woh (azaab se pahle) eemaan laayi ho, phir uske eemaan ne use nafa' diya ho siwaaye qaum-e- Yuonus ke, jab woh eemaan le aaye to humne unse zillat ka azaab taal diya duniya ki zindagi mein, aur humne ek (muqarrar) waqt tak unhein (usse) faaidah uthhaane diya.

verses.arabic: وَلَوْ شَاۗءَ رَبُّكَ لَاٰمَنَ مَنْ فِي الْاَرْضِ كُلُّهُمْ جَمِيْعًا ۚ اَفَاَنْتَ تُكْرِهُ النَّاسَ حَتّٰى يَكُوْنُوْا مُؤْمِنِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa law shaaa'a Rabbuka la'aamana man fil-'ardi kulluhum jamee'aa; 'afa'anta tukrihun-naasa hattaa yakoonoo mu'mineen.
verses.translation: Aur agar aapka rab chaahta to jo log zameen mein hain, sab ke sab, saare hi eemaan le aate, phir kiya aap logon ko majboor karenge hatta woh momin ho jaayein?.

verses.arabic: وَمَا كَانَ لِنَفْسٍ اَنْ تُؤْمِنَ اِلَّا بِاِذْنِ اللّٰهِ ۚ وَيَجْعَلُ الرِّجْسَ عَلَي الَّذِيْنَ لَا يَعْقِلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maa kaana linafsin 'an tu'mina 'illaa bi'iznil-laah; wa yaj'alur-rijsa 'alal-lazeena laa ya'qiloon.
verses.translation: Aur kisi shakhs ke liye (mumkin) nahin ke woh Allah ke hukm ke baghair eemaan laaye, aur woh (Allah) un logon par paleedi (azaab) daal deta hai jo aql se kaam nahin lete.

verses.arabic: قُلِ انْظُرُوْا مَاذَا فِي السَّمٰوٰتِ وَالْاَرْضِ ۚ وَمَا تُغْنِي الْاٰيٰتُ وَالنُّذُرُ عَنْ قَوْمٍ لَا يُؤْمِنُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qulin-zuroo maazaa fis-samaawaati wal'ard; wa maa tughnil-'Aayaatu wannuzuru 'an qawmil- laa yu'minoon.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) kah deejiye: dekho (aur ghaur karo) jo kuchh aasmaanon aur zameen mein hai, aur nishaaniyaan aur daraawe un logon ko koyi faayedah nahin dete jo eemaan nahin laate.

verses.arabic: فَهَلْ يَنْتَظِرُوْنَ اِلَّا مِثْلَ اَيَّامِ الَّذِيْنَ خَلَوْا مِنْ قَبْلِهِمْ ۭ قُلْ فَانْتَظِرُوْٓا اِنِّيْ مَعَكُمْ مِّنَ الْمُنْتَظِرِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Fahal yantaziroona 'illaa misla 'ayyaamil- lazeena khalaw min qablihim; qul fantazirooo 'innee ma'akum minal- muntazireen.
verses.translation: To yeh log bhi (goya) un logon ke se dinon ka intezaar kar rahe hain jo inse pahle guzre. kah deejiye: phir tum intezaar karo, beshak tumhaare saath main bhi intezaar karne waalon mein hoon.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ نُنَجِّيْ رُسُلَنَا وَالَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا ۗ كَذٰلِكَ حَقًّا عَلَيْنَا نُنجِ الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Summa nunajjee Rusulanaa wallazeena 'aamanoo; kazaalika haqqan 'alaynaa nunjil- mu'mineen.
verses.translation: Phir hum najaat dete hain apne Rasoolon ko aur un logon ko jo eemaan laaye, isi tarah hum par laazim hai ke hum mominon ko najaat dein.

verses.arabic: قُلْ يٰٓاَيُّهَا النَّاسُ اِنْ كُنْتُمْ فِيْ شَكٍّ مِّنْ دِيْنِيْ فَلَآ اَعْبُدُ الَّذِيْنَ تَعْبُدُوْنَ مِنْ دُوْنِ اللّٰهِ وَلٰكِنْ اَعْبُدُ اللّٰهَ الَّذِيْ يَتَوَفّٰىكُمْ ۚ وَاُمِرْتُ اَنْ اَكُوْنَ مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qul yaaa 'ayyuhan- naasu 'in kuntum fee shakkim-min deenee falaaa 'a'budul-lazeena ta budoona min doonil- laahi wa laakin 'a'budul- laahal-lazee yatawaffaakum wa 'umirtu 'an 'akoona minal-mu'mineen.
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: aye logo! agar tum mere deen se (muta'alliq) shak mein ho to main unki i'baadat nahin karta jinki tum Allah ke siwa i'baadat karte ho lekin main to Allah ki i'baadat karta hoon woh jo tumhein wafaat deta hai, aur mujhe iss baat ka hukm diya gaya hai ke main mominon mein shaamil rahun.

verses.arabic: وَاَنْ اَقِمْ وَجْهَكَ لِلدِّيْنِ حَنِيْفًا وَّلَا تَكُوْنَنَّ مِنَ الْمُشْرِكِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'an 'aqim wajhaka liddeeni Haneefaa; wa laa takoonanna minal- mushrikeen.
verses.translation: Aur yeh ke Aap apna rukh deen (islaam) ki taraf seedha rakkhein yaksu ho kar, aur mushrikon mein se hargiz na hon.

verses.arabic: وَلَا تَدْعُ مِنْ دُوْنِ اللّٰهِ مَا لَا يَنْفَعُكَ وَلَا يَضُرُّكَ ۚ فَاِنْ فَعَلْتَ فَاِنَّكَ اِذًا مِّنَ الظّٰلِمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laa tad'u min doonil-laahi maa laa yanfa'uka wa laa yadurruka fa'in fa'alta fa'innaka 'izam-minaz- zaalimeen.
verses.translation: Aur Aap Allah ke siwa unko mat pukaarein jo na aapko nafa' de sakte hain aur na aapko nuqsaan pahuncha sakte hain. phir agar aap ne aisa kiya to beshak aap bhi iss waqt zaalimon mein honge.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Mulaahazah ho haashyah: (Surah Baqarah:2/165)

verses.arabic: وَاِنْ يَمْسَسْكَ اللّٰهُ بِضُرٍّ فَلَا كَاشِفَ لَهٗٓ اِلَّا هُوَ ۚ وَاِنْ يُّرِدْكَ بِخَيْرٍ فَلَا رَآدَّ لِفَضْلِهٖ ۭ يُصِيْبُ بِهٖ مَنْ يَّشَاۗءُ مِنْ عِبَادِهٖ ۭ وَهُوَ الْغَفُوْرُ الرَّحِيْمُ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'iny-yamsaskal- laahu bidurrin falaa kaashifa lahooo 'illaa Huwa wa 'iny- yuridka bikhayrin falaa raaadda lifadlih; yuşeebu bihee many-yashaaa'u min 'ibaadih; wa huwal- Ghafoorur-Raheem.
verses.translation: Aur agar Allah aap ko koyi takleef pahunchaaye to uske siwa koyi bhi use door karne waala nahin, aur agar Allah aapke saath bhalaayi ka iraadah kare to koyi bhi uske fazl ko rad karne waala nahin. woh apne bandon mein se jise chaahta hai uss (fazl) se nawaazta hai, aur woh bahut bakhshne waala, nehaayat raham karne waala hai.

verses.arabic: قُلْ يٰٓاَيُّهَا النَّاسُ قَدْ جَاۗءَكُمُ الْحَقُّ مِنْ رَّبِّكُمْ ۚ فَمَنِ اهْتَدٰى فَاِنَّمَا يَهْتَدِيْ لِنَفْسِهٖ ۚ وَمَنْ ضَلَّ فَاِنَّمَا يَضِلُّ عَلَيْهَا ۚ وَمَآ اَنَا عَلَيْكُمْ بِوَكِيْلٍ
verses.transliteration: Qul yaaa 'ayyuhan- naasu qad jaaa'akumul- haqqu mir-Rabbikum famanih-tadaa fa'innamaa yahtadee linafsihee wa man dalla fa'innamaa yadillu 'alayhaa wa maaa 'ana 'alaykum biwakeel.
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: aye logo! tumhaare paas tumhaare rab ki taraf se haq aagaya hai, chunaancheh jiss (shakhs) ne hidaayat paayi to yaqeenan woh apne hi liye hidaayat paata hai, aur jisne gumraahi ikhtiyaar ki to yaqeenan woh apne hi liye gumraahi ikhtiyaar karta hai.aur main tumhaara wakeel nahin hoon.

verses.arabic: وَاتَّبِعْ مَا يُوْحٰٓى اِلَيْكَ وَاصْبِرْ حَتّٰى يَحْكُمَ اللّٰهُ ۚ وَهُوَ خَيْرُ الْحٰكِمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wattabi' maa yoohaaa 'ilayka waşbir hattaa yahkumal-laah; wa Huwa khayrul- haakimeen.
verses.translation: Aur aap ki taraf jo wahi ki jaati hai aap uss ka itteba' keejiye aur sabr keejiye hattah ke Allah faislah karde, aur woh sab se behtar faislah karne waala hai.

verses.arabic: الر ۖ كِتٰبٌ اُحْكِمَتْ اٰيٰتُهٗ ثُمَّ فُصِّلَتْ مِنْ لَّدُنْ حَكِيْمٍ خَبِيْرٍ
verses.transliteration: Alif-Laaam-Raa; Kitaabun 'uhkimat 'Aayaatuhoo summa fuşşilat mil-ladun Hakeemin Khabeer.
verses.translation: Alif Laaam Raa (yeh) woh kitaab hai jiski aayaten mohakam ki gayi hain, phir tafseel¹ se bayaan ki gayi hain, badi hikmat waale, bahut khabar rakhne waale ki taraf se.
verses.deepMeaning: Iss mein ahkaam-o-shaaraaye', maawiz-o-qişas, aqaayed-o-eemaaniyaat aur aadaab- o-akhlaaq jis tarah wazaahat aur tafseel sebayaan kiye gaye hain, pichhli kitabein iski nazeer pesh karne se qaaisr hain.

verses.arabic: اَلَّا تَعْبُدُوْا اِلَّا اللّٰهَ ۭ اِنَّنِيْ لَكُمْ مِّنْهُ نَذِيْرٌ وَّبَشِيْرٌ
verses.transliteration: 'Allaa ta'budooo 'illal- laah; 'innanee lakum minhu nazeeruñw-wa basheer.
verses.translation: Yeh ke tum Allah ke siwa kisi ki ibaadat na karo, beshak main tumhaare liye usi ki taraf se daraane waala aur khushkhabri dene waala hoon.

verses.arabic: وَاَنِ اسْتَغْفِرُوْا رَبَّكُمْ ثُمَّ تُوْبُوْٓا اِلَيْهِ يُمَتِّعْكُمْ مَّتَاعًا حَسَنًا اِلٰٓى اَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى وَّيُؤْتِ كُلَّ ذِيْ فَضْلٍ فَضْلَهٗ ۭ وَاِنْ تَوَلَّوْا فَاِنِّيْٓ اَخَافُ عَلَيْكُمْ عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ كَبِيْرٍ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'anis-taghfiroo Rabbakum summa toobooo 'ilayhi yumatti'kum mataa'an hasanan 'ilaaa 'ajalim- musammanw-wa yu'ti kulla zee fadlin fadlahoo wa 'in tawallaw fa'inneee 'akhaafu 'alaykum 'azaaba Yawmin Kabeer.
verses.translation: Aur yeh ke tum apne rab se bakhshish maango, phir tum usi ki taraf taubah karo, woh tumhein bahut achchha faaidah dega ek muqarrar waqt tak, aur har sahib-e-fazl ko uska fazl bakhshega. aur agar tum munh modoge to beshak main tum par ek bade (haulnaak) din ke azaab se darta hoon.

verses.arabic: اِلَى اللّٰهِ مَرْجِعُكُمْ ۭ وَهُوَ عَلٰى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيْرٌ
verses.transliteration: 'Ilal-laahi marji'ukum wa Huwa 'alaa kulli shay'in Qadeer
verses.translation: Tumhein Allah hi ki taraf laut kar jaana hai aur woh har cheez par khoob qaadir hai.

verses.arabic: اَلَآ اِنَّهُمْ يَثْنُوْنَ صُدُوْرَهُمْ لِيَسْتَخْفُوْا مِنْهُ ۭ اَلَا حِيْنَ يَسْتَغْشُوْنَ ثِيَابَهُمْ يَعْلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّوْنَ وَمَا يُعْلِنُوْنَ ۭ اِنَّهٗ عَلِيْمٌۢ بِذَاتِ الصُّدُوْرِ
verses.transliteration: 'Alaaa 'innahum yasnoona şudoorahum liyastakhfoo minh; 'alaa heena yastaghshoona siyaabahum yalamu maa yusirroona wa maa yu'linoon; 'innahoo 'aleemum bizaatis- sudoor.
verses.translation: Aagaah raho! Beshak woh apne seene dohre karte hain, taake Allah se chhup jaayin. Aagaah raho! jab woh apne kapde odhte hain (tab bhi) Allah jaanta hai jo woh chhupaate aur zaahir karte hain, beshak Allah seenon ke raaz khoob jaanta hai.

verses.arabic: وَمَا مِنْ دَآبَّةٍ فِي الْاَرْضِ اِلَّا عَلَى اللّٰهِ رِزْقُهَا وَيَعْلَمُ مُسْتَقَرَّهَا وَمُسْتَوْدَعَهَا ۭ كُلٌّ فِيْ كِتٰبٍ مُّبِيْنٍ
verses.transliteration: Wa maa min daaabbatin fil-'ardi 'illaa 'alal-laahi rizquhaa wa ya'lamu mustaqarrahaa wa mustawda'ahaa; kullun fee Kitaabim- Mubeen.
verses.translation: Aur zameen par chalne waale har jaandaar ka rizq Allah ke zimme hai aur woh jaanta hai uski qaraar gaah aur uske dafan hone ki jagah ko. har cheez waazeh kitab mein (tahreer) hai.

verses.arabic: وَهُوَ الَّذِيْ خَلَقَ السَّمٰوٰتِ وَالْاَرْضَ فِيْ سِتَّةِ اَيَّامٍ وَّكَانَ عَرْشُهٗ عَلَى الْمَاۗءِ لِيَبْلُوَكُمْ اَيُّكُمْ اَحْسَنُ عَمَلًا ۭ وَلَىِٕنْ قُلْتَ اِنَّكُمْ مَّبْعُوْثُوْنَ مِنْۢ بَعْدِ الْمَوْتِ لَيَقُوْلَنَّ الَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْٓا اِنْ هٰذَآ اِلَّا سِحْرٌ مُّبِيْنٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa Huwal-lazee khalaqas-samaawaati wal'arda fee sittati 'ayyaamiñw-wa kaana 'Arshuhoo 'alal-maaa'i liyabluwakum 'ayyukum 'ahsanu 'amalaa; wa la'in qulta 'innakum mab'oosoona mim ba'dil- mawti layaqoolannal- lazeena kafarooo 'in haazaaa 'illaa sihrum- mubeen.
verses.translation: Aur wahi to hai jisne aasmaanon aur zameen ko 6 dinon mein paida kiya, aur  uska arsh paani¹ par tha taake woh tumhein aazmaaye ke tum mein se kaun ziyaadah achchhe amal karta hai. aur (Aye Nabi!) agar aap kahein ke tumhein maut ke ba'd zindah kiya jaayega to jin logon ne kufr kiya, woh zaroor kahenge ke yeh to khula jaadu hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Iski taayeed hadees se bhi hoti hai, Abu Hurairah  رضي الله عنه se marvi hai ke Rasoolullah ﷺ ne farmaya: 'Allah Ta'ala ka daayan haath bhara huwa hai. din raat ka kharch (bakhshish) use kam nahin karta. Kiya tumne nahin dekha ke jabse aasmaan aur zameen paida huye hain woh uss mein se kitna kharch karchuka hai? lekin jo kuchh uske daayan haath mein hai uss mein koyi kami nahin huyi aur uska arsh paani par tha aur uske doosre haath mein bhi faiz (bakhshísh-o-ataa) ya qabz (jaanein qabz karna) hai aur woh ba'z logon ko buland karta aur ba'z ko past karta hai.' (Sahih Bukhari, At-tauheed, Baab:22, Hadees:7419)

verses.arabic: وَلَىِٕنْ اَخَّرْنَا عَنْهُمُ الْعَذَابَ اِلٰٓى اُمَّةٍ مَّعْدُوْدَةٍ لَّيَقُوْلُنَّ مَا يَحْبِسُهٗ ۭ اَلَا يَوْمَ يَاْتِيْهِمْ لَيْسَ مَصْرُوْفًا عَنْهُمْ وَحَاقَ بِهِمْ مَا كَانُوْا بِهٖ يَسْتَهْزِءُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa la'in 'akhkharnaa 'anhumul-'azaaba 'ilaaa 'ummatim-ma'doodatil- lay'aqoolunna maa yahbisuh; 'alaa yawma ya'teehim laysa maşroofan 'anhum wa haaqa bihim maa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon.
verses.translation: ur agar hum unse gini chuni muddat tak azaab muakhkhar kar dein to woh (kaafir) zaroor kahenge ke kiya cheez use roke huye hai? khabardaar! jis din woh (azaab) aayega (phir) unse talega nahin aur woh (azaab) unhein gher lega jiska woh mazaaq udaate the.

verses.arabic: وَلَىِٕنْ اَذَقْنَا الْاِنْسَانَ مِنَّا رَحْمَةً ثُمَّ نَزَعْنٰهَا مِنْهُ اِنَّهٗ لَيَـٔوْسٌ كَفُوْرٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa la'in 'azagnal- 'insaana minnaa rahmatan summa naza'naahaa minhu, 'innahoo laya'oosun kafoor.
verses.translation: Aur agar hum insaan ko apni rahmat ka mazah chakhaayein, phir use chheen lein, to beshak woh bada na ummeed, bahut naashukra ho jaata hai.

verses.arabic: وَلَىِٕنْ اَذَقْنٰهُ نَعْمَاۗءَ بَعْدَ ضَرَّاۗءَ مَسَّتْهُ لَيَقُوْلَنَّ ذَهَبَ السَّيِّاٰتُ عَنِّيْ ۭ اِنَّهٗ لَفَرِحٌ فَخُوْرٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa la'in 'azaqnaahu na'maaa'a ba'da darraaa'a massathu layaqoolanna zahabas- sayyi'aatu 'anneee; 'innahoo lafarihun fakhoor
verses.translation: Aur agar hum use takleef pahunchne ke ba'd ne'maton ka mazah chakhaayein to woh zaroor kahega: mujh se sakhtiyaan door ho gayin, beshak woh (uss waqt) itraata aur fakhr jataata hai.

verses.arabic: اِلَّا الَّذِيْنَ صَبَرُوْا وَعَمِلُوا الصّٰلِحٰتِ اُولٰۗىٕكَ لَهُمْ مَّغْفِرَةٌ وَّاَجْرٌ كَبِيْرٌ
verses.transliteration: 'Illal-lazeena şabaroo wa 'amiluş-şaalihaati 'ulaaa'ika lahum maghfiratunw-wa 'ajrun kabeer.
verses.translation: Magar jin logon ne sabr kiya aur nek amal kiye, unhi ke liye bakhshish aur bahut bada ajr hai.

verses.arabic: فَلَعَلَّكَ تَارِكٌۢ بَعْضَ مَا يُوْحٰٓي اِلَيْكَ وَضَاۗىٕقٌ بِهٖ صَدْرُكَ اَنْ يَّقُوْلُوْا لَوْلَآ اُنْزِلَ عَلَيْهِ كَنْزٌ اَوْ جَاۗءَ مَعَهٗ مَلَكٌ ۭ اِنَّمَآ اَنْتَ نَذِيْرٌ ۭ وَاللّٰهُ عَلٰي كُلِّ شَيْءٍ وَّكِيْلٌ
verses.transliteration: Fala allaka taarikum- ba'da maa yoohaaa 'ilayka wa daaa'iqum- bihee şadruka 'any- yaqooloo law laaa 'unzila 'alayhi kanzun 'aw jaaa'a ma'ahoo malak; 'innamaaa 'anta nazeer; wallaahu 'alaa kulli shay'inw-wakeel.
verses.translation: To (Aye Nabi!) shaayad ke aap iss wahi se kuchh chhodne waale hon jo aapki taraf naazil ki jaati hai aur Aapka seena usse tang hone waala ho ke woh (kaafir) kahenge ke iss par koyi khazaana kyun nahin utaara gaya ya iske saath koyi farishtah (kyun nahin) aaya? aap to sirf daraane waale hain aur Allah har cheez par nigraan hai.

verses.arabic: اَمْ يَقُوْلُوْنَ افْتَرٰىهُ ۭ قُلْ فَاْتُوْا بِعَشْرِ سُوَرٍ مِّثْلِهٖ مُفْتَرَيٰتٍ وَّادْعُوْا مَنِ اسْتَطَعْتُمْ مِّنْ دُوْنِ اللّٰهِ اِنْ كُنْتُمْ صٰدِقِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Am yaqooloonaf- taraahu qul fa'too bi'ashri Suwarim-mislihee muftarayaatiñw-wad'oo manis-tata'tum min doonil-laahi 'in kuntum saadiqeen.
verses.translation: Kiya woh kahte hain ke usne yeh (qur'an) khud gadh liya hai? kah deejiye:- phir tum bhi iss jaisi 10 suratein gadh laao Allah ke siwa jinhein (madad ke liye) bula sakte ho bulaa lo, agar tum sachche ho?.

verses.arabic: فَاِلَّمْ يَسْتَجِيْبُوْا لَكُمْ فَاعْلَمُوْٓا اَنَّمَآ اُنْزِلَ بِعِلْمِ اللّٰهِ وَاَنْ لَآ اِلٰهَ اِلَّا هُوَ ۭ فَهَلْ اَنْتُمْ مُّسْلِمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Fa'il-lam yastajeeboo lakum falamooo 'annamaaa 'unzila bi'ilmil-laahi wa 'al- laaa 'ilaaha 'illaa Huwa fahal 'antum muslimoon.
verses.translation: Phir agar woh tumhein jawaab na dein to jaan lo ke yaqeenan yeh (qur'an) Allah ke ilm se utaara gaya hai aur yeh ke uske siwa koyi ma'bood nahin, phir (aye logo!( kiya tum musalmaan hote ho?.

verses.arabic: مَنْ كَانَ يُرِيْدُ الْحَيٰوةَ الدُّنْيَا وَزِيْنَتَهَا نُوَفِّ اِلَيْهِمْ اَعْمَالَهُمْ فِيْهَا وَهُمْ فِيْهَا لَا يُبْخَسُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Man kaana yureedul- hayaatad-dunyaa wa zeenatahaa nuwaffi 'ilayhim 'a'maalahum feehaa wa hum feehaa laa yubkhasoon.
verses.translation: Jo shakhs duniya ki zindagi aur uski zeenat chaahta hai to hum unke a'maal ka badlah isi duniya mein de dete hain aur uss mein unki haq talfi nahin ki jaati.

verses.arabic: اُولٰۗىٕكَ الَّذِيْنَ لَيْسَ لَهُمْ فِي الْاٰخِرَةِ اِلَّا النَّارُ ۖ وَحَبِطَ مَا صَنَعُوْا فِيْهَا وَبٰطِلٌ مَّا كَانُوْا يَعْمَلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Ulaaa'ikal-lazeena laysa lahum fil-'Aakhirati 'illan-Naaru wa habita maa sana'oo feehaa wa baatilum-maa kaanoo ya'maloon.
verses.translation: Yahi log hain jinke liye aakhirat mein aag ke siwa kuchh nahin aur barbaad ho gaya jo kuchh unhon ne duniya mein kamaaya tha aur jo. amal woh karte rahe zaaye' ho gaye.

verses.arabic: اَفَمَنْ كَانَ عَلٰي بَيِّنَةٍ مِّنْ رَّبِّهٖ وَيَتْلُوْهُ شَاهِدٌ مِّنْهُ وَمِنْ قَبْلِهٖ كِتٰبُ مُوْسٰٓي اِمَامًا وَّرَحْمَةً ۭ اُولٰۗىٕكَ يُؤْمِنُوْنَ بِهٖ ۭ وَمَنْ يَّكْفُرْ بِهٖ مِنَ الْاَحْزَابِ فَالنَّارُ مَوْعِدُهٗ ۭ فَلَا تَكُ فِيْ مِرْيَةٍ مِّنْهُ ۭ اِنَّهُ الْحَقُّ مِنْ رَّبِّكَ وَلٰكِنَّ اَكْثَرَ النَّاسِ لَا يُؤْمِنُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Afaman kaana 'alaa bayyinatim-mir-Rabbihee wa yatloohu shaahidum minhu wa min qablihee Kitaabu Moosaaa 'imaamañw-wa rahmah; 'ulaaa'ika yu'minoona bih; wa mañy-yakfur bihee minal-'Ahzaabi fan-Naaru maw'iduh; falaa taku fee miryatim- minh; 'innahul-haqqu mir-Rabbika wa laakinna 'aksaran-naasi laa yu'minoon.
verses.translation: Kiya bhala jo shakhs apne rab ki taraf se waazeh daleel par ho aur uske ba'd Allah ki taraf se ek gawaah (qur'an) bhi aajaaye jabke isse pahle Moosa ki kitab bhi rahnuma aur rahmat (rahi) ho (woh qur'an ka inkaar kar sakta hai?) aise log hi to iss (qur'an) par eemaan laate hain. aur un girohon mein se jo koyi iss ka inkaar kare to uska thhekaana aag hi hai. chunaancheh (Aye Nabi!) aap iss shak mein na paden, beshak yeh (qura'an) Aap ke rab ki taraf se haq hai lekin aksar log eemaan nahin laate.

verses.arabic: وَمَنْ اَظْلَمُ مِمَّنِ افْتَرٰي عَلَي اللّٰهِ كَذِبًا ۭ اُولٰۗىٕكَ يُعْرَضُوْنَ عَلٰي رَبِّهِمْ وَيَقُوْلُ الْاَشْهَادُ هٰٓؤُلَاۗءِ الَّذِيْنَ كَذَبُوْا عَلٰي رَبِّهِمْ ۭ اَلَا لَعْنَةُ اللّٰهِ عَلَي الظّٰلِمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa man 'azlamu mimmanif-taraa 'alal- laahi kazibaa; 'ulaaa'ika yu'radoona 'alaa Rabbihim wa yaqoolul- 'ashhaadu haaa'ulaaa'il- lazeena kazaboo 'alaa Rabbihim; 'alaa la'natul- laahi 'alaz-zaalimeen.
verses.translation: Aur Uss shakhs se ziyaadah zaalim kaun ho sakta hai jisne Allah par jhoot baandha? yahi log apne rab ke saamne pesh kiye jaayenge aur gawaah (farishte) kahenge ke yahi woh log hain jinhon ne apne rab par jhoot gadha tha,¹ sun lo! zaalimon par Allah ki la'nat hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Darj zail hadees se bhi iski taayeed hoti hai. Safwaan bin Muharrar se rivaayat hai, Abdullah bin Umar رضي الله عنها tawaaf kar rahe the ke ek shakhs saamne aaya aur kahne laga: aye Abu Abdur Rahmaan! Kiya aap ne Nabi ﷺ se najwaa (sargoshi) ke baare mein kuchh suna hai? Ibne Umar رضي الله عنها ne jawaab diya: main ne Nabi kareem ko ﷺ yeh farmaate huye suna: 'Momin ko apne rab ke qareeb laaya jaayega.' Hishaam ka bayaan hai: ' Momin apne rab ke iss qadar qareeb ho jaayega ke uska rab uss par apna pahlu rakh dega aur usse uske gunaahon ka e'teraaf karaayega (Allah usse farmaayega:) kiya tujhe apna fulaan gunhah ma'loom hai? woh momin do martabah kahega: main jaanta hoon, aye mere rab! Main jaanta hoon, uss waqt Allah farmaayega: main ne dunya mein tere gunaahon ki pardah poshi ki aur aaj main unhein tere liye mu'aaf kar deta hoon phir uski nekiyon ka ragistar band kar diya jaayega aur kuffaar ka haal yeh hoga ke gawaahon ke saamne e'laaniyah taur par kahaa jaayega: yahi hain woh log jinhon ne apne rab par jhoot bola tha.' (Sahih Bukhari, Tafseer, Surah Hood عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام baab:14, hadees:4685) (An-najwaa) qiyaamat ke roz Allah aur uske bande ke darmiyaan tanhaayi mein baat cheet, isse muraad khufyah mushaawarat bhi hai.

verses.arabic: اَلَّذِيْنَ يَصُدُّوْنَ عَنْ سَبِيْلِ اللّٰهِ وَيَبْغُوْنَهَا عِوَجًا ۭ وَهُمْ بِالْاٰخِرَةِ هُمْ كٰفِرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Allazeena yasuddoona 'an sabeelil- laahi wa yabghoonahaa 'iwajaa; wa hum bil- 'Aakhirati hum kaafiroon.
verses.translation: Woh jo Allah ki raah se rokte hain aur uss mein kaji dhoondte hain aur wahi aakhirat ka inkaar karne waale hain.

verses.arabic: اُولٰۗىٕكَ لَمْ يَكُوْنُوْا مُعْجِزِيْنَ فِي الْاَرْضِ وَمَا كَانَ لَهُمْ مِّنْ دُوْنِ اللّٰهِ مِنْ اَوْلِيَاۗءَ ۭ يُضٰعَفُ لَهُمُ الْعَذَابُ ۭ مَا كَانُوْا يَسْتَطِيْعُوْنَ السَّمْعَ وَمَا كَانُوْا يُبْصِرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Ulaaa'ika lam yakoonoo mu jizeena fil- 'ardi wa maa kaana lahum min doonil-laahi min 'awliyaaa; yudaa'afu lahumul- 'azaab; maa kaanoo yastatee'oonas-sam'a wa maa kaanoo yubşiroon.
verses.translation: Yeh log zameen mein (Allah ko) aajiz karne waale na the aur unke liye Allah ke siwa koyi himaayati na tha. unke liye 'azaab dugna kar diya jaayega. un mein (haq) sunne ki taab nahin thi aur na use dekhne ke rawadaar the.

verses.arabic: اُولٰۗىٕكَ الَّذِيْنَ خَسِرُوْٓا اَنْفُسَهُمْ وَضَلَّ عَنْهُمْ مَّا كَانُوْا يَفْتَرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Ulaaa'ikal-lazeena khasirooo 'anfusahum wa dalla 'anhum maa kaanoo yaftaroon.
verses.translation: Yahi log hain jinhon ne apne aapko khasaare mein daala aur unse gum hogaya jo woh eftra baandhe the

verses.arabic: لَا جَرَمَ اَنَّهُمْ فِي الْاٰخِرَةِ هُمُ الْاَخْسَرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Laa jarama 'annahum fil-'Aakhirati humul- 'akhsaroon.
verses.translation: Bila shubah yaqeenan wahi log aakhirat mein sabse ziyaadah khasaarah paane waale hain.

verses.arabic: اِنَّ الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا وَعَمِلُوا الصّٰلِحٰتِ وَاَخْبَتُوْٓا اِلٰى رَبِّهِمْ اُولٰۗىٕكَ اَصْحٰبُ الْجَنَّةِ ۚ هُمْ فِيْهَا خٰلِدُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Innal-lazeena 'aamanoo wa 'amilus- şaalihaati wa 'akhbatooo 'ilaa Rabbihim 'ulaaa'ika 'Ashaabul-Jannati hum feehaa khaalidoon.
verses.translation: Beshak jo log eemaan laaye aur unhon ne nek amal kiye aur apne rab ke huzoor aajizi ki, wahi jannati hain, woh USS mein hameshah rahenge.

verses.arabic: مَثَلُ الْفَرِيْقَيْنِ كَالْاَعْمٰى وَالْاَصَمِّ وَالْبَصِيْرِ وَالسَّمِيْعِ ۭ هَلْ يَسْتَوِيٰنِ مَثَلًا ۭ اَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Masalul-fareeqayni kal'a'maa wal'aşammi walbaşeeri wassamee'; hal yastawiyaani masalaa; 'afalaa tazakkaroon.
verses.translation: Donon fareeqon ki misaal aisie hai jaise andha aur bahra aur dekhne waala aur sunne waala, kiya masalan donon baraabar ho sakte hain? kiya phir tum naseehat haasil nahin karte?.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ اَرْسَلْنَا نُوْحًا اِلٰى قَوْمِهٖٓ اِنِّيْ لَكُمْ نَذِيْرٌ مُّبِيْنٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad 'arsalnaa Noohan 'ilaa qawmiheee 'innee lakum nazeerum- mubeen.
verses.translation: Aur albattah humne Nooh ko uski qaum ki taraf bheja (usne kaha:) beshak main tumhein saaf saaf daraane waala hoon.

verses.arabic: اَلَّا تَعْبُدُوْا اِلَّا اللّٰهَ اِنِّيْٓ اَخَافُ عَلَيْكُمْ عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ اَلِيْمٍ
verses.transliteration: 'Al-laa ta'budooo 'illal-laaha 'inneee 'akhaafu 'alaykum 'azaaba Yawmin 'aleem.
verses.translation: Yeh ke tum Allah ke siwa kisi ki i'baadat na karo. beshak mujhe tum par dardnaak din ke azaab ka khauf aata hai.

verses.arabic: فَقَالَ الْمَلَاُ الَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا مِنْ قَوْمِهٖ مَا نَرٰىكَ اِلَّا بَشَرًا مِّثْلَنَا وَمَا نَرٰىكَ اتَّبَعَكَ اِلَّا الَّذِيْنَ هُمْ اَرَاذِلُنَا بَادِيَ الرَّاْيِ وَمَا نَرٰى لَكُمْ عَلَيْنَا مِنْ فَضْلٍ ۙ بَلْ نَظُنُّكُمْ كٰذِبِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Faqaalal-mala'ul- lazeena kafaroo min qawmihee maa naraaka 'illaa basharam-mislanaa wa maa naraakat- taba'aka 'illal-lazeena hum 'araazilunaa baadiyar-ra'yi wa maa naraa lakum 'alaynaa min fadlim-bal nazunnukum kaazibeen.
verses.translation: Phir uske kaafir qaum ke wadere (zameendaar) bole: beshak hum tumhein apne hi jaisa bashar dekhte hain aur yeh bhi dekhte hain ke bus unhi logon ne be soche samjhe teri pairwi ki hai jo

verses.arabic: قَالَ يٰقَوْمِ اَرَءَيْتُمْ اِنْ كُنْتُ عَلٰي بَيِّنَةٍ مِّنْ رَّبِّيْ وَاٰتٰىنِيْ رَحْمَةً مِّنْ عِنْدِهٖ فَعُمِّيَتْ عَلَيْكُمْ ۚ اَنُلْزِمُكُمُوْهَا وَاَنْتُمْ لَهَا كَارِهُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala yaa qawmi 'ara'aytum 'in kuntu 'alaa bayyinatim-mir- Rabbee wa 'aataanee rahmatam-min 'indihee fa'ummiyat 'alaykum 'anulzimukumoohaa wa 'antum lahaa kaarihoon.
verses.translation: Nooh ne kaha ai meri qaum! Tumne dekha agar main apne rab ki taraf se ek wazeh daleel par hoon aur usne mujhe apni taraf se rehmat di ho jo tum par chhup gayi ho to kya hum tumhein ispar majboor kar sakte hain jab ke tum isse nafrat karte ho?

verses.arabic: وَيٰقَوْمِ لَآ اَسْــَٔـلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مَالًا ۭ اِنْ اَجْرِيَ اِلَّا عَلَي اللّٰهِ وَمَآ اَنَا بِطَارِدِ الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا ۭ اِنَّهُمْ مُّلَاقُوْا رَبِّهِمْ وَلٰكِنِّيْٓ اَرٰىكُمْ قَوْمًا تَجْهَلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa yaa qawmi laaa 'as'alukum 'alayhi maalan 'in 'ajriya 'illaa 'alal-laah; wa maaa 'ana bitaaridil-lazeena 'aamanoo; 'innahum mulaaqoo Rabbihim wa laakinneee 'araakum qawman tajhaloon.
verses.translation: Aur ai meri qaum! Main tumse ispar koi maal talab nahi karta, mera ajar to Allah ke zimmay hai aur main un logon ko door karne wala nahi jo imaan laye hain, beshak wo apne rab se milne wale hain magar main tumhein ek aise qoum dekh raha hoon jo jahil hai

verses.arabic: وَيٰقَوْمِ مَنْ يَّنْصُرُنِيْ مِنَ اللّٰهِ اِنْ طَرَدْتُّهُمْ ۭ اَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa yaa qawmi mañy- yanşurunee minal-laahi 'in tarat-tuhum; 'afalaa tazakkaroon.n
verses.translation: Aur ai meri qaum! Agar main unhein door kar doon to Allah ke azab se mujhe kaun bachaayega? To kya tum sochte nahi?

verses.arabic: وَلَآ اَقُوْلُ لَكُمْ عِنْدِيْ خَزَاۗىٕنُ اللّٰهِ وَلَآ اَعْلَمُ الْغَيْبَ وَلَآ اَقُوْلُ اِنِّيْ مَلَكٌ وَلَآ اَقُوْلُ لِلَّذِيْنَ تَزْدَرِيْٓ اَعْيُنُكُمْ لَنْ يُّؤْتِيَهُمُ اللّٰهُ خَيْرًا ۭ اَللّٰهُ اَعْلَمُ بِمَا فِيْٓ اَنْفُسِهِمْ ۭ اِنِّيْٓ اِذًا لَّمِنَ الظّٰلِمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laaa 'aqoolu lakum 'indee khazaaa'inul-laahi wa laaa 'a'lamul-ghayba wa laaa 'aqoolu 'innee malakunw-wa laaa 'aqoolu lillazeena tazdareee 'a'yunukum lany-yu'tiyahumul-laahu khayran 'Allaahu 'alamu bimaa feee 'anfusihim 'inneee 'izal- laminaz-zaalimeen.
verses.translation: Aur main tumse nahin kahta ke mere paas Allah ke khazaane hain, aur na main ghaib jaanta hoon aur na main kahta hoon ke beshak main farishtah hoon aur na main unhein jinhein tumhaari aankhein haqeer dekhti hain, (yeh) kahta hoon ke Allah unhein koyi bhalaayi nahin dega. Allah khoob jaanta hai jo kuchh unke dilon mein hai. beshak (agar main ne yeh baaten kahin) tab main zaroor zaalimon mein se hunga.

verses.arabic: قَالُوْا يٰنُوْحُ قَدْ جَادَلْتَنَا فَاَكْثَرْتَ جِدَالَنَا فَاْتِنَا بِمَا تَعِدُنَآ اِنْ كُنْتَ مِنَ الصّٰدِقِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo yaa Noohu qad jaadaltanaa fa'aksarta jidaalanaa fa'tinaa bimaa ta'idunaaa 'in kunta minaş-şaadiqeen.
verses.translation: Unhon ne kaha: aye Nooh! tu hum se jhagad chuka hai aur hamaare saath bahut jhagda kar chuka hai, chunaancheh tu hum par woh azaab le hi aa jiska humse wa'dah karta hai agar tu sachcha hai.

verses.arabic: قَالَ اِنَّمَا يَاْتِيْكُمْ بِهِ اللّٰهُ اِنْ شَاۗءَ وَمَآ اَنْتُمْ بِمُعْجِزِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala 'innamaa ya'teekum bihil-laahu 'in shaaa'a wa maaa 'antum bimu'jizeen.
verses.translation: Nooh ne kaha: yaqeenan Allah hi tum par woh (azaab) laayega agar usne chaaha aur tum (use) aajiz karne waale nahin.

verses.arabic: وَلَا يَنْفَعُكُمْ نُصْحِيْٓ اِنْ اَرَدْتُّ اَنْ اَنْصَحَ لَكُمْ اِنْ كَانَ اللّٰهُ يُرِيْدُ اَنْ يُّغْوِيَكُمْ ۭ هُوَ رَبُّكُمْ وَاِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laa yanfa'ukum nuşheee 'in 'arattu 'an 'anşaha lakum 'in kaanal-laahu yureedu 'any-yughwiyakum; Huwa Rabbukum wa 'ilayhi turja'oon.
verses.translation: Aur tumhein meri naseehat nafa' nahin degi agar main chaahun ke tumhein naseehat karun jabke Allah tumhein gumraah karna chaahta ho, wahi tumhaara rab hai aur usi ki taraf tum lautaaye jaao ge.

verses.arabic: اَمْ يَقُوْلُوْنَ افْتَرٰىهُ ۭ قُلْ اِنِ افْتَرَيْتُهٗ فَعَلَيَّ اِجْرَامِيْ وَاَنَا۟ بَرِيْۗءٌ مِّمَّا تُجْرِمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Am yaqooloonaf- taraahu qul 'inif- taraytuhoo faʻalayya 'ijraamee wa 'ana bareee'um-mimmaa tujrimoon.
verses.translation: Kiya woh kahte hain ke usne usko khud gadh liya hai, (Aye Nabi!) kah deejiye: agar main ne ise khud gadha hai to mera jurm mujh hi par hai aur main usse bari hoon jo tum jurm karte ho.

verses.arabic: وَاُوْحِيَ اِلٰي نُوْحٍ اَنَّهٗ لَنْ يُّؤْمِنَ مِنْ قَوْمِكَ اِلَّا مَنْ قَدْ اٰمَنَ فَلَا تَبْتَىٕسْ بِمَا كَانُوْا يَفْعَلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'oohiya 'ilaa Noohin 'annahoo lañy- yu'mina min qawmika 'illaa man qad 'aamana falaa tabta'is bimaa kaanoo yafaloon.
verses.translation: Aur Nooh ki taraf wahi ki gayi ke teri qaum mein se koyi eemaan nahin laayega siwaaye uske jo (pahle) eemaan laa chuka hai chunaancheh woh jo kuchh kar rahe hain tu uss par gham na kha.

verses.arabic: وَاصْنَعِ الْفُلْكَ بِاَعْيُنِنَا وَوَحْيِنَا وَلَا تُخَاطِبْنِيْ فِي الَّذِيْنَ ظَلَمُوْا ۚ اِنَّهُمْ مُّغْرَقُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wasna'il-fulka bi'a'yuninaa wa wahyinaa wa laa tukhaatibnee fil-lazeena zalamooo; 'innahum mughraqoon.
verses.translation: Aur tu hamaari aankhon ke saamne hamaari wahi ke mutaabiq ek kashti bana aur mujhse un logon ke muta'alliq baat mat karna jinhon ne zulm (kufr) kiya, beshak unhen gharq kar diya jaayega.

verses.arabic: وَيَصْنَعُ الْفُلْكَ وَكُلَّمَا مَرَّ عَلَيْهِ مَلَاٌ مِّنْ قَوْمِهٖ سَخِرُوْا مِنْهُ ۭ قَالَ اِنْ تَسْخَرُوْا مِنَّا فَاِنَّا نَسْخَرُ مِنْكُمْ كَمَا تَسْخَرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa yaşna'ul-fulka wa kullamaa marra 'alayhi mala'um-min qawmihee sakhiroo minh; qaala 'in taskharoo minnaa fa'innaa naskharu minkum kamaa taskharoon.
verses.translation: Aur Nooh kashti banaata tha aur jab uski qaum ke wadere (zameendaar) uske paas se guzarte to woh usse mazaaq karte, Nooh ne kaha: agar tum (aaj) humse

verses.arabic: فَسَوْفَ تَعْلَمُوْنَ مَنْ يَّاْتِيْهِ عَذَابٌ يُّخْزِيْهِ وَيَحِلُّ عَلَيْهِ عَذَابٌ مُّقِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: Fasawfa taʻlamoona many-ya'teehi 'azaabuñy-yukhzeehi wa yahillu 'alayhi 'azaabum-muqeem.
verses.translation: Phir tum jald jaan loge ke kis shakhs par aisa azaab aata hai jo use (duniya mein) ruswa kar dega aur (aakhirat mein) uss par hameshah ka azaab naazil hoga.

verses.arabic: حَتّٰىٓ اِذَا جَاۗءَ اَمْرُنَا وَفَارَ التَّنُّوْرُ ۙ قُلْنَا احْمِلْ فِيْهَا مِنْ كُلٍّ زَوْجَيْنِ اثْنَيْنِ وَاَهْلَكَ اِلَّا مَنْ سَبَقَ عَلَيْهِ الْقَوْلُ وَمَنْ اٰمَنَ ۭ وَمَآ اٰمَنَ مَعَهٗٓ اِلَّا قَلِيْلٌ
verses.transliteration: Hattaaa 'izaa jaaa'a 'amrunaa wa faarat- tannooru qulnah-mil feehaa min kullin zawjaiynis-nayni wa 'ahlaka 'illaa man sabaqa 'alayhil-qawlu wa man 'aaman; wa maaa 'aamana ma'ahooo 'illaa qaleel.
verses.translation: Hatta ke jab hamaara hukm aagaya aur tannur ne josh maara to humne (Nooh se) kaha: uss (kashti) mein har qism (ke jaanwaron) ka joda, do (nar aur maadah) sawaar karle aur apne ghar waalon ko, siwaaye uss shakhs ke jiski baabat pahle hukm ho chuka aur unko bhi jo eemaan laa chuke hain aur uss par thode hi log eemaan laaye the.

verses.arabic: وَقَالَ ارْكَبُوْا فِيْهَا بِسْمِ اللّٰهِ مَجْرٖٮهَا وَمُرْسٰٮهَا ۭ اِنَّ رَبِّيْ لَغَفُوْرٌ رَّحِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa qaalar-kaboo feehaa bismil-laahi majrihaa wa mursaahaa; 'inna Rabbee la- Ghafoorur-Raheem.
verses.translation: Aur Nooh ne kaha: iss (kashti) mein sawaar ho jaao, Allah ke naam se hai uska chalna aur thhaharna, beshak mera rab albattah bahut bakhshne waala, nehaayat raham karne waala hai

verses.arabic: وَهِيَ تَجْرِيْ بِهِمْ فِيْ مَوْجٍ كَالْجِبَالِ وَنَادٰى نُوْحُ ابْنَهٗ وَكَانَ فِيْ مَعْزِلٍ يّٰبُنَيَّ ارْكَبْ مَّعَنَا وَلَا تَكُنْ مَّعَ الْكٰفِرِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa hiya tajree bihim fee mawjin kaljibaali wa naadaa Noohunib-nahoo wa kaana fee maʻziliñy- yaa bunayyar-kam- ma'anaa wa laa takum- ma'al-kaafireen.
verses.translation: Aur woh (kashti) unhein pahaad jaisi maujon mein le jaati thi aur Nooh ne apne bete ko pukaara, aur woh (sabse) alag thalag tha: piyaare bete! tu (bhi) hamaare saath sawaar ho jaa aur kaafiron mein shaamil na ho.

verses.arabic: قَالَ سَاٰوِيْٓ اِلٰى جَبَلٍ يَّعْصِمُنِيْ مِنَ الْمَاۗءِ ۚ قَالَ لَا عَاصِمَ الْيَوْمَ مِنْ اَمْرِ اللّٰهِ اِلَّا مَنْ رَّحِمَ ۭ وَحَالَ بَيْنَهُمَا الْمَوْجُ فَكَانَ مِنَ الْمُغْرَقِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala sa'aaweee 'ilaa jabaliny-ya'şimunee minal-maaa'; qaala laa 'aaşimal-yawma min 'amril-laahi 'illaa mar- rahim; wa haala baynahumal-mawju fakaana minal- mughraqeen.
verses.translation: Woh bola: main abhi kisi pahaad ki taraf panaah le leta hoon, woh mujhe paani se bachaa lega. Nooh ne kaha: aaj Allah ke hukm (azaab) se koyi bachaane waala nahin magar jis par 0 Allah raham farmaye¹ aur un donon ke darmiyaan lahar haayel ho gayi to woh gharq shudah logon mein shaamil ho gaya.
verses.deepMeaning: Rasoolullah ﷺ ne farmaya: 'Jab bhi koyi khaleefah muqarrar kiya jaata hai to uske musheer do tarah ke hote hain: ek use neki ka hukm deta aur uski raghbat dilaata hai jabke doosra use buraayi ka hukm deta aur uski targheeb deta hai lekin ma'soom (gunaah se mahfooz) wahi hai jíse Allah bachaaye rakkhe.' (Sahih Bukhari, Al-qadr, Baab:8, Hadees:6611)

verses.arabic: وَقِيْلَ يٰٓاَرْضُ ابْلَعِيْ مَاۗءَكِ وَيٰسَمَآءُ اَقْلِعِيْ وَغِيْضَ الْمَاۗءُ وَقُضِيَ الْاَمْرُ وَاسْتَوَتْ عَلَي الْجُوْدِيِّ ۭ وَقِيْلَ بُعْدًا لِّلْقَوْمِ الظّٰلِمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa qeela yaaa 'ardub-la'ee maaa'aki wa yaa samaaa'u 'aqli'ee wa gheedal- maaa'u wa qudiyal- 'amru wastawat 'alal- joodiyyi wa qeela bu'dal- lilqawmiz-zaalimeen.
verses.translation: Aur kaha gaya: aye zameen! tu apna paani nigal le, aur aye aasmaan! tu (barasne se) tham ja aur paani khushk kar diya gaya aur (kaafiron ka) kaam tamaam kar diya gaya, aur kashti joodi pahaad par jaa thhahri aur kaha gaya: zaalim qaum ke liye doori (la'nat) hai.

verses.arabic: وَنَادٰى نُوْحٌ رَّبَّهٗ فَقَالَ رَبِّ اِنَّ ابْنِيْ مِنْ اَهْلِيْ وَاِنَّ وَعْدَكَ الْحَقُّ ۚ وَاَنْتَ اَحْكَمُ الْحٰكِمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa naadaa Noohur- Rabbahoo faqaala Rabbi 'innab-nee min 'ahlee wa 'inna wa'dakal-haqqu wa 'Anta 'ahkamul- haakimeen.
verses.translation: Aur Nooh ne apne rab ko pukaara, chunaancheh usne kaha: aye mere rab! beshak mera beta mere ahal mein se hai aur beshak tera wa'dah sachcha hai aur tu sab faisle karne waalon mein se behtar faislah karne waala hai.

verses.arabic: قَالَ يٰنُوْحُ اِنَّهٗ لَيْسَ مِنْ اَهْلِكَ ۚ اِنَّهٗ عَمَلٌ غَيْرُ صَالِحٍ فَلَا تَسْـــَٔلْنِ مَا لَيْسَ لَكَ بِهٖ عِلْمٌ ۖ اِنِّيْٓ اَعِظُكَ اَنْ تَكُوْنَ مِنَ الْجٰهِلِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala yaa Noohu 'innahoo laysa min 'ahlika 'innahoo 'amalun ghayru saalihin falaa tas'alni maa laysa laka bihee 'ilmun 'inneee 'a'izuka 'an takoona minal-jaahileen.
verses.translation: Allah ne kaha: aye Nooh! beshak woh tere ahal mein se nahin, beshak uska amal nek nahin, lihaaza tu mujhse uss cheez ka sawaal na kar jiska tujhe koyi ilm nahin. beshak main tujhe naseehat karta hoon ke tu jaahilon mein shaamil (na) ho.

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ اِنِّيْٓ اَعُوْذُ بِكَ اَنْ اَسْــئَلَكَ مَا لَيْسَ لِيْ بِهٖ عِلْمٌ ۖ وَاِلَّا تَغْفِرْ لِيْ وَتَرْحَمْنِيْٓ اَكُنْ مِّنَ الْخٰسِرِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala rabbi 'inneee 'a'oozu bika 'an 'as'alaka maa laysa lee bihee 'ilm; wa 'illaa taghfir lee wa tarhamneee 'akum- minal-khaasireen.
verses.translation: Nooh ne kaha: aye mere rab! beshak main teri panaah mein aata hoon usse ke main tujh se uss cheez ka sawaal karoon jiska mujhe koyi ilm nahin aur agar tune meri bakhshish na ki aur mujh par raham (na) kiya to main khasaarah paane waalon mein se ho jaaounga.

verses.arabic: قِيْلَ يٰنُوْحُ اهْبِطْ بِسَلٰمٍ مِّنَّا وَبَرَكٰتٍ عَلَيْكَ وَعَلٰٓي اُمَمٍ مِّمَّنْ مَّعَكَ ۚ وَاُمَمٌ سَنُمَتِّعُهُمْ ثُمَّ يَمَسُّهُمْ مِّنَّا عَذَابٌ اَلِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: Qeela yaa Noohuh-bit bisalaamim-minnaa wa barakaatin 'alayka wa 'alaaa 'umamim- mimmam-ma'ak; wa 'umamun sanumatti'uhum summa yamassuhum- minnaa 'azaabun 'aleem.
verses.translation: Kaha gaya: aye Nooh! Utar tu hamaari taraf se salaamti aur barkaton ke saath jo tujh par aur tere saath ki jamaa'aton par (naazil ki gayi) hain aur kuchh jamaa'atein hongi ke hum (dunya mein) unhein faayedah denge phir unhein hamaari taraf se dardnaak azaab pahunchega.

verses.arabic: تِلْكَ مِنْ اَنْۢبَاۗءِ الْغَيْبِ نُوْحِيْهَآ اِلَيْكَ ۚ مَا كُنْتَ تَعْلَمُهَآ اَنْتَ وَلَا قَوْمُكَ مِنْ قَبْلِ هٰذَا ۖ فَاصْبِرْ اِنَّ الْعَاقِبَةَ لِلْمُتَّقِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Tilka min 'ambaaa'il- ghaybi nooheehaaa 'ilayka maa kunta talamuhaaa 'anta wa laa qawmuka min qabli haazaa faşbir 'innal- 'aaqibata lilmuttaqeen
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) yeh kuchh ghaib ki khabren hain, hum unhein aapki taraf wahi karte hain, isse pahle na aap unhein jaante the aur na aap ki qaum, isliye aap sabar karein, beshak (behtareen) anjaam muttaqeen hi ke liye hai.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Aaqibat dunya-o-aakhirat ke achchhe anjaam ko kahte hain. iss mein muttaqeen ke liye badi bashaarat hai ke ibtedaa mein chaahe unhein kitna bhi mushkilaat se do chaar hona pade taahum bil aakhir Allah ki madad wa nusrat aur husne anjaam ke wahi mustahiq hain, jis tarah (Surah Momin: 40/51) aur surah saaffaat:37/17-171) mein bhi waarid hai. mazeed mulaahazah ho haashiyah: (Surah Baqarah:2/2)

verses.arabic: وَاِلٰى عَادٍ اَخَاهُمْ هُوْدًا ۗ قَالَ يٰقَوْمِ اعْبُدُوا اللّٰهَ مَا لَكُمْ مِّنْ اِلٰهٍ غَيْرُهٗ ۭ اِنْ اَنْتُمْ اِلَّا مُفْتَرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: wa 'ilaa 'Aadin 'akhaahum Hoodaa; qaala yaa qawmi'-budul- laaha maa lakum min 'ilaahin ghayruhooo 'in 'antum 'illaa muftaroon.
verses.translation: Aur (humne) Aad ki taraf unke bhaai Hood ko bheja, usne kaha: aye meri qaum! tum Allah ki i'baadat karo, tumhaare liye uske siwa koyi ma'bood nahin, tum to mahaz jhoot gadhne waale ho.

verses.arabic: يٰقَوْمِ لَآ اَسْــَٔـلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ اَجْرًا ۭ اِنْ اَجْرِيَ اِلَّا عَلَي الَّذِيْ فَطَرَنِيْ ۚ اَفَلَا تَعْقِلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Yaa qawmi laaa 'as'alukum 'alayhi 'ajran 'in 'ajriya 'illaa 'alal- lazee fataranee; 'afalaa ta'qiloon.
verses.translation: Aye meri qaum! main tumse iss (tableegh) par koyi ajr nahin maangta, mera ajr to uss zaat ke zimme hai jisne mujhe paida kiya, phir kiya tum aqal nahin rakhte?

verses.arabic: وَيٰقَوْمِ اسْتَغْفِرُوْا رَبَّكُمْ ثُمَّ تُوْبُوْٓا اِلَيْهِ يُرْسِلِ السَّمَاۗءَ عَلَيْكُمْ مِّدْرَارًا وَّيَزِدْكُمْ قُوَّةً اِلٰى قُوَّتِكُمْ وَلَا تَتَوَلَّوْا مُجْرِمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa yaa qawmis- taghfiroo Rabbakum summa toobooo 'ilayhi yursilis-samaaa'a 'alaykum midraarañw- wa yazidkum quwwatan 'ilaa quwwatikum wa laa tatawallaw mujrimeen.
verses.translation: Aur aye meri qaum! tum apne rab se bakhshish maango, phir uski taraf taubah karo, woh tum par khoob barasne waale baadal bhejega aur tumhaari quwwat par quwwat badhaayega aur tum mujrim ban kar (haq se) munh na modo.

verses.arabic: قَالُوْا يٰهُوْدُ مَا جِئْتَنَا بِبَيِّنَةٍ وَّمَا نَحْنُ بِتَارِكِيْٓ اٰلِهَتِنَا عَنْ قَوْلِكَ وَمَا نَحْنُ لَكَ بِمُؤْمِنِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo yaa Hoodu maa ji'tanaa bibayyinatinw-wa maa nahnu bitaarikeee 'aalihatinaa 'an qawlika wa maa nahnu laka bimu'mineen.
verses.translation: Unhon ne kaha: aye Hood! tu hamaare paas koyi waazeh daleel nahin laaya aur hum (sirf) tere kahne se apne ma'boodon ko chhodne waale nahin aur hum tujh par eemaan laane waale (bhi) nahin.

verses.arabic: اِنْ نَّقُوْلُ اِلَّا اعْتَرٰىكَ بَعْضُ اٰلِهَتِنَا بِسُوْۗءٍ ۭ قَالَ اِنِّيْٓ اُشْهِدُ اللّٰهَ وَاشْهَدُوْٓا اَنِّيْ بَرِيْۗءٌ مِّمَّا تُشْرِكُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'In naqoolu 'illa'- taraaka ba'du 'aalihatinaa bisooo; qaala 'inneee ushhidullaaha wash- hadooo 'annee bareee'um-mimmaa tushrikoon.
verses.translation: Hum to yahi kahte hain ke hamaare kisi ma'bood ne tujhe (dimaaghi) kharaabi mein mubtala kar diya hai. Hood ne kaha: beshak main Allah ko gawaah banaata hoon aur tum bhi gawaah raho ke beshak main bari hoon unse jinhein tum shareek thhahraate ho.

verses.arabic: مِنْ دُوْنِهٖ ۚ فَكِيْدُوْنِيْ جَمِيْعًا ثُمَّ لَا تُنْظِرُوْنِ
verses.transliteration: Min doonihee fakeedoonee jamee'an summa laa tunziroon
verses.translation: Siwaaye Allah ke, chunaancheh tum sab milkar mujhe nuqsaan pahunchaane ki tadbeer karlo phir tum mujhe mohlat na do.

verses.arabic: اِنِّيْ تَوَكَّلْتُ عَلَي اللّٰهِ رَبِّيْ وَرَبِّكُمْ ۭ مَا مِنْ دَآبَّةٍ اِلَّا هُوَ اٰخِذٌۢ بِنَاصِيَتِهَا ۭ اِنَّ رَبِّيْ عَلٰي صِرَاطٍ مُّسْتَقِيْمٍ
verses.transliteration: 'Innee tawakkaltu 'alal-laahi Rabbee wa Rabbikum; maa min daaabbatin 'illaa Huwa 'aakhizum binaaşiyatihaa; 'inna Rabbee 'alaa Şiraatim- mustaqeem.
verses.translation: Beshak main ne Allah par bharosa kiya hai jo mera rab hai aur tumhaara rab hai, (zameen par) chalne waala koyi jaandaar aisa nahin jise usne peshaani se na pakad rakhkha ho, beshak mera rab siraate mustaqeem par hai.

verses.arabic: فَاِنْ تَوَلَّوْا فَقَدْ اَبْلَغْتُكُمْ مَّآ اُرْسِلْتُ بِهٖٓ اِلَيْكُمْ ۚ وَيَسْتَخْلِفُ رَبِّيْ قَوْمًا غَيْرَكُمْ ۖ وَلَا تَضُرُّوْنَهٗ شَيْـًٔا ۭ اِنَّ رَبِّيْ عَلٰي كُلِّ شَيْءٍ حَفِيْظٌ
verses.transliteration: Fa'in tawallaw faqad 'ablaghtukum maaa 'ursiltu biheee 'ilaykum; wa yastakhlifu Rabbee qawman ghayrakum wa laa tadurroonahoo shay'aa; 'inna Rabbee 'alaa kulli shay'in Hafeez
verses.translation: Phir agar tum (haq se) munh modoge to main ne woh (paighaam) tumhen pahunchaa diya hai jiske saath mujhe tumhaari taraf bheja gaya tha mera rab ek aur qaum ko (tumhaara) jaanasheen banaa dega, aur tum use kuchh bhi nuqsaan nahin pahunchaa sakoge. beshak mera rab har cheez par nigehbaan hai.

verses.arabic: وَلَمَّا جَاۗءَ اَمْرُنَا نَجَّيْنَا هُوْدًا وَّالَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا مَعَهٗ بِرَحْمَةٍ مِّنَّا وَنَجَّيْنٰهُمْ مِّنْ عَذَابٍ غَلِيْظٍ
verses.transliteration: Wa lammaa jaaa'a 'amrunaa najjaynaa Hoodañw-wallazeena 'aamanoo ma'ahoo birahmatim-minnaa wa najjaynaahum min 'azaabin ghaleez.
verses.translation: Aur jab hamaara hukm (azaab) aagaya to humne Hood aur uss ke saath eemaan laane waalon ko, apni rahmat se nijhaat di aur humne unhen shadeed azaab se nijaat di.

verses.arabic: وَتِلْكَ عَادٌ ۖ جَحَدُوْا بِاٰيٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ وَعَصَوْا رُسُلَهٗ وَاتَّبَعُوْٓا اَمْرَ كُلِّ جَبَّارٍ عَنِيْدٍ
verses.transliteration: Wa tilka 'Aadun jahadoo bi-'Aayaati- Rabbihim wa 'aşaw Rusulahoo wattaba'o00 'amra kulli jabbaarin 'aneed.
verses.translation: Aur (dekho) yeh Aad the, unhon ne apne rab ki aayaton ka inkaar kiya tha aur Allah ke Rasoolon ki naafarmaani ki aur har sarkash aur (haq se) e'naad rakhne waale ka kaha maana

verses.arabic: وَاُتْبِعُوْا فِيْ هٰذِهِ الدُّنْيَا لَعْنَةً وَّيَوْمَ الْقِيٰمَةِ ۭ اَلَآ اِنَّ عَادًا كَفَرُوْا رَبَّهُمْ ۭ اَلَا بُعْدًا لِّعَادٍ قَوْمِ هُوْدٍ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'utbi'oo fee haazihid-dunyaa la'natanw-wa Yawmal- Qiyaamah; 'alaaa 'inna 'Aadan kafaroo Rabbahum; 'alaa bu'dal- li-'Aadin qawmi Hood
verses.translation: Aur iss duniya mein la'nat unke peechhe lagi rahi aur roze qiyaamat ko bhi (lagi rahegi.) aagaah raho! beshak (qaum) Aad ne apne rab ka inkaar kiya. sun lo! phatkaar hai Hood ki qaum Aad par.

verses.arabic: وَاِلٰى ثَمُوْدَ اَخَاهُمْ صٰلِحًا ۗ قَالَ يٰقَوْمِ اعْبُدُوا اللّٰهَ مَا لَكُمْ مِّنْ اِلٰهٍ غَيْرُهٗ ۭ هُوَ اَنْشَاَكُمْ مِّنَ الْاَرْضِ وَاسْتَعْمَرَكُمْ فِيْهَا فَاسْتَغْفِرُوْهُ ثُمَّ تُوْبُوْٓا اِلَيْهِ ۭ اِنَّ رَبِّيْ قَرِيْبٌ مُّجِيْبٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'ilaa Samooda 'akhaahum Şaalihaa; qaala yaa qawmi'-budul- laaha maa lakum min 'ilaahin ghayruhoo Huwa 'ansha'akum minal-'ardi wasta'marakum feehaa fastaghfiroohu summa toobooo 'ilayh; 'inna Rabbee Qareebum- Mujeeb.
verses.translation: Aur (humne) Samood ki taraf unke bhaai Saaleh ko bheja. usne kaha: aye meri qaum! Tum Allah ki i'baadat karo, uske siwa tumhaara koyi ma'bood nahin, usi ne tumhein zameen se paida kiya aur usi ne tumhen iss mein aabaad kiya, chunaancheh tum usi se bakhshish maango phir usi ki taraf taubah karo. beshak mera rab bahut qareeb hai, (du'ayein) qubool karne waala hai.

verses.arabic: قَالُوْا يٰصٰلِحُ قَدْ كُنْتَ فِيْنَا مَرْجُوًّا قَبْلَ هٰذَا ۖ اَتَنْهٰىنَآ اَنْ نَّعْبُدَ مَا يَعْبُدُ اٰبَاۗؤُنَا ۚ وَاِنَّنَا لَفِيْ شَكٍّ مِّمَّا تَدْعُوْنَآ اِلَيْهِ مُرِيْبٍ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo yaa Şaalihu qad kunta feenaa marjuwwan qabla haazaaa 'atanhaanaaa 'an na'buda maa ya'budu 'aabaaa'unaa wa 'innanaa lafee shakkim-mimmaa tad'oonaaa 'ilayhi mureeb.
verses.translation: Unhon ne kaha: aye Saaleh tahqeeq tu isse pahle hum mein ummeed ka markaz tha. kiya tu hamein iss baat se rokta hai ke hum unki ibaadat karein jinki hamaare baap daada i'baadat karte the? aur bilaashubah jiss cheez (tauheed) ki taraf tu humein bulaata hai hum uske muta'alliq aise shak mein hain jo pareshaan kun hai.

verses.arabic: قَالَ يٰقَوْمِ اَرَءَيْتُمْ اِنْ كُنْتُ عَلٰي بَيِّنَةٍ مِّنْ رَّبِّيْ وَءَاتٰىنِيْ مِنْهُ رَحْمَةً فَمَنْ يَّنْصُرُنِيْ مِنَ اللّٰهِ اِنْ عَصَيْتُهٗ ۚ فَمَا تَزِيْدُوْنَنِيْ غَيْرَ تَخْسِيْرٍ
verses.transliteration: Qaala yaa qawmi 'ara'aytum 'in kuntu 'alaa bayyinatim-mir-Rabbee wa 'aataanee minhu rahmatan famañу- yanşurunee minal-laahi 'in 'aşaytuhoo famaa tazeedoonanee ghayra takhseer.
verses.translation: Saaleh ne kaha: aye meri qaum! bhala bataao to, agar main apne rab ki taraf se waazeh daleel par hoon aur usne mujhe apni taraf se rahmat (nabuwwat) di ho, phir agar main uski naafarmaani karoon to Allah (ke azaab) se meri madad kaun karega? tum to mera nuqsaan hi badhaa rahe ho.

verses.arabic: وَيٰقَوْمِ هٰذِهٖ نَاقَةُ اللّٰهِ لَكُمْ اٰيَةً فَذَرُوْهَا تَاْكُلْ فِيْٓ اَرْضِ اللّٰهِ وَلَا تَمَسُّوْهَا بِسُوْۗءٍ فَيَاْخُذَكُمْ عَذَابٌ قَرِيْبٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa yaa qawmi haazihee naaqatul-laahi lakum 'Aayatan fazaroohaa ta'kul feee 'ardil-laahi wa laa tamassoohaa bisooo'in faya'khuzakum 'azaabun qareeb.
verses.translation: Aur aye meri qaum! yeh ountni tumhaare liye Allah ki nishaani hai, lihaaza tum ise chhod do ke khaati (charti) phire Allah ki zameen mein, aur tum ise buraayi se na chhoona warnah tumhein jald azaab pakad lega.

verses.arabic: فَعَقَرُوْهَا فَقَالَ تَمَتَّعُوْا فِيْ دَارِكُمْ ثَلٰثَةَ اَيَّامٍ ۭ ذٰلِكَ وَعْدٌ غَيْرُ مَكْذُوْبٍ
verses.transliteration: Fa'agaroohaa faqaala tamatta'oo fee daarikum salaasata 'ayyaamin zaalika wa'dun ghayru makzoob.
verses.translation: phir unhon ne uski taangein kaat daalin, to saaleh ne kaha: tum apne gharon mein teen din ka faaidah uthhaalo. yeh aisa wa'dah hai jo jhoota nahin hoga.

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّا جَاۗءَ اَمْرُنَا نَجَّيْنَا صٰلِحًا وَّالَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا مَعَهٗ بِرَحْمَةٍ مِّنَّا وَمِنْ خِزْيِ يَوْمِئِذٍ ۭ اِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ الْقَوِيُّ الْعَزِيْزُ
verses.transliteration: Falammaa jaaa'a 'amrunaa najjaynaa Saalihanw-wallazeena 'aamanoo ma'ahoo birahmatim-minnaa wa min khizyi Yawmi'iz; 'inna Rabbaka Huwal- Qawiyyul-'Azeez.
verses.translation: Phir jab hamaara hukm (azaab) aagaya to humne Saaleh aur uske saath eemaan laane waalon ko apni rahmat se najaat di aur uss (qiyaamat ke) din ki ruswaayi se bhi (najaat di,) beshak aapka rab, wahi hai nihaayat qawi, bahut zabardast.

verses.arabic: وَاَخَذَ الَّذِيْنَ ظَلَمُوا الصَّيْحَةُ فَاَصْبَحُوْا فِيْ دِيَارِهِمْ جٰثِمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'akhazal-lazeena zalamus-sayhatu fa'aşbahoo fee diyaarihim jaasimeen.
verses.translation: Aur jin logon ne zulm kiya tha unhen zabardast cheekh ne aa pakda phir woh apne gharon mein ondhe pade rah gaye.

verses.arabic: كَانْ لَمْ يَغْنَوْا فِيْهَا ۭ اَلَآ اِنَّ ثَمُوْدَ كَفَرُوْا رَبَّهُمْ ۭ اَلَا بُعْدًا لِّثَمُوْدَ
verses.transliteration: Ka'al-lam yaghnaw feehaaa; 'alaaa 'inna Samooda kafaroo Rabbahum; 'alaa bu'dal- li-Samood.
verses.translation: Jaise kabhi un mein base hi na the. aagaah raho! beshak Samood (qaum) ne apne rab ka inkaar kiya. sun lo! phatkaar (la'nat) hai Samood par.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ جَاۗءَتْ رُسُلُنَآ اِبْرٰهِيْمَ بِالْبُشْرٰى قَالُوْا سَلٰمًا ۭ قَالَ سَلٰمٌ ۡ فَمَا لَبِثَ اَنْ جَاۗءَ بِعِجْلٍ حَنِيْذٍ
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad jaaa'at Rusulunaaa 'Ibraaheema bilbushraa qaaloo salaaman qaala salaamun famaa labisa 'an jaaa'a biʻijlin haneez.
verses.translation: Aur albatta tahqeeq hamaare qaasid (farishte) Ibraahim ke paas khush khabri le kar aaye. unhon ne kaha: (aap par) salaam ho. phir der kiye baghair woh ek bhuna huwa bachhda le aaya.

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّا رَآٰ اَيْدِيَهُمْ لَا تَصِلُ اِلَيْهِ نَكِرَهُمْ وَاَوْجَسَ مِنْهُمْ خِيْفَةً ۭ قَالُوْا لَا تَخَفْ اِنَّآ اُرْسِلْنَآ اِلٰى قَوْمِ لُوْطٍ
verses.transliteration: Falammaa ra'aaa 'aydiyahum laa taşilu 'ilayhi nakirahum wa 'awjasa minhum kheefah; qaaloo laa takhaf 'innaaa 'ursilnaaa 'ilaa qawmi Loot.
verses.translation: Phir jab usne dekha ke unke haath uss (bachhde) ki taraf nahin badhte to unhein ajnabi samjha aur (dil mein) unse khauf mahsoos kiya. unhon ne kaha (humse) na dar, beshak humein to qaume Loot ki taraf bheja gaya hai

verses.arabic: وَامْرَاَتُهٗ قَاۗىٕمَةٌ فَضَحِكَتْ فَبَشَّرْنٰهَا بِاِسْحٰقَ وَمِنْ وَّرَاۗءِ اِسْحٰقَ يَعْقُوْبَ
verses.transliteration: Wamra'atuhoo qaaa'imatun fadahikat fabashsharnaahaa bi- 'Ishaaqa wa miñw waraaa'i 'Ishaaqa Yaʻqoob.b
verses.translation: Aur Ibraaheem ki beewi (qareeb) khadi thi to woh hans padi. phir humne use Ishaaq ki khush khabri di aur Ishaaq ke ba'd Ya'qoob (pote) ki.

verses.arabic: قَالَتْ يٰوَيْلَتٰٓي اَاَلِدُ وَاَنَا عَجُوْزٌ وَهٰذَا بَعْلِيْ شَيْخًا ۭ اِنَّ هٰذَا لَشَيْءٌ عَجِيْبٌ
verses.transliteration: Qaalat yaa waylataaa 'a alidu wa 'ana 'ajoozuñw-wa haazaa balee shaykhan 'inna haazaa lashay'un 'ajeeb.
verses.translation: Woh boli: haaye haaye! kiya (ab) main bachchah janungi haalaanke main budhiyaa hoon aur yeh mera hi shauhar bhi boodha hai? beshak yeh to bahut ajeeb cheez hai.

verses.arabic: قَالُوْٓا اَتَعْجَبِيْنَ مِنْ اَمْرِ اللّٰهِ ۭ رَحْمَتُ اللّٰهِ وَبَرَكٰتُهٗ عَلَيْكُمْ اَهْلَ الْبَيْتِ ۭ اِنَّهٗ حَمِيْدٌ مَّجِيْدٌ
verses.transliteration: Qaalooo 'ata'jabeena min 'amril-laahi rahmatul-laahi wa barakaatuhoo 'alaykum 'Ahlal-Bayt; 'innahoo Hameedum-Majeed.
verses.translation: Unhon ne kaha: kiya tu Allah ke hukm par ta'ajjub karti hai, Allah ki rahmat aur barkatein hon tum par aye ahle bait! beshak Allah qaabil-e-ta'reef nehaayat buzrugi waala. hai,

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّا ذَهَبَ عَنْ اِبْرٰهِيْمَ الرَّوْعُ وَجَاۗءَتْهُ الْبُشْرٰى يُجَادِلُنَا فِيْ قَوْمِ لُوْطٍ
verses.transliteration: Falammaa zahaba 'an 'Ibraaheemar-raw' wa jaaa'athul-bushraa yujaadilunaa fee qawmi Loot.
verses.translation: Phir jab Ibraheem se khauf door ho gaya aur uske paas khush khabri aa gayi to woh hum se qaum-e-loot ki baabat jhagadne laga.

verses.arabic: اِنَّ اِبْرٰهِيْمَ لَحَلِيْمٌ اَوَّاهٌ مُّنِيْبٌ
verses.transliteration: 'Inna 'Ibraaheema lahaleemun 'awwaahum- muneeb.
verses.translation: Beshak Ibraaheem bada narm mizaaj, narm dil aur (hamaari taraf) bahut ruju' karne waala tha.

verses.arabic: يٰٓاِبْرٰهِيْمُ اَعْرِضْ عَنْ هٰذَا ۭ اِنَّهٗ قَدْ جَاۗءَ اَمْرُ رَبِّكَ وَ اِنَّهُمْ اٰتِيْهِمْ عَذَابٌ غَيْرُ مَرْدُوْدٍ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'Ibraaheemu 'a'rid 'an haazaaa 'innahoo qad jaaa'a 'amru Rabbika wa 'innahum 'aateehim 'azaabun ghayru mardood.
verses.translation: (Humne kaha:) aye Ibraaheem! iss baat ko jaane do, beshak tumhaare rab ka hukm aa pahunchaa hai, aur beshak un logon par azaab aane waala hai jo talega nahin.

verses.arabic: وَلَمَّا جَاۗءَتْ رُسُلُنَا لُوْطًا سِيْۗءَ بِهِمْ وَضَاقَ بِهِمْ ذَرْعًا وَّقَالَ هٰذَا يَوْمٌ عَصِيْبٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa lammaa jaaa'at Rusulunaa Lootan seee'a bihim wa daaqa bihim zar'añw-wa qaala haazaa yawmun 'aşeeb
verses.translation: Aur jab hamaare qaasid (farishte) Loot ke paas aaye to unki wajah se ghamgheen huwa aur unse dil mein tang huwa aur bola: yeh intehaayi sakht din hai.

verses.arabic: وَجَاۗءَهٗ قَوْمُهٗ يُهْرَعُوْنَ اِلَيْهِ وَمِنْ قَبْلُ كَانُوْا يَعْمَلُوْنَ السَّيِّاٰتِ ۚ قَالَ يٰقَوْمِ هٰٓؤُلَاۗءِ بَنَاتِيْ هُنَّ اَطْهَرُ لَكُمْ فَاتَّقُوا اللّٰهَ وَلَا تُخْزُوْنِ فِيْ ضَيْفِيْ ۭ اَلَيْسَ مِنْكُمْ رَجُلٌ رَّشِيْدٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa jaaa'ahoo qawmuhoo yuhraʻoona 'ilayhi wa min qablu kaanoo ya maloonas- sayyi'aat; qaala yaa qawmi haaa'ulaaa'i banaatee hunna 'atharu Jakum fattaqul-laaha wa laa tukhzooni fee dayfeee 'alaysa minkum rajulur-rasheed.
verses.translation: Aur uski qaum ke log daudte huye uske paas aaye jabke woh pahle hi se bure amal karte the. usne kaha: aye meri qaum! yeh meri (qaum ki) betiyaan hai (inse nkaah karlo), yeh tumhaare Eye paakeezah tar hain, naaza tum Allah se daro aur mere mehmaanon mein mujhe ruswa na karo. kiya tum mein koyi bhala aadmi mahin?

verses.arabic: قَالُوْا لَقَدْ عَلِمْتَ مَا لَنَا فِيْ بَنَاتِكَ مِنْ حَقٍّ وَّاِنَّكَ لَتَعْلَمُ مَا نُرِيْدُ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo laqad 'alimta maa lanaa fee banaatika min haqq; wa 'innaka lataʻlamu maa nureed.
verses.translation: Yaqeenan tu jaanta hai ke hamaare liye teri (qaum ki betiyon mein koyi haq (dilchaspi) nahin aur bila shubah tu yaqeenan jaanta hai jo hum chaahte hain.

verses.arabic: قَالَ لَوْ اَنَّ لِيْ بِكُمْ قُوَّةً اَوْ اٰوِيْٓ اِلٰي رُكْنٍ شَدِيْدٍ
verses.transliteration: Qaala law 'anna lee bikum quwwatan 'aw 'aaweee 'ilaa ruknin shadeed.
verses.translation: Loot ne kaha: kaash! mere liye tumhaare ugaabile mein koyi quwwat hoti ya main kisi mazboot sahaare ki panah leta.

verses.arabic: قَالُوْا يٰلُوْطُ اِنَّا رُسُلُ رَبِّكَ لَنْ يَّصِلُوْٓا اِلَيْكَ فَاَسْرِ بِاَهْلِكَ بِقِطْعٍ مِّنَ الَّيْلِ وَلَا يَلْتَفِتْ مِنْكُمْ اَحَدٌ اِلَّا امْرَاَتَكَ ۭ اِنَّهٗ مُصِيْبُهَا مَآ اَصَابَهُمْ ۭ اِنَّ مَوْعِدَهُمُ الصُّبْحُ ۭ اَلَيْسَ الصُّبْحُ بِقَرِيْبٍ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo yaa Lootu 'innaa Rusulu Rabbika lañy-yaşilooo 'ilayka fa'asri bi'ahlika biqit'im- minal-layli wa laa yaltafit minkum 'ahadun 'illam-ra'ataka 'innahoo muşeebuhaa maaa 'aşaabahum; 'inna maw'idahumuş-şubh; 'alaysaş-şubhu biqareeb.
verses.translation: Farishton ne kaha: aye Loot! beshak hum tere rab ke qaasid hain, woh log har giz tujh par haath nahin daal sakenge. chunaancheh tu apne ghar waalon ko raat gaye le chal aur tum mein se koyi peechhe mud kar na dekhe, siwaaye teri beewi ke beshak uss par wahi azaab aane waala hai jo un logon) par aaya chaahta hai. beshak unke wa'de (azaab) ka waqt subah hai kya subah qareeb nahin?.¹
verses.deepMeaning: jab farishton ne hazrat Loot ki bebasi aur unki qaum ki sarkashi ka mushaahadah kar liya to bole: Loot! Ghabraane ki zaroorat nahin hum tak to kiya ab yeh tujh tak bhi nahin pahunch sakte, ab raat ek hisse mein siwaaye apni biwi ke, apne ghar waalon ko le kar yahaan se nikal jaa! Subah hote hi iss basti ko halaak  kar diya jaayega, mazeed mulaahazah ho. (Surah Qamar:54/33-39)

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّا جَاۗءَ اَمْرُنَا جَعَلْنَا عَالِيَهَا سَافِلَهَا وَاَمْطَرْنَا عَلَيْهَا حِجَارَةً مِّنْ سِجِّيْلٍ مَّنْضُوْدٍ
verses.transliteration: Falammaa jaaa'a 'amrunaa ja'alnaa 'aaliyahaa saafilahaa wa 'amtarnaa 'alayhaa hijaaratam-min sijjeelim- mandood
verses.translation: Phir jab hamaara hukum (azaab) aagaya to humne uss (basti) ko (ulat kar) ouper neeche kar diya aur un  par khangar ke patthar batah barsaaye.

verses.arabic: مُّسَوَّمَةً عِنْدَ رَبِّكَ ۭ وَمَا هِيَ مِنَ الظّٰلِمِيْنَ بِبَعِيْدٍ
verses.transliteration: Musawwamatan 'inda Rabbik; wa maa hiya minaz-zaalimeena biba'eed.
verses.translation: Jo tumhaare rab ke Taan se nishaan zadah the. aur woh basti un zaalimon Curaish-e-Makkah) se door nahin.

verses.arabic: وَاِلٰى مَدْيَنَ اَخَاهُمْ شُعَيْبًا ۗ قَالَ يٰقَوْمِ اعْبُدُوا اللّٰهَ مَا لَكُمْ مِّنْ اِلٰهٍ غَيْرُهٗ ۭ وَلَا تَنْقُصُوا الْمِكْيَالَ وَالْمِيْزَانَ ۭ اِنِّيْٓ اَرٰىكُمْ بِخَيْرٍ وَّاِنِّيْٓ اَخَافُ عَلَيْكُمْ عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ مُّحِيْطٍ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'ilaa Madyana¹ 'akhaahum Shu'aybaa; qaala yaa qawmi'-budul- laaha maa lakum min 'ilaahin ghayruhoo wa laa tanquşul- mikyaala walmeezaana 'inneee 'araakum bikhayriñw-wa 'inneee 'akhaafu 'alaykum 'azaaba Yawmim-muheet
verses.translation: Aur (humne) madyan (waalon) ki taraf unke bhaai Shuaib ko (bheja), usne kaha: aye meri qaum! tum Allah ki i'baadat karo, uske siwa tumhaara koyi ma'bood nahin aur tum naap taul kam na karo, beshak main tumhein khushhaal dekhta hoon aur beshak mujhe khauf aata hai tum par gherne waale din ke azaab se.
verses.deepMeaning: Madyan hazrat Ibraheem عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام ke bête ya pote ka naam tha phir unhin ki nasal par mabni qabeele ka naam bhi madyan aur jis basti mein yeh rehaayesh pazeer the, uska naam bhi madyan pad gaya, phir uska itlaaq qabeele aur basti donon par hota hai. unhi ko qura'n mein doosre maqaam par ashaabul aikah (ban ke rahne waale) bhi kaha gaya hai, inki taraf Shuaib عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام Nabi banaakar bheje gaye the. Aykah, Jungal ko kahte hain aur yeh bhi kaha jaata hai ke iska ma'na hai 'Ghana darakht' aur aisa ek darakht Madyan ki nawaahi aabaadi mein bhi tha, jiski pooja paat hoti thi, عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام Shuaib ka daayerah nabuwwat aur hudood-e-da'wat-o-tableegh, madyan se lekar uss nawaahi aabaadi tak tha, jahaan Aykah darakht ki pooja hoti thi.

verses.arabic: وَيٰقَوْمِ اَوْفُوا الْمِكْيَالَ وَالْمِيْزَانَ بِالْقِسْطِ وَلَا تَبْخَسُوا النَّاسَ اَشْيَاۗءَهُمْ وَلَا تَعْثَوْا فِي الْاَرْضِ مُفْسِدِيْنَ
