verses.transliteration: Wa yaa qawmi 'awful-mikyaala walmeezaana bilqisti wa laa tabkhasun-naasa 'ashyaaa'ahum wa laa ta saw fil-'ardi mufsideen.
verses.translation: Aur aye meri qaum! tum naap aur taul insaaf se poora kiya karo aur logon ko unki cheezein kam na diya karo aur tum zameen mein fasaadi ban kar na phiro.

verses.arabic: بَقِيَّتُ اللّٰهِ خَيْرٌ لَّكُمْ اِنْ كُنْتُمْ مُّؤْمِنِيْنَ ۚ وَمَآ اَنَا عَلَيْكُمْ بِحَفِيْظٍ
verses.transliteration: Baqiyyatul-laahi khayrul-lakum 'in kuntum mu'mineen; wa maaa 'ana 'alaykum bihafeez.
verses.translation: Allah ki bachat (jaayez nafa') tumhaareliye behtar hai agar tum momin ho aur main tum par muhaafiz nahin hoon.

verses.arabic: قَالُوْا يٰشُعَيْبُ اَصَلَاتُكَ تَاْمُرُكَ اَنْ نَّتْرُكَ مَا يَعْبُدُ اٰبَاۗؤُنَآ اَوْ اَنْ نَّفْعَلَ فِيْٓ اَمْوَالِنَا مَا نَشٰؤُا ۭ اِنَّكَ لَاَنْتَ الْحَلِيْمُ الرَّشِيْدُ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo yaa Shu'aybu 'a-Şalaatuka ta'muruka 'an natruka maa ya'budu 'aabaaa'unaaa 'aw 'an nafala feee 'amwaalinaa maa nashaaa'oo 'innaka la'antal-haleemur- rasheed.
verses.translation: Unhon ne kaha: aye Shuaib! kiya teri namaaz tujhe yeh hukm karti (sikhaati) hai ke ham un (ma'boodon) ko chhod den jinko hamaare baap daada poojte rahe ya apne maalon mein woh na karen jo karna chaahen? bilaa shubah tu to bada narm mizaaj, bada samajhdaar hai.

verses.arabic: قَالَ يٰقَوْمِ اَرَءَيْتُمْ اِنْ كُنْتُ عَلٰي بَيِّنَةٍ مِّنْ رَّبِّيْ وَرَزَقَنِيْ مِنْهُ رِزْقًا حَسَنًا ۭ وَمَآ اُرِيْدُ اَنْ اُخَالِفَكُمْ اِلٰي مَآ اَنْهٰىكُمْ عَنْهُ ۭ اِنْ اُرِيْدُ اِلَّا الْاِصْلَاحَ مَا اسْتَطَعْتُ ۭ وَمَا تَوْفِيْقِيْٓ اِلَّا بِاللّٰهِ ۭ عَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ وَاِلَيْهِ اُنِيْبُ
verses.transliteration: Qaala yaa qawmi 'ara'aytum 'in kuntu 'alaa bayyinatim-mir- Rabbee wa razaqanee minhu rizqan hasanaa; wa maaa 'ureedu 'an 'ukhaalifakum 'ilaa maaa 'anhaakum 'anh; 'in 'ureedu 'illal-'islaaha mastata't; wa maa tawfeeqeee 'illaa billaah; 'alayhi tawakkaltu wa 'ilayhi 'uneeb.
verses.translation: Shuaib ne kaha: aye meri qaum! bhala bataao to, agar main apne rab ki taraf se waazeh daleel par hoon aur usne mujhe apni taraf se achchha rizq diya ho (to kaise uski naafarmaani karoon?) aur main yeh nahin chaahta ke tumhaari mukhaalifat karoon (iss tarah ke) woh kaam karoon jinse tumhein rokta hoon. main kuchh nahin chaahta siwaaye (tumhaari) islaah ke jahaan tak mujh se ho sake. aur mujhe (uski) taufeeq milna Allah ki madad ke siwa (mumkin) nahin. main ne usi par bharosa kiya hai aur usi ki taraf ruju' karta hoon.

verses.arabic: وَيٰقَوْمِ لَا يَجْرِمَنَّكُمْ شِقَاقِيْٓ اَنْ يُّصِيْبَكُمْ مِّثْلُ مَآ اَصَابَ قَوْمَ نُوْحٍ اَوْ قَوْمَ هُوْدٍ اَوْ قَوْمَ صٰلِحٍ ۭ وَمَا قَوْمُ لُوْطٍ مِّنْكُمْ بِبَعِيْدٍ
verses.transliteration: Wa yaa qawmi laa yajrimannakum shiqaaqeee 'añy- yuşeebakum-mislu maaa 'aşaaba qawma Noohin 'aw qawma Hoodin 'aw qawma Şaalih; wa maa qawmu Lootim-minkum biba'eed.
verses.translation: Aur aye meri qaum! meri mukhaalifat¹ tumhein (aise kaam par) na uksaaye ke tum par waisa azaab aaye jaisa qaum-e-Nooh ya qaum- e-Hood ya qaum-e-Saaleh par aaya tha aur Loot ki qaum (ka elaaqah bhi) tumse kuchh door nahin.
verses.deepMeaning: Ya'ni Alaahidgi, dushmani, ghussah aur mukhaalifat waghairah, tumhaara Allah Ta'ala ki wahdaaniyat par eemaan se inkaar aur but parasti karna aur tumhaara logon ko (unki ashya mein) dhoka dena aur tumhaara logon ko (ashya) naap taul mein kami karke dena waghairah iss baat ka baayis na ho jaaye ke tum par bhi wahi azaab aa jaaye jo Nooh, Hood ya Saaleh, aur Loot عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام ki qaumon par aaya tha.

verses.arabic: وَاسْتَغْفِرُوْا رَبَّكُمْ ثُمَّ تُوْبُوْٓا اِلَيْهِ ۭ اِنَّ رَبِّيْ رَحِيْمٌ وَّدُوْدٌ
verses.transliteration: Wastaghfiroo Rabbakum summa toobooo 'ilayh; 'inna Rabbee Raheemuñw- Wadood.
verses.translation: Aur tum apne rab se bakhshish maango, phir usi ki taraf taubah karo, beshak mera rab bada raham karne waala, nehaayat mohabbat karne waala hai.

verses.arabic: قَالُوْا يٰشُعَيْبُ مَا نَفْقَهُ كَثِيْرًا مِّمَّا تَقُوْلُ وَ اِنَّا لَنَرٰىكَ فِيْنَا ضَعِيْفًا ۡ وَلَوْلَا رَهْطُكَ لَرَجَمْنٰكَ ۡ وَمَآ اَنْتَ عَلَيْنَا بِعَزِيْزٍ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo yaa Shu'aybu maa nafqahu kaseeram- mimmaa taqoolu wa 'innaa lanaraaka feenaa da'eefaa; wa law laa rahtuka larajamnaaka wa maaa 'anta 'alaynaa bi'azeez.
verses.translation: Unhon ne kaha: aye Shuaib! jo tu kahta hai hum uss mein se bahut kuchh nahin samajhte aur beshak hum tujhe apne darmiyaan kamzor dekhte hain aur agar tera qabeelah na hota to hum yaqeenan tujhe sangsaar kar dete aur tu hum par koyi ghalbah nahin rakhta.

verses.arabic: قَالَ يٰقَوْمِ اَرَهْطِيْٓ اَعَزُّ عَلَيْكُمْ مِّنَ اللّٰهِ وَاتَّخَذْتُمُوْهُ وَرَاۗءَكُمْ ظِهْرِيًّا ۭ اِنَّ رَبِّيْ بِمَا تَعْمَلُوْنَ مُحِيْطٌ
verses.transliteration: Qaala yaa qawmi 'arahteee 'a'azzu 'alaykum minal-laahi wattakhaztumoohu waraaa'akum zihriyyan 'inna Rabbee bimaa ta'maloona muheet.
verses.translation: Shuaib ne kaha: aye meri qaum! kiya mera gabeelah tum par Allah se ziyaadah dabaao waala hai? aur tumne uss (Allah) ko apni peethh peechhe daal rakhkha hai. beshak tum jo amal karte ho, mera rab unka ehaata kiye huye hai.

verses.arabic: وَيٰقَوْمِ اعْمَلُوْا عَلٰي مَكَانَتِكُمْ اِنِّيْ عَامِلٌ ۖ سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُوْنَ مَنْ يَّاْتِيْهِ عَذَابٌ يُّخْزِيْهِ وَمَنْ هُوَ كَاذِبٌ ۭ وَارْتَقِبُوْٓا اِنِّيْ مَعَكُمْ رَقِيْبٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa yaa qawmi-maloo 'alaa makaanatikum 'innee 'aamilun sawfa ta'lamoona таñу- ya'teehi 'azaabuñy- yukhzeehi wa man huwa kaazib; wartaqibooo 'innee ma'akum raqeeb.
verses.translation: Aur aye meri qaum! tum apni jagah amal karo, beshak main bhi amal kar raha hoon. jald tum jaan loge ke kis par ruswa kun azaab aata hai aur kaun jhoota hai? aur tum intezaar karo, beshak main bhi tumhaare saath muntazir hoon.

verses.arabic: وَلَمَّا جَاۗءَ اَمْرُنَا نَجَّيْنَا شُعَيْبًا وَّالَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا مَعَهٗ بِرَحْمَةٍ مِّنَّا وَ اَخَذَتِ الَّذِيْنَ ظَلَمُوا الصَّيْحَةُ فَاَصْبَحُوْا فِيْ دِيَارِهِمْ جٰثِمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa lammaa jaaa'a 'amrunaa najjaynaa shu'aybanw-wallazeena 'aamanoo maʻahoo birahmatim-minnaa wa 'akhazatil-lazeena zalamuş-şaynatu fa'aşbahoo fee diyaarihim jaasimeen
verses.translation: Aur jab hamaara hukm (azaab) aaya to humne najaat di shuaib ko aur uske saath eemaan laane waalon ko apni rahmat se, aur jin logon ne zulm kiya tha unhein zabardast cheekh ne aa pakda to woh apne gharon mein ondhe pade rah gaye.

verses.arabic: كَانْ لَمْ يَغْنَوْا فِيْهَا ۗ اَلَا بُعْدًا لِّمَدْيَنَ كَمَا بَعِدَتْ ثَمُوْدُ
verses.transliteration: Ka'al-lam yaghnaw feehaaa; 'alaa bu'dal-li- Madyana Kamaa baʻidat Samood.
verses.translation: Jaise woh un mein kabhi base hi na the. suno! phatkaar hai (ahle) madyan par jaise Samood par phatkaar padi.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ اَرْسَلْنَا مُوْسٰى بِاٰيٰتِنَا وَسُلْطٰنٍ مُّبِيْنٍ
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad 'arsalnaa Moosaa bi-'Aayaatinaa wa sultaanim-mubeen.
verses.translation: Aur tahqeeq humne Moosa ko apni aayaat aur waazeh daleel ke saath bheja.

verses.arabic: اِلٰى فِرْعَوْنَ وَمَلَاۗىٕهِ فَاتَّبَعُوْٓا اَمْرَ فِرْعَوْنَ ۭ وَمَآ اَمْرُ فِرْعَوْنَ بِرَشِيْدٍ
verses.transliteration: 'Ilaa Fir'awna wa mala'ihee fattaba'ooo 'amra Fir'awna wa maaa 'amru Fir'awna birasheed.
verses.translation: Firaun aur uske darbaariyon ki taraf, phir unhon ne Firaun ke hukm ka itteba' kiya, aur Firaun ka hukm koyi bhalaayi waala na tha.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Rasheed, Zi rushd ke ma'na mein hai, ya'ni baat to Moosa ki rushd-o-hidaayat waali thi, lekin use un logon ne radd kar diya aur Fir'aun ki baat jo rushd-o-hidaayat se door thi, uski unhon ne pairwi ki.

verses.arabic: يَقْدُمُ قَوْمَهٗ يَوْمَ الْقِيٰمَةِ فَاَوْرَدَهُمُ النَّارَ ۭ وَبِئْسَ الْوِرْدُ الْمَوْرُوْدُ
verses.transliteration: Yaqdumu qawmahoo Yawmal-Qiyaamati fa'awradahumun-Naara wa bi'sal-wirdul- mawrood.
verses.translation: Woh qiyaamat ke din apni qaum ke aage aage hoga, phir unhein aag mein jaa daakhil karega, aur bura hai woh ghaat jis par woh pahunchaaye jaayenge.

verses.arabic: وَاُتْبِعُوْا فِيْ هٰذِهِ لَعْنَةً وَّيَوْمَ الْقِيٰمَةِ ۭ بِئْسَ الرِّفْدُ الْمَرْفُوْدُ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'utbi'oo fee haazihee la'natañw-wa Yawmal-Qiyaamah; bi'sar-rifdul-marfood.
verses.translation: Aur iss duniya mein bhi la'nat unke peechhe laga di gayi aur aakhirat mein bhi aur bura hai woh in'aam jo unhein diya jaayega.

verses.arabic: ذٰلِكَ مِنْ اَنْۢبَاۗءِ الْقُرٰي نَقُصُّهٗ عَلَيْكَ ۭ مِنْهَا قَاۗىٕمٌ وَّحَصِيْدٌ
verses.transliteration: Zaalika min 'ambaaa'il-quraa naquşşuhoo 'alayka minhaa qaaa'imuñw-wa haseed.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) yeh kuchh khabrein hain un (tabaah shudah) bastiyon ki jo hum aap ko sunaate hain. un mein se kuchh to qaayem hain aur kuchh tahas nahas kar di gayin.

verses.arabic: وَمَا ظَلَمْنٰهُمْ وَلٰكِنْ ظَلَمُوْٓا اَنْفُسَهُمْ ۚ فَمَآ اَغْنَتْ عَنْهُمْ اٰلِهَتُهُمُ الَّتِيْ يَدْعُوْنَ مِنْ دُوْنِ اللّٰهِ مِنْ شَيْءٍ لَّمَّا جَاۗءَ اَمْرُ رَبِّكَ ۭ وَمَا زَادُوْهُمْ غَيْرَ تَتْبِيْبٍ
verses.transliteration: Wa maa zalamnaahum wa laakin zalamooo 'anfusahum famaaa 'aghnat 'anhum 'aalihatuhumul-latee yad'oona min doonil- laahi min shay'il-lammaa jaaa'a 'amru Rabbika wa maa zaadoohum ghayra tatbeeb.
verses.translation: Aur humne un par zulm nahin kiya lekin unhon ne (khud hi) apne aap par zulm kiya tha, unke woh ma'bood jinhein woh Allah ke siwa pukaarte the, unke kisi kaam na aaye, jab aapke rab ka hukm (azaab) aa pahuncha balke unhon ne unki tabaahi mein ezaafah hi kiya.

verses.arabic: وَكَذٰلِكَ اَخْذُ رَبِّكَ اِذَآ اَخَذَ الْقُرٰي وَهِىَ ظَالِمَةٌ ۭ اِنَّ اَخْذَهٗٓ اَلِيْمٌ شَدِيْدٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa kazaalika 'akhzu Rabbika 'izaaa 'akhazal-quraa wa hiya zaalimah; 'inna 'akhzahooo 'aleemun shadeed.
verses.translation: Aur (Aye Nabi!) aapke rab ki pakad aisi hai hi jab woh bastiyon ko pakadta hai jabke woh zaalim hoti hain. beshak uski pakad nehaayat dardnaak (aur) shadeed hai...¹
verses.deepMeaning: Rasoolullah ﷺ ne farmaya: 'Allah Ta'ala zaalim (mushrik, gunaah gaar, sitamgar waghairah) ko dheel deta rahta hai lekin jab use pakad leta hai to use chhodta nahin hai.' Abu Moosa عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام kahte hain: iske ba'd Nabi ﷺ ne yeh aayat: (11/102) tilaawat farmayi:(Sahih Bukhari, Tafseer, Surah Hood عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام Baab:5:Hadees:4686

verses.arabic: اِنَّ فِيْ ذٰلِكَ لَاٰيَةً لِّمَنْ خَافَ عَذَابَ الْاٰخِرَةِ ۭ ذٰلِكَ يَوْمٌ مَّجْمُوْعٌ لَّهُ النَّاسُ وَذٰلِكَ يَوْمٌ مَّشْهُوْدٌ
verses.transliteration: 'Inna fee zaalika la- 'Aayatal-liman khaafa 'azaabal-'Aakhirah; zaalika Yawmum- majmooʻul-lahun-naasu wa zaalika Yawmum- mashhood.
verses.translation: Beshak iss mein uss shakhs ke liye yaqeenan nishaan (ibrat) hai jo azaab- e- akhirat se dar gaya. woh (yaum-e-aakhirat) aisa din hai (jab) sab log jama' kiye jaayenge, aur woh aisa din hai jab (sab) haazir kiye jaayenge.

verses.arabic: وَمَا نُؤَخِّرُهٗٓ اِلَّا لِاَجَلٍ مَّعْدُوْدٍ
verses.transliteration: Wa maa nu'akhkhiruhooo 'illaa li'ajalim-ma'dood.
verses.translation: Aur hum ek muqarrarah waqt tak hi iss mein taakheer kar rahe hain.

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ يَاْتِ لَا تَكَلَّمُ نَفْسٌ اِلَّا بِاِذْنِهٖ ۭ فَمِنْهُمْ شَقِيٌّ وَّسَعِيْدٌ
verses.transliteration: Yawma ya'ti laa takallamu nafsun 'illaa bi'iznih; faminhum shaqiyyunw-wa sa'eed.
verses.translation: (Jab) woh din aajaayega to koyi nafs Allah ke izn ke baghair kalaam nahin kar sakega, phir un mein se koyi bad bakht hoga aur koyi nek bakht.

verses.arabic: فَاَمَّا الَّذِيْنَ شَقُوْا فَفِي النَّارِ ۭ لَهُمْ فِيْهَا زَفِيْرٌ وَّشَهِيْقٌ
verses.transliteration: Fa'ammal-lazeena shaqoo fafin-Naari lahum feehaa zafeeruñw-wa shaheeq.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh jo log bad bakht honge to (woh) aag mein honge, unke liye uss mein bas cheekhna chillaana aur dahaadna hoga.

verses.arabic: خٰلِدِيْنَ فِيْهَا مَا دَامَتِ السَّمٰوٰتُ وَالْاَرْضُ اِلَّا مَا شَاۗءَ رَبُّكَ ۭ اِنَّ رَبَّكَ فَعَّالٌ لِّمَا يُرِيْدُ
verses.transliteration: Khaalideena feehaa maa daamatis- samaawaatu wal'ardu 'illaa maa shaaa'a Rabbuk; 'inna Rabbaka fa' 'aalul-limaa yureed.
verses.translation: Woh USS mein hameshah rahenge jab tak aasmaan aur zameen (baaqi) rahenge magar yeh ke aapka rab (kuchh aur) chaahe, beshak aapka rab jo chaahe use kar guzarta hai.

verses.arabic: وَاَمَّا الَّذِيْنَ سُعِدُوْا فَفِي الْجَنَّةِ خٰلِدِيْنَ فِيْهَا مَا دَامَتِ السَّمٰوٰتُ وَالْاَرْضُ اِلَّا مَا شَاۗءَ رَبُّكَ ۭ عَطَاۗءً غَيْرَ مَجْذُوْذٍ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'ammal-lazeena su'idoo fafil-Jannati khaalideena feehaa maa daamatis-samaawaatu wal'ardu 'illaa maa shaaa'a Rabbuk; 'ataaa'an ghayra majzooz.
verses.translation: Aur lekin jo nek bakht banaaye gaye honge to (woh) jannat mein honge. woh uss mein hameshah rahenge jab tak aasmaan aur zameen (baaqi) rahenge magar yeh ke aapka rab (kuchh aur) chaahe, (yeh Allah ki) ata hai jo kabhi khatm na hogi.

verses.arabic: فَلَا تَكُ فِيْ مِرْيَةٍ مِّمَّا يَعْبُدُ هٰٓؤُلَاۗءِ ۭ مَا يَعْبُدُوْنَ اِلَّا كَمَا يَعْبُدُ اٰبَاۗؤُهُمْ مِّنْ قَبْلُ ۭ وَاِنَّا لَمُوَفُّوْهُمْ نَصِيْبَهُمْ غَيْرَ مَنْقُوْصٍ
verses.transliteration: Falaa taku fee miryatim-mimmaa ya'budu haaa'ulaaa'; maa ya'budoona 'illaa kamaa ya'budu 'aabaaa'uhum min qabl; wa 'innaa lamuwaffoohum naseebahum ghayra manqoos.
verses.translation: Cunaancheh aap unke muta'alliq taraddud mein na padein jinki yeh log i'baadat karte hain, yeh log to waise hi i'baadat karte hain jaise usse pahle unke baap daada ibaadat karte the aur beshak hum unhein unka hissa pura denge, uss mein se kuchh bhi kam na hoga.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ اٰتَيْنَا مُوْسَي الْكِتٰبَ فَاخْتُلِفَ فِيْهِ ۭ وَلَوْلَا كَلِمَةٌ سَبَقَتْ مِنْ رَّبِّكَ لَقُضِيَ بَيْنَهُمْ ۭ وَاِنَّهُمْ لَفِيْ شَكٍّ مِّنْهُ مُرِيْبٍ
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad 'aataynaa Moosal-Kitaaba fakhtulifa feeh; wa law laa Kalimatun sabaqat mir-Rabbika laqudiya baynahum; wa 'innahum lafee shakkim-minhu mureeb.
verses.translation: Aur tahqeeq humne Moosa ko kitab di to uss mein ikhtelaaf kiya gaya aur agar na hoti ek baat jo Aapke rab ki taraf se pahle (tai) ho chuki hai to unke darmiyaan zaroor faislah kar diya jaata aur bila shubah woh uske muta'alliq zaroor shak mein hai (jo unke liye) pareshaan kun hain.

verses.arabic: وَاِنَّ كُلًّا لَّمَّا لَيُوَفِّيَنَّهُمْ رَبُّكَ اَعْمَالَهُمْ ۭ اِنَّهٗ بِمَا يَعْمَلُوْنَ خَبِيْرٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'inna kullal- lammaa layuwaffiyan nahum Rabbuka 'a'maalahum; 'innahoo bimaa ya maloona Khabeer.
verses.translation: Aur beshak Aap ka rab zaroor sabko unke a'amaal ki puri puri jaza dega. beshak woh jo amal karte hain, Allah unse khoob baa khabar hai.

verses.arabic: فَاسْتَقِمْ كَمَآ اُمِرْتَ وَمَنْ تَابَ مَعَكَ وَلَا تَطْغَوْا ۭ اِنَّهٗ بِمَا تَعْمَلُوْنَ بَصِيْرٌ
verses.transliteration: Fastaqim kamaaa 'umirta wa man taaba ma'aka wa laa tatghaw innahoo bimaa ta'maloona Başeer
verses.translation: Chunaancheh (Aye Nabi!) aap saabit qadam rahein jis tarah aapko hukm diya gaya hai aur woh log jinhon ne aap ke saath taubah ki (eemaan laaye,) aur tum sarkashi na karo, beshak tum jo amal karte ho Allah unhein dekh raha hai.

verses.arabic: وَلَا تَرْكَنُوْٓا اِلَي الَّذِيْنَ ظَلَمُوْا فَتَمَسَّكُمُ النَّارُ ۚ وَمَا لَكُمْ مِّنْ دُوْنِ اللّٰهِ مِنْ اَوْلِيَاۗءَ ثُمَّ لَا تُنْصَرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laa tarkanooo 'ilal- lazeena zalamoo fatamassakumun-Naaru wa maa lakum min doonil- laahi min 'awliyaaa'a summa laa tunşaroon.
verses.translation: Aur tum un logon ki taraf na jhuko¹ jinhon ne zulm kiya warnah tumhein aag aan lapetegi aur tumhaare liye Allah ke siwa koyi dost na hoga, phir tumhaari madad na ki jaayegi.
verses.deepMeaning: Ya'ni na un se dostaanah ta'alluq rakhna aur na unki madad karna aur usi mein woh log bhi aa jaate hain jo deen mein bid'aat eijaad karke deen par aur logon par zulm karte hain jaise Rasoolullah ﷺ ki yeh hadees. Aasim عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام rivaayat karte hain, main ne Anas عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام se poochha: kiya Rasoolullah ﷺ ne Madine ko bhi harm qaraar diya? Unhon ne farmaya: 'Haan! Madina bhi haram hai, fulaan jagah se fulaan tak, uske darakht kaatna haraam hai aur jo koyi yahaan kisi bid'at ko jaari karega to woh Allah, farishton aur tamaam insaanon ki la'nat ka sazawaar hoga.' Mazeed farmaya: ya kisi bid'ati (deen mein apni taraf se ezaafah kanre waale) ko panaah de.' (Al-Bukhari, Al-E'tesaam bil Kitaab wassunnah, Baab:6, Hadees:7306)

verses.arabic: وَاَقِمِ الصَّلٰوةَ طَرَفَيِ النَّهَارِ وَزُلَفًا مِّنَ الَّيْلِ ۭ اِنَّ الْحَسَنٰتِ يُذْهِبْنَ السَّيِّاٰتِ ۭ ذٰلِكَ ذِكْرٰي لِلذّٰكِرِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'aqimiş-şalaata tarafa'yin-nahaari wa zulafam-minal-layl; 'innal-hasanaati yuzhibnas-sayyi'aat; zaalika zikraa lizzaakireen.
verses.translation: Aur aap namaaz qaayem karein din ki donon tarfon (subah-o-shaam) aur raat ki kuchh ghadiyon mein, beshak nekiyaan buraayiyon ko door kar deti hain. yeh (Allah ka) zikr karne waalon ke liye naseehat hai.

verses.arabic: وَاصْبِرْ فَاِنَّ اللّٰهَ لَا يُضِيْعُ اَجْرَ الْمُحْسِنِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Waşbir fa'innal- laaha laa yudee'u 'ajral- muhsineen.
verses.translation: Aur aap sabr karein, beshak Allah neki karne waalon ka ajr zaaye' nahin karta.

verses.arabic: فَلَوْلَا كَانَ مِنَ الْقُرُوْنِ مِنْ قَبْلِكُمْ اُولُوْا بَقِيَّةٍ يَّنْهَوْنَ عَنِ الْفَسَادِ فِي الْاَرْضِ اِلَّا قَلِيْلًا مِّمَّنْ اَنْجَيْنَا مِنْهُمْ ۚ وَاتَّبَعَ الَّذِيْنَ ظَلَمُوْا مَآ اُتْرِفُوْا فِيْهِ وَكَانُوْا مُجْرِمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Falaw laa kaana minal-qurooni min qablikum 'uloo baqiyyatiny-yanhawna 'anil-fasaadi fil-'ardi 'illaa qaleelam-mimman 'anjaynaa minhum; wattaba al-lazeena zalamoo maaa 'utrifoo feehi wa kaanoo mujrimeen.
verses.translation: Phir un ummaton mein jo tumse pahle guzrin, aise aql- o-baseerat waale kyun na huye jo zameen mein (logon ko) fasaad se rokte, magar thode hi un mein se jinhen humne najaat di aur jin logon ne zulm kiya woh un cheezon ke peechhe lage rahe jin mein aish-o-aaraam tha aur woh mujrim the.

verses.arabic: وَمَا كَانَ رَبُّكَ لِيُهْلِكَ الْقُرٰي بِظُلْمٍ وَّاَهْلُهَا مُصْلِحُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maa kaana Rabbuka liyuhlikal-quraa bizulminw-wa 'ahluhaa muslihoon.
verses.translation: Aur aapka rab aisa nahin ke woh bastiyon ko zulm ke saath halaak kare jabke unke baashinde islaah karne waale hon.

verses.arabic: وَلَوْ شَاۗءَ رَبُّكَ لَجَعَلَ النَّاسَ اُمَّةً وَّاحِدَةً وَّلَا يَزَالُوْنَ مُخْتَلِفِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa law shaaa'a Rabbuka laja'alan-naasa 'ummatañw- waahidatanw-wa laa yazaaloona mukhtalifeen
verses.translation: Aur agar aapka rab chaahta to yaqeenan tamaam logon ko ek hi ummat bana deta, lekin woh hameshah (baahum) ikhtelaaf karte rahenge.

verses.arabic: اِلَّا مَنْ رَّحِمَ رَبُّكَ وَلِذٰلِكَ خَلَقَهُمْ ۗ وَتَمَّتْ كَلِمَةُ رَبِّكَ لَاَمْلَاَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنَ الْجِنَّةِ وَالنَّاسِ اَجْمَعِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Illaa mar-rahima Rabbuk; wa lizaalika khalaqahum; wa tammat Kalimatu Rabbika la'amla'anna Jahannama minal-jinnati wannaasi 'ajma'een.
verses.translation: Siwaaye un logon ke jin par aapke rab ne raham kiya aur isi liye¹ usne unhein paida kiya aur aapke rab ki baat puri huyi ke main jahannam ko jinnon aur insaanon sabse zaroor bharunga.
verses.deepMeaning: Isliye ka matlab ba'z ne ikhtelaaf aur ba'z ne rahmat liya hai. donon sooraton mein mafhoom yeh hoga ke humne insaanon ko aazmaayish ke liye paida kiya hai. jo deen-e-haq se ikhtelaaf ka raastah ikhtiyaar karega, woh aazmaayish mein na kaam aur jo use apnaa lega, woh kaamyaab aur rahmat-e- ilaahi ka mustahiq hoga.

verses.arabic: وَكُلًّا نَّقُصُّ عَلَيْكَ مِنْ اَنْۢبَاۗءِ الرُّسُلِ مَا نُثَبِّتُ بِهٖ فُؤَادَكَ ۚ وَجَاۗءَكَ فِيْ هٰذِهِ الْحَقُّ وَمَوْعِظَةٌ وَّذِكْرٰي لِلْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa kullannaquşşu 'alayka min 'ambaaa'ir- Rusuli maa nusabbitu bihee fu'aadak; wa jaaa'aka fee haazihil- haqqu wa mawʻizatuñw- wa zikraa lilmu'mineen.
verses.translation: Aur hum rasoolon ki khabron mein se aap ko woh (khabar) sunaate hain jisse hum aap ka dil mazboot rakhte hain aur iss (surat) mein aapke paas haq aagaya aur mominon ke liye naseehat aur yaad dihaani bhi.

verses.arabic: وَقُلْ لِّلَّذِيْنَ لَا يُؤْمِنُوْنَ اعْمَلُوْا عَلٰي مَكَانَتِكُمْ اِنَّا عٰمِلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa qul lillazeena laa yu'minoona'-maloo 'alaa makaanatikum 'innaa 'aamiloon.
verses.translation: Aur Aap un logon se kah deejiye jo eemaan nahin laate: tum apni jagah amal karo, beshak hum bhi amal kar rahe hain.

verses.arabic: وَانْتَظِرُوْٓا اِنَّا مُنْتَظِرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wantaziroo 'innaa muntaziroon.
verses.translation: Aur tum intezaar karo, beshak hum bhi intezaar karte hain.

verses.arabic: وَلِلّٰهِ غَيْبُ السَّمٰوٰتِ وَالْاَرْضِ وَاِلَيْهِ يُرْجَعُ الْاَمْرُ كُلُّهٗ فَاعْبُدْهُ وَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَيْهِ ۭ وَمَا رَبُّكَ بِغَافِلٍ عَمَّا تَعْمَلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa lil-laahi ghaybus- samaawaati wal'ardi wa 'ilayhi yurja'ul-'amru kulluhoo fa'budhu wa tawakkal 'alayh; wa maa Rabbuka bighaafilin 'ammaa ta'maloon.
verses.translation: Aur Allah hi ke liye hai aasmaanon aur zameen ka ghaib aur sab kaam usi ki taraf lautaaye jaate hain, chunaancheh aap usi ki ibaadat karein aur usi par tawakkul karein, aur aapka rab usse ghaafil nahin jo tum amal karte ho.

verses.arabic: الۤرٰ تِلْكَ اٰيٰتُ الْكِتَابِ الْمُبِيْنِ
verses.transliteration: Alif-Laaam-Raa; tilka 'Aayaatul-Kitaabil- Mubeen
verses.translation: Alf laaam raa, yeh waazel kitab ki aayaat hain

verses.arabic: اِنَّاۤ اَنْزَلْنٰهُ قُرْاٰنًا عَرَبِيًّا لَعَلَّكُمْ تَعْقِلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Innaaa 'anzalnaahu qur'aanan 'Arabiyyal- la'allakum ta'qiloon.
verses.translation: Beshak humne ise arabi qur'an naazil kiya taake tum samjho.

verses.arabic: نَحْنُ نَقُصُّ عَلَيْكَ اَحْسَنَ الْقَصَصِ بِمَاۤ اَوْحَيْنَاۤ اِلَيْكَ هٰذَا الْقُرْاٰنَۚ وَ اِنْ كُنْتَ مِنْ قَبْلِهٖ لَمِنَ الْغٰفِلِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Nahnu naquşşu 'alayka 'ahsanal-qaşaşi bimaaa 'awhaynaaa 'ilayka haazal-qur'aana wa 'in kunta min qablihee laminal-ghaafileen.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) aapki taraf yeh qur'an wahi karke hum aapko ek behtareen daastaan sunaate hain jabke yaqeenan isse pahle aap ghaafilon mein se the.
verses.deepMeaning: Yahan behtareen qisaye se murad woh waqiaat hain jo Qur'an mein hain, jinmein hidayat hai aur ibraaten hain

verses.arabic: اِذْ قَالَ يُوْسُفُ لِاَبِيْهِ يٰۤاَبَتِ اِنِّيْ رَاَيْتُ اَحَدَ عَشَرَ كَوْكَبًا وَّ الشَّمْسَ وَ الْقَمَرَ رَاَيْتُهُمْ لِيْ سٰجِدِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Iz qaala Yoosufu li'abeehi yaaa 'abati 'innee ra'aytu 'ahada 'ashara kawkabañw- washshamsa walqamara ra'aytuhum lee saajideen
verses.translation: (Yaad karein) jab Yusuf ne apne baap se kaha: Abba jaan: beshak main ne (khaab mein) dekha hai ke giyaarah sitaare, suraj aur chaand mujhe sajdah kar rahe hain.

verses.arabic: قَالَ يٰبُنَيَّ لَا تَقْصُصْ رُءْيَاكَ عَلٰۤى اِخْوَتِكَ فَيَكِيْدُوْا لَكَ كَيْدًا ؕ اِنَّ الشَّيْطٰنَ لِلْاِنْسَانِ عَدُوٌّ مُّبِيْنٌ
verses.transliteration: Qaala yaa bunayya laa taqşuş ru'yaaka 'alaaa 'ikhwatika fayakeedoo laka kaydaa; 'innash- Shaytaana lil'insaani 'aduwwum-mubeen.
verses.translation: Uss (Ya'qoob) ne kaha: mere piyaare bete! apna khaab apne bhaaiyon ko na sunana warnah woh tere liye koyi (buri) tadbeer karenge, beshak shaytaan insaan ka khula dushman hai.

verses.arabic: وَ كَذٰلِكَ يَجْتَبِيْكَ رَبُّكَ وَ يُعَلِّمُكَ مِنْ تَأْوِيْلِ الْاَحَادِيْثِ وَ يُتِمُّ نِعْمَتَهٗ عَلَيْكَ وَ عَلٰۤى اٰلِ يَعْقُوْبَ كَمَاۤ اَتَمَّهَا عَلٰۤى اَبَوَيْكَ اِبْرٰهِيْمَ وَ اِسْحٰقَؕ اِنَّ رَبَّكَ عَلِيْمٌ حَكِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa kazaalika yajtabeeka Rabbuka wa yu'allimuka min ta'weelil- 'ahaadeesi wa yutimmu ni'matahoo 'alayka wa 'alaaa 'Aali Ya'qooba kamaaa 'atammahaa alaaa 'abawayka min qablu 'Ibraaheema wa Ishaaq; 'inna Rabbaka Aleemun Hakeem.
verses.translation: Aur iss tarah tera rab tujhe mumtaaz maqaam ataa karega aur tujhe baaton ki taaweel (khaabon ki t'abeer) sikhaayega, aur tujh par aal-e-yaqoob par apni ne'mat puri karega jis tarah usne isse pahle pura kiya tha tere baap dada Ibraheem aur Ishaaq par, beshak tera rab khoob jaanne waala, badi hikmat waala hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Yahan ikhtiyar ki baat ki gayi hai jo Allah ne apne Nabi Yusuf (A.S) ko di, unko baaton ka mafhoom samajhne ki salahiat bakshi aur apni ni'mat ka zikar kiya jo Ibraheem aur Ishaaq ke saath thi.

verses.arabic: لَقَدْ كَانَ فِيْ يُوْسُفَ وَ اِخْوَتِهٖۤ اٰيٰتٌ لِّلسَّآئِلِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Laqad kaana fee Yoosufa wa 'ikhwatiheee 'Aayaatul-lissaaa'ileen
verses.translation: Tahqeeq Yusuf aur uske bhaaiyon (ke waaqiye) mein saayilon ke liye nishaaniyaan hain.

verses.arabic: اِذْ قَالُوْا لَيُوْسُفُ وَ اَخُوْهُ اَحَبُّ اِلٰۤى اَبِيْنَا مِنَّا وَ نَحْنُ عُصْبَةٌ اِنَّ اَبَانَا لَفِيْ ضَلٰلٍ مُّبِيْنٍ
verses.transliteration: Iz qaaloo la-Yoosufu wa 'akhoohu 'ahabbu 'ilaaa 'Abeenaa minnaa wa nahnu 'uşbah; 'inna 'abaanaa lafee dalaalim- mubeen.
verses.translation: Jab unhon ne (aapas mein) kaha: Yusuf aur uska bhaai (Binyaameen) to hamaare baap ko humse ziyaadah piyaare hain haalaanke hum ek taaqatwar jamaa'at hain, beshak hamaara baap waazeh ghalti par hai.

verses.arabic: اُقْتُلُوْا يُوْسُفَ اَوِ اطْرَحُوْهُ اَرْضًا يَّخْلُ لَكُمْ وَجْهُ اَبِيْكُمْ وَ تَكُوْنُوْا مِنْۢ بَعْدِهٖ قَوْمًا صٰلِحِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Uqtuloo Yoosufa 'awit- rahoohu 'ardañy-yakhlu lakum wajhu 'abeekum wa takoonoo mim ba'dihee qawman şaaliheen.
verses.translation: Tum Yusuf ko qatl kardo ya use kisi zameen mein phenk do ke tumhaare baap ka chehra tumhaare liye khaali (makhsoos) ho jaaye aur uske ba'd tum nek log ban jaana.

verses.arabic: قَالَ قَآىٕلٌ مِّنْهُمْ لَا تَقْتُلُوْا يُوْسُفَ وَ اَلْقُوْهُ فِيْ غَيٰبَتِ الْجُبِّ يَلْتَقِطْهُ بَعْضُ السَّيَّارَةِ اِنْ كُنْتُمْ فٰعِلِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala qaaa'ilum- minhum laa taqtuloo Yoosufa wa 'alqoohu fee ghayaabatil-jubbi yaltaqithu ba dus- sayyaarati 'in kuntum faa'ileen.
verses.translation: Un mein se ek kahne waale ne kaha: tum Yusuf ko qatl na karo aur tum use kunwein ki tah (gahraayi) mein daal do ke use koyi musaafir uthhaale jaaye, gar tum (kuchh) karne hi waale ho.

verses.arabic: قَالُوْا يٰۤاَبَانَا مَا لَكَ لَا تَاْمَنَّا عَلٰى يُوْسُفَ وَ اِنَّا لَهٗ لَنٰصِحُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo yaaa 'abaaanaa maa laka laa ta'mannaa 'alaa Yoosufa wa 'innaa lahoo lanaaşihoon.
verses.translation: Unhon ne kaha: Abba jaan! aapko kiya hai ke aap hum par Yusuf ki baabat e'tebaar nahin karte haalaanke yaqeenan hum uske khair khaah hain.

verses.arabic: اَرْسِلْهُ مَعَنَا غَدًا يَّرْتَعْ وَ يَلْعَبْ وَ اِنَّا لَهٗ لَحٰفِظُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Arsilhu ma'anaa wa ghadany-yarta' yal'ab wa 'innaa lahoo lahaafizoon.
verses.translation: Aap kal use hamaare saath bhejein ke khoob (phal) khaaye aur khele koode¹ aur hum yaqeenar uske muhaafiz hain.
verses.deepMeaning: Khel aur tafreeh ka rujhaan, insaan ki fitrat mein daakhil hai. isliye jaayez khel aur tafreeh par Allah Ta'ala ne kisi daur mein bhi paa bandi aayed nahin ki. Islam mein bhi inki ijaazat hai lekin mashroot ya'ni aise khel aur tafreeh jaayez hain jin mein sharayi mahzooraat na hon ya mahzooraat tak phunchne ka zaria' na banein, chunaancheh Ya'qoob عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام ne bhi khel kood ki hadtak koyi e'teraaz nahin kiya albatta yeh khadshah zaahir kiya ke tum khel kood mein madhoosh ho aur use bhedya khaa jaaye, kyun ke khule maidaanon aur sehraaon mein wahaan bhediye aam the.

verses.arabic: قَالَ اِنِّيْ لَيَحْزُنُنِيْۤ اَنْ تَذْهَبُوْا بِهٖ وَ اَخَافُ اَنْ يَّاْكُلَهُ الذِّئْبُ وَ اَنْتُمْ عَنْهُ غٰفِلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala 'innee layahzununeee 'an tazhaboo bihee wa 'akhaafu 'any-ya'kulahuz-zi'bu wa 'antum 'anhu ghaafiloon
verses.translation: Ya'qoob ne kaha: beshak mujhe to yeh baat gham gheen kiye deti hai ke tum use le jaao aur mujhe khauf aata hai ke use bhediyaa khaa jaaye aur tum usse ghaafil ho.

verses.arabic: قَالُوْا لَىٕنْ اَكَلَهُ الذِّئْبُ وَ نَحْنُ عُصْبَةٌ اِنَّاۤ اِذًا لَّخٰسِرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo la'in 'akalahuzzi'bu wa nahnu 'uşbatun 'innaaa 'izal-lakhaasiroon.
verses.translation: Unhon ne kaha: agar use bhediyaa kha jaaye jab ke hum ek taaqatwar jamaa'at hain to bilashubah hum khasaarah paane waale huye.

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّا ذَهَبُوْا بِهٖ وَ اَجْمَعُوْۤا اَنْ يَّجْعَلُوْهُ فِيْ غَيٰبَتِ الْجُبِّ وَ اَوْحَيْنَاۤ اِلَيْهِ لَتُنَبِّئَنَّهُمْ بِاَمْرِهِمْ هٰذَا وَ هُمْ لَا يَشْعُرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Falammaa zahaboo bihee wa 'ajma'ooo 'añy-yaj'aloohu fee ghayaabatil-jubb; wa 'awhaynaaa 'ilayhi latunabbi'annahum bi'amrihim haazaa wa hum laa yash'uroon.
verses.translation: Phir woh jab use le gaye aur unhon ne tai kar liya ke use kunwein ki tah mein daal dein, tab humne Yusuf ki taraf wahi bheji ke tu unhein unka yeh kaam jataaye ga jabke woh nahin samajhte honge.

verses.arabic: وَ جَآءُوْۤ اَبَاهُمْ عِشَآءً يَّبْكُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa jaaa'ooo 'abaahum 'ishaaa'any- yabkoon.
verses.translation: Aur woh apne baap ke paas isha ke waqt rote huye aaye.

verses.arabic: قَالُوْا يٰۤاَبَانَاۤ اِنَّا ذَهَبْنَا نَسْتَبِقُ وَ تَرَكْنَا يُوْسُفَ عِنْدَ مَتَاعِنَا فَاَكَلَهُ الذِّئْبُۖ وَ مَاۤ اَنْتَ بِمُؤْمِنٍ لَّنَا وَ لَوْ كُنَّا صٰدِقِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo yaaa 'abaanaaa 'innaa zahabnaa nastabiqu wa taraknaa Yoosufa 'inda mataa'inaa fa'akalahuz- zi'bu, wa maaa 'anta bimu'minil-lanaa wa law kunnaa şaadiqeen.
verses.translation: Unhon ne kaha: Abba jaan! beshak hum daud ka muqaablah karne lage the aur Usuf ko apne saamaan ke paas chhod diya tha to use bhediya khaa gaya aur aap hamaari baat ka yaqeen karne waale nahin agarcheh hum sachche hi hon.

verses.arabic: وَ جَآءُوْا عَلٰى قَمِيْصِهٖ بِدَمٍ كَذِبٍ ؕ قَالَ بَلْ سَوَّلَتْ لَكُمْ اَنْفُسُكُمْ اَمْرًا ۖ فَصَبْرٌ جَمِيْلٌ ؕ وَ اللّٰهُ الْمُسْتَعَانُ عَلٰى مَا تَصِفُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa jaaa'oo 'alaa qameeşihee bidamin kazib; qaala bal sawwalat lakum 'anfusukum 'amraa; faşabrun jameel; wallaahul-musta'aanu 'alaa maa taşifoon.
verses.translation: Aur woh uski qamees ko jhoot moot ka khoon bhi laga laaye, Ya'qoob ne kaha: (haqeeqat yeh nahin) balke tumhaare dilon ne tumhaare liye ek (buri) baat aaraastah kardi hai, lihaaza sabr hi behtar hai, aur uss par Allah hi madad se matloob hai jo tum bayaan karte ho.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Munaafiqeen ne jab Aayeshah  رضي الله عنها par tohmat lagaayi to unhon ne bhi Nabi ﷺ ke iſhaam-o- irshaad ke jawaab mein farmaya tha: 'Allah ki qasam main apne aur aap logon ke liye wahi misaal paati hoon sse Yusuf ke baap Ya'qoob ko saabqah pesh aaya tha unhon ne sabr ka raastah ikhtiyaar kiya tha aur ere liye bhi siwaaye sabr ke koyi chaarah nahin. (Sahih Bukhari, Tafseer Surah Yusuf)

verses.arabic: وَ جَآءَتْ سَيَّارَةٌ فَاَرْسَلُوْا وَارِدَهُمْ فَاَدْلٰى دَلْوَهٗ ؕ قَالَ يٰبُشْرٰى هٰذَا غُلٰمٌ ۚ وَّ اَسَرُّوْهُ بِضَاعَةً ۭ وَ اللّٰهُ عَلِيْمٌۢ بِمَا يَعْمَلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa jaaa'at sayyaaratun fa'arsaloo waaridahum fa'adlaa dalwah; qaala yaa bushraa haazaa ghulaam; wa 'asarroohu bidaa'ah; wallaahu 'aleemum bimaa ya'maloon.
verses.translation: Aur ek qaafilah aaya, phir unhon ne apna paani laane waala bheja to usne apna dol Matkaaya. woh (dekhte hi) pukaar uthaa: waah khush khabri hai! yeh ladka hai. aur unhon ne use poonji samajh kar chhupaaliya aur Allah use khoob jaanta tha jo woh kar rahe the.

verses.arabic: وَ شَرَوْهُ بِثَمَنٍۭ بَخْسٍ دَرٰهِمَ مَعْدُوْدَةٍ ۭ وَ كَانُوْا فِيْهِ مِنَ الزّٰهِدِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa sharawhu bisamanim bakhsin daraahima ma'doodah; wa kaanoo feehi minaz- zaahideen.
verses.translation: Aur unhon ne use ma'mooli si qeemat (ya'ni) ginti ke chand dirhamon mein bech diya aur unhen iss mein koyi raghbat hi na thi.

verses.arabic: وَ قَالَ الَّذِي اشْتَرٰىهُ مِنْ مِّصْرَ لِامْرَاَتِهٖۤ اَكْرِمِيْ مَثْوٰٮهُ عَسٰۤى اَنْ يَّنْفَعَنَاۤ اَوْ نَتَّخِذَهٗ وَلَدًا ؕ وَ كَذٰلِكَ مَكَّنَّا لِيُوْسُفَ فِي الْاَرْضِ وَ لِنُعَلِّمَهٗ مِنْ تَاْوِيْلِ الْاَحَادِيْثِ ؕ وَ اللّٰهُ غَالِبٌ عَلٰۤى اَمْرِهٖ وَ لٰكِنَّ اَكْثَرَ النَّاسِ لَا يَعْلَمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa qaalal-lazish- taraahu mim-Misra limra'atiheee 'akrimee maswaahu 'asaaa 'añy- yanfa'anaaa 'aw nattakhizahoo waladaa; wa kazaalika makkannaa li-Yoosufa fil- 'ardi wa linu'allimahoo min ta'weelil-ahaadees; wallaahu ghaalibun 'alaaa 'amrihee wa laakinna 'aksaran-naasi laa yalamoon.
verses.translation: Aur woh shakhs jisne Yusuf ko Misr mein khareeda tha, usne apni beewi se kaha: iss ki achchhi tarah dekh bhaal karna ummeed hai yeh humein nafa' de ya yeh ke hum ise beta banaalen. aur isi tarah humne Yusuf ko zameen (Misr) mein jagah di taake hum use baaton ki taaweel (khawaabob ki ta'beer) sikhaayen aur Allah apne har kaam par ghaalib hai lekin aksar log nahin jaante.

verses.arabic: وَ لَمَّا بَلَغَ اَشُدَّهٗۤ اٰتَيْنٰهُ حُكْمًا وَّ عِلْمًا ۚ وَ كَذٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa lammaa balagha 'ashuddahooo 'aataynaahu hukmanw- wa 'ilmaa; wa kazaalika najzil-muhsineen.
verses.translation: Aur jab Yusuf apni jawaani mein pahunche to humne use hukm aur ilm diya aur isi tarah hum neki karne waalon ko jaza dete hain.

verses.arabic: وَ رَاوَدَتْهُ الَّتِيْ هُوَ فِيْ بَيْتِهَا عَنْ نَّفْسِهٖ وَ غَلَّقَتِ الْاَبْوَابَ وَ قَالَتْ هَيْتَ لَكَ ۭ قَالَ مَعَاذَ اللّٰهِ ۭ اِنَّهٗ رَبِّيْۤ اَحْسَنَ مَثْوَاىَ ۭ اِنَّهٗ لَا يُفْلِحُ الظّٰلِمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa raawadathul-latee huwa fee baytihaa 'an nafsihee wa ghallaqatil- 'abwaaba wa qaalat hayta lak; qaala ma'aazal-laahi 'innahoo rabbeee 'ahsana maswaaya 'innahoo laa yuflihuz-zaalimoon.
verses.translation: Aur jis aurat ke ghar mein woh (Yusuf) tha uss aurat ne uske ji se phuslaaya aur darwaaze band kar diye aur boli: lo aajaao, Yusuf ne kaha: Allah ki panah! woh (Azeeze Misr) to mera aaqa hai, usne mujhe achchha thhekaana diya, beshak zaalim log falaah nahin paate.

verses.arabic: وَ لَقَدْ هَمَّتْ بِهٖ وَ هَمَّ بِهَا لَوْلَاۤ اَنْ رَّاٰ بُرْهَانَ رَبِّهٖ ۭ كَذٰلِكَ لِنَصْرِفَ عَنْهُ السُّوْٓءَ وَ الْفَحْشَآءَ ۭ اِنَّهٗ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا الْمُخْلَصِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa lagad hammat bihee wa hamma bihaa law laaa 'ar-ra'aa burhaana Rabbih; kazaalika linasrifa 'anhus- Sooo'a walfahshaaa'; 'innahoo min 'ibaadinal- mukhlaşeen
verses.translation: Aur albatta uss aurat ne Yusuf ka iraadah kiya aur woh bhi uska iraadah kar leta agar apne rab ki nishaani na dekh leta.¹ usi tarah huwa taake hum usse buraayi aur be hayaayi ko door karein, beshak woh hamaare chune huye bandon mein se tha.
verses.deepMeaning: Ya'ni agar Yusuf عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام rab ki burhaan na dekhte to jo qasd kiya tha, kar guzrte, yeh burhaan kiya thi? iss mein mukhtalif aqwaal hain, matlab yeh hai ke rab ki taraf se koyi aisi cheez aap ko dikhaayi gayi ke use dekh kar aap nafs ke daay'iye ko dabaane aur radd karne mein kaamyaab ho gaye. Allah Ta'ala apne paighambaron ki iss tarah hifaazat farmaata hai.

verses.arabic: وَ اسْتَبَقَا الْبَابَ وَ قَدَّتْ قَمِيْصَهٗ مِنْ دُبُرٍ وَّ اَلْفَيَا سَيِّدَهَا لَدَا الْبَابِ ۭ قَالَتْ مَا جَزَآءُ مَنْ اَرَادَ بِاَهْلِكَ سُوْۤءًا اِلَّاۤ اَنْ يُّسْجَنَ اَوْ عَذَابٌ اَلِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: Wastabaqal-baaba wa qaddat qameeșahoo min duburinw-wa 'alfayaa sayyidahaa ladal-baab; qaalat maa jazaaa'u man 'araada bi'ahlika sooo'an 'illaaa 'añy-yusjana 'aw 'azaabun 'aleem.
verses.translation: Aur woh donon darwaaze ki taraf daude, aur uss (aurat) ne uss (Yusuf) ki qamees peechhe se phaad di aur donon ne uske khaawind ko darwaaze ke paas paaya to woh (jhat se) boli: uski kiya saza hai jo teri beewi se buraayi ka eraadah kare siwaaye iske ki use qaid kiya jaaye ya dard naak azaab (diya jaaye)?

verses.arabic: قَالَ هِيَ رَاوَدَتْنِيْ عَنْ نَّفْسِيْ ۚ وَ شَهِدَ شَاهِدٌ مِّنْ اَهْلِهَاۤ اِنْ كَانَ قَمِيْصُهٗ قُدَّ مِنْ قُبُلٍ فَصَدَقَتْ وَ هُوَ مِنَ الْكٰذِبِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala hiya raawadatnee 'an nafsee wa shahida shaahidum- min 'ahlihaaa 'in kaana qameeșuhoo qudda min qubulin faşadaqat wa huwa minal-kaazibeen.
verses.translation: Yusuf ne kaha: isi ne mujhe meri ji se phuslaaya hai aur aurat ke khaandaan mein se ek shaahid ne gawaahi di ke agar Yusuf ki qamees aage se phaati hai to aurat sachchi hai aur Yusuf jhoota hai.

verses.arabic: وَ اِنْ كَانَ قَمِيْصُهٗ قُدَّ مِنْ دُبُرٍ فَكَذَبَتْ وَ هُوَ مِنَ الصّٰدِقِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'in kaana qameeșuhoo qudda min duburin fakazabat wa huwa minaş-şaadiqeen
verses.translation: Aur agar uski qamees peechhe se phati hai to aurat jhooti hai aur Yusuf sachcha hai.

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّا رَاٰ قَمِيْصَهٗ قُدَّ مِنْ دُبُرٍ قَالَ اِنَّهٗ مِنْ كَيْدِكُنَّ ۭ اِنَّ كَيْدَكُنَّ عَظِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: Falammaa ra'aa qameeşahoo qudda min duburin qaala 'innahoo min kaydikunna 'inna kaydakunna 'azeem.
verses.translation: Phir jab Azeez ne Yusuf ki qamees peechhe se phati dekhi to woh kahne laga: beshak yeh tum auraton ke makro fareb mein se hai, beshak tumhaara makr bahut bada (khatarnaak) hai.

verses.arabic: يُوْسُفُ اَعْرِضْ عَنْ هٰذَا وَ اسْتَغْفِرِيْ لِذَنْبِكِ ۭ اِنَّكِ كُنْتِ مِنَ الْخَاطِئِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Yoosufu 'a'rid 'an haazaa; wastaghfiree lizambiki 'innaki kunti minal-khaati'een.
verses.translation: Aye Yusuf! iss (baat) se dar guzar kar aur (beewi se kaha:) tu apne gunaah par bakhshish maang, beshak tu hi khatakaar hai.

verses.arabic: وَ قَالَ نِسْوَةٌ فِي الْمَدِيْنَةِ امْرَاَتُ الْعَزِيْزِ تُرَاوِدُ فَتٰىهَا عَنْ نَّفْسِهٖ ۚ قَدْ شَغَفَهَا حُبًّا ۭ اِنَّا لَنَرٰىهَا فِيْ ضَلٰلٍ مُّبِيْنٍ
verses.transliteration: Wa qaala niswatun fil- madeenatim-ra'atul-'Azeezi turaawidu fataahaa 'an nafsihee qad shaghafahaa hubbaa; 'innaa lanaraahaa fee dalaalim-mubeen.
verses.translation: Aur shahar mein auratein kahne lagin ke Azeez ki beewi apne ghulaam ko uske ji se phuslaati hai, uske dil mein (Yusuf ki) mohabbat ghar gayi hai. beshak hum use khuli gumraahi mein dekhti hain.

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّا سَمِعَتْ بِمَكْرِهِنَّ اَرْسَلَتْ اِلَيْهِنَّ وَ اَعْتَدَتْ لَهُنَّ مُتَّكَـٔـا وَّ اٰتَتْ كُلَّ وَاحِدَةٍ مِّنْهُنَّ سِكِّيْنًا وَّ قَالَتِ اخْرُجْ عَلَيْهِنَّ ۭ فَلَمَّا رَاَيْنَهٗۤ اَكْبَرْنَهٗ وَ قَطَّعْنَ اَيْدِيَهُنَّ وَ قُلْنَ حَاشَ لِلّٰهِ ۭ مَا هٰذَا بَشَرًا ۭ اِنْ هٰذَاۤ اِلَّا مَلَكٌ كَرِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: Falammaa sami'at bimakrihinna 'arsalat 'ilayhinna wa 'a'tadat lahunna muttakaanw-wa 'aatat kulla waahidatim- minhunna sikkeenanw- wa qaalatikh-ruj 'alayhinna falammaa ra'aynahooo 'akbarnahoo wa qatta'na 'aydiyahunna wa qulna haasha lillaahi maa haazaa basharaa; 'in haazaaa 'illaa malakun kareem.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh jab uss (aurat) ne unki pur makr baatein suni to usne unki taraf paighaam bheja aur un ke liye masnadein tayyaar kin aur un mein se har ek aurat ko ek chhuri di aur (phir Yusuf se) kaha: nikal aa inke saamne. phir jab unhon ne use dekha to dang rah gayin aur apne haath kaat daale aur boli: (Haashalillah) 'Allah ki panah!' yeh bashar nahin, yeh to nehaayat muazzaz farishtah hai.

verses.arabic: قَالَتْ فَذٰلِكُنَّ الَّذِيْ لُمْتُنَّنِيْ فِيْهِ ۚ وَ لَقَدْ رَاوَدْتُّهٗ عَنْ نَّفْسِهٖ فَاسْتَعْصَمَ ۖ وَ لَىٕنْ لَّمْ يَفْعَلْ مَاۤ اٰمُرُهٗ لَيُسْجَنَنَّ وَ لَيَكُوْنًا مِّنَ الصّٰغِرِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaalat fazaalikunnal- lazee lumtunnanee feeh; wa laqad raawattuhoo 'an nafsihee fasta'şam; wa la'il-lam yafal maaa 'aamuruhoo layusjananna wa layakoonam-minas-şaaghireen.
verses.translation: Usne kaha: yahi to hai woh shakhs jiske baare mein tum mujhe ta'ne deti thin aur main ne hi ise uske ji se phuslaaya tha lekin usne (khud ko) bachaa liya, ab agar iss ne woh na kiya jo main hukm deti hoon to ise zaroor qaid kiya jaayega aur yaqeenan woh be izzat hoga.

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ السِّجْنُ اَحَبُّ اِلَيَّ مِمَّا يَدْعُوْنَنِيْۤ اِلَيْهِ ۚ وَ اِلَّا تَصْرِفْ عَنِّيْ كَيْدَهُنَّ اَصْبُ اِلَيْهِنَّ وَ اَكُنْ مِّنَ الْجٰهِلِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala Rabbis-sijnu 'ahabbu 'ilayya mimmaa yad'oonaneee 'ilayhi wa 'illaa taşrif 'annee kaydahunna 'aşbu 'ilayhinna wa 'akum-minal-jaahileen
verses.translation: Yusuf ne kaha: aye mere rab! mujhe qaid khaanah isse ziyaadah pasand hai jiski taraf yeh auratein mujhe bulaati hain aur agar tune unka makr mujh se door na kiya to main unki taraf maayel ho jaaounga aur main jaahilon mein hunga.

verses.arabic: فَاسْتَجَابَ لَهٗ رَبُّهٗ فَصَرَفَ عَنْهُ كَيْدَهُنَّ ۭ اِنَّهٗ هُوَ السَّمِيْعُ الْعَلِيْمُ
verses.transliteration: Fastajaaba lahoo Rabbuhoo faşarafa 'anhu kaydahunn; 'innahoo Huwas-Samee'ul-'Aleem.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh uske rab ne uski du'a qubool karli, phir usne usse un (auraton) ka makr door kar diya, beshak wahi khoob sunne waala, khoon jaanne waala hai.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ بَدَا لَهُمْ مِّنْۢ بَعْدِ مَا رَاَوُا الْاٰيٰتِ لَيَسْجُنُنَّهٗ حَتّٰى حِيْنٍ
verses.transliteration: Summa badaa lahum mim ba'di maa ra'awul- 'Aayaati layasjununnahoo hattaa heen.
verses.translation: Phir nishaaniyaan dekh lene ke ba'd un logon ko yahi soojha ke woh uss (Yusuf) ko kuchh arse tak bahar haal qaid rakhkhein.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Iffat-o-paak daamni waazeh ho jaane ke baa wajood Yusuf ko Hawaal-e-zindaan karne mein yahi maslehat unke pesh-e-nazar ho sakti thi ke aziz-e-misr hazrat Yusuf ko apni biwi se door rakhna chaahta hoga ke woh dobaarah Yusuf ko apne daam mein phansaane ki koshish na kare jaisa ke woh aisa iraadah rakhti thi.

verses.arabic: وَ دَخَلَ مَعَهُ السِّجْنَ فَتَيٰنِ ۖ قَالَ اَحَدُهُمَاۤ اِنِّيْۤ اَرٰى نِيْۤ اَعْصِرُ خَمْرًا ۙ وَ قَالَ الْاٰخَرُ اِنِّيْۤ اَرٰى نِيْۤ اَحْمِلُ فَوْقَ رَاْسِيْ خُبْزًا تَاْكُلُ الطَّيْرُ مِنْهُ ۭ نَبِّئْنَا بِتَأْوِيْلِهٖۤ اِنَّا نَرٰىكَ مِنَ الْمُحْسِنِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa dakhala ma'ahus- sijna fatayaan; qaala 'ahaduhumaaa 'inneee 'araaneee 'a'şiru khamranw-wa qaalal- 'aakharu 'inneee 'araanee 'ahmilu Fawqa Ra'see khubzan ta'kulut-tayru minh; nabbi'naa bita'weeliheee 'innaa naraaka minal-muhsineen
verses.translation: Aur uske saath qaid khaane mein do jawaan bhi daakhil huye. un mein se ek ne kaha: beshak main khud ko dekhta hoon ke sharaab nichod raha hoon aur doosra bola: beshak main khud ko dekhta hoon ke apne sar par rotiyaan uthaaye huye hoon, un mein se parinde khaa rahe hain tu humein inki ta'beer bata, beshak hum tujhe nek samajhte hain.

verses.arabic: قَالَ لَا يَاْتِيْكُمَا طَعَامٌ تُرْزَقَانِهٖۤ اِلَّا نَبَّأْتُكُمَا بِتَأْوِيْلِهٖ قَبْلَ اَنْ يَّأْتِيَكُمَا ۭ ذٰلِكُمَا مِمَّا عَلَّمَنِيْ رَبِّيْ ۚ اِنِّيْ تَرَكْتُ مِلَّةَ قَوْمٍ لَا يُؤْمِنُوْنَ بِاللّٰهِ وَ هُمْ بِالْاٰخِرَةِ هُمْ كٰفِرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala laa ya'teekumaa ta'aamun turzaqaaniheee 'illaa nabba'tukumaa bita'weelihee qabla 'añy- ya'tiyakumaa; zaalikumaa mimmaa 'allamanee rabbeee; 'innee taraktu millata qawmil-laa yu'minoona billaahi wa hum bil- 'Aakhirati hum kaafiroon
verses.translation: Yusuf ne kaha: jo khaana tumhein yahaan milta hai uske aane se pahle main tumhein unki ta'beer batlaaounga. yeh un cheezon mein se hain jo mere rab ne mujhe sikhlaayin. beshak main ne un logon ka deen chhod diya hai jo Allah par eemaan nahin laate aur woh aakhirat ke bhi munkir hain.

verses.arabic: وَ اتَّبَعْتُ مِلَّةَ اٰبَآىٕيْۤ اِبْرٰهِيْمَ وَ اِسْحٰقَ وَ يَعْقُوْبَ ۚ مَا كَانَ لَنَاۤ اَنْ نُّشْرِكَ بِاللّٰهِ مِنْ شَيْءٍ ۭ ذٰلِكَ مِنْ فَضْلِ اللّٰهِ عَلَيْنَا وَ عَلَى النَّاسِ وَ لٰكِنَّ اَكْثَرَ النَّاسِ لَا يَشْكُرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wattaba'tu Millata 'aabaaa'eee 'Ibraaheema wa 'Ishaaqa wa Yaʻqoob; maa kaana lanaaa 'an nushrika billaahi min shay'; zaalika min fadlil-laahi 'alaynaa wa 'alan-naasi wa laakinna 'aksaran- naasi laa yashkuroon
verses.translation: Aur main ne itteba' kiya hai apne baap daada, braaheem aur Ishaaq aur Ya'qoob ke deen ka. hamaare liye jaayez nahin ke hum Allah ke saath kisi cheez ko shareek thhahraayein, yeh Allah ka fazl hai hum par aur (sab) logon par, lekin aksar log shukr adaa nahin karte.

verses.arabic: يٰصَاحِبَيِ السِّجْنِ ءَاَرْبَابٌ مُّتَفَرِّقُوْنَ خَيْرٌ اَمِ اللّٰهُ الْوَاحِدُ الْقَهَّارُ
verses.transliteration: Yaa şaahibayis-sijni 'a'arbaabum-Mutafar- riqoona khayrun 'amil- laahul-Waahidul-Qahhaar.
verses.translation: Mere qaid khaane ke do saathiyo! bhala kayi juda juda ma'bood behtar hai ya ek Allah, zabardast?.

verses.arabic: مَا تَعْبُدُوْنَ مِنْ دُوْنِهٖۤ اِلَّاۤ اَسْمَآءً سَمَّيْتُمُوْهَاۤ اَنْتُمْ وَ اٰبَآؤُكُمْ مَّاۤ اَنْزَلَ اللّٰهُ بِهَا مِنْ سُلْطٰنٍ ۭ اِنِ الْحُكْمُ اِلَّا لِلّٰهِ ۭ اَمَرَ اَلَّا تَعْبُدُوْۤا اِلَّاۤ اِيَّاهُ ۭ ذٰلِكَ الدِّيْنُ الْقَيِّمُ وَ لٰكِنَّ اَكْثَرَ النَّاسِ لَا يَعْلَمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Maa ta'budoona min dooniheee 'illaaa 'asmaaa'an sammaytumoohaaa 'antum wa 'aabaaa'ukum. maaa 'anzalal-laahu bihaa min sultaan; 'inil- hukmu 'illaa lillaah; 'amara 'allaa ta'budooo 'illaaa 'iyyaah; zaalikad- deenul-qayyimu wa laakinna 'aksaran-naasi laa ya'lamoon.
verses.translation: Tum uske siwa jinki i'baadat karte ho woh naam hi to hain jo khud tumne aur tumhaare baap daadon ne rakh liye hain, Allah ne unki koyi sanad naazil nahin ki¹ Allah ke siwa kisi ki hukoomat nahin. usne hukm diya hai ke tum sirf uski i'baadat karo yahi seedha deen hai, magar aksar log ilm nahin rakhte.
verses.deepMeaning: Iska ek matlab to yeh hai ke unka naam ma'bood tumne khud hi rakh liya hai daraan haal yeh ke woh ma'bood hain na unki baabat koyi daleel Allah ne utaari hai. doosra matlab yeh hai ke un ma'boodon ke jo mukhtalif naam tumne tajweez kar rakkhe hain masalan ghareeb nawaaz, gunj bakhsh, shakar gunjkarni waala, karmaan waala waghairah waghairah yeh sab tumhaare khud saakhtah hain, unki koyi daleel Allah ne nahin utaari.

verses.arabic: يٰصَاحِبَيِ السِّجْنِ اَمَّاۤ اَحَدُكُمَا فَيَسْقِيْ رَبَّهٗ خَمْرًا ۚ وَ اَمَّا الْاٰخَرُ فَيُصْلَبُ فَتَاْكُلُ الطَّيْرُ مِنْ رَّاْسِهٖ قُضِيَ الْاَمْرُ الَّذِيْ فِيْهِ تَسْتَفْتِيٰنِ
verses.transliteration: Yaa şaahibayis-sijni 'ammaaa 'ahadukumaa fayasqee rabbahoo khamranw-wa 'ammal- 'aakharu fayuşlabu fata kulut-tayru mir- ra'sih; qudiyal-'amrul- lazee feehi tastaftiyaan
verses.translation: Mere qaid khaane ke do saathiyo! tum donon mein se ek apne maalik ko sharaab pilaayega aur doosra sooli diya jaayega aur uske sar mein se parinde (gosht) khaayenge. iss mu'aamle ka faislah kiya jaa chuka jiski baabat tum poochh rahe the.

verses.arabic: وَ قَالَ لِلَّذِيْ ظَنَّ اَنَّهٗ نَاجٍ مِّنْهُمَا اذْكُرْنِيْ عِنْدَ رَبِّكَ ۚ فَاَنْسٰىهُ الشَّيْطٰنُ ذِكْرَ رَبِّهٖ فَلَبِثَ فِي السِّجْنِ بِضْعَ سِنِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa qaala lillazee zanna 'annahoo naajim- minhumaz-kurnee 'inda rabbika fa'ansaahush- Shaytaanu zikra Rabbihee falabisa fis- sijni bad'a sineen.
verses.translation: Aur Yusuf ne use kaha jiska yaqeen tha ke woh un donon mein se najaat paane waala hai: to apne maalik se mera zikr karna, phir shaytaan ne use bhulaa diya apne malik se (Yusuf ka) zikr karna, chunaancheh Yusuf qaid khaane mein kayi saal¹ thhahra raha.
verses.deepMeaning: Biz'a ka lafz teen se le kar 9 tak ke adad ke liye bola jaata hai. Wahab bin Munabbah ka qaul hai Ayyub عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام aazmaayish mein aur Yusuf عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام qaid khaane mein 7 saal rahe aur bakht nasr ka azaab bhi 7 saal raha. Aur ba'z ke nazdeek 12 saal aur ba'z ke nazdeek 14 saal qaid khaane mein rahe. Wallahu A'alam

verses.arabic: وَ قَالَ الْمَلِكُ اِنِّيْۤ اَرٰى سَبْعَ بَقَرَاتٍ سِمَانٍ يَاْكُلُهُنَّ سَبْعٌ عِجَافٌ وَّ سَبْعَ سُنۢبُلٰتٍ خُضْرٍ وَّ اُخَرَ يَابِسٰتٍ ۚ يٰۤاَيُّهَا الْمَلَاُ اَفْتُوْنِیْ فِیْ رُءْیَایَ اِنْ كُنْتُمْ لِلرُّءْیَا تَعْبُرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa qaalal-maliku 'inneee 'araa sab'a baqaraatin simaaniny- ya'kuluhunna sab'un ijaafunw-wa sab'a sumbulaatin khudriñw-wa 'ukhara yaabisaat; yaaa 'ayyuhal-mala'u 'aftoonee fee ru'yaaya 'in kuntum lirru'yaa ta'buroon.
verses.translation: Aur baadshaah ne kaha: beshak main (khaab mein) saat moti gaayein dekhta hoon jinhein saat dubli gaayein khaa rahi hain aur saat sabz baaliyaan aur doosri khushk. aye darbaariyo! agar tum khaab ki ta'beer kar sakte ho to mujhe mere khaab ki ta'beer bataao.

verses.arabic: قَالُوْۤا اَضْغَاثُ اَحْلَامٍ ۚ وَ مَا نَحْنُ بِتَاْوِيْلِ الْاَحْلَامِ بِعٰلِمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaalooo 'adghaasu 'ahlaam; wa maa nahnu bita'weelil-'ahlaami bi'aalimeen.
verses.translation: Unhon ne kaha: yeh parishaan khaab hain aur hum aise khaabon ki ta'beer nahin jaante.

verses.arabic: وَ قَالَ الَّذِيْ نَجَا مِنْهُمَا وَ ادَّكَرَ بَعْدَ اُمَّةٍ اَنَا۠ اُنَبِّئُكُمْ بِتَاْوِيْلِهٖ فَاَرْسِلُوْنِ
verses.transliteration: Wa qaalal-lazee najaa minhumaa waddakara ba'da 'ummatin 'ana 'unabbi'ukum bita'weelihee fa'arsiloon.
verses.translation: Aur woh (shakhs) jisne donon (qaidiyon) mein se najaat paayi thi use (Yusuf) muddat ke ba'd yaad aaya, bola: main tumhein iski ta'beer bataaounga, lihaaza tum mujhe (Yusuf ke paas) bhejo.

verses.arabic: يُوْسُفُ اَيُّهَا الصِّدِّيْقُ اَفْتِنَا فِيْ سَبْعِ بَقَرٰتٍ سِمَانٍ يَاْكُلُهُنَّ سَبْعٌ عِجَافٌ وَّ سَبْعِ سُنۢبُلٰتٍ خُضْرٍ وَّ اُخَرَ يَابِسٰتٍ لَّعَلِّيْۤ اَرْجِعُ اِلَى النَّاسِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَعْلَمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Yoosufu 'ayyuhaş- şiddeequ 'aftinaa fee sab'i baqaraatin simaaniny-ya'kuluhunna sab'un 'ijaafunw-wa sab'i sumbulaatin khudrinw-wa 'ukhara yaabisaatil-la'alleee 'arji'u 'ilan-naasi la'allahum ya'ʻlamoon.
verses.translation: (Usne jaakar kaha:) aye Yusuf! aye bahut sachche! hamein (iss khaab ki ta'beer) bat laayiye ke saat moti gaayein hain jinhein saat dubli gaayein khaa rahi hain aur saat hari baaliyaan hain aur doosri khushk taake  main logon ki taraf lautun taake woh ma'loom karlein.

verses.arabic: قَالَ تَزْرَعُوْنَ سَبْعَ سِنِيْنَ دَأَبًا فَمَا حَصَدْتُّمْ فَذَرُوْهُ فِيْ سُنۢبُلِهٖۤ اِلَّا قَلِيْلًا مِّمَّا تَاْكُلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala tazra'oona sab'a sineena da'aban famaa haşattum fazaroohu fee sumbuliheee 'illaa qaleelam-mimmaa ta'kuloon.
verses.translation: Yusuf ne kaha: tum saat saal laga taar kaasht Karoge, chunaancheh tum jo (fasal) kaato to woh uski baaliyon hi mein rahne do siwaaye thodi (miqdaar) ke jo tum khaate ho.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ يَاْتِيْ مِنْۢ بَعْدِ ذٰلِكَ سَبْعٌ شِدَادٌ يَاْكُلْنَ مَا قَدَّمْتُمْ لَهُنَّ اِلَّا قَلِيْلًا مِّمَّا تُحْصِنُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Summa ya'tee mim ba'di zaalika sab'un shidaaduñy-ya'kulna maa qaddamtum lahunna 'illaa qaleelam- mimmaa tuhșinoon.
verses.translation: Phir uske ba'd saat saal sakht aayenge woh khaa jaayenge use jo tum ne unke liye zakheerah kiya hoga siwaaye thode se ghalle ke jo tum (bataure beej) mahfooz rakhkhoge.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ يَاْتِيْ مِنْۢ بَعْدِ ذٰلِكَ عَامٌ فِيْهِ يُغَاثُ النَّاسُ وَ فِيْهِ يَعْصِرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Summa ya'tee mim- ba'di zaalika 'aamun feehi yughaasun-naasu wa feehi ya'şiroon.
verses.translation: Phir uss (qahat saali) ke ba'd ek saal aayega, uss mein log baarish paayenge aur woh uss mein ras nichodenge.

verses.arabic: وَ قَالَ الْمَلِكُ ائْتُوْنِیْ بِهٖۤ ۚ فَلَمَّا جَآءَهُ الرَّسُوْلُ قَالَ ارْجِعْ اِلٰى رَبِّكَ فَسْـَٔـلْهُ مَا بَالُ النِّسْوَةِ الّٰتِيْ قَطَّعْنَ اَيْدِيَهُنَّ ۭ اِنَّ رَبِّیْ بِكَيْدِهِنَّ عَلِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa qaalal-maliku'- toonee bihee falammaa jaaa'ahur-rasoolu qaalar- ji' 'ilaa rabbika fas'alhu maa baalun-niswatil- laatee qatta'na 'aydiyahunn; 'inna Rabbee bikaydihinna 'Aleem.
verses.translation: Aur baadshaah ne kaha: tum use mere paas le aao, phir jab uss (Yusuf) ke qaasid aaya to usne kaha: tu apne maalik ke paas laut jaa aur usse poochh ke un auraton (ke mu'aamle) ki kiya haqeeqat hai jinhon ne apne haath kaat liye the? beshak mera rab unka mekar khoob jaanta hai.

verses.arabic: قَالَ مَا خَطْبُكُنَّ اِذْ رَاوَدْتُّنَّ يُوْسُفَ عَنْ نَّفْسِهٖ ۭ قُلْنَ حَاشَ لِلّٰهِ مَا عَلِمْنَا عَلَيْهِ مِنْ سُوْءٍ ؕ قَالَتِ امْرَاَتُ الْعَزِیْزِ الْـٰٔنَ حَصْحَصَ الْحَقُّ ۚ اَنَا رَاوَدْتُّهٗ عَنْ نَّفْسِهٖ وَ اِنَّهٗ لَمِنَ الصّٰدِقِیْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala maa khatbukunna 'iz raawattunna Yoosufa 'an nafsih; qulna haasha lillaahi maa 'alimnaa 'alayhi min sooo'; qaalatim-ra'atul-'Azeezil- 'aana haşhaşal-haqqu 'ana raawattuhoo 'an nafsihee wa 'innahoo laminaş-şaadiqeen.
verses.translation: Baadshaah ne (auraton se) kaha: tumhaara muraamlah kiya hai jab tumne Yusuf ko uske ji se phulaaya tha? woh bolin: (Haashaa lillaah) 'Allah ki panaah' hamein uss (ki zaat) main koyi buraayi ma'loom nahin. Azeez-e-(Misr) ki beewi ne kaha: ab haq waazeh ho gaya hai, main ne hi use uske ji se phushlaaya tha aur bilaashubah woh sachcha hai.

verses.arabic: ذٰلِكَ لِيَعْلَمَ اَنِّيْ لَمْ اَخُنْهُ بِالْغَيْبِ وَ اَنَّ اللّٰهَ لَا يَهْدِيْ كَيْدَ الْخَآىٕنِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Zaalika liya lama 'annee lam 'akhunhu bilghaybi wa 'annal- laaha laa yahdee kaydal-khaaa'ineen.
verses.translation: (Yusuf ne kaha:) yeh isliye ke woh (azeez) jaan le ke beshak main ne dar pardah uski khiyaanat nahin ki thi aur yeh ke beshak Allah khaayinon ka makr nahin chalne deta.

verses.arabic: وَ مَاۤ اُبَرِّئُ نَفْسِیْ ۭ اِنَّ النَّفْسَ لَاَمَّارَةٌۢ بِالسُّوْٓءِ اِلَّا مَا رَحِمَ رَبِّیْ ۭ اِنَّ رَبِّیْ غَفُوْرٌ رَّحِیْمٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa maaa 'ubarri'u nafseee; 'innan-nafsa la'ammaaratum bissooo'i 'illaa maa rahima Rabbeee; 'inna Rabbee Ghafoorur-Raheem.
verses.translation: Aur main apne nafs ko bari nahin karta, beshak nafs to buraayi par uksaata hai, magar jis par mera rab raham kare, beshak mera rab Ghafoorur Raheem hai.

verses.arabic: وَ قَالَ الْمَلِكُ ائْتُوْنِیْ بِهٖۤ اَسْتَخْلِصْهُ لِنَفْسِیْ ۚ فَلَمَّا كَلَّمَهٗ قَالَ اِنَّكَ الْيَوْمَ لَدَيْنَا مَكِيْنٌ اَمِيْنٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa qaalal-maliku'- toonee biheee 'astakhlişhu linafsee falammaa kallamahoo qaala 'innakal-yawma ladaynaa makeenun 'ameen.
verses.translation: Aur baadshaah ne kaha: use mere paas laao, main use apni zaat ke liye makhsoos karunga, phir jab usne Yusuf se guftagu ki,to kaha: yaqeenan aaj tu hamaare haan martabeh waala, ameen hai.

verses.arabic: قَالَ اجْعَلْنِیْ عَلٰى خَزَآىٕنِ الْاَرْضِ ۭ اِنِّیْ حَفِیْظٌ عَلِیْمٌ
verses.transliteration: Qaalaj-'alnee 'alaa khazaaa'inil-'ardi 'innee hafeezun 'aleem.
verses.translation: Yusuf ne kaha: mujhe zameen ke khazaanon (paidaawaar) par muqarrar kar deejiye, beshak main. khoob nigehbaani karne waala khoob jaanne waala hoon.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Aam haalaat mein agarcheh Ohda-o-mansab ki talab jaayez nahin hai lekin Yusuf ke iss aqdaam se yeh ma'loom hota hai ke khaas haalaat mein agar koyi shakhs yeh samajhta hai ke qaum aur mulk ko jo khatraat dar pesh hain aur unse nimatne ki achchhi salaahiyatein mere under maujood hain, jo doosron mein nahin hain, to woh apni ahliyat ke mutaabiq aisa kar sakta hai.

verses.arabic: وَ كَذٰلِكَ مَكَّنَّا لِيُوْسُفَ فِي الْاَرْضِ یَتَبَوَّاُ مِنْهَا حَيْثُ یَشَآءُ ۭ نُصِيْبُ بِرَحْمَتِنَا مَنْ نَّشَآءُ ۚ وَ لَا نُضِيْعُ اَجْرَ الْمُحْسِنِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa kazaalika makkannaa li-Yoosufa fil- 'ardi yatabawwa'u minhaa haysu yashaaaa'; nuşeebu birahmatinaa mannashaaa'u wa laa nudee'u 'ajral-muhsineen.
verses.translation: Aur iss tarah humne Yusuf ko zameen (Misr) mein iqtedaar diya, woh uss mein jahaan chaahta qiyaam karta, hum apni rahmat se jise chaaheim nawaazte hain, aur hum nekon ka ajr zaaye' nahim karte.

verses.arabic: وَ لَاَجْرُ الْاٰخِرَةِ خَيْرٌ لِّلَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا وَ كَانُوْا یَتَّقُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa la'ajrul-'Aakhirati khayrul-lillazeena 'aamanoo wa kaanoo yattaqoon.
verses.translation: Aur yaqeenan aakhirat a ajr behtar hai unke liye jo eemaan laaye aur unhon ne taqwa ikhtiyaar kiya.

verses.arabic: وَ جَآءَ اِخْوَةُ یُوْسُفَ فَدَخَلُوْا عَلَيْهٖ فَعَرَفَهُمْ وَ هُمْ لَهٗ مُنْكِرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa jaaa'a 'ikhwatu Yoosufa fadakhaloo 'alayhi fa'arafahum wa hum lahoo munkiroon.
verses.translation: Aur Yusuf ke bhaai shallah lene) aaye aur uske paas pahunche, to usne nhein pahchaan liya aur woh use nahin pahchaante the.

verses.arabic: وَ لَمَّا جَهَّزَهُمْ بِجَهَازِهِمْ قَالَ ائْتُوْنِیْ بِاَخٍ لَّكُمْ مِّنْ اَبِيْكُمْ ۚ اَلَا تَرَوْنَ اَنِّیْۤ اُوْفِی الْكَيْلَ وَ اَنَا۠ خَيْرُ الْمُنْزِلِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa lamтаа jahhazahum bijahaazihim qaala'- toonee bi'akhil-lakum min 'abeekum; 'alaa tarawna 'anneee 'oofil- kayla wa 'ana khayrul- munzileen.
verses.translation: Aur jab usne unka saamaan tayyaar kar waaya to kaha: mere paas apna pedri bhaai (Binyaameen) laana kiya tum dekhte nahin ke main pura maap (ghallah) deta hoon, aur main behtareen mehmaan nawaaz hoon?.

verses.arabic: فَاِنْ لَّمْ تَاْتُوْنِیْ بِهٖ فَلَا كَيْلَ لَكُمْ عِنْدِیْ وَ لَا تَقْرَبُوْنِ
verses.transliteration: Fa'il-lam ta'toonee bihee falaa kayla lakum 'indee wa laa taqraboon
verses.translation: Phir agar tum use mere paas nahin laaye to tumhaare liye mere paas koyi (ghallah) nahin, aur na tum mere qareeb aana.

verses.arabic: قَالُوْا سَنُرَاوِدُ عَنْهُ اَبَاهُ وَ اِنَّا لَفٰعِلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo sanuraawidu 'anhu 'abaahu wa 'innaa lafaa'iloon.
verses.translation: Unhon ne kaha: hum uske baap se use maangenge aur yaqeenan hum (yeh karenge

verses.arabic: وَ قَالَ لِفِتْيَانِهٖ اجْعَلُوْا بِضَاعَتَهُمْ فِیْ رِحَالِهِمْ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَعْرِفُوْنَهَاۤ اِذَا انْقَلَبُوْۤا اِلٰۤى اَهْلِهِمْ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَرْجِعُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa qaala lifityaanihij- 'aloo bidaa'atahum fee rihaalihim laʻallahum ya'rifoonahaaa 'izan- qalabooo 'ilaaa 'ahlihim la allahum yarji'oon.
verses.translation: Aur Yusuf ne apne khaadimon se kaha: unki poonji (naqdi) unke saamaan mein rakhdo taake jab woh apne ahlo ayaal mein pahuncheh to use pahchaan lein, shaayad woh waapas aaye.

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّا رَجَعُوْۤا اِلٰۤى اَبِيْهِمْ قَالُوْا يٰۤاَبَانَا مُنِعَ مِنَّا الْكَيْلُ فَاَرْسِلْ مَعَنَاۤ اَخَانَا نَكْتَلْ وَ اِنَّا لَهٗ لَحٰفِظُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Falammaa raja'ooo 'ilaaa 'abeehim qaaloo yaaa 'abaanaa muni'a minnal-kaylu fa'arsil ma'anaaa 'akhaanaa naktal wa 'innaa lahoo lahaafizoon.
verses.translation: Phir jab woh apne baap ke paas laute to bole: Abba jaan! (aayindah) hamaare liye maap (ghallah) mamnu' thhahra hai, lihaaza tu hamaare saath hamaare bhaai ko bhej ke hum maap (ghallah) laayein aur beshak hum uske muhaafiz hain.

verses.arabic: قَالَ هَلْ اٰمَنُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ اِلَّا كَمَاۤ اَمِنْتُكُمْ عَلٰۤى اَخِيْهِ مِنْ قَبْلُ ۚ فَاللّٰهُ خَيْرٌ حٰفِظًا وَّهُوَ اَرْحَمُ الرّٰحِمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala hal 'aamanukum 'alayhi 'illaa kamaaa 'amintukum 'alaaa 'akheehi min qabl; fallaahu khayrun haafizanw-wa Huwa 'arhamur-Raahimeen
verses.translation: Ya'qoob ne kaha: kiya main iski baabat tumhaara e'tebaar kar loon jaise pahle uske bhaai ki baabat tum par e'tabaar kiya tha? chunaancheh Allah hi behtar muhaafiz hai aur woh sab meharbaanon se ziyaadah raham karne waala hai.

verses.arabic: وَ لَمَّا فَتَحُوْا مَتَاعَهُمْ وَجَدُوْا بِضَاعَتَهُمْ رُدَّتْ اِلَيْهِمْ ۚ قَالُوْا يٰۤاَبَانَا مَا نَبْغِيْ ۚ هٰذِهٖ بِضَاعَتُنَا رُدَّتْ اِلَيْنَا وَ نَمِيْرُ اَهْلَنَا وَ نَحْفَظُ اَخَانَا وَ نَزْدَادُ كَيْلَ بَعِيْرٍ ۭ ذٰلِكَ كَيْلٌ يَّسِيْرٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa lammaa fatahoo mataa'ahum wajadoo bidaa'atahum ruddat 'ilayhim qaaloo yaaa 'abaanaa maa nabghee; haazihee bidaa'atunaa ruddat 'ilaynaa wa nameeru 'ahlanaa wa nahfazu 'akhaanaa wa nazdaadu kayla ba'eer zaalika kayluñy-yaseer.
verses.translation: Aur jab unhon ne apna saamaan khola to apni poonji paayi jo unhein lautaa di gayi thi. woh bole: Abba jaan! hamein (aur) kiya chaahiye? yeh hamaari poonji hamein lauta di gayi hai, aur hum apne ahlo ayaal ke liye ghallah laayenge aur apne bhaai ki hifaazat karenge aur hum ek ount ka maap (ghallah) ziyaadah laayenge, yeh maap (ghallah milna) to bahut aasaan hai.

verses.arabic: قَالَ لَنْ اُرْسِلَهٗ مَعَكُمْ حَتّٰى تُؤْتُوْنِ مَوْثِقًا مِّنَ اللّٰهِ لَتَاْتُنَّنِيْ بِهٖۤ اِلَّاۤ اَنْ يُّحَاطَ بِكُمْ ۭ فَلَمَّاۤ اٰتَوْهُ مَوْثِقَهُمْ قَالَ اللّٰهُ عَلٰى مَا نَقُوْلُ وَكِیْلٌ
verses.transliteration: Qaala lan 'ursilahoo ma'akum hattaa tu'tooni mawsiqam-minal-laahi lata'tunnanee biheee 'illaaa 'añy-yuhaata bikum falammaaa 'aatawhu mawsiqahum qaalal-laahu 'alaa maa naqoolu Wakeel.
verses.translation: Ya'qoob ne kaha: main use tumhaare saath hargiz nahin bhejunga hatta ke tum mujhe Allah ka pukhtah ahad do ke tum use zaroor mere paas laaoge siwaaye iske ke tum ghir jaao. phir jab unhon ne use pukhtah ahad diya to woh bola: jo kuchh hum kahte hain Allah uss par zaamin hai.

verses.arabic: وَ قَالَ یٰبَنِیَّ لَا تَدْخُلُوْا مِنْۢ بَابٍ وَّاحِدٍ وَّ ادْخُلُوْا مِنْ اَبْوَابٍ مُّتَفَرِّقَةٍ ۚ وَ مَاۤ اُغْنِیْ عَنْكُمْ مِّنَ اللّٰهِ مِنْ شَیْءٍ ۭ اِنِ الْحُكْمُ اِلَّا لِلّٰهِ ۭ عَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ وَ عَلَيْهِ فَلْيَتَوَكَّلِ الْمُتَوَكِّلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa qaala yaa baniyya laa tadkhuloo mim baabinw- waahidiñw-wadkhuloo min 'abwaabim- mutafarriqah; wa maaa 'ughnee 'ankum minal- laahi min shay'in 'inil- hukmu 'illaa lillaahi 'alayhi tawakkaltu wa 'alayhi falyatawakkalil- Mutawakkiloon.
verses.translation: Aur usne kaha: Aye mere beton! tum ek hi darwaaze se daakhil na hona balke mutafarriq darwaaze se daakhil hona, aur main tumhein Allah (ki taqdeer) se zara bhi nahin bacha sakta. hukm to Allah hi ka hai, usi par main ne tawakkul kiya hai, aur tawakkul karne waalon ko usi par tawakkul karna chaahiye.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Zaahiri asbaab ikhtiyaar karna agarcheh bharosa ke khilaaf nahin hai taahum pure taur par Allah par e'temaad bahut bada amal hai aur iski badi fazeelat aahaadees mein bayaan huyi hai jaise ek hadees mein farmaya: 'meri ummat ke 70,000 aadmi baghair hisaab ke jannat mein daakhil honge aur yeh woh log hain jo na dam karaate hain aur na badshugooni lete hain balke (sirf) Allah Ta'ala ki zaat par e'temaad karte hain.' (Al-Bukhari, Ar-Reqaaq, Baab:21, Hadees:6472) ek aur hadees mein Nabi ﷺ ne ek waaqia'h bayaan farmaya jis mein ek israayili doosre se 1000 dinaar bataur qarz maangta hai gawaah aur zaamin Allah ko bana lete hain. maqrooz ko samandar uboor karne ke liye kashti nahin milti take muqarrarah waqt par qarz waapas lauta sake chunaancheh ek lakdi ke under soraakh karke ek hazaar dinaar aur ek khat rakh kar uska munh band karke aur Allah ko gawaah bana kar use samandar mein phenk deta hai. idhar qarz khaah apne ghar se nikla ke shaayad koyi kashti uski raqam waapas lekar aayi ho to achaanak uski nazar ek lakdi par padi jise usne ghar ke indhan ke liye uthha liya. Jab usne use cheera to use uss mein se ek hazaar dinar aur ek khat mila. Kuchh arsah ba'd woh maqrooz bhi ek hazaar dinar le kar qarz khaah ke paas pahuch kar taakheer ki ma'zrat talab karte huye raqam waapas karta hai lekin qarz khaah ne jawaab diya: Allah Ta'ala ne tumhaari taraf se woh raqam pahunchaa di Hai jo tumne lakdi mein daal kar bhejti thi. (Al-Bukhari, Al-kifaalah: Baab:1, Hadees:2291)

verses.arabic: وَ لَمَّا دَخَلُوْا مِنْ حَيْثُ اَمَرَهُمْ اَبُوْهُمْ مَا كَانَ يُغْنِیْ عَنْهُمْ مِّنَ اللّٰهِ مِنْ شَیْءٍ اِلَّا حَاجَةً فِیْ نَفْسِ یَعْقُوْبَ قَضٰٮهَا ۚ وَ اِنَّهٗ لَذُوْ عِلْمٍ لِّمَا عَلَّمْنٰهُ وَ لٰكِنَّ اَكْثَرَ النَّاسِ لَا یَعْلَمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa lammaa dakhaloo min haysu 'amarahum 'aboohum maa kaana yughnee 'anhum minal- laahi min shay'in 'illaa haajatan fee nafsi Yaʻqooba qadaahaa; wa 'innahoo lazoo 'ilmil- limaa 'allamnaahu wa laakinna 'aksaran-naasi laa yaʻlamoon.
verses.translation: Aur jab woh daakhil huye jahaan se unke baap ne unhein hukm diya tha, woh unhein Allah (ki taqdeer) se zara bhi nahin bacha sakta tha, magar ya'qoob ke dil mein ek khaahish thi so woh puri kar chuka, aur bilaahşubah hamaare ta'leem dene ki wajah se woh saahibe ilm tha lekin aksar log ilm nahin rakhte.

verses.arabic: وَ لَمَّا دَخَلُوْا عَلٰى یُوْسُفَ اٰوٰۤى اِلَيْهِ اَخَاهُ قَالَ اِنِّیْۤ اَنَا۠ اَخُوْكَ فَلَا تَبْتَىٕسْ بِمَا كَانُوْا یَعْمَلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa lammaa dakhaloo 'alaa Yoosufa 'aawaaa 'ilayhi 'akhaahu qaala 'inneee 'ana 'akhooka falaa tabta'is bimaa kaanoo ya maloon
verses.translation: Aur jab woh Yusuf ke paas pahunche to usne apne (sage) bhaai (binyaameen) ko apne paas rakh liya (aur) akaha: beshak main tera bhaai hoon, lihaaza tu uska gham na kar jo kuchh woh karte rahe.

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّا جَهَّزَهُمْ بِجَهَازِهِمْ جَعَلَ السِّقَایَةَ فِیْ رَحْلِ اَخِیْهِ ثُمَّ اَذَّنَ مُؤَذِّنٌ اَیَّتُهَا الْعِیْرُ اِنَّكُمْ لَسٰرِقُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Falammaa jahhazahum bijahaazihim ja'alas-siqaayata fee rahli 'akheehi summa 'azzana mu'azzinun 'ayyatuhal'eeru 'innakum lasaariqoon
verses.translation: Phir jab Yusuf ne unka saamaan tayyaar kar diya to apne bhaai ke saamaan mein ek piyaalah rakh diya, phir ek pukaarne waale ne pukaara: aye qaafile waalo! yaqeenan tum chor ho.

verses.arabic: قَالُوْا وَ اَقْبَلُوْا عَلَيْهِمْ مَّاذَا تَفْقِدُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo wa 'aqbaloo 'alayhim maazaa tafqidoon.
verses.translation: Woh unki taraf mutawajjah ho kar bole: tum kiya cheez gum paate ho?.

verses.arabic: قَالُوْا نَفْقِدُ صُوَاعَ الْمَلِكِ وَ لِمَنْ جَآءَ بِهٖ حِمْلُ بَعِیْرٍ وَّ اَنَا بِهٖ زَعِیْمٌ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo nafqidu suwaa'al-maliki wa liman jaaa'a bihee himlu ba'eeriñw-wa 'ana bihee za'eem.
verses.translation: Unhon ne kaha: Hum baadshaah ka piyaalah gum paate hain, aur jo shakhs use laaye uske liye oont bhar (ghallah) hai aur main uska zaamin hoon.

verses.arabic: قَالُوْا تَاللّٰهِ لَقَدْ عَلِمْتُمْ مَّا جِئْنَا لِنُفْسِدَ فِی الْاَرْضِ وَ مَا كُنَّا سٰرِقِیْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo tallaahi laqad 'alimtum maa ji'naa linufsida fil-'ardi wa maa kunnaa saariqeen.
verses.translation: Woh bole: Allah ki qasam! tumhen ilm hai ke hum iss mulk mein fasaad karne nahin aaye aur na hum chor hain.

verses.arabic: قَالُوْا فَمَا جَزَآؤُهٗۤ اِنْ كُنْتُمْ كٰذِبِیْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo famaa jazaaa'uhooo 'in kuntum kaazibeen.
verses.translation: Unhon ne kaha: phir uss (chor) ki kiya saza hai agar tum jhoote huye?.

verses.arabic: قَالُوْا جَزَآؤُهٗ مَنْ وُجِدَ فِیْ رَحْلِهٖ فَهُوَ جَزَآؤُهٗ ۭ كَذٰلِكَ نَجْزِی الظّٰلِمِیْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo jazaaa'uhoo manw-wujida fee rahlihee fahuwa jazaaa'uh; kazaalika najziz-zaalimeen.
verses.translation: Woh bole: uski saza yeh hai (ke) jiske saamaan mein woh (piyaalah) paaya jaaye wahi shakhs uska badlah hai. hum zaalimon ko yahi saza dete hain.

verses.arabic: فَبَدَاَ بِاَوْعِیَتِهِمْ قَبْلَ وِعَآءِ اَخِیْهِ ثُمَّ اسْتَخْرَجَهَا مِنْ وِّعَآءِ اَخِیْهِ ۭ كَذٰلِكَ كِدْنَا لِیُوْسُفَ ۭ مَا كَانَ لِیَاْخُذَ اَخَاهُ فِیْ دِیْنِ الْمَلِكِ اِلَّاۤ اَنْ یَّشَآءَ اللّٰهُ ۭ نَرْفَعُ دَرَجٰتٍ مَّنْ نَّشَآءُ ۭ وَ فَوْقَ كُلِّ ذِیْ عِلْمٍ عَلِیْمٌ
verses.transliteration: Fabada'a bi'aw'iyatihim qabla wi'aaa'i 'akheehi summas-takhrajahaa minw-wi'aaa'i 'akheeh; kazaalika kidnaa li- Yoosuf; maa kaana liya'khuza 'akhaahu fee deenil-maliki 'illaaa 'añyyashaaa'al-laah; narfa'u darajaatim-man- nashaaa'; wa fawqa kulli zee 'ilmin 'Aleem.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh Yusuf apne bhaai ke bore se pahle unke boron ki talaashi lene laga, phir usne apne bhaail ke bore se woh (piyaalah) nikaal liya, isi tarah humne Yusuf ke tadbeer ki, woh uss baadshaah ke qanoon ki ru se to apne bhaai ko nahin rakh sakta tha magar yeh ke Allah chaahe. hum jiske chaahein darje baland karte hain. aur har saahibe ilm ke oupar ek ziyaadah ilm waala hai.

verses.arabic: قَالُوْۤا اِنْ یَّسْرِقْ فَقَدْ سَرَقَ اَخٌ لَّهٗ مِنْ قَبْلُ ۚ فَاَسَرَّهَا یُوْسُفُ فِیْ نَفْسِهٖ وَ لَمْ یُبْدِهَا لَهُمْ ۚ قَالَ اَنْتُمْ شَرٌّ مَّكَانًا ۚ وَ اللّٰهُ اَعْلَمُ بِمَا تَصِفُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaalooo 'iny-yasriq faqad saraqa 'akhul- lahoo min qabl; fa'asarrahaa Yoosufu fee nafsihee wa lam yubdihaa lahum; qaala 'antum sharrum- makaanan wallaahu 'a'lamu bimaa taşifoon
verses.translation: Unhon ne kaha: agar isne chori ki hai to isse pahle iske bhaai ne bhi chori ki thi. chunaancheh Yusuf ne yeh (baat) apne dil mein chhupaayi aur un par zaahir na ki (aur dil mein) kaha: tum bad tareen darje par ho, Allah khoob jaanta hai jo tum bayaan karte ho.

verses.arabic: قَالُوْا یٰۤاَیُّهَا الْعَزِیْزُ اِنَّ لَهٗۤ اَبًا شَیْخًا كَبِیْرًا فَخُذْ اَحَدَنَا مَكَانَهٗ ۚ اِنَّا نَرٰىكَ مِنَ الْمُحْسِنِیْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo yaaa 'ayyuhal-'Azeezu 'inna lahooo 'aban shaykhan kabeeran fakhuz 'ahadanaa makaanahoo 'innaa naraaka minal-muhsineen.
verses.translation: Unhon ne kaha: aye Azeez! beshak iska baap boodha badi umar ka hai, chunaancheh aap iski jagah hum mein se kisi ko pakad lein. beshak hum dekhte hain ke aap ehsaan karne waale hain.

verses.arabic: قَالَ مَعَاذَ اللّٰهِ اَنْ نَّاْخُذَ اِلَّا مَنْ وَّجَدْنَا مَتَاعَنَا عِنْدَهٗۤ اِنَّاۤ اِذًا لَّظٰلِمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala ma'aazal-laahi 'anna'khuza 'illaa mañw- wajadnaa mataa'anaa indahooo 'innaaa 'izal- lazaalimoon.
verses.translation: Yusuf ne kaha: Allah ki panaah de ke jis shakhs ke paas humne apni cheez paayi, uske siwa kisi aur ko pakdein, tab to beshak hum zaalim huye.

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّا اسْتَیْـَٔسُوْا مِنْهُ خَلَصُوْا نَجِیًّا ۭ قَالَ كَبِیْرُهُمْ اَلَمْ تَعْلَمُوْۤا اَنَّ اَبَاكُمْ قَدْ اَخَذَ عَلَیْكُمْ مَّوْثِقًا مِّنَ اللّٰهِ وَ مِنْ قَبْلُ مَا فَرَّطْتُمْ فِیْ یُوْسُفَ فَلَنْ اَبْرَحَ الْاَرْضَ حَتّٰى یَاْذَنَ لِیْۤ اَبِیْۤ اَوْ یَحْكُمَ اللّٰهُ لِیْ ۚ وَ هُوَ خَیْرُ الْحٰكِمِیْنَ
verses.transliteration: Falammas-tay'asoo minhu khalaşoo najiyyan qaala kabeeruhum 'alam talamooo 'anna 'abaakum qad 'akhaza 'alaykum mawsiqam- minal-laahi wa min qablu maa farrattum fee Yoosufa falan 'abrahal- 'arda hattaa ya'zana leee 'abeee 'aw yahkumal- laahu lee wa huwa khayrul-haakimeen
verses.translation: Phir jab woh usse naa ummeed ho gaye to alag ho kar mashwarah kiya. unke bade ne kaha: kiya tumhein ilm nahin ke beshak tumhaare baap ne tumse Allah ka pukhtah ahad liya hai? aur isse pahle Yusuf ki baabat tum ghalti kar chuke ho? chunaancheh main to iss sar zameen ko nahin chhodunga hatta ke mera baap mujhe hukm de ya Allah mere liye faislah karde, aur woh behtareen faislah karne waala hai.

verses.arabic: اِرْجِعُوْۤا اِلٰۤى اَبِیْكُمْ فَقُوْلُوْا یٰۤاَبَانَا اِنَّ ابْنَكَ سَرَقَ وَ مَا شَهِدْنَاۤ اِلَّا بِمَا عَلِمْنَا وَ مَا كُنَّا لِلْغَیْبِ حٰفِظِیْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Irji'ooo 'ilaaa 'abeekum faqooloo yaaa 'abaanaaa 'innab-naka saraq; wa maa shahidnaaa 'illaa bimaa 'alimnaa wa maa kunnaa lilghaybi haafizeen.
verses.translation: Tum apne baap ke paas waapas jaao aur kaho: Abba Jaan! beshak Aap ke bete ne chori ki aur hum ne wahi gawaahi di thi jo humein ilm tha¹ aur hamen ghaib ki khabar na thi.
verses.deepMeaning: Y'ani hum ne jo ahad kiya tha ke hum Binyaameen ko ba hifaazat waapas le aayeinge to yeh hum ne apne ilm ke mutaabiq ahad kiya tha, ba'd mein jo waaqia'h pesh aa gaya aur jiski wajah se Binyaameen ko hamein chhodna pada, yeh to hamaare wahm-o-gumaan mein bhi na tha, doosra matlab yeh hai ke humne chori ki jo saza bayaan ki thi ke chor ko hi chori ke badle mein rakh liya jaaye, to yeh saza humne apne ilm ke mutaabiq hi tajweez ki thi, iss mein kisi qism ki bad niyati shaamil nahin thi. Lekin phir yeh ittefaaq ki baat thi ke jab saamaan ki talaashi li gayi to masrooqa katora Binyaameen ke saamaan se nikal aaya.

verses.arabic: وَ سْــٶلِ الْقَرْیَةَ الَّتِیْ كُنَّا فِیْهَا وَ الْعِیْرَ الَّتِیْۤ اَقْبَلْنَا فِیهَا وَ اِنَّا لَصٰدِقُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Was'alil-qaryatal- latee kunnaa feehaa wal'eeral-lateee 'aqbalnaa feehaa wa 'innaa lașaadiqoon.
verses.translation: Aur aap USS basti (waalon) se poochh lein jis mein hum rahe aur uss qaafile se bhi jis mein hum aaye hain aur beshak hum sachche hain

verses.arabic: قَالَ بَلْ سَوَّلَتْ لَكُمْ اَنْفُسُكُمْ اَمْرًا ۚ فَصَبْرٌ جَمِیْلٌ عَسَى اللّٰهُ اَنْ یَّاْتِیَنِیْ بِهِمْ جَمِیْعًا ۭ اِنَّهٗ هُوَ الْعَلِیْمُ الْحَكِیْمُ
verses.transliteration: Qaala bal sawwalat lakum 'anfusukum 'amran faşabrun jameelun 'asal-laahu 'any-ya'tiyanee bihim jamee'aa; 'innahoo Huwal-'Aleemul-Hakeem
verses.translation: Ya'qoob ne kaha: (haqeeqat yeh nahin) balke tumhaare liye tumhaare dilon ne ek (buri) baat aaraastah kardi hai, chunaancheh sabr hi behtar hai. shaayad Allah un sab ko mere paas le aaye, beshak wahi aleem-o-hakeem hai.

verses.arabic: وَ تَوَلّٰى عَنْهُمْ وَ قَالَ یٰۤاَسَفٰى عَلٰى یُوْسُفَ وَ ابْیَضَّتْ عَیْنٰهُ مِنَ الْحُزْنِ فَهُوَ كَظِیْمٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa tawallaa 'anhum wa qaala yaaa 'asafaa 'alaa Yoosufa wabyaddat 'aynaahu minal-huzni fahuwa kazeem.
verses.translation: Aur woh unse munh pher kar bola: haaye afsos Yusuf par! aur uski aankhein gham se safed ho gayin aur woh gham se bhara huwa tha.

verses.arabic: قَالُوْا تَاللّٰهِ تَفْتَؤُا تَذْكُرُ یُوْسُفَ حَتّٰى تَكُوْنَ حَرَضًا اَوْ تَكُوْنَ مِنَ الْهٰلِكِیْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo tallaahi tafta'u tazkuru Yoosufa hattaa takoona haradan Paw takoona minal- haalikeen.
verses.translation: Bete bole: Allah ki qasam! aap Yusuf ko sada yaad karte rahenge hatta ke aap (gham se) ghul jaayein¹ ya halaak ho jaayein.
verses.deepMeaning: Harz, uss jismaani aarze ya zu'f-e-aql ko kahte hain jo budhaape, ishq ya pai dar pai sadmaat ki wajah se insaan ko laahaq hota hai, Yusuf عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام ke zikr se bhaaiyon ki aatish-e- hasad phir bhadak uthhi aur apne baap ko yeh kaha.

verses.arabic: قَالَ اِنَّمَاۤ اَشْكُوْا بَثِّیْ وَ حُزْنِیْۤ اِلَى اللّٰهِ وَ اَعْلَمُ مِنَ اللّٰهِ مَا لَا تَعْلَمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala 'innamaaa 'ashkoo bassee wa huzneee 'ilal-laahi wa 'alamu minal-laahi maa laa talamoon.
verses.translation: Usne kaha: main to apni parishaani aur gham ka shikwah Allah hi se karta hoon aur main Allah ki taraf se jaanta hoon jo tum nahin jaante

verses.arabic: یٰبَنِیَّ اذْهَبُوْا فَتَحَسَّسُوْا مِنْ یُوْسُفَ وَ اَخِیْهِ وَ لَا تَیْــٴَسُوْا مِنْ رَّوْحِ اللّٰهِ ۭ اِنَّهٗ لَا یَیْــٴَسُ مِنْ رَّوْحِ اللّٰهِ اِلَّا الْقَوْمُ الْكٰفِرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Yaa baniyyaz-haboo fatahassasoo miny- Yoosufa wa 'akheehi wa laa tay'asoo mir-rawhil- laahi 'innahoo laa yay'asu mir-rawhil-laahi 'illal-qawmul-kaafiroon.
verses.translation: Aye mere beto! tum jaao aur Yusuf aur uske bhaai ko dhoondo aur Allah ki rahmat se maayus na hona, beshak Allah ki rahmat se to kaafir hi maayoos huwa karte hain.

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّا دَخَلُوْا عَلَيْهِ قَالُوْا یٰۤاَیُّهَا الْعَزِیْزُ مَسَّنَا وَ اَهْلَنَا الضُّرُّ وَ جِئْنَا بِبِضَاعَةٍ مُّزْجٰٮةٍ فَاَوْفِ لَنَا الْكَيْلَ وَ تَصَدَّقْ عَلَيْنَا ۭ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ یَجْزِی الْمُتَصَدِّقِیْنَ
verses.transliteration: Falammaa dakhaloo 'alayhi qaaloo yaaa 'ayyuhal-'Azeezu massanaa wa 'ahlanad- durru wa ji'naa bibidaa'atim-muzjaatin fa'awfi lanal-kayla wa taşaddaq 'alaynaa 'innal- laaha yajzil- mutasaddiqeen.
verses.translation: Phir jab woh Yusuf ke paas pahunche to unhon ne kaha: Aye Aziz! hamein aur hamaare ahl-o-ayaal ko takleef pahunchi hai aur hum naaqis poonji laaye hain, chunaancheh aap hamen pura maap dein aur hum par sadqah karen, yaqeenan Allah sadqah khairaat karne waalon ko jaza deta hai.

verses.arabic: قَالَ هَلْ عَلِمْتُمْ مَّا فَعَلْتُمْ بِيُوْسُفَ وَ اَخِیْهِ اِذْ اَنْتُمْ جٰهِلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala hal 'alimtum maa fa'altum bi-Yoosufa wa 'akheehi 'iz 'antum jaahiloon.
verses.translation: Usne kaha: kiya tumhein ma'loom hai ke tumne Yusuf aur uske bhaai ke saath kiya kiya tha jab tum naadaan the?.

verses.arabic: قَالُوْا ءَاِنَّكَ لَاَنْتَ یُوْسُفُ ۭ قَالَ اَنَا یُوْسُفُ وَ هٰذَاۤ اَخِیْ ۭ قَدْ مَنَّ اللّٰهُ عَلَيْنَا ۭ اِنَّهٗ مَنْ یَّتَّقِ وَ یَصْبِرْ فَاِنَّ اللّٰهَ لَا یُضِیْعُ اَجْرَ الْمُحْسِنِیْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaalooo 'a'innaka la'anta Yoosufu qaala 'ana Yoosufu wa haazaaa 'akhee qad mannal-laahu 'alaynaaa 'innahoo many- yattaqi wa yaşbir fa'innal-laaha laa yudee'u 'ajral-muhsineen.
verses.translation: Woh bole: kiya waaqa'yi tuhi Yusuf hai: usne kaha: (haan) main hi Yusuf hoon, aur yeh mera bhaai hai. yaqeenan Allah ne hum par ehsaan kiya hai. beshak jo shakhs taqwa ikhtiyaar kare aur sabr kare to Allah nekon ka ajr zaaye' nahin karta.

verses.arabic: قَالُوْا تَاللّٰهِ لَقَدْ اٰثَرَكَ اللّٰهُ عَلَيْنَا وَ اِنْ كُنَّا لَخٰطِئِیْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo tallaahi laqad 'aasarakal-laahu 'alaynaa wa 'in kunnaa lakhaati'een.
verses.translation: Unhon ne kaha: Allah ki qasam! yaqeenan Allah ne tujhe hum par fazeelat di, aur bila shubah hum hi khatakaar the.

verses.arabic: قَالَ لَا تَثْرِیْبَ عَلَيْكُمُ الْيَوْمَ ۚ یَغْفِرُ اللّٰهُ لَكُمْ ۭ وَ هُوَ اَرْحَمُ الرّٰحِمِیْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala laa tasreeba 'alaykumul-yawma yaghfirul-laahu lakum wa Huwa 'arhamur-raahimeen.
verses.translation: Yusuf ne kaha: tum par aaaj koyi ilzaam nahin, Allah tumhaari maghfirat kare aur woh Arhamur-Raahimeen hai¹
verses.deepMeaning: Yusuf عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام ne bhi paighambaraanah a'fu-o-darguzar se kaam lete huye farma diya ke jo huwa, so huwa, aaj tumhein koyi sarzanish aur mulaamat nahin ki jaayegi, Fatah-e-Makkah waale din Rasoolullah ﷺ ne bhi Makkah ke un kuffaar aur sardaaraan-e-quraish ko, jo aapke khoon ke piyaase the aur jinhon ne aapki tarah tarah ki eizaayein pahunchaayi thin, yahi alfaaz irshaad farma kar unhein mu'aaf farma diya tha..... Allah Ta'ala ki meharbaani ko usa't ka andaazah is hadees se kiya jaa sakta hai jis mein Rasoolullah ﷺ ne farmaya: 'Jis roz Allah ne rahmat ko paida kiya, uske 100 hisse kiye. usne 99 hisse apne paas rakh liye aur uska ek hissah apni tamaam makhlooqaat ke liye bhej diya. Chunaancheh agar kaafir yeh jaan le ke Allah Ta'ala ke paas kis qadar rahmat hai to woh kabhi jannat se maayus na ho aur momin ko yeh ma'loom ho jaaye ke Allah ke paas kis qadar azaab hai to woh jahannam se be khauf na rahe.' (Al-Bukhari, Ar-Reqaaq, Baab:19, Hadees:6469)

verses.arabic: اِذْهَبُوْا بِقَمِیْصِیْ هٰذَا فَاَلْقُوْهُ عَلٰى وَجْهِ اَبِیْ یَاْتِ بَصِیْرًا وَ ائْتُوْنِیْ بِاَهْلِكُمْ اَجْمَعِیْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Izhaboo biqameeșee haazaa fa'alqoohu 'alaa wajhi 'abee ya'ti baseeraa; wa'toonee bi'ahlikum 'ajma'een.
verses.translation: Tum meri yeh qamees le jaao aur use mere baap ke chehre par daal do, woh beena ho jaayenge aur tum apne tamaam ahlo ayaal ko mere paas le aao.

verses.arabic: وَ لَمَّا فَصَلَتِ الْعِیْرُ قَالَ اَبُوْهُمْ اِنِّیْ لَاَجِدُ رِیْحَ یُوْسُفَ لَوْلَاۤ اَنْ تُفَنِّدُوْنِ
verses.transliteration: Wa lammaa faşalatil- 'eeru qaala 'aboohum 'innee la'ajidu reeha Yoosufa law laaa 'an tufannidoon.
verses.translation: Aur jab qaafilah (Misr se) chala to unke baap ne kaha: beshak main Yusuf ki mahak paata hoon agar tum mujhe bahka huwa na kaho.

verses.arabic: قَالُوْا تَاللّٰهِ اِنَّكَ لَفِیْ ضَلٰلِكَ الْقَدِیْمِ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo tallaahi 'innaka lafee dalaalikal- qadeem.
verses.translation: Woh bole: Allah ki qasam! Bilaa shubah Aap apni qadeem ghalti mein hain.

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّاۤ اَنْ جَآءَ الْبَشِیْرُ اَلْقٰىهُ عَلٰى وَجْهِهٖ فَارْتَدَّ بَصِیْرًا ۚ قَالَ اَلَمْ اَقُلْ لَكُمْ اِنِّیْۤ اَعْلَمُ مِنَ اللّٰهِ مَا لَا تَعْلَمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Falammaaa 'an jaaa'al-basheeru 'alqaahu 'alaa wajhihee fartadda başeeran qaala 'alam aqul-lakum 'inneee 'a'lamu minal-laahi maa laa taʻlamoon.
verses.translation: Phir jab bashaarat dene waala aaya, usne woh (qamees) uske chehre par daali to woh beena ho gaya, Ya'qoob ne kaha: kiya main ne tumse nahin kaha tha ke beshak main Allah ki taraf se woh jaanta hoon jo tum nahin jaante?.

verses.arabic: قَالُوْا یٰۤاَبَانَا اسْتَغْفِرْ لَنَا ذُنُوْبَنَا ۚ اِنَّا كُنَّا خٰطِئِیْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo yaaa 'abaanas-taghfir lanaa zunoobanaaa 'innaa kunnaa khaati'een.
verses.translation: Unhon ne kaha: abba jaan! Hamaare liye hamaare gunaahon ki maghfirat maangein, beshak hum hi khatakaar the.

verses.arabic: قَالَ سَوْفَ اَسْتَغْفِرُ لَكُمْ رَبِّیْ ۭ اِنَّهٗ هُوَ الْغَفُوْرُ الرَّحِیْمُ
verses.transliteration: Qaala sawfa 'astaghfiru lakum Rabbeee; 'innahoo Huwal- Ghafoorur-Raheem.
verses.translation: Yaqoob ne kaha: a'naqreeb main apne rab se tumhaare liye maghfirat maangunga, beshak wahi ghafoorur Raheem hai.

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّا دَخَلُوْا عَلٰى یُوْسُفَ اٰوٰۤى اِلَيْهِ اَبَوَیْهِ وَ قَالَ ادْخُلُوْا مِصْرَ اِنْ شَآءَ اللّٰهُ اٰمِنِیْنَ
verses.transliteration: Falammaa dakhaloo 'alaa Yoosufa 'aawaaa 'ilayhi 'abawayhi wa qaalad-khuloo Mişra 'in shaaa'al-laahu 'aamineen.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh jab woh Yusuf ke paas pahunche to usne apne maan baap ko apne paas jagah di aur kaha: tum misr mein daakhil ho jaao aur agar Allah ne chaaha to aman se rahoge.

verses.arabic: وَ رَفَعَ اَبَوَیْهِ عَلَى الْعَرْشِ وَ خَرُّوْا لَهٗ سُجَّدًا ۭ وَ قَالَ یٰۤاَبَتِ هٰذَا تَاْوِیْلُ رُءْیَایَ مِنْ قَبْلُ ۚ قَدْ جَعَلَهَا رَبِّیْ حَقًّا ۭ وَ قَدْ اَحْسَنَ بِیْۤ اِذْ اَخْرَجَنِیْ مِنَ السِّجْنِ وَ جَآءَ بِكُمْ مِّنَ الْبَدْوِ مِنْۢ بَعْدِ اَنْ نَّزَغَ الشَّیْطٰنُ بَیْنِیْ وَ بَیْنَ اِخْوَتِیْ ۭ اِنَّ رَبِّیْ لَطِیْفٌ لِّمَا یَشَآءُ ۭ اِنَّهٗ هُوَ الْعَلِیْمُ الْحَكِیْمُ
