verses.transliteration: Wa rafa'a 'abawayhi 'alal-'arshi awa kharroo lahoo sujjadaa; wa qaala yaaa 'abati haazaa ta'weelu ru'yaaya min qablu qad ja'alahaa Rabbee haqqaa; wa qad 'ahsana beee 'iz 'akhrajanee minas-sijni wa jaaa'a bikum-minal-badwi mim ba'di 'an nazaghash- Shaytaanu baynee wa bayna 'ikhwateee; 'inna Rabbee lateeful-limaa yashaaa'; 'innahoo Huwal-'Aleemul-Hakeem.
verses.translation: Aur usne apne maan baap ko takht par ouncha bathhaaya aur sab uske aage sajde mein gir gaye¹ aur Yusuf ne kaha: Abba jaan yeh mere pahle ke khaab ki ta'beer hai. mere rab ne use sachcha kar diya hai aur usne mujh par ehsaan kiya jab usne mujhe qaid se nikaala aur tumhein dehaat se (yahaan) le aaya, iske ba'd ke shaytaan ne mere aur mere bhaaiyon ke darmiyaan fasaad daal diya tha, beshak mera rab baareek beeni se jo chaahe tadbeer karta hai, beshak wahi aleem-o-hakeem hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Ba'z ne Iska tarjumah kiya hai ke adab-o-ta'zeem ke taur par Yusuf ke saamne jhuk gaye lekin 'wa kharroo lahoo sujjadan' ke alfaaz batlaate hain ke woh zameen par Yusuf ke saamne sajdah rez huye. Ya'ni yeh sajdah, sajdah hi ke ma'na mein hai. taahum yeh sajdah, sajda-e-ta'zeemi hai sajda-e-ibaadat nahin aur sajdah-e-ta'zeemi Yaqoob عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام ki shari'at mein jaayez tha. Islam shirk ke sadde dde baab ke liye sajda-e-ta'zeemi ko bhi haraam kar diya gaya hai aur ab sajdah ta'zeemi bhi kisi ke liye jaayez nahin, hatta ke sar nihod kar milna bhi jaayez nahin

verses.arabic: رَبِّ قَدْ اٰتَيْتَنِیْ مِنَ الْمُلْكِ وَ عَلَّمْتَنِیْ مِنْ تَاْوِیْلِ الْاَحَادِیْثِ ۭ فَاطِرَ السَّمٰوٰتِ وَ الْاَرْضِ ۚ اَنْتَ وَلِیِّیْ فِی الدُّنْیَا وَ الْاٰخِرَةِ ۚ تَوَفَّنِیْ مُسْلِمًا وَّ اَلْحِقْنِیْ بِالصّٰلِحِیْنَ
verses.transliteration: Rabbi qad 'aataytanee minal-mulki wa 'allamtanee min ta'weelil-'ahaadees; faatiras-samaawaati wal'ardi 'Anta waliyyee fid-dunyaa wal- 'Aakhirati tawaffanee muslimanw-wa 'alhiqnee bişşaaliheen.
verses.translation: Aye mere rab! toone mujhe kuchh hukoomat di hai aur mujhe khaabon ki ta'beer sikhaayi hai, aye aasmaan aur zameen paida karne waale! tu hi dunya aur aakhirat mein mera kaar saaz hai, tu mujhe islam par maut de aur mujhe saaliheen ke saath mila

verses.arabic: ذٰلِكَ مِنْ اَنْۢبَآءِ الْغَیْبِ نُوْحِیْهِ اِلَیْكَ ۚ وَ مَا كُنْتَ لَدَیْهِمْ اِذْ اَجْمَعُوْۤا اَمْرَهُمْ وَ هُمْ یَمْكُرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Zaalika min 'ambaaa'il-ghaybi nooheehi 'ilayka wa maa kunta ladayhim 'iz 'ajma'ooo 'amrahum wa hum yamkuroon.
verses.translation: Yah ghaib ki kuchh khabrein hain, yeh hum aap ki taraf wahi karte hain aur aap un (baraadraan-e- Yusuf) ke paas nahin the jab unhon ne apni ek baat par ittefaaq kiya tha aur woh makr kar rahe the.

verses.arabic: وَ مَاۤ اَكْثَرُ النَّاسِ وَ لَوْ حَرَصْتَ بِمُؤْمِنِیْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maaa 'aksarun- naasi wa law haraşta bimu'mineen.
verses.translation: Aur aksar log, agarcheh aap hirs karein, eemaan laane waale nahin.

verses.arabic: وَ مَا تَسْــَٔلُهُمْ عَلَیْهِ مِنْ اَجْرٍ ۭ اِنْ هُوَ اِلَّا ذِكْرٌ لِّلْعٰلَمِیْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maa tas'aluhum 'alayhi min ajr; 'in huwa 'illaa zikrul-lil'aalameen.
verses.translation: Aur aap iss (tableegh) par un (Mushrikeen-e-Makkah) se koyi ajr nahin maangte. Yeh (qur'an) to saare aalam ke liye naseehat hai.

verses.arabic: وَ كَاَیِّنْ مِّنْ اٰیَةٍ فِی السَّمٰوٰتِ وَ الْاَرْضِ یَمُرُّوْنَ عَلَیْهَا وَ هُمْ عَنْهَا مُعْرِضُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa ka'ayyim-min 'Aayatin fis-samaawaati wal'ardi yamurroona 'alayhaa wa hum 'anhaa mu'ridoon.
verses.translation: Aur aasmaanon aur zameen mein kitni hi nishaaniyaan hain ke woh un par se guzarte hain aur unse be dhiyaani karte hain.

verses.arabic: وَ مَا یُؤْمِنُ اَكْثَرُهُمْ بِاللّٰهِ اِلَّا وَ هُمْ مُّشْرِكُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maa yu'minu 'aksaruhum billaahi 'illaa wa hum mushrikoon.
verses.translation: Aur unke aksar Allah par (iss tarah) eemaan laate hain ke woh mushrik hi hote hain.

verses.arabic: اَفَاَمِنُوْۤا اَنْ تَاْتِیَهُمْ غَاشِیَةٌ مِّنْ عَذَابِ اللّٰهِ اَوْ تَاْتِیَهُمُ السَّاعَةُ بَغْتَةً وَّ هُمْ لَا یَشْعُرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Afa'aminooo 'an ta'tiyahum Ghaashiyatum- min 'azaabil-laahi 'aw ta'tiyahumus-Saa'atu baghtatanñw-wa hum laa yash'uroon.
verses.translation: Kiya woh nidar ho gaye hain ke un par Allah ke a'zaab ki koyi aafat aaye ya achaanak un par qiyaamat aa jaaye aur unhein khabar bhi na ho.

verses.arabic: قُلْ هٰذِهٖ سَبِیْلِیْۤ اَدْعُوْۤا اِلَى اللّٰهِ ۣ عَلٰى بَصِیْرَةٍ اَنَا وَ مَنِ اتَّبَعَنِیْ ۚ وَ سُبْحٰنَ اللّٰهِ وَ مَاۤ اَنَا۠ مِنَ الْمُشْرِكِیْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qul haazihee sabeeleee 'ad'ooo 'ilal- laah; 'alaa başeeratin 'ana wa manit-taba'anee wa Subhaanal-laahi wa maaa 'ana minal- mushrikeen.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) kah deejiye: yahi meri raah hai, main (tumhein) Allah ki taraf bulaata hoon, main aur woh log, jinhon ne mera itteba' kiya, baseerat par hain aur Allah paak hai aur main mushrikon mein se nahin.

verses.arabic: وَ مَاۤ اَرْسَلْنَا مِنْ قَبْلِكَ اِلَّا رِجَالًا نُّوْحِیْۤ اِلَيْهِمْ مِّنْ اَهْلِ الْقُرٰىۤ ۚ اَفَلَمْ یَسِیْرُوْا فِی الْاَرْضِ فَیَنْظُرُوْا كَیْفَ كَانَ عَاقِبَةُ الَّذِیْنَ مِنْ قَبْلِهِمْ ۚ وَ لَدَارُ الْاٰخِرَةِ خَیْرٌ لِّلَّذِیْنَ اتَّقَوْا ۭ اَفَلَا تَعْقِلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maaa 'arsalnaa min qablika 'illaa rijaalan-nooheee min 'ahlil-quraaa; 'ilayhim 'afalam yaseeroo fil-'ardi fayanzuroo kayfa kaana 'aaqibatul-lazeena min qablihim; wa la-Daarul- 'Aakhirati Khayrul- lillazeenat-taqaw; 'afalaa ta'qiloon.
verses.translation: Aur aapse pahle humne mard hi (Rasool banaakar) bheje, unki taraf hum wahi karte the (aur) woh bastiyon ke rahne waale the. Kiya phir woh zameen mein nahin chale phire ke dekhte un logon ka anjaam kiya huwa jo unse pahle the? aur parhez gaaron ke liye aakhirat ka ghar hi behtar hai. kiya phir tum samajhte nahin?

verses.arabic: حَتّٰى اِذَا اسْتَیْــٴَسَ الرُّسُلُ وَ ظَنُّوْۤا اَنَّهُمْ قَدْ كُذِبُوْا جَآءَهُمْ نَصْرُنَا فَنُجِّیَ مَنْ نَّشَآءُ ۭ وَ لَا یُرَدُّ بَاْسُنَا عَنِ الْقَوْمِ الْمُجْرِمِیْنَ
verses.transliteration: Hattaaa 'izas- tay'asar-Rusulu wa zannooo 'annahum qad kuziboo jaaa'ahum naşrunaa fanujjiya man nashaaa'u wa laa yuraddu ba'sunaa 'anil- qawmil-mujrimeen.
verses.translation: Hatta ke jab Rasool maayoos ho gaye aur woh khayaal karne lage ke unhein khilaaf-e-aaqia khabar di gayi to unke paas hamaari madad aa pahunchi, phir najaat mili use jise humne chaaha aur mujrim qaum se hamaara azaab taala nahin jaata.

verses.arabic: لَقَدْ كَانَ فِیْ قَصَصِهِمْ عِبْرَةٌ لِّاُولِی الْاَلْبَابِ ۗ مَا كَانَ حَدِیْثًا یُفْتَرٰى وَ لٰكِنْ تَصْدِیْقَ الَّذِیْ بَيْنَ يَدَيْهِ وَ تَفْصِیْلَ كُلِّ شَیْءٍ وَّ هُدًى وَّ رَحْمَةً لِّقَوْمٍ یُّؤْمِنُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Laqad kaana fee qaşaşihim 'ibratul-li'ulil- 'albaab; maa kaana hadeesany-yuftaraa wa laakin taşdeeqal-lazee bayna yadayhi wa tafseela kulli shay'inw- wa hudanw-wa rahmatal-liqawminy- yu'minoon.
verses.translation: Yaqeenan unke qisson mein aql waalon ke liye i'brat hai. yeh (qur'an) ghadi huyi baat nahin balke apne se pahli kitabon ki tasdeeq aur har cheez ki tafseel hai aur eemaan laane waalon ke liye hidaayat aur rahamt hai.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Goya qur'an ke faham ka husool aur uske zariye' se raah yaab ho jaana, Allah Ta'ala ka ek in'aam hai, jaise hadees mein bhi hai: 'ar Allah Ta'ala kisi shakhs ke saath bhalaayi karna chaahe to woh use deen ki samajh (qur'an aur Rasoolullah ﷺ ki sunnat ki samajh) ataa farma deta hai, main baantne waala hoon aur ataa karne waala Allah hai. (aur yaad rakkho!) yeh ummat (sachche musalmaan, islam ke aqeeda-e-tauheed ke sachche pairokaar) Allah ki taleemaat ki sakhti se pairwi karti rahegi. Uske mukhaalifeen use koyi nuqsaan na phuncha sakenge yahaan tak ke Allah ka hukm aa jaaye (qiyaamat qaayem ho jaaye) (Sahih Bukhari, Al-ilm, Baab:13, Hadees:71)

verses.arabic: الٓمٓرٰ ۚ تِلْكَ اٰيٰتُ الْكِتٰبِ ۗ وَالَّذِيْٓ اُنْزِلَ اِلَيْكَ مِنْ رَّبِّكَ الْحَـقُّ وَلٰكِنَّ اَكْثَرَ النَّاسِ لَا يُؤْمِنُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Alif-Laaam-Мееет- Raa; tilka 'Aayaatul- Kitaab; wallazeee 'unzila 'ilayka mir-Rabbikal- haqqu wa laakinna 'aksaran-naasi laa yu'minoon.
verses.translation: Alif laaam meeem raa, (Aye Nabi!) yeh kitab ki aayaat hain, aur jo aap ke rab ki taraf se aap par naazil kiya gaya woh haq hai lekin aksar log eemaan nahin laate.

verses.arabic: اَللّٰهُ الَّذِيْ رَفَعَ السَّمٰوٰتِ بِغَيْرِ عَمَدٍ تَرَوْنَهَا ۖ ثُمَّ اسْتَوٰى عَلَي الْعَرْشِ وَسَخَّرَ الشَّمْسَ وَالْقَمَرَ ۖ كُلٌّ يَجْرِيْ لِاَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى ۗ يُدَبِّرُ الْاَمْرَ يُفَصِّلُ الْاٰيٰتِ لَعَلَّكُمْ بِلِقَاۗءِ رَبِّكُمْ تُوْقِنُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Allaahul-lazee rafa'as- samaawaati bighayri 'amadin tarawnahaa summas-tawaa 'alal- 'Arshi wa sakhkharash- shamsa walqamara kulluñy-yajree li'ajalim- musammaa; yudabbirul- 'amra yufaşşilul-'Aayaati la'allakum biliqaaa'i Rabbikum tooginoon.
verses.translation: Allah woh zaat hai jisne sutoonon ke baghair aasmaan buland kiye, tum unhein dekhte ho phir woh mustawi-e- arsh huwa¹ aur suraj aur chaand ko kaam par lagaaya, har ek muqarrarah muddat tak ke liye chal raha hai. woh kaam ki tadbeer karta hai, (apni) nishaaniyaan tafseel se bayaan karta hai taake tum apne rab se mulaaqaat par yaqeen karlo.
verses.deepMeaning: Istawaa alalarsh ka mafhoom hai ke Allah Ta'ala ne arsh par qaraar pakda hai, mohaddiseen ka yahi maslak hai woh iski taweel nahin karte jaise ba'z doosre giroh iss mein aur digar sifaat-e-ilaahi mein taweel karte hain. taahum mohaddiseen kahte hain ke uski kaifyat na bayaan ki jaasakti hai aur na use kisi cheez ke saath tashbeeh di jaa sakti hai. 'laysa kamislihee shayun' (Surah Shoora:42/11) kyun ke iski misl koyi cheez hai hi nahin.

verses.arabic: وَهُوَ الَّذِيْ مَدَّ الْاَرْضَ وَجَعَلَ فِيْهَا رَوَاسِيَ وَاَنْهَارًا ۚ وَمِنْ كُلِّ الثَّمَرٰتِ جَعَلَ فِيْهَا زَوْجَيْنِ اثْنَيْنِ ۖ يُغْشِي الَّيْلَ النَّهَارَ ۭ اِنَّ فِيْ ذٰلِكَ لَاٰيٰتٍ لِّقَوْمٍ يَّتَفَكَّرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa Huwal-lazee maddal-'arda wa ja ala feehaa rawaasiya wa 'anhaaraa; wa min ja'ala kullis-samaraati feehaa zawjaynis-nayni Yughshil-laylan-nahaar; 'inna fee zaalika la Aayaatil-liqawminy- yatafakkaroon.
verses.translation: Aur wahi hai jisne zameen phailaayi aur USS pahaad mein aur nahrein banaayein aur uss mein har qism ke phalon ke do do jode banaaye,¹ woh din ko raat se dhaanpta hai. beshak uss mein un logon ke liye nishaaniyaan hain jo ghaur-o-fikr karte hain.
verses.deepMeaning: Iska matlab to yeh hai ke nar aur maadah donon banaaye, jaisa ke maujoodah tahqiqaat ne bhi uski tasdeeq kardi hai. doosra matlab (jode jode) ka yeh hai ke meethha aur khatta, sard-o-garam, siyaah aur safed aur zaayeqah aur bad zaayeqah, iss tarah ek doosre se mukhtalif aur mutazaad qismein paida kin

verses.arabic: وَفِي الْاَرْضِ قِطَعٌ مُّتَجَاوِرٰتٌ وَّجَنّٰتٌ مِّنْ اَعْنَابٍ وَّزَرْعٌ وَّنَخِيْلٌ صِنْوَانٌ وَّغَيْرُ صِنْوَانٍ يُّسْقٰي بِمَاۗءٍ وَّاحِدٍ وَنُفَضِّلُ بَعْضَهَا عَلٰي بَعْضٍ فِي الْاُكُلِ ۭ اِنَّ فِيْ ذٰلِكَ لَاٰيٰتٍ لِّقَوْمٍ يَّعْقِلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa fil-'ardi qitaum- mutajaawiraatuñw-wa jannaatum-min 'a'naabinw-wa zaruñω- wa nakheelun şinwaanunw-wa ghayru şinwaaniny-yusqaa bimaaa'inw-waahid; wa nufaddilu ba dahaa 'alaa ba'din fil-'ukul; 'inna fee zaalika la-'Aayaatil- liqawminy-ya'qiloon.
verses.translation: Aur zameen mein baahum mile huye qat'aat hain, aur angoor ke baagh aur khetiyaan aur khujoor ke darakht hain jo jad se mile huye hain aur juda juda, jo ek hi paani se sairaab hote hain, hum ba'z ko ba'z par phalon (ke zaayiqe) mein fazeelat dete hain. beshak iss mein unke liye nishaaniyaan hain jo samajhte hain.

verses.arabic: وَاِنْ تَعْجَبْ فَعَجَبٌ قَوْلُهُمْ ءَاِذَا كُنَّا تُرٰبًا ءَاِنَّا لَفِيْ خَلْقٍ جَدِيْدٍ ۭ اُولٰۗىٕكَ الَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا بِرَبِّهِمْ ۚ وَاُولٰۗىٕكَ الْاَغْلٰلُ فِيْٓ اَعْنَاقِهِمْ ۚ وَاُولٰۗىٕكَ اَصْحٰبُ النَّارِ ۚ هُمْ فِيْهَا خٰلِدُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'in ta'jab faʻajabun qawluhm 'a'izaa kunnaa turaaban 'a'innaa lafee khalqin jadeed; 'ulaaa'ikal-lazeena kafaroo bi-Rabbihim wa 'ulaaa'ikal-'aghlaalu feee 'a'naaqihim wa 'ulaaa'ika 'Ashaabun-Naari hum feehaa khaalidoon.
verses.translation: Aur agar aap ta'ajjub karein to unka yeh kahna ajeeb tar hai ke kiya jab hum mitti ho jaayeinge to humein az sar-e-nau paida kiya jaayega? Yahi log hain jo apne rab ke munkir huye, aur yahi hain ke unki gardanon mein tauq honge aur yahi dozakh waale hain, woh uss mein hameshah raheinge.

verses.arabic: وَيَسْتَعْجِلُوْنَكَ بِالسَّيِّئَةِ قَبْلَ الْحَسَنَةِ وَقَدْ خَلَتْ مِنْ قَبْلِهِمُ الْمَثُلٰتُ ۗ وَاِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَذُوْ مَغْفِرَةٍ لِّلنَّاسِ عَلٰي ظُلْمِهِمْ ۖ وَاِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَشَدِيْدُ الْعِقَابِ
verses.transliteration: Wa yasta jiloonaka bissayyi'ati qablal- hasanati wa qad khalat min qablihimul-masulaat; wa 'inna Rabbaka lazoo maghfiratil-linnaasi 'alaa zulmihim wa 'inna Rabbaka lashadeedul- 'iqaab.
verses.translation: Aur woh aapse bhalaayi (rahmat) se pahle buraayi (azaab) chaahte hain, haalaanke unse pahle (azaab ki) misaalein guzar chuki hain aur beshak aapka rab logon ke zulm ke baa wajood unhein bakhshne waala hai aur yaqeenan aapka rab sakht saza waala hai.

verses.arabic: وَيَقُوْلُ الَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا لَوْلَآ اُنْزِلَ عَلَيْهِ اٰيَةٌ مِّنْ رَّبِّهٖ ۗ اِنَّمَآ اَنْتَ مُنْذِرٌ وَلِكُلِّ قَوْمٍ هَادٍ
verses.transliteration: Wa yaqoolul-lazeena kafaroo law laaa 'unzila 'alayhi 'Aayatum-mir- Rabbih; 'innamaaa 'anta munziruñw-wa likulli qawmin haad
verses.translation: Aur kaafir log kahte hain: uss par uske rab ki taraf se koyi nishaani kyun na utaari gayi? (Aye Nabi!) aap to sirf daraane waale hain aur har qaum ke liye ek hi haadi hota hai.

verses.arabic: اَللّٰهُ يَعْلَمُ مَا تَحْمِلُ كُلُّ اُنْثٰى وَمَا تَغِيْضُ الْاَرْحَامُ وَمَا تَزْدَادُ ۭ وَكُلُّ شَيْءٍ عِنْدَهٗ بِمِقْدَارٍ
verses.transliteration: Allaahu ya'lamu maa tahmilu kullu 'unsaa wa maa tagheedul-'arhaamu wa maa tazdaad; wa kullu shay'in 'indahoo bimiqdaar.
verses.translation: Allah jaanta hai ke har maadah jo kuchh pet mein uthhaaye phirti hai aur arhaam ki kami beshi bhi, aur uske haan har cheez ki ek miqdaar (muqarrar) hai.

verses.arabic: عٰلِمُ الْغَيْبِ وَالشَّهَادَةِ الْكَبِيْرُ الْمُتَعَالِ
verses.transliteration: 'Aalimul-Ghaybi washshahaadatil- Kaabeerul-Muta'aal
verses.translation: Woh ghaib aur zaahir ka jaanne waala, bahut bada, nehaayat buland hai.

verses.arabic: سَوَآءٌ مِّنْكُمْ مَّنْ اَسَرَّ الْقَوْلَ وَمَنْ جَهَرَ بِهٖ وَمَنْ هُوَ مُسْتَخْفٍ بِالَّيْلِ وَسَارِبٌۢ بِالنَّهَارِ
verses.transliteration: Sawaaa'um-minkum man 'asarral-qawla wa man jahara bihee wa man huwa mustakhfim- billayli wa saaribum binnahaar.
verses.translation: (Allah ke nazdeek) masaawi hai ke tum mein se jo koyi aahistah baat kahe ya buland aawaaz se kahe, aur jo raat (ki taareeki) mein chhupa ho ya din (ki raushni) mein chal rahaa ho.

verses.arabic: لَهٗ مُعَقِّبٰتٌ مِّنْۢ بَيْنِ يَدَيْهِ وَمِنْ خَلْفِهٖ يَحْفَظُوْنَهٗ مِنْ اَمْرِ اللّٰهِ ۗ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ لَا يُغَيِّرُ مَا بِقَوْمٍ حَتّٰي يُغَيِّرُوْا مَا بِاَنْفُسِهِمْ ۭ وَاِذَآ اَرَادَ اللّٰهُ بِقَوْمٍ سُوْۗءًا فَلَا مَرَدَّ لَهٗ ۚ وَمَا لَهُمْ مِّنْ دُوْنِهٖ مِنْ وَّالٍ
verses.transliteration: Lahoo mu'aqqibaatum-mim bayni yadayhi wa min khalfihee yahfazoonahoo min 'amril-laah; 'innal- laaha laa yughayyiru maa biqawmin hattaa yughayyiroo maa bi'anfusihim; wa 'izaaa 'araadal-laahu biqawmin sooo'an falaa maradda lah; wa maa lahum min doonihee minw-waal.
verses.translation: Uss (insaan) ke liye baari baari aane waale (farishte) hain, uske aage se aur uske peechhe se,woh Allah ke hukm se uski hifaazat karte hain.¹ beshak Allah kisi qaum ki (achchhi) haalat ko nahin badalta hatta ke woh khud apne dilon ki kaifiyat ko badal lein aur jab Allah kisi qaum ke saath buraayi (azaab) ka iraadah karta hai to use koyi taalne waala mahin aur unke liye uske siwa koyi kaar saaz nahin.
verses.deepMeaning: Mulaahazah ho: (Haashayah Surah Anaam:6/61)

verses.arabic: هُوَ الَّذِيْ يُرِيْكُمُ الْبَرْقَ خَوْفًا وَّطَمَعًا وَّيُنْشِئُ السَّحَابَ الثِّقَالَ
verses.transliteration: Huwal-lazee yureekumul-barqa khawfanw-wa tama'añw- wa yunshi'us-sahaabas- siqaal
verses.translation: Wahi hai jo tumhein daraane aur ummeed dilaane ke liye bijli dikhaata hai aur bhaari baadal uthhaata hai

verses.arabic: وَيُسَبِّحُ الرَّعْدُ بِحَمْدِهٖ وَالْمَلٰۗىٕكَةُ مِنْ خِيْفَتِهٖ وَيُرْسِلُ الصَّوَاعِقَ فَيُصِيْبُ بِهَا مَنْ يَّشَاۗءُ وَهُمْ يُجَادِلُوْنَ فِي اللّٰهِ وَهُوَ شَدِيْدُ الْمِحَالِ
verses.transliteration: Wa yusabbihur-ra'du bihamdihee walmalaaa'ikatu min kheefatihee wa yursiluş- sawaa'iqa fayuşeebu bihaa mañy-yashaaa'u wa hum yujaadiloona fil- laahi wa Huwa shadeedul-mihaal
verses.translation: Aur (baadal ki) garaj uski hamd ke saath saath¹ tasbeeh padhti hai aur farishte bhi uske khauf se (tasbeeh padhte hain) aur wahi kadakti bijliyaan bhejta hai phir unhein jin par chaahe giraata hai jabke woh Allah ki baabat jhagad rahe hote hain aur uski chaal zabardast hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Ba'z mufassireen bayaan karte hain ke 'Ar-Ra'd' ek farishtah hai jise baadalon par maamoor kiya gaya hai woh Allah ke hukm ke mutaabiq baadalon ko ek jagah se doosri jagah haank kar le jaata hai aur Allah Ta'ala ki tasbeeh bayaan karta rahta hai. (Tafseer Qurtubi:9/296)

verses.arabic: لَهٗ دَعْوَةُ الْحَقِّ ۚ وَالَّذِيْنَ يَدْعُوْنَ مِنْ دُوْنِهٖ لَا يَسْتَجِيْبُوْنَ لَهُمْ بِشَيْءٍ ۭ اِلَّا كَبَاسِطِ كَفَّيْهِ اِلَى الْمَاۗءِ لِيَبْلُغَ فَاهُ وَمَا هُوَ بِبٰلِغِهٖ ۭ وَمَا دُعَاۗؤُا الْكٰفِرِيْنَ اِلَّا فِيْ ضَلٰلٍ
verses.transliteration: Lahoo da'watul-haqq; wallazeena yad'oona min doonihee laa yastajeeboona lahum bishay'in 'illaa kabaasiți kaffayhi 'ilal-maaa' liyablugha faahu wa maa huwa bibaalighih; wa maa du'aaa'ul- kaafireena 'illaa fee dalaal.
verses.translation: Usi ko pukaarna barhaq hai¹ aur jo log uske siwa doosron ko pukaarte hain woh unhein kisi baat ka jawaab nahin dete magar jaise koyi shakhs apne donon haath paani ki taraf phailaaye taake paani uske munh mein aa phunche jab ke woh uss (ke munh) tak pahunchne waala nahin. Aur kaafiron ki pukaar saraasar gumraahi mein hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Ya'ni khauf aur ummeed ke waqt usi ek Allah ko pukaarna sahih hai kyun ke wahi har ek ki pukaar sunta aur qubool farmaata hai. ya da'wat ibaadat ke ma'na mein hai ya'ni usi ki ibaadat haq aur sahih hai, uske siwa koyi ibaadat ka mustahiq nahin, kyun ke kaayenaat ka khaaliq, maalik aur mudabbir sirf wahi hai isliye ibaadat bhi sirf uska haq hai.

verses.arabic: وَلِلّٰهِ يَسْجُدُ مَنْ فِي السَّمٰوٰتِ وَالْاَرْضِ طَوْعًا وَّكَرْهًا وَظِلٰلُهُمْ بِالْغُدُوِّ وَالْاٰصَالِ
verses.transliteration: Wa lillaahi yasjudu man fis-samaawaati wal'ardi taw'anw-wa karhanw-wa zilaaluhum bilghuduwwi wal-'aasaal.
verses.translation: Aur Allah hi ko sajdah karta hai jo koyi aasmaanon aur zameen mein hai, khushi se aur naakhushi se aur unkel saaye bhi subah aur shaam (sajdah karte hain)

verses.arabic: قُلْ مَنْ رَّبُّ السَّمٰوٰتِ وَالْاَرْضِ ۭ قُلِ اللّٰهُ ۭ قُلْ اَفَاتَّخَذْتُمْ مِّنْ دُوْنِهٖٓ اَوْلِيَاۗءَ لَا يَمْلِكُوْنَ لِاَنْفُسِهِمْ نَفْعًا وَّلَا ضَرًّا ۭ قُلْ هَلْ يَسْتَوِي الْاَعْمٰى وَالْبَصِيْرُ اَمْ هَلْ تَسْتَوِي الظُّلُمٰتُ وَالنُّوْرُ ۗ اَمْ جَعَلُوْا لِلّٰهِ شُرَكَاۗءَ خَلَقُوْا كَخَلْقِهٖ فَتَشَابَهَ الْخَلْقُ عَلَيْهِمْ ۭ قُلِ اللّٰهُ خَالِقُ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ وَّهُوَ الْوَاحِدُ الْقَهَّارُ
verses.transliteration: Qul mar-Rabbus- samaawaati wal'ard; qulil-laah; qul 'afattakhaztum min dooniheee 'awliyaaa'a laa yamlikoona li'anfusihim nafañw-wa laa darraa; qul hal yastawil-'a'maa walbaseeru 'am hal tastawiz-zulumaatu wannoor; 'am ja'aloo lillaahi shurakaaa'a khalaqoo kakhalqihee fatashaabahal-khalqu 'alayhim; qulil-laahu Khaaliqu kulli shay'inw- wa Huwal-Waahidul- Qahhaar.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) poochhiye= aasmaanon aur zameen ka rab kaun hai? kah deejiye- Allah (aur) kahiye: phir kiya tumne Allah siwa himaayat bana rakkhe hain jo khud apne nafa' nuqsaan ke bhi malik nahin? Kah deejiye kiya andha aur dekhne waala baraabar ho sakte hain? ya kiya andhere aur raushni baraabar ho sakte hain? kiya unhon ne Allah ke shareek thhahraa rakkhe hain ke unhon ne bhi Allah ki makhlooq jaisi koyi makhlooq banaayi hai phir woh makhlooq un par mushtabah ho gayi hai? kah deejiye: Allah hi har cheez ka khaaliq hai aur woh yakta hai, nehaayat ghaalib.

verses.arabic: اَنْزَلَ مِنَ السَّمَاۗءِ مَاۗءً فَسَالَتْ اَوْدِيَةٌۢ بِقَدَرِهَا فَاحْتَمَلَ السَّيْلُ زَبَدًا رَّابِيًا ۚ وَمِمَّا يُوْقِدُوْنَ عَلَيْهِ فِي النَّارِ ابْتِغَاۗءَ حِلْيَةٍ اَوْ مَتَاعٍ زَبَدٌ مِّثْلُهٗ ۭ كَذٰلِكَ يَضْرِبُ اللّٰهُ الْحَقَّ وَالْبَاطِلَ ۭ فَاَمَّا الزَّبَدُ فَيَذْهَبُ جُفَاۗءً ۚ وَاَمَّا مَا يَنْفَعُ النَّاسَ فَيَمْكُثُ فِي الْاَرْضِ ۭ كَذٰلِكَ يَضْرِبُ اللّٰهُ الْاَمْثَالَ
verses.transliteration: 'Anzala minas- samaaa'i maaa'an fasaalat 'awdiyatum biqadarihaa fahtamalas- saylu zabadar-raabiyaa; wa mimmaa yooqidoona 'alayhi fin-naarib- tighaaa'a hilyatin 'aw mataa in zabadum- misluh; kazaalika yadribul-laahul-haqqa walbaatil; fa'ammaz- zabadu fayazhabu jufaaa'aa; wa 'ammaa maa yanfa'un-naasa fayamkusu fil-'ard; kazaalika yadribul- laahul-'amsaal.
verses.translation: Allah ne aasmaan se paani naazil kiya, to nadi naale apni apni gunjaayish ke mutaabiq bah nikle, phir sailaab phula huwa jhaag oupar le aaya. Aur un (dhaaton) mein se bhi jinhein zewar ya saamaan banaane ke liye aag mein pighlaate hain, isi tarah ka jhaag (uthhta hai) Allah isi tarah haq aur baatil ki misaal bayaan karta hai. chunaancheh jo jhaag hai woh to sookh kar zaayel ho jaata hai aur jo cheez insaanon ko faaidah deti hai woh zameen mein baaqi rahti hai.¹ Allah isi tarah misaalein bayaan karta hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Ya'ni jab haq aur baatil ka aapas mein ijtema' aur takraao hota hai to baatil ko isi tarah sabaat aur dawaam nahin hota jis tarah sailaabi reele ka jhaag paani ke saath, dhaaton ka jhaag, jin ko aag mein tapaaya jaata hai, dhaaton ke saath baaqi nahin rahta balke muzmahal aur khatm ho jaata hai, aahistah aahistah baithh jaata hai ya hawaayein use udaale jaati hain, baatil ki misaal bhi jhaag hi ki tarah hai aur paani, sona, chaandi, taanba aur peetal waghairah baaqi rah jaate hain jin se log mutamatta' aur faiz yaab hote hain isi tarah haq baaqi rahta hai jis ke wajood ko bhi zawaal nahin aur jiska nafa' bhi daayemi hai.

verses.arabic: لِلَّذِيْنَ اسْتَجَابُوْا لِرَبِّهِمُ الْحُسْنٰى ۚ وَالَّذِيْنَ لَمْ يَسْتَجِيْبُوْا لَهٗ لَوْ اَنَّ لَهُمْ مَّا فِي الْاَرْضِ جَمِيْعًا وَّمِثْلَهٗ مَعَهٗ لَافْتَدَوْا بِهٖ ۭ اُولٰۗىٕكَ لَهُمْ سُوْۗءُ الْحِسَابِ ۚ وَمَاْوٰىهُمْ جَهَنَّمُ ۭ وَبِئْسَ الْمِهَادُ
verses.transliteration: Lillazeenas-tajaaboo li-Rabbihimul-husnaa; wallazeena lam yastajeeboo lahoo law 'anna lahum maa fil-'ardi jamee'anw-wa mislahoo ma'ahoo laftadaw bih; 'ulaaa'ika lahum sooo'ul- hisaab; wa ma'waahum Jahannamu wa bi'sal- mihaad.
verses.translation: Jinhon ne pane rab ka hukm maana unke liye bhalaayi hai. aur jinhon ne uska hukm na maana, agar unke paas woh sab kcuhh ho jo zameen mein hai aur utna hi uske saath (aur bhi) to woh zaroor use fidye mein de dein.¹ yahi log hain ke unse buri tarah hisaab liya jaayega aur unka thhekaana jahannam hai aur woh bahut bura thhekaana hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Mulaahazah ho: (Surah Aal-e-Imran:3/91)

verses.arabic: اَفَمَنْ يَّعْلَمُ اَنَّمَآ اُنْزِلَ اِلَيْكَ مِنْ رَّبِّكَ الْحَقُّ كَمَنْ هُوَ اَعْمٰى ۭ اِنَّمَا يَتَذَكَّرُ اُولُوا الْاَلْبَابِ
verses.transliteration: Afamany-yalamu 'annamaaa 'unzila 'ilayka mir-Rabbikal-haqqu kaman huwa 'a'maaa; 'innamaa yatazakkaru 'ulul-'albaab.
verses.translation: Bhala jo shakhs jaanta hai ke jo kuchh aap ke rab ki taraf se aap par naazil kiya gaya hai, wahi haq hai, woh andhe jaisa ho sakta hai? bas aqal waale hi naseehat pakadte hain.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Ya'ni jinke paas qalb-e-saleem aur aql-e-sahih na ho aur jinhon ne apne dilon ko gunaahon ke zung se aaloodah aur apni aqlon ko kharaab kar liya ho, woh iss qur'an se naseehat haasil hi nahin kar sakte.

verses.arabic: الَّذِيْنَ يُوْفُوْنَ بِعَهْدِ اللّٰهِ وَلَا يَنْقُضُوْنَ الْمِيْثَاقَ
verses.transliteration: 'Allazeena yoofoona bi-'Ahdil-laahi wa laa yanqudoonal-meesaaq.
verses.translation: Woh jo Allah ka ahad pura karte hain aur pukhtah wa'dah nahin todte

verses.arabic: وَالَّذِيْنَ يَصِلُوْنَ مَآ اَمَرَ اللّٰهُ بِهٖٓ اَنْ يُّوْصَلَ وَيَخْشَوْنَ رَبَّهُمْ وَيَخَافُوْنَ سُوْۗءَ الْحِسَابِ
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena yaşiloona maaa 'amaral-laahu biheee 'añy-yooşala wa yakhshawna Rabbahum wa yakhaafoona sooo'al- hisaab.
verses.translation: Aur jo jodte hain woh cheez jise Allah ne jodne ka hukm diya aur woh apne rab se darte hain aur sakht hisaab se ghabraate hain

verses.arabic: وَالَّذِيْنَ صَبَرُوا ابْتِغَاۗءَ وَجْهِ رَبِّهِمْ وَاَقَامُوا الصَّلٰوةَ وَاَنْفَقُوْا مِمَّا رَزَقْنٰهُمْ سِرًّا وَّعَلَانِيَةً وَّيَدْرَءُوْنَ بِالْحَسَنَةِ السَّيِّئَةَ اُولٰۗىٕكَ لَهُمْ عُقْبَي الدَّارِ
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena şabarub- tighaaa'a Wajhi Rabbihim wa 'aqaamuş-Şalaata wa 'anfaqoo mimmaa razaqnaahum sirrañw-wa 'alaaniyatanw-wa yadra'oona bilhasanatis- sayyi'ata 'ulaaa'ika lahum 'uqbad-daar.
verses.translation: Aur jinhon ne apne rab ke chehre ki talab ke liye sabr kiya aur namaaz qaayem ki aur hamaare diye rizq mein se chhupe aur khule kharc kiya aur woh buraayi ko bhlaayi se dafa' karte hain, unhi logon ke liye aakhirat ka ghar hai.

verses.arabic: جَنّٰتُ عَدْنٍ يَّدْخُلُوْنَهَا وَمَنْ صَلَحَ مِنْ اٰبَاۗىٕهِمْ وَاَزْوَاجِهِمْ وَذُرِّيّٰتِهِمْ ۭ وَالْمَلٰۗىٕكَةُ يَدْخُلُوْنَ عَلَيْهِمْ مِّنْ كُلِّ بَابٍ
verses.transliteration: jannaatu 'Adniny- yadkhuloonahaa wa man salaha min 'aabaaa'ihim wa 'azwaajihim wa zurriyyaatihim walmalaaa'ikatu yadkhuloona 'alayhim min kulli baab.
verses.translation: Jo ke hameshah ke baagh hain jin mein woh daakhil honge aur woh bhi jo unke baap dada aur unki biwiyon aur unki aulaad mein se nek hain aur farishte (jannat ke) har darwaaze se unke paas aayenge

verses.arabic: سَلٰمٌ عَلَيْكُمْ بِمَا صَبَرْتُمْ ۚ فَنِعْمَ عُقْبَي الدَّارِ
verses.transliteration: Salaamun 'alaykum bimaa şabartum; fani'ma 'uqbad-daar.
verses.translation: (Aur kahenge:) tum par salaam ho, isliye ke tumne sabr kiya, lehaaza aakhirat ka ghar bahut khoob hai.

verses.arabic: وَالَّذِيْنَ يَنْقُضُوْنَ عَهْدَ اللّٰهِ مِنْۢ بَعْدِ مِيْثَاقِهٖ وَيَقْطَعُوْنَ مَآ اَمَرَ اللّٰهُ بِهٖٓ اَنْ يُّوْصَلَ وَيُفْسِدُوْنَ فِي الْاَرْضِ ۙ اُولٰۗىٕكَ لَهُمُ اللَّعْنَةُ وَلَهُمْ سُوْۗءُ الدَّارِ
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena yanqudoona 'Ahdal-laahi mim ba'di meesaaqihee wa yaqta'oona maaa 'amaral-laahu biheee 'any-yooşala wa yufsidoona fil-'ardi 'ulaaa'ika lahumul-la'natu wa lahum sooo'ud-daar.
verses.translation: Aur jo log Allah ke ahad ko pukhtah karne ke ba'd tod dete hain aur woh cheez qata' karte hain jise Allah ne jodne ka hukm diya, aur woh zameen mein fasaad karte hain.¹ unhi logon ke liye la'nat hai aur unke liye (aakhirat ka) bahut bura ghar hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Mulaahazah ho haashyah: (Surah Baqarah:2/27)

verses.arabic: اَللّٰهُ يَبْسُطُ الرِّزْقَ لِمَنْ يَّشَاۗءُ وَيَقْدِرُ ۭ وَفَرِحُوْا بِالْحَيٰوةِ الدُّنْيَا ۭ وَمَا الْحَيٰوةُ الدُّنْيَا فِي الْاٰخِرَةِ اِلَّا مَتَاعٌ
verses.transliteration: 'Allaahu yabsutur- rizqa limany-yashaaa'u wa yaqdir; wa farihoo bilhayaatid-dunyaa wa mal-hayaatud-dunyaa fil- 'Aakhirati 'illaa mataa.
verses.translation: Allah jise chaahe khula rizq deta hai aur (jise chaahe) napa tula deta hai aur woh (kaafir) dunya ki zindagi par itraate hain haalaanke dunya ki zindagi aakhirat ki nisbat (haqeer) mata' hi to hai.

verses.arabic: وَيَقُوْلُ الَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا لَوْلَٓا اُنْزِلَ عَلَيْهِ اٰيَةٌ مِّنْ رَّبِّهٖ ۭ قُلْ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ يُضِلُّ مَنْ يَّشَاۗءُ وَيَهْدِيْٓ اِلَيْهِ مَنْ اَنَابَ
verses.transliteration: Wa yaqoolul-lazeena kafaroo law laaa 'unzila 'alayhi 'Aayatum-mir- Rabbih; qul 'innal-laaha yudillu many-yashaa'u wa yahdeee 'ilayhi man 'anaab.
verses.translation: Aur kaafir kahte hain: uske rab ki taraf se uss par koyi nishaani kyun nahin naazil ki gayi? Kah deejiye: beshak Allah jise chaahe gumraah karta hai aur uss shakhs ko apni taraf hidaayat deta hai jo ruju' kare.

verses.arabic: اَلَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا وَتَطْمَىٕنُّ قُلُوْبُهُمْ بِذِكْرِ اللّٰهِ ۭ اَلَا بِذِكْرِ اللّٰهِ تَطْمَىٕنُّ الْقُلُوْبُ
verses.transliteration: 'Allazeena 'aamanoo wa tatma'innu quloobuhum bizikril-laah; 'alaa bizikril-laahi tatma'innul-quloob.
verses.translation: Jo log eemaan laaye unke dil Allah ke zikr se itmenaan paate hain, aagaah raho! Allah ke zikr hi se dil itmenaan paate hain.

verses.arabic: اَلَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا وَعَمِلُوا الصّٰلِحٰتِ طُوْبٰى لَهُمْ وَحُسْنُ مَاٰبٍ
verses.transliteration: 'Allazeena 'aamanoo wa 'amiluş-şaalihaati toobaa lahum wa husnu ma'aab.
verses.translation: Jo log eemaan laaye aur nek amal kiye, unke liye khush haali aur achchha thhikaana hai.

verses.arabic: كَذٰلِكَ اَرْسَلْنٰكَ فِيْٓ اُمَّةٍ قَدْ خَلَتْ مِنْ قَبْلِهَآ اُمَمٌ لِّتَتْلُوَا عَلَيْهِمُ الَّذِيْٓ اَوْحَيْنَآ اِلَيْكَ وَهُمْ يَكْفُرُوْنَ بِالرَّحْمٰنِ ۭ قُلْ هُوَ رَبِّيْ لَآ اِلٰهَ اِلَّا هُوَ ۭ عَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ وَاِلَيْهِ مَتَابِ
verses.transliteration: Kazaalika arsalnaaka feee 'ummatin qad khalat min qablihaaa 'umamul- litatluwa 'alayhimul- lazeee 'awhaynaaa 'ilayka wa hum yakfuroona bir-Rahmaan; qul Huwa Rabbee laaa 'ilaaha 'illaa Huwa 'alayhi tawakkaltu wa 'ilayhi mataab.
verses.translation: (Jaise pahle Rasool bheje the) usi tarah humne aapko aisi ummat mein Rasool- banaa kar bheja jisse pahle kayi ummatein guzar chuki hain taake aap unhein woh padh kar sunaayein jo humne aapki taraf wahi ki aur woh Rahmaan ka inkaar karte hain, kah deejiye: woh mera rab hai, uske siwa koyi ma'bood nahin, main ne usi par bharosa kiya hai aur usi ki taraf meri taubah hai.

verses.arabic: وَلَوْ اَنَّ قُرْاٰنًا سُيِّرَتْ بِهِ الْجِبَالُ اَوْ قُطِّعَتْ بِهِ الْاَرْضُ اَوْ كُلِّمَ بِهِ الْمَوْتٰى ۭ بَلْ لِّلّٰهِ الْاَمْرُ جَمِيْعًا ۭ اَفَلَمْ يَاْيْـَٔسِ الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْٓا اَنْ لَّوْ يَشَاۗءُ اللّٰهُ لَهَدَى النَّاسَ جَمِيْعًا ۭ وَلَا يَزَالُ الَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا تُصِيْبُهُمْ بِمَا صَنَعُوْا قَارِعَةٌ اَوْ تَحُلُّ قَرِيْبًا مِّنْ دَارِهِمْ حَتّٰي يَاْتِيَ وَعْدُ اللّٰهِ ۭ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ لَا يُخْلِفُ الْمِيْعَادَ
verses.transliteration: Wa law 'anna Qur'aanan suyyirat bihil- jibaalu 'aw qutti'at bihil- 'ardu 'aw kullima bihil- mawtaa; bal lillaahil- 'amru jamee'aa; 'afalam yay'asil-lazeena 'aamanooo 'al-law yashaaa'ul-laahu lahadan-naasa jamee'aa; wa laa yazaalul-lazeena kafaroo tuşeebuhum bimaa sana'oo qaari'atun 'aw tahullu qareebam-min daarihim hattaa ya'tiya wa'dul-laah; 'innal-laaha laa yukhliful-mee'aad.
verses.translation: Aur agar bilaa shubah aisa qur'an hota ke uske zariye' se pahaad chalaaye jaate ya usse zameen qat'a ki jaati ya usse murde bol padte (to bhi kuffaar eemaan na laate) balke saara ikhtiyaar Allah hi ke paas hai, kiya phir eemaan waalon ne (abhi tak) nahin jaana ke agar Allah chaahta to sab hi logon ko hidaayat deta? Aur jinhon ne kufr kiya unke kartooton par unhein aafat pahunchti hi rahegi ya unke gharon ke qareeb utregi hatta ke Allah ka wa'dah aa phunche. Beshak Allah apne wa'de ke khilaaf nahin karta.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدِ اسْتُهْزِئَ بِرُسُلٍ مِّنْ قَبْلِكَ فَاَمْلَيْتُ لِلَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا ثُمَّ اَخَذْتُهُمْ ۭ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عِقَابِ
verses.transliteration: Wa laqadis-tuhzi'a bi- Rusulim-min qablika fa'amlaytu lillazeena kafaroo summa 'akhaztuhum fakayfa kaana 'iqaab.
verses.translation: Aur (Aye Nabi!) aapse pahle Rasoolon ka mazaaq udaaya gaya to main ne kaafiron ko dheel di, phir unhein pakad liya, phir mera azaab kaisa (ibratnaak) tha?

verses.arabic: اَفَمَنْ هُوَ قَاۗىٕمٌ عَلٰي كُلِّ نَفْسٍۢ بِمَا كَسَبَتْ ۗ وَجَعَلُوْا لِلّٰهِ شُرَكَاۗءَ ۭ قُلْ سَمُّوْهُمْ ۭ اَمْ تُنَبِّـءُوْنَهٗ بِمَا لَا يَعْلَمُ فِي الْاَرْضِ اَمْ بِظَاهِرٍ مِّنَ الْقَوْلِ ۗ بَلْ زُيِّنَ لِلَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا مَكْرُهُمْ وَصُدُّوْا عَنِ السَّبِيْلِ ۭ وَمَنْ يُّضْلِلِ اللّٰهُ فَمَا لَهٗ مِنْ هَادٍ
verses.transliteration: 'Afaman Huwa qaaa'imun 'alaa kulli nafsim bimaa kasabat; wa ja'aloo lillaahi shurakaaa'a qul sammoohum; 'am tunabbi'oonahoo bimaa laa ya'lamu fil-'ardi; 'am bizaahirim-minal-qawl; bal zuyyina lillazeena kafaroo makruhum wa suddoo 'anis-sabeel; wa many-yudlilil-laahu famaa lahoo min haad.
verses.translation: Bhala woh (Allah) jo har nafs (ke a'amaal) par nigraan hai, jo usne kiye, (ghairullah ke maanind ho sakta hai?) aur unhon ne Allah ke shareek thhahraaye hain. kah deejiye:unke naam to lo, kiya tum Allah ko uss cheez ki khabar dete ho jo woh nahin jaanta zameen mein? Balke zann-e-baatil se tum shareek thhah raate ho, balke kaafiron ke liye unka makr khush numa bana diya gaya aur unhein raah-e-haq se rok diya gaya aur jise Allah gumraah kare uske liye koyi haadi nahin.

verses.arabic: لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ فِي الْحَيٰوةِ الدُّنْيَا ۖ وَلَعَذَابُ الْاٰخِرَةِ اَشَقُّ ۚ وَمَا لَهُمْ مِّنَ اللّٰهِ مِنْ وَاقٍ
verses.transliteration: Lahum 'azaabun fil- hayaatid-dunyaa wa la azaabul-'Aakhirati 'ashaqqu wa maa lahum minal-laahi miñw-waaq.
verses.translation: Unke liye dunya ki zindagi mein azaab hai aur aakhirat ka azaab to sakht tareen hai aur unhein Allah (ke azaab) se bachaane waala koyi nahin.

verses.arabic: مَّثَلُ الْجَنَّةِ الَّتِيْ وُعِدَ الْمُتَّقُوْنَ ۙ تَجْرِيْ مِنْ تَحْتِهَا الْاَنْهٰرُ ۖ اُكُلُهَا دَاۗىٕمٌ وَّظِلُّهَا ۭ تِلْكَ عُقْبَي الَّذِيْنَ اتَّقَوْا ۭ وَّعُقْبَي الْكَافِرِيْنَ النَّارُ
verses.transliteration: Maşalul-Jannatil-latee wu'idal-muttaqoona tajree min tahtihal-'anhaaru 'ukuluhaa daaa'imuñw- wa zilluhaa; tilka 'uqbal- lazeenat-taqawwa 'uqbal- kafireenan-Naar.
verses.translation: Jis jannat ka muttaqi logon se wa'dah kiya gaya uski sifat yeh hai ke uske neeche nahrein jaari hain. uske phal aur uske saaye daayemi hain. yeh unka anjaam hai jo muttaqi huye aur kaafiron ka anjaam aag hai.

verses.arabic: وَالَّذِيْنَ اٰتَيْنٰهُمُ الْكِتٰبَ يَفْرَحُوْنَ بِمَآ اُنْزِلَ اِلَيْكَ ۚ وَمِنَ الْاَحْزَابِ مَنْ يُّنْكِرُ بَعْضَهٗ ۭ قُلْ اِنَّمَآ اُمِرْتُ اَنْ اَعْبُدَ اللّٰهَ وَلَآ اُشْرِكَ بِهٖٓ اِلَيْهِ اَدْعُوْا وَاِلَيْهِ مَاٰبِ
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena 'aataynaahumul-Kitaaba yafrahoona bimaaa 'unzila 'ilayka wa minal- 'Ahzaabi mañy-yunkiru ba'dah; qul 'innamaaa 'umirtu 'an 'a'budal- laaha wa laaa 'ushrika bih; 'ilayhi 'ad'oo wa 'ilayhi ma'aab.
verses.translation: Aur jinhein humne kitab di woh iss (qur'an) se khush hote hain jo aapki taraf naazil kiya gaya aur kuchh giroh hain jo uske ba'z ahkaam ka inkaar karte hain. kah deejiye:mujhe to sirf yeh hukm diya gaya hai ke main Allah ki ibaadat karun aur uske saath shirk na karun.usi ki taraf main da'wat deta hoon aur usi ki taraf meri waapsi hai.

verses.arabic: وَكَذٰلِكَ اَنْزَلْنٰهُ حُكْمًا عَرَبِيًّا ۚ وَلَىِٕنِ اتَّبَعْتَ اَهْوَاۗءَهُمْ بَعْدَ مَا جَاۗءَكَ مِنَ الْعِلْمِ مَا لَكَ مِنَ اللّٰهِ مِنْ وَّلِيٍّ وَّلَا وَاقٍ
verses.transliteration: Wa kazaalika 'anzalnaahu hukman 'Arabiyyaa; wa la'init- taba'ta 'ahwaaa'ahum ba'da maa jaaa'aka minal-'ilmi maa laka minal-laahi minw- waliyyinw wa laa waaq
verses.translation: Aur isi tarah humne iss (qur'an) ko arabi zabaan mein hukm (banaakar) naazil kiya aur agar aapne iske ba'd bhi unki khaahishaat ka itteba' kiya ke aapke paas ilm aa chuka to aap ke liye Allah ke muqaable mein koyi aur bachaane waala na hoga.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ اَرْسَلْنَا رُسُلًا مِّنْ قَبْلِكَ وَجَعَلْنَا لَهُمْ اَزْوَاجًا وَّذُرِّيَّةً ۚ وَمَا كَانَ لِرَسُوْلٍ اَنْ يَّاْتِيَ بِاٰيَةٍ اِلَّا بِاِذْنِ اللّٰهِ ۭ لِكُلِّ اَجَلٍ كِتَابٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa lagad 'arsalnaa Rusulam-min qablika wa ja'alnaa lahum 'azwaajañw-wa zurriyyah; wa maa kaana li-Rasoolin 'any-ya'tiya bi- 'Aayatin 'illaa bi'iznil- laah; likulli 'ajalin kitaab
verses.translation: Aur beshak humne aap se pahle kayi Rasool bheje aur humne unhein beewi bachchon waale banaaya aur kisi Rasool ko yeh ikhtiyaar na tha ke woh Allah ke izn ke baghair koyi nishaani (mo'jizah) laa dikhaaye. Har wa'de ke liye likkha huwa waqt hai.

verses.arabic: يَمْحُوا اللّٰهُ مَا يَشَاۗءُ وَيُثْبِتُ ۭ وَعِنْدَهٗٓ اُمُّ الْكِتٰبِ
verses.transliteration: Yamhul-laahu maa yashaaa'u wa yusbitu wa 'indahooo 'ummul-Kitaab.
verses.translation: Allah jise chaahta hai mitaata hai aur (jise chaahe) saabit rakhta hai aur usi ke paas asl kitab hai¹
verses.deepMeaning: Ek da'fa Umar رضي الله عنه ka'ba ka tawaaf kar rahe the aur woh rote huye kah rahe the: 'Aye Allah agar toone mujhe nek bakhton mein likh rakkha hai to mujhe unke saath saabit qadam rakh aur agar toone mujhe badbakht gunaah gaaron mein likh rakkha hai to use nek bakht aur bakhshe huye logon se badal de, beshak tu jo chaahta hai, mita deta hai aur (Ummul Kitab) tere hi paas hai.' (Tafseer Qurtubi:9/330)

verses.arabic: وَاِمَّا نُرِيَنَّكَ بَعْضَ الَّذِيْ نَعِدُهُمْ اَوْ نَتَوَفَّيَنَّكَ فَاِنَّمَا عَلَيْكَ الْبَلٰغُ وَعَلَيْنَا الْحِسَابُ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'im-maa nuriyannaka ba'dal- lazee na iduhum 'aw natawaffayannaka fa'innamaa 'alaykal- balaaghu wa 'alaynal-hisaab
verses.translation: Aur (Aye Nabi!) jis (azaab) ka hum unse wa'dah karte hain khaah uska kuchh hissa hum aapko dikha dein ya (usse pahle) aap ko wafaat de dein aapke zimme to sirf pahunchaa dena hai aur hamaara kaam hisaab lena hai.

verses.arabic: اَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا اَنَّا نَاْتِي الْاَرْضَ نَنْقُصُهَا مِنْ اَطْرَافِهَا ۚ وَاللّٰهُ يَحْكُمُ لَا مُعَقِّبَ لِحُكْمِهٖ ۭ وَهُوَ سَرِيْعُ الْحِسَابِ
verses.transliteration: Awalam yaraw 'annaa na'til-'arda nanquşuhaa min 'atraafihaa; wallaahu yahkumu laa mu'aqqiba lihukmih; wa Huwa saree'ul-hisaab.
verses.translation: Kiya woh dekhte nahin ke bila shubah hum (kufr ki) zameen ko har taraf se ghataate jaar ahe hain (ya'ni islam phail rahaa hai) aur Allah hukm karta hai, koyi uska hukm radd karne waala nahin aur woh jald hisaab lene waala hai.

verses.arabic: وَقَدْ مَكَرَ الَّذِيْنَ مِنْ قَبْلِهِمْ فَلِلّٰهِ الْمَكْرُ جَمِيْعًا ۭ يَعْلَمُ مَا تَكْسِبُ كُلُّ نَفْسٍ ۚ وَسَيَعْلَمُ الْكُفَّارُ لِمَنْ عُقْبَي الدَّارِ
verses.transliteration: Wa qad makaral- lazeena min qablihim falillaahil-makru jamee'aa; ya'ʻlamu maa taksibu kullu nafs; wa sayalamul-kuffaaru liman 'uqbad-daar
verses.translation: Aur beshak woh log bahut tadbeerein kar chuke jo un se pahle pahle the, bas Allah hi ke liye hain saari tadbeerein. Woh jaanta hai jo kuchh har nafs kamaata hai aur jald hi kuffaar jaan lenge ke aakhirat ka ghar kiske liye hai.

verses.arabic: وَيَقُوْلُ الَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا لَسْتَ مُرْسَلًا ۭ قُلْ كَفٰي بِاللّٰهِ شَهِيْدًۢا بَيْنِيْ وَبَيْنَكُمْ وَمَنْ عِنْدَهٗ عِلْمُ الْكِتٰبِ
verses.transliteration: Wa yaqoolul-lazeena kafaroo lasta mursalaa; qul kafaa billaahi shaheedam baynee wa baynakum wa man 'indahoo 'ilmul-Kitaab.
verses.translation: Aur kaafir kahte hain: tum Rasool nahin ho, aap kah deejiye: Allah kaafi hai mere aur tumhaare darmiyaan gawah aur woh shakhs bhi jise kitab ka ilm hai.

verses.arabic: الٓرٰ ۗ كِتٰبٌ اَنْزَلْنٰهُ اِلَيْكَ لِتُخْرِجَ النَّاسَ مِنَ الظُّلُمٰتِ اِلَى النُّوْرِ بِاِذْنِ رَبِّهِمْ اِلٰى صِرَاطِ الْعَزِيْزِ الْحَمِيْدِ
verses.transliteration: 'Alif-Laaam-Raa; Kitaabun 'anzalnaahu 'ilayka litukhrijan-naasa minaz-zulumaati 'ilan- noori bi'izni Rabbihim 'ilaa şiraatil-'Azeezil- Hameed.
verses.translation: Alif Laaam Raa, (Aye Nabi!) yeh azeemush-shaan kitab humne aapki taraf naazil ki hai take aap logon ko zulmaton se nor ki taraf nikaal laayein, unke rab ke izn¹ se ghaalib aur laayeq-e-t'areef ke raaste ki taraf.
verses.deepMeaning: Ya'ni paighambar ka kaam hidaayat ka raastah dikhaana hai lekin agar koyi uss raaste ko ikhtiyaar kar leta hai to yeh sirf Allah ke hukm aur uski mashiyat se hota kyunke asal haadi wahi hai. uski mashiyat agar na ho to paighambar kitna bhi wa'z-o-naseehat kare, log hidaayat ka raastah apnaane ke liye tayyaar nahin hote, jiski muta'ddad misaalein Ambiya-e-saabiqeen mein maujood hain aur khud Nabi ﷺ baawajood shaded khaahish ke apne meharbaan chacha ko musalmaan na bana sake.

verses.arabic: اللّٰهِ الَّذِيْ لَهٗ مَا فِي السَّمٰوٰتِ وَ مَا فِي الْاَرْضِ ۭ وَ وَيْلٌ لِّلْكٰفِرِيْنَ مِنْ عَذَابٍ شَدِيْدِ
verses.transliteration: Allaahil-lazee lahoo maa fis-samaawaati wa maa fil-'ard; wa waylul- lilkaafireena min 'azaabin shadeed.
verses.translation: Allaahil-lazee lahoo maa fis-samaawaati wa maa fil-'ard; wa waylul- lilkaafireena min 'azaabin shadeed.

verses.arabic: الَّذِيْنَ يَسْتَحِبُّوْنَ الْحَيٰوةَ الدُّنْيَا عَلَى الْاٰخِرَةِ وَ يَصُدُّوْنَ عَنْ سَبِيْلِ اللّٰهِ وَ يَبْغُوْنَهَا عِوَجًا ۭ اُولٰٓىٕكَ فِيْ ضَلٰلٍۭ بَعِيْدٍ
verses.transliteration: 'Allazeena yastahibboonal-hayaatad- dunyaa 'alal-'Aakhirati wa yaşuddoona 'an sabeelil- laahi wa yabghoonahaa iwajaa; 'ulaaa'ika fee dalaalim ba'eed.
verses.translation: Jo aakhirat par dunya ki zindagi ko mahboob rakhte hain aur Allah ke raaste se rokte hain aur uss mein thhedha pan dhoondte hain, wahi door ki gumraahi mein hain.

verses.arabic: وَ مَآ اَرْسَلْنَا مِنْ رَسُوْلٍ اِلَّا بِلِسَانِ قَوْمِهٖ لِيُبَيِّنَ لَهُمْ ۚ فَيُضِلُّ اللّٰهُ مَنْ يَّشَآءُ وَ يَهْدِيْ مَنْ يَّشَآءُ ۭ وَ هُوَ الْعَزِيْزُ الْحَكِيْمُ
verses.transliteration: Wa maaa 'arsalnaa mir-Rasoolin 'illaa bilisaani qawmihee liyubayyina lahum fayudillul-laahu many- yashaaa'u wa yahdee many-yashaaa'; wa Huwal-'Azeezul-Hakeem.
verses.translation: Aur hum ne har Rasool uski apni qaum ki zabaan bolne waala bheja taake unke liye khol kar bayaan kare. Phir Allah jise chaahe gumraah karta hai aur jise chaahe hidaayat deta hai aur woh zabardast, khoob hikmat waala hai.

verses.arabic: وَ لَقَدْ اَرْسَلْنَا مُوْسٰى بِاٰيٰتِنَآ اَنْ اَخْرِجْ قَوْمَكَ مِنَ الظُّلُمٰتِ اِلَى النُّوْرِ وَ ذَكِّرْهُمْ بِاَيَّامِ اللّٰهِ ۭ اِنَّ فِيْ ذٰلِكَ لَاٰيٰتٍ لِّكُلِّ صَبَّارٍ شَكُوْرٍ
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad 'arsalnaa Moosaa bi-'Aayaatinaaa 'an 'akhrij qawmaka minaz-zulumaati 'ilan- noori wa zakkirhum bi'ayyaamil-laah; 'inna fee zaalika la-'Aayaatil- likulli şabbaarin shakoor.
verses.translation: Aur bila shubah humne Moosa ko apni nishaanyon ke saath bheja ke apni qaum ko zulmaton se nor ki taraf nikaal la aur unhein Allah ke (yaad gaar) ayyaam (dinon) yaad dila.¹ Beshak un mein har saabir (aur) shaakir ke liye nishaanyaan hain.
verses.deepMeaning: Muraad Allah ke woh ehsanaat hai jo bani Israyeel par kiye gaye. Ya ayyaam waqaaye' ke ma'na mein hain yani woh waaqeaat unko yaad dila, jinse woh guzar chuke hain jin mein un par Allah Ta'ala ke khusoosi inaamaat huye.

verses.arabic: وَ اِذْ قَالَ مُوْسٰى لِقَوْمِهِ اذْكُرُوْا نِعْمَتَ اللّٰهِ عَلَيْكُمْ اِذْ اَنْجٰىكُمْ مِّنْ اٰلِ فِرْعَوْنَ يَسُوْمُوْنَكُمْ سُوْٓءَ الْعَذَابِ وَ يُذَبِّحُوْنَ اَبْنَآءَكُمْ وَ يَسْتَحْيُوْنَ نِسَآءَكُمْ ۭ وَ فِيْ ذٰلِكُمْ بَلَآءٌ مِّنْ رَّبِّكُمْ عَظِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'iz qaala Moosaa liqawmihiz-kuroo ni'matal- laahi 'alaykum iz 'anjaakum min 'Aali- Fir'awna yasoomoonakum sooo'al-'azaabi wa yuzabbihoona 'abnaaa 'akum wa yastahyoona nisaaa'akum; wa fee zaalikum balaaa'um-mir- Rabbikum 'azeem.
verses.translation: Aur jab Moosa ne apni qaum se kaha: apne oupar Allah ki ne'mat yaad karo jab usne tumhein aal-e- fir'aun se najaat di, woh tumhein sakht azaab dete the, tumhaare bête zabah karte aur tumhaari betiyaan zindah chhodte the aur uss mein tumhaare rab ki taraf se azeem aazmaayish thi.

verses.arabic: وَ اِذْ تَاَذَّنَ رَبُّكُمْ لَىٕنْ شَكَرْتُمْ لَاَزِيْدَنَّكُمْ وَ لَىٕنْ كَفَرْتُمْ اِنَّ عَذَابِيْ لَشَدِيْدٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'iz ta'azzana Rabbukum la'in shakartum la 'azeedannakum wa la'in kafartum 'inna 'azaabee lashadeed.
verses.translation: Aur jab tumhaare rab ne aagah kar diya ke agar tum shukr karoge to yaqeenan main tumhein mazeed dunga aur agar tum kufr karoge to bilaa shubah mera azaab bahut shadeed hai.

verses.arabic: وَ قَالَ مُوْسٰى اِنْ تَكْفُرُوْۤا اَنْتُمْ وَ مَنْ فِي الْاَرْضِ جَمِيْعًا فَاِنَّ اللّٰهَ لَغَنِيٌّ حَمِيْدٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa qaala Moosaaa 'in takfurooo 'antum wa man fil-'ardi jamee'an fa'innal- laaha la-Ghaniyyun Hameed.
verses.translation: Aur Moosa ne kaha: agar tum kufr karoge aur woh sab log bhi jo zameen mein hain to beshk Allah be parwa aur laayiq-e-ta'reef hai¹
verses.deepMeaning: Matlab yeh hai ke insaan Allah ki shukr guzaari karega to usi mein uska faaidah hai. naa shukri karega to Allah ka uss mein kiya nuqsaan hai, woh to be niyaaz hai, saara jahaan naa shukr guzaar ho jaaye to uska kiya bigdega? Jis tarah hadees-e-qudsi mein aata hai 'Allah Ta'ala farmaata hai: aye mere bando! Agar tumhaare awwal aur aakhir aur iss tarah tamaam insaan aur jin uss ek aadmi ki tarah ho jaayein jo tum mein sabse ziyaadah muttaqi aur parhezgaar ho (ya'ni koyi bhi naa farmaan na rahe) to usse meri hukoomat aur baadshaahi mein ezaafah nahin hoga. Aye mere bando! Agar tumhaare awwa- o-aakhir aur tamaam insaan aur jin uss ek aadmi ke dil ki tarah ho jaayein jo tum mein sabse bada naafarmaan aur faajir ho to uss mein meri hukoomat aur baadshaahi mein koyi kami waaqe' nahin hogi. Aye mere bando! Agar tumhaare awwal-o-aakhir aur insaan aur jin sab ek maidaan mein jama' ho jaayein aur mujh se sawaal karein, pas main har insaan ko uske sawaal ke mutaabiq ataa' kardoon to usse meri khazaane aur baadshaahi mein itni hi kami hogi jitni suyi ke samandar mein dubone se samandar mein hoti hai. (Muslim, Albir wassilah, baab tahreemuzzulm, hadees:2577)

verses.arabic: اَلَمْ يَاْتِكُمْ نَبَاُ الَّذِيْنَ مِنْ قَبْلِكُمْ قَوْمِ نُوْحٍ وَّ عَادٍ وَّ ثَمُوْدَ ۛ وَ الَّذِيْنَ مِنْۢ بَعْدِهِمْ ۚ لَا يَعْلَمُهُمْ اِلَّا اللّٰهُ ۚ جَآءَتْهُمْ رُسُلُهُمْ بِالْبَيِّنٰتِ فَرَدُّوْۤا اَيْدِيَهُمْ فِيْۤ اَفْوَاهِهِمْ وَ قَالُوْۤا اِنَّا كَفَرْنَا بِمَآ اُرْسِلْتُمْ بِهٖ وَ اِنَّا لَفِيْ شَكٍّ مِّمَّا تَدْعُوْنَنَاۤ اِلَيْهِ مُرِيْبٍ
verses.transliteration: 'Alam ya'tikum naba'ul-lazeena min qablikum qawmi Noohinw-wa 'Aadiñw-wa Samood, wallazeena mim ba'dihim; laa yalamuhum 'illal-laah; jaaa'athum Rusuluhum bilbayyinaati faraddooo 'aydiyahum feee 'afwaahihim wa qaalooo 'innaa kafarnaa bimaaa 'ursiltum bihee wa 'innaa lafee shakkim-mimmaa tad'oonanaaa 'ilayhi mureeb.
verses.translation: Kiya tumhein unki khabar nahin pahunchi jo tum se pahle the, (ya'ni) qaum-e- Nooh aur Aad aur Samood aur jo unke ba'd huye? Jinhein sirf Allah jaanta hai. unke paas unke Rasool khuli nishaaniyaan laaye to unhon ne apne haath apne munh mein daba liye aur bole: beshak hum use nahin maante jo tumhaare haath bheja gaya hai aur jis cheez ki taraf tum hamein bulaate ho USS mein hamein izteraab mein daalne waala shak hai.

verses.arabic: قَالَتْ رُسُلُهُمْ اَفِي اللّٰهِ شَكٌّ فَاطِرِ السَّمٰوٰتِ وَ الْاَرْضِ ۚ يَدْعُوْكُمْ لِيَغْفِرَ لَكُمْ مِّنْ ذُنُوْبِكُمْ وَ يُؤَخِّرَكُمْ اِلٰٓى اَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى ۭ قَالُوْۤا اِنْ اَنْتُمْ اِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُنَا تُرِيْدُوْنَ اَنْ تَصُدُّوْنَا عَمَّا كَانَ يَعْبُدُ اٰبَآؤُنَا فَاْتُوْنَا بِسُلْطٰنٍ مُّبِيْنٍ
verses.transliteration: Qaalat Rusuluhum 'afil-laahi shakkun faatiris-samaawaati wal'ardi yad'ookum liyaghfira lakum min zunoobikum wa yu'akhkhirakum 'ilaaa 'ajalim-musamтаа; qaalooo 'in 'antum 'illaa basharum-mislunaa tureedoona 'an taşuddoonaa 'ammaa kaana ya budu 'aabaaa'unaa fa'toonaa bisultaanim-mubeen.
verses.translation: Unke Rasoolon ne kaha: kiya (tumhein) uss Allah ki baabat shak hai jo aasmaanon aur zameen ka paida karne waala hai? woh tumhein bulaata hai ke tumhaare gunaah mu'aaf karde aur tumhein ek muqarrar waqt tak mohlat de. woh kane lage: tum hamaare jaise bashar hi to ho, tum chaahte ho ke hamein un (ma'boodon) se rok do jin ki hamaare baap dada ibaadat karte the, lehaaza hamaare paas koyi khuli daleel (mo'jezah) le aao.

verses.arabic: قَالَتْ لَهُمْ رُسُلُهُمْ اِنْ نَّحْنُ اِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُكُمْ وَّ لٰكِنَّ اللّٰهَ يَمُنُّ عَلٰى مَنْ يَّشَآءُ مِنْ عِبَادِهٖ ۚ وَ مَا كَانَ لَنَآ اَنْ نَّاْتِيَكُمْ بِسُلْطٰنٍ اِلَّا بِاِذْنِ اللّٰهِ ۭ وَ عَلَى اللّٰهِ فَلْيَتَوَكَّلِ الْمُؤْمِنُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaalat lahum Rusuluhum 'in nahnu 'illaa basharum-mislukum wa laakinnal-laaha yamunnu 'alaa mañy- yashaaa'u min 'ibaadihee wa maa kaana lanaaa 'an na'tiyakum bisultaanin 'illaa bi'iznil- laah; wa 'alal-laahi falyatawakkalil- mu'minoon.
verses.translation: Unke Rasoolon ne unse kaha: waaqayi' hum tumhaare jaise bashar hi hain lekin Allah apne bandon mein se jise chaahta hai uss par ehsaan karta hai. aur humein yeh ikhtiyaar nahin ke Allah ke hukm ke baghair hum tumhaare paas koyi mo'jizah laa sakein, aur mominon ko Allah hi par bharosah karna chaahiye.

verses.arabic: وَ مَا لَنَآ اَلَّا نَتَوَكَّلَ عَلَى اللّٰهِ وَ قَدْ هَدٰىنَا سُبُلَنَا ۚ وَ لَنَصْبِرَنَّ عَلٰى مَآ اٰذَيْتُمُوْنَا ۭ وَ عَلَى اللّٰهِ فَلْيَتَوَكَّلِ الْمُتَوَكِّلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maa lanaaa 'allaa natawakkala 'alal-laahi wa qad hadaanaa subulanaa; wa lanaşbiranna 'alaa maaa 'aazaytumoonaa; wa 'alal- laahi falyatawakkalil- mutawakkiloon.
verses.translation: Aur hamaare paas kiya uzr hai ke hum Allah par bharosah na karein jab ke woh hamein hamaari raahein dikha chuka hai? aur hum un eizaaon par zaroor sabr karenge jo tum hamein dete ho aur tawakkul karne waalon ko Allah hi par tawakkul karna chaahiye.

verses.arabic: وَ قَالَ الَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا لِرُسُلِهِمْ لَنُخْرِجَنَّكُمْ مِّنْ اَرْضِنَآ اَوْ لَتَعُوْدُنَّ فِيْ مِلَّتِنَا ۚ فَاَوْحٰٓى اِلَيْهِمْ رَبُّهُمْ لَنُهْلِكَنَّ الظّٰلِمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa qaalal-lazeena kafaroo li-Rusulihim lanukhrijannakum min 'ardinaaa 'aw lata'oodunna fee millatinaa fa'awhaaa 'ilayhim Rabbuhum lanuhlikannaz-zalimeen.
verses.translation: Aur kaafiron ne apne Rasoolon se kaha: hum tumhein apni zameen se zaroor nikaal denge ya tum hamaare deen mein laut aao, chunaancheh unke rab ne unki taraf wahi ki ke hum zaalimon ko zaroor halaak kar denge.

verses.arabic: وَ لَنُسْكِنَنَّكُمُ الْاَرْضَ مِنْۢ بَعْدِهِمْ ۭ ذٰلِكَ لِمَنْ خَافَ مَقَامِیْ وَ خَافَ وَعِيْدِ
verses.transliteration: Wa lanuskinan- nakumul-'arda mim ba'dihim; zaalika liman khaafa maqaamee wa khaafa wa'eed.
verses.translation: Aur un ke ba'd hum zaroor tumhein zameen mein iss sar aabaad kareinge yeh (inaam) uske liye hai ke jo mere huzoor khada hone se dara¹ aur meri wayeed se daraa.
verses.deepMeaning: Jis tarah doosre maqaam par farmaya: jo apne rab ke saamne khada hone se dar gaya aur apne nafs ko khaahish se roke rakkha, yaqeenan jannat uska thhekaana hai' (Surah Naazi'aat: 79/40-41) mazeed dekhein (Surah Rahmaan:55/46)

verses.arabic: وَ اسْتَفْتَحُوْا وَ خَابَ كُلُّ جَبَّارٍ عَنِيْدٍ
verses.transliteration: Wastaftahoo wa khaaba kullu jabbaarin 'aneed.
verses.translation: Aur unhon ne fatah maangi aur har sarkash, ziddi naa kaam huwa.

verses.arabic: مِنْ وَّرَآىٕهِ جَهَنَّمُ وَ يُسْقٰى مِنْ مَآءٍ صَدِيْدٍ
verses.transliteration: Minw-waraaa'ihee jahannamu wa yusqaa mim-maaa'in şadeed.
verses.translation: Uske aage jahannam rab hai aur (wahaan) use peep ka paani pilaaya jaayega.

verses.arabic: يَتَجَرَّعُهٗ وَ لَا يَكَادُ يُسِيْغُهٗ وَ يَاْتِيْهِ الْمَوْتُ مِنْ كُلِّ مَكَانٍ وَّ مَا هُوَ بِمَيِّتٍ وَ مِنْ وَّرَآىٕهِ عَذَابٌ غَلِيْظٌ
verses.transliteration: Yatajarra'uhoo wa laa yakaadu yuseeghuhoo wa ya'teehil-mawtu min kulli makaaninw-wa maa huwa bimayyit; wa minw-waraaa'ihee 'azaabun ghaleez.
verses.translation: Jise woh ghont ghont piyega magar halaq se na utaar sakega aur har taraf se maut uski taraf badhegi jab ke woh marega nahin aur uske aage nehaayat sakht azaab hoga.

verses.arabic: مَّثَلُ الَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا بِرَبِّهِمْ ۙ اَعْمَالُهُمْ كَرَمَادِۣ اشْتَدَّتْ بِهِ الرِّيْحُ فِيْ يَوْمٍ عَاصِفٍ ۭ لَا يَقْدِرُوْنَ مِمَّا كَسَبُوْا عَلٰى شَيْءٍ ۭ ذٰلِكَ هُوَ الضَّلٰلُ الْبَعِيْدُ
verses.transliteration: Maşalul-lazeena kafaroo bi-Rabbihim 'a'maaluhum karamaadinish-taddat bihir-reehu fee yawmin 'aaşif; laa yaqdiroona mimmaa kasaboo 'alaa shay'; zaalika huwad- dalaalul-ba'eed.
verses.translation: Jin logon ne apne rab ke saath kufr kiya un ke (nek) a'amaal ki misaal raakh ki si hai jise aandhi ke din zor ki hawa udaa le jaaye, jo kuchh unhon ne kamaaya woh uss par koyi qudrat nahin rakkheinge. Yahi parle darje ki gumraahi hai.

verses.arabic: اَلَمْ تَرَ اَنَّ اللّٰهَ خَلَقَ السَّمٰوٰتِ وَ الْاَرْضَ بِالْحَقِّ ۚ اِنْ يَّشَاْ يُذْهِبْكُمْ وَ يَاْتِ بِخَلْقٍ جَدِيْدٍ
verses.transliteration: 'Alam tara 'annal- laaha khalaqas- samaawaati wal'arda bilhaqq; 'iny-yasha' yuzhibkum wa ya'ti bikhalqin jadeed.
verses.translation: Kiya aapne nahin dekha ke beshak Allah ne aasmaanon aur zameen ko haq ke saath paida kiya. Agar woh chaahe to tumhein le jaaye aur nayi makhlooq le aaye.

verses.arabic: وَ مَا ذٰلِكَ عَلَى اللّٰهِ بِعَزِيْزٍ
verses.transliteration: Wa maa zaalika 'alal- laahi bi'azeez.
verses.translation: Aur Allah ke liye yeh kaam kuchh bhi mushkil nahin.

verses.arabic: وَ بَرَزُوْا لِلّٰهِ جَمِيْعًا فَقَالَ الضُّعَفٰٓؤُا لِلَّذِيْنَ اسْتَكْبَرُوْا اِنَّا كُنَّا لَكُمْ تَبَعًا فَهَلْ اَنْتُمْ مُّغْنُوْنَ عَنَّا مِنْ عَذَابِ اللّٰهِ مِنْ شَيْءٍ ۭ قَالُوْا لَوْ هَدٰىنَا اللّٰهُ لَهَدَيْنٰكُمْ ۭ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيْنَآ اَجَزِعْنَآ اَمْ صَبَرْنَا مَا لَنَا مِنْ مَّحِيْصٍ
verses.transliteration: Wa barazoo lillaahi jamee'an faqaalad- du'afaaa'u lillazeenas- takbarooo 'innaa kunnaa lakum taba'an fahal 'antum mughnoona 'annaa min 'azaabil- laahi min shay'; qaaloo law hadaanal-laahu lahadaynaakum sawaaa'un 'alaynaaa 'ajazi'naaa 'am şabarnaa maa lanaa mim-mahees.
verses.translation: Aur sab log Allah ke saamne khade honge to kamzor log un logon se kahenge jo (dunya mein) takabbur karte the: beshak hum to tumhaare taab'e the, phir kiya tum humse Allah ka kuchh azaab door kar sakte ho? woh kahenge: agar Allah hamein hidaayat deta to hum zaroor tumhein hidaayat karte. Ab hamaare liye baraabar hai khaah hum royein peetein ya sabr karein, hamaare liye bhaaghne ki koyi jagah nahin.

verses.arabic: وَ قَالَ الشَّيْطٰنُ لَمَّا قُضِيَ الْاَمْرُ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ وَعَدَكُمْ وَعْدَ الْحَقِّ وَ وَعَدْتُّكُمْ فَاَخْلَفْتُكُمْ ۚ وَ مَا كَانَ لِيَ عَلَيْكُمْ مِّنْ سُلْطٰنٍ اِلَّاۤ اَنْ دَعَوْتُكُمْ فَاسْتَجَبْتُمْ لِيْ ۚ فَلَا تَلُوْمُوْنِيْ وَ لُوْمُوْۤا اَنْفُسَكُمْ ۭ مَآ اَنَا۠ بِمُصْرِخِكُمْ وَ مَآ اَنْتُمْ بِمُصْرِخِيَّ اِنِّيْ كَفَرْتُ بِمَآ اَشْرَكْتُمُوْنِ مِنْ قَبْلُ ۭ اِنَّ الظّٰلِمِيْنَ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ اَلِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa qaalash- Shaytaanu lammaa qudiyal-'amru 'innal- laaha wa'adakum wa'dal-haqqi wa wa'attukum fa'akhlaftukum wa maa kaana liya 'alaykum min sultaanin 'illaaa 'an da'awtukum fastajabtum lee falaa taloomoonee wa loomooo 'anfusakum maaa 'ana bimuşrikhikum wa maaa 'antum bimuşrikhiyya 'innee kafartu bimaaa 'ashraktumooni min qabl; 'innaz-zaalimeena lahum 'azaabun 'aleem.
verses.translation: Aur jab faislah chuka diya jaayega to shaytaan kahega: beshak Allah ne tumse sachcha wa'dah kiya tha aur main ne tumse wa'dah kiya tha uski main ne khilaaf warzi ki aur mera tum par koyi zor na tha magar yeh ke main ne tumhein da'wat di to tum ne meri baat maan li, chunaancheh tum mujhe malaamat na karo apne aapko malaamat karo. Main tumhaara faryaad ras nahin aur na tum mere faryaad ras ho. bilaa shubah main to uska inkaar karta hoon jo tum isse pahle mujhe (Allah ka) shareek thhahraate the beshak zaalimon ke liye dardnaak 'azaab hai.

verses.arabic: وَ اُدْخِلَ الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا وَ عَمِلُوا الصّٰلِحٰتِ جَنّٰتٍ تَجْرِيْ مِنْ تَحْتِهَا الْاَنْهٰرُ خٰلِدِيْنَ فِيْهَا بِاِذْنِ رَبِّهِمْ ۚ تَحِيَّتُهُمْ فِيْهَا سَلٰمٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'udkhilal-lazeena 'aamanoo wa 'amilus- saalihaati Jannaatin tajree min tahtihal- 'anhaaru khaalideena feehaa bi'izni Rabbihim tahiyyatuhum feeha salaam.
verses.translation: Aur jo log eemaan laaye aur unhon ne nek amal kiye woh aisi jannaton mein daakhil kiye jaayenge jinke neeche nahrein jaari hongi, woh apne rab ke ejaazat se hameshah wahaan rahenge. Wahaan unki (mulaqaat ki) dua' 'Salaam' hogi.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Mulaahazah ho haashyah (Surah Nisa:4/86)

verses.arabic: اَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ ضَرَبَ اللّٰهُ مَثَلًا كَلِمَةً طَيِّبَةً كَشَجَرَةٍ طَيِّبَةٍ اَصْلُهَا ثَابِتٌ وَّ فَرْعُهَا فِي السَّمَآءِ
verses.transliteration: 'Alam tara kayfa darabal-laahu masalan kalimatan tayyibatan kashajaratin tayyibatin 'aşluhaa saabituñw-wa far'uhaa fis-samaaa'.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) kiya aapne dekha nahin Allah ne kaise misaal bayaan ki kalma-e- tayyebah (Islam) ki ke woh ek paakeezah darakht ki tarah hai, uski jad mazboot hai aur uski shaakhein aasmaan mein hain.

verses.arabic: تُؤْتِيْۤ اُكُلَهَا كُلَّ حِيْنٍۢ بِاِذْنِ رَبِّهَا ۭ وَ يَضْرِبُ اللّٰهُ الْاَمْثَالَ لِلنَّاسِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَذَكَّرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Tu'teee 'ukulahaa kulla heenim bi'izni Rabbihaa; wa yadribul- laahul-'amsaala lin- naasi la allahum yatazakkaroon.
verses.translation: Woh har waqt par apne rab ke hukm se phal laata hai aur Allah logon ke liye misaalein bayaan karta hai take woh naseehat pakdein.

verses.arabic: وَ مَثَلُ كَلِمَةٍ خَبِيْثَةٍ كَشَجَرَةٍ خَبِيْثَةٍ اجْتُثَّتْ مِنْ فَوْقِ الْاَرْضِ مَا لَهَا مِنْ قَرَارٍ
verses.transliteration: Wa masalu kalimatin khabeesatin kashajaratin khabeesatinij-tussat min fawqil-'ardi maa lahaa min qaraar.
verses.translation: Aur kalma-e-khabeesah (kufr-o-shirk) ki misaal ek khabees darakht ki si hai ke use zameen par se ukhaad diya jaaye, uske liye koyi qaraar nahin.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Kalma-e- khabeesah se muraad kufr aur shajra-e-khabeesah se Hanzal ka darakht muraad hai jis ki jad zameen ke oupar hi hoti hai aur zara se ishaare se ukhad jaati hai ya'ni kaafir ke a'amaal bilkul be haisyat hain, na woh aasmaan par chadhte hain na Allah ki baargaah mein woh qubooliyat ka darjah paate hain.

verses.arabic: يُثَبِّتُ اللّٰهُ الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا بِالْقَوْلِ الثَّابِتِ فِي الْحَيٰوةِ الدُّنْيَا وَ فِي الْاٰخِرَةِ ۚ وَ يُضِلُّ اللّٰهُ الظّٰلِمِيْنَ ۚ وَ يَفْعَلُ اللّٰهُ مَا يَشَآءُ
verses.transliteration: Yusabbitul-laahul- lazeena 'aamanoo bilqawlis-saabiti fil-hayaatid-dunyaa wa-fil' 'Aakhirati wa yudillul- laahuz-zaalimeen; wa yafalul-laahu maa yashaaa'.
verses.translation: Allah eemaan waalon ko qaul-e- saabit (kalma-e- tauheed) se dunya ki zindagi aur aakhirat mein saabit qadam rakhta hai¹ aur Allah zaalimon ko gumraah kar deta hai aur Allah jo chaahe karta hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Ya'ni maut ke fauran ba'd (unki qabron mein) jab farishte 'munkar' aur 'Nakeer' unse yeh teen sawaal kareinge: ⓵ tera rab kaun hai? ⓶ tera deen kiya hai? ⓷ tum uss aadmi (Muhammad ﷺ) ke baare mein, jise tumhaari taraf bheja gaya tha, kiya kahte ho? eemaan waale sahih jawaab deinge: ⓵ Allah mera rab hai ⓶ mera deen islam hai ⓷ yeh shakhs Muhammad ﷺ Allah ke Rasool hain, aur jo hamaare paas waazeh nishaaniyaan le kar aaye aur hum un par eemaan laaye. Jab ke gunaah gaar jo hazrat Muhammad ﷺ par eemaan nahin rakhte in sawaalon ke sahih jawaab na de sakenge. Mazeed mulaahazah ho haashyah: (Surah Anaam:6/93 aur surah Aal-e-Imran:3/85)

verses.arabic: اَلَمْ تَرَ اِلَى الَّذِيْنَ بَدَّلُوْا نِعْمَتَ اللّٰهِ كُفْرًا وَّ اَحَلُّوْا قَوْمَهُمْ دَارَ الْبَوَارِ
verses.transliteration: 'Alam tara 'ilal- lazeena baddaloo ni'matal-laahi kufrañw- wa 'ahalloo qawmahum daaral-bawaar.
verses.translation: Kiya Aapne dekha nahin un logon ko jinhon ne Allah ki ne'mat (eemaan) ko kufr se badal daala aur apni qaum ko halaakat ke ghar mein le jaa utaara?

verses.arabic: جَهَنَّمَ ۚ يَصْلَوْنَهَا ۚ وَ بِئْسَ الْقَرَارُ
verses.transliteration: Jahannama yaşlawnahaa wa bi'sal- qaraar.
verses.translation: (Ya'ni) jahannam mein, woh uss mein daakhil honge aur woh bad tareen thhikaana hai.

verses.arabic: وَ جَعَلُوْا لِلّٰهِ اَنْدَادًا لِّيُضِلُّوْا عَنْ سَبِيْلِهٖ ۭ قُلْ تَمَتَّعُوْا فَاِنَّ مَصِيْرَكُمْ اِلَى النَّارِ
verses.transliteration: Wa ja'aloo lillaahi 'andaadal-liyudilloo 'an sabeelih; qul tamatta'oo fa'inna mașeerakum 'ilan-Naar.
verses.translation: Aur unhon ne Allah ke shareek banaa rakkhe hain taake woh (logon ko) uske raaste se bhatkaa dein, kah deejiye: faaidah uthhao, (dunya mein) phir yaqeenan tumhaari waapsi aag ki taraf hai.

verses.arabic: قُلْ لِّعِبَادِيَ الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا يُقِيْمُوا الصَّلٰوةَ وَ يُنْفِقُوْا مِمَّا رَزَقْنٰهُمْ سِرًّا وَّ عَلَانِيَةً مِّنْ قَبْلِ اَنْ يَّاْتِيَ يَوْمٌ لَّا بَيْعٌ فِيْهِ وَ لَا خِلٰلٌ
verses.transliteration: Qul-li'ibaadiyal- lazeena 'aamanoo yuqeemuş-Şalaata wa yunfiqoo mimmaa razaqnaahum sirrañw- wa 'alaaniyatam-min qabli 'any-ya'tiya Yawmul-laa bay'un feehi wa laa khilaal.
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: mere un bandon se jo eemaan laaye ke woh namaaz qaayem karein aur hum ne unhein jo rizq diya hai uss mein se chhupa kar aur e'laaniyah kharch karein, usse pahle ke woh din aaye jis mein na sauda baazi hogi na dosti (kaam aayegi)

verses.arabic: اَللّٰهُ الَّذِيْ خَلَقَ السَّمٰوٰتِ وَ الْاَرْضَ وَ اَنْزَلَ مِنَ السَّمَآءِ مَآءً فَاَخْرَجَ بِهٖ مِنَ الثَّمَرٰتِ رِزْقًا لَّكُمْ وَ سَخَّرَ لَكُمُ الْفُلْكَ لِتَجْرِيَ فِي الْبَحْرِ بِاَمْرِهٖ وَ سَخَّرَ لَكُمُ الْاَنْهٰرَ
verses.transliteration: 'Allaahul-lazee khalaqas-samaawaati wal'arda wa 'anzala minas-samaaa'i maaa'an fa'akhraja bihee minas- samaraati rizqal-lakum wa sakhkhara lakumul-fulka litajriya fil-bahri bi'amrihee wa sakhkharalakumul- 'anhaar.
verses.translation: Allah woh hai jisne aasmaanon aur zameen ko paida kiya aur aasmaan se paani naazil kiya phir uss (paani) ke zariye' se tumhaare liye bataur rizq phal paida kiye aur tumhaare liye kashtiyaan musakhkhar kin taake samandar mein uske hukm se chalein aur tumhaare liye dariya musakkhar kiya.

verses.arabic: وَ سَخَّرَ لَكُمُ الشَّمْسَ وَ الْقَمَرَ دَآىٕبَيْنِ وَ سَخَّرَ لَكُمُ الَّيْلَ وَ النَّهَارَ
verses.transliteration: Wa sakh- kharalakumush-shamsa walqamara daaa'ibayni wa sakhkhara-lakumul- layla wannahaar.
verses.translation: Aur tumhaare liye suraj aur chaand musakkhar kiye jo musalsal chal rahe hain aur tumhaare liye raat aur din ko musakhkhar kiya.

verses.arabic: وَ اٰتٰىكُمْ مِّنْ كُلِّ مَا سَاَلْتُمُوْهُ ۭ وَ اِنْ تَعُدُّوْا نِعْمَتَ اللّٰهِ لَا تُحْصُوْهَا ۭ اِنَّ الْاِنْسَانَ لَظَلُوْمٌ كَفَّارٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'aataakum min kulli maa sa'altumooh; wa 'in ta'uddoo ni'matal- laahi laa tuhsoohaa; 'innal-'insaana lazaloomun kaffaar.
verses.translation: Aur tumhein har woh cheez di jo tumne usse maangi aur agar tum Allah ki ne'matein gino to unhein shumaar na kar sakoge. Beshak insaan bada zaalim, nehaayat na shukra hai.

verses.arabic: وَ اِذْ قَالَ اِبْرٰهِيْمُ رَبِّ اجْعَلْ هٰذَا الْبَلَدَ اٰمِنًا وَّ اجْنُبْنِيْ وَ بَنِيَّ اَنْ نَّعْبُدَ الْاَصْنَامَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'iz qaala Ibraaheemu Rabbij-'al haazal-balada 'aaminanw-wajnubnee wa baniyya 'an na'budal-'aşnaam.
verses.translation: Aur jab Ibraheem ne kaha: aye mere rab! iss shahar (Makkah) ko aman waala bana de aur mujhe aur meri aulaad ko but parasti se bachaaye rakhna.

verses.arabic: رَبِّ اِنَّهُنَّ اَضْلَلْنَ كَثِيْرًا مِّنَ النَّاسِ ۚ فَمَنْ تَبِعَنِيْ فَاِنَّهٗ مِنِّيْ ۚ وَ مَنْ عَصَانِيْ فَاِنَّكَ غَفُوْرٌ رَّحِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: Rabbi 'innahunna 'adlalna kaseeram- minan-naasi faman tabi'anee fa'innahoo minnee wa man 'aşaanee fa'innaka Ghafoorur-Raheem.
verses.translation: Aye mere rab! Beshak unhon ne bahut se log gumraah kiye hain phir jo mera itteba' kare to yaqeenan woh mera hai aur jo meri naafarmaani kare bilaashubah tu ghafoorur- Raheem hai.

verses.arabic: رَبَّنَآ اِنِّيْۤ اَسْكَنْتُ مِنْ ذُرِّيَّتِيْ بِوَادٍ غَيْرِ ذِيْ زَرْعٍ عِنْدَ بَيْتِكَ الْمُحَرَّمِ ۙ رَبَّنَا لِيُقِيْمُوا الصَّلٰوةَ فَاجْعَلْ اَفْــٕدَةً مِّنَ النَّاسِ تَهْوِيْۤ اِلَيْهِمْ وَ ارْزُقْهُمْ مِّنَ الثَّمَرٰتِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَشْكُرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Rabbanaaa 'inneee 'askantu min zurriyyatee biwaadin ghayri zee zar'in 'inda Baytikal- Muharrami Rabbanaa liyuqeemuş-Şalaata faj'al 'af'idatam-minan-naasi tahweee 'ilayhim warzuqhum- minas-samaraati la'allahum yashkuroon
verses.translation: Aye hamaare rab! Beshak main ne apni kuchh aulaad ek be zaraa'at waadi mein basaayi hai tere mohtaram ghar (ka'be) ke paas¹, aye hamaare rab! Taake woh namaaz qaayem karein, chunaancheh tu ba'z logon ke dil unki taraf maayel hone waale karde aur unhein har qsim ke phalon se rizq de taake woh (tera) shukr karein.
verses.deepMeaning: Yeh ishaarah hai uss waaqiye' ki taraf jo ibne Abbaas  رضي الله عنها ki hadees mein mazkoor hai: Ibaraheem عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام ne Ismayeel aur unki waalidah ko jo abhi Ismayeel ko doodh pilaati thin, baitullah ke qareeb zamzam ke paas laa kar aabaad kiya aur un donon ke paas ek thaile mein khujoorein aur ek mashkeeze mein paani rakh diya, uss waqt Makkah Mukarramah mein koyi insaani aabaadi thi na paani tha. Jab Ibraheem un donon ko chhod kar waapas jaane lage to Haajirah ke arz karne par Ibraheem عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام ne farmaya: 'Mujhe Allah Ta'ala ne yahi hukm diya hai'. jab yeh khujoorein aur paani khatm ho gaya to Haajirah عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام ne paani ki talaash mein safa wa marwah ke darmiyaan izteraar ke aalam mein chakkar lagaaye. Bil aakhir Allah ke hukm se ek farishte ne iss maqaam par apni aedi ya par maara, jis se zamzam ka chashmah jaari ho gaya, phir paani ki wajah se yahaan qabeelah (jurham) bhi aabaad ho gaya. (Mulkhas az sahih Bukhari, Ahaadeesul Amiya, Baab:9 Hadees:3364)

verses.arabic: رَبَّنَاۤ اِنَّكَ تَعْلَمُ مَا نُخْفِيْ وَ مَا نُعْلِنُ ۚ وَ مَا يَخْفٰى عَلَى اللّٰهِ مِنْ شَيْءٍ فِي الْاَرْضِ وَ لَا فِي السَّمَآءِ
verses.transliteration: Rabbanaaa 'innaka talamu maa nukhfee wa maa nuʻlin; wa maa yakhfaa 'alal-laahi min shay'in fil-'ardi wa laa fis-samaaa.
verses.translation: Aye hamaare rab! Beshak tu sab kuchh jaanta hai jo hum chhupaate hain aur jo zaahir karte hain. aur zameen-o-aasmaan mein koyi cheez Allah se makhfi nahin.

verses.arabic: اَلْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ الَّذِيْ وَهَبَ لِيْ عَلَى الْكِبَرِ اِسْمٰعِيْلَ وَ اِسْحٰقَ ۭ اِنَّ رَبِّيْ لَسَمِيْعُ الدُّعَآءِ
verses.transliteration: 'Alhamdu lillaahil- lazee wahaba lee 'alal- kibari 'Ismaa'eela wa 'Ishaaq; 'inna Rabbee 'lasamee'ud-du'aaa.
verses.translation: Tamaam Ta'reefein Allah ke liye hain jis ne mujhe budhaape mein Ismayeel aur Ishaaq ataa farmaaye, beshak mera rab khoob dua' sunta hai

verses.arabic: رَبِّ اجْعَلْنِيْ مُقِيْمَ الصَّلٰوةِ وَ مِنْ ذُرِّيَّتِيْ ۚ رَبَّنَا وَ تَقَبَّلْ دُعَآءِ
verses.transliteration: Rabbij-'alnee muqeemaş-Şalaati wa min zurriyyatee Rabbanaa wa taqabbal du'aaa.
verses.translation: Aye mere rab! Mujhe aur meri aulaad ko bhi namaaz qaayem karne wala bana. Aye hamaare rab! Aur meri dua' qubool farma.

verses.arabic: رَبَّنَا اغْفِرْ لِيْ وَ لِوَالِدَيَّ وَ لِلْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ يَوْمَ يَقُوْمُ الْحِسَابُ
verses.transliteration: Rabbanagh-fir lee wa liwaalidayya wa lilmu'mineena Yawma yaqoomul-hisaab.
verses.translation: Aye hamaare rab! Jis din hisaab qaayem hoga uss din mujhe, mere waaledain ko aur tamaam mominon ko mu'aaf farmaana.

verses.arabic: وَ لَا تَحْسَبَنَّ اللّٰهَ غَافِلًا عَمَّا يَعْمَلُ الظّٰلِمُوْنَ ۭ اِنَّمَا يُؤَخِّرُهُمْ لِيَوْمٍ تَشْخَصُ فِيْهِ الْاَبْصَارُ
verses.transliteration: Wa laa tahsabannal- laaha ghaafilan 'ammaa ya maluz-zaalimoon; 'innamaa yu'akhkhiruhum li-Yawmin tashkhaşu feehil-'absaar.
verses.translation: Aur (Aye Nabi!) aap mat khayaal karein ke Allah un kaamon se ghaafil hai jo zaalim karte hain, woh to unhein sirf uss din tak mohlat deta hai jis mein aankhein phati ki phati rah jaayengi

verses.arabic: مُهْطِعِيْنَ مُقْنِعِيْ رُءُوْسِهِمْ لَا يَرْتَدُّ اِلَيْهِمْ طَرْفُهُمْ وَ اَفْــٕدَتُهُمْ هَوَآءٌ
verses.transliteration: Muhți'eena muqni'ee ru'oosihim laa yartaddu 'ilayhim tarfuhum wa 'af'idatuhum hawaaa'.
verses.translation: Woh apne sar uthhaaye (mahshar ki taraf) daud rahe honge, unki nigaah apni taraf bhi na phir sakegi aur unke dil (khauf se) ude jaarahe honge

verses.arabic: وَ اَنْذِرِ النَّاسَ يَوْمَ يَاْتِيْهِمُ الْعَذَابُ فَيَقُوْلُ الَّذِيْنَ ظَلَمُوْا رَبَّنَآ اَخِّرْنَآ اِلٰٓى اَجَلٍ قَرِيْبٍ نُجِبْ دَعْوَتَكَ وَ نَتَّبِعِ الرُّسُلَ ۭ اَوَ لَمْ تَكُوْنُوْۤا اَقْسَمْتُمْ مِّنْ قَبْلُ مَا لَكُمْ مِّنْ زَوَالٍ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'anzirin-naasa Yawma ya'teehimul-'azaabu fayaqoolul-lazeena zalamoo Rabbanaaa 'akhkhirnaaa 'ilaaa Pajalin qareebin-nujib da'wataka wa nattabi'ir-Rusul; 'awalam takoonooo 'aqsamtum min qablu maa lakum min zawaal.
verses.translation: Aur (aye Nabi!) logon ko uss din se khabar daar kardein jab unhein azaab aa lega to zaalim kahenge: aye hamaare rab! Hamein thodi muddat tak mohlat de (taake) hum teri da'wat qubool karein aur Rasoolon ka itteba' karein. (unse kahaa jaayega) kiya tum isse pahle qasmein nahin khaate the ke tumhaare liye koyi zawaal nahin?

verses.arabic: وَ سَكَنْتُمْ فِيْ مَسٰكِنِ الَّذِيْنَ ظَلَمُوْۤا اَنْفُسَهُمْ وَ تَبَيَّنَ لَكُمْ كَيْفَ فَعَلْنَا بِهِمْ وَ ضَرَبْنَا لَكُمُ الْاَمْثَالَ
verses.transliteration: Wa sakantum fee masaakinil-lazeena zalamooo 'anfusahum wa tabayyana lakum kayfa fa'alnaa bihim wa darabnaa lakumul- 'amsaal.
verses.translation: Aur tum un logon ki bastiyon mein aabaad the jinhon ne apne aap par zulm kiya tha aur tum par waazeh ho chuka tha ke humne un se kiya sulook kiya tha, aur humne tumhaare liye misaalein bayaan ki thin.

verses.arabic: وَ قَدْ مَكَرُوْا مَكْرَهُمْ وَ عِنْدَ اللّٰهِ مَكْرُهُمْ وَ اِنْ كَانَ مَكْرُهُمْ لِتَزُوْلَ مِنْهُ الْجِبَالُ
verses.transliteration: Wa qad makaroo makrahum wa 'indal- laahi makruhum wa 'in kaana makruhum litazoola minhul-jibaal
verses.translation: Aur yaqeenan woh apni chaalein chal chuke aur unki sab chaalein Allah ki nazar mein hain aur unki chaalein aisi na thi ke unki wajah se pahaad hil jaate.

verses.arabic: فَلَا تَحْسَبَنَّ اللّٰهَ مُخْلِفَ وَعْدِهٖ رُسُلَهٗ ۭ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ عَزِيْزٌ ذُو انْتِقَامٍ
verses.transliteration: Falaa tahsabannal- laaha mukhlifa wa'dihee Rusulah; 'innal-laaha 'azeezun zun-tiqaam.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh aap hargiz khayaal na karein ke Allah apne Rasoolon se wa'dah khilaafi karega. Beshak Allah Ghalib hai, inteqaam lene waala.

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ تُبَدَّلُ الْاَرْضُ غَيْرَ الْاَرْضِ وَ السَّمٰوٰتُ وَ بَرَزُوْا لِلّٰهِ الْوَاحِدِ الْقَهَّارِ
verses.transliteration: Yawma tubaddalul- 'ardu ghayral-'ardi wassamaawaatu wa barazoo lillaahil- Waahidil-Qahhaar.
verses.translation: Jis din yeh zameen doosri zameen se badal di jaayegi, aur aasmaan bhi¹ aur log Allah, waahid, qahar waale ke saamne khade honge
verses.deepMeaning: Imam Shaukaani  رضي الله عنه farmaate hain ke aayat mein donon ehtemaal hain ke yeh tabdeeli sifaat ke lehaaz se ho ya zaat ke lehaaz se. ya'ni yeh aasmaan aur zameen apne sifaat ke e'tebaar se badal jaayenge ya waise hi zaati taur par yeh tabdeeli aayegi, na yeh zameen rahegi na yeh aasmaan. Zameen bhi koyi aur hogi aur aasmaan bhi koyi aur. Hadees mein hai: 'qiyaamat waale din log safed bhuri zameen par ekhatthhe honge jo medah ki roti ki tarah hogi. Uss mein kisi ka koyi jhanda nahin hoga. (Sahih Muslim, Sifaatul Munaafiqeen, Baab fil ba'si wannushoor. Hadees:2790)

verses.arabic: وَ تَرَى الْمُجْرِمِيْنَ يَوْمَىٕذٍ مُّقَرَّنِيْنَ فِي الْاَصْفَادِ
verses.transliteration: Wa taral-mujrimeena Yawma'izim muqarraneena fil- 'asfaad.
verses.translation: Aur uss din aap tamaam mujrim zanjeeron mein jakde huye dekhenge.

verses.arabic: سَرَابِيْلُهُمْ مِّنْ قَطِرَانٍ وَّ تَغْشٰى وُجُوْهَهُمُ النَّارُ
verses.transliteration: 50. Saraabeeluhum min qatiraaninw-wa taghshaa wujoohahumun-Naar.
verses.translation: 50. Unke kurte gandhak ke honge, aur aag unke chehron ko dhaanpti hogi

verses.arabic: لِيَجْزِيَ اللّٰهُ كُلَّ نَفْسٍ مَّا كَسَبَتْ ۭ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ سَرِيْعُ الْحِسَابِ
verses.transliteration: Liyajziyal-laahu kulla nafsim-maa kasabat; 'innal-laaha saree'ul-hisaab.
verses.translation: Taake Allah har nafs ko (uss amal ki) jazaa de jo usne kamaya. Beshak Allah bahut jald hisaab lene aala hai.

verses.arabic: هٰذَا بَلٰغٌ لِّلنَّاسِ وَ لِيُنْذَرُوْا بِهٖ وَ لِيَعْلَمُوْۤا اَنَّمَا هُوَ اِلٰهٌ وَّاحِدٌ وَّ لِيَذَّكَّرَ اُولُوا الْاَلْبَابِ
verses.transliteration: Haazaa balaaghul- linnaasi wa liyunzaroo bihee wa liyaʻlamooo 'annamaa Huwa 'Ilaahuñw- Waahiduñw-wa liyazzakkara 'ulul- 'albaab.
verses.translation: Yeh (qur'an) logon ke liye ek paighaam hai taake uske zariye' se unhein daraaya jaaye aur taake unhein ma'loom ho jaaye ke beshak wahi (Allah) ma'bood waahid hai aur taake aqal mand naseehat haasil karein.

verses.arabic: الٓرٰ ۚ تِلْكَ اٰيٰتُ الْكِتٰبِ وَ قُرْاٰنٍ مُّبِيْنٍ
verses.transliteration: 'Alif-Laaam-Raa; tilka 'Aayaatul-Kitaabi wa Qur'aanim-Mubeen.
verses.translation: Alif laaam raa, yeh aayaat hain kitab aur qur'an mubeen ki.

verses.arabic: رُّبَمَا يَوَدُّ الَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا لَوْ كَانُوْا مُسْلِمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Rubamaa yawaddul- lazeena kafaroo law kaanoo muslimeen.
verses.translation: Kisi waqt kafir chaahenge kaash ke woh musalmaan hote.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Mulaahazah ho haashyah (Surah Aal-e-Imran:3/85)

verses.arabic: ذَرْهُمْ يَاْكُلُوْا وَ يَتَمَتَّعُوْا وَ يُلْهِهِمُ الْاَمَلُ ۖ فَسَوْفَ يَعْلَمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Zarhum ya'kuloo wa yatamatta'oo wa yulhihimul-'amalu fasawfa ya'lamoon.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) unhein chhod deejiye, woh khayein (piyein) aur maze karein, aur (jhooti) ummeed unhein ghaflat mein dale rakkhe, phir jald unko ma'loom ho jaayega

verses.arabic: وَ مَاۤ اَهْلَكْنَا مِنْ قَرْيَةٍ اِلَّا وَ لَهَا كِتَابٌ مَّعْلُوْمٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa maaa 'ahlaknaa min qaryatin 'illaa wa lahaa kitaabum-maloom
verses.translation: Aur humne jis basti ko bhi halaak kiya hai uss (ki tabaahi) ke liye mee'aad muqarrar thi.

verses.arabic: مَا تَسْبِقُ مِنْ اُمَّةٍ اَجَلَهَا وَ مَا يَسْتَاْخِرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Maa tasbiqu min 'ummatin 'ajalahaa wa maa yasta'khiroon.
verses.translation: Koyi ummat apne (muqararr) waqt se na aage nikal sakti hai aur na peechhe rah sakti hai

verses.arabic: وَ قَالُوْا يٰۤاَيُّهَا الَّذِيْ نُزِّلَ عَلَيْهِ الذِّكْرُ اِنَّكَ لَمَجْنُوْنٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa qaaloo yaaa ayyuhal-lazee nuzzila 'alayhiz-Zikru 'innaka lamajnoon.
verses.translation: Aur unhon ne kaha: aye woh shakhs! Jis par yeh zikr (qur'an naazil kiya gaya hai, yaqeenan tu to majnoon hai.

verses.arabic: لَوْ مَا تَاْتِيْنَا بِالْمَلٰٓىٕكَةِ اِنْ كُنْتَ مِنَ الصّٰدِقِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Law maa ta'teenaa bilmalaaa'ikati 'in kunta minaş-şaadiqeen.
verses.translation: Tu hamaare paas farishte kyun nahin le aata agar tu sachchon mein se hai?

verses.arabic: مَا نُنَزِّلُ الْمَلٰٓىٕكَةَ اِلَّا بِالْحَقِّ وَ مَا كَانُوْۤا اِذًا مُّنْظَرِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Maa nunazzilul- malaaa'ikata 'illaa bilhaqqi wa maa kaanooo izam- Munzareen
verses.translation: Farishte to hum sirf haq (azaab) ke saath naazil karte hain aur phir uss waqt un (kuffaar) ko dheel nahin di jaati.

verses.arabic: اِنَّا نَحْنُ نَزَّلْنَا الذِّكْرَ وَ اِنَّا لَهٗ لَحٰفِظُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Innaa Nahnu nazzalnaz-Zikra wa 'Innaa lahoo lahaafizoon.
verses.translation: Beshak hum hi ne yeh qur'an naazil kiya aur beshak hum hi uske muhaafiz hain.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Qur'an kareem ki yeh aayat Bani Aadam ke liye ek challaing hai aur har ek iss baat ka paaband hai ke woh qur'an hakeem ke mo'jizaat par eemaan laaye. Yeh ek waazeh haqeeqat hai ke 1400 saal se bhi zaayed arsah guzar jaane ke baawajood qur'an hakeem ke kisi ek harf mein bhi koyi tabdeeli nahin huyi, agarcheh kuffaar-o-munkireen ne iss kitab mein tahreef-o-tabdeeli ki intehaayi koshishein keen, lekin woh apni koshishon mein buri tarah naakaam rahe jaisa ke iss aayat mein farmaya gaya hai: 'hum iski hifaazat karenge.' Allah ki qasam! Uss (Allah) ne iski hifaazat ki hai jabke iske bar'aks deegar aasmaani kutub (tauraat aur Injeel waghairah) ko unke asal matan mein kami wa beshi, hazf-o-ezaafah aur taghayyur-o-tabaddul karke bigaad kar rakh diya gaya hai.

verses.arabic: وَ لَقَدْ اَرْسَلْنَا مِنْ قَبْلِكَ فِيْ شِيَعِ الْاَوَّلِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad 'arsalnaa min qablika fee shiya'il- 'awwaleen.
verses.translation: Aur yaqeenan aapse pahle hum kayi girohon mein Rasool bhej chuke hain.

verses.arabic: وَ مَا يَاْتِيْهِمْ مِّنْ رَّسُوْلٍ اِلَّا كَانُوْا بِهٖ يَسْتَهْزِءُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maa ya'teehim- mir-Rasoolin 'illaa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon.
verses.translation: Aur unke paas jo bhi Rasool aaya woh usse mazaaq karte the.

verses.arabic: كَذٰلِكَ نَسْلُكُهٗ فِيْ قُلُوْبِ الْمُجْرِمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Kazaalika naslukuhoo fee quloobil- mujrimeen.
verses.translation: Hum isi tarah mujrimon ke dilon mein hansi mazaaq daalte hain.

verses.arabic: لَا يُؤْمِنُوْنَ بِهٖ وَ قَدْ خَلَتْ سُنَّةُ الْاَوَّلِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Laa yu'minoona bihee wa qad khalat sunnatul- 'awwaleen.
verses.translation: Woh iss (qur'an) par eemaan nahin laate aur (yahi) pahle logon ka tareeqah guzar chuka hai.

verses.arabic: وَ لَوْ فَتَحْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ بَابًا مِّنَ السَّمَآءِ فَظَلُّوْا فِيْهِ يَعْرُجُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa law fatahnaa 'alayhim baabam-minas- samaaa'i fazalloo feehi ya'rujoon.
verses.translation: Aur agar hun un par aasmaan se ek darwaazah khol dein, phir woh uss mein chadhne lagein.

verses.arabic: لَقَالُوْا اِنَّمَا سُكِّرَتْ اَبْصَارُنَا بَلْ نَحْنُ قَوْمٌ مَّسْحُوْرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Laqaalooo 'innamaa sukkirat 'absaarunaa bal nahnu qawmит- mashooroon.
verses.translation: To bhi woh yahi kahenge ke hamaari to nazrein hi band kardi gayi hain balke hum logon par jaadu huwa hai..

verses.arabic: وَ لَقَدْ جَعَلْنَا فِي السَّمَآءِ بُرُوْجًا وَّ زَيَّنّٰهَا لِلنّٰظِرِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad ja'alnaa fis- samaaa'i buroojañw-wa zayyannaahaa linnaazireen.
verses.translation: Aur yaqeenan humne aasmaan mein burj banaaye aur unhein naazireen ke liye zeenat di.

verses.arabic: وَ حَفِظْنٰهَا مِنْ كُلِّ شَيْطٰنٍ رَّجِيْمٍ
verses.transliteration: Wa hafiznaahaa min kulli Shaytaanir-rajeem
verses.translation: Aur humne unhein har shaitaan mardood se mahfooz rakhkha.

verses.arabic: اِلَّا مَنِ اسْتَرَقَ السَّمْعَ فَاَتْبَعَهٗ شِهَابٌ مُّبِيْنٌ
verses.transliteration: 'Illaa manis-taraqas- sam'a fa'atba'ahoo shihaabum-mubeen
verses.translation: Magar jo chori chhupe sune to chamakta shehaab (dahakat sho'la) uska peechha karta hai.

verses.arabic: وَ الْاَرْضَ مَدَدْنٰهَا وَ اَلْقَيْنَا فِيْهَا رَوَاسِيَ وَ اَنْۢبَتْنَا فِيْهَا مِنْ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ مَّوْزُوْنٍ
verses.transliteration: Wal'arda madadnaahaa wa 'alqaynaa feehaa rawaasiya wa 'ambatnaa feehaa min kulli shay'im- mawzoon.
verses.translation: Aur humne zameen phailaadi aur USS mein pahaad gaad diye aur uss mein har cheez munaasib miqdaar mein ugaayi.

verses.arabic: وَ جَعَلْنَا لَكُمْ فِيْهَا مَعَايِشَ وَ مَنْ لَّسْتُمْ لَهٗ بِرَازِقِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa ja'alnaa lakum feehaa ma'aayisha wa mal-lastum lahoo biraaziqeen.
verses.translation: Aur humne tumhaare liye zameen mein ma'aash rakh di aur unke liye bhi jin ke raaziq tum nahin ho.

verses.arabic: وَ اِنْ مِّنْ شَيْءٍ اِلَّا عِنْدَنَا خَزَآىٕنُهٗ وَ مَا نُنَزِّلُهٗۤ اِلَّا بِقَدَرٍ مَّعْلُوْمٍ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'im-min shay'in 'illaa 'indanaa khazaaa'inuhoo wa maa nunazziluhooo 'illaa biqadarim-ma'loom.
verses.translation: Aur har cheez ke khazaane hamaare paas hi hain aur hum har cheez ma'loom miqdaar hi mein utaarte hain.

verses.arabic: وَ اَرْسَلْنَا الرِّيٰحَ لَوَاقِحَ فَاَنْزَلْنَا مِنَ السَّمَآءِ مَآءً فَاَسْقَيْنٰكُمُوْهُ وَ مَآ اَنْتُمْ لَهٗ بِخٰزِنِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'arsalnar-riyaaha lawaaqiha fa'anzalnaa minas-samaaa'i maaa'an fa'asqaynaakumoohu wa maaa 'antum lahoo bikhaazineen.
verses.translation: Aur humne bojhal (baar aawar) hawaayein bhejein phir aasmaan se paani naazil kiya, phir woh tumhein pilaaya, aur uss (paani) ka zakheerah rakhne waale tum nahin ho.

verses.arabic: وَ اِنَّا لَنَحْنُ نُحْيٖ وَ نُمِيْتُ وَ نَحْنُ الْوٰرِثُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'innaa lanahnu nuhyee wa numeetu wa nahnul-waarisoon.
verses.translation: Aur bilaashubah hum hi zindagi aur maut dete hain,¹ aur beshak hum hi (sab ke)  waaris hain.
verses.deepMeaning: Marna aisi haqeeqat hai jisse kisi ko majaal-e-inkaar nahin lekin khush naseeb hain woh log jo mar kar fazaayel-o-darjaat se bahrah war hote hain, yeh kaun log hain? uski saraahat iss hadees se hoti hai: jab insaan mar jaata hai to uske a'amaal ka silsilah munqata' ho jaata hai maa siwaaye un teen a'amaal ke: ⓵ Sadqah Jaariyah (sadqah-o-khairaat ke a'amaal, masalan: yateemon ke liye ghar banana, paani ke liye kuwan waghairah ta'meer karna) ⓶ Aisa ilm jisse log faaidah uthhaayein ⓷ Nek aur Saaleh aulaad jo Allah se apne waaledain ki bakhshish-o-maghfirat ki dua' kare.' (Sahih Muslim, Al-wasiyyatu, baabu maa yalhaqul insaan minassawaab ba'da wafaatihee, hadees:1631)

verses.arabic: وَ لَقَدْ عَلِمْنَا الْمُسْتَقْدِمِيْنَ مِنْكُمْ وَ لَقَدْ عَلِمْنَا الْمُسْتَاْخِرِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad 'alimnal- mustaqdimeena minkum wa laqad 'alimnal- musta'khireen.
verses.translation: Aur yaqeenan hamein unka ilm hai jo tum mein se pahle guzar chuke aur unka (bhi) ilm hai jo peechhe rahne waale hain.
