verses.arabic: وَ اِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ يَحْشُرُهُمْ ۚ اِنَّهٗ حَكِيْمٌ عَلِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'inna Rabbaka Huwa yahshuruhum; 'innahoo Hakeemun 'Aleem.
verses.translation: Aur (Aye Nabi!) beshak Aapka rab hi unhein ekhatthhah karega. besaak woh hakeem-o-aleem hai

verses.arabic: وَ لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْاِنْسَانَ مِنْ صَلْصَالٍ مِّنْ حَمَاٍ مَّسْنُوْنٍ
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad khalaqnal- 'insaana min şalşaalim- min hama'im-masnoon
verses.translation: Aur yaqeenan humne insaan ko sade gaade ki khankhanaati mitti se takhleeq kiya hai.

verses.arabic: وَ الْجَآنَّ خَلَقْنٰهُ مِنْ قَبْلُ مِنْ نَّارِ السَّمُوْمِ
verses.transliteration: Waljaaanna khalaqnaahu min qablu min naaris-samoom.
verses.translation: Aur isse pahle jin ko hum ne aatishe sozaan se takhleeq kiya.

verses.arabic: وَ اِذْ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلْمَلٰٓىٕكَةِ اِنِّيْ خَالِقٌۢ بَشَرًا مِّنْ صَلْصَالٍ مِّنْ حَمَاٍ مَّسْنُوْنٍ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'iz qaala Rabbuka lilmalaaa'ikati 'innee khaaliqum basharam- min şalşaalim-min hama'im-masnoon.
verses.translation: Aur jab Aapke rab ne farishton se kaha: beshak main sade gaade ki khankhanaati mitti se ek bashar takhleeq karne waala hoon.

verses.arabic: فَاِذَا سَوَّيْتُهٗ وَ نَفَخْتُ فِيْهِ مِنْ رُّوْحِيْ فَقَعُوْا لَهٗ سٰجِدِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Fa'izaa sawwaytuhoo wa nafakhtu feehi mir- roohee faqa'oo lahoo saajideen.
verses.translation: Phir jab main use durust karlun aur apni rooh se uss mein phoonk doon to uske aage sajdah karte gid padna.

verses.arabic: فَسَجَدَ الْمَلٰٓىٕكَةُ كُلُّهُمْ اَجْمَعُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Fasajadal- malaaa'ikatu kulluhum 'ajma'oon.
verses.translation: Phir saare farishton ne ekatthhe sajdah kiya.

verses.arabic: اِلَّاۤ اِبْلِيْسَ اَبٰى اَنْ يَّكُوْنَ مَعَ السّٰجِدِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Illaaa 'Ibleesa 'abaaa 'añy-yakoona ma'as- saajideen.
verses.translation: Siwaaye Iblees ke woh na maana ke sajdah karne waalon ke saath ho.

verses.arabic: قَالَ يٰۤاِبْلِيْسُ مَا لَكَ اَلَّا تَكُوْنَ مَعَ السّٰجِدِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala yaaa 'Ibleesu maa laka 'allaa takoona ma'as-saajideen.
verses.translation: Allah ne farmaya: Aye Iblees! tujhe kiya hai ke tu sajdah karne waalon ke saath shaamil na huwa?.

verses.arabic: قَالَ لَمْ اَكُنْ لِّاَسْجُدَ لِبَشَرٍ خَلَقْتَهٗ مِنْ صَلْصَالٍ مِّنْ حَمَاٍ مَّسْنُوْنٍ
verses.transliteration: Qaala lam 'akul- li'asjuda libasharin khalaqtahoo min salsaalim-min hama'im- masnoon.
verses.translation: Usne kaha: main aisa nahin ke ek bashar ko sajdah karun jise tune sade gaare ki khankhanaati mitti se paida kiya.

verses.arabic: قَالَ فَاخْرُجْ مِنْهَا فَاِنَّكَ رَجِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: Qaala fakhruj minhaa fa'innaka rajeem.
verses.translation: Allah ne farmaya: phir tu yahaan se nikal ja, chunaancheh bilaashubah tu mardood hai.

verses.arabic: وَ اِنَّ عَلَيْكَ اللَّعْنَةَ اِلٰى يَوْمِ الدِّيْنِ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'inna 'alaykal- la'nata 'ilaa Yawmid-Deen
verses.translation: Aur beshak tujh par yaume jaza tak la'nat hai.

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ فَاَنْظِرْنِيْۤ اِلٰى يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala Rabbi fa'anzirneee 'ilaa Yawmi yub'asoon.
verses.translation: Usne kaha: mere rab! mujhe uss yaum tak mohlat de jab (log dobaarah uthhaaye jaayen.

verses.arabic: قَالَ فَاِنَّكَ مِنَ الْمُنْظَرِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala fa'innaka minal-munzareen.
verses.translation: Allah ne farmaya: beshak tujhe mohlat de di gayi hai.

verses.arabic: اِلٰى يَوْمِ الْوَقْتِ الْمَعْلُوْمِ
verses.transliteration: 'Ilaa Yawmil-waqtil- ma'loom.
verses.translation: Muqarrar waqt ke din tak.

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ بِمَآ اَغْوَيْتَنِيْ لَاُزَيِّنَنَّ لَهُمْ فِي الْاَرْضِ وَ لَاُغْوِيَنَّهُمْ اَجْمَعِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala Rabbi bimaaa 'aghwaytanee la'uzayyinanna lahum fil-'ardi wa la'ughwiyannahum 'ajma'een.
verses.translation: Usne kaha: mere rab! jaise tune mujhe gumraah kiya, yaqeenan main un (logon) ke liye zameen mein (gunaah) khushnuma banadunga aur un sab ko gumraah karunga.

verses.arabic: اِلَّا عِبَادَكَ مِنْهُمُ الْمُخْلَصِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Illaa ibaadaka minhumul-mukhlaşeen
verses.translation: Tere un bandon ke siwa jo un mein se chune huye hain.

verses.arabic: قَالَ هٰذَا صِرَاطٌ عَلَيَّ مُسْتَقِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: Qaala haazaa Şiraatun 'alayya Mustaqeem.
verses.translation: Allah ne farmaya: yahi mujh tak (pahunchaane waali) seedhi raah hai.

verses.arabic: اِنَّ عِبَادِيْ لَيْسَ لَكَ عَلَيْهِمْ سُلْطٰنٌ اِلَّا مَنِ اتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ الْغٰوِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Inna 'ibaadee laysa laka 'alayhim sultaanun 'illaa manit-taba'aka minal-ghaaween.
verses.translation: Beshak mere bandon par tera koyi zor nahin, tera zor sirf un gumraahon par chalega jo tera itteba' karenge

verses.arabic: وَ اِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ لَمَوْعِدُهُمْ اَجْمَعِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'inna jahannama lamaw'iduhum 'ajma'een.
verses.translation: Aur yaqeenan un sab ke wa'de ki jagah jahannam hai.

verses.arabic: لَهَا سَبْعَةُ اَبْوَابٍ ۭ لِكُلِّ بَابٍ مِّنْهُمْ جُزْءٌ مَّقْسُوْمٌ
verses.transliteration: Lahaa sab'atu 'abwaab; likulli baabim-minhum juz'um-maqsoom.
verses.translation: Uske saat darwaaze hain, un (gumraahon) mein se har darwaaz ke liye ek taqseem shudah hissa hai.

verses.arabic: اِنَّ الْمُتَّقِيْنَ فِيْ جَنّٰتٍ وَّ عُيُوْنٍ
verses.transliteration: 'Innal-muttaqeena fee Jannaatinw-wa 'uyoon.
verses.translation: Beshak muttaqi log baaghon aur chashmon mein honge.

verses.arabic: اُدْخُلُوْهَا بِسَلٰمٍ اٰمِنِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Udkhuloohaa bisalaamin 'aamineen.
verses.translation: (kaha jaayega:) tum un mein salaamati se baa amn daakhil ho jaao.

verses.arabic: وَ نَزَعْنَا مَا فِيْ صُدُوْرِهِمْ مِّنْ غِلٍّ اِخْوَانًا عَلٰى سُرُرٍ مُّتَقٰبِلِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa naza'naa maa fee şudoorihim min ghillin 'ikhwaanan 'alaa sururim-mutaqaabileen
verses.translation: Aur unke seenon mein jo keenah hasad hoga hum nikaal denge, (woh) takhton par aamne saamne (baithhe) bhaai bhaai honge.

verses.arabic: لَا يَمَسُّهُمْ فِيْهَا نَصَبٌ وَّ مَا هُمْ مِّنْهَا بِمُخْرَجِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Laa yamassuhum feehaa naşabuñw-wa maa hum minhaa bimukhrajeen.
verses.translation: Unhein wahaan koyi takleef na pahunchegi aur na wahaan se nikaala jaayega.

verses.arabic: نَبِّئْ عِبَادِيْٓ اَنِّيْ اَنَا الْغَفُوْرُ الرَّحِيْمُ
verses.transliteration: Nabbi' 'ibaadeee 'anneee 'anal-Ghafoorur- Raheem.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) mere bandon ko khabar suna deejiye ke yaqeenan main ghafoorur- Raheem hoon.

verses.arabic: وَ اَنَّ عَذَابِيْ هُوَ الْعَذَابُ الْاَلِيْمُ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'anna 'azaabee huwal-'azaabul-'aleem.
verses.translation: Aur beshak mera azaab bhi bada dardnaak azaab hai.

verses.arabic: وَ نَبِّئْهُمْ عَنْ ضَيْفِ اِبْرٰهِيْمَ
verses.transliteration: Wa nabbi'hum 'an dayfi 'Ibraaheem.
verses.translation: Aur unhein Ibraheem ke mehmaanon ki khabar suna deejiye.

verses.arabic: اِذْ دَخَلُوْا عَلَيْهِ فَقَالُوْا سَلٰمًا ۭ قَالَ اِنَّا مِنْكُمْ وَجِلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Iz dakhaloo 'alayhi faqaaloo salaaman qaala 'innaa minkum wajiloon.
verses.translation: Jab woh uske paas pahunche to unhon ne salaam kiya, usne kaha beshuk hum tumse darte hain.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Ibraheem عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام ko un farishton se dar isliye mahsoos huwa ke unhon ne Ibraheem عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام ka tayyaar kardah bhuna huwa bachhda nahin khaaya tha jaisa ke surah Hood (11/70) mein tafseel guzri hai isse maloom huwa ke Allah Ta'ala ke jaleelul qadr paighambaron ko bhi ilm-e-ghaib nahin hota agar paighambar aalimul ghaib hote to hazrat Ibraheem عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام samajh jaate ke aane waale mehmaan farishte hain aur unke liye khaana tayyaar karne ki zaroorat nahin, kyun ke farishte insaanon ki tarah khaane peene ke mohtaaj nahin hain.

verses.arabic: قَالُوْا لَا تَوْجَلْ اِنَّا نُبَشِّرُكَ بِغُلٰمٍ عَلِيْمٍ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo laa tawjal 'innaa nubashshiruka bighulaamin 'aleem.
verses.translation: Woh bole: dar mat, beshak hum tujhe ek ilm waale ladke ki bashaarat dete hain.

verses.arabic: قَالَ اَبَشَّرْتُمُوْنِيْ عَلٰٓى اَنْ مَّسَّنِيَ الْكِبَرُ ۭ فَبِمَ تُبَشِّرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala 'abashshartumoonee 'alaaa 'am-massaniyal- kibaru fabima tubashshiroon
verses.translation: Ibraheem ne kaha: kiya tum mujhe bashaarat dete ho jab ke mujh par budhaapa aa chuka? Chunaancheh (ab) kis benaa par bashaarat dete ho?

verses.arabic: قَالُوْا بَشَّرْنٰكَ بِالْحَقِّ فَلَا تَكُنْ مِّنَ الْقٰنِطِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo bashsharnaaka bilhaqqi falaa takum-minal- qaaniteen.
verses.translation: Woh bole: humne tujhe haq (amr-e-waaqayi) ki bashaarat di hai, chunaancheh tu naa ummeed na ho.

verses.arabic: قَالَ وَ مَنْ يَّقْنَطُ مِنْ رَّحْمَةِ رَبِّهٖٓ اِلَّا الضَّآلُّوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala wa mañy- yaqnatu mir-rahmati Rabbiheee 'illad- daaalloon.
verses.translation: Ibraheem ne kaha: aur apne rab ki rahmat se to gumraah log hi naa ummeed hote hain.

verses.arabic: قَالَ فَمَا خَطْبُكُمْ اَيُّهَا الْمُرْسَلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala famaa khatbukum 'ayyuhal- mursaloon.
verses.translation: Ibraheem ne kaha: Phir tumhaara maqsad kiya hai? aye bheje huye (farishto!)

verses.arabic: قَالُوْا اِنَّاۤ اُرْسِلْنَآ اِلٰى قَوْمٍ مُّجْرِمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaalooo 'innaaa 'ursilnaaa 'ilaa qawmim- mujrimeen.
verses.translation: Unhon ne kaha: beshak hum ek mujrim qaum ki taraf bheje gaye hain.

verses.arabic: اِلَّآ اٰلَ لُوْطٍ اِنَّا لَمُنَجُّوْهُمْ اَجْمَعِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Illaaa 'Aala Loot; 'innaa lamunajjoohum 'ajma'een.
verses.translation: Siwaaye aal-e-loot ke, beshak hum un sab ko najaat dene waale hain.

verses.arabic: اِلَّا امْرَاَتَهٗ قَدَّرْنَآ ۙ اِنَّهَا لَمِنَ الْغٰبِرِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Illam-ra'atahoo qaddarnaaa 'innahaa laminal-ghaabireen.
verses.translation: Siwaaye uski beewi ke, humne muqaddar kardiya ke beshak woh peechhe rah jaane waalon mein se hogi.

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ اٰلَ لُوْطِ ۙ الْمُرْسَلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Falammaa jaaa'a 'Aala Lootinil-mursaloon.
verses.translation: Phir jab farishte aal-e- loot ke haan pahunche.

verses.arabic: قَالَ اِنَّكُمْ قَوْمٌ مُّنْكَرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala 'innakum qawmum-munkaroon.
verses.translation: .To loot ne kaha: beshak tum log to ajnabi ho.

verses.arabic: قَالُوْا بَلْ جِئْنٰكَ بِمَا كَانُوْا فِيْهِ يَمْتَرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo bal ji'naaka bimaa kaanoo feehi yamtaroon.
verses.translation: Woh bole: balke hum tere paas woh (azaab) laaye hain jis mein yeh (log) shak karte the

verses.arabic: وَ اَتَيْنٰكَ بِالْحَقِّ وَ اِنَّا لَصٰدِقُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'ataynaaka bilhaqqi wa 'innaa laşaadiqoon.
verses.translation: Aur hum tere paas haq (yaqeeni cheez) laaye hain aur beshak hum sachche hain.

verses.arabic: فَاَسْرِ بِاَهْلِكَ بِقِطْعٍ مِّنَ الَّيْلِ وَ اتَّبِعْ اَدْبَارَهُمْ وَ لَا يَلْتَفِتْ مِنْكُمْ اَحَدٌ وَّ امْضُوْا حَيْثُ تُؤْمَرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Fa'asri bi'ahlika biqit'im-minal-layli wattabi' 'adbaarahum wa laa yaltafit minkum 'ahaduñw-wamdoo haysu tu'maroon.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh tu kuchh raat rahe apne ahl-o-ayaal ko le kar nikal aur tu unke peechhe chal, aur tum mein se koyi peechhe mud kar na dekhe, aur chale jaao jahaan tumhein hukm diya jaata hai.

verses.arabic: وَ قَضَيْنَآ اِلَيْهِ ذٰلِكَ الْاَمْرَ اَنَّ دَابِرَ هٰٓؤُلَآءِ مَقْطُوْعٌ مُّصْبِحِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa qadaynaaa 'ilayhi zaalikal-'amra 'anna daabira haaa'ulaaa'i maqtoo'um-muşbiheen.
verses.translation: Aur humne use uss amr ka faislah suna diya ke beshak subah hote un logon ki jad kaat di jaayegi.

verses.arabic: وَ جَآءَ اَهْلُ الْمَدِيْنَةِ يَسْتَبْشِرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa jaaa'a 'ahlul- madeenati yastabshiroon
verses.translation: Aur shahar (Saddoom) waale khushyaan manaate aaye.

verses.arabic: قَالَ اِنَّ هٰٓؤُلَآءِ ضَيْفِيْ فَلَا تَفْضَحُوْنِ
verses.transliteration: Qaala 'inna haaa'ulaaa'i dayfee falaa tafdahoon.
verses.translation: Loot ne kaha: beshak yeh log mere mehmaan hain, lehaaza tum mujhe ruswa na karo.

verses.arabic: وَ اتَّقُوا اللّٰهَ وَ لَا تُخْزُوْنِ
verses.transliteration: Wattaqul-laaha wa laa tukhzoon.
verses.translation: Aur Allah se daro aur mujhe ruswa na karo.

verses.arabic: قَالُوْا اَوَ لَمْ نَنْهَكَ عَنِ الْعٰلَمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaalooo 'awalam nanhaka 'anil-'aalameen.
verses.translation: Woh bole: kiya humne tujhe dunya waalon (ki himaayat) se roka nahin?

verses.arabic: قَالَ هٰٓؤُلَآءِ بَنَاتِيْۤ اِنْ كُنْتُمْ فٰعِلِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala haaa'ulaaa'i banaateee 'in kuntum faa'ileen.
verses.translation: Loot ne kaha: yeh meri (qaum ki) betiyaan hain (inse nikaah karlo) agar tum (kuchh) karne waale ho.

verses.arabic: لَعَمْرُكَ اِنَّهُمْ لَفِيْ سَكْرَتِهِمْ يَعْمَهُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: La'amruka 'innahum lafee sakratihim ya'mahoon.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) aap ki umr ki qasam!¹ beshak woh apni masti (gumraahi) mein bhatak rahe the.
verses.deepMeaning: Allah Ta'ala Nabi se khitaab farma kar, unki zindagi ki qasam khaa rahaa hai, jisse aapka sharf-o- fazl waazeh hai, taahum kisi aur ke liye Allah Ta'ala ke siwa kisi aur ki qasam khaana jaayez nahin hai. Allah Ta'ala hakim-e-mutlaq hai woh jis ki chaahe qasam khaaye, usse kaun poochhne waala hai? Allah Ta'ala farmaata hai ke jis tarah sharaab ke nashe mein dhut insaan ki aql maauf ho jaati hai usi tarah yeh apni bad masti aur gumraahi mein itne sar gardaan the ke hazrat Loot ki itni ma'qool baat Shi unki samajh mein nahin aa paayi.

verses.arabic: فَاَخَذَتْهُمُ الصَّيْحَةُ مُشْرِقِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Fa'akhazathumuş- sayhatu mushriqeen.
verses.translation: Phir suraj nikalte unhein ek chinghaadne aa pakda

verses.arabic: فَجَعَلْنَا عَالِيَهَا سَافِلَهَا وَ اَمْطَرْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ حِجَارَةً مِّنْ سِجِّيْلٍ
verses.transliteration: Faja'alnaa 'aaliyahaa saafilahaa wa 'amtarnaa 'alayhim hijaaratam-min sijjeel.
verses.translation: Phir humne woh (basti ulat kar) oupar neeche kardi aur un par khangar ke patthar barsaaye.

verses.arabic: اِنَّ فِيْ ذٰلِكَ لَاٰيٰتٍ لِّلْمُتَوَسِّمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Inna fee zaalika la- 'Aayaatil- lilmutawassimeen.
verses.translation: Beshak uss mein dhiyaan karne waalon ke liye nishaaniyaan hain.

verses.arabic: وَ اِنَّهَا لَبِسَبِيْلٍ مُّقِيْمٍ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'innahaa labisabeelim-muqeem.
verses.translation: Aur beshak woh basti seedhi raah¹ par hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Tafseel ke liye imam Ibne Kaseer رضي الله عنه ki tareekh ki kitab (Al-bidaaya Wannihaaya) ka muta'ala Sarmaayein.

verses.arabic: اِنَّ فِيْ ذٰلِكَ لَاٰيَةً لِّلْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Inna fee zaalika la- 'Aayatal-lilmu'mineen.
verses.translation: Aur beshak uss mein mominon ke liye nishaani hai.

verses.arabic: وَ اِنْ كَانَ اَصْحٰبُ الْاَيْكَةِ لَظٰلِمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'in kaana 'Ashaabul-'Aykati lazaalimeen.
verses.translation: Aur beshak aykah (basti) waale bhi zaalim the.

verses.arabic: فَانْتَقَمْنَا مِنْهُمْ ۚ وَ اِنَّهُمَا لَبِاِمَامٍ مُّبِيْنٍ
verses.transliteration: Fantaqamnaa minhum wa 'innahumaa labi'imaamim-mubeen.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh humne unse inteqaam liya aur beshak donon (tabaah shudah bastiyaan) khuli shaaheraah par hain.

verses.arabic: وَ لَقَدْ كَذَّبَ اَصْحٰبُ الْحِجْرِ الْمُرْسَلِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad kazzaba 'Ashaabul-Hijril- mursaleen.
verses.translation: Aur Yaqeenan hijr waalon (Samood) ne Rasoolon¹ ki takzeeb ki
verses.deepMeaning: Hijr, Saaleh عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام ki qaum, Samood, ki bastiyon ka naam tha. Unhein 'As-haabul Hijr' kaha gaya hai. Yeh basti Madinah aur tabook ke darmiyaan thi. Unhon ne apne paighamber hazrat Saaleh عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام ko jhutlaaya. Lekin yahaan Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya: 'unhon ne Rasoolon ki takzeeb ki.' Yeh isliye ke ek paighambar ki takzeeb aise hi hai jaise saare paighambaron ki takzeeb.

verses.arabic: وَ اٰتَيْنٰهُمْ اٰيٰتِنَا فَكَانُوْا عَنْهَا مُعْرِضِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'aataynaahum 'Aayaatinaa fakaanoo 'anhaa mu'rideen.
verses.translation: Aur humne unhein apni nishaanyaan din, phir woh unse munh madte the.

verses.arabic: وَ كَانُوْا يَنْحِتُوْنَ مِنَ الْجِبَالِ بُيُوْتًا اٰمِنِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa kaanoo yanhitoona minal-jibaali buyootan 'aamineen.
verses.translation: Aur woh pahaadon se gahr taraashte the bekhauf ho kar.

verses.arabic: فَاَخَذَتْهُمُ الصَّيْحَةُ مُصْبِحِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Fa'akhazathumuş- şayhatu muşbiheen.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh unhein subah hote hi chinghaadne aa pakda.

verses.arabic: فَمَاۤ اَغْنٰى عَنْهُمْ مَّا كَانُوْا يَكْسِبُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Famaaa 'aghnaa 'anhum maa kaanoo yaksiboon.
verses.translation: Phir unke kaam na aaya jo woh kamaate the.

verses.arabic: وَ مَا خَلَقْنَا السَّمٰوٰتِ وَ الْاَرْضَ وَ مَا بَيْنَهُمَاۤ اِلَّا بِالْحَقِّ ۭ وَ اِنَّ السَّاعَةَ لَاٰتِيَةٌ ۚ فَاصْفَحِ الصَّفْحَ الْجَمِيْلَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maa khalaqnas- samaawaati wal'arda wa maa baynahumaaa 'illaa bilhaqq; wa 'innas- Saa'ata la'aatiyatun fasfahis-safhal-jameel.
verses.translation: Aur humne aasmaanon aur zameen ko aur jo unke maa bain hai haq hi ke saath takhleeq kiya hai. aur yaqeenan qiyaamat aane waali hai, to (aye Nabi!) aap (kaafiron se) khoobsurat andaaz se dar guzar karein.

verses.arabic: اِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ الْخَلَّاقُ الْعَلِيْمُ
verses.transliteration: 'Inna Rabbaka Huwal- khallaaqul-'aleem.
verses.translation: Bilaa shubah aapka rab hi sab ko takhleeq karne waala, khoob jaanne waala ahai.

verses.arabic: وَ لَقَدْ اٰتَيْنٰكَ سَبْعًا مِّنَ الْمَثَانِيْ وَ الْقُرْاٰنَ الْعَظِيْمَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad 'aataynaaka sab'am- minal-masaanee wal- Qur'aanal-'Azeem.
verses.translation: Beshak humne aapko baar baar dohraayi jaane waali saat aayaat¹ aur qur'an azeem diya hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Mulaahazah ho haashyah (Surah Faateha:1/2)

verses.arabic: لَا تَمُدَّنَّ عَيْنَيْكَ اِلٰى مَا مَتَّعْنَا بِهٖۤ اَزْوَاجًا مِّنْهُمْ وَ لَا تَحْزَنْ عَلَيْهِمْ وَ اخْفِضْ جَنَاحَكَ لِلْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Laa tamuddanna 'aynayka 'ilaa maa matta'naa biheee 'azwaajam-minhum wa laa tahzan 'alayhim wakhfid janaahaka lilmu'mineen.
verses.translation: Aur humne mukhtalif qism ke logon ko jo maal-o- mata' diya hai, uss par aap apni nazrein na jamaayein, aur na un (ki haalat) par gham khaayein aur apne (pur shafqat) baazu mominon ke liye jhukaaye rakkhein.

verses.arabic: وَ قُلْ اِنِّيْۤ اَنَا النَّذِيْرُ الْمُبِيْنُ
verses.transliteration: Wa qul 'inneee 'anan- nazeerul-mubeen.
verses.translation: Aur kah deejiye: beshak main to saaf saaf daraane waala hoon

verses.arabic: كَمَاۤ اَنْزَلْنَا عَلَى الْمُقْتَسِمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Kamaaa 'anzalnaa 'alal-muqtasimeen.
verses.translation: (Aise hi azaab se) jaisa ke humne taqseem karne waalon par naazil kiya tha.

verses.arabic: الَّذِيْنَ جَعَلُوا الْقُرْاٰنَ عِضِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Allazeena jaʻalul- Qur'aana 'ideen.
verses.translation: Jinhon ne (apne) qur'an (toraat) ko paarah paarah kar diya.

verses.arabic: فَوَرَبِّكَ لَنَسْــَٔلَنَّهُمْ اَجْمَعِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Fawa Rabbika lanas'alannahum 'ajma'een.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh aapke rab ki qasam! Hum un sabse zaroor baaz purs karenge.

verses.arabic: عَمَّا كَانُوْا يَعْمَلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Ammaa kaanoo ya'maloon.
verses.translation: Un amalon ki jo woh karte the.

verses.arabic: فَاصْدَعْ بِمَا تُؤْمَرُ وَ اَعْرِضْ عَنِ الْمُشْرِكِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Faşda bimaa tu'maru wa 'a'rid 'anil- mushrikeen.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh aapko jo hukm diya jaata hai, khol kar suna dein aur mushrikeen se be rukhi bartein.

verses.arabic: اِنَّا كَفَيْنٰكَ الْمُسْتَهْزِءِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Innaa kafaynaakal- mustahzi'een.
verses.translation: Bilaa shubah hum thhatthha karne waalon ke muqaabil aapko kaafi hai.

verses.arabic: الَّذِيْنَ يَجْعَلُوْنَ مَعَ اللّٰهِ اِلٰهًا اٰخَرَ ۚ فَسَوْفَ يَعْلَمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Allazeena yaj'aloona ma'al-laahi 'ilaahan 'aakhar; fasawfa yalamoon.
verses.translation: Woh log jo Allah ke saath kisi aur ko ma'bood banaate hain, chunaancheh woh (apna anjaam) jald jaan lenge

verses.arabic: وَ لَقَدْ نَعْلَمُ اَنَّكَ يَضِيْقُ صَدْرُكَ بِمَا يَقُوْلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa lagad naʻlamu 'annaka yadeequ şadruka bimaa yaqooloon.
verses.translation: Aur yaqeenan hum jaante hain ke jo kuchh woh kahte hain usse aapka seena (dil) tang hota hai.

verses.arabic: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَ كُنْ مِّنَ السّٰجِدِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Fasabbih bihamdi Rabbika wa kum-minas- saajideen.
verses.translation: Aap apne rab ki hamd ke saath tasbeeh karein aur sajdah guzaaron mein ho jaayein.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Isse muraad baa jamaa'at namaaz ka ehtemaam hai. Nabi ﷺ ke zamaane mein uska bahut ehtemaam tha, ibne Abbaas  رضي الله عنها bayaan karte hain: 'Rasoolullah ﷺ ke ahad mein log jab farz namaazon se faarigh hote to baland aawaaz se Allah ka zikr (Allaahu Akbar, Astaghfirullaah, Astaghfirullaah, Aastaghfirullaah) waghairah) kiya karte jisse mujhe patah chal jaata tha ke log farz namaaz se faarigh ho chuke hain.' (Al-Bukhaari, Al-azaan, Baab:155, Hadees:841)

verses.arabic: وَ اعْبُدْ رَبَّكَ حَتّٰى يَاْتِيَكَ الْيَقِيْنُ
verses.transliteration: Wa'bud Rabbaka hattaa ya'tiyakal-yaqeen.
verses.translation: Aur aap apne rab ki ibaadat karein hatta ke aap ke paas yaqeen (maut) aa jaaye.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Nabi kareem ﷺ ne farmaya: 'tum mein se kisi ko koyi museebat laahaq ho jaaye to woh uski wajah se maut ki aarzu na kare aur agar maut ki aarzu ke elaawah koyi chaarah kaar nazar na aaye to use yun kahna chaahiye: 'Aye Allah!mujhe uss waqt tak zindah rakhy jab tak zindagi mein mere liye bhalaayi hai aur maut uss waqt de jab mere liye maut mein bhalaayi ho.' (Al-Bukhari, Baab:19, hadees:5671)

verses.arabic: اَتٰۤى اَمْرُ اللّٰهِ فَلَا تَسْتَعْجِلُوْهُ ۭ سُبْحٰنَهٗ وَ تَعٰلٰى عَمَّا يُشْرِكُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Ataaa 'amrul-laahi falaa tasta jilooh; Subhaanahoo wa Ta'aalaa 'ammaa yushrikoon.
verses.translation: 1. Allah ka hukm aa pahuncha, lehaaza tum use u'jlat se na maango. woh paak aur unse bartar hai jinhein woh shareek thhahraate hain.

verses.arabic: يُنَزِّلُ الْمَلٰٓىٕكَةَ بِالرُّوْحِ مِنْ اَمْرِهٖ عَلٰى مَنْ يَّشَآءُ مِنْ عِبَادِهٖٓ اَنْ اَنْذِرُوْۤا اَنَّهٗ لَآ اِلٰهَ اِلَّآ اَنَا۠ فَاتَّقُوْنِ
verses.transliteration: Yunazzilul- malaaa'ikata birroohi min 'amrihee 'alaa many-yashaaa'u min 'ibaadiheee 'an 'anzirooo 'annahoo laaa 'ilaaha 'illaaa 'ana fattaqoon.
verses.translation: Woh apne bandon mein se jis par chaahe apne hukm se wahi de kar farishte naazil karta hai ke tum (logon ko) iss baat se aagaah kardo ke bilaa shubah mere siwa koyi ilaah nahin, lehaaza tum mujh hi se daro.

verses.arabic: خَلَقَ السَّمٰوٰتِ وَ الْاَرْضَ بِالْحَقِّ ۚ تَعٰلٰى عَمَّا يُشْرِكُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Khalaqas-samaawaati wal-'arda bilhaqq; Ta'aalaa 'ammaa yushrikoon.
verses.translation: Usne aasmaan aur zameen haq ke saath takhleeq kiye, woh unse bartar hai jinheinwoh shareek thhahraate hain.

verses.arabic: خَلَقَ الْاِنْسَانَ مِنْ نُّطْفَةٍ فَاِذَا هُوَ خَصِيْمٌ مُّبِيْنٌ
verses.transliteration: Khalaqal-'insaana min nutfatin fa'izaa huwa khaşeemum-mubeen
verses.translation: Usne insaan ko nutfe se takhleeq kiya, to yakaayak woh khula jhagdaalu ho gaya.

verses.arabic: وَ الْاَنْعَامَ خَلَقَهَا ۚ لَكُمْ فِيْهَا دِفْءٌ وَّ مَنَافِعُ وَ مِنْهَا تَاْكُلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wal'an'aamaa khalaqahaa; lakum feehaa dif'unw-wa manaafi'u wa minhaa ta'kuloon.
verses.translation: Aur usne chaupaaye bhi takhleeq kiye, un mein tumhaare liye sardi se bachaao aur deegar manaafa' hain aur un mein se ba'z ko tum khaate ho.

verses.arabic: وَ لَكُمْ فِيْهَا جَمَالٌ حِيْنَ تُرِيْحُوْنَ وَ حِيْنَ تَسْرَحُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa lakum feehaa jamaalun heena tureehoona wa heena tasrahoon.
verses.translation: Aur un mein tumhaare liye raunaq hai jab tum unhein shaam ko charaa kar laate ho aur jab subah charaane le jaate ho.

verses.arabic: وَ تَحْمِلُ اَثْقَالَكُمْ اِلٰى بَلَدٍ لَّمْ تَكُوْنُوْا بٰلِغِيْهِ اِلَّا بِشِقِّ الْاَنْفُسِ ۭ اِنَّ رَبَّكُمْ لَرَءُوْفٌ رَّحِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa tahmilu 'asqaalakum 'ilaa baladil- lam takoonoo baaligheehi 'illaa bishiqqil-'anfus; 'inna Rabbakum la- Ra'oofur-Raheem.
verses.translation: Aur woh tumhaare bojh uthhaa kar un shahron tak le jaate hain jahaan tum jismaani musahaqqat ke baghair nahin pahunch paate the. Beshak tumhaara rab bada shafqat waala bahut raham waala hai

verses.arabic: وَ الْخَيْلَ وَ الْبِغَالَ وَ الْحَمِيْرَ لِتَرْكَبُوْهَا وَ زِيْنَةً ۚ وَ يَخْلُقُ مَا لَا تَعْلَمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Walkhayla walbighaala walhameera litarkaboohaa wa zeenah; wa yakhluqu maa laa taʻlamoon.
verses.translation: Aur (usi ne) ghode, khachchar aur gadhe (paida kiye) taake tum un par sawaar ho aur woh baay'is- e-zeenat hain, aur woh paida karta hai jo tum nahin jaante.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Zameen ke zereen hisse mein, isi tarah samandar mein, aur be aab-o-gayaah sehraaon aur jangalon mein Allah Ta'ala makhlooq paida farmaata rahta hai jinka ilm Allah Ta'ala ke siwa kisi ko nahin aur usi mein insaan ki banaayi huyi woh cheezein bhi aa jaati hain jo Allah ke diye huye dimaagh aur salaahiyaton ko baru-e-kaar laate huye usi ki paida kardah cheezon ko mukhtalif andaaz mein jod kar tayyaar karta hai masalan: bas, car, rail gaadi, jahaaz aur iss tarah ki beshumaar cheezein aur jo mustaqbil mein ummeed hain.

verses.arabic: وَ عَلَى اللّٰهِ قَصْدُ السَّبِيْلِ وَ مِنْهَا جَآىٕرٌ ۭ وَ لَوْ شَآءَ لَهَدٰىكُمْ اَجْمَعِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'alal-laahi qaşdus- sabeeli wa minhaa jaaa'ir; wa law shaaa'a lahadaakum 'ajma'een.
verses.translation: Aur seedhi raah Allah tak (pahunchti) hai, aur ba'z raahein tedhi hain aur agar Allah chaahta to tum sab ko hidaayat deta.

verses.arabic: هُوَ الَّذِيْۤ اَنْزَلَ مِنَ السَّمَآءِ مَآءً ۚ لَكُمْ مِّنْهُ شَرَابٌ وَّ مِنْهُ شَجَرٌ فِيْهِ تُسِيْمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Huwal-lazeee 'anzala minas-samaaa'i maaa'al- lakum minhu sharaabuñw-wa minhu shajarun feehi tuseemoon.
verses.translation: Wahi hai jisne aasmaan se tumhaare liye paani naazil kiya, usi se peena hai aur usi se darakht (ugte) hain jin mein tum (jaanwar) charaate ho.

verses.arabic: يُنۢبِتُ لَكُمْ بِهِ الزَّرْعَ وَ الزَّيْتُوْنَ وَ النَّخِيْلَ وَ الْاَعْنَابَ وَ مِنْ كُلِّ الثَّمَرٰتِ ۗ اِنَّ فِيْ ذٰلِكَ لَاٰيَةً لِّقَوْمٍ يَّتَفَكَّرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Yumbitu lakum bihiz- zar'a wazzaytoona wannakheela wal'a'naaba wa min kullis-samaraat, 'inna fee zaalika-la-'Aayatal- liqawminy-yatafakkaroon.
verses.translation: Woh usi (paani) se tumhaare liye kheti ugaata hai aur zaytoon aur khujoor aur angoor aur har qism ke phal. Beshak iss mein ghaur- o-fikr karne waale logon ke liye bahut badi nishaani hai.

verses.arabic: وَ سَخَّرَ لَكُمُ الَّيْلَ وَ النَّهَارَ وَ الشَّمْسَ وَ الْقَمَرَ ۚ وَ النُّجُوْمُ مُسَخَّرٰتٌۢ بِاَمْرِهٖ ۭ اِنَّ فِيْ ذٰلِكَ لَاٰيٰتٍ لِّقَوْمٍ يَّعْقِلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa sakhkhara lakumul- layla wannahaara washshamsa walqamara wannujoomu musakhkharaatum- bi'amrih; 'inna fee zaalika la-'Aayaatil- liqawminy-ya qiloon.
verses.translation: Aur usne tumhaare liye musakhkhar kiye raat aur din aur suraj aur chaand aur tamaam taare bhi usi ke hukm ke paaband hain. beshak iss mein aql mand logon ke liye kayi nishaaniyaan hain.

verses.arabic: وَ مَا ذَرَاَ لَكُمْ فِي الْاَرْضِ مُخْتَلِفًا اَلْوَانُهٗ ۭ اِنَّ فِيْ ذٰلِكَ لَاٰيَةً لِّقَوْمٍ يَّذَّكَّرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maa zara'a lakum fil-'ardi mukhtalifan 'alwaanuh; 'inna fee zaalika la-'Aayatal- liqawminy-yazzakkaroon.
verses.translation: Aur rang birang ki woh cheezein bhi (taabe' kardin) jo uss (Allah) ne tumhaare liye zameen mein paida kin. Beshak iss mein bahut badi nishaani hai un logon ke liye jo naseehat pakadte hain.

verses.arabic: وَ هُوَ الَّذِيْ سَخَّرَ الْبَحْرَ لِتَاْكُلُوْا مِنْهُ لَحْمًا طَرِيًّا وَّ تَسْتَخْرِجُوْا مِنْهُ حِلْيَةً تَلْبَسُوْنَهَا ۚ وَ تَرَى الْفُلْكَ مَوَاخِرَ فِيْهِ وَ لِتَبْتَغُوْا مِنْ فَضْلِهٖ وَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَشْكُرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa Huwal-lazee sakhkharal-bahra lita'kuloo minhu lahman tariyyanw-wa tastakhrijoo minhu hilyatan talbasoonahaa wa taral- fulka mawaakhira feehi wa litabtaghoo min fadlihee wa la'allakum tashkuroon.
verses.translation: Aur wahi hai jisne samandar musakhkhar kiya taake tum uss mein se taro taazah (machhli ka) gosht khaao, aur uss mein se zewar (moti) nikaalo jo tum pahante ho, aur tu kashtiyaan dekhta hai ke paani ko cheerti chali jaati hain aur taake tum Allah ka fazl talaash karo aur taake tum shukr karo.

verses.arabic: وَ اَلْقٰى فِي الْاَرْضِ رَوَاسِيَ اَنْ تَمِيْدَ بِكُمْ وَ اَنْهٰرًا وَّ سُبُلًا لَّعَلَّكُمْ تَهْتَدُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa alqaa fil-'ardi rawaasiya 'an tameeda bikum wa 'anhaaranw-wa subulal-la'allakum tahtadoon.
verses.translation: Aur usne zameen mein pahaad gaad diye ke woh tumhaare samet jhuk (na) pade aur nahrein aur raaste banaaye taake tum raah paao.

verses.arabic: وَ عَلٰمٰتٍ ۭ وَ بِالنَّجْمِ هُمْ يَهْتَدُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'alaamaat; wa binnajmi hum yahtadoon.
verses.translation: Aur (deegar) nishaaniyaan (banaayeen) aur taaron se bhi log raah paate hain.

verses.arabic: اَفَمَنْ يَّخْلُقُ كَمَنْ لَا يَخْلُقُ ۭ اَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Afamañy-yakhluqu kamal-laa yakhluq; 'afalaa tazakkaroon.
verses.translation: Bhala jo (Allah sab kuchh) takhleeq karta hai woh uss jaisa ho sakta hai jo (kuchh bhi) takhleeq nahin karta? Kiya phir tum naseehat nahin pakadte?

verses.arabic: وَ اِنْ تَعُدُّوْا نِعْمَتَ اللّٰهِ لَا تُحْصُوْهَا ۭ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ لَغَفُوْرٌ رَّحِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'in ta'uddoo ni'matal-laahi laa tuhsoohaaa; 'innal-laaha la-Ghafoorur-Raheem.
verses.translation: Aur agar tum Allah ki ne'matein ginna chaaho to unhein gin na sako. Beshak Allah ghafoorur Raheem hai.

verses.arabic: وَ اللّٰهُ يَعْلَمُ مَا تُسِرُّوْنَ وَ مَا تُعْلِنُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wallaahu ya'lamu maa tusirroona wa maa tulinoon.
verses.translation: Aur Allah jaanta hai jo tum chhupaate ho aur jo tum zaahir karte ho.

verses.arabic: وَ الَّذِيْنَ يَدْعُوْنَ مِنْ دُوْنِ اللّٰهِ لَا يَخْلُقُوْنَ شَيْــٴًـا وَّهُمْ يُخْلَقُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena yad'oona min doonil-laahi laa yakhluqoona shay'anw- wa hum yukhlaqoon.
verses.translation: Aur log jinhein Allah ke siwa pukaarte hain woh koyi cheez takhleeq nahin karte jabke woh khud takhleeq hote hain.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Ya'ni ek se ziyaadah maboodon ke maanne waale, but parast aur Allah ki wahdaaniyat par eemaan na rakhne waale jo Allah ke saath doosron ki parastish bhi karte hain aur Allah ke shareek thhahraate hain. woh sab Allah ki makhlooq hain aur makhlooq, ilaah kis tarah ho sakti hai?

verses.arabic: اَمْوَاتٌ غَيْرُ اَحْيَآءٍ ۚ وَ مَا يَشْعُرُوْنَ اَيَّانَ يُبْعَثُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Amwaatun ghayru Pahyaaa; wa maa yash'uroona 'ayyaana yub'asoon.
verses.translation: Woh murde hain,¹ zindah nahin aur woh shu'oor nahin rakhte ke woh kab uthhaaye jaayenge?
verses.deepMeaning: Murdah se muraad, woh jamaad (patthar) bhi hain jo be jaan aur be shu'oor hain aur faut shudah saaleheen bhi hain, kyunke marne ke ba'd uthhaaya jaana (jinka unhein shu'oor nahin) woh to jamaad ke bajaaye saaleheen hi par saadiq aa sakta hai, unko sirf murdah hi nahin kaha gaya balke mazeed wazaahat farma di ke woh zindah nahin hain, isse qabar paraston ka bhi waazeh rad ho jaata hai. Jo kahte hain ke qabron mein madfoon murdah nahin, zindah hain. Allah Ta'ala ke irshaad se maloom huwa ke maut waarid hone ke ba'd dunyawi zindagi kisi ko naseeb nahin ho sakti na dunya se un ka koyi ta'alluq hi baaqi rahta hai

verses.arabic: اِلٰهُكُمْ اِلٰهٌ وَّاحِدٌ ۚ فَالَّذِيْنَ لَا يُؤْمِنُوْنَ بِالْاٰخِرَةِ قُلُوْبُهُمْ مُّنْكِرَةٌ وَّهُمْ مُّسْتَكْبِرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Ilaahukum 'Ilaahuñw-Waahid; fallazeena laa yu'minoona bil-'Aakhirati quloobuhum munkiratuñw-wa hum mustakbiroon.
verses.translation: Tumhaara ma'bood bas ek hi ma'bood hai, chunaancheh jo log aakhirat par eemaan nahin rakhte, unke dil munkir hain aur woh takabbur karne waale hain.

verses.arabic: لَا جَرَمَ اَنَّ اللّٰهَ يَعْلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّوْنَ وَ مَا يُعْلِنُوْنَ ۚ اِنَّهٗ لَا يُحِبُّ الْمُسْتَكْبِرِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Laa jarama 'annal- laaha ya'lamu maa yusirroona wa maa yu'linoon; 'innahoo laa yuhibbul-mustakbireen.
verses.translation: Bilaa shubah yaqeenan Allah jaanta hai jo tum chhupaate ho aur jo tum zaahiar karte ho, beshak woh takabbur karne waalon ko qata'an pasand nahin karta.

verses.arabic: وَ اِذَا قِيْلَ لَهُمْ مَّاذَاۤ اَنْزَلَ رَبُّكُمْ ۙ قَالُوْٓا اَسَاطِيْرُ الْاَوَّلِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'izaa qeela lahum- maazaaa 'anzala Rabbukum qaalooo 'asaateerul-'awwaleen.
verses.translation: Aur jab unse kahaa- jaaye tumhaare rab ne kiya nazil kiya hai? to woh kahte hain: yeh pahle logon ke qisse kahaaniyaan hain.

verses.arabic: لِيَحْمِلُوْۤا اَوْزَارَهُمْ كَامِلَةً يَّوْمَ الْقِيٰمَةِ ۙ وَ مِنْ اَوْزَارِ الَّذِيْنَ يُضِلُّوْنَهُمْ بِغَيْرِ عِلْمٍ ۭ اَلَا سَآءَ مَا يَزِرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Liyahmilooo 'awzaarahum kaamilatañy-Yawmal- Qiyaamati wa min 'awzaaril-lazeena yudilloonahum bighayri 'ilm; 'Alaa saaa'a maa yaziroon.
verses.translation: Taake qiyaamat ke din woh apne kaamil bojh uthhaayein aur kuchh unke bojh bhi jinhein woh baghair ilm ke gumraah karte hain, jaan lo! Bura bojh hai jo woh uthhaate hain.

verses.arabic: قَدْ مَكَرَ الَّذِيْنَ مِنْ قَبْلِهِمْ فَاَتَى اللّٰهُ بُنْيَانَهُمْ مِّنَ الْقَوَاعِدِ فَخَرَّ عَلَيْهِمُ السَّقْفُ مِنْ فَوْقِهِمْ وَ اَتٰٮهُمُ الْعَذَابُ مِنْ حَيْثُ لَا يَشْعُرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qad makaral-lazeena min qablihim fa'atal- laahu bunyaanahum- minal-qawaa'idi fakharra 'alayhimus- saqfu min fawqihim wa 'ataahumul-'azaabu min haysu laa yash'uroon.
verses.translation: Tahqeeq woh log makr kar chuke hain jo unse pahle the, phir Allah ne un (ke makr) ki imaarat ko bunyaadon se aa liya, chunaancheh unke oupar chhat gir padi aur un par azaab aaya jahaan se woh shu'oor na rakhte the.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ يَوْمَ الْقِيٰمَةِ يُخْزِيْهِمْ وَ يَقُوْلُ اَيْنَ شُرَكَآءِيَ الَّذِيْنَ كُنْتُمْ تُشَاقُّوْنَ فِيْهِمْ ۭ قَالَ الَّذِيْنَ اُوْتُوا الْعِلْمَ اِنَّ الْخِزْيَ الْيَوْمَ وَ السُّوْٓءَ عَلَى الْكٰفِرِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Summa Yawmal- Qiyaamati yukhzeehim wa yaqoolu 'ayna shurakaaa'iyal-lazeena kuntum tushaaaqqoona feehim; qaalal-lazeena ootul-'ilma 'innal-khizyal- Yawma wassooo'a 'alal- kaafireen.
verses.translation: Phir qiyaamat ke din Allah unhein ruswa karega aur kahega: mere shareek kahaan hain jinki baabat tum (mominon se) jhagadte the? woh log kahenge jinhein ilm diya gaya tha: beshak aaj kaafiron ke liye ruswaayi aur badbakhti hai.

verses.arabic: الَّذِيْنَ تَتَوَفّٰٮهُمُ الْمَلٰٓىٕكَةُ ظَالِمِيْۤ اَنْفُسِهِمْ فَاَلْقَوُا السَّلَمَ مَا كُنَّا نَعْمَلُ مِنْ سُوْۤءٍ ۭ بَلٰى ۙ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ عَلِيْمٌۢ بِمَا كُنْتُمْ تَعْمَلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Allazeena tatawaffaahumul- malaaa'ikatu zaalimeee 'anfusihim fa'alqawus- salama maa kunnaa na'malu min sooo'; balaaa 'innal-laaha 'aleemum bimaa kuntum ta'maloon.
verses.translation: Woh jinki rooh farishte iss haal mein qabz karte hain ke woh apne aap par zulm kar rahe hote hain, to woh (yeh kahte huye) sar tasleem kham kar dete hain ke hum to koyi bura amal nahin karte the. (Farishte kahte hain:) kyun nahin! beshak Allah ko maloom hai jot um amal karte the.

verses.arabic: فَادْخُلُوْۤا اَبْوَابَ جَهَنَّمَ خٰلِدِيْنَ فِيْهَا ۚ فَلَبِئْسَ مَثْوَى الْمُتَكَبِّرِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Fadkhulooo 'abwaaba jahannama khaalideena feehaa falabi'sa maswal- mutakabbireen.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh tum jahannam ke darwaazon mein daakhil ho jaao,¹ uss mein hameshah rahoge. So kaisa bura thhikaana hai takabbur karne waalon ka!.
verses.deepMeaning: Imam Ibne Kaseer  رضي الله عنه farmaate hain unki maut ke fauran ba'd unki roohein jahannam mein chali jaati hain aur unke jism qabr mein rahte hain jahaan Allah Ta'ala apni qudrat-e-kaamilah se jism-o- rooh mein doori ke baa wajood, un mein ek guna ta'alluq paida karke unko azaab deta hai aur subh-o- shaam un par aag pesh ki jaati hai. Phir jab qiyaamat barpa hogi to unki roohein unke jismon mein laut aayengi aur hameshah ke liye yeh jahannam mein daakhil kar diye jaayenge.

verses.arabic: وَ قِيْلَ لِلَّذِيْنَ اتَّقَوْا مَاذَاۤ اَنْزَلَ رَبُّكُمْ ۭ قَالُوْا خَيْرًا ۭ لِّلَّذِيْنَ اَحْسَنُوْا فِيْ هٰذِهِ الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةٌ ۭ وَ لَدَارُ الْاٰخِرَةِ خَيْرٌ ۭ وَ لَنِعْمَ دَارُ الْمُتَّقِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa qeela lillazeenat- taqaw maazaaa 'anzala Rabbukum; qaaloo khayraa; lillazeena 'ahsanoo fee haazihid- dunyaa hasanah; wa la- Daarul-'Aakhirati khayr; wa lani'ma daarul- muttaqeen.
verses.translation: Aur (jab) poochha jaata hai muttaqi logon se ke tumhaare rab ne kiya naazil kiya hai? to woh kahte hain: 'Khair hi khair' jin logon ne bhalaayi ki unke liye iss dunya mein bhi bhalaayi hai aur daar-e-aakhirat to yaqeenan behtareen hai aur kiya khoob hai muttaqi logon ka ghar!

verses.arabic: جَنّٰتُ عَدْنٍ يَّدْخُلُوْنَهَا تَجْرِيْ مِنْ تَحْتِهَا الْاَنْهٰرُ ۖ لَهُمْ فِيْهَا مَا يَشَآءُوْنَ ۭ كَذٰلِكَ يَجْزِي اللّٰهُ الْمُتَّقِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Jannaatu 'Adniny- yadkhuloonahaa tajree min tahtihal- 'anhaaru lahum feehaa maa yashaaa'oon; kazaalika yajzil-laahul- muttaqeen.
verses.translation: (Ya'ni) hameshah ke baaghaat hain, woh un mein daakhil honge, unke neeche nahrein jaari hain, wahaan unke liye woh hoga jo woh chaahenge. Allah isi tarah muttaqi logon ko jazaa deta hai.

verses.arabic: الَّذِيْنَ تَتَوَفّٰٮهُمُ الْمَلٰٓىٕكَةُ طَيِّبِيْنَ ۙ يَقُوْلُوْنَ سَلٰمٌ عَلَيْكُمُ ادْخُلُوا الْجَنَّةَ بِمَا كُنْتُمْ تَعْمَلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Allazeena tatawaffaahumul-malaaa'ikatu tayyibeena yaqooloona salaamun 'alaykumud-khulul- Jannata bimaa kuntum ta'maloon.
verses.translation: Jin ki jaan farishte iss haal mein qabz karte hain ke woh (kufr-o-shirk se) paak hote hain, to (farishte) kahte hain: tum par salaam ho, tum jannat mein daakhil ho jaao uske badle jo tum amal karte the.

verses.arabic: هَلْ يَنْظُرُوْنَ اِلَّاۤ اَنْ تَاْتِيَهُمُ الْمَلٰٓىٕكَةُ اَوْ يَاْتِيَ اَمْرُ رَبِّكَ ۚ كَذٰلِكَ فَعَلَ الَّذِيْنَ مِنْ قَبْلِهِمْ ۭ وَ مَا ظَلَمَهُمُ اللّٰهُ وَ لٰكِنْ كَانُوْۤا اَنْفُسَهُمْ يَظْلِمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Hal yanzuroona 'illaaa 'an ta'tiyahumul- malaaa'ikatu 'aw ya'tiya 'amru Rabbik; kazaalika fa'alal-lazeena min qablihim; wa maa zalamahumul-laahu wa laakin kaanooo 'anfusahum yazlimoon.
verses.translation: Woh (kaafir) yahi intezaar to karte hain ke unke paas farishte aayein ya aapke rab ka hukm aaye. Isi tarah kiya tha un logon ne jo unse pahle the. Aur Allah ne un par zulm nahin kiya lekin woh khud apni jaanon par zulm karte the.

verses.arabic: فَاَصَابَهُمْ سَيِّاٰتُ مَا عَمِلُوْا وَ حَاقَ بِهِمْ مَا كَانُوْا بِهٖ يَسْتَهْزِءُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Fa'aşaabahum sayyi'aatu maa 'amiloo wa haaqa bihim maa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon.
verses.translation: Phir unhein unke a'amaal ke bure badle mile aur unhein uss (azaab) ne gher liya jis ka woh mazaaq udaate the.

verses.arabic: وَ قَالَ الَّذِيْنَ اَشْرَكُوْا لَوْ شَآءَ اللّٰهُ مَا عَبَدْنَا مِنْ دُوْنِهٖ مِنْ شَيْءٍ نَّحْنُ وَ لَاۤ اٰبَآؤُنَا وَ لَا حَرَّمْنَا مِنْ دُوْنِهٖ مِنْ شَيْءٍ ۭ كَذٰلِكَ فَعَلَ الَّذِيْنَ مِنْ قَبْلِهِمْ ۚ فَهَلْ عَلَى الرُّسُلِ اِلَّا الْبَلٰغُ الْمُبِيْنُ
verses.transliteration: Wa qaalal-lazeena 'ashrakoo law shaaa'al- laahu maa 'abadnaa min doonihee min shay'in nahnu wa laaa 'aabaaa'unaa wa laa harramnaa min doonihee min shay'; kazaalika fa'alal-lazeena min qablihim fahal 'alar- Rusuli 'illal-balaaghul- mubeen.
verses.translation: Aur mushrik logon ne kaha: agar Allah chaahta to hum uske siwa kisi cheez ki baadat na karte aur na hamaare baap dada hi, aur hum uss (ke hukm) ke baghair koyi cheez haraam na thhahraate. Isi tarah kiya tha un logon ne jo unse pahle the, chunaancheh Rasoolon ke zimme to sirf saaf saaf pahunchaa dena hai.

verses.arabic: وَ لَقَدْ بَعَثْنَا فِيْ كُلِّ اُمَّةٍ رَّسُوْلًا اَنِ اعْبُدُوا اللّٰهَ وَ اجْتَنِبُوا الطَّاغُوْتَ ۚ فَمِنْهُمْ مَّنْ هَدَى اللّٰهُ وَ مِنْهُمْ مَّنْ حَقَّتْ عَلَيْهِ الضَّلٰلَةُ ۭ فَسِيْرُوْا فِي الْاَرْضِ فَانْظُرُوْا كَيْفَ كَانَ عَاقِبَةُ الْمُكَذِّبِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad baʻasnaa fee kulli 'ummatir- Rasoolan 'ani'-budul- laaha wajtanibut- Taaghoota faminhum man hadal-laahu wa minhum-man haqqat 'alayhid-dalaalah; faseeroo fil-'ardi fanzuroo kayfa kaana 'aaqibatul-mukazzibeen.
verses.translation: Aur yaqeenan humne har ummat mein ek Rasool bheja ke Allah ki ibaadat karo aur taaghoot¹ se bacho, phir un mein se ba'z ko Allah ne hedaayat di aur un mein se ba'z par zalaalat saabit ho gayi, lehaaza tum zameen mein sair karo, phir dekho (Rasoolon ko) jhutlaane waalon ka anjaam kaisa bratnaak) huwa?
verses.deepMeaning: Taaghoot: mulaahazah ho haashyah (Surah Baqarah:2/257)

verses.arabic: اِنْ تَحْرِصْ عَلٰى هُدٰىهُمْ فَاِنَّ اللّٰهَ لَا يَهْدِيْ مَنْ يُضِلُّ ۚ وَ مَا لَهُمْ مِّنْ نّٰصِرِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'In tahriş 'alaa hudaahum fa'innal- laaha laa yahdee many- yudillu wa maa lahum minnaașireen.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) khaah aap unki hedaayat ke liye kitni hi hirs karein,¹ to beshak Allah jise gumraah kare phir use hidaayat nahin deta, aur un (gumraahon) ka madadgaar koyi bhi nahin.
verses.deepMeaning: Hadees mein Aap ﷺ ki uss khaahish aur koshish ko yun bayaan kiya gaya hai: Rasoolullah ﷺ ne farmaya: 'meri aur logon ki misaal aisi hai jaise kisi ne aag jalaayi jab aag ne apne ird gird ko raushan kiya to parwaane aur patinge, jo aag mein girte hain, uss mein girne lage, to woh aadmi unhein rokne laga. (ke woh uss mein na girein) lekin woh uss par ghaalib aa kar uss aag mein girte rahe. (Nabi ﷺ ne farmaya) isi tarah main bhi tumhein tumhaari kamron se pakad kar aag se rok rahaa hoon lekin tum ho ke aag mein girne par hi musir ho.' (Sahih Bukhari, Ar-reqaaq, Baab:26, Hadees:6483) Note: aag un naa jaayez-o-haraam a'amaal ki alaamat hai jin se Nabi Kareem ne khabardaar kiya hai.

verses.arabic: وَ اَقْسَمُوْا بِاللّٰهِ جَهْدَ اَيْمَانِهِمْ لَا يَبْعَثُ اللّٰهُ مَنْ يَّمُوْتُ ۭ بَلٰى وَعْدًا عَلَيْهِ حَقًّا وَّ لٰكِنَّ اَكْثَرَ النَّاسِ لَا يَعْلَمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'aqsamoo billaahi jahda 'aymaanihim laa yab'asul-laahu mañy- yamoot; balaa wa'dan 'alayhi haqqanw-wa laakinna 'aksaran-naasi laa yaʻlamoon.
verses.translation: Aur woh Allah ki pukhtah qasmein khaa kar kahte hain ke jo mar jaata hai Allah use dobaarah nahin uthhaayega. Kyun nahin! (balke woh uthhaayega) yeh uske zimme sachcha wa'dah hai lekin aksar log ilm nahin rakhte.

verses.arabic: لِيُبَيِّنَ لَهُمُ الَّذِيْ يَخْتَلِفُوْنَ فِيْهِ وَ لِيَعْلَمَ الَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْۤا اَنَّهُمْ كَانُوْا كٰذِبِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Liyubayyina lahumul- lazee yakhtalifoona feehi wa liyaʻlamal-lazeena kafarooo 'annahum kaanoo kaazibeen.
verses.translation: Taake unke liye waazeh kare woh baat ke jis mein woh ikhtelaaf karte the aur taake ma'loom ho jaaye kaafiron ko ke beshak wahi jhoote the.

verses.arabic: اِنَّمَا قَوْلُنَا لِشَيْءٍ اِذَآ اَرَدْنٰهُ اَنْ نَّقُوْلَ لَهٗ كُنْ فَيَكُوْنُ
verses.transliteration: 'Innamaa qawlunaa lishay'in 'izaaa 'aradnaahu 'an naqoola lahoo kun fayakoon.
verses.translation: Jab hum kisi cheez ka iraadah karlein to uske liye hamaara sirf yahi qaul hota hai ke hum usse kahte hain: ho jaao to woh ho jaati hai.

verses.arabic: وَ الَّذِيْنَ هَاجَرُوْا فِي اللّٰهِ مِنْۢ بَعْدِ مَا ظُلِمُوْا لَنُبَوِّئَنَّهُمْ فِي الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً ۭ وَ لَاَجْرُ الْاٰخِرَةِ اَكْبَرُ ۭ لَوْ كَانُوْا يَعْلَمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena haajaroo fil-laahi mim ba'di maa zulimoo lanubawwi'annahum fid-dunyaa hasanah; wa la'ajrul-'Aakhirati akbar law kaanoo yaʻlamoon.
verses.translation: Aur jin logon ne zulm-o- sitam sahne ke ba'd Allah ki raah mein hijrat ki to hum unhein dunya mein achchha thhikaana deinge aur yaqeenan aakhirat ka ajr to bahut bada hai, kaash! Woh ilm rakhte.

verses.arabic: اَلَّذِيْنَ صَبَرُوْا وَ عَلٰى رَبِّهِمْ يَتَوَكَّلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Allazeena şabaroo wa 'alaa Rabbihim yatawakkaloon.
verses.translation: Woh log jinhon ne sabr kiya aur woh apne rab hi par bharosah karte hain.

verses.arabic: وَ مَآ اَرْسَلْنَا مِنْ قَبْلِكَ اِلَّا رِجَالًا نُّوْحِيْۤ اِلَيْهِمْ فَسْـَٔلُوْۤا اَهْلَ الذِّكْرِ اِنْ كُنْتُمْ لَا تَعْلَمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maaa 'arsalnaa min qablika 'illaa rijaalan-nooheee 'ilayhim; fas'alooo 'ahlaz-zikri 'in kuntum laa talamoon.
verses.translation: Aur humne aapse pahle bhi mard hi (Nabi) bheje the,¹ hum unki taraf wahi karte the, lehaaza tum ahl-e-kitab se poochh lo agar tum ilm nahin rakhte
verses.deepMeaning: Matlab yeh hai ke humne jitne bhi Rasool bheje, woh insaan hi the iss liye Muhammad Rasoolullah ﷺ bhi agar insaan hain to yeh koyi nayi baat nahin ke tum unki bashriyat ki wajah se unki risaalat ka inkaar kardo. Mazeed dekhiye (Surah Al-Ambiya:21/7)

verses.arabic: بِالْبَيِّنٰتِ وَ الزُّبُرِ ۚ وَ اَنْزَلْنَاۤ اِلَيْكَ الذِّكْرَ لِتُبَيِّنَ لِلنَّاسِ مَا نُزِّلَ اِلَيْهِمْ وَ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَفَكَّرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Bilbayyinaati waz- Zubur; wa 'anzalnaaa 'ilaykaz-Zikra litubayyina linnaasi maa nuzzila 'ilayhim wa laʻallahum yatafakkaroon.
verses.translation: (Humne unhein) waazeh dalaayel aur kitaabon ke saath (bheja tha) aur humne aap par yeh zikr (qur'an) naazil kiya taake aap logon ke saamne bayaan karein jo kuchh unki taraf naazil kiya gaya aur taake woh ghaur-o- fikr karein.

verses.arabic: اَفَاَمِنَ الَّذِيْنَ مَكَرُوا السَّيِّاٰتِ اَنْ يَّخْسِفَ اللّٰهُ بِهِمُ الْاَرْضَ اَوْ يَاْتِيَهُمُ الْعَذَابُ مِنْ حَيْثُ لَا يَشْعُرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Afa'aminal-lazeena makarus-sayyi'aati 'añy- yakhsifal-laahu bihimul- 'arda 'aw ya'tiyahumul- 'azaabu min haysu laa yash'uroon.
verses.translation: Kiya be khauf ho gaye hain jinhon ne bure makr kiye ke Allah unhein zameen mein dhansa de ya un par azaab le aaye jahaan se woh shu'oor nahin rakhte.

verses.arabic: اَوْ يَاْخُذَهُمْ فِيْ تَقَلُّبِهِمْ فَمَا هُمْ بِمُعْجِزِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Aw ya'khuzahum fee taqallubihim famaa hum bimu jizeen.
verses.translation: Ya unke chalne phirne mein unhein pakad le, phir woh use aajiz karne waale nahin.

verses.arabic: اَوْ يَاْخُذَهُمْ عَلٰى تَخَوُّفٍ فَاِنَّ رَبَّكُمْ لَرَءُوْفٌ رَّحِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: 'Aw ya'khuzahum 'alaa takhawwuf; fa'inna Rabbakum la-Ra'oofur- Raheem.
verses.translation: Ya unhein haalat-e-khauf mein mubtala karke pakad le phir bilaa shubah tumhaara rab bahut shafqat waala, bada raham waala hai.

verses.arabic: اَوَ لَمْ يَرَوْا اِلٰى مَا خَلَقَ اللّٰهُ مِنْ شَيْءٍ يَّتَفَيَّؤُا ظِلٰلُهٗ عَنِ الْيَمِيْنِ وَ الشَّمَآىٕلِ سُجَّدًا لِّلّٰهِ وَ هُمْ دٰخِرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Awa lam yaraw 'ilaa maa khalaqal-laahu min shay'iny-yatafayya'u zilaaluhoo 'anil-yameeni washshamaaa'ili sujjadal-lillaahi wa hum daakhiroon.
verses.translation: Kiya yeh log Allah ki paida ki huyi cheezon ko nahin dekhte ke unke saaye daayein aur baayein jaanib se dhalte hain Allah ko sajdah karte huye aur (uske saamne) woh sab aajiz hain?.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Allah Ta'ala ki azmat-o-kibriyaayi aur uski jalaalat-e-shaan ka bayaan hai ke har cheez uske saamne jhuki huyi aur muti' hai. Jamaadaat hon ya haiwanaat ya jinn-o-insaan aur malaayekah. Har cheez jiska saayah hai aur uska saayah daayein baayein jhukta hai to woh subh-o-shaam apne saaye ke saath Allah ko sajdah karti hai. Imam Mujaahid رضي الله عنه farmaate hain jab suraj dhalta hai to har cheez Allah ke saamne sajdah rez ho jaati hai.

verses.arabic: وَ لِلّٰهِ يَسْجُدُ مَا فِي السَّمٰوٰتِ وَ مَا فِي الْاَرْضِ مِنْ دَآبَّةٍ وَّ الْمَلٰٓىٕكَةُ وَ هُمْ لَا يَسْتَكْبِرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa lillaahi yasjudu maa fis-samaawaati wa maa fil-'ardi min daaabbatiñw- walmalaaa'ikatu wa hum laa yastakbiroon.
verses.translation: Aur aasmaanon aur zameen ke tamaam jaandaar Allah ko sajdah karte hain? aur tamaam farishte bhi aur takbbur nahin karte.

verses.arabic: يَخَافُوْنَ رَبَّهُمْ مِّنْ فَوْقِهِمْ وَ يَفْعَلُوْنَ مَا يُؤْمَرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: yakhaafoona Rabbahum min fawqihim wa yafaloona maa yu'maroon.
verses.translation: Woh apne oupar apne rab se darte hain aur wahi karte hain jo unhein hukm diya jaata hai.

verses.arabic: وَ قَالَ اللّٰهُ لَا تَتَّخِذُوْٓا اِلٰهَيْنِ اثْنَيْنِ ۚ اِنَّمَا هُوَ اِلٰهٌ وَّاحِدٌ ۚ فَاِيَّايَ فَارْهَبُوْنِ
verses.transliteration: Wa qaalal-laahu laa tattakhizooo 'ilaahaynis- nayni 'innamaa Huwa 'Ilaahuñw-Waahid; fa'iyyaaya farhaboon.
verses.translation: Aur Allah ne farmaya: do ilaah mat banaao, bas woh akela ilaah hai, lehaaza tum mujhi se daro.

verses.arabic: وَ لَهٗ مَا فِي السَّمٰوٰتِ وَ الْاَرْضِ وَ لَهُ الدِّيْنُ وَاصِبًا ۭ اَفَغَيْرَ اللّٰهِ تَتَّقُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa lahoo maa fis- samaawaati wal'ardi wa lahud-deenu waaşibaa; 'afaghayral-laahi tattaqoon.
verses.translation: Aur usi ke liye hai jo aasmaanon aur zameen mein hai aur usi ki etaa'at daayemi hai. kiya phir tum ghairullah se darte ho?

verses.arabic: وَ مَا بِكُمْ مِّنْ نِّعْمَةٍ فَمِنَ اللّٰهِ ۚ ثُمَّ اِذَا مَسَّكُمُ الضُّرُّ فَاِلَيْهِ تَجْــــَٔرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maa bikum min ni'matin faminal-laahi summa 'izaa massakumud-durru fa'ilayhi taj'aroon.
verses.translation: Aur tumhaare paas jo bhi ne'mat hai to woh Allah ki taraf se hai phir jab tumhein koyi takleef pahunchti hai to usi se tum faryaad karte ho

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ اِذَا كَشَفَ الضُّرَّ عَنْكُمْ اِذَا فَرِيْقٌ مِّنْكُمْ بِرَبِّهِمْ يُشْرِكُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Summaa 'izaa kashafad-durra 'ankum 'izaa fareequm-minkum bi-Rabbihim yushrikoon.
verses.translation: Phir jab woh tumse takleef hataa deta hai to tum mein se ek fareeq apne rab ke saath shirk karne lagta hai.

verses.arabic: لِيَكْفُرُوْا بِمَآ اٰتَيْنٰهُمْ ۚ فَتَمَتَّعُوْا فَسَوْفَ تَعْلَمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Liyakfuroo bimaaa 'aataynaahum; fatamatta'oo, fasawfa talamoon.
verses.translation: Taake un (ne'maton) ki naa shukri karein jo humne unhein deen, chunaancheh tum faaidah uthhaalo, phir jald tum jaan loge.

verses.arabic: وَ يَجْعَلُوْنَ لِمَا لَا يَعْلَمُوْنَ نَصِيْبًا مِّمَّا رَزَقْنٰهُمْ ۭ تَاللّٰهِ لَتُسْــٴَــلُنَّ عَمَّا كُنْتُمْ تَفْتَرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa yaj'aloona limaa laa ya'lamoona naseebam-mimmaa razaqnaahum; tallaahi latus'alunnaa 'ammaa kuntum taftaroon.
verses.translation: Aur humne unhein jo rizq diya hai uss mein se un (baatil ma'boodon) ka hissa thhahraate hain jinhein yeh jaante bhi nahin, Allah ki qasam! Tum se tumhaari ifteraa pardaaziyon ka zaroor sawaal hoga.

verses.arabic: وَ يَجْعَلُوْنَ لِلّٰهِ الْبَنٰتِ سُبْحٰنَهٗ وَ لَهُمْ مَّا يَشْتَهُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa yaj'aloona lillaahil-banaati Subhaanahoo wa lahum maa yashtahoon.
verses.translation: Aur woh Allah ki betiyaan thhahraate hain woh (aulaad se) paak hai aur unke liye hai jo woh chaahein (ya'ni bete)

verses.arabic: وَ اِذَا بُشِّرَ اَحَدُهُمْ بِالْاُنْثٰى ظَلَّ وَجْهُهٗ مُسْوَدًّا وَّهُوَ كَظِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'izaa bushshira 'ahaduhum bil'unsaa zalla wajhuhoo muswaddañw-wa huwa kazeem.
verses.translation: Aur jab un mein se kisi ko beti ki bashaarat di jaaye to uska chehra kaala pad jaata hai aur woh gham-o- ghusse se bhara hota hai.

verses.arabic: يَتَوَارٰى مِنَ الْقَوْمِ مِنْ سُوْٓءِ مَا بُشِّرَ بِهٖ ۚ اَيُمْسِكُهٗ عَلٰى هُوْنٍ اَمْ يَدُسُّهٗ فِي التُّرَابِ ۭ اَلَا سَآءَ مَا يَحْكُمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Yatawaaraa minal- qawmi min sooo'i maa bushshira bih; 'ayumsikuhoo 'alaa hoonin 'am yadussuhoo fit-turaab; 'alaa saaa'a maa yahkumoon.
verses.translation: Woh uss aa'r ke baayis, jiski use bashaarat di gayi, logon se chhupta phirta hai, (sochta hai) kiya apni tauheen ke baawajood use baaqi rakkhe ya use mitti mein daba de?¹ aagaah raho! Bahut bura hai jo woh faislah karte hain.
verses.deepMeaning: Yeh ishaarah hai zamaanh jaaheliyat ki uss rasm ki taraf ke woh ladkiyon ko zindah dar gor kar diya karate the. Islam ne uss zulm se roka.

verses.arabic: لِلَّذِيْنَ لَا يُؤْمِنُوْنَ بِالْاٰخِرَةِ مَثَلُ السَّوْءِ ۚ وَلِلّٰهِ الْمَثَلُ الْاَعْلٰى ۭ وَ هُوَ الْعَزِيْزُ الْحَكِيْمُ
verses.transliteration: Lillazeena laa yu'minoona bil-'Aakhirati masalus-saw'i wa lillaahil-masalul-'a'laa; wa Huwal-'Azeezul- Hakeem.
verses.translation: Jo log aakhirat par eemaan nahin rakhte unke liye buri misaal hai, aur Allah ke liye a'ala misaal hai, aur woh ghaalib hai, khoob hikmat waala.

verses.arabic: وَ لَوْ يُؤَاخِذُ اللّٰهُ النَّاسَ بِظُلْمِهِمْ مَّا تَرَكَ عَلَيْهَا مِنْ دَآبَّةٍ وَّ لٰكِنْ يُّؤَخِّرُهُمْ اِلٰٓى اَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى ۚ فَاِذَا جَآءَ اَجَلُهُمْ لَا يَسْتَاْخِرُوْنَ سَاعَةً وَّلَا يَسْتَقْدِمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa law yu'aakhizul- laahun-naasa bizulmihim maa taraka 'alayhaa min daaabbatiñw-wa laakiny-yu'akhkhiruhum 'ilaaa 'ajalim-musamman fa'izaa jaaa'a 'ajaluhum laa yasta'khiroona saa'ataniw-wa laa yastaqdimoon.
verses.translation: Aur agar Allah logon ke zulm par unka muaakhazah kare to zameen par koyi chalne waala (jaandaar) na chhode lekin woh ek muqarrar waqt tak unhein dheel deta hai. phir jab unka muqarrar waqt aa phunchta hai to woh ek ghadi bhi aage peechhe nahin ho sakte.

verses.arabic: وَ يَجْعَلُوْنَ لِلّٰهِ مَا يَكْرَهُوْنَ وَ تَصِفُ اَلْسِنَتُهُمُ الْكَذِبَ اَنَّ لَهُمُ الْحُسْنٰى ۖ لَا جَرَمَ اَنَّ لَهُمُ النَّارَ وَ اَنَّهُمْ مُّفْرَطُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa yaj'aloona lillaahi maa yakrahoona wa taşifu 'alsinatuhumul- kaziba 'anna lahumul- husnaa laa jarama 'anna lahumun-Naara wa 'annahum mufratoon.
verses.translation: Aur woh Allah ke liye woh cheez thhahraate hain jisse khud karaahat karte hain aur unki zabaanein jhoot kahti hain ke beshak unke liye bhalaayi hai. bilaa shubah yaqeenan unke liye aag hai aur beshak woh uss mein sab se aage bheje jaayenge.

verses.arabic: تَاللّٰهِ لَقَدْ اَرْسَلْنَآ اِلٰٓى اُمَمٍ مِّنْ قَبْلِكَ فَزَيَّنَ لَهُمُ الشَّيْطٰنُ اَعْمَالَهُمْ فَهُوَ وَلِيُّهُمُ الْيَوْمَ وَ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ اَلِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: Tallaahi laqad 'arsalnaaa 'ilaaa 'umamim-min qablika fazayyana lahumush- Shaytaanu 'a'maalahum fahuwa waliyyuhumul- yawma wa lahum 'azaabun 'aleem.
verses.translation: Allah ki qasam! Humne aapse pahli qaumon ki taraf Rasool bheje to shaytaan ne unke (bure) a'amaal unke liye khushnuma kar diye, chunaancheh aaj wahi unka dost hai aur unke liye dardnaak azaab hai.

verses.arabic: وَ مَاۤ اَنْزَلْنَا عَلَيْكَ الْكِتٰبَ اِلَّا لِتُبَيِّنَ لَهُمُ الَّذِيْ اخْتَلَفُوْا فِيْهِ وَ هُدًى وَّ رَحْمَةً لِّقَوْمٍ يُّؤْمِنُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maaa 'anzalnaa ■'alaykal-Kitaaba 'illaa litubayyina lahumul- lazikh-talafoo feehi wa hudañw-wa rahmatal- liqawminy-yu'minoon.
verses.translation: Aur humne aap par yeh kitab sirf isliye naazil ki hai taake aap un par woh cheez waazeh kardein jis mein woh ikhtelaaf karte hain aur woh eemaan laane waalon ke liye hidaayat aur rahmat hai.

verses.arabic: وَ اللّٰهُ اَنْزَلَ مِنَ السَّمَآءِ مَآءً فَاَحْيَا بِهِ الْاَرْضَ بَعْدَ مَوْتِهَا ۭ اِنَّ فِيْ ذٰلِكَ لَاٰيَةً لِّقَوْمٍ يَّسْمَعُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wallaahu 'anzala minas-samaaa'i maaa'an fa'ahyaa bihil-'arda ba'da mawtihaaa; 'inna fee zaalika la-'Aayatal- liqawminy-yasmaʻoon.
verses.translation: Aur Allah ne aasmaan se paani naazil kiya phir uske saath zameen ko uski maut ke ba'd zindah kiya, behsak iss mein un logon ke liye nishaani hai jo sunte hain.

verses.arabic: وَ اِنَّ لَكُمْ فِي الْاَنْعَامِ لَعِبْرَةً ۚ نُسْقِيْكُمْ مِّمَّا فِيْ بُطُوْنِهٖ مِنْۢ بَيْنِ فَرْثٍ وَّ دَمٍ لَّبَنًا خَالِصًا سَآىٕغًا لِّلشّٰرِبِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'inna lakum fil- 'an'aami la'ibrah; nusqeekum mimmaa fee butoonihee mim bayni farsinw-wa damil-labanan khaalişan saaa'ighal- lishshaaribeen.
verses.translation: Aur beshak tumhaare liye chaupaayon mein bhi ibrat (ghaur-o- fikr ka saamaan) hai. hum tumhein pilaate hain usse jo unke peton mein hai, gobar aur lahu ke beech se khaalis doodh, peene waalon ke liye nehaayat khush gawaar.

verses.arabic: وَ مِنْ ثَمَرٰتِ النَّخِيْلِ وَ الْاَعْنَابِ تَتَّخِذُوْنَ مِنْهُ سَكَرًا وَّ رِزْقًا حَسَنًا ۭ اِنَّ فِيْ ذٰلِكَ لَاٰيَةً لِّقَوْمٍ يَّعْقِلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa min samaraatin- nakheeli wal'a'naabi tattakhizoona minhu sakarañw-wa rizqan hasanaa; 'inna fee zaalika la-'Aayatal- liqawminy-yaʻqiloon.
verses.translation: Aur khujoor aur angoor ke kuchh phal woh hain jinse tum nasha (aawar sharaab) aur achchha rizq haasil karte ho. beshak iss mein nishaani hai un logon ke liye jo aql rakhte hain.

verses.arabic: وَ اَوْحٰى رَبُّكَ اِلَى النَّحْلِ اَنِ اتَّخِذِيْ مِنَ الْجِبَالِ بُيُوْتًا وَّ مِنَ الشَّجَرِ وَ مِمَّا يَعْرِشُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'awhaa Rabbuka 'ilan-nahli 'anit-takhizee minal-jibaali buyootañw- wa minash-shajari wa mimmaa ya'rishoon.
verses.translation: Aur aapke rab ne shahad ki makkhi ko ilhaam kiya ke tu pahaadon mein ghar (chhatte) bana aur darakhton mein aur un (chhapparon) mein jin par log belein chadhaate hain

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ كُلِيْ مِنْ كُلِّ الثَّمَرٰتِ فَاسْلُكِيْ سُبُلَ رَبِّكِ ذُلُلًا ۭ يَخْرُجُ مِنْۢ بُطُوْنِهَا شَرَابٌ مُّخْتَلِفٌ اَلْوَانُهٗ فِيْهِ شِفَآءٌ لِّلنَّاسِ ۭ اِنَّ فِيْ ذٰلِكَ لَاٰيَةً لِّقَوْمٍ يَّتَفَكَّرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Summa kulee min kullis-samaraati faslukee subula Rabbiki zululaa; yakhruju mim butoonihaa sharaabum-mukhtalifun 'alwaanuhoo feehi shifaaa'ul-linnaas, 'inna fee zaalika la-'Aayatal- liqawminy- yatafakkaroon.
verses.translation: Phir har qism ke phalon (aur phoolon) se ras choos, phir apne rab ki hamwaar raahon par chal. Unke peton se mukhtalif rangon ka mashroob (shahad) nikalta hai, iss mein logon ke liye shifa hai, beshak iss mein bhi ghaur-o-fikr karne waalon ke liye bahut badi nishaani hai.

verses.arabic: وَ اللّٰهُ خَلَقَكُمْ ثُمَّ يَتَوَفّٰىكُمْ ۚ وَ مِنْكُمْ مَّنْ يُّرَدُّ اِلٰى اَرْذَلِ الْعُمُرِ لِكَيْ لَا يَعْلَمَ بَعْدَ عِلْمٍ شَيْـًٔا ۭ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ عَلِيْمٌ قَدِيْرٌ
verses.transliteration: Wallaahu khalaqakum summa yatawaffaakum; wa minkum mañy- yuraddu 'ilaaa 'arzalil- 'umuri likay laa ya'lama ba'da 'ilmin shay'aa; 'innal-laaha Aleemun Qadeer.
verses.translation: Aur Allah ne tumhein paida kiya phir wahi tumhein wafaat deta hai aur tum mein se koyi naakaarah umr tak pahuncha diya jaata hai taake woh ilm ke ba'd kuchh na jaane, beshak Allah khoob jaanne waala, Khoob qudrat waala hai.

verses.arabic: وَ اللّٰهُ فَضَّلَ بَعْضَكُمْ عَلٰى بَعْضٍ فِي الرِّزْقِ ۭ فَمَا الَّذِيْنَ فُضِّلُوْا بِرَآدِّيْ رِزْقِهِمْ عَلٰى مَا مَلَكَتْ اَيْمَانُهُمْ فَهُمْ فِيْهِ سَوَآءٌ ۭ اَفَبِنِعْمَةِ اللّٰهِ يَجْحَدُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wallaahu faddala ba'dakum 'alaa ba'din fir-rizq; famal-lazeena fuddiloo biraaaddee rizqihim 'alaa maa malakat 'aymaanuhum fahum feehi sawaaa'; 'afabini'matil-laahi yajhadoon.
verses.translation: Aur Allah ne rizq mein tum mein se ba'z ko ba'z par fazeelat di, phir jin logon ko fazeelat di gayi woh apna rizq un logon ki taraf nahin lautaate jo unke daayein haath ki milkiyat mein (ghulaam) hain ke woh uss (rizq) mein baraabar hon. Kiya phir woh Allah ki ne'mat hi ke munkir hain?¹
verses.deepMeaning: Allah Ta'ala ne yeh misaal un mushrikeen ke baare mein bayaan farmaayi hai jo jhoote khudaaon ko Allah ke saath shareek thhahraate hain ke woh (mushrikeen) khud uss baat par raza mand na honge ke unki daulat aur jaayedaad mein unke ghulaam hissah daar ban jaayein phir yeh log Allah ki bandage- ibaadat mein jhoote khudaaon (devtaaon) ko shareek karne par kyunkar raazí ho jaate hain?

verses.arabic: وَ اللّٰهُ جَعَلَ لَكُمْ مِّنْ اَنْفُسِكُمْ اَزْوَاجًا وَّ جَعَلَ لَكُمْ مِّنْ اَزْوَاجِكُمْ بَنِيْنَ وَ حَفَدَةً وَّ رَزَقَكُمْ مِّنَ الطَّيِّبٰتِ ۭ اَفَبِالْبَاطِلِ يُؤْمِنُوْنَ وَ بِنِعْمَةِ اللّٰهِ هُمْ يَكْفُرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wallaahu ja'ala lakum min 'anfusikum 'azwaajanw-wa ja'ala lakum min 'azwaajikum baneena wa hafadatañw-wa razaqakum minat- tayyibaat; 'afabilbaatili yu'minoona wa bini'matil-laahi hum yakfuroon.
verses.translation: Aur Allah ne tumhaare liye tumhi mein se biwiyaan banaayen aur usi ne tumhaare liye tumhaari biwiyon se bête aur pote banaaye, aur tumhein paakeezah cheezon se rizq diya. Kiya phir bhi woh baatil par eemaan laate hain aur Allah ki ne'maton ki naa shukri karte hain?

verses.arabic: وَ يَعْبُدُوْنَ مِنْ دُوْنِ اللّٰهِ مَا لَا يَمْلِكُ لَهُمْ رِزْقًا مِّنَ السَّمٰوٰتِ وَ الْاَرْضِ شَيْــٴًـا وَّ لَا يَسْتَطِيْعُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa ya'budoona min doonil-laahi maa laa yamliku lahum rizqam- minas-samaawaati wal'ardi shay'anw-wa laa yastatee'oon.
verses.translation: Aur woh Allah ke siwa unki ibaadat karte hain jinhein aasmaanon aur zameen se unke liye kisi rizq ka koyi ikhtiyaar nahin aur na woh (uski) iste'taa'at hi rakhte hain.

verses.arabic: فَلَا تَضْرِبُوْا لِلّٰهِ الْاَمْثَالَ ۭ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ يَعْلَمُ وَ اَنْتُمْ لَا تَعْلَمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Falaa tadriboo lillaahil-'amsaal; 'innal- laaha ya'lamu wa 'antum laa taʻlamoon
verses.translation: Chunaancheh tum Allah ke liye misaalein na bayaan karo. Beshak Allah jaanta hai aur tum nahin jaante.

verses.arabic: ضَرَبَ اللّٰهُ مَثَلًا عَبْدًا مَمْلُوْكًا لَا يَقْدِرُ عَلٰى شَيْءٍ وَّ مَنْ رَّزَقْنٰهُ مِنَّا رِزْقًا حَسَنًا فَهُوَ يُنْفِقُ مِنْهُ سِرًّا وَّ جَهْرًا ۭ هَلْ يَسْتَوٗنَ ۭ اَلْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ بَلْ اَكْثَرُهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Darabal-laahu masalan 'abdam- mamlookal-laa yaqdiru 'alaa shay'inw-wa mar-razaqnaahu minnaa rizqan hasanan fahuwa yunfiqu minhu sirrañw- wa jahraa; hal yastawoon; 'alhamdu lillaah; bal 'aksaruhum laa ya'lamoon.
verses.translation: Allah ne misaal bayaan ki ek ghulaam mamlook ki jo kisi cheez par qudrat nahin rakhta aur (doosra) woh jise humne apni taraf se achchha rizq diya, chunaancheh woh uss mein se khufyah aur e'laaniyah kharch karta hai. Kiya woh baraabar ho sakte hain?¹ tamaam hamd Allah hi ke liye hai balke aksar log (yeh waazeh haqeeqat bhi) nahin jaante.
verses.deepMeaning: Ba'z kahte hain ke yeh ghulaam aur azad ki misaal hai ke pahla shakhs ghulaam aur doosra azad hai. Yeh donon baraabar nahin ho sakte. Ba'z kahte hain ke yeh momin aur kaafir ki misaal hai pahla kaafir aur doosra momin hai. Yeh baraabar nahin. Ba'z kahte hain ke yeh Allah Ta'ala aur asnaam (maboodaan-e- baatilah) ki misaal hai pahle se muraad asnaam aur doosre se Allah hai. Yeh donon baraabar nahin ho sakte. Matlab yahi hai ke ek ghulaam aur azad baawajood iss baat ke ke donon insaan hain. donon Allah ki makhlooq hain aur bhi bahut si cheezein donon ke dermiyaan mushtarikah hain, iske baa wajood rutbah-o- sharf aur fazl-o-manzilat mein tum donon ko baraabar nahin samajhte. to Allah Ta'ala aur patthar ke ek moorti ya qabr ki dheri, yeh donon kis tarah baraabar ho sakte hain.

verses.arabic: وَ ضَرَبَ اللّٰهُ مَثَلًا رَّجُلَيْنِ اَحَدُهُمَآ اَبْكَمُ لَا يَقْدِرُ عَلٰى شَيْءٍ وَّهُوَ كَلٌّ عَلٰى مَوْلٰىهُ اَيْنَمَا يُوَجِّهْهُ لَا يَاْتِ بِخَيْرٍ ۭ هَلْ يَسْتَوٗنَ هُوَ وَ مَنْ يَّاْمُرُ بِالْعَدْلِ وَ هُوَ عَلٰى صِرَاطٍ مُّسْتَقِيْمٍ
verses.transliteration: Wa darabal-laahu masalar-rajulayni 'ahaduhumaaa 'abkamu laa yaqdiru 'alaa shay'inw-wa huwa kallun 'alaa mawlaahu 'aynamaa yuwajjihhu laa ya'ti bikhayrin hal yastawee huwa wa many-ya'muru bil'adli wa huwa 'alaa Şiraatim- Mustaqeem.
verses.translation: Aur Allah ne do shakhson ki (ek aur) misaal bayaan ki, un mein se ek gonga (aur bahra) hai, woh kisi cheez par qudrat nahin rakhta jabke woh apne aaqa par ek bojh hai, jahaan kahin bhi woh use bheje woh koyi khair aur bhalaayi nahin laata. Kiya woh uss shakhs ke baraabar ho sakta hai jo adl ka hukm deta hai aur woh siraat-e- mustaqeem par hai?

verses.arabic: وَ لِلّٰهِ غَيْبُ السَّمٰوٰتِ وَ الْاَرْضِ ۭ وَ مَآ اَمْرُ السَّاعَةِ اِلَّا كَلَمْحِ الْبَصَرِ اَوْ هُوَ اَقْرَبُ ۭ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ عَلٰى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيْرٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa lillaahi ghaybus- samaawaati wal'ard; wa maaa 'amrus-Saa'ati 'illaa kalamhil-başari 'aw huwa 'aqrab; 'innal- laaha 'alaa kulli shay'in Qadeer.
verses.translation: Aur Allah hi ke paas hai ghaib aasmaanon aur zameen ka, aur qiyamat ka muaamlah to bas aankh jhapakne ki tarah hai balke usse bhi qareeb tar, beshak Allah har cheez par khoob qaadir hai.

verses.arabic: وَ اللّٰهُ اَخْرَجَكُمْ مِّنْۢ بُطُوْنِ اُمَّهٰتِكُمْ لَا تَعْلَمُوْنَ شَيْـًٔا وَّ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ السَّمْعَ وَ الْاَبْصَارَ وَ الْاَفْــِٕدَةَ ۙ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَشْكُرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wallaahu 'akhrajakum mim butooni 'ummahaatikum laa taʻlamoona shay'anw-wa ja'ala lakumus-sam'a wal'absaara wal'af'idata la'al-lakum tashkuroon.
verses.translation: Aur Allah ne tumhein tumhaari maaon ke peton se iss haal mein nikaala ke tum kuchh ilm nahin rakhte the, aur usi ne tumhaare kaan, aankhein aur dil banaaye taake tum shukr karo.

verses.arabic: اَلَمْ يَرَوْا اِلَى الطَّيْرِ مُسَخَّرٰتٍ فِيْ جَوِّ السَّمَآءِ ۭ مَا يُمْسِكُهُنَّ اِلَّا اللّٰهُ ۭ اِنَّ فِيْ ذٰلِكَ لَاٰيٰتٍ لِّقَوْمٍ يُّؤْمِنُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Alam yaraw 'ilat- tayri musakhkharaatin fee jawwis-samaaa'i maa yumsikuhunna 'illal-laah; 'inna fee zaalika la-'Aayaatil- liqawminy-yu'minoon.
verses.translation: Kiya unhon ne parindon ki taraf nahin dekha, woh aasmaani fiza mein musakhkhar (taabe' farmaan) hain. Allah ke siwa, unhein (fiza mein) koyi nahin thaam raha. Beshak USS mein nishaaniyaan hain un logon ke liye jo eemaan laate hain.

verses.arabic: وَ اللّٰهُ جَعَلَ لَكُمْ مِّنْۢ بُيُوْتِكُمْ سَكَنًا وَّ جَعَلَ لَكُمْ مِّنْ جُلُوْدِ الْاَنْعَامِ بُيُوْتًا تَسْتَخِفُّوْنَهَا يَوْمَ ظَعْنِكُمْ وَ يَوْمَ اِقَامَتِكُمْ ۭ وَ مِنْ اَصْوَافِهَا وَ اَوْبَارِهَا وَ اَشْعَارِهَآ اَثَاثًا وَّ مَتَاعًا اِلٰى حِيْنٍ
verses.transliteration: Wallaahu ja'ala lakum mim buyootikum sakanañw-wa ja'ala lakum min juloodil- an'aami buyootan tastakhiffoonahaa yawma za nikum wa yawma 'iqaamatikum wa min 'aşwaafihaa wa 'awbaarihaa wa 'ash'aarihaaa 'asaasanw-wa mataa'an 'ilaa heen.
verses.translation: Aur Allah ne tumhaare liye tumhaare ghar jaaye sukoonat banaaye aur tumhaare liye chaupaaiyon ki khaalon se aise ghar (kheeme) banaaye jinhein tum halka samajhte ho apne Kooch ke din aur apne qiyaam ke din, aur un (bhedon) ki oun se aur un (wounton) ki pashm se aur un (bakriyon) ke baalon se gharelu asaase aur ek muddat tak baratne ki cheezein (banaayeen)

verses.arabic: وَ اللّٰهُ جَعَلَ لَكُمْ مِّمَّا خَلَقَ ظِلٰلًا وَّ جَعَلَ لَكُمْ مِّنَ الْجِبَالِ اَكْنَانًا وَّ جَعَلَ لَكُمْ سَرَابِيْلَ تَقِيْكُمُ الْحَرَّ وَ سَرَابِيْلَ تَقِيْكُمْ بَاْسَكُمْ ۭ كَذٰلِكَ يُتِمُّ نِعْمَتَهٗ عَلَيْكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُسْلِمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wallaahu ja'ala lakum mimmaa khalaqa zilaalañw-wa ja'ala lakum-minal-jibaali 'aknaananw-wa ja'ala lakum saraabeela taqeekumul-harra wa saraabeela taqeekum ba'sakum; kazaalika yutimmu ni'matahoo 'alaykum laʻallakum tuslimoon.
verses.translation: Aur Allah ne apni takhleeq kardah cheezon se tumhaare liye saaye banaaye aur tumhaare liye pahaadon mein chhupne ke maqaam (ghaar) banaaye aur tumhaare liye kurte banaaye jo tumhein garmi se bachaate hain aur kurte (zerah baktar) jo tumhaari ladaayi mein tumhein bachaate hain. isi tarah woh tum par apni ne'matein tamaam karta hai taake tum farmaan bardaar ban jaao.

verses.arabic: فَاِنْ تَوَلَّوْا فَاِنَّمَا عَلَيْكَ الْبَلٰغُ الْمُبِيْنُ
verses.transliteration: Fa'in tawallaw fa'innamaa 'alaykal- balaaghul-mubeen.
verses.translation: Phir agar woh munh modein to aapke zimme to sirf saaf saaf tableegh hai.

verses.arabic: يَعْرِفُوْنَ نِعْمَتَ اللّٰهِ ثُمَّ يُنْكِرُوْنَهَا وَ اَكْثَرُهُمُ الْكٰفِرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Ya'rifoona ni'matal- laahi summa yunkiroonahaa wa 'aksaruhumul-kaafiroon.
verses.translation: Woh Allah ki ne'mat ko pahchaante hain phir uska inkaar karte hain aur un mein aksar naa shukre hain.

verses.arabic: وَ يَوْمَ نَبْعَثُ مِنْ كُلِّ اُمَّةٍ شَهِيْدًا ثُمَّ لَا يُؤْذَنُ لِلَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا وَ لَا هُمْ يُسْتَعْتَبُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa yawma nab'asu min kulli 'ummatin shaheedan summa laa yuʼzanu lillazeena kafaroo wa laa hum yusta'taboon.
verses.translation: Aur (yaad karo) jis din hum har ummat mein se ek gawaah khada karenge phir jinhon ne kufr kiya, unhein izn nahin milega aur na unse taubah hi ka mutaalabah kiya jaayega.

verses.arabic: وَ اِذَا رَاَ الَّذِيْنَ ظَلَمُوا الْعَذَابَ فَلَا يُخَفَّفُ عَنْهُمْ وَ لَا هُمْ يُنْظَرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'izaa ra'al- lazeena zalamul-'azaaba falaa yukhaffafu 'anhum wa laa hum yunzaroon.
verses.translation: Jin logon ne zulm kiya jab woh azaab dekh lenge to na unse (azaab mein) takhfeef ki jaayegi aur na unko dheel di jaayegi.

verses.arabic: وَ اِذَا رَاَ الَّذِيْنَ اَشْرَكُوْا شُرَكَآءَهُمْ قَالُوْا رَبَّنَا هٰٓؤُلَآءِ شُرَكَآؤُنَا الَّذِيْنَ كُنَّا نَدْعُوْا مِنْ دُوْنِكَ ۚ فَاَلْقَوْا اِلَيْهِمُ الْقَوْلَ اِنَّكُمْ لَكٰذِبُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'izaa ra'al- lazeena 'ashrakoo shurakaaa'ahum qaaloo Rabbanaa haaa'ulaaa shurakaaa'unal-lazeena kunnaa nad'co min doonika fa'alqaw 'ilayhimul-qawla 'innakum lakaaziboon.
verses.translation: Aur jin logon ne shirk kiya, jab woh apne (khud saakhtah) shareekon ko dekhenge to kahenge: aye hamaare rab! Yeh hamaare shareek hain jinhein hum tere siwa pukaarte the. tab woh (shareek) unki baat unke munh par de maarenge (aur kahenge:) bilaa shubah tum ho yaqeenan jhoote ho.

verses.arabic: وَ اَلْقَوْا اِلَى اللّٰهِ يَوْمَىٕذٍ السَّلَمَ وَ ضَلَّ عَنْهُمْ مَّا كَانُوْا يَفْتَرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'alqaw 'ilal-laahi yawma'izinis-salama wa dalla 'anhum maa kaanoo yaftaroon.
verses.translation: Aur uss din woh Allah ke huzoor apni farmaan bardaari (aajzi) pesh karenge, aur woh sab kuchh unse gum ho jaayega jo woh jhoot ghadte the.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Ma'boodaan-e-baatilah ki pooja karne waale apne uss da'we mein jhoote to nahin honge lekin woh shurakaa, jin ko yeh Allah ka shareek gardaante the, kahenge yeh jhoote hain, yeh ya to shirkat ki nafi hai ya'ni humein Allah ka shareek thhahraane mein yeh jhoote hain ya isliye ke woh unki ibaadat se bilkul be khabar the. Ek matlab yeh bhi ho sakta hai ke humne tumhein apni ibaadat karne ke liye kabhi nahin kaha tha, isliye tum jhoote ho. Yeh shurakaa agar hajr-o-shajar honge to Allah Ta'ala unhein quwwat-e- goyaayi ataa farmaayega, jinnaat-o-shayaateen honge to koyi ishkaal hi nahin hai aur agar Allah ke nek bande honge to Allah Ta'ala unko maidaan-e-mahshar mein hi bari farmaa dega aur unki ibaadat karne waalon ko jahannam mein daal dega jaisa ke surah maayedah ke aakhir mein hai.

verses.arabic: اَلَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا وَ صَدُّوْا عَنْ سَبِيْلِ اللّٰهِ زِدْنٰهُمْ عَذَابًا فَوْقَ الْعَذَابِ بِمَا كَانُوْا يُفْسِدُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Allazeena kafaroo wa şaddoo 'an sabeelil-laahi zidnaahum 'azaaban fawqal-'azaabi bimaa kaanoo yufsidoon.
verses.translation: Jinhon ne kufr kiya aur (logon ko) Allah ki raah se roka, hum unhein ziyaadah deinge azaab par azaab, uske liye woh fasaad karte the.

verses.arabic: وَ يَوْمَ نَبْعَثُ فِيْ كُلِّ اُمَّةٍ شَهِيْدًا عَلَيْهِمْ مِّنْ اَنْفُسِهِمْ وَ جِئْنَا بِكَ شَهِيْدًا عَلٰى هٰٓؤُلَآءِ ۭ وَ نَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْكَ الْكِتٰبَ تِبْيَانًا لِّكُلِّ شَيْءٍ وَّ هُدًى وَّ رَحْمَةً وَّ بُشْرٰى لِلْمُسْلِمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa yawma nab'asu fee kulli 'ummatin shaheedan 'alayhim min 'anfusihim wa ji'naa bika shaheedan 'alaa haaa'ulaaa'; wa nazzalnaa 'alaykal- Kitaaba tibyaanal-likulli shay'inw-wa hudañw- wa rahmatañw-wa bushraa lilmuslimeen.
verses.translation: Aur (Aye Nabi! Yaad karo) jis din hum har ummat mein un par unhi mein se ek gawaah khada kareinge aur aapko un logon par gawaah laayeinge aur hum ne aap par har cheez ko khol kar bayaan karne waali yeh kitab naazil ki hai jo musalmaanon ke liye hidaayat, rahmat aur khushkhabri hai.

verses.arabic: اِنَّ اللّٰهَ يَاْمُرُ بِالْعَدْلِ وَ الْاِحْسَانِ وَ اِيْتَآئِ ذِي الْقُرْبٰى وَ يَنْهٰى عَنِ الْفَحْشَآءِ وَ الْمُنْكَرِ وَ الْبَغْيِ ۭ يَعِظُكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَذَكَّرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Innal-laaha ya'muru bil'adli wal'ihsaani wa 'eetaaa'i zilqurbaa wa yanhaa 'anil-fahshaaa'i wal-munkari walbaghy' yaʻizukum laʻallakum tazakkaroon.
verses.translation: Beshak Allah adl aur ehsaan aur qaraabatdaaron ko dene ka hukm deta hai¹ aur be hayaayi, bure kaam aur zulmo-ziyaadati se mana' karta hai. woh tumhein wa'z karta hai, taake tum naseehat pakdo.
verses.deepMeaning: Lekin rishte daari ke bhi madaarij hain sabse pahle tumhaare waaledain, phir tumhaari aulaad, phir tumhaare bhaayi, bahnein phir tumhaare chacha aur phoophi phir tumhaare maamun aur khaalah aur phir deegar rishte daar.

verses.arabic: وَ اَوْفُوْا بِعَهْدِ اللّٰهِ اِذَا عٰهَدْتُّمْ وَ لَا تَنْقُضُوا الْاَيْمَانَ بَعْدَ تَوْكِيْدِهَا وَ قَدْ جَعَلْتُمُ اللّٰهَ عَلَيْكُمْ كَفِيْلًا ۭ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ يَعْلَمُ مَا تَفْعَلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'awfoo bi-'Ahdil- laahi 'izaa 'aahattum wa laa tanqudul-'aymaana ba'da tawkeedihaa wa qad ja altumul-laaha 'alaykum kafeelaa; 'innal-laaha ya'lamu maa tafaloon.
verses.translation: Aur Allah ka ahad pura karo jab tum aapas mein ahad karlo aur qasmein pakki karne ke ba'd na todo jabke tumne Allah ko apna kafeel banaaya ho.¹ beshak Allah jaanta hai jo tum karte ho.
verses.deepMeaning: Qasam, ek to woh hai jo kisi ahd-o-paimaan ke waqt, use mazeed pukhtah karne ke liye khaayi jaati hai. Doosri qasam woh hai jo insaan apne taur par kisi waqt khaa leta hai ke main fulaan kaam karunga ya nahin karunga, yahaan aayat mein awwaluzzikr qasam muraad hai ke tumne qasam khaa kar Allah ko zaamin banaa liya hai. Ab use nahin todna balke uss ahad-o-paimaan ko pura karna hai jis par tumne qasam khaayi hai, kyun ke saaniuz zikr qasam ki baabat to hadees mein hukm diya gaya hai ke koyi shakhs kisi kaam ki baabat qasam khaale, phir woh dekhe ke ziyaadah khair doosri cheez mein hai (ya'ni qasam ke khilaaf karne mein hai) to woh behtari waale kaam ko ikhtiyaar karle aur qasam tod kar uska kaffaarah adaa kare.' (Muslim Al-eemaan, Baab:3, Hadees:1650) aur Nabi Akram ﷺ ka amal bhi yahi tha. (Al-Bukhari, Al-Eemaan Wannuzoor, Baab:1, Hadees:6623)

verses.arabic: وَ لَا تَكُوْنُوْا كَالَّتِيْ نَقَضَتْ غَزْلَهَا مِنْۢ بَعْدِ قُوَّةٍ اَنْكٰثًا تَتَّخِذُوْنَ اَيْمَانَكُمْ دَخَلًۢا بَيْنَكُمْ اَنْ تَكُوْنَ اُمَّةٌ هِيَ اَرْبٰى مِنْ اُمَّةٍ ۭ اِنَّمَا يَبْلُوْكُمُ اللّٰهُ بِهٖ ۭ وَ لَيُبَيِّنَنَّ لَكُمْ يَوْمَ الْقِيٰمَةِ مَا كُنْتُمْ فِيْهِ تَخْتَلِفُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laa takoonoo kallatee naqadat ghazlahaa mim ba'di quwwatin 'ankaasaa; tattakhizoona 'aymaanakum dakhalam baynakum 'an takoona 'ummatun hiya 'arbaa min 'ummah; 'innamaa yablookumul-laahu bih; wa layubayyinanna lakum Yawmal- Qiyaamati maa kuntum feehi takhtalifoon.
verses.translation: Aur tum uss aurat ki tarah na ho jaao jisne apna soot mehnat se kaatne ke ba'd tukde tukde kar daala, tum apni qasmon ko baahum fareb ka zari'ah banaate ho ke ek jamaa'at se (maal-e-waafar mein) badh jaaye. beshak Allah uss (ahd-o-paymaan) se tumhein aazmaata hai. aur yaum-e-qiyaamat woh tum par zaroor waazeh kar dega jis mein tum ikhtelaaf karte the.

verses.arabic: وَ لَوْ شَآءَ اللّٰهُ لَجَعَلَكُمْ اُمَّةً وَّاحِدَةً وَّ لٰكِنْ يُّضِلُّ مَنْ يَّشَآءُ وَ يَهْدِيْ مَنْ يَّشَآءُ ۚ وَ لَتُسْـَٔلُنَّ عَمَّا كُنْتُمْ تَعْمَلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa law shaaa'al- laahu laja'alakum 'ummatanw- waahidatañw-wa laakiny-yudillu many- yashaaa'u wa yahdee many-yashaaa'; wa latus'alunna 'ammaa kuntum ta'maloon.
verses.translation: Aur agar Allah chaahta to tumhein ek hi ummat bana deta lekin woh jise chaahe gumraah karta hai aur jise chaahe hidaayat deta hai aur tumse zaroor uska sawaal hoga jo tum amal karte the.

verses.arabic: وَ لَا تَتَّخِذُوْۤا اَيْمَانَكُمْ دَخَلًۢا بَيْنَكُمْ فَتَزِلَّ قَدَمٌۢ بَعْدَ ثُبُوْتِهَا وَ تَذُوْقُوا السُّوْٓءَ بِمَا صَدَدْتُّمْ عَنْ سَبِيْلِ اللّٰهِ وَ لَكُمْ عَذَابٌ عَظِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa laa tattakhizooo 'aymaanakum dakhalam-baynakum fatazilla qadamum ba'da subootihaa wa tazooqus- sooo'a bimaa şadattum 'an sabeelil-laahi wa lakum 'azaabun 'azeem.
verses.translation: Aur tum apni qasmon ko baahum fareb dene ka zaria'h na banaao ke (islam par kisi ka) qadam jamne ke ba'd dagmaga jaaye aur tum (dunya mein) uski saza bhugto ke tum ne (use) Allah ki raah se roka aur (aakhirat mein) tumhaare liye azaab-e-azeem hoga.

verses.arabic: وَ لَا تَشْتَرُوْا بِعَهْدِ اللّٰهِ ثَمَنًا قَلِيْلًا ۭ اِنَّمَا عِنْدَ اللّٰهِ هُوَ خَيْرٌ لَّكُمْ اِنْ كُنْتُمْ تَعْلَمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laa tashtaroo bi- 'ahdil-laahi samanan qaleelaa; 'innamaa 'indal-laahi huwa khayrul-lakum 'in kuntum taʻlamoon.
verses.translation: Aur Allah ka ahad thodi qeemat mein na becho, beshak jo Allah ke haan (ajr) hai wahi behtar hai agar tum ilm rakhte ho.

verses.arabic: مَا عِنْدَكُمْ يَنْفَدُ وَ مَا عِنْدَ اللّٰهِ بَاقٍ ۭ وَ لَنَجْزِيَنَّ الَّذِيْنَ صَبَرُوْا اَجْرَهُمْ بِاَحْسَنِ مَا كَانُوْا يَعْمَلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: maa 'indakum yanfadu wa maa 'indal- laahi baaq; wa lanajziyannal-lazeena şabarooo 'ajrahum bi'ahsani maa kaanoo ya'maloon.
verses.translation: Jo kuchh tumhaare paas hai woh fana ho jaayega, aur jo kuchh Allah ke paas hai woh (hameshah) baaqi rahne waala hai aur jin logon ne sabr kiya hum zaroor unhein unka ajr-o-sawaab (badlah) usse behtar denge jo woh amal karte the.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Mulaahazah ho haashyah (Surah Taubah:9/121)

verses.arabic: مَنْ عَمِلَ صَالِحًا مِّنْ ذَكَرٍ اَوْ اُنْثٰى وَ هُوَ مُؤْمِنٌ فَلَنُحْيِيَنَّهٗ حَيٰوةً طَيِّبَةً ۚ وَ لَنَجْزِيَنَّهُمْ اَجْرَهُمْ بِاَحْسَنِ مَا كَانُوْا يَعْمَلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Man 'amila şaaliham- min zakarin 'aw 'unsaa wa huwa mu'minun falanuhyiyannahoo hayaatan tayyibah; wa lanajziyannahum 'ajrahum bi'ahsani maa kaanoo ya maloon.
verses.translation: Jisne nek amal kiye, mard ho ya aurat, jabke woh momin ho to hum zaroor use paakeezah zindagi basar karaayenge aur hum unhein zaroor unka ajr-o-sawaab (badlah) usse behtar denge jo woh amal karte the.

verses.arabic: فَاِذَا قَرَاْتَ الْقُرْاٰنَ فَاسْتَعِذْ بِاللّٰهِ مِنَ الشَّيْطٰنِ الرَّجِيْمِ
verses.transliteration: Fa'izaa qara'tal- Qur'aana fasta'iz billaahi minash- Shaytaanir-rajeem.
verses.translation: Phir jab aap qur'an padhne lagein to shaytaan mardood se Allah ki panaah maangein.

verses.arabic: اِنَّهٗ لَيْسَ لَهٗ سُلْطٰنٌ عَلَى الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا وَ عَلٰى رَبِّهِمْ يَتَوَكَّلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Innahoo laysa lahoo sultaanun 'alal-lazeena 'aamanoo wa 'alaa Rabbihim yatawakkaloon
verses.translation: Beshak un logon par uska koyi zor nahin chalta jo eemaan laaye aur woh apne rab par tawakkul karte hain.

verses.arabic: اِنَّمَا سُلْطٰنُهٗ عَلَى الَّذِيْنَ يَتَوَلَّوْنَهٗ وَ الَّذِيْنَ هُمْ بِهٖ مُشْرِكُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Innamaa sultaanuhoo 'alal-lazeena yatawallawnahoo wallazeena hum bihee mushrikoon.
verses.translation: Bas uska zor to un logon par chalta hai jo use dost banaate hain aur (un par) jo Allah ke saath shareek thhahraate hain.

verses.arabic: وَ اِذَا بَدَّلْنَآ اٰيَةً مَّكَانَ اٰيَةٍ وَّ اللّٰهُ اَعْلَمُ بِمَا يُنَزِّلُ قَالُوْٓا اِنَّمَآ اَنْتَ مُفْتَرٍ ۭ بَلْ اَكْثَرُهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'izaa baddalnaaa 'Aayatam- makaana 'Aayatiñw- wallaahu 'a'lamu bimaa yunazzilu qaalooo 'innamaaa 'anta muftar; bal 'aksaruhum laa ya'lamoon.
verses.translation: Aur jab hum ek aayat ki jagah badal kar doosri aayat laayein aur Allah use khoob jaanta hai jo kuchh woh naazil karta hai to woh (kaafir) kahte hain: yaqeenan tu ghadh lene waala hai lekin un mein aksar ilm nahin rakhte.

verses.arabic: قُلْ نَزَّلَهٗ رُوْحُ الْقُدُسِ مِنْ رَّبِّكَ بِالْحَقِّ لِيُثَبِّتَ الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا وَ هُدًى وَّ بُشْرٰى لِلْمُسْلِمِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Qul nazzalahoo Roohul-Qudusi mir- Rabbika bilhaqqi liyusabbital-lazeena 'aamanoo wa hudañw- wa bushraa lilmuslimeen
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: iss (qur'an) ko Roohul Qudus (Jibrayeel) ne tere rab ki taraf se haq ke saath naazil kiya hai taake Allah eemaan waalon ko saabit qadam rakkhe aur musalmaanon ke liye hidaayat aur bashaarat ho.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Aur yeh qur'an musalmaanon ke liye hidaayat aur bashaarat ka zaria'h hai kyunke qur'an bhi baarish ki tarah hai jisse ba'z zameenein khoob shaadaab hoti hain aur ba'z mein khaar-o-khas ke siwa kuchh nahin ugta.
