Momin ka dil taahir aur shaffaaf hai jo qur'an ki barkat se aur eemaan ke nor se munawwar ho jaata hai aur kaafır ka dil zameen- e-shor ki tarah hai jo kufr-o-zalaalat ki taareekiyon se bhara huwa hai jahaan qur'an ki ziya paashiyaan bhi be asar rahti hain.

verses.arabic: وَ لَقَدْ نَعْلَمُ اَنَّهُمْ يَقُوْلُوْنَ اِنَّمَا يُعَلِّمُهٗ بَشَرٌ ۘ لِسَانُ الَّذِيْ يُلْحِدُوْنَ اِلَيْهِ اَعْجَمِيٌّ وَّ هٰذَا لِسَانٌ عَرَبِيٌّ مُّبِيْنٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad nalamu 'annahum yaqooloona 'innamaa yu'allimuhoo bashar; lisaanul-lazee yulhidoona 'ilayhi 'a'jamiyyunw-wa haazaa lisaanun-'Arabiyyum- mubeen.
verses.translation: Aur humein bakhoobi ilm hai ke woh kahte hain: yaqeenan iss (Nabi) ko ek aadmi (Roomi ghulaam) sikhaata hai. uss shakhs ki zabaan jis ki taraf yeh ghalat nisbat karte hain, ajmi hai jabke yeh (qur'an) to faseeh arabi zabaan hai.

verses.arabic: اِنَّ الَّذِيْنَ لَا يُؤْمِنُوْنَ بِاٰيٰتِ اللّٰهِ لَا يَهْدِيْهِمُ اللّٰهُ وَ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ اَلِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: 'Innal-lazeena laa yu'minoona bi-'Aayaatil- laahi laa yahdeehimul- laahu wa lahum 'azaabun 'aleem.
verses.translation: Bilaa shubah jo log Allah ki aayaat par eemaan nahin laate, Allah unhein hidaayat nahin deta aur unke liye dardnaak azaab hai.

verses.arabic: اِنَّمَا يَفْتَرِي الْكَذِبَ الَّذِيْنَ لَا يُؤْمِنُوْنَ بِاٰيٰتِ اللّٰهِ وَ اُولٰۤىٕكَ هُمُ الْكَاذِبُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Innamaa yaftaril- kazibal-lazeena laa yu'minoona bi-'Aayaatil- laahi wa 'ulaaa'ika humul- kaaziboon.
verses.translation: Jhoot to sirf woh log ghadte hain jo Allah ki aayaat par eemaan nahin laate, aur wahi log jhoote hain.

verses.arabic: مَنْ كَفَرَ بِاللّٰهِ مِنْۢ بَعْدِ اِيْمَانِهٖۤ اِلَّا مَنْ اُكْرِهَ وَ قَلْبُهٗ مُطْمَىٕنٌّۢ بِالْاِيْمَانِ وَلٰكِنْ مَّنْ شَرَحَ بِالْكُفْرِ صَدْرًا فَعَلَيْهِمْ غَضَبٌ مِّنَ اللّٰهِ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ عَظِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: Man kafara billaahi mim ba'di 'eemaaniheee 'illaa man 'ukriha wa qalbuhoo mutma'innum bil'eemaani wa laakim- man sharaha bilkufri şadran fa'alayhim ghadabum-minal-laahi wa lahum 'azaabun 'azeem.
verses.translation: Jo shakhs apne eemaan ke ba'd Allah se kufr kare, siwaaye uske jis par jabr kiya gaya aur uska dil eemaan par mutmayin tha,¹ lekin jisne kufr ke liye apna seena khol diya (raazi khushi kufr kiya) to aise logon par Allah ka ghazab hai aur unke liye bahut bada azaab hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Ahl-e-ilm ka iss baat par ijma' hai ke jis shakhs ko kufr par majboor kiya jaaye aur woh jaan bachaane ke liye qaulan ya fe'lan kufr ka irtekaab kare, jab ke uska dil eemaan par mutmayin ho to woh kaafir nahin hoga, na uski beewi usse juda hogi aur na uss par deegar ahkaam-e-kufr laagu honge. (Fatahul Qadeer)

verses.arabic: ذٰلِكَ بِاَنَّهُمُ اسْتَحَبُّوا الْحَيٰوةَ الدُّنْيَا عَلَى الْاٰخِرَةِ وَاَنَّ اللّٰهَ لَا يَهْدِي الْقَوْمَ الْكٰفِرِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: .Zaalika bi'annahumus-tahabbul- hayaatad-dunyaa 'alal- 'Aakhirati wa 'annal- laaha laa yahdil- qawmal-kaafireen.
verses.translation: Yeh isliye ke unhon ne dunyaawi zindagi ko aakhirat se ziyaadah mahboob rakkha aur beshak Allah kaafiron ki qaum ko hidaayat nahin deta.

verses.arabic: اُولٰۤىٕكَ الَّذِيْنَ طَبَعَ اللّٰهُ عَلٰى قُلُوْبِهِمْ وَسَمْعِهِمْ وَاَبْصَارِهِمْ ۚ وَاُولٰۤىٕكَ هُمُ الْغٰفِلُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Ulaaa'ikal-lazeena taba'al-laahu 'alaa quloobihim wa sam'ihim wa 'absaarihim wa 'ulaaa'ika humul- ghaafiloon.
verses.translation: Yahi woh log hain jinke dilon, kaanon aur aankhon par Allah ne muhar lagaadi hai, aur yahi log ghaafil hain.

verses.arabic: لَا جَرَمَ اَنَّهُمْ فِي الْاٰخِرَةِ هُمُ الْخٰسِرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Laa jarama 'annahum fil-'Aakhirati humul-khaasiroon.
verses.translation: Bilaa shubah yaqeenan aakhirat mein yahi log khasaarah paane waale hain.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ اِنَّ رَبَّكَ لِلَّذِيْنَ هَاجَرُوْا مِنْۢ بَعْدِ مَا فُتِنُوْا ثُمَّ جٰهَدُوْا وَصَبَرُوْا اِنَّ رَبَّكَ مِنْۢ بَعْدِهَا لَغَفُوْرٌ رَّحِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: Summa 'inna Rabbaka lillazeena haajaroo mim ba'di maa futinoo summa jaahadoo wa şabarooo 'inna Rabbaka mim ba'dihaa la-Ghafoorur-Raheem.
verses.translation: Phir beshak aapka rab un logon par (meharbaan hai) jinhon ne aazmaayish mein padne ke ba'd hijrat ki, phir jehaad kiya aur sabr kiya, beshak aapka rab un (aazmaayishon) ke ba'd (un logon ke liye) ghafoorur Raheem hai.

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ تَاْتِيْ كُلُّ نَفْسٍ تُجَادِلُ عَنْ نَّفْسِهَا وَتُوَفّٰى كُلُّ نَفْسٍ مَّا عَمِلَتْ وَهُمْ لَا يُظْلَمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Yawma ta'tee kullu nafsin tujaadilu 'an nafsihaa wa tuwaffaa kullu nafsim-maa 'amilat wa hum laa yuzlamoon
verses.translation: Jis din har nafs apni taraf se jhagadta huwa aayega¹ aur har kisi ne jo amal kiye unka use pura badlah milega aur un par zulm na hoga.
verses.deepMeaning: Ya'ni koyi aur kisi ki himaayat mein aage nahin aayega na baap, na bhaayi, na beta, na beewi na koyi aur. Balke ek doosre se bhaageinge, bhaayi bhaayi se, bête, maan baap se, khaawind, beewi se bhaagega, har shakhs ko sirf apni fikr hogi jo use doosre se be parwa kardegi (Surah Abas:80/37)

verses.arabic: وَضَرَبَ اللّٰهُ مَثَلًا قَرْيَةً كَانَتْ اٰمِنَةً مُّطْمَىٕنَّةً يَاْتِيْهَا رِزْقُهَا رَغَدًا مِّنْ كُلِّ مَكَانٍ فَكَفَرَتْ بِاَنْعُمِ اللّٰهِ فَاَذَاقَهَا اللّٰهُ لِبَاسَ الْجُوْعِ وَالْخَوْفِ بِمَا كَانُوْا يَصْنَعُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa darabal-laahu masalan qaryatan kaanat 'aaminatam- mutma'innatañy-. ya'teehaa rizquhaa raghadam-min kulli makaanin fakafarat bi'an'umil-laahi fa'azaaqahal-laahu libaasal-joo'i walkhawfi bimaa kaanoo yaşna'oon.
verses.translation: Aur Allah ne ek basti ki misaal bayaan ki hai jo amn- o-itminaan se (aabaad) thi, uska rizq use har jagah se waafar (muyassar) aata tha, phir uss (ke baashindon) ne Allah ki ne'maton ki naa shukri ki¹ to Allah ne unhein unke kartooton ki wajah se bhook ka mazah chakhaaya aur khauf ka libaas (pahnaaya)
verses.deepMeaning: → Bandon ki naa shukri bhi bada jurm hai cheh jaayeke insaan Allah ki ne'maton ki naashukri kare. Yeh to badarjaha ziyaadah bada jurm hai. Bandon ki naa shukri aur uski saza ki misaal ek hadees mein bayaan ki gayi hai. Rasoolullah ﷺ ne farmaya: 'mujhe dozakh dikhlaayi gayi, pas (main ne dekha ke) uss mein aksariyat auraton kit hi jo kufr (naa shukri) kiya karti thin.' Arz kiya gaya: kiya woh Allah ki naa shukri karti hain? Aap ﷺ ne farmaya: 'woh apne shauharon ki naa shukri karti hain, aur (woh shauhar) unke saath jo ehsaan aur nek bartaao karte hain uski bhi naashukri karti hain agar tu kisi aurat ke saath ek zamaane tak ehsaan karta rahe phir woh tujh mein zara si bhi koyi aisi baat dekhe is ko woh pasand na karti ho) to kahne lagti hai: main ne tujh se kabhi koyi bhalaayi nahin paayi.'(Sahih Bukhari, Al-Eemaan, Baab:21 Hadees:29)

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ جَآءَهُمْ رَسُوْلٌ مِّنْهُمْ فَكَذَّبُوْهُ فَاَخَذَهُمُ الْعَذَابُ وَهُمْ ظٰلِمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad jaaa'ahum Rasoolum-minhum fakazzaboohu fa'akhazahumul-'azaabu wa hum zaalimoon.
verses.translation: Aur unke paas ek Rasool unhi mein se aaya to unhon ne uski takzeeb ki, tab unhein azaab ne aa pakda aur woh zaalim the.

verses.arabic: فَكُلُوْا مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ اللّٰهُ حَلٰلًا طَيِّبًا وَّاشْكُرُوْا نِعْمَتَ اللّٰهِ اِنْ كُنْتُمْ اِيَّاهُ تَعْبُدُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Fakuloo mimmaa razaqakumul-laahu halaalan tayyibanw- washkuroo ni'matal- laahi 'in kuntum 'iyyaahu ta'budoon.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh uss mein se khaao (piyo)¹ jo Allah ne tumhein halaal paakeezah rizq diya hai aur agar tum waaqayi' usi ki ibaadat karte ho to Allah ki ne'mat ka shukr karo.
verses.deepMeaning: Iss mein woh maweshi bhi hain jinhein Allah ne tumhaare liye halaal banaaya hai aur jinhein islami tareeqe ke mutaabiq zabah kiya jaata hai

verses.arabic: اِنَّمَا حَرَّمَ عَلَيْكُمُ الْمَيْتَةَ وَالدَّمَ وَلَحْمَ الْخِنْزِيْرِ وَمَآ اُهِلَّ لِغَيْرِ اللّٰهِ بِهٖ ۚ فَمَنِ اضْطُرَّ غَيْرَ بَاغٍ وَّلَا عَادٍ فَاِنَّ اللّٰهَ غَفُوْرٌ رَّحِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: 'Innamaa harrama 'alaykumul-maytata waddama wa lahmal- khinzeeri wa maaa 'uhilla lighayril-laahi bihee famanid-turra ghayra baaghiñw-wa laa 'aadin fa'innal-laaha Ghafoorur-Raheem.
verses.translation: Allah ne to bas tum par haraam kiya hai: murdaar, khoon, khinzeer ka gosht aur jis par ghairullah ka naam liya gaya ho, phir jo shakhs majboor ho jaaye jabke na woh baaghi ho aur na had se badhne waala ho to beshak Allah Ghafoorur Raheem hai.

verses.arabic: وَلَا تَقُوْلُوْا لِمَا تَصِفُ اَلْسِنَتُكُمُ الْكَذِبَ هٰذَا حَلٰلٌ وَّهٰذَا حَرَامٌ لِّتَفْتَرُوْا عَلَى اللّٰهِ الْكَذِبَ ۚ اِنَّ الَّذِيْنَ يَفْتَرُوْنَ عَلَى اللّٰهِ الْكَذِبَ لَا يُفْلِحُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laa taqooloo limaa taşifu 'alsinatukumul-kaziba haazaa halaaluñw-wa haazaa haraamul- litaftaroo 'alal-laahil- kazib; 'innal-lazeena yaftaroona 'alal-laahil- kaziba laa yuflihoon.
verses.translation: Aur apni zabaanon ke jhoot bayaan karne ki wajah se mat kaho ke yeh halaal hai aur yeh haraam hai taake tum Allah par jhoot baandho. Beshak jo Allah par jhoot baandhte hain woh falaah nahin paayenge.

verses.arabic: مَتَاعٌ قَلِيْلٌ وَّلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ اَلِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: .Mataa'un qaleeluñw-wa lahum 'azaabun 'aleem.
verses.translation: (unke liye) thoda saa faaidah hai aur (aakhirat mein) unke liye dard naak azaab hai.

verses.arabic: وَعَلَى الَّذِيْنَ هَادُوْا حَرَّمْنَا مَا قَصَصْنَا عَلَيْكَ مِنْ قَبْلُ ۭ وَمَا ظَلَمْنٰهُمْ وَلٰكِنْ كَانُوْا اَنْفُسَهُمْ يَظْلِمُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'alal-lazeena haadoo harramnaa maa qaşaşnaa 'alayka min qablu wa maa zalamnaahum wa laakin kaanooo 'anfusahum yazlimoon.
verses.translation: Aur jo log yahoodi huye un par humne woh cheezein haraam ki thin jo hum pahle aap se bayaan kar chuke hain aur humne un par zulm nahin kiya lekin woh khud hi apne aap par zulm karte the.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ اِنَّ رَبَّكَ لِلَّذِيْنَ عَمِلُوا السُّوْۤءَ بِجَهَالَةٍ ثُمَّ تَابُوْا مِنْۢ بَعْدِ ذٰلِكَ وَاَصْلَحُوْا اِنَّ رَبَّكَ مِنْۢ بَعْدِهَا لَغَفُوْرٌ رَّحِيْمٌ
verses.transliteration: Summa 'inna Rabbaka lillazeena 'amilus-soo0'a bijahaalatin summa taaboo mim ba'di zaalika wa 'aşlahooo 'inna Rabbaka mim ba'dihaa la- Ghafoorur-Raheem.
verses.translation: Phir beshak aapka rab un par (meharbaan hai) jinhon ne jehaalat se bure amal kiye, phir uske ba'd unhon ne taubah ki aur apni islaah karli, beshak uske ba'd aapka rab (un logon ke liye) Ghafoorur Raheem hai.

verses.arabic: اِنَّ اِبْرٰهِيْمَ كَانَ اُمَّةً قَانِتًا لِّلّٰهِ حَنِيْفًا وَّلَمْ يَكُ مِنَ الْمُشْرِكِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Inna 'Ibraaheema kaana 'ummatan qaanital-lillaahi Haneefaa lam yaku minal-mushrikeen.
verses.translation: Bilaa shubah Ibraheem ek ummat tha Allah ka farmaan bardaar aur uski taraf yaksu, aur woh mushrikon mein se na tha.

verses.arabic: شَاكِرًا لِّاَنْعُمِهٖ ۭ اِجْتَبٰىهُ وَهَدٰىهُ اِلٰى صِرَاطٍ مُّسْتَقِيْمٍ
verses.transliteration: Shaakiral-li'an'umih; 'ijtabaahu wa hadaahu 'ilaa Şiraatim- Mustaqeem.
verses.translation: 21.Woh Allah ki ne'maton ka shukr karne waala tha, Allah ne use chun liya aur usko siraat-e-mustaqeem ki taraf hidaayat di.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Ibraheem عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام na to Yahoodi the aur na Nasraani balke woh (ek sachche) muslim, haneef (islami aqeedah tauheed ya'ni Allah ke siwa kisi ko bandagi ke laayeq na maanne waale) the aur woh mushrikon mein se bhi nahin the. (Surah Aal-e-Imran:3/67)

verses.arabic: وَاٰتَيْنٰهُ فِي الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً ۖ وَاِنَّهٗ فِي الْاٰخِرَةِ لَمِنَ الصّٰلِحِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: 122. Wa 'aataynaahu fid- dunyaa hasanah; wa 'innahoo fil-'Aakhirati laminas-saaliheen.
verses.translation: 122. Aur hum ne use dunya mein bhalaayi di, aur woh aakhirat mein zaroor saaleheen mein se hoga.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ اَوْحَيْنَآ اِلَيْكَ اَنِ اتَّبِعْ مِلَّةَ اِبْرٰهِيْمَ حَنِيْفًا ۖ وَمَا كَانَ مِنَ الْمُشْرِكِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Summa 'awhaynaaa 'ilayka 'anit-tabi' Millata 'Ibraaheema Haneefaa; wa maa kaana minal-mushrikeen.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) phir humne aapki taraf wahi ki ke millat- e-Ibraheem ka itteba' karein jo (Allah ki taraf) yaksu tha aur woh mushrikon mein se na tha.

verses.arabic: اِنَّمَا جُعِلَ السَّبْتُ عَلَى الَّذِيْنَ اخْتَلَفُوْا فِيْهِ ۭ وَاِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَيَحْكُمُ بَيْنَهُمْ يَوْمَ الْقِيٰمَةِ فِيْمَا كَانُوْا فِيْهِ يَخْتَلِفُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Innamaa ju'ilas- Sabtu 'alal-lazeenakh- talafoo feeh; wa 'inna Rabbaka layahkumu baynahum Yawmal- Qiyaamati feemaa kaanoo feehi yakhtalifoon.
verses.translation: Hafte (ke din) ki ta'zeem to sirf un logon par zaroori qaraar di gayi thi jinhon ne uss mein ikhtelaaf kiya. Aur beshak aapka rab unke maabain qiyaamat ke din uss amr ka faislah karega jis mein woh ikhtelaaf karte the.

verses.arabic: اُدْعُ اِلٰى سَبِيْلِ رَبِّكَ بِالْحِكْمَةِ وَالْمَوْعِظَةِ الْحَسَنَةِ وَجَادِلْهُمْ بِالَّتِيْ هِيَ اَحْسَنُ ۭ اِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ اَعْلَمُ بِمَنْ ضَلَّ عَنْ سَبِيْلِهٖ وَهُوَ اَعْلَمُ بِالْمُهْتَدِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Ud'u 'ilaa sabeeli Rabbika bilhikmati walmaw'izatil-hasanati wa jaadilhum billatee hiya 'ahsan; 'inna Rabbaka Huwa 'alamu biman dalla 'an sabeelihee wa Huwa 'a'lamu bilmuhtadeen.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) apne rab ke raaste ki taraf hikmat aur achchhe wa'z ke saath da'wat deejiye: aur unse achchhe tareeqe se bahas keejiye. Beshak aapka rab hi khoob jaanta hai uss shakhs ko jo uski raah se bhatka aur wahi hidaayat paane waalon ko khoob jaanta hai.

verses.arabic: وَاِنْ عَاقَبْتُمْ فَعَاقِبُوْا بِمِثْلِ مَا عُوْقِبْتُمْ بِهٖ ۖ وَلَىٕنْ صَبَرْتُمْ لَهُوَ خَيْرٌ لِّلصّٰبِرِيْنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'in 'aaqabtum fa'aaqiboo bimisli maa 'ooqibtum bihee wa la'in şabartum lahuwa khayrul-lişşaabireen.
verses.translation: Aur agar tum badlah lo to utna hi badlah lo jitni tumhein takleef pahunchi ho, aur agar tum sabr karo to woh saabireen ke liye bahut behtar hai.

verses.arabic: وَاصْبِرْ وَمَا صَبْرُكَ اِلَّا بِاللّٰهِ ۚ وَلَا تَحْزَنْ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا تَكُ فِيْ ضَيْقٍ مِّمَّا يَمْكُرُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: Waşbir wa maa sabruka 'illaa billaah; wa laa tahzan 'alayhim wa laa taku fee dayqim- mimmaa yamkuroon.
verses.translation: Aur (Aye Nabi!) Aap sabr karein aur Aapka sabr karna bhi Allah hi ki taufeeq se hai aur un (kuffaar) par gham na khaayein, aur na Aap uss par tangi mein mubtala hon jo woh makr (saazishein) karte hain.

verses.arabic: اِنَّ اللّٰهَ مَعَ الَّذِيْنَ اتَّقَوْا وَّالَّذِيْنَ هُمْ مُّحْسِنُوْنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Innal-laaha ma'al- lazeenat-taqaw wallazeena hum muhsinoon.
verses.translation: Bilaa shubah Allah taqwa ikhtiyaar karne waalon aur ehsaan (neki) karne waalon ke saath hai.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Yeh neki aur parhezgaari hi dar asal Allah ki rahmat haasil karne ka zariyah hai aur rahmat-e-ilaahi ke baghair kisi ki bhi najaat ki ummeed nahin hatta ke Ambiya عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام ki bhi nahin jaisa ke hadees mein hai: (Sahih Bukhari, Ar-reqaaq, Baab:18, Hadees:6463)

verses.arabic: سُبْحَانَ الَّذِيْٓ اَسْرٰى بِعَبْدِهٖ لَيْلًا مِّنَ الْمَسْجِدِ الْحَرَامِ اِلَى الْمَسْجِدِ الْاَقْصَا الَّذِيْ بٰرَكْنَا حَوْلَهٗ لِنُرِيَهٗ مِنْ اٰيٰتِنَا ۭ اِنَّهٗ هُوَ السَّمِيْعُ الْبَصِيْرُ
verses.transliteration: Subhaanal-lazeee 'asraa bi'abdihee laylam-minal-Masjidil- Haraami 'ilal-Masjidil- 'Aqsal-lazee baaraknaa hawlahoo linuriyahoo min 'aayaatinaa; 'innahoo Huwas- Samee'ul-Başeer.
verses.translation: Paak zaat hai (Allah) jo apne bande ko raat ke ek hisse mein masjid-e-Haraam se masjid-e-Aqsa tak le gaya jiske maahaul ko humne barkat di hai taake hum use apni kuchh nishaaniyaan dikhaayein.¹ beshak wahi sami'-o-baseer hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Masjid-e-Haraam se masjid-e-Aqsa tak ka safar (Isra) aur masjid-e-aqsa (baitul maqdis) se aasmaanon ka safar (me'raaj) kahlaata hai. Yeh isra-o-me'raaj Nabi ﷺ ka ek nehaayat azeemush-shaan mo'jezah hota hi woh hai jo sirf Allah Ta'ala ki qudrat se zuhoor pazeer ho. Nabi ka koyi ikhtiyaar uss mein shaamil na ho. Isliye iss waaqiye ko ruhaani sair ya khaab baawar karaana bilkul ghalat hai. Aap ko me'raaj aalam-e-bedaari mein hi karaayi gayi hai. Yeh khaab ka waaqia'h ya kashf nahin hai, agar aisa hota to kuffaar ke liye uske jhutlaane ka koyi jawaaz na hota lekin kuffaar-e-makkah ne use jhutlaaya aur Nabi ﷺ ko unke mushkil sawaalaat ka saamna karna pada jiski wajah se aapko shadeed be chaini bhi huyi. Agar yeh khaab hota to Nabi ﷺ aasaani se yeh kah kar chhutkaara haasil kar sakte the: 'main to khaab bayaan kar rahaa hoon, tum mujhse yeh sawaalaat kyun kar rahe ho.?'

verses.arabic: وَاٰتَيْنَا مُوْسَى الْكِتٰبَ وَجَعَلْنٰهُ هُدًى لِّبَنِيْٓ اِسْرَآءِيْلَ اَلَّا تَتَّخِذُوْا مِنْ دُوْنِيْ وَكِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: Wa 'aataynaa Moosal- Kitaaba wa jaʻalnaahu hudal-li-Baneee 'Israaa'eela 'allaa tattakhizoo min doonee wakeelaa.
verses.translation: Aur humne Moosa ko kitab (Tauraat) di aur humne use Bani Israyeel ke liye hidaayat banaaya (aur unhein hukm diya) ke tum mere siwa kisi ko kaar saaz na thhahraao.

verses.arabic: ذُرِّيَّةَ مَنْ حَمَلْنَا مَعَ نُوْحٍ ۭ اِنَّهٗ كَانَ عَبْدًا شَكُوْرًا
verses.transliteration: Zurriyyata man hamalnaa ma'a Nooh; 'innahoo kaana 'abdan shakooraa.
verses.translation: Aye un logon ki aulaad jinhein humne Nooh ke saath (kashti mein) sawaar kiya tha beshak woh shukr guzaar bandah tha.

verses.arabic: وَقَضَيْنَآ اِلٰى بَنِيْٓ اِسْرَآءِيْلَ فِي الْكِتٰبِ لَتُفْسِدُنَّ فِي الْاَرْضِ مَرَّتَيْنِ وَلَتَعْلُنَّ عُلُوًّا كَبِيْرًا
verses.transliteration: Wa qadaynaaa 'ilaa Baneee 'Israaa'eela fil- Kitaabi latufsidunna fil- 'ardi marratayni wa latalunna 'uluwwan kabeeraa.
verses.translation: Aur humne Bani Israyeel ko kitab (Tauraat) mein faislah suna diya ke tum zameen mein do baar zaroor fasaad karoge aur bahut badi sarkashi zaroor karoge.

verses.arabic: فَاِذَا جَآءَ وَعْدُ اُوْلٰىهُمَا بَعَثْنَا عَلَيْكُمْ عِبَادًا لَّنَآ اُولِيْ بَاْسٍ شَدِيْدٍ فَجَاسُوْا خِلٰلَ الدِّيَارِ ۚ وَكَانَ وَعْدًا مَّفْعُوْلًا
verses.transliteration: Fa'izaa jaaa'a wa'du 'oolaahumaa baʻasnaa 'alykum 'ibaadal-lanaaa 'ulee ba'sin shadeedin fajaasoo khilaalad-diyaar; wa kaana wa'dam-mafoolaa.
verses.translation: Phir jab donon mein se pahla wa'dah aaya to humne tum par apne sakht jungju bande musallat kardiye chunaancheh woh (fasaad angezi ke liye) shahron ke darmiyaan phail gaye. aur yeh wa'dah pura hona hi tha.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ رَدَدْنَا لَكُمُ الْكَرَّةَ عَلَيْهِمْ وَاَمْدَدْنٰكُمْ بِاَمْوَالٍ وَبَنِيْنَ وَجَعَلْنٰكُمْ اَكْثَرَ نَفِيْرًا
verses.transliteration: Summa radadnaa lakumul-karrata 'alayhim wa 'amdadnaakum bi'amwaaliñw-wa baneena wa jaʻalnaakum 'aksara nafeeraa.
verses.translation: Phir humne tumhein dobaarah un par ghalbah diya aur tumhein maal aur beton ke saath mdad di aur humne tumhein nafri mein ziyaadah kar diya.

verses.arabic: اِنْ اَحْسَنْتُمْ اَحْسَنْتُمْ لِاَنْفُسِكُمْ ۚ وَاِنْ اَسَاْتُمْ فَلَهَا ۭ فَاِذَا جَآءَ وَعْدُ الْاٰخِرَةِ لِيَسُوْٓءُوْا وُجُوْهَكُمْ وَلِيَدْخُلُوا الْمَسْجِدَ كَمَا دَخَلُوْهُ اَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍ وَلِيُتَبِّرُوْا مَا عَلَوْا تَتْبِيْرًا
verses.transliteration: 'In 'ahsantum 'ahsantum li'anfusikum wa 'in 'asa'tum falahaa; fa'izaa jaaa'a wa'dul- 'aakhirati liyasooo'oo wujoohakum wa liyadkhulul-masjida kamaa dakhaloohu 'awwala marratiñw-wa liyutabbiroo maa 'alaw tatbeeraa.
verses.translation: Agar tum bhalaayi karoge to apne hi nafs ke liye karoge, aur agar buraayi karoge to (woh bhi) usi ke liye hogi, phir jab doosra wa'dah aaya, (to ek aur qaum tum par ghaalib aayi) taake woh tumhaare chehre bigaad dein aur masjid (haikal-e-sulaimaani) mein daakhil ho jaayein jaise pahli baar iss mein daakhil huye the aur taake woh jis par ghalbah paayein use yaksar tabaah kar dein.

verses.arabic: عَسٰى رَبُّكُمْ اَنْ يَّرْحَمَكُمْ ۚ وَاِنْ عُدْتُّمْ عُدْنَا ۭ وَجَعَلْنَا جَهَنَّمَ لِلْكٰفِرِيْنَ حَصِيْرًا
verses.transliteration: 'Asaa Rabbukum 'any- yarhamakum; wa 'in 'uttum 'udnaa; wa jaʻalnaa jahannama lilkaafireena haseeraa.
verses.translation: Qareeb hai ke tumhaara rab tum par raham kare aur agar tum phir wahi (sarkashi) karoge to hum bhi wahi (mu'aamlah) karenge aur humne jahannam ko kaafiron ke liye qaid khaana banaaya hai.

verses.arabic: اِنَّ هٰذَا الْقُرْاٰنَ يَهْدِيْ لِلَّتِيْ هِيَ اَقْوَمُ وَيُبَشِّرُ الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ الَّذِيْنَ يَعْمَلُوْنَ الصّٰلِحٰتِ اَنَّ لَهُمْ اَجْرًا كَبِيْرًا
verses.transliteration: 'Inna haazal-Qur'aana yahdee lillatee hiya 'aqwamu wa yubashshirul- mu'mineenal-lazeena ya'maloonas-saalihaati 'anna lahum 'ajran kabeeraa.
verses.translation: Beshak yeh qur'an woh raah bataata hai jo sabse seedhi hai aur mominon ko bashaarat deta hai jo nek kaam karte hain ke yaqeenan unke liye bahut bada ajr hai.

verses.arabic: وَاَنَّ الَّذِيْنَ لَا يُؤْمِنُوْنَ بِالْاٰخِرَةِ اَعْتَدْنَا لَهُمْ عَذَابًا اَلِيْمًا
verses.transliteration: Wa 'annal-lazeena laa yu'minoona bil- 'Aakhirati 'a'tadnaa lahum 'azaaban 'aleemaa.
verses.translation: Aur yeh ke jo log aakhirat par eemaan nahin rakhte unke liye humne dardnaak azaab tayyaar kiya hai.

verses.arabic: وَيَدْعُ الْاِنْسَانُ بِالشَّرِّ دُعَآءَهٗ بِالْخَيْرِ ۭ وَكَانَ الْاِنْسَانُ عَجُوْلًا
verses.transliteration: Wa yad'ul-'insaanu bishsharri du'aaa'ahoo bilkhayr; wa kaanal- 'insaanu 'ajoolaa.
verses.translation: Aur insaan buraayi ki dua' aise maangta hai jaise uski bhalaayi ki dua' ho aur insaan bahut ujlat waala hai.

verses.arabic: وَجَعَلْنَا الَّيْلَ وَالنَّهَارَ اٰيَتَيْنِ فَمَحَوْنَآ اٰيَةَ الَّيْلِ وَجَعَلْنَآ اٰيَةَ النَّهَارِ مُبْصِرَةً لِّتَبْتَغُوْا فَضْلًا مِّنْ رَّبِّكُمْ وَلِتَعْلَمُوْا عَدَدَ السِّنِيْنَ وَالْحِسَابَ ۭ وَكُلَّ شَيْءٍ فَصَّلْنٰهُ تَفْصِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: Wa jaʻalnal-layla wannahaara 'Aayatayni famahawnaaa 'Aayatal- layli wa jaʻalnaaa 'Aayatan-nahaari mubşiratal-litabtaghoo fadlam-mir-Rabbikum wa lita'lamoo 'adadas- sineena walhisaab; wa kulla shay'in faşşalnaahu tafseelaa.
verses.translation: Aur humne raat aur din ko do nishaaniyaan banaaya, phir humne raat ki nishaani to mahu (be noor) kardi aur din ki nishaani raushan banaayi, taake tum apne rab ka fazl talaash karo, aur taake tum barson ki ginti aur hisaab jaan lo aur humne har cheez khoob tafseel se bayaan kardi hai.

verses.arabic: وَكُلَّ اِنْسَانٍ اَلْزَمْنٰهُ طٰٓىٕرَهٗ فِيْ عُنُقِهٖ ۭ وَنُخْرِجُ لَهٗ يَوْمَ الْقِيٰمَةِ كِتٰبًا يَّلْقٰىهُ مَنْشُوْرًا
verses.transliteration: Wa kulla 'insaanin 'alzamnaahu taaa'irahoo fee 'unuqihee wa nukhriju lahoo Yawmal- Qiyaamati kitaabañy- yalqaahu manshooraa.
verses.translation: Aur humne har insaan ka a'amaal naamah uski gardan se laga diya hai aur qiyaamat ke din hum uske saamne ek kitab pesh kareinge¹ woh use khuli 0 paayega.
verses.deepMeaning: Yeh a'amaal woh honge jo insaan dunya mein karke gaya hoga. Achchhe ya bure donon qism ke a'amaal insaan ke saamne pesh kar diye jaayeinge aur unki raushni mein uske jannat ya dozakh mein jaane ka faislah hoga. Chand fazeelat waale amal mulaahazah farmaayein: '(Rozaanah farz) namaazein unke muqarrarah auqaat mein adaa karna. Waaledain ke saath neki karna aur unki farmaan bardaari karna. Phir Allah ki raah mein jehaad karna.' (Sahih Bukhari, kitabut tauheed, hadees:7534)

verses.arabic: اِقْرَاْ كِتٰبَكَ ۭ كَفٰى بِنَفْسِكَ الْيَوْمَ عَلَيْكَ حَسِيْبًا
verses.transliteration: 'Iqra' kitaabak kafaa binafsikal-Yawma 'alayka haseebaa.
verses.translation: (Kahaa jaayega) apna a'amaal naamah padh, tera nafs hi aaj kaafi hai, tera hisaab lene waala.

verses.arabic: مَنِ اهْتَدٰى فَاِنَّمَا يَهْتَدِيْ لِنَفْسِهٖ ۚ وَمَنْ ضَلَّ فَاِنَّمَا يَضِلُّ عَلَيْهَا ۭ وَلَا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةٌ وِّزْرَ اُخْرٰى ۭ وَمَا كُنَّا مُعَذِّبِيْنَ حَتّٰى نَبْعَثَ رَسُوْلًا
verses.transliteration: Manih-tadaa fa'innamaa yahtadee linafsihee wa man dalla fa'innamaa yadillu 'alayhaa; wa laa taziru waaziratuñw-wizra 'ukhraa; wa maa kunnaa mu'azzibeena hattaa nab'asa Rasoolaa.
verses.translation: Jisne hidaayat paayi to bas woh apne nafs ke liye hidaayat paata hai aur jo gumraah huwa to bas woh apne nafs hi par gumraah hota hai. aur koyi bojh uthhaane waala kisi doosre ka bojh nahin uthhaayega aur hum uss waqt tak kisi ko azaab nahin dete jab tak koyi Rasool na bhejein.

verses.arabic: وَاِذَآ اَرَدْنَآ اَنْ نُّهْلِكَ قَرْيَةً اَمَرْنَا مُتْرَفِيْهَا فَفَسَقُوْا فِيْهَا فَحَقَّ عَلَيْهَا الْقَوْلُ فَدَمَّرْنٰهَا تَدْمِيْرًا
verses.transliteration: Wa 'izaaa 'aradnaaa 'an nuhlika qaryatan 'amarnaa mutrafeehaa fafasaqoo feehaa fahaqqa 'alayhal-qawlu fadammarnaahaa tadmeeraa.
verses.translation: Aur jab hum kisi basti ko halaak karna chaahein to uske khush haal afraad ko hukm dete hain, phir woh USS mein naa farmaani karne lagte hain, chunaancheh uss basti par (azaab ki) baat saabit ho jaati hai, tab hum use (mukammal taur par) tabaah kar daalte hain.

verses.arabic: وَكَمْ اَهْلَكْنَا مِنَ الْقُرُوْنِ مِنْۢ بَعْدِ نُوْحٍ ۭ وَكَفٰى بِرَبِّكَ بِذُنُوْبِ عِبَادِهٖ خَبِيْرًۢا بَصِيْرًا
verses.transliteration: Wa kam 'ahlaknaa minal-qurooni mim ba'di Nooh; wa kafaa bi- Rabbika bizunoobi 'ibaadihee Khabeeram- Baseeraa.
verses.translation: Aur humne Nooh ke ba'd kitni hi qaumein halaak kar din, aur aapka rab kaafi hai apne bandon ke gunaahon ki khoob khabar rakhne waala, (unhein) khoob dekhne waala.

verses.arabic: مَنْ كَانَ يُرِيْدُ الْعَاجِلَةَ عَجَّلْنَا لَهٗ فِيْهَا مَا نَشَآءُ لِمَنْ نُّرِيْدُ ثُمَّ جَعَلْنَا لَهٗ جَهَنَّمَ ۭ يَصْلٰىهَا مَذْمُوْمًا مَّدْحُوْرًا
verses.transliteration: Man kaana yureedul- 'aajilata 'ajjalnaa lahoo feehaa maa nashaaa'u limannureedu summa ja'alnaa lahoo Jahannama yaşlaahaa mazmoomam- madhooraa.
verses.translation: Jo koyi jaldi waali (dunya) chaahe to hum isi dunya mein jiske liye chaahein jis qadar chaahein jald ataa karte hain, phir uske liye hum jahannam thhahraa dete hain, woh USS mein mazmoom aur dhutkaara huwa daakhil hoga.

verses.arabic: وَمَنْ اَرَادَ الْاٰخِرَةَ وَسَعٰى لَهَا سَعْيَهَا وَهُوَ مُؤْمِنٌ فَاُولٰٓىٕكَ كَانَ سَعْيُهُمْ مَّشْكُوْرًا
verses.transliteration: Wa man 'araadal- 'Aakhirata wa sa'aa lahaa sa'yahaa wa huwa mu'minun fa'ulaaa'ika kaana sa'yuhum mashkooraa.
verses.translation: Aur uske liye puri puri koshish kare, jab ke woh momin ho, to yahi log hain jinki koshish qaabil-e-qadr hai.

verses.arabic: كُلًّا نُّمِدُّ هٰٓؤُلَاۤءِ وَهٰٓؤُلَاۤءِ مِنْ عَطَآءِ رَبِّكَ ۭ وَمَا كَانَ عَطَآءُ رَبِّكَ مَحْظُوْرًا
verses.transliteration: Kullannumiddu haaa 'ulaaa'i wa haaa'ulaaa'i min 'ataaa'i Rabbik; wa maa kaana 'ataaa'u Rabbika mahzoora.
verses.translation: Hum har ek ko aapke rab ki ataa se nawaazte hain, unko bhi aur unkho bhi, aur tere rab ki ataa (kisi se) roki huyi nahin.

verses.arabic: اُنْظُرْ كَيْفَ فَضَّلْنَا بَعْضَهُمْ عَلٰى بَعْضٍ ۭ وَلَلْاٰخِرَةُ اَكْبَرُ دَرَجٰتٍ وَّاَكْبَرُ تَفْضِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: 'Unzur kayfa faddalnaa ba dahum 'alaa ba'd; wa lal- 'Aakhiratu 'akbaru darajaatiñw-wa 'akbaru tafdeelaa.
verses.translation: Dekhiye! kis tarah humne fazeelat di ba'z ko ba'z par aur yaqeenan aakhirat darjon mein badh kar hai aur fazeelat dene mein bhi badh kar hai.

verses.arabic: لَا تَجْعَلْ مَعَ اللّٰهِ اِلٰهًا اٰخَرَ فَتَقْعُدَ مَذْمُوْمًا مَّخْذُوْلًا
verses.transliteration: Laa taj'al maʻal-laahi 'ilaahan 'aakhara fataq'uda mazmoomam- makhzoolaa.
verses.translation: Aap Allah ke saath koyi aur ma'bood na thhahraayein (warna) phir aap mazmoom aur bekas ho kar baithhe rahenge.

verses.arabic: وَقَضٰى رَبُّكَ اَلَّا تَعْبُدُوْٓا اِلَّآ اِيَّاهُ وَبِالْوَالِدَيْنِ اِحْسَانًا ۭ اِمَّا يَبْلُغَنَّ عِنْدَكَ الْكِبَرَ اَحَدُهُمَآ اَوْ كِلٰهُمَا فَلَا تَقُلْ لَّهُمَآ اُفٍّ وَّلَا تَنْهَرْهُمَا وَقُلْ لَّهُمَا قَوْلًا كَرِيْمًا
verses.transliteration: Wa qadaa Rabbuka 'allaa ta'budooo 'illaaa 'iyyaahu wa bilwaalidayni 'ihsaanaa 'immaa yablughanna 'indakal-kibara 'ahaduhumaaa 'aw kilaahumaa falaa taqul- lahumaaa 'uffinw-wa laa tanharhumaa wa qul- lahumaa qawlan kareemaa.
verses.translation: Aur aapke rab ne faislah kar diya ke tum uske siwa kisi ki ibaadat na karo, aur waaledain se achchha sulook karo, agar un donom mein se ek ya donon tere saamne budhaape ko pahunch jaayein to unse 'uff' tak na kah aur unehin mat jhidak, aur unse narm lahje mein (adab-o- ehteraam se) baat kar.

verses.arabic: وَاخْفِضْ لَهُمَا جَنَاحَ الذُّلِّ مِنَ الرَّحْمَةِ وَقُلْ رَبِّ ارْحَمْهُمَا كَمَا رَبَّيٰنِيْ صَغِيْرًا
verses.transliteration: Wakhfid lahumaa janaahaz-zulli minar- rahmati wa qur-Rabbir- hamhumaa kamaa rabbayaanee sagheeraa
verses.translation: Aur unke saamne raham dili se aajzi ke saath apna baazu (pahlu) jukhaaye rakh, aur kah: mere Rab! In donon par raham farma jaise inhon ne bachpan mein meri parwarish ki.

verses.arabic: رَبُّكُمْ اَعْلَمُ بِمَا فِيْ نُفُوْسِكُمْ ۭ اِنْ تَكُوْنُوْا صَالِحِيْنَ فَاِنَّهٗ كَانَ لِلْاَوَّابِيْنَ غَفُوْرًا
verses.transliteration: Rabbukum 'alamu bimaa fee nufoosikum; 'in takoonoo şaaliheena fa'innahoo kaana lil'awwaabeena Ghafoooraa.
verses.translation: Tumhaara rab khoob jaanta hai jo kuchh tumhaare dilon mein hai, agar tum saaleh hoge to bilaa shubah woh (apni taraf) ruju' karne waalon ko bada bakhsne waala hai.

verses.arabic: وَاٰتِ ذَا الْقُرْبٰى حَقَّهٗ وَالْمِسْكِيْنَ وَابْنَ السَّبِيْلِ وَلَا تُبَذِّرْ تَبْذِيْرًا
verses.transliteration: Wa 'aati zal-qurbaa haqqahooo walmiskeena wabnas-sabeeli wa laa tubazzir tabzeeraa.
verses.translation: Aur qaraabat daar ko uska haq de aur miskeen aur musaafir ko bhi¹, aur fuzool kharchi se maal na udaa.²
verses.deepMeaning: 1️⃣Iss mein husn-e-akhlaaq ki taleem di gayi hai. Mazeed mulaahazah ho: (Surah Baqarah:2/83) 2️⃣ Ya'ni tumhein apne akhrajaat mein miyaanah rawi ikhtiyaar karni chaahiye. Bakheel na fuzool kharch aur na un logon ki tarah hi hona chaahiye jo Allah aur uske Rasool ﷺ ki naafarmaani mein maal kharch karte hain.

verses.arabic: اِنَّ الْمُبَذِّرِيْنَ كَانُوْٓا اِخْوَانَ الشَّيٰطِيْنِ ۭ وَكَانَ الشَّيْطٰنُ لِرَبِّهٖ كَفُوْرًا
verses.transliteration: 'Innal-mubazzireena kaanooo 'ikhwaanash- shayaateeni wa kaanash-shaytaanu li- Rabbihee kafooraa.
verses.translation: Beshak fuzool kharch shayaateen ke bhaai hain aur shaytaan apne rab ka sakht naa shukra hai.

verses.arabic: وَاِمَّا تُعْرِضَنَّ عَنْهُمُ ابْتِغَآءَ رَحْمَةٍ مِّنْ رَّبِّكَ تَرْجُوْهَا فَقُلْ لَّهُمْ قَوْلًا مَّيْسُوْرًا
verses.transliteration: Wa 'immaa tu'ridanna 'anhumub-tighaaa'a rahmatim-mir-Rabbika tarjoohaa faqul-lahum qawlam-maysooraa.
verses.translation: Aur agar tu apne rab ki rahmat (rozi) talaash karne ki wajah se un (azeez-o- aqaarib) se e'raaz kare to unse narm baat kah.

verses.arabic: وَلَا تَجْعَلْ يَدَكَ مَغْلُوْلَةً اِلٰى عُنُقِكَ وَلَا تَبْسُطْهَا كُلَّ الْبَسْطِ فَتَقْعُدَ مَلُوْمًا مَّحْسُوْرًا
verses.transliteration: Wa laa taj'al yadaka maghloolatan 'ilaa 'unuqika wa laa tabsuthaa kullal-basti fataq'uda maloomam- mahsooraa.
verses.translation: Aur apna haath apni gardan ke saath bandha na rakh aur na use puri tarah khol de ke phir malaamat zadah aur thaka haara ho kar baithh rahe.

verses.arabic: اِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَبْسُطُ الرِّزْقَ لِمَنْ يَّشَآءُ وَيَقْدِرُ ۭ اِنَّهٗ كَانَ بِعِبَادِهٖ خَبِيْرًۢا بَصِيْرًا
verses.transliteration: 'Inna Rabbaka yabsutur-rizqa limany- yashaaa'u wa yaqdir; 'innahoo kaana bi'ibaadihee Khabeeram- Baseeraa.
verses.translation: Bilaa shubah aapka rab jis ke liye chaahe rizq khol deta hai aur tang bhi kar deta hai, beshak woh apne bandon ki khoob khabar rakhta, khoob dekhta hai.

verses.arabic: وَلَا تَقْتُلُوْٓا اَوْلَادَكُمْ خَشْيَةَ اِمْلَاقٍ ۭ نَحْنُ نَرْزُقُهُمْ وَاِيَّاكُمْ ۭ اِنَّ قَتْلَهُمْ كَانَ خِطْاً كَبِيْرًا
verses.transliteration: Wa laa taqtulooo 'awlaadakum khashyata 'imlaaq; nahnu narzuquhum wa 'iyyaakum; 'inna qatlahum kaana khit'an kabeeraa.
verses.translation: Aur tum apni aulaad ko ghareebi ke dar se qatl na karo, hum unhein bhi rizq dete hain aur tumhein bhi, beshak unka qatl kabeerah gunaah hai.

verses.arabic: وَلَا تَقْرَبُوا الزِّنٰٓى اِنَّهٗ كَانَ فَاحِشَةً وَسَآءَ سَبِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: Wa laa taqrabuz- zinaaa 'innahoo kaana faahishatanw-wa saaa'a sabeelaa.
verses.translation: Aur tum zina ke qareeb mat jaao, yaqeenan woh be hayaayi aur buri raah hai.

verses.arabic: وَلَا تَقْتُلُوا النَّفْسَ الَّتِيْ حَرَّمَ اللّٰهُ اِلَّا بِالْحَقِّ ۭ وَمَنْ قُتِلَ مَظْلُوْمًا فَقَدْ جَعَلْنَا لِوَلِيِّهٖ سُلْطٰنًا فَلَا يُسْرِفْ فِّي الْقَتْلِ ۭ اِنَّهٗ كَانَ مَنْصُوْرًا
verses.transliteration: Wa laa taqtulun- nafsal-latee harramal- laahu 'illaa bilhaqq; wa man qutila mazlooman faqad ja'alnaa liwaliyyihee sultaanan falaa yusrif-fil-qatli 'innahoo kaana mansooraa.
verses.translation: Aur tum uss jaan ko qatl na karo jise Allah ne haraam kiya hai, siwaaye haq ke. Aur jo zulm se qatl kiya jaaye to hum ne uske waaris ko ikhtiyaar diya hai, chunaancheh woh qatl (qisaas) mein ziyaadati na kare, beshak uski madad ki jaayegi.

verses.arabic: وَلَا تَقْرَبُوْا مَالَ الْيَتِيْمِ اِلَّا بِالَّتِيْ هِيَ اَحْسَنُ حَتّٰى يَبْلُغَ اَشُدَّهٗ ۚ وَاَوْفُوْا بِالْعَهْدِ ۭ اِنَّ الْعَهْدَ كَانَ مَسْـُٔوْلًا
verses.transliteration: Wa laa taqraboo maalal-yateemi 'illaa billatee hiya 'ahsanu hattaa yablugha 'ashuddah; wa 'awfoo bil'ahdi, 'innal-'ahda kaana mas'oolaa.
verses.translation: Aur tum yateem ke maal ke qareeb na jaao, siwaaye uske jo ahsan tareeqa ho, hatta ke woh apni jawaani ko pahunch jaaye aur tum ahad pura karo, beshak ahad ki baabat sawaal hoga.

verses.arabic: وَاَوْفُوا الْكَيْلَ اِذَا كِلْتُمْ وَّزِنُوْا بِالْقِسْطَاسِ الْمُسْتَقِيْمِ ۭ ذٰلِكَ خَيْرٌ وَّاَحْسَنُ تَاْوِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: Wa 'awful-kayla 'izaa kiltum wazinoo bilqistaasil-mustaqeem; zaalika khayrunw-wa 'ahsanu ta'weelaa.
verses.translation: Aur jab maap kar do to tum maap pura karo aur seedhi taraazu se taulo, yeh behtareen aur anjaam kaar ke lehaaz se ahsan hai.

verses.arabic: وَلَا تَقْفُ مَا لَيْسَ لَكَ بِهٖ عِلْمٌ ۭ اِنَّ السَّمْعَ وَالْبَصَرَ وَالْفُؤَادَ كُلُّ اُولٰۤىٕكَ كَانَ عَنْهُ مَسْـُٔوْلًا
verses.transliteration: Wa laa taqfu maa laysa laka bihee 'ilm; 'innas-sam'a walbaşara walfu'aada kullu 'ulaaa'ika kaana 'anhu mas'oolaa.
verses.translation: Aur jis baat ka Aap ko Im hi nahin uske peechhe na padein, beshak kaan, aankh aur dil, un mein se har ek ki baabat sawaal hoga.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Ya'ni jis cheez ke peechhe tum padoge uske muta'alliq kaan se sawaal hoga ke kiya usne suna tha, aankh se sawaal hoga ke kiya usne dekha tha aur dil se sawaal hoga ke kiya usne jaana tha? Kyun ke yahi teenon ilm ka zaria'h hain ya'ni a'azaa ko Allah Ta'ala qiyaamat waale din quwwat-e-goyaayi ataa farmaayega aur unse poochha jaayega, silsilah kalaam ke liye mulaahazah farmaayein (Surah Haa meeem As-Sajdah:41/19-22)

verses.arabic: وَلَا تَمْشِ فِي الْاَرْضِ مَرَحًا ۭ اِنَّكَ لَنْ تَخْرِقَ الْاَرْضَ وَلَنْ تَبْلُغَ الْجِبَالَ طُوْلًا
verses.transliteration: Wa laa tamshi fil-'ardi marahan 'innaka lan takhriqal-'arda wa lan tablughal-jibaala toolaa.
verses.translation: Aur zameen par akad kar mat chal. tu na to zameen phaad sakta hai aur na balandi mein pahaad tak pahunch sakta hai.

verses.arabic: كُلُّ ذٰلِكَ كَانَ سَيِّئُهٗ عِنْدَ رَبِّكَ مَكْرُوْهًا
verses.transliteration: Kullu zaalika kaana sayyi'uhoo 'inda Rabbika makroohaa.
verses.translation: Yeh saare (mazkoorah) kaam, unki buraayi aapke rab ke nazdeek naa pasandeedah hai.

verses.arabic: ذٰلِكَ مِمَّآ اَوْحٰٓى اِلَيْكَ رَبُّكَ مِنَ الْحِكْمَةِ ۚ وَلَا تَجْعَلْ مَعَ اللّٰهِ اِلٰهًا اٰخَرَ فَتُلْقٰى فِيْ جَهَنَّمَ مَلُوْمًا مَّدْحُوْرًا
verses.transliteration: Zaalika mimmaaa 'awhaaa 'ilayka Rabbuka minal-hikmah; wa laa taj'al maʻal-laahi 'ilaahan 'aakhara fatulqaa fee Jahannama maloomam-madhooraa.
verses.translation: Yeh woh hikmat ki baatein hain jo aapke rab ne aapki taraf wahi ki hain. aur Allah ke saath koyi aur ma'bood na thhahraao warna jahannam mein dale jaaoge, malaamat zadah, dhutkaare huye.

verses.arabic: اَفَاَصْفٰىكُمْ رَبُّكُمْ بِالْبَنِيْنَ وَاتَّخَذَ مِنَ الْمَلٰۤىٕكَةِ اِنَاثًا ۭ اِنَّكُمْ لَتَقُوْلُوْنَ قَوْلًا عَظِيْمًا
verses.transliteration: Afa'asfaakum Rabbukum bilbaneena wattakhaza minal- malaaa'ikati 'inaasaa; 'innakum lataqooloona qawlan 'azeemaa.
verses.translation: Kiya tumhaare rab ne tumhein beton ke liye chun liya aur apne liye farishton mein se betiyaan banaa leen.? bilaa shubah tum badi (naa zeba aur khatarnaak) baat kahte ho.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ صَرَّفْنَا فِيْ هٰذَا الْقُرْاٰنِ لِيَذَّكَّرُوْا وَمَا يَزِيْدُهُمْ اِلَّا نُفُوْرًا
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad şarrafnaa fee haazal-Qur'aani liyazzakkaroo wa maa yazeeduhum 'illaa nufooraa.
verses.translation: Aur humne iss qur'an mein har tarah pher kar (haqaayeq ko) bayaan kiya hai taake woh naseehat pakdein lekin yeh (cheez) unko nafrat hi mein ziyaadah karti hai.

verses.arabic: قُلْ لَّوْ كَانَ مَعَهٗٓ اٰلِهَةٌ كَمَا يَقُوْلُوْنَ اِذًا لَّابْتَغَوْا اِلٰى ذِي الْعَرْشِ سَبِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: Qul-law kaana ma'ahooo 'aalihatun kamaa yaqooloona 'izal- labtaghaw 'ilaa zil-'Arshi Sabeelaa.
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: agar uske saath aur mabood hote, jaisa ke woh (mushrik) kahte hain, to woh saahib-e- 'arsh (Allah) tak pahuchne ke liye zaroor koyi raah talaash karte.

verses.arabic: سُبْحٰنَهٗ وَتَعٰلٰى عَمَّا يَقُوْلُوْنَ عُلُوًّا كَبِيْرًا
verses.transliteration: Subhaanahoo wa Ta'aalaa 'ammaa yaqooloona 'uluwwan kabeeraa.
verses.translation: Woh paak hai aur woh (mushrik) jo kuchh kahte hain usse kaheen ziyaadah a'alaa-o- baland tar hai.

verses.arabic: تُسَبِّحُ لَهُ السَّمٰوٰتُ السَّبْعُ وَالْاَرْضُ وَمَنْ فِيْهِنَّ ۭ وَاِنْ مِّنْ شَيْءٍ اِلَّا يُسَبِّحُ بِحَمْدِهٖ وَلٰكِنْ لَا تَفْقَهُوْنَ تَسْبِيْحَهُمْ ۭ اِنَّهٗ كَانَ حَلِيْمًا غَفُوْرًا
verses.transliteration: Tusabbihu lahus- samaawaatus-sab'u wal'ardu wa man feehinn; wa im-min shay'in 'illaa yusabbihu bihamdihee wa laakil-laa tafqahoona tasbeehahum; C 'innahoo kaana Haleeman Ghafooraa.
verses.translation: Uski tasbeeh karte hain saaton aasmaan aur zameen aur jo (makhlooq) un mein hai, aur koyi cheez aisi nahin jo uski hamd ke saath tasbeeh na karti ho, lekin tum unki tasbeeh nahin samajh sakte. beshak woh hilm aur maghfirat waala hai.

verses.arabic: وَاِذَا قَرَاْتَ الْقُرْاٰنَ جَعَلْنَا بَيْنَكَ وَبَيْنَ الَّذِيْنَ لَا يُؤْمِنُوْنَ بِالْاٰخِرَةِ حِجَابًا مَسْتُوْرًا
verses.transliteration: Wa 'izaa qara'tal- Qur'aana ja'alnaa baynaka wa baynal- lazeena laa yu'minoona bil-'Aakhirati hijaabam- mastooraa.
verses.translation: Aur jab aap qur'an padhte hain to hum aapke aur un logon ke darmiyaan, jo aakhirat par eemaan nahin laate, ek makhfi pardah daal dete hain.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Sayeed bin Jubair رَضِيَ اللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ se rivaayat hai: 'jab (Surah Lahab) naazil huyi to Abu Lahab ki beewi Nabi kareem ki taraf aayi jabke Abu Bakr Siddeeq aapke paas maujood the. Abu Bakr رضي الله عنه Nabi kareem ﷺ se arz kiya: (aye Allah ke Rasool!) aap pare (peechhe) hat jaayein woh kahin aapse aisi baatein na kare jisse aapko takleef pahunche, woh nehaayat bad zubaan aurat hai. Aap ﷺ ne farmaya: 'mere aur uske darmiyaan pardah h ayel kar diya jaayega. 'Chunaancheh usne Abu Bakr رضي الله عنه se kaha: tumhaare saathi ne hamaari hijo ki hai. Abu Bakr رضي الله عنه ne kaha: Allah ki qasam! woh she'r nahin kahta. Usne kaha: kiya tum uski tasdeeq karte ho? Phir woh wahaan se chali gayi. Abu Bakr رضي الله عنه ke sawaal par Nabi Kareem ﷺ ne farmaya: 'uske jaane tak ek farishtah mere aur uske darmiyaan haayel rahaa tha jo mujh par pardah (ojhal) kiye rahaa tha.' (Tafseer Al-Qurtubi:10/269, Musnad Abu Ya'la:1/54)

verses.arabic: وَجَعَلْنَا عَلٰى قُلُوْبِهِمْ اَكِنَّةً اَنْ يَّفْقَهُوْهُ وَفِيْٓ اٰذَانِهِمْ وَقْرًا ۭ وَاِذَا ذَكَرْتَ رَبَّكَ فِي الْقُرْاٰنِ وَحْدَهٗ وَلَّوْا عَلٰٓى اَدْبَارِهِمْ نُفُوْرًا
verses.transliteration: Wa jaʻalnaa 'alaa quloobihim 'akinnatan 'any-yafqahoohu wa feee 'aazaanihim waqraa; wa 'izaa zakarta Rabbaka fil-Qur'aani wahdahoo wallaw 'alaaa 'adbaarihim nufooraa.
verses.translation: Aur humne unke dilon par parde daal rakkhe hain taake use na samajh paayein aur unke kaanon mein daat (rok) laga dete hain aur jab aap qur'an mein apne akele rab ka zikr karte hain to woh nafrat se apni peethh pher lete hain.

verses.arabic: نَحْنُ اَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَسْتَمِعُوْنَ بِهٖٓ اِذْ يَسْتَمِعُوْنَ اِلَيْكَ وَاِذْ هُمْ نَجْوٰٓى اِذْ يَقُوْلُ الظَّالِمُوْنَ اِنْ تَتَّبِعُوْنَ اِلَّا رَجُلًا مَّسْحُوْرًا
verses.transliteration: Nahnu 'alamu bimaa yastami'oona biheee 'iz yastami'oona 'ilayka wa 'iz hum najwaaa 'iz yaqooluz-zaalimoona 'in tattabi'oona 'illaa rajulam- mashooraa.
verses.translation: Hum khoob jaante hain ke woh kis gharz se iss (qur'an) ko sunte hain, jab woh aapki taraf kaan lagaate hain aur jab woh kaana phoosi karte hain (tab bhi) jabke zaailm kahte hain: tum jiska itteba' karte ho woh to jaadu maara shakhs hai.

verses.arabic: اُنْظُرْ كَيْفَ ضَرَبُوْا لَكَ الْاَمْثَالَ فَضَلُّوْا فَلَا يَسْتَطِيْعُوْنَ سَبِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: 'Unzur kayfa daraboo lakal-'amsaala fadalloo falaa yastatee'oona sabeelaa.
verses.translation: Dekhiye: woh aapke liye kaisi misaalein bayaan karte hain, woh gumraah ho gaye, lehaaza woh raastah nahin paa sakte.

verses.arabic: وَقَالُوْٓا ءَاِذَا كُنَّا عِظَامًا وَّرُفَاتًا ءَاِنَّا لَمَبْعُوْثُوْنَ خَلْقًا جَدِيْدًا
verses.transliteration: Wa qaalooo 'a'izaa kunnaa 'izaamañw-wa rufaatan 'a'innaa lamaboosoona khalqan jadeedaa.
verses.translation: Aur woh kahte hain: kiya jab hum haddiyaan aur choora ho jaayeige to kiya hum do baarah az sar-e-nau uthhaaye jaayenge?

verses.arabic: قُلْ كُوْنُوْا حِجَارَةً اَوْ حَدِيْدًا
verses.transliteration: Qul koonoo hijaaratan 'aw hadeedaa.
verses.translation: Kahiye: tum patthar ya loha ho jaao.

verses.arabic: اَوْ خَلْقًا مِّمَّا يَكْبُرُ فِيْ صُدُوْرِكُمْ ۚ فَسَيَقُوْلُوْنَ مَنْ يُّعِيْدُنَا ۭ قُلِ الَّذِيْ فَطَرَكُمْ اَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍ ۭ فَسَيُنْغِضُوْنَ اِلَيْكَ رُءُوْسَهُمْ وَيَقُوْلُوْنَ مَتٰى هُوَ ۭ قُلْ عَسٰٓى اَنْ يَّكُوْنَ قَرِيْبًا
verses.transliteration: Aw khalqam- mimmaa yakburu fee şudoorikum; fasayaqooloona mañy- yu'eedunaa qulil-lazee fatarakum 'awwala marrah; fasayunghidoona 'ilayka ru'oosahum wa yaqooloona mataa huwa qul 'asaaa 'any-yakoona qareebaa.
verses.translation: Ya koyi makhlooq jo tumhaare dilon mein badi maloom ho. phir woh kahenge: kaun hamein dobaarah paida karega? Kahiye: woh jisne tumhein pahli baar paida kiya, phir woh aapki taraf apne sar hilaayenge aur kahenge: yeh kab hoga? kah deejiye: shaayad ke woh qareeb ho.

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ يَدْعُوْكُمْ فَتَسْتَجِيْبُوْنَ بِحَمْدِهٖ وَتَظُنُّوْنَ اِنْ لَّبِثْتُمْ اِلَّا قَلِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: Yawma yad'ookum fatastajeeboona bihamdihee wa tazunnoona 'il-labistum 'illaa qaleelaa.
verses.translation: Jis din woh (Allah) tumhein bulaayega, to tum uski hamd karte chale aaoge aur tum khayaal karoge ke bas thoda arsah thhahre ho.

verses.arabic: وَقُلْ لِعِبَادِيْ يَقُوْلُوا الَّتِيْ هِيَ اَحْسَنُ ۭ اِنَّ الشَّيْطٰنَ يَنْزَغُ بَيْنَهُمْ ۭ اِنَّ الشَّيْطٰنَ كَانَ لِلْاِنْسَانِ عَدُوًّا مُّبِيْنًا
verses.transliteration: Wa qul-li'ibaadee yaqoolul-latee hiya 'ahsan; 'innash- Shaytaana yanzaghu baynahum; 'innash- Shaytaana kaana lil'insaani 'aduwwam- mubeenaa.
verses.translation: Aur mere bandon se kah deejiye ke woh baat kahein jo ahsan ho, beshak shaytaan unke darmiyaan fasaad daalta hai, bilaa shubah shaytaan insaan ka khula dushman hai.

verses.arabic: رَبُّكُمْ اَعْلَمُ بِكُمْ ۭ اِنْ يَّشَاْ يُرْحِمْكُمْ اَوْ اِنْ يَّشَاْ يُعَذِّبْكُمْ ۭ وَمَآ اَرْسَلْنٰكَ عَلَيْهِمْ وَكِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: Rabbukum 'a'lamu bikum 'iny-yasha' yarhamkum 'aw 'iny- yasha' yu'azzibkum; wa maaa 'arsalnaaka 'alayhim wakeelaa.
verses.translation: Tumhaara rab tumhein behtar jaanta hai, agar woh chaahe to tum par raham kare, aur agar chaahe to tumhein azaab de aur hum ne aapko un par zimme daar banaa kar nahin bheja.

verses.arabic: وَرَبُّكَ اَعْلَمُ بِمَنْ فِي السَّمٰوٰتِ وَالْاَرْضِ ۭ وَلَقَدْ فَضَّلْنَا بَعْضَ النَّبِيّٖنَ عَلٰى بَعْضٍ وَّاٰتَيْنَا دَاوٗدَ زَبُوْرًا
verses.transliteration: Wa Rabbuka 'a'lamu biman fis-samaawaati wal'ard; wa laqad faddalnaa ba'dan- Nabiyyeena 'alaa ba'dinw-wa 'aataynaa Daawooda Zabooraa.
verses.translation: Aur aapka rab unhein khoob jaanta hai jo aasmaanon aur zameen mein hain aur yaqeenan humne ba'z nabiyon ko ba'z par fazeelat di hai aur humne Dawood ko zaboor di.

verses.arabic: قُلِ ادْعُوا الَّذِيْنَ زَعَمْتُمْ مِّنْ دُوْنِهٖ فَلَا يَمْلِكُوْنَ كَشْفَ الضُّرِّ عَنْكُمْ وَلَا تَحْوِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: Qulid-'ul-lazeena za'amtum min doonihee falaa yamlikoona kashfad- durri 'ankum wa laa tahweelaa.
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: pukaaro jinhein tum uske siwa ma'bood samajhte ho, na to woh tum se kisi takleef ko hataane ka koyi ikhtiyaar rakhte hain aur na (use) badalne hi ka.

verses.arabic: اُولٰٓىٕكَ الَّذِيْنَ يَدْعُوْنَ يَبْتَغُوْنَ اِلٰى رَبِّهِمُ الْوَسِيْلَةَ اَيُّهُمْ اَقْرَبُ وَيَرْجُوْنَ رَحْمَتَهٗ وَيَخَافُوْنَ عَذَابَهٗ ۭ اِنَّ عَذَابَ رَبِّكَ كَانَ مَحْذُوْرًا
verses.transliteration: 'Ulaaa'ikal-lazeena yad'oona yabtaghoona 'ilaa Rabbihimul- waseelata 'ayyuhum 'aqrabu wa yarjoona rahmatahoo wa yakhaafoona 'azaabah; 'inna 'azaaba Rabbika kaana mahzooraa.
verses.translation: Jinhein yeh (mushrik) log pukaarte hain woh to khud apne rab tak pahunchne ka waseelah dhoondhte hain ke un mein se kaun (Allah se) qareeb tar (ho sakta) hai, aur woh uski rahmat ki ummeed rakhte hain aur uske azaab se darte hain. bilaa shubah aapke rab ka azaab darne ki cheez hai.

verses.arabic: وَاِنْ مِّنْ قَرْيَةٍ اِلَّا نَحْنُ مُهْلِكُوْهَا قَبْلَ يَوْمِ الْقِيٰمَةِ اَوْ مُعَذِّبُوْهَا عَذَابًا شَدِيْدًا ۭ كَانَ ذٰلِكَ فِي الْكِتٰبِ مَسْطُوْرًا
verses.transliteration: Wa 'im-min qaryatin 'illaa Nahnu muhlikoohaa qabla Yawmil-Qiyaamati 'aw mu'azziboohaa 'azaaban shadeedaa; kaana zaalika fil-Kitaabi mastooraa.
verses.translation: Aur koyi basti aisi nahin jise hum yaum-e-qiyaamat se pahle halaak na karein ya use shadeed azaab na dein, yeh kitab (Lauh-e-mahfooz) mein likha huwa hai.

verses.arabic: وَمَا مَنَعَنَآ اَنْ نُّرْسِلَ بِالْاٰيٰتِ اِلَّآ اَنْ كَذَّبَ بِهَا الْاَوَّلُوْنَ ۭ وَاٰتَيْنَا ثَمُوْدَ النَّاقَةَ مُبْصِرَةً فَظَلَمُوْا بِهَا ۭ وَمَا نُرْسِلُ بِالْاٰيٰتِ اِلَّا تَخْوِيْفًا
verses.transliteration: Wa maa mana'anaaa 'an-nursila bil-'Aayaati 'illaaa 'an kazzaba bihal- 'awwaloon; wa 'aataynaa Samoodan- naaqata mubşiratan fazalamoo bihaa; wa maa nursilu bil-'Aayaati 'illaa takhweefaa.
verses.translation: Aur humein nishaaniyaan bhejne se sir uss cheez ne roka hai ke pahle logon ne unko jhutlaaya tha. aur humne Samood ko ek ountni di thi waazeh nishaani, phir unhon ne uss par zulm kiya aur hum to sirf daraane ke liye nishaaniyaan bhejte hain.

verses.arabic: وَاِذْ قُلْنَا لَكَ اِنَّ رَبَّكَ اَحَاطَ بِالنَّاسِ ۚ وَمَا جَعَلْنَا الرُّءْيَا الَّتِيْٓ اَرَيْنٰكَ اِلَّا فِتْنَةً لِلنَّاسِ وَالشَّجَرَةَ الْمَلْعُوْنَةَ فِي الْقُرْاٰنِ ۚ وَنُخَوِّفُهُمْ فَمَا يَزِيْدُهُمْ اِلَّا طُغْيَانًا كَبِيْرًا
verses.transliteration: Wa 'iz qulnaa laka 'inna Rabbaka 'ahaata binnaas; wa maa ja'alnar-ru'yal-lateee 'araynaaka 'illaa fitnatal-linnaasi washshajaratal- mal'oonata fil-qur'aan; wa nukhawwifuhum famaa yazeeduhum 'illaa tughyaanan kabeeraa.
verses.translation: Aur (yaad karein) jab humne aapse kaha: beshak aapke rab ne logon ka ehaatah kar rakkha hai aur humne aapko (me'raaj mein) jo mushaahadah karaaya. Use logon ke liye bas ek fitnah hi bana diya aur uss darakht (Zaqqoom) ko bhi jis par qur'an mein la'nat ki gayi aur hum unhein daraate hain to unki badi sarkash aur ziyaadah ho jaati hai.

verses.arabic: وَاِذْ قُلْنَا لِلْمَلٰٓىٕكَةِ اسْجُدُوْا لِاٰدَمَ فَسَجَدُوْٓا اِلَّآ اِبْلِيْسَ ۭ قَالَ ءَاَسْجُدُ لِمَنْ خَلَقْتَ طِيْنًا
verses.transliteration: Wa 'iz qulnaa lilmalaaa'ikatis-judoo li- 'Aadama fasajadooo 'illaaa 'Ibleesa qaala 'a'asjudu liman khalaqta teenaa.
verses.translation: Aur jab humne farishton se kaha: Aadam ko sajdah karo, to Iblees ke siwa un sab ne sajdah kiya, woh bola: kiya main use ajdah karun jise toone mitti se paida kiya hai?

verses.arabic: قَالَ اَرَءَيْتَكَ هٰذَا الَّذِيْ كَرَّمْتَ عَلَيَّ ۚ لَىٕنْ اَخَّرْتَنِ اِلٰى يَوْمِ الْقِيٰمَةِ لَاَحْتَنِكَنَّ ذُرِّيَّتَهٗٓ اِلَّا قَلِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: Qaala 'ara'aytaka haazal-lazee karramta 'alayya la'in 'akhkhartani 'ilaa Yawmil-Qiyaamati la'ahtanikanna zurriyyatahooo 'illaa qaleelaa.
verses.translation: Kahne laga: bhala dekh to use jise toone mujh par izzat di hai, agar tu mujhe yaum-e-qiyaamat tak dheel de, to thode logon ke siwa mein uski tamaam nasl ki jad kaat dunga.

verses.arabic: قَالَ اذْهَبْ فَمَنْ تَبِعَكَ مِنْهُمْ فَاِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ جَزَآؤُكُمْ جَزَاءً مَّوْفُوْرًا
verses.transliteration: Qaalaz-hab faman tabi'aka minhum fa'inna Jahannama jazaaa'ukum jazaaa'am-mawfooraa.
verses.translation: Allah ne farmaya: jaa! Phir un mein se jo tera itteba' karega to bilaa shubah tumhaari saza jahannam hai, puri puri saza.

verses.arabic: وَاسْتَفْزِزْ مَنِ اسْتَطَعْتَ مِنْهُمْ بِصَوْتِكَ وَاَجْلِبْ عَلَيْهِمْ بِخَيْلِكَ وَرَجِلِكَ وَشَارِكْهُمْ فِي الْاَمْوَالِ وَالْاَوْلَادِ وَعِدْهُمْ ۭ وَمَا يَعِدُهُمُ الشَّيْطٰنُ اِلَّا غُرُوْرًا
verses.transliteration: Wastafziz manis- tata'ta minhum bişawtika wa 'ajlib 'alayhim bikhaylika wa rajilika wa shaarikhum fil-'amwaali wal'awlaadi wa 'idhum; wa maa ya iduhumush- Shaytaanu 'illaa ghurooraa.
verses.translation: Aur un mein se jin par bhi tera bas chal sake unhein apni aawaaz se bah kaale, aur un par apne sawaar aur piyaade chadhaa la, aur maal aur aulaad mein unka shareek ban jaa aur unhein (jhoote) wa'de de aur shaytaan to unhein bas fareb hi ka wa'dah deta hai.

verses.arabic: اِنَّ عِبَادِيْ لَيْسَ لَكَ عَلَيْهِمْ سُلْطٰنٌ ۭ وَكَفٰى بِرَبِّكَ وَكِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: 'Inna 'ibaadee laysa laka 'alayhim sultaan; wa kafaa bi-Rabbika Wakeelaa.
verses.translation: Beshak mere bandon par tera koyi zor nahin, aur aapka rab kaafi hai kaar saaz.

verses.arabic: رَبُّكُمُ الَّذِيْ يُزْجِيْ لَكُمُ الْفُلْكَ فِي الْبَحْرِ لِتَبْتَغُوْا مِنْ فَضْلِهٖ ۭ اِنَّهٗ كَانَ بِكُمْ رَحِيْمًا
verses.transliteration: Rabbukumul-lazee yuzjee lakumul-fulka fil- bahri litabtaghoo min fadlih; 'innahoo kaana bikum Raheemaa.
verses.translation: Tumhaara rab to woh hai jo tumhaare liye samandar mein kashti chalaata hai taake tum uska fazl talaash karo, beshak woh tum par bada raheem hai.

verses.arabic: وَاِذَا مَسَّكُمُ الضُّرُّ فِي الْبَحْرِ ضَلَّ مَنْ تَدْعُوْنَ اِلَّآ اِيَّاهُ ۚ فَلَمَّا نَجّٰىكُمْ اِلَى الْبَرِّ اَعْرَضْتُمْ ۭ وَكَانَ الْاِنْسَانُ كَفُوْرًا
verses.transliteration: Wa 'izaa massakumud-durru fil- bahri dalla man tad'oona 'illaaa 'iyyaahu falammaa najjaakum 'ilal-barri 'a'radtum; wa kaanal-'insaanu kafooraa.
verses.translation: Aur jab samandar mein tumhein koyi takleef pahunche to tum unko, jinhein Allah ke siwa pukaarte ho, bhool jaate ho,¹ phir jab woh (Allah) tumhein khushki ki taraf najaat deta hai to tum munh mod lete ho aur insaan bada hi naa shukra hai.
verses.deepMeaning: hai, kashti ke tufaan mein ghirne par log kahne lage: Allah wahdahu se pure ekhlaas ke saath dua' karo. Ekramah ne apne ji mein kaha: 'Allah ki qasam! Agar samandar mein Allah wahdahu ke siwa koyi faaidah nahin pahuncha sakta to phir yaqeenan zameen par bhi uske siwa koyi faaidah nahin pahuncha sakta. Chunaancheh baahar nikal kar seedhe Nabi Kareem ﷺ ki khidmat mein haazir huye aur islam qubool kar liya. (Tafseer Ibne Kaseer, Surah Bani Israyeel:17/67)

verses.arabic: اَفَاَمِنْتُمْ اَنْ يَّخْسِفَ بِكُمْ جَانِبَ الْبَرِّ اَوْ يُرْسِلَ عَلَيْكُمْ حَاصِبًا ثُمَّ لَا تَجِدُوْا لَكُمْ وَكِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: 'Afa'amintum 'añy- yakhsifa bikum jaanibal- barri 'aw yursila 'alaykum haaşiban summa laa tajidoo lakum wakeelaa.
verses.translation: Kiya phir tum usse be khauf ho gaye ho ke woh tumhein khushki ki jaanib (zameen mein) dhansa de ya tum par san rezon waali sakht aandhi bhej de, phir tum apne liye koyi kaar saaz na paa sako.

verses.arabic: اَمْ اَمِنْتُمْ اَنْ يُّعِيْدَكُمْ فِيْهِ تَارَةً اُخْرٰى فَيُرْسِلَ عَلَيْكُمْ قَاصِفًا مِّنَ الرِّيْحِ فَيُغْرِقَكُمْ بِمَا كَفَرْتُمْ ثُمَّ لَا تَجِدُوْا لَكُمْ عَلَيْنَا بِهٖ تَبِيْعًا
verses.transliteration: 'Am 'amintum 'any- yu'eedakum feehi taaratan 'ukhraa fayursila 'alaykum qaaşifam-minar-reehi fayughriqakum bimaa kafartum summa laa tajidoo lakum 'alaynaa bihee tabeeʻaa.
verses.translation: Kiya tum be khauf ho gaye ho ke woh tumhein dobaarah uss (samandar) mein dhakel de, phir tum par toofaani hawa bheje, to woh tumhaare kufr ke sabab tumhein gharq karde, phir tum apne liye hamaare khilaaf uss par koyi hamaara peechha karne waala bhi na paao.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ كَرَّمْنَا بَنِيْٓ اٰدَمَ وَحَمَلْنٰهُمْ فِي الْبَرِّ وَالْبَحْرِ وَرَزَقْنٰهُمْ مِّنَ الطَّيِّبٰتِ وَفَضَّلْنٰهُمْ عَلٰى كَثِيْرٍ مِّمَّنْ خَلَقْنَا تَفْضِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad karramnaa Baneee 'Aadama wa hamalnaahum fil-barri walbahri wa razaqnaahum minat- tayyibaati wa faddalnaahum 'alaa kaseerim-mimman khalaqnaa tafdeelaa.
verses.translation: Aur bilaa shubah yaqeenan hum ne Bani Aadam ko izzat di hai aur unhein barr-o-bahar mein sawaariyan din, aur unhein paakeezah cheezon mein se rizq diya aur unhein apni kaseer makhlooqaat par badi fazeelat di, jinhein humne paida kiya.

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ نَدْعُوْا كُلَّ اُنَاسٍۢ بِاِمَامِهِمْ ۚ فَمَنْ اُوْتِيَ كِتٰبَهٗ بِيَمِيْنِهٖ فَاُولٰٓىٕكَ يَقْرَءُوْنَ كِتٰبَهُمْ وَلَا يُظْلَمُوْنَ فَتِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: Yawma nad'oo kulla 'unaasim bi-'Imaamihim faman 'ootiya kitaabahoo biyameenihee fa'ulaaa'ika yaqra'oona kitaabahum wa laa yuzlamoona fateelaa.
verses.translation: Jis din hum tamaam insaanon ko unke imam ke saath bulaayeinge phir jise uska a'amaal naama uske daayen haath mein diya gaya to woh apna a'amaal naama padhenge aur un par (ghithhli ke) dhaage baraabar zulm na hoga.

verses.arabic: وَمَنْ كَانَ فِيْ هٰذِهٖٓ اَعْمٰى فَهُوَ فِي الْاٰخِرَةِ اَعْمٰى وَاَضَلُّ سَبِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: Wa man kaana fee haazihee a'maa fa huwa fil aakhirati a'maa wa adallu sabeelaa
verses.translation: Aur jo iss dunya mein andha raha, woh aakhirat mein bhi andha aur raah se bahut ziyaadah bhatka huwa rahega.

verses.arabic: وَاِنْ كَادُوْا لَيَفْتِنُوْنَكَ عَنِ الَّذِيْٓ اَوْحَيْنَآ اِلَيْكَ لِتَفْتَرِيَ عَلَيْنَا غَيْرَهٗ وَاِذًا لَّاتَّخَذُوْكَ خَلِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: Wa 'in kaadoo layaftinoonaka 'anil- lazeee 'awhaynaaa 'ilayka litaftariya 'alaynaa ghayrahoo wa 'izal-lattakhazooka khaleelaa.
verses.translation: Aur bilaa shubah qareeb tha ke humne aapki taraf jo wahi ki hai kaafir aapko usse phusla dete taake Aap hum par uske elaawah kuchh aur ghad lein aur tab woh zaroor aapko apna dili dost bana lete.

verses.arabic: وَلَوْلَآ اَنْ ثَبَّتْنٰكَ لَقَدْ كِدْتَّ تَرْكَنُ اِلَيْهِمْ شَيْـًٔا قَلِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: Wa law laaa 'an sabbatnaaka laqad kitta tarkanu 'ilayhim shay'an qaleelaa.
verses.translation: Aur agar hum aapko saabit qadam na rakhte to bilaa shubah qareeb tha ke aap unki taraf thoda sa jhuk jaate

verses.arabic: اِذًا لَّاَذَقْنٰكَ ضِعْفَ الْحَيٰوةِ وَضِعْفَ الْمَمَاتِ ثُمَّ لَا تَجِدُ لَكَ عَلَيْنَا نَصِيْرًا
verses.transliteration: 'Izal-la'azaqnaaka di'fal-hayaati wa di'fal- mamaati summa laa tajidu laka 'alaynaa naseeraa.
verses.translation: (Agar aisa hota) to hum aapko zindagi mein bhi aur maut ke ba'd bhi do guna azaab chakhaate phir aap apne liye hamaare khilaaf koyi madad gaar na paate

verses.arabic: وَاِنْ كَادُوْا لَيَسْتَفِزُّوْنَكَ مِنَ الْاَرْضِ لِيُخْرِجُوْكَ مِنْهَا ۭ وَاِذًا لَّا يَلْبَثُوْنَ خِلٰفَكَ اِلَّا قَلِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: Wa 'in kaadoo layastafizzoonaka minal- 'ardi liyukhrijooka minhaa wa 'izal-laa yalbasoona khilaafaka 'illaa qaleelaa.
verses.translation: Aur woh aapko iss zameen (Makkah) se ukhaadne hi lage the ke aapko yahaan se nikaal dein aur tab aapke peechhe woh thoda hi thhahar paate.

verses.arabic: سُنَّةَ مَنْ قَدْ اَرْسَلْنَا قَبْلَكَ مِنْ رُّسُلِنَا ۚ وَلَا تَجِدُ لِسُنَّتِنَا تَحْوِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: Sunnata man qad 'arsalnaa qablaka mir- Rusulinaa wa laa tajidu lisunnatinaa tahweelaa.
verses.translation: Un Rasoolon ke tareeqe ki maanind jinhein humne aapse pahle bheja aur aap hamaare tareeqe (qaanoon) mein koyi tabdeeli na paayenge.

verses.arabic: اَقِمِ الصَّلٰوةَ لِدُلُوْكِ الشَّمْسِ اِلٰى غَسَقِ الَّيْلِ وَقُرْاٰنَ الْفَجْرِ ۭ اِنَّ قُرْاٰنَ الْفَجْرِ كَانَ مَشْهُوْدًا
verses.transliteration: 'Aqimiş-Şalaata lidulookish-shamsi 'ilaa ghasaqil-layli wa qur'aanal-Fajri 'inna qur'aanal-Fajri kaana mashhoodaa.
verses.translation: Suraj dhalne se le kar raat ke andhere tak namaaz qaayem keejiye, aur namaaz-e-fajr bhi, beshak fajr ki namaaz (farishton ke) haazir hone ka waqt hai.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Iska matlab hadees mein yeh bayaan kiya gaya hai ke uss waqt raat aur din ke farishte haazir hote aur ekatthhe hote hain, (Al-Bukhari, Al-Azaan, Baab:31, hadees:648)avidy

verses.arabic: وَمِنَ الَّيْلِ فَتَهَجَّدْ بِهٖ نَافِلَةً لَّكَ ۭ عَسٰٓى اَنْ يَّبْعَثَكَ رَبُّكَ مَقَامًا مَّحْمُوْدًا
verses.transliteration: Wa minal-layli fatahajjad bihee naafilatal-laka 'asaaa 'any-yab'asaka Rabbuka Maqaamam-Mahmoodaa.
verses.translation: Aur raat ke kuchh hisse mein bhi aap iss (qur'an) ke saath tahajjud padhein, (yeh) aapke liye zaayed hai, ummeed hai ke aapka rab aapko maqaam-e-mahmood¹ par khadaa karega.
verses.deepMeaning: Yeh 'maqaam-e-Mahmood' qiyaamat ke din Nabi ﷺ ko ataa kiya jaayega jis par faayez ho kar Aap ﷺ shifaa'at farmaayenge Jaisa ke ahaadees se waazeh hai qiyaamat ke din log apne apne nabi se kahenge: 'Aye fulaan! (aye fulaan!) Allah se hamaari shifaa'at (sifaarish) keejiye batta ke shifaa'at ka haq Nabi (Muhammad ﷺ ) ko de diya jaayega aur woh wahi din hoga jab Allah Ta'ala Nabi Kareem ﷺ ko maqaam-e-mahmood par faayez karega.'' (Al-Bukhari, At- tafseer, Baab:11, Hadees:4718) Rasoolullah ﷺ ne mazeed farmaya: 'jo shakhs azaan sunne ke ba'd ye dua' padhe: (Allaahumma Rabba haazihid-da'watit-taammati wassalaatil Qaaimati, aati Muhammadanil waseelata walfadheelata, wab'ath-hu maqaamam- Mahmoodanillazee wa 'attahu, (innaka laa tukhliful mee'aad) usko qiyaamat ke din Deri shifaa'at naseeb hogi.' (Al-Bukhaari, At-tafseer, Surah Bani Israyeel, hadees:4719)

verses.arabic: وَقُلْ رَّبِّ اَدْخِلْنِيْ مُدْخَلَ صِدْقٍ وَّاَخْرِجْنِيْ مُخْرَجَ صِدْقٍ وَّاجْعَلْ لِّيْ مِنْ لَّدُنْكَ سُلْطٰنًا نَّصِيْرًا
verses.transliteration: Wa qur-Rabbi 'adkhilnee mudkhala sidqinw-wa 'akhrijnee mukhraja şidqinw- waj'al-lee mil-ladunka sultaanan naseeraa.
verses.translation: Aur kahiye: aye mere rab! Mujhe (jahaan le jaaye to) sachchaayi ke saath le jaa aur (jahaan se nikaale to) sachchaayi ke saath nikaal aur mujhe apne paas se madad dene waala ghalbah ataa kar.

verses.arabic: وَقُلْ جَآءَ الْحَقُّ وَزَهَقَ الْبَاطِلُ ۭ اِنَّ الْبَاطِلَ كَانَ زَهُوْقًا
verses.transliteration: Wa qul jaaa'al-haqqu wa zahaqal-baatil; 'innal-baatila kaana zahooqaa.
verses.translation: Aur kahiye; haq aa gaya aur baatil mit gaya, beshak baatil to mitne hi waala hai.

verses.arabic: وَنُنَزِّلُ مِنَ الْقُرْاٰنِ مَا هُوَ شِفَآءٌ وَّرَحْمَةٌ لِّلْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ وَلَا يَزِيْدُ الظّٰلِمِيْنَ اِلَّا خَسَارًا
verses.transliteration: Wa nunazzilu minal- Qur'aani maa huwa shifaaa'unw-wa rahmatul- lilmu'mineena wa laa yazeeduz- zaalimeena 'illaa khasaaraa.
verses.translation: Aur hum qur'an mein se jo naazil karte hain woh mominon ke liye shifa aur rahmat hai aur woh zaalimon ko khasaare hi mein ziyaadah karta hai.

verses.arabic: وَاِذَآ اَنْعَمْنَا عَلَى الْاِنْسَانِ اَعْرَضَ وَنَاٰ بِجَانِبِهٖ وَاِذَا مَسَّهُ الشَّرُّ كَانَ يَـُٔوْسًا
verses.transliteration: Wa 'izaaa 'an'amnaa 'alal-'insaani 'a'rada wa na'aa bijaanibihee wa 'izaa massahush-sharru kaana ya'oosaa.
verses.translation: Aur jab hum insaan par in'aam karein to woh munh mod leta hai aur apna pahlu bachaata hai aur jab use takleef pahunche to maayoos ho jaata hai.

verses.arabic: قُلْ كُلٌّ يَّعْمَلُ عَلٰى شَاكِلَتِهٖ فَرَبُّكُمْ اَعْلَمُ بِمَنْ هُوَ اَهْدٰى سَبِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: Qul kulluny-ya'malu 'alaa shaakilatihee fa- Rabbukum 'a'lamu biman huwa 'ahdaa sabeelaa.
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: har koyi apne tareeqe par amal karta hai, chunaancheh tumhaara rab khoob jaanta hai ke kaun ziyaadah seedhe raaste par hai.

verses.arabic: وَيَسْــَٔلُوْنَكَ عَنِ الرُّوْحِ ۭ قُلِ الرُّوْحُ مِنْ اَمْرِ رَبِّيْ وَمَآ اُوْتِيْتُمْ مِّنَ الْعِلْمِ اِلَّا قَلِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: Wa yas'aloonaka 'anir-rooh; qulir-roohu min 'amri Rabbee wa maaa 'ooteetum minal- 'ilmi 'illaa qaleelaa.
verses.translation: Aur woh aapse rooh ke muta'alliq sawaal karte hain. kahiye: Rooh mere rab ke hukm se hai aur tumhein tobahut hi thoda ilm diya gaya hai

verses.arabic: وَلَئِنْ شِئْنَا لَنَذْهَبَنَّ بِالَّذِيْٓ اَوْحَيْنَآ اِلَيْكَ ثُمَّ لَا تَجِدُ لَكَ بِهٖ عَلَيْنَا وَكِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: Wa la'in shi'naa lanazhabanna billazeee 'awhaynaaa 'ilayka summa laa tajidu laka bihee 'alaynaa wakeelaa.
verses.translation: Aur agar hum chaahein to use zaroor le jaayein jo kuchh humne aapki taraf wahi ki hai phir aap uss par hamaare muqaable mein apna koyi himaayati na paayenge.

verses.arabic: اِلَّا رَحْمَةً مِّنْ رَّبِّكَ ۭ اِنَّ فَضْلَهٗ كَانَ عَلَيْكَ كَبِيْرًا
verses.transliteration: 'Illaa rahmatam-mir- Rabbik; 'inna fadlahoo kaana 'alayka kabeeraa.
verses.translation: Siwaaye aapke rab ki rahmat ke, beshak aap par uska fazl bahut ziyaadah hai.

verses.arabic: قُلْ لَىٕنِ اجْتَمَعَتِ الْاِنْسُ وَالْجِنُّ عَلٰٓى اَنْ يَّاْتُوْا بِمِثْلِ هٰذَا الْقُرْاٰنِ لَا يَاْتُوْنَ بِمِثْلِهٖ وَلَوْ كَانَ بَعْضُهُمْ لِبَعْضٍ ظَهِيْرًا
verses.transliteration: Qul la'inij-tamaʻatil- 'insu waljinnu 'alaaa 'any-ya'too bimisli haazal-Qur'aani laa ya'toona bimislihee wa law kaana ba'duhum liba din zaheeraa.
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: agar tamaam insaan aur jin mil kar iss qu'ran ki misl laana chaahein to woh iski misl na laa sakenge agarcheh woh ek doosre ke madad gaar bhi ban jaayein.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ صَرَّفْنَا لِلنَّاسِ فِيْ هٰذَا الْقُرْاٰنِ مِنْ كُلِّ مَثَلٍ فَاَبٰٓى اَكْثَرُ النَّاسِ اِلَّا كُفُوْرًا
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad şarrafnaa linnaasi fee haazal- Qur'aani min kulli masalin fa'abaaa 'aksarun-naasi 'illaa kufooraa.
verses.translation: Aur bilaa shubah humne iss qur'an mein har misaal pher pher kar bayaan ki hai phir bhi aksar log naa shukre huye baghair nahin rahte.

verses.arabic: وَقَالُوْا لَنْ نُّؤْمِنَ لَكَ حَتّٰى تَفْجُرَ لَنَا مِنَ الْاَرْضِ يَنْۢبُوْعًا
verses.transliteration: Wa qaaloo lan nu'mina laka hattaa tafjura lanaa minal-'ardi yamboo'aa.
verses.translation: Aur woh bole: hum tujh par hargiz eemaan nahin laayenge hatta ke tu hmaare liye zameen se chashmah jaari karde.

verses.arabic: اَوْ تَكُوْنَ لَكَ جَنَّةٌ مِّنْ نَّخِيْلٍ وَّعِنَبٍ فَتُفَجِّرَ الْاَنْهٰرَ خِلٰلَهَا تَفْجِيْرًا
verses.transliteration: 'Aw takoona laka jannatum-min- nakheelinw-wa 'inabin fatufajjiral-'anhaara khilaalahaa tafjeeraa.
verses.translation: Ya tere liye khujooron aur angooron ka ek baagh ho phir tu uss (baagh) ke darmiyaan (jagah jagah) nahrein jaari kar de.

verses.arabic: اَوْ تُسْقِطَ السَّمَآءَ كَمَا زَعَمْتَ عَلَيْنَا كِسَفًا اَوْ تَاْتِيَ بِاللّٰهِ وَالْمَلٰٓىٕكَةِ قَبِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: 'Aw tusqitas-samaaa'a kamaa zaʻamta 'alaynaa kisafan 'aw ta'tiya billaahi walmalaaa'ikati qabeelaa.
verses.translation: Ya tu aasmaan tukde tukde karke hum par gira de jaise tu kaha karta hai, ya Allah ko aur farishton ko saamne le aa.

verses.arabic: اَوْ يَكُوْنَ لَكَ بَيْتٌ مِّنْ زُخْرُفٍ اَوْ تَرْقٰى فِي السَّمَآءِ ۚ وَلَنْ نُّؤْمِنَ لِرُقِيِّكَ حَتّٰى تُنَزِّلَ عَلَيْنَا كِتٰبًا نَّقْرَؤُهٗ ۭ قُلْ سُبْحَانَ رَبِّيْ هَلْ كُنْتُ اِلَّا بَشَرًا رَّسُوْلًا
verses.transliteration: 'Aw yakoona laka baytum-min zukhrufin 'aw tarqaa fis-samaaa'i wa lan nu'mina liruqiyyika hattaa tunazzila 'alaynaa kitaaban nagra'uh; qul Subhaana Rabbee hal kuntu 'illaa basharar- Rasoolaa.
verses.translation: Ya tere liye sone ka ghar ho, ya tu aasmaan mein chadh jaaye, aur hum tere chadhne par eemaan na laayeinge, hatta ke tu hum par ek kitab utaar laaye jise hum padhein, kahiye: mera rab paak hai, main to bas ek bashar Rasool hoon.

verses.arabic: وَمَا مَنَعَ النَّاسَ اَنْ يُّؤْمِنُوْٓا اِذْ جَآءَهُمُ الْهُدٰٓى اِلَّآ اَنْ قَالُوْٓا اَبَعَثَ اللّٰهُ بَشَرًا رَّسُوْلًا
verses.transliteration: Wa maa mana'an- naasa 'añy-yu'minooo 'iz jaaa'ahumul-hudaaa 'illaaa 'an qaalooo 'aba'asal-laahu basharar-Rasoolaa.
verses.translation: Aur logon ke paas hidaayat aa jaane ke ba'd unko eemaan laane se sirf uss cheez ne roka ke unhon ne kaha: kiya Allah ne bashar Rasool bheja hai?

verses.arabic: قُلْ لَوْ كَانَ فِي الْاَرْضِ مَلٰٓىٕكَةٌ يَمْشُوْنَ مُطْمَىٕنِّيْنَ لَنَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ مِّنَ السَّمَآءِ مَلَكًا رَّسُوْلًا
verses.transliteration: Qul law kaana fil-'ardi malaaa ikatuñy- yamshoona mutma'inneena lanazzalnaa 'alayhim minas-samaaa'i malakar- Rasoolaa.
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: agar zameen mein farishte hote jo yahaan mutmayin ho kar chalte phirte to hum un par aasmaan se koyi farishtah hi Rasool banaa kar naazil karte.

verses.arabic: قُلْ كَفٰى بِاللّٰهِ شَهِيْدًۢا بَيْنِيْ وَبَيْنَكُمْ ۭ اِنَّهٗ كَانَ بِعِبَادِهٖ خَبِيْرًۢا بَصِيْرًا
verses.transliteration: Qul kafaa billaahi shaheedam baynee wa baynakum; 'innahoo kaana bi'ibaadihee Khabeeram Baseeraa.
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: mere aur tumhaare darmiyaan bataur gawaah Allah kaafi hai. beshak woh apne bandon se baa khabar aur (unhein) dekhne waala hai.

verses.arabic: وَمَنْ يَّهْدِ اللّٰهُ فَهُوَ الْمُهْتَدِيْ ۚ وَمَنْ يُّضْلِلْ فَلَنْ تَجِدَ لَهُمْ اَوْلِيَآءَ مِنْ دُوْنِهٖ ۚ وَنَحْشُرُهُمْ يَوْمَ الْقِيٰمَةِ عَلٰى وُجُوْهِهِمْ عُمْيًا وَّبُكْمًا وَّصُمًّا ۭ مَاْوٰىهُمْ جَهَنَّمُ ۭ كُلَّمَا خَبَتْ زِدْنٰهُمْ سَعِيْرًا
verses.transliteration: Wa mañy-yahdil-laahu fahuwal-muhtad; wa many-yudlil falan tajida lahum 'awliyaaa'a min doonih; wa nahshuruhum Yawmal-Qiyaamati 'alaa wujoohihim 'umyanw-wa bukmanw-wa summaa; ma'waahum Jahannamu kullamaa khabat zidnaahum sa'eeraa.
verses.translation: Aur jise Allah hidaayat de, to wahi hidaayat yaaftah hai aur jise woh gumraah kare to unke liye aap uske siwa koyi dost hargiz na paayenge aur hum unehin yaum-e- qiyaamat ondhe munh¹ andhe, gonge aur bahre uthhaayenge, unka thhikaana jahannam hoga. jab woh bujhne lagegi to hum unke liye aur bhadkaa denge.
verses.deepMeaning: Munh ke bal (munh neeche aur taangein oupar) uski baabat hadees mein aata hai hazrat Anas رضي الله عنه se vaayat hai, ek aadmi ne arz kiya: aye Allah ke Nabi ﷺ qiyaamat ke din kaafir ko uske munh ke bal alaaya jaayega? Nabi ﷺ ne farmaya: 'jis zaat ne dunya mein use do paaun ke bal chalaaya, kiya woh aamat ke din use munh ke bal chalaane par qaadir nahin hai?' Qataadah رضي الله عنه ne farmaya: hamaare rab ki izzat-o-jalaalat ki qasam! Kyun nahin. (Sahih Bukhari At-tafseer, Surah Al-furqaan, Baab:1, Hadees:4760)

verses.arabic: ذٰلِكَ جَزَآؤُهُمْ بِاَنَّهُمْ كَفَرُوْا بِاٰيٰتِنَا وَقَالُوْٓا ءَاِذَا كُنَّا عِظَامًا وَّرُفَاتًا ءَاِنَّا لَمَبْعُوْثُوْنَ خَلْقًا جَدِيْدًا
verses.transliteration: Zaalika jazaaa'uhum bi'annahum kafaroo bi- 'Aayaatinaa wa qaalooo 'a'izaa kunnaa Izaamañw-wa rufaatan 'a'innaa lamab'oosoona khalqan jadeedaa.
verses.translation: Yeh unki saza hai kyun ke unhon ne hamaari aayaat ka inkaar kiya aur kaha: kiya jab hum haddiyaan aur choora ho jaayenge to kiya yaqeenan hum dobaarah az sar-e-nau uthhaaye jaayenge?

verses.arabic: اَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا اَنَّ اللّٰهَ الَّذِيْ خَلَقَ السَّمٰوٰتِ وَالْاَرْضَ قَادِرٌ عَلٰٓى اَنْ يَّخْلُقَ مِثْلَهُمْ وَجَعَلَ لَهُمْ اَجَلًا لَّا رَيْبَ فِيْهِ ۭ فَاَبَى الظّٰلِمُوْنَ اِلَّا كُفُوْرًا
verses.transliteration: 'Awalam yaraw 'annal-laahal-lazee khalaqas-samaawaati wal'arda qaadirun 'alaaa 'any-yakhluqa mislahum wa ja'ala lahum 'ajalal-laa rayba feeh; fa'abaz-zaalimoona 'illaa kufooraa.
verses.translation: Kiya unhon ne dekha ke beshak jis Allah ne aasmaan aur zameen takhleeq kiye, woh uss par qaadir hai ke un jaise phir takhleeq karde aur Allah ne unke liye ek waqt muqarrar kiya hai, jis mein koyi shak nahin lekin zaalim inkaar kiye baghair nahin rahte.

verses.arabic: قُلْ لَوْ اَنْتُمْ تَمْلِكُوْنَ خَزَآىٕنَ رَحْمَةِ رَبِّيْٓ اِذًا لَّاَمْسَكْتُمْ خَشْيَةَ الْاِنْفَاقِ ۭ وَكَانَ الْاِنْسَانُ قَتُوْرًا
verses.transliteration: Qullaw 'antum tamlikoona khazaaa'ina rahmati Rabbeee 'izal- la'amsaktum khashyatal- 'infaaq; wa kaanal- 'insaanu qatooraa.
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: agar tum mere rab ki rahmat ke khazaanon ke malik hote to Uss waqt tum unhein kharch ho jaane ke dar se zaroor rok lete aur insaan nehaayat bakheel hai.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ اٰتَيْنَا مُوْسٰى تِسْعَ اٰيٰتٍۭ بَيِّنٰتٍ فَسْــَٔلْ بَنِيْٓ اِسْرَآءِيْلَ اِذْ جَآءَهُمْ فَقَالَ لَهٗ فِرْعَوْنُ اِنِّيْ لَاَظُنُّكَ يٰمُوْسٰى مَسْحُوْرًا
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad 'aataynaa Moosaa tis'a 'Aayaatim bayyinaatin fas'al Baneee 'Israaa'eela 'iz jaaa'ahum faqaala lahoo Fir'awnu 'innee la'azunnuka yaa Moosaa mashooraa.
verses.translation: Aur hum ne Moosa ko nau(9) khuli anokhi nishaaniyaan deen, chunaancheh aap bani Israyeel se poochhein, jab woh unke paas aaya to firw'aon ne usse kaha: aye Moosa! Beshak main tujhe sahar zadah samajhta hoon.

verses.arabic: قَالَ لَقَدْ عَلِمْتَ مَآ اَنْزَلَ هٰٓؤُلَآءِ اِلَّا رَبُّ السَّمٰوٰتِ وَالْاَرْضِ بَصَآىٕرَ ۚ وَاِنِّيْ لَاَظُنُّكَ يٰفِرْعَوْنُ مَثْبُوْرًا
verses.transliteration: Qaala laqad 'alimta maaa 'anzala haaa'ulaaa'i 'illaa Rabbus-samaawaati wal'ardi başaaa'ira wa 'innee la'azunnuka yaa Fir'awnu masbooraa.
verses.translation: Uss (Moosa) ne kaha: tu yaqeenan jaan chuka hai ke yeh cheezein aasmaanon aur zameen ke rab hi ne, baseerat banaa kar (ghaur karne ke liye) naazil ki hain aur aye firaun! Main to tujhe halaak kiya huwa samajhta hoon.

verses.arabic: فَاَرَادَ اَنْ يَّسْتَفِزَّهُمْ مِّنَ الْاَرْضِ فَاَغْرَقْنٰهُ وَمَنْ مَّعَهٗ جَمِيْعًا
verses.transliteration: Fa'araada 'añy- yastafizzahum minal- 'ardi fa'aghraqnaahu wa mam-ma'ahoo jameeʻaa.
verses.translation: Phir Firaun ne iraadah kiya ke unhein iss zameen se ukhaad de to humne use aur uske sab saathiyon ko gharq kar diya.

verses.arabic: وَقُلْنَا مِنْۢ بَعْدِهٖ لِبَنِيْٓ اِسْرَآءِيْلَ اسْكُنُوا الْاَرْضَ فَاِذَا جَآءَ وَعْدُ الْاٰخِرَةِ جِئْنَا بِكُمْ لَفِيْفًا
verses.transliteration: Wa qulnaa mim ba'dihee li-Baneee 'Israaa'eelas-kunul-'arda fa'izaa jaaa'a wa'dul- 'aakhirati ji'naa bikum lafeefaa.
verses.translation: Aur uske ba'd humne Bani Israyeel se kaha ke iss zameen mein raho phir jab aakhirat ka wa'dah aayega to hum tum sab ko samet laayenge.

verses.arabic: وَبِالْحَقِّ اَنْزَلْنٰهُ وَبِالْحَقِّ نَزَلَ ۭ وَمَآ اَرْسَلْنٰكَ اِلَّا مُبَشِّرًا وَّنَذِيْرًا
verses.transliteration: Wa bilhaqqi 'anzalnaahu wa bilhaqqi nazal; wa maaa 'arsalnaaka 'illaa mubashshiranw-wa nazeeraa.
verses.translation: Aur hum ne iss (Qur'an) ko haq ke saath naazil kiya hai aur yeh haq ke saath naazil huwa aur humne aapko sirf bashaarat dene waala aur daraane waala banaa kar bheja hai.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Mulaahazah ho haashyah: (Surah Aal-e-Imran:3/85 aur Surah Nisa:4/80)

verses.arabic: وَقُرْاٰنًا فَرَقْنٰهُ لِتَقْرَاَهٗ عَلَي النَّاسِ عَلٰي مُكْثٍ وَّنَزَّلْنٰهُ تَنْزِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: Wa qur'aanan faraqnaahu litaqra'ahoo 'alan-naasi 'alaa muksiñw-wa nazzalnaahu tanzeelaa.
verses.translation: Aur Qur'an ko humne thoda thoda utaara taake aap use logon ko thhahar thhahar kar sunaayein aur hum ne use batadreej hi naazil kiya hai.

verses.arabic: قُلْ اٰمِنُوْا بِهٖٓ اَوْ لَا تُؤْمِنُوْا ۭ اِنَّ الَّذِيْنَ اُوْتُوا الْعِلْمَ مِنْ قَبْلِهٖٓ اِذَا يُتْلٰى عَلَيْهِمْ يَخِرُّوْنَ لِلْاَذْقَانِ سُجَّدًا
verses.transliteration: Qul 'aaminoo biheee 'aw laa tu'minooo; 'innal- lazeena 'ootul-'ilma min qabliheee 'izaa yutlaa 'alayhim yakhirroona lil'azqaani sujjadaa
verses.translation: kah deejiye: uss par eemaan laao ya eemaan na laao, bilaa shubah jinhein isse pahle ilm diya gaya jab un par tilaawat ki jaati hai to woh apni thhodiyon ke bal sajde mein gir padte hain.

verses.arabic: وَيَقُوْلُوْنَ سُبْحٰنَ رَبِّنَآ اِنْ كَانَ وَعْدُ رَبِّنَا لَمَفْعُوْلًا
verses.transliteration: Wa yaqooloona Subhaana Rabbinaaa 'in kaana wa'du Rabbinaa lamafoolaa.
verses.translation: Aur woh kahte hain: paak hai hamaara rab: beshak hamaare rab ka wa'dah zaroor pura hona hai.

verses.arabic: وَيَخِرُّوْنَ لِلْاَذْقَانِ يَبْكُوْنَ وَيَزِيْدُهُمْ خُشُوْعًا
verses.transliteration: Wa yakhirroona lil'azqaani yabkoona wa yazeeduhum khushoo'aa.
verses.translation: Aur woh rote huye apni thhodiyon ke bal gir padte hain aur yeh (Qur'an) unke khushu' ko ziyaadah karta hai.

verses.arabic: قُلِ ادْعُوا اللّٰهَ اَوِ ادْعُوا الرَّحْمٰنَ ۭ اَيًّا مَّا تَدْعُوْا فَلَهُ الْاَسْمَآءُ الْحُسْنٰى ۚ وَلَا تَجْهَرْ بِصَلَاتِكَ وَلَا تُخَافِتْ بِهَا وَابْتَغِ بَيْنَ ذٰلِكَ سَبِيْلًا
verses.transliteration: Qulid-'ul-laaha 'awid-'ur-Rahmaana 'ayyam-maa tad'oo falahul-'Asmaaa'ul- Husnaa; wa laa tajhar bi-Şalaatika wa laa tukhaafit bihaa wabtaghi bayna zaalika sabeelaa.
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: (Allah ko) 'Allah' kah kar pukaaro ya 'Rahmaan' kah kar tum jis naam se bhi pukaaro to usi ke liye asmaay-e-husna hain, apni namaaz na ziyaadah baland aawaaz se padhein na bilkul past aawaaz se balke uske bain bain raastah khtiyaar karein.

verses.arabic: وَقُلِ الْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ الَّذِيْ لَمْ يَتَّخِذْ وَلَدًا وَّلَمْ يَكُنْ لَّهٗ شَرِيْكٌ فِي الْمُلْكِ وَلَمْ يَكُنْ لَّهٗ وَلِيٌّ مِّنَ الذُّلِّ ۭ وَكَبِّرْهُ تَكْبِيْرًا
verses.transliteration: Wa qulil-hamdu lillaahil-lazee lam yattakhiz waladañw- wa lam yakul-lahoo shareekun fil-mulki wa lam yakul-lahoo waliyyum-minaz-zulli wa kabbirhu takbeeraa
verses.translation: Aur kah deejiye: saari hamd Allah hi ke liye hai jis ne (apne liye) koyi aulaad nahin banaayi aur na baadshaahi mein uska koyi shareek hai aur na use naa tawaani-o-kamzori ki wajah se koyi himaayati darkaar ha aur Aap uss (Allah) ki badaayi bayaan karein, kamaal darje ki badaayi.’

verses.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي أَنْزَلَ عَلَىٰ عَبْدِهِ الْكِتَابَ وَلَمْ يَجْعَل لَّهُ عِوَجًا
verses.transliteration: 'Alhamdu lillaahil- lazeee 'anzala 'alaa 'abdihil-kitaaba wa lam yaj'al-lahoo 'iwajaa.
verses.translation: Saari Hamd Allah hi ke liye hai jis ne apne bande par kitab naazil ki aur uss mein koyi tedh nahin rakkhi.

verses.arabic: قَيِّمًا لِّيُنذِرَ بَأْسًا شَدِيدًا مِّن لَّدُنْهُ وَيُبَشِّرَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ الَّذِينَ يَعْمَلُونَ الصَّالِحَاتِ أَنَّ لَهُمْ أَجْرًا حَسَنًا
verses.transliteration: Qayyimal-liyunzira ba'san shadeedam-mil- ladunhu wa yubashshiral- mu'mineenal-lazeena ya maloonas-saalihaati 'anna lahum 'ajran hasanaa.
verses.translation: Thheek aur seedhi, (baghair ifraat-o-tafreet ke utaari) taake woh uss (Allah) ki taraf se sakht azaab se daraaye aur mominon ko bashaarat de jo nek amal karte hain ke beshak unke liye achchha ajr hai.

verses.arabic: مَاكِثِينَ فِيهِ أَبَدًا
verses.transliteration: Maakiseena feehi 'abadaa.
verses.translation: jis mein woh hameshah rahenge.

verses.arabic: وَيُنذِرَ الَّذِينَ قَالُوا اتَّخَذَ اللَّهُ وَلَدًا
verses.transliteration: Wa yunziral-lazeena qaalut-takhazal-laahu waladaa.
verses.translation: Aur un logon ko daraaye jinhon ne kaha ke Allah aulaad rakhta hai.

verses.arabic: مَّا لَهُم بِهِ مِنْ عِلْمٍ وَلَا لِآبَائِهِمْ كَبُرَتْ كَلِمَةً تَخْرُجُ مِنْ أَفْوَاهِهِمْ إِن يَقُولُونَ إِلَّا كَذِبًا
verses.transliteration: Maa lahum bihee min 'ilminw-wa laa li'aabaaa'ihim; kaburat kalimatan takhruju min 'afwaahihim; 'iny- yaqooloona 'illaa kazibaa
verses.translation: na unhein uska koyi ilm hai aur na unke baap dada ko tha, unke munh se badi hi khatarnaak baat nikalti hai. woh saraasar jhoot hi bakte hain.

verses.arabic: فَلَعَلَّكَ بَاخِعٌ نَّفْسَكَ عَلَىٰ آثَارِهِمْ إِن لَّمْ يُؤْمِنُوا بِهَٰذَا الْحَدِيثِ أَسَفًا
verses.transliteration: Fala'allaka baakhi'un nafsaka 'alaaa 'aasaarihim 'il-lam yu'minoo bihaazal- hadeesi 'asafaa.
verses.translation: Phir shaayad Aap to khud ko unke peechhe gham se halaak karne waale hain agar yeh (kaafir) iss (qur'an) par eemaan na laayein.

verses.arabic: إِنَّا جَعَلْنَا مَا عَلَى الْأَرْضِ زِينَةً لَّهَا لِنَبْلُوَهُمْ أَيُّهُمْ أَحْسَنُ عَمَلًا
verses.transliteration: 'Innaa jaʻalnaa maa 'alal-'ardi zeenatal-lahaa linabluwahum 'ayyuhum 'ahsanu 'amalaa.
verses.translation: Bilaa shubah humne jo kuchh roo-e-zameen par hai use uski zeenat banaaya hai hum logon taake hum ko aazmaayein ke un mein se kaun achchhe amal karta hai.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّا لَجَاعِلُونَ مَا عَلَيْهَا صَعِيدًا جُرُزًا
verses.transliteration: Wa 'innaa lajaaʻiloona maa 'alayhaa şa'eedan juruzaa
verses.translation: Aur jo kuchh zameen par hai, bilaa shubah hum use chatyal maidaan bana dene waale hain.

verses.arabic: أَمْ حَسِبْتَ أَنَّ أَصْحَابَ الْكَهْفِ وَالرَّقِيمِ كَانُوا مِنْ آيَاتِنَا عَجَبًا
verses.transliteration: 'Am hasibta 'anna 'Ashaabal-Kahfi war- Raqeemi kaanoo min 'Aayaatinaa 'ajabaa.
verses.translation: Kiya Aapne samjha ke ghaar aur kutbe waale hamaari nishaanyon mein se ek ajb nishaani the?

verses.arabic: إِذْ أَوَى الْفِتْيَةُ إِلَى الْكَهْفِ فَقَالُوا رَبَّنَا آتِنَا مِن لَّدُنكَ رَحْمَةً وَهَيِّئْ لَنَا مِنْ أَمْرِنَا رَشَدًا
verses.transliteration: 'Iz 'awal-fityatu 'ilal-Kahfi faqaaloo Rabbanaaa 'aatinaa mil- ladunka rahmatanw-wa hayyi' lanaa min 'amrinaa rashadaa.
verses.translation: Jab un naw jawaanon¹ ne ghaar mein panaah li, to unhon ne kaha: aye hamaare rab! Humein apne paas se rahmat de aur hamaare liye hamaare muaamle mein sahih rahnumaayi farma.
verses.deepMeaning: Yeh wahi naujawaan hain jinhein ashaab-e-kahaf kaha gaya hai, unhon ne jab apne deen ko bachaate huye ghaar mein panaah li to yeh dua' maangi, ashaab-e-kahaf ke iss qisse mein naujawaanon ke liye bada sabaq hai, aaj kal ke naujawaanon ka beshtar waqt fuzooliyaat mein barbaad hota hai aur Allah ki taraf koyi tawajjoh nahin, kaash aaj ke naujawaan 'dar jawaani taubah kardan shewa-e-paighambari' ke misdaaq apni jawaaniyon ko Allah ki ibaadat mein sarf karein take hadees shareef mein maujood uss sa'aadat ko haasil karne waale ban sakein jis mein saat afraad ko qiyaamat ke roz zill-e-ilaahi mein jagah pane ki nawaid di gayi hai un mein ek naujawaan woh hai jisne Allah ki ibaadat mein ayyaam-e- jawaani guzaare honge. (Al-Bukhari, Azzakaat, Baab:16, Hadees:1423)

verses.arabic: فَضَرَبْنَا عَلَىٰ آذَانِهِمْ فِي الْكَهْفِ سِنِينَ عَدَدًا
verses.transliteration: Fadarabnaa 'alaaa 'aazaanihim fil-Kahfi sineena 'adadaa.
verses.translation: Phir humne ghaar mein unke kaanon par kayi baras ke liye pardah daal diya.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ بَعَثْنَاهُمْ لِنَعْلَمَ أَيُّ الْحِزْبَيْنِ أَحْصَىٰ لِمَا لَبِثُوا أَمَدًا
verses.transliteration: Summa baʻasnaahum lina'lama 'ayyul-hizbayni 'ahsaa limaa labisooo 'amadaa.
verses.translation: Phir hum ne unhein uthhaaya taake hum maloom karein ke do girohon¹ mein se kaun uss muddat ko ziyaadah yaad rakhne waala hai jo unhon ne guzaari.
verses.deepMeaning: Un do girohon se muraad ikhtelaaf karne waale log hain. yeh ya to usi daur ke log the jin ke darmiyaan unki baabat ikhtelaaf huwa, ya ahd-e-resaalat ke momin-o-kaafir muraad hain aur baz kahte ke yeh ashaab-e-kahaf hi hain unke do giroh ban gaye the ek kahta tha ke hum itna arsah soye rahe, doosra uski nafi karta aur fareeq awwal se kam-o-besh muddat batlaata.

verses.arabic: نَحْنُ نَقُصُّ عَلَيْكَ نَبَأَهُم بِالْحَقِّ إِنَّهُمْ فِتْيَةٌ آمَنُوا بِرَبِّهِمْ وَزِدْنَاهُمْ هُدًى
verses.transliteration: Nahnu naquşşu 'alayka naba'ahum bilhaqq; 'innahum fityatun 'aamanoo bi- Rabbihim wa zidnaahum hudaa.
verses.translation: Hum unka haal thheek. thheek aap se bayaan karte hain, beshak woh chand naujawaan the jo apne rab par eemaan laaye aur hum ne unhein hidaayat main ziyaadah kiya tha.

verses.arabic: وَرَبَطْنَا عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمْ إِذْ قَامُوا فَقَالُوا رَبُّنَا رَبُّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ لَن نَّدْعُوَا مِن دُونِهِ إِلَٰهًا لَّقَدْ قُلْنَا إِذًا شَطَطًا
verses.transliteration: Wa rabatnaa 'alaa quloobihim 'iz qaamoo faqaaloo Rabbunaa Rabbus-samaawaati wal'ardi lan nad'uwa min dooniheee 'ilaahal- laqad qulnaaa 'izan shatataa.
verses.translation: Aur humne unke dil mazboot kar diye, jab woh khade huye to bole: hamaara rab to aasmaanon aur zameen ka rab hai, hum uske siwa kisi ko mabood nahin pukaarenge, agar pukaara to humne zulm-o- ziyaadati waali baat kahi.

verses.arabic: هَٰؤُلَاءِ قَوْمُنَا اتَّخَذُوا مِن دُونِهِ آلِهَةً لَّوْلَا يَأْتُونَ عَلَيْهِم بِسُلْطَانٍ بَيِّنٍ ۖ فَمَنْ أَظْلَمُ مِمَّنِ افْتَرَىٰ عَلَى اللَّهِ كَذِبًا
verses.transliteration: Haaa'ulaaa'i qawmunat-takhazoo min dooniheee 'aalihatallaw laa ya'toona 'alayhim bisultaanim bayyin; faman 'azlamu mimmanif- taraa 'alal-laahi kazibaa.
