verses.translation: Yeh hamaari qaum hai, inhon ne Allah ke siwa doosron ko ilaah bana rakkha hai woh un (ki ibaadat) par waazeh daleel kyun nahin laate? Phir uss shakhs se ziyaadah zaalim kaun hai jis ne Allah par jhoot ghada

verses.arabic: وَإِذِ اعْتَزَلْتُمُوهُمْ وَمَا يَعْبُدُونَ إِلَّا اللَّهَ فَأْوُوا إِلَى الْكَهْفِ يَنشُرْ لَكُمْ رَبُّكُم مِّن رَّحْمَتِهِ وَيُهَيِّئْ لَكُم مِّنْ أَمْرِكُم مِّرْفَقًا
verses.transliteration: Wa 'izi'- tazaltumoohum wa maa ya'budoona 'illal-laaha fa'wooo 'ilal-kahfi yanshur lakum Rabbukum mir- rahmatihee wa yuhayyi' lakum min 'amrikum mirfaqaa.
verses.translation: Aur jab tum un logon se aur jinki woh Allah ke siwa ibaadat karte hain unse alag ho gaye hoto ghaar mein panaah lo, tumhaara rab apni rahmat tum par phailaa dega aur tumhaare liye tumhaare kaam mein aasaani paida kar dega.
verses.deepMeaning: Is aayat se hamein sabak milta hai ke jab Allah ke raste mein mushkilen aaein to sab kuch chor kar apni hifazat ka intezaam karna chahiye aur uske baad Allah par bharosa rakhna chahiye.

verses.arabic: وَتَرَى الشَّمْسَ إِذَا طَلَعَت تَّزَاوَرُ عَن كَهْفِهِمْ ذَاتَ الْيَمِينِ وَإِذَا غَرَبَت تَّقْرِضُهُمْ ذَاتَ الشِّمَالِ وَهُمْ فِي فَجْوَةٍ مِّنْهُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ مِنْ آيَاتِ اللَّهِ ۗ مَن يَهْدِ اللَّهُ فَهُوَ الْمُهْتَدِ وَمَن يُضْلِلْ فَلَن تَجِدَ لَهُ وَلِيًّا مُّرْشِدًا
verses.transliteration: Wa tarash-shamsa 'izaa tala'at- tazaawaru 'an kahfihim zaatal- yameeni wa 'izaa gharabat taqriduhum zaatash- shimaali wa hum fee fajwatim-minh; zaalika min 'Aayaatil-laah; many- yahdil-laahu fahuwal- muhtad; wa mañy-yudlil falan tajida lahoo waliyyam-murshidaa.
verses.translation: Aur Aaap suraj ko dekhenge jab woh tulu' hota hai to unke ghaar se daayein taraf hat jaata hai aur jab ghuroob hota hai to unke baayein taraf katra (kar nikal) jaata hai, aur woh ghaar ke under khuli jagah mein hain. yeh Allah ki nishaaniyon mein se hai. jise Allah hidaayat de to wahi hidaayat yaaftah hai, aur jise woh gumraah kare, to Aap uske liye hargiz koyi rahnumaa dost nahin paayenge.

verses.arabic: وَتَحْسَبُهُمْ أَيْقَاظًا وَهُمْ رُقُودٌ ۚ وَنُقَلِّبُهُمْ ذَاتَ الْيَمِينِ وَذَاتَ الشِّمَالِ وَكَلْبُهُم بَاسِطٌ ذِرَاعَيْهِ بِالْوَصِيدِ ۚ لَوِ اطَّلَعْتَ عَلَيْهِمْ لَوَلَّيْتَ مِنْهُمْ فِرَارًا وَلَمُلِئْتَ مِنْهُمْ رُعْبًا
verses.transliteration: Wa tahsabuhum 'ayqaazañw-wa hum ruqood; wa nuqallibuhum zaatal- yameeni wa zaatash- shimaali wa kalbuhum baasitun ziraa'ayhi bilwaşeed; lawit-tala'ta 'alayhim lawallayta minhum firaarañw-wa lamuli'ta minhum ru'baa.
verses.translation: Aur Aap unhein jaagte samajhenge, haalaanke woh soye huye hain, aur hum unki daayein aur baayein karwatein badalte hain aur unka kutta ghaar ke dehaane par apne donon baazu phailaaye huye hai, agar aap unehin jhaank kar dekhein to unse peethh pher kar bhaag niklein aur aap mein unki dahshat sama jaaye.

verses.arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ بَعَثْنَاهُمْ لِيَتَسَاءَلُوا بَيْنَهُمْ ۚ قَالَ قَائِلٌ مِّنْهُمْ كَمْ لَبِثْتُمْ ۖ قَالُوا لَبِثْنَا يَوْمًا أَوْ بَعْضَ يَوْمٍ ۚ قَالُوا رَبُّكُمْ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا لَبِثْتُمْ فَابْعَثُوا أَحَدَكُم بِوَرِقِكُمْ هَٰذِهِ إِلَى الْمَدِينَةِ فَلْيَنظُرْ أَيُّهَا أَزْكَىٰ طَعَامًا فَلْيَأْتِكُم بِرِزْقٍ مِّنْهُ وَلْيَتَلَطَّفْ وَلَا يُشْعِرَنَّ بِكُمْ أَحَدًا
verses.transliteration: Wa kazaalika baʻasnaahum liyatasaaa'aloo baynahum; qaala qaaa'ilum-minhum kam labistum qaaloo labisnaa yawman 'aw ba da yawm; qaaloo Rabbukum 'a'lamu bimaa labistum fab'asooo 'ahadakum biwariqikum haaziheee 'ilal- madeenati falyanzur 'ayyuhaaa 'azkaa ta'aaman falya'tikum birizqim-minhu walyatalattaf wa laa yush'iranna bikum 'ahadaa.
verses.translation: Aur isi tarah humne unhein uthhaaya taake woh baahum sawaal karein, un mein se ek kahne waale ne kaha: tum kitna arsah thhahre ho? woh bole: hum ek din ya din ka kuchh hissah thhahre hain. phir bole: tumhaara rab behtar jaanta hai jitni der tum thhahre, chunaancheh ab tum apne chaandi ke yeh sikke de kar apna ek aadmi shahar bhejo, phir woh  dekhe ke shahar ka kaun sa khaana paakeezah tar hai, to woh USS mein se tumhaare liye kuchh khaana le aaye aur chaahiye ke woh narmi (se baat) kare aur tumhaare muta'alliq bilkul kisi ko na bataaye.
verses.deepMeaning: Is aayat se yeh sabak milta hai ke mushkil halaat mein bhi hifazat aur paakizgi ka khayal rakhna chahiye, aur Allah par bharosa rakhte hue apni hifazat karni chahiye.

verses.arabic: إِنَّهُمْ إِن يَظْهَرُوا عَلَيْكُمْ يَرْجُمُوكُمْ أَوْ يُعِيدُوكُمْ فِي مِلَّتِهِمْ وَلَن تُفْلِحُوا إِذًا أَبَدًا
verses.transliteration: 'Innahum 'iny- yazharoo 'alaykum yarjumookum 'aw yu'eedookum fee millatihim wa lan tuflihooo 'izan 'abadaa
verses.translation: Bilaa shubah agar woh tum par muttala' ho gaye to tumhein rajm kar denge ya tumhein apne deen mein palta lenge, aur phir uss waqt tum kabhi bhi falaah nahin paa sakoge.

verses.arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ أَعْثَرْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ لِيَعْلَمُوا أَنَّ وَعْدَ اللَّهِ حَقٌّ وَأَنَّ السَّاعَةَ لَا رَيْبَ فِيهَا إِذْ يَتَنَازَعُونَ بَيْنَهُمْ أَمْرَهُمْ فَقَالُوا ابْنُوا عَلَيْهِم بُنْيَانًا رَّبُّهُمْ أَعْلَمُ بِهِمْ ۚ قَالَ الَّذِينَ غَلَبُوا عَلَىٰ أَمْرِهِمْ لَنَتَّخِذَنَّ عَلَيْهِم مَّسْجِدًا
verses.transliteration: Wa kazaalika 'a'sarnaa 'alayhim liya'lamooo 'anna wa'dal- laahi haqqunw-wa 'annas-Saa'ata laa rayba feehaaa 'iz yatanaaza'oona baynahum 'amrahum faqaalub-noo 'alayhim bunyaanaa; Rabbuhum 'a'lamu bihim; qaalal- lazeena ghalaboo 'alaaa 'amrihim lanattakhizanna 'alayhim masjidaa.
verses.translation: Aur isi tarah humne logon ko un par muttala' kar diya taake woh jaan lein ke beshak Allah ka wa'dah haq hai aur yaqeenan qiyaamat mein koyi shak nahin, jab log unke mu'aamle mein baahum jhaghad rahe the, to unhon ne kaha: un par ek emaarat banaado, unka rab unehin behtar jaanta hai, jinhein unke mu'aamle mein ghalbah haasil tha woh bole: hum un par zaroor ek baadat gaah baayenge.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Yeh ghalbah haasil karne waale ahle eemaan the ya ahl-o-kufr-o-shirk? Shaukaani رحمه الله  ne pahli raaye ko tarjeeh di hai aur Ibne Kaseer رحمه الله ne doosri raaye ko kyun ke saaleheen ki qabron par masjidein ta'meer karna Allah ko pasand nahin hai. Nabi ﷺ ne farmaya: 'Allah Ta'ala ki yahood-o-nasaara par la'nat ho jinhon ne apne paighambaron ki qabron ko masjidein banaa liya'(Al-Bukhari, Assalaat, hadees:436), Umar رضي الله عنه ki khilaafat mein iraq mein Daaniyaal عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام ki qabr daryaaft huyi to aapne hukm diya ke use chhupa kar aam qabron jaisa kar diya jaaye taake logon ke ilm mein na aaye ke fulaan qabr fulaan paighambar ki hai. (Tafseer Ibne Kaseer)

verses.arabic: سَيَقُولُونَ ثَلَاثَةٌ رَّابِعُهُمْ كَلْبُهُمْ وَيَقُولُونَ خَمْسَةٌ سَادِسُهُمْ كَلْبُهُمْ رَجْمًا بِالْغَيْبِ وَيَقُولُونَ سَبْعَةٌ وَثَامِنُهُمْ كَلْبُهُمْ قُل رَّبِّي أَعْلَمُ بِعِدَّتِهِم مَّا يَعْلَمُهُمْ إِلَّا قَلِيلٌ فَلَا تُمَارِ فِيهِمْ إِلَّا مِرَاءً ظَاهِرًا وَلَا تَسْتَفْتِ فِيهِم مِّنْهُمْ أَحَدًا
verses.transliteration: Sayaqooloona salaasatur-raabi'uhum kalbuhum wa yaqooloona khamsatun saadisuhum kalbuhum rajmam bilghayb; wa yaqooloona sab'atuñw-wa saaminuhum-kalbuhum; qur-Rabbeee 'a'lamu bi'iddatihim maa yalamuhum 'illaa qaleel; falaa tumaari feehim 'illaa miraaa'an zaahirañw-wa laa tastafti feehim minhum 'ahadaa.
verses.translation: Kuchh log kahenge woh teen the chautha unka kutta tha. aur kuchh (doosre) kahenge: woh paanch the chhata unka kutta tha, (yeh) andhere mein teer chalaana hai. aur kuchh log (yeh bhi) kahenge: woh saat the aathhwan unka kutta tha. Aap kah deejiye: mera rab hi unki ginti khoob jaanta hai, bahut thode log hi unke (haal) ko jaante hain, lehaaza aap unki baabat bahas na karein, siwaaye sar sari bahas ke. Aur Aap unke baare mein unse kisi se bhi na poochhein.
verses.deepMeaning: Yahan par sabak yeh hai ke baatil ke andaze lagane se parheiz karna chahiye aur sirf Allah ki haqaiq par imaan rakhna chahiye, aur kisi baat ko zaroorat se zyada na khenchna chahiye.

verses.arabic: وَلَا تَقُولَنَّ لِشَاۗيْءٍ اِنِّيْ فَاعِلٌ ذٰلِكَ غَدًا
verses.transliteration: Wa laa taqoolanna lishay'in 'innee faa'ilun zaalika ghadaa.
verses.translation: Aur aap kisi cheez ke muta'alliq na kahein: beshak main use kal karne waala hoon.

verses.arabic: إِلَّا أَن يَشَاءَ اللَّهُ ۚ وَاذْكُر رَّبَّكَ إِذَا نَسِيتَ وَقُلْ عَسَىٰ أَن يَهْدِيَنِ رَبِّي لِأَقْرَبَ مِنْ هَٰذَا رَشَدًا
verses.transliteration: 'Illaaa 'any- yashaaa'al-laah; wazkur-Rabbaka 'izaa naseeta wa qul 'asaaa 'any-yahdiyani Rabbee li'aqraba min haazaa rashadaa.
verses.translation: Magar yeh ke Allah chaahe. Aur jab aap bhool jaayein to apne rab ko yaad karein aur kahein: ummeed hai ke mera rab iss muaamle mein rushd-o-bhalaayi se qareeb tar baat ki taraf meri rahnumaayi karega.

verses.arabic: وَلَبِثُوا فِي كَهْفِهِمْ ثَلَاثَ مِائَةٍ سِنِينَ وَازْدَادُوا تِسْعًا
verses.transliteration: Wa labisoo fee kahfihim salaasa mi'atin sineena wazdaadoo tis'aa.
verses.translation: Aur woh ghaar mein 300 saal aur 9 saal ziyaadah rahe.

verses.arabic: قُلِ اللَّهُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا لَبِثُوا ۖ لَهُ غَيْبُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۖ أَبْصِرْ بِهِ وَأَسْمِعْ ۚ مَا لَهُم مِّن دُونِهِ مِن وَلِيٍّ وَلَا يُشْرِكُ فِي حُكْمِهِ أَحَدًا
verses.transliteration: Qulil-laahu 'a'lamu bimaa labisoo lahoo ghaybus-samaawaati wal'ardi 'abşir bihee wa 'asmi'; maa lahum min doonihee minw- waliyyinw-wa laa yushriku fee hukmiheee 'ahadaa.
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: Allah behtar jaanta hai jitna arsah woh rahe, aasmaanon aur zameen ka ghaib usi ke liye hai. kiya hi khoob hai woh dekhne waala aur sunne waala! Unke liye uss (Allah) ke siwa koyi dost nahin, aur woh apne hukm mein kisi ko shareek nahin karta.
verses.deepMeaning: Yeh aayat humein yeh sabak deti hai ke hamesha Allah par bharosa rakhna chahiye aur uska hi intezaam sabse behtareen hai.

verses.arabic: وَاتْلُ مَا أُوحِيَ إِلَيْكَ مِن كِتَابِ رَبِّكَ ۖ لَا مُبَدِّلَ لِكَلِمَاتِهِ وَلَن تَجِدَ مِن دُونِهِ مُلْتَحَدًا
verses.transliteration: Watlu maaa 'oohiya 'ilayka min Kitaabi Rabbika laa mubaddila li-Kalimaatihee wa lan tajida min doonihee multahadaa.
verses.translation: Aur aap uski tilaawat keejiye jo kuchh aapke rab ki kitab mein se aapki taraf wahi kiya gaya hai, uske kalimaat ko koyi badalne waala nahin aur aap uske siwa koyi jaaye panah hargiz nahin paayenge.

verses.arabic: وَاصْبِرْ نَفْسَكَ مَعَ الَّذِينَ يَدْعُونَ رَبَّهُم بِالْغَدَاةِ وَالْعَشِيِّ يُرِيدُونَ وَجْهَهُ ۖ وَلَا تَعْدُ عَيْنَاكَ عَنْهُمْ تُرِيدُ زِينَةَ الْحَيَاةِ الدُّنْيَا ۖ وَلَا تُطِعْ مَنْ أَغْفَلْنَا قَلْبَهُ عَن ذِكْرِنَا وَاتَّبَعَ هَوَاهُ وَكَانَ أَمْرُهُ فُرُطًا
verses.transliteration: Waşbir nafsaka ma'al-lazeena yad'oona Rabbahum bilghadaati wal'ashiyyi yureedoona Wajhahoo wa laa ta'du 'aynaaka 'anhum tureedu zeenatal- hayaatid-dunyaa wa laa tuti' man 'aghfalnaa qalbahoo 'an zikrinaa wattaba'a hawaahu wa kaana 'amruhoo furutaa.
verses.translation: Aur apne aap ko un logon ke saath rok rakkhein jo subh-o-shaam apne rab ko pukaarte hain, woh uska chehra chaahte hain. aur aapki aankhein unse hatne na paayein ke dunyaawi zindagi ki zeenat chaahne lagein,¹ aur uski etaa'at na karein jis ka dil hum ne apne zikr se ghaafil kar diya aur usne apni khaahish ki pairwi ki aur uska muaamlah had se badhaa huwa hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Yeh wahi hukm hai jo isse qabl (Surah An'aam:6/52 mein guzar chuka hai.) muraad unse woh sahaaba kiraam رَضِيَ اللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ hain jo ghareeb aur kamzor the jin ke saath baithhna ashraaf-e-quraish ko gawaara na tha. Sa'd bin Abi Waqqaas رضي الله عنه farmaate hain ke hum 6 aadmi Nabi ﷺ ke saath the, mere elaawah Bilal, Ibne Masood, Huzli aur do Sahaaba aur the. Quraish-e-Makkah ne khaahish zaahir ki ke un logon ko apne paas se hata do taake hum aap ki khidmat mein haazir ho kar aap ki baatein sunein. Nabi ﷺ ke dil mein aaya shayad iss tarah unke dilon ki dunya badal jaaye lekin Allah Ta'ala ne mana' farma diya.

verses.arabic: وَقُلِ الْحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكُمْ ۖ فَمَن شَاءَ فَلْيُؤْمِن وَمَن شَاءَ فَلْيَكْفُرْ ۚ إِنَّا أَعْتَدْنَا لِلظَّالِمِينَ نَارًا أَحَاطَ بِهِمْ سُرَادِقُهَا ۚ وَإِن يَسْتَغِيثُوا يُغَاثُوا بِمَاءٍ كَالْمُهْلِ يَشْوِي الْوُجُوهَ ۚ بِئْسَ الشَّرَابُ وَسَاءَتْ مُرْتَفَقًا
verses.transliteration: Wa qulil-haqqu mir- Rabbikum faman shaaa'a falyu'minw-wa man shaaa'a falyakfur; 'innaaa 'a'tadnaa lizzaalimeena Naaran 'ahaata bihim suraadiquhaa; wa 'iny-yastagheesoo yughaasoo bimaaa'in kalmuhli yashwil-wujooh; bi'sash-sharaab; wa saaa'at murtafaqaa.
verses.translation: Aur kah deejiye: haq to tumhaare rab ki taraf se hai, phir jo chaahe eemaan laaye aur jo chaahe kufr kare, bilaa shubah humne zaalimon ke liye aisi aag tayyaar kar rakkhi hai jiski qanaaton ne unka ehaatah kar rakkha hai, aur agar woh faryaad karenge to aise paani ke saath suni jaayegi jo telchhat ke maanind hoga woh (unke chehre bhoon daalega) kiya bura mashroob hai aur kiya buri aaraam gaah hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Yeh aayat humein yaad dilati hai ke Allah ke hukm par amal karna hi hamesha ke liye behteri hai, aur jo uske mukhaalif hai, unke liye sakht azaab hai.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ إِنَّا لَا نُضِيعُ أَجْرَ مَنْ أَحْسَنَ عَمَلًا
verses.transliteration: 'Innal-lazeena 'aamanoo wa 'amilus- saalihaati 'innaa laa nudee'u 'ajra man 'ahsana 'amalaa.
verses.translation: Beshak jo log eemaan laaye aur unhon ne nek amal kiye, yaqeenan hum uska ajr zaaye' nahin karte sne achchha amal kiya.

verses.arabic: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمْ جَنَّـٰتُ عَدْنٍ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهِمُ ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ يُحَلَّوْنَ فِيهَا مِنْ أَسَاوِرَ مِن ذَهَبٍۢ وَيَلْبَسُونَ ثِيَابًا خُضْرًۭا مِّن سُندُسٍۢ وَإِسْتَبْرَقٍۢ مُّتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ ۚ نِعْمَ ٱلثَّوَابُ وَحَسُنَتْ مُرْتَفَقًا
verses.transliteration: 'Ulaaa'ika lahum Jannaatu 'Adnin tajree min tahtihimul-'anhaaru yuhallawna feehaa min 'asaawira min zahabiñw- wa yalbasoona siyaaban khudram-min sundusiñw- wa 'istabraqim-muttaki'eena feehaa 'alal-'araaa'ik; ni'mas- sawaab; wa hasunat murtafaqaa.
verses.translation: Unhi logon ke liye abdi baaghaat hain, jinke neeche nahrein jaari hain,¹ wahaan unhein sone ke kangan pahnaaye jaayeinge, aur woh baareek aur mote resham ke sabz kapde pahneinge, wahaan takhton par takiye lagaaye baithhe
verses.deepMeaning: Zamaana-e-Nuzool-e-Qur'an aur usse ma qabl rawaaj tha ke baadshaah, ruoosa aur sardaaraan-e- çabaayel apne haathon mein sone ke kade pahante the jis se unki imtiyaazi haisiyat numaayan hoti thi, ahl-e-jannat ko bhi jannat mein kade pahnaaye jaayeinge. Dunya mein mardon ke liye sona aur reshmi libaas mamnu' hai jo log iss hukm par amal karte huye dunya mein un moharramaat se tenaab kareinge unhein jannat mein yeh saari cheezein muyassar hongi, wahaan koyi cheez mamnu' mahin hogi balke ahl-e-jannat jis cheez ki khaahish kareinge woh maujood hogi. Mulaahazah ho (Surah Haa Meeem As-Sajdah:41/31)

verses.arabic: وَٱضْرِبْ لَهُم مَّثَلَ ٱلرَّجُلَيْنِ جَعَلْنَا لِأَحَدِهِمَا جَنَّتَيْنِ مِّنْ أَعْنَـٰبٍۢ وَحَفَفْنَـٰهُمَا بِنَخْلٍۢ وَجَعَلْنَا بَيْنَهُمَا زَرْعًا
verses.transliteration: Wadrib lahum masalar-rajulayni ja'alnaa li'ahadihimaa jannatayni min 'a'naabinw-wa hafafnaahumaa binakhlinw-wa jaʻalnaa baynahumaa zar'aa.
verses.translation: Aur (Aye Nabi!) bayaan keejiye unke liye do aadmiyon ki misaal, humne un mein se ek ko angooron ke do baagh ataa kiye, aur unke gird khujooron ki baad lagaadi, aur un donon ke darmiyaan kheti ugaayi.

verses.arabic: كِلْتَا ٱلْجَنَّتَيْنِ ءَاتَتْ أُكُلَهَا وَلَمْ تَظْلِم مِّنْهُ شَيْـًۭٔا وَفَجَّرْنَا خِلَـٰلَهُمَا نَهَرًا
verses.transliteration: Kiltal-jannatayni 'aatat 'ukulahaa wa lam tazlim minhu shay'anw- wa fajjarnaa khilaalahumaa naharaa
verses.translation: Donon baagh apna phal laate, aur uss mein se kuchh na ghataate, aur unke darmiyaan humne ek nahar bahaayi.

verses.arabic: وَكَانَ لَهُۥ ثَمَرٌۭ فَقَالَ لِصَـٰحِبِهِۦ وَهُوَ يُحَاوِرُهُۥٓ أَنَا۠ أَكْثَرُ مِنكَ مَالًۭا وَأَعَزُّ نَفَرًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa kaana lahoo samarun faqaala lişaahibihee wa huwa yuhaawiruhooo 'ana 'aksaru minka maalañw- wa 'a'azzu nafaraa.
verses.translation: Aur use phal mila to woh apne saathi se kahne laga jab ke woh usse guftagu kar rahaa tha: main tujhse maal mein ziyaadah hoon aur jatthe mein (bhi) ziyaadah mua'zzaz hoon.

verses.arabic: وَدَخَلَ جَنَّتَهُۥ وَهُوَ ظَالِمٌۭ لِّنَفْسِهِۦ قَالَ مَآ أَظُنُّ أَن تَبِيدَ هَـٰذِهِۦٓ أَبَدًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa dakhala jannatahoo wa huwa zaalimul-linafsihee qaala maaa 'azunnu 'an tabeeda haaziheee 'abadaa.
verses.translation: Aur woh apne baagh mein daakhil huwa jab ke woh apni jaan ke liye zaalim tha, usne kaha: main nahin samajhta ke yeh (baagh) kabhi tabaah hoga.

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَظُنُّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ قَآئِمَةًۭ وَلَئِن رُّدِدتُّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّى لَأَجِدَنَّ خَيْرًۭا مِّنْهَا مُنقَلَبًا
verses.transliteration: Wa maaa 'azunnus- Saa'ata qaaa'imatañw- wa la'ir-rudittu 'ilaa Rabbee la'ajidanna khayram-minhaa munqalabaa.
verses.translation: Aur main nahin samajhta ke qiyaamat qaayem honi hai, aur agar (bil farz) mujhe apne rab ki taraf lautaaya gaya to yaqeenan main wahaan in baaghon se behtar lautne ki jagah paaounga.

verses.arabic: قَالَ لَهُۥ صَـٰحِبُهُۥ وَهُوَ يُحَاوِرُهُۥٓ أَكَفَرْتَ بِٱلَّذِى خَلَقَكَ مِن تُرَابٍۢ ثُمَّ مِن نُّطْفَةٍۢ ثُمَّ سَوَّىٰكَ رَجُلًۭا
verses.transliteration: Qaala lahoo şaahibuhoo wa huwa yuhaawiruhooo 'akafarto billazee khalaqaka mir turaabin summa min nutfatin summa sawwaaka rajulaa.
verses.translation: Uske (momin) saathi ne usse kaha jab ke woh usse guftagu kar rahaa tha: kiya tu usse kufr karta hai jisne tujhe mitti se paida kiya, phir nutfe se, phir tujhe pura mard banaa diya?

verses.arabic: لَّـٰكِنَّا۠ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ رَبِّى وَلَآ أُشْرِكُ بِرَبِّىٓ أَحَدًا
verses.transliteration: Laakinna Huwal- laahu Rabbee wa laaa 'ushriku bi-Rabbeee 'ahadaa
verses.translation: Lekin (mera to aqeedah hai ke) wahi Allah hai mera rab, aur main apne rab ke saath kisi ko shareek nahin karta.

verses.arabic: وَلَوْلَآ إِذْ دَخَلْتَ جَنَّتَكَ قُلْتَ مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ لَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِٱللَّهِ ۚ إِن تَرَنِ أَنَا۠ أَقَلَّ مِنكَ مَالًۭا وَوَلَدًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa law laaa 'iz dakhalta jannataka qulta maa shaaa'al- laahu laa quwwata 'illaa billaah; 'in tarani 'ana 'aqalla minka maalañw- wa waladaa.
verses.translation: Aur jab tu apne baagh mein daakhil huwa to kyun na kaha: Maashaa Allah, Laa Quwwata Illa Billaah¹ agar tu mujhe maal aur aulaad mein kamtar dekhta hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Maashaa Allah, Laa Quwwata Illaa Billaah. Khair-o-barkat aur nazr-e-bad se bachaao ki dua' hai. elaawah azin (Laa Hawlaa wala Quwwata Illaa Billaah) 'Allah ke siwa kisi ko gunaah se pherne ki aur uske siwa kisi ko neki karne ki taufeeq dene ki quwwat-o-taaqat nahin.' bhi ek bahut achchha kalimah hai aur uski badi fazeelat hadees mein bayaan ki gayi hai, chunaancheh hazrat Abu Moosa Ash'ari رضي الله عنه rivaayat karte hain, Rasoolullah ﷺ kisi teele par chadhne lage to ek aadmi uski balandi par pahuncha aur usne baland aawaaz se kaha: (Laa Ilaaha Illallaahu Wallaahu Akbar) uss waqt Nabi ﷺ apne khachchar par sawaar the Aapne farmaya: tum kisi bahre ya ghaayeb ko nahin pukaarte ho. phir farmaya: Aye Moosa! Kiya main tumhein jannat ke khazaane mein se ek kalimah na bataaoun? Main ne araz kiya: kyun nahin (zaroor bataayiye) Aap ﷺ ne farmaya: Laa Hawlaa Walaa Quuwwata illaa billaah. (Al-Bukhari, Ad'dawaat, Baab:67, hadees: 6409)

verses.arabic: فَعَسَىٰ رَبِّىٓ أَن يُؤْتِيَنِ خَيْرًۭا مِّن جَنَّتِكَ وَيُرْسِلَ عَلَيْهَا حُسْبَانًۭا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَتُصْبِحَ صَعِيدًا زَلَقًا
verses.transliteration: Fa'asaa Rabbeee 'añy- yu'tiyani khayram-min jannatika wa yursila 'alayhaa husbaanam- minas-samaaa'i fatuşbiha şa'eedan zalaqaa.
verses.translation: To ummeed hai ke mera rab mujhe tere baagh se behtar de aur uss (tere baagh) par aasmaan se koyi azaab bheje to woh (baagh) chatyal phisalna maidaan ho jaaye.

verses.arabic: أَوْ يُصْبِحَ مَآؤُهَا غَوْرًۭا فَلَن تَسْتَطِيعَ لَهُۥ طَلَبًا
verses.transliteration: 'Aw yuşbiha maaa'uhaa ghawran falan tastatee'a lahoo talabaa.
verses.translation: Ya uska paani gahra ho jaaye, phir tu use talaash karne ki istetaa'at na rakkhe.

verses.arabic: وَأُحِيطَ بِثَمَرِهِۦ فَأَصْبَحَ يُقَلِّبُ كَفَّيْهِ عَلَىٰ مَآ أَنفَقَ فِيهَا وَهِىَ خَاوِيَةٌ عَلَىٰ عُرُوشِهَا وَيَقُولُ يَـٰلَيْتَنِى لَمْ أُشْرِكْ بِرَبِّىٓ أَحَدًا
verses.transliteration: Wa 'uheeta bisamarihee fa'aşbaha yuqallibu kaffayhi 'alaa maaa 'anfaqa feehaa wa hiya khaawiyatun 'alaa 'urooshihaa wa yaqoolu yaalaytanee lam 'ushrik bi-Rabbeee 'ahadaa.
verses.translation: Aur uska phal gher liya (tabaah kar diya) gaya, phir woh uss maal par apni hatheliyaan malta rah gaya jo uss par kharch kiya tha, jab ke woh (baagh) apni chhatriyon par gira huwa tha, aur woh kahta tha: aye kaash! Main apne rab ke saath kisi ko shareek na karta.

verses.arabic: وَلَمْ تَكُن لَّهُۥ فِئَةٌۭ يَنصُرُونَهُۥ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَمَا كَانَ مُنتَصِرًا
verses.transliteration: Wa lam takul-lahoo fi'atuny-yansuroonahoo min doonil-laahi wa maa kaana muntaşiraa.
verses.translation: Aur uski koyi aisi jamaa'at na thi jo Allah ke siwa uski madad karti aur na huwa woh (hum se) badlah lene waala.

verses.arabic: هُنَالِكَ ٱلْوَلَـٰيَةُ لِلَّهِ ٱلْحَقِّ ۚ هُوَ خَيْرٌۭ ثَوَابًۭا وَخَيْرٌ عُقْبًۭا
verses.transliteration: Hunaalikal- walaayatu lillaahil-haqq; huwa khayrun sawaabanw-wa khayrun 'uqbaa.
verses.translation: Wahaan to tamaam khtiyaar Allah sachche hi ka hai, wahi hai behtar sawaab aur behtar badlah dene waala.
verses.deepMeaning: Yahan humein yeh sabak milta hai ke duniya ki asli baadshahat Allah ki hai, aur usi ke paas behtareen sila aur anjaam hai.

verses.arabic: وَٱضْرِبْ لَهُم مَّثَلَ ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا كَمَآءٍ أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَٱخْتَلَطَ بِهِۦ نَبَاتُ ٱلْأَرْضِ فَأَصْبَحَ هَشِيمًۭا تَذْرُوهُ ٱلرِّيَـٰحُ ۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ مُّقْتَدِرًا
verses.transliteration: Wadrib lahum- masalal-hayaatid- dunyaa kamaaa'in 'anzalnaahu minas- samaaa'i fakhtalata bihee nabaatul-'ardi fa'aşbaha hasheeman tazroohur-riyaah; wa kaanal-laahu 'alaa kulli shay'im-muqtadiraa.
verses.translation: Aur unke liye dunyaawi zindagi ki misaal bayaan keejiye: jaise paani (meenah) jise hum ne Aasmaan se naazil kiya, phir usse zameen ki nabataat khoob phooli phali, phir woh choora choora ho gayi, use hawaayein udaa le jaati hain aur Allah har shay par qudrat rakhne waala hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Duniya ki zindagi bilkul faani hai, isliye iske peechay na bhago aur aakhirat ke liye amal karo.

verses.arabic: ٱلْمَالُ وَٱلْبَنُونَ زِينَةُ ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا ۖ وَٱلْبَـٰقِيَـٰتُ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتُ خَيْرٌ عِندَ رَبِّكَ ثَوَابًۭا وَخَيْرٌ أَمَلًۭا
verses.transliteration: 'Almaalu walbanoona zeenatul-hayaatid- dunyaa walbaaqiyaatus- saalihaatu khayrun 'inda Rabbika sawaabañw-wa khayrun 'amalaa.
verses.translation: Yeh maal aur bête to dunyaawi zindagi ki zeenat hain, aur aapke rab ke haan baaqi rahne waali nekiyaan hi sawaab mein behtar hain aur ahchchhi ummeed lagaane ke e'tebaar se bhi behtar hain.

verses.arabic: وَيَوْمَ نُسَيِّرُ ٱلْجِبَالَ وَتَرَى ٱلْأَرْضَ بَارِزَةًۭ وَحَشَرْنَـٰهُمْ فَلَمْ نُغَادِرْ مِنْهُمْ أَحَدًا
verses.transliteration: Wa Yawma nusayyirul-jibaala wa taral-'arda baarizatañw- wa hasharnaahum falam nughaadir minhum 'ahadaa.
verses.translation: Aur jis din hum pahaadon ko chalaayeinge aur aap zameen ko saaf maidaan dekhenge aur hum unko ekhatthah kareinge, chunaancheh hum un mein se kisi ko bhi nahin chhodenge.

verses.arabic: وَعُرِضُوا۟ عَلَىٰ رَبِّكَ صَفًّۭا ۖ لَّقَدْ جِئْتُمُونَا كَمَا خَلَقْنَـٰكُمْ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍۢ ۚ بَلْ زَعَمْتُمْ أَلَّن نَّجْعَلَ لَكُم مَّوْعِدًا
verses.transliteration: Wa 'uridoo 'alaa Rabbika şaffaa; laqad ji'tumoonaa kamaa khalaqnaakum 'awwala marrah; bal zaʻamtum 'allan-naj'ala lakum- maw'idaa.
verses.translation: Aur woh aap ke rab ke saamne saff bastah pesh kiye jaayenge (kaha jaayega) yaqeenan tum hamaare paas aaye ho jaise humne tumhein pahli baar paida kiya tha balke tum samajhte the ke hum tumhaare liye koyi wadah nahin thhahraayenge.
verses.deepMeaning: Is aayat mein yeh tasweer pesh ki gayi hai ke qayamat ke din insaan apne Rubb ke samne ek saf mein khara hoga, aur us waqt uske saare ghalat gumaan khatam ho jaayenge.

verses.arabic: وَوُضِعَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبُ فَتَرَى ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ مُشْفِقِينَ مِمَّا فِيهِ وَيَقُولُونَ يَـٰوَيْلَتَنَا مَالِ هَـٰذَا ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ لَا يُغَادِرُ صَغِيرَةًۭ وَلَا كَبِيرَةً إِلَّآ أَحْصَىٰهَا ۚ وَوَجَدُوا۟ مَا عَمِلُوا۟ حَاضِرًۭا ۗ وَلَا يَظْلِمُ رَبُّكَ أَحَدًا
verses.transliteration: Wa wudi'al-kitaabu fataral-mujrimeena mushfiqeena mimmaa feehi wa yaqooloona yaa waylatanaa maa lihaazal-kitaabi laa yughaadiru sagheeratañw-wa laa kabeeratan 'illaaa 'ahsaahaa; wa wajadoo maa 'amiloo haadiraa; wa laa yazlimu Rabbuka 'ahadaa
verses.translation: Aur (har ek ka) a'amaal naamah (saamne) rakh diya jaayega, phir aap mujrimon ko dekheinge ke woh uske mandarjaat (tahreer) se dar rahe honge aur kahenge: haaye hamaari kam bakhti! Kaisa hai yeh a'amaal naama jo kisi chhote aur bade amal ko nahin chhoda hai, isne to sab kuchh hi shumaar kar rakkha hai. aur unhon ne jo amal kiye the haazir payenge aur aapka rab kisi par zulm nahin karega.

verses.arabic: وَإِذْ قُلْنَا لِلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ ٱسْجُدُوا۟ لِـَٔادَمَ فَسَجَدُوٓا۟ إِلَّآ إِبْلِيسَ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلْجِنِّ فَفَسَقَ عَنْ أَمْرِ رَبِّهِۦٓ ۗ أَفَتَتَّخِذُونَهُۥ وَذُرِّيَّتَهُۥٓ أَوْلِيَآءَ مِن دُونِى وَهُمْ لَكُمْ عَدُوٌّۭ ۚ بِئْسَ لِلظَّـٰلِمِينَ بَدَلًا
verses.transliteration: Wa 'iz qulnaa lilmalaaa'ikatis-judoo li- 'Aadama fasajadooo 'illaaa 'Ibleesa kaana minal-jinni fafasaqa 'an 'amri Rabbih; 'afatattakhizoonahoo wa zurriyyatahooo 'awliyaaa'a min doonee wa hum lakum 'aduww; bi'sa lizzaalimeena badalaa.
verses.translation: Aur jab humne farishton se kaha: tum Aadam ko sajdah karo, to Iblees ke siwa sab ne sajdah kiya, woh jinnon mein se tha,¹ chunaancheh usne apne rab ka hukm na maana, kiya phir bhi tum mujhe chhod kar use aur uski aulaad ko dost banaate ho jab ke woh tumhaare dushman hain? zaalimon ke liye bahut hi bura badlah hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Qura'n ki iss saraahat ne waazeh kar diya ke shaytaan farishtah nahin tha, farishtah agar hota to hukm-e-ilaahi se sar taabi ki use majaal hi na hoti, kyun ke farishton ki sifat Allah Ta'ala ne bayaan farmaayi hai ke 'woh Allah ke hukm ki naa farmaani nahin karte aur wahi karte hain jis ka unhein hukm diya jaata hai.' (At-tahreem:66/6) iss soorat mein yeh ishkaal rahta hai agar woh farishtah nahin tha to phir Allah ke hukm ka woh mukhaatab hi nahin tha, to saahb-e-roohul ma'aani ne kaha hai ke woh farishtah yaqeenan nahin tha lekin woh farishton ke saath hi rahta tha aur un hi mein shumaar hota tha iss liye woh bhi hukm-e- sajdah ka mukhaatab tha. Irshaad-e-baari ta'ala bhi hai: 'tujhe kis cheez ne roka ke toone sajdah na kiya jab ke main ne tujhe hukm diya tha?

verses.arabic: مَآ أَشْهَدتُّهُمْ خَلْقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَا خَلْقَ أَنفُسِهِمْ وَمَا كُنتُ مُتَّخِذَ ٱلْمُضِلِّينَ عَضُدًا
verses.transliteration: Maaa 'ashhattuhum khalqas-samaawaati wal'ardi wa laa khalqa 'anfusihim wa maa ekuntu muttakhizal- mudilleena 'adudaa.
verses.translation: Main ne unhein aasmaanon aur zameen ki paidaayish mein gawaah nahin banaaya tha aur na unki apni paidaayish hi mein, aur main gumraah karne waalon ko (apna) baazu (madad gaar) banaane waala nahin.

verses.arabic: وَيَوْمَ يَقُولُ نَادُوا۟ شُرَكَآءِىَ ٱلَّذِينَ زَعَمْتُمْ فَدَعَوْهُمْ فَلَمْ يَسْتَجِيبُوا۟ لَهُمْ وَجَعَلْنَا بَيْنَهُم مَّوْبِقًا
verses.transliteration: Wa Yawma yaqoolu naadoo shurakaaa'iyal- lazeena zaʻamtum fada'awhum falam yastajeeboo lahum wa jaʻalnaa baynahum mawbiqaa.
verses.translation: Aur jis din Allah kahega: bulaao mere shareekon ko jinhein tum mera shareek samajhte the, phir woh unhein pukaarenge, magar woh unhein koyi jawaab na denge, aur hum unke darmiyaan halaakat gaah bana denge.

verses.arabic: وَرَءَا ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ ٱلنَّارَ فَظَنُّوٓا۟ أَنَّهُم مُّوَاقِعُوهَا وَلَمْ يَجِدُوا۟ عَنْهَا مَصْرِفًا
verses.transliteration: Wa ra'al- mujrimoonan-Naara fazannooo 'annahum- muwaaqi'oohaa wa lam yajidoo 'anhaa maşrifaa.
verses.translation: Aur mujrim aag ko dekhenge to yaqeen karenge ke beshak woh uss mein girne waale hain aur woh usse bachne ki raah na paayenge.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ صَرَّفْنَا فِى هَـٰذَا ٱلْقُرْءَانِ لِلنَّاسِ مِن كُلِّ مَثَلٍۢ ۗ وَكَانَ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ أَكْثَرَ شَىْءٍۢ جَدَلًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad şarrafnaa fee haazal-Qur'aani linnaasi min kulli masal; wa kaanal-'insaanu 'aksara shay'in jadalaa
verses.translation: Aur humne iss qur'an mein logon ke liye pher pher kar har qism ki misaal bayaan ki hai aur insaan tamaam cheezon se ziyaadah jhagdaalu hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Is aayat se yeh samajh aata hai ke insaan ki fitrat mein jhagda karna zyada hai, isliye wo sirat-e-mustaqeem par chalne se bhatak jata hai.

verses.arabic: وَمَا مَنَعَ النَّاسَ اَنْ يُؤْمِنُوا إِذْ جَاءَهُمُ الْهُدٰى وَيَسْتَغْفِرُوا رَبَّهُمْ إِلَّآ اَنْ تَاْتِيَهُمْ سُنَّةُ الْاَوَّلِيْنَ اَوْ يَاْتِيَهُمُ الْعَذَابُ قُبُلًا
verses.transliteration: Wa maa mana'an- naasa 'any-yu'minooo 'iz jaaa'ahumul-hudaa wa yastaghfiroo Rabbahum 'illaaa 'an ta'tiyahum sunnatul-'awwaleena 'aw ya'tiyahumul- 'azaabu qubulaa.
verses.translation: Aur logon ko eemaan laane se nahin roka aur (na) apne rab se istaghfaar karne se jab ke unke paas hidaayat aa gayi magar sirf iss baat ne ke (woh chaahte hain) unhein pahle logon ka sa muaamlah pesh aaye ya unke saamne azaab aa jaaye.

verses.arabic: وَمَا نُرْسِلُ الْمُرْسَلِيْنَ اِلَّا مُبَشِّرِيْنَ وَمُنْذِرِيْنَ وَيُجَادِلُ الَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا بِالْبَاطِلِ لِيُدْحِضُوا بِهِ الْحَقَّ ۖ وَاتَّخَذُوْا اٰيٰتِيْ وَمَآ اُنْذِرُوْا هُزُوًا
verses.transliteration: Wa maa nursilul- mursaleena 'illaa mubashshireena wa munzireen; wa yujaadilul- lazeena kafaroo bilbaatili liyudhidoo bihil-haqqa wattakhazooo 'Aayaatee wa maaa 'unziroo huzuwaa.
verses.translation: Aur hum Rasoolon ko sirf isliye bhejte hain ke woh (logon ko) khushkhabri dein aur daraayein, aur kaafir log to baatil tareeqe se jhaghadte hain taake uske saath haq ko shikast dein aur unhon ne hamaari aayaat ko aur jis cheez se daraaye gaye usko mazaaq bana liya.

verses.arabic: وَمَنْ أَظْلَمُ مِمَّنْ ذُكِّرَ بِآيَاتِ رَبِّهِۦ فَأَعْرَضَ عَنْهَا وَنَسِىَ مَا قَدَّمَتْ يَدَاهُ ۚ إِنَّا جَعَلْنَا عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمْ أَكِنَّةً أَن يَفْقَهُوهُ وَفِىٓ ءَاذَانِهِمْ وَقْرًۭا ۚ وَإِن تَدْعُهُمْ إِلَى ٱلْهُدَىٰ فَلَن يَهْتَدُوٓا۟ إِذًا أَبَدًا
verses.transliteration: Wa man 'azlamu mimman zukkira bi- 'Ayaati Rabbihee fa'a'rada 'anhaa wa nasiya maa qaddamat yadaah; 'innaa jaʻalnaa 'alaa quloobihim 'akinnatan 'any- yafqahoohu wa feee 'aazaanihim waqraa; wa 'in tad'uhum 'ilal-hudaa falany-yahtadooo 'izan 'abadaa.
verses.translation: Aur usse ziyaadah zaalim kaun hai jise uske rab ki aayaat se naseehat ki jaaye to woh unse munh mod le aur jo kuchh uske donon haathon ne aage bheja hai use bhool jaaye, beshak humne unke dilon par parde daal diye hain ke iss (qur'an) ko (na) samjhein aur unke kaanon mein daat hain aur agar aap unhein hidaayat ki taraf bulaayein to woh kabhi bhi hidaayat na paayenge.

verses.arabic: وَرَبُّكَ الْغَفُوْرُ ذُو الرَّحْمَةِ ۚ لَوْ يُؤَاخِذُهُمْ بِمَا كَسَبُوْا لَعَجَّلَ لَهُمُ الْعَذَابَ بَلْ لَّهُمْ مَّوْعِدٌ لَّنْ يَّجِدُوْا مِنْ دُوْنِهٖ مَوْئِلًا
verses.transliteration: Wa Rabbukal- Ghafooru zur-rahmati law yu'aakhizuhum bimaa kasaboo laʻajjala lahumul-'azaab; bal- lahum maw'idul-lany- yajidoo min doonihee maw'ilaa.
verses.translation: Aur Aapka rab khoob maghferat waala aur khoob rahmat waala hai. agar woh unke kiye par pakde to un par jald azaab le aaye balke unke wa'de ka waqt muqarrar hai, woh uske muqaabil koyi jaaye panaah nahin paayenge.

verses.arabic: وَتِلْكَ الْقُرٰى اَهۡلَكۡنٰهُمۡ لَمَّا ظَلَمُوۡا وَجَعَلۡنَا لِمَهۡلِكِهِمۡ مَّوۡعِدًا
verses.transliteration: Wa tilkal-quraaa 'ahlaknaahum lammaa zalamoo wa jaʻalnaa limahlikihim-mawʻidaa
verses.translation: Aur yeh bastiyaan hain jinhein humne halaak kiya jab unhon ne zulm kiya aur hum ne unki halaakat ke liye ek waqt muqarrar kar rakkha tha.

verses.arabic: وَاِذۡ قَالَ مُوۡسٰى لِفَتٰٮهٕ لَاۤ اَبۡرَحُ حَتّٰۤى اَبۡلُغَ مَجۡمَعَ الۡبَحۡرَيۡنِ اَوۡ اَمۡضِىَ حُقُبًا
verses.transliteration: Wa 'iz qaala Moosaa lifataahu laaa 'abrahu hattaaa 'ablugha majma'al-bahrayni 'aw 'amdiya huqubaa.
verses.translation: Aur jab Moosa ne apne jawaan (Yusha' bin Noon) se kaha: main to chalta hi rahunga, hatta ke 'do daryaaon ke sangam'¹ par pahunch jaaoun, ya main muddat haaye daraaz tak chalta rahunga.
verses.deepMeaning: Uss maqaam ki baabat kaha gaya tha ke yahaan Khizar عَلَیهِ‌السَّلا se mulaqaat hogi. Moosa aur Khizar عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام ki mulaqaat ki wazaahat ke liye mulaahazah ho: (Sahih Bukhari, At-tafseer, Surah Kahaf, baab:2, hadees:4725)

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّا بَلَغَا مَجۡمَعَ بَيۡنِهِمَا نَسِيَا حُوۡتَهُمَا فَاتَّخَذَ سَبِيۡلَهٗ فِى الۡبَحۡرِ سَرَبًا
verses.transliteration: Falammaa balaghaa majma'a baynihimaa nasiyaa hootahumaa fattakhaza sabeelahoo fil-bahri sarabaa.
verses.translation: Phir jab woh donon do daryaaon ke sangam par pahunche, to woh apni machhli bhool gaye aur woh darya mein surang ka saa raastah banaa kar chali gayi.

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّا جَاوَزَا قَالَ لِفَتٰٮهٕ اٰتِنَا غَدَآءَنَا لَقَدۡ لَقِيۡنَا مِنۡ سَفَرِنَا هٰذَا نَصَبًا
verses.transliteration: Falammaa jaawazaa qaala lifataahu 'aatinaa ghadaaa'anaa laqad laqeenaa min safarinaa haazaa naşabaa.
verses.translation: Phir jab woh donon aage chale to uss (Moosa) ne apne jawaan se kaha ke hamaara naashtah hamaare paas laao. Humein hamaare iss safar se thakaawat ho gayi hai.

verses.arabic: قَالَ أَرَءَيۡتَ إِذۡ أَوَيۡنَآ إِلَى ٱلصَّخۡرَةِ فَإِنِّى نَسِيتُ ٱلۡحُوتَ وَمَآ أَنسَىٰنِيهُ إِلَّا ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ أَنۡ أَذۡكُرَهُۥۚ وَٱتَّخَذَ سَبِيلَهُۥ فِى ٱلۡبَحۡرِ عَجَبًۭا
verses.transliteration: Qaala 'ara'ayta 'iz 'awaynaaa 'ilaş-şakhrati fa'innee naseetul-hoota wa maaa 'ansaaneehu 'illash-Shaytaanu 'an 'azkurah; wattakhaza sabeelahoo fil-bahri 'ajabaa.
verses.translation: Woh bola: bhala aapne dekha jab hum chattaan ke paas thhahre the to machhli bhool gaya aur mujhe shaytaan hi ne bhulaaya ke (Aap se) uska zikr karun aur woh ajeeb tarah daryaa mein raastah banaa kar chali gayi.

verses.arabic: قَالَ ذَٰلِكَ مَا كُنَّا نَبۡغِۖ فَٱرۡتَدَّا عَلَىٰٓ ءَاثَارِهِمَا قَصَصًۭا
verses.transliteration: Qaala zaalika maa kunnaa nabgh; fartaddaa 'alaaa aasaarihimaa qaşaşaa.
verses.translation: Moosa ne kaha: Yahi to hai jo kuchh hum chaahte the. phir woh apne qadmon ke nishanaat dekhte huye laute.

verses.arabic: فَوَجَدَا عَبۡدًۭا مِّنۡ عِبَادِنَآ ءَاتَيۡنَـٰهُ رَحۡمَةًۭ مِّنۡ عِندِنَا وَعَلَّمۡنَـٰهُ مِن لَّدُنَّا عِلۡمًۭا
verses.transliteration: Fawajadaa 'abdam- min 'ibaadinaaa 'aataynaahu Rahmatam- min 'indinaa wa 'allamnaahu mil- ladunnaa ilmaa.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh un donon ne hamaare bandon mein se ek bande (Khizar) ko paaya, humne use apni taraf se rahmat di thi aur apne paas se (khaas) ilm sikhaaya tha.

verses.arabic: قَالَ لَهُۥ مُوسَىٰ هَلْ أَتَّبِعُكَ عَلَىٰٓ أَن تُعَلِّمَنِ۠ مِمَّا عُلِّمْتَ رُشْدًا
verses.transliteration: Qaala lahoo Moosaa hal 'attabi'uka 'alaaa 'an tu'allimani mimmaa 'ullimta rushdaa.
verses.translation: Moosa ne usse kaha: kiya (iss shart par) main tera itteba' kar sakta hoon ke tu mujhe uss mein se sikhaaye jo tujhe bhalaayi sikhaayi gayi hai.

verses.arabic: قَالَ إِنَّكَ لَن تَسْتَطِيعَ مَعِىَ صَبْرًا
verses.transliteration: Qaala 'innaka lan tastatee'a maʻiya şabraa
verses.translation: Woh bola: beshak tu mere saath hargiz sabr na kar sakega.

verses.arabic: وَكَيْفَ تَصْبِرُ عَلَىٰ مَا لَمْ تُحِطْ بِهِۦ خُبْرًا
verses.transliteration: 68. Wa kayfa taşbiru 'alaa maa lam tuhit bihee khubraa.
verses.translation: 68. Aur jo cheez tere ehaata-e-ilm hi mein nahin to uss par sabr kar bhi kaise sakta hai?

verses.arabic: قَالَ سَتَجِدُنِىٓ إِن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ صَابِرًۭا وَلَآ أَعْصِى لَكَ أَمْرًا
verses.transliteration: Qaala satajiduneee 'in shaaa'al-laahu şaabiranw-wa laaa 'a'şee laka 'amraa.
verses.translation: Moosa ne kaha: IN SHAA ALLAAH tu mujhe saabir paayega aur main kisi hukm mein teri naa farmaani nahin karung.

verses.arabic: قَالَ فَإِنِ ٱتَّبَعْتَنِى فَلَا تَسْـَٔلْنِى عَن شَىْءٍ حَتَّىٰٓ أُحْدِثَ لَكَ مِنْهُ ذِكْرًا
verses.transliteration: Qaala fa'init- taba'tanee falaa tas'alnee 'an shay'in hattaaa 'uhdisa laka minhu zikraa.
verses.translation: Khizar ne kaha: phir agar tu mera itteba' karna chaahta hai to kisi cheez ki baabat mujhse sawaal na karna hatta ke main khud hi uska zikr tujh se chhedun.

verses.arabic: فَٱنطَلَقَا حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا رَكِبَا فِى ٱلسَّفِينَةِ خَرَقَهَاۖ قَالَ أَخَرَقْتَهَا لِتُغْرِقَ أَهْلَهَاۖ لَقَدْ جِئْتَ شَيْـًۭٔا إِمْرًا
verses.transliteration: Fantalaqaa hattaaa 'izaa rakibaa fis- safeenati kharaqahaa qaala 'akharaqtahaa litughriqa 'ahlahaa laqad ji'ta shay'an 'imraa.
verses.translation: Phir woh donon chale hatta ke jab woh kashti mein sawaar huye to Khizar ne kashti ke takhte tod diye, Moosa ne kaha: kiya tu ise tod rahaa hai taake iss kashti waalon ko gharq karde? Toone bada haulnaak kaam kiya hai.

verses.arabic: قَالَ أَلَمْ أَقُلْ إِنَّكَ لَن تَسْتَطِيعَ مَعِىَ صَبْرًۭا
verses.transliteration: Qaala 'alam 'aqul 'innaka lan tastatee'a ma'iya şabraa.
verses.translation: Khizar ne kaha: kiya main ne na kahaa tha ke tu mere saath hargiz sabr nahin kar sakega?

verses.arabic: قَالَ لَا تُؤَاخِذْنِى بِمَا نَسِيتُ وَلَا تُرْهِقْنِى مِنْ أَمْرِى عُسْرًا
verses.transliteration: Qaala laa tu'aakhiznee bimaa naseetu wa laa turhiqnee min 'amree 'usraa.
verses.translation: Moosa ne kaha: meri bhool chook par mujhe na¹ pakad, aur mere mu'aamle mein mujhe mushkil mein na daal.
verses.deepMeaning: Isse maloom huwa ke bhool chook mu'aaf hai, chunaancheh ek aur maqaam par irshaad-e-ilaahi hai: Aur tum par koyi gunaah nahin agar tum bhool kar koyi ghalti kar daalo' (Al-ahzaab:33/5) isi tarah dil mein paida hone waale waswase bhi mu'aaf hain. Nabi ﷺ ne farmaya: 'mere ummatiyon ke dilon mein jo waswase aur khayalaat aate hain, Allah ne unhein muaa'f kar diya hai, jab tak un par amal na karein ya zabaan se na kahein.' (Sahih Bukhari, Al-Eemaan Wannuzoor, Baab: 15, Hadees:6664)

verses.arabic: فَٱنطَلَقَا حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا لَقِيَا غُلَـٰمًۭا فَقَتَلَهُۥۖ قَالَ أَقَتَلْتَ نَفْسًۭا زَكِيَّةًۭ بِغَيْرِ نَفْسٍۢۖ لَّقَدْ جِئْتَ شَيْـًۭٔا نُّكْرًا
verses.transliteration: Fantalaqaa 'izaa laqiyaa ghulaaman faqatalahoo qaala 'aqatalta nafsan zakiyyatam bighayri nafs; laqad ji'ta shay'an nukraa.
verses.translation: Phir woh donon chale hatta ke unhein ek ladka mila to Khizar ne use qatl kar diya, Moosa ne kaha: kiya toone ek paak nafs (be gunaah) ko kisi jaan ke (qesaas ke) baghair qatl kar diya hai? yaqeenan toone to bahut hi bura kaam kiya hai!

verses.arabic: قَالَ أَلَمْ أَقُل لَّكَ إِنَّكَ لَن تَسْتَطِيعَ مَعِىَ صَبْرًۭا
verses.transliteration: Qaala 'alam 'aqul laka 'innaka lan tastatee'a ma'iya şabraa.
verses.translation: Khizar ne kaha: kiya main ne nahin kahaa tha ke bila shubah tu mere saath hargiz sabr nahin kar sakega?

verses.arabic: قَالَ إِن سَأَلْتُكَ عَن شَىْءٍۢ بَعْدَهَا فَلَا تُصَـٰحِبْنِىۖ قَدْ بَلَغْتَ مِن لَّدُنِّى عُذْرًا
verses.transliteration: Qaala 'in sa'altuka 'an shay'im ba'dahaa falaa tuşaahibnee qad balaghta mil-ladunnee uzraa.
verses.translation: Moosa ne kaha: agar iske ba'd main tujh se kisi cheez ki baabat sawaal karun to phir mujhe hargiz sohbat mein na rakhna, yaqeenan meri taraf se tujhe uzr mil gaya hai.

verses.arabic: فَٱنطَلَقَا حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَتَيَآ أَهْلَ قَرْيَةٍ ٱسْتَطْعَمَآ أَهْلَهَا فَأَبَوْا۟ أَن يُضَيِّفُوهُمَا فَوَجَدَا فِيهَا جِدَارًۭا يُرِيدُ أَن يَنقَضَّ فَأَقَامَهُۥۖ قَالَ لَوْ شِئْتَ لَتَّخَذْتَ عَلَيْهِ أَجْرًۭا
verses.transliteration: Fantalaqaa hattaaa 'izaaa 'atayaaa 'ahla qaryatinis- tat'amaaa 'ahlahaa fa'abaw 'any- yudayyifoohumaa fawajadaa feehaa jidaarañy-yureedu 'añy- yanqadda fa'aqaamah; qaala law shi'ta lattakhazta 'alayhi 'ajraa
verses.translation: Phir woh donon chale hatta ke ek gaaon waalon ke paas pahunche (aur) unse khaana maanga, to unhon ne unki ziyaafat karne se inkaar kar diya,¹ phir un donon ne ek diwaar paayi jo gira chaahti thi, to Khizar ne woh seedhi kar di.. Moosa ne kaha: agar tu chaahta to iss par ujrat le leta.
verses.deepMeaning: Yeh bakheelon aur layeemon ki basti thi ke mehmaanon ki mehmaan nawaazi se hi inkaar kar diya, daraan haal yeh ke musaafiron ko khaana khilaana aur mehmaan nawaazi karna har shari'at ki akhlaaqi ta'leemaat ka aham hissa rahaa hai. Nabi ﷺ ne bhi mehmaan nawaazi aur ekraam-e-zaif ko eemaan ka taqaaza qaraar diya hai. farmaya: 'jo Allah aur yaum-e-aakhirat par eemaan rakhta hai use chaahiye ke mehmaan ki izzat-o-takreem kare.' (Faizul Qadeer Sharahul Jaame'issagheer: 5/209)

verses.arabic: قَالَ هَٰذَا فِرَاقُ بَيْنِى وَبَيْنِكَۚ سَأُنَبِّئُكَ بِتَأْوِيلِ مَا لَمْ تَسْتَطِعْ عَلَيْهِ صَبْرًا
verses.transliteration: Qaala haazaa firaaqu baynee wa baynik; sa'unabbi'uka bita'weeli maa lam tastati' 'alayhi sabraa.
verses.translation: Khizar ne kaha: ab mere aur tere darmiyaan judaayi hai, ab main tujhe un baaton ki haqeeqat bataaounga jin par tu sabr na kar saka.

verses.arabic: أَمَّا ٱلسَّفِينَةُ فَكَانَتْ لِمَسَـٰكِينَ يَعْمَلُونَ فِى ٱلْبَحْرِ فَأَرَدتُّ أَنْ أَعِيبَهَا وَكَانَ وَرَآءَهُم مَّلِكٌۭ يَأْخُذُ كُلَّ سَفِينَةٍ غَصْبًۭا
verses.transliteration: Ammas-safeenatu fakaanat limasaakeena ya'maloona fil-bahri fa'arattu 'an 'a'eebahaa wa kaana waraaa'ahum malikuñy-ya'khuzu kulla safeenatin ghaşbaa.
verses.translation: Woh kashti to chand miskeenon ki thi jo darya mein chalaate the, lehaaza main ne iraadah kiya ke uss mein a'ib daal dun jab ke unke aage ek baadshaah tha jo har kashti ghasab kar leta tha.

verses.arabic: وَأَمَّا ٱلْغُلَـٰمُ فَكَانَ أَبَوَاهُ مُؤْمِنَيْنِ فَخَشِينَآ أَن يُرْهِقَهُمَا طُغْيَـٰنًۭا وَكُفْرًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa 'ammal-ghulaamu fakaana 'abawaahu mu'minayni fakhasheenaaa 'añy- yurhiqahumaa tughyaananw-wa kufraa.
verses.translation: Aur woh jo ladka tha, to uske maan baap momin the, lehaaza hum dare ke woh sar kasha aur kufr ki wajah se unhein (gunaah par) majboor karega.

verses.arabic: فَأَرَدْنَآ أَن يُبْدِلَهُمَا رَبُّهُمَا خَيْرًۭا مِّنْهُ زَكَوٰةًۭ وَأَقْرَبَ رُحْمًۭا
verses.transliteration: Fa'aradnaaa 'añy- yubdilahumaa Rabbuhumaa khayram- minhu zakaatanw-wa 'aqraba ruhmaa.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh hum ne chaaha ke un donon ka rab unhein aisa badal de jo usse paakeezgi mein behtar aur mohabbat mein qareeb tar ho.

verses.arabic: وَأَمَّا ٱلْجِدَارُ فَكَانَ لِغُلَـٰمَيْنِ يَتِيمَيْنِ فِى ٱلْمَدِينَةِ وَكَانَ تَحْتَهُۥ كَنزٌۭ لَّهُمَا وَكَانَ أَبُوهُمَا صَـٰلِحًۭا فَأَرَادَ رَبُّكَ أَن يَبْلُغَآ أَشُدَّهُمَا وَيَسْتَخْرِجَا كَنزَهُمَا رَحْمَةًۭ مِّن رَّبِّكَۚ وَمَا فَعَلْتُهُۥ عَنْ أَمْرِىۚ ذَٰلِكَ تَأْوِيلُ مَا لَمْ تَسْطِعْ عَلَيْهِ صَبْرًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa 'ammal-jidaaru fakaana lighulaamayni yateemayni fil-madeenati wa kaana tahtahoo kanzul-lahumaa wa kaana 'aboohumaa saalihan fa'araada Rabbuka 'añy- yablughaaa 'ashuddahumaa wa yastakhrijaa kanzahumaa rahmatam-mir-Rabbik; wa maa fa'altuhoo 'an 'amree; zaalika ta'weelu maa lam tasti 'alayhi şabraa
verses.translation: Aur woh jo diwaar thi, to woh uss shahar ke do yateem ladkon ki thi, aur uske neeche unka khazaanah tha aur unka baap nek tha, chunaancheh tere rab ne chaaha ke woh donon yateem apni jawaani ko pahunchein aur tere rab ki rahmat se apna khazaanah nikaal lein aur main ne yeh apni raaye se nahin kiya, yeh un baaton ki haqeeqat hai jin par tu sabr na kar saka.

verses.arabic: وَيَسْـَٔلُونَكَ عَن ذِى ٱلْقَرْنَيْنِۖ قُلْ سَأَتْلُوا۟ عَلَيْكُم مِّنْهُ ذِكْرًا
verses.transliteration: Wa yas'aloonaka 'an Zil-Qarnayni qul sa'atloo 'alaykum minhu zikraa.
verses.translation: Aur yeh log aapse zulqarnain ke muta'alliq poochhte hain. aap kah deejiye: an qareeb main uska kuchh zikr tumhaare saamne tilaawat karunga.

verses.arabic: إِنَّا مَكَّنَّا لَهُۥ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ مِن كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ سَبَبًۭا
verses.transliteration: Innaa makkannaa lahoo fil-'ardi wa 'aataynaahu min kulli shay'in sababaa.
verses.translation: Beshak humne use zameen mein iqtedaar diya tha aur use har cheez ke asbaab diye the.

verses.arabic: فَأَتْبَعَ سَبَبًا
verses.transliteration: Fa'atbaʻa sababaa.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh woh ek mohim ke peechhe laga.

verses.arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا بَلَغَ مَغْرِبَ ٱلشَّمْسِ وَجَدَهَا تَغْرُبُ فِى عَيْنٍ حَمِئَةٍۢ وَوَجَدَ عِندَهَا قَوْمًۭاۗ قُلْنَا يَـٰذَا ٱلْقَرْنَيْنِ إِمَّآ أَن تُعَذِّبَ وَإِمَّآ أَن تَتَّخِذَ فِيهِمْ حُسْنًۭا
verses.transliteration: Hattaaa 'izaa balagha maghribash-shamsi wajadahaa taghrubu fee 'aynin hami'atiñw-wa wajada 'indahaa qawmaa; qulnaa yaa Zal- Qarnayni 'immaaa 'an tu'azziba wa 'immaaa 'an tattakhiza feehim husnaa
verses.translation: Hatta ke woh ghuroob-e- aaftaab ki jagah pahuncha, usne use paaya ke woh ek daldali nadi mein ghuroob ho rahaa hai aur uske paas ek qaum paayi. humne kaha: aye Zulqarnain! (tujhe ikthiyaar hai) khaah tu unhein saza de, khaah unse achchha bartaao kare.

verses.arabic: قَالَ أَمَّا مَن ظَلَمَ فَسَوْفَ نُعَذِّبُهُۥ ثُمَّ يُرَدُّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ فَيُعَذِّبُهُۥ عَذَابًۭا نُّكْرًا
verses.transliteration: Qaala 'ammaa man zalama fasawfa nu'azzibuhoo summa yuraddu 'ilaa Rabbihee fayu'azzibuhoo 'azaaban-nukraa.
verses.translation: Usne kahaa: woh jisne zulm kiya, to use hum anqareeb saza denge phir woh apne rab ki taraf lautaaya jaayega to woh use sakht tareen azaab dega.

verses.arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنْ ءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَـٰلِحًۭا فَلَهُۥ جَزَآءً ٱلْحُسْنَىٰۖ وَسَنَقُولُ لَهُۥ مِنْ أَمْرِنَا يُسْرًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa 'ammaa man 'aamana wa 'amila saalihan falahoo jazaaa'anil-husnaa wa sanaqoolu lahoo min 'amrinaa yusraa.
verses.translation: Aur woh jo eemaan laaya aur nek amal kiye to uske liye (Allah ke haan) achchhi jazaa hai aur hum bhi apne kaam mein uske liye aasaani ka hukm denge.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ أَتْبَعَ سَبَبًا
verses.transliteration: Summa 'atba'a sababaa.
verses.translation: phir woh ek mohim ke peechhe laga.

verses.arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا بَلَغَ مَطْلِعَ ٱلشَّمْسِ وَجَدَهَا تَطْلُعُ عَلَىٰ قَوْمٍۢ لَّمْ نَجْعَل لَّهُم مِّن دُونِهَا سِتْرًۭا
verses.transliteration: Hattaaa 'izaa balagha matli'ash- shamsi wajadahaa tatlu'u 'alaa qawmil-lam naj'al-lahum-min doonihaa sitraa.
verses.translation: Hatta ke woh tulu'-e- shams ki jagah pahuncha, usne use paaya ke woh aisi qaum par tulu' ho rahaa hai jis ke liye hum ne suraj ke darmiyaan koyi pardah nahin rakkha.

verses.arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ وَقَدْ أَحَطْنَا بِمَا لَدَيْهِ خُبْرًۭا
verses.transliteration: Kazaalika wa qad 'ahatnaa bimaa ladayhi khubraa.
verses.translation: Waqia'h aisa hi hai aur uske paas jo kuchh tha uski tafseel hamaare ehaata-e-ilm mein hai.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ أَتْبَعَ سَبَبًا
verses.transliteration: Summa 'atba'a sababaa.
verses.translation: Phir woh ek aur mohim ke peechhe laga.

verses.arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا بَلَغَ بَيْنَ ٱلسَّدَّيْنِ وَجَدَ مِن دُونِهِمَا قَوْمًۭا لَّا يَكَادُونَ يَفْقَهُونَ قَوْلًۭا
verses.transliteration: Hattaaa 'izaa balagha baynas- saddayni wajada min doonihimaa qawmal-laa yakaadoona yafqahoona qawlaa.
verses.translation: Hatta ke jab woh do diwaaron ke darmiyaan pahuncha to usne un donon ke uss taraf ek qaum paayi ke lagta nahin tha ke woh koyi baat samajhte hon.

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ يَـٰذَا ٱلْقَرْنَيْنِ إِنَّ يَأْجُوجَ وَمَأْجُوجَ مُفْسِدُونَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَهَلْ نَجْعَلُ لَكَ خَرْجًا عَلَىٰٓ أَن تَجْعَلَ بَيْنَنَا وَبَيْنَهُمْ سَدًّا
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo yaa Zal- qarnayni 'inna Ya'jooja wa Ma'jooja mufsidoona fil-'ardi fahal naj'alu laka kharjan 'alaaa 'an taj'ala baynanaa wa baynahum saddaa.
verses.translation: Woh kahne lage: aye Zulqarnain! Beshak yaajooj aur maajooj iss sar zameen mein fasaad machaaye rakhte hain¹ to kiya hum tere liye kuchh maal ekatthha karein ke tu hamaare aur unke darmiyaan ek diwaar banaa de.
verses.deepMeaning: Yeh Allah ki makhlooq hain jo fil haal ek diwaar ke peechhe mahsoor hain. qiyaamat ke qareeb jab Allah chaahega unki diwaar mein soraakh ho jaayega aur yeh baahar nikal aayeinge aur fasaad machaayeinge. Tafseel ke liye mulaahazah farmaayein.(Sahih Bukhari, Al-fitan, Baab:28, hadees:7135 ma' Fatahul Baari)

verses.arabic: قَالَ مَا مَكَّنِّى فِيهِ رَبِّى خَيْرٌۭ فَأَعِينُونِى بِقُوَّةٍۢ أَجْعَلْ بَيْنَكُمْ وَبَيْنَهُمْ رَدْمًا
verses.transliteration: Qaala maa makkannee feehi Rabbee khayrun fa'a'eenoonee biquwwatin 'aj'al baynakum wa baynahum radmaa.
verses.translation: Usne kaha: mere rab ne mujhe uss mein jo qudrat di hai, bahut behtar hai, chunaancheh tum meri (afraadi) quwwat se madad karo to main tumhaare aur unke darmiyaan ek mazboot band banaa dunga.

verses.arabic: ءَاتُونِى زُبَرَ ٱلْحَدِيدِۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا سَاوَىٰ بَيْنَ ٱلصَّدَفَيْنِ قَالَ ٱنفُخُوا۟ۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَعَلَهُۥ نَارًۭا قَالَ ءَاتُونِىٓ أُفْرِغْ عَلَيْهِ قِطْرًا
verses.transliteration: 'Aatoonee zubaral- hadeed; hattaaa 'izaa saawaa baynaş- şadafayni qaalan-fukhoo hattaaa 'izaa jaʻalahoo naaran qaala 'aatooneee 'ufrigh 'alayhi qitraa.
verses.translation: Tum mujhe lohe ke takhte laado, hatta ke jab usne donon pahaadon ke darmiyaan khala ko baraabar kar diya (to) kaha: (ab iss mein) dhonko, hatta ke jab usne use aag (jaisa) bana diya to kaha: pighla taanba laao ke uss par daal dun.

verses.arabic: فَمَا ٱسْطَـٰعُوٓا۟ أَن يَظْهَرُوهُ وَمَا ٱسْتَطَـٰعُوا۟ لَهُۥ نَقْبًۭا
verses.transliteration: Famas-taa'ooo 'añy- yazharoohu wa mas- tataa'oo lahoo naqbaa.
verses.translation: Phir woh (Yaajooj Maajooj) istetaa'at na rakhte the ke uss par chadh jaayein aur na yeh istetaa'at rakhte the ke uss mein naqab lagaayein.

verses.arabic: قَالَ هَـٰذَا رَحْمَةٌۭ مِّن رَّبِّى فَإِذَا جَآءَ وَعْدُ رَبِّى جَعَلَهُۥ دَكَّآءَۖ وَكَانَ وَعْدُ رَبِّى حَقًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Qaala haazaa rahmatum-mir-Rabbee fa'izaa jaaa'a wa'du Rabbee ja'alahoo dakkaaa'a wa kaana wa'du Rabbee haqqaa.
verses.translation: Zul Qarnain ne kaha: yeh mere rab ki rahmat hai, phir jab mere rab ka wa'dah aa jaayega to woh use hamwaar kar dega aur mere rab ka wa'dah haq hai.

verses.arabic: وَتَرَكْنَا بَعْضَهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ يَمُوجُ فِى بَعْضٍۢ وَنُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَجَمَعْنَـٰهُمْ جَمْعًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa taraknaa ba'dahum Yawma'iziny- yamooju fee ba'diñw-wa nufikha fiş-Şoori fajama'naahum jam'aa.
verses.translation: Aur uss roz hum unke kuchh ko chhod denge, woh ek doosre se gud mud ho jaayenge aur soor phoonka jaayega phir hum un sab ko jama' karenge.

verses.arabic: وَعَرَضْنَا جَهَنَّمَ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْكَـٰفِرِينَ عَرْضًا
verses.transliteration: Wa 'aradnaa jahannama Yawma'izil- lilkaafireena 'ardaa
verses.translation: Aur uss din hum jahannam ko kaafiron ke ru baru le aayeinge.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ كَانَتْ أَعْيُنُهُمْ فِى غِطَآءٍ عَن ذِكْرِى وَكَانُوا۟ لَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ سَمْعًا
verses.transliteration: 'Allazeena kaanat 'a'yunuhum fee ghitaaa'in 'an zikree wa kaanoo laa yastatee'oona sam'aa.
verses.translation: Jinki aankhein meri yaad se parde mein thin aur woh sunne ki istetaa'at na rakhte the.

verses.arabic: أَفَحَسِبَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ أَن يَتَّخِذُوا۟ عِبَادِى مِن دُونِىٓ أَوْلِيَآءَ إِنَّآ أَعْتَدْنَا جَهَنَّمَ لِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ نُزُلًا
verses.transliteration: 'Afahasibal-lazeena kafarooo 'any- yattakhizoo 'ibaadee min dooneee 'awliyaaa'; 'innaaa 'a'tadnaa jahannama lilkaafireena nuzulaa.
verses.translation: Kiya kaafiron ne yeh samajh rakkha hai ke woh mujhe chhod kar mere bandon ko himaayati banaalenge?¹ Beshak humne kaafiron ki mehmaani ke liye jahannam tayyaar kiya hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Iska ek mafhoom to yeh hai ke Allah ko chhod kar Allah ke bandon ko apna haajat rawa aur mushkil kusha samajh liya aur doosra mafhoom yeh hai ke deen mein unko muta'-e-mutlaq samajh liya jise unhon ne halaal kaha, use halaal aur jise haraam kaha, use haraam samjha, jaise (Surah Taubah:9/31) ki wazaahat mein Rasoolullah ﷺ  ne farmaya hai. su360

verses.arabic: قُلْ هَلْ نُنَبِّئُكُم بِٱلْأَخْسَرِينَ أَعْمَـٰلًا
verses.transliteration: Qul hal uunabbi'ukum bil'akhsareena 'a'maalaa
verses.translation: Kahiye (agar tum kaho to) kiya hum tumhein bataayein ke a'amaal mein sab se ziyaadah khasaare mein kaun hain?

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ ضَلَّ سَعْيُهُمْ فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا وَهُمْ يَحْسَبُونَ أَنَّهُمْ يُحْسِنُونَ صُنْعًا
verses.transliteration: 'Allazeena dalla sa'yuhum fil-hayaatid- dunyaa wa hum yahsaboona 'annahum yuhsinoona şun'aa.
verses.translation: Jinki koshish dunyaawi zindagi mein akaarat gayi jab ke woh samajhte hain ke yaqeenan woh achchhe kaam kar rahe hain.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Iss mein aise logon ka zikr hai jo apni taraf se a'amaal ghad liya karte hain aur baz'm-e- khawesh unhein achchha samajhte hain jaise bid'ati waghairah, lekin Allah ne farmaya: 'unke saare a'maal barbad hain.'

verses.arabic: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ وَلِقَآئِهِۦ فَحَبِطَتْ أَعْمَـٰلُهُمْ فَلَا نُقِيمُ لَهُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ وَزْنًا
verses.transliteration: 'Ulaaa'ikal-lazeena kafaroo bi'Aayaati Rabbihim wa liqaaa'ihee fahabitat 'a'maaluhum falaa nuqeemu lahum Yawmal-Qiyaamati waznaa.
verses.translation: Wahi hain jinhon ne apne rab ki aayaat aur uski mulaaqaat ka inkaar kiya, chunaancheh unke a'amaal barbaad ho gaye, lehaaza yaum-e-qiyaamat hum unke liye koyi wazan qaayem nahin karenge.

verses.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ جَزَآؤُهُمْ جَهَنَّمُ بِمَا كَفَرُوا۟ وَٱتَّخَذُوٓا۟ ءَايَـٰتِى وَرُسُلِى هُزُوًا
verses.transliteration: Zaalika jazaaa'uhum jahannamu bimaa kafaroo wattakhazooo 'Aayaatee wa Rusulee huzuwaa.
verses.translation: Yeh hai unki saza jahannam, isliye ke unhon ne kufr kiya aur meri aayaat aur mere rasoolon ko thhathha bana liya.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ كَانَتْ لَهُمْ جَنَّـٰتُ ٱلْفِرْدَوْسِ نُزُلًا
verses.transliteration: 'Innal-lazeena 'aamanoo wa 'amiluş- şaalihaati kaanat lahum Jannaatul-Firdawsi nuzulaa.
verses.translation: Bilaa shubah jo log eemaan laaye aur unhon ne nek amal kiye unki mehmaani ke liye baaghaat- e-firdaus hain.

verses.arabic: خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا لَا يَبْغُونَ عَنْهَا حِوَلًا
verses.transliteration: Khaalideena feehaa laa yabghoona 'anhaa hiwalaa.
verses.translation: Woh un mein hameshah raheinge, wahaan se jagah badalna nahin chaaheinge.

verses.arabic: قُل لَّوْ كَانَ ٱلْبَحْرُ مِدَادًۭا لِّكَلِمَـٰتِ رَبِّى لَنَفِدَ ٱلْبَحْرُ قَبْلَ أَن تَنفَدَ كَلِمَـٰتُ رَبِّى وَلَوْ جِئْنَا بِمِثْلِهِۦ مَدَدًا
verses.transliteration: Qullaw kaanal bahru midaadal-li- Kalimaati Rabbee lanafidal-bahru qabla 'an tanfada Kalimaatu Rabbee wa law ji'naa bimislihee madadaa.
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: agar mere rab ki baaton (ke likhne) ke liye samandar siyaahi ban jaaye to mere rab ki baatein khatm hone se pahle samandar khatm ho jaayega agarcheh hum uske misl (aur samandar) madad ko le aayein.

verses.arabic: قُلْ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ بَشَرٌۭ مِّثْلُكُمْ يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَىَّ أَنَّمَآ إِلَـٰهُكُمْ إِلَـٰهٌۭ وَٰحِدٌۭۖ فَمَن كَانَ يَرْجُوا۟ لِقَآءَ رَبِّهِۦ فَلْيَعْمَلْ عَمَلًۭا صَـٰلِحًۭا وَلَا يُشْرِكْ بِعِبَادَةِ رَبِّهِۦٓ أَحَدًۢا
verses.transliteration: Qul 'innamaaa 'ana basharum-mislukum yoohaaa 'ilayya 'annamaaa 'ilaahukum 'Ilaahuñw-Waahid; faman kaana yarjoo liqaaa'a Rabbihee falya'mal 'amalan saalihanw-wa laa yushrik bi'ibaadati Rabbiheee 'ahadaa.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) kah deejiye: main to bas tumhaari tarah bashar (insaan) hoon, meri taraf wahi aati hai ke tumhara ilaah sirf ek ilaah hai, phir jo shakhs apne rab se mulaqaat ki ummeed rakhta ho, to chaahiye ke nek amal kare aur apne rab ki ibaadat mein kisi ko shareek na kare.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Zakariya عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام Ambiyaa-e-Bani Israyeel mein se hain. yeh badhay the aur yahi peshah unka zariah-e- aamadni tha. (Sahih Muslim, Al-Fazaayel, Hadees:2379)

verses.arabic: كٓهيعٓصٓ
verses.transliteration: Kaaaf-Haa-Yaa- 'Ayyyn-Şaaad
verses.translation: Kaaaf Haa Yaa Ai'n Saaad

verses.arabic: ذِكْرُ رَحْمَتِ رَبِّكَ عَبْدَهُۥ زَكَرِيَّآ
verses.transliteration: 2.Zikru rahmati Rabbika 'abdahoo Zakariyyaa
verses.translation: Yeh aapke rab ki uss rahmat ka zikr hai jo usne apne bande Zakariya¹ par ki thi.
verses.deepMeaning: Mulaahazah ho haashyah: (Surah An'aam:6/31) Maktaba Al-Usald

verses.arabic: إِذْ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥ نِدَآءً خَفِيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Iz naadaa Rabbahoo nidaaa'an khafiyyaa.
verses.translation: Jab usne apne rab ko aahistah aawaaz se pukaara tha.

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّى وَهَنَ ٱلْعَظْمُ مِنِّى وَٱشْتَعَلَ ٱلرَّأْسُ شَيْبًۭا وَلَمْ أَكُنۢ بِدُعَآئِكَ رَبِّ شَقِيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Qaala Rabbi 'innee wahanal-'azmu minnee washta'alar-ra'su shaybanw-wa lam 'akum bidu'aaa'ika Rabbi shaqiyyaa.
verses.translation: Zakariya ne kaha: aye mere rab! Beshak meri haddiyaan kamzor ho gayin aur mera sar budhaape (ki safedi) se bhadak uthha aur aye mere rab! Main tujhse dua' karke (kabhi) mahroom nahin raha.

verses.arabic: وَإِنِّى خِفْتُ ٱلْمَوَٰلِىَ مِن وَرَآءِى وَكَانَتِ ٱمْرَأَتِى عَاقِرًۭا فَهَبْ لِى مِن لَّدُنكَ وَلِيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa 'innee khiftul- mawaaliya miñw- waraaa'ee wa kaanatim- ra'atee 'aaqiran fahab lee mil-ladunka waliyyaa.
verses.translation: Aur beshak main apne peechhe apne waarison se darta hoon aur meri beewi baanjh hai, chunaancheh tu mujhe apne paas se ek waaris ataa kar.

verses.arabic: يَرِثُنِى وَيَرِثُ مِنْ ءَالِ يَعْقُوبَ ۖ وَٱجْعَلْهُ رَبِّ رَضِيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Yarisunee wa yarisu min 'aali Yaʻqoob; waj'alhu Rabbi radiyyaa
verses.translation: Woh waaris ho mera aur waaris ho aal-e-Yaqoob ka aur aye mere rab! Tu use pasandeedah bana.

verses.arabic: يَـٰزَكَرِيَّآ إِنَّا نُبَشِّرُكَ بِغُلَـٰمٍ ٱسْمُهُۥ يَحْيَىٰ لَمْ نَجْعَل لَّهُۥ مِن قَبْلُ سَمِيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Yaa Zakariyyaaa 'innaa nubashshiruka bighulaaminis muhoo Yahyaa lam naj'al-lahoo min qablu samiyyaa.
verses.translation: (Allah ne farmaya) aye Zakariya! Beshak hum tujhe ek ladke ki bashaarat dete hain, uska naam Yahya hai, humne isse pahle uska koyi hum naam nahin banaaya.

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ أَنَّىٰ يَكُونُ لِى غُلَـٰمٌۭ وَكَانَتِ ٱمْرَأَتِى عَاقِرًۭا وَقَدْ بَلَغْتُ مِنَ ٱلْكِبَرِ عِتِيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Qaala Rabbi 'annaa yakoonu lee ghulaamunw-wa kaanatim-ra'atee 'aaqiranw-wa qad balaghtu minal-kibari 'itiyyaa.
verses.translation: Zakariya ne kaha: aye mere rab! Mere haan ladka kaise ho sakta hai jabke meri beewi baanjh hai aur main budhaape ki aakhri hadd ko pahunch gayaa hoon?

verses.arabic: قَالَ كَذَٰلِكَ قَالَ رَبُّكَ هُوَ عَلَىَّ هَيِّنٌۭ وَقَدْ خَلَقْتُكَ مِن قَبْلُ وَلَمْ تَكُ شَيْـًۭٔا
verses.transliteration: Qaala kazaalika qaala Rabbuka huwa 'alayya hayyinunw-wa qad khalaqtuka min qablu wa lam taku shay'aa
verses.translation: Farishte ne kaha: aisa hi hoga, tere rab ne farmaya: woh mujh par aasaan hai aur main ne usse pahle tujhe paida kiya jabke tu kuchh bhi nahin tha.

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱجْعَل لِّىٓ ءَايَةًۭ ۖ قَالَ ءَايَتُكَ أَلَّا تُكَلِّمَ ٱلنَّاسَ ثَلَـٰثَ لَيَالٍۢ سَوِيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Qaala Rabbij-'al-leee 'Aayah; qaala 'Aayatuka 'allaa tukalliman-naasa salaasa layaalin sawiyyaa.
verses.translation: Zakariya ne kaha: aye mere rab! Mere liye koyi nishaani thhahra, farmaya: teri nishaani yeh hai ke tu bhala changa hone ke baa wajood teen (din aur teen) raatein logon se kalaam na karsakega.

verses.arabic: فَخَرَجَ عَلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦ مِنَ ٱلْمِحْرَابِ فَأَوْحَىٰٓ إِلَيْهِمْ أَن سَبِّحُوا۟ بُكْرَةًۭ وَعَشِيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Fakharaja 'alaa qawmihee minal-mihraabi fa'awhaaa 'ilayhim 'an sabbihoo bukratañw-wa 'ashiyyaa.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh woh hujre se nikal kar apni qaum ke paas aaya to usne unhein ishaarah kiya ke tum subh-o- shaam tasbeeh bayaan karo.

verses.arabic: يَـٰيَحْيَىٰ خُذِ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ بِقُوَّةٍۢۖ وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ ٱلْحُكْمَ صَبِيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Yaa Yahyaa khuzil- Kitaaba biquwwatiñw- wa 'aataynaahul-hukma şabiyyaa.
verses.translation: (Allah ne farmaya) Aye Yahya! Kitab ko quwwat se pakad, aur humne use bachpan hi mein quwwat-e- faislah di.

verses.arabic: وَحَنَانًۭا مِّن لَّدُنَّا وَزَكَوٰةًۭۖ وَكَانَ تَقِيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa hanaanam-mil-ladunnaa wa zakaatañw- wa kaana taqiyyaa
verses.translation: Aur apni taraf se shafqat aur paakeezgi (di) aur woh mehaayat muttaqi tha.

verses.arabic: وَبَرَّۢا بِوَٰلِدَيْهِ وَلَمْ يَكُن جَبَّارًا عَصِيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa barram biwaalidayhi wa lam yakun jabbaaran 'aşiyyaa.
verses.translation: Aur apne walidayn ka farmanbardar tha, aur wo zalim aur naframaan nahi tha.

verses.arabic: وَسَلَـٰمٌ عَلَيْهِ يَوْمَ وُلِدَ وَيَوْمَ يَمُوتُ وَيَوْمَ يُبْعَثُ حَيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa salaamun 'alayhi yawma wulida wa yawma yamootu wa yawma yub'asu hayyaa
verses.translation: Aur us par salaam hai jis din wo paida hua, jis din wo marega, aur jis din wo zinda uthaya jayega.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Teen mawaaq'e insaan ke liye sakht wahshat naak hute hain jab insaan raham-e-maadar se baahar aata hai, jab maut ka shikanjah use apni girift mein leta hai aur jab use qabr se zindah karke uthhaaya jaayega to woh apne ko maidaan-e-mahshar ki haulnaakiyon mein ghira huwa paayega. Allah ne farmaya ke un teenon jaghon mein uske liye hamaari taraf se salaamati aur amaan hai.

verses.arabic: وَٱذْكُرْ فِى ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ مَرْيَمَ إِذِ ٱنتَبَذَتْ مِنْ أَهْلِهَا مَكَانًۭا شَرْقِيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Wazkur fil-Kitaabi Maryam; 'izin-tabazat min 'ahlihaa makaanan sharqiyyaa.
verses.translation: Aur iss kitab mein Maryam ka zikr keejiye, jab woh apne ahl-e-khaana se alag mashriqi jaanib makaan mein jaa baithhi.

verses.arabic: فَٱتَّخَذَتْ مِن دُونِهِمْ حِجَابًۭا فَأَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَيْهَا رُوحَنَا فَتَمَثَّلَ لَهَا بَشَرًۭا سَوِيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Fattakhazat min doonihim hijaaban fa'arsalnaaa 'ilayhaa roohanaa fatamassala lahaa basharan sawiyyaa.
verses.translation: Phir usne unke aage ek pardah taan liya, tab humne apni rooh (Farishte) ko uske paas bheja, to woh uske saamne kaamil aadmi ban kar aaya.

verses.arabic: قَالَتْ إِنِّىٓ أَعُوذُ بِٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ مِنكَ إِن كُنتَ تَقِيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Qaalat 'inneee 'a'oozu bir-Rahmaani minka 'in kunta taqiyyaa.
verses.translation: Maryam ne kaha: main tujhse Rahmaan ki panaah maangti hun agar tu darne waala hai.

verses.arabic: قَالَ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ رَسُولُ رَبِّكِ لِأَهَبَ لَكِ غُلَـٰمًۭا زَكِيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Qaala 'innamaaa 'ana rasoolu Rabbiki li'ahaba laki ghulaaman zakiyyaa.
verses.translation: Farishte ne kaha: yaqeenan main tere rab ka bheja huwa hoon taake tujhe (hukm-e-ilaahi se) ek paakeezah ladka ataa karun.

verses.arabic: قَالَتْ أَنَّىٰ يَكُونُ لِى غُلَـٰمٌۭ وَلَمْ يَمْسَسْنِى بَشَرٌۭ وَلَمْ أَكُ بَغِيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Qaalat 'annaa yakoonu lee ghulaamuñw-wa lam yamsasnee basharuñw- wa lam 'aku baghiyyaa.
verses.translation: Maryam ne kaha: mere liye ladka kyun kar hoga jabke mujhe kisi mard ne nahin chhuwa aur na main badkaar hoon.

verses.arabic: قَالَ كَذَٰلِكِ قَالَ رَبُّكِ هُوَ عَلَىَّ هَيِّنٌۭ وَلِنَجْعَلَهُۥٓ ءَايَةًۭ لِّلنَّاسِ وَرَحْمَةًۭ مِّنَّا ۚ وَكَانَ أَمْرًۭا مَّقْضِيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Qaala kazaaliki qaala Rabbuki huwa 'alayya hayyin; wa linaj'alahooo 'Aayatal-linnaasi wa rahmatam-minnaa; wa kaana 'amram- maqdiyyaa.
verses.translation: Farishte ne kaha: isi tarah hoga, tere rab ne kaha hai ke woh mujh par aasaan hai taake hum use logon ke liye nishaani aur apni taraf se rahmat banaayein aur yeh amr tay shudah hai.

verses.arabic: فَحَمَلَتْهُ فَٱنتَبَذَتْ بِهِۦ مَكَانًۭا قَصِيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Fahamalathu fantabazat bihee makaanan qaşiyyaa.
verses.translation: Bilaakhir woh uske saath haamilah ho¹ gayi to door ke ek makaan mein alag jaa baithhi.
verses.deepMeaning: Iss haqeeqat ko ek doosre maqaam par iss tarah bayaan farmaya: 'aur woh paak daaman bi bi jis ne apni I'smat ki hifaazat ki. humne unke under apni taraf se rooh phoonk di aur khud unhein aur unke ladke ko tamaam jahaan ke liye nishaani bana diya.' (Surah Al-Ambiya:21/91)

verses.arabic: فَأَجَآءَهَا ٱلْمَخَاضُ إِلَىٰ جِذْعِ ٱلنَّخْلَةِ قَالَتْ يَـٰلَيْتَنِى مِتُّ قَبْلَ هَـٰذَا وَكُنتُ نَسْيًۭا مَّنسِيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Fa'ajaaa'ahal- makhaadu 'ilaa jiz'in- nakhlati qaalat yaa laytanee mittu qabla haazaa wa kuntu nasyam-mansiyyaa.
verses.translation: Phir dard-e-zeh use khujoor ke ek tane ki taraf le aaya (to) woh boli: aye Kaash! Main isse pahle mar jaati aur bholi bisri ho jaati.

verses.arabic: فَنَادَىٰهَا مِن تَحْتِهَآ أَلَّا تَحْزَنِى قَدْ جَعَلَ رَبُّكِ تَحْتَكِ سَرِيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Fanaadaahaa min tahtihaaa 'allaa tahzanee qad ja'ala Rabbuki tahtaki sariyyaa
verses.translation: Phir farishte ne uske neeche se use aawaaz di ke gham na kha, tere rab ne tere neeche ek chashmah jaari kar diya hai.'

verses.arabic: وَهُزِّىٓ إِلَيْكِ بِجِذْعِ ٱلنَّخْلَةِ تُسَـٰقِطْ عَلَيْكِ رُطَبًۭا جَنِيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa huzzeee 'ilayki bijiz'in-nakhlati tusaaqit 'alayki rutaban janiyyaa.
verses.translation: Aur tu khujoor ka tana apni taraf hila, woh tujh par taazah paki huyi khujoor giraayega.

verses.arabic: فَكُلِى وَٱشْرَبِى وَقَرِّى عَيْنًۭا فَإِمَّا تَرَيِنَّ مِنَ ٱلْبَشَرِ أَحَدًۭا فَقُولِىٓ إِنِّى نَذَرْتُ لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ صَوْمًۭا فَلَنْ أُكَلِّمَ ٱلْيَوْمَ إِنسِيًّا
verses.transliteration: Fakulee washrabee wa qarree 'aynaa; fa'immaa tarayinna minal-bashari 'ahadan faqooleee 'innee nazartu lir-Rahmaani şawman falan 'ukallimal-yawma 'insiyyaa.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh tu khaa aur pi aur (apni) aankhein thhandi kar, phir agar tu kisi aadmi ko dekhe to usse kah dena: beshak main ne Rahmaan ke liye roze ki nazr maani hai, lehaaza aaj main kisi insaan se hargiz kalaam nahin karungi.

verses.arabic: فَأَتَتْ بِهِۦ قَوْمَهَا تَحْمِلُهُۥۖ قَالُوا۟ يَـٰمَرْيَمُ لَقَدْ جِئْتِ شَيْـًۭٔا فَرِيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Fa'atat bihee qawmahaa tahmiluhoo qaaloo yaa Maryamu laqad ji'ti shay'an fariyyaa.
verses.translation: Phir woh uss (bachche) ko uthhaaye apni qaum ke paas aayi, to woh kahne lage: Aye Maryam! Yaqeenan toone bahut bura kaam kiya hai.

verses.arabic: يَـٰٓأُخْتَ هَـٰرُونَ مَا كَانَ أَبُوكِ ٱمْرَأَ سَوْءٍۢ وَمَا كَانَتْ أُمُّكِ بَغِيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ukhta Haaroona maa kaana 'abookim-ra'a saw'inw- wa maa kaanat 'ummuki baghiyyaa.
verses.translation: Aye Haroon ki bahan! na to tera baap bura aadmi tha aur na teri maan hi badkaar thi.

verses.arabic: فَأَشَارَتْ إِلَيْهِۖ قَالُوا۟ كَيْفَ نُكَلِّمُ مَن كَانَ فِى ٱلْمَهْدِ صَبِيًّا
verses.transliteration: Fa'ashaarat 'ilayh; qaaloo kayfa nukallimu man kaana fil-mahdi şabiyyaa
verses.translation: Chunaancheh Maryam ne uss (bachche) ki taraf ishaarah kiya, to woh kahne lage: hum (usse) kaise kalaam Karein jo god mein bachcha hai?¹
verses.deepMeaning: Mulaahazah ho haashyah: (Surah Aal-e-Imran:3/46)

verses.arabic: قَالَ إِنِّى عَبْدُ ٱللَّهِ ءَاتَىٰنِىَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ وَجَعَلَنِى نَبِيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Qaala 'innee 'abdul- laahi 'aataaniyal- Kitaaba wa ja'alanee Nabiyyaa.
verses.translation: Bachcha bol uthha: bilaa shubah main Allah ka bandah hoon, usne mujhe kitab di aur mujhe Nabi banaaya hai.'

verses.arabic: وَجَعَلَنِى مُبَارَكًا أَيْنَ مَا كُنتُ وَأَوْصَىٰنِى بِٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَٱلزَّكَوٰةِ مَا دُمْتُ حَيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa ja'alanee mubaarakan 'ayna maa kuntu wa 'awsaanee bis- Şalaati waz-Zakaati maa dumtu hayyaa.
verses.translation: Aur usne mujhe barkat waala banaaya jahaan bhi main hoon aur mujhe namaaz aur zakaat ki paabandi ka hukm diya hai jab tak main zindah rahoon

verses.arabic: وَبَرًّۢا بِوَٰلِدَتِى وَلَمْ يَجْعَلْنِى جَبَّارًۭا شَقِيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa barram biwaalidatee wa lam yaj'alnee jabbaaran shaqiyyaa.
verses.translation: Aur apni waalidah se neki karne waala banaaya hai aur usne mujhe sarkash (aur) badbakht nahin banaaya.

verses.arabic: وَٱلسَّلَـٰمُ عَلَىَّ يَوْمَ وُلِدتُّ وَيَوْمَ أَمُوتُ وَيَوْمَ أُبْعَثُ حَيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Wassalaamu 'alayya yawma wulittu wa yawma 'amootu wa yawma 'ub'asu hayyaa.a
verses.translation: Aur salaam hai mujh par jis din main paida huwa aur jis din main marunga aur jis din main zindah (karke) uthhaaya jaaounga.

verses.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ عِيسَى ٱبْنُ مَرْيَمَۚ قَوْلَ ٱلْحَقِّ ٱلَّذِى فِيهِ يَمْتَرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Zaalika Eesab-nu- Maryam; qawlal-haqqil- lazee feehi yamtaroon.
verses.translation: Yeh hai Eisa Ibne Maryam, (yahi hai) haq ki baat jis mein woh log shak karte hain.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Ya'ni yeh hain woh sifaat, jinse Eisa عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام muttasif the na ke un sifaat ke haamil, jo Nasaara ne ghulu kar ke unke baare mein baawar karaayein aur na aise, jo yahoodiyon ne tafreet-o- tanqees se kaam lete huye unki baabat kaha. aur yahi haq baat hai jis mein log khaah makhaah shak karte hain.

verses.arabic: مَا كَانَ لِلَّهِ أَن يَتَّخِذَ مِن وَلَدٍۢ سُبْحَٰنَهُۥٓ إِذَا قَضَىٰٓ أَمْرًۭا فَإِنَّمَا يَقُولُ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ
verses.transliteration: Maa kaana lillaahi 'any-yattakhiza miñw- waladin Subhaanah; 'izaa qadaaa 'amran fa'innamaa yaqoolu lahoo kun fayakoon.
verses.translation: Allah ke laayeq hi nahin ke woh aulaad rakkhe, woh paak hai, jab woh kisi kaam ka faislah kar leta hai to uske liye bas yahi kahta hai ke ho ja, to woh ho jaata hai.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Mulaahazah ho haashyah: (Surah Baqarah:2/116)

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ رَبِّى وَرَبُّكُمْ فَٱعْبُدُوهُۚ هَـٰذَا صِرَٰطٌۭ مُّسْتَقِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'innal-laaha Rabbee wa Rabbukum fa budooh; haazaa Şiraatum-Mustaqeem.
verses.translation: Aur beshak Allah hi mera rab hai aur tumhaara rab hai, lehaaza tum usi ki ibaadat karo, yahi hai seedhi raah.

verses.arabic: فَٱخْتَلَفَ ٱلْأَحْزَابُ مِنۢ بَيْنِهِمْۖ فَوَيْلٌۭ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِن مَّشْهَدِ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍۢ
verses.transliteration: Fakhtalafal-'ahzaabu mim baynihim fawaylul-lillazeena kafaroo mim-mashhadi Yawmin 'azeem.
verses.translation: Phir (mukhtalif) girohon ne aapas mein ikhtelaaf kiya,¹ chunaancheh unke liye tabaahi hai jinhon ne yaum-e-azeem ki peshi ka inkaar kiya.
verses.deepMeaning: Mulaahazah ho haashyah: (Surah Aal-e-Imran:3/103)

verses.arabic: أَسْمِعْ بِهِمْ وَأَبْصِرْۖ يَوْمَ يَأْتُونَنَا لَـٰكِنِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ ٱلْيَوْمَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍۢ مُّبِينٍۢ
verses.transliteration: 'Asmi' bihim wa 'abşir Yawma ya'toonanaa laakiniz- zaalimoonal-yawma fee dalaalim-mubeen.
verses.translation: Woh log kiya hi khoob sunte aur dekhte honge jis din woh hamaare paas aayenge! Lekin aaj yeh zaalim khuli gumraahi mein hain.

verses.arabic: وَأَنذِرْهُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْحَسْرَةِ إِذْ قُضِىَ ٱلْأَمْرُ وَهُمْ فِى غَفْلَةٍۢ وَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'anzirhum Yawmal-hasrati 'iz qudiyal-'amr; wa hum fee ghaflatiñw-wa hum laa yu'minoon.
verses.translation: Aur Aap unhein roz-e- hasrat se daraayein jab har mu'aamle ka faislah kiya jaayega jabke (aaj) woh ghaflat mein hain,¹ aur woh eemaan nahin laate.
verses.deepMeaning: Usi hasrat ke baabat Abu Sayeed Al-Khudri رضي الله عنه se marvi Rasoolullah ﷺ ki hadees mein hai 'qiyaamat ke din maut ko ek chiktakbre mendhe ki shakl mein laaya jaayega phir jannat aur jahannam waalon ke saamne use zabah kar diya jaayega. Tafseel ke liye dekhein (Sahih Bukhari, At-tafseer, Surah Kaaf Haa Yaa A'in Saaad, Baab:1 Hadees:4730)

verses.arabic: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَرِثُ ٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَنْ عَلَيْهَا وَإِلَيْنَا يُرْجَعُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Innaa Nahnu narisul- 'arda wa man 'alayhaa wa 'ilaynaa yurja'oon.
verses.translation: Bilaa shubah hum hi zameen ke aur tamaam zameen waalon ke waaris honge aur hamaari hi taraf woh lautaaye jaayenge.

verses.arabic: وَٱذْكُرْ فِى ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ صِدِّيقًۭا نَّبِيًّا
verses.transliteration: Wazkur fil-Kitaabi 'Ibraaheem; 'innahoo kaana şiddeeqan- Nabiyyaa.
verses.translation: Aur kitab mein Ibraheem ka zikr keejiye, beshak woh nehaayat sachcha nabi tha

verses.arabic: إِذْ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ يَـٰٓأَبَتِ لِمَ تَعْبُدُ مَا لَا يَسْمَعُ وَلَا يُبْصِرُ وَلَا يُغْنِى عَنكَ شَيْـًۭٔا
verses.transliteration: 'Iz qaala li'abeehi yaaa 'abati lima ta'budu maa laa yasma'u wa laa yubşiru wa laa yughnee 'anka shay'aa.
verses.translation: Jab usne apne baap se kaha: aye mere baap! to uski ibaadat kyun karta hai jo na sune, na dekhe aur na tere kuchh kaam aaye?

verses.arabic: يَـٰٓأَبَتِ إِنِّى قَدْ جَآءَنِى مِنَ ٱلْعِلْمِ مَا لَمْ يَأْتِكَ فَٱتَّبِعْنِىٓ أَهْدِكَ صِرَٰطًۭا سَوِيًّا
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'abati 'innee qad jaaa'anee minal-'ilmi maa lam ya'tika fattabi'neee 'ahdika siraatan Sawiyyaa.
verses.translation: Aye mere baap! beshak mere paas woh ilm aaya hai jo tere paas nahin aaya lehaaza tu mera itteba' kar, main tujhe seedhi raah dikhaaounga.

verses.arabic: يَـٰٓأَبَتِ لَا تَعْبُدِ ٱلشَّيْطَٰنَ ۖ إِنَّ ٱلشَّيْطَٰنَ كَانَ لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ عَصِيًّا
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'abati laa ta'budish-Shaytaana 'innash-Shaytaana kaana lir-Rahmaani 'aşiyyaa.
verses.translation: Aye mere baap! tu shaytaan ki ibaadat na kar, bilaa shubah shaytaan Rahmaan ka sakht naafarmaan hai.

verses.arabic: يَـٰٓأَبَتِ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ أَن يَمَسَّكَ عَذَابٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ فَتَكُونَ لِلشَّيْطَٰنِ وَلِيًّا
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'abati 'inneee Pakhaafu 'any- yamassaka 'azaabum- minar-Rahmaani fatakoona waliyyaa. lish-Shaytaani
verses.translation: Aye Abba jaan! Beshak mein iss baat se darta hoon ke tujhe rahmaan ki taraf se azaab aa pakde, phir tu shaytaan ka saathi ho jaaye.'

verses.arabic: قَالَ أَرَاغِبٌ أَنتَ عَنْ ءَالِهَتِى يَـٰٓإِبْرَٰهِيمُۖ لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهِ لَأَرْجُمَنَّكَۖ وَٱهْجُرْنِى مَلِيًّا
verses.transliteration: Qaala 'araaghibun 'anta 'an 'aalihatee yaaa 'Ibraaheemu la'il-lam tantahi la'arjumannaka wahjurnee maliyyaa.
verses.translation: Aazar kahne laga: aye Ibraheem! Kiya tu mere ma'boodon se munh phere huye hai? agar tu usse baaz na aaya to main tujhe zaroor rajm kardunga aur tu lamba arsah mujhse door chala jaa.

verses.arabic: قَالَ سَلَـٰمٌ عَلَيْكَ سَأَسْتَغْفِرُ لَكَ رَبِّىٓۖ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ بِى حَفِيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Qaala salaamun 'alayka sa'astaghfiru laka Rabbeee 'innahoo kaana bee hafiyyaa.
verses.translation: Ibraheem ne kaha: tujh par salaamti ho, anqareeb main tere liye apne rab se istaghfaar karunga, beshak woh mujh par bahut meharbaan hai.

verses.arabic: وَأَعْتَزِلُكُمْ وَمَا تَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَأَدْعُوا۟ رَبِّى عَسَىٰٓ أَلَّآ أَكُونَ بِدُعَآءِ رَبِّى شَقِيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa 'a'tazilukum wa maa tad'oona min doonil- laahi wa 'ad'oo Rabbee 'asaaa 'allaaa 'akoona bidu'aaa'i Rabbee shaqiyyaa.
verses.translation: Aur main kinaarah kash hota hoon tumse aur unse jinhein tum Allah ke siwa pukaarte ho aur main to apne rab hi ko pukaarta hoon, ummeed hai ke main apne rab ko pukaar kar mahroom na rahunga.

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّا ٱعْتَزَلَهُمْ وَمَا يَعْبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَهَبْنَا لَهُۥٓ إِسْحَـٰقَ وَيَعْقُوبَۖ وَكُلًّۭا جَعَلْنَا نَبِيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Falamma'-tazalahum wa maa ya'budoona min doonil-laahi wahabnaa lahooo 'Ishaaqa wa Yaʻqoob; wa kullan ja'alnaa Nabiyyaa.
verses.translation: Phir jab usne kinaarah kiya unse aur jinhein woh Allah ke siwa poojte the to hum ne use Ishaaq aur Yaqoob bakhshe aur hum ne har ek ko Nabi banaaya.

verses.arabic: وَوَهَبْنَا لَهُمْ مِّن رَّحْمَتِنَا وَجَعَلْنَا لَهُمْ لِسَانَ صِدْقٍ عَلِيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa wahabnaa lahum- mir-rahmatinaa wa ja'alnaa lahum lisaana şidqin 'aliyyaa.
verses.translation: Aur humne unhein apni rahmat bakhshi aur unke liye sachchaayi ka bol (zikr- e-khair) baland kiya.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Mulaahazah ho haashyah: (Surah Nahl:16/121)

verses.arabic: وَٱذْكُرْ فِى ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ مُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ مُخْلَصًۭا وَكَانَ رَسُولًۭا نَّبِيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Wazkur fil-Kitaabi Moosaaa; 'innahoo kaana mukhlasanw-wa kaana Rasoolan- Nabiyyaa.
verses.translation: Aur kitab mein Moosa ka zikr keejiye, bila shubah woh chuna huwa aur Rasool Nabi tha.

verses.arabic: وَنَـٰدَيْنَـٰهُ مِن جَانِبِ ٱلطُّورِ ٱلْأَيْمَنِ وَقَرَّبْنَـٰهُ نَجِيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa naadaynaahu min jaanibit-Tooril-'aymani wa qarrabnaahu najiyyaa.
verses.translation: Aur humne use toor ki daayein jaanib se pukaara aur use raaz-o-niyaaz ke liye qareeb kiya.

verses.arabic: وَوَهَبْنَا لَهُۥ مِن رَّحْمَتِنَآ أَخَاهُ هَـٰرُونَ نَبِيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa wahabnaa lahoo mir-rahmatinaaa 'akhaahu Haaroona Nabiyyaa.
verses.translation: Aur use apni rahmat se uska bhaai Haaroon nabi bakhsha.

verses.arabic: وَٱذْكُرْ فِى ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ إِسْمَـٰعِيلَ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ صَادِقَ ٱلْوَعْدِ وَكَانَ رَسُولًۭا نَّبِيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Wazkur fil-Kitaabi 'ismaa'eel; 'innahoo kaana şaadiqal-wa'di wa kaana Rasoolan- Nabiyyaa.
verses.translation: Aur kitab mein Ismayeel ka zikr keejiye, beshak woh wa'de ka sachcha Rasool Nabi tha.

verses.arabic: وَكَانَ يَأْمُرُ أَهْلَهُۥ بِٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَٱلزَّكَوٰةِ وَكَانَ عِندَ رَبِّهِۦ مَرْضِيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa kaana ya'muru 'ahlahoo biş-Şalaati wazzakaati wa kaana 'inda Rabbihee mardiyyaa
verses.translation: Aur woh apne ghar waalon ko namaaz aur zakaat ka hukm deta tha aur woh apne rab ke haan pasandeedah tha.

verses.arabic: وَٱذْكُرْ فِى ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ إِدْرِيسَ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ صِدِّيقًۭا نَّبِيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Wazkur fil-Kitaabi 'Idrees; 'innahoo kaana siddeeqan-Nabiyyaa
verses.translation: Aur kitab mein Idrees ka zikr keejiye, beshak woh nehaayat sachcha nabi tha.

verses.arabic: وَرَفَعْنَـٰهُ مَكَانًا عَلِيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa rafa'naahu makaanan 'aliyyaa.
verses.translation: Aur hum ne use ek baland maqaam par uthhaa liya.

verses.arabic: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَنْعَمَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْهِم مِّنَ ٱلنَّبِيِّۦنَ مِن ذُرِّيَّةِ ءَادَمَ وَمِمَّنْ حَمَلْنَا مَعَ نُوحٍۢ وَمِن ذُرِّيَّةِ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَإِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ وَمِمَّنْ هَدَيْنَا وَٱجْتَبَيْنَآۚ إِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَايَـٰتُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ خَرُّوا۟ سُجَّدًۭا وَبُكِيًّا
verses.transliteration: 'Ulaaa'ikal-lazeena 'an'amal-laahu 'alayhim min minan-Nabiyyeena zurriyyati 'Aadama wa mimman hamalnaa ma'a Noohinw-wa min zurriyyati 'Ibraaheema wa 'Israaa'eela wa mimman hadaynaa wajtabaynaaa; 'izaa tutlaa 'alayhim 'Aayaatur-Rahmaani kharroo sujjadañw- wa bukiyyaa.
verses.translation: Yeh woh (Ambiya) hain jin par Allah ne in'aam kiya jo aulaad-e-Aadam mein se hain aur un logon (ki nasl) mein se jinhein humne Nooh ke saath (kashti mein) sawaar kiya tha, aur Ibraheem aur Israyeel ki aulaad se, aur un logon mein se jinhein humne hidaayat di aur chun liya, jab un par Rahmaan ki aayaat tilaawat ki jaatin to woh sajde¹ mein gir padte aur rote.
verses.deepMeaning: (Assajdah) qur'an kareem ki tilaawat karne waale ko uss maqaam par (tilaawat mauqoof karke) qiblah rukh ho kar Allah ke huzoor sajdah karna chaahiye. Sajde mein yeh masnoon dua' padhe: 'Allaahummaktub lee bihaa indaka ajran, wa-dha 'annnee bihaa wizran, waj'al haa lee indaka zukhran wa taqabbal haa mine kamaa taqabbaltahaa min 'abdika Daawooda. 'Aye Allah! Mere liye apne haan iss (qur'an majeed ki tilaawat) ki wajah se ajr-o-sawaab likh de aur mujhe uske badle gunaahon se paak karde aur meri jaanib se iss (tilaawat) ko apne haan zakheerah karle aur meri taraf se iss tilaawat ko aise hi qubool farma jis tarah toone apne bande Dawood عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام se qubool farmaayi.' (Jaame' At-tirmezi, Al-juma' Baab: 55, Hadees:579, 3424, wa Sunan Ibne Maajah, hadees:1053)

verses.arabic: فَخَلَفَ مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ خَلْفٌۭ أَضَاعُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَٱتَّبَعُوا۟ ٱلشَّهَوَٰتِۖ فَسَوْفَ يَلْقَوْنَ غَيًّا
verses.transliteration: Fakhalafa mim ba'dihim khalfun 'adaa'uş-Şalaata wattaba'ush-shahawaati fasawfa yalqawna ghayyaa.
verses.translation: Phir unke ba'd naa khalf (naa laayeq unke) jaanasheen huye, woh namaaz zaaye' karte aur khaaheshaat ki pairwi karte chunaancheh jald hi (aage) woh halaakat aur gumraahi ke anjaam se do chaar honge.

verses.arabic: إِلَّا مَن تَابَ وَءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَـٰلِحًۭا فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ يَدْخُلُونَ ٱلْجَنَّةَ وَلَا يُظْلَمُونَ شَيْـًٔا
verses.transliteration: 'Illaa man taaba wa 'aamana wa 'amila saalihan fa'ulaaa'ika yadkhuloonal-Jannata wa laa yuzlamoona shay'aa.
verses.translation: Magar jisne taubah ki aur eemaan laaya aur nek amal kiye, to woh log jannat mein daakhil honge aur un par koyi zulm na hoga.

verses.arabic: جَنَّـٰتِ عَدْنٍ ٱلَّتِى وَعَدَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ عِبَادَهُۥ بِٱلْغَيْبِۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ وَعْدُهُۥ مَأْتِيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Jannaati 'Adninil- latee wa'adar- Rahmaanu 'ibaadahoo bilghayb; 'innahoo kaana wa'duhoo ma'tiyyaa.
