verses.translation: (Ya'ni) abdi baaghaat, inka Rahmaan ne apne bandon ke saath ghaib se wa'dah kiya hai. beshak uska wa'dah (har soorat) aane waala hai.

verses.arabic: لَا يَسْمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغْوًۭا إِلَّا سَلَـٰمًۭاۖ وَلَهُمْ رِزْقُهُمْ فِيهَا بُكْرَةًۭ وَعَشِيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Laa yasmaʻoona feehaa laghwan 'illaa salaamaa; wa lahum rizquhum feehaa bukratañw-wa ashiyyaa
verses.translation: Woh uss mein koyi laghw' baat nahin sunenge siwaaye salaam ke aur wahaan unke liye subh-o- shaam rizq hoga.

verses.arabic: تِلْكَ ٱلْجَنَّةُ ٱلَّتِى نُورِثُ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا مَن كَانَ تَقِيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Tilkal-Jannatul-latee noorisu min 'ibaadinaa man kaana taqiyyaa.
verses.translation: yahi woh jannat hai jiska waaris hum apne bandon mein se use banaayenge jo muttaqi hoga.

verses.arabic: وَمَا نَتَنَزَّلُ إِلَّا بِأَمْرِ رَبِّكَۖ لَهُۥ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِينَا وَمَا خَلْفَنَا وَمَا بَيْنَ ذَٰلِكَۚ وَمَا كَانَ رَبُّكَ نَسِيًّا
verses.transliteration: Wa maa natanazzalu 'illaa bi'amri Rabbika lahoo maa bayna 'aydeenaa wa maa khalfanaa wa maa bayna zaalik; wa maa kaana Rabbuka nasiyyaa.
verses.translation: Aur hum (farishte) aap ke rab hi ke hukm se naazil hote hain, usi ke liye hai jo kuchh hamaare aage hai aur jo kuchh hamaare peechhe hai aur jo kuchh uske darmiyaan hai aur aapka rab bhoolne waala nahin.

verses.arabic: رَّبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا فَٱعْبُدْهُ وَٱصْطَبِرْ لِعِبَادَتِهِۦۚ هَلْ تَعْلَمُ لَهُۥ سَمِيًّا
verses.transliteration: Rabbus-samaawaati wal'ardi wa maa baynahumaa fa'budhu waştabir li'ibaadatih; hal taʻlamu lahoo samiyyaa.
verses.translation: wahi rab hai aasmaanon ka, zameen ka aur jo kuchh unke darmiyaan hai (sab ka), chunaancheh aap uski ibaadat karein aur uski ibaadat par qaayem rahein, kiya aap uska koyi hum naam jaante hain?

verses.arabic: وَيَقُولُ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ أَءِذَا مَا مِتُّ لَسَوْفَ أُخْرَجُ حَيًّا
verses.transliteration: Wa yaqoolul-'insaanu 'a'izaa maa mittu lasawfa 'ukhraju hayyaa.
verses.translation: Aur insaan kahta hai: kiya jab main mar jaaounga phir mujhe zindah nikaala jaayega?

verses.arabic: أَوَلَا يَذْكُرُ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَـٰهُ مِن قَبْلُ وَلَمْ يَكُ شَيْـًۭٔا
verses.transliteration: Awalaa yazkurul- 'insaanu 'annaa khalaqnaahu min qablu wa lam yaku shay'aa.
verses.translation: Kiya insaan (itnaa hi) yaad nahin rakhta ke yaqeenan humne isse pahle use takhleeq kiya jab ke woh kuchh bhi na tha.

verses.arabic: فَوَرَبِّكَ لَنَحْشُرَنَّهُمْ وَٱلشَّيَـٰطِينَ ثُمَّ لَنُحْضِرَنَّهُمْ حَوْلَ جَهَنَّمَ جِثِيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Fawa Rabbika lanahshurannahum washshayaateena summa lanuhdirannahum hawla jahannama jisiyyaa.
verses.translation: Aapke rab ki qasam! Hum zaroor un (kuffaar) ko shaytaanon ke humraah ekhatthha karenge phir hum zaroor unhein ghutnon ke bal jahannam ke gird haazir kareinge.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ لَنَنزِعَنَّ مِن كُلِّ شِيعَةٍ أَيُّهُمْ أَشَدُّ عَلَى ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ عِتِيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Summa lananzi anna min kulli shee'atin 'ayyuhum 'ashaddu 'alar- Rahmaani 'itiyyaa.
verses.translation: Phir hum zaroor har giroh se use kheench kar alag karenge jo un mein se Rahmaan ke khilaaf sar kash mein sakht tar tha.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ لَنَحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ أَوْلَىٰ بِهَا صِلِيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Summa lanahnu 'a'ʻlamu billazeena hum 'awlaa bihaa şiliyyaa.
verses.translation: Phir humein unka khoob ilm hai jo jahannam mein jaane ke ziyaadah laayeq hain.

verses.arabic: وَإِن مِّنكُمْ إِلَّا وَارِدُهَاۚ كَانَ عَلَىٰ رَبِّكَ حَتْمًۭا مَّقْضِيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa 'im-minkum 'illaa waariduhaa; kaana 'alaa Rabbika hatmam-maqdiyyaa.
verses.translation: aur tum mein se koyi bhi aisa nahin jo jahannam par waarid na ho,¹ yeh aapke rab ke zimme hatmi aur tay shudah baat hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Iski tafseer sahih ahaadees mein iss tarah bayaan ki gayi hai ke jahannam ke oupar pul banaaya jaayega jis par se har momin-o-kaafir ko guzarna hoga. Momin to apne a'amaal ke mutaabiq jald ya bader guzar jaayenge. Kuchh to palak jhapatte mein, kuchh bijli aur hawa ki tarah, kuchh parindon ki tarah aur kuchh ghodon aur deegar sawaaryon ki tarah guzar jaayeinge. Yun kuchh bilkul sahih saalim, kuchh zakhmi, taahum pul uboor kar leinge, kuchh jahannam mein gir padeinge jinhein ba'd mein shefaa'at ke zariye nikaal liya jaayega lekin kaafir uss pul ko uboor karne mein kaamyaab nahin honge aur sab jahannam mein gir padeinge. Uski taayeed iss hadees se bhi hoti hai: 'jiske teen bachche bulooghat se pahle faut ho gaye, use aag nahin chhuyegi magar sirf qasam halaal karne ke Irye.' (Sahih Bukhari, hadees:1251, Sahih Muslim, hadees:2632)

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ نُنَجِّى ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوْا۟ وَنَذَرُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ فِيهَا جِثِيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Summa nunajjil- lazeenat-taqaw wa nazaruz-zaalimeena feehaa jisiyyaa.
verses.translation: Phir hum muttaqi logon ko najaat deinge, aur hum zaalimon ko chhod deinge uss mein ghutnon ke bal gire huye.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَايَـٰتُنَا بَيِّنَـٰتٍۢ قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ أَىُّ ٱلْفَرِيقَيْنِ خَيْرٌۭ مَّقَامًۭا وَأَحْسَنُ نَدِيًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa 'izaa tutlaa 'alayhim 'Aayaatunaa bayyinaatin qaalal- lazeena kafaroo lillazeena 'aamanooo 'ayyul-fareeqayni khayrum-maqaamañw- wa 'ahsanu nadiyyaa.
verses.translation: Aur jab un par hamaari waazeh aayaat tilaawat ki jaati hain to kaafir mominon se kahte hain: fariqain mein se kiska maqaam behtar aur kiski majlis ziyaadah achchhi hai?

verses.arabic: وَكَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّن قَرْنٍ هُمْ أَحْسَنُ أَثَٰثًۭا وَرِءْيًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa kam 'ahlaknaa qablahum-min qarnin hum 'ahsanu 'asaasanw-wa ri'yaa.
verses.translation: Aur unse pahle humne 2 kitni hi qaumein halaak kardin, woh unse asaason aur naam-o-numood mein kaheen badh kar thin.

verses.arabic: قُلْ مَن كَانَ فِى ٱلضَّلَـٰلَةِ فَلْيَمْدُدْ لَهُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ مَدًّاۚ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا رَأَوْا۟ مَا يُوعَدُونَ إِمَّا ٱلْعَذَابَ وَإِمَّا ٱلسَّاعَةَ فَسَيَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ هُوَ شَرٌّۭ مَّكَانًۭا وَأَضْعَفُ جُندًۭا
verses.transliteration: Qul man kaana fid- dalaalati falyamdud lahur-Rahmaanu maddaa; hattaaa 'izaa ra'aw maa yoo'adoona 'immal- 'azaaba wa 'immas- Saa'ata fasayaʻlamoona man huwa sharrum- makaananw-wa 'ad'afu jundaa.
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: jo shakhs gumraahi mein hai, use Rahmaan lambi dheel deta hai, hatta ke jab woh dekhenge jiska unse wa'dah kiya jaata hai, ya azaab ya qiyaamat, to woh zaroor jaan lenge ke kaun darje mein badtar aur fauji lehaaz se kamzor tar hai.

verses.arabic: وَيَزِيدُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱهْتَدَوْا۟ هُدًۭىۖ وَٱلْبَٰقِيَٰتُ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتُ خَيْرٌ عِندَ رَبِّكَ ثَوَابًۭا وَخَيْرٌۭ مَّرَدًّا
verses.transliteration: Wa yazeedul-laahul- lazeenah-tadaw hudaa; wal-baaqiyaatus- saalihaatu khayrun 'inda Rabbika sawaabanw-wa- khayrum-maraddaa
verses.translation: Aur raah-e-hidaayat par chalne waalon ko Allah mazeed hidaayat ataa karta hai aur baaqi rahne waali nekiyaan hi aapke rab ke haan sawaab aur anjaam ke e'tebaar se bahut behtar hain.

verses.arabic: أَفَرَءَيْتَ ٱلَّذِى كَفَرَ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا وَقَالَ لَأُوتَيَنَّ مَالًۭا وَوَلَدًا
verses.transliteration: Afara'aytal-lazee kafara bi-'Aayaatinaa wa qaala la'ootayanna maalañw-wa waladaa.
verses.translation: Kiya phir aapne use dekha jisne hamaari aayaat ka inkaar kiya aur kaha: mujhe zaroor maal aur aulaad milegi?

verses.arabic: أَطَّلَعَ ٱلْغَيْبَ أَمِ ٱتَّخَذَ عِندَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ عَهْدًا
verses.transliteration: 'Attala'al-ghayba 'amit-takhaza indar-Rahmaani 'ahdaa.
verses.translation: Kiya usne ghaib ki ittela' paali ya Rahmaan ke haan koyi ahad le liya hai?

verses.arabic: كَلَّاۚ سَنَكْتُبُ مَا يَقُولُ وَنَمُدُّ لَهُۥ مِنَ ٱلْعَذَابِ مَدًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Kallaa; sanaktubu maa yaqoolu wa namuddu lahoo minal- 'azaabi maddaa.
verses.translation: Hargiz nahin! hum zaroor likhenge jo kuchh woh kahta hai aur hum uske liye azaab bahut badhaa denge

verses.arabic: وَنَرِثُهُۥ مَا يَقُولُ وَيَأْتِينَا فَرْدًا
verses.transliteration: Wa narisuhoo maa yaqoolu wa ya'teenaa fardaa.
verses.translation: Aur un cheezon ke hum waaris honge jo woh kahta hai aur woh hamaare paas akela aayega.

verses.arabic: وَٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ءَالِهَةًۭ لِّيَكُونُوا۟ لَهُمْ عِزًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Wattakhazoo min doonil-laahi 'aalihatal- liyakoonoo lahum 'izzaa
verses.translation: Aur unhon ne Allah ke siwa ma'bood banaa liye hain taake woh unke madadgaar hon.

verses.arabic: كَلَّاۚ سَيَكْفُرُونَ بِعِبَادَتِهِمْ وَيَكُونُونَ عَلَيْهِمْ ضِدًّا
verses.transliteration: Kallaa; sayakfuroona bi'ibaadatihim wa yakoonoona 'alayhim diddaa.
verses.translation: Hargiz nahin! anqareeb woh khud unki ibaadat ka inkaar kar deinge aur unke mukhaalif ho jaayenge.

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينَ عَلَى ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ تَؤُزُّهُمْ أَزًّۭا
verses.transliteration: 'Alam tara 'annaaa 'arsalnash-Shayaateena 'alal-kaafireena ta'uzzuhum 'azzaa.
verses.translation: Kiya aapne dekha nahin ke beshak hum ne kaafiron par shaytaan chhod rakkhe hain woh jo unhein khoob khoob (gunaanon par) ubhaarte hain?

verses.arabic: فَلَا تَعْجَلْ عَلَيْهِمْ إِنَّمَا نَعُدُّ لَهُمْ عَدًّا
verses.transliteration: Falaa ta'jal 'alayhim 'innamaa na'uddu lahum 'addaa.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh aap unki baabat jaldi na karein, hum to bas unke din gin rahe hain.

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ نَحْشُرُ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ إِلَى ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ وَفْدًۭا
verses.transliteration: Yawma nahshurul- muttaqeena 'ilar- Rahmaani wafdaa.
verses.translation: jis din hum muttaqiyon ko Rahmaan ki taraf (bataur) mehmaan ekhatthha kar laayeinge.

verses.arabic: وَنَسُوقُ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ إِلَىٰ جَهَنَّمَ وِرْدًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa nasooqul- mujrimeena 'ilaa Jahannama wirdaa.
verses.translation: Aur mujrimon ko jahannam ki taraf piyaase (hi) hank le jaayenge.

verses.arabic: لَّا يَمْلِكُونَ ٱلشَّفَـٰعَةَ إِلَّا مَنِ ٱتَّخَذَ عِندَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ عَهْدًۭا
verses.transliteration: Laa yamlikoonash- shafaa 'ata 'illaa manit- takhaza 'indar- Rahmaani 'ahdaa.
verses.translation: Woh (uss roz) sifaarish ka ikhtiyaar nahin rakkhheinge siwaaye uske jisne Rahmaan se ahad liya.

verses.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ ٱتَّخَذَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ وَلَدًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa qaalut-takhazar- Rahmaanu waladaa.
verses.translation: Aur unhon ne kaha: Rahmaan aulaad rakhta hai.

verses.arabic: لَّقَدْ جِئْتُمْ شَيْـًۭٔا إِدًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Laqad ji'tum shay'an 'iddaa.
verses.translation: Albatta tum ek bahut bhaari baat (gunaah) tak aa pahunche ho.

verses.arabic: تَكَادُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتُ يَتَفَطَّرْنَ مِنْهُ وَتَنشَقُّ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَتَخِرُّ ٱلْجِبَالُ هَدًّا
verses.transliteration: Takaadus-samaawaatu yatafattarna minhu wa tanshaqqul-'ardu wa takhirrul-jibaalu haddaa.
verses.translation: Qareeb hain ke aasmaan iss (baat) se phat padein, aur zameen shaq ho jaaye aur pahaad rezah rezah ho kar gir padein.

verses.arabic: أَن دَعَوْا۟ لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ وَلَدًۭا
verses.transliteration: 'An da'aw lir- Rahmaani waladaa
verses.translation: Iss (baat) par ke unhon ne Rahmaan ke liye aulaad ka da'wa kiya.

verses.arabic: وَمَا يَنبَغِى لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ أَن يَتَّخِذَ وَلَدًا
verses.transliteration: Wa maa yambaghee lir-Rahmaani 'añy- yattakhiza waladaa.
verses.translation: Aur Rahmaan ke laayeq nahin ke woh kisi ko aulaad banaaye.

verses.arabic: إِن كُلُّ مَن فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ إِلَّآ ءَاتِى ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ عَبْدًۭا
verses.transliteration: 'In kullu man fis- samaawaati wal'ardi 'illaaa 'aatir-Rahmaani 'abdaa.
verses.translation: Aasmaanon aur zameen mein jo koyi bhi hain woh sab Rahmaan ke paas ghulaam ban kar aayenge.

verses.arabic: لَّقَدْ أَحْصَىٰهُمْ وَعَدَّهُمْ عَدًّۭا
verses.transliteration: Laqad 'ahşaahum wa 'addahum 'addaa.
verses.translation: yaqeenan USS (Rahmaan) ne unka shumaar kar rakkha hai aur unhein khoob gin rakkha hai.

verses.arabic: وَكُلُّهُمْ ءَاتِيهِ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ فَرْدًا
verses.transliteration: Wa kulluhum 'aateehi Yawmal-Qiyaamati fardaa.
verses.translation: Aur woh sab yaum-e- qiyaamat Allah ke paas tanha tanha aayenge.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ سَيَجْعَلُ لَهُمُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ وُدًّا
verses.transliteration: 'Innal-lazeena 'aamanoo wa 'amilus- şaalihaati sayaj'alu lahumur-Rahmaanu wuddaa.
verses.translation: Beshak jo log eemaan laaye aur unhon ne nek amal kiye, yaqeenan Rahmaan unke liye mohabbat paida kar dega.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Zameen mein ahl-e-dunya ke dilon mein aur aasmaanon mein farishton ke dilon mein. (Al-Bukhari, hadees:3209)

verses.arabic: فَإِنَّمَا يَسَّرْنَـٰهُ بِلِسَانِكَ لِتُبَشِّرَ بِهِ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ وَتُنذِرَ بِهِۦ قَوْمًۭا لُّدًّا
verses.transliteration: Fa'innamaa yassarnaahu bilisaanika litubashshira bihil- muttaqeena wa tunzira bihee qawmal-luddaa.
verses.translation: Yaqeenan humne to iss (qur'an) ko aap ki zabaan (arabi) mein khoob aasaan kar diya hai taake aap isse muttaqeen ko bashaarat dein aur uske saath jhagdaalu qaum¹ ko daraayein.
verses.deepMeaning: Jhagdaalu qaum' woh log jo Allah Ta'ala ki wahdaaniyat aur uske Rasool ﷺ ki risaalat par eemaan ahin rakhte aur har cheez (kaam) ke baare mein da'wa karte hain ke Allah ne uska hukm diya hai.

verses.arabic: وَكَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّن قَرْنٍۢ هَلْ تُحِسُّ مِنْهُم مِّنْ أَحَدٍ أَوْ تَسْمَعُ لَهُمْ رِكْزًا
verses.transliteration: Wa kam 'ahlaknaa qablahum min qarnin hal tuhissu minhum min 'ahadin 'aw tasma'u lahum rikzaa.
verses.translation: Aur inse pahle humne kitni hi qaumein halaak ardein, kiya Aap un mein se kisi ek ko mahsoos karte hain ya unki koyi bhinak aahat) bhi sunte hain?

verses.arabic: طٰهٰ
verses.transliteration: Taa-Haa
verses.translation: Taahaa

verses.arabic: مَآ أَنزَلْنَا عَلَيْكَ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِتَشْقَىٰٓ
verses.transliteration: Maaa 'anzalnaa 'alaykal-Qur'aana litashqaaa.
verses.translation: Humne aap par qur'an isliye naazil nahin kiya ke Aap mushaqqat mein padein.

verses.arabic: إِلَّا تَذْكِرَةًۭ لِّمَن يَخْشَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Illaa tazkiratal-limany- yakhshaa.
verses.translation: Magar (yeh to) uss shakhs ke liye naseehat hai jo Allah se dare.

verses.arabic: تَنزِيلًۭا مِّمَّنْ خَلَقَ ٱلْأَرْضَ وَٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ ٱلْعُلَى
verses.transliteration: Tanzeelam-mimman khalaqal-'arda wassamaawaatil-ulaa
verses.translation: Uss zaat ki taraf se naazil huwa hai jisne zameen aur ounche aasmaan takhleeq kiye.

verses.arabic: ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ عَلَى ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱسْتَوَىٰ
verses.transliteration: 'Ar-Rahmaanu 'alal- 'Arshis-tawaa.
verses.translation: woh Rahmaan hai, Arsh par mustawi hai.

verses.arabic: لَهُۥ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا وَمَا تَحْتَ ٱلثَّرَىٰ
verses.transliteration: ahoo maa fis- samaawaati wa maa fil- 'ardi wa maa baynahumaa wa maa tahtas-saraa.
verses.translation: Usi ka hai jo kuchh aasmaanon aur zameen mein hai aur jo kuchh un donon ke darmiyaan hai aur kura-e-khaak ke neeche waali cheezein.

verses.arabic: وَإِن تَجْهَرْ بِٱلْقَوْلِ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَعْلَمُ ٱلسِّرَّ وَأَخْفَى
verses.transliteration: Wa 'in tajhar bilqawli fa'innahoo ya'lamus- sirra wa 'akhfaa.
verses.translation: Aur agar aap baland aawaaz se baat karein to bilaa shubah woh har raaz aur usse bhi posheedah tar baat ko jaanta hai.

verses.arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ لَهُ ٱلْأَسْمَآءُ ٱلْحُسْنَىٰ
verses.transliteration: 'Allaahu laaa ilaaha 'illaa Huwa lahul- 'Asmaaa'ul-Husnaa
verses.translation: (wahi) Allah hai, uske siwa koyi ilaah nahin, usi ke hain sab achchhe naam.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Mulaahazah ho haashyah: (Surah A'araaf:7/180)

verses.arabic: وَهَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ مُوسَىٰٓ
verses.transliteration: Wa hal 'ataaka hadeesu Moosaa.
verses.translation: Aur kiya aap tak Moosa ki khabar pahunchi hai?

verses.arabic: إِذْ رَءَا نَارًۭا فَقَالَ لِأَهْلِهِ ٱمْكُثُوٓا۟ إِنِّىٓ ءَانَسْتُ نَارًۭا لَّعَلِّىٓ ءَاتِيكُم مِّنْهَا بِقَبَسٍ أَوْ أَجِدُ عَلَى ٱلنَّارِ هُدًۭى
verses.transliteration: Iz ra'aa naaran faqaala li'ahlihim-kusooo 'inneee 'aanastu naaral- la'alleee 'aateekum- minhaa biqabasin 'aw 'ajidu 'alan-naari hudaa.
verses.translation: Jab usne (Toor par) aag dekhi to apne ghar waalon se kaha: (yahaan) thhahro, beshak main ne aag dekhi hai shaayad main uss mein se tumhaare liye koyi angaara le aaoun ya aag ke paas koyi raahbar paaoun.

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّآ أَتَىٰهَا نُودِىَ يَـٰمُوسَىٰٓ
verses.transliteration: Falammaaa 'ataahaa noodiya yaa-Moosaa.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh Jab Moosa aag ke paas pahuncha to aawaaz di gayi: aye Moosa!

verses.arabic: إِنِّىٓ أَنَا۠ رَبُّكَ فَٱخْلَعْ نَعْلَيْكَ إِنَّكَ بِٱلْوَادِ ٱلْمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى
verses.transliteration: 'Inneee 'Ana Rabbuka fakhla' na'layka 'innaka bilwaadil-muqaddasi Tuwaa.
verses.translation: Beshak main tera rab hoon, lehaaza tu apne joote utaar de, bilaa shubah tu muqaddas waadi Tuwa mein hai.

verses.arabic: وَأَنَا۠ ٱخْتَرْتُكَ فَٱسْتَمِعْ لِمَا يُوحَىٰٓ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'anakh-tartuka fastami' limaa yoohaa.
verses.translation: Aur main ne tujhe chun liya hai, lehaaza jo wahi ki jaati hai use ghaur se sun.

verses.arabic: إِنَّنِىٓ أَنَا ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّآ أَنَا۠ فَٱعْبُدْنِى وَأَقِمِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ لِذِكْرِىٓ
verses.transliteration: 'Innaneee 'Anal-laahu laaa ilaaha 'illaaa 'Ana fa'budnee wa 'aqimis- Şalaata lizikree.
verses.translation: Beshak main hi Allah hoon, mere siwa koyi mabood nahin, chunaancheh tu meri hi ibaadat kar aur meri yaad ke liye namaaz qaayem kar.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ ءَاتِيَةٌ أَكَادُ أُخْفِيهَا لِتُجْزَىٰ كُلُّ نَفْسٍۢ بِمَا تَسْعَىٰ
verses.transliteration: 'Innas-Saa'ata 'aatiyatun 'akaadu 'ukhfeehaa litujzaa kullu nafsim bimaa tas'aa.
verses.translation: Beshak qiyaamat aane waali hai, main uska waqt makhfi rakhna chaahta hoon taake har nafs ko (uski) koshish ka badlah diya jaaye.

verses.arabic: فَلَا يَصُدَّنَّكَ عَنْهَا مَن لَّا يُؤْمِنُ بِهَا وَٱتَّبَعَ هَوَىٰهُ فَتَرْدَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Falaa yaşuddannaka 'anhaa mal-laa yu'minu bihaa wattaba'a hawaahu fatardaa.
verses.translation: Lehaaza USS (fikr-e- aakhirat) se tujhe woh shakhs rokne na paaye jo uss par eemaan nahin rakhta, aur apni khaaheshaat ki pairwi karta hai, warnah tu (bhi) halaak ho jaayega.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Mulaahazah ho: (Surah Maryam:19/59)

verses.arabic: وَمَا تِلْكَ بِيَمِينِكَ يَـٰمُوسَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Wa maa tilka biyameenika yaa Moosaa.
verses.translation: Aur aye Moosa! Yeh tere daayein haath mein kiya hai?

verses.arabic: قَالَ هِىَ عَصَاىَ أَتَوَكَّؤُا۟ عَلَيْهَا وَأَهُشُّ بِهَا عَلَىٰ غَنَمِى وَلِىَ فِيهَا مَـَٔارِبُ أُخْرَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Qaala hiya 'aşaaya 'atawakka'u 'alayhaa wa 'ahushshu bihaa 'alaa ghanamee wa liya feehaa ma'aaribu 'ukhraa.
verses.translation: Usne kaha: yeh meri laathhi hai, main iss par tek lagaata hoon aur isse apni bakriyon ke liye patte jhaadta hoon aur iss mein mere liye aur bhi kaam hai.

verses.arabic: قَالَ أَلْقِهَا يَـٰمُوسَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Qaala 'alqihaa yaa Moosaa.
verses.translation: Allah ne farmaya: aye Moosa! Use phenk de.

verses.arabic: فَأَلْقَىٰهَا فَإِذَا هِىَ حَيَّةٌۭ تَسْعَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Fa'alqaahaa fa'izaa hiya hayyatun tas'aa.
verses.translation: Phir jab usne use phenka, tab woh daudta huwa saanp ban gaya.

verses.arabic: قَالَ خُذْهَا وَلَا تَخَفْۖ سَنُعِيدُهَا سِيرَتَهَا ٱلْأُولَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Qaala khuzhaa wa laa takhaf sanu'eeduhaa seeratahal-'oolaa.
verses.translation: Farmaya: use pakadle aur mat dar, hum use uski pahli haalat mein le aayenge.

verses.arabic: وَٱضْمُمْ يَدَكَ إِلَىٰ جَنَاحِكَ تَخْرُجْ بَيْضَآءَ مِنْ غَيْرِ سُوٓءٍ ءَايَةً أُخْرَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Wadmum yadaka 'ilaa janaahika takhruj baydaaa'a min ghayri sooo'in 'Aayatan-'ukhraa.
verses.translation: Aur apna haath apni baghal se laga, woh baghair kisi marz ke chamakta huwa safed niklega, (yeh) doosri nishaani hai.

verses.arabic: لِنُرِيَكَ مِنْ ءَايَـٰتِنَا ٱلْكُبْرَى
verses.transliteration: Linuriyaka min 'Aayaatinal-Kubraa.
verses.translation: Taake hum tujhe apni kuchh badi badi nishaaniyaan dikhaayein.

verses.arabic: ٱذْهَبْ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّهُۥ طَغَىٰ
verses.transliteration: 'Izhab 'ilaa Fir'awna 'innahoo taghaa.
verses.translation: Tu fir'aun ki taraf jaa, beshak woh sarkash ho gaya hai.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Fir'aun ka zikr isliye kiya ke usne Moosa عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام ki qaum Bani Israyeel ko ghulaam bana rakkha tha aur uss par tarah tarah ke zulm rawa rakhta tha. elaawah azin uski sarkash-o-tughyaani bhi bahut badh gayi thi hatta ke woh da'wa kare laga 'Main tumhaara baland tar rab hoon'

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱشْرَحْ لِى صَدْرِى
verses.transliteration: Qaala Rabbish-rah lee şadree.
verses.translation: Moosa ne kaha: mere rab! Mere liye mera seenah khol de.

verses.arabic: وَيَسِّرْ لِىٓ أَمْرِى
verses.transliteration: Wa yassir leee 'amree.
verses.translation: Aur mere liye mera kaam aasaan kar de

verses.arabic: وَٱحْلُلْ عُقْدَةًۭ مِّن لِّسَانِى
verses.transliteration: Wahlul 'uqdatam-mil- lisaanee.
verses.translation: Aur meri zabaan ki girah khol de.

verses.arabic: يَفْقَهُوا۟ قَوْلِى
verses.transliteration: Yafqahoo qawlee.
verses.translation: (Taake) woh meri baat samajh sakein.

verses.arabic: وَٱجْعَل لِّى وَزِيرًۭا مِّنْ أَهْلِى
verses.transliteration: Waj'al lee wazeeram- min 'ahlee.
verses.translation: Aur mere liye mere kunbe mein se ek wazeer banaade.

verses.arabic: هَـٰرُونَ أَخِى
verses.transliteration: Haaroona 'akhee.
verses.translation: (Ya'ni) mere bhaayi Haaroon ko.

verses.arabic: ٱشْدُدْ بِهِۦٓ أَزْرِى
verses.transliteration: 'Ushdud biheee 'azree
verses.translation: Uske saath meri kamar mazboot kar de.

verses.arabic: وَأَشْرِكْهُ فِىٓ أَمْرِى
verses.transliteration: Wa 'ashrikhu feee 'amree.
verses.translation: Aur use mere kaam (nabuwwat) mein shareek karde.

verses.arabic: كَىْ نُسَبِّحَكَ كَثِيرًۭا
verses.transliteration: Kay nusabbihaka kaseeraa.
verses.translation: Taake hum teri bakasrat tasbeeh karein.

verses.arabic: وَنَذْكُرَكَ كَثِيرًا
verses.transliteration: Wa nazkuraka kaseeraa.
verses.translation: Aur hum tujhe bakasrat yaad karein.

verses.arabic: إِنَّكَ كُنتَ بِنَا بَصِيرًا
verses.transliteration: 'Innaka kunta binaa baseeraa.
verses.translation: Beshak tu humein khoob dekhta hai.

verses.arabic: قَالَ قَدْ أُوتِيتَ سُؤْلَكَ يَـٰمُوسَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Qaala qad 'ooteeta su'laka yaa-Moosaa.
verses.translation: Allah ne farmaya: aye Moosa! Jo kuchh toone maanga, tujhe diya jaata hai.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ مَنَنَّا عَلَيْكَ مَرَّةً أُخْرَىٰٓ
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad manannaa 'alayka marratan 'ukhraaa.
verses.translation: Hum tujh par ek baar aur bhi ehsaan kar chuke hain.

verses.arabic: إِذْ أَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰٓ أُمِّكَ مَا يُوحَىٰٓ
verses.transliteration: 'Iz 'awhaynaaa 'ilaaa 'ummika maa yoohaaa.
verses.translation: Jab humne teri maan ko woh ilhaam kiya tha jo (ab) wahi ki jaati hai.

verses.arabic: أَنِ ٱقْذِفِيهِ فِى ٱلتَّابُوتِ فَٱقْذِفِيهِ فِى ٱلْيَمِّ فَلْيُلْقِهِ ٱلْيَمُّ بِٱلسَّاحِلِ يَأْخُذْهُ عَدُوٌّۭ لِّى وَعَدُوٌّۭ لَّهُۥۚ وَأَلْقَيْتُ عَلَيْكَ مَحَبَّةًۭ مِّنِّى وَلِتُصْنَعَ عَلَىٰ عَيْنِىٓ
verses.transliteration: Aniq-zifeehi fit- Taabooti faqzifeehi fil- yammi falyulqihil-yammu bissaahili ya'khuzhu 'aduwwul-lee wa 'aduwwul-lah; wa 'alqaytu 'alayka mahabbatam-minnee wa lituşna'a 'alaa 'ayneee.
verses.translation: Yeh ke tu uss (Moosa) ko sandooq mein daal, phir sandooq darya mein daal de phir darya use saahil par laa daalega jise mera aur uska dushman uthhaa lega aur main ne apni taraf se tujh par mohabbat daal di aur yeh (isliye) ke meri aankhon ke saamne teri parwarish ho.

verses.arabic: إِذْ تَمْشِىٓ أُخْتُكَ فَتَقُولُ هَلْ أَدُلُّكُمْ عَلَىٰ مَن يَكْفُلُهُۥۖ فَرَجَعْنَـٰكَ إِلَىٰٓ أُمِّكَ كَىْ تَقَرَّ عَيْنُهَا وَلَا تَحْزَنَۚ وَقَتَلْتَ نَفْسًۭا فَنَجَّيْنَـٰكَ مِنَ ٱلْغَمِّ وَفَتَنَّـٰكَ فُتُونًۭاۚ فَلَبِثْتَ سِنِينَ فِىٓ أَهْلِ مَدْيَنَ ثُمَّ جِئْتَ عَلَىٰ قَدَرٍۢ يَـٰمُوسَىٰ
verses.transliteration: 'Iz tamsheee 'ukhtuka fataqoolu hal 'adullukum 'alaa mañy-yakfuluhoo faraja'naaka 'ilaaa 'ummika kay taqarra 'aynuhaa wa laa tahzan; wa qatalta nafsan fanajjaynaaka minal- ghammi wa fatannaaka futoonaa; falabista sineena feee 'ahli Madyana summa ji'ta 'alaa qadariny-yaa Moosaa.
verses.translation: Jab teri bahan chal rahi thi aur kah rahi thi: kiya main tumhein uska bataaoun jo uski kifaalat kare? Phir humne tujhe teri maan ke- paas lauta diya taake uski aankh thhandi rahe aur gham na khaaye, aur toone ek shakhs ko qatl kiya to humne tujhe uss gham se najaat di aur humne tujhe khoob aazmaaya, phir tu ahl-e- madyan mein kayi saal thhahra rahaa, phir aye Moosa! tu taqdeer-e-ilaahi ke mutaabiq yahaan aaya.

verses.arabic: وَٱصْطَنَعْتُكَ لِنَفْسِى
verses.transliteration: Wastana tuka linafsee.
verses.translation: Aur main ne tujhe apni zaat ke liye khaas kar liya.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Ya'ni main ne tujhe apni Wahi aur resaalat ke liye chun liya hai ya main ne tujh ko apne liye paida kiya hai ya main ne tujhe mazboot banaaya hai aur tujhe sikhaya taake tu mere bandon ko mere amr- o-nahi (ahkaam) pahunchaaye.' (Tafseer Al-Qurtubi:11/198)

verses.arabic: ٱذْهَبْ أَنتَ وَأَخُوكَ بِـَٔايَـٰتِى وَلَا تَنِيَا فِى ذِكْرِى
verses.transliteration: 'Izhab 'anta wa 'akhooka bi'Aayaatee wa laa taniyaa fee zikree.
verses.translation: Tu aur tera bhaai meri nishaaniyaan le kar jaao, tum donon meri yaad mein susti na karna.

verses.arabic: ٱذْهَبَآ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّهُۥ طَغَىٰ
verses.transliteration: 'Izhabaaa 'ilaa Fir'awna 'innahoo taghaa.
verses.translation: Tum donon fira'un ki taraf jaao, bilaashubah woh sarkash ho gaya hai.

verses.arabic: فَقُولَا لَهُۥ قَوْلًۭا لَّيِّنًۭا لَّعَلَّهُۥ يَتَذَكَّرُ أَوْ يَخْشَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Faqoolaa lahoo qawlal-layyinal- la'allahoo yatazakkaru 'aw yakhshaa.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh tum donon usse narm baat kahna, shaayad ke woh naseehat pakde ya dare.

verses.arabic: قَالَا رَبَّنَآ إِنَّنَا نَخَافُ أَن يَفْرُطَ عَلَيْنَآ أَوْ أَن يَطْغَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Qaalaa Rabbanaaa 'innanaa nakhaafu 'añy- yafruta 'alaynaaa 'aw 'any-yatghaa.
verses.translation: Un donon ne kaha: aye hamaare rab! Beshak hum to darte hain ke woh hum par ziyaadati kare ya sar kasha kare.

verses.arabic: قَالَ لَا تَخَافَآ إِنَّنِى مَعَكُمَآ أَسْمَعُ وَأَرَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Qaala laa takhaafaaa 'innanee ma'akumaaa 'asma'u wa 'araa.
verses.translation: Allah ne farmaya: tum donon mat daro, bilaa shubah main tum donon ke saath hoon, main suntan aur dekht hoon.

verses.arabic: فَأْتِيَاهُ فَقُولَآ إِنَّا رَسُولَا رَبِّكَ فَأَرْسِلْ مَعَنَا بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ وَلَا تُعَذِّبْهُمْۖ قَدْ جِئْنَـٰكَ بِـَٔايَةٍۢ مِّن رَّبِّكَ وَٱلسَّلَـٰمُ عَلَىٰ مَنِ ٱتَّبَعَ ٱلْهُدَىٰٓ
verses.transliteration: Fa'tiyaahu faqoolaaa 'innaa Rasoolaa Rabbika fa'arsil ma'anaa Baneee 'Israaa'eela wa laa tu'azzibhum qad ji'naaka bi-'Aayatim-mir-Rabbika wassalaamu 'alaa manit-tabaʻal-hudaa.
verses.translation: Lehaaza tum donon uske paas jaao aur kaho: beshak hum tere rab ke Rasool hain, chunaancheh tu Bani Israyeel ko hamaare saath bhej aur unhein mat sata, yaqeenan hum tere paas tere rab ki taraf se nishaani laaye hain aur jo hidaayat ka itteba' kare uss par salaamti hai.

verses.arabic: إِنَّا قَدْ أُوحِىَ إِلَيْنَآ أَنَّ ٱلْعَذَابَ عَلَىٰ مَن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.transliteration: 'Innaa qad 'oohiya 'ilaynaaa 'annal-'azaaba 'alaa man kazzaba wa tawallaa.
verses.translation: Bilaa shubah hamaari taraf wahi ki gayi hai ke jo (haq ki) takzeeb kare aur munh pherle yaqeenan uss par azaab hai.

verses.arabic: قَالَ فَمَن رَّبُّكُمَا يَـٰمُوسَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Qaala famar- Rabbukumaa yaa-Moosaa.
verses.translation: Fira'un ne kaha: aye Moosa! Tum donon ka rab kaun hai?

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبُّنَا ٱلَّذِىٓ أَعْطَىٰ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ خَلْقَهُۥ ثُمَّ هَدَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Qaala Rabbunal- lazeee 'a'taa kulla shay'in khalqahoo summa hadaa.
verses.translation: Moosa ne kaha: Hamaara rab woh hai jisne har cheez ko uski shakl-o- soorat di, phir hidaayat di.

verses.arabic: قَالَ فَمَا بَالُ ٱلْقُرُونِ ٱلْأُولَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Qaala famaa baalul- quroonil-'oolaa.
verses.translation: Fira'un ne kaha: agli ummaton ka kiya haal hai?

verses.arabic: قَالَ عِلْمُهَا عِندَ رَبِّى فِى كِتَـٰبٍۢۖ لَّا يَضِلُّ رَبِّى وَلَا يَنسَى
verses.transliteration: Qaala ilmuhaa 'inda Rabbee fee kitaab; laa yadillu Rabbee wa laa yansaa.
verses.translation: Moosa ne kaha: unka ilm mere rab ke paas ek kitab (lauh-e-mahfooz) mein hai, mera rab na bhatakta hai aur na bhoolta hai.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ مَهْدًۭا وَسَلَكَ لَكُمْ فِيهَا سُبُلًۭا وَأَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءًۭ فَأَخْرَجْنَا بِهِۦٓ أَزْوَٰجًۭا مِّن نَّبَاتٍۢ شَتَّىٰ
verses.transliteration: 'Allazee ja'ala lakumul-'arda mahdanw-wa-salaka lakum feehaa subulañw- wa 'anzala minas- samaaa'i maaa'an fa'akhrajnaa biheee 'azwaajam-min nabaatin shattaa.
verses.translation: Woh zaat jisne tumhaare liye zameen ko bichhauna banaaya aur tumhaare chalne ke liye uss mein raaste banaaye aur aasmaan se paani naazil kiya phir humne uske zariye se kayi qism ki mukhtalif nabaa taat nikaalin.

verses.arabic: كُلُوا۟ وَٱرْعَوْا أَنْعَـٰمَكُمْۗ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَءَايَـٰتٍۢ لِّأُو۟لِى ٱلنُّهَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Kuloo war'aw 'an'aamakum; 'inna fee zaalika la-'Aayaatil- li'ulin-nuhaa.
verses.translation: Tum khaao aur apne maweshiyon ko charaao, beshak uss mein aql mandon ke liye bahut si nishaaniyaan hain.

verses.arabic: مِنْهَا خَلَقْنَـٰكُمْ وَفِيهَا نُعِيدُكُمْ وَمِنْهَا نُخْرِجُكُمْ تَارَةً أُخْرَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Minhaa khalaqnaakum wa feehaa nu'eedukum wa minhaa nukhrijukum taaratan 'ukhraa.
verses.translation: Humne tumhein usi zameen se paida kiya aur usi mein tumhein lautaayenge aur usi mein se tumhein ek baar phir nikaalenge¹
verses.deepMeaning: Ba'z rivayaat mein dafnaane ke ba'd teen lapein mitti daalte waqt iss aayat ka padhna manqool hai. lekin sanadan yeh rivaayaat zayeef hain. taahum aayat ke baghair teen lapein daalne waali rivaayat, jo Ibne Maajah mein hai, sahih hai. Ulama ne ise mustahab qaraar diya hai. (Irwaaul ghulail: 251, jild:3, page:200)

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَرَيْنَـٰهُ ءَايَـٰتِنَا كُلَّهَا فَكَذَّبَ وَأَبَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad 'araynaahu 'Aayaatinaa kullahaa fakazzaba wa 'abaa.
verses.translation: Aur humne uss fira'un ko apni sab nishaaniyaan dikha din phir bhi usne jhutlaaya aur inkaar kiya.

verses.arabic: قَالَ أَجِئْتَنَا لِتُخْرِجَنَا مِنْ أَرْضِنَا بِسِحْرِكَ يَـٰمُوسَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Qaala 'aji'tanaa litukhrijanaa min 'ardinaa bisihrika yaa Moosaa.
verses.translation: Kahne laga: aye Moosa! Kiya tu hamaare paas isi liye aaya hai ke apne jaadu se humein hamaari sar zameen se nikaal de?

verses.arabic: فَلَنَأْتِيَنَّكَ بِسِحْرٍۢ مِّثْلِهِۦ فَٱجْعَلْ بَيْنَنَا وَبَيْنَكَ مَوْعِدًۭا لَّا نُخْلِفُهُۥ نَحْنُ وَلَآ أَنتَ مَكَانًۭا سُوًۭى
verses.transliteration: Falana'tiyannaka bisihrim-mislihee faj'al baynanaa wa baynaka maw'idal-laa nukhlifuhoo nahnu wa laaa 'anta makaanan suwaa.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh hum tere (muqaabil) ss jaisa hi jaadu laayenge, lehaaza tu hamaare aur apne darmiyaan ek wa'dah thhahra, na hum uski khilaaf warzi karein aur na tu, ek hamwaar maidaan mein.

verses.arabic: قَالَ مَوْعِدُكُمْ يَوْمُ ٱلزِّينَةِ وَأَن يُحْشَرَ ٱلنَّاسُ ضُحًۭى
verses.transliteration: Qaala maw'idukum yawmuz-zeenati wa 'any-yuhsharan-naasu duhaa.
verses.translation: Moosa ne kaha: tumhaara wa'dah zeenat (jashn) ka din hai aur yeh ke log din chadhe ekatthe kiye jaayein.

verses.arabic: فَتَوَلَّىٰ فِرْعَوْنُ فَجَمَعَ كَيْدَهُۥ ثُمَّ أَتَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Fatawallaa Fir'awnu fajama'a kaydahoo summa 'ataa.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh Fira'un (mahal mein) lauta aur apni saari chaalein jama' keen, phir (maidaan mein) aa gaya.

verses.arabic: قَالَ لَهُم مُّوسَىٰ وَيْلَكُمْ لَا تَفْتَرُوا۟ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًۭا فَيُسْحِتَكُم بِعَذَابٍۢ وَقَدْ خَابَ مَنِ ٱفْتَرَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Qaala lahum Moosaa waylakum laa taftaroo 'alal-laahi kaziban fayushitakum bi'azaab; wa qad khaaba manif- taraa.
verses.translation: Moosa ne unse kaha: tumhaare liye halaakat ho! tum Allah par jhoot na ghado, warnah woh azaab se tumhein tabaah kar dega aur jisne jhoot ghada yaqeenan woh naa kaam raha.

verses.arabic: فَتَنَٰزَعُوٓا۟ أَمْرَهُم بَيْنَهُمْ وَأَسَرُّوا۟ ٱلنَّجْوَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Fatanaaza'ooo 'amrahum baynahum wa 'asarrun-najwaa.
verses.translation: Phir unhon ne aapas mein apne mu'aamle mein baahum ikhtelaaf kiya aur raaz daari se mashwarah kiya.

verses.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنْ هَـٰذَٰنِ لَسَـٰحِرَٰنِ يُرِيدَانِ أَن يُخْرِجَاكُم مِّنْ أَرْضِكُم بِسِحْرِهِمَا وَيَذْهَبَا بِطَرِيقَتِكُمُ ٱلْمُثْلَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Qaalooo 'in haazaani lasaahiraani yureedaani 'añy-yukhrijaakum min 'ardikum bisihrihimaa wa yazhabaa bitareeqatikumul- muslaa.
verses.translation: Woh bole: bilaa shubah yeh donon jaadu gar hain, yeh chaahte hain ke apne jaadu (ke zor) se tumhein tumhaari sar zameen se nikaal dein aur tumhaara umdah nizaam tabaah-o- barbaad kar dein.

verses.arabic: فَأَجْمِعُوا۟ كَيْدَكُمْ ثُمَّ ٱئْتُوا۟ صَفًّۭاۚ وَقَدْ أَفْلَحَ ٱلْيَوْمَ مَنِ ٱسْتَعْلَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Fa'ajmi'oo kaydakum summa-too șaffaa; wa qad 'aflahal-yawma manis-taʻlaa.
verses.translation: Lehaaza apni tamaam tadbeerein pukhtah karlo phir saff baandh kar aa jaao aur jo (aaj) ghaalib raha woh kaamyaab thhahra.

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ يَـٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِمَّآ أَن تُلْقِىَ وَإِمَّآ أَن نَّكُونَ أَوَّلَ مَنْ أَلْقَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo yaa Moosaaa 'immaaa 'an tulqiya wa 'immaaa 'an nakoona 'awwala man 'alqaa.
verses.translation: (Un jaadu garon ne) kaha: aye Moosa! Ya to tu daal ya hum hi hon pahle daalne waale?

verses.arabic: قَالَ بَلْ أَلْقُوا۟ۖ فَإِذَا حِبَالُهُمْ وَعِصِيُّهُمْ يُخَيَّلُ إِلَيْهِ مِن سِحْرِهِمْ أَنَّهَا تَسْعَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Qaala bal 'alqoo fa'izaa hibaaluhum wa 'işiyyuhum yukhayyalu 'ilayhi min sihrihim 'annahaa tas'aa.
verses.translation: Moosa ne kaha: balke tumhi daalo, phir naagahaan unke jaadu ki wajah se Moosa ko yeh khayaal guzarne laga ke unki rassiyaan aur unki laathhiyaan bilaa shubah daud rahi hain.

verses.arabic: فَأَوْجَسَ فِى نَفْسِهِۦ خِيفَةًۭ مُّوسَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Fa'awjasa fee nafsihee kheefatam- Moosaa.
verses.translation: Phir Moosa ne apne dil mein khauf mahsoos kiya.

verses.arabic: قُلْنَا لَا تَخَفْ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Qulnaa laa takhaf 'innaka 'antal-'a'laa.
verses.translation: Hum ne kaha: Khauf na khaa, beshak tu hi ghaalib rahega.

verses.arabic: وَأَلْقِ مَا فِى يَمِينِكَ تَلْقَفْ مَا صَنَعُوٓا۟ۖ إِنَّمَا صَنَعُوا۟ كَيْدُ سَـٰحِرٍۢ وَلَا يُفْلِحُ ٱلسَّـٰحِرُ حَيْثُ أَتَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'alqi maa fee yameenika talqaf maa sana'ooo; 'innamaa şana'oo kaydu saahir; wa laa yuflihus-saahiru haysu 'ataa.
verses.translation: Aur jo (laathhi) tere daayein haath mein hai use daal de, woh nigal jaayegi suko jo kuchh unhon ne banaaya hai, bas unhon ne to jaadu gar ka fareb taraasha hai, aur jaadu gar jahaan se bhi aaye kaamyaab nahin hota.

verses.arabic: فَألْقِيَ السَّحَرَةُ سُجَّدًا قَالُوا آمَنَّا بِرَبِّ هَرُونَ وَ مُوسَى
verses.transliteration: Fa'ulqiyas-saharatu sujjadan qaalooo 'aamannaa bi-Rabbi Haaroona wa Moosaa.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh jaadu gar be ikhtiyaar sajde mein gir gaye aur kahne lage: hum Haaroon aur Moosa ke rab par eemaan laaye.

verses.arabic: قَالَ ءَامَنتُمْ لَهُۥ قَبْلَ أَنْ ءَاذَنَ لَكُمْۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكَبِيرُكُمُ ٱلَّذِى عَلَّمَكُمُ ٱلسِّحْرَ فَلَأُقَطِّعَنَّ أَيْدِيَكُمْ وَأَرْجُلَكُم مِّنْ خِلَـٰفٍۢ وَلَأُصَلِّبَنَّكُمْ فِى جُذُوعِ ٱلنَّخْلِ وَلَتَعْلَمُنَّ أَيُّنَآ أَشَدُّ عَذَابًۭا وَأَبْقَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Qaala 'aamantum lahoo qabla 'an 'aazana lakum; 'innahoo lakabeerukumul- lazee 'allamakumus-sihra fala'ugatti anna 'aydiyakum wa 'arjulakum min khilaafinw-wa la'uşallibannakum fee juzoo 'in nakhli wa lataʻlamunna 'ayyunaaa 'ashaddu 'azaabañw-wa 'abqaa.
verses.translation: Fira'un ne kaha: kiya meri ijaazat se pahle hi tum uss par eemaan laaye ho? yaqeenan yeh tumhaara bada hai jisne tumhein jaadu sikhaaya hai, lehaaza main tumhaare haath aur paaon mukhaalif simton se zaroor katwaaounga aur tumhein khujoor ke tanon par zaroor sooli dunga aur tumhein zaroor maloom ho jaayega ke hum mein se kiska azaab ziyaadah sakht aur der pa hai.

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ لَن نُّؤْثِرَكَ عَلَىٰ مَا جَآءَنَا مِنَ ٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ وَٱلَّذِى فَطَرَنَاۖ فَٱقْضِ مَآ أَنتَ قَاضٍۖ إِنَّمَا تَقْضِى هَـٰذِهِ ٱلْحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنْيَآ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo lan nu'siraka 'alaa maa jaaa'anaa minal-bayyinaati wallazee fataranaa faqdi maaa 'anta qaadin 'innamaa taqdee haazihil-hayaatad- dunyaa.
verses.translation: Woh kahne lage: hum tujhe kabhi tarjeeh nahin denge un waazeh dalaayel par jo hamaare paas aa chuke aur na uss zaat par jisne humein paida kiya, lehaaza tu jo kar sakta hai kar guzar, bas tu to iss dunyaawi zindagi hi mein hukm chala sakta hai.

verses.arabic: إِنَّآ ءَامَنَّا بِرَبِّنَا لِيَغْفِرَ لَنَا خَطَـٰيَـٰنَا وَمَآ أَكْرَهْتَنَا عَلَيْهِ مِنَ ٱلسِّحْرِۗ وَٱللَّهُ خَيْرٌۭ وَأَبْقَىٰٓ
verses.transliteration: 'Innaaa 'aamannaa bi-Rabbinaa liyaghfira lanaa khataayaanaa wa maaa' akrahtanaa 'alayhi minas-sihr; wallaahu khayrunw-wa 'abqaa.
verses.translation: Yaqeenan hum apne rab par eemaan laaye hain taake woh bakhsh de hamaari khataayein aur woh jaadu bhi jis par toone humein majboor kiya aur Allah bahut behtar aur bahut baaqi rahne waala hai.

verses.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ مَن يَأْتِ رَبَّهُۥ مُجْرِمًۭا فَإِنَّ لَهُۥ جَهَنَّمَ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحْيَىٰ
verses.transliteration: 'Innahoo many-ya'ti Rabbahoo mujriman fa'inna lahoo Jahannama laa yamootu feehaa wa laa yahyaa.¹
verses.translation: 'Innahoo many-ya'ti Rabbahoo mujriman fa'inna lahoo Jahannama laa yamootu feehaa wa laa yahyaa.
verses.deepMeaning: Ya'ni azaab se tang aa kar maut ki aarzu karenge, to maut nahin aayegi aur raat din azaab mein mubtala rahna, khaane peene ko zaqqoom jaisa talkh darakht aur jahannamiyon ke jimson se nichda huwa khoon aur peep milna, yeh koyi zindagi hogi? Allahumma Ajirna min azaabi jahannam.

verses.arabic: وَمَن يَأْتِهِۦ مُؤْمِنًۭا قَدْ عَمِلَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمُ ٱلدَّرَجَـٰتُ ٱلْعُلَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Wa mañy-ya'tihee mu'minan qad 'amilas- saalihaati fa'ulaaa'ika lahumud-darajaatul-'ulaa.
verses.translation: wa mañy-ya'tihee mu'minan qad 'amilaş- saalihaati fa'ulaaa'ika lahumud-darajaatul-'ulaa

verses.arabic: جَنَّـٰتُ عَدْنٍۢ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۚ وَذَٰلِكَ جَزَآءُ مَن تَزَكَّىٰ
verses.transliteration: Jannaatu 'Adnin tajree min tahtihal- 'anhaaru khaalideena feehaa; wa zaalika jazaaa'u man tazakkaa.
verses.translation: (Ya'ni) sada rahne waale baaghaat, jin ke neeche nahrein jaari hain, woh un mein hameshah rahenge aur yahi hai jaza uski jo (gunahon se) paak huwa.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Ya'ni jo eemaan laane ke ba'd uske taqaaze bhi pure karenge ya'ni a'amaal-e-saaleha ko ikhtiyaar aur apne nafs ko gunaahon ki aaludgi se paak kareinge kyun ke eemaan aqeedah-o-amal donon ke majmoo'ye ka naam hai.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنْ أَسْرِ بِعِبَادِى فَٱضْرِبْ لَهُمْ طَرِيقًۭا فِى ٱلْبَحْرِ يَبَسًۭا لَّا تَخَافُ دَرَكًۭا وَلَا تَخْشَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad 'awhaynaaa 'ilaa Moosaaa 'an 'asri bi'ibaadee fadrib lahum tareeqan fil-bahri yabasal-laa takhaafu darakanw-wa laa takhshaa.
verses.translation: Aur bilaa shubah humne Moosa ki taraf wahi ki ke raat ko mere bande nikaal le chal phir unke liye samandar mein khushk raastah bana jab ke tujhe na to pakde jaane ka khauf hoga aur na (doobne ka) dar)

verses.arabic: فَأَتْبَعَهُمْ فِرْعَوْنُ بِجُنُودِهِۦ فَغَشِيَهُم مِّنَ ٱلْيَمِّ مَا غَشِيَهُمْ
verses.transliteration: Fa'atba'ahum Fir'awnu bijunoodihee faghashiyahum minal- yammi maa ghashiyahum.
verses.translation: Phir Fira'un ne apne lashkar ke saath unka peechha kiya to unehin paani ne gher liya jaise gherne ka haq tha.

verses.arabic: وَأَضَلَّ فِرْعَوْنُ قَوْمَهُۥ وَمَا هَدَىٰ
verses.transliteration: wa 'adalla fir'awnu qawmahoo wa maa hadaa.
verses.translation: Aur Fira'un ne apni qaum ko gumraah kiya aur (seedhi) raah na dikhaayi.

verses.arabic: يَـٰبَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ قَدْ أَنجَيْنَـٰكُم مِّنْ عَدُوِّكُمْ وَوَٰعَدْنَـٰكُمْ جَانِبَ ٱلطُّورِ ٱلْأَيْمَنَ وَنَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْكُمُ ٱلْمَنَّ وَٱلسَّلْوَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Yaa Baneee 'Israaa'eela qad 'anjaynaakum min 'aduwwikum wa waa'adnaakum jaanibat- Tooril-'aymana wa nazzalnaa 'alaykumul- Manna was-Salwaa.
verses.translation: Aye bani Israyeel! Humne tumhein tumhaare dushman se najaat di, aur humne tumse toor ki daayein jaanib (tauraat dene) ka wa'dah kiya aur humne tum par Mann aur Salwa naazil kiya.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Mulaahaza ho haashyah: (Surah Baqarah:2/57)

verses.arabic: كُلُوا۟ مِن طَيِّبَٰتِ مَا رَزَقْنَـٰكُمْ وَلَا تَطْغَوْا۟ فِيهِ فَيَحِلَّ عَلَيْكُمْ غَضَبِىۖ وَمَن يَحْلِلْ عَلَيْهِ غَضَبِى فَقَدْ هَوَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Kuloo min tayyibaati maa razaqnaakum wa laa tatghaw feehi fayahilla 'alaykum ghadabee wa mañy- yahlil 'alayhi ghadabee faqad hawaa.
verses.translation: Aur humne tumhein jin paakeezah cheezon se rizq diya hai unse khaao aur tum uss mein sar kash na karo ke tum par mera ghazab utre aur jis par mera ghazab utra to yaqeenan woh tabaah ho gaya.

verses.arabic: وَإِنِّى لَغَفَّارٌۭ لِّمَن تَابَ وَءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَـٰلِحًۭا ثُمَّ ٱهْتَدَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'innee la- Ghaffaarul-liman taaba wa 'aamana wa 'amila saalihan summah-tadaa.
verses.translation: Aur beshak main bahut bakhshne waala hoon uske liye jo taubah kare, eemaan laaye aur nek amal kare, phir hidaayat par rahe.

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَعْجَلَكَ عَن قَوْمِكَ يَـٰمُوسَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Wa maaa 'a'jalaka 'an qawmika yaa Moosaa.
verses.translation: Aur Aye Moosa! Kaunsi cheez tujhe teri qaum se jaldi le aayi thi?

verses.arabic: قَالَ هُمْ أُو۟لَآءِ عَلَىٰٓ أَثَرِى وَعَجِلْتُ إِلَيْكَ رَبِّ لِتَرْضَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Qaala hum 'ulaaa'i 'alaaa 'asaree wa 'ajiltu 'ilayka Rabbi litardaa.
verses.translation: Usne kaha: woh log mere peechhe hain aur aye mere rab! Main ne teri taraf jaldi ki taake tu raazi ho Jaaye.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Samandar paar karne ke ba'd Moosa عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام bani Israyeel ke sar bar aawardah logon ke saath kooh-e-toor ki taraf chale. Lekin rab ke shauq-e-mulaqaat mein tez raftaari se saathiyon ko peechhe chhod kar akele hi toor par pahunch gaye, Allah Ta'ala ke sawaal karne par jawaab diya: mujhe to teri raza ki talab aur uski jaldi thi, woh log mere peechhe peechhe hi aa rahe hain. baqaul ba'z iska matlab yeh nahin ke mere peechhe aa rahe hain balke yeh hai ke woh mere peechhe kooh-e-toor ke qareeb hi hain aur wahaan meri waapsi ke muntazir hain.

verses.arabic: قَالَ فَإِنَّا قَدْ فَتَنَّا قَوْمَكَ مِنۢ بَعْدِكَ وَأَضَلَّهُمُ ٱلسَّامِرِىُّ
verses.transliteration: Qaala fa'innaa qad fatannaa qawmaka mim ba'dika wa 'adallahumus-Saamiriyy.
verses.translation: Allah ne farmaya: chunaancheh beshak humne tere ba'd teri qaum ko ek aazmaayish mein daal diya aur unhein Saamri ne gumraah kar diya.

verses.arabic: فَرَجَعَ مُوسَىٰٓ إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦ غَضْبَـٰنَ أَسِفًۭاۚ قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ أَلَمْ يَعِدْكُمْ رَبُّكُمْ وَعْدًا حَسَنًاۚ أَفَطَالَ عَلَيْكُمُ ٱلْعَهْدُ أَمْ أَرَدتُّمْ أَن يَحِلَّ عَلَيْكُمْ غَضَبٌۭ مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ فَأَخْلَفْتُم مَّوْعِدِى
verses.transliteration: Faraja'a Moosaaa 'ilaa qawmihee ghadbaana 'asifaa; qaala yaa qawmi 'alam ya'idkum Rabbukum wa'dan hasanaa; 'afataala 'alaykumul- 'ahdu 'am 'arattum 'any- yahilla 'alaykum ghadabum-mir-Rabbikum fa'akhlaftum maw'idee
verses.translation: Phir Moosa apni qaum ki taraf ghazabnaak aur ghamgheen lauta (aur) kahne laga: aye meri qaum! Kiya tumhaare rab ne tumhein achchha wa'dah na diya tha? kiya phir tum par ahad taweel ho gaya tha ya tumne chaaha ke tum par tumhaare rab ka ghazab utre? Lehaaza tumne mere wa'de ki khilaaf warzi ki.

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ مَآ أَخْلَفْنَا مَوْعِدَكَ بِمَلْكِنَا وَلَـٰكِنَّا حُمِّلْنَآ أَوْزَارًۭا مِّن زِينَةِ ٱلْقَوْمِ فَقَذَفْنَـٰهَا فَكَذَٰلِكَ أَلْقَى ٱلسَّامِرِىُّ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo maaa 'akhlafnaa maw'idaka bimalkinaa wa laakinnaa hummilnaaa 'awzaaram-min zeenatil- qawmi faqazafnaahaa fakazaalika 'alqas- Saamiriyy.
verses.translation: Woh kahne lage: humne tere wa'de ki apne ikhtiyaar se khilaaf warzi nahin ki lekin humse qaum-e-fira'un ke zewraat ka bojh uthhwaaya gaya tha, to humne woh (aag mein) daal diye aur isi tarah Saamri ne bhi (zewar) daala.

verses.arabic: فَأَخْرَجَ لَهُمْ عِجْلًۭا جَسَدًۭا لَّهُۥ خُوَارٌۭ فَقَالُوا۟ هَـٰذَآ إِلَـٰهُكُمْ وَإِلَـٰهُ مُوسَىٰ فَنَسِىَ
verses.transliteration: Fa'akhraja lahum 'ijlan jasadal-lahoo khuwaarun faqaaloo haazaaa ilaahukum wa 'ilaahu Moosaa fanasee.
verses.translation: Phir usne unke liye ek bachhda, ek dhad bana daala, jiski aawaaz gaaye ki si thi, phir woh (log) kahne lage: yahi hai tumhaara ilaah aur Moosa ka ilaah, woh to bhool gaya hai.

verses.arabic: أَفَلَا يَرَوْنَ أَلَّا يَرْجِعُ إِلَيْهِمْ قَوْلًۭا وَلَا يَمْلِكُ لَهُمْ ضَرًّۭا وَلَا نَفْعًا
verses.transliteration: 'Afalaa yarawna 'allaa yarji'u 'ilayhim qawlañw-wa laa yamliku lahum darrañw- wa laa nafaa.
verses.translation: Bhala woh dekhte nahin the ke bilaa shubah woh (bachhda) unki kisi baat ka jawaab nahin deta aur na unke kisi nafa'-o-nuqsaan ka koyi ikhtiyaar rakhta hai?

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ قَالَ لَهُمْ هَـٰرُونُ مِن قَبْلُ يَـٰقَوْمِ إِنَّمَا فُتِنتُم بِهِۦ وَإِنَّ رَبَّكُمُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ فَٱتَّبِعُونِى وَأَطِيعُوٓا۟ أَمْرِى
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad qaala lahum Haaroonu min qablu yaa qawmi 'innamaa futintum bihee wa 'inna Rabbakumur- Rahmaanu fattabi'oonee wa 'atee'ooo 'amree.
verses.translation: Aur bilaa shubah usse pahle Haaroon ne unse kaha tha: aye meri qaum! Yaqeenan iske saath tum aazmaaye gaye ho aur yaqeenan tumhaara rab Rahmaan hai, lehaaza tum mera itteba' karo aur mere hukm ki etaa'at karo.

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ لَن نَّبْرَحَ عَلَيْهِ عَـٰكِفِينَ حَتَّىٰ يَرْجِعَ إِلَيْنَا مُوسَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo lannabraha 'alayhi 'aakifeena hattaa yarji'a 'ilaynaa Moosaa.
verses.translation: Woh kahne lage: hum to hameshah iski pooja karte rahenge hatta ke Moosa hamaare paas laaut aaye.

verses.arabic: قَالَ يَـٰهَـٰرُونُ مَا مَنَعَكَ إِذْ رَأَيْتَهُمْ ضَلُّوٓا۟
verses.transliteration: Qaala Yaa Haaroonu maa mana'aka 'iz ra'aytahum dallooo.
verses.translation: Moosa ne kaha: aye Haaroon! Tujhe kis cheez ne roke rakkha jab toone unhein dekha ke woh bhatak gaye hain.'

verses.arabic: أَلَّا تَتَّبِعَنِۖ أَفَعَصَيْتَ أَمْرِى
verses.transliteration: 'Allaa tattabi'ani 'afa'aşayta 'amree
verses.translation: Ke toone mera itteba' na kiya? kiya toone mere hukm ki naafarmaani ki?

verses.arabic: قَالَ يَـٰبْنَ أُمَّ لَا تَأْخُذْ بِلِحْيَتِى وَلَا بِرَأْسِىٓۖ إِنِّى خَشِيتُ أَن تَقُولَ فَرَّقْتَ بَيْنَ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ وَلَمْ تَرْقُبْ قَوْلِى
verses.transliteration: Qaala yabna'umma laa ta'khuz bilihyatee wa laa bira'seee 'innee khasheetu 'an taqoola. farraqta bayna Baneee 'Israaa'eela wa lam tarqub qawlee.
verses.translation: Haaroon ne kaha: Aye mere maan jaaye! meri daadhi aur mera sar na pakad, main dara ke tu kahega: toone Bani Israyeel ke darmiyaan tafargah daal diya aur meri baat yaad na rakkhi.

verses.arabic: قَالَ فَمَا خَطْبُكَ يَـٰسَـٰمِرِىُّ
verses.transliteration: Qaala famaa khatbuka yaa Saamiriyy.
verses.translation: Moosa ne kaha: aye Saamri! Tera kiya mu'aamlah hai?

verses.arabic: قَالَ بَصُرْتُ بِمَا لَمْ يَبْصُرُوا۟ بِهِۦ فَقَبَضْتُ قَبْضَةًۭ مِّنْ أَثَرِ ٱلرَّسُولِ فَنَبَذْتُهَاۖ وَكَذَٰلِكَ سَوَّلَتْ لِى نَفْسِى
verses.transliteration: Qaala başurtu bimaa lam yabșuroo bihee faqabadtu qabdatam-min 'asarir-Rasooli fanabaztuhaa wa kazaalika sawwalat lee nafsee.
verses.translation: Usne kaha: main ne woh cheez dekhi jo un logon ne na dekhi, chunaancheh main ne (mitti ki) ek mutthhi Jibrayeel (ke ghode) ke naqsh-e-qadam se bhar li aur woh uss mein daal di aur mere nafs ne mujhe yahi targheeb di.

verses.arabic: قَالَ فَٱذْهَبْ فَإِنَّ لَكَ فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ أَن تَقُولَ لَا مِسَاسَۖ وَإِنَّ لَكَ مَوْعِدًۭا لَّن تُخْلَفَهُۥۖ وَٱنظُرْ إِلَىٰٓ إِلَـٰهِكَ ٱلَّذِى ظَلْتَ عَلَيْهِ عَاكِفًۭاۚ لَّنُحَرِّقَنَّهُۥ ثُمَّ لَنَنسِفَنَّهُۥ فِى ٱلْيَمِّ نَسْفًا
verses.transliteration: Qaala fazhab fa'inna laka fil-hayaati 'an taqoola laa misaasa wa 'inna laka maw'idal-lan tukhlafahoo wanzur 'ilaaa ilaahikal-lazee zalta 'alayhi 'aakifaa; Lanuharriqannahoo summa Lanansifannahoo fil-yammi nasfaa.
verses.translation: Moosa ne kaha: tu dafa' hojaa, ab yaqeenan tere liye zindagi bhar yahi hai ke tu kahta rahe: (mujhe) na chhoona¹aur beshak tere liye ek wa'dah hai, woh hargiz tujhse nahin tal sakta aur tu apne mabood ki taraf dekh, jiski pooja mein tu lagaa raha, hum use jalaal denge, phir udaa kar samandar mein bikher denge
verses.deepMeaning: Ya'ni umr bhar tu yahi kahta rahega ke mujhse door raho, mujhe na chhuna, isliye ke use chhoote hi chhoone waala bhi aur yeh Saamri bhi donon bukhaar mein mubtala ho jaate. Isliye jab yeh kisi insaan ko dekhta to fauran cheekh uthhtake a Misaasa' kaha jaata hai ke phir yeh insaanon ki basti se nikal kar jungal mein chala gaya jahaan jaanwaron ke saath uski zindagi guzri aur yun ibrat ka namoonah bana raha. Goya logon ko gumraah karne ke liye jo shakhs jitna ziyaadah heelah-o-fan aur makro fareb ikhtiyaar karega, dunya-o-aakhirat mein uski saza bhi usi hisaab se shadeed tar nehaayat ibrat naak hogi.

verses.arabic: إِنَّمَآ إِلَـٰهُكُمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِى لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۚ وَسِعَ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ عِلْمًا
verses.transliteration: 'Innamaaa 'ilaahukumul-laahul- lazee laaa ilaaha 'illaa Hoo; wasi'a kulla shay'in ilmaa.
verses.translation: Bas tumhaara mabood to Allah hai jiske siwa kohi mabood nahin, usne har cheez ko apne ilm se gher rakkha hai.

verses.arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ نَقُصُّ عَلَيْكَ مِنْ أَنۢبَآءِ مَا قَدْ سَبَقَۚ وَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَـٰكَ مِن لَّدُنَّا ذِكْرًا
verses.transliteration: Kazaalika naquşşu 'alayka min 'ambaaa'i maa qad sabaqa wa qad 'aataynaaka mil- ladunnaa Zikraa.
verses.translation: Isi tarah hum aapko ahwaal sunaate hain jo pahle guzre aur yaqeenan humne aapko apne paas se zikr (qur'an) diya.

verses.arabic: مَّنْ أَعْرَضَ عَنْهُ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَحْمِلُ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ وِزْرًا
verses.transliteration: Man 'a'rada 'anhu fa'innahoo yahmilu Yawmal-Qiyaamati wizraa.
verses.translation: Jisne isse munh moda, to yaqeenan woh yaum-e- qiyaamat ek bojh uthhaaye huye hoga.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Mulaahazah ho haashyah: (Surah Aal-e-Imran:3/85

verses.arabic: خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهِۖ وَسَآءَ لَهُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ حِمْلًۭا
verses.transliteration: Khaalideena feehi wa saaa'a lahum Yawmal-Qiyaamati himlaa.
verses.translation: Woh iss (takleef) mein hameshah rahenge aur yaum-e-qiyaamat bojh uthhaana unke liye bura hoga.

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ يُنفَخُ فِى ٱلصُّورِ وَنَحْشُرُ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ زُرْقًۭا
verses.transliteration: Yawma yunfakhu fişşoori wa nahshurul- mujrimeena Yawma'izin zurqaa.
verses.translation: Jis din soor mein phoonk maari jaayegi aur hum uss din mujrim ekatthhe kareinge (jinki) aankhein neeli (ho rahi) hongi.

verses.arabic: يَتَخَٰفَتُونَ بَيْنَهُمْ إِن لَّبِثْتُمْ إِلَّا عَشْرًۭا
verses.transliteration: Yatakhaafatoona baynahum 'il-labistum 'illaa 'ashraa.
verses.translation: Woh baahum chupke chupke kahte honge: tum (dunya mein) nahin thhahre magar sirf das din.

verses.arabic: نَّحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ إِذْ يَقُولُ أَمْثَلُهُمْ طَرِيقَةً إِن لَّبِثْتُمْ إِلَّا يَوْمًۭا
verses.transliteration: Nahnu 'a'lamu bimaa yaqooloona 'iz yaqoolu 'amsaluhum tareeqatan 'il-labistum 'illaa yawmaa.
verses.translation: Humko khoob maloom hai jo woh kaheinge jab ke un mein behtareen raaye waala kahega: tum to sirf ek din thhahre the.

verses.arabic: وَيَسْـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلْجِبَالِ فَقُلْ يَنسِفُهَا رَبِّى نَسْفًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa yas'aloonaka 'anil-jibaali faqul yansifuhaa Rabbee nasfaa.
verses.translation: Aur woh aapse pahaadon ki baabat sawaal karte hain, to aap kah deejiye: mera rab unhein udaa kar bikher dega.

verses.arabic: فَيَذَرُهَا قَاعًۭا صَفْصَفًۭا
verses.transliteration: Fayazaruhaa qaa'an safsafaa.
verses.translation: Phir woh uss (zameen) ko chatyal maidaan bana chhodega.

verses.arabic: لَّا تَرَىٰ فِيهَا عِوَجًۭا وَلَآ أَمْتًۭا
verses.transliteration: Laa taraa feehaa 'iwajanw-wa laaa 'amtaa.
verses.translation: Aap uss mein na koyi kaji dekhenge aur na teela.

verses.arabic: يَوْمَئِذٍۢ يَتَّبِعُونَ ٱلدَّاعِىَ لَا عِوَجَ لَهُۥ وَخَشَعَتِ ٱلْأَصْوَاتُ لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ فَلَا تَسْمَعُ إِلَّا هَمْسًۭا
verses.transliteration: Yawma'iziny- yattabi'oonad-daa'iya laa 'iwaja lahoo wa khasha'atil-'aşwaatu lir- Rahmaani falaa tasma'u 'illaa hamsaa.
verses.translation: Uss din sab log pukaarne waale ke peechhe chalenge, uske liye koyi kaji na hogi aur aawaazein Rahmaan ke saamne dab jaayengi, phir aap aahat ke siwa kuchh na sunenge.

verses.arabic: يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لَّا تَنفَعُ ٱلشَّفَـٰعَةُ إِلَّا مَنْ أَذِنَ لَهُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ وَرَضِىَ لَهُۥ قَوْلًۭا
verses.transliteration: Yawmaʻizil-laa tanfa'ush-shafaa'atu 'illaa man 'azina lahur- Rahmaanu wa radiya lahoo qawlaa.
verses.translation: Uss din sifaarish koyi nafa' na degi magar sirf uski jise Rahmaan ijaazat dega aur uski baat pasand karega.

verses.arabic: يَعْلَمُ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَمَا خَلْفَهُمْ وَلَا يُحِيطُونَ بِهِۦ عِلْمًا
verses.transliteration: Yaʻlamu maa bayna 'aydeehim wa maa khalfahum wa laa yuheetoona bihee 'ilmaa.
verses.translation: Jo kuchh unke aage aur unke peechhe hai use Allah hi jaanta hai, aur woh (log) apne ilm se uska ehaatah nahin kar sakte.

verses.arabic: وَعَنَتِ ٱلْوُجُوهُ لِلْحَىِّ ٱلْقَيُّومِۖ وَقَدْ خَابَ مَنْ حَمَلَ ظُلْمًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa 'anatil-wujoohu lil-Hayyil-Qayyoomi wa qad khaaba man hamala zulmaa.
verses.translation: Aur sab chehre Hayy-o- Qayyoom (Allah) ke aage jhuk jaayenge, aur yaqeenan woh naa kaam huwa jisne zulm (shirk) ka bojh uthhaaya.

verses.arabic: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ وَهُوَ مُؤْمِنٌۭ فَلَا يَخَافُ ظُلْمًۭا وَلَا هَضْمًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa mañy-ya'mal minaş-şaalihaati wa huwa mu'minun falaa yakhaafu zulmanw-wa laa hadmaa.
verses.translation: Aur jo shakhs nek amal kare, jabke woh momin ho to woh na zulm (be insaafi) ka khauf khaayega aur na haq talfi ka.

verses.arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ قُرْءَانًا عَرَبِيًّۭا وَصَرَّفْنَا فِيهِ مِنَ ٱلْوَعِيدِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَّقُونَ أَوْ يُحْدِثُ لَهُمْ ذِكْرًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa kazaalika 'anzalnaahu Qur'aanan 'Arabiyyanw-wa- sarrafnaa feehi minal- wa'eedi la'allahum yattaqoona 'aw yuhdisu lahum zikraa.
verses.translation: Aur isi tarah humne iss qur'an ko arabi mein naazil kiya aur iss mein badal badal kar wayeed sunaayi taake woh taqwa apnaayein ya yeh (qur'an) unke liye naseehat paida kare.

verses.arabic: فَتَعَـٰلَى ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمَلِكُ ٱلْحَقُّۗ وَلَا تَعْجَلْ بِٱلْقُرْءَانِ مِن قَبْلِ أَن يُقْضَىٰٓ إِلَيْكَ وَحْيُهُۥۖ وَقُل رَّبِّ زِدْنِى عِلْمًۭا
verses.transliteration: Fata'aalal-laahul- Malikul-Haqq; wa laa ta'jal bil-Qur'aani min qabli 'any-yuqdaaa 'ilayka wahyuhoo wa qur-Rabbi zidnee 'ilmaa.
verses.translation: Pas Allah A'ala hai, sachcha baadshaah hai, aur (Aye Nabi!) Aap qur'an (padhne) mein jaldi na karein qabl iske ke aap ki taraf uski wahi puri ki jaaye aur kahiye: aye mere rab! Mujhe ilm mein ziyaadah kar.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ عَهِدْنَآ إِلَىٰٓ ءَادَمَ مِن قَبْلُ فَنَسِىَ وَلَمْ نَجِدْ لَهُۥ عَزْمًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad 'ahidnaaa 'ilaaa 'Aadama min qablu fanasiya wa lam najid lahoo 'azmaa.
verses.translation: Aur albatta humne isse pahle Aadam se ahad liya tha, to woh bhool gaya aur hum ne uss mein azm na paaya.

verses.arabic: وَإِذْ قُلْنَا لِلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ ٱسْجُدُوا۟ لِءَادَمَ فَسَجَدُوٓا۟ إِلَّآ إِبْلِيسَ أَبَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'iz qulnaa lilmalaaa'ikatis-judoo li- 'Aadama fasajadooo 'illaaa 'Iblees; 'abaa.
verses.translation: Aur jab humne farishton se kaha: Aadam ko sajdah karo to unhon ne sajdah kiya siwaaye Iblees ke, usne inkaar kiya.

verses.arabic: فَقُلْنَا يَـٰٓـٔادَمُ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا عَدُوٌّۭ لَّكَ وَلِزَوْجِكَ فَلَا يُخْرِجَنَّكُمَا مِنَ ٱلْجَنَّةِ فَتَشْقَىٰٓ
verses.transliteration: Faqulnaa yaaa 'Aadamu 'inna haazaa 'aduwwul-laka wa lizawjika falaa Yukhrijannakumaa minal-Jannati Fatashqaa.
verses.translation: Phir humne kaha: aye Aadam! Beshak yeh (Iblees) tera aur teri beewi ka dushman hal, kaheen woh tum donon ko jannat se na nikalwaa de ke tu mushaqqat mein pad jaaye.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ لَكَ أَلَّا تَجُوعَ فِيهَا وَلَا تَعْرَىٰ
verses.transliteration: 'Inna laka 'allaa tajoo'a feehaa wa laa ta'raa.
verses.translation: Beshak tere liye (Yahaan ehtemaam) hai ke tu iss mein na bhooka hog aur na nanga.

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّكَ لَا تَظْمَؤُا۟ فِيهَا وَلَا تَضْحَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'annaka laa tazma'u feehaa wa laa tadhaa.
verses.translation: Aur beshak tu na piyaasa hoga aur na tujhe dhoop lagegi.

verses.arabic: فَوَسْوَسَ إِلَيْهِ ٱلشَّيْطَٰنُ قَالَ يَـٰٓـٔادَمُ هَلْ أَدُلُّكَ عَلَىٰ شَجَرَةِ ٱلْخُلْدِ وَمُلْكٍۢ لَّا يَبْلَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Fawaswasa 'ilayhish-Shaytaanu qaala yaaa 'Aadamu hal 'adulluka 'alaa shajaratil-khuldi wa mulkil-laa yablaa.
verses.translation: Phir Shaytaan ne uski taraf waswasah daala, usne kaha: aye Aadam! Kiya main tujhe sada jeene ka darakht aur baadshaahi na bataaoun jo puraani na ho?

verses.arabic: فَأَكَلَا مِنْهَا فَبَدَتْ لَهُمَا سَوْءَٰتُهُمَا وَطَفِقَا يَخْصِفَانِ عَلَيْهِمَا مِن وَرَقِ ٱلْجَنَّةِۚ وَعَصَىٰٓ ءَادَمُ رَبَّهُۥ فَغَوَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Fa'akalaa minhaa fabadat lahumaa saw'aatuhumaa wa tafiqaa yakhşifaani 'alayhimaa miñw- waragil-Jannah; wa 'aşaaa 'Aadamu Rabbahoo faghawaa.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh un donon ne uss darakht ka phal khaaya to unki sharamgaahein un par zaahir ho gayeen aur woh donon apne oupar jannat ke patte chipkaane lage aur Aadam ne apne rab ki naafarmaani ki to woh bhatak gaya.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ ٱجْتَبَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَتَابَ عَلَيْهِ وَهَدَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Summaj-tabbahu Rabbuhoo fataaba 'alayhi wa hadaa.
verses.translation: Phir use uske rab ne barguzeedah kiya, uski taubah qubool ki aur (use) hidaayat di.

verses.arabic: قَالَ ٱهْبِطَا مِنْهَا جَمِيعًۭاۖ بَعْضُكُمْ لِبَعْضٍ عَدُوٌّۭۖ فَإِمَّا يَأْتِيَنَّكُم مِّنِّى هُدًۭى فَمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَ هُدَاىَ فَلَا يَضِلُّ وَلَا يَشْقَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Qaalah-bitaa minhaa jamee'am ba'dukum liba'din 'aduww; fa'immaa ya'ti- yannakum minnee hudan famanit-taba'a hudaaya falaa yadillu wa laa yashqaa
verses.translation: Allah ne farmaya: tum donon yahaan se ekatthhe utar jaao, tumhaare ba'z ba'z ke dushman honge. Phir jab tumhaare paas meri hidaayat pahunche to jisne meri hidaayat ki pairwi ki, to woh na gumrah hoga aur na mushaqqat mein padega.

verses.arabic: وَمَنْ أَعْرَضَ عَن ذِكْرِى فَإِنَّ لَهُۥ مَعِيشَةًۭ ضَنكًۭا وَنَحْشُرُهُۥ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ أَعْمَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Wa man 'a'rada 'an Zikree fa'inna lahoo ma'eeshatan dankanw-wa nahshuruhoo Yawmal- Qiyaamati 'a'maa.
verses.translation: Aur jisne meri yaad se munh moda to bila shubal uski zindagi tang hogi aur roz-e-qiyaamat hum use andha karke uthhaayenge.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Isse muraad fil waaqe' aankhon se andha hona hai ya phir baseerat (Ghaur-o-fikr) se mahroomi muraad hai ya'ni wahaan usko koyi aisi daleel nahin sujhegi jise pesh karke woh azaab se chhoot sake.

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ لِمَ حَشَرْتَنِىٓ أَعْمَىٰ وَقَدْ كُنتُ بَصِيرًۭا
verses.transliteration: Qaala Rabbi lima hashartaneee 'a'maa wa qad kuntu başeeraa.
verses.translation: Woh kahega: aye mere rab! Toone mujhe andha kyun uthhaaya? Jabke main to (dunya mein) dekhne waala tha.

verses.arabic: قَالَ كَذَٰلِكَ أَتَتْكَ ءَايَـٰتُنَا فَنَسِيتَهَا وَكَذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمَ تُنسَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Qaala kazaalika 'atatka 'Aayaatunaa fanaseetahaa wa kazaalikal-Yawma tunsaa.
verses.translation: Irshad hoga: isi tarah tere paas hamaari aayaat aayeen, to toone woh bhula deen aur usi tarah aaj tujhe bhi bhua diya jaayega.

verses.arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى مَنْ أَسْرَفَ وَلَمْ يُؤْمِنۢ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِۦۚ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ أَشَدُّ وَأَبْقَىٰٓ
verses.transliteration: Wa kazaalika najzee man 'asrafa wa lam yu'mim bi-'Aayaati- Rabbih; wa laʻazaabul- 'Aakhirati 'ashaddu wa 'abqaa.
verses.translation: Aur jo had se badh gaya aur apne rab ki aayaat par eemaan na laaya, hum usko usi tarah saza denge aur yaqeenan aakhirat ka azaab shadeed tar aur bahut baaqi rahne waala hai.

verses.arabic: أَفَلَمْ يَهْدِ لَهُمْ كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّنَ ٱلْقُرُونِ يَمْشُونَ فِى مَسَـٰكِنِهِمْۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَءَايَـٰتٍۢ لِّأُو۟لِى ٱلنُّهَىٰ
verses.transliteration: 'Afalam yahdi lahum kam 'ahlaknaa qablahum minal-qurooni yamshoona fee masaakinihim; 'inna fee zaalika la Aayaatil- li'ulin-nuhaa.
verses.translation: Kiya phir (uss cheez ne) unki rahnumaayi nahin ki ke humne unse pahle kitni hi qaumein halaak kardeen? Jinke masaakin (bastyon) mein yeh log chalte phirte hain, beshak uss mein albatta aqal waalon ke liye nishaaniyaan hain.

verses.arabic: وَلَوْلَا كَلِمَةٌۭ سَبَقَتْ مِن رَّبِّكَ لَكَانَ لِزَامًۭا وَأَجَلٌۭ مُّسَمًّۭى
verses.transliteration: Wa law laa Kalimatun sabaqat mir- Rabbika lakaana lizaamañw-wa 'ajalum- musammaa.
verses.translation: Aur agar aapke rab ki taraf se ek baat pahle hi se (tay) na ho chuki hoti aur mi'aad muqarrar bhi (na hoti) to (unhein azaab) chimat ke rahta.

verses.arabic: فَٱصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ قَبْلَ طُلُوعِ ٱلشَّمْسِ وَقَبْلَ غُرُوبِهَاۖ وَمِنْ ءَانَآئِ ٱلَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْ وَأَطْرَافَ ٱلنَّهَارِ لَعَلَّكَ تَرْضَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Faşbir 'alaa maa yaqooloona wa sabbih bihamdi Rabbika qabla tuloo'ish-shamsi wa qabla ghuroobihaa wa min 'aanaaa'il-layli fasabbih wa 'atraafan- nahaari la'allaka tardaa.
verses.translation: Lehaaza jo kuchh woh kahte hain aap uss par sabr keejiye aur tulu'-e-shams se pahle aur uske ghuroob se pahle apne rab ki hamd ke saath tasbeeh keejiye¹ aur raat ki kuchh ghadyon mein bhi tasbeeh keejiye aur din ke (donon) hisson mein bhi taake aap raazi ho jaayein
verses.deepMeaning: Ba'z Mufassireen ke nazdeek tasbeeh se muraad namaaz hai aur woh usse paanch namaazein muraad lete hain. tulu' shams se qabl fajr, ghuroob se qabl asr, raat ki ghadiyon se maghrib-o-isha aur din ke hisson se muraad zuhar ki namaaz muraad hai.

verses.arabic: وَلَا تَمُدَّنَّ عَيْنَيْكَ إِلَىٰ مَا مَتَّعْنَا بِهِۦٓ أَزْوَٰجًۭا مِّنْهُمْ زَهْرَةَ ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا لِنَفْتِنَهُمْ فِيهِۚ وَرِزْقُ رَبِّكَ خَيْرٌۭ وَأَبْقَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Wa laa tamuddanna 'aynayka 'ilaa maa matta'naa biheee 'azwaajam-minhum zahratal-hayaatid- dunyaa linaftinahum feeh; wa rizqu Rabbika khayrunw-wa 'abqaa.
verses.translation: Aur (Aye Nabi!) un cheezon ki taraf aap apni nigaahein uthhaa kar bhi na dekhein jo cheezein zindagaani-e-dunya ki aaraayish ki hum ne un mein se mukhtalif qism ke logon ko de rakkhi hain taake hum unhein unke zariye se aazmaayen¹ aur aapke rab ka rizq behtar aur bahut baaqi rahne waala hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Yeh wahi mazmoon hai jo isse qabl surah aal-e-imran:3/196-197, Al-Hijr:15/87-88 aur Al-kahaf:18/7-8 mein bayaan huwa hai.

verses.arabic: وَأْمُرْ أَهْلَكَ بِٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَٱصْطَبِرْ عَلَيْهَاۖ لَا نَسْـَٔلُكَ رِزْقًۭاۖ نَّحْنُ نَرْزُقُكَۗ وَٱلْعَـٰقِبَةُ لِلتَّقْوَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Wa'mur 'ahlaka biş- Şalaati waştabir 'alayhaa laa nas'aluka rizqaa; Nahnu narzuquk; wal'aaqibatu littaqwaa.
verses.translation: Aur apnea hl-o-a'yaal ko namaaz ka hukm deejiye aur (khud bhi) uss par qaayem rahiye, hum aap se rizq nahin maangte, hum hi aap ko rizq dete hain, aur behtareen anjaam to ahl-e- taqwa ke liye hai.

verses.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ لَوْلَا يَأْتِينَا بِـَٔايَةٍۢ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦٓۚ أَوَلَمْ تَأْتِهِم بَيِّنَةُ مَا فِى ٱلصُّحُفِ ٱلْأُولَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Wa qaaloo law laa ya'teenaa bi-'Aayatim- mir-Rabbih; 'awalam ta'tihim bayyinatu maa fiş-şuhufil-'oolaa.
verses.translation: Aur unhon ne kaha: woh hamaare paas apne rab ki taraf se koyi nishaani kyun nahin laata? Kiya unke paas pahle saheefon mein waazeh daleel nahin aa chuki?

verses.arabic: وَلَوْ أَنَّآ أَهْلَكْنَـٰهُم بِعَذَابٍۢ مِّن قَبْلِهِۦ لَقَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا لَوْلَآ أَرْسَلْتَ إِلَيْنَا رَسُولًۭا فَنَتَّبِعَ ءَايَـٰتِكَ مِن قَبْلِ أَن نَّذِلَّ وَنَخْزَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Wa law 'annaaa 'ahlaknaahum bi'azaabim-min qablihee laqaaloo Rabbanaa law laaa 'arsalta 'ilaynaa Rasoolan fanattabi'a 'Aayaatika min qabli 'an nazilla wa nakhzaa.
verses.translation: Aur agar bilaa shubah hum unhein iss (Rasool) se pahle kisi azaab se halaak kar dete to woh log kahte: aye hamaare rab! Toone hamaari taraf koyi Rasool kyun na bheja ke hum zaleel-o-ruswa hone se pahle teri aayaat ki pairwi karte.

verses.arabic: قُلْ كُلٌّۭ مُّتَرَبِّصٌۭ فَتَرَبَّصُوا۟ۖ فَسَتَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلصِّرَٰطِ ٱلسَّوِىِّ وَمَنِ ٱهْتَدَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Qul kullum- mutarabbişun fatarabbasoo fasata lamoona man Ashaabuş-Şiraatis- Sawiyyi wa manih-tadaa.
verses.translation: Aap kah deejiye: har ek (anjaam kaar ka) muntazir hai, lehaaza tum bhi intezaar karo, tum jald hi jaan loge ke raah-e-raast waale kaun hain aur hidaayat yaaftah kaun hain?

verses.arabic: ٱقْتَرَبَ لِلنَّاسِ حِسَابُهُمْ وَهُمْ فِى غَفْلَةٍۢ مُّعْرِضُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Iqtaraba linnaasi hisaabuhum wa hum fee ghaflatim-mu'ridoon.
verses.translation: Logon ke hisaab ka waqt qareeb aa gaya hai, jab ke woh ghaflat mein pade e'raaz kar rahe hain.

verses.arabic: مَا يَأْتِيهِم مِّن ذِكْرٍۢ مِّن رَّبِّهِم مُّحْدَثٍ إِلَّا ٱسْتَمَعُوهُ وَهُمْ يَلْعَبُونَ
verses.transliteration: Maa ya'teehim min zikrim-mir-Rabbihim muhdasin 'illas- tama'oohu wa hum yal'aboon.
verses.translation: unke rab ki taraf se unke paas jo bhi nayi naseehat aati hai, use woh khelte koodte (hansi mazaaq hi mein) sunte hain.

verses.arabic: لَاهِيَةًۭ قُلُوبُهُمْۗ وَأَسَرُّوا۟ ٱلنَّجْوَى ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ هَلْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا بَشَرٌۭ مِّثْلُكُمْۚ أَفَتَأْتُونَ ٱلسِّحْرَ وَأَنتُمْ تُبْصِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Laahiyatan quloobuhum; wa 'asarrun-najwal-lazeena zalamoo hal haazaaa 'illaa basharum-mislukum 'afata'toonas-sihra wa 'antum tubșiroon.
verses.translation: Unke dil ghaafil hain, aur un zaalimon ne chupke chupke sar goshiyaan keen ke yeh (Rasool) tum jaisa ek bashar hi to hai, kiya phir tum dekhte bhaalte (uske) jaadu mein phanste ho?

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّى يَعْلَمُ ٱلْقَوْلَ فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلْأَرْضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
verses.transliteration: Qaala Rabbee yalamul-qawla fis- samaaa'i wal'ardi wa Huwas- Samee'ul-'Aleem.
verses.translation: (Rasool ne) kaha: mera rab aasmaan aur zameen mein har baat jaanta hai, aur woh sab kuchh sunta jaanta hai.

verses.arabic: بَلْ قَالُوٓا۟ أَضْغَٰثُ أَحْلَـٰمٍۢ بَلِ ٱفْتَرَىٰهُ بَلْ هُوَ شَاعِرٌۭ فَلْيَأْتِنَا بِـَٔايَةٍۢ كَمَآ أُرْسِلَ ٱلْأَوَّلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Bal qaalooo 'adghaasu 'ahlaamim balif-taraahu bal huwa shaa'irun falya'tinaa bi-'Aayatin kamaaa 'ursilal- 'awwaloon.
verses.translation: Balke unhon ne kaha: yeh udte khaab hain, balke usne jhoot ghad liya hai, balke woh shaa'yer hai, warnah use hamaare paas koyi aisi nishaani laani chaahiye jaise pahle Rasool bheje gaye the.

verses.arabic: مَآ ءَامَنَتْ قَبْلَهُم مِّن قَرْيَةٍ أَهْلَكْنَـٰهَآ أَفَهُمْ يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.transliteration: Maaa 'aamanat qablahum min qaryatin 'ahlaknaahaa 'afahum yu'minoon.
verses.translation: Unse pahle koyi basti bhi, jise humne halaak kiya, eemaan nahin laayi thi, kiya phir yeh eemaan laayenge?

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَا قَبْلَكَ إِلَّا رِجَالًۭا نُّوحِىٓ إِلَيْهِمْۚ فَسْـَٔلُوٓا۟ أَهْلَ ٱلذِّكْرِ إِن كُنتُمْ لَا تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maaa 'arsalnaa qablaka 'illaa rijaalan nooheee 'ilayhim fas'alooo 'ahlaz-zikri 'in kuntum laa ta'ʻlamoon.
verses.translation: Aap se pahle hum ne jitne rasool bheje, woh sab mard hi the,¹ unki taraf hum wahi karte the, chunaancheh agar tum khud nahin jaante to ahl-e-zikr (ahl-e-kitab) se poochh lo.
verses.deepMeaning: Ya'ni tamaam Nabi mard insaan the, na koyi ghair insaan kabhi nabi aaya aur na ghair mard, goya nabuwwat insaanon ke sath aur insaanon mein bhi mardon ke saath hi khaas rahi hai, isse maloom huwa ke koyi aurat nabi nahin bani. Isliye ke nabuwwat bhi un faraayez mein se hai jo aurat ke tabayi' aur fitri daayerah amal se khaarij hai. qabl azin yeh baat surah Yusfu: 12/109 aur Surah Nahl:16/43 mein bhi guzar chuki hai.

verses.arabic: وَمَا جَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ جَسَدًۭا لَّا يَأْكُلُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ خَـٰلِدِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maa jaʻalnaahum jasadal-laa ya'kuloonat- ta'aama wa maa kaanoo khaalideen.
verses.translation: Aur hum ne un (Nabyon) ke aise jism nahin banaaye the ke woh khaana na khaate hon, aur na woh hameshah rahne waale the.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ صَدَقْنَـٰهُمُ ٱلْوَعْدَ فَأَنجَيْنَـٰهُمْ وَمَن نَّشَآءُ وَأَهْلَكْنَا ٱلْمُسْرِفِينَ
verses.transliteration: Summa şadaqnaahumul-wa'da fa'anjaynaahum wa man nashaaa'u wa 'ahlaknal- musrifeen.
verses.translation: Phir humne un (Rasoolon) se wa'dah sachcha kar dikhaaya, chunaancheh humne unko aur jise humne chaaha najaat di, aur hum ne israaf karne waalon ko halaak kar diya.

verses.arabic: لَقَدْ أَنزَلْنَآ إِلَيْكُمْ كِتَـٰبًۭا فِيهِ ذِكْرُكُمْۚ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Laqad 'anzalnaaa 'ilaykum Kitaaban feehi zikrukum 'afalaa ta'qiloon.
verses.translation: Bilaa shubah humne tumhaari taraf ek kitab naazil ki hai, uss mein tumhaara hi zikr hai, kiya phir bhi tum nahin samajhte?

verses.arabic: وَكَمْ قَصَمْنَا مِن قَرْيَةٍۢ كَانَتْ ظَالِمَةًۭ وَأَنشَأْنَا بَعْدَهَا قَوْمًا ءَاخَرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa kam qaşamnaa min qaryatin kaanat zaalimatanw-wa ansha'naa ba'dahaa qawman 'aakhareen.
verses.translation: Aur humne kitni hi bastiyaan tahas nahas kar dein jo zaalim thin, aur unke - ba'd doosri qaumein uthhaa khadi (paida) keen.

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّآ أَحَسُّوا۟ بَأْسَنَآ إِذَا هُم مِّنْهَا يَرْكُضُونَ
verses.transliteration: Falammaaa 'ahassoo ba'sanaaa 'izaa hum minhaa yarkudoon.
verses.translation: Phir jab unhon ne hamaare azaab ki aahat mahsoos ki to woh log wahaan se bhaagne lage.

verses.arabic: لَا تَرْكُضُوا۟ وَٱرْجِعُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ مَآ أُتْرِفْتُمْ فِيهِ وَمَسَـٰكِنِكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُسْـَٔلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Laa tarkudoo warji'ooo 'ilaa maaa Putriftum feehi wa masaakinikum la'allakum tus'aloon.
verses.translation: (Un se kahaa gaya:) mat bhago, aur laut jaao jahaan tumhein saamaan-e-aish-o- i'shrat diya gaya tha aur apne makanaat (mahallaat) ki taraf, taake tumse sawaal kiya jaaye.

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ يَٰوَيْلَنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَـٰلِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo yaa waylanaaa 'innaa kunnaa zaalimeen.
verses.translation: Woh kahne lage: haaye hamaari kam bakhti! Beshak hum hi zaalim the.

verses.arabic: فَمَا زَالَت تِّلْكَ دَعْوَىٰهُمْ حَتَّىٰ جَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ حَصِيدًا خَـٰمِدِينَ
verses.transliteration: Famaa zaalat tilka da'waahum hattaa ja'alnaahum haseedan khaamideen.
verses.translation: Phir yahi rahi unki pukaar, hatta ke humne unhein kati fasl aur bujhi raakh jaisa banaa diya.

verses.arabic: وَمَا خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا لَٰعِبِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maa khalaqnas- samaaa'a wal'arda wa maa baynahumaa laa'ibeen.
verses.translation: Aur humne aasmaan aur zameen ko aur jo kuchh unke maabain hai, khelte huye (be maqsad) paida nahin kiya.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Balke aasmaanon aur zameen waghairah ki takhleeq mein ke liye qudrat ki nishaaniyaan hain ke usse woh sabaq seekhein aur jaan lein ke iss kaayenaat ka khaaliq aur badon mudabbir sirf ek Allah Ta'ala hai: 'Laa ilaaha lallah' mazeed unki takhleeq mein kayi maqaasid aur hikmatein hain, masalan bande mera zikr-o-shukr karein, nekon ko nekiyon ki jaza aur badyon ki saza di jaaye waghairah kyun ke Allah Ta'ala hakeem hai aur uska adna se adna kaam bhi hikmat se bharpoor-o- ma'moor hai.

verses.arabic: لَوْ أَرَدْنَآ أَن نَّتَّخِذَ لَهْوًۭا لَّٱتَّخَذْنَـٰهُ مِن لَّدُنَّآ إِن كُنَّا فَـٰعِلِينَ
verses.transliteration: Law 'aradnaaa 'an nattakhiza lahwal- lattakhaznaahu mil- ladunnaaa 'in kunnaa faa ileen.
verses.translation: agar hum (yun hi) saamaan-e-tafreeh banana chaahte aur agar humne yahi kuchh karna hota to apne paas hi se yahi kuchh kar lete.

verses.arabic: بَلْ نَقْذِفُ بِٱلْحَقِّ عَلَى ٱلْبَـٰطِلِ فَيَدْمَغُهُۥ فَإِذَا هُوَ زَاهِقٌۭۚ وَلَكُمُ ٱلْوَيْلُ مِمَّا تَصِفُونَ
verses.transliteration: Bal naqzifu bil-haqqi 'alal-baatili fayadmaghuhoo fa'izaa huwa zaahiq; wa lakumul-waylu mimmaa taşifoon.
verses.translation: Balke hum haq ko baatil par phenk maarte hain, to woh uska sar phod deta hai, phir yakaa yak woh (baatil) malya met ho jaata hai aur tumhaare liye un baaton ki wajah se halaakat hai jo tum banaate ho.

verses.arabic: وَلَهُۥ مَن فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِۖ وَمَنْ عِندَهُۥ لَا يَسْتَكْبِرُونَ عَنْ عِبَادَتِهِۦ وَلَا يَسْتَحْسِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa lahoo man fis- samaawaati wal'ard; wa man 'indahoo laa yastakbiroona 'an 'ibaadatihee wa laa yastahsiroon.
verses.translation: Aur usi ke liye hain jo aasmaanon aur zameen mein hain, aur jo (farishte) uske paas hain woh uski ibaadat karne se takabbur nahin karte aur na woh thakte (uktaate) hain.

verses.arabic: يُسَبِّحُونَ ٱلَّيْلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ لَا يَفْتُرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Yusabbihoonallayla wannahaara laa yafturoon.
verses.translation: Woh raat din uski tasbeeh karte hain, sust nahin padte.

verses.arabic: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُوٓا۟ ءَالِهَةًۭ مِّنَ ٱلْأَرْضِ هُمْ يُنشِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Amit-takhazooo 'aalihatam-minal-'ardi hum yunshiroon.
verses.translation: Kiya unhon ne zameen mein se aise mabood bana liye hain jo (murdon ko) zindah kardenge?

verses.arabic: لَوْ كَانَ فِيهِمَآ ءَالِهَةٌ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ لَفَسَدَتَاۚ فَسُبْحَـٰنَ ٱللَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَرْشِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
verses.transliteration: Law kaana feehimaaa 'aalihatun 'illal-laahu lafasadataa; fa-Subhaanal-laahi Rabbil-'Arshi 'ammaa yaşifoon.
verses.translation: Agar un donon (zameen- o-aasmaan) mein Allah ke siwa kayi aur mabood hote to yeh donon hi tabaah ho jaate, chunaancheh Allah, A'rsh ka rab, un baaton se paak hai jo woh (mushrik) bayaan karte hain.

verses.arabic: لَا يُسْـَٔلُ عَمَّا يَفْعَلُ وَهُمْ يُسْـَٔلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Laa yus'alu 'ammaa yafalu wa hum yus'aloon.
verses.translation: Woh jo kuchh karta hai uski baabat usse sawaal nahin kiya jaa sakta, jab ke un (logon) se baaz purs hogi.

verses.arabic: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ ءَالِهَةًۭۖ قُلْ هَاتُوا۟ بُرْهَـٰنَكُمْۗ هَـٰذَا ذِكْرُ مَن مَّعِىَ وَذِكْرُ مَن قَبْلِىۖ بَلْ أَكْثَرُهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ ٱلْحَقَّ فَهُم مُّعْرِضُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Amit-takhazoo min dooniheee 'aalihatan qul haatoo burhaanakum haazaa zikru mam- maʻiya wa zikru man qablee; bal 'aksaruhum laa ya'lamoonal-haqqa fahum mu'ridoon.
verses.translation: Kiya unhon ne Allah ke siwa aur mabood banaa liye hain? kah deejiye: tum apni daleel laao, yeh (tauheed hi) mere saathyion ka zikr hai aur mujhse pahlon ka bhi zikr tha, balke un mein se aksar haq ka ilm nahin rakhte, lehaaza woh (usse) munh pher lete hain.

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَا مِن قَبْلِكَ مِن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا نُوحِىٓ إِلَيْهِ أَنَّهُۥ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّآ أَنَا۠ فَٱعْبُدُونِ
verses.transliteration: Wa maaa 'arsalnaa min qablika mir-Rasoolin 'illaa nooheee 'ilayhi 'annahoo laaa 'ilaaha 'illaaa 'Ana fa'budoon.
verses.translation: Aur aapse pahle humne jo bhi Rasool bheja, uski taraf yahi wahi karte rahe ke beshak mere siwa koyi mabood nahin, lehaaza tum meri hi ibaadat karo.

verses.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ ٱتَّخَذَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ وَلَدًۭاۗ سُبْحَـٰنَهُۥۖ بَلْ عِبَادٌۭ مُّكْرَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa qaalut-takhazar- Rahmaanu waladan Subhaanah; bal 'ibaadum-mukramoon.
verses.translation: Aur unhon ne kaha: Rahmaan ne aulaad banaayi hai. woh (usse) paak hai, balke woh (farishte) to (Allah ke) mu'azzaz-o- mukarram bande hain.

verses.arabic: لَا يَسْبِقُونَهُۥ بِٱلْقَوْلِ وَهُم بِأَمْرِهِۦ يَعْمَلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Laa yasbiqoonahoo bilqawli wa hum bi'amrihee ya maloon.
verses.translation: Woh baat karne mein usse sabqat nahin karte, aur woh usi ke hukm par amal karte hain.

verses.arabic: يَعْلَمُ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَمَا خَلْفَهُمْ وَلَا يَشْفَعُونَ إِلَّا لِمَنِ ٱرْتَضَىٰ وَهُم مِّنْ خَشْيَتِهِۦ مُشْفِقُونَ
verses.transliteration: Yaʻlamu maa bayna 'aydeehim wa maa khalfahum wa laa yashfa'oona 'illaa limanir- tadaa wa hum min khashyatihee mushfiqoon.
verses.translation: Woh jaanta hai jo kuchh unke aage aur peechhe hai, aur woh sirf uski sifaarish karenge jiske liye Allah pasnad karega, aur woh uske khauf se darne waale hain.

verses.arabic: وَمَن يَقُلْ مِنْهُمْ إِنِّىٓ إِلَـٰهٌۭ مِّن دُونِهِۦ فَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِيهِ جَهَنَّمَۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa mañy-yaqul minhum 'inneee 'ilaahum-min doonihee fazaalika najzeehi Jahannam; kazaalika najziz-zaalimeen.
verses.translation: Aur un mein se jo yeh kahe ke beshak Allah ke siwa main bhi mabood hoon, to use hum jahannam ki saza denge, hum zaalimon ko isi tarah saza dete hain.

verses.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَرَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ كَانَتَا رَتْقًۭا فَفَتَقْنَـٰهُمَاۖ وَجَعَلْنَا مِنَ ٱلْمَآءِ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ حَىٍّۢۖ أَفَلَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Awalam yaral- lazeena kafarooo 'annas- samaawaati wal'arda kaanataa ratqan fafataqnaahumaa wa jaʻalnaa minal-maaa'i kulla shay'in hayyin 'afalaa yu'minoon.
verses.translation: Kiya kaafiron ne nahin dekha (ghaur kiya) ke beshak aasmaan aur zameen baahum mile huye the, phir humne un donon ko alga alg kar diya? aur humne paani se har zindah cheez banaayi, kiya phir woh eemaan nahin laate?

verses.arabic: وَجَعَلْنَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ رَوَٰسِىَ أَن تَمِيدَ بِهِمْ وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا فِجَاجًۭا سُبُلًۭا لَّعَلَّهُمْ يَهْتَدُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa jaʻalnaa fil-'ardi rawaasiya 'an tameeda bihim wa jaʻalnaa feehaa fijaajan subulal- la'allahum yahtadoon.
verses.translation: Aur humne zameen mein pahaad banaaye taake woh unke saath jhukne (na) paaye, aur humne uss mein khuli raahein rakkhin taake woh (log) raah paayein.

verses.arabic: وَجَعَلْنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ سَقْفًۭا مَّحْفُوظًۭاۖ وَهُمْ عَنْ ءَايَـٰتِهَا مُعْرِضُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa ja'alnas- samaaa'a saqfam- mahfoozañw-wa hum 'an 'Aayaatihaa mu'ridoon.
verses.translation: Aur humne aasmaan ko mahfooz chhat banaaya jab ke woh uss (aasmaan) ki nishaaniyon se munh pher lete hain.

verses.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلَّيْلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ وَٱلشَّمْسَ وَٱلْقَمَرَۖ كُلٌّۭ فِى فَلَكٍۢ يَسْبَحُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa Huwal-lazee khalaqal-layla wannahaara washshamsa walqamara kullun fee falakiny- yasbahoon.
verses.translation: Aur wahi (Allah) hai jisne raat aur din aur suraj aur chaand ko paida kiya, sab apne apne madaar mein tairte phirte hain.

verses.arabic: وَمَا جَعَلْنَا لِبَشَرٍۢ مِّن قَبْلِكَ ٱلْخُلْدَۖ أَفَإِيْن مِّتَّ فَهُمُ ٱلْخَٰلِدُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maa jaʻalnaa libasharim-min qablikal- khuld 'afa'-'im-mitta fahumul-khaalidoon.
verses.translation: Aur (Aye Nabi!) humne Aap se pahle bhi kisi bashar ko hameshah ki zindagi nahin di, phir agar aap mar jaayein to kiya woh hameshah rahne waale hain?

verses.arabic: كُلُّ نَفْسٍۢ ذَآئِقَةُ ٱلْمَوْتِۗ وَنَبْلُوكُم بِٱلشَّرِّ وَٱلْخَيْرِ فِتْنَةًۭۖ وَإِلَيْنَا تُرْجَعُونَ
verses.transliteration: Kullu nafsin zaaa'iqatul-mawt; wa nablookum bishsharri walkhayri fitnatan wa 'ilaynaa turja'oon.
verses.translation: Har nafs maut ko chakhne waala hai. aur hum tumhein parakhne ke liye buraayi aur bhalaayi se aazmaate hain,¹ aur aakhir kaar tumhein hamaari hi taraf palatna hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Ya'ni kabhi masaayeb-o-aalaam se do chaar karke aur kabhi dunya wa wasaayel-e-farawaan se bahrah war karke, kabhi sehat-o-faraakhi ke zariye se aur kabhi tangi-o-bimaari ke zariye se, kabhi tawangari de kar aur kabhi faqr-o-faaqah mein mubtala karke hum aazmaate hain, taake hum dekhein ke shukr guzaari kaun karta hai aur naa shukri kaun? Sabr kaun karta hai aur naa sabri kaun? Shukr aur sabr yeh razaay-e-ilaahi ka aur kufraan-e-ne'mat aur naa sabri ghazab-e-ilaahi ka mojib hai.
