verses.arabic: وَإِذَا رَءَاكَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ إِن يَتَّخِذُونَكَ إِلَّا هُزُوًا أَهَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى يَذْكُرُ ءَالِهَتَكُمْ وَهُمْ بِذِكْرِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ هُمْ كَـٰفِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'izaa ra'aakal- lazeena kafarooo 'iny- yattakhizoonaka 'illaa huzuwaa; 'ahaazal-lazee yazkuru 'aalihatakum wa hum bizikrir-Rahmaani hum kaafiroon.
verses.translation: Aur jab kaafir aapko dekhte hain to woh aap ko mazaaq hi ka nishaanah banaate hain (kahte hain:) kiya yahi hai jo tumhaare maboodon ka zikr (ehaanat se) karta hai? jabke woh khud Rahmaan ke zikr ke munkir hain.

verses.arabic: خُلِقَ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ مِنْ عَجَلٍۢۚ سَأُو۟رِيكُمْ ءَايَـٰتِى فَلَا تَسْتَعْجِلُونِ
verses.transliteration: Khuliqal-'insaanu min 'ajal; sa'ureekum 'Aayaatee falaa tasta jiloon.
verses.translation: Insaan jald baazi (ke khameer) se takhleeq kiya gaya hai, main jald tumhein apni nishaaniyaan dikhaaounga, lehaaza tum mujh se jaldi ka mutaalbah na karo.

verses.arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَـٰذَا ٱلْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa yaqooloona mataa haazal-wa'du 'in kuntum şaadiqeen.
verses.translation: Aur woh (musalmaanon se) kahte hain: agar tum sachche ho to yeh (azaab ya qiyaamat ka) wa'dah kab (pura) hoga?

verses.arabic: لَوْ يَعْلَمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ حِينَ لَا يَكُفُّونَ عَن وُجُوهِهِمُ ٱلنَّارَ وَلَا عَن ظُهُورِهِمْ وَلَا هُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Law ya'lamul-lazeena kafaroo heena laa yakuffoona 'anw- wujoohihimun-Naara wa laa 'an zuhoorihim wa laa hum yunşaroon.
verses.translation: Kaash! Kaafir uss waqt ko jaan lein jab woh apne chehron se aag nahin hataa sakenge aur na apni pushton se, aur na unki madad hi ki jaayegi.

verses.arabic: بَلْ تَأْتِيهِم بَغْتَةًۭ فَتَبْهَتُهُمْ فَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ رَدَّهَا وَلَا هُمْ يُنظَرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Bal ta'teehim baghtatan fatabhatuhum falaa yastateeʻoona raddahaa wa laa hum yunzaroon.
verses.translation: Balke woh (Qiyaamat) achaanak hi unhein aa legi, woh unke hosh khodegi, phir woh taal use na sakenge aur na unhein mohlat hi di jaayegi.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدِ ٱسْتُهْزِئَ بِرُسُلٍۢ مِّن قَبْلِكَ فَحَاقَ بِٱلَّذِينَ سَخِرُوا۟ مِنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laqadis-tuhzi'a bi- Rusulim-min qablika fahaaqa billazeena sakhiroo minhum maa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon.
verses.translation: Aur (aye Nabi!) bilaa shubah aapse pahle bhi Rasoolon se mazaaq kiya gaya, phir un mein se jin logon ne mazaaq udaaya unhein uss (azaab) ne gher liya jiska woh mazaaq udaate the.

verses.arabic: قُلْ مَن يَكْلَؤُكُم بِٱلَّيْلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ مِنَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِۚ بَلْ هُمْ عَن ذِكْرِ رَبِّهِم مُّعْرِضُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qul mañy- yakla'ukum billayli wannahaari minar- Rahmaan; bal hum 'an zikri Rabbihim mu'ridoon.
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: raat aur din mein kaun tumhaari negahbaani karta hai Rahmaan (ke azaab) se? balke woh apne rab ke zikr se munh modte hain.

verses.arabic: أَمْ لَهُمْ ءَالِهَةٌۭ تَمْنَعُهُم مِّن دُونِنَاۚ لَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ نَصْرَ أَنفُسِهِمْ وَلَا هُم مِّنَّا يُصْحَبُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Am lahum 'aalihatun tamna'uhum min dooninaa; laa yastatee'oonaa naşra 'anfusihim wa laa hum minnaa yushaboon.
verses.translation: Kiya hamaare siwa unke koyi aur mabood hain jo unhein bachaate hon, woh to khud apni madad bhi nahin kar sakte, aur na woh hum (hamaare azaab) hi se mahfooz hain.

verses.arabic: بَلْ مَتَّعْنَا هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ وَءَابَآءَهُمْ حَتَّىٰ طَالَ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْعُمُرُۗ أَفَلَا يَرَوْنَ أَنَّا نَأْتِى ٱلْأَرْضَ نَنقُصُهَا مِنْ أَطْرَافِهَآۚ أَفَهُمُ ٱلْغَـٰلِبُونَ
verses.transliteration: Bal matta'naa haaa'ulaaa'i wa 'aabaaa'ahum hattaa taala 'alayhimul-'umur; 'afalaa yarawna 'annaa na'til-'arda nanquşuhaa min 'atraafihaaa; 'afahumul-ghaaliboon.
verses.translation: Balke humne unhein aur unke baap dada ko faaidah diya hatta ke un par taweel muddat guzar gayi, kiya phir woh nahin dekhete ke beshak hum zameen ko uske atraaf se ghataate aate hain¹ (kufr simat rahaa hai), kiya phir bhi wahi ghaalib aane waale hain?
verses.deepMeaning: Yahi baat Allah ne isse qabl surah Ra'd mein bhi bayaan farmaayi hai: 'kiya woh nahin dekhte ke hum (kufr ki) zameen ko uske kinaaron se ghataate chale aa rahe hain (ya'ni islam phail rahaa hai) Allah hukm karta hai koyi uske ahkaam peechhe daalne waala nahin. woh jald hisaab lene waala hai.' (Ar- Ra'd:13/41) zameen ko ghataane ka matlab hai ke arab ki sar zameen mushrikeen par batadreej tang ho rahi hai aur islam ko ghalbah-o-urooj haasil ho rahaa hai.

verses.arabic: قُلْ إِنَّمَآ أُنذِرُكُم بِٱلْوَحْىِۖ وَلَا يَسْمَعُ ٱلصُّمُّ ٱلدُّعَآءَ إِذَا مَا يُنذَرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qul 'innamaaa 'unzirukum bilwahyi; wa laa yasma'uş-şummud- du'aaa'a 'izaa maa yunzaroon.
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: bas main to tumhein wahi ke saath daraata hoon, aur bahre pukaar ko nahin sunte jab unhein daraaya jaaye.

verses.arabic: وَلَئِن مَّسَّتْهُمْ نَفْحَةٌۭ مِّنْ عَذَابِ رَبِّكَ لَيَقُولُنَّ يَـٰوَيْلَنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَـٰلِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa la'im-massathum nafhatum-min 'azaabi Rabbika layaqoolunna yaawaylanaaa 'innaa kunnaa zaalimeen.
verses.translation: Albatta agar unhein aapke rab ke azaab ka ek halka sa jhonka bhi chhu jaaye to woh zaroor kahenge: haaye hamaari kam bakhti! Bilaa shubah hum hi zaalim the.

verses.arabic: وَنَضَعُ ٱلْمَوَٰزِينَ ٱلْقِسْطَ لِيَوْمِ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ فَلَا تُظْلَمُ نَفْسٌۭ شَيْـًۭٔاۖ وَإِن كَانَ مِثْقَالَ حَبَّةٍۢ مِّنْ خَرْدَلٍ أَتَيْنَا بِهَاۗ وَكَفَىٰ بِنَا حَـٰسِبِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa nada'ul- mawaazeenal-qista li- Yawmil-Qiyaamati falaa tuzlamu nafsun shay'aa; wa 'in kaana misqaala habbatim-min khardalin 'ataynaa bihaa; wa kafaa binaa haasibeen.
verses.translation: Aur hum qiyaamat ke din insaaf ke taraazu rakkhenge, phir kisi shakhs par kuchh zulm na hoga, aur agar raayi ke daane ke baraabar bhi amal hoga to hum use (taulne ke liye) le aayeinge, aur hum hisaab karne waale kaafi hain.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا مُوسَىٰ وَهَـٰرُونَ ٱلْفُرْقَانَ وَضِيَآءًۭ وَذِكْرًۭا لِّلْمُتَّقِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad 'aataynaa Moosaa wa Haaroonal- Furqaana wa diyaaa'añw-wa zikral- lilmuttaqeen.
verses.translation: Aur yaqeenan humne Moosa aur Haaroon ko furqaan (tauraat) aur raushni enaayat ki aur un muttaqeen ke liye naseehat di.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَخْشَوْنَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلْغَيْبِ وَهُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّاعَةِ مُشْفِقُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Allazeena yakhshawna Rabbahum bilghaybi wa hum minas- Saa'ati mushfiqoon.
verses.translation: Jo apne rab se bin dekhe darte hain aur woh qiyaamat se bhi darte rahte hain.

verses.arabic: وَهَـٰذَا ذِكْرٌۭ مُّبَارَكٌ أَنزَلْنَـٰهُۚ أَفَأَنتُمْ لَهُۥ مُنكِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa haazaa Zikrum- Mubaarakun 'anzalnaah; 'afa'antum lahoo munkiroon.
verses.translation: Aur yeh (Qur'an) baa barkat zikr hai jise humne naazil kiya hai, kiya phir tum uske munkir ho?¹
verses.deepMeaning: Mulaahazah ho Haashyah: (Surah Yunus:10/37) aur (Surah Aal-e-Imran:3/85)

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَآ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ رُشْدَهُۥ مِن قَبْلُ وَكُنَّا بِهِۦ عَـٰلِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad 'aataynaaa 'Ibraaheema rushdahoo min qablu wa kunnaa bihee 'aalimeen.
verses.translation: Aur bilaa shubah usse bhi pahle humne Ibraheem ko uski daanaayi di thi, aur hum use khoob jaanne waale the.

verses.arabic: إِذْ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوْمِهِۦ مَا هَـٰذِهِ ٱلتَّمَاثِيلُ ٱلَّتِىٓ أَنتُمْ لَهَا عَـٰكِفُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Iz qaala li'abeehi wa qawmihee maa haazihit- tamaaseelul-lateee 'antum lahaa 'aakifoon.
verses.translation: Jab usne apne baap aur apni qaum se kaha: yeh kiya hain murtiyaan jinse tum lage baithhe ho?

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ وَجَدْنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا لَهَا عَـٰبِدِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo wajadnaaa 'aabaaa'anaa lahaa 'aabideen.
verses.translation: Woh kahne lage: humne  apne baap dada ko inhi ki ibaadat karte huye paaya.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Jis tarah aaj bhi jehaalat-o-khurafaat mein phanse huye musalmaanon ko bid'aat-o-rusumaat-e- jaahiliyah se roka jaaye to woh jawaab dete hain ke hum unhein kis tarah chhodein, jab ke hamaare aabaa-o-ajdaad bhi yahi kuchh karte rahe hain aur yahi woh jawaab muqallideen dete hain jo nusoos kitab-o-sunnat se e'raaz karke apne imam aur uski taraf mansoob fiqah se chimte rahne ko zaroori khayaal karte hain.

verses.arabic: قَالَ لَقَدْ كُنتُمْ أَنتُمْ وَءَابَآؤُكُمْ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍۢ مُّبِينٍۢ
verses.transliteration: Qaala laqad kuntum 'antum wa 'aabaaa'ukum fee dalaalim-mubeen.
verses.translation: Ibraheem ne kaha: bilaa shubah tum aur tumhaare baap dada khuli gumraahi mein pade huye ho.

verses.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ أَجِئْتَنَا بِٱلْحَقِّ أَمْ أَنتَ مِنَ ٱللَّـٰعِبِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaalooo 'aji'tanaa bilhaqqi 'am 'anta minal- laa'ibeen.
verses.translation: Unhon ne kaha: kiya tu hamaare paas haq laaya hai ya tu khel karne waalon mein se hai?

verses.arabic: قَالَ بَل رَّبُّكُمْ رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ٱلَّذِى فَطَرَهُنَّ وَأَنَا۠ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكُم مِّنَ ٱلشَّـٰهِدِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala bar-Rabbukum Rabbus-samaawaati wal'ardil-lazee fatarahunna wa 'ana 'alaa zaalikum minash- shaahideen.
verses.translation: Ibraheem ne kaha: balke tumhaara rab aasmaanon aur zameen ka rab hai jisne unhein paida kiya hai, aur main uss par tumhaare saamne gawaahi deta hoon.

verses.arabic: وَتَٱللَّهِ لَأَكِيدَنَّ أَصْنَامَكُم بَعْدَ أَن تُوَلُّوا۟ مُدْبِرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa tallaahi la'akeedanna 'aşnaamakum ba'da 'an tuwalloo mudbireen.
verses.translation: Aur Allah ki qasam! Tumhaare jaane ke ba'd main zaroor tumhaare buton ka elaaj karunga.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Yeh hazrat Ibraheem عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام ne apne dil mein azm kiya, ba'z kahte hain ke aahistah se kaha jis se maqsood ba'z logon ko sunaana tha, wallahu a'alam, keid (elaaj) se muraad yahaan woh amal-o- sayi' hai jo woh zabaani wa'z ke ba'd taghayyur-e-munkir ke amali ehtemaam ki shakl mein karna chaahte the, ya'ni buton ki tod phod.

verses.arabic: فَجَعَلَهُمْ جُذَٰذًا إِلَّا كَبِيرًۭا لَّهُمْ لَعَلَّهُمْ إِلَيْهِ يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.transliteration: Faja'alahum juzaazan 'illaa kabeeral- lahum la allahum 'ilayhi yarji'oon.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh usne unke bade (but) ko chhod kar baaqi sab ko tukde tukde kar daala taake woh uski taraf ruju' karein.

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ مَن فَعَلَ هَـٰذَا بِـَٔالِهَتِنَآ إِنَّهُۥ لَمِنَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo man fa'ala haazaa bi'aalihatinaaa 'innahoo laminaz- zaalimeen.
verses.translation: Woh kahne lage: kisne hamaare maboodon ka yeh haal kiya hai? bilaa shubah woh zaroor zaalimon mein se hai.

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ سَمِعْنَا فَتًۭى يَذْكُرُهُمْ يُقَالُ لَهُۥٓ إِبْرَٰهِيمُ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo sami'naa fatañy-yazkuruhum yuqaalu lahooo 'Ibraaheem.
verses.translation: (Ba'z) kahne lage: humne naujawaan ko unka zikr karte suna tha, use Ibraheem kahaa jaata hai.

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ فَأْتُوا۟ بِهِۦ عَلَىٰٓ أَعْيُنِ ٱلنَّاسِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَشْهَدُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo fa'too bihee 'alaaa 'a'yunin-naasi la'allahum yashhadoon.
verses.translation: Unhon ne kaha: phir tum use logon ke saamne le aao taake woh dekhein.

verses.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ أَأَنتَ فَعَلْتَ هَـٰذَا بِـَٔالِهَتِنَا يَـٰٓإِبْرَٰهِيمُ
verses.transliteration: Qaalooo 'a'anta fa'alta haazaa bi'aalihatinaa yaaa 'Ibraaheem.
verses.translation: Unhon ne poochha: aye Ibraheem! Kiya toone hamaare maboodon ka yeh haal kiya hai?

verses.arabic: قَالَ بَلْ فَعَلَهُۥ كَبِيرُهُمْ هَـٰذَا فَسْـَٔلُوهُمْ إِن كَانُوا۟ يَنطِقُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala bal fa'alahoo kabeeruhum haazaa fas'aloohum 'in kaanoo yantiqoon.
verses.translation: Ibraheem ne kaha: (nahin) balke yeh kaam unke uss bade ne kiya hai, lehaaza tum unse poochh lo agar woh bolte hain.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Ek hadees mein Ibraheem عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام se mansoob teen jhoton ka zikr hai: yeh un mein se ek hai. Rasoolullah ﷺ ne farmaya: 'Ibraheem عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام ne apni ahliyah (saarah) ke saath hijrat ki, raaste mein ek zaalim baadshaah tha. usne Ibraheem عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام ko paighaam bheja ke woh Saarah ko uske paas bhej de, chunaancheh jab Ibraheem ne Saarah ko baadshaah ke paas bhej diya to woh uski taraf badi ki niyyat se badha, lekin Saarah ne uthh kar wazu kiya aur namaaz adaa ki aur arz kiya: ya Allah! Main tujh par aur tere Rasool par eemaan laayi hoon tu us kafir ko mujh par musallat na hone de. to woh baadshaah be hosh ho kar zameen par gir pada aur apni taangein zameen par ragadne laga.' (Al-Bukhari, Al-ikrah, baab:6) usne teen martabah aisa kiya aur har martabah uska yahi hashr huwa bil aakhir usne Saaarah ko chhod diya. Ibraheem عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام ne uss moqe par apni beewi Saarah ko apni 'bahan' kahaa tha. yeh ek tooriyah tha, maqsad deeni bahan tha. usi tarah do aur moqon par aapne tooriyah farmaya, ek uss waqt jab farmaya: 'main bimaar hoon.'' (Surah Saaffaat: 37/89) aur doosra jiska zikr aayat zer-e-bahas mein hai. yeh teenon baatein ta'reez, kinaaya aur tooriye ki qism se hain, lekin hadees mein unhein unki zaahri shakl ke e'tebaar se jhoot kaha gaya hai, haqeeqat mein yeh jhoot nahin hain lekin (Hasanaatul Abraari Sayyeaatul Muqarrabeen) ke tehat aisa kiya gaya hai, jaise Aadm ke nisyaan ko bhi (Wa A'saa aadamu Rabbahu Faghawa) (Taaha:20/121) se ta'beer kiya gaya hai. isliye hadees par e'teraaz karne ki koyi zaroorat nahin hai jaise ba'z muaasreen kar rahe hain.

verses.arabic: فَرَجَعُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمْ فَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّكُمْ أَنتُمُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Faraja ooo 'ilaaa 'anfusihim faqaalooo 'innakum 'antumuz- zaalimoon.
verses.translation: Phir unhon ne apne dil mein socha, to (baahum) kahne lage: beshak tumhi zaalim ho.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ نُكِسُوا۟ عَلَىٰ رُءُوسِهِمْ لَقَدْ عَلِمْتَ مَا هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ يَنطِقُونَ
verses.transliteration: Summa nukisoo 'alaa ru'oosihim laqad 'alimta maa haaa'ulaaa'i yantiqoon.
verses.translation: Phir woh (sharmindagi ke maare) apne sar daal kar ondhe ho rahe (aur kaha) bilaa shubah tu jaanta hai ke yeh (but) bolte nahin.

verses.arabic: قَالَ أَفَتَعْبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَنفَعُكُمْ شَيْـًۭٔا وَلَا يَضُرُّكُمْ
verses.transliteration: Qaala 'afata budoona min doonil-laahi maa laa yanfa'ukum shay'anw- wa laa yadurrukum.
verses.translation: Ibraheem ne kaha: kiya phir tum Allah ke siwa unki ibaadat karte ho jo tumhein kuchh nafa' nahin de sakte aur na tumhein nuqsaan de sakte hain.

verses.arabic: أُفٍّۢ لَّكُمْ وَلِمَا تَعْبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِۖ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Uffil-lakum wa limaa ta budoona min doonil- laah; 'afalaa taʻqiloon.
verses.translation: Tuff hai tum par aur un par jinki tum Allah ke siwa ibaadat karte ho, kiya phir tum aql nahin rakhte?

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ حَرِّقُوهُ وَٱنصُرُوٓا۟ ءَالِهَتَكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ فَـٰعِلِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo harriqoohu wansurooo 'aalihatakum 'in kuntum faa'ileen.
verses.translation: Unhon ne kaha: agar tumne kuchh karna hai to Ibraheem ko jalaado aur apne maboodon ki madad karo.

verses.arabic: قُلْنَا يَـٰنَارُ كُونِى بَرْدًۭا وَسَلَـٰمًا عَلَىٰٓ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ
verses.transliteration: Qulnaa yaa naaru koonee bardañw-wa salaaman 'alaaa 'Ibraaheem.
verses.translation: Humne kaha: aye Aag! tu Ibraheem par thhandi aur salaamti waali ho ja.

verses.arabic: وَأَرَادُوا۟ بِهِۦ كَيْدًۭا فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمُ ٱلْأَخْسَرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'araadoo bihee kaydan faja'alnaahumul- 'akhsareen.
verses.translation: Aur unhon ne Ibraheem ka bura chaaha tha, to humne unehin hi bahut khasaare mein daal diya.

verses.arabic: وَنَجَّيْنَـٰهُ وَلُوطًا إِلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ ٱلَّتِى بَـٰرَكْنَا فِيهَا لِلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa najjaynaahu wa Lootan 'ilal-'ardil-latee baaraknaa feehaa lil'aalameen.
verses.translation: Aur humne use (Ibraheem) aur Loot ko uss zameen ki taraf najaat di jis mein humne ahl-e-aalam ke liye barkat rakkhi thi.

verses.arabic: وَوَهَبْنَا لَهُۥٓ إِسْحَـٰقَ وَيَعْقُوبَ نَافِلَةًۭۖ وَكُلًّۭا جَعَلْنَا صَـٰلِحِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa wahabnaa lahooo 'Ishaaq; wa Yaʻqooba naafilah; wa kullan ja'alnaa saaliheen.
verses.translation: Aur humne use Ishaaq bakhsha, aur Yaqoob mazeed (diya), aur har ek ko hum ne saaleh banaaya.

verses.arabic: وَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ أَئِمَّةًۭ يَهْدُونَ بِأَمْرِنَا وَأَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَيْهِمْ فِعْلَ ٱلْخَيْرَٰتِ وَإِقَامَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَإِيتَآءَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةِۖ وَكَانُوا۟ لَنَا عَـٰبِدِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa jaʻalnaahum 'a'immatany-yahdoona bi'amrinaa wa 'awhaynaaa 'ilayhim fi'lal-khayraati wa 'iqaamaş-Şalaati wa 'eetaaa'az-Zakaati wa kaanoo lanaa 'aabideen.
verses.translation: Aur humne unhein imam banaaya, woh hamaare hukm se (logon ko) raah-e- hidaayat bataate the, aur humne un par nekiyaan karne, namaaz qaayem rakhne aur zakaat dene ki wahi ki, aur woh hamaare ibaadat guzaar the.

verses.arabic: وَلُوطًا ءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ حُكْمًۭا وَعِلْمًۭا وَنَجَّيْنَـٰهُ مِنَ ٱلْقَرْيَةِ ٱلَّتِى كَانَت تَّعْمَلُ ٱلْخَبَـٰٓئِثَۗ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَوْمَ سَوْءٍۢ فَـٰسِقِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa Lootan 'aataynaahu hukmanw- wa 'ilmanw-wa najjaynaahu minal- qaryatil-latee kaanat- ta'malul-khabaaa'is; 'innahum kaanoo qawma saw'in faasiqeen.
verses.translation: Aur humne Loot ko hikmat (nabuwwat) aur ilm diya, aur humne use uss basti se najaat di jiske baashinde badkaariyaan karte the. bilaa shubah woh bahut bure aur naafarmaan log the.

verses.arabic: وَأَدْخَلْنَـٰهُ فِى رَحْمَتِنَآۖ إِنَّهُۥ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'adkhalnaahu fee rahmatinaaa 'innahoo minas-saaliheen.
verses.translation: Aur humne uss (Loot) ko apni rahmat mein daakhil kiya, beshak woh saaleheen mein se tha.

verses.arabic: وَنُوحًا إِذْ نَادَىٰ مِن قَبْلُ فَٱسْتَجَبْنَا لَهُۥ فَنَجَّيْنَـٰهُ وَأَهْلَهُۥ مِنَ ٱلْكَرْبِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
verses.transliteration: Wa Noohan 'iz naadaa min qablu fastajabnaa lahoo fanajjaynaahu wa 'ahlahoo minal-karbil- 'azeem.
verses.translation: Aur Nooh (ko yaad karein) jab un (sab Ambiya) se pahle usne (humein) pukaara to humne uski dua' qubool ki, chunaancheh humne use aur uske ahl (mominon) ko bahut bade gham se najaat di.

verses.arabic: وَنَصَرْنَـٰهُ مِنَ ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَآۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَوْمَ سَوْءٍۢ فَأَغْرَقْنَـٰهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa naşarnaahu minal- qawmil-lazeena kazzaboo bi-'Aayaatinaa; 'innahum kaanoo qawma saw'in fa'aghraqnaahum 'ajma'een.
verses.translation: Aur humne uss qaum ke khilaaf uski madad ki jisne hamaari aayaat ko jhutlaaya tha, beshak woh bure log the, lehaaza humne un sab ko gharq kar diya.

verses.arabic: وَدَاوُۥدَ وَسُلَيْمَـٰنَ إِذْ يَحْكُمَانِ فِى ٱلْحَرْثِ إِذْ نَفَشَتْ فِيهِ غَنَمُ ٱلْقَوْمِ وَكُنَّا لِحُكْمِهِمْ شَـٰهِدِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa Daawooda wa Sulaymaana 'iz yahkumaani fil-harsi 'iz nafashat feehi ghanamul-qawmi wa kunnaa lihukmihim shaahideen.
verses.translation: Aur (yaad karein) Dawood aur Sulaimaan ko jab woh donon uss kheti ki baabat faislah kar rahe the jise raat ko ek qaum ki bakriyaan char gayi thin, aur hum unke faisle ke shaahid the.

verses.arabic: فَفَهَّمْنَـٰهَا سُلَيْمَـٰنَۚ وَكُلًّا ءَاتَيْنَا حُكْمًۭا وَعِلْمًۭاۚ وَسَخَّرْنَا مَعَ دَاوُۥدَ ٱلْجِبَالَ يُسَبِّحْنَ وَٱلطَّيْرَۚ وَكُنَّا فَـٰعِلِينَ
verses.transliteration: Fafah-hamnaahaa sulaymaan; wa kullan 'aataynaa hukmanw-wa 'ilmaa; wa sakhkharnaa ma'a Daawoodal-jibaala yusabbihna wattayr; wa kunnaa faa'ileen.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh humne woh (faislah) Sulaimaan ko samjha diya, aur har ek ko humne hukm aur ilm diya, aur humne Dawood ke saath pahaad aur parinde musakhkhar kiye the, woh tasbeeh karte the, aur (yeh hum hi karne waale the.

verses.arabic: وَعَلَّمْنَـٰهُ صَنْعَةَ لَبُوسٍۢ لَّكُمْ لِتُحْصِنَكُم مِّنۢ بَأْسِكُمْۖ فَهَلْ أَنتُمۡ شَـٰكِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'allamnaahu san'ata laboosil-lakum lituḥşinakum mim ba'sikum fahal 'antum shaakiroon.
verses.translation: Aur humne use tumhaare liye zerah ki san'at sikhaayi thi taake tumhaari ladaayi (ki takleef) se tumhein bachaaye, phir kiya tum shukr karne waale ho?

verses.arabic: وَلِسُلَيْمَـٰنَ ٱلرِّيحَ عَاصِفَةًۭ تَجْرِى بِأَمْرِهِۦٓ إِلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ ٱلَّتِى بَٰرَكْنَا فِيهَاۚ وَكُنَّا بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَـٰلِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa li-Sulaymaanar- reeha 'aaşifatan tajree bi'amriheee 'ilal-'ardil- latee baaraknaa feehaa; wa kunnaa bikulli shay'in 'aalimeen.
verses.translation: Aur (humne) Sulaimaan ke liye tund-o-tez hawa musakhkhar kardi, uske hukm woh se uss sar zameen ki taraf chalti thi jis mein hum ne barkat di thi, aur hum har cheez ko khoob jaante hain.

verses.arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينِ مَن يَغُوصُونَ لَهُۥ وَيَعْمَلُونَ عَمَلًۭا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَۖ وَكُنَّا لَهُمْ حَـٰفِظِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa minash- Shayaateeni mañy- yaghooşoona lahoo wa ya'maloona 'amalan doona zaalika wa kunnaa lahum haafizeen.
verses.translation: Aur kuchh shaytaan bhi (taabe' kiye the) jo uske liye (samandar mein) ghotah lagaate, aur uske elaawah bhi kayi kaam karte the, aur hum hi unke nigraan the.

verses.arabic: وَأَيُّوبَ إِذْ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّى مَسَّنِىَ ٱلضُّرُّ وَأَنتَ أَرْحَمُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'Ayyooba 'iz naadaa Rabbahooo 'annee massaniyad- durru wa 'Anta 'arhamur-raahimeen.
verses.translation: Aur (yaad karein) Ayyub ko jab usne apne rab ko pukaara ke beshak mujhe takleef pahunchi hai, aur tu Arhamur Raahimeen hai.'

verses.arabic: فَٱسْتَجَبْنَا لَهُۥ فَكَشَفْنَا مَا بِهِۦ مِن ضُرٍّۢۖ وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ أَهْلَهُۥ وَمِثْلَهُم مَّعَهُمْ رَحْمَةًۭ مِّنْ عِندِنَا وَذِكْرَىٰ لِلْعَـٰبِدِينَ
verses.transliteration: Fastajabnaa lahoo fakashafnaa maa bihee min durriñw-wa 'aataynaahu 'ahlahoo wa mislahum ma'ahum rahmatam-min 'indinaa wa zikraa lil'aabideen.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh humne uski dua' qubool ki aur jo takleef use thi usko humne door kar diya aur humne use uske ahl-o-a'yaal bhi diye, aur apni meharbaani se unke saath utne hi aur bhi ataa kiye taake yeh ibaadat guzaaron ke liye naseehat ho.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Qura'n Majeed mein hazrat Ayyub ko saabir kaha gaya hai (Surah Saad:44) iska matlab yeh hai ke unhein sakht aazmaayishon mein daala gaya jin mein unhon ne sabr-o-shukr ka daaman haath se nahin chhoda. Yeh aazmaayishein aur takleefein kiya thin? uski mustanad tafseel to nahin milti. Taahum qur'an ke andaaz-e-bayaan se maloom hota hai ke Allah Ta'ala ne unhein maal-o-daulat-e- dunya aur aulaad waghairah se nawaaza huwa tha bataur aazmaayish Allah Ta'ala ne yeh sab ne'matein chheen lein hatta ke jismaani sehat se bhi mahroom aur bimaariyon mein ghir kar rah gaye. bil aakhir kaha jaata hai ke 18 saal ki aazmaayishon ke ba'd baargaah-e-ilaahi mein dua' ki Allah Ta'ala me dua' qubool farmaayi aur sehat ke saath maal aur aulaad pahle se do guna ataa farmaaye (iski kuchh tafseel sahih Ibne Hibban, jild:4,page:244 mein milti hai.)

verses.arabic: وَإِسْمَـٰعِيلَ وَإِدْرِيسَ وَذَا ٱلْكِفْلِۖ كُلٌّۭ مِّنَ ٱلصَّـٰبِرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'Ismaa'eela wa 'Idreesa wa Zal-Kifli kullum-minaş-şaabireen.
verses.translation: Aur Ismayeel, Idrees aur Zulkifl ko (yaad karein) yeh sab Saabir the.

verses.arabic: وَأَدْخَلْنَـٰهُمْ فِى رَحْمَتِنَآۖ إِنَّهُم مِّنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'adkhalnaahum fee rahmatinaaa 'innahum minas- saaliheen.
verses.translation: Aur humne unhein apni rahmat mein daakhil kiya, beshak woh saaliheen mein se the.

verses.arabic: وَذَا ٱلنُّونِ إِذ ذَّهَبَ مُغَـٰضِبًۭا فَظَنَّ أَن لَّن نَّقْدِرَ عَلَيْهِ فَنَادَىٰ فِى ٱلظُّلُمَـٰتِ أَن لَّآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّآ أَنتَ سُبْحَـٰنَكَ إِنِّى كُنتُ مِنَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa Zan-Nooni 'iz- zahaba mughaadiban fazanna 'al-lan naqdira 'alayhi fanaada fiz- zulumaati 'al-laaa 'ilaaha 'illaaa 'Anta Subhaanaka 'innee kuntu minaz-zaalimeen.
verses.translation: Aur (yaad karein) machhli waale (Yunus) ko, jab woh (apni qaum se) naaraaz ho kar chala gaya tha aur usne samjha tha ke hum uss par girift nahin karenge, phir usne (humein) andheron mein pukaara ke tere siwa koyi mabood nahin, tu paak hai, bilaa shubah main hi zaalimon mein se hoon.

verses.arabic: فَٱسْتَجَبْنَا لَهُۥ وَنَجَّيْنَـٰهُ مِنَ ٱلْغَمِّۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُـۨجِى ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.transliteration: Fastajabnaa lahoo wa najjaynaahu minal- ghamm; wa kazaalika nunjil-mu'mineen.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh humne uski a dua' qubool ki, aur humne use gham se najaat di, aur hum isi tarah mominon ko najaat dete hain.

verses.arabic: وَزَكَرِيَّآ إِذْ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥ رَبِّ لَا تَذَرْنِى فَرْدًۭا وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ ٱلْوَٰرِثِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa Zakariyyaaa 'iz naadaa Rabbahoo Rabbi laa tazarnee fardañw-wa 'Anta khayrul-waariseen.
verses.translation: Aur (yaad karein) Zakariya ko, jab usne apne rab ko pukaara tha: aye mere rab! Tu mujhe akela na chhod, aur tu hi behtareen waaris hai.

verses.arabic: فَٱسْتَجَبْنَا لَهُۥ وَوَهَبْنَا لَهُۥ يَحْيَىٰ وَأَصْلَحْنَا لَهُۥ زَوْجَهُۥٓۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ يُسَٰرِعُونَ فِى ٱلْخَيْرَٰتِ وَيَدْعُونَنَا رَغَبًۭا وَرَهَبًۭاۖ وَكَانُوا۟ لَنَا خَٰشِعِينَ
verses.transliteration: Fastajabnaa lahoo wa wahabnaa lahoo Yahyaa Wa 'aşlahnaa lahoo zawjah; 'innahum kaanoo yusaari'oona fil- khayraati wa yad'oonanaa raghabanw-wa rahabaa; wa kaanoo lanaa khaashi'een.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh humne uski dua' qubool ki, aur humne use Yahya ataa kiya, aur humne uske liye uski beewi ko durust kar diya, beshak woh Ambiya عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام ) nekiyon mein jaldi karte aur humein raghbat aur dar se pukaarte the, aur woh hamaare hi niyaaz mand the.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّتِىٓ أَحْصَنَتْ فَرْجَهَا فَنَفَخْنَا فِيهَا مِن رُّوحِنَا وَجَعَلْنَـٰهَا وَٱبْنَهَآ ءَايَةًۭ لِّلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wallateee 'ahsanat farjahaa fanafakhnaa feehaa mir-roohinaa wa ja'alnaahaa wabnahaaa 'Aayatal-lil'aalameen.
verses.translation: Aur uss aurat ko (yaad karein) jisne apni iffat-o- i'smat ki hifaazat ki thi, phir humne uss mein apni rooh phoonk di,¹ aur use uske bête (Eisa) ko ahl-e-aalam ke liye azeem nishaani bana diya.
verses.deepMeaning: Bayaan kiya jaata hai ke Jibrayeel عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام ne Maryam عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام ki qamees mein mahaz ek phoonk maari thi, chunaancheh Allah Ta'ala ne usi se Maryam عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام ke pet mein Maseeh عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام ko paida farma diya. (Tafseer Al-Qurtubi)

verses.arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰذِهِۦٓ أُمَّتُكُمْ أُمَّةًۭ وَٰحِدَةًۭ وَأَنَا۠ رَبُّكُمْ فَٱعْبُدُونِ
verses.transliteration: Inna haaziheee 'ummatukum 'ummatañw- waahidatanw-wa 'Ana Rabbukum fa'budoon.
verses.translation: Bilaa shubah yeh tumhaara deen ek hi deen hai, aur main tumhaara rab hoon, lehaaza tum meri hi ibaadat karo.

verses.arabic: وَتَقَطَّعُوٓا۟ أَمْرَهُم بَيْنَهُمْۖ كُلٌّ إِلَيْنَا رَٰجِعُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa taqatta'ooo 'amrahum baynahum kullun 'ilaynaa raaji'oon.
verses.translation: Aur unhon ne apna deen baahum tukde tukde kar daala, (bil aakhir) sab hamaari hi taraf lautenge.

verses.arabic: فَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ وَهُوَ مُؤْمِنٌۭ فَلَا كُفْرَانَ لِسَعْيِهِۦ وَإِنَّا لَهُۥ كَـٰتِبُونَ
verses.transliteration: Famany-ya'mal minas-saalihaati wa huwa mu'minun falaa kufraana lisa'yihee wa 'innaa lahoo kaatiboon.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh jo bhi nek amal kare aur woh momin (bhi) ho, to uski koshish ki naa qadri na hogi aur beshak hum uss (ke amlon) ke likh rahe hain.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Mulaahazah ho haashyah (Surah Taubah:9/121)

verses.arabic: وَحَرَٰمٌ عَلَىٰ قَرْيَةٍ أَهْلَكْنَـٰهَآ أَنَّهُمْ لَا يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa haraamun 'alaa qaryatin 'ahlaknaahaaa 'annahum laa yarji'oon.
verses.translation: Aur har basti jise humne halaak kiya hai, uss par laazim hai ke uske baashinde (dunya ki taraf) nahin lautenge.

verses.arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا فُتِحَتْ يَأْجُوجُ وَمَأْجُوجُ وَهُم مِّن كُلِّ حَدَبٍۢ يَنسِلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Hattaaa 'izaa futihat Ya'jooju wa Ma'jooju wa hum min kulli hadabiny- yansiloon.
verses.translation: Hatta ke jab Yaajooj aur Maajooj khol diye jaayenge aur woh har balandi se tezi se (daudte) aayenge.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Mulaahazah ho haashyah (Surah Kahaf:18/94

verses.arabic: وَٱقْتَرَبَ ٱلْوَعْدُ ٱلْحَقُّ فَإِذَا هِىَ شَٰخِصَةٌ أَبْصَـٰرُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ يَـٰوَيْلَنَا قَدْ كُنَّا فِى غَفْلَةٍۢ مِّنْ هَـٰذَا بَلْ كُنَّا ظَـٰلِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Waqtarabal-wa'dul- haqqu fa'izaa hiya shaakhişatun 'absaarul- lazeena kafaroo yaa waylanaa qad kunnaa fee ghaflatim-min haazaa bal kunnaa zaalimeen.
verses.translation: Aur sachcha wa'dah (yaum-e-qiyaamat) qareeb aa pahunchega, tab kaafiron ki aankhein phati ki phati rah jaayengi, (aur woh kahenge:) haaye hamaari kam bakhti! Hum isse ghaflat mein rahe balke hum hi zaalim the.

verses.arabic: إِنَّكُمْ وَمَا تَعْبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ حَصَبُ جَهَنَّمَ أَنتُمْ لَهَا وَٰرِدُونَ
verses.transliteration: Innakum wa maa ta'budoona min doonil laahi haşabu Jahannama 'antum lahaa waaridoon
verses.translation: Beshak tum aur jinki tum Allah ke siwa ibaadat karte ho, jahannam ka endhan hain, tum uss par waarid hone waale ho.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Jab Allah Ta'ala ka yeh irshaad naazil huwa to mushkireen-e-quraish bahut khush huye aur kahne lage: hum khush haín ke dozakh mein hum apne maboodon ke saath honge jaisa ke but (dozakh mein) apne pujaaryon ke saath honge, lehaaza Eisa Ibne Maryam aur Uzair عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام bhi (dozakh mein) apne pujaaryon ke saath honge aur usi tarah doosre log bhi chúnaancheh Allah Ta'ala ne iss masale ki wazaahat aur mushrikeen ke da'we ki tardeed ke liye qur'an kareeim ki aayat: (21:101) naazil farmaayi: (Tafseer Ibne Kaseer, Surah Ambiya, aayat:101)

verses.arabic: لَوْ كَانَ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ ءَالِهَةًۭ مَّا وَرَدُوهَاۖ وَكُلٌّۭ فِيهَا خَـٰلِدُونَ
verses.transliteration: Law kaana haaa'ulaaa'i 'aalihatam- maa waradoohaa wa kullun feehaa khaalidoon.
verses.translation: Agar yeh (waaqayi') mabood hote to uss par waarid na hote, aur woh sab hameshah jahannam mein rahenge.

verses.arabic: لَهُمْ فِيهَا زَفِيرٌۭ وَهُمْ فِيهَا لَا يَسْمَعُونَ
verses.transliteration: Lahum feehaa zafeeruñw-wa hum feehaa laa yasma'oon.
verses.translation: uss mein unke liye cheekhna chillaana hoga, aur woh uss mein kuchh na sun paayeinge.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ سَبَقَتْ لَهُم مِّنَّا ٱلْحُسْنَىٰٓ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ عَنْهَا مُبْعَدُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Innal-lazeena sabaqat lahum minnal- husnaaa 'ulaaa'ika 'anhaa mub'adoon.
verses.translation: Beshak jin logon ke liye hamaari taraf se pahle hi neki aur bhalaayi muqaddar ho chuki hai, woh usse door rakkhe jaayenge.

verses.arabic: لَا يَسْمَعُونَ حَسِيسَهَا وَهُمْ فِى مَا ٱشْتَهَتْ أَنفُسُهُمْ خَـٰلِدُونَ
verses.transliteration: Laa yasma'oona haseesahaa wa hum fee mash-tahat 'anfusuhum khaalidoon.
verses.translation: Woh uski aahat (bhi) na suneinge, aur woh apni dil pasand nematon mein hameshah raheinge.

verses.arabic: لَا يَحْزُنُهُمُ ٱلْفَزَعُ ٱلْأَكْبَرُ وَتَتَلَقَّىٰهُمُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ هَـٰذَا يَوْمُكُمُ ٱلَّذِى كُنتُمْ تُوعَدُونَ
verses.transliteration: Laa yahzunuhumul- faza'ul-'akbaru wa tatalaqqaahumul- malaaa'ikatu haazaa Yawmukumul-lazee kuntum too'adoon.
verses.translation: Badi ghabraahat unhein ghamgeen nahin karegi, aur farishte unse yeh kah kar milenge: yeh hai tumhaara woh din jiska tum se wa'dah kiya jaata tha.

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ نَطْوِى ٱلسَّمَآءَ كَطَىِّ ٱلسِّجِلِّ لِلْكُتُبِۖ كَمَا بَدَأْنَآ أَوَّلَ خَلْقٍۢ نُّعِيدُهُۥۚ وَعْدًا عَلَيْنَآۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا فَـٰعِلِينَ
verses.transliteration: Yawma natwis- samaaa'a katayyis-sijilli lilkutub; kamaa bada'naaa 'awwala khalqin nu'eeduh; wa'dan 'alaynaaa; 'innaa kunnaa faa'ileen
verses.translation: Jis din hum aasmaan ko likkhe huye kaaghaz lapet denge,¹ denge ki tarah jis jis tarah humne takhleeq ki ibteda ki thi usi tarah hum phir uska eaadah kareinge. (yeh) hamaare zimme wa'dah hai, beshak hum use pura karne waale hain.
verses.deepMeaning: Ya'ni jis tarah kaatib likhne ke ba'd auraaq ya ragister ko lapet kar rakh deta hai jaise doosre maqaam par farmaya: 'Aur aasmaan uske daayein haath mein lipte honge' (Surah Zumar:39/67)

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ كَتَبْنَا فِى ٱلزَّبُورِ مِنۢ بَعْدِ ٱلذِّكْرِ أَنَّ ٱلْأَرْضَ يَرِثُهَا عِبَادِىَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad katabnaa fiz-Zaboori mim ba'diz- zikri 'annal-'arda yarisuhaa 'ibaadiyaş- saalihoon
verses.translation: Aur bilaa shubah hum zaboor mein naseehat ke ba'd yeh likh chuke hain ke beshak mere nek bande zameen ke waaris honge.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ فِى هَـٰذَا لَبَلَٰغًۭا لِّقَوْمٍ عَـٰبِدِينَ
verses.transliteration: 'Inna fee haazaa labalaaghal-liqawmin 'aabideen.
verses.translation: Bilaa shubah uss mein hamaare ibaadat guzaar bandon ke liye bahut badi ittela' hai.

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَـٰكَ إِلَّا رَحْمَةًۭ لِّلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maaa 'arsalnaaka 'illaa rahmatal-lil'aalameen.
verses.translation: Aur (Aye Nabi!) humne aapko tamaam jahaan waalon ke liye rahmat banaakar hi bheja hai.

verses.arabic: قُلْ إِنَّمَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَىَّ أَنَّمَآ إِلَـٰهُكُمْ إِلَـٰهٌۭ وَٰحِدٌۭ فَهَلْ أَنتُم مُّسْلِمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qul 'innamaa yoohaaa 'ilayya 'annamaaa 'ilaahukum 'ilaahuñw-Waahid; fahal 'antum muslimoon.
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: meri taraf to sirf yeh wahi ki jaati hai ke bas tumhaara mabood ek hi hai, phir kiya tum musalmaan ho?

verses.arabic: فَإِن تَوَلَّوْا۟ فَقُلْ ءَاذَنتُكُمْ عَلَىٰ سَوَآءٍۢۖ وَإِنْ أَدْرِىٓ أَقَرِيبٌ أَم بَعِيدٌۭ مَّا تُوعَدُونَ
verses.transliteration: Fa'in tawallaw faqul 'aazantukum 'alaa sawaaa'in; wa 'in 'adreee 'aqareebun 'am ba'eedum-mua too'adoon.
verses.translation: Phir agar woh munh modein to kah deejiye: main ne tumhein yaksaan taur par khabardaar kar diya hai, aur main nahin jaanta ke jiska tumhein wadah diya jaata hai woh qareeb hai ya bayeed?

verses.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ يَعْلَمُ ٱلْجَهْرَ مِنَ ٱلْقَوْلِ وَيَعْلَمُ مَا تَكْتُمُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Innahoo ya'lamul- jahra minal-qawli wa yalamu maa taktumoon.
verses.translation: Beshak Allah pukaar kar kahi huyi baat ko bhi jaanta hai, aur jo tum chhupaate ho, usko bhi jaanta hai.

verses.arabic: وَإِنْ أَدْرِى لَعَلَّهُۥ فِتْنَةٌۭ لَّكُمْ وَمَتَـٰعٌ إِلَىٰ حِينٍۢ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'in 'adree la'allahoo fitnatul-lakum wa mataa'un 'ilaa heen.
verses.translation: Aur main nahin jaanta shaayad yeh (taakheer-e- azaab) tumhaare liye aazmaayish aur ek waqt tak tumhein maze karaana ho.

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱحْكُم بِٱلْحَقِّۗ وَرَبُّنَا ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ ٱلْمُسْتَعَانُ عَلَىٰ مَا تَصِفُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala Rabbih-kum bilhaqq; wa Rabbunar- Rahmaanul-mustaʻaanu 'alaa maa taşifoon.
verses.translation: (Rasool ne) kaha: aye mere rab! Haq ke saath faislah farma, aur hamaara rab nehaayat meharbaan hai, jo baatein tum bayaan karte ho un par wahi madad maange jaane ke laayeq hai.

verses.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ ٱتَّقُوا۟ رَبَّكُمْ إِنَّ زَلْزَلَةَ ٱلسَّاعَةِ شَىْءٌ عَظِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhan- naasut-taqoo Rabbakum; 'inna zalzalatas-Saa'ati shay'un 'azeem.
verses.translation: Aye logo! apne rab se daro, beshak qiyaamat ka zalzalah bahut badi (haulnaak) cheez hai.

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ تَرَوْنَهَا تَذْهَلُ كُلُّ مُرْضِعَةٍ عَمَّآ أَرْضَعَتْ وَتَضَعُ كُلُّ ذَاتِ حَمْلٍ حَمْلَهَا وَتَرَى ٱلنَّاسَ سُكَٰرَىٰ وَمَا هُم بِسُكَٰرَىٰ وَلَـٰكِنَّ عَذَابَ ٱللَّهِ شَدِيدٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Yawma tarawnahaa tazhalu kullu murdi'atin 'ammaaa 'arda'at wa tada'u kullu zaati hamlin hamlahaa wa taran- naasa sukaaraa wa maa hum bisukaaraa wa laakinnaa 'azaabal-laahi shadeed.
verses.translation: Jis din tum use dekhoge (yeh haal hoga) ke har doodh pilaane waali apne doodh peete bachche se ghaafil ho jaayegi, aur har hamal waali apna hamal daal degi, aur aap logon ko nashe mein (madhosh) dekhenge, haalaanke woh nashe mein nahin honge, lekin Allah ka azaab (bada hi) shadeed hoga.

verses.arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يُجَـٰدِلُ فِى ٱللَّهِ بِغَيْرِ عِلْمٍۢ وَيَتَّبِعُ كُلَّ شَيْطَـٰنٍۢ مَّرِيدٍۢ
verses.transliteration: Wa minan-naasi mañy- yujaadilu fil-laahi bighayri 'ilminw-wa yattabi'u kulla shaytaanim-mareed.
verses.translation: Aur kuchh log aise hain jo Allah ke baare mein ilm ke baghair bahas karte hain, aur woh har sarkash shaytaan ka itteba' karte hain.

verses.arabic: كُتِبَ عَلَيْهِ أَنَّهُۥ مَن تَوَلَّاهُ فَأَنَّهُۥ يُضِلُّهُۥ وَيَهْدِيهِ إِلَىٰ عَذَابِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ
verses.transliteration: Kutiba 'alayhi 'annahoo man tawallaahu fa'annahoo yudilluhoo wa yahdeehi 'ilaa 'azaabis-sa'eer.
verses.translation: Uski baabat likh diya gaya ke beshak jo koyi usse dosti karega, to yaqeenan woh use gumraah karega aur dozakh ke azaab ki taraf le jaayega.

verses.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ إِن كُنتُمْ فِى رَيْبٍۢ مِّنَ ٱلْبَعْثِ فَإِنَّا خَلَقْنَـٰكُم مِّن تُرَابٍۢ ثُمَّ مِن نُّطْفَةٍۢ ثُمَّ مِنْ عَلَقَةٍۢ ثُمَّ مِن مُّضْغَةٍۢ مُّخَلَّقَةٍۢ وَغَيْرِ مُخَلَّقَةٍۢ لِّنُبَيِّنَ لَكُمْۚ وَنُقِرُّ فِى ٱلْأَرْحَامِ مَا نَشَآءُ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍۢ مُّسَمًّۭى ثُمَّ نُخْرِجُكُمْ طِفْلًۭا ثُمَّ لِتَبْلُغُوٓا۟ أَشُدَّكُمْۖ وَمِنكُم مَّن يُتَوَفَّىٰ وَمِنكُم مَّن يُرَدُّ إِلَىٰٓ أَرْذَلِ ٱلْعُمُرِ لِكَيْلَا يَعْلَمَ مِنۢ بَعْدِ عِلْمٍۢ شَيْـًۭٔاۚ وَتَرَى ٱلْأَرْضَ هَامِدَةًۭ فَإِذَآ أَنزَلْنَا عَلَيْهَا ٱلْمَآءَ ٱهْتَزَّتْ وَرَبَتْ وَأَنۢبَتَتْ مِن كُلِّ زَوْجٍۢ بَهِيجٍۢ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhan-naasu 'in kuntum fee raybim- minal-ba'si fa'innaa khalaqnaakum min turaabin summa min nutfatin summa min 'alaqatin summa mim- mudghatim- mukhallaqatiñw-wa ghayri mukhallaqatil- linubayyina lakum; wa nuqirru fil-'arhaami maa nashaaa'u 'ilaaa 'ajalim- musamman summa nukhrijukum tiflan summa litablughooo 'ashuddakum wa minkum mañy- yutawaffaa wa minkum many-yuraddu 'ilaaa 'arzalil-'umuri likaylaa yalama mim ba'di 'ilmin shay'aa; wa taral-'arda haamidatan fa'izaaa 'anzalnaa 'alayhal- maaa'ah-tazzat wa rabat wa 'ambatat min kulli zawjim baheej.
verses.translation: Aye logo! agar tum dobaarah ji uthhne ke muta'alliq shak mein ho to (tumhein ilm hona chaahiye ke) bilaa shubah humne tumhein mitti se paia kiya, phir nutfe se, phir jame huye khoon se, phir gosht ke lothde se,¹ jo waazeh shakl waala bhi hota hai aur ghair waazeh (adhuri) shakl waala bhi, taake hum tumhaare liye (apni qudrat-o-hikmat) waazeh karein, aur hum jis (nutfe) ke muta'alliq chaahein use muqarrarah muddat tak rahmon mein thhahraate hain, phir tumhein mukammal bachcha banaa kar nikaalte hain taake tum apni jawaani ko pahuncho, aur tum mein se koyi faut kar diya jaata hai, aur tum mein se koyi naa kaarah umr ki taraf lautaaya jaata hai taake woh jaanne ke ba'd kuchh bhi na jaane, aur aap dekhte hain ke zameen banjar aur khushk padi thi, phir jab hum ne uss par paani naazil kiya to usne harkat ki aur lahlahaa uthhi, aur phooli, aur usne har tarah ki khushnuma nabataat nikaali.
verses.deepMeaning: Hadees se bhi iski taayeed hoti hai. Rasoolullah ﷺ ne farmaya: 'tum mein se har ek apni maan ke shikam mein pahle 40 roz tak (nutfah ki surat mein) rakkha jaata hai, phir woh 40 roz tak jame huye khoon ki surat mein rahta hai, phir woh 40 roz tak gosht ka lothda ban kar rahta hai, phir Allah Ta'ala uski taraf ek farishtah bhejta hai ke woh chaar baatein likh de. chunaancheh woh uske a'amaal uski maut ka waqt, uska rizq aur yeh ke woh badbakht hoga ya nek bakht likh deta hai, phir uske jism mein rooh phoonki jaati hai, chunaancheh koyi aadmi do zakhiyon jaise amal karta rahta hai yahaan tak ke uske aur dozakh ke darmiyaan ek haath ka faaslah rah jaata hai lekin uss par taqdeer ka likkha ghaalib aa jaata hai to woh jannatyon jaise amal karke jannat mein daakhil ho jaata hai. isi tarah ek aadmi jannatiyon jaise kaam karta rahta hatta ke uske aur jannat ke darmiyaan ek haath ka faaslah rah jaata hai lekin uss par taqdeer ka likkha ghaalib aa jaata hai aur woh jahannamiyon jaise amal karne lag jaata hai aur jahannam mein daakhil ho jaata hai.' (Sahih Bukhari, Ahaadeesul Ambiya, Baab:1, Hadees:3332)

verses.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلْحَقُّ وَأَنَّهُۥ يُحْىِ ٱلْمَوْتَىٰ وَأَنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ قَدِيرٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Zaalika bi'annal-laaha Huwal-haqqu wa 'annahoo yuhyil-mawtaa wa 'annahoo 'alaa kulli shay'in Qadeer.
verses.translation: Yeh (sab kuchh) isliye ke beshak Allah hi haq hai, aur beshak wahi murdon ko zindah karta hai, aur beshak woh har cheez par khoob qaadir hai.

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ ءَاتِيَةٌۭ لَّا رَيْبَ فِيهَا وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَبْعَثُ مَن فِى ٱلْقُبُورِ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'annas-Saa'ata 'aatiyatul-laa rayba feehaa wa 'annal-laaha yab'asu man fil-quboor.
verses.translation: Aur yeh ke bilaa shubah qiyaamat aane waali hai, uss mein koyi shak nahin, aur beshak Allah unko uthhaayega jo qabron mein (pade) hain.

verses.arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يُجَـٰدِلُ فِى ٱللَّهِ بِغَيْرِ عِلْمٍۢ وَلَا هُدًۭى وَلَا كِتَـٰبٍۢ مُّنِيرٍۢ
verses.transliteration: Wa minan-naasi mañy- yujaadilu fil-laahi bighayri 'ilmiñw-wa laa hudanw-wa laa Kitaabim-Muneer.
verses.translation: Aur kuchh log aise hain jo Allah ke baare mein baghair ilm, baghair hidaayat aur baghair raushan kitab ke bahas karte hain.

verses.arabic: ثَانِىَ عِطْفِهِۦ لِيُضِلَّ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِۖ لَهُۥ فِى ٱلدُّنْيَا خِزْىٌۭ وَنُذِيقُهُۥ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ عَذَابَ ٱلْحَرِيقِ
verses.transliteration: Saaniya 'itfihee liyudilla 'an sabeelil-laahi lahoo fid-dunyaa khizyunw-wa nuzeequhoo Yawmal- Qiyaamati 'azaabal- hareeq.
verses.translation: (Takabbur ki wajah se haq se) pahlu tahi karte huye,¹ taake (logon ko) Allah ki raah se bahkaaye, uske liye dunya mein ruswaayi hai aur yaum- e-qiyaamat hum use jalaane waala azaab chakhaayeinge.

verses.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِمَا قَدَّمَتْ يَدَاكَ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَيْسَ بِظَلَّـٰمٍۢ لِّلْعَبِيدِ
verses.transliteration: Zaalika bimaa qaddamat yadaaka wa 'annal-laaha laysa bizallaamil-lil'abeed.
verses.translation: (kaha jaayega) yeh uska badlah hai jo tere donon haathon ne aage bheja, aur beshak Allah apne bandon par zulm karne waala nahinn hai.

verses.arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يَعْبُدُ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ حَرْفٍۢۖ فَإِنْ أَصَابَهُۥ خَيْرٌ ٱطْمَأَنَّ بِهِۦ وَإِنْ أَصَابَتْهُ فِتْنَةٌ ٱنقَلَبَ عَلَىٰ وَجْهِهِۦ خَسِرَ ٱلدُّنْيَا وَٱلْـَٔاخِرَةَۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْخُسْرَانُ ٱلْمُبِينُ
verses.transliteration: 1. Wa minan-naasi many-ya'budul-laaha 'alaa harfin fa'in 'aşaabahoo khayrunit- ma'anna bihee wa 'in 'aşaabathu fitnatunin- qalaba 'alaa wajhihee khasirad-dunyaa wal- 'Aakhirah; zaalika huwal-khusraanul- mubeen.
verses.translation: Aur logon mein se koyi Allah ki ibaadat karta hai kinaare (shak) par, phir agar use bhalaayi mil gayi to uss par mutmayin ho gaya, aur agar use koyi aazmaayish aa padi to apne munh ke bal ulta phir jaata hai, usne dunya aur aakhirat mein khasaarah uthhaaya, yahi khula khasaarah hai.

verses.arabic: يَدْعُوا۟ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَضُرُّهُۥ وَمَا لَا يَنفَعُهُۥۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلضَّلَـٰلُ ٱلْبَعِيدُ
verses.transliteration: Yad'oo min doonil- laahi maa laa yadurruhoo wa maa laa yanfa'uh; zaalika huwad-dalaalul-ba'eed.
verses.translation: Woh Allah ke siwa use pukaarta hai jo use na nuqsaan pahuncha sakta hai aur na use nafa' de sakta hai. yahi hai door ki gumraahi.

verses.arabic: يَدْعُوا۟ لَمَن ضَرُّهُۥٓ أَقْرَبُ مِن نَّفْعِهِۦۚ لَبِئْسَ ٱلْمَوْلَىٰ وَلَبِئْسَ ٱلْعَشِيرُ
verses.transliteration: Yad'oo laman darruhooo 'aqrabu min- nafih; labi'sal-mawlaa wa labi'sal-'asheer.
verses.translation: Woh use pukaarta hai jiska nuqsaan uske nafa' se ziyaadah qareeb hai, bilaa shubah bura hai woh kaar saaz aur bila shubah bura hai woh saathi.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُدْخِلُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ جَنَّـٰتٍۢ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَفْعَلُ مَا يُرِيدُ
verses.transliteration: 'Innal-laaha yudkhilul-lazeena 'aamanoo wa 'amilus- saalihaati Jannaatin tajree min tahtihal- 'anhaar; 'innal-laaha yafalu maa yureed.
verses.translation: Beshak Allah un logon ko, jo eemaan laaye aur nek amal karte rahe, aise baaghon mein daakhil karega jinke neeche nahrein jaari hain, beshak Allah jo chaahe wahi karta hai.

verses.arabic: مَن كَانَ يَظُنُّ أَن لَّن يَنصُرَهُ ٱللَّهُ فِى ٱلدُّنْيَا وَٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ فَلْيَمْدُدْ بِسَبَبٍ إِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ ثُمَّ لْيَقْطَعْ فَلْيَنظُرْ هَلْ يُذْهِبَنَّ كَيْدُهُۥ مَا يَغِيظُ
verses.transliteration: Man kaana yazunnu 'al-lany-yansurahul- laahu fid-dunyaa wal- 'Aakhirati falyamdud bisababin 'ilas-samaaa'i summal-yaqta' falyanzur hal yuzhibanna kayduhoo maa yagheez.
verses.translation: Jo yeh samajhta ho ke Allah dunya aur aakhirat mein hargiz uss (Rasool) ki madad na karega, to chaahiye ke woh aasmaan tak rassi daraaz kare, phir use kaat dale aur dekhe ke kiya uski tadbeer uske ghusse ko door karti hai.

verses.arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ ءَايَـٰتٍۢ بَيِّنَـٰتٍۢ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَهْدِى مَن يُرِيدُ
verses.transliteration: Wa kazaalika 'anzalnaahu 'Aayaatim bayyinaatinw-wa 'annal- laaha yahdee many- yureed.
verses.translation: Aur isi tarah humne iss (qur'an) ko waazeh aayaat (ki shakl mein) naazil kiya hai aur beshak Allah jise chaahe use hidaayat deta hai.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَٱلَّذِينَ هَادُوا۟ وَٱلصَّـٰبِـِٔينَ وَٱلنَّصَـٰرَىٰ وَٱلْمَجُوسَ وَٱلَّذِينَ أَشْرَكُوٓا۟ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَفْصِلُ بَيْنَهُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ شَهِيدٌ
verses.transliteration: 'Innal-lazeena 'aamanoo wallazeena haadoo waş-Şaabi'eena wan-Nasaaraa wal- Majoosa wallazeena 'ashrakooo 'innal-laaha yafsilu baynahum Yawmal-Qiyaamah; 'innal-laaha 'alaa kulli shay'in Shaheed.
verses.translation: Beshak jo log eemaan laaye, aur jo yahoodi huye, aur saabi (be deen) aur Nasaara aur majoosi¹ aur woh log jinhon ne Allah ke saath shirk kiya, beshak Allah 'unke maa bain yaum- e-qiyaamat faislah karega,² yaqeenan Allah har cheez par shahid hai.
verses.deepMeaning: 1️⃣ Majoosi) se muraad iraan ke aatish parast hain jo do khudaaon ke qaayel hain, ek zulmat ka khaaliq hai, doosra noor ka, jise woh ahare man aur yazdaan kahte hain.2️⃣ Un mein se haq par kaun hai, baatil par kaun? Yeh to un dalaayel se waazeh ho jaata hai jo Allah ne apne qur'an mein naazil farmaaye hain aur apne aakhri paighambar ko bhi usi maqsad ke liye bheja tha. 'Taake woh use sab adyaan par ghaalib karde.' (Surah Fatah:48/28) yahaan faisle se muraad woh jaza hai jo Allah Ta'ala baatil paraston ko qiyaamat waale din dega, uss jaza se bhi waazeh ho jaayega ke dunya mein haq par kaun tha aur baatil par kaun? Mazeed iss aayat ki tafseer ke liye mulaahazah ho haashyah: (Surah Baqarah:2/62)

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَسْجُدُ لَهُۥ مَن فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَٱلشَّمْسُ وَٱلْقَمَرُ وَٱلنُّجُومُ وَٱلْجِبَالُ وَٱلشَّجَرُ وَٱلدَّوَآبُّ وَكَثِيرٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلنَّاسِۖ وَكَثِيرٌ حَقَّ عَلَيْهِ ٱلْعَذَابُۗ وَمَن يُهِنِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن مُّكْرِمٍۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَفْعَلُ مَا يَشَآءُ
verses.transliteration: 'Alam tara 'annal- laaha yasjudu lahoo man fis-samaawaati wa man fil-'ardi washshamsu walqamaru wannujoomu waljibaalu washshajaru waddawaaabbu wa kaseerum-minan-naasi wa kaseerun haqqa 'alayhil-'azaab; wa mañy- yuhinil-laahu famaa lahoo mim-mukrim; 'innal-laaha yafalu maa yashaaa.
verses.translation: Kiya aapne nahin dekha ke beshak Allah ko sajdah karta hai jo koyi aasmaanon mein aur jo koyi zameen mein hai, aur suraj aur chaand aur sitaare aur pahaad aur darakht aur jaanwar aur bahut se log, aur bahutson par uska azaab saabit ho chuka hai, aur jise Allah zaleel kare, use koyi izzat dene waala nahin, beshak Allah jo chaahe karta hai.

verses.arabic: هَـٰذَانِ خَصْمَانِ ٱخْتَصَمُوا۟ فِى رَبِّهِمْۖ فَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ قُطِّعَتْ لَهُمْ ثِيَابٌۭ مِّن نَّارٍۢ يُصَبُّ مِن فَوْقِ رُءُوسِهِمُ ٱلْحَمِيمُ
verses.transliteration: Haazaani khaşmaanikh-tașamoo fee Rabbihim fallazeena kafaroo qutti'at lahum siyaabum-min-naar; yuşabbu min fawqi ru'oosihimul-hameem.
verses.translation: Yeh do giroh hain jo apne rab ke baare mein jhagde hain, chunaancheh jin logon ne kufr kiya unke liye aag ke kapde kaate jaayenge, unke saron par khaulta paani undela jaayega.

verses.arabic: يُصْهَرُ بِهِۦ مَا فِى بُطُونِهِمْ وَٱلْجُلُودُ
verses.transliteration: Yuşharu bihee maa fee butoonihim wal- julood.
verses.translation: Usse woh sab kuchh gal jaayega jo unke peton mein hai aur (unki) khaalein bhi.

verses.arabic: وَلَهُم مَّقَٰمِعُ مِنْ حَدِيدٍۢ
verses.transliteration: Wa lahum maqaami'u min hadeed.
verses.translation: Aur un (ko maarne) ke liye lohe ke hathode honge.

verses.arabic: كُلَّمَآ أَرَادُوٓا۟ أَن يَخْرُجُوا۟ مِنْهَا مِنْ غَمٍّ أُعِيدُوا۟ فِيهَا وَذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابَ ٱلْحَرِيقِ
verses.transliteration: Kullamaaa 'araadooo 'any-yakhrujoo minhaa min ghammin 'u'eedoo feehaa wa zooqoo 'azaabal-hareeq.
verses.translation: Aur jab bhi maare gham ke usse baahar nikalne ka iraadah karenge, phir uss mein daal diye jaayenge aur (kaha jaayega:) jalaane waale azaab ka mazah chakho.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُدْخِلُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ جَنَّـٰتٍۢ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ يُحَلَّوْنَ فِيهَا مِنْ أَسَاوِرَ مِن ذَهَبٍۢ وَلُؤْلُؤًۭا وَلِبَاسُهُمْ فِيهَا حَرِيرٌۭ
verses.transliteration: 'Innal-laaha yudkhilul-lazeena 'aamanoo wa 'amilus- saalihaati Jannaatin tajree min tahtihal- 'anhaaru yuhallawna feehaa min 'asaawira min zahabiñw-wa lu'lu'aa; wa libaasuhum feehaa hareer.
verses.translation: Beshak jo log eemaan laaye aur nek amal karte rahe Allah unko (aise) baaghon mein daakhil karega jinke neeche nahrein jaari hain, wahaan unhein sone ke kangan aur moti pahnaaye jaayenge aur wahaan unka libaas resham ka hoga.

verses.arabic: وَهُدُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱلطَّيِّبِ مِنَ ٱلْقَوْلِ وَهُدُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطِ ٱلْحَمِيدِ
verses.transliteration: Wa hudooo 'ilat- tayyibi minal-qawli wa hudooo 'ilaa şiraatil- hameed.
verses.translation: Aur (dunya mein) unhein paakeezah baat (tauheed) ki hidaayat di gayi, aur qaabil-e-ta'reef (Allah) ki raah dikhaayi gayi.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَيَصُدُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلْمَسْجِدِ ٱلْحَرَامِ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلْنَـٰهُ لِلنَّاسِ سَوَآءً ٱلْعَـٰكِفُ فِيهِ وَٱلْبَادِۚ وَمَن يُرِدْ فِيهِ بِإِلْحَادٍۢ بِظُلْمٍۢ نُّذِقْهُ مِنْ عَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍۢ
verses.transliteration: 'Innal-lazeena kafaroo wa yaşuddoona 'an sabeelil-laahi wal- Masjidil-Haraamil-lazee ja'alnaahu linnaasi sawaaa'anil-'aakifu feehi walbaad; wa many-yurid feehi bi'ilhaadim bizulmin nuziqhu min 'azaabin 'aleem.
verses.translation: Beshak jin logon ne kufr kiya aur woh (logon ko) Allah ki raah aur masjid-e-haraam se rokte hain, jise humne sab logon ke liye banaaya hai, uss mein muqeem aur baahar se aane waale baraabar hain, aur jo uss mein zulm ke saath ilhaad (kaji) ka iraadah kare to hum use nehaayat dardnaak azaab chakhaayeinge.

verses.arabic: وَإِذْ بَوَّأْنَا لِإِبْرَٰهِيمَ مَكَانَ ٱلْبَيْتِ أَن لَّا تُشْرِكْ بِى شَيْـًۭٔا وَطَهِّرْ بَيْتِىَ لِلطَّآئِفِينَ وَٱلْقَآئِمِينَ وَٱلرُّكَّعِ ٱلسُّجُودِ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'iz bawwa'naa li- 'Ibraaheema makaanal- Bayti 'al-laa tushrik bee shay'anw-wa tahhir Baytiya littaaa'ifeena wal-qaaa'imeena warrukka'is-sujood.
verses.translation: Aur (yaad karein) jab humne Ibraheem ke liye baitullah ki jagah muqarrar kardi (aur use hukm diya) ke tu mere saath kisi cheez ko shareek na kar aur tawaaf karne waalon aur qiyaam karne waalon aur ruku' aur sajde karne waalon ke liye mera ghar paak rakh.

verses.arabic: وَأَذِّن فِى ٱلنَّاسِ بِٱلْحَجِّ يَأْتُوكَ رِجَالًۭا وَعَلَىٰ كُلِّ ضَامِرٍۢ يَأْتِينَ مِن كُلِّ فَجٍّ عَمِيقٍۢ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'azzin fin-naasi bil-Hajji ya'tooka rijaalañw-wa 'alaa kulli daamiriny-ya'teena min kulli fajjin 'ameeq.
verses.translation: Aur logon mein hajj ka elaan karde, woh tere paas har door daraaz raaste se paidal (chal kar) aur duble patle ounton par (sawaar ho kar) aayenge.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Iss mein hajj karne ka hukm diya gaya hai, hajj ki badi fazeelat hai jaisa ke hadees mein hai, Rasoolullah ne ﷺ farmaya: 'jis kisi ne Allah ke liye uss ghar (baitullah) ka hajj kiya (uss adaayegi hajj ke dauraan mein) usne apni beewi se mubaasharat ki na kisi gunaah ka irtekaab kiya to woh uss bachche ki tarah gunaahon se paak saaf hokar laut ta hai jise abhi abhi uski maan ne janam diya ho.' (Sahih Bukhari, Kitabul Mohsar, baab:9, Hadees: 1819) mazeed mulaahazah ho: (Surah Baqarah:2/196 ka haashyah)

verses.arabic: لِّيَشْهَدُوا۟ مَنَـٰفِعَ لَهُمْ وَيَذْكُرُوا۟ ٱسْمَ ٱللَّهِ فِىٓ أَيَّامٍۢ مَّعْلُومَـٰتٍ عَلَىٰ مَا رَزَقَهُم مِّنۢ بَهِيمَةِ ٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِۖ فَكُلُوا۟ مِنْهَا وَأَطْعِمُوا۟ ٱلْبَآئِسَ ٱلْفَقِيرَ
verses.transliteration: Liyashhadoo manaafi'a lahum wa yazkurus-mal laahi feee 'ayyaamim-ma'loomaatin 'alaa maa razaqahum mim baheematil-'an'aami fakuloo minhaa wa 'at'imul-baaa'isal-faqeer.
verses.translation: Taake woh apne munaafe' ke liye haazir hon, aur maloom ayyaam mein (zabah ke waqt) un chaupaaye maweshiyon par Allah ka naam padhein, jo Allah ne unhein diye hain, phir tum (khud bhi) unka gosht khaao aur khilaao har bhooke faqeer ko.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ لْيَقْضُوا۟ تَفَثَهُمْ وَلْيُوفُوا۟ نُذُورَهُمْ وَلْيَطَّوَّفُوا۟ بِٱلْبَيْتِ ٱلْعَتِيقِ
verses.transliteration: Summal-yaqdoo tafasahum walyoofoo nuzoorahum walyattawwafoo bil- Baytil-'Ateeq.
verses.translation: Phir chaahiye ke woh apna mail kuchail door karein, aur chaahiye ke apni nazrein puri karein, aur chaahiye ke qadeem ghar (baitullah) ka tawaaf karein.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Tafseel ke liye dekhiye: (Al-Bukhari, Abwaabul Hajj wal Umrah)

verses.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ وَمَن يُعَظِّمْ حُرُمَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ فَهُوَ خَيْرٌۭ لَّهُۥ عِندَ رَبِّهِۦۗ وَأُحِلَّتْ لَكُمُ ٱلْأَنْعَـٰمُ إِلَّا مَا يُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْكُمْ فَٱجْتَنِبُوا۟ ٱلرِّجْسَ مِنَ ٱلْأَوْثَـٰنِ وَٱجْتَنِبُوا۟ قَوْلَ ٱلزُّورِ
verses.transliteration: Zaalika wa mañy- yu'azzim hurumaatil- laahi fahuwa khayrul- lahoo 'inda Rabbih; wa 'uhillat lakumul- 'an'aamu 'illaa maa yutlaa 'alaykum fajtanibur-rijsa minal- 'awsaani wajtaniboo qawlaz-zoor.
verses.translation: Yahi (hukm) hai, aur jo shakhs Allah ki hurmaton ki tazeem kare to yeh uske rab ke haan uske liye bahut behtar hai¹ aur tumhaare liye chaupaaye halaal kiye gaye hain, siwaaye unke jo tumhein sunaaye jaa chuke hain, lehaaza tum buton ki gandagi se bacho, aur jhooti baat se bhi bacho.
verses.deepMeaning: Mulaahazah ho haashyah: (Surah Maayedah:5/32)

verses.arabic: حُنَفَآءَ لِلَّهِ غَيْرَ مُشْرِكِينَ بِهِۦۚ وَمَن يُشْرِكْ بِٱللَّهِ فَكَأَنَّمَا خَرَّ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَتَخْطَفُهُ ٱلطَّيْرُ أَوْ تَهْوِى بِهِ ٱلرِّيحُ فِى مَكَانٍۢ سَحِيقٍۢ
verses.transliteration: Hunafaaa'a lillaahi ghayra mushrikeena bih; wa mañy-yushrik billaahi faka'annamaa kharra minas-samaaa'i fatakhtafuhut-tayru 'aw tahwee bihir-reehu fee makaanin saheeq.
verses.translation: Allah ke liye yaksu ho jaao na ke uske saath shirk karne waale, aur jo koyi Allah ke saath shirk kare to goya who aasmaan se gir pada, phir use parinde uchak le jaayein yaa hawa kisi door daraaz jagah lejaa pheinkenge

verses.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ وَمَن يُعَظِّمْ شَعَآئِرَ ٱللَّهِ فَإِنَّهَا مِن تَقْوَى ٱلْقُلُوبِ
verses.transliteration: Zaalika wa mañy- yu'azzim sha'aaa'iral- laahi fa'innahaa min taqwal-quloob.
verses.translation: Yahi (hukm) hai, aur jo shakhs Allah ki (azmat ki) nishaaniyon ki ta'zeem kare, to bilaa shubah yeh dilon ke taqwa se hai.

verses.arabic: لَكُمْ فِيهَا مَنَـٰفِعُ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍۢ مُّسَمًّۭى ثُمَّ مَحِلُّهَآ إِلَى ٱلْبَيْتِ ٱلْعَتِيقِ
verses.transliteration: Lakum feehaa manaafi'u 'ilaaa 'ajalim - musamman summa mahilluhaaa 'ilal-Baytil-'Ateeq.
verses.translation: Tumhaare liye un (chaupaayon) main ek muqarrar waqt tak munaafe' hain, phir unke halaal (zabah) hone ki jagah qadeem ghar (baitullah) ke paas hai.

verses.arabic: وَلِكُلِّ أُمَّةٍۢ جَعَلْنَا مَنسَكًۭا لِّيَذْكُرُوا۟ ٱسْمَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَىٰ مَا رَزَقَهُم مِّنۢ بَهِيمَةِ ٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِۗ فَإِلَـٰهُكُمْ إِلَـٰهٌۭ وَٰحِدٌۭ فَلَهُۥٓ أَسْلِمُوا۟ۗ وَبَشِّرِ ٱلْمُخْبِتِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa likulli 'ummatin ja'alnaa mansakal liyazkurus-mal-laahi 'alaa maa razaqahum- mim baheematil-'an'aam; fa'ilaahukum 'ilaahuñw- Waahidun falahooo 'aslimoo; wa bashshiril- mukhbiteen.
verses.translation: Aur humne har ummat ke liye qurbaani muqarrar ki taake woh (zabah ke waqt) un chaaupaaye maweshiyon par Allah ka naam lein jo Allah ne unhein diye, phir (samajh lo ke) tumhaara mabood ek hi mabood hai. lehaaza tum usi ki farmaan bardaari karo, aur aajzi karne waalon ko bashaarat deejiye.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ذُكِرَ ٱللَّهُ وَجِلَتْ قُلُوبُهُمْ وَٱلصَّـٰبِرِينَ عَلَىٰ مَآ أَصَابَهُمْ وَٱلْمُقِيمِى ٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَمِمَّا رَزَقْنَـٰهُمْ يُنفِقُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Allazeena 'izaa zukiral-laahu wajilat quloobuhum waşşaabireena 'alaa maaa 'aşaabahum walmuqeemiş-Şalaati wa mimmaa razaqnaahum yunfiqoon.
verses.translation: Woh log ke jab Allah ka zikr kiya jaaye to unke dil dar jaate hain, aur jo saabir hain uss (takleef)par jo unhein pahunche aur jo namaaz qaayem karne waale hain, aur humne unhein jo rizq diya uss mein se woh kharch karte hain.

verses.arabic: وَٱلْبُدْنَ جَعَلْنَـٰهَا لَكُم مِّن شَعَآئِرِ ٱللَّهِ لَكُمْ فِيهَا خَيْرٌۭ فَٱذْكُرُوا۟ ٱسْمَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيْهَا صَوَآفَّۖ فَإِذَا وَجَبَتْ جُنُوبُهَا فَكُلُوا۟ مِنْهَا وَأَطْعِمُوا۟ ٱلْقَانِعَ وَٱلْمُعْتَرَّۚ كَذَٰلِكَ سَخَّرْنَـٰهَا لَكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَشْكُرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Walbudna ja'alnaahaa lakum min sha'aaa'iril-laahi feehaa khayrun lakum fazkurus-mal-laahi 'alayhaa sawaaff; fa'izaa wajabat junoobuhaa fakuloo minhaa wa 'at'imul- qaani'a walmuʻtarr; kazaalika sakhkharnaahaa lakum la'allakum tashkuroon.
verses.translation: Aur qurbaani ke ount bhi jinhein humne tumhaare liye Allah ke sha'aayer banaaya hai, tumhaare liye un mein bhalaayi hai. lehaaza (nahar ke waqt) jab woh paaoun bandhe khadhe hon to tum un par Allah ka naam lo, phir jab woh pahlu ke bal gir jaayein to tum unka gosht khaao¹ aur qanaa'at pasand aur sawaali mohtaaj ko bhi khilaao, isi tarah hum ne chaupaaye tumhaare taabe' kar diye taake tum shukr karo.
verses.deepMeaning: Ba'z Ulamaa ke nazdeek yeh amr wajoob ke liye hai aur aksar ulama ke nazdeek yeh amr istehbaab ya jawaaz ke liye hai ya'ni agar koyi khud na khaaye balke sab ka sab taqseem karde to koyi gunaah nahin hai.

verses.arabic: لَن يَنَالَ ٱللَّهَ لُحُومُهَا وَلَا دِمَآؤُهَا وَلَـٰكِن يَنَالُهُ ٱلتَّقْوَىٰ مِنكُمْۚ كَذَٰلِكَ سَخَّرَهَا لَكُمْ لِتُكَبِّرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ مَا هَدَىٰكُمْۗ وَبَشِّرِ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.transliteration: Lañy-yanaalal-laaha luhoomuhaa wa laa dimaaa'uhaa wa laakiny-yanaaluhut- taqwaa minkum;kazaalika sakhkharahaa lakum litukabbirul-laaha 'alaa ma hadaakum; wa bashshiril-muhsineen
verses.translation: Allah tak un (qurbaani ke jaanawron) ka gosht hargiz nahin pahunchta aur na unka khoon lekin uss tak tumhaara taqwa pahunchta hai, isi tarah usne un (chau paayon) ko tumhaare taabe' kar diya taake tum Allah ki badaayi bayaan karo ke usne tumhein hidaayat di, aur neki karne waalon ko¹ bashaarat deejiye.
verses.deepMeaning: (Mohsineen) dekhein haashyah: (Surah Aal-e-Imran:3/134)

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُدَٰفِعُ عَنِ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ كُلَّ خَوَّانٍۢ كَفُورٍۢ
verses.transliteration: 'Innal-laaha yudaafi'u 'anil-lazeena 'aamanooo; 'innal-laaha laa yuhibbu kulla khawwaanin kafoor.
verses.translation: Yaqeenan Allah eemaan waalon ka defa' karta hai, beshak Allah har khaayen (aur) naa shukre ko pasand nahin karta.

verses.arabic: أُذِنَ لِلَّذِينَ يُقَٰتَلُونَ بِأَنَّهُمْ ظُلِمُوا۟ۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ نَصْرِهِمْ لَقَدِيرٌ
verses.transliteration: 'Uzina lillazeena yuqaataloona bi'annahum zulimoo; wa 'innal-laaha 'alaa nasrihim la-Qadeer.
verses.translation: Jin logon se ladaayi ki jaati hai unhein (jehaad ki) ijaazat di gayi hai, isliye ke un par zulm huwa, aur yaqeenan Allah unki madad par zaroor qaadir hai.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ أُخْرِجُوا۟ مِن دِيَـٰرِهِم بِغَيْرِ حَقٍّ إِلَّآ أَن يَقُولُوا۟ رَبُّنَا ٱللَّهُۗ وَلَوْلَا دَفْعُ ٱللَّهِ ٱلنَّاسَ بَعْضَهُم بِبَعْضٍۢ لَّهُدِّمَتْ صَوَٰمِعُ وَبِيَعٌۭ وَصَلَوَٰتٌۭ وَمَسَـٰجِدُ يُذْكَرُ فِيهَا ٱسْمُ ٱللَّهِ كَثِيرًۭاۗ وَلَيَنصُرَنَّ ٱللَّهُ مَن يَنصُرُهُۥٓۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَقَوِىٌّ عَزِيزٌ
verses.transliteration: 'Allazeena 'ukhrijoo min diyaarihim bighayri haqqin 'illaaa 'any-yaqooloo Rabbunal-laah; wa law laa daful-laahin-naasa ba'dahum biba'dil- lahuddimat şawaami'u wa biya'unw-wa salawaatunw-wa masaajidu yuzkaru feehas- mul-laahi kaseeraa; wa layanșurannal-laahu many-yanşuruh; 'innal- laaha la-Qawiyyun 'Azeez.
verses.translation: Woh log jinhein unke gharon se naahaq nikaal diya gaya, sirf isliye ke woh kahte hain: hamaara rab Allah hai, aur agar Allah logon mein se ba'z ko ba'z ke zariye se defa' na karta to bila shubah khaanqaahein aur girje aur yahoodi ibaadat khaane aur masjidein dhaadi jaatin jin mein Allah ka naam bakasrat zikr kiya jaata hai aur Allah zaroor uski madad karega jo uss (ke deen) ki madad karega, beshak Allah bahut quwwat waala, ghaalib hai.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ إِن مَّكَّنَّـٰهُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ أَقَامُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتَوُا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَأَمَرُوا۟ بِٱلْمَعْرُوفِ وَنَهَوْا۟ عَنِ ٱلْمُنكَرِۗ وَلِلَّهِ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلْأُمُورِ
verses.transliteration: 'Allazeena 'im- makkannaahum fil-'ardi 'aqaamuş-Şalaata wa 'aatawuz-Zakaata wa 'amaroo bilma'roofi wa nahaw 'anil-munkar; wa lillaahi 'aaqibatul-'umoor.
verses.translation: Yeh woh log hain ke jinhein agar hum zameen mein iqtedaar bakhshein to woh namaaz qaayem karein,¹ aur zakaat dein, aur neki ka hukm dein aur buraayi se rokein, aur tamaam umoor ka anjaam Allah ke ikhtiyaar mein hai.
verses.deepMeaning: 'Namaaz qaayem karne' ka matlab yeh hai ke har musalmaan mard ya aurat par farz hai ke woh baa qaayedgi se din raat mein paanch namaazein muqarrarah auqaat mein adaa kare, mard masjid mein jamaa'at ke saath aur auratein ghar mein, jaisa ke Nabi ﷺ ne farmaya: 'jab tumhaare bachche saat saal ke ho jaayein to unhein namaaz padhne ka hukm do aur jab woh das saal ke ho jaayein to uss (namaaz adaa na karne) par unki pitaayi karo' (Abu Dawood, Assalaat, Baab: 26, hadees: 495) khaandaan, shahar aur qabeele waghairah ka sar baraah aur kisi mulk ka musalmaan hukmaraan apni hukoomat-o-iqtedaar ke maatehat basne waale musalmaanon ki taraf se iss deeni fareeze ki adm-e-adaayegi ki soorat mein Allah ke saamne jawaab dah hoga. Nabi ﷺ jin lawaazim, aadaab-o-sharaayet ke saath namaaz adaa kiya karte the, har shakhs ko usi tarah namaaz adaa karni chaahiye jaisa ke farmaan hai: 'um usi tarah namaaz padho jis tarah tum mujhe namaaz padhte huye dekhte ho.'(Al-Bukhari, Akhbaarul Ahaad, baab:1, hadees:7246)

verses.arabic: وَإِن يُكَذِّبُوكَ فَقَدْ كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍۢ وَعَادٌۭ وَثَمُودُ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'iny-yukazzibooka faqad kazzabat qablahum qawmu Noohinw-wa 'Aaduñw- wa Samood.
verses.translation: Aur (aye Nabi!) agar woh aapko jhutlaayein to bilaashubah unse pahle qaum-e-Nooh aur Aad aur Samood ne bhi (apne apne Ambiya ko) jhutlaaya.

verses.arabic: وَقَوْمُ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَقَوْمُ لُوطٍۢ
verses.transliteration: Wa qawmu 'Ibraaheema wa qawmu Loot.
verses.translation: Aur qaum-e-ibraheem aur qaum-e-Loot ne bhi.

verses.arabic: وَأَصْحَـٰبُ مَدْيَنَۖ وَكُذِّبَ مُوسَىٰ فَأَمْلَيْتُ لِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ ثُمَّ أَخَذْتُهُمْۖ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'ashaabu Madyana wa kuzziba Moosaa fa'amlaytu lilkaafireena summa 'akhaztuhum fakayfa kaana nakeer.
verses.translation: Aur madyan waalon ne bhi, aur Moosa ko bhi jhutlaaya gaya, (pahle) to main ne kaafiron ko dheel di, phir main ne unhein pakad liya, chunaancheh kaisa tha mera azaab!

verses.arabic: فَكَأَيِّن مِّن قَرْيَةٍ أَهْلَكْنَـٰهَا وَهِىَ ظَـٰلِمَةٌۭ فَهِىَ خَاوِيَةٌ عَلَىٰ عُرُوشِهَا وَبِئْرٍۢ مُّعَطَّلَةٍۢ وَقَصْرٍۢ مَّشِيدٍ
verses.transliteration: Faka'ayyim-min qaryatin 'ahlaknaahaa wa hiya zaalimatun fahiya khaawiyatun 'alaa 'urooshihaa wa bi'rim-mu'attalatiñw-wa qaşrim-masheed.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh kitni hi bastiyaan hain ke humne unhein halaak kar diya jabke woh zaalim theen, to woh giri padi hain apni chhaton par aur (kitne hi) kunwen bekaar aur (kitne hi) mazboot mahal (viraan) pade huye hain!.

verses.arabic: أَفَلَمْ يَسِيرُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَتَكُونَ لَهُمْ قُلُوبٌۭ يَعْقِلُونَ بِهَآ أَوْ ءَاذَانٌۭ يَسْمَعُونَ بِهَاۖ فَإِنَّهَا لَا تَعْمَى ٱلْأَبْصَـٰرُ وَلَـٰكِن تَعْمَى ٱلْقُلُوبُ ٱلَّتِى فِى ٱلصُّدُورِ
verses.transliteration: 'Afalam yaseeroo fil- 'ardi fatakoona lahum quloobuñy-ya qiloona bihaaa 'aw 'aazaanuñy- yasma'oona bihaa fa'innahaa laa ta'mal- 'abşaaru wa laakin ta'mal-quloobul-latee fiş- sudoor.
verses.translation: Kiya phir woh zameen mein chale phire nahin ke unke dil hote jin se woh samajhte, ya kaan (hote) jinse woh sunte, pas beshak (unki) aankhein andhi nahin ho teen lekin dil andhe ho jaate hain jo seenon mein hain.

verses.arabic: وَيَسْتَعْجِلُونَكَ بِٱلْعَذَابِ وَلَن يُخْلِفَ ٱللَّهُ وَعْدَهُۥۚ وَإِنَّ يَوْمًا عِندَ رَبِّكَ كَأَلْفِ سَنَةٍۢ مِّمَّا تَعُدُّونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa yasta' jiloonaka bil'azaabi wa lañy- yukhlifal-laahu wa'dah; wa 'inna yawman 'inda Rabbika ka'alfi sanatim- mimmaa ta'uddoon.
verses.translation: Aur woh aap se jald azaab maangte hain aur Allah apne wa'de ke khilaaf nahin karega, aur bilaa shubah aapke rab ke haan ek din tumhaari ginti ke hisaab se eh hazaar baras ki tarah hai.

verses.arabic: وَكَأَيِّن مِّن قَرْيَةٍ أَمْلَيْتُ لَهَا وَهِىَ ظَـٰلِمَةٌۭ ثُمَّ أَخَذْتُهَا وَإِلَىَّ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
verses.transliteration: Wa ka'ayyim-min qaryatin 'amlaytu lahaa wa hiya zaalimatun summa 'akhaztuhaa wa 'ilayyal-maşeer.
verses.translation: Aur kitni hi bastiyaan hain ke main ne unhein dheel di jabke woh zaalim theen, phir main ne unhein pakad liya, aur meri hi taraf (sab ki) waapsi hai.

verses.arabic: قُلْ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ لَكُمْ نَذِيرٌۭ مُّبِينٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Qul yaaa 'ayyuhan- naasu 'innamaaa 'ana lakum nazeerum- mubeen.
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: aye logo! main, to bas tumhein khullam khulla daraane waala hoon.

verses.arabic: فَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ لَهُم مَّغْفِرَةٌۭ وَرِزْقٌۭ كَرِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Fallazeena 'aamanoo wa 'amilus-saalihaati lahum maghfiratunw-wa rizqun kareem.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh jo log eemaan laaye aur nek amal karte rahe, unke liye maghfirat aur izzat ka rizq hai.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ سَعَوْا۟ فِىٓ ءَايَـٰتِنَا مُعَٰجِزِينَ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena sa'aw feee 'Aayaatinaa mu'aajizeena 'ulaaa'ika 'As haabul-jaheem.
verses.translation: Aur jin logon ne (humein) aajiz karne ke liye hamaari aayaat ko haraane ki koshish ki, wahi dozakh waale hain.

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَا مِن قَبْلِكَ مِن رَّسُولٍۢ وَلَا نَبِىٍّ إِلَّآ إِذَا تَمَنَّىٰٓ أَلْقَى ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ فِىٓ أُمْنِيَّتِهِۦ فَيَنسَخُ ٱللَّهُ مَا يُلْقِى ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ ثُمَّ يُحْكِمُ ٱللَّهُ ءَايَـٰتِهِۦۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Wa maaa 'arsalnaa min qablika mir-Rasooliñw-wa laa Nabiyyin 'illaaa 'izaa tamannaaa 'alqash- Shaytaanu feee 'umniyyatihee fayansakhul-laahu maa yulqish-Shaytaanu summa yuhkimul-laahu 'aayaatih; wallaahu 'Aleemun Hakeem.
verses.translation: Aur humne aap se pahle jo bhi Rasool aur Nabi bheja jab woh tilaawat karta to shaytaan uski tilaawat mein (apni taraf se kuchh) daal deta, phir Allah use mita deta jo shaytaan ne (waswasah) daala hota, phir Allah apni aayaat ko mohkam kar deta,¹ aur Allah Aleem-o- Hakeem hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Yahaan ba'z mufassireen ne gharaneeq-e-ulya ka qissah bayaan kiya hai jo muhaqqiqeen ke nazdeek saabit hi nahin hai, isliye use yahaan pesh karne ki zaroorat hi sire se nahin samjhi gayi hai.

verses.arabic: لِّيَجْعَلَ مَا يُلْقِى ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ فِتْنَةًۭ لِّلَّذِينَ فِى قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌۭ وَٱلْقَاسِيَةِ قُلُوبُهُمْۗ وَإِنَّ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ لَفِى شِقَاقِۭ بَعِيدٍۢ
verses.transliteration: Liyaj'ala maa yulqish- Shaytaanu fitnatal- lillazeena fee quloobihim maradunw-walqaasiyati quloobuhum; wa 'innaz- zaalimeena lafee shiqaaqim-ba'eed.
verses.translation: Taake Allah shaytaan ke daale huye waswase ko bimaar dil aur sung dil (shaqiul qalb) logon ke liye fitnah banaa de aur beshak zaalim to door ki mukhaalifat mein (pade) hain.

verses.arabic: وَلِيَعْلَمَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْعِلْمَ أَنَّهُ ٱلْحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكَ فَيُؤْمِنُوا۟ بِهِۦ فَتُخْبِتَ لَهُۥ قُلُوبُهُمْۗ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَهَادِ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍۢ مُّسْتَقِيمٍۢ
verses.transliteration: Wa liyaʻlamal-lazeena 'ootul-'ilma 'annahul- haqqu mir-Rabbika fayu'minoo bihee fatukhbita lahoo quloobuhum; wa 'innal- laaha lahaadil-lazeena 'aamanooo 'ilaa Şiraatim-Mustaqeem.
verses.translation: Aur taake woh log jaan lein jinhein ilm diya gaya hai ke beshak yeh (qur'an) aapke rab ki taraf se haq hai, phir woh uss par eemaan laayein to unke dil uss (haq) ke aage jhuk jaayein, aur beshak Allah eemaan laane waale logon ko zaroor siraat-e- mustaqeem ki taraf hidaayat deta hai.

verses.arabic: وَلَا يَزَالُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فِى مِرْيَةٍۢ مِّنْهُ حَتَّىٰ تَأْتِيَهُمُ ٱلسَّاعَةُ بَغْتَةً أَوْ يَأْتِيَهُمْ عَذَابُ يَوْمٍ عَقِيمٍ
verses.transliteration: Wa laa yazaalul- lazeena kafaroo fee miryatim-minhu hattaa ta'tiyahumus-Saa'atu baghtatan 'aw ya'tiyahum 'azaabu Yawmin 'aqeem.
verses.translation: Aur kaafir iss qur'an ki baabat hameshah shak mein rahenge hatta ke unpar achaanak qiyaamat aa jaaye, ya un par nehaayat manhoos din ka azaab aa jaaye.

verses.arabic: ٱلْمُلْكُ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلَّهِ يَحْكُمُ بَيْنَهُمْۖ فَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ فِى جَنَّـٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
verses.transliteration: 'Almulku Yawma'izil- lillaahi yahkumu baynahum; fallazeena 'aamanoo wa 'amilus- şaalihaati fee Jannaatin- Na'eem.
verses.translation: Uss din baadshaahi Allah hi ki hogi,¹ woh unke maabain faislah karega. Chunaancheh jo log eemaan laaye aur nek amal karte rahe woh ne'maton waale baaghon mein honge.
verses.deepMeaning: Ya'ni dunya mein to aarzi taur par bataur in'aam ya bataur imtehaan logon ko bhi baadshaahatein aur ikhtiyaar-o-iqtedaar mil jaata hai lekin aakhirat mein kisi ke paas bhi koyi baadshaahat aur ikhtiyaar nahin hoga, sirf ek Allah ki baadshaahi aur uski farmaan rawaayi hogi, usi ka mukammal ikhtiyaar aur ghalbah hoga. 'baadshaahi uss din saabit hai waste Rahmaan ke, aur yeh din kaafiron par sakht bhaari hoga.' 'Surah Furqan: 25/26) aur doosre maqaam par yun aata hai Allah Ta'ala poochhega: 'Aaj kiski baadshaahi hai?'' phir khud hi jawaab dega. 'Ek Allah ghaalib ki.' (Surah Momin:40/16) aur tamaam ke tamaam ikhtiyaraat sirf Allah Ta'ala hi ke paas honge. (Suratul Infetaar:82/19)

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَكَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌۭ مُّهِينٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena kafaroo wa kazzaboo bi- 'Aayaatinaa fa'ulaaa'ika lahum 'azaabum- muheen.
verses.translation: Aur jinhon ne kufr kiya aur hamaari aayaat ko jhutlaaya, to wahi hain jin ke liye ruswa kun azaab hai.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هَاجَرُوا۟ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ثُمَّ قُتِلُوٓا۟ أَوْ مَاتُوا۟ لَيَرْزُقَنَّهُمُ ٱللَّهُ رِزْقًا حَسَنًۭاۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَهُوَ خَيْرُ ٱلرَّٰزِقِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena haajaroo fee sabeelil-laahi summa qutilooo 'aw maatoo layarzuqannahumul- laahu rizqan hasanaa; wa 'innal-laaha la-Huwa khayrur-raaziqeen.
verses.translation: Aur jinhon ne Allah ki raah mein hijrat ki, phir woh qatl huye ya mar gaye, to Allah zaroor unhein achchha rizq dega aur bilaa shubah Allah hi behtar riza dene waala hai.

verses.arabic: لَيُدْخِلَنَّهُم مُّدْخَلًۭا يَرْضَوْنَهُۥۗ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلِيمٌ حَلِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Layudkhilannahum mudkhalañy-yardawnah; wa 'innal-laaha la- 'Aleemun Haleem.
verses.translation: Woh unhein USS maqaam mein zaroor daakhil karega jise woh pasand karenge, aur beshak Allah Aleem-o-Haleem hai.

verses.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ وَمَنْ عَاقَبَ بِمِثْلِ مَا عُوقِبَ بِهِۦ ثُمَّ بُغِىَ عَلَيْهِ لَيَنصُرَنَّهُ ٱللَّهُۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَعَفُوٌّ غَفُورٌ
verses.transliteration: Zaalika wa man 'aaqaba bimisli maa 'ooqiba bihee summa bughiya 'alayhi layanșurannahul-laah; 'innal-laaha la-'Afuwwun Ghafoor.
verses.translation: (Baat) yahi hai, aur jo shakhs waisa hi badlah le jaisa uske saath kiya gaya tha, phir agar uss par ziyaadati ki jaaye, to Allah zaroor uski madad karega, beshak Allah bahut mu'aaf karne aala, nehaayat maghfirat waala hai.

verses.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُولِجُ ٱلَّيْلَ فِى ٱلنَّهَارِ وَيُولِجُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فِى ٱلَّيْلِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعٌۭ بَصِيرٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Zaalika bi'annal- laaha yoolijul-layla fin- nahaari wa yoolijun-nahaara fil-layli wa 'annal-laaha Samee'um Baseer.
verses.translation: Yeh isliye ke beshak Allah hi raat ko din mein daakhil karta hai aur din ko raat mein daakhil karta hai, aur beshak Allah Sami'-o- Baseer hai.

verses.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلْحَقُّ وَأَنَّ مَا يَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِهِ ٱلْبَـٰطِلُ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلْعَلِىُّ ٱلْكَبِيرُ
verses.transliteration: Zaalika bi'annal- laaha Huwal-haqqu wa 'anna maa yad'oona min doonihee huwal-baatilu wa 'annal-laaha Huwal- 'Aliyyul-kabeer.
verses.translation: Yeh isliye ke beshak Allah hi haq hai, aur bilaa shubah jise woh Allah ke siwa pukaarte hain wahi baatil hai, aur bilaa shubah Allah hi baland tar, bahut badaa hai.

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ أَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءًۭ فَتُصْبِحُ ٱلْأَرْضُ مُخْضَرَّةًۭ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَطِيفٌ خَبِيرٌۭ
verses.transliteration: 'Alam tara 'annal- laaha 'anzala minas- samaaa'i maaa'an fatuşbihul-'ardu mukhdarrah; 'innal- laaha Lateefun Khabeer.
verses.translation: Kiya aapne nahin dekha ke Allah ne aasmaan se (murdah zameen par) paani naazil kiya, phir usse zameen sar sabz ho jaati hai. beshak Allah nehaayat baareek been, baa khabar hai.

verses.arabic: لَّهُۥ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَهُوَ ٱلْغَنِىُّ ٱلْحَمِيدُ
verses.transliteration: Lahoo maa fis- samaawaati wa maa fil- 'ard; wa 'innal-laaha la- Huwal-Ghaniyyul- Hameed.
verses.translation: Usi ke liye hai jo kuchh aasmaanon mein aur jo kuchh zameen mein hain,¹ aur bilaa shubah Allah hi be niyaaz aur laayeq-e-hamd hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Paidaayish ke lehaaz se bhi, milkiyat ke e'tebaar se bhi aur tasarruf karne ke e'tebaar se bhi, isi liye sab makhlooq uski mohtaaj hai, woh kisi ka mohtaaj nahin kyun ke woh ghani ya'ni beniyaaz hai aur jo zaat saare ikhtiyaraat aur kamaalaat ka mamba' hai, har haal mein ta'reef ki mustahiq bhi wahi hai.

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَخَّرَ لَكُم مَّا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَٱلْفُلْكَ تَجْرِى فِى ٱلْبَحْرِ بِأَمْرِهِۦ وَيُمْسِكُ ٱلسَّمَآءَ أَن تَقَعَ عَلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِهِۦٓۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِٱلنَّاسِ لَرَءُوفٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: 'Alam tara 'annal- laaha sakhkhara lakum maa fil-'ardi walfulka tajree fil-bahri bi'amrihee wa yumsikus -samaaa'a 'an taqa'a 'alal-'ardi 'illaa bi'iznih; 'innal- laaha binnaasi la- Ra'oofur-Raheem.
verses.translation: Kiya aapne nahin dekha ke beshak Allah ne tumhaare liye musakhkhar kiya jo kuchh zameen mein hain, aur kashtiyaan jo uske hukm se samandar mein chalti hain, aur woh aasmaan ko thaame huye hai ke uske izn ke baghair woh zameen par (na) gire. Beshak Allah logon ke liye Rawaufur Raheem hai.

verses.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَحْيَاكُمْ ثُمَّ يُمِيتُكُمْ ثُمَّ يُحْيِيكُمْ إِنَّ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ لَكَفُورٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Wa Huwal-lazeee 'ahyaakum summa yumeetukum summa yuhyeekum; 'innal- 'insaana lakafoor.
verses.translation: Aur wahi hai jisne tumhein hayaat di, phir woh tumhein maut dega, phir hayaat dega, beshak insaan bada hi naa shukra hai.

verses.arabic: لِكُلِّ أُمَّةٍۢ جَعَلْنَا مَنسَكًۭا هُمْ نَاسِكُوهُ فَلَا يُنَـٰزِعُونَكَ فِى ٱلْأَمْرِ وَٱدْعُ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ إِنَّكَ لَعَلَىٰ هُدًۭى مُّسْتَقِيمٍۢ
verses.transliteration: Likulli 'ummatin jaʻalnaa mansakan hum naasikoohu falaa yunaazi unnaka fil-'amr; wad'u 'ilaa Rabbika 'innaka la'alaa hudam-mustaqeem.
verses.translation: ar ummat ke liye humne tareeq-e-ibaadat muqarrar kiya hai, woh uss par amal paira hain, lehaaza unhein iss amr mein aapse jhagda nahin karna chaahiye, aur aap apne .rab ki taraf dawat dein yaqeenan aap raah-e-raast par hain.

verses.arabic: وَإِن جَـٰدَلُوكَ فَقُلِ ٱللَّهُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'in jaadalooka faqulil-laahu 'a'lamu bimaa ta'maloon.
verses.translation: Aur agar woh aapse jhagda karein to aap kah deejiye: tum jo amal karte ho Allah use khoob jaanta hai.

verses.arabic: ٱللَّهُ يَحْكُمُ بَيْنَكُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ فِيمَا كُنتُمْ فِيهِ تَخْتَلِفُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Allaahu yahkumu baynakum Yawmal- Qiyaamati feemaa kuntum feehi takhtalifoon.
verses.translation: Allah hi yaum-e- qiyaamat tumhaare maabain un baaton ka faislah karega jin mein tum ikhtelaaf karte rahe ho.

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ تَعْلَمْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعْلَمُ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلْأَرْضِۗ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ فِى كِتَـٰبٍۢ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرٌۭ
verses.transliteration: 'Alam ta'ʻlam 'annal- laaha yaʻlamu maa fis- samaaa'i wal'ard; 'inna zaalika fee kitaab; 'inna zaalika 'alal-laahi yaseer.
verses.translation: Kiya aap nahin jaante ke beshak Allah hi jaanta hai jo kuchh aasmaanon aur zameen mein hai, bilaa shubah yeh (sab kuchh) kitab (Lauh-e-mahfooz) mein (darj) hai, beshak yeh Allah par bilkul aasaan hai.

verses.arabic: وَيَعْبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَمْ يُنَزِّلْ بِهِۦ سُلْطَٰنًۭا وَمَا لَيْسَ لَهُم بِهِۦ عِلْمٌۭۗ وَمَا لِلظَّـٰلِمِينَ مِن نَّصِيرٍۢ
verses.transliteration: Wa ya'budoona min doonil-laahi maa lam yunazzil bihee sultaananw-wa maa laysa lahum bihee 'ilm; wa maa lizzaalimeena min naseer.
verses.translation: Aur woh (mushrik) Allah ke siwa uss cheez ki ibaadat karte hain jiski Allah ne koyi sanad naazil nahin ki aur jiska unhein kuchh ilm nahin, aur un zaalimon ka koyi madadgaar nahin.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَايَـٰتُنَا بَيِّنَـٰتٍۢ تَعْرِفُ فِى وُجُوهِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ٱلْمُنكَرَۖ يَكَادُونَ يَسْطُونَ بِٱلَّذِينَ يَتْلُونَ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَايَـٰتِنَاۗ قُلْ أَفَأُنَبِّئُكُم بِشَرٍّۢ مِّن ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱلنَّارُۖ وَعَدَهَا ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ۖ وَبِئْسَ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'izaa tutlaa 'alayhim 'Aayaatunaa bayyinaatin ta'rifu fee wujoohil-lazeena kafarul- munkara yakaadoona yastoona billazeena yatloona 'alayhim 'Aayaatinaa; qul 'afa'unabbi'ukum bisharrim-min zaalikum; 'an-Naaru wa'adahal- laahul-lazeena kafaroo wa bi'sal-maşeer.
verses.translation: Aur jab unko hamaari waazeh aayaat sunaayi jaayein, to aap un kaafiron ke chehron par naa gawaari pahchaante hain, lagta hai ke woh un logon par chadh daudenge jo unhein hamaari aayaat padh kar sunaate hain,¹ kah deejiye: kiya phir main tumhein usse bad tar ki khabar dun? (woh) aag hai, jiska Allah ne kaafiron se wa'dah kar rakkha hai, aur buri hai woh lautne ki jagah.
verses.deepMeaning: Apne haathon se dast daraazi karein ya bad zabaani karein ya'ni mushrikeen aur ahl-e-zalaalat ke liye Allah Ta'ala ki tauheed aur resaalat-o-ma'aad ka bayaan naa qaabil-e-bardaasht hota hai jiska izhaar, unke chehre se aur ba'z dafa' haathon se aur zabaanon se hota hai yahi haal aaj ke ahl-e-bid'at aur gumraah firqon ka hai jab unki gumraahi, qur'an-o-hadees ke dalaayel se waazeh ki jaati hai to unka rawayyah bhi aayat-e-qur'ani aur dalaayel-e-hadeesiya ke muqaable mein aisa hi hota hai jiski wazaahat iss aayat mein ki gayi hai. (Fatahul Qadeer)

verses.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ ضُرِبَ مَثَلٌۭ فَٱسْتَمِعُوا۟ لَهُۥٓۚ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ تَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ لَن يَخْلُقُوا۟ ذُبَابًۭا وَلَوِ ٱجْتَمَعُوا۟ لَهُۥۖ وَإِن يَسْلُبْهُمُ ٱلذُّبَابُ شَيْـًۭٔا لَّا يَسْتَنقِذُوهُ مِنْهُۚ ضَعُفَ ٱلطَّالِبُ وَٱلْمَطْلُوبُ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhan-naasu duriba masalun fastami'oo lah; 'innal- lazeena tad'oona min doonil-laahi lañy- yakhluqoo zubaabañw- wa lawij-tamaʻoo lahoo wa 'iny-yaslubhumuz- zubaabu shay'al-laa yastanqizoohu minh; da'ufat-taalibu walmatloob.
verses.translation: Aye logo! ek misaal bayaan ki jaati hai, lehaaz tum use ghaur se suno, beshak jinhein tum Allah ke siwa, pukaarte ho woh ek makkhi bhi paida nahin kar sakinge agarcheh woh (saare bhi) uske jam'a ho jaayein, aur agar makkhi unse kuchh chheen le to woh use usse chhuda nahin sakte, taalib-o- matloob (Aabid -o-mabood) sab kamzor hain.

verses.arabic: مَا قَدَرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ حَقَّ قَدْرِهِۦٓۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَقَوِىٌّ عَزِيزٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Maa qadarul-laaha haqqa qadrih; 'innal- laaha la-Qawiyyun 'Azeez.
verses.translation: Unhon ne Allah ki qadr nahin ki jis tarah uski qadr karne ka haq hai, beshak Allah bahut qawi, nehaayat Ghaalib hai.
