verses.arabic: ٱللَّهُ يَصْطَفِى مِنَ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ رُسُلًۭا وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعٌۭ بَصِيرٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Allaahu yaştafee minal-malaaa'ikati Rusulanw-wa minan- naas; 'innal-laaha Samee'um Başeer.
verses.translation: Woh jaanta hai jo kuchh paighaam-e-resaan chun leta hai aur logon mein se (bhi), yaqeenan Sami'-o- Baseer hai.

verses.arabic: يَعْلَمُ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَمَا خَلْفَهُمْۚ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُرْجَعُ ٱلْأُمُورُ
verses.transliteration: Ya'ʻlamu maa bayna 'aydeehim wa maa khalfahum; wa 'ilal-laahi turja'ul-'umoor.
verses.translation: woh jaanta hai jo kuchh unke saamne hai aur jo kuchh unke peechhe hai, aur Allah hi ki taraf tamaam umoor umoor lautaaye jaate hain.

verses.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱرْكَعُوا۟ وَٱسْجُدُوا۟ وَٱعْبُدُوا۟ رَبَّكُمْ وَٱفْعَلُوا۟ ٱلْخَيْرَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُفْلِحُونَ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhal- lazeena 'aamanur-kaʻoo wasjudoo wa'budoo Rabbakum wafalul- khayra laʻallakum tuflihoon.
verses.translation: Aye eemaan waalo! Ruku' karo aur sajdah karo, aur apne rab ki ibaadat karo, aur bhalaayi (ke kaam) karo taake tum falaah paao.

verses.arabic: وَجَـٰهِدُوا۟ فِى ٱللَّهِ حَقَّ جِهَادِهِۦۚ هُوَ ٱجْتَبَىٰكُمْ وَمَا جَعَلَ عَلَيْكُمْ فِى ٱلدِّينِ مِنْ حَرَجٍۢۚ مِّلَّةَ أَبِيكُمْ إِبْرَٰهِيمَۚ هُوَ سَمَّىٰكُمُ ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ مِن قَبْلُ وَفِى هَـٰذَا لِيَكُونَ ٱلرَّسُولُ شَهِيدًا عَلَيْكُمْ وَتَكُونُوا۟ شُهَدَآءَ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِۚ فَأَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُوا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَٱعْتَصِمُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ هُوَ مَوْلَىٰكُمْ فَنِعْمَ ٱلْمَوْلَىٰ وَنِعْمَ ٱلنَّصِيرُ
verses.transliteration: Wa jaahidoo fil-laahi haqqa jihaadih; Huwaj- tabaakum wa maa ja'ala 'alaykum fid-deeni min haraj; Millata 'abeekum 'Ibraaheem; Huwa sammaakumul-muslimeena min qablu wa fee haazaa liyakoonar-Rasoolu shaheedan 'alaykum wa takoonoo shuhadaaa'a 'alan-naas; fa'aqeemus- Şalaata wa 'aatuz- Zakaata wa'tașimoo billaahi Huwa mawlaakum fani'mal- mawlaa wa ni'man- naseer.
verses.translation: Aur tum Allah ki raah mein jehaad karo jaisa ke jehaad karne ka haq hai, usne tumhein (apne deen ke liye) chun liya hai, aur usne deen mein tumhaare liye koyi tangi nahin rakkhi,¹ apne baap Ibraheem ki millat ka itteba' karo, Allah ne pahle bhi tumhaara naam musalmaan rakkha tha aur iss (qur'an) mein bhi (tumhaara yahi naam hai), taake Rasool tum par shahid ho, aur tum logon par shahid ho jaao, lehaaza tum namaaz qaayem karo, aur zakaat do, aur Allah (ke deen) ko mazbooti se thaamo, wahi tumhaara kaar saaz hai, aur woh behtareen kaar saaz aur behtareen madad gaar hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Ya'ni deen bahut aasaan hai aur Nabi Kareem ﷺ ka irshaad hai: 'Allah ka pasandeedah deen woh hai jo seedha aur mo'tadil (aasaan) hai.' Aap ﷺ ne mazeed farmaya: 'beshak deen (islam) bahut aasaan hai aur jo koyi uss deen mein naarawa sakhti karega to woh (deen) uss par ghaalib aa jaayega, chunaancheh tum miyaanah rawi ikhtiyaar karo aur (kaamil-o-afzal a'amaal ke) qareeb tar raho aur (ajr-o-sawaab ki ummeed par, jo tumhein diya jaayega) khush ho jaao aur subh-o-shaam aur raat ke aakhri hisse mein ibaadat guzaari karke madad-o-quwwat haasil karo.' (Sahih Bukhari, Al-eemaan, baab: 29, hadees:39) mazeed mulaahazah ho haashyah: (Surah Baqarah:2/143)

verses.arabic: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qad 'aflahal- mu'minoon.
verses.translation: Momin yaqeenan falaah paa gaye.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ فِى صَلَاتِهِمْ خَـٰشِعُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Allazeena hum fee Şalaatihim khaashi'oon.
verses.translation: Woh jo apni namaaz mein aajzi karne waale hain.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ عَنِ ٱللَّغْوِ مُعْرِضُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena hum 'anil- laghwi mu'ridoon.
verses.translation: Aur woh jo laghw¹ baaton se munh modne waale hain.
verses.deepMeaning: Laghw har woh kaam aur har woh baat jiska koyi faaidah na ho ya uss mein deeni ya dunyawi nuqsanaat hon. unse e'raaz ka matlab hai ke unki taraf iltefaat bhi na kiya jaaye cheh jaaye ke unhein ikhtiyaar ya unka irtekaab kiya jaaye.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ لِلزَّكَوٰةِ فَـٰعِلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena hum liz- Zakaati faa iloon.
verses.translation: Aur woh jo zakaat adaa karne waale hain.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ لِفُرُوجِهِمْ حَـٰفِظُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena hum lifuroojihim haafizoon.
verses.translation: Aur woh jo apni sharm gaahon ki hifaazat karne waale hain.

verses.arabic: إِلَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَزْوَٰجِهِمْ أَوْ مَا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَـٰنُهُمْ فَإِنَّهُمْ غَيْرُ مَلُومِينَ
verses.transliteration: 'Illaa 'alaaa 'azwaajihim 'aw maa malakat 'aymaanuhum fa'innahum ghayru maloomeen.
verses.translation: Siwaaye apni beewiyon ya un (kaneezon) ke jinke maalik huye unke daayein haath, to bilaa shubah (unki baabat) un par koyi malaamat nahin.

verses.arabic: فَمَنِ ٱبْتَغَىٰ وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْعَادُونَ
verses.transliteration: Famanib-taghaa waraaa'a zaalika fa'ulaaa'ika humul- 'aadoon.
verses.translation: phir jo shakhs unke elaawah (rastah) talaash kare to aise log hi had se guzarne waale hain.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Isse maloom huwa ke muta' ki islam mein qata'an ijaazat nahin hai aur jinsi khaahish ki taskeen ke liye sirf do hi jaayez tareeqe hain, beewi se mubaashirat karke ya laundi se humbistari karke. Balke ab sirf beewi hi iss kaam ke liye rah gayi hai kyun ke istelaahi laundi ka wajood fil haal khatm hai taahum jab kabhi bhi haalaat ne use dobaarah wajodd pazeer kiya to beewi hi ki tarah usse mubaashirat jaayez hogi.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ لِأَمَـٰنَـٰتِهِمْ وَعَهْدِهِمْ رَٰعُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena hum li'amaanaatihim wa 'ahdihim raa'oon.
verses.translation: Aur woh jo apni amaanaton aur apne ahad ki hifaazat karne waale hain.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ عَلَىٰ صَلَوَاتِهِمْ يُحَافِظُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena hum 'alaa Şalawaatihim yuhaafizoon.
verses.translation: Aur woh jo apni namaazon ki hifaazat karte hain.

verses.arabic: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْوَٰرِثُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Ulaaa'ika humul- waarisoon.
verses.translation: Yahi log waaris hain.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَرِثُونَ ٱلْفِرْدَوْسَ هُمْ فِيهَا خَـٰلِدُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Allazeena yarisoonal- Firdawsa hum feehaa khaalidoon.
verses.translation: Jo firdaus ke waaris honge, woh uss mein hameshah rahenge.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ مِن سُلَـٰلَةٍۢ مِّن طِينٍۢ
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad khalaqnal- 'insaana min sulaalatim- min teen.
verses.translation: Aur bilaa shubah humne insaan ko mitti ke jauhar se paida kiya hai.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ جَعَلْنَـٰهُ نُطْفَةًۭ فِى قَرَارٍۢ مَّكِينٍۢ
verses.transliteration: Summa jaʻalnaahu nutfatan fee qaraarim- makeen.
verses.translation: Phir humne use ek mahfooz qaraar gaah (reham-e-maadar) mein nutfah banaa kar rakkha.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ خَلَقْنَا ٱلنُّطْفَةَ عَلَقَةًۭ فَخَلَقْنَا ٱلْعَلَقَةَ مُضْغَةًۭ فَخَلَقْنَا ٱلْمُضْغَةَ عِظَـٰمًۭا فَكَسَوْنَا ٱلْعِظَـٰمَ لَحْمًۭا ثُمَّ أَنشَأْنَـٰهُ خَلْقًا ءَاخَرَۚ فَتَبَارَكَ ٱللَّهُ أَحْسَنُ ٱلْخَـٰلِقِينَ
verses.transliteration: Summa khalaqnan- nutfata 'alaqatan- fakhalaqnal-'alaqata mudghatan fakhalaqnal- mudghata 'izaaman fakasawnal-'izaama lahman summa 'ansha'naahu khalqan 'aakhar; fatabaarakal- laahu 'ahsanul- khaaliqeen.
verses.translation: Phir humne nutfe ko khoon ki phutki banaaya, phir humne phutki ko lauthde mein dhaala, phir humne lauthde se haddiyaan banaayeen, phir humne haddiyon par gosht chadhaa diya, phir humne use ek aur hi surat mein banaa diya, chunaancheh badaa baa barkat hai Allah jo sab se umdah banaane waala hai.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Mulaahazah ho haashyah: (Surah Hajj:22/5)

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُم بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ لَمَيِّتُونَ
verses.transliteration: Summa 'innakum ba'da zaalika lamayyitoon.
verses.translation: Phir beshak tum uske ba'd zaroor marne waale ho.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ تُبۡعَثُونَ
verses.transliteration: Summa 'innakum Yawmal-Qiyaamati tub'asoon.
verses.translation: Phir yaqeenan tum yaum-e-qiyaamat dobaarah uthhaaye jaaoge.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا فَوْقَكُمْ سَبْعَ طَرَآئِقَ وَمَا كُنَّا عَنِ ٱلْخَلْقِ غَٰفِلِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad khalaqnaa fawqakum sab'a taraaa'iqa wa maa kunnaa 'anil-khalqi ghaafileen.
verses.translation: Aur bilaa shubah humne tumhaare oupr saat aasmaan tah batah paida kiye, aur hum (apni) makhlooq se ghaafil nahin hain.

verses.arabic: وَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءًۭ بِقَدَرٍۢ فَأَسْكَنَّٰهُ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰ ذَهَابٍۢ بِهِۦ لَقَـٰدِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'anzalnaa minas- samaaa'i maaa'am biqadarin fa'askannaahu fil-'ardi wa 'innaa 'alaa zahaabim bihee laqaadiroon.
verses.translation: Aur humne aasmaan se ek (khaas) andaaze se paani naazil kiya, phir humne use zameen mein thhahraaya, aur bilaa shubah hum use le jaane par bhi yaqeenan qaadir hain.

verses.arabic: فَأَنشَأْنَا لَكُم بِهِۦ جَنَّـٰتٍۢ مِّن نَّخِيلٍۢ وَأَعْنَـٰبٍۢ لَّكُمْ فِيهَا فَوَٰكِهُ كَثِيرَةٌۭ وَمِنْهَا تَأْكُلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Fa'ansha'naa lakum bihee Jannaatim-min nakheelinw-wa-'a'naab; lakum feehaa fawaakihu kaseeratuñw-wa-minhaa ta'kuloon.
verses.translation: Phir humne uss (paani) ke zariye se tumhaare liye khujooron aur angooron ke baaghaat ugaaye, un mein tumhaare liye bahut se (lazeez) phal hain, aur un mein se ba'z ko tum khaate ho.

verses.arabic: وَشَجَرَةًۭ تَخْرُجُ مِن طُورِ سَيْنَآءَ تَنبُتُ بِٱلدُّهْنِ وَصِبْغٍۢ لِّلْءَاكِلِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa shajaratan takhruju min Toori Saynaaa'a tambutu bidduhni wa şibghil-lil- 'aakileen.
verses.translation: Aur woh darakht (zaitoon) jo toor-e-sina mein paida hota hai, woh khaane waalon ke liye tel aur saalan liye ugta hai.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ لَكُمْ فِى ٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ لَعِبْرَةًۭۖ نُّسْقِيكُم مِّمَّا فِى بُطُونِهَا وَلَكُمْ فِيهَا مَنَـٰفِعُ كَثِيرَةٌۭ وَمِنْهَا تَأْكُلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'inna lakum fil- 'an'aami la'ibrah; nusqeekum mimmaa fee butoonihaa wa lakum feehaa manaafi'u kaseeratuñw-wa-minhaa ta'kuloon.
verses.translation: Aur bilaa shubah tumhaare liye chaupaayon mein zaroor (saamaan) ibrat hai, hum tumhein uss mein se pilaate hain jo unke peton mein (doodh) hai, aur tumhaare liye un mein kaseer munaafa' hain. aur un mein se ba'z ko tum khaate ho.

verses.arabic: وَعَلَيْهَا وَعَلَى ٱلْفُلْكِ تُحْمَلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'alayhaa wa 'alal- fulki tuhmaloon.
verses.translation: Aur un (chaupaayon) par aur kashtiyon par tum sawaar bhi kiye jaate ho.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦ فَقَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنْ إِلَـٰهٍ غَيْرُهُۥٓۚ أَفَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad 'arsalnaa Noohan 'ilaa qawmihee faqaala yaa qawmi budul- laaha maa lakum min 'ilahin ghayruhoo 'afalaa tattaqoon.
verses.translation: Aur bilaa shubah humne Nooh ko uski qaum ki taraf bheja to usne kaha: aye meri qaum! Allah ki ibaadat karo, uske siwa tumhaare liye koyi mabood nahin, to kiya tum darte nahin?

verses.arabic: فَقَالَ ٱلْمَلَأُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِن قَوْمِهِۦ مَا هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا بَشَرٌۭ مِّثْلُكُمْ يُرِيدُ أَن يَتَفَضَّلَ عَلَيْكُمْۚ وَلَوْ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ لَأَنزَلَ مَلَـٰٓئِكَةًۭ مَّا سَمِعْنَا بِهَـٰذَا فِىٓ ءَابَآئِنَا ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.transliteration: Faqaalal-mala'ul- lazeena kafaroo min qawmihee maa haazaaa 'illaa basharum-mislukum yureedu añy-yatafaddala 'alaykum wa law shaaa'al-laahu la'anzala malaaa'ikatam-maa sami'naa bihaazaa feee 'aabaaa'inal 'awwaleen.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh uski qaum ke sardaar, jinhon ne kufr kiya, kahne lage: yeh to tum jaisa hi bashar hai, woh chaahta hai ke tum par fazeelat paaye, aur agar Allah chaahta to (aasmaan se) farishte zaroor naazil karta, humne apne pahle baap dada mein yeh (tauheed) nahin suni.

verses.arabic: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا رَجُلٌۭ بِهِۦ جِنَّةٌۭ فَتَرَبَّصُوا۟ بِهِۦ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍۢ
verses.transliteration: 'In huwa 'illaa rajulum bihee jinnatun fatarabbasoo bihee hattaa heen.
verses.translation: Yeh ek aadmi hi to hai jise junoon laahaq hai, lehaaza tum ek waqt tak uski baabat intezaar karo.

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱنصُرْنِى بِمَا كَذَّبُونِ
verses.transliteration: Qaala Rabbin-şurnee bimaa kazzaboon.
verses.translation: Nooh ne kaha: aye mere rab! Meri madad kar ke unhon ne mujhe jhutlaaya.

verses.arabic: فَأَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَيْهِ أَنِ ٱصْنَعِ ٱلْفُلْكَ بِأَعْيُنِنَا وَوَحْيِنَا فَإِذَا جَآءَ أَمْرُنَا وَفَارَ ٱلتَّنُّورُ فَٱسْلُكْ فِيهَا مِن كُلٍّۢ زَوْجَيْنِ ٱثْنَيْنِ وَأَهْلَكَ إِلَّا مَن سَبَقَ عَلَيْهِ ٱلْقَوْلُ مِنْهُمْ وَلَا تُخَٰطِبْنِى فِى ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوٓا۟ ۖ إِنَّهُم مُّغْرَقُونَ
verses.transliteration: Fa'awhaynaaa 'ilayhi 'anişna'il-fulka bi'a'yuninaa wa wahyinaa fa'izaa jaaa'a 'amrunaa wa faarat- tannooru fasluk feehaa min kullin zawjaynis- nayni wa 'ahlaka 'illaa man sabaqa 'alayhil-qawlu minhum wa laa tukhaatibnee fil-lazeena zalamooo 'innahum mughraqoon.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh humne uski taraf wahi ki ke hamaari aankhon ke saamne aur hamaari wahi ke mutaabiq kashti bana, phir jab hamaara hukm aa jaaye aur tannoor ubal pade to uss mein har qism ke jode se do (nar aur maadah) aur apne ahl-o-a'yaal sawaar karle, siwaaye uske jiske mua'alliq un mein hamaara qaul pahle hi aa chuka, aur tu mujh se zaalimon ke baare mein baat na karna, bilaashubah woh gharq kardiye jaayenge.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Ya'ni jab azaab ka aaghaaz ho jaaye to un zaalimon mein se kisi par raham khaane ki zaroorat nahin hai ke tu kisi ki sifaarish karni shuru karde ky kyun ke unke gharq karne ka qatay'i faislah kiya jaa chuka hai.

verses.arabic: فَإِذَا ٱسْتَوَيْتَ أَنتَ وَمَن مَّعَكَ عَلَى ٱلْفُلْكِ فَقُلِ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِى نَجَّىٰنَا مِنَ ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Fa'izas-tawayta 'anta wa mam-ma'aka 'alal- fulki faqulil-hamdu lillaahil-lazee najjaanaa minal-qawmiz-zalimeen.
verses.translation: Phir jab tu aur tere saathi itminaan se kashti par sawaar ho chukein to kah: tamaam hamd Allah hi ke liye hai jisne humein zaalim qaum se najaat di.

verses.arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَنزِلْنِى مُنزَلًۭا مُّبَارَكًۭا وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ ٱلْمُنزِلِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa qur-Rabbi 'anzilnee munzalam- mubaarakañw-wa 'Anta khayrul-munzileen.
verses.translation: Aur kah: aye mere rab! tu mujhe baa barkat utaarna, aur tu sab se behtar utaarne waala hai.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَءَايَـٰتٍۢ وَإِن كُنَّا لَمُبْتَلِينَ
verses.transliteration: 'Inna fee zaalika la'Aayaatinw-wa'in kunnaa lamubtaleen.
verses.translation: Beshak iss waaqiye mein bhi nishaaniyaan hain, aur bilaa shubah hum hi imtehaan lene waale hain.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ أَنشَأْنَا مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ قَرْنًا ءَاخَرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Summa 'ansha'naa mim ba'dihim qarnan 'aakhareen.
verses.translation: Phir humne unke ba'd ek doosri ummat paida ki.

verses.arabic: فَأَرْسَلْنَا فِيهِمْ رَسُولًۭا مِّنْهُمْ أَنِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنْ إِلَـٰهٍ غَيْرُهُۥٓۖ أَفَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.transliteration: Fa'arsalnaa feehim Rasoolam-minhum 'ani'budul-laaha maa lakum min 'ilaahin ghayruh; 'afalaa tattaqoon.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh humne un mein unhi mein se ek Rasool bheja ke tum Allah ki ibaadat karo, uske siwa tumhaare liye koyi mabood nahin, phir kiya tum darte nahin?

verses.arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلْمَلَأُ مِن قَوْمِهِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَكَذَّبُوا۟ بِلِقَآءِ ٱلْءَاخِرَةِ وَأَتْرَفْنَـٰهُمْ فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا مَا هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا بَشَرٌۭ مِّثْلُكُمْ يَأْكُلُ مِمَّا تَأْكُلُونَ مِنْهُ وَيَشْرَبُ مِمَّا تَشْرَبُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa qaalal-mala'u min qawmihil-lazeena kafaroo wa kazzaboo biliqaaa'il-'Aakhirati wa 'atrafnaahum fil- hayaatid-dunyaa maa haazaaa 'illaa basharum-mislukum ya'kulu mimmaa ta'kuloona minhu wa yashrabu mimmaa tashraboon.
verses.translation: Aur uski qaum ke sardaaron ne kaha, jinhon ne kufr kiya aur (hamaari) aakhirat ki mulaqaat jhutlaayi, aur humne unhein dunyaawi zindagi mein khush haali di thi, ke yeh tum jaisa ek bashar hi to hai, woh uss mein se khaata hai jis mein se tum khaate ho, aur woh uss mein se peeta hai jo tum peete ho.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Chunaancheh unhon ne yeh kah kar inkaar kar diya ke yeh to hamaari hi tarah khaata peeta hai, yeh Allah ka Rasool kis tarah ho sakta hai? jaise aaj bhi bahut se mudda'yaan-e-islam ke liye Rasool ki bashariyat ka tasleem karna nehaayat giran hai. jabke Allah Ta'ala ne awwal ta aakhir tamaam ambiya- o-mursaleen ke muta'alliq yeh faislah bade waazeh alfaaz mein suna diya hai. mulaahazah farmaayein: (Surah Furqan:25/20)

verses.arabic: وَلَئِنْ أَطَعْتُم بَشَرًۭا مِّثْلَكُمْ إِنَّكُمْ إِذًا لَّخَـٰسِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa la'in 'ata'tum basharam-mislakum 'innakum 'izal- lakhaasiroon.
verses.translation: Aur agar tumne apne hi jaise bashar ki itaa'at ki to bilaa shubah tum uss waqt khasaarah pane waale hoge.

verses.arabic: أَيَعِدُكُمْ أَنَّكُمْ إِذَا مِتُّمْ وَكُنتُمْ تُرَٰبًۭا وَعِظَـٰمًا أَنَّكُم مُّخْرَجُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'A-Ya'idukum 'annakum 'izaa mittum wa kuntum turaabañw- wa-'izaaman 'annakum mukhrajoon.
verses.translation: Kiya woh tumhein wa'dah deta hai ke beshak jab tu mar gaye aur mitti aur haddiyaan ho gaye to bilaa shubah tum (zindah) nikaale jaaoge?

verses.arabic: هَيْهَاتَ هَيْهَاتَ لِمَا تُوعَدُونَ
verses.transliteration: Hayhaata hayhaata limaa too'adoon.
verses.translation: Naa mumkin hai, naa mumkin hai woh jo tumhein wadah diya jaata hai!

verses.arabic: إِنْ هِىَ إِلَّا حَيَاتُنَا ٱلدُّنْيَا نَمُوتُ وَنَحْيَا وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَبْعُوثِينَ
verses.transliteration: 'In hiya 'illaa hayaatunad-dunyaa namootu wa nahyaa wa maa nahnu bimab'ooseen.
verses.translation: Yeh hamaari dunyaawi zindagi hi to (sab kuchh) hai (jis mein) hum marte aur zindah rahte hain, aur hum dobaarah uthhaaye jaane waale nahin

verses.arabic: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا رَجُلٌ ٱفْتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًۭا وَمَا نَحْنُ لَهُۥ بِمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.transliteration: 'In huwa 'illaa rajulunif-taraa 'alal-laahi kazibañw-wa maa nahnu lahoo bimu'mineen.
verses.translation: Woh ek shakhs hi to hai jisne Allah par jhoot ghada hai, aur hum USS par eemaan laane waale nahin.

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱنصُرْنِى بِمَا كَذَّبُونِ
verses.transliteration: Qaala Rabbin-şurnee bimaa kazzaboon.
verses.translation: Uss (Rasool) ne kaha: aye mere rab! tu meri madad farma isliye ke unhon ne meri takzeeb ki.

verses.arabic: قَالَ عَمَّا قَلِيلٍۢ لَّيُصْبِحُنَّ نَـٰدِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala 'ammaa qaleelil-layuşbihunna naadimeen.
verses.translation: Allah ne farmaya: bilaa shubah thode dinon mein woh (apne kiye par) zaroor naadim honge.

verses.arabic: فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ ٱلصَّيْحَةُ بِٱلْحَقِّ فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ غُثَآءًۭ ۚ فَبُعْدًۭا لِّلْقَوْمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Fa'akhazathumuş- sayhatu bilhaqqi faja'alnaahum ghusaaa'aa; fabu'dal- lilqawmiz-zaalimeen.
verses.translation: Phir unhein insaaf ke saath chinghaad ne aa pakda, phir humne unhein khas-o-khaashaak banaake rakh diya, chunaancheh lanat hai zaalim logon ke liye.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ أَنشَأْنَا مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ قُرُونًا ءَاخَرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Summa 'ansha'naa mim ba'dihim quroonan 'aakhareen.
verses.translation: Phir humne unke ba'd doosri ummatein paida keen.

verses.arabic: مَا تَسْبِقُ مِنْ أُمَّةٍ أَجَلَهَا وَمَا يَسْتَـْٔخِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Maa tasbiqu min 'ummatin 'ajalahaa wa maa yasta'khiroon.
verses.translation: Koyi bhi ummat apne muqarrar waqt se aage nahin nikal sakti aur na woh peechhe rah sakti hai.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ أَرْسَلْنَا رُسُلَنَا تَتْرَاۖ كُلَّ مَا جَآءَ أُمَّةًۭ رَّسُولُهَا كَذَّبُوهُ فَأَتْبَعْنَا بَعْضَهُم بَعْضًۭا وَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ أَحَادِيثَۚ فَبُعْدًۭا لِّقَوْمٍۢ لَّا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.transliteration: Summa 'arsalnaa Rusulanaa tatraa kullamaa jaaa'a 'ummatar-Rasooluhaa kazzaboohu fa'atba'naa ba'dahum ba'danw-wa ja'alnaahum 'ahaadees; fabu'dal-liqawmil-laa yu'minoon.
verses.translation: Phir hum lagaataar apne Rasool bhejte rahe, jab bhi kisi ummat ke paas Rasool aaya to unhon ne uski takzeeb ki, phir hum ek ke peechhe doosri qaum ko halaak karte rahe, aur humne unhein afsaane banaa diya, chunaancheh un logon ke liye la'nat hai jo eemaan nahin laate.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ أَرْسَلْنَا مُوسَىٰ وَأَخَاهُ هَـٰرُونَ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا وَسُلْطَٰنٍۢ مُّبِينٍ
verses.transliteration: Summa 'arsalnaa Moosaa wa 'akhaahu Haaroona bi'Aayaatinaa wa sultaanim-mubeen.
verses.translation: Phir humne Moosa aur uske bhaai Haaroon ko apni nishaaniyon aur khuli daleel ke saath bheja.

verses.arabic: إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ وَمَلَإِي۟هِۦ فَٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ وَكَانُوا۟ قَوْمًۭا عَالِينَ
verses.transliteration: 'Ilaa Fir'awna wa mala'ihee fastakbaroo wa kaanoo qawman 'aaleen.
verses.translation: Fira'un aur uske darbaaryon ki taraf, phir unhon ne takabbur kiya aur woh sarkash log the.

verses.arabic: فَقَالُوا۟ أَنُؤْمِنُ لِبَشَرَيْنِ مِثْلِنَا وَقَوْمُهُمَا لَنَا عَـٰبِدُونَ
verses.transliteration: Faqaalooo 'anu'minu libasharayni mislinaa wa qawmuhumaa lanaa 'aabidoon.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh woh kahne lage: kiya hum apni hi tarah ke do insaanon par eemaan laayein jabke unki qaum ke log hamaare ghulaam (maatehat) hain.

verses.arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُمَا فَكَانُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلْمُهْلَكِينَ
verses.transliteration: Fakazzaboohumaa -fakaanoo minal- muhlakeen.
verses.translation: Phir unhon ne un donon ko jhutlaaya, to woh halaak shudgaan mein se ho gaye.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا مُوسَى ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَهْتَدُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad 'aataynaa Moosal-Kitaaba la'allahum yahtadoon
verses.translation: Aur bilaa shubah humne Moosa ko kitab di taake woh (log) hidaayat paayein.

verses.arabic: وَجَعَلْنَا ٱبْنَ مَرْيَمَ وَأُمَّهُۥٓ ءَايَةًۭ وَءَاوَيْنَـٰهُمَآ إِلَىٰ رَبْوَةٍۢ ذَاتِ قَرَارٍۢ وَمَعِينٍۢ
verses.transliteration: Wa ja'alnab-na Maryama wa 'ummahooo 'Aayatanw-wa 'aawaynaahumaaa 'ilaa rabwatin zaati qaraariñw- wa ma'een.
verses.translation: Aur humne (Eisa) Ibne Maryam aur uski maan ko ek nishaani banaaya aur ek sukoon aur jaari chashme waale teele par un donon ko thhekaana diya.

verses.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلرُّسُلُ كُلُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلطَّيِّبَـٰتِ وَٱعْمَلُوا۟ صَـٰلِحًا ۖ إِنِّى بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ عَلِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhar- Rusulu kuloo minat- tayyibaati wa'maloo saalihan 'innee bimaa ta'maloona 'Aleem.
verses.translation: (Farmaaya:) aye Rasoolo! Tum paakeezah cheezon mein se khaao aur nek amal karo, beshak tum jo amal karte ho main use khoob jaanta hoon.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ هَـٰذِهِۦٓ أُمَّتُكُمْ أُمَّةًۭ وَٰحِدَةًۭ وَأَنَا۠ رَبُّكُمْ فَٱتَّقُونِ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'inna haaziheee 'ummatukum 'ummatañw- waahidatanw-wa 'Anaa Rabbukum fattaqoon.
verses.translation: Aur bilaa shubah yeh tumhaari millat ek hi millat-o- sharia't hai, aur main tumhaara raab hoon, lehaaza tum mujh hi se daro.

verses.arabic: فَتَقَطَّعُوٓا۟ أَمْرَهُم بَيْنَهُمْ زُبُرًۭا ۖ كُلُّ حِزْبٍۢ بِمَا لَدَيْهِمْ فَرِحُونَ
verses.transliteration: Fataqatta'ooo 'amrahum baynahum zuburaa; kullu hizbim bimaa ladayhim farihoon.
verses.translation: Phir unhon ne apna amr (deen) aapas mein tukde tukde kar daala, har firqe ke paas jo kuchh hai woh usi par reejhe huye hai.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Mulaahazah ho haashyah: (Surah Aal-e-Imran:3/103)

verses.arabic: فَذَرْهُمْ فِى غَمْرَتِهِمْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
verses.transliteration: Fazarhum fee ghamratihim hattaa heen.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh (Aye Nabi!) aap unhein unki ghaflat mein ek (muqarrar) waqt tak chhod dein.

verses.arabic: أَيَحْسَبُونَ أَنَّمَا نُمِدُّهُم بِهِۦ مِن مَّالٍۢ وَبَنِينَ
verses.transliteration: A-yahsaboona 'annamaa numidduhum bihee mim-maaliñw-wa- baneen.
verses.translation: Kiya woh samajhte hain ke beshak hum jo bhi unke maal aur aulaad mein ezaafah kiye jaa rahe hain.

verses.arabic: نُسَارِعُ لَهُمْ فِى ٱلْخَيْرَٰتِ ۚ بَل لَّا يَشْعُرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Nusaari'u lahum fil- khayraat; ballaa yash'uroon.
verses.translation: (to) kiya hum unke liye bhalaaiyon mein jaldi kar rahe hain? (nahin, nahin) balke, woh (asal haqeeqat ka) shu'oor nahin rakhte.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنْ خَشْيَةِ رَبِّهِم مُّشْفِقُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Innal-lazeena hum- min khashyati Rabbihim mushfiqoon.
verses.translation: Beshak jo log apne rab ke khauf se darte rahte hain.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم بِـَٔايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena hum bi'Aayaati Rabbihim yu'minoon.
verses.translation: Aur jo log apne rab ki aayaat par eemaan laate hain.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم بِرَبِّهِمْ لَا يُشْرِكُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena hum bi- Rabbihim laa yushrikoon.
verses.translation: Aur jo log apne rab ke saath kisi ko shareek nahin thhahraate.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُؤْتُونَ مَآ ءَاتَوا۟ وَقُلُوبُهُمْ وَجِلَةٌ أَنَّهُمْ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ رَٰجِعُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena yu'toona maaa 'aataw-wa- quloobuhum wajilatun 'annahum 'ilaa Rabbihim raaji'oon.
verses.translation: Aur jo log (Allah ki raah mein) dete hain jo kuchh bhi dete hain, to iss tarah ke unke dil khaufzadah hote hain ke beshak woh apne rab ki taraf lautne waale hain.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Rasoolullah ﷺ ne farmaya: 'Yeh woh log hain jo rozah rakhte hain, namaaz padhte hain aur sadqah-o-khairaat dete hain aur woh khaufzadah rahte hain ke shaayad Allah Ta'ala unke un'a'amaal ko qubool na farmaaye. (Tirmezi, hadees:3175)

verses.arabic: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ يُسَـٰرِعُونَ فِى ٱلْخَيْرَٰتِ وَهُمْ لَهَا سَـٰبِقُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Ulaaa'ika yusaari'oona fil-khayraati wa hum lahaa saabiqoon.
verses.translation: Yahi log bhalaaiyon mein jaldi karte hain, aur woh un mein baahum sabqat karne waale hain.

verses.arabic: وَلَا نُكَلِّفُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا وَلَدَيْنَا كِتَـٰبٌۭ يَنطِقُ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَهُمْ لَا يُظْلَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laa nukallifu nafsan 'illaa wus'ahaa wa ladaynaa kitaabuñy- yantiqu bilhaqqi wa hum laa yuzlamoon.
verses.translation: Aur hum kisi nafs ko uski taaqat se ziyaadah takleef nahin dete, aur hamaare paas ek aisi kitab (naama-e- a'amaal) hai jo (har shakhs ka haal) thheek thheek bataa degi, aur un par zulm nahin kiya jaayega.

verses.arabic: بَلْ قُلُوبُهُمْ فِى غَمْرَةٍۢ مِّنْ هَـٰذَا وَلَهُمْ أَعْمَـٰلٌۭ مِّن دُونِ ذَٰلِكَ هُمْ لَهَا عَـٰمِلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Bal quloobuhum fee ghamratim-min haazaa wa lahum 'a'maalum- min-dooni zaalika hum lahaa 'aamiloon.
verses.translation: Balke un (kuffaar) ke dil iss (qur'an) se ghaafil hai, aur uss (ghaflat) ke elaawah bhi unke kayi (bure) a'amaal hain jinhein woh karne waale hain.

verses.arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَخَذْنَا مُتْرَفِيهِم بِٱلْعَذَابِ إِذَا هُمْ يَجْـَٔرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Hattaaa izaaa 'akhaznaa mutrafeehim bil'azaabi 'izaa hum yaj'aroon.
verses.translation: Hatta ke jab hum unke khush haal (A'yyaash) logon ko azaab mein pakdenge to USS waqt woh cheekh pukaar karenge.

verses.arabic: لَا تَجْـَٔرُوا۟ ٱلْيَوْمَ ۖ إِنَّكُم مِّنَّا لَا تُنصَرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Laa taj'arul-yawma 'innakum minnaa laa tunsaroon.
verses.translation: (Kaaha jaayega) aaj mat cheekho yaqeenan hamaari taraf se tumhein koyi madad nahin pahunchegi.

verses.arabic: قَدْ كَانَتْ ءَايَـٰتِى تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْكُمْ فَكُنتُمْ عَلَىٰٓ أَعْقَٰبِكُمْ تَنكِصُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qad kaanat 'Aayaatee tutlaa 'alaykum fakuntum 'alaaa 'a'qaabikum tankisoon.
verses.translation: Tahqeeq meri aayaat tum par tilaawat ki jaati thin to tum apni aediyon par ulte phir jaate the.

verses.arabic: مُسْتَكْبِرِينَ بِهِۦ سَـٰمِرًۢا تَهْجُرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Mustakbireena bihee saamiran tahjuroon.
verses.translation: Takabbur karte huye, uss (qur'an) ke saath afsaanah goyi karte huye tum behoodah bakte the.

verses.arabic: أَفَلَمْ يَدَّبَّرُوا۟ ٱلْقَوْلَ أَمْ جَآءَهُم مَّا لَمْ يَأْتِ ءَابَآءَهُمُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.transliteration: 'Afalam yaddabbarul- qawla 'am jaaa'ahum- maa lam ya'ti 'aabaaa'ahumul- 'awwaleen.
verses.translation: Kiya phir unhon ne qur'an mein tadabbur nahin kiya, ya phir unke paas woh cheez aa gayi jo unke pahle baap dada ke paas nahin aayi thi?

verses.arabic: أَمْ لَمْ يَعْرِفُوا۟ رَسُولَهُمْ فَهُمْ لَهُۥ مُنكِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Am lam ya'rifoo Rasoolahum fahum lahoo munkiroon.
verses.translation: Ya unhon ne apne Rasool ko nahin pahchaana? Lehaaza woh uske munkir hain.

verses.arabic: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ بِهِۦ جِنَّةٌۭ ۚ بَلْ جَآءَهُم بِٱلْحَقِّ وَأَكْثَرُهُمْ لِلْحَقِّ كَـٰرِهُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Am yaqooloona bihee jinnah; bal jaaa'ahum bilhaqqi wa 'aksaruhum lilhaqqi kaarihoon.
verses.translation: Ya woh kahte hain use junoon hai? balke woh unke paas haq laaya hai, aur unke aksar log haq ko naa pasand karte hain.

verses.arabic: وَلَوِ ٱتَّبَعَ ٱلْحَقُّ أَهْوَآءَهُمْ لَفَسَدَتِ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتُ وَٱلْأَرْضُ وَمَن فِيهِنَّ ۚ بَلْ أَتَيْنَـٰهُم بِذِكْرِهِمْ فَهُمْ عَن ذِكْرِهِم مُّعْرِضُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa lawit-taba'al- haqqu 'ahwaaa'ahum lafasadatis-samaawaatu wal'ardu wa man feehinn; bal 'ataynaahum bizikrihim fahum 'an zikrihim mu'ridoon.
verses.translation: Aur agar haq unki khaaheshaat ki pairwi kare to aasmaan aur zameen aur jo un mein hain, sab tabaah ho jaayein, balke hum unke paas unke liye naseehat laaye hain, aur woh apni hi naseehat se munh mode huye hain.

verses.arabic: أَمْ تَسْـَٔلُهُمْ خَرْجًۭا فَخَرَاجُ رَبِّكَ خَيْرٌۭ ۖ وَهُوَ خَيْرُ ٱلرَّٰزِقِينَ
verses.transliteration: 'Am tas'aluhum kharjan fakharaaju Rabbika khayrunw-wa huwa khayrur-raaziqeen.
verses.translation: Kiya aap unse ujrat ka sawaal karte hain? to aapke rab ka silah behtar hai, aur woh behtareen rizq dene waala hai.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّكَ لَتَدْعُوهُمْ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍۢ مُّسْتَقِيمٍۢ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'innaka latad'oohum 'ilaa Şiraatim-Mustaqeem.
verses.translation: Aur bilaa shubah aap unhein siraat-e-mustaqeem (islam) ki taraf bulaate hain.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْءَاخِرَةِ عَنِ ٱلصِّرَٰطِ لَنَٰكِبُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'innal-lazeena laa yu'minoona bil-'Aakhirati 'aniş-şiraati lanaakiboon.
verses.translation: Aur bilaa shubah jo log aakhirat par eemaan nahin laate woh yaqeenan siraat-e- mustaqeem se hat rahe hain.

verses.arabic: وَلَوْ رَحِمْنَـٰهُمْ وَكَشَفْنَا مَا بِهِم مِّن ضُرٍّۢ لَّلَجُّوا۟ فِى طُغْيَـٰنِهِمْ يَعْمَهُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa law rahimnaahum wa kashafnaa maa bihim min durril-lalajjoo fee tughyaanihim ya'mahoon.
verses.translation: Aur agar hum un par raham karein aur unhein laahaq takleefein dooar kardein to phir bhi woh baraabar apni sar kash mein ade rahein (aur) bhatakte phirein.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَخَذْنَـٰهُم بِٱلْعَذَابِ فَمَا ٱسْتَكَانُوا۟ لِرَبِّهِمْ وَمَا يَتَضَرَّعُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad 'akhaznaahum bil'azaabi famastakaanoo li- Rabbihim wa maa yatadarra'oon.
verses.translation: Aur bilaa shubah humne unhein azaab mein pakda tha, phir na unhon ne apne rab ke saamne aajzi ki aur na woh gid gidaaye.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Azaab se muraad jung-e-badr ki shikast hai jis mein unke 70 aadmi maare gaye the ya woh qahat saali ka azaab muraad hai jo Nabi ﷺ ki bad dua' ke nateeje mein un par aaya tha, aapne arz kiya tha: 'aye Allah! Jis tarah Yusuf عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام ke zamaane mein saat saal qahat raha, usi tarah qahat saali mein unhein mubtala karke unke muqaabile mein meri madad farma.' (Sahih Bukhari, Ad-da'waat, Baab:58, hadees:6393) iss qahat saali mein Abu Sufyan ne Nabi ﷺ ke paas aa kar Allah ka aur risthah daari ka waastah de kar kaha ke ab to hum jaanawaron ki khaalein aur khoon tak khaane par majboor ho gaye hain tab yeh aayat naazil huyi. (Ibne Kaseer)

verses.arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا فَتَحْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ بَابًۭا ذَا عَذَابٍۢ شَدِيدٍ إِذَا هُمۡ فِيهِ مُبْلِسُونَ
verses.transliteration: Hattaaa 'izaa fatahnaa 'alayhim baaban zaa 'azaabin shadeedin 'izaa hum feehi mublisoon.
verses.translation: Hatta ke jab humne un par sakht azaab ka darwaazah khol diya to woh uss mein naa ummeed ho gaye.

verses.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمْعَ وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرَ وَٱلْأَفْـِٔدَةَ ۚ قَلِيلًۭا مَّا تَشْكُرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa Huwal-lazeee 'ansha'a-lakumus-sam'a wal'absaara wal 'af'idah; qaleelam-maa tashkuroon.
verses.translation: Aur wahi (Allah) hai jisne tumhaare liye kaan aur aankhein aur dil paida kiye, tum qaleel hi shukr karte ho.

verses.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى ذَرَأَكُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَإِلَيْهِ تُحْشَرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa Huwal-lazee zara'akum fil-'ardi wa 'ilayhi tuhsharoon.
verses.translation: Aur wahi hai jisne tumhein zameen mein phailaaya, aur usi ki taraf tumhein ekattha kiya jaayega.

verses.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى يُحْىِۦ وَيُمِيتُ وَلَهُ ٱخْتِلَـٰفُ ٱلَّيْلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ ۚ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa Huwal-lazee yuhyee wa yumeetu wa lahukh-tilaaful-layli wannahaari 'afalaa taʻqiloon.
verses.translation: Aur wahi hai jo zindah karta aur maut deta hai aur raat aur din ka ikhtelaaf usi ka (paida kiya huwa) hai, kiya phir bhi tum nahin samajhte?

verses.arabic: بَلْ قَالُوا۟ مِثْلَ مَا قَالَ ٱلْأَوَّلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Bal qaaloo misla maa qaalal-'awwaloon.
verses.translation: Balke unhon ne wahi kuchh kaaha jo unse pahlon ne kaha tha.

verses.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ أَئِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَٰبًۭا وَعِظَـٰمًا أَئِنَّا لَمَبْعُوثُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qaalooo 'a'izaa mitnaa wa kunnaa turaabanw-wa 'izaaman 'a'innaa lamabʻoosoon.
verses.translation: Unhon ne kaha: kiya jab hum mar gaye aur mitti aur haddiyaan ho gaye, to kiya humein do baarah zindah karke uthhaaya jaayega?

verses.arabic: لَقَدْ وُعِدْنَا نَحْنُ وَءَابَآؤُنَا هَـٰذَا مِن قَبْلُ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّآ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.transliteration: Laqad wu'idnaa nahnu wa 'aabaaa'unaa haazaa min qablu 'in haazaaa 'illaaa 'asaateerul-'awwaleen.
verses.translation: Bilaa shubah isi baat ka humse aur humse pahle hamaare baap daadon se wa'dah hota aaya hai, yeh to mahaz pahle logon ke afsaane hain.

verses.arabic: قُل لِّمَنِ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَمَن فِيهَآ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qul limanil-'ardu wa man feehaaa 'in kuntum taʻlamoon.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) aap (unse) poochhein: agar tum jaante ho (to bataao) kiski hai yeh zameen aur jo kuchh uss mein hai?

verses.arabic: سَيَقُولُونَ لِلَّهِ ۚ قُلْ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Sayaqooloona lillaah; qul 'afalaa tazakkaroon.
verses.translation: Woh zaroor kahenge: Allah hi ki hai, kah deejiye: kiya phir tum naseehat nahin pakadte?

verses.arabic: قُلْ مَن رَّبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ ٱلسَّبْعِ وَرَبُّ ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
verses.transliteration: Qul mar-Rabbus- samaawaatis-sab'i wa Rabbul-'Arshil-'Azeem.
verses.translation: Aap poochhein: saaton aasmaanon ka rab aur arsh- e-azeem ka rab kaun hai?

verses.arabic: سَيَقُولُونَ لِلَّهِ ۚ قُلْ أَفَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.transliteration: Sayaqooloona lillaah; qul 'afalaa tattaqoon.
verses.translation: Woh zaroor kahenge: (yeh) Allah hi ke hain, kah deejiye: kiya phir tum darte nahin?'

verses.arabic: قُلْ مَنۢ بِيَدِهِۦ مَلَكُوتُ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ وَهُوَ يُجِيرُ وَلَا يُجَارُ عَلَيْهِ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qul mam biyadihee malakootu kulli shay'inw-wa Huwa yujeeru wa laa yujaaru 'alayhi 'in kuntum taʻlamoon.
verses.translation: Aap (phir) poochhen: kiske haath mein hai har cheez ki baadshaahi, jabke wahi panaah deta hai aur uske muqaabil kisi ko panaah nahin di jaa sakti, agar tum jaante ho (to bataao?)

verses.arabic: سَيَقُولُونَ لِلَّهِ ۚ قُلْ فَأَنَّىٰ تُسْحَرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Sayaqooloona lillaah; qul fa'annaa tusharoon.
verses.translation: Woh zaroor kaheinge: (baadshaahi) Allah hi ki hai, kah deejiye: phir kahaan se tum par jaadu kiya jaata hai?

verses.arabic: بَلْ أَتَيْنَـٰهُم بِٱلْحَقِّ وَإِنَّهُمْ لَكَـٰذِبُونَ
verses.transliteration: Bal 'ataynaahum bil- haqqi wa 'innahum lakaaziboon.
verses.translation: Balke hum unke paas haq laaye hain aur bilaa shubah wahi jhoote hain.

verses.arabic: مَا ٱتَّخَذَ ٱللَّهُ مِن وَلَدٍۢ وَمَا كَانَ مَعَهُۥ مِنْ إِلَـٰهٍۢ ۚ إِذًۭا لَّذَهَبَ كُلُّ إِلَـٰهٍۢ بِمَا خَلَقَ وَلَعَلَا بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍۢ ۚ سُبْحَـٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
verses.transliteration: Mat-takhazal-laahu minw-waladiñw-wa maa kaana ma'ahoo min 'ilaah; 'izal-lazahaba kullu 'ilaahim bimaa khalaqa wa la'alaa ba'duhum 'alaa ba'd; Subhaanal-laahi 'ammaa yaşifoon.
verses.translation: Allah ne apni koyi aulaad nahin banaayi aur na uske saath koyi (aur) mabood hai (agar hota) to har mabood uss cheez ko, jo usne paida ki, le jaata aur bilaa shubah un mein se har ek doosre par chadhaayi karta, Allah un baaton se paak hai jo woh bayaan karte hain.

verses.arabic: عَـٰلِمِ ٱلْغَيْبِ وَٱلشَّهَـٰدَةِ فَتَعَـٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Aalimil-Ghaybi washshahhaadati fata'aalaa 'ammaa yushrikoon.
verses.translation: Woh ghaib aur haazir ka jaanne waal hai, chunaancheh woh kahin A'ala hai usse jo woh shirk karte hain.

verses.arabic: قُل رَّبِّ إِمَّا تُرِيَنِّى مَا يُوعَدُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qur-Rabbi 'immaa turiyannee maa yoo'adoon.
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: aye mere rab! agar tu mujhe dikhaaye jo unhein wa'dah diya jaata hai.

verses.arabic: رَبِّ فَلَا تَجْعَلْنِى فِى ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Rabbi falaa taj'alnee fil-qawmiz-zaalimeen.
verses.translation: (to) aye mere rab! tu mujhe zaalim logon mein shaamil na karna.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّرِيَكَ مَا نَعِدُهُمْ لَقَـٰدِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'innaa 'alaaa 'an- nuriyaka maa na iduhum laqaadiroon.
verses.translation: Aur bilaa shubah hum iss baat par ke aapko dikhaayein jiska hum unse wa'dah karte hain, zaroor qaadir hain.

verses.arabic: ٱدْفَعْ بِٱلَّتِى هِىَ أَحْسَنُ ٱلسَّيِّئَةَ ۚ نَحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَصِفُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Idfa' billatee hiya 'ahsanus-sayyi'ah; nahnu 'a'lamu bimaa yaşifoon.
verses.translation: Buraayi ko iss tareeqe se dafa' keejiye jo ahsan ho, hum use khoob jaante hain jo woh bayaan karte hain.

verses.arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ هَمَزَٰتِ ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينِ
verses.transliteration: Wa qur-Rabbi 'a'oozu bika min hamazaatish- Shayaateen.
verses.translation: Aur aap kahein: aye mere rab! main shaytaanon ke waswason se teri panaah maangta hoon.

verses.arabic: وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ رَبِّ أَن يَحْضُرُونِ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'a'oozu bika Rabbi 'any-yahduroon.
verses.translation: Aur aye mere rab! usse bhi main tari panaah maangta hoon ke woh mere paas haazir hon.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Isliye Nabi ﷺ ne taakeed farmaayi hai ke har aham kaam ki ibteda Allah ke naam se karo ya'ni Bismillah padh kar. Kyun ke Allah ki yaad, shaytaan ko door karne waali hai cheez hai. Nabi Akrm ﷺ raat ko ghabraahat mein yeh dua' padhte the: 'Bismillah 'A 'oozu bikalimaatillaahittaammaati min ghadhabihi wa 'iqaabihi, wa sharri 'ibaadihi, wa min hamazaatish-shayaateeni wa an yahdhuroon.' (Musnad Ahmad:2/181, Tirmezi, Abwabud-da'waat, hadees:3528)

verses.arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءَ أَحَدَهُمُ ٱلْمَوْتُ قَالَ رَبِّ ٱرْجِعُونِ
verses.transliteration: Hattaaa 'izaa jaaa'a 'ahadahumul-mawtu qaala Rabbir-ji'oon.
verses.translation: Hatta ke jab un mein se kisi ko maut aayegi to woh kahega: aye mere rab! mujhe waapas bhej.

verses.arabic: لَعَلِّىٓ أَعْمَلُ صَـٰلِحًۭا فِيمَا تَرَكْتُ ۚ كَلَّآ ۚ إِنَّهَا كَلِمَةٌ هُوَ قَآئِلُهَا ۖ وَمِن وَرَآئِهِم بَرْزَخٌ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ
verses.transliteration: La'alleee 'a'malu saalihan feemaa taraktu kallaa; 'innahaa kalimatun huwa qaaa'iluhaa wa miñw- waraaa'ihim barzakhun 'ilaa Yawmi yub'asoon.
verses.translation: Taake main uss dunya mein, jise main chhod aaya hoon, nek amal karun, hargiz nahin! beshak yeh ek baat hai jo woh kahne waala hai. aur unke aage pardah hai uss din tak jab woh dobaarah uthhaaye jaayenge.

verses.arabic: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَلَآ أَنسَابَ بَيْنَهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ وَلَا يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Faizaa nufikha fiş- Şoori falaaa 'ansaaba baynahum yawma'izinw- wa laa yatasaaa'aloon.
verses.translation: Phir jab soor mein phoonka jaayega to uss din na un mein rishtah daariyaan raheingi aur na woh baahum sawaal karenge

verses.arabic: فَمَن ثَقُلَتْ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُفْلِحُونَ
verses.transliteration: Faman saqulat mawaazeenuhoo fa'ulaaa'ika humul- muflihoon.
verses.translation: Phir jiske palde bhaari ho gaye to wahi falaah pane waale hain.

verses.arabic: وَمَنْ خَفَّتْ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ خَسِرُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ فِى جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa man khaffat mawaazeenuhoo fa'ulaaa'ikal-lazeena khasirooo 'anfusahum fee Jahannama khaalidoon.
verses.translation: Aur jiske palde halke ho gaye to wahi hain jinhon ne apne aap ko khasaare mein daala, woh hameshah jahannam mein rahenge.

verses.arabic: تَلْفَحُ وُجُوهَهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ وَهُمْ فِيهَا كَـٰلِحُونَ
verses.transliteration: Talfahu wujoohahumun-Naaru wa hum feehaa kaalihoon.
verses.translation: Aag unke chehre jalaa daalegi, aur woh uss mein bad shakl honge.

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ تَكُنْ ءَايَـٰتِى تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْكُمْ فَكُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Alam takun 'Aayaatee tutlaa 'alaykum fakuntum bihaa tukazziboon.
verses.translation: (Kaha jaayega:) kiya tum par meri aayaat tilaawat nahin ki jaati thin, phir tum unko jhutlaa diya karte the?

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا غَلَبَتْ عَلَيْنَا شِقْوَتُنَا وَكُنَّا قَوْمًۭا ضَآلِّينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo Rabbanaa ghalabat 'alaynaa shiqwatunaa wa kunnaa qawman daaalleen.
verses.translation: Woh kahenge: aye hamaare rab! hamaari badbakhti hum par ghaalib aa gayi aur (waaqayi) hum log gumraah the.

verses.arabic: رَبَّنَآ أَخْرِجْنَا مِنْهَا فَإِنْ عُدْنَا فَإِنَّا ظَـٰلِمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Rabbanaa 'akhrijnaa minhaa fa'in 'udnaa fa'innaa zaalimoon.
verses.translation: Aye hamaare rab! humein yahaan se nikaal, phir agar hum dobaarah wahi karein to bilaashubah hum zaalim honge

verses.arabic: قَالَ ٱخْسَـُٔوا۟ فِيهَا وَلَا تُكَلِّمُونِ
verses.transliteration: Qaalakh-sa'oo feehaa wa laa tukallimoon.
verses.translation: Allah farmaayega: usi mein phatkaare pade raho aur mujhse kalaam na karo.

verses.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فَرِيقٌۭ مِّنْ عِبَادِى يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَآ ءَامَنَّا فَٱغْفِرْ لَنَا وَٱرْحَمْنَا وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: 'Innahoo kaana fareequm-min 'ibaadee yaqooloona Rabbanaaa 'aamannaa faghfir lanaa warhamnaa wa 'Anta khayrur-raahimeen.
verses.translation: Beshak mere bandon mein ek giroh tha jo kahte the: aye hamaare rab! hum eenaan laye, lehaaza tu hamaari maghfirat farma aur hum par raham kar, aur tu hi sab se behtar raham karne waala hai.

verses.arabic: فَٱتَّخَذْتُمُوهُمْ سِخْرِيًّا حَتَّىٰٓ أَنسَوْكُمْ ذِكْرِى وَكُنتُم مِّنْهُمْ تَضْحَكُونَ
verses.transliteration: Fattakhaztumoohum sikhriyyan hattaaa 'ansawkum zikree wa kuntum minhum tadhakoon.
verses.translation: Phir tum unse maskhari (hansi mazaaq) karte the hatta ke unhon ne tumhein mera zikr bhula diya tha, aur tum un par hansa karte the.

verses.arabic: إِنِّى جَزَيْتُهُمُ ٱلْيَوْمَ بِمَا صَبَرُوٓا۟ أَنَّهُمْ هُمُ ٱلْفَآئِزُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Innee jazaytuhumul- Yawma bimaa şabarooo 'annahum humul- faaa'izoon.
verses.translation: Bilaa shubah main ne aaj unhein unke sabr ka badlah de diya hai ke beshak wahi kaamyaab hain.

verses.arabic: قَالَ كَمْ لَبِثْتُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ عَدَدَ سِنِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala kam labistum fil-'ardi 'adada sineen.
verses.translation: Allah farmaayega: zameen mein tum kitne saal rahe?

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ لَبِثْنَا يَوْمًا أَوْ بَعْضَ يَوْمٍۢ فَسْـَٔلِ ٱلْعَآدِّينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo labisnaa yawman 'aw ba da yawmin fas'alil- 'aaaddeen.
verses.translation: Woh kahenge: hum ek din ya din ka bhi kuchh hissa rahe, ginti karne waalon se poochh leejiye

verses.arabic: قَالَ إِن لَّبِثْتُمْ إِلَّا قَلِيلًۭا ۖ لَّوْ أَنَّكُمْ كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala 'il-labistum 'illaa qaleelal-law 'annakum kuntum ta'lamoon.
verses.translation: Allah farmaayega: waaqayi' tum (wahaan) thoda sa waqt hi rahe, kaash! Tum (yeh baat dunya mein) jaante hote.

verses.arabic: أَفَحَسِبْتُمْ أَنَّمَا خَلَقْنَـٰكُمْ عَبَثًۭا وَأَنَّكُمْ إِلَيْنَا لَا تُرْجَعُونَ
verses.transliteration: Afahasibtum 'annamaa khalaqnaakum 'abasañw-wa-'annakum 'ilaynaa laa turja'oon.
verses.translation: Kiya tumne samjha tha ke humne tumhein be faaidah paida kiya hai aur yeh ke tum hamaari taraf laut kar nahin aaoge?

verses.arabic: فَتَعَـٰلَى ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمَلِكُ ٱلْحَقُّ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْكَرِيمِ
verses.transliteration: Fata'aalal-laahul- Malikul-Haqq; laaa 'ilaaha 'illaa Huwa Rabbul-'Arshil-Kareem.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh Allah A'ala hai, baadshaah sachcha, uske siwa koyi mabood nahin, woh arsh-e- kareem¹ ka rab hai.
verses.deepMeaning: A'rsh ki sifat Kareem bayaan farmaayi ke wahaan se rahmaton aur barkaton ka nuzool hota hai.

verses.arabic: وَمَن يَدْعُ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ لَا بُرْهَـٰنَ لَهُۥ بِهِۦ فَإِنَّمَا حِسَابُهُۥ عِندَ رَبِّهِۦٓ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُفْلِحُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa mañy-yad'u ma'al-laahi 'ilaahan 'aakhara laa burhaana lahoo bihee fa'innamaa hisaabuhoo 'inda Rabbih; 'innahoo laa yuflihul-kaafiroon.
verses.translation: Aur jo koyi Allah ke saath kisi aur mabood ko pukaare jiski uske paas koyi daleel nahin, to yaqeenan uska hisaab uske rab ke paas hai, beshak kaafir falaah nahin paayenge.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Isse maloom huwa ke falaah aur kaamyaabi aakhirat mein azaab-e-ilaahi se bach jaana hai, mahaz dunya ki daulat aur aasaayishon ki farwaani, kaamyaabi nahin, yeh to dunya mein kaafiron ko bhi haasil hai lekin Allah Ta'ala unse falaah ki nafi farma rahaa hai jiske saaf ma'na yeh hain ke asal falaah aakhirat ki falaah hai jo ahl-e-eemaan ke hisse mein aayegi, na ke dunyawi maal-o-asbaab ki kasrat jo ke bila tafreeq momin-o-kaafir, sab ko hi haasil hoti hai.

verses.arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ ٱغْفِرْ وَٱرْحَمْ وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa qur-Rabbighfir warham wa 'Anta khayrur-raahimeen.
verses.translation: Aur aap kahein: aye mere rab! meri maghfirat farma, aur (mujh par) raham farma, aur tuhi sab se behtar raham karne waala hai.

verses.arabic: سُوۡرَةٌ اَنۡزَلۡنٰهَا وَفَرَضۡنٰهَا وَاَنۡزَلۡنَا فِيۡهَآ اٰيٰتٍۢ بَيِّنٰتٍ لَّعَلَّكُمۡ تَذَكَّرُوۡنَ
verses.transliteration: Sooratun 'anzalnaahaa wa faradnaahaa wa 'anzalnaa feehaaa 'Aayaatim bayyinaatil- laʻallakum tazakkaroon.
verses.translation: (Yeh) ek surat hai, humne ise naazil kiya aur humne iss (ke ahkaam) ko farz kiya hai, aur humne iss mein waazeh aayaat naazil keen taake tum naseehat haasil karo.

verses.arabic: اَلزَّانِيَةُ وَالزَّانِیۡ فَاجۡلِدُوۡا كُلَّ وَاحِدٍ مِّنۡهُمَا مِائَةَ جَلۡدَةٍ ؕ وَلَا تَاۡخُذۡكُمۡ بِهِمَا رَاۡفَةٌ فِیۡ دِیۡنِ اللّٰهِ اِنۡ كُنۡتُمۡ تُؤۡمِنُوۡنَ بِاللّٰهِ وَالۡيَوۡمِ الۡاٰخِرِ وَلۡيَشۡهَدۡ عَذَابَهُمَا طَآئِفَةٌ مِّنَ الۡمُؤۡمِنِيۡنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Azzaaniyatu wazzaanee fajlidoo kulla waahidim-minhumaa mi'ata jaldatiñw-wa laa ta'khuzkum bihimaa ra'fatun fee deenil-laahi 'in kuntum tu'minoona billaahi wal-Yawmil- 'Aakhiri walyashhad 'azaabahumaa taaa'ifatum-minal- mu'mineen.
verses.translation: Zaaniyah aurat aur zaani mard, to un donon mein se har ek ko tum 100 kode maaro,¹ aur agar tum Allah  aur yaum-e-aakhirat par eemaan rakhte ho to Allah ke deen (par amal karne) ke muaamle mein tumhein un donon (zaaniyah aur zaania) par qata'an taras nahin aana chaahiye, aur mominon ka ek giroh un donon ki saza ke waqt maujood hona cahaahiye.
verses.deepMeaning: Iss mein 'zaani' aur 'zaaniyah' ka lafz agarcheh aam hai, lekin Nabi ﷺ ne use ghair shadi shudah ke saath khaas kar diya hai ya'ni yeh saza jo iss aayat mein bayaan ki gayi hai, woh aise bad kaar mard ya aurat ko di jaayegi jo ghair shaadi shudah honge, elaawah azin uske liye Aap ﷺ ne jelaawatni ki saza ka bhi ezaafah farmaya jaisa ke ahaadees mein uski wazaahat hai. (Sahih Bukhari, Al-hudood, baab:32, hadees:6833) aur shaadi shudah zaani mard aur aurat ki saza rajm (sangsaari) hai. Nabi ﷺ aur khulafaa- e-raashedeen رَضِيَ اللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ ne shaadi shudah zaaniyon ko rajm hi ki saza di hai. elaawah azin iss par ummat ke tamaam fuqahaa-o-ulamaa ka ijma' hai.

verses.arabic: اَلزَّانِيۡ لَا يَنۡكِحُ اِلَّا زَانِيَةً اَوۡ مُشۡرِكَةً ۚ وَالزَّانِيَةُ لَا يَنۡكِحُهَاۤ اِلَّا زَانٍ اَوۡ مُشۡرِكٌ ۚ وَحُرِّمَ ذٰلِكَ عَلَي الۡمُؤۡمِنِيۡنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Azzaanee laa yankihu 'illaa zaaniyatan 'aw mushrikatanw- wazzaaniyatu laa yankihuhaaa 'illaa zaanin 'aw mushrik; wa hurrima zaalika 'alal- mu'mineen.n
verses.translation: Zaani mard nikaah nahin karta magar zaaniyah ya mushrikah aurat hi se, aur zaaniyah aurat se nikaah nahin karta magar zaani ya mushrik mard hi, aur mominon par yeh (zina kaar se nikah) haraam thhahraaya gaya hai.

verses.arabic: وَالَّذِيۡنَ يَرۡمُوۡنَ الۡمُحۡصَنٰتِ ثُمَّ لَمۡ يَاۡتُوۡا بِاَرۡبَعَةِ شُهَدَآءَ فَاجۡلِدُوۡهُمۡ ثَمٰنِيۡنَ جَلۡدَةً وَّلَا تَقۡبَلُوۡا لَهُمۡ شَهَادَةً اَبَدًا ؕ وَاُولٰٓئِكَ هُمُ الۡفٰسِقُوۡنَ
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena yarmoonal- muhsanaati summa lam ya'too bi'arbaʻati shuhadaaa'a fajlidoohum samaaneena jaldatañw- wa laa taqbaloo lahum shahaadatan 'abadaa wa 'ulaaa'ika humul- faasiqoon.
verses.translation: Aur jo log paak daaman auraton par tohmat lagaate hain, phir woh chaar gawaah nahin laate, to tum unhein 80 kode maaro, aur tum unki shahaadat (gawaahi) kabhi qubool na karo, aur yahi log naafarmaan hain.

verses.arabic: اِلَّا الَّذِيۡنَ تَابُوۡا مِنۡۢ بَعۡدِ ذٰلِكَ وَاَصۡلَحُوۡا فَاِنَّ اللّٰهَ غَفُوۡرٌ رَّحِيۡمٌ
verses.transliteration: 'Illal-lazeena taaboo mim ba'di zaalika wa 'aşlahoo fa'innal-laaha Ghafoorur-Raheem.
verses.translation: Magar jo log iske baad tauba kar lein aur apne aamaal ko sudhaar lein to beshak Allah maaf karne wala aur nihayat raheem hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Magar uske ba'd jin logor ne taubah ki aur islah karli to bilaa shubah Allah Ghafoorur-Raheem hai.

verses.arabic: وَالَّذِيۡنَ يَرۡمُوۡنَ اَزۡوَاجَهُمۡ وَلَمۡ يَكُنۡ لَّهُمۡ شُهَدَآءُ اِلَّاۤ اَنۡفُسُهُمۡ فَشَهَادَةُ اَحَدِهِمۡ اَرۡبَعُ شَهٰدٰتٍۢ بِاللّٰهِ اِنَّهٗ لَمِنَ الصّٰدِقِيۡنَ
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena yarmoona 'azwaajahum wa lam yakul-lahum shuhadaaa'u 'illaaa 'anfusuhum fashahaadatu 'ahadihim 'arba'u shahaadaatim bil- laahi 'innahoo laminas- saadiqeen.
verses.translation: Aur jo log apni beewiyon par tohmat lagaayein aur unke paas apne siwa koy gawaah na hon, to un mein se ek ki shahaadat iss tarah hogi ke chaar baar Allah ki qasm khaakar kahe ke beshak woh sachchon mein se hai.

verses.arabic: وَالۡخَامِسَةُ اَنَّ لَعۡنَتَ اللّٰهِ عَلَيۡهِ اِنۡ كَانَ مِنَ الۡكٰذِبِيۡنَ
verses.transliteration: Walkhaamisatu 'anna la'natal-laahi 'alayhi 'in kaana minal-kaazibeen
verses.translation: Aur paanchwin baar yeh kahe: agar woh jhooton mein se ho to uss par Allah ki la'nat ho.

verses.arabic: وَيَدۡرَؤُا عَنۡهَا الۡعَذَابَ اَنۡ تَشۡهَدَ اَرۡبَعَ شَهٰدٰتٍۢ بِاللّٰهِ اِنَّهٗ لَمِنَ الۡكٰذِبِيۡنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa yadra'u 'anhal- 'azaaba 'an tashhada 'arba'a shahaadaatim bil-laahi 'innahoo laminal-kaazibeen.
verses.translation: Aur aurat se saza tab talti hai ke woh chaar baar Allah ki qasam khaa kar kahe ke bilaa shubah woh (uska khaawind) jhooton mein se hai.

verses.arabic: وَالۡخَامِسَةَ اَنَّ غَضَبَ اللّٰهِ عَلَيۡهَاۤ اِنۡ كَانَ مِنَ الصّٰدِقِيۡنَ
verses.transliteration: Walkhaamisata 'anna ghadabal-laahi 'alayhaaa 'in kaana minaş-şaadiqeen.
verses.translation: Aur paanchwin baar yeh kahe ke agar woh (uska khaawind) sachchon mein se ho to uss (aurat) par Allah ka ghazab ho.

verses.arabic: وَلَوۡلَا فَضۡلُ اللّٰهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَرَحۡمَتُهٗ وَاَنَّ اللّٰهَ تَوَّابٌ حَكِيۡمٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa law laa fadlul- laahi 'alaykum wa rahmatuhoo wa 'annal- laaha Tawwaabun Hakeem.
verses.translation: Aur agar tum par Allah ka fazl aur uski rahmat na hoti (to jhooton ko saza milti) aur yeh ke bilaashubah Allah bahut taubah qubool karne waala aur khoob hikmat waala hai.

verses.arabic: اِنَّ الَّذِيۡنَ جَآءُوۡ بِالۡاِفۡكِ عُصۡبَةٌ مِّنۡكُمۡ ؕ لَا تَحۡسَبُوۡهُ شَرًّا لَّكُمۡ ؕ بَلۡ هُوَ خَيۡرٌ لَّكُمۡ ؕ لِكُلِّ امۡرِئٍ مِّنۡهُمۡ مَّا اكۡتَسَبَ مِنَ الۡاِثۡمِ ؕ وَالَّذِىۡ تَوَلّٰى كِبۡرَهٗ مِنۡهُمۡ لَهٗ عَذَابٌ عَظِيۡمٌ
verses.transliteration: 'Innal-lazeena jaaa'oo bil'ifki 'uşbatum-minkum; laa tahsaboohu sharrallakum bal huwa khayrul-lakum; likul- limri'im-minhum maktasaba minal-'ism; wallazee tawallaa kibrahoo minhum lahoo 'azaabun 'azeem.
verses.translation: Beshak jo log (ummul momineen Aayeshah Siddeeqah رضي الله عنه par) bohtaan ghad laaye¹ aur tumhi mein se ek giroh hain, tum use apne liye bura na samjho balke woh tumhaare liye behtar hai, un mein se har shakhs ke liye utnaa hi gunaah hai jo usne kamaaya aur un mein se woh shakhs jisne uss (gunaah) ka bada bojh uthhaaya, uske liye azaab-e-azeem hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Isse muraad woh bohtaan hai jo zauja-e-Rasool hazrat Aayeshah رضي الله عنها par ba'z munaafiqeen ki taraf se aayed kiya gaya tha. ek jung mein waapsi par kisi wajah se aap qaafle se peechhe rah rah gayeen to munaafiqeen ne un par tohmat lagaadi. Nabi Kareem ﷺ ek maheenah sakht pareeshaan rahe. Bil aakhir Allah Ta'ala ne hazrat Aayeshah رضي الله عنها ki baraa'at mein yeh aayaat (utaazo) naazil farmaa kar aap ki paak daamni aur munaafiqeen ki sharaarat ko waazeh kar diya. yeh qissah 'waaqia-e-ifak' ke naam se mashhoor hai. (Al-Bukhari, At-tafseer, Suratun Noor, Hadees:4750)

verses.arabic: لَوۡلَآ اِذۡ سَمِعۡتُمُوۡهُ ظَنَّ الۡمُؤۡمِنُوۡنَ وَالۡمُؤۡمِنٰتُ بِاَنۡفُسِهِمۡ خَيۡرًا وَّقَالُوۡا هٰذَآ اِفۡكٌ مُّبِيۡنٌ
verses.transliteration: Law laaa 'iz sami'tumoohu zannal- mu'minoona walmu'minaatu bi'anfusihim khayranw- wa qaaloo haazaaa 'ifkum-mubeen.
verses.translation: Jab tum ne yeh (jhoot) suna to kyun na momin mardon aur momin auraton ne apne nafson mein achchha gumaan kiya aur (kyun na) kaha ke yeh to sareeh bohtaan hai?

verses.arabic: لَوۡلَا جَآءُوۡ عَلَيۡهِ بِاَرۡبَعَةِ شُهَدَآءَؕ فَاِذۡ لَمۡ يَاۡتُوۡا بِالشُّهَدَآءِ فَاُولٰٓئِكَ عِنۡدَ اللّٰهِ هُمُ الۡكٰذِبُوۡنَ
verses.transliteration: Law laa jaaa'oo 'alayhi bi'arbaʻati shuhadaaa'; fa'iz lam ya'too bish-shuhadaaa'i fa'ulaaa'ika 'indal-laahi humul-kaaziboon.
verses.translation: Woh iss (ilzaam) par chaar gawaah kyun na laaye? Phir jab woh gawaah nahin laaye to wahi log Allah ke haan jhoote hain.

verses.arabic: وَلَوۡلَا فَضۡلُ اللّٰهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَرَحۡمَتُهٗ فِىۡ الدُّنۡيَا وَالۡاٰخِرَةِ لَمَسَّكُمۡ فِيۡ مَآ اَفَضۡتُمۡ فِيۡهِ عَذَابٌ عَظِيۡمٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa law laa fadlul- laahi 'alaykum wa rahmatuhoo fid-dunyaa wal-'Aakhirati lamassakum fee maaa 'afadtum feehi 'azaabun 'azeem.
verses.translation: Aur agar tum par dunya- o-aakhirat mein Allah ka fazl aur uski rahmat na hoti to tum jin baaton mein pad gaye the uss par tumhein azaab-e-azeem aa leta.

verses.arabic: اِذۡ تَلَقَّوۡنَهٗ بِاَلۡسِنَتِكُمۡ وَتَقُوۡلُوۡنَ بِاَفۡوَاهِكُمۡ مَّا لَيۡسَ لَكُمۡ بِهٖ عِلۡمٌ وَّتَحۡسَبُوۡنَهٗ هَيِّنًا وَّهُوَ عِنۡدَ اللّٰهِ عَظِيۡمٌ
verses.transliteration: 'iz talaqqawnahoo bi'alsinatikum wa taqooloona bi'afwaahikum maa laysa lakum bihee 'ilmuñw-wa-tahsaboonahoo hayyinañw-wa huwa 'indal-laahi 'azeem.
verses.translation: Jab tum apni zabaanon se uss bohtaan ka charcha kar rahe the aur apne munh se woh baat kah rahe the jiska tumhein ilm na tha, aur tum use mamooli samajh rahe the jabke woh Allah ke haan bahut badi baat hai.

verses.arabic: وَلَوۡلَاۤ اِذۡ سَمِعۡتُمُوۡهُ قُلۡتُمۡ مَّا يَكُوۡنُ لَنَآ اَنۡ نَّتَكَلَّمَ بِهٰذَا سُبۡحٰنَكَ هٰذَا بُهۡتٰنٌ عَظِيۡمٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa law laaa 'iz sami'tumoohu qultum- maa yakoonu lanaaa 'an natakallama bihaazaa Subhaanaka haaza buhtaanun 'azeem.
verses.translation: Aur jab tumne use suna tha to kyun na kha: yeh hamaare laayeq nahin ke hum yeh baat zabaan par laayein (ya Allah!) tu paak hai, yeh bohtaan-e-azeem hai.

verses.arabic: يَعِظُكُمُ اللّٰهُ اَنۡ تَعُوۡدُوۡا لِمِثۡلِهٖۤ اَبَدًا اِنۡ كُنۡتُمۡ مُّؤۡمِنِيۡنَ
verses.transliteration: Yaʻizukumul-laahu 'an ta'oodoo limisliheee 'abadan 'in kuntum mu'mineen.
verses.translation: Allah Tumhein naseehat karta hai ke agar tum momin ho to phir kabhi bhi aisi harkat na karna.

verses.arabic: وَيُبَيِّنُ اللّٰهُ لَكُمُ الۡاٰيٰتِ ؕ وَاللّٰهُ عَلِيۡمٌ حَكِيۡمٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa yubayyinul-laahu lakumul-'Aayaati wallaahu 'Aleemun Hakeem.
verses.translation: Aur Allah tumhaare liye apni aayaat bayaan karta hai, aur Allah khoob jaanne waala, khoob hikmat waala hai.

verses.arabic: اِنَّ الَّذِيۡنَ يُحِبُّوۡنَ اَنۡ تَشِيۡعَ الۡفَاحِشَةُ فِى الَّذِيۡنَ اٰمَنُوۡا لَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ اَلِيۡمٌ فِى الدُّنۡيَا وَالۡاٰخِرَةِ ؕ وَاللّٰهُ يَعۡلَمُ وَاَنۡتُمۡ لَا تَعۡلَمُوۡنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Innal-lazeena yuhibboona 'an tashee'al-faahishatu fil- lazeena 'aamanoo lahum 'azaabun 'aleemun fid- dunyaa wal-'Aakhirah; wallaahu yaʻlamu wa 'antum laa taʻlamoon.
verses.translation: Beshak jo log yeh pasnad karte hain ke eemaan laane waalon mein be hayaayi phaile, unke liye dunya aur aakhirat mein dardnaak azaab hai. aur Allah jaanta hai aur tum nahin jaante.

verses.arabic: وَلَوۡلَا فَضۡلُ اللّٰهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَرَحۡمَتُهٗ وَاَنَّ اللّٰهَ رَءُوۡفٌ رَّحِيۡمٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa law laa fadlul- laahi 'alaykum wa rahmatuhoo wa 'annal- laaha Ra'oofur-Raheem.
verses.translation: Aur agar tum par Allah ka fazl aur uski rahmat na hoti (to Allah bohtaan lagaane waalon ko fauran azaab deta) aur yeh ke bilaa shubah Allah nehaayat shafqat karne waala, nehaayat raham karne waala hai.

verses.arabic: يٰۤاَيُّهَا الَّذِيۡنَ اٰمَنُوۡا لَا تَتَّبِعُوۡا خُطُوٰتِ الشَّيۡطٰنِ ؕ وَمَنۡ يَّتَّبِعۡ خُطُوٰتِ الشَّيۡطٰنِ فَاِنَّهٗ يَاۡمُرُ بِالۡفَحۡشَآءِ وَالۡمُنۡكَرِ ؕ وَلَوۡلَا فَضۡلُ اللّٰهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَرَحۡمَتُهٗ مَا زَكٰى مِنۡكُمۡ مِّنۡ اَحَدٍ اَبَدًا وَّلٰكِنَّ اللّٰهَ يُزَكِّيۡ مَنۡ يَّشَآءُ ؕ وَاللّٰهُ سَمِيۡعٌ عَلِيۡمٌ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhal- lazeena 'aamanoo laa tattabi'oo khutuwaatish- Shaytaan; wa mañy- yattabi' khutuwaatish- Shaytaani fa'innahoo ya'muru bil-fahshaaa'i walmunkar; wa law laa fadlul-laahi 'alaykum wa rahmatuhoo maa zakaa minkum min 'ahadin 'abadanw-wa laakinnal- laaha yuzakkee many- yashaaa'; wallaahu Samee'un 'Aleem.
verses.translation: Aye eemaan waalo! Tum shaytaan ke qadmon ka itteba' na karo, aur jo koyi shaytaan ke qadmon ka itteba' karta hai, to bilaa shubah woh (shaytaan) to be hayaai aur bure kaam hi ka hukm deta hai aur agar tum par Allah ka fazl aur uski rahmat na hoti to tum mein se koyi ek bhi kabhi paak na hota lekin Allah jise chaahe paak karta hai, aur Allah khoob sunta aur khoob jaanta hai.

verses.arabic: وَلَا يَاۡتَلِ اُولُوا الۡفَضۡلِ مِنۡكُمۡ وَالسَّعَةِ اَنۡ يُّؤۡتُوۡۤا اُولِى الۡقُرۡبٰى وَالۡمَسٰكِيۡنَ وَالۡمُهٰجِرِيۡنَ فِىۡ سَبِيۡلِ اللّٰهِ وَلۡيَعۡفُوۡا وَلۡيَصۡفَحُوۡا ؕ اَلَا تُحِبُّوۡنَ اَنۡ يَّغۡفِرَ اللّٰهُ لَكُمۡ ؕ وَاللّٰهُ غَفُوۡرٌ رَّحِيۡمٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa laa ya'tali 'ulul-fadli minkum wassa'ati 'any-yu'tooo 'ulil-qurbaa walmasaakeena walmuhaajireena fee sabeelil-laahi walya'foo walyasfahoo 'alaa tuhibboona 'any- yaghfiral-laahu lakum; wal-laahu Ghafoorur- Raheem.
verses.translation: Aur tum mein se fazl aur us'at waale, qaraabat daaron aur miskeenon aur Allah ki raah mein hijrat karne waalon ko (maali madad) dene se qasam na khaayein aur chaahiye ke woh mu'aaf kar dein aur dar guzar karein. Kiya tum yeh pasand nahin karte ke Allah tumhaari maghfirat farmaaye? Aur Allah bahut bakhshne waala, nehaayat raham karne waala hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Is ayat ka nuzool Abu Bakr Siddique (R.A) ke silsile mein hua tha jab unhon ne apne rishtedar Mistah ko madad dena band kar diya tha, jo Hazrat Aisha (R.A) par ilzam lagane walon mein se tha. Allah ne unhein naseehat ki ke maaf kar dein.

verses.arabic: اِنَّ الَّذِيۡنَ يَرۡمُوۡنَ الۡمُحۡصَنٰتِ الۡغٰفِلٰتِ الۡمُؤۡمِنٰتِ لُعِنُوۡا فِى الدُّنۡيَا وَالۡاٰخِرَةِ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ عَظِيۡمٌ
verses.transliteration: 'Innal-lazeena yarmoonal-muhsanaatil- ghaafilaatil-mu'minaati lu'inoo fid-dunyaa wal- 'Aakhirati wa lahum 'azaabun 'azeem.
verses.translation: Bilaa shubah jo log paak daaman, be khabar momin auraton par (zina ki) tohmat lagaate hain, un par dunya aur aakhirat mein la'nat ki gayi, aur unke liye azaab-e- azeem hai.

verses.arabic: يَّوۡمَ تَشۡهَدُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ اَلۡسِنَتُهُمۡ وَ اَيۡدِيۡهِمۡ وَ اَرۡجُلُهُمۡ بِمَا كَانُوۡا يَعۡمَلُوۡنَ
verses.transliteration: Yawma tashhadu 'alayhim 'alsinatuhum wa 'aydeehim wa 'arjuluhum bimaa kaanoo ya maloon.
verses.translation: Jis din unki zabaanein aur unke haath aur unke pair unke khilaaf, un a'amaal ki gawaahi denge jo woh karte the.

verses.arabic: يَوۡمَئِذٍ يُّوَفِّيۡهِمُ اللّٰهُ دِيۡنَهُمُ الۡحَقَّ وَيَعۡلَمُوۡنَ اَنَّ اللّٰهَ هُوَ الۡحَقُّ الۡمُبِيۡنُ
verses.transliteration: Yawma'iziny- yuwaffeehimul-laahu deenahumul-haqqa wa ya'lamoona 'annal-laaha Huwal-Haqqul-Mubeen.
verses.translation: Uss din Allah unhein unka pura pura, thheek badlah dega (jiske woh mustahiq hain,) aur woh jaan lenge ke beshak Allah hi haq hai, (haq ko) waazeh karne waala hai.

verses.arabic: الۡخَبِيۡثٰتُ لِلۡخَبِيۡثِيۡنَ وَ الۡخَبِيۡثُوۡنَ لِلۡخَبِيۡثٰتِؕ وَالطَّيِّبٰتُ لِلطَّيِّبِيۡنَ وَ الطَّيِّبُوۡنَ لِلطَّيِّبٰتِؕ اُولٰٓئِكَ مُبَرَّءُوۡنَ مِمَّا يَقُوۡلُوۡنَۚ لَهُمۡ مَّغۡفِرَةٌ وَّ رِزۡقٌ كَرِيۡمٌ
verses.transliteration: 'Alkhabeesaatu lilkhabeeseena walkhabeesoona lilkhabeesaati wattayyibaatu littayyibeena wattayyiboona littayyibaat; 'ulaaa'ika mubarra'oona mimma yaqooloona lahum maghfiratunw-wa rizqun kareem.
verses.translation: Khabees auratein khabees mardon ke liye hain aur khabees mard khabees auraton ke liye, aur paakeezah auratein paakeezah mardon ke liye hain aur paakeezah mard paakeezah auraton ke liye¹ yeh (paakeezah) log un baaton se bari hain jo woh (khabees log unki baabat) kahte hain, unke liye maghfirat aur izzat ka rizq hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Doosre ma'na iske hain ke naapaak baatein naapaak mardon ke liye aur naapaak mard naapaak baaton ke liye hain aur paakeezah baatein paakeezah mardon ke liye aur paakeezah mard paakeezah baaton ke liye hain aur matlab yeh hoga ke naapaak baatein wahi mard-o-aurat karte hain jo naapaak hain aur paakeezah baatein karna paakeezah logon ka shewah hai.

verses.arabic: يٰۤاَيُّهَا الَّذِيۡنَ اٰمَنُوۡا لَا تَدۡخُلُوۡا بُيُوۡتًا غَيۡرَ بُيُوۡتِكُمۡ حَتّٰى تَسۡتَاۡنِسُوۡا وَتُسَلِّمُوۡا عَلٰٓى اَهۡلِهَا ؕ ذٰلِكُمۡ خَيۡرٌ لَّكُمۡ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَذَكَّرُوۡنَ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhal- lazeena 'aamanoo laa tadkhuloo buyootan ghayra buyootikum hattaa tastaʼnisoo wa tusallimoo 'alaaa 'ahlihaa; zaalikum khayrul-lakum laʻallakum tazakkaroon.
verses.translation: Aye eemaan waalo! Apne gharon ke siwa aur gharon mein daakhil na huwa karo hatta ke tum ijaazat le lo, aur un ghar waalon ko salaam karo, yeh tumhaare liye bahut behtar hai taake tum naseehat haasil karo.

verses.arabic: فَاِنۡ لَّمۡ تَجِدُوۡا فِيۡهَاۤ اَحَدًا فَلَا تَدۡخُلُوۡهَا حَتّٰى يُؤۡذَنَ لَكُمۡ وَ اِنۡ قِيۡلَ لَكُمُ ارۡجِعُوۡا فَارۡجِعُوۡا هُوَ اَزۡكٰى لَكُمۡ ؕ وَاللّٰهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُوۡنَ عَلِيۡمٌ
verses.transliteration: Fa'il-lam tajidoo feehaaa 'ahadan falaa tadkhuloohaa hattaa yuʼzana lakum wa 'in qeela lakumur-ji'oo farji'oo huwa 'azkaa lakum; wallaahu bimaa ta'maloona 'Aleem.
verses.translation: Phir agar tum un mein kisi ko na paao to un mein daakhil na ho hatta ke tumhein ijaazat de di jaaye, aur agar tumse kaha jaaye ke laut jaao to laut aao, yeh tumhaare liye bahut paakeezah (amal) hai, aur jo tum amal karte ho Allah use khoob jaanta hai.

verses.arabic: لَيۡسَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ جُنَاحٌ اَنۡ تَدۡخُلُوۡا بُيُوۡتًا غَيۡرَ مَسۡكُوۡنَةٍ فِيۡهَا مَتَاعٌ لَّكُمۡ ؕ وَاللّٰهُ يَعۡلَمُ مَا تُبۡدُوۡنَ وَمَا تَكۡتُمُوۡنَ
verses.transliteration: Laysa 'alaykum junaahun 'an tadkhuloo buyootan ghayra maskoonatin feehaa mataa'ul-lakum; wallaahu yaʻlamu maa tubdoona wa maa taktumoon.
verses.translation: Tum par koyi gunaah nahin ke tum un gharon mein daakhil ho jahaan koyi rahta na ho (aur) un mein tumhaare faaide ki koyi cheez ho aur Allah jaanta hai jot um zaahir karte ho aur jo tum chhupaate ho.

verses.arabic: قُلۡ لِّلۡمُؤۡمِنِيۡنَ يَغُضُّوۡا مِنۡ اَبۡصَارِهِمۡ وَ يَحۡفَظُوۡا فُرُوۡجَهُمۡ ؕ ذٰلِكَ اَزۡكٰى لَهُمۡ ؕ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ خَبِيۡرٌۢ بِمَا يَصۡنَعُوۡنَ
verses.transliteration: Qullilmu'mineena yaghuddoo min 'absaarihim wa yahfazoo furoojahum; zaalika 'azkaa lahum; 'innal- laaha khabeerum bimaa yaşna'oon.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi!) Aap momin mardon se kah deejiye ke woh apni nazrein neechi rakkhein, aur apni sharm gaahon ki hifaazat karein, yeh unke liye bahut paakeezah (amal) hai, jo kuchh woh karte hain, bilaa shubah Allah usse khoob baa khabar hai.

verses.arabic: وَقُلۡ لِّلۡمُؤۡمِنٰتِ يَغۡضُضۡنَ مِنۡ اَبۡصَارِهِنَّ وَ يَحۡفَظۡنَ فُرُوۡجَهُنَّ وَ لَا يُبۡدِيۡنَ زِيۡنَتَهُنَّ اِلَّا مَا ظَهَرَ مِنۡهَا ۖ وَ لۡيَضۡرِبۡنَ بِخُمُرِهِنَّ عَلٰى جُيُوۡبِهِنَّ وَ لَا يُبۡدِيۡنَ زِيۡنَتَهُنَّ اِلَّا لِبُعُوۡلَتِهِنَّ اَوۡ اٰبَآئِهِنَّ اَوۡ اٰبَآءِ بُعُوۡلَتِهِنَّ اَوۡ اَبۡنَآئِهِنَّ اَوۡ اَبۡنَآءِ بُعُوۡلَتِهِنَّ اَوۡ اِخۡوَانِهِنَّ اَوۡ بَنِيۡۤ اِخۡوَانِهِنَّ اَوۡ بَنِيۡۤ اَخَوٰتِهِنَّ اَوۡ نِسَآئِهِنَّ اَوۡ مَا مَلَكَتۡ اَيۡمَانُهُنَّ اَوِ التَّابِعِيۡنَ غَيۡرِ اُولِى الۡاِرۡبَةِ مِنَ الرِّجَالِ اَوِ الطِّفۡلِ الَّذِيۡنَ لَمۡ يَظۡهَرُوۡا عَلٰى عَوۡرٰتِ النِّسَآءِۚ وَلَا يَضۡرِبۡنَ بِاَرۡجُلِهِنَّ لِيُعۡلَمَ مَا يُخۡفِيۡنَ مِنۡ زِيۡنَتِهِنَّ ؕ وَ تُوۡبُوۡۤا اِلَى اللّٰهِ جَمِيۡعًا اَيُّهَ الۡمُؤۡمِنُوۡنَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُفۡلِحُوۡنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa qul lilmu'minaati yaghdudna min 'absaarihinna wa yahfazna furoojahunna wa laa yubdeena zeenatahunna 'illaa maa zahara minhaa walyadribna bikhumurihinna 'alaa juyoobihinna wa laa yubdeena zeenatahunna 'illaa libu'oolatihinna 'aw 'aabaaa'ihinna 'aw 'aabaaa'i bu'oolatihinna 'aw 'abnaaa'ihinaa 'aw 'abnaaa'i bu'oolatihinna 'aw 'ikhwaanihinna 'aw baneee 'ikhwaanihinna 'aw baneee 'akhawaatihinna 'aw nisaaa'ihinna 'aw maa malakat 'aymaanuhunna 'awit-taabi'eena ghayri 'ulil-'irbati minar-rijaali 'awit-tiflil-lazeena lam yazharoo 'alaa 'awraatin-nisaaa'i wa laa yadribna bi'arjulihinna liyu'lama maa yukhfeena min zeenatihinna; wa tooboo0 'ilal-laahi jamee'an 'ayyuhal-mu'minoona la'allakum tuflihoon.
verses.translation: Aur aap momin auraton se kah deejiye ke woh apni nazrein neechi rakkhein, aur apni sharm gaahon ki hifaazat karein, aur apni zeenat na kholein¹ magar jo (az khud) uss mein se zaahir ho, odhniyaan aur apni apne gareebaanon par daale rakkhein, aur apna banaao singaar zaahir na karein magar apne khaawindon par, ya apne baap dada par, ya apne khaawindon ke baap dada par, ya apne beton par, ya apne shauharon ke beton (sautele beton) par, ya apne bhaaiyon par, ya apne bhateejon par, ya apne bhaanjon par, ya apni (musalmaan) auraton par, ya apne daayein haath ki milkiyat (kaneezon) par, ya auraton se raghbat na rakhne waale naukar chaakar mardon par ya un ladkon par jo auraton ki chhupi baaton se waaqif na hon, aur woh (auratein) apne paaun (zor zor se) zameen par maarti huyi na chalaa karein ke apni jo zeenat unhon ne chhupa rakkhi hai woh (logon ko) maloom ho jaaye, aur aye momino! Tum majmooyi taur par Allah se taubah karo taake tum falaah paao.
verses.deepMeaning: Iss aayat ki baabat Aayeshah رضي الله عنها farmaati hain: 'Allah Ta'ala un auraton par raham farmaaye jinhon ne sab se pahle hijrat ki thi. Jab Allah Ta'ala ne yeh aayat naazil farmaayi: 'Aur woh apne seenon par apni odhniyon ke aanchal daal lein,' to unhon ne apni chaadaron ko phaad kar unhein apne oupar odh liya (unse apne chehron aur seenon ko dhaanp liya.') (Sahih Bukhari, At-tafseer, Suratun-Noor, Baab:12 hadees:4758)

verses.arabic: وَ اَنۡكِحُوا الۡاَيَامٰى مِنۡكُمۡ وَ الصّٰلِحِيۡنَ مِنۡ عِبَادِكُمۡ وَ اِمَآئِكُمۡ ؕ اِنۡ يَّكُوۡنُوۡا فُقَرَآءَ يُغۡنِهِمُ اللّٰهُ مِنۡ فَضۡلِهٖ ؕ وَاللّٰهُ وَاسِعٌ عَلِيۡمٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'ankihul-'ayaamaa minkum waşşaaliheena min 'ibaadikum wa 'imaa'ikum; 'iny- yakoonoo fuqaraaa'a yughnihimul-laahu min fadlih; wallaahu Waasi'un 'Aleem.
verses.translation: Aur tum apne be nikaahon ke nikaah kardo aur (unke bhi) jo tumaahre ghulaam aur laundiyaan nek hon, agar woh faqeer honge to Allah apne fazl se unhein ghani kar dega, aur Allah us'at waala khoob jaanne waala hai.

verses.arabic: وَلۡيَسۡتَعۡفِفِ الَّذِيۡنَ لَا يَجِدُوۡنَ نِكَاحًا حَتّٰى يُغۡنِيَهُمُ اللّٰهُ مِنۡ فَضۡلِهٖ ؕ وَ الَّذِيۡنَ يَبۡتَغُوۡنَ الۡكِتٰبَ مِمَّا مَلَكَتۡ اَيۡمَانُكُمۡ فَكَاتِبُوۡهُمۡ اِنۡ عَلِمۡتُمۡ فِيۡهِمۡ خَيۡرًا ۖ وَّاٰتُوۡهُمۡ مِّنۡ مَّالِ اللّٰهِ الَّذِىۡۤ اٰتٰٮكُمۡ ؕ وَلَا تُكۡرِهُوۡا فَتَيٰتِكُمۡ عَلَى الۡبِغَآءِ اِنۡ اَرَدۡنَ تَحَصُّنًا لِّتَبۡتَغُوۡا عَرَضَ الۡحَيٰوةِ الدُّنۡيَا ۚ وَمَنۡ يُّكۡرِهۡهُنَّ فَاِنَّ اللّٰهَ مِنۡۢ بَعۡدِ اِكۡرَاهِهِنَّ غَفُوۡرٌ رَّحِيۡمٌ
verses.transliteration: Wal yasta'fifil- lazeena laa yajidoona nikaahan hattaa yughniyahumul-laahu min fadlih; wallazeena yabtaghoonal-kitaaba mimmaa malakat 'aymaanukum fakaatiboohum 'in 'alimtum feehim khayranw-wa 'aatoohum mim-maalil-laahil-lazeee 'aataakum; wa laa tukrihoo fatayaatikum 'alal-bighaaa'i 'in 'aradna tahaşşunal- litabtaghoo 'aradal- hayaatid-dunyaa; wa many-yukrihhunna fa'innal-laaha mim ba'di 'ikraahihinna Ghafoorur- Raheem.
verses.translation: Aur jo log nikaah (ki taaqat) nahin paate unhein paak daaman rahna chaahiye hatta ke Allah apne fazl se unhein ghani kar de, aur tumhaare jo laundi ghulaam makaatibat karna (azadi ki tahreer likhaana) chaahein, agar tumhein un mein koyi bhalaayi maloom ho, to tum unhein likh kar de do, aur tum unhein Allah ke uss maal mein se do jo usne tumhein diya hai, aur tumhaari laundiyaan agar paak daaman rahna chaahein to tum duniyaawi zindagi ka saamaan talaash karne ki khaatir unhein bad kaari par majboor na karo aur jo koyi unhein majboor kare to beshak unke majboor kiye jaane ke ba'd Allah (unke liye) Ghafoorur Raheem hai.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدۡ اَنۡزَلۡنَاۤ اِلَيۡكُمۡ اٰيٰتٍ مُّبَيِّنٰتٍ وَّمَثَلًا مِّنَ الَّذِيۡنَ خَلَوۡا مِنۡ قَبۡلِكُمۡ وَ مَوۡعِظَةً لِّلۡمُتَّقِيۡنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad 'anzalnaaa 'ilaykum 'Aayaatim- mubayyinaatiñw-wa masalam minal-lazeena khalaw min qablikum wa maw'izatal-lilmuttaqeen.
verses.translation: Aur bilaa shubah humne tumhaari taraf khol kar bayaan karne wali aayaat naazil keen, aur kuchh haal un logon ka jo tum se pahle guzar chuke aur muttaqeen ke liye naseehat.

verses.arabic: اَللّٰهُ نُوۡرُ السَّمٰوٰتِ وَالۡاَرۡضِؕ مَثَلُ نُوۡرِهٖ كَمِشۡكٰوةٍ فِيۡهَا مِصۡبَاحٌ ؕ اَلۡمِصۡبَاحُ فِىۡ زُجَاجَةٍ ۖ اَلزُّجَاجَةُ كَاَنَّهَا كَوۡكَبٌ دُرِّىٌّ يُّوۡقَدُ مِنۡ شَجَرَةٍ مُّبٰرَكَةٍ زَيۡتُوۡنَةٍ لَّا شَرۡقِيَّةٍ وَّلَا غَرۡبِيَّةٍ يَّكَادُ زَيۡتُهَا يُضِىۡٓءُ وَلَوۡ لَمۡ تَمۡسَسۡهُ نَارٌؕ نُوۡرٌ عَلٰى نُوۡرٍؕ يَهۡدِى اللّٰهُ لِنُوۡرِهٖ مَنۡ يَّشَآءُؕ وَيَضۡرِبُ اللّٰهُ الۡاَمۡثَالَ لِلنَّاسِ ؕ وَاللّٰهُ بِكُلِّ شَىۡءٍ عَلِيۡمٌ
verses.transliteration: 'Allaahu noorus- samaawaati wal'ard; masalu noorihee kamishkaatin feehaa misbaah; 'almişbaahu fee zujaajatin 'azzujaajatu ka'annahaa kawkabun durriyyuny-yooqadu min shajaratim-mubaarakatin zaytoonatil-laa sharqiyyatinw-wa laa gharbiyyatiny-yakaadu zaytuhaa yudeee'u wa law lam tamsashu naar; noorun 'alaa noor; yahdil- laahu linoorihee many- yashaaa'; wa yadribul- laahul 'amsaala linnaasi; wallaahu bikulli shay'in 'Aleem.
verses.translation: Allah aasmaanon aur zameen ka noor hai, uske noor ki misaal (yun hai) jaise ek taaq ho, jis mein chiraagh ho, chiraagh ek sheeshe (ki qindeel) mein ho, sheeshah jaise chamakta sitaarah ho, woh (chiraagh) ek mubaarak darakht zaitoon (ke tel) se jalaaya jaata ho jo na sharqi ho na gharbi, yun lage jaise uska tel khud bakhud sulag uthhega agarcheh use aag ne mas na kiya ho, (woh) noorun a'laa noor hai. Allah apne noor ki taraf hidaayat deta hai jise chaahe. Aur Allah logon ke liye misaalein bayaan karta hai, aur Allah har cheez ko khoob jaanta hai.

verses.arabic: فِىۡ بُيُوۡتٍ اَذِنَ اللّٰهُ اَنۡ تُرۡفَعَ وَ يُذۡكَرَ فِيۡهَا اسۡمُهٗؕ يُسَبِّحُ لَهٗ فِيۡهَا بِالۡغُدُوِّ وَالۡاٰصَالِ
verses.transliteration: Fee buyootin 'azinal- laahu 'an turfa'a wa yuzkara feehas-muhoo yusabbiņu lahoo feehaa bilghuduwwi wal- 'aasaal.
verses.translation: Yeh (chiraagh aur qindeelein) un gharon mein hain (jinki baabat) Allah ne hukm diya hai ke unko baland kiya jaaye aur un mein Allah ka naam zikr kiya jaaye¹ (aur) woh wahaan subh-o-shaam uski tasbeeh karte hain.
verses.deepMeaning: Aayat mein gharon se muraad masjidein hain. jin mein jaane aur baithhne ke bhi khusoosi aadaab hain aur ibaadaat ka ajr-o-sawaab bhi ziyaadah hai jaisa ke aahaadees se waazeh hai. masalan: masjid mein daakhil ho to baithhne se pahle do rakatein padh le.' (Al-Bukhari, Assalaat, baab:60, hadees:444) jamaa'at ke saath namaaz adaa karne ka ajr-o-sawaab 25 guna ziyaadah hai. aadmi jab wazu karke masjid ki taraf nikalta hai to ek qadam par ek darjah baland hota aur doosre par ek gunah mitaa diya jaata hai. (Al-Bukhari, Al-azaan, baab: 30, hadees:647)

verses.arabic: رِجَالٌ لَّا تُلۡهِيۡهِمۡ تِجَارَةٌ وَّ لَا بَيۡعٌ عَنۡ ذِكۡرِ اللّٰهِ وَ اِقَامِ الصَّلٰوةِ وَ اِيتَآءِ الزَّكٰوةِ ؕ يَخَافُوۡنَ يَوۡمًا تَتَقَلَّبُ فِيۡهِ الۡقُلُوۡبُ وَ الۡاَبۡصَارُ
verses.transliteration: Rijaalul-laa tulheehim tijaaratuñw-wa laa bay'un 'an zikril-laahi wa 'iqaamiş-Şalaati wa 'eetaaa'iz-Zakaati yakhaafoona Yawman tataqallabu feehil- quloobu wal'absaar.
verses.translation: Woh log jinhein tijaarat aur khareed-o-farokht, Allah ke zikr aur namaaz qaayem karne aur zakaat dene se ghaafil nahin karti, woh uss din se darte hain jis mein dil aur aankhein ulat jaayege.

verses.arabic: لِيَجۡزِيَهُمُ اللّٰهُ اَحۡسَنَ مَا عَمِلُوۡا وَ يَزِيۡدَهُمۡ مِّنۡ فَضۡلِهٖ ؕ وَاللّٰهُ يَرۡزُقُ مَنۡ يَّشَآءُ بِغَيۡرِ حِسَابٍ
verses.transliteration: Liyajziyahumul-laahu 'ahsana maa 'amiloo wa yazeedahum min fadlih; wallaahu yarzuqu many- yashaaa'u bighayri hisaab.
verses.translation: (Woh yeh kaam karte hain) taake Allah unhein unke a'amaal ki behtareen jazaa de aur unhein apne fazl se ziyaadah de, aur Allah jise haahe be hisaab rizq deta hai.

verses.arabic: وَ الَّذِيۡنَ كَفَرُوۡۤا اَعۡمَالُهُمۡ كَسَرَابٍۢ بِقِيۡعَةٍ يَّحۡسَبُهُ الظَّمۡاٰنُ مَآءً حَتّٰىۤ اِذَا جَآءَهٗ لَمۡ يَجِدۡهُ شَيۡـٔـًا وَّ وَجَدَ اللّٰهَ عِنۡدَهٗ فَوَفّٰٮهُ حِسَابَهٗ ؕ وَ اللّٰهُ سَرِيۡعُ الۡحِسَابِ
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena kafarooo 'a'maaluhum kasaraabim biqee'atiny- yahsabuhuz-zamaanu maaa'an hattaaa 'izaa jaaa'ahoo lam yajidhu shay'anw-wa wajadal- laaha 'indahoo fawaffaahu hisaabahoo; wallaahu saree'ul- hisaab.
verses.translation: Aur jin logon ne kufr kiya unke a'amaal chatyal madaan mein saraab (chamakti ret) jaise hain, piyaasa uss (ret) ko paani samajhta rahaa hatta ke jab woh uske paas pahuncha to usne wahaan cuchh bhi na paaya, aur Allah ko apne paas paaya,¹ phir Allah ne uska hisaab pura pura chuka diya aur Allah jald hisaab lene waala hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Ya'ni kaafir ke a'amaal ek piyaase aadmi ke liye saraab ki tarah hain jab kaafir Allah se milega to woh khayaal karega ke use Allah ki taraf se uske nek a'amaal ka achchha ajr milega, lekin saraab ki tarah use kuchh bhi na mil paayega aur use jahannam mein phenk diya jaayega.

verses.arabic: اَوۡ كَظُلُمٰتٍ فِيۡ بَحۡرٍ لُّجِّىٍّ يَّغۡشٰٮهُ مَوۡجٌ مِّنۡ فَوۡقِهٖ مَوۡجٌ مِّنۡ فَوۡقِهٖ سَحَابٌ ؕ ظُلُمٰتٌۢ بَعۡضُهَا فَوۡقَ بَعۡضٍ ۚ اِذَاۤ اَخۡرَجَ يَدَهٗ لَمۡ يَكَدۡ يَرٰٮهَا ۗ وَ مَنۡ لَّمۡ يَجۡعَلِ اللّٰهُ لَهٗ نُوۡرًا فَمَا لَهٗ مِنۡ نُّوۡرٍ
verses.transliteration: 'Aw kazulumaatin fee bahril-lujjiyyi- yaghshaahu mawjum- min fawqihee mawjum- min fawqihee mawjum min fawqihee sahaab; zulumaatum ba'duhaa fawqa ba'din 'izaaa 'akhraja yadahoo lam yakad yaraahaa wa mal- lam yaj'alil-laahu lahoo nooran famaa lahoo min- noor.
verses.translation: Ya (kaafiron ke a'amaal) gahre samandar mein andheron ki tarah hain, jise ek mauj dhaanpti ho, uske oupar ek aur mauj ho, uske oupar baadal ho, (gharz) oupar tale andhere (hi andhere) hon, jab woh apna haath nikaale to lagta nahin ke use dekh sake, aur jiske liye Allah ne noor nahin banaaya to uske liye (kahin bhi) koyi noor nahin.

verses.arabic: اَلَمۡ تَرَ اَنَّ اللّٰهَ يُسَبِّحُ لَهٗ مَنۡ فِى السَّمٰوٰتِ وَالۡاَرۡضِ وَ الطَّيۡرُ صٰۤفّٰتٍ ؕ كُلٌّ قَدۡ عَلِمَ صَلَاتَهٗ وَ تَسۡبِيۡحَهٗ ؕ وَاللّٰهُ عَلِيۡمٌۢ بِمَا يَفۡعَلُوۡنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Alam tara 'annal-laaha yusabbiņu lahoo man fis-samaawaati wal'ardi wattayru şaaaffaatin kullun qad 'alima Şalaatahoo wa tasbeehah; wallaahu 'aleemum bimaa yafaloon.
verses.translation: Kiya Aapne nahin dekha ke beshak Allah ki tasbeeh karta hai jo koyi aasmaanon aur zameen mein hai, aur (fiza mein) par phailaaye huye parinde bhi? Har ek ne apni namaaz aur apni tasbeeh jaan li hai, aur jo kuchh woh karte hain Allah use khoob jaanta hai.

verses.arabic: وَ لِلّٰهِ مُلۡكُ السَّمٰوٰتِ وَ الۡاَرۡضِؕ وَ اِلَى اللّٰهِ الۡمَصِيۡرُ
verses.transliteration: Wa lillaahi mulkus- samaawaati wal'ardi wa 'ilal-laahil maşeer.
verses.translation: Aur Allah hi ke liye hai aasmaanon aur zameen ki baadshaahi, aur Allah hi ki taraf (sabki) waapsi hai.

verses.arabic: اَلَمۡ تَرَ اَنَّ اللّٰهَ يُزۡجِىۡ سَحَابًا ثُمَّ يُؤَلِّفُ بَيۡنَهٗ ثُمَّ يَجۡعَلُهٗ رُكَامًا فَتَرَى الۡوَدۡقَ يَخۡرُجُ مِنۡ خِلٰلِهٖ وَ يُنَزِّلُ مِنَ السَّمَآءِ مِنۡ جِبَالٍ فِيۡهَا مِنۡۢ بَرَدٍ فَيُصِيۡبُ بِهٖ مَنۡ يَّشَآءُ وَ يَصۡرِفُهٗ عَنۡ مَّنۡ يَّشَآءُۚ يَكَادُ سَنَا بَرۡقِهٖ يَذۡهَبُ بِالۡاَبۡصَارِ
verses.transliteration: 'Alam tara 'annal- laaha yuzjee sahaaban summa yu'allifu baynahoo summa yaj'aluhoo rukaaman fataral-wadqo yakhruju min khilaalihee wa yunazzilu minas- samaaa'i min jibaalin feehaa mim baradin fayuşeebu bihee many- yashaaa'u wa yaşrifuhoo 'am many-yashaaa'u yakaadu sanaa barqihee yazhabu bil'absaar.
verses.translation: Kiya aap ne nahin dekha ke beshak Allah hi baadal chalaata hai, phir woh unhein baahum milaata hai, phir unhein tah batah kar deta hai, phir aap dekhte hain ke un (baadalon) ke darmiyaan se menh nikalta hai, aur woh aasmaan se, ya'ni un pahaadon se jo aasmaan mein hain, ole barsaata hai, phir unhein jis par chaahe giraata hai, aur jisse chaahe pher deta hai, lagta hai ke uski bijli ki chamak aankhon (ki raushni) ko uchak le jaayegi.

verses.arabic: يُقَلِّبُ اللّٰهُ الَّيۡلَ وَ النَّهَارَ ؕ اِنَّ فِىۡ ذٰلِكَ لَعِبۡرَةً لِّاُولِى الۡاَبۡصَارِ
verses.transliteration: Yuqal-libullaahul layla wan-nahaar; 'inna fee zaalika laʻibratal- li'ulil-'absaar.
verses.translation: Allah hi raat aur din ko ulatta palatta rahta hai. bilaa shubah in (nishaaniyon) mein ahl-e-nazar ke liye saamaan-e-ibrat hai.

verses.arabic: وَ اللّٰهُ خَلَقَ كُلَّ دَآبَّةٍ مِّنۡ مَّآءٍ ۚ فَمِنۡهُمۡ مَّنۡ يَّمۡشِىۡ عَلٰى بَطۡنِهٖ وَ مِنۡهُمۡ مَّنۡ يَّمۡشِىۡ عَلٰى رِجۡلَيۡنِ وَ مِنۡهُمۡ مَّنۡ يَّمۡشِىۡ عَلٰٓى اَرۡبَعٍ ؕ يَخۡلُقُ اللّٰهُ مَا يَشَآءُ ؕ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ عَلٰى كُلِّ شَىۡءٍ قَدِيۡرٌ
verses.transliteration: Wallaahu khalaqa kulla daaabbatim-mim maaa'in faminhum-many- yamshee 'alaa batnihee wa minhum mañy- yamshee 'alaa rijlayne wa minhum mañy- yamshee 'alaaa 'arba'; yakhluqul-laahu maa yashaaa'; 'innal-laaha 'alaa kulli shay'in Qadeer.
verses.translation: Aur Allah ne zameen par chalne waala har jaandaar paani se paida kiya, phir un mein se koyi apne pet ke bal chalta hai, aur un mein se koyi do paaun par chalta hai, aur un mein se koyi chaar paaun par chalta hai, Allah jo chaahta hai paida karta hai, bilaa shubah Allah har cheez par khoob qaadir hai.

verses.arabic: لَقَدۡ اَنۡزَلۡنَاۤ اٰيٰتٍ مُّبَيِّنٰتٍ ؕ وَاللّٰهُ يَهۡدِىۡ مَنۡ يَّشَآءُ اِلٰى صِرَاطٍ مُّسۡتَقِيۡمٍ
verses.transliteration: Laqad 'anzalnaaa 'Aayaatim- mubayyinaatin; wallaahu yahdee many- yashaaa'u 'ilaa Şiraatim- Mustaqeem.
verses.translation: Bilaa shubah humne khol kar bayaan karne waali aayaat naazil keen, aur Allah jise chaahe siraat-e- mustaqeem ki taraf hidaayat deta hai.

verses.arabic: وَ يَقُوۡلُوۡنَ اٰمَنَّا بِاللّٰهِ وَ بِالرَّسُوۡلِ وَ اَطَعۡنَا ثُمَّ يَتَوَلّٰى فَرِيۡقٌ مِّنۡهُمۡ مِّنۡۢ بَعۡدِ ذٰلِكَ ؕ وَمَاۤ اُولٰٓئِكَ بِالۡمُؤۡمِنِيۡنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa yaqooloona 'aamannaa billaahi wa bir-Rasooli wa 'ata'naa summa yatawallaa fareequm-minhum mim ba'di zaalik; wa maaa 'ulaaa'ika bilmu'mineen
verses.translation: Aur woh (munaafiq) kahte hain: hum Allah aur uske Rasool par eemaan laaye, aur hum ne etaa'at ki, phir uske ba'd un mein se ek fareeq (etaa'at se) phir jaata hai, aur woh log momin hi nahin.

verses.arabic: وَ اِذَا دُعُوۡۤا اِلَى اللّٰهِ وَرَسُوۡلِهٖ لِيَحۡكُمَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ اِذَا فَرِيۡقٌ مِّنۡهُمۡ مُّعۡرِضُوۡنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'izaa du'ooo 'ilal- laahi wa Rasoolihee liyahkuma baynahum 'izaa fareequm-minhum mu'ridoon.
