verses.translation: Aur jab woh Allah aur uske Rasool ki taraf bulaaye jaate hain, taake woh unke maabain faislah kare, to achaanak un mein se ek fareeq munh mod leta hai.

verses.arabic: وَ اِنۡ يَّكُنۡ لَّهُمُ الۡحَقُّ يَاۡتُوۡۤا اِلَيۡهِ مُذۡعِنِيۡنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'iny-yakul- lahumul-haqqu ya'tooo 'ilayhi muz'ineen.
verses.translation: Aur agar unke liye haq (faaidah) ho to woh uski taraf farmaan bardaar ho kar chale aate hain.

verses.arabic: اَفِىۡ قُلُوۡبِهِمۡ مَّرَضٌ اَمِ ارۡتَابُوۡا اَمۡ يَخَافُوۡنَ اَنۡ يَّحِيۡفَ اللّٰهُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَرَسُوۡلُهٗ ؕ بَلۡ اُولٰٓئِكَ هُمُ الظّٰلِمُوۡنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Afee quloobihim- maradun 'amir-taabooo 'am yakhaafoona 'any- yaheefal-laahu 'alayhim wa Rasooluhu; bal 'ulaaa'ika humuz- zaalimoon.
verses.translation: Kiya unke dilon mein (nifaaq ka) marz hai ya woh shak mein pade hain ya khauf khaate hain ke Allah aur uska Rasool un par zulm karenge? (nahin) balke woh log khud hi zaalim hain.

verses.arabic: اِنَّمَا كَانَ قَوۡلَ الۡمُؤۡمِنِيۡنَ اِذَا دُعُوۡۤا اِلَى اللّٰهِ وَرَسُوۡلِهٖ لِيَحۡكُمَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ اَنۡ يَّقُوۡلُوۡا سَمِعۡنَا وَ اَطَعۡنَا ؕ وَ اُولٰٓئِكَ هُمُ الۡمُفۡلِحُوۡنَ
verses.transliteration: 'Innamaa kaana qawlal-mu'mineena 'izaa du'ooo 'ilal-laahi wa Rasoolihee liyahkuma baynahum 'any-yaqooloo sami'naa wa 'ata'naa; wa 'ulaaa'ika humul- muflihoon.
verses.translation: Bas mominon ki to baat hi yeh hai ke jab woh Allah aur uske Rasool ki taraf bulaaye jaate hain, taake woh unke maabain faislah kare, to woh kahte hain: humne suna aur etaa'at ki aur wahi log falaah pane waale hain.

verses.arabic: وَ مَنۡ يُّطِعِ اللّٰهَ وَرَسُوۡلَهٗ وَ يَخۡشَ اللّٰهَ وَيَتَّقۡهِ فَاُولٰٓئِكَ هُمُ الۡفَآئِزُوۡنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa mañy-yuti'il-laaha wa Rasoolahoo wa yakhshal-laaha wa yattaqhi fa'ulaaa'ika humul-faaa'izoon.
verses.translation: Aur jo koyi Allah aur uske Rasool ki etaa'at kare, aur Allah se dare aur uska taqwa ikhtiyaar kare, to wahi log kaamyaab hain.

verses.arabic: وَ اَقۡسَمُوۡا بِاللّٰهِ جَهۡدَ اَيۡمَانِهِمۡ لَئِنۡ اَمَرۡتَهُمۡ لَيَخۡرُجُنَّ ؕ قُلۡ لَا تُقۡسِمُوۡا ۛ طَاعَةٌ مَّعۡرُوۡفَةٌ ؕ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ خَبِيۡرٌۢ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُوۡنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'aqsamoo billaahi jahda 'aymaanihim la'in 'amartahum layakhrujunna qul-laa tuqsimoo taa'atum- ma'roofah; 'innal-laaha khabeerum bimaa ta'maloon.
verses.translation: Aur unhon ne Allah ki qasmein khaayen, apni pakki qasmein ke agar aap unhein hukm denge to woh (jehaad par) zaroor niklenge, kah deejiye: tum qasmein na khaao, (tumhaari) etaa'at maroof hai,¹ bilaa shubah jo amal tum kar rahe ho Allah usse khoob baa khabar hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Aur woh yeh hai ke jis tarah tum qasmein jhooti khaate ho tumhaari etaa'at bhi nifaaq par mabni hai. ba'z ne yeh ma'na kiye hain ke tumhaara muaamlah itaa'at maroofah hona chaahiye ya'ni maroof mein baghair kisi qism ke halaf ke etaa'at jis tarah musalmaan karte hain pas tum bhi unki misl ho jaao.

verses.arabic: قُلۡ اَطِيۡعُوا اللّٰهَ وَ اَطِيۡعُوا الرَّسُوۡلَ ۚ فَاِنۡ تَوَلَّوۡا فَاِنَّمَا عَلَيۡهِ مَا حُمِّلَ وَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ مَّا حُمِّلۡتُمۡ ؕ وَ اِنۡ تُطِيۡعُوۡهُ تَهۡتَدُوۡا ۚ وَ مَا عَلَى الرَّسُوۡلِ اِلَّا الۡبَلٰغُ الۡمُبِيۡنُ
verses.transliteration: Qul 'atee'ullaaha wa 'atee'ur-Rasoola fa'in tawallaw fa'innamaa 'alayhi maa hummila wa 'alaykum maa hummiltum wa 'in tutee'oohu tahtadoo; wa maa 'alar-Rasooli 'illal- balaaghul-mubeen.
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: Allah ki etaa'at karo, aur Rasool ki etaa'at karo, phir agar tum munh modoge to USS Rasool ke zimme sirf woh hai jo uss par bojh daala gaya hai aur tumhaare zimme sirf woh hai jo tum par bojh daala gaya, aur agar tum uss (Rasool) ki etaa'at karoge to hidaayat paaoge, aur Rasool ke zimme sirf khol kar pahuncha dena hai.'

verses.arabic: وَعَدَ اللّٰهُ الَّذِيۡنَ اٰمَنُوۡا مِنۡكُمۡ وَ عَمِلُوا الصّٰلِحٰتِ لَيَسۡتَخۡلِفَنَّهُمۡ فِى الۡاَرۡضِ كَمَا اسۡتَخۡلَفَ الَّذِيۡنَ مِنۡ قَبۡلِهِمۡ وَ لَيُمَكِّنَنَّ لَهُمۡ دِيۡنَهُمُ الَّذِىۡ ارۡتَضٰى لَهُمۡ وَ لَيُبَدِّلَنَّهُمۡ مِّنۡۢ بَعۡدِ خَوۡفِهِمۡ اَمۡنًا ؕ يَعۡبُدُوۡنَنِىۡ لَا يُشۡرِكُوۡنَ بِىۡ شَيۡـًٔا ؕ وَ مَنۡ كَفَرَ بَعۡدَ ذٰ لِكَ فَاُولٰٓئِكَ هُمُ الۡفٰسِقُوۡنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa'adal-laahul- lazeena 'aamanoo minkum wa 'amiluş- saalihaati layastakhlifannahum fil- 'ardi kamas-takhlafal- lazeena min qablihim wa layumakkinanna lahum deenahumul-lazir-tadaa lahum wa layubaddilannahum-mim ba'di khawfihim 'amnaa; ya'budoonanee laa yushrikoona bee shay'aa; wa man kafara ba'da zaalika fa'ulaaa'ika humul-faasiqoon.
verses.translation: Jo tum mein se eemaan laaye aur unhon ne nek amal kiye Allah ne un logon se wa'dah kiya hai ke woh unhein zameen mein zaroor khilaafat dega, jaise usne unse pahle logon ko khilaafat di thi, aur unke liye zaroor unka woh deen jamaa dega jo usne unke liye chuna, aur yaqeenan unki haalat-e-khauf ko badal kar woh zaroor unhein aman dega,¹ woh meri ibaadat karenge, mere saath kisi cheez ko shareek nahin thhahraayenge, aur jo koyi uske ba'd kufr kare to wahi log faasiq hain.
verses.deepMeaning: Ba'z ne iss wa'da-e-ilaahi ko sahaaba kiraam ke saath ya khulafaa-e-raashedeen ke saath khaas qaraar diya hai lekin uski takhsees ki koyi daleel nahin hai qur'an ke alfaaz aam hain aur eemaan-o-amal-e- saaleh ke saath mashroot hain, albatta yeh baat zaroor hai ke ahd-e-khilaafat-e-raashidah aura ahad-e- khairul quroon mein, iss wa'da-e-ilaahi ka zuhoor huwa, Allah Ta'ala ne musalmaanon ko zameen mein ghalbah ataa farmaya, apne pasandeedah deen, islam ko urjooj diya aur musalmaanon ke khauf ko aman se badal diya pahle musalmaan kuffaar-e-arab se darte the, phir uske baraks muaamlah ho gaya. Nabi ﷺ ne bhi jo pesh goyiaan farmaayi thin, woh bhi uss ahad mein puri huyeen. Masalan aap ne farmaya tha ke Heerah se ek aurat tan-e-tanha chalegi aur baitullah aakar tawaaf karegi, use koyi khauf aur kahtrah nahin hoga. Kisra ke khazaane tumhaare qadmon mein dher ho jaayeinge chunaancheh aisaa hi huwa. (Al-Bukhari, Al-Manaaqib, baab:25, hadees:3595) bahut si futoohaat huyeen, Faaras, Room, Misr, Africa, aur deegar door daraaz ke mamaalik fatah huye aur kufr-o-shirk ki jagah tauheed-o-sunnat ki mash'alein har jagah raushan ho gayeen aur islami tahzeeb-o-tamaddun ka pharera chaar daang aalam mein lahraaya gaya. lekin yeh wa'dah chunke mashroot tha jab musalmaan eemaan mein kamzor aur amal-e-saaleh mein kotaahi ke murtakib huye to Allah ne unki izzat ko zillat mein, unke iqtedaar aur ghalbe ko ghulaami mein aur unke amn-o-istehkaam ko khauf aur dahshat mein badal diya. (Ahsanul Bayaan)

verses.arabic: وَ اَقِيۡمُوا الصَّلٰوةَ وَ اٰتُوا الزَّكٰوةَ وَ اَطِيۡعُوا الرَّسُوۡلَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُرۡحَمُوۡنَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'aqeemuş-Şalaata wa 'aatuz-Zakaata wa 'atee'ur-Rasoola la'allakum turhamoon.
verses.translation: Aur tum namaaz qaayem karo aur zakaat do aur Rasool ki etaa'at karo taaake tum par raham kiya jaaye.

verses.arabic: لَا تَحۡسَبَنَّ الَّذِيۡنَ كَفَرُوۡا مُعۡجِزِيۡنَ فِى الۡاَرۡضِ ؕ وَ مَاۤوٰٮهُمُ النَّارُ ؕ وَ لَبِئۡسَ الۡمَصِيۡرُ
verses.transliteration: Laa tahsabannal-lazeena kafaroo mu'jizeena fil-'ard; wamaawa humun-Naaru wa labi'sal-maseer.
verses.translation: Aur kaafiron ki baabat aap yeh khayaal na karein ke woh zameen mein (Allah ko) aajiz kar dene waale hain, aur unka thhikaana aag hai, aur bilaa shubah woh waapsi ki buri jagah hai.

verses.arabic: يٰۤاَيُّهَا الَّذِيۡنَ اٰمَنُوۡا لِيَسۡتَاۡذِنۡكُمُ الَّذِيۡنَ مَلَكَتۡ اَيۡمَانُكُمۡ وَ الَّذِيۡنَ لَمۡ يَبۡلُغُوا الۡحُلُمَ مِنۡكُمۡ ثَلٰثَ مَرّٰتٍ ؕ مِّنۡ قَبۡلِ صَلٰوةِ الۡفَجۡرِ وَحِيۡنَ تَضَعُوۡنَ ثِيَابَكُمۡ مِّنَ الظَّهِيۡرَةِ وَمِنۡۢ بَعۡدِ صَلٰوةِ الۡعِشَآءِ ؕ ثَلٰثُ عَوۡرٰتٍ لَّـكُمۡ ؕ لَيۡسَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَ لَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ جُنَاحٌۢ بَعۡدَهُنَّ ۚ طَوَّافُوۡنَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ بَعۡضُكُمۡ عَلٰى بَعۡضٍ ؕ كَذٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ اللّٰهُ لَـكُمُ الۡاٰيٰتِ ؕ وَ اللّٰهُ عَلِيۡمٌ حَكِيۡمٌ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa 'ayyuhal-lazeena 'aamanoo liyastaʼzinkumul-lazeena malakat 'aymaanukum wallazeena lam yablughul-huluma minkum salaasa marraat; min qabli Şalaatil-Fajri wa heena tada'oona siyaabakum minaz-zaheerati wa mim ba'di Salaatil-Ishaaa'; salaasu 'awraatil-lakum; laysa 'alaykum wa laa 'alayhim junaahum ba'dahunn; tawwaafoona 'alaykum ba'dukum 'alaa ba'd; kazaalika yubayyinul- laahu lakumul-'Aayaat; wallaahu 'Aleemun Hakeem.
verses.translation: Aye eemaan waalo! Tumhaare ghulaamon, laundiyon aur (un ladkon aur lakdiyon ko) jo tum mein se bulooghat ko na pahunche hon, (unhein) chaahiye ke tumse teen baar ijaazat maangein (phir ghar mein daakhil hon,) namaaz-e-fajr se pahle aur jab tum do pahar ko kapde utaarte ho aur namaaz-e- isha ke ba'd yeh teen waqt tumhaare liye khalwat aur parde ke hain, un (auqaat) ke ba'd (bila ijaazat aane se) na tum par aur na un par koyi gunaah hai, tum ek doosre ke paas bakasrat aaya jaaya hi karte ho, Allah isi tarah tumhaare liye apni aayaat bayaan karta hai, aur Allah khoob jaanne waala, khoob hikmat waala hai.

verses.arabic: وَ اِذَا بَلَغَ الۡاَطۡفَالُ مِنۡكُمُ الۡحُلُمَ فَلۡيَسۡتَاۡذِنُوۡا كَمَا اسۡتَاۡذَنَ الَّذِيۡنَ مِنۡ قَبۡلِهِمۡ ؕ كَذٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ اللّٰهُ لَكُمۡ اٰيٰتِهٖ ؕ وَاللّٰهُ عَلِيۡمٌ حَكِيۡمٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'izaa balaghal- 'atfaalu minkumul-huluma falyastaʼzinoo kamas-taʼzanal-lazeena min qablihim; kazaalika yubayyinul-laahu lakum 'Aayaatih; wallaahu 'Aleemun Hakeem.
verses.translation: Aur jab tum mein se ladke (aur ladkiyaan) bulooghat ki had ko pahunch jaayein to unhein chaahiye ke woh bhi usi trah ijaazat maangein jis tarah unse pahle (unke bade) ijaazat maangte rahe hain, Allah isi tarah tumhaare liye apni aayaat bayaan karta hai, aur Allah khoob jaanne waala, khoob hikmat waala hai.

verses.arabic: وَالۡقَوَاعِدُ مِنَ النِّسَآءِ الّٰتِىۡ لَا يَرۡجُوۡنَ نِكَاحًا فَلَيۡسَ عَلَيۡهِنَّ جُنَاحٌ اَنۡ يَّضَعۡنَ ثِيَابَهُنَّ غَيۡرَ مُتَبَرِّجٰتٍۢ بِزِيۡنَةٍ ؕ وَاَنۡ يَّسۡتَعۡفِفۡنَ خَيۡرٌ لَّهُنَّ ؕ وَاللّٰهُ سَمِيۡعٌ عَلِيۡمٌ
verses.transliteration: Walqawaa'idu minan- nisaaa'il-laatee laa yarjoona nikaahan falaysa 'alayhinna junaahun 'any-yada'na siyaabahunna ghayra mutabar-rijaatim bizeenatin wa 'añy- yasta fifna khayrul- lahunn; wallaahu Samee'un 'Aleem
verses.translation: Aur gharon mein baithh rahne waali (umr raseedah) auratein jo nikaah ki ummeed nahin rakhtin, to un par koyi gunaah nahin ke woh apne (pardah daari ke) kapde utaar dein jab ke woh (apni) zeb-o-zeenat zaahir karne waali na hon, aur unka usse bhi bachna unke liye bahut behtar hai, aur Allah Sami' (aur) Aleem hai.

verses.arabic: لَيۡسَ عَلَى الۡاَعۡمٰى حَرَجٌ وَّ لَا عَلَى الۡاَعۡرَجِ حَرَجٌ وَّ لَا عَلَى الۡمَرِيۡضِ حَرَجٌ وَّ لَا عَلٰٓى اَنۡفُسِكُمۡ اَنۡ تَاۡكُلُوۡا مِنۡۢ بُيُوۡتِكُمۡ اَوۡ بُيُوۡتِ اٰبَآئِكُمۡ اَوۡ بُيُوۡتِ اُمَّهٰتِكُمۡ اَوۡ بُيُوۡتِ اِخۡوَانِكُمۡ اَوۡ بُيُوۡتِ اَخَوٰتِكُمۡ اَوۡ بُيُوۡتِ اَعۡمَامِكُمۡ اَوۡ بُيُوۡتِ عَمّٰتِكُمۡ اَوۡ بُيُوۡتِ اَخۡوَالِكُمۡ اَوۡ بُيُوۡتِ خٰلٰتِكُمۡ اَوۡ مَا مَلَكۡتُمۡ مَّفَاتِحَهٗۤ اَوۡ صَدِيۡقِكُمۡ ؕ لَيۡسَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ جُنَاحٌ اَنۡ تَاۡكُلُوۡا جَمِيۡعًا اَوۡ اَشۡتَاتًاۚ فَاِذَا دَخَلۡتُمۡ بُيُوۡتًا فَسَلِّمُوۡا عَلٰٓى اَنۡفُسِكُمۡ تَحِيَّةً مِّنۡ عِنۡدِ اللّٰهِ مُبٰرَكَةً طَيِّبَةً ؕ كَذٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ اللّٰهُ لَـكُمُ الۡاٰيٰتِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَعۡقِلُوۡنَ
verses.transliteration: Laysa 'alal-'a'maa harajuñw-wa laa 'alal- 'a'raji harajuñw-wa laa 'alal-mareedi harajuñw- wa laa 'alaaa 'anfusikum 'an ta'kuloo mim buyootikum 'aw buyooti 'aabaaa'ikum 'aw buyooti 'ummahaatikum 'aw buyooti 'ikhwaanikum 'aw buyooti 'akhawaatikum 'aw buyooti 'a'maamikum 'aw buyooti 'ammaatikum 'aw buyooti 'akhwaalikum 'aw buyooti khaalaatikum 'aw maa malaktum mafaatihahooo 'aw sadeeqikum; laysa 'alaykum junaahun 'an ta'kuloo jamee'an 'aw 'ashtaataa; fa'izaa dakhaltum buyootan fasallimoo 'alaaa 'anfusikum tahiyyatam- min 'indil-laahi mubaarakatan tayyibah; kazaalika yubayyinul- laahu lakumul-'Aayaati la'allakum ta'qiloon.
verses.translation: Andhe par koyi harj nahin aur na langde hi par harj hai aur na mareez par koyi harj hai aur na khud tumhi par (koyi harj hai) ke tum apne gharon se khaao, ya apne baap dada ke gharon se, ya apni maaon ke gharon se, ya apne bhaaiyon ke gharon se, ya apni bahnon ke gharon se, ya apne chachaaon ke gharon se, ya apni phoophiyon ke gharon se, ya apne maamuon ke gharon se, ya apni khaalaaon ke (gharon se), ya un (gharon) se jinki chaabiyon ke tum maalik ho, ya apne doston ke gharon se, uss mein bhi koyi harj nahin ke tum mil kar khaao ya alag alag, phir jab tum gharon mein daakhil ho to apne logon ko salaam kaho, (yeh) Allah ki taraf se baabarkat (aur) paakeezah tohfah hai, isi tarah Allah tumhaare liye aayaat bayaan karta hai taake tum samjho.

verses.arabic: اِنَّمَا الۡمُؤۡمِنُوۡنَ الَّذِيۡنَ اٰمَنُوۡا بِاللّٰهِ وَرَسُوۡلِهٖ وَ اِذَا كَانُوۡا مَعَهٗ عَلٰٓى اَمۡرٍ جَامِعٍ لَّمۡ يَذۡهَبُوۡا حَتّٰى يَسۡتَاۡذِنُوۡهُ ؕ اِنَّ الَّذِيۡنَ يَسۡتَاۡذِنُوۡنَكَ اُولٰٓئِكَ الَّذِيۡنَ يُؤۡمِنُوۡنَ بِاللّٰهِ وَرَسُوۡلِهٖ ۚ فَاِذَا اسۡتَاۡذَنُوۡكَ لِبَعۡضِ شَاۡنِهِمۡ فَاۡذَنۡ لِمَنۡ شِئۡتَ مِنۡهُمۡ وَ اسۡتَغۡفِرۡ لَهُمُ اللّٰهَ ؕ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ غَفُوۡرٌ رَّحِيۡمٌ
verses.transliteration: 'Innamal- mu'minoonal-lazeena 'aamanoo billaahi wa Rasoolihee wa 'izaa kaanoo ma'ahoo 'alaaa 'amrin jaami'il-lam yazhaboo hattaa yasta'zinooh; 'innal- lazeena yastaʼzinoonaka 'ulaaa'ikal-lazeena yu'minoona billaahi wa Rasoolih; fa'izas- taʼzanooka liba di sha'nihim fa'zal-liman shi'ta minhum wastaghfir lahumul-laah; 'innal-laaha Gahfoorur- Raheem.
verses.translation: Bas momin to sirf woh hain jo Allah aur uske Rasool par eemaan laaye, aur jab woh Rasool ke saath kisi ijtemaayi kaam par hote hain to aap se ijaazat liye baghair wahaan se chale nahin jaate. (aye Nabi!) bilaa shubah jo log aap se ijaazat maangte hain wahi log hain jo Allah aur uske Rasool par eemaan laate hain, chunaancheh jab woh apne kisi kaam ke liye aapse ijaazat maangein to aap un mein se jise chaahein ijaazat dein, aur unke liye Allah se maghfirat maangein, beshak Allah bahut bakhshne waala, nehaayat meharbaan hai.

verses.arabic: لَا تَجۡعَلُوۡا دُعَآءَ الرَّسُوۡلِ بَيۡنَكُمۡ كَدُعَآءِ بَعۡضِكُمۡ بَعۡضًا ؕ قَدۡ يَعۡلَمُ اللّٰهُ الَّذِيۡنَ يَتَسَلَّلُوۡنَ مِنۡكُمۡ لِوَاذًا ؕ فَلۡيَحۡذَرِ الَّذِيۡنَ يُخَالِفُوۡنَ عَنۡ اَمۡرِهٖۤ اَنۡ تُصِيۡبَهُمۡ فِتۡنَةٌ اَوۡ يُصِيۡبَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ اَلِيۡمٌ
verses.transliteration: Laa taj'aloo du'aaa'ar-Rasooli baynakum kadu'aaa'i ba'dikum ba'daa; qad yalamul-laahul-lazeena yatasallaloona minkum liwaazaa; falyahzaril- lazeena yukhaalifoona 'an 'amriheee 'an tuşeebahum fitnatun 'aw yuşeebahum 'azaabun 'aleem.
verses.translation: Tum Rasool ke bulaane ko baahum ek doosre ko bulaane ke maanind na thharaao, yaqeenan Allah un logon ko jaanta hai jo tum mein se aankh bachaa kar khisak jaate hain, lehaaza chaahiye ke jo log uss (Allah ke Rasool) ke hukm ki khilaaf warzi karte hain, iss (baat) se darein ke unhein koyi aazmaayish aa pade ya unhein dardnaak azaab aale.

verses.arabic: اَلَاۤ اِنَّ لِلّٰهِ مَا فِى السَّمٰوٰتِ وَالۡاَرۡضِ ؕ قَدۡ يَعۡلَمُ مَاۤ اَنۡتُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ وَيَوۡمَ يُرۡجَعُوۡنَ اِلَيۡهِ فَيُنَبِّئُهُمۡ بِمَا عَمِلُوۡا ؕ وَاللّٰهُ بِكُلِّ شَىۡءٍ عَلِيۡمٌ
verses.transliteration: 'Alaaa 'inna lillaahi maa fis-samaawaati wal'ardi qad yaʻlamu maaa 'antum 'alayhi wa Yawma yurjaʻoona 'ilayhi fayunaabbi'uhum bimaa 'amiloo; wallaahu bikulli shay'in 'Aleem.
verses.translation: Khabardaar! bilaashbah Allah hi ke liye hai jo kuchh aasmaanon aur zameen mein hai, yaqeenan woh uss (rawish) ko jaanta hai jis par tum ho, aur jis din woh uski taraf lautaaye jaayeinge to woh jataayega jo unhon ne amal kiye, aur Allah har cheez ko khoob jaanta hai.

verses.arabic: تَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِى نَزَّلَ ٱلْفُرْقَانَ عَلَىٰ عَبْدِهِۦ لِيَكُونَ لِلْعَـٰلَمِينَ نَذِيرًا
verses.transliteration: Tabaarakal-lazee nazzalal-Furqaana 'alaa 'abdihee liyakoona lil'aalameena nazeeraa.
verses.translation: Woh zaat badi hi baa barkat hai jisne apne bande par furqaan (Qur'an) naazil kiya taake woh jahaan waalon ke liye daraane waala bane.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Isse yeh bhi maloom huwa ke Nabi ﷺ ki nabuwwat Aalamgeer hai aur Aap tamaam insaanon aur jinnon ke liye haadi-o-rahnuma banaa kar bheje gaye hain jis tarah doosre maqaam (Surah A'araaf:7/158) mein farmaya: 'ah deejiye: aye logo! beshak main tum sab ki taraf Allah ka Rasool hoon.' Aur hadees mein bhi hai: 'pahle nabi kisi ek qaum ki taraf mab'oos hota tha aur main tamaam logon ki taraf Nabi banaa kar bheja gaya hoon.' '(Bukhaari, Attayammum, baab:1, hadees:335) Ek doosri hadees mein hai: 'mujhe Ahmar Aswad sab ki taraf nabi banaa kar bheja gaya hai.' (Muslim Al-Masaajid Hadees:521) Ek aur hadees mein alfaaz yun bhi hain: 'aur mujhe puri khilqat ki taraf bheja gaya hai aur mujh par silsila-e- ambiya khatm kar diya gaya hai.'' (Muslim, Al-masaajid, hadees:523

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِى لَهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَمْ يَتَّخِذْ وَلَدًۭا وَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُۥ شَرِيكٌۭ فِى ٱلْمُلْكِ وَخَلَقَ كُلَّ شَىْءٍۢ فَقَدَّرَهُۥ تَقْدِيرًۭا
verses.transliteration: Allazee lahoo mulkus- samaawaati wal'ardi wa lam yattakhiz waladañw wa lam yakul-lahoo shareekun fil-mulki wa khalaqa kulla shay'in faqaddarahoo taqdeeraa.
verses.translation: Wahi zaat jiske liye aasmaanon aur zameen ki baadshaahi hai, aur usne apne liye koyi aulaad nahin banaayi aur na baadshaahi mein uska koyi shareek hai, aur usne har cheez ko paida kiya, phir uska thheek thheek andaazah kiya.

verses.arabic: وَٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ ءَالِهَةًۭ لَّا يَخْلُقُونَ شَيْـًۭٔا وَهُمْ يُخْلَقُونَ وَلَا يَمْلِكُونَ لِأَنفُسِهِمْ ضَرًّۭا وَلَا نَفْعًۭا وَلَا يَمْلِكُونَ مَوْتًۭا وَلَا حَيَوٰةًۭ وَلَا نُشُورًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wattakhazoo min dooniheee 'aalihatal-laa yakhluqoona shay'anw- wa hum yukhlaqoona wa laa yamlikoona li'anfusihim darrañw-wa laa nafanw-wa laa yamlikoona mawtañw-wa laa hayaatañw-wa laa nushooraa.
verses.translation: Aur logon ne uske siwa (aur) mabood bana liye hain jo koyi cheez paida nahin karte, aur woh to (khud) makhlooq hain, aur woh khud apne kisi nafa' aur nuqsaan ka kuchh ikhtiyaar nahin rakhte, aur na maut-o-hayaat ka, aur na dobaarah ji uthhne hi ka ikhtiyaar rakhte hain.

verses.arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّآ إِفْكٌ ٱفْتَرَىٰهُ وَأَعَانَهُۥ عَلَيْهِ قَوْمٌ ءَاخَرُونَ فَقَدْ جَآءُو ظُلْمًۭا وَزُورًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa qaalal-lazeena kafarooo 'in haazaaa 'illaaa 'ifkunif-taraahu wa 'a'aanahoo 'alayhi qawmun 'aakharoona faqad jaaa'oo zulmañw- wa zooraa.
verses.translation: Aur kaafir logon ne kaha: yeh (Qur'an) to nara jhoot hai jise woh (Nabi) khud ghad laaya hai, aur uss (ke ghadhne) mein aur logon ne uski madad ki hai. chunaancheh (aye Nabi!) unhon ne zulm aur jhoot ka irtekaab kiya.

verses.arabic: وَقَالُوٓا۟ أَسَـٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ ٱكْتَتَبَهَا فَهِىَ تُمْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ بُكْرَةًۭ وَأَصِيلًا
verses.transliteration: Wa qaalooo 'asaateerul- 'awwaleenak-tatabahaa fahiya tumlaa 'alayhi bukratañw-wa 'aşeelaa.
verses.translation: Aur unhon ne kaha: yeh aglon ke afsaane hain (jo) usne apne liye likhwaaye hain, aur woh subh-o-shaam uss par padhe jaate hain.

verses.arabic: قُلْ أَنزَلَهُ ٱلَّذِى يَعْلَمُ ٱلسِّرَّ فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفُورًۭا رَّحِيمًۭا
verses.transliteration: Qul 'anzalahul-lazee ya'lamus-sirra fis- samaawaati wal'ard; 'innahoo kaana Ghafoorar-Raheemaa.
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: ise usne naazil kiya hai jo aasmaanon aur zameen ke bhed jaanta hai, bilaa shubah woh Ghafoor (aur) Raheem hai.

verses.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ مَالِ هَـٰذَا ٱلرَّسُولِ يَأْكُلُ ٱلطَّعَامَ وَيَمْشِى فِى ٱلْأَسْوَاقِ لَوْلَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيْهِ مَلَكٌۭ فَيَكُونَ مَعَهُۥ نَذِيرًا
verses.transliteration: Wa qaaloo maa li- haazar-Rasooli ya'kulut- ta'aama wa yamshee fil- 'aswaaq; law laaa 'unzila 'ilayhi malakun fayakoona ma'ahoo nazeeraa.
verses.translation: Aur unhon ne kaha: yeh kaisa Rasool hai jo khaana khaata hai aur bazaaron mein chalta hai? uss par farishtah kyun na naazil huwa jo uske humraah (logon ko) daraane waala hota.

verses.arabic: أَوْ يُلْقَىٰٓ إِلَيْهِ كَنزٌ أَوْ تَكُونُ لَهُۥ جَنَّةٌۭ يَأْكُلُ مِنْهَا ۚ وَقَالَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ إِن تَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا رَجُلًۭا مَّسْحُورًا
verses.transliteration: 'Aw yulqaaa 'ilayhi kanzun 'aw takoonu lahoo jannatuñy-ya'kulu minhaa; wa qaalaz- zaalimoona 'in tattabi'oona 'illaa rajulam-mashooraa.
verses.translation: Yaa uss par koyi khazaanah utaara jaata, ya uska koyi baagh hota jis mein se woh (phal) khaata aur zaalimon ne (mominon se) kaha: tum to bas ek jaadu maare shakhs ka hi itteba' karte ho.

verses.arabic: ٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ ضَرَبُوا۟ لَكَ ٱلْأَمْثَـٰلَ فَضَلُّوا۟ فَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ سَبِيلًۭا
verses.transliteration: 'Unzur kayfa daraboo lakal-'amsaala fadalloo falaa yastatee'oona sabeelaa.
verses.translation: Dekhiye! Unhon ne aapke liye kaisi misaalein bayaan ki hain, woh bahak gaye hain, lehaaza woh raah nahin paa sakte.

verses.arabic: تَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِىٓ إِن شَآءَ جَعَلَ لَكَ خَيْرًۭا مِّن ذَٰلِكَ جَنَّـٰتٍۢ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ وَيَجْعَل لَّكَ قُصُورًۭا
verses.transliteration: Tabaarakal-lazeee 'in shaaa'a ja'ala laka khayram-min zaalika Jannaatin tajree min tahtihal-'anhaaru wa yaj'al-laka quşooraa.
verses.translation: Woh zaat badi hi baa barkat hai jo agar chaahe to aapke liye usse behtar (cheezein) banaade, ya'ni aise baagh jinke neechhe nahrein jaari hon aur aapke liye mahallaat banaade.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Ya'ni yeh aapke liye jo mutaalabe karte hain, Allah ke liye unka kar dena koyi mushkil nahin hai, woh chaahe to unse behtar baaghaat aur mahallaat, jo unke dimaaghon mein hain, dunya mein aapko ataa kar sakta hai. lekin unke mutaalabe to takzeeb-o-e'naad ke taur par hain na ke talb-e-hidaayat aur talaash-e-najaat ke liye.

verses.arabic: بَلْ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِٱلسَّاعَةِ وَأَعْتَدْنَا لِمَن كَذَّبَ بِٱلسَّاعَةِ سَعِيرًا
verses.transliteration: Bal kazzaboo bis- Saa'ati wa 'a'tadnaa liman kazzaba bis- Saa'ati sa'eeraa.
verses.translation: Lekin unhon ne qiyaamat ko jhutlaaya, aur humne uss shakhs ke liye jo qiyaamat ko jhutlaaye, bhadakti aag tayyaar kar rakkhi hai.

verses.arabic: إِذَا رَأَتْهُم مِّن مَّكَانٍۢ بَعِيدٍۢ سَمِعُوا۟ لَهَا تَغَيُّظًۭا وَزَفِيرًۭا
verses.transliteration: 'Izaa ra'athum mim makaanim ba'eedin sami'oo lahaa taghayyuzañw-wa zafeeraa
verses.translation: Jab woh un (mujrimon) ko door daraaz jagah se dekhegi to woh uska bapharna aur dahaadna sunenge.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَآ أُلْقُوا۟ مِنْهَا مَكَانًۭا ضَيِّقًۭا مُّقَرَّنِينَ دَعَوْا۟ هُنَالِكَ ثُبُورًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa 'izaaa 'ulqoo minhaa makaanan dayyiqam-muqarraneena da'aw hunaalika subooraa
verses.translation: Aur jab woh zanjeeron mein jakde uski kisi tang jagah mein jhonke jaayenge, to woh wahaan maut ko pukaareinge.

verses.arabic: لَا تَدْعُوا۟ ٱلْيَوْمَ ثُبُورًۭا وَٰحِدًۭا وَٱدْعُوا۟ ثُبُورًۭا كَثِيرًا
verses.transliteration: Laa tad'ul-yawma suboorañw-waahidañw- wad'oo subooran kaseeraa.
verses.translation: (Kahaa jaayega:) tum aaj ek maut ko mat pukaaro balke bahut si mauton ko pukaaro.

verses.arabic: قُلْ أَذَٰلِكَ خَيْرٌ أَمْ جَنَّةُ ٱلْخُلْدِ ٱلَّتِى وُعِدَ ٱلْمُتَّقُونَ ۚ كَانَتْ لَهُمْ جَزَآءًۭ وَمَصِيرًا
verses.transliteration: Qul 'azaalika khayrun 'am Jannatul-khuldil- latee wuʻidal-muttaqoon; kaanat lahum jazaaa'añw-wa maseeraa.
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: kiya yeh (azaab) behtar hai ya abdi jannat jiska muttaqeen ko wadah diya gaya hai? woh unke liye jaza aur waapsi ki jagah hai.

verses.arabic: لَّهُمْ فِيهَا مَا يَشَآءُونَ خَـٰلِدِينَ ۚ كَانَ عَلَىٰ رَبِّكَ وَعْدًۭا مَّسْـُٔولًۭا
verses.transliteration: Lahum feehaa maa yashaaa'oona khaalideen; kaana 'alaa Rabbika wa'dam- mas'oolaa.
verses.translation: Uss mein unke liye hoga jo woh chaaheinge, hameshah (wahaan) rahne waale, yeh aapke rab ke zimme wa'dah hai jo qaabil-e-darkhaast hai.

verses.arabic: وَيَوْمَ يَحْشُرُهُمْ وَمَا يَعْبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ فَيَقُولُ ءَأَنتُمْ أَضْلَلْتُمْ عِبَادِى هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ أَمْ هُمْ ضَلُّوا۟ ٱلسَّبِيلَ
verses.transliteration: Wa Yawma yahshuruhum wa maa ya'budoona min doonil- laahi fayaqoolu 'a'antum 'adlaltum 'ibaadee haaa'ulaaa'i 'am hum dallus-sabeel.
verses.translation: Aur jis din Allah unhein aur unko jinhein woh Allah ke siwa poojte hain, jama' karega, phir (unse) poochhega: kiya tumne mere un bandon ko ko gumraah kiya tha ya woh khud hi raah se bhatak gaye the?

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ سُبْحَـٰنَكَ مَا كَانَ يَنۢبَغِى لَنَآ أَن نَّتَّخِذَ مِن دُونِكَ مِنْ أَوْلِيَآءَ وَلَـٰكِن مَّتَّعْتَهُمْ وَءَابَآءَهُمْ حَتَّىٰ نَسُوا۟ ٱلذِّكْرَ وَكَانُوا۟ قَوْمًۭا بُورًۭا
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo Subhaanaka maa kaana yambaghee lanaaa 'an-nattakhiza min doonika min 'awliyaaa'a wa laakim- matta'tahum wa 'aabaaa'ahum hattaa nasuz-zikra wa kaanoo qawmam booraa.
verses.translation: Woh kahenge: tu paak hai hamaare laayeq nahin tha ke hum tere siwa kaar saaz banaayen lekin toone unhein saamaan-e-zindagi diya, aur unke baap dada ko bhi hatta ke woh (tera) zikr bhool gaye, aur woh log halaak hone waale the.

verses.arabic: فَقَدْ كَذَّبُوكُم بِمَا تَقُولُونَ فَمَا تَسْتَطِيعُونَ صَرْفًۭا وَلَا نَصْرًۭا ۚ وَمَن يَظْلِم مِّنكُمْ نُذِقْهُ عَذَابًۭا كَبِيرًۭا
verses.transliteration: Faqad kazzabookum bimaa taqooloona famaa tastatee'oona şarfanw- wa laa naşraa; wa many-yazlim minkum nuziqhu 'azaaban kabeeraa.
verses.translation: (Allah farmaayega: aye kaafiro!) yaqeenan unhon ne to tumhein tumhaari baaton mein jhutlaa diya, lehaaza ab na tum (apne aap se azaab) taal sakte ho aur na (kisi se) madad le sakte ho, aur tum mein se jo shakhs zulm (shirk) karega to use hum bahut bada azaab chakhaayenge.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Mazkoorah aayaat se maloom huwa ke ek Allah ke siwa kisi ki i'baadat jaayez nahin hai aur jo kisi aur ki bhi ibaadat karega to yaqeenan woh Allah ke azaab ka mustahiq hoga warna Allah to itna meharbaan hai ke woh apni makhlooq ko azaab dena pasand hi nahin karta. ek hadees mein Rasoolullah ne ﷺ farmaya: 'aye Mu'aaz! Kiya tum jaante ho ke Allah ka bandon par kiya haq hai?' Muaaz رضي الله عنه ne arz kiya: Allah aur uska Rasool behtar jaante hain. Aap ne ﷺ farmaya: 'woh (haq yeh hai ke woh) uski ibaadat karein aur uske saath kisi ko shareek na thhahraayein. (phir farmaya) kiya tum jaante ho ke un (bandon) ka uss (Allah) par kiya haq hai?' Muaaz رضي الله عنه ne arz kiya: Allah aur uska Rasool behtar jaante hain. Nabi ﷺ ne farmaya: 'woh (yeh hai ke woh) unhein azab na de.' (Sahih Bukhari, At-tauheed, baab:1, hadees:7373)

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَا قَبْلَكَ مِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ إِلَّآ إِنَّهُمْ لَيَأْكُلُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ وَيَمْشُونَ فِى ٱلْأَسْوَاقِ ۗ وَجَعَلْنَا بَعْضَكُمْ لِبَعْضٍۢ فِتْنَةً أَتَصْبِرُونَ ۗ وَكَانَ رَبُّكَ بَصِيرًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa maaa 'arsalnaa qablaka minal- mursaleena 'illaaa 'innahum layaʼkuloonat- ta'aama wa yamshoona fil-'aswaaq; wa jaʻalnaa ba'dakum liba'din fitnatan 'ataşbiroon; wa kaana Rabbuka Başeera.
verses.translation: Aur (aye Nabi!) humne aapse pahle jitne bhi Rasool bheje, bilaa shubah woh khaana khaate the aur baazaaron mein chalet the, aur humne tumhein ek doosre ke liye aazmaayish banaaya, kiya tum sabr karte ho? aur aapka rab (sab kuchh) khoob dekh rahaa hai.

verses.arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَرْجُونَ لِقَآءَنَا لَوْلَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَيْنَا ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ أَوْ نَرَىٰ رَبَّنَا ۗ لَقَدِ ٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ فِىٓ أَنفُسِهِمْ وَعَتَوْا۟ عُتُوًّۭا كَبِيرًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa qaalal-lazeena laa yarjoona liqaaa'anaa law laaa 'unzila 'alaynal-malaaa'ikatu 'awnaraa Rabbanaa; laqadis-takbaroo feee 'anfusihim wa 'ataw utuwwan kabeeraa.
verses.translation: Aur un logon ne kaha jo hamaari mulaaqaat ki ummeed nahin rakhte: hum par farishte kyun nahin naazil kiye gaye ya hum apne rab ko dekhte? Bilaa shubah unhon ne apne nafson mein takabbur kiya aur bahut badi sar kashi ki.

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ يَرَوْنَ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ لَا بُشْرَىٰ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُجْرِمِينَ وَيَقُولُونَ حِجْرًۭا مَّحْجُورًۭا
verses.transliteration: Yawma yarawnal- malaaa'ikata laaa bushraa Yawma'izil- lilmujrimeena wa yaqooloona hijram- mahjooraa.
verses.translation: Jis din woh farishton ko dekhenge uss din mujrimon ke liye koyi bashaarat nahin hogi aur woh (farishte) kahenge: (tum par jannat) mamnu' hai, haraam ki gayi hai.

verses.arabic: وَقَدِمْنَآ إِلَىٰ مَا عَمِلُوا۟ مِنْ عَمَلٍۢ فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُ هَبَآءًۭ مَّنثُورًا
verses.transliteration: Wa qadimnaaa 'ilaa maa 'amiloo min 'amalin faja'alnaahu habaaa'am- mansooraa.
verses.translation: Aur unhon ne jo (bazaahir nek) amal kiye honge hum unki taraf mutawajjah ho kar unko udta huwa paraagandah gard-o-ghubaar banaa denge.

verses.arabic: أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْجَنَّةِ يَوْمَئِذٍ خَيْرٌۭ مُّسْتَقَرًّۭا وَأَحْسَنُ مَقِيلًۭا
verses.transliteration: Ashaabul-Jannati yawma'izin khayrum- mustaqarrañw-wa 'ahsanu maqeela.
verses.translation: Jannati log uss din behtareen thhikaane aur ahsan aaraam gaah mein honge

verses.arabic: وَيَوْمَ تَشَقَّقُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ بِٱلْغَمَـٰمِ وَنُزِّلَ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ تَنزِيلًا
verses.transliteration: Wa Yawma tashaqqaqus-samaaa'u bilghamaami wa nuzzilal- malaaa'ikatu tanzeela.
verses.translation: Aur jis din aasmaan baadalon ke saath phat jaayega aur farishte laga taar utaare jaayeinge.

verses.arabic: ٱلْمُلْكُ يَوْمَئِذٍ ٱلْحَقُّ لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ۚ وَكَانَ يَوْمًا عَلَى ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ عَسِيرًۭا
verses.transliteration: 'Almulku Yawma'izinil- haqqu lir-Rahmaan; wa kaana Yawman 'alal- kaafireena 'aseeraa.
verses.translation: Uss din haqeeqi baadshaahi Rahmaan hi ki hogi, aur woh din kaafiron par bahut sakht hoga.

verses.arabic: وَيَوْمَ يَعَضُّ ٱلظَّالِمُ عَلَىٰ يَدَيْهِ يَقُولُ يَـٰلَيْتَنِى ٱتَّخَذْتُ مَعَ ٱلرَّسُولِ سَبِيلًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa Yawma ya adduz- zaalimu 'alaa yadayhi yaqoolu yaa laytanit- takhaztu maʻar-Rasooli sabeelaa.
verses.translation: Aur jis din (har) zaalim apne haath daanton se kaat khaayega (aur) kahega: aye kaash! Main Rasool ke saath raah ikhtiyaar karta.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Isse maloom huwa ke Muhammad Rasoolullah ﷺ ki resaalat par eemaan rakhna waajib hai, jaisa ke hazrat Abu Hurairah رضي الله عنه se marwi hadees mein bhi hai ke resaalat-e-Muhammadia par eemaan na laane waala jahannami hai. (Sahih Muslim, Al-eemaan, baabu ujoobil eemaan biresaalati nabiyyina Muhammad ﷺ Hadees:153)

verses.arabic: يَـٰوَيْلَتَىٰ لَيْتَنِى لَمْ أَتَّخِذْ فُلَانًا خَلِيلًۭا
verses.transliteration: Yaa waylataa laytanee lam 'attakhiz fulaanan khaleelaa.
verses.translation: Haaye meri kam bakhti! Kaash! Main fulaan (shakhs) ko dost na banaata.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Isse maloom huwa ke Allah ke naafarmaanon se dosti aur waabastagi nahin rakhni chaahiye, isliye ke sohbat saaleh se insaan saaleh aur sohbat taale' se insaan bura banta hai. aksar logon ki gumraahi ki wajah ghalat doston ka intekhaab aur sohbat-e-bad ka ikhtiyaar karna hi hai.

verses.arabic: لَّقَدْ أَضَلَّنِى عَنِ ٱلذِّكْرِ بَعْدَ إِذْ جَآءَنِى ۗ وَكَانَ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ لِلْإِنسَـٰنِ خَذُولًۭا
verses.transliteration: Laqad 'adallanee 'aniz-zikri ba'da 'iz jaaa'anee; wa kaanash- Shaytaanu lil'insaani khazoolaa.
verses.translation: Bilaas hubah usne mere paas zikr (Qur'an) aa jaane ke ba'd mujhe (usse) bahkaa diya aur shaytaan insaan ko (museebat mein) be yaar-o-madadgaar chhod dene waala hai.

verses.arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلرَّسُولُ يَـٰرَبِّ إِنَّ قَوْمِى ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ هَـٰذَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ مَهْجُورًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa qaalar-Rasoolu yaa Rabbi 'inna qawmit- takhazoo haazal- Qur'aana mahjooraa.
verses.translation: Aur Rasool kahenge: aye mere rab! beshak meri qaum ne iss qur'an ko pas-e- pusht daal diya tha

verses.arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ جَعَلْنَا لِكُلِّ نَبِىٍّ عَدُوًّۭا مِّنَ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ ۗ وَكَفَىٰ بِرَبِّكَ هَادِيًۭا وَنَصِيرًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa kazaalika jaʻalnaa likulli Nabiyyin 'aduwwam-minal- mujrimeen; wa kafaa bi- Rabbika haadiyanw-wa- naseeraa.
verses.translation: Aur isi tarah humne har Nabi ke dushman mujrimon mein se banaaye aur aapka rah Haadi aur madadgaar kaafi hai.

verses.arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لَوْلَا نُزِّلَ عَلَيْهِ ٱلْقُرْءَانُ جُمْلَةًۭ وَٰحِدَةًۭ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ لِنُثَبِّتَ بِهِۦ فُؤَادَكَ ۖ وَرَتَّلْنَـٰهُ تَرْتِيلًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa qaalal-lazeena kafaroo law laa nuzzila 'alayhil-Qur'aanu jumlatanw-waahidah; kazaalika linusabbita bihee fu'aadaka wa rattalnaahu tarteelaa.
verses.translation: Aur kaafiron ne kaha: uss par yeh qura'n ek hi baar ekatthha kyun nahin naazil kiya gaya? isi tarah (humne naazil kiya) hai, taake hum usse aapka dil mazboot karein aur humne use thhahar thhahar kar padh sunaaya hai.

verses.arabic: وَلَا يَأْتُونَكَ بِمَثَلٍ إِلَّا جِئْنَـٰكَ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَأَحْسَنَ تَفْسِيرًا
verses.transliteration: Wa laa ya'toonaka bimasalin 'illaa ji'naaka bilhaqqi wa 'ahsana tafseeraa.
verses.translation: Aur woh (kaafir) jab Aapke paas koyi misaal (e'teraaz) le kar aayein to hum (jawaab mein) aapko haq aur (uski) behtareen taujeeh-o-tafseer bata dete hain.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُحْشَرُونَ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمْ إِلَىٰ جَهَنَّمَ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ شَرٌّۭ مَّكَانًۭا وَأَضَلُّ سَبِيلًۭا
verses.transliteration: 'Allazeena yuhsharoona 'alaa wujoohihim 'ilaa jahannama 'ulaaa'ika sharrum-makaananw- wa 'adallu sabeelaa.
verses.translation: Jo log apne chehron ke bal jahannam ki taraf ekatthhe kiye jaayenge, wahi log bad tareen makaan waale aur gumraah tareen raah waale hain.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Mulaahazah ho haashyah (Surah Bani Israyeel:17/97)

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا مُوسَى ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ وَجَعَلْنَا مَعَهُۥٓ أَخَاهُ هَـٰرُونَ وَزِيرًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad 'aataynaa Moosal-Kitaaba wa ja'alnaa ma'ahooo 'akhaahu Haaroona wazeeraa.
verses.translation: Aur Bilaa shubah humne Moosa ko kitab di, aur uske saath uske bhaai Haaroon ko madadgaar banaaya.

verses.arabic: فَقُلْنَا ٱذْهَبَآ إِلَى ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا فَدَمَّرْنَـٰهُمْ تَدْمِيرًۭا
verses.transliteration: Faqulnaz-habaaa 'ilal-qawmil-lazeena kazzaboo bi'Aayaatinaa fadam-marnaahum tadmeeraa.
verses.translation: Phir humne kaha: tum donon uss qaum ki taraf jaao jinhon ne hamari aayaat ko jhutlaaya, phir humne unhein bilkul hi halaak karke rakh diya.

verses.arabic: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍۢ لَّمَّا كَذَّبُوا۟ ٱلرُّسُلَ أَغْرَقْنَـٰهُمْ وَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ لِلنَّاسِ ءَايَةًۭ ۖ وَأَعْتَدْنَا لِلظَّـٰلِمِينَ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa qawma Noohil- lammaa kazzabur- Rusula 'aghraqnaahum wa jaʻalnaahum linnaasi 'Aayatanw-wa 'a'tadnaa lizzaalimeena 'azaaban 'aleemaa.
verses.translation: Aur qaum-e-Nooh ko bhi, jab usne Rasoolon ki takzeeb ki, hum ne unhein gharq kar diya aur humne unhein logon ke liye nishaan-e-ibrat banaa diya aur humne zaalimon ke liye dardnaak azaab tayyaar kar rakkha hai.

verses.arabic: وَعَادًۭا وَثَمُودَ وَأَصْحَـٰبَ ٱلرَّسِّ وَقُرُونًۭا بَيْنَ ذَٰلِكَ كَثِيرًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa 'Aadañw-wa Samooda wa 'Ashaabar- Rassi wa quroonam bayna zaalika kaseeraa.
verses.translation: Aur qaum-e-Aad aur qaum-e-Samood aur kunwein waale aur unke darmiyaan (deegar) bahut si qaumon ko bhi (humne halaak kar diya)

verses.arabic: وَكُلًّۭا ضَرَبْنَا لَهُ ٱلْأَمْثَـٰلَ وَكُلًّۭا تَبَّرْنَا تَتْبِيرًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa kullan darabnaa lahul-'amsaala wa kullan tabbarnaa tatbeeraa.
verses.translation: Aur har ek ke liye humne misaalein bayaan keen, aur sab ko tabaah-o-barbaad karke milya met kar diya.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَتَوْا۟ عَلَى ٱلْقَرْيَةِ ٱلَّتِىٓ أُمْطِرَتْ مَطَرَ ٱلسَّوْءِ ۚ أَفَلَمْ يَكُونُوا۟ يَرَوْنَهَا ۚ بَلْ كَانُوا۟ لَا يَرْجُونَ نُشُورًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad 'ataw 'alal- qaryatil-lateee 'umtirat mataras-saw'; 'afalam yakoonoo yarawnahaa; bal kaanoo laa yarjoona nushooraa.
verses.translation: Aur bilaa shubah yeh log uss (qaum ki) basti par se to guzarte hain jis par badtareen bearish barsaayi gayi, kiya phir woh use dekhte nahin rahe? Balke woh dobaarah ji uthhne ki ummeed nahin rakhte the.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَوْكَ إِن يَتَّخِذُونَكَ إِلَّا هُزُوًا أَهَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى بَعَثَ ٱللَّهُ رَسُولًا
verses.transliteration: Wa 'izaa ra'awka 'iny-yattakhizoonaka 'illaa huzuwan 'ahaazal- lazee baʻasal-laahu Rasoolaa.
verses.translation: Aur (aye Nabi!) jab woh aapko dekhte hain to aapko hansi mazaaq ka nishaanah banaate hain (aur kahte hain:) kiya yahi hai woh jise Allah ne Rasool banaa kar bheja hai?

verses.arabic: إِن كَادَ لَيُضِلُّنَا عَنْ ءَالِهَتِنَا لَوْلَآ أَن صَبَرْنَا عَلَيْهَا ۗ وَسَوْفَ يَعْلَمُونَ حِينَ يَرَوْنَ ٱلْعَذَابَ مَنْ أَضَلُّ سَبِيلًا
verses.transliteration: In kaada layudillunaa 'an 'aalihatinaa law laaa 'an şabarnaa 'alayhaa; wa sawfa yalamoona heena yarawnal-'azaaba man 'adallu sabeelaa.
verses.translation: Beshak woh to humein hamaare maboodon se bahkaane hi lagaa tha agar hum un (maboodon ki aqeedat) par jame na rahte aur jald woh jaan lenge jab azaab dekheinge ke sab se ziyaadah be raah kaun hai?

verses.arabic: أَرَءَيْتَ مَنِ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَـٰهَهُۥ هَوَىٰهُ ۚ أَفَأَنتَ تَكُونُ عَلَيْهِ وَكِيلًا
verses.transliteration: 'Ara'ayta manit- takhaza 'ilaahahoo hawaahu 'afa'anta takoonu 'alayhi wakeelaa.
verses.translation: Kiya aap ne use dekha jisne apni khaahish ko mabood banaa liya hai? kiya phir aap uske zimmah daar bante hain.

verses.arabic: أَمْ تَحْسَبُ أَنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ يَسْمَعُونَ أَوْ يَعْقِلُونَ ۚ إِنْ هُمْ إِلَّا كَٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ ۖ بَلْ هُمْ أَضَلُّ سَبِيلًا
verses.transliteration: 'Am tahsabu 'anna 'aksarahum yasma'oona 'aw ya'qiloon; 'in hum 'illaa kal'an'aami bal hum 'adallu sabeelaa.
verses.translation: ya Aap samajhte hain ke beshak un mein se aksar - sunte ya samajhte hain? woh to jaanwaron ki tarah hain balke unse bhi gaye guzre hain.

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَيْفَ مَدَّ ٱلظِّلَّ وَلَوْ شَآءَ لَجَعَلَهُۥ سَاكِنًۭا ثُمَّ جَعَلْنَا ٱلشَّمْسَ عَلَيْهِ دَلِيلًۭا
verses.transliteration: 'Alam tara 'ilaa Rabbika kayfa maddaz- zilla wa law shaaa'a laja'alahoo saakinan summa jaʻalnash- shamsa 'alayhi daleelaa.
verses.translation: Kiya aapne apne rab (ki qudrat) ki taraf nahin dekha ke usne saayah kaise phailaaya hai? aur agar woh chaahta to use saakin kar deta, phir humne suraj ko uss (saaye) par rahnuma banaaya.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ قَبَضْنَـٰهُ إِلَيْنَا قَبْضًۭا يَسِيرًۭا
verses.transliteration: Summa qabadnaahu 'ilaynaa qabdany- yaseeraa.
verses.translation: Phir humne use aahistah aahistah apni taraf samet liya.

verses.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلَّيْلَ لِبَاسًۭا وَٱلنَّوْمَ سُبَاتًۭا وَجَعَلَ ٱلنَّهَارَ نُشُورًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa Huwal-lazee ja'ala lakumul-layla libaasanw-wannawma subaatañw-wa jaʻalan- nahaara nushooraa.
verses.translation: Aur wahi (Allah) hai jisne tumhaare liye raat ko libaas aur neend ko (zaria'h) aaraam banaaya, aur usne din ko uthh khade hone ka waqt banaaya.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Ya'ni neend, jo maut ki bahan hai, din ko insaan iss neend se bedaar ho kar kaarobaar aur tijaarat ke liye phir uthh khada hota hai. hadees mein hai Nabi ﷺ subah bedaar hote to yeh dua' padhte: Alhamdu lillaahillazee Ahyaana ba'da maa Amaatana Wa'ilayhinnushoor (Al-Bukhari, Ad-da'waat, baab: 16, hadees:6325)

verses.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَرْسَلَ ٱلرِّيَـٰحَ بُشْرًۭا بَيْنَ يَدَىْ رَحْمَتِهِۦ ۚ وَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءًۭ طَهُورًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa Huwal-lazeee 'arsalar-riyaaha bushram bayna yaday rahmatih; wa 'anzalnaa minas-samaaa'i maaa'an tahooraa.
verses.translation: Aur wahi (Allah) hai jisne apni rahmat (bearish) se pahle bashaarat dene waali hawaayein chalaayen aur humne aasmaan se paakeezah paani utaara.

verses.arabic: لِّنُحْـِۧىَ بِهِۦ بَلْدَةًۭ مَّيْتًۭا وَنُسْقِيَهُۥ مِمَّا خَلَقْنَآ أَنْعَـٰمًۭا وَأَنَاسِىَّ كَثِيرًۭا
verses.transliteration: Linuhyiya bihee baldatam maytanw-wa nusqiyahoo mimmaa khalaqnaaa an'aa manw -wa 'anaasiyya kaseeraa
verses.translation: Taake hum usse murdah shahar ko zindah karein aur hum apni makhlooq mein se bahut se maweshiyon aur insaanon ko woh (paani) pilaayein.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ صَرَّفْنَـٰهُ بَيْنَهُمْ لِيَذَّكَّرُوا۟ فَأَبَىٰٓ أَكْثَرُ ٱلنَّاسِ إِلَّا كُفُورًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad sarrafnaahu baynahum liyazzakkaroo fa'abaaa 'aksarun-naasi'illaa kufooraa
verses.translation: Aur bilaa shubah humne uss (qur'an) ko unke darmiyaan pher pher kar bayaan kiya taake woh naseehat pakdein, phir bhi aksar log naa shukri kiye baghair nahin rahte.

verses.arabic: وَلَوْ شِئْنَا لَبَعَثْنَا فِى كُلِّ قَرْيَةٍۢ نَذِيرًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa law shi'naa laba'asnaa fee kulli qaryatin nazeeraa.
verses.translation: Aur agar hum chaahte to har basti mein ek daraane waala bhejte¹
verses.deepMeaning: Lekin humne aisa nahin kiya aur sirf aapko hi tamaam bastiyon balke tamaam insaanon ke liye nazeer banaa kar bheja hai.

verses.arabic: فَلَا تُطِعِ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ وَجَٰهِدْهُم بِهِۦ جِهَادًۭا كَبِيرًۭا
verses.transliteration: Falaa tuti'il kaafireena wa jaahidhum bihee jihaadan kabeeraa
verses.translation: Chunaancheh aap kaafiron ki etaa'at na karein aur unse bazria'h qur'an bade zor ka jehaad karein.

verses.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى مَرَجَ ٱلْبَحْرَيْنِ هَـٰذَا عَذْبٌۭ فُرَاتٌۭ وَهَـٰذَا مِلْحٌ أُجَاجٌۭ وَجَعَلَ بَيْنَهُمَا بَرْزَخًۭا وَحِجْرًۭا مَّحْجُورًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa Huwal-lazee marajal-bahrayni haazaa 'azbun furaatuñw-wa haazaa milhun 'ujaaj; wa ja'ala baynahumaa barzakhanw-wa hijram- mahjooraa.
verses.translation: Aur wahi (Allah) hai jisne do samandar milaaye. Yeh meethha hai piyaas bujhaane waala aur yeh khaara hai bahut kadwa aur usne un donon ke darmiyaan ek pardah aur mazboot aad rakkhi.

verses.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ مِنَ ٱلْمَآءِ بَشَرًۭا فَجَعَلَهُۥ نَسَبًۭا وَصِهْرًۭا ۗ وَكَانَ رَبُّكَ قَدِيرًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa Huwal-lazee khalaqa minal-maaa'i basharan faja'alahoo nasabañw-wa șihraa; wa kaana Rabbuka Qadeeraa.
verses.translation: Aur wahi (Allah) hai jisne paani (mani) se insaan ko paida kiya, phir uske nasbi aur susraali rishte thhahraaye. Aur aap ka rab badi qudrat waala hai.

verses.arabic: وَيَعْبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَنفَعُهُمْ وَلَا يَضُرُّهُمْ ۗ وَكَانَ ٱلْكَافِرُ عَلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ ظَهِيرًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa ya'budoona min doonil-laahi maa laa yanfa'uhum wa laa yadurruhum; wa kaanal- kaafiru 'alaa Rabbihee zaheeraa.
verses.translation: Aur woh Allah ko chhod kar unki ibaadat karte hain jo unhein na nafa' de sakte hain aur na nuqsaan pahuncha sakte hain, aur kaafir to apne rab ke muqaabil (shaytaan ka) madadgaar hai.

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَـٰكَ إِلَّا مُبَشِّرًۭا وَنَذِيرًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa maa 'arsalnaaka 'illaa mubashshiranw- wa nazeeraa.
verses.translation: Aur (Aye Nabi!) humne aapko bashaarat dene waala aur daraane waala banaa kar bheja hai.

verses.arabic: قُلْ مَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ إِلَّا مَن شَآءَ أَن يَتَّخِذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًۭا
verses.transliteration: Qul maaa 'as'alukum 'alayhi min 'ajrin 'illaa man shaaa'a 'añy- yattakhiza 'ilaa Rabbihee sabeelaa.
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: main tumse iss (tableegh) par koyi silah nahin maangta magar jo yeh chaahe ke apne rab ki taraf raah pakde (woh ise maan le)

verses.arabic: وَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱلْحَىِّ ٱلَّذِى لَا يَمُوتُ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِهِۦ ۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِهِۦ بِذُنُوبِ عِبَادِهِۦ خَبِيرًا
verses.transliteration: Wa tawakkal 'alal- Hayyil-lazee laa yamootu wa sabbiḥ bihamdih; wa kafaa bihee bizunoobi 'ibaadihee khabeeraa.
verses.translation: Aur aap uss hameshah zindah (Allah) par tawakkul keejiye jise maut nahin aati aur uski hamd ke saath tasbeeh keejiye aur woh apne bandon ke gunaahon se baa khabar rahne ko kaafi hai.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا فِى سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍۢ ثُمَّ ٱسْتَوَىٰ عَلَى ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ فَسْـَٔلْ بِهِۦ خَبِيرًۭا
verses.transliteration: 'Allazee khalaqas- samaawaati wal-'arda wa maa baynahumaa fee sittati 'ayyaamin summas-tawaa 'alal- 'Arsh; 'ar-Rahmaanu fas'al bihee khabeeraa
verses.translation: Woh zaat jisne paida kiya aasmaanon aur zameen ko aur jo kuchh un donon ke darmiyaan hai, 6 dinon mein, phir woh Arsh par mustawi huwa, (wahi) Rahmaan hai, lehaaza kisi baa khabar se uski shaan poochh lein.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱسْجُدُوا۟ لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ قَالُوا۟ وَمَا ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ أَنَسْجُدُ لِمَا تَأْمُرُنَا وَزَادَهُمْ نُفُورًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa 'izaa qeela lahumus-judoo lir- Rahmaani qaaloo wa mar-Rahmaanu 'anasjudu limaa ta'murunaa wa zaadahum nufooraa.
verses.translation: Aur jab unse kaha jaaye Rahmaan ko sajdah karo to woh kahte hain: kiya hai Rahmaan? Kiya hum use sajdah karein jiska tu humein hukm deta hai? aur iss (tableegh) ne unko nafrat mein ziyaadah kar diya.

verses.arabic: تَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ بُرُوجًۭا وَجَعَلَ فِيهَا سِرَٰجًۭا وَقَمَرًۭا مُّنِيرًۭا
verses.transliteration: Tabaarakal-lazee ja'ala fis-samaaa'i buroojañw-wa jaʻala feehaa siraajañw-wa qamaram-muneeraa.
verses.translation: Woh zaat badi baa barkat hai jisne aasmaan mein burj banaaye aur uss mein chiraagh (suraj) aur raushan chaand banaaya.

verses.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ ٱلَّيْلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ خِلْفَةًۭ لِّمَنْ أَرَادَ أَن يَذَّكَّرَ أَوْ أَرَادَ شُكُورًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa huwal-lazee ja'alal-layla wannahaara khilfatal-liman 'araada 'añy-yazzakkara 'aw 'araada shookooraa.
verses.translation: Aur wahi (Allah) hai jisne ek doosre ke peechhe aane waale raat aur din banaaye, uss shakhs (ki naseehat) ke liye jo naseehat pakadna chaahe ya shukar karna chaahe.

verses.arabic: وَعِبَادُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلَّذِينَ يَمْشُونَ عَلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ هَوْنًۭا وَإِذَا خَاطَبَهُمُ ٱلْجَـٰهِلُونَ قَالُوا۟ سَلَـٰمًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa 'ibaadur- Rahmaanil-lazeena yamshoona 'alal-'ardi hawnaw-wa 'izaa khaatabahumul- jaahiloona qaaloo salaamaa.
verses.translation: Aur Rahmaan ke bande woh hain jo zameen par aahistagi (waqaar aur aajzi) se chalte hain aur jab jaahil log unse baat karein to woh kahte hain: Salaam hai.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَبِيتُونَ لِرَبِّهِمْ سُجَّدًۭا وَقِيَـٰمًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena yabeetoona li-Rabbihim sujjadañw-wa qiyaamaa
verses.translation: Aur woh jo apne rab ke huzoor sajde aur qiyaam mein raat guzaarte hain.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Matlab yeh hai ke faraayez ki adaayegi ke saath nafil namaazon ka ehtemaam karne waale iska misdaaq honge taahum sirf faraayez ki adaayegi bhi mamooli amal nahin aur woh bhi uss mein yaqeenan daakhil hain.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا ٱصْرِفْ عَنَّا عَذَابَ جَهَنَّمَ إِنَّ عَذَابَهَا كَانَ غَرَامًا
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena yaqooloona Rabbanas-rif 'annaa 'azaaba Jahannama 'inna 'azaabahaa kaana gharaamaa.
verses.translation: Aur woh jo kahte hain: aye hamaare rab! hum se jahannam ka azaab pher de, bilaa shubah uska azaab daayemi chimatne waala hai.

verses.arabic: إِنَّهَا سَآءَتْ مُسْتَقَرًّۭا وَمُقَامًۭا
verses.transliteration: 'Innahaa saaa'at mustaqarrañw-wa muqaamaa.
verses.translation: Beshak woh Jahannam thhaharne aur qiyaam karne ki buri jagah hai.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ إِذَآ أَنفَقُوا۟ لَمْ يُسْرِفُوا۟ وَلَمْ يَقْتُرُوا۟ وَكَانَ بَيْنَ ذَٰلِكَ قَوَامًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena 'izaaa 'anfaqoo lam yusrifoo wa lam yaqturoo wa kaana bayna zaalika qawaamaa.
verses.translation: Aur woh log ke jab woh kharch karte hain to na israaf karte hain aur na tangi (bakheeli) hi, aur unka kharch uske darmiyaan mo'tadil hota hai.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَدْعُونَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ وَلَا يَقْتُلُونَ ٱلنَّفْسَ ٱلَّتِى حَرَّمَ ٱللَّهُ إِلَّا بِٱلْحَقِّ وَلَا يَزْنُونَ ۚ وَمَن يَفْعَلْ ذَٰلِكَ يَلْقَ أَثَامًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena laa yad'oona maʻal-laahi 'ilaahan 'aakhara wa laa yaqtuloonan-nafsal-latee harramal-laahu 'illaa bilhaqqi wa laa yaznoon; wa mañy-yafal zaalika yalqa 'asaamaa.
verses.translation: Aur woh jo Allah ke saath kisi aur mabood ko nahin pukaarte, aur woh kisi nafs ko bhi jise (maarna) Allah ne haraam thhahraaya hai, naahaq qatl nahin karte¹ aur woh zina nahin karte aur jo koyi yeh kaam karega woh gunaah ki saza paayega.
verses.deepMeaning: Aur haq ke saath qatl karne ki teen suraten hain, islam ke ba'd koyi dobaarah kufr ikhtiyaar kare jise irtedaad kahte hain, ya shaadi shudah ho kar badkaari ka irtekaab kare ya kisi ko qatl karde. in suraton mein qatl kiya jaayega.

verses.arabic: يُضَٰعَفْ لَهُ ٱلْعَذَابُ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ وَيَخْلُدْ فِيهِ مُهَانًا
verses.transliteration: Yudaa af lahul- 'azaabu Yawmal- Qiyaamati wa yakhlud feehee muhaanaa.
verses.translation: Yaum-e-qiyaamat uska azaab dugna kar diya jaayega aur woh uss mein hameshah zaleel-o-khaar rahega.

verses.arabic: إِلَّا مَن تَابَ وَءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ عَمَلًۭا صَـٰلِحًۭا فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ يُبَدِّلُ ٱللَّهُ سَيِّـَٔاتِهِمْ حَسَنَـٰتٍۢ ۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورًۭا رَّحِيمًۭا
verses.transliteration: 'Illaa man taaba wa 'aamana wa 'amila 'amalan şaalihan fa'ulaaa'ika yubaddilul- laahu sayyi'aatihim hasanaat; wa kaanal- laahu Ghafoorar- Raheemaa.
verses.translation: Magar jisne taubah ki aur woh eemaan laaya aur nek amal kiye, to unhi logon ki buraayiyon ko Allah achchhaaiyon se badal dega, aur Allah Ghafoor (aur) Raheem hai.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Rasoolullah ﷺ ne farmaya: 'beshak islam guzishtah tamaam gunaahon ko mita deta hai aur isi tarah (Allah ke liye) hijrat aur hajj-e-baitullah bhi.' (Muslim, Al-eemaan, hadees:121) Ibne Abbaas رضي الله عنها se rivaayat hai: chand mushrikeen jinhon ne bahut ziyaadah qatl aur zina kiye the Nabi ﷺ ki khidmat mein haazir ho kar kahne lage: aap jo kuchh kahte hain woh bahut achchha hai, lekin aap yeh to bata dein ke hamaare bure a'amaal ka koyi kaffaarah bhi hai? chunaancheh qur'an kareem ki yeh aayat (25/68) naazil huyi aur sura Zumar ki yeh aayat bhi: 'kah do ke aye mere bando! Jinhon ne apni jaanon par ziyaadati ki hai, Allah ki rahmat se maayoos na hon.' (Al-Bukhari, Attafseeruzzumar, Baab:1, wa Muslim, hadees:122)

verses.arabic: وَمَن تَابَ وَعَمِلَ صَـٰلِحًۭا فَإِنَّهُۥ يَتُوبُ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَتَابًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa man taaba wa 'amila saalihan fa'innahoo yatoobu 'ilal- laahi mataabaa.
verses.translation: Aur jo taubah kare aur nek kaam kare, to bilaashubah woh Allah se taubah karta hai jaise taubah karne ka haq hai.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَشْهَدُونَ ٱلزُّورَ وَإِذَا مَرُّوا۟ بِٱللَّغْوِ مَرُّوا۟ كِرَامًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena laa yashhadoonaz-zoora wa 'izaa marroo billaghwi marroo kiraamaa.
verses.translation: Aur woh jo jhooti shahaadat nahin dete aur jab kisi laghuw aur behoodah kaam se unka guzar ho to woh izzat wa waqaar se guzar jaate hain.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ذُكِّرُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ لَمْ يَخِرُّوا۟ عَلَيْهَا صُمًّۭا وَعُمْيَانًا
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena 'izaa zukkiroo bi-'Aayaati Rabbihim lam yakhirroo 'alayhaa şummañw-wa 'umyaanaa.
verses.translation: Aur woh ke jab unhein unke rab ki aayaat ke zariye se naseehat ki jaati hai to woh un par bahre aur andhe ho kar nahin gir padte.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا هَبْ لَنَا مِنْ أَزْوَٰجِنَا وَذُرِّيَّـٰتِنَا قُرَّةَ أَعْيُنٍۢ وَٱجْعَلْنَا لِلْمُتَّقِينَ إِمَامًا
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena yaqooloona Rabbanaa hab lanaa min 'azwaajinaa wa zurriyyaatinaa qurrata 'a'yuninw-waj'alnaa lilmuttaqeena 'Imaamaa.
verses.translation: Aur woh jo kahte hain: aye hamaare rab! humein hamaari beewiyon aur aulaad ki taraf se aankhon ki thhandak ataa kar aur humein muttaqiyon ka imam bana.

verses.arabic: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ يُجْزَوْنَ ٱلْغُرْفَةَ بِمَا صَبَرُوا۟ وَيُلَقَّوْنَ فِيهَا تَحِيَّةًۭ وَسَلَـٰمًا
verses.transliteration: 'Ulaaa'ika yujzawnal- ghurfata bimaa şabaroo wa yulaqqawna feehaa tahiyyatanw-wa salaamaa.
verses.translation: Unhi logon ko unke sabr ke badle (jannat ke) baalaa khaane jaza mein mileinge aur wahaan dua' aur salaam ke saath unka istaqbaal hoga.

verses.arabic: خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا ۖ حَسُنَتْ مُسْتَقَرًّۭا وَمُقَامًۭا
verses.transliteration: Khaalideena feehaa; hasunat mustaqarrañw- wa muqaamaa.
verses.translation: Woh hameshah wahaan raheinge, woh (behisht) bahut achchha mustaqir aur maqaam hoga.

verses.arabic: قُلْ مَا يَعْبَؤُا۟ بِكُمْ رَبِّى لَوْلَا دُعَآؤُكُمْ ۖ فَقَدْ كَذَّبْتُمْ فَسَوْفَ يَكُونُ لِزَامًا
verses.transliteration: Qul maa ya'ba'u bikum Rabbee law laa du'aaa'ukum faqad kazzabtum fasawfa yakoonu lizaamaa.
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: agar tumhaari dua' aur ilteja na hoti to mera rab tumhaari parwaa na karta, (haq ko) jhutlaa chuke ho, lehaaza (tumhein) uski saza jald chimtegi.

verses.arabic: طسم
verses.transliteration: Taa-Seeem-Мееет
verses.translation: Taaa seeem meeem

verses.arabic: تِلْكَ ءَايَـٰتُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ ٱلْمُبِينِ
verses.transliteration: Tilka 'Aayaatul- Kitaabil-Mubeen.
verses.translation: yeh waazeh kitab ki aayaat hain.

verses.arabic: لَعَلَّكَ بَٰخِعٌۭ نَّفْسَكَ أَلَّا يَكُونُوا۟ مُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.transliteration: La'allaka baakhi'un nafsaka 'allaa yakoonoo mu'mineen.
verses.translation: (Aye Nabi) shaayad iss (gham) se ke woh log eemaan nahin laate aap khud ko halaak hi karleinge.

verses.arabic: إِن نَّشَأْ نُنَزِّلْ عَلَيْهِم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ ءَايَةًۭ فَظَلَّتْ أَعْنَـٰقُهُمْ لَهَا خَـٰضِعِينَ
verses.transliteration: 'In-nasha' nunazzil 'alayhim minas-samaaa'i 'Aayatan fazallat 'a'naaquhum lahaa khaadi'een.
verses.translation: Agar hum chaahein to un par aasmaan se koyi nishaani utaar dein, phir uske aage unki gardanein jhuki hi rah jaayein.

verses.arabic: وَمَا يَأْتِيهِم مِّن ذِكْرٍۢ مِّنَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ مُحْدَثٍ إِلَّا كَانُوا۟ عَنْهُ مُعْرِضِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maa ya'teehim min zikrim-minar-Rahmaani muhdasin 'illaa kaanoo 'anhu mu'rideen.
verses.translation: Aur Rahmaan ke paas se jo bhi koyi nayi naseehat aati hai to woh usse munh mod lete hain.

verses.arabic: فَقَدْ كَذَّبُوا۟ فَسَيَأْتِيهِمْ أَنۢبَـٰٓؤُا۟ مَا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ
verses.transliteration: Faqad kazzaboo fasaya'teehim 'ambaaa'u maa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh yaqeenan woh jhutlaa chuke, lehaaza jald unke paas uski khabarein aayengi jiska woh mazaaq udaaya karte the.

verses.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ إِلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ كَمْ أَنۢبَتْنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوْجٍۢ كَرِيمٍ
verses.transliteration: 'Awa lam yaraw 'ilal- 'ardi kam 'ambatnaa feehaa min kulli zawjin kareem.
verses.translation: Kiya unhon ne zameen ko nahin dekha ke humne uss mein har qism ki kitni hi umdah cheezein ugaayi hain?

verses.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَءَايَةًۭ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.transliteration: 'Inn fee zaalika la'Aayah; wa maa kaana 'aksaruhum mu'mineen
verses.translation: Bilaa shubah uss mein azeem nishaani hai, aur un mein se aksar eemaan laane waale nahin.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'innaa Rabbaka la Huwal-'Azeezur-Raheem.
verses.translation: Aur beshak aapka rab, wahi hai Ghaalib, bahut raham karne waala.

verses.arabic: وَإِذْ نَادَىٰ رَبُّكَ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنِ ٱئْتِ ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'iz naadaa Rabbuka Moosaaa 'ani'- til-qawmaz-zaalimeen.
verses.translation: Aur (yaad karein) jab aapke rab ne Moosa ko pukaara ke tu zaalim qaum ke paas jaa.

verses.arabic: قَوْمَ فِرْعَوْنَ ۚ أَلَا يَتَّقُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qawma Fir'awn; 'alaa yattaqoon.
verses.translation: (Ya'ni) Qaum-e-fir'aun ke paas, kiya woh darte nahin?

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ أَن يُكَذِّبُونِ
verses.transliteration: Qaala Rabbi 'inneee 'akhaafu 'añy- yukazziboon.
verses.translation: Moosa ne kaha: aye mere rab! beshak main darta hoon ke woh mujhe jhutlaa denge.

verses.arabic: وَيَضِيقُ صَدْرِى وَلَا يَنطَلِقُ لِسَانِى فَأَرْسِلْ إِلَىٰ هَـٰرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa yadeequ şadree wa laa yantaliqu lisaanee fa'arsil 'ilaa Haaroon.
verses.translation: Aur mera seena tang hota hai aur meri zabaan nahin chalti, lehaaza tu Haaroon ki taraf bhi wahi bhej.

verses.arabic: وَلَهُمْ عَلَىَّ ذَنۢبٌۭ فَأَخَافُ أَن يَقْتُلُونِ
verses.transliteration: Wa lahum 'alayya zambun fa'akhaafu any- yaqtuloon.
verses.translation: Aur unka mere zimme ek gunaah (jurm) hai, lehaaza mujhe khauf aata hai kaheen woh mujhe qatl hi kar dein.

verses.arabic: قَالَ كَلَّا ۖ فَٱذْهَبَا بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَآ إِنَّا مَعَكُم مُّسْتَمِعُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala kallaa fazhabaa bi'Aayaatinaaa 'innaa ma'akum-mustami'oon.
verses.translation: Farmaya: hargiz nahin! chunaancheh tum donon hamaari nishaaniyon ke saath jaao, yaqeenan hum tumhaare saath sunne waale hain.

verses.arabic: فَأْتِيَا فِرْعَوْنَ فَقُولَآ إِنَّا رَسُولُ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Fa'tiyaa Fir'awna faqoolaaa 'innaa Rasoolu Rabbil-'aalameen.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh tum donon Fir'aun ke paas jaao aur usse kaho: bilaa shubah hum rabbul aalameen ke Rasool hain

verses.arabic: أَنْ أَرْسِلْ مَعَنَا بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ
verses.transliteration: 'An 'arsil ma'anaa Baneee 'Israaa'eel.
verses.translation: 'Yeh ke Bani Israyeel ko (azad karke) hamaare saath bhej de.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Ya'ni Fir'aun se ek baat yeh kaho ke hum tere paas apni marzi se nahin aaye hain balke Rabbul Aa'lameen ke numaayinde aur uske Rasool ki haisiyat se aaye hain aur doosri baat yeh ke toone (400saal se) Bani Israyeel  ko ghulaam bana rakkha hai, unko azad karde taake main unhein shaam ki sar zameen par le jaaoun jiska Allah ne unse wa'dah kiya huwa hai.

verses.arabic: قَالَ أَلَمْ نُرَبِّكَ فِينَا وَلِيدًۭا وَلَبِثْتَ فِينَا مِنْ عُمُرِكَ سِنِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala 'alam nurabbika feenaa waleedanw-wa labista feenaa min 'umurika sineen.
verses.translation: Fir'aun ne kaha: kiya humne apne paas bachpan mein teri parwarish nahin ki aur tu hamaare darmiyaan apni umr ke kayi baras nahin raha?

verses.arabic: وَفَعَلْتَ فَعْلَتَكَ ٱلَّتِى فَعَلْتَ وَأَنتَ مِنَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa fa'alta faʻlatakal- latee fa'alta wa 'anta minal-kaafireen.
verses.translation: Aur tu apna woh kaam kar gaya jo kar gaya aur tu naa shukron mein se hai.

verses.arabic: قَالَ فَعَلْتُهَآ إِذًۭا وَأَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala fa'altuhaaa Pizanw-wa 'ana minad- daaalleen.
verses.translation: Moosa ne kaha: main ne woh kaam uss waqt kiya tha jab ke main bhatke huye logon mein se tha.

verses.arabic: فَفَرَرْتُ مِنكُمْ لَمَّا خِفْتُكُمْ فَوَهَبَ لِى رَبِّى حُكْمًۭا وَجَعَلَنِى مِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.transliteration: Fafarartu minkum lammaa khiftukum fawahaba lee Rabbee hukmanw-wa ja'alanee minal-mursaleen.
verses.translation: Phir jab main tum se daraa to mein tumse bhaag gaya, phir mere rab ne mujhe hukm bakhsha aur usne mujhe Rasoolon mein se banaaya.

verses.arabic: وَتِلْكَ نِعْمَةٌۭ تَمُنُّهَا عَلَىَّ أَنْ عَبَّدتَّ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ
verses.transliteration: Wa tilka ni'matun tamunnuhaa 'alayya 'an 'abbatta Baneee 'Israaa'eel.
verses.translation: Aur (kiya yahi hai) woh ehsaan jo tu mujh par ehsaan jatlaata hai ke toone Bani Israyeel ko ghulaam bana rakkha hai.

verses.arabic: قَالَ فِرْعَوْنُ وَمَا رَبُّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala Fir'awnu wa maa Rabbul-'aalameen.
verses.translation: Fir'aun ne kaha: aur Rabbul A'alameen kiya hai?

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَآ إِن كُنتُم مُّوقِنِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala Rabbus- samaawaati wal'ardi wa maa baynahumaa 'in kuntum mooqineen.
verses.translation: Moosa ne kaha: woh aasmaanon aur zameen ka aur jo kuchh un donon ke darmiyaan hai, unka rab hai, agar tum yaqeen karne waale ho.

verses.arabic: قَالَ لِمَنْ حَوْلَهُۥٓ أَلَا تَسْتَمِعُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala liman hawlahooo 'alaa tastami'oon.
verses.translation: Usne apne ird gird waalon (dar baariyon) se kaha: kiya tum sunte nahin ho?

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبُّكُمْ وَرَبُّ ءَابَآئِكُمُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala Rabbukum wa Rabbu 'aabaaa'ikumul- 'awwaleen.
verses.translation: Moosa ne kaha: (woh) tumhaara aur tumhaare agle aabaa-o-ajdaad ka rab hai.

verses.arabic: قَالَ إِنَّ رَسُولَكُمُ ٱلَّذِىٓ أُرْسِلَ إِلَيْكُمْ لَمَجْنُونٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Qaala 'inna Rasoolakumul-lazee 'ursila 'ilaykum lamajnoon.
verses.translation: Usne kaha: bilaa shubah tumhaara yeh Rasool, jo tumhaari taraf bheja gaya hai, yaqeenan diwaanah hai.

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبُّ ٱلْمَشْرِقِ وَٱلْمَغْرِبِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَآ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْقِلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala Rabbul- mashriqi wal-maghribi wa maa baynahumaa 'in kuntum ta'qiloon.
verses.translation: Moosa ne kaha: (woh) mashriq-o-maghrib aur jo kuchh un donon ke darmiyaan hai unka rab hai, agar tum aql rakhte ho.

verses.arabic: قَالَ لَئِنِ ٱتَّخَذْتَ إِلَـٰهًا غَيْرِى لَأَجْعَلَنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلْمَسْجُونِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala la'init-takhazta 'ilaahan ghayree la'aj'alannaka minal- masjooneen.
verses.translation: Usne kaha: albatta agar toone mere siwa koyi aur mabood pakda to main zaroor tujhe qaidiyon mein shaamil kar dunga.

verses.arabic: قَالَ أَوَلَوْ جِئْتُكَ بِشَىْءٍۢ مُّبِينٍۢ
verses.transliteration: Qaala 'awalw ji'tuka bishay'im-mubeen.
verses.translation: Moosa ne kaha: agarcheh main tere paas koyi waazeh shay (daleel) laaoun (tab bhi?)

verses.arabic: قَالَ فَأْتِ بِهِۦٓ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala fa'ti biheee 'in kunta minaş-şaadiqeen.
verses.translation: Usne kaha: agar tu sachchon mein se hai to woh to le hi aa.

verses.arabic: فَأَلْقَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِىَ ثُعْبَانٌۭ مُّبِينٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Fa'alqaa 'aşaahu fa'izaa hiya su'baanum- mubeen.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh Moosa ne apna 'asa daala to aanan faanan woh waazeh azdaha ban gaya.

verses.arabic: وَنَزَعَ يَدَهُۥ فَإِذَا هِىَ بَيْضَآءُ لِلنَّـٰظِرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa naza'a yadahoo fa'izaa hiya baydaaa'u linnaazireen.
verses.translation: Aur usne apna haath (baghal mein se) kheench nikaala to usi waqt woh naazireen ko safed (chamakta) nazar aaya.

verses.arabic: قَالَ لِلْمَلَإِ حَوْلَهُۥٓ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَسَـٰحِرٌ عَلِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Qaala lilmala'i hawlahooo 'inna haazaa lasaahirun 'aleem.
verses.translation: Fir'aun ne apne ird gird maujood sardaaron se kaha: bilaa shubah yeh zaroor maahir jaadu gar hai.

verses.arabic: يُرِيدُ أَن يُخْرِجَكُم مِّنْ أَرْضِكُم بِسِحْرِهِۦ فَمَاذَا تَأْمُرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Yureedu 'añy- yukhrijakum min 'ardikum bisihrihee famaazaa ta'muroon
verses.translation: Woh chaahta hai ke apne jaadu se tumhein tumhaari zameen se nikaal de, lehaaza tum kiya mashwarah dete ho?

verses.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ أَرْجِهْ وَأَخَاهُ وَٱبْعَثْ فِى ٱلْمَدَآئِنِ حَـٰشِرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaalooo 'arjih wa 'akhaahu wab'as fil- madaaa'ini haashireen.
verses.translation: Unhon ne kaha: use aur uske bhaai ko dheel de aur shahron mein (jaadu garon ko) ekatthha karne waale bhej de.

verses.arabic: يَأْتُوكَ بِكُلِّ سَحَّارٍ عَلِيمٍۢ
verses.transliteration: Ya'tooka bikulli sahhaarin 'aleem.¹
verses.translation: (ke) woh har maahir jaadu gar ko tere paas le aayein.
verses.deepMeaning: Ya'ni un donon ko filhaal apne haal par chhod do aur tamaam shahron se jaadu garon ko jama' karke unka baahami muqaablah kiya jaaye taake unke kartab ka jawaab aur teri taayeed-o-nusrat ho jaaye. aur yeh Allah hi ki taraf se takweeni intezaam tha taake log ek hi jagah jama' ho jaayein aur un dalaayel-o-baraaheen ka bah chashm-e-sar khud mushaahadah kar lein jo Allah Ta'ala ne hazrat Moosa عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام ko ataa farmaaye the

verses.arabic: فَجُمِعَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ لِمِيقَـٰتِ يَوْمٍۢ مَّعْلُومٍۢ
verses.transliteration: Fa jumi'as-saharatu limeeqaati Yawmim maloom.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh jaadu gar ek muqarrar din ko (khaas) waqt par jama' kar liye gaye.

verses.arabic: وَقِيلَ لِلنَّاسِ هَلْ أَنتُم مُّجْتَمِعُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa qeela linnaasi hal 'antum mujtami'oon.
verses.translation: aur logon se kaha gaya:. kiya tum bhi jama' ho gaye?

verses.arabic: لَعَلَّنَا نَتَّبِعُ ٱلسَّحَرَةَ إِن كَانُوا۟ هُمُ ٱلْغَـٰلِبِينَ
verses.transliteration: La'allanaa nattabi'us- saharata 'in kaanoo humul-ghaalibeen.
verses.translation: taake agar woh (jaadu gar) ghaalib aayein to hum un jaadu garon ka itteba' karein.

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ قَالُوا۟ لِفِرْعَوْنَ أَئِنَّ لَنَا لَأَجْرًا إِن كُنَّا نَحْنُ ٱلْغَـٰلِبِينَ
verses.transliteration: Falammaa jaaa'as- saharatu qaaloo li- Fir'awna 'a'inna lanaa la'ajran 'in kunnaa nahnul-ghaalibeen.
verses.translation: Phir jab jaadu gar aaye to woh fir'aun se kahne lage: agar hum hi ghaalib aaye to kiya hamaare liye koyi silah hoga?

verses.arabic: قَالَ نَعَمْ وَإِنَّكُمْ إِذًۭا لَّمِنَ ٱلْمُقَرَّبِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala na'am wa 'innakum 'izal-laminal- muqarrabeen.
verses.translation: Fir'aun ne kaha: haan! aur beshak tab tum mere muqarrab logon mein se hoge

verses.arabic: قَالَ لَهُم مُّوسَىٰٓ أَلْقُوا۟ مَآ أَنتُم مُّلْقُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala lahum Moosaaa 'alqoo maaa 'antum-mulqoon.
verses.translation: Moosa ne unse kaha: jo kuchh tumne daalna hai, daal do.

verses.arabic: فَأَلْقَوْا۟ حِبَالَهُمْ وَعِصِيَّهُمْ وَقَالُوٓا۟ بِعِزَّةِ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّا لَنَحْنُ ٱلْغَـٰلِبُونَ
verses.transliteration: Fa'alqaw hibaalahum wa 'işiyyahum wa qaaloo biʻizzati Fir'awna 'innaa lanahnul-ghaaliboon.
verses.translation: Tab unhon ne apni rassiyaan aur laathhyaan daaleen aur kahne lage: izzat- e-fir'aun ki qasam! Bilaa shubah hum hi ghaalib hain.

verses.arabic: فَأَلْقَىٰ مُوسَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِىَ تَلْقَفُ مَا يَأْفِكُونَ
verses.transliteration: Fa'alqaa Moosaa 'aşaahu fa'izaa hiya talqafu maa ya'fikoon.
verses.translation: Phir Moosa ne apna 'asa daala to woh fauran hi use nigalne laga jo unhon ne suwaang (bhes badalna) rachaaya tha.

verses.arabic: فَأُلْقِىَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ سَٰجِدِينَ
verses.transliteration: Fa'ulqiyas-saharatu saajideen.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh jaadugar be ikhtiyaar sajde mein gir pade

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ ءَامَنَّا بِرَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaalooo 'aamannaa bi-Rabbil-'aalameen.
verses.translation: Woh kahne lage: hum Rabbul Aa'lameen par eemaan laaye.

verses.arabic: رَبِّ مُوسَىٰ وَهَـٰرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Rabbi Moosaa wa Haaroon.
verses.translation: Moosa aur Haaroon ke rab par.

verses.arabic: قَالَ ءَامَنتُمْ لَهُۥ قَبْلَ أَنْ ءَاذَنَ لَكُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكَبِيرُكُمُ ٱلَّذِى عَلَّمَكُمُ ٱلسِّحْرَ فَلَسَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ لَأُقَطِّعَنَّ أَيْدِيَكُمْ وَأَرْجُلَكُم مِّنْ خِلَـٰفٍۢ وَلَأُصَلِّبَنَّكُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala 'aamantum lahoo qabla 'an 'aazana lakum 'innahoo lakabeerukumul-lazee 'allamakumus-sihra falasawfa ta'lamoon; la'uqatti'anna 'aydiyakum wa 'arjulakum min khilaafinw-wa la'uşallibannakum 'ajma'een.
verses.translation: Fir'aun ne kaha: mere ijaazat dene se pahle tumne use maan liya, beshak woh tumhaara bada hai jisne tumhein jaadu sikhaaya hai, lehaaza jald tum jaan loge, main zaroor tumhaare haath paaon mukhaalif taraf se kaat dunga aur tum sab ko zaroor sooli chadhaaounga.

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ لَا ضَيْرَ إِنَّآ إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا مُنقَلِبُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo la dayra 'innaaa 'ilaa Rabbinaa munqaliboon.
verses.translation: woh kahne lage: koyi harj nahin, beshak hum apne rab hi ki taraf lautne waale hain.

verses.arabic: إِنَّا نَطْمَعُ أَن يَغْفِرَ لَنَا رَبُّنَا خَطَـٰيَـٰنَآ أَن كُنَّآ أَوَّلَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.transliteration: Innaa natma'u 'any- yaghfira lanaa Rabbunna khataayaanaaa 'an kunnaaa 'awwalal- mu'mineen.
verses.translation: beshak hum ummeed rakhte hian ke hamaara rab hamaari khataayein bakhsh dega isliye ke hum pahle¹ eemaan laane waale bane hain.

verses.arabic: وَأَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنْ أَسْرِ بِعِبَادِىٓ إِنَّكُم مُّتَّبَعُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'awhaynaaa 'ilaa Moosaaa 'an 'asri bi'ibaadeee 'innakum muttaba'oon.
verses.translation: Aur humne Moosa ki taraf wahi ki ke tu mere bandon ke lekar raaton raat nikal chal, bilaa shubah tumhaara ta'aaqub kiya jaayega.

verses.arabic: فَأَرْسَلَ فِرْعَوْنُ فِى ٱلْمَدَآئِنِ حَـٰشِرِينَ
verses.transliteration: .Fa'arsala Fir'awnu filmadaaa'ini haashireen.
verses.translation: phir Fir'aun ne shahron mein ekatthha karne waale bheje

verses.arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَشِرْذِمَةٌۭ قَلِيلُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Inna haaa'ulaaa'i lashirzimatun qaleeloon
verses.translation: (Yeh paighaam dekar ke) beshak yeh (bani Israyeel) qaleel si jamaa'at hain.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّهُمْ لَنَا لَغَآئِظُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'innahum lanaa laghaaa'izoon.
verses.translation: Aur bilaa shubah woh humein ghussah dilaane waale hain.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّا لَجَمِيعٌ حَـٰذِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'innaa lajamee'un haaziroon.
verses.translation: Aur bilaa shubah hum chaukas aur hoshiyaar jamaa'at hain.

verses.arabic: فَأَخْرَجْنَـٰهُم مِّن جَنَّـٰتٍۢ وَعُيُونٍۢ
verses.transliteration: Fa'akhrajnaahum min Jannaatinw-wa 'uyoon.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh humne un (fir'auniyon) ko baaghon aur chashmon se nikaala.

verses.arabic: وَكُنُوزٍۢ وَمَقَامٍۢ كَرِيمٍۢ
verses.transliteration: Wa kunooziñw-wa maqaamin kareem.
verses.translation: Aur khazaanon aur umdah qiyaam gaahon se.

verses.arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ وَأَوْرَثْنَـٰهَا بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ
verses.transliteration: Kazaalika wa 'awrasnaahaa Baneee 'Israaa'eel.
verses.translation: Isi tarah huwa aur humne Bani Israyeel ko un cheezon ka waaris banaaya.

verses.arabic: فَأَتْبَعُوهُم مُّشْرِقِينَ
verses.transliteration: Fa'atbaʻoohum mushriqeen.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh (Fir'auni) suraj nikalte hi unke ta'aaqub mein nikle.

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّا تَرَآءَا ٱلْجَمْعَانِ قَالَ أَصْحَـٰبُ مُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّا لَمُدْرَكُونَ
verses.transliteration: Falammaa taraaa'al- jam'aani qaala 'aşhaabu Moosaaa 'innaa lamudrakoon.
verses.translation: Phir jab donon jamaa'atein muqaabil huyin to ashaab-e- Moosa kahne lage: yaqeenan hum to pakde gaye.

verses.arabic: قَالَ كَلَّآ إِنَّ مَعِىَ رَبِّى سَيَهْدِينِ
verses.transliteration: Qaala kallaaa 'inna ma'iya Rabbee sayahdeen.
verses.translation: Moosa ne kaha: hargiz nahin! bilaa shubah mera rab mere saath hai, woh zaroor meri rahnumaayi karega.

verses.arabic: فَأَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنِ ٱضْرِب بِّعَصَاكَ ٱلْبَحْرَ ۖ فَٱنفَلَقَ فَكَانَ كُلُّ فِرْقٍۢ كَٱلطَّوْدِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
verses.transliteration: Fa'awhaynaaa 'ilaa Moosaaa 'anidrib bi'aşaakal-bahra fanfalaqa fakaana kullu firqin kattawdil-'azeem.
verses.translation: Tab humne Moosa ki taraf wahi ki ke apna asa samandar par maar, to woh phat gaya, phir (samanadar ka) har tukda yun ho gaya jaise azeem pahaad.

verses.arabic: وَأَزْلَفْنَا ثَمَّ ٱلْـَٔاخَرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'azlafnaa sammal-'aakhareen.
verses.translation: Aur hum wahaan doosron (Fir'auniyon) ko qareeb le aaye.

verses.arabic: وَأَنجَيْنَا مُوسَىٰ وَمَن مَّعَهُۥٓ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'anjaynaa Moosaa wa mam ma'ahooo 'ajma'een.
verses.translation: Aur humne Moosa aur jo uske humraah the, sab ko bachaa liya.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ أَغْرَقْنَا ٱلْـَٔاخَرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Summa 'aghraqnal- 'aakhareen.
verses.translation: Phir humne doosron ko gharq kar diya.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَءَايَةًۭ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.transliteration: 'Inna fee zaalika la- 'Aayaah; wa maa kaana 'aksaruhum-mu'mineen.
verses.translation: Bilaa shubah uss mein azeem nishaani hai, aur unke aksar momin nahin hain.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'inna Rabbaka la Huwal-'Azeezur-Raheem.
verses.translation: Aur beshak aapka rab, wahi hai, Ghaalib, bahut raham karne waala.

verses.arabic: وَٱتْلُ عَلَيْهِمْ نَبَأَ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ
verses.transliteration: Watlu 'alayhim naba'a 'Ibraaheem.
verses.translation: Aur un (kuffaar) ko Ibraheem ki khabar sunaayiye.

verses.arabic: إِذْ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوْمِهِۦ مَا تَعْبُدُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Iz qaala li'abeehi wa qawmihee maa ta'budoon.
verses.translation: Jab usne apne baap aur apni qaum se kaha: tum kiya poojte ho?

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ نَعْبُدُ أَصْنَامًۭا فَنَظَلُّ لَهَا عَـٰكِفِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo na'budu 'aşnaaman fanazallu lahaa 'aakifeen.
verses.translation: Woh kahne lage: hum but poojte hain, aur hum hameshah unhi ke pujaari rahenge

verses.arabic: قَالَ هَلْ يَسْمَعُونَكُمْ إِذْ تَدْعُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala hal yasma'oonakum 'iz tad'oon.
verses.translation: Ibraheem ne kaha: kiya woh tumhein sunte hain jab tum unhein pukaarte ho.

verses.arabic: أَوْ يَنفَعُونَكُمْ أَوْ يَضُرُّونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Aw yanfaʻoonakum 'aw yadurroon.
verses.translation: ya woh tumhein nafa' dete hain ya zarar pahunchaate hain?

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ بَلْ وَجَدْنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا كَذَٰلِكَ يَفْعَلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo bal wajadnaaa 'aabaaa'anaa kazaalika yafaloon.
verses.translation: Unhon ne kaha: (nahin) balke humne apne baap dada ko paaya, woh isi tarah karte the.

verses.arabic: قَالَ أَفَرَءَيْتُم مَّا كُنتُمْ تَعْبُدُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala 'afara'aytum maa kuntum ta'budoon.
verses.translation: Ibraheem ne kaha: kiya bhala dekha tum ne jinko tum poojte aa rahe ho.

verses.arabic: أَنتُمْ وَءَابَآؤُكُمُ ٱلْأَقْدَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Antum wa 'aabaaa'ukumul- 'aqdamoon.
verses.translation: Tum aur tumhaare agle baap dada?

verses.arabic: فَإِنَّهُمْ عَدُوٌّۭ لِّىٓ إِلَّا رَبَّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Fa'innahum 'aduwwul-leee 'illaa Rabbal-'aalameen.
verses.translation: to bilaa shubah woh mere dushman hain, siwaaye rabbul aa'lameen ke.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَنِى فَهُوَ يَهْدِينِ
verses.transliteration: 'Allazee khalaqanee fahuwa yahdeen.
verses.translation: Jisne mujhe paida kiya, phir wahi meri rahnumaayi karta hai.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِى هُوَ يُطْعِمُنِى وَيَسْقِينِ
verses.transliteration: Wallazee Huwa yut'imunee wa yasqeen
verses.translation: Jisne mujhe paida kiya, phir wahi meri rahnumaayi karta hai.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا مَرِضْتُ فَهُوَ يَشْفِينِ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'izaa maridtu fahuwa yashfeen.
verses.translation: Aur jab main bimaar hota hoon to wahi mujhe shifa deta hai.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِى يُمِيتُنِى ثُمَّ يُحْيِينِ
verses.transliteration: Wallazee yumeetunee summa yuhyeen.
verses.translation: Aur wahi mujhe maut dega, phir mujhe zindah karega.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِىٓ أَطْمَعُ أَن يَغْفِرَ لِى خَطِيٓـَٔتِى يَوْمَ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.transliteration: Wallazeee 'atma'u 'any-yaghfira lee khateee'atee Yawmad- Deen.
verses.translation: Aur wahi jisse main ummeed¹ rakhta hoon ke roz-e-qiyaamat meri khataayein bakhsh dega.
verses.deepMeaning: Yahaan ummeed, yaqeen ke ma'na mein hai kyun ke kisi badi shakhsiyat se ummmeed, yaqeen ke mutaraadif hi hoti aur Allah Ta'ala to kaayenaat ki sab se badi hasti hai, usse waabasta ummeed, yaqeen kyun nahin hogi. Iss liye mufassireen kahte hain ke qur'an mein jahaan bhi Allah ke liye 'A'saa' ka lafz iste'maal huwa hai woh yaqeen hi ke mafhoom mein hai 'khati'ati, khatiatun waahid ka seghah hai lekin khataaya (jama') ke ma'na mein hai. Ambiya عَلَیهِ‌السَّلام agarcheh ma'soom hote hain isliye unse kisi bade gunaah ka sudoor mumkin nahin lekin (Hasanaatul Abraar Sayyeaatul Muqarrabeen) ke tehat Ambiya phir bhi apne ba'z af aal ko kotaahi par mahmool karte huye baargaah-e-ilaahi mein afu' ke talabgaar honge.

verses.arabic: رَبِّ هَبْ لِى حُكْمًۭا وَأَلْحِقْنِى بِٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
verses.transliteration: Rabbi hab lee hukmanw-wa 'alhiqnee bis-saaliheen.
verses.translation: Aye mere rab! mujhe hikmat ataa farma aur mujhe saaleheen ke saath mila.

verses.arabic: وَٱجْعَل لِّى لِسَانَ صِدْقٍۢ فِى ٱلْءَاخِرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Waj'al-lee lisaana şidqin fil-'aakhireen
verses.translation: Aur ba'd waalon mein mera zikr khair jaari rakh.

verses.arabic: وَٱجْعَلْنِى مِن وَرَثَةِ جَنَّةِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
verses.transliteration: Waj'alnee minw- warasati Jannatin- Na'eem.
verses.translation: Aur mujhe ne'maton waali jannat ke waarison mein shaamil farma.

verses.arabic: وَٱغْفِرْ لِأَبِىٓ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ
verses.transliteration: Waghfir li'abeee 'innahoo kaana minaddaalleen.
verses.translation: Aur mere baap ko bakhsh de, beshak woh gumraahon mein se tha.

verses.arabic: وَلَا تُخْزِنِى يَوْمَ يُبْعَثُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laa tukhzinee Yawma yub'asoon.
verses.translation: Aur jis din log dobaarah uthhaaye jaayenge, mujhe ruswa na karna.

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ لَا يَنفَعُ مَالٌۭ وَلَا بَنُونَ
verses.transliteration: Yawma laa yanfa'u maaluñw-wa laa banoon.
verses.translation: Jis din na maal koyi nafa' dega aur na aulaad hi.

verses.arabic: إِلَّا مَنْ أَتَى ٱللَّهَ بِقَلْبٍۢ سَلِيمٍۢ
verses.transliteration: 'Illaa man 'atal-laaha biqalbin saleem.
verses.translation: Illa yeh ke koyi Allah ke paas qalb-e-saleem ke saath haazir ho.

verses.arabic: وَأُزْلِفَتِ ٱلْجَنَّةُ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'uzlifatil-Jannatu lilmuttaqeen.
verses.translation: Aur jannat muttaqeen ke qareeb ki jaayegi.

verses.arabic: وَبُرِّزَتِ ٱلْجَحِيمُ لِلْغَاوِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa burrizatil- Jaheemu lilghaaween.
verses.translation: Aur dozakh gumraahon ke saamne laayi jaayegi.

verses.arabic: وَقِيلَ لَهُمْ أَيْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْبُدُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa qeela lahum 'aynamaa kuntum ta'budoon.
verses.translation: Aur unse kaha jaayega: kahan hain woh jinhein tum poojte the.

verses.arabic: مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ هَلْ يَنصُرُونَكُمْ أَوْ يَنتَصِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Min doonil-laahi hal yanșuroonakum 'aw yantaşiroon.n
verses.translation: Allah ke siwa? Kiya woh tumhaari madad kar sakte hain ya woh badlah le sakte hain?

verses.arabic: فَكُبْكِبُوا۟ فِيهَا هُمْ وَٱلْغَاوُۥنَ
verses.transliteration: Fakubkiboo feehaa hum walghaawoon.
verses.translation: Phir woh aur (sab) gumraah uss jahannam mein ondhe munh daale jaayeinge.

verses.arabic: وَجُنُودُ إِبْلِيسَ أَجْمَعُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa junoodu 'Ibleesa 'ajma'oon.
verses.translation: Aur Iblees ke saare lashkar bhi.

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ وَهُمْ فِيهَا يَخْتَصِمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo wa hum feehaa yakhtaşimoon.
verses.translation: Woh kaheinge jabke woh wahaan jhagad rahe honge

verses.arabic: تَٱللَّهِ إِن كُنَّا لَفِى ضَلَـٰلٍۢ مُّبِينٍ
verses.transliteration: Tallaahi 'in kunnaa lafee dalaalim-mubeen.
verses.translation: Allah ki qasam! Yaqeenan hum hi khuli gumraahi mein the.

verses.arabic: إِذْ نُسَوِّيكُم بِرَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.transliteration: 'Iz nusawweekum bi- Rabbil-'aalameen.
verses.translation: Jabke hum tumhein rabbul Aa'lameen ke baraabar thhahraate the.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Dunya mein to har taraasha huwa patthar aur qabr par bana huwa khush numa quba, mushrikon ko khudaayi ikhtiyaraat ka haamil nazar aata hai. lekin qiyaamat ko patah chalega ke yeh to khuli gumraahi hi thi ke woh unhein rab ke baraabar samajhte rahe.

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَضَلَّنَآ إِلَّا ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maaa 'adallanaaa 'illal-mujrimoon.
verses.translation: 'Aur humein to unhi (bade) mujrimon ne bahkaaya tha.

verses.arabic: فَمَا لَنَا مِن شَـٰفِعِينَ
verses.transliteration: Famaa lanaa min shaafi'een
verses.translation: To (ab) hamaare liye koyi sifaarshi nahin hai.

verses.arabic: وَلَا صَدِيقٍ حَمِيمٍۢ
verses.transliteration: Wa laa şadeeqin hameem.
verses.translation: Aur na koyi mukhlis dost.¹
verses.deepMeaning: Gunaah gaar ahl-e-eemaan ki sifaarish to Allah ki ijaazat ke ba'd Ambiya-o-Sulahaa bilkhusoos hazrat Nabi Kareem ﷺ farmaayenge. Lekin kaafiron aur mushrikon ke liye sifaarish karne ki kisi ko ijaazat hogi na hauslah, aur na wahaan koyi dosti hi kaam aayegi.

verses.arabic: فَلَوْ أَنَّ لَنَا كَرَّةًۭ فَنَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.transliteration: Falaw 'anna lanaa karratan fanakoona minal-mu'mineen.
verses.translation: Phir kaash ke hamaare liye ek baar (dunya mein) waapsi ho to hum mominon mein se ho jaayein.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَءَايَةًۭ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.transliteration: 'Inna fee zaalika la- 'Aayatanw-wa maa kaana 'aksaruhum mu'mineen.
verses.translation: Beshak iss mein azeem nishaani hai aur unke aksar eemaan laane waale nahin hain.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'inna Rabbaka la Huwal-'Azeezur- Raheem.
verses.translation: Aur beshak aapka rab wahi hai Ghalib, bahut raham karne waala.

verses.arabic: كَذَّبَتْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍۢ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.transliteration: Kazzabat qawmu Noohinil-Mursaleen.
verses.translation: Qaum-e-Nooh ne Rasoolon ko jhutlaaya.

verses.arabic: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ نُوحٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.transliteration: Iz qaala lahum 'akhoohum Noohun 'alaa tattaqoon.
verses.translation: Jab unse unke bhaai Nooh ne kaha: kiya tum (Allah se) darte nahin?
