verses.arabic: إِنِّى لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌ
verses.transliteration: Innee lakum Rasoolun 'ameen.
verses.translation: Beshak main tumhaare liye Ameen Rasool hoon.

verses.arabic: فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
verses.transliteration: Fattaqul-laaha wa 'atee'oon.
verses.translation: Lehaaza tum Allah se daro aur meri etaa'at karo.

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍۢ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maaa 'as'alukum 'alayhi min 'ajrin 'in 'ajriya 'illaa 'alaa Rabbil-'aalameen.
verses.translation: Aur main tumse iss (tableegh) par koyi ajr aur silah nahin maangta, mera ajr to Rabbul Aa'lameen hi ke zimme hai.

verses.arabic: فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
verses.transliteration: Fattaqul-laaha wa 'atee'oon.
verses.translation: Lehaaza tum Allah se daro aur meri itaa'at karo.

verses.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ أَنُؤْمِنُ لَكَ وَٱتَّبَعَكَ ٱلْأَرْذَلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qaalooo 'anu'minu laka wattabaʻakal- 'arzaloon.
verses.translation: Unhon ne kaha: kiya hum tujh par eemaan laayein haalaanke teri pairwi to Razeel logon ne ki hai.

verses.arabic: قَالَ وَمَا عِلْمِى بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala wa maa 'ilmee bimaa kaanoo ya'maloon.
verses.translation: Nooh ne kaha: aur mujhe uska kiya ilm jo woh amal karte rahe hain.

verses.arabic: إِنْ حِسَابُهُمْ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّى ۖ لَوْ تَشْعُرُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'In hisaabuhum 'illaa 'alaa Rabbee law tash'uroon.
verses.translation: Unka hisaab to mere rab ke zimme hai agar tum kuchh shu'oor rakhte ho.

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَنَا۠ بِطَارِدِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maaa 'ana bitaaridil-mu'mineen.
verses.translation: Aur main mominon ko door karne waala nahin.

verses.arabic: إِنْ أَنَا۠ إِلَّا نَذِيرٌۭ مُّبِينٌۭ
verses.transliteration: 'In 'ana 'illaa nazeerum-mubeen.
verses.translation: Main to khullam khulla daraane waala hoon.

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهِ يَـٰنُوحُ لَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلْمَرْجُومِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo la'il-lam tantahi yaa Noohu latakoonanna minal- marjoomeen.
verses.translation: Woh bole: Aye Nooh! Agar tu baaz na aaya to tujhe zaroor sangsaar kar diya jaayega.

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنَّ قَوْمِى كَذَّبُونِ
verses.transliteration: Qaala Rabbi 'inna qawmee kazzaboon.
verses.translation: Nooh ne kaha: aye mere rab! beshak meri qaum ne mujhe jhutlaaya hai.

verses.arabic: فَٱفْتَحْ بَيْنِى وَبَيْنَهُمْ فَتْحًۭا وَنَجِّنِى وَمَن مَّعِىَ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.transliteration: Faftah baynee wa baynahum fathanw-wa najjinee wa mam-maʻiya minal-mu'mineen.
verses.translation: 1Lehaaza tu mere aur unke darmiyaan faislah farma aur mujhe aur jo mere humraah momin hain unko najaat de.

verses.arabic: فَأَنجَيْنَـٰهُ وَمَن مَّعَهُۥ فِى ٱلْفُلْكِ ٱلْمَشْحُونِ
verses.transliteration: Fa'anjaynaahu wa mam-ma'ahoo fil-fulkil- mashhoon.
verses.translation: Chunaancheh humne use aur jo log bhari kashti mein uske saath the unko najaat di.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ أَغْرَقْنَا بَعْدُ ٱلْبَاقِينَ
verses.transliteration: Summa 'aghraqnaa ba'dul-baaqeen.
verses.translation: Phir uske ba'd humne baaqi sab gharq kar diye.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَءَايَةًۭ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.transliteration: 'Inna fee zaalika la- 'Aayaah; wa maa kaana 'aksaruhum mu'mineen
verses.translation: Beshak uss mein azeem nishaani hai, aur unke aksar momin nahin.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'inna Rabbaka la-Huwal-'Azeezur- Raheem.
verses.translation: Aur bilaa shubah aapka rab, wahi hai Ghalib, bahut raham karne waala.

verses.arabic: كَذَّبَتْ عَادٌۭ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.transliteration: Kazzabat 'Aadunil- mursaleen.
verses.translation: (Qaum) Aad ne Rasoolon ko jhutlaaya.

verses.arabic: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ هُودٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.transliteration: Iz qaala lahum 'akhoohum Hoodun 'alaa tattaqoon.
verses.translation: Jab unke bhaai¹ Hood ne kaha: kiya tum (Allah se) darte nahin ho?
verses.deepMeaning: Har Nabi usi qaum ka ek fard hota tha jiski taraf use mab'oos kiya jaata tha aur usi e'tebaar se unhein uss qaum ka bhaai qaraar diya gaya hai. Ambiya-o-Rusul ki yeh bashriyat bhi unki qaumon ke eemaan Jaane mein rukaawat bani rahi hai unka khayaal tha ke Nabi ko bashar nahin, Maafauqul Bashar hona chaahiye. Aaj bhi iss musallamah haqeeqat se bekhabar log paighamber-e-islam ﷺ ko maafauqul bashar baawar karaane par tule huye rahte hain haalaanke aap khaandaan quraish ke ek fard the

verses.arabic: إِنِّى لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Innee lakum Rasoolun 'ameen.
verses.translation: Beshak main tumhaare liye ameen Rasool hoon.

verses.arabic: فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
verses.transliteration: Fattaqul-laaha wa 'atee'oon.
verses.translation: Lehaaza tum Allah se daro aur meri etaa'at karo.

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍۢ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maaa 'as'alukum 'alayhi min ajrin 'in 'ajriya 'illaa 'alaa Rabbil-'aalameen.
verses.translation: Aur main tumse iss (tableegh) par koyi ajr nahin maangta, mera ajr to Rabbul Aa'lameen hi ke zimme hai.

verses.arabic: أَتَبْنُونَ بِكُلِّ رِيعٍ ءَايَةًۭ تَعْبَثُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Atabnoona bikulli ree'in 'aayatan ta basoon.
verses.translation: Kiya tun har ounchi jagah par bataur khel tamaasha yaad gaarein banaate ho?

verses.arabic: وَتَتَّخِذُونَ مَصَـٰنِعَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَخْلُدُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa tattakhizoona masaani'a laʻallakum takhludoon.
verses.translation: Aur tum mazboot mahal banaate ho, shaayad tum hameshah (yaheen) rahoge.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا بَطَشْتُم بَطَشْتُمْ جَبَّارِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa 'izaa batashtum batashtum jabbaareen.
verses.translation: Aur jab tum (kisi par) haath daalte ho to sarkash ban kar hi haath daalte ho.

verses.arabic: فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
verses.transliteration: Fattaqul-laaha wa 'atee'oon.
verses.translation: Lehaaza tum Allah se daro aur meri etaa'at karo.

verses.arabic: وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَمَدَّكُم بِمَا تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: 132. Wattaqul-lazeee 'amaddakum bimaa taʻlamoon.
verses.translation: 132. Aur tum uss zaat se daro Jisne tumhein un cheezon mein badhaaya (imdaad di) hai jo tum jaante ho.

verses.arabic: أَمَدَّكُم بِأَنْعَـٰمٍۢ وَبَنِينَ
verses.transliteration: 133.'Amaddakum bi'an'aamiñw-wa baneen.
verses.translation: 'Tumhein pashuon aur aulad se nawaza.'

verses.arabic: وَجَنَّـٰتٍۢ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.transliteration: 134. Wa jannaatiñw-wa 'uyoon.
verses.translation: 'Aur baghon aur chashmon se.'

verses.arabic: إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيْكُمْ عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍۢ
verses.transliteration: 135. 'Innee 'akhaafu 'alaykum 'azaaba Yawmin 'azeem.
verses.translation: 'Main yaqeenan tum par ek bade din ke azaab se dar raha hoon.'

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيْنَآ أَوَعَظْتَ أَمْ لَمْ تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلْوَٰعِظِينَ
verses.transliteration: 136.Qaaloo sawaaa'un 'alaynaaa 'awa 'azta 'am lam takum minal- waaʻizeen.
verses.translation: Unhon ne kaha, 'Hamare liye yeh barabar hai, tum naseehat karo ya naseehat karne walon mein se na ho.'

verses.arabic: إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا خُلُقُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.transliteration: 137. 'In haazaaa 'illaa khuluqul-'awwaleen.
verses.translation: 'Yeh to bas pehle walon ki aadat hai.'

verses.arabic: وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ
verses.transliteration: 138. Wa maa nahnu bimu'azzabeen.
verses.translation: 'Aur hum azaab die jaane walay nahi hain.'

verses.arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَهْلَكْنَـٰهُمْ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَءَايَةًۭ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.transliteration: 139.Fakazzaboohu fa'ahlaknaahum; 'inna fee zaalika la'aayah; wa maa kaana 'aksaruhum mu'mineen.
verses.translation: To unhon ne use jhutla diya, phir humne unhein tabaah kar diya; yaqeenan isme ek nishani hai, lekin unmein se zyada log imaan nahi late.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
verses.transliteration: 140. Wa 'inna Rabbaka la-Huwal-'Azeezur- Raheem.
verses.translation: Aur yaqeenan tumhara Rubb Zabar dost aur Rehman hai.

verses.arabic: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.transliteration: 141. Kazzabat Samoodul- mursaleen.
verses.translation: Samood ne paighambaron ko jhutla diya.

verses.arabic: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ صَـٰلِحٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.transliteration: 142. 'Iz qaala lahum 'akhoohum Şaalihun 'alaa tattaqoon.
verses.translation: Jab unke bhai Saleh ne unse kaha, 'Kya tum dar nahi rakhte?'

verses.arabic: إِنِّى لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌۭ
verses.transliteration: 143. 'Innee lakum Rasoolun 'ameen.
verses.translation: 'Main yaqeenan tumhare liye ek aamannaatdaar paighambar hoon.'

verses.arabic: فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
verses.transliteration: 144.Fattaqul-laaha wa 'atee'oon.
verses.translation: 'To tum Allah se daro aur meri baat maano.'

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍۢ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.transliteration: 145. Wa maaa 'as'alukum 'alayhi min 'ajrin 'in 'ajriya 'illaa 'alaa Rabbil-'aalameen.
verses.translation: 'Aur main tum se ispar koi ajar nahi maangta, mera ajar to sirf duniya ke Rubb par hai.'

verses.arabic: أَتُتْرَكُونَ فِى مَا هَـٰهُنَآ ءَامِنِينَ
verses.transliteration: 146. 'Atutrakoona fee maa haahunaaa 'aamineen.
verses.translation: 'Kya tum yahan choode jaoge aman mein?'

verses.arabic: فِى جَنَّـٰتٍۢ وَعُيُونٍۢ
verses.transliteration: 147. Fee jannaatiñw-wa 'uyoon.net
verses.translation: 'Baghon aur chashmon mein?'

verses.arabic: وَزُرُوعٍۢ وَنَخْلٍۢ طَلْعُهَا هَضِيمٌۭ
verses.transliteration: 148. Wa zurooʻinw-wa nakhlin tal'uhaa hadeem.
verses.translation: 'Aur kheton aur khajoor ke darakhton mein jinke phal naram hain?'

verses.arabic: وَتَنْحِتُونَ مِنَ ٱلْجِبَالِ بُيُوتًۭا فَـٰرِهِينَ
verses.transliteration: 149. Wa tanhitoona minal-jibaali buyootan faariheen.
verses.translation: 'Aur tum pahadon mein ghar banate ho to shokh banate ho?'

verses.arabic: فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
verses.transliteration: 150. Fattaqul-laaha wa 'atee'oon.
verses.translation: 'To tum Allah se daro aur meri baat maano.'

verses.arabic: وَلَا تُطِيعُوٓا۟ أَمْرَ ٱلْمُسْرِفِينَ
verses.transliteration: 151. Wa laa tutee'ooo 'amral-musrifeen.
verses.translation: 'Aur na hi un logon ka hukm maano jo had se barhne waale hain.'

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُفْسِدُونَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَا يُصْلِحُونَ
verses.transliteration: 152.'Allazeena yufsidoona fil-'ardi wa laa yuslihoon.
verses.translation: 'Wo jo zameen mein fasaad phailate hain aur islah nahi karte.'

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مِنَ ٱلْمُسَحَّرِينَ
verses.transliteration: 153. Qaalooo 'innamaaa 'anta minal- musahhareen.
verses.translation: Unhon ne kaha, 'Tum to sirf un logon mein se ho jo jaadoo kiye gaye hain.'

verses.arabic: مَآ أَنتَ إِلَّا بَشَرٌۭ مِّثْلُنَا فَأْتِ بِـَٔايَةٍ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ
verses.transliteration: 154. Maaa 'anta 'illaa basharum-mislunaa fa'ti bi'Aayatin 'in kunta minaş-şaadiqeen.
verses.translation: 'Tum to bas humare jese insaan ho, to ek nishani lao agar tum sachay ho.'

verses.arabic: قَالَ هَـٰذِهِۦ نَاقَةٌۭ لَّهَا شِرْبٌۭ وَلَكُمْ شِرْبُ يَوْمٍۢ مَّعْلُومٍۢ
verses.transliteration: 155.Qaala haazihee naaqatul-lahaa shirbunw-wa lakum shirbu yawmim-maʻloom.
verses.translation: Usne kaha, 'Yeh ek oontni hai, iske liye ek din ka paani hai aur tumhare liye ek ma'loom din ka paani hai.'

verses.arabic: وَلَا تَمَسُّوهَا بِسُوٓءٍۢ فَيَأْخُذَكُمْ عَذَابُ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍۢ
verses.transliteration: 156. Wa laa tamassoohaa bisooo'in faya'khuzakum 'azaabu Yawmin 'Azeem.
verses.translation: 'Aur isay kisi burayi ke saath haath mat lagana warna tumhein ek bade din ka azaab aa ghera karega.'

verses.arabic: فَعَقَرُوهَا فَأَصْبَحُوا۟ نَـٰدِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: 157.Faʻaqaroohaa fa'aşbahoo naadimeen.
verses.translation: To unhon ne use qatal kar diya, phir wo naadim ho gaye.

verses.arabic: فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَءَايَةًۭ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.transliteration: 158. Fa'akhazahumul- 'azaab; 'inna fee zaalika la-'Aayah; wa maa kaana 'aksaruhum Mu'mineen.
verses.translation: Phir unhein azaab ne aa ghera; yaqeenan isme ek nishani hai, lekin unmein se zyada log imaan nahi late.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
verses.transliteration: 159. Wa 'inna Rabbaka la-Huwal-'Azeezur- Raheem.
verses.translation: Aur yaqeenan tumhara Rubb Zabar dost aur Rehman hai.

verses.arabic: كَذَّبَتْ قَوْمُ لُوطٍ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.transliteration: 160.kazzabat qawmu Lootinil-mursaleen.
verses.translation: Loot ki qaum ne paighambaron ko jhutla diya.

verses.arabic: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ لُوطٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.transliteration: 161. Iz qaala lahum 'akhoohum Lootun 'alaa tattaqoon.
verses.translation: Jab unke bhai Loot ne unse kaha, 'Kya tum dar nahi rakhte?'

verses.arabic: إِنِّى لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌۭ
verses.transliteration: 162. 'Innee lakum rasoolun 'ameen.
verses.translation: 'Main yaqeenan tumhare liye ek aamannaatdaar paighambar hoon.'

verses.arabic: فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
verses.transliteration: 163.Fattaqul-laaha wa 'atee'oon.
verses.translation: 'To tum Allah se daro aur meri baat maano.'

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.transliteration: 164. Wa maaa 'as'alukum 'alayhi min 'ajrin 'in 'ajriya 'illaa 'alaa Rabbil-'aalameen.
verses.translation: 'Aur main tum se ispar koi ajar nahi maangta, mera ajar to sirf duniya ke Rubb par hai.'

verses.arabic: أَتَأْتُونَ ٱلذُّكْرَانَ مِنَ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.transliteration: 165. 'Ata'toonaz-zukraana minal-'aalameen.
verses.translation: 'Kya tum duniya mein sab logon ke darmiyan mardon ke paas jaate ho?'

verses.arabic: وَتَذَرُونَ مَا خَلَقَ لَكُمْ رَبُّكُم مِّنْ أَزْوَٰجِكُم ۚ بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌ عَادُونَ
verses.transliteration: 166. Wa tazaroona maa khalaqa lakum Rabbukum min 'azwaajikum; bal 'antum qawmun 'aadoon.
verses.translation: 'Aur tum chhod dete ho jo tumhare Rubb ne tumhare liye tumhari biwiyon mein paida kiya hai? Balki tum log had se barhne waale ho.'

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهِ يَـٰلُوطُ لَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلْمُخْرَجِينَ
verses.transliteration: 167.Qaloo la'il-lam tantahi yaa Lootu latakoonanna minal- mukhrajeen.
verses.translation: Unhon ne kaha, 'Agar tum baaz nahi aaye Loot, to yaqeenan tum un logon mein se ho jaoge jo nikaale gaye hain.'

verses.arabic: قَالَ إِنِّى لِعَمَلِكُم مِّنَ ٱلْقَالِينَ
verses.transliteration: 168. Qaala 'innee li'amalikum minal- qaaleen.
verses.translation: Usne kaha, 'Main yaqeenan tumhare kaam se nafrat karne walon mein se hoon.'

verses.arabic: رَبِّ نَجِّنِى وَأَهْلِى مِمَّا يَعْمَلُونَ
verses.transliteration: 169. Rabbi najjinee wa 'ahlee mimmaa ya'maloon.
verses.translation: 'Mere Rubb, mujhe aur meri aulad ko bacha le jo wo log kar rahe hain.'

verses.arabic: فَنَجَّيْنَـٰهُ وَأَهْلَهُۥٓ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.transliteration: 170.Fanajjaynaahu wa 'ahlahooo 'ajma'een.
verses.translation: To humne usay aur uski aulad ko sab ko bacha liya.

verses.arabic: إِلَّا عَجُوزًۭا فِى ٱلْغَـٰبِرِينَ
verses.transliteration: 171.'Illaa 'ajoozan fil- ghaabireen.
verses.translation: Siwaaye ek boodhi aurat ke jo pichey rah gayi thi.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ دَمَّرْنَا ٱلْـَٔاخَرِينَ
verses.transliteration: 172.Summa dammarnal- 'aakhareen.
verses.translation: Phir humne baaqi sab ko tabaah kar diya.

verses.arabic: وَأَمْطَرْنَا عَلَيْهِم مَّطَرًۭا ۖ فَسَآءَ مَطَرُ ٱلْمُنذَرِينَ
verses.transliteration: 173. Wa 'amtarnaa 'alayhim mataran fasaaa'a matarul- munzareen.
verses.translation: Aur humne unpar ek andhi chhodi; phir kitna bura tha unko azaab dene walon ka paani barsana.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَءَايَةًۭ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.transliteration: Inna fee zaalika la-Aayah; wa maa kaana aksaruhum mu'mineen
verses.translation: Yaqeenan isme ek nishani hai, lekin unmein se zyada log imaan nahi late.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
verses.transliteration: Wa inna rabbaka la huwal 'azeezur-raheem
verses.translation: Aur yaqeenan tumhara Rubb Zabar dost aur Rehman hai.

verses.arabic: كَذَّبَ أَصْحَـٰبُ لْـَٔيْكَةِ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.transliteration: Kazzaba as-haabul-aikati-l-mursaleen
verses.translation: Aikah walon ne paighambaron ko jhutla diya.

verses.arabic: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ شُعَيْبٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.transliteration: Iz qaala lahum Shu'aybun alaa tattaqoon
verses.translation: Jab unke bhai Shoaib ne unse kaha, 'Kya tum dar nahi rakhte?'

verses.arabic: إِنِّى لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Innee lakum rasoolun ameen
verses.translation: 'Main yaqeenan tumhare liye ek aamannaatdaar paighambar hoon.'

verses.arabic: فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
verses.transliteration: Fattaqoo-llaaha wa atee'oon
verses.translation: 'To tum Allah se daro aur meri baat maano.'

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍۢ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maa as-alukum 'alayhi min ajr; in ajriya illa 'ala rabbil 'aalameen
verses.translation: 'Aur main tum se ispar koi ajar nahi maangta, mera ajar to sirf duniya ke Rubb par hai.'

verses.arabic: أَوْفُوا۟ ٱلْكَيْلَ وَلَا تَكُونُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلْمُخْسِرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Awfoo-l-kaila wa laa takoonoo minal-mukhsireen
verses.translation: 'Naapo tol karo aur kam tolne walon mein se na ho jao.'

verses.arabic: وَزِنُوا۟ بِٱلْقِسْطَاسِ ٱلْمُسْتَقِيمِ
verses.transliteration: Wazinoo bilqistaasil-mustaqeem
verses.translation: 'Aur barabar tol karo sahih tarazu ke zariye.'

verses.arabic: وَلَا تَبْخَسُوا۟ ٱلنَّاسَ أَشْيَآءَهُمْ وَلَا تَعْثَوْا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ مُفْسِدِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa laa tabkhasoo-naasa ashyaa'ahum wa laa ta'saw fil-ardi mufsideen
verses.translation: 'Aur logon ke cheezon mein kami na karo aur zameen mein fasaad phailane waale na bano.'

verses.arabic: وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَكُمْ وَٱلْجِبِلَّةَ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa taqoo allazee khalaqakum wal-jibillatal-awwaleen
verses.translation: 'Aur us se daro jisne tumhein aur pehle waalon ko paida kiya hai.'

verses.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مِنَ ٱلْمُسَحَّرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo innamaa anta minal-musahhareen
verses.translation: Unhon ne kaha, 'Tum to sirf un logon mein se ho jo jaadoo kiye gaye hain.'

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَنتَ إِلَّا بَشَرٌۭ مِّثْلُنَا وَإِن نَّظُنُّكَ لَمِنَ ٱلْكَـٰذِبِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maa anta illa basharum-mithluna wa in-na zunnuka laminal-kaazibeen
verses.translation: 'Aur tum to sirf humare jese insaan ho aur yaqeenan hum samajhte hain ke tum jhooton mein se ho.'

verses.arabic: فَأَسْقِطْ عَلَيْنَا كِسَفًۭا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ
verses.transliteration: Fa-asqit 'alayna kisafan minas-samaa'i in kunta minas-saadiqeen
verses.translation: 'To humpar ek tukda aasmaan se gira do agar tum sachay ho.'

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّىٓ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qaala rabbee a'lamu bimaa ta'maloon
verses.translation: Usne kaha, 'Mera Rubb zyada behtar janta hai jo tum karte ho.'

verses.arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَخَذَهُمْ عَذَابُ يَوْمِ ٱلظُّلَّةِ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍۢ
verses.transliteration: Fa-kazzaboohu fa-akhazahum azaabu yawmi-zullati inna hu kaana azaaba yawmin-'azeem
verses.translation: To unhon ne use jhutla diya, phir unhein zillat ka din ka azaab aa ghera; yaqeenan ye ek bara din tha.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَءَايَةًۭ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.transliteration: Inna fee zaalika la-Aayah; wa maa kaana aksaruhum mu'mineen
verses.translation: Yaqeenan isme ek nishani hai, lekin unmein se zyada log imaan nahi late.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
verses.transliteration: Wa inna rabbaka la huwal 'azeezur-raheem
verses.translation: Aur yaqeenan tumhara Rubb Zabar dost aur Rehman hai.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَتَنزِيلُ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa innahu latanzeelu rabbil 'aalameen
verses.translation: Aur yaqeenan yeh duniya ke Rubb ka utarna hai.

verses.arabic: نَزَلَ بِهِ ٱلرُّوحُ ٱلْأَمِينُ
verses.transliteration: Nazzala bihi-rroohul-ameen
verses.translation: Isay Rooh-ul-Ameen le kar aaye hain.

verses.arabic: عَلَىٰ قَلْبِكَ لِتَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُنذِرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Alaa qalbika litakoona minal-munzireen
verses.translation: Tumhare dil par taa ke tum ek dard dene walon mein se ho jao.

verses.arabic: بِلِسَانٍ عَرَبِىٍّۢ مُّبِينٍۢ
verses.transliteration: Bilisaaanin 'arabiyyin-mubeen
verses.translation: Ek saaf aur roshan arabi zubaan mein.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَفِى زُبُرِ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa innahu lafee zuburil-awwaleen
verses.translation: Aur yaqeenan yeh pehle waalon ke likhayi mein hai.

verses.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُمْ ءَايَةً أَن يَعْلَمَهُۥ عُلَمَـٰٓؤُا۟ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ
verses.transliteration: Awalam-yakun lahum aayatan anya'lamahu 'ulamaaa'u Baneee Israa'eel
verses.translation: Aur kya yeh unke liye ek nishani nahi ke Bani Israil ke ulema isay jante hain?

verses.arabic: وَلَوْ نَزَّلْنَـٰهُ عَلَىٰ بَعْضِ ٱلْأَعْجَمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa law nazzalnaahu 'alaa ba'dil-a'jameen
verses.translation: Aur agar hum isay kuch ghair arbi logon par utarte.

verses.arabic: فَقَرَأَهُۥ عَلَيْهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ مُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.transliteration: Faqara'ahoo 'alayhim maa kaanoo bihi mu'mineen
verses.translation: Phir wo isay unke saamne parhte, to wo ispar imaan nahi late.

verses.arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ سَلَكْنَـٰهُ فِى قُلُوبِ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Kazaalika salaknaahu fee quloobil-mujrimeen
verses.translation: Aur isi tarah humne isay mujrimon ke dilon mein daal diya.

verses.arabic: لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِهِۦ حَتَّىٰ يَرَوُا۟ ٱلْعَذَابَ ٱلْأَلِيمَ
verses.transliteration: Laa yu'minoona bihee hattaa yarawul 'azaabal-aleem
verses.translation: Wo ispar imaan nahi late jab tak ke wo dardnaak azaab ko na dekh lein.

verses.arabic: فَيَأْتِيَهُم بَغْتَةًۭ وَهُمْ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Fa-ya'tiyahum baghtatanw-wa hum laa yash'uroon
verses.translation: Phir wo achanak unpar aa jaayega jabke unhein ehsaas nahi hoga.

verses.arabic: فَيَقُولُوا۟ هَلْ نَحْنُ مُنظَرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Fa-yaqooloo hal nahnu munzaroon
verses.translation: Phir wo kahenge, 'Kya hamen thodi der di jaayegi?'

verses.arabic: أَفَبِعَذَابِنَا يَسْتَعْجِلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Afa-bi'azaabinaa yasta'jiloon
verses.translation: Kya wo hamare azaab ko jaldi lana chahte hain?

verses.arabic: أَفَرَءَيْتَ إِن مَّتَّعْنَـٰهُمْ سِنِينَ
verses.transliteration: Afara'ayta in matta'naahum sineen
verses.translation: To kya tumne dekha agar hum unhein kuch saalon ke liye fayda dein?

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ جَآءَهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يُوعَدُونَ
verses.transliteration: Summa jaaa'ahum maa kaanoo yoo'adoon
verses.translation: Phir un tak wo aa jaaye jo unse wada kiya gaya tha.

verses.arabic: مَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يُمَتَّعُونَ
verses.transliteration: Maa aghnaa 'anhum maa kaanoo yumatta'oon
verses.translation: To unhein unka fayda kuch kaam nahi aaya jo wo le rahe thay.

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَهْلَكْنَا مِن قَرْيَةٍ إِلَّا لَهَا مُنذِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maaa ahlaknaa min qaryatin illaa lahaa munziroon
verses.translation: Aur humne kisi basti ko tabaah nahi kiya siwaaye uske jisme dar dene walay thay.

verses.arabic: ذِكْرَىٰ وَمَا كُنَّا ظَـٰلِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Zikraa wa maa kunnaa zaalimeen
verses.translation: Yeh yaad dilaane ke liye, aur hum zaalim nahi thay.

verses.arabic: وَمَا تَنَزَّلَتْ بِهِ ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينُ
verses.transliteration: Wa maa tanazzalat bihish-shayaateen
verses.translation: Aur shayateen ispar nahi utarte.

verses.arabic: وَمَا يَنبَغِى لَهُمْ وَمَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa maa yanbaghee lahum wa maa yastatee'oon
verses.translation: Aur na hi yeh unke laayak hai aur na hi wo yeh kar sakte hain.

verses.arabic: إِنَّهُمْ عَنِ ٱلسَّمْعِ لَمَعْزُولُونَ
verses.transliteration: Innahum 'anis-sam'i la-ma'azooloon
verses.translation: Wo yaqeenan sunne se mehroom hain.

verses.arabic: فَلَا تَدْعُ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَتَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُعَذَّبِينَ
verses.transliteration: Falaa tad'u ma'a laahi ilaahan aakhara fa-takoona minal-mu'az-zabeen
verses.translation: To tum Allah ke saath kisi aur ko na pukaro, warna tum azaab die jaane walon mein se ho jaoge.

verses.arabic: وَأَنذِرْ عَشِيرَتَكَ ٱلْأَقْرَبِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa anzira 'asheerataka-l-aqrabeen
verses.translation: Aur apne qareebi rishtedaron ko dar sunao.

verses.arabic: وَٱخْفِضْ جَنَاحَكَ لِمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wakh-fid janaahaka limanittaba'aka minal-mu'mineen
verses.translation: Aur apni baazoo jhuka do jo tumhare saath imaan laaye hain.

verses.arabic: فَإِنْ عَصَوْكَ فَقُلْ إِنِّى بَرِىٓءٌۭ مِّمَّا تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Fa-in 'asawka faqul innee baree'um mimmaa ta'maloon
verses.translation: Phir agar wo tumhari nafarmaani karein to kehdo ke main beri hai jo tum karte ho.

verses.arabic: وَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ
verses.transliteration: Wa tawakkal 'alal-'azeezir-raheem
verses.translation: Aur Zabar dost aur Rehman par bharosa karo.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِى يَرَىٰكَ حِينَ تَقُومُ
verses.transliteration: Allazee yaraaka heena taqoom
verses.translation: Wo jo tumhein dekh raha hai jab tum uthte ho.

verses.arabic: وَتَقَلُّبَكَ فِى ٱلسَّـٰجِدِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa taqallubaka fis-saajideen
verses.translation: Aur tumhara sajda karte hue dekhte hain.

verses.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
verses.transliteration: Innahoo huwa-s-samee'ul-'aleem
verses.translation: Yaqeenan wo sunne waala, jaanne waala hai.

verses.arabic: هَلْ أُنَبِّئُكُمْ عَلَىٰ مَن تَنَزَّلُ ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينُ
verses.transliteration: Hal-unabbi'ukum 'alaa man-tanazzalu-shayaateen
verses.translation: Kya tumhein bataaoon ke shayateen kispar utarte hain?

verses.arabic: تَنَزَّلُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ أَفَّاكٍ أَثِيمٍۢ
verses.transliteration: Tanazzalu 'alaa kulli affaakin atheem
verses.translation: Wo har jhoot bolne wale gunaahgaar par utarte hain.

verses.arabic: يُلْقُونَ ٱلسَّمْعَ وَأَكْثَرُهُمْ كَـٰذِبُونَ
verses.transliteration: Yulqoonas-sam'a wa aksaruhum kaaziboon
verses.translation: Wo sunte hain, lekin unmein se zyada jhoot bolne waale hote hain.

verses.arabic: وَٱلشُّعَرَآءُ يَتَّبِعُهُمُ ٱلْغَاوُۥنَ
verses.transliteration: Wash-shu'araaa'u yattabi'uhumul-ghaawoon
verses.translation: Aur shoaara ko sirf gumraah log hi follow karte hain.

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّهُمْ فِى كُلِّ وَادٍۢ يَهِيمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Alam tara annahum fee kulli waadin yaheemoon
verses.translation: Kya tumne nahi dekha ke wo har waadi mein bhatakte phirte hain?

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّهُمْ يَقُولُونَ مَا لَا يَفْعَلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa annahum yaqooloona maa laa yaf'aloon
verses.translation: Aur wo kahte hain jo wo karte nahi hain?

verses.arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ وَذَكَرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ كَثِيرًۭا وَٱنتَصَرُوا۟ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا ظُلِمُوا۟ ۗ وَسَيَعْلَمُ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوٓا۟ أَىَّ مُنقَلَبٍۢ يَنقَلِبُونَ
verses.transliteration: Illal-lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus-saalihaati wa zakarullaaha kaseeranw-wa-ntasaroo mim-ba'di maa zulimoo; wa sa ya'lamul-lazeena zalamoo ayya munqalabi yanqaliboon
verses.translation: Siwaaye un logon ke jo imaan laaye aur unhon ne nek amal kiya aur Allah ka bohot zyada zikar kiya, aur unhone badla liya baad apne zulm ke baad; aur yaqeenan un logon ko jo zulm karte hain jaldi maloom ho jaayega ke wo kis jagah lautne waale hain.

verses.arabic: تَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِى بِيَدِهِ ٱلْمُلْكُ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ قَدِيرٌ
verses.transliteration: Tabaarakal lazee biyadihil mulku wa huwa 'alaa kulli shai'in qadeer
verses.translation: Woh zaat badi baabarkat hai jiske haath mein baadshaahi hai aur woh har cheez par khoob qaadir hai.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلْمَوْتَ وَٱلْحَيَوٰةَ لِيَبْلُوَكُمْ أَيُّكُمْ أَحْسَنُ عَمَلًۭا ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْغَفُورُ
verses.transliteration: Allazee khalaqal mawta walhayaata liyabluwakum ayyukum ahsanu 'amalaa; wa huwal 'azeezul ghafoor
verses.translation: Woh jisne maut-o-hayaat ko paida kiya taake woh tumhein aazmaaye ke tum mein se kaun amal mein ziyaadah achchha hai. aur woh zabardast hai khoob bakhshne waala.
verses.deepMeaning: Ya'ni tum mein se kaun ahsan tareeqe se nek amal karta hai jo ke sirf razaa-e-ilaahi ke liye aur Muhammad ﷺ ki sunnat ke mutaabiq ho.

verses.arabic: الَّذِي خَلَقَ سَبْعَ سَمُوتٍ طِبَاقًا مَا تَرَى فِي خَلْقِ الرَّحْمَنِ مِن تَقوتٍ فَارْجع الْبَصَرَ هَلْ تَرَى مِنْ فُطُورٍ
verses.transliteration: Allazee khalaqa sab'a samaawaatin tibaagan maa taraa fee khalqir Rahmaan min tafaawut farji'il-basara hal taraa min futoor
verses.translation: Woh jisne saat aasmaan oupar neeche paida kiye. (Aye insaan!) tu Rahmaan ki takhleed na mein dekh koyi phir nigaah daal, kiya tu koyi daraad dekhta hai?
verses.deepMeaning: Ba'z dafa' dobaarah ghaur se dekhne se koyi nuqs aur aib nikal aata hai. Allah Ta'ala dawat de rahaa hai ke baar baar dekh kar kiya tumhein koyi shigaaf nazar aata hai?

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ ٱرْجِعِ ٱلْبَصَرَ كَرَّتَيْنِ يَنقَلِبْ إِلَيْكَ ٱلْبَصَرُ خَاسِئًۭا وَهُوَ حَسِيرٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Summarji'il-basara karratayni yanqalib 'ilaykal-basaru khaasi'añu wa huwa haseer
verses.translation: Phir baar baar nigaah dauda, (teri) nigaah o-khaar ho kar teri taraf laut aayegi jabke woh thaki maandi hogi.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ زَيَّنَّا ٱلسَّمَآءَ ٱلدُّنْيَا بِمَصَـٰبِيحَ وَجَعَلْنَـٰهَا رُجُومًۭا لِّلشَّيَـٰطِينِ ۖ وَأَعْتَدْنَا لَهُمْ عَذَابَ ٱلسَّعِيرِ
verses.transliteration: Walaqad zayyannas-samaa'ad-dunyaa bimasabeeha wa ja'alnaha rujooman-lish-shayaateeni wa 'a'tadnaa lahum 'azaabas-sa'eer
verses.translation: Aur bilaashubah humne aasmaan-e-duniya ko chiraaghon se zeenat di hai, aur unhein shaytaanon ko maar bhagaane ka zariah banaaya hai aur humne unke liye bhadakti aag ka azaab tayyaar kar rakkha hai.
verses.deepMeaning: Mulaahazah karein haashyah: (Surah An'aam:6/97)

verses.arabic: وَلِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِرَبِّهِمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ ۖ وَبِئْسَ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
verses.transliteration: Wa lillazeena kafaroo birabbihim 'azaabu Jahannam wa bi'sal-maşeer
verses.translation: Aur jin logon ne apne rab se kufr kiya, unke liye jahannam ka azaab bai, aur (woh) bura thhekaana hai.

verses.arabic: إِذَآ أُلْقُوا۟ فِيهَا سَمِعُوا۟ لَهَا شَهِيقًۭا وَهِىَ تَفُورُ
verses.transliteration: Izaa 'ulqoo feehaa sami'oo lahaa shaheeqaňw-wa hiya tafoor
verses.translation: Jab woh uss mein daale jaayenge to uski dahaad sunenge aur woh josh maar rahi hogi.

verses.arabic: تَكَادُ تَمَيَّزُ مِنَ ٱلْغَيْظِ ۖ كُلَّمَآ أُلْقِىَ فِيهَا فَوْجٌۭ سَأَلَهُمْ خَزَنَتُهَآ أَلَمْ يَأْتِكُمْ نَذِيرٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Takadu tamayyazu minal ghayz kullamaaa ulqiya feehaa fawjun sa'alahum khazanatuhaaa 'alam ya'tikum nazeer
verses.translation: Qareeb hai ke woh ghazab se phat pade. Jab bhi koyi giroh uss mein daala jaayega, uske daarogha unse poocheing: kiya tumhaare paas koyi daraane waala nahi aaya tha?

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ بَلَىٰ قَدْ جَآءَنَا نَذِيرٌۭ فَكَذَّبْنَا وَقُلْنَا مَا نَزَّلَ ٱللَّهُ مِن شَىْءٍ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا فِى ضَلَـٰلٍۢ كَبِيرٍۢ
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo balaa qad jaaa'anaa nazeerun fakazzabnaa wa qulnaa maa nazzalal-laahu min shay'in in 'antum illaa fee dalaalin kabeer
verses.translation: Woh kahenge: kyun nahi! hamaare paas aaya tha, chunaanche humne (uss daraane waale ko) jhuthlaa diya aur kaha ke Allah ne (kisi par) koyi cheez nahi utaari, tum to buhat hi bady gumraahi mein ho.

verses.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ لَوْ كُنَّا نَسْمَعُ أَوْ نَعْقِلُ مَا كُنَّا فِىٓ أَصْحَـٰبِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ
verses.transliteration: Wa qaaloo law kunnaa nasma'u aw na'qilu maa kunnaa fee ashaabis-sa'eer
verses.translation: Aur woh kahenge: kaash hum sunte ya samajhte hote to hum dozakhiyon mein na hote.

verses.arabic: فَٱعْتَرَفُوا۟ بِذَنۢبِهِمْ فَسُحْقًۭا لِّأَصْحَـٰبِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ
verses.transliteration: Fa'atarafuu bizanbihim fasuhqan li ashaabis-sa'eer
verses.translation: Phir woh apne gunaah ka iqraar karenge, dozakhiyon par la'nat hai.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخْشَوْنَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلْغَيْبِ لَهُم مَّغْفِرَةٌۭ وَأَجْرٌۭ كَبِيرٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Innal lazeena yakhshawna rabbahum bilghaybi lahum maghfiratunw-wa ajrun kabeer
verses.translation: Beshak jo log be dekhe apne rab ka khauf rakhte hain, unke liye maghfirat aur bahut bada ajar hai.

verses.arabic: وَأَسِرُّوا۟ قَوْلَكُمْ أَوِ ٱجْهَرُوا۟ بِهِۦٓ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
verses.transliteration: Wa asirroo qawlakum awijharoo bih inahoo 'aleemun bizaatis-sudoor
verses.translation: Aur tum apni baat chhupaa kar kaho, beshak woh seeno ki baat ko jaanne waala hai.

verses.arabic: أَلَا يَعْلَمُ مَنْ خَلَقَ وَهُوَ ٱللَّطِيفُ ٱلْخَبِيرُ
verses.transliteration: Alaa ya'lamu man khalaqa wa huwal-lateeful-khabeer
verses.translation: Bhala woh na jaane jisne sabko paida kiya? woh baareek been, khabar daar hai.

verses.arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ ذَلُولًۭا فَٱمْشُوا۟ فِى مَنَاكِبِهَا وَكُلُوا۟ مِن رِّزْقِهِۦ ۖ وَإِلَيْهِ ٱلنُّشُورُ
verses.transliteration: Huwal lazee ja'ala lakumul arda dhaloolan famshoo fee manaakibiha wa kuloo mir rizqihi wa ilaihin nushoor
verses.translation: Wahi hai jisne zameen ko tumhaare taabe' kar diya, chalo uski raahon mein aur uss (Allah) ke rizq mein se khao, aur usi ke paas dobaara uth kar jaana hai.

verses.arabic: ءَأَمِنتُم مَّن فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَن يَخْسِفَ بِكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ فَإِذَا هِىَ تَمُورُ
verses.transliteration: A'amintum man fissamaa'i any-yakhsifa bikumul arda fa-izaa hiya tamoor
verses.translation: Kiya tum uss (Allah) se be khauf ho gaye ho jo aasamaan mein hai, ke woh tumhein zameen mein dhansa de to nagahaan woh larazne lage?

verses.arabic: أَمْ أَمِنتُم مَّن فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَن يُرْسِلَ عَلَيْكُمْ حَاصِبًۭا ۖ فَسَتَعْلَمُونَ كَيْفَ نَذِيرِ
verses.transliteration: Am amintum man fissamaa'i any-yursila 'alaykum haasiba; fasata'lamoona kayfa nazeer
verses.translation: Ya tum uss (Allah) se bekhauf ho gaye ho jo aasamaan mein hai, ke woh tum par patthar waali aandhi bheje? phir jald tum jaan loge ki mera daraana kaisa hai.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad kazzabal lazeena min qablihim fakayfa kaana nakeer
verses.translation: Aur bilaashubah takzeeb kar chuke woh jo unse pehle the, chunaanche (dekh lo) ke mera azaab kaisa tha.

verses.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ إِلَى ٱلطَّيْرِ فَوْقَهُمْ صَـٰٓفَّـٰتٍۢ وَيَقْبِضْنَ ۚ مَا يُمْسِكُهُنَّ إِلَّا ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ بَصِيرٌ
verses.transliteration: Awa lam yaraw ilat tayri fawqahum saaffatinw-wa yaqbidn maa yumsikuhunna illar-Rahmaan; innahoo bikulli shay'in baseer
verses.translation: Kiya unhon ne apne oopar parinde nahi dekhe, ke phailaate aur sikaate hue, unhein (Allah) Rahmaan ke siwa koyi nahi thaamta, beshak woh har cheez ko dekh raha hai.

verses.arabic: أَمَّنْ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى هُوَ جُندٌۭ لَّكُمْ يَنصُرُكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ۚ إِنِ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ إِلَّا فِى غُرُورٍ
verses.transliteration: Amman haazal lazee huwa jundullakum yansurukum min doonir-Rahmaan; inilkafiroona illa fee ghuroor
verses.translation: Bhala aisa kaun hai jo tumhein madad karega Rahmaan ke siwa? kaafir to bas dhokey mein hi hain.

verses.arabic: أَمَّنْ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى يَرْزُقُكُمْ إِنْ أَمْسَكَ رِزْقَهُۥ ۚ بَل لَّجُّوا۟ فِى عُتُوٍّۢ وَنُفُورٍ
verses.transliteration: Amman haazal lazee yarzuqukum in amsaka rizqah; bal lajjoo fee 'utuwwinw-wa nufoor
verses.translation: Bhala aisa kaun hai jo tumhein rizq de agar (koyi nahi) lekin woh sar kash aur dur hue hain.

verses.arabic: أَفَمَن يَمْشِى مُكِبًّا عَلَىٰ وَجْهِهِۦٓ أَهْدَىٰٓ أَمَّن يَمْشِى سَوِيًّا عَلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍۢ مُّسْتَقِيمٍۢ
verses.transliteration: Afaman-yamshii mukibban 'alaa wajhihi a'ahdaa ammany-yamshii sawiyyan 'alaa siraatim-mustaqeem
verses.translation: Bhala jo shakhs ondha ho kar apne chehre ke bal chalta ho, woh ziyaadah hidaayat yaafta hai ya woh jo bilkul seedha ho kar siraat-e-mustaqeem chalta ho?

verses.arabic: قُلْ هُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَكُمْ وَجَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمْعَ وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرَ وَٱلْأَفْـِٔدَةَ ۖ قَلِيلًۭا مَّا تَشْكُرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qul huwal lazee ansha'akum wa ja'ala lakumus-sam'a wal-absara wal-af'ida; qaleelam-maa tashkuroon
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: wahi hai jisne tumhein paida kiya aur tumhaare liye kaan aur aankhein aur dil banaaye. tum kam hi shukr ada karte ho.

verses.arabic: قُلْ هُوَ ٱلَّذِى ذَرَأَكُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَإِلَيْهِ تُحْشَرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qul huwal lazee zara'akum fil-ardi wa ilaihi tuhsharoon
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: wahi hai jisne tumhein zameen mein phailaaya, aur usi ke huzoor tum ekattha kiye jaoge.

verses.arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَـٰذَا ٱلْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa yaqooloona mataa haazal-wa'du in kuntum saadiqeen
verses.translation: Aur woh (kaafir) kahte hain ke yeh waadah kab (pura) hoga agar tum sacche ho?

verses.arabic: قُلْ إِنَّمَا ٱلْعِلْمُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَإِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٌۭ مُّبِينٌۭ
verses.transliteration: Qul innamal-ilmu 'indal-laahi wa innamaa anaa nazeerum-mubeen
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: beshak (uska ilm) to sirf Allah ke paas hai, aur mai to bas ek saaf taur par daraane waala hoon.

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّا رَأَوْهُ زُلْفَةًۭ سِيٓـَٔتْ وُجُوهُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَقِيلَ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَدَّعُونَ
verses.transliteration: Falammaa ra-awhu zulfatan see'at wujoohul-lazeena kafaroo wa qeela haazal-lazee kuntum bihee tadda'oon
verses.translation: Phir jab woh usse qareeb dekhenge to kaafirion ke chehre bigad jaayenge aur kaha jaayega: yahi hai jo tum maanga karte the.

verses.arabic: قُلْ أَرَءَيْتُمْ إِنْ أَهْلَكَنِىَ ٱللَّهُ وَمَن مَّعِىَ أَوْ رَحِمَنَا فَمَن يُجِيرُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ مِنْ عَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍۢ
verses.transliteration: Qul ara'aytum in ahlakaniyallaahu wa mam ma'iya aw rahimanaa famai-yujeerul-kaafireena min 'azaabin aleem
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: bhala dekho to! agar tumhaare saath hain, halaak karde ya hum par rahm kare, kaun hai jo kaafiron ko dardnaak azaab se bacha sake?

verses.arabic: قُلْ هُوَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦ وَعَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْنَا فَسَتَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ هُوَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍۢ مُّبِينٍۢ
verses.transliteration: Qul huwar-Rahmaanu aamannaa bihee wa 'alaihi tawakkalnaa fasata'lamoona man huwa fee dalaalim-mubeen
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: wahi hai Rahmaan hai, hum uss par eemaan laaye aur usi par humne tawakkul kiya, chunaanche tum jald jaan loge ke kaun khuli gumraahi mein hai.

verses.arabic: قُلْ أَرَءَيْتُمْ إِنْ أَصْبَحَ مَآؤُكُمْ غَوْرًۭا فَمَن يَأْتِيكُم بِمَآءٍۢ مَّعِينٍۭ
verses.transliteration: Qul ara'aytum in asbaha maaa'ukum ghawran famai-yateekum bimaaa'im-ma'een
verses.translation: Kah deejiye: bhala dekho to! Agar tumhaara (kunwon ka) paani zameen ke neeche utar jaaye, to kaun hai jo tumhein paasa zameen se nikaal kar laaega.

verses.arabic: a
verses.transliteration: a
verses.translation: a

verses.arabic: a
verses.transliteration: a
verses.translation: a

verses.arabic: a
verses.transliteration: a
verses.translation: a

verses.arabic: a
verses.transliteration: a
verses.translation: a

verses.arabic: a
verses.transliteration: a
verses.translation: a

verses.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْمُزَّمِّلُ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa ayyuhal muzzammil
verses.translation: O you who wraps himself [in clothing],

verses.arabic: قُمِ ٱلَّيْلَ إِلَّا قَلِيلًۭا
verses.transliteration: Qumi allayla illaa qaleelaa
verses.translation: Arise [to pray] the night, except for a little -

verses.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْمُدَّثِّرُ
verses.transliteration: Yaaa ayyuhal muddaththir
verses.translation: O you who covers himself [with a garment],

verses.arabic: قُمْ فَأَنذِرْ
verses.transliteration: Qum fa-andhir
verses.translation: Arise and warn

verses.arabic: لَآ أُقْسِمُ بِيَوْمِ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ
verses.transliteration: Laa uqsimu bi Yawmil Qiyaamah
verses.translation: I swear by the Day of Resurrection

verses.arabic: وَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِٱلنَّفْسِ ٱللَّوَّامَةِ
verses.transliteration: Wa laaa uqsimu bin-nafsil lawwaamah
verses.translation: And I swear by the reproaching soul [to the certainty of resurrection].

verses.arabic: هَلْ أَتَىٰ عَلَى ٱلْإِنسَـٰنِ حِينٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلدَّهْرِ لَمْ يَكُن شَيْـًۭٔا مَّذْكُورًا
verses.transliteration: Hal ataa 'alal insaani heenum minad-dahri lam yakun shay-am madhkooraa
verses.translation: Has there [not] come upon man a period of time when he was not a thing [even] mentioned?

verses.arabic: إِنَّا خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ أَمْشَاجٍۢ نَّبْتَلِيهِ فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُ سَمِيعًۢا بَصِيرًا
verses.transliteration: Innaa khalaqnal insaana min nutfatin amshaajin nabtaleehi faja'alnaahu samee'am baseeraa
verses.translation: Indeed, We created man from a sperm-drop mixture that We may try him; and We made him hearing and seeing.

verses.arabic: وَٱلْمُرْسَلَـٰتِ عُرْفًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wal-mursalati 'urfa
verses.translation: By those [winds] sent forth in gusts

verses.arabic: فَٱلْعَـٰصِفَـٰتِ عَصْفًۭا
verses.transliteration: Fal'aasifati 'asfa
verses.translation: And the winds that blow violently

verses.arabic: عَمَّ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
verses.transliteration: 'Amma yatasa'aloon
verses.translation: About what are they asking one another?

verses.arabic: عَنِ ٱلنَّبَإِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
verses.transliteration: 'Anin naba'il 'azeem
verses.translation: About the great news -

verses.arabic: وَٱلنَّـٰزِعَـٰتِ غَرْقًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wan-naazi'ati gharqa
verses.translation: By those [angels] who extract with violence

verses.arabic: وَٱلنَّـٰشِطَـٰتِ نَشْطًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wan-naashitaati nashta
verses.translation: And [by] those who remove with ease

verses.arabic: عَبَسَ وَتَوَلَّىٰٓ
verses.transliteration: 'Abasa wa tawalla
verses.translation: He frowned and turned away

verses.arabic: أَن جَآءَهُ ٱلْأَعْمَىٰ
verses.transliteration: An jaa'ahul a'ma
verses.translation: Because there came to him the blind man, [interrupting].

verses.arabic: إِذَا ٱلشَّمْسُ كُوِّرَتْ
verses.transliteration: Ithash shamsu kuwwirat
verses.translation: When the sun (with its spacious light) is folded up;

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلنُّجُومُ ٱنكَدَرَتْ
verses.transliteration: Wa ithan nujoomu inkadarat
verses.translation: When the stars fall, losing their lustre;

verses.arabic: إِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ ٱنفَطَرَتْ
verses.transliteration: Ithas samaaa'un fatarat
verses.translation: When the sky breaks apart

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلْكَوَاكِبُ ٱنتَثَرَتْ
verses.transliteration: Wa ithal kawaakibun tatharat
verses.translation: And when the stars fall, scattering

verses.arabic: وَيْلٌۭ لِّلْمُطَفِّفِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wailul lilmutaffifeen
verses.translation: Woe to those who give less [than due],

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ٱكْتَالُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ يَسْتَوْفُونَ
verses.transliteration: Allazeena ithaak taaloo 'alan naasi yastawfoon
verses.translation: Who, when they take a measure from people, take in full.

verses.arabic: إِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ ٱنشَقَّتْ
verses.transliteration: Ithas samaaa'un shaqqat
verses.translation: When the sky has split [open]

verses.arabic: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ
verses.transliteration: Wa athinat li Rabbihaa wa huqqat
verses.translation: And has listened [i.e., responded] to its Lord and was obligated [to do so]

verses.arabic: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلْبُرُوجِ
verses.transliteration: Wassamaaa'i zaatil burooj
verses.translation: By the sky containing great stars

verses.arabic: وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْمَوْعُودِ
verses.transliteration: Wal yawmil maw'ood
verses.translation: And [by] the promised Day

verses.arabic: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلطَّارِقِ
verses.transliteration: Wassamaaa'i wattaariq
verses.translation: By the sky and the night comer

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلطَّارِقُ
verses.transliteration: Wa maaa adraaka mattaariq
verses.translation: And what can make you know what is the night comer?

verses.arabic: سَبِّحِ ٱسْمَ رَبِّكَ ٱلْأَعْلَى
verses.transliteration: Sabbihisma Rabbikal A'laa
verses.translation: Exalt the name of your Lord, the Most High,

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ
verses.transliteration: Allazee khalaqa fasawwa
verses.translation: Who created and proportioned

verses.arabic: هَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ٱلْغَـٰشِيَةِ
verses.transliteration: Hal ataaka hadeethul ghaashiyah
verses.translation: Has there reached you the report of the Overwhelming [event]?

verses.arabic: وُجُوهٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍ خَـٰشِعَةٌ
verses.transliteration: Wujoohu yawnai'iz khaashi'ah
verses.translation: Some faces, that Day, will be humbled,

verses.arabic: وَٱلْفَجْرِ
verses.transliteration: Walfajr
verses.translation: By the dawn

verses.arabic: وَلَيَالٍ عَشْرٍۢ
verses.transliteration: Wa layaalin 'ashr
verses.translation: And [by] ten nights

verses.arabic: لَآ أُقْسِمُ بِهَـٰذَا ٱلْبَلَدِ
verses.transliteration: Laaa uqsimu bihaazal balad
verses.translation: I swear by this city, Makkah

verses.arabic: وَأَنتَ حِلٌّۭ بِهَـٰذَا ٱلْبَلَدِ
verses.transliteration: Wa anta hillum bihaazal balad
verses.translation: And you, [O Muhammad], are free of restriction in this city

verses.arabic: وَٱلشَّمْسِ وَضُحَىٰهَا
verses.transliteration: Wash-shamsi wa duhaa haa
verses.translation: By the sun and its brightness

verses.arabic: وَٱلْقَمَرِ إِذَا تَلَىٰهَا
verses.transliteration: Wal qamari ithaa talaa haa
verses.translation: And [by] the moon when it follows it

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Wallaili ithaa yaghshaa
verses.translation: By the night when it covers

verses.arabic: وَٱلنَّهَارِ إِذَا تَجَلَّىٰ
verses.transliteration: Wannahaari ithaa tajalla
verses.translation: And [by] the day when it appears

verses.arabic: وَٱلضُّحَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Wad duhaa
verses.translation: By the morning brightness

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا سَجَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Wallaili ithaa sajaa
verses.translation: And [by] the night when it covers with darkness

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ نَشْرَحْ لَكَ صَدْرَكَ
verses.transliteration: Alam nashrah laka sadrak
verses.translation: Did We not expand for you, [O Muhammad], your breast?

verses.arabic: وَوَضَعْنَا عَنكَ وِزْرَكَ
verses.transliteration: Wa wa da'naa 'anka wizrak
verses.translation: And We removed from you your burden

verses.arabic: وَٱلتِّينِ وَٱلزَّيْتُونِ
verses.transliteration: Watteeni wa zaitoon
verses.translation: By the fig and the olive

verses.arabic: وَطُورِ سِينِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa toori seeneen
verses.translation: And [by] Mount Sinai

verses.arabic: ٱقْرَأْ بِٱسْمِ رَبِّكَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ
verses.transliteration: Iqra' bismi rabbikal lazee khalaq
verses.translation: Recite in the name of your Lord who created

verses.arabic: خَلَقَ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ مِنْ عَلَقٍ
verses.transliteration: Khalaqal insaana min 'alaq
verses.translation: Created man from a clinging substance

verses.arabic: إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ فِى لَيْلَةِ ٱلْقَدْرِ
verses.transliteration: Innaaa anzalnaahu fee lailatil qadr
verses.translation: Indeed, We sent the Qur'an down during the Night of Decree

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا لَيْلَةُ ٱلْقَدْرِ
verses.transliteration: Wa maa adraaka maa lailatul qadr
verses.translation: And what can make you know what is the Night of Decree?

verses.arabic: لَمْ يَكُنِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ وَٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ مُنفَكِّينَ حَتَّىٰ تَأْتِيَهُمُ ٱلْبَيِّنَةُ
verses.transliteration: Lam yakunil lazeena kafaroo min Ahlil Kitaabi wal mushrikeena munfakkeena hattaa ta'tiyahumul baiyyinah
verses.translation: Those who disbelieved among the People of the Scripture and the polytheists were not to be parted [from misbelief] until there came to them clear evidence -

verses.arabic: رَسُولٌۭ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ يَتْلُوا۟ صُحُفًۭا مُّطَهَّرَةًۭ
verses.transliteration: Rasoolum minal laahi yatloo suhufam mutahharah
verses.translation: A Messenger from Allah, reciting purified scriptures

verses.arabic: إِذَا زُلْزِلَتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ زِلْزَالَهَا
verses.transliteration: Izaa zul zilatil ardu zil zaalaha
verses.translation: When the earth is shaken with its [final] earthquake

verses.arabic: وَأَخْرَجَتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ أَثْقَالَهَا
verses.transliteration: Wa akhrajatil ardu athqaalaha
verses.translation: And the earth discharges its burdens

verses.arabic: وَٱلْعَـٰدِيَـٰتِ ضَبْحًا
verses.transliteration: Wal'aadi yaati dhabhaa
verses.translation: By the racers, panting,

verses.arabic: فَٱلْمُورِيَـٰتِ قَدْحًا
verses.transliteration: Falmureeyaati qadh'aa
verses.translation: And the producers of sparks [when] striking

verses.arabic: ٱلْقَارِعَةُ
verses.transliteration: Al-Qari'ah
verses.translation: The Striking Calamity -

verses.arabic: مَا ٱلْقَارِعَةُ
verses.transliteration: Mal-Qari'ah
verses.translation: What is the Striking Calamity?

verses.arabic: أَلْهَىٰكُمُ ٱلتَّكَاثُرُ
verses.transliteration: Al-haakumut-takathur
verses.translation: Competition in [worldly] increase diverts you

verses.arabic: حَتَّىٰ زُرْتُمُ ٱلْمَقَابِرَ
verses.transliteration: Hattaa zurtumul-maqabir
verses.translation: Until you visit the graveyards

verses.arabic: وَٱلْعَصْرِ
verses.transliteration: Wal asr
verses.translation: By time

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ لَفِى خُسْرٍ
verses.transliteration: Innal insaana lafee khusr
verses.translation: Indeed, mankind is in loss,

verses.arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلصَّبْرِ
verses.transliteration: Illal lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati wa tawaasaw bil haqqi wa tawaasaw bis sabr
verses.translation: Except for those who have believed and done righteous deeds and advised each other to truth and advised each other to patience.

verses.arabic: وَيْلٌۭ لِّكُلِّ هُمَزَةٍۢ لُّمَزَةٍ
verses.transliteration: Waylulikulli humazatil lumazah
verses.translation: Woe to every scorner and mocker

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِى جَمَعَ مَالًۭا وَعَدَّدَهُۥ
verses.transliteration: Allazee jama'a maalanw wa 'addadah
verses.translation: Who collects wealth and [continuously] counts it.

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصْحَـٰبِ ٱلْفِيلِ
verses.transliteration: Alam tara kaifa fa'ala rabbuka bi ashaabil feel
verses.translation: Have you not considered, [O Muhammad], how your Lord dealt with the companions of the elephant?

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ يَجْعَلْ كَيْدَهُمْ فِى تَضْلِيلٍۢ
verses.transliteration: Alam yaj'al kai dahum fee tad leel
verses.translation: Did He not make their plan into misguidance?

verses.arabic: لِإِيلَـٰفِ قُرَيْشٍ
verses.transliteration: Li eelaafi quraysh
verses.translation: For the accustomed security of the Quraysh -

verses.arabic: إِۦلَـٰفِهِمْ رِحْلَةَ ٱلشِّتَآءِ وَٱلصَّيْفِ
verses.transliteration: Eelaafihim rihlatash shitaa'i was saif
verses.translation: Their accustomed security [in] the caravan of winter and summer

verses.arabic: أَرَءَيْتَ ٱلَّذِى يُكَذِّبُ بِٱلدِّينِ
verses.transliteration: Ara'aytal lazee yukazzibu bid deen
verses.translation: Have you seen the one who denies the Recompense?

verses.arabic: فَذَٰلِكَ ٱلَّذِى يَدُعُّ ٱلْيَتِيمَ
verses.transliteration: Fa thaalikal lazee yadu''ul yateem
verses.translation: For that is the one who drives away the orphan

verses.arabic: إِنَّآ أَعْطَيْنَـٰكَ ٱلْكَوْثَرَ
verses.transliteration: Innaa a'taynaakal kawthar
verses.translation: Indeed, We have granted you, [O Muhammad], al-Kawthar.

verses.arabic: فَصَلِّ لِرَبِّكَ وَٱنْحَرْ
verses.transliteration: Fa-salli li rabbika wanhar
verses.translation: So pray to your Lord and sacrifice [to Him alone]

verses.arabic: إِنَّ شَانِئَكَ هُوَ ٱلْأَبْتَرُ
verses.transliteration: Inna shaani'aka huwal abtar
verses.translation: Indeed, your enemy is the one cut off

verses.arabic: قُلْ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qul yaaa ayyuhal kaafiroon
verses.translation: Say, "O disbelievers,

verses.arabic: لَآ أَعْبُدُ مَا تَعْبُدُونَ
verses.transliteration: Laa a'budu maa ta'budoon
verses.translation: I do not worship what you worship.

verses.arabic: إِذَا جَآءَ نَصْرُ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلْفَتْحُ
verses.transliteration: Izaa jaaa'a nasrul laahi wal fath
verses.translation: When the victory of Allah has come and the conquest,

verses.arabic: وَرَأَيْتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدْخُلُونَ فِى دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفْوَاجًۭا
verses.transliteration: Wa ra-aitan naasa yadkhuloona fee deenil laahi afwajaa
verses.translation: And you see the people entering into the religion of Allah in multitudes,

verses.arabic: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسْتَغْفِرْهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابًۢا
verses.transliteration: Fasab bih bihamdi rabbika wastaghfir; innahoo kaana tawwaaba
verses.translation: Then exalt [Him] with praise of your Lord and ask forgiveness of Him. Indeed, He is ever Accepting of repentance.

verses.arabic: تَبَّتْ يَدَآ أَبِى لَهَبٍۢ وَتَبَّ
verses.transliteration: Tabbat yadaa abee lahabinw-wa tab
verses.translation: May the hands of Abu Lahab be ruined, and ruined is he.

verses.arabic: مَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُ مَالُهُۥ وَمَا كَسَبَ
verses.transliteration: Maaa aghnaa 'anhu maaluhu wa maa kasab
verses.translation: His wealth will not avail him or that which he gained.

verses.arabic: قُلْ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدٌ
verses.transliteration: Qul huwa Allahu ahad
verses.translation: Say, "He is Allah, [who is] One,

verses.arabic: ٱللَّهُ ٱلصَّمَدُ
verses.transliteration: Allahus samad
verses.translation: Allah, the Eternal Refuge.

verses.arabic: لَمْ يَلِدْ وَلَمْ يُولَدْ
verses.transliteration: Lam yalid wa lam yoolad
verses.translation: He neither begets nor is born,

verses.arabic: وَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُۥ كُفُوًا أَحَدٌۢ
verses.transliteration: Wa lam yakul lahoo kufuwan ahad
verses.translation: Nor is there to Him any equivalent."

verses.arabic: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلْفَلَقِ
verses.transliteration: Qul a'oozu bi rabbil-falaq
verses.translation: Say, "I seek refuge in the Lord of daybreak

verses.arabic: مِن شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
verses.transliteration: Min sharri maa khalaq
verses.translation: From the evil of that which He created

verses.arabic: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلنَّاسِ
verses.transliteration: Qul a'oozu birabbin naas
verses.translation: Say, "I seek refuge in the Lord of mankind,

verses.arabic: مَلِكِ ٱلنَّاسِ
verses.transliteration: Malikin naas
verses.translation: The Sovereign of mankind.
